The  बर्फ मुखाग्र is  approximately 60 m high
Ice formations in the Titlis  हिमानी गुफा
A glacier cave is a  गुफा formed भीतर  the ice of a glacier .
Glacier caves are often called ice caves , but this term is properly used to describe bedrock caves  कि contain year-round बर्फ  .
In physics , circular motion is a movement of an object along the  परिधि of a वृत्त or  rotation along a circular path .
It can be uniform , with constant angular rate of  रोटेशन ( और निरंतर गति )  , or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation .
The rotation around a fixed axis of a  three-dimensional देह involves  circular motion of its parts .
The equations of motion  describe the गति of the बीच  of mass of a body .
Examples of circular motion include : an artificial satellite orbiting the Earth at constant height , a stone  जिससे is tied to a रस्सी और is होने swung in वृत्त , a car turning through  a curve in a race track , an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field , and a gear turning inside a mechanism .
Since the object 's velocity vector is  constantly बदलना दिशा , the चलती ऑब्जेक्ट  is undergoing acceleration by a centripetal force in the direction of the center of rotation .
Without  इस त्वरण  , the object would move in a straight line , according to Newton 's laws of motion .
अपोलो पंथ is a fictional अक्षर इससे  the Rocky films , initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World .
He was played by Carl  weathers .
Creed had multiple nicknames , including The Master of Disaster , The King of Sting , The Dancing Destroyer , The Prince of Punch , The One and Only and The Count  of मोंटे  Fisto .
Urban legend  राज्य कि अपोलो पंथ 's नाम is a wordplay on the रसूलों  ' Creed , a statement of belief used in Christian churches .
All of Apollo 's championship fights were scheduled  लिये the 15 गोलाकार अलहदा .
Championship fights did not convert from 15 rounds  to 12  rounds until 1987 .
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red , white , and blue trunks ; Creed was the first man to wear them ( latterly worn by Rocky Balboa in the 3rd and 4th installments and finally by Tommy ``  the यंत्र '' gunn ( टॉमी मॉरिसन ) in the  5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white , as seen in Rocky II .
Balboa 's signature  रंगों यहूद ब्लैक और  gold—colors he used in the latest movie .
In the United States , the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and  पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति  Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the  परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य , जिनकी अस्तित्व और कुछ पहलुओं of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे  the constitutional power of Congress to alter , acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal  न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ शामिल the मुख्य  Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court , Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals , and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges  वर्णित यूँ दूर हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख  III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In  जोड , न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत  of International Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III .
Other judges serving in  the संघीय न्यायालयों  , including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges , are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however , they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate , and their power derives from Article I instead .
See  आलेख  I and Article III tribunals .
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a small pocket-sized semi-automatic pistol  designed by beretta in इटली  .
Production began in late  1984 , solely in the beretta u.s.A. सुविधा  in Accokeek , Maryland .
It is a further development of the Beretta Model 20 , whose  उत्पादन ended in 1985  .
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to VUL ) is a type of life  बीमे कि builds a नकदी  value .
In a VUL , the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of  पृथक खाते , समान to परस्पर निधि , और the चुनाव  of which of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner .
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to this ability to invest in separate accounts whose values vary—they vary because they are invested in  भण्डार and/or बंध बाज़ार  .
The 'universal ' component  in the नाम refers to the  flexibility the owner has in making premium payments .
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to  maximums पारिभाषित by the आतंरिक आय कोड लिये  life insurance .
इस लचीलापन is in कंट्रास्ट to पूरे जीवन बीमे कि रै फिक्स्ड प्रीमियम भुगतान  that typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an Automatic Premium Loan feature , or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ) .
परिवर्तनीय सार्वभौमिक जीवन is a प्रकार of स्थाई जीवन बीमे  , because the death benefit will be paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy .
With most if not all VULs , unlike whole  जीवन , वहीँ is no endowment आयु ( the आयु  at which the cash value equals the death benefit amount , which for whole life is typically 100 ) .
This is yet  another कुंजी लाभ  of VUL over Whole Life .
With a typical whole life policy , the death benefit is limited to the face amount specified in the policy , and at endowment age , the face  राशि is सब कि is सशुल्क आउट .
Thus with  either मौत or endowment , the बीमे  company keeps any cash value built up over the years .
However , some participating whole life policies offer riders which specify that any dividends paid on the policy be used to purchase `` paid up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value and  the मौत  benefit over time .
If investments made in the separate  खाते out-perform the सामान्य  account of the insurance company , a higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life .
The combination over the years of no  endowment आयु , continually increasing  death benefit , and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy , this could result in higher value to the owner or beneficiary than that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums .
The outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the classic wood stove adapted for set-up outdoors while  स्टिल transferring the ऊष्मा  to interior buildings .

Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by Girl  स्काउट of the यूएसए ( gsusa )  as one of its major fundraisers for local Scout units .
Members of the GSUSA have been selling  कुकीज़ चूंकि 1917 to  raise funds .
लड़कियों जो participate can  earn prizes for their efforts .
There are also unit incentives if  the ईकाई as a पूरे करता  well .
As of 2007 , sales were estimated at about 200  लाख  boxes per year .
विश्वविद्यालयों  Hall
Purdue University  , स्तिथ in वेस्ट lafayette , इंडियाना , is the  flagship university of the six-campus Purdue University system .
Purdue was founded on May 6 , 1869 , as a land-grant university when the Indiana General Assembly , taking advantage of the Morrill Act , accepted a donation of land and money from  lafayette बिजनेसमैन जॉन purdue to स्थापित a कॉलेज of विज्ञान , प्रौद्योगिकी ,  and agriculture in his name .
The first classes  यहूद आयोजित on सितंबर 16 , 1874  , with six instructors and 39 students .
Today , Purdue is a member of the Big Ten  सम्मेलन , और is  a well known world-class research institution .
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in Indiana as well as the fourth largest  अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of कोई विश्वविद्यालयों in the  United States .
Purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate programs in over 211 major  क्षेत्रों of पढ़ाई , और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके  competitive engineering curricula .
The university has also been  अत्यधिक influential in अमेरिका 's इतिहास of विमानन , having स्थापित  the first college credit offered in flight training , the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation , and the first university airport ( Purdue University Airport ) .
Purdue 's  विमानन प्रौद्योगिकी  program remains one of the most competitive aviation-specific programs in the world .
In the mid-20th  सदी , purdue 's विमानन  program expanded to encompass advanced spaceflight technology giving rise to Purdue 's nickname , Cradle of Astronauts .
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts , including Gus Grissom ( one of the original Mercury Seven astronauts ) , Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on  the  moon ) , and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ) .
A sebaceous  गाँठ ( ) is a पद कि  loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( also known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ) .
क्युकी an epidermoid गाँठ originates in the epidermis  and a pilar cyst originates from hair follicles , by definition , neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst .
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty , white , semi-solid material in both of these cyst entities  is नहीं sebum , लकिन keratin  .
Furthermore , under the microscope  neither एंटिटी contains वसामय  glands .
In practice ,  however , the  terms are often used interchangeably .
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and are  ज्ञात as steatocystomas  or , if multiple , as steatocystoma multiplex .
आधुनिक  pointe shoes .
The  किनारे of the टो pad , जिससे  is inserted between the foot and toe box for cushioning , can be seen on the right foot .
A pointe shoe is a type of shoe worn by ballet dancers when  performing pointe कार्य .
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like and have  विकसित to enable नर्तक to नृत्य  en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time .
They are normally worn by female dancers , though male dancers  may  wear them for unorthodox roles such as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella , Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's Dream , or men performing as women in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva .
They are manufactured  in a किस्में of रंगों , सबसे  commonly in shades of light pink .
This tablespoon has a capacity of  परिचय 15 ml  .
measuring  Spoons
In the US and parts of Canada , a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for  खाने इससे a कटोरी  .
In the UK , Europe and most  राष्ट्रमंडल देशों  , a tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually used for serving .
in देशों जहाँ a tablespoon  is a serving spoon , the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon .
A tablespoonful , nominally the  क्षमता of एक tablespoon  , is commonly used as a measure of volume in cooking .
It is  abbreviated as t ,  tb , tbs , tbsp , tblsp , or tblspn .
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated  by विधि और is विषय  to considerable variation .
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is approximately 15 mL ;  the क्षमता of an वास्तविक tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) सीमाएँ  from 7 mL to 14 mL .
In Australia one tablespoon (  मापन ईकाई )  is 20 mL .
Harry Potter is a  श्रेणी of सात काल्पनिक  novels written by the British author J. K. Rowling .
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard ,  हैरी कुम्हार , और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर  , all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry .
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort , whose aims are to become immortal , conquer the wizarding  संसार  , subjugate non-magical people , and destroy all those who stand in his way , especially Harry Potter .
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone on 30 June 1997 , the books  have gained immense लोकप्रियता , नाजुक acclaim और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी  worldwide .
The series has also had some share of  आलोचना , सहित चिंता लिये the  increasingly dark tone .
, the book series has sold  परिचय 450 लाख नक़ल , बनाना it the best-selling  book series in history , and has been translated into 67 languages .
The last four books consecutively set records as the  fastest-selling किताबे in इतिहास  .
A series of many genres , including  काल्पनिक और coming  of age ( with elements of mystery , thriller , adventure , and romance ) , it has many cultural meanings and references .
According  to रोलिंग ,  the main theme is death .
There are also many other  विषयवस्तु  in the series , such as prejudice and corruption .
The initial major publishers  of the किताबे यहूद  Bloomsbury in the United Kingdom and Scholastic Press in the United States .
The books have since been published by many publishers  विश्वव्यापी  .
The books , with the seventh book split into two parts , have been made  into an eight-part फिल्मी श्रेणी by warner भाईs.  Pictures , the highest-grossing film series of all time .
The  श्रेणी भी originated much tie-in  merchandise , making the Harry Potter brand worth in excess of $ 15 billion .
Also due to the success of the books and films , Harry Potter has been used for a theme  पार्क , the wizarding संसार of  Harry Potter in Universal Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure .

The nearly transparent exhaust is due to this engine 's  exhaust होने ज़्यादातर अतितप्त  steam ( water vapor from its propellants , hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking  5c प्रक्षेपास्त्र  engine
A  प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन , or बस `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '' , is a जेट इंजन  that uses only stored propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet .
Rocket  इंजन हैं प्रतिक्रिया इंजन और obtain thrust in  accordance with Newton 's third law .
Since they need no external material to form their  जेट , प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन can be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft  propulsion as well as terrestrial uses , such as missiles .
Most rocket engines are  आतंरिक दहन इंजन ,  although non-combusting forms also exist .
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities , are by far the lightest , but are the least propellant  कुशल of सब  types of jet engines .
`` ... Baby One More Time ''  is a सोंग by अमरीकी  recording artist Britney Spears .
It served as Spears 's debut single and  शीर्षक track इससे उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम , ... baby एक  More Time ( 1999 ) .
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and Rami , `` ... Baby One More Time '' was released on September 30 , 1998 ,  by  Jive Records .
After recording and sending a demo tape with an unused song from Toni Braxton  , स्पीयर्स हस्ताक्षरित a multi-album सौदे साथ jive  .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and  dance-pop सोंग कि refers to a लड़की  who regrets breaking up with her boyfriend .
The song received  generally अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे  critics , who praised its composition .
`` ... Baby One  अधिक समय '' attained वैश्विक कामयाबी , reaching  number one in every country it charted .
It also received numerous certifications around the world , and is one of the best-selling singles of all  समय , साथ over 10 लाख  copies sold .
An accompanying music video , directed by Nigel Dick , portrays Spears as a  छात्र इससे a कैथोलिक ऊँची स्कूल , जो starts to daydream कि वो is गायन और नाचना  around the school , while watching her love interest from afar .
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy  `` ( 2008 ) , जहाँ स्पीयर्स  's fictional daughter is dressed with a similar schoolgirl outfit while wearing pink ribbons in her hair .
In 2010 , the music video for `` ... Baby One More Time '' was  voted the तीसरा सबसे influential  video in the history of pop music , in a poll held by Jam ! .
Spears has performed `` ... Baby One More Time '' in a number of live  दिखावे और in सब  of her concert tours .
It was the encore of the ... Baby One More Time Tour ( 1999 ) and Dream Within a Dream Tour ( 2001 ) ; Spears also performed remixed  संस्करण of the सोंग दौरान the उफ़ ! ...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 )  , the गोमेद होटल दौरे ( 2004 ) , the m+m  's Tour ( 2007 ) , The Circus Starring Britney Spears ( 2009 ) , and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ) .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance , and has  महरूम शामिल in सूचियाँ by ब्लेंडर  , Rolling Stone and VH1 .
It has been  विख्यात लिये redefining  the sound of late 1990s music .
Spears has named `` ... Baby One More Time '' as  एक of उसके पसंदीदा गीतों  from her career .
It was also the final song to be played on the BBC 's music  कार्यक्रम शीर्ष of the चबूतरे  .
Cholera is an infection in the small intestine caused  by the  bacterium Vibrio cholerae .
The main  लक्षण हैं watery  diarrhea and vomiting .
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that  रै महरूम contaminated by the मल ( बर्बाद उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित  person , including one with no apparent symptoms .
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to rapid  निर्जलीकरण और electrolyte असंतुलन , और मौत in  some cases .
The primary treatment is oral  पुनर्जलीकरण चिकित्सा , typically साथ  oral rehydration solution , to replace water and electrolytes .
If this is not tolerated or does not provide improvement fast enough , intravenous fluids can  भी be प्रयुक्त  .
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with severe  बीमारी to shorten इसके  duration and severity .
Worldwide , it affects 3–5  लाख  people and causes 100,000–130,000 deaths a year .
Cholera was one of  the earliest infections  to be studied by epidemiological methods .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only  प्रकाशित अनोखा by ऑस्कर वाइल्ड , appearing as the सीसे  story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890 , printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine .
The magazine 's editors feared the story was  अभद्र as सुपुर्द , so वे censored roughly 500 शब्द ,  without Wilde 's knowledge , before publication .
But even with that , the story was still greeted with  आक्रोश by अंग्रेजों reviewers , कुछ of जिसको सुझाया कि वाइल्ड  should be prosecuted on moral grounds , leading Wilde to defend the novel aggressively in letters to the British press .
Wilde later revised the story for book publication , making substantial alterations , deleting controversial  passages , adding नई अध्याय और सहित an aphoristic preface जिससे  has since become famous in its own right .
The amended version was published by Ward , Lock and  कम्पनी in अप्रैल 1891  .
Some scholars believe  कि वाइल्ड होता आज  have wanted us to read the version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's .
The novel tells of a young man named Dorian Gray , the subject  of a पेंटिंग  by artist Basil Hallward .
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated with him , believing his beauty is responsible for  a नई विधि in  his art .
डोरियन meets रब हेनरी wotton  , a friend of Basil 's , and becomes enthralled by Lord Henry 's world view .
Espousing a new hedonism ,  रब हेनरी suggests  the only things worth pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses .
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade , Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell  उसके आत्मा to ensure  the portrait Basil has painted would age rather than he .
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled , and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery , the portrait serves as a reminder of  the प्रभाव प्रत्येक अधिनियम रै upon उसके आत्मा , साथ प्रत्येक सिन प्रदर्शित as a disfigurement  of his form , or through a sign of aging .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is  माना a कार्य of क्लासिक गोथिक  fiction with a strong Faustian theme .
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ) , known as Zsa Zsa Gabor ( ) , is a Hungarian -born American actress who acted in supporting roles in movies , on  ब्रॉडवे , और occasionally  on television .
Gabor  थी भी a socialite  .
She began her stage career in Vienna at  आयु 15 , और थी पहनाया मिस  Hungary in 1936 .
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after actress with `` European  फ्लेयर और स्टाइल ''  , with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace '' .
Her first movie role was as  supporting अभिनेत्री  in Lovely to Look At .
She later acted  in we 're  Not Married !
and  निभाई एक of उसके few अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ  in Moulin Rouge ( 1952 ) , directed by John Huston , who described her as a `` creditable '' actress .
besides उसके फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न  appearances , she is best known for having nine husbands , including hotel magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders .
She once stated , `` Men have always liked  me और i  have always liked men .
But I like a mannish man , a man who knows  कैसा to बात to और दावत a  woman – not just a man with muscles . ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan  ; 27 नवम्बर 1940 – 20 जुलाई 1973 ) थी a चाइनीज  American martial artist , actor , martial arts instructor , philosopher , and filmmaker .
The  संस्थापक of जीत kune  Do , Lee was the son of Cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen .
He is widely considered by commentators , critics , media and other martial artists  to be एक of the  most influential martial artists of all time , and a pop culture icon of the 20th century .
He is often credited with helping to change the way  एशियाइ यहूद प्रस्तुत in अमरीकी films  .
Lee was born in Chinatown , San Francisco on 27  नवम्बर 1940 to अभिभावक इससे हांग काँग  and was raised in Kowloon with his family until his late teens .
He was introduced to the  फिल्मी उद्योग by उसके पिता  and appeared in several films as a child actor .
ली स्थानांतरित to the संयुक्त राज्य at the आयु of  18 to receive his higher education , and it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts .
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated  the परंपरागत हांग काँग martial कला  film to a new level of popularity and acclaim , sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s .
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced martial arts and martial arts films in Hong  काँग और the बाकी of the संसार  .
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way  of the ड्रैगन ( 1972 ) , निर्देशित और लिखा by ली ; warner भाइयो ' डालें the ड्रैगन ( 1973 ) और  The Game of Death ( 1978 ) , both directed by Robert Clouse .
Lee  became an iconic फिगर ज्ञात throughout  the world , particularly among the Chinese , as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films .
He initially trained in Wing Chun , but later rejected well-defined martial art styles , favouring instead the use of techniques from various sources , in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy , which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do (  the रास्ता of the intercepting  Fist ) .
Lee  आयोजित डुअल नागरिकता  of Hong Kong and the United States .
He died in  कोलून टोंग  on 20 July 1973 at age 32 .
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ) , chronic  obstructive airway बीमारी ( coad ) , दीर्घकालिक airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive  respiratory disease ( CORD ) , is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema , a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time .
This limits airflow to and from  the  lungs , causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ) .
In clinical practice , COPD is defined by its  characteristically कम airflow on फेफड़ों फलन  tests .
In contrast to asthma , this  limitation is poorly reversible और प्रायः  gets progressively worse over time .
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas , most commonly  इससे तम्बाकू धूम्रपान , जिससे triggers  an abnormal inflammatory response in the lung .
The  निदान of  COPD requires lung function tests .
Important management  रणनीति हैं धूम्रपान cessation , vaccinations , पुनर्वास  , and drug therapy ( often using inhalers ) .
कुछ मरीजों go on  to require long-term oxygen therapy or lung transplantation .
Worldwide , COPD ranked  as the छठे अग्रणी कारण  of death in 1990 .
It is projected to  become the चौथी अग्रणी कारण  of death worldwide by 2030 , due to an increase in smoking rates and demographic changes in many countries .
COPD is the  तीसरा अग्रणी कारण  of death in the U.S. , and the economic burden of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity .
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank ( , ? , ; 12 June  1929early  March 1945 ) is one of the most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust .
Her diary has been the basis for  अनेक plays और  films .
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in  वाइमर जर्मनी , वो जिया  most of her life in or near Amsterdam , in the Netherlands .
Born a German  नेशनल  , Frank lost her citizenship in 1941 .
She gained international fame posthumously after her diary  थी प्रकाशित  .
It documents her experiences  छुपाना दौरान the जर्मनी occupation  of the Netherlands in World War II .
The Frank family moved from Germany  to एम्सटर्डम  in 1933 , the year the Nazis gained control over Germany .
By the beginning of 1940 , they were trapped in Amsterdam by  the नाजी occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स  .
As  persecutions of the यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी increased in जुलाई 1942 , the परिवार गई into छुपाना  in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father , Otto Frank 's , office building .
After two years , the group was betrayed  और transported to विशेषज्ञता  camps .
Anne Frank and her sister , Margot , were eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp , where they died  of सन्निपात in कूच 1945  .
Otto Frank , the only survivor of the family  , लौटे to एम्सटर्डम बाद the युद्ध to  find that Anne 's diary had been saved , and his efforts led to its publication in 1947 .
It was translated from its original Dutch and  पहला प्रकाशित in  English in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl .
It has since been translated into many  भाषाएं .
the डायरी , जिससे थी दिए to ऐनी  on her 13th birthday , chronicles her life from 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944 .
Kurt  's हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994 ) was an American musician and artist , best known as the lead singer ,  guitarist और प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge बैंड निर्वाण .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in  1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी , having  its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like  टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind  ( 1991 ) .
Following the success of Nevermind  , निर्वाण थी labeled ``  the flagship band '' of Generation X , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was  प्रायः असहज और कुंठित ,  believing his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public , with his personal issues often subject to media attention .
He challenged Nirvana 's  दर्शक साथ इसके फाइनल स्टुडियो  album In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years of his life , Cobain struggled with heroin addiction , illness  और  depression .
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image , and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding  खुद  and his wife , musician Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was  मिला मुर्दे at उसके घर in  Seattle , the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The  हालातों of उसके मौत at आयु  27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate .
चूंकि उनके डेब्यू , निर्वाण  , with Cobain as a songwriter , has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .

रेडियल  engine of a biplane

The  रेडियल इंजन is a प्रत्यागमनी प्रकार आतंरिक दहन इंजन विन्यास  in which the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel .
It resembles a stylized star when viewed from the front , and is  पुकारा a `` स्टार इंजन ''  ( German Sternmotor ) in some languages .
The radial configuration was very commonly used in  वायुयान इंजन पहले  turbine engines became predominant .
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom ,  निर्मित by सुसान हैरिस , कि originally  aired on NBC from September 13 , 1985 , to May 9 , 1992 .
Starring Bea Arthur , Betty White , Rue  mcclanahan और estelle getty , the  show centers on four older women sharing a home in Miami , Florida .
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions , in association with Touchstone Television , and Paul  junger witt , टोनी थामस , और हैरिस परोसा as the असली  executive producers .
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and won several awards , including the Primetime Emmy  पुरस्कार लिये बकाया  Comedy Series twice .
It also won three Golden Globe Awards for  बेहतरीन टेलीविज़न श्रेणी – musical  or Comedy .
All four stars each  प्राप्त an एमी पुरस्कार throughout  the series ' run and had multiple nominations .
The series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated programs for six out  of इसके सात सीज़न  .
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil and gas exploration and production in  गहराइयों of अधिक than 500  feet .
By this  परिभाषा ,  there are approximately 600 deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico .
It has  महरूम economically  infeasible for many years , but with rising oil prices , more companies are investing in this area .
Major companies working in this sector  शामिल डायमंड  Offshore , TransOcean , and Baker Hughes .
There are  मूलरूप दो kinds of मोबाईल deepwater  drilling rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships .
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position installation such as a  फ्लोटिंग spar ( मंच ) or  tension-leg platform .
Recent industry  विश्लेषण रै अनुमानित कि the  total expenditure in the global deepwater infrastructure market will reach $ 145bn in 2011 .
“Not all oil is  accessible on जमीन  or in shallow water .
You  can ढूँढें कुछ आयल जमा दफ्न गहन अंतर्गत the समंदर floor.”  ... Using sonic equipment , oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to produce oil .
Then they use a mobile offshore drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig  the आरंभिक खूब  .
Some units are converted  into उत्पादन  rigs , meaning they switch from drilling for oil to capturing oil once it 's found .
Most of the time , the oil company will replace the MODU with a more permanent oil production rig to capture  oil.” ... the मोदू 's जॉब is to ड्रिल bas into the  ocean 's floor to find oil deposits .
The part of  the ड्रिल कि extends  below the deck and through the water is called the riser .
The riser  allows लिये खुदाई fluids  to move between the floor and the rig .
Engineers lower a drill string -- a series of pipes  designed to ड्रिल bas to the आयल जमा -- through the  riser.”
“The  विस्तार of deepwater  drilling is happening despite accidents in offshore fields ... ”
In 2010 a large  विस्फोट occurred हत्या 11 मजदूर  and spilling millions of gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters .
“ ...  despite the risks , the deepwater खुदाई  trend is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling , analyst say , is continuing high  माँग लिये उर्जा worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the high risks that come  साथ deepwater खुदाई in अनुक्रम लिये अमेरिकी to continue  to carry on their everyday lives .
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf oil production would expand from its 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day , still nearly a quarter of total domestic  उत्पादन , to 2 लाख barrels a दिन  by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects the  पर्यावरण in दोनो ऋणात्मक  and positive ways .
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes  आयल spills it is स्टिल a hazardous  possible outcome .
Oil spills result in oil sinking  to the नीचे of the समंदर smothering संयंत्र जीवन leaving  fish without food and shelter to survive .
On the other hand deepwater drilling  प्रभाव the पर्यावरण in a धनात्मक  ways too .
In time once the deepwater oil well  is नहीं in उपयोग anymore  plants will grow on and around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in .
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the depths of the ocean floor that  हैं hardly  ever seen .
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take  फ़ोटो of विरल मछली कि हैं in वहीँ प्राकृतिक आवास , giving वैज्ञानिक  a look at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ) . ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States President Bill Clinton  admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध  '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its  परखना ( जिससे शामिल  Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
Francis Albert ``  फ़्रैंक '' सिनात्रा , , ( दिसम्बर  12 , 1915 – May 14 , 1998 ) was an American singer and film actor .
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey , Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo artist from the early to  mid-1940s बाद होने हस्ताक्षरित  to Columbia Records in 1943 .
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers `` , he released his first  एल्बम , the आवाज़ of फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा  in 1946 .
His professional career had stalled by the 1950s , but it  थी पुनर्जन्म in  1953 after he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity .
He signed with Capitol Records  in 1953 और released अनेक critically  lauded albums ( such as In the Wee Small Hours , Songs for Swingin ' Lovers ! , Come Fly with Me , Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ) .
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label , Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding ! , Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim ) , toured  internationally , थी a founding सदस्य of the चूहा पैक और fraternized साथ हस्तियाँ और कूटनीतिज्ञों , सहित जॉन F. कैनेडी  .
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965 , recorded the retrospective September of My Years ,  स्ट्रक्चर in the एमी -winning टेलीविज़न खास फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा : a  Man and His Music , and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way `` .
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in several  poorly प्राप्त films , सिनात्रा रिटायर्ड लिये the पहला  time in 1971 .
Two years later , however , he came out of  रिटायरमेंट और in  1973 recorded several albums , scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York , New York `` in 1980 .
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base , he  toured दोनो भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और  internationally , until a short time before his death in 1998 .
Sinatra also forged a  अत्यधिक कामयाब  career as a film actor .
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953 , he also garnered a nomination for Best Actor for The Man with the Golden Arm , and critical acclaim  लिये उसके  performance in The Manchurian Candidate .
He also starred  in ऐसे musicals as ऊँची समाज  , Pal Joey , Guys and Dolls and On the Town .
Sinatra was honored at the Kennedy  बीच honors in 1983 और थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक  of Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997 .
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards , including the Grammy Trustees Award , Grammy Legend  पुरस्कार और the ग्रैमी  Lifetime Achievement Award .
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling artists of all time , having sold more  than 150 लाख  copies worldwide .
ठेठ cornhole  board
Cornhole ,  भी ज्ञात as सेम थैला टॉस ,  corn toss , baggo or bags , is a lawn game in which players take turns throwing corn hole bags at a raised platform with a hole in the far end .
A bag in the hole scores 3  अंक ,  while one on the platform scores 1 point .
Play  continues जबतक a टोली  or player reaches the score of 21 .
The  अमरीकी सुनहरा त्रिभुज is an  official gold bullion coin of the United States .
Authorized under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985 , it was first  released by the संयुक्त राज्य मिंट in  1986 .
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram  choudhury synthesized इससे परंपरागत  hatha yoga techniques and popularized beginning in the early 1970s .
All  बिक्रम योग वर्ग चलाएं लिये 90 मिनट्स और  consist of the same series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises .
बिक्रम योग is ideally practiced  in a room heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 % , .
Christopher Michael Massey ( born 26 January 1990 ) is an American actor , comedian and  rapper बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as माइकल barret  in Nickelodeon television series Zoey 101 .
Massey  रै प्राप्त अनेक पुरस्कार  and nomination including a Young Artist Award and Emmy Awards nominations .

A  teaspoon is an मद of cutlery and/or a measuring  instrument , as well as a unit of measurement of volume in some countries and customs .
A fern is any one or more of a group of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the  वनस्पति समूह ज्ञात  as Pteridophyta .
Unlike mosses , they  have जाइलम और  phloem ( making them vascular plants ) .
They have  तना , पत्ते , और  roots like other vascular plants .
Ferns reproduce via  बीजाणुओं और have neither  seeds nor flowers .
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate  ferns , लकिन  ferns as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) include horsetails , whisk ferns , marattioid ferns , and ophioglossoid ferns .
The term pteridophyte also refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular  पौधे ( देखिए वर्गीकरण  section below ) .
Ferns first appear in  the चट्टान रिकार्ड 360 लाख सालो पहले in the carboniferous लकिन अनेक of the  current families and species did not appear until roughly 145 million years ago in the early Cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ) .
Ferns  हैं नहीं of प्रमुख आर्थिक महत्व  , but some are grown or gathered for food , as ornamental plants , for remediating contaminated soils , and have been the subject of research for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air .
Some are  significant weeds  .
वे भी  play a role in mythology , medicine , and art .
Flat roofs  in इसराईल
Flat roof  in लॉस  Angeles
A flat roof is a type of  covering लिये a  building .
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof , a flat  छत is आड़ा or nearly आड़ा  .
The slope of a roof is properly known as its pitch :  roofs जिससे हैं nearly चपटा हैं ज्ञात as low-pitch roofs (  as the angle of slope increases , so the pitch is said to increase ) .
Any  चादर of सामग्री प्रयुक्त to  cover a flat or low-pitched roof is usually known as a membrane and the primary purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area .
Materials that cover flat roofs  typically allow the जल to चलाएं बंद  from a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system .
Water  इससे कुछ चपटा roofs ऐसे as on गार्डन sheds sometimes  flows freely off the edge of a roof , though gutter systems are of advantage in keeping both walls and foundations dry .
Gutters on smaller roofs often  सीसे जल सीधे onto the मैदान  , or better , into a specially made soakaway .
Gutters on larger roofs usually lead water into the rainwater drainage system of any built  up क्षेत्रफल  .
Occasionally flat roofs though are  designed to collect जल in a पूल ,  usually for aesthetic purposes , or for rainwater buffering .
Flat roofs exist all over the world and each area has its own tradition or  वरीयता लिये सामग्री  used .
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and freezing is unlikely to occur , many flat roofs are simply built of  चिनाई or कंक्रीट और इस is शुभ at keeping आउट the ऊष्मा of the सूर्य  and cheap and easy to build where timber is not readily available .
In areas  जहाँ the छत could become संतृप्त by  rain and leak , or where water soaked into the brickwork could freeze to ice and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable .
Traditionally most flat roofs  in the पश्चिमी संसार मेक उपयोग of तारकोल or अधिक प्रायः  tar paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight .
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in  बजरी to रखना the सूर्य 's ऊष्मा , uv किरणें और  weather off it and helps protect it from cracking or blistering and degradation .
Roof decking is  प्रायः of प्लाईवुड , chipboard or osb फलक ( osb = उन्मुख strand  Board , also known as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness .
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid , heated in a tar kettle , or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued down and sealed together at joints by  hot तारकोल - एकबार it रै cooled , the बजरी  is spread evenly over it .
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs  is अनभिज्ञता or कमी  of maintenance where people or events cause the gravel to be moved or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing , thus exposing it to weather and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in .
Tarpaper is usually a  'paper ' or fibre सामग्री  soaked or impregnated in tar .
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise vertically from the roof such as on parapet walls or upstands , tarpaper variants are produced with fine gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of  manufacture ऐसे कि a स्थाई परत  of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection .
tarpapers vary in विशेषता as करता  the workmanship and training of those applying it to produce more or less successful results .
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the cost of materials purchase  और लागत of लेटा उन्हें , however the लागत of आधुनिक झिल्लियों ऐसे as epdm  has come down over recent years to make them more and more affordable .
There are now more firms supplying modern alternatives and there is  generally a growing जागरूकता of  their performance and availability .
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed for long periods of time during which water penetrates and soaks the decking and any  इन्सुलेशन and/or ढांचा beneath it  .
This can lead to expensive damage  इससे the दुर्गन्ध जिससे प्रायः develops और if बाएँ can  weaken the roof structure .
There are also various health risks to people and animals breathing the mould  बीजाणुओं : the गंभीरता of इस  health risk remains a debated point .
One problem with maintaining flat roofs is that if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional  or a आधुनिक झिल्ली ) it can सफर a long  way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen .
Thus it is not easy  to देखिए जहाँ  it is leaking in order to repair it .
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further collection  or puddling  of water in that area and the problem worsens .
A CD-ROM ( )  is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट  disc which contains data .
The name is an acronym which stands for `` Compact  डिस्क read-only मेमोरी  `` .
Computers can read  cd-roms , लकिन can  not write on them .
CD-ROMs are  popularly प्रयुक्त to वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र , सहित  video games and multimedia applications , though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced CDs  , थाम दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम  of being played on a CD player , while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book is the  तकनीकी मानक कि  defines the format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of  color-bound किताबे कि contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ  for all CD formats , the Yellow Book , created by Sony and Philips , was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It  adapted the स्वरूप  to hold any form of data .
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ) , ( born 31 July 1965 ) , pen name J. K. Rowling , is a British  उपन्यासकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as  the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series .
The Potter books  have gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान , जीती अनेक  awards , and sold more than 400 million copies .
They have become the best-selling book series in history ,  और महरूम the आधार लिये a श्रेणी of films  which has become the highest-grossing film series in history .
Rowling had overall approval  on the स्क्रिप्ट as खूब  as maintaining creative control by serving as a producer on the final instalment .
Born in Yate , Gloucestershire , Rowling was working  as a शोधकर्ता और दुभाषिया  secretary for Amnesty International when she conceived the idea for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990 .
The seven-year period that followed entailed the death of her mother  , तलाक इससे उसके पहला husband और गरीबी जबतक रोलिंग  finished the first novel in the series , Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ) .
रोलिंग subsequently  published 6 sequels—the last , Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to the series .
In 2012 , Rowling parted with  उसके एजेंसी और resumed लिखने in the  form of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership , entitled The Casual Vacancy .
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed  लिये वयस्कों , the अन्य लिये children younger than the  Harry Potter audience , and she expects the latter to be published first .
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` life story , in which she progressed from living on state benefits  to multi-millionaire औकात भीतर पाँच  years .
She is the United Kingdom  's best-selling लेखक चूंकि  records began , with sales in excess of £238m .
The 2008 Sunday Times  समृद्ध सूची अनुमानित  Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $ 798 million ) , ranking her as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom .
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007 , and  समय पत्रिका नामित उसके as a runner-up  for its 2007 Person of the Year , noting the social , moral , and political inspiration she has given her fans .
In October 2010 , Rowling was named the `` Most  influential स्त्री in ब्रिटेन '' by अग्रणी पत्रिका सम्पादक  .
She has become a notable philanthropist , supporting such charities as Comic Relief , One Parent Families , Multiple Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and  lumos ( formerly the children  's High Level Group ) .
Auburndale is  a नगर in polk काउंटी  , Florida , United States .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी  11,032 at the 2000 census .
According to the  u.s जनसांख्यिकी estimates of  2005 , the city had a population of 12,381 .
It is part of the Lakeland – Winter Haven  महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
Hurricane  इसाबेल ( 2003 ) as देखी इससे  orbit during Expedition 7 of the International Space Station .
The eye , eyewall , and surrounding rainbands , characteristics of tropical cyclones , are clearly visible in this  दृश्य इससे स्पेस  .
A tropical cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by  a सर्पिल व्यवस्था of thunderstorms  that produce strong winds and heavy rain .
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water evaporated from the ocean is released as the saturated air rises , resulting in condensation of  जल वाष्प contained  in the moist air .
They are fueled by a different heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as  nor'easters , यूरोपीय windstorms , और ध्रुवीय चढ़ाव  .
The characteristic that separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is that at any height in the atmosphere , the center of a tropical  चक्रवात होगा be warmer than इसके परिवेश ; a घटना पुकारा `` गरम  core `` storm systems .
The term `` tropical '' refers  दोनो to the भौगोलिक उत्पत्ति of ये प्रणालियों , जिससे  usually form in tropical regions of the globe , and to their formation in maritime tropical air masses .
the पद `` चक्रवात '' refers to ऐसे तूफ़ान ' cyclonic प्रकृति ,  with counterclockwise wind flow in the Northern Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere .
The opposite  दिशा of the  wind flow is a result of the Coriolis force .
Depending on its  स्थान और शक्ति , a तीव्र चक्रवात  is referred to by names such as hurricane ( , ) , typhoon ( ) , tropical storm , cyclonic storm , tropical depression , and simply cyclone .
While tropical cyclones can produce extremely powerful  हवाएँ और मूसलाधार बरसात ,  they are also able to produce high waves , damaging storm surge , and tornadoes .
They develop over large bodies of warm water , and lose their strength  if वे मूव over जमीन due to increased  surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source .
This is why coastal  regions can प्राप्त significant क्षति इससे a तीव्र  cyclone , while inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds .
Heavy rains , however , can produce significant flooding inland , and storm surges can produce extensive  तटीय बाढ़  up to from the coastline .
Although their effects on human  populations can be विनाशकारी  , tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions .
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward temperate latitudes , which makes them an important part  of the वैश्विक  atmospheric circulation mechanism .
As a result , tropical cyclones help to maintain equilibrium in the  धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल , और  to maintain a relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide .
Many tropical cyclones develop when the  वायुमंडलीय शर्तें around  a weak disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable .
The background  पर्यावरण is modulated by climatological चक्र  and patterns such as the Madden-Julian oscillation , El Niño-Southern Oscillation , and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation .
Others form when other  प्रकार of cyclones acquire तीव्र  characteristics .
Tropical systems are then moved  by परिचालन हवाएँ in the क्षोभमण्डल ; if  the conditions remain favorable , the tropical disturbance intensifies , and can even develop an eye .
On  the अन्य समाप्त of the वर्णक्रम , if  the conditions around the system deteriorate or the tropical cyclone makes landfall , the system weakens and eventually dissipates .
It is not possible to artificially induce  the dissipation of ये प्रणालियों  with current technology .
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch , ; December 9 , 1916 ) is an American stage and film  कर्ता , फिल्मी निर्माता और लेखक  .
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ) , Champion ( 1949 ) , Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ) , The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ) , 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ) , Lust for Life ( 1956 ) , Paths of Glory ( 1957 ) , Gunfight at the O.K . Corral  ( 1957 ) , the वाइकिंग्स ( 1958 ) , स्पार्टाकस ( 1960  ) , Lonely Are the Brave ( 1962 ) , Seven Days in May ( 1964 ) , The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ) .
He  is no.17 on the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's  list of the greatest male American screen legends of all time , making him the highest-ranked living person on the list .
In 1996 , he received the Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years as a  रचनात्मक और moral फ़ोर्स in the गति चित्र जातियाँ  . ''
He is one of the last surviving actors from Hollywood 's  `` सुनहरी  age '' .
Robert Clark `` Bob  '' seger ( born may 6 , 1945 )  is an American rock and roll singer-songwriter , guitarist and pianist .
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist ,  he performed और अंकित as bob seger और  the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s .
By the early 1970s ,  he था dropped the `` प्रणाली '' इससे  his recordings and continued to strive for broader success with other various bands .
In 1973 , he put together The Silver Bullet Band , a group of Detroit-area musicians  , साथ जिसको he became सबसे कामयाब on the नेशनल  level with the album Live Bullet , recorded live with the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit , Michigan .
In 1976 ,  he हासिल a नेशनल ब्रेकआउट  with the studio album Night Moves .
On his studio albums , he also worked  extensively साथ the alabama-based मांसपेशी shoals लय  Section , which appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums .
A roots rocker with a classic raspy , shouting voice , Seger  wrote and  recorded songs that dealt with love , women , blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock .
Seger has recorded many hits , including `` Night Moves , '' `` Turn the Page , '' `` We 've Got Tonight , '' `` Against the Wind , '' and Shakedown that was written for Beverly Hills Cop  ii और `` जैसे a चट्टान , '' और भी  co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight . ''
His iconic  रिकॉर्डिंग of `` बूढ़ा समय चट्टान और फेंकें `` थी  named one of the Songs of the Century in 2001 .
With a career spanning five decades ,  seger continues to perform  and record today .
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2004 and the  songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in 2012  .
Richard Milhous Nixon (  जनवरी 9 , 1913 – अप्रैल  22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States , serving from 1969 to 1974 , when he became the only president to resign the office .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and  सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th वाइस अध्यक्ष  of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
Nixon was born in Yorba Linda  , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
He graduated from Whittier  कॉलेज in 1934 और ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of  Law in 1937 , returning to California to practice law .
He and his wife , Pat Nixon , moved to  वॉशिंगटन to कार्य लिये  the federal government in 1942 .
He  subsequently  served in the United States Navy during World War II .
Nixon was elected in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस  of Representatives in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit of  the alger hiss मामला स्थापित उसके  reputation as a leading anti-communist , and elevated him to national prominence .
He was the running mate of Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर , the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी  presidential nominee in the 1952 election .
Nixon served for eight  सालो as वाइस  president .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960 , narrowly losing to John F.  कैनेडी , और  lost a race for Governor of California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he ran again  लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी और थी निर्वाचित  .
Although Nixon  initially escalated अमेरिका 's  involvement in the Vietnam War , he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon  's विज़िट to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972  opened diplomatic relations between the two nations , and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his  प्रशासन generally embraced  policies that transferred power from Washington to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs ,  imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण , enforced desegregation of  some Southern schools , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over the  चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत साथ  Apollo 11 , he scaled back manned space exploration .
He was  re-elected by a भूस्खलन  in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal  और  other misconduct by members of the administration .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support , and on August 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the face of almost  निश्चित महाभियोग और हटाना इससे दफ्तर  .
After his  इस्तीफा , he controversially  received a pardon issued by his successor , Gerald Ford .
In retirement ,  निक्सन 's कार्य as an elder statesman , authoring अनेक किताबे और  undertaking many foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image .
He suffered  a debilitating स्ट्रोक  on April 18 , 1994 , and died four days later at the age of 81 .

The Dominican  गणतंत्र annexation सन्धि caused कड़वा  contention between President Grant and Sen. Sumner .
Brady  1869 ]  ]
Sen. Sumner , opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would lead to the  conquest of the neighboring ब्लैक गणतंत्र of हैती , became कायल  that corruption lay behind the treaty , and that men close to the president shared in the corruption .
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee , Sen. Sumner initially withheld his  राय on the सन्धि  on January 18 , 1870 .
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from Assistant Secretary of State ,  bancroft डेविस , कि u.s . नवल जहाजों यहूद  being used to protect President Báez .
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and  at sen. sumner’s सुझाव और काफी संभवतः  to save the party from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment , the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session .
President Grant persisted and sent messages to Congress  in एहसान of annexation  on March 14 , 1870 , and May 31 , 1870 .
In closed session , Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there would be difficulty with the foreign nationals , noting the chronic rebellion  कि took प्लेस on the द्वीप , और the रिस्क कि the स्वतंत्रता  of Haiti , recognized by the United States in 1862 , would be lost .
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the U.S. Navy as a  प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी a उल्लंघन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law and unconstitutional .
Finally , on June 30 ,  1870 the सन्धि थी voted on by the सीनेट  and failed to gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty passage .
The following day , President Grant , feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner , retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close  dost J. lothrop motley , दूत to ब्रिटेन  .
By autumn , Sumner 's personal hostility to the president  थी पब्लिक ज्ञान , और he blamed the सचिव of राज्य लिये failing to have resigned  , rather than let Grant have his way .
The two men , friends until then ,  cooled into कड़वा  enemies .
In December , 1870 , still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow , Sumner  दिया a fiercely नाजुक वाक accusing the  president of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct .
Already , President Grant , supported by his Secretary of State Hamilton Fish , had initiated a campaign to depose Sumner from the  अध्यक्षता of the सीनेट विदेशी संबंध कमेटी  .
Although Sumner stated he was an  `` प्रशासन man '' , in जोड to having रोका ग्रान्ट 's डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र सन्धि attempt , sumner था पराजित ग्रान्ट  's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act , blocked Grant 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury , and been a constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go .
Grant resented Sumner 's  बड़प्पन  of manner , as well .
Told once that Sumner did not believe in the Bible , the  अध्यक्ष is supposed to have कहा  that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it . ''
As the rift  between ग्रान्ट और  Sumner increased , Sumner’s health began to decline .
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4 , 1871 , Senators  संबद्ध साथ अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट , ज्ञात as ‘’new radicals’’ voted to  oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship .
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of  लागू आचार  or professional ethics that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that arise in a business environment .
It applies to all aspects of business conduct and is relevant to the conduct of individuals and entire  संगठन  .
कारोबार आचार रै  both normative and descriptive dimensions .
As a corporate  अभ्यास और a करियर  specialization , the field is primarily normative .
Academics attempting to  समझे कारोबार बर्ताव employ वर्णनात्मक  methods .
The range and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing  बर्ताव साथ non-economic चिंताएं  .
Interest in business ethics accelerated dramatically during  the 1980s और 1990s , दोनो भीतर  major corporations and within academia .
For example , today most major corporations promote their  प्रतिबद्धता to non-economic मान अंतर्गत headings ऐसे as आचार कोड  and social responsibility charters .
Adam  स्मिथ कहा , `` लोगों of the  same trade seldom meet together , even for merriment and diversion , but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public , or in some contrivance to raise prices . ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business  बर्ताव in कया वे perceive  to be beneficial directions .
आचार implicitly regulates क्षेत्रों  and details of behavior that lie beyond governmental control .
the emergence of विशाल corporations  with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they operate accelerated the development of formal ethics regimes .
A burn is a type of injury  to flesh or स्किन  caused by heat , electricity , chemicals , friction , or radiation .
सबसे burns affect तभी the सतही स्किन ( ज्ञात as सतही or पहला  degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ) .
Rarely all layers of the skin  or deeper ऊतकों , ऐसे as मांसपेशी or  bone can be injured in which case the burn is either full thickness ( third degree ) or fourth degree .
The  उपचार जरूरी depends  on the severity of the burn .
Superficial burns maybe managed with little more than simple   pain killers while major burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized burn centers .
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if exposure is  prolonged it may परिणाम in कम देह तापमान  .
Partial  मोटाई burns may आवश्यकता  cleaning with soap and water followed by dressings .
Blisters should typically be left  अखंड  .
Full thickness  burns  usually require surgical treatments such as skin grafting and extensive burns often require large amount of intravenous fluids .
The most common  जटिलताओं of burns हैं  related to infection .
While large burns can be fatal , modern treatments  विकसित in the पिछला 50 सालो have significantly improved  the outcomes , especially in children and young adults .
Globally about 11 million people  तलाश चिकित्सा  treatment and 300,000 people die from burns .
In the United States , of those admitted to a burn center ,  लगभग 4 % die इससे उनके  injuries .
The long term outcome is primarily related to the size  of बर्न और the आयु of  the person effected .
The  अटलांटिक समंदर , नहीं  including Arctic and Antarctic regions
इस वीडियो थी लिया by  the crew of Expedition 29 on board the ISS .
The pass starts from just north-east of the  द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड over the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर to सेंट्रल  Africa , over South Sudan .
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of  the संसार 's oceanic  divisions .
With a total area of about , it covers  लगभग 20 प्रतिशत of the धरती  's surface and about 29 percent of its water surface area .
The  पहला भाग of इसके नाम refers to  Atlas of Greek mythology , making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas '' .
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450 BC ( Hdt . 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek :  ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; अंग्रेज़ी : समुद्र of एटलस )  .
The term  ethiopic समंदर , निकला इससे इथियोपिया  , was applied to the southern Atlantic as late as the mid-19th century .
पहले  Europeans discovered other oceans , the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters beyond the Strait of Gibraltar that we now know as the Atlantic .
The  जल्दी यूनानियों believed  this ocean to be a gigantic river encircling the world .
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated , S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east , and the  americas to the वेस्ट .
As one component of the interconnected  वैश्विक समंदर , it is कनेक्ट in the उत्तर to the आर्कटिक समंदर ( जिससे is sometimes माना a समुद्र of  the Atlantic ) , to the Pacific Ocean in the southwest , the Indian Ocean in the southeast , and the Southern Ocean in the south .
( Other definitions describe the Atlantic as extending  southward  to Antarctica . )
The equator subdivides it into  the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर  and South Atlantic Ocean .
Due to their long-term persistence , and the need for a  अद्वितीय पहचानकर्ता in issuing forecasts और चेतावनियाँ , तीव्र cyclones  and subtropical cyclones are given names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ) .
The following are lists from which these  तीव्र और उपोष्ण चक्रवात  names are derived .
White light is dispersed by a prism into the colors of  the ऑप्टिकल वर्णक्रम  .
The visible  वर्णक्रम is the portion of the  electromagnetic spectrum that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye .
Electromagnetic radiation in this range of wavelengths is called  दृश्य लाइट or बस लाइट  .
A typical human eye will respond to  wavelengths इससे परिचय 390  to 700 nm .
in शर्तें of आवृत्ति  , this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz .
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ) , in the green region  of the ऑप्टिकल वर्णक्रम ( देखिए :  luminosity function ) .
The spectrum does  नहीं , however , contain सब the रंगों कि  the human eyes and brain can distinguish .
Unsaturated colors such as pink , or purple variations such as  magenta , हैं अनुपस्थित , लिये उदाहरण , क्युकी  they can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths .
Colors containing only one wavelength  हैं भी पुकारा pure रंगों  .
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window `` , the region of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely  unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere .
An example of this phenomenon is that  साफ एयर scatters ब्लू लाइट अधिक than रेड wavelengths  , and so the midday sky appears blue .
The  ऑप्टिकल खिड़की  is also called the visible window because it overlaps the human visible response spectrum .
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the human vision , as well as the Medium Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long  wavelength or दूर इन्फ्रारेड ( lwir or fir ) खिड़की हालांकि  other animals may experience them .
Many species can see light with frequencies outside the `` visible spectrum , '' which is defined  in शर्तें of इंसान दृष्टि  .
Bees and many   other insects can detect ultraviolet light , which helps them find nectar in flowers .
Plant species that  निर्भर on कीट परागण may owe  reproductive success to their appearance in ultraviolet light , rather than how colorful they appear to humans .
Birds , too , can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ) , and some have sex-dependent markings on their  plumage कि हैं दृश्य तभी in the  ultraviolet range .
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range  , however , can नहीं देखिए रेड लाइट or कोई अन्य  reddish wavelengths .
मधुमक्खियों ' दृश्य वर्णक्रम  ends at about 590nm , just before the orange wavelengths start .
Birds ,  however , can देखिए  some red wavelengths , but not as many as humans .
Zebras ( or ) are several species of African equids ( horse family )  संयुक्त by उनके distinctive ब्लैक और  white stripes .
Their stripes come in  अलग पैटर्न  , unique to each individual .
They are generally social animals that live in  छोटी harems to विशाल herds  .
Unlike their closest relatives , horses and asses ,  zebras have never महरूम truly  domesticated .
There are three  प्रजाति of zebras : the  plains zebra , the Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra .
The plains zebra and the mountain  जेब्रा belong to the subgenus hippotigris  , but Grévy 's zebra is the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus .
The latter resembles an ass , to which it is closely related , while the former two are more  horse-like  .
All three belong to the genus  equus , साथ  with other living equids .
The unique stripes of zebras make them one of the  पशु सबसे परिचित to लोगों  .
वे occur in a किस्में of habitats ,  such as grasslands , savannas , woodlands , thorny scrublands , mountains , and coastal hills .
However , various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on zebra populations , in  particular शिकार लिये खालें और आवास विनाश  .
grévy 's जेब्रा और the  mountain zebra are endangered .
जबकि मैदान zebras हैं much अधिक plentiful , एक subspecies , the quagga , became विलुप्त in the लेट 19th सदी  – though there is currently a plan , called the Quagga Project , that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically similar to the quagga in a process called breeding back .
Barry White , born Barry Eugene Carter ( – ) , was an American  composer और singer-songwriter  .
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known  लिये उसके distinctive बास आवाज़ और रोमांटिक चित्र , श्वेत 's महानतम कामयाबी  came in the 1970s as a solo singer and with the Love Unlimited Orchestra , crafting many enduring soul , funk , and disco songs such as his two biggest hits , `` You 're the First , the Last , My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love , Babe . ''
Along with Isaac Hayes , White  is माना by allmusic.com  as a pioneer of disco music in the early 1970s .
During the course of his career in the music business , White achieved 106 gold albums worldwide , 41 of  जिससे भी attained प्लेटिनम  status .
White had 20 gold  और 10 प्लेटिनम singles , साथ विश्वव्यापी बिक्री  in excess of 100 million , according to critics Ed Hogan and Wade Kergan .
His influences included Rev . James Cleveland , Ray  चार्ल्स , एरीथा फ्रैंकलिन  plus Motown artists The Supremes , The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye .
Angelina Jolie ( , born Angelina Jolie Voight ; June 4 , 1975 ) is  an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , फिल्मी निदेशक , और  screenwriter .
She has received an Academy Award , two Screen Actors Guild Awards , and three Golden Globe  पुरस्कार , और थी नामित हॉलीवुड 's highest-paid  actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011 .
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes , and is noted for her work with refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill  दूत लिये  the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ) .
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman , a title for  जिससे वो रै प्राप्त substantial मीडिया ध्यान  .
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get  आउट ( 1982 ) , लकिन उसके फिल्मी करियर began in सच्चाई a दशक  later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ) .
Her first leading role in a major film was in  the cyber-thriller  Hackers ( 1995 ) .
She starred in the  critically acclaimed biographical टेलीविज़न films  George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ) , and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl , Interrupted ( 1999 ) .
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ) ,  और स्थापित herself among the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों  in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ) .
She continued her action star career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 )  और चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं to date—and  received further critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ) , which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress .
Jolie made her directorial debut with  the wartime  drama In the Land of Blood and Honey ( 2011 ) .
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob  थॉर्नटन , जोली अभी जीवनदान  with actor Brad Pitt , in a relationship notable for fervent media attention .
Jolie and Pitt have three biological children and  तीन अपनाया  children .
A natural arch  उत्पादित by the अपरदन of differentially  weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz , Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock are removed from the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes  ऐसे as हवा or जल प्रवाह , और तब transported और deposited  in other locations .
While erosion is a  प्राकृतिक प्रक्रम , इंसान  activities have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which erosion is occurring globally .
excessive अपरदन कल्याणकारी समस्याएं ऐसे as मरुस्थलीकरण  , decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation , sedimentation of waterways , and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers .
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation ; combined ,  वे हैं जिम्मेदार लिये 84 % of degraded acreage , बनाना excessive  erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems .
Industrial agriculture , deforestation , roads , anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl are amongst the most  significant इंसान क्रियाएँ in लिहाज़ to उनके  effect on stimulating erosion .
However , there are many available alternative land use practices that can curtail or limit erosion , such as terrace -building , no-till  कृषि , और revegetation of denuded soils  .
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series which ran on  एमटीवी इससे दिसम्बर 3 , 2009  to December 20 , 2012 in the United States .
The series follows the lives of eight housemates spending  उनके गर्मियाँ at the  Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey .
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast winter to  मियामी बीच , साथ ऋतु 3 returning to  the Jersey Shore .
The fourth season , filmed in Italy  , premiered on अगस्त  4 , 2011 .
The show  लौटे लिये a पांचवां  season , at Seaside Heights on January 5 , 2012 .
The fifth season  finale  aired on March 15 , 2012 .
On March 19 , 2012 , MTV  पुष्टि कि the श्रेणी  would return for their sixth season .
On August 30 , 2012 ,  एमटीवी  announced that the series will end after the sixth season , which premiered on October 4 .
The series finale  aired on  December 20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette , '' portrayals of Italian-American  stereotypes , और scrutiny इससे स्थानीय क्युकी the डाल सदस्यों  were not residents of the area .
The series garnered record ratings for MTV ,  बनाना it the संजाल  's most viewed series telecast ever .
The series '  डाल have भी महरूम credited  with introducing unique lexicon and phrases into American popular culture .
The University of Chicago and the University of Oklahoma are among the educational institutions that  have था वर्ग or सम्मेलनों परिचय the दिखाएँ  .
In 2010 , the cast of Jersey Shore was named on Barbara Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating People list , and the series has since been exported to  दर्जनों of देशों विश्वव्यापी  .
There are several remakes of the show in other countries , with two set in the United Kingdom ; the well known Geordie  shore , नियत in न्यूकैसल upon tyne  , England .
The other is The Valleys , the Welsh  समतुल्य , जिससे is  filmed and set in Cardiff .
The only other official remake of the show is Gandía Shore , set in  gandía , स्पेन .

United States territory is any extent of region under  the क्षेत्राधिकार of the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त  States , including all waters ( around islands or continental tracts ) and all U.S . Naval vessels .
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign rights for exploring , exploiting  , conserving , और मैनेजिंग इसके territory  .
This extent  of territory is सब the क्षेत्रफल belonging to , और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन  of , the United States federal government ( which includes tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative and other purposes .
the संयुक्त राज्य  total territory includes a subset of political divisions .
The U.S. government is a government  साथ प्रतिनिधित्व  powers under the United States Constitution .
`` The powers not delegated to the United  राज्य by the संविधान  , nor prohibited by it to the States , are reserved to the States respectively , or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment .
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated  as t3 ) is a 2003 विज्ञान fiction कार्रवाई फिल्मी निर्देशित by जोनाथन mostow और अभिनीत  Arnold Schwarzenegger , Nick Stahl , Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken .
