This  शामिल जॉन 's  future wife , but not John himself as his whereabouts are unknown to Skynet .
John 's life is placed in danger when the T-X  accidentally  finds him .
A  cord of लकडी
The cord is a unit of  माप  of dry volume used in Canada and the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood .
A cord is the  राशि of लकडी कि  , when `` ranked and well stowed '' ( arranged so pieces are aligned , parallel , touching and compact ) , occupies a volume of .
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high , long , and deep ; or any other arrangement of  रैखिक माप कि yields the वही  volume .
The name cord  संभवतः आता इससे  the use of a cord or string to measure it .
The ,  is an 8-bit हैंडहेल्ड  video game device developed and manufactured by Nintendo .
It was  released in जापानी on  , in North America in , and in Europe on .
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line , and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the same staff who had  designed the खेल & देखें  series as well as several popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
redesigned संस्करण यहूद released  in 1996 and 1998 , in the form of Game Boy Pocket , and Game Boy Light ( Japan only ) , respectively .
The Game Boy is Nintendo  's दूसरी हैंडहेल्ड प्रणाली following the खेल  & Watch series introduced in , and it combined features from both the Nintendo Entertainment System and Game & Watch .
It was originally bundled with the  पहेली  game Tetris .
As part of the fourth generation of gaming , the Game Boy competed with the Sega Game Gear ,  atari लिंक्स , और the turboexpress .
Despite these other technologically  श्रेष्ठ हैंडहेल्ड consoles , the खेल  Boy was a tremendous success .
The Game Boy and its successor  , the खेल लड़के रंग , have दोनो संयुक्त बेची  118.69 million units worldwide .
Upon its release in the United States , it sold  इसके संपूर्ण  shipment of one million units within weeks .
The World Trade Center is  a जटिल of इमारतें अंतर्गत निर्माण  in Lower Manhattan , New York City , United States , replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings with the same name on the same site .
The original World Trade Center featured landmark twin towers , which opened on  अप्रैल 4 , 1973 और यहूद नष्ट in  the September 11 attacks of 2001 , along with 7 World Trade Center .
The other  इमारतें in the जटिल यहूद  damaged in the attacks , and their ruins were eventually demolished .
The site is being rebuilt with  पाँच नई skyscrapers और a मेमोरियल to  those killed in the attacks .
, only one skyscraper has been completed ; the  अन्य चार हैं अपेक्षित  to be completed before 2020 .
One World Trade Center will be the lead building for the new  जटिल , reaching  more than 100 stories at its completion .
It became the tallest building in New York City on April 30 , 2012 ,  और is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त by 2013 .
a छठे  tower is awaiting confirmation .
At the time of their  पूर्णता , the असली 1 संसार व्यापार बीच ( the उत्तर मीनार ) और 2 संसार व्यापार  Center ( the South Tower ) , known collectively as the `` Twin Towers '' , were the tallest buildings in the world .
The other buildings included 3 WTC ( the Marriott World Trade Center ) , 4  wtc , 5 wtc , 6 wtc ,  and 7 WTC .
All of these  इमारतें यहूद  built between 1975 and 1985 .
The cost for the construction was $ 400 million (  $ in डॉलर  ) .
The complex was located in the heart  of नई यॉर्क नगर 's शहर वित्तीय ज़िला  and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space .
The World Trade Center experienced a  आग on , 1975 , a bombing on  , 1993 and a robbery on , 1998 .
In 1998 , the Port Authority decided to privatize  the संसार व्यापार बीच , पट्टे the इमारतें to a  private company to manage , and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in .
On the  morning of सितंबर 11 , 2001 , al-qaeda -संबद्धd hijackers  flew two Boeing 767 jets into the complex , one into each tower , in a coordinated terrorist attack .
After burning for 56 minutes , the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed , followed a half-hour later by  the उत्तर मीनार ( 1 ) , साथ the हमले on the संसार व्यापार बीच  resulting in 2,753 deaths .
Falling debris from the towers , combined with fires  कि the मलबा initiated in अनेक surrounding इमारतें , led to the आंशिक  or complete collapse of all the other buildings in the complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area .
The process of  क्लीनअप और रिकवरी at  the World Trade Center site took eight months .
Over the following  सालो , योजनाएँ लिये a rebuilt  World Trade Center took form .
The first new building at the site was 7 World  व्यापार बीच , जिससे खोली in .
The  निम्नतर मैनहटन विकास निगम ( lmdc ) ,  established in to oversee the rebuilding process , organized competitions to select a site plan and memorial design .
Memory  मूलाधार , designed by डेनियल libeskind  , was selected as the master plan , but this went through substantial changes in design .
The new World Trade Center complex will include One World Trade Center , three other high-rise office  मीनारें , और the नेशनल  September 11 Memorial & Museum .

The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain ranges of southern California  , in the प्रशांत coast सीमाएँ  physiographic region in North America .
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया coast सीमाएँ और झूठ between सांता  Barbara and San Diego counties .
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to their East-West orientation ,  बनाना उन्हें अनुप्रस्थ to the सामान्य  North-South orientation of most of California 's coastal mountains .
Periodic  तालिका साथ इलेक्ट्रॉन  shells
An electron shell may be thought of  as an कक्षा followed  by electrons around an atom 's nucleus .
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K shell '' ) , followed by  the `` 2 शेल '' ( or `` l शेल '' ) , तब the  `` 3 shell '' ( or `` M shell '' ) , and so on farther and farther from the nucleus .
The shell letters K , L , M , ... ,  प्रयुक्त in the  X-ray notation , are alphabetical .
Each shell can contain only a fixed  क्रमांक of electrons : the 1st शेल can थाम up to दो  electrons , the 2nd shell can hold up to eight electrons , the 3rd shell can hold up to 18 , and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on .
Since electrons are electrically  आकर्षित to the केंद्रक , an अणु 's electrons होगा generally  occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely filled by other electrons .
However , this is not a strict requirement : Atoms may have two or  भी तीन  incomplete outer shells .
( See Madelung rule for more  विवरण  . )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in these  शेल देखिए इलेक्ट्रॉन विन्यास  .
The electrons in the outermost  occupied शेल ( or शेल ) determine the रासायनिक  properties of the atom ; it is called the valence shell .
Each shell consists of one or more subshells , and  प्रत्येक subshell consists of एक or अधिक परमाणु  orbitals .
Vickie Lynn Marshall (  née होगन ; नवम्बर 28 , 1967  – February 8 , 2007 ) , known by her moniker Anna Nicole Smith , was an American model , actress , and television personality .
Smith first gained popularity in Playboy , becoming the  1993 संगिनी of the साल  .
She   modeled for clothing companies , including Guess jeans and Lane Bryant .
Smith dropped out of high  स्कूल और थी शादीशुदा  in 1985 .
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul ,  J. हावर्ड मार्शल , 62 सालो उसके वरिष्ठ , resulted in अटकलें कि  she married the octogenarian for his money , which she denied .
Following Marshall 's death , Smith began a lengthy  विधिक बैटल over a share of  his estate .
Her case , Marshall v. Marshall , reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a  सवाल of संघीय क्षेत्राधिकार , और again on  a question of bankruptcy court authority ( now called Stern v. Marshall ) .
Smith died on February 8 , 2007 in a  हॉलीवुड , फ्लोरिडा होटल  room as a result of an overdose of prescription drugs .
Within the final six  महीने of उसके जीवन , स्मिथ थी the फ़ोकस of a नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज  surrounding the death of her son , Daniel , and the paternity and custody battle over her newborn daughter , Dannielynn .
The is one denomination of  जापानी  yen .
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` new script `` , and were also minted from  1949-1958 using `` old-script '' जापानी  characters .
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when , due to the much  उच्चतर मान of the येन , वे यहूद minted in सुनहरा ) .
The front of the coin depicts a rice  संयंत्र growing आउट of the जल , साथ `` पाँच येन '' लिखा in कांजी  ; the back is stamped with `` Japan '' and the year of issue , also in kanji , separated by sprouts of a tree .
The three graphic elements of the coin represent  कृषि और fisheries , the कुंजी  elements of the Japanese first-sector economy .
Around a hole , there is a  गियर कि represents  industry .
It is the only Japanese coin in circulation to lack Arabic  numerals on either फेस  .
TLC is an American girl group whose repertoire spanned R & B ,  हिप हॉप , आत्मा , दुर्गंध  , and new jack swing .
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins , rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas , the group found unprecedented success in the 1990s while also enduring a  श्रेणी of spats साथ the विधि , प्रत्येक  other , and the group 's record label .
Initially , TLC  हासिल वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी following  the release of their debut album Ooooooohhh ...
on the  TLC Tip , which sold 6 million copies worldwide .
However , it was their second album , CrazySexyCool , that  catapulted the समूह to superstar औकात  .
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female group ,  और आखिरकार  sold 23 million copies worldwide .
Five years later , the group released their  तीसरा एल्बम fanmail , जिससे  became the group 's first album to debut at number one and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide .
The subsequent tour following FanMails release became the highest  grossing दौरे  of all time by a female band .
in 2002 , लिसा  `` Left Eye '' Lopes died in a car accident in Honduras .
Seven months later , T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth album 3D , which sold 2 million copies  विश्वव्यापी , it प्रदर्शित unreleased vocals  from Left Eye .
Billboard magazine ranked TLC  as एक of the महानतम  musical trios .
Between 1992 and 2003 , the band accumulated ten top ten singles , four number one singles  , चार multi-platinum एल्बम , और चार ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  .
At the end of 1999 , TLC was ranked as the seventh most successful act of  the 1990s by बिलबोर्ड  .
In 2008 , the group  थी inducted  into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall of Fame by the same magazine , at 56th place .
That year  it थी भी  listed as the # 25 R & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 years .
TLC has sold more than 65 million records worldwide and they are ranked as the second best selling female group of all time  , और the बेहतरीन selling मादा r & b समूह of  all time .
In 2012 , TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's 100 Greatest Women in Music , being ranked the number one  सब लड़की समूह on कि सूची  .
Tarzan is a  1999 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड एडवेंचर  film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated  क्लासिक , it is आधारित on the स्टोरी टार्ज़न of the apes by एडगर राइस बरोज  , and is the only major motion picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated .
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay by Tab Murphy , Bob Tzudiker , and Noni White , Tarzan features the voices of Tony Goldwyn , Minnie Driver , Glenn Close , and  रोजी o'donnell साथ ब्रायन धन्य , तलवार henriksen , वेन नाईट  , and Nigel Hawthorne .
It was the last bona fide hit before the  डिज़्नी slump of the जल्दी 2000s  grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide , outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the time of its release , its production budget of $ 130 million made it the most expensive  एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना , जबतक  topped by Disney 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002 .
It was also the first Disney animated feature to open at #  1 चूंकि pocahontas  .
This was the last major box office  कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी  Renaissance .
Oil Platform P-51 off  the ब्राज़ीलियाई  coast is a semi-submersible platform .
Oil platform Mittelplate  in the  North sea
An oil platform , (  offshore मंच or colloquially आयल रिग ) is a विशाल ढांचा  with facilities to drill wells , to extract and process oil and natural gas , and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing .
In many cases , the platform contains  सुविधाएं to हाउस the workforce  as well .
Depending on the circumstances  , the मंच  may be fixed to the ocean floor , may consist of an artificial island , or may float .
Remote subsea wells  may भी be कनेक्ट to a  platform by flow lines and by umbilical connections .
These subsea  समाधान may consist of एक  or more subsea wells , or of one or more manifold centres for multiple wells .
Slaughter is the killing of animals , usually that of  घरेलू पशुधन  for food .
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle , water buffalo ( for beef and veal ) , sheep , goats ( for lamb and mutton ) , pigs ( for pork ) , horses ( for horse meat ) , and fowl , largely chickens , turkeys , and ducks and increasingly  मछली इससे the aquaculture  industry ( fish farming ) .
The White House ,  the अध्यक्ष 's आधिकारिक  residence and center of the administration
Under the  संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , the  President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole , the presidency is the highest  राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by  influence and recognition .
The president is also the commander-in-chief of  the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद  Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives should the  चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to पुरस्कार an निरपेक्ष  majority of votes to any person ) .
Since the ratification of  the twenty-second amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान in 1951 , no व्यक्ति may  be elected President more than twice , and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death , resignation  , or हटाना इससे दफ्तर  of an incumbent President , the Vice President assumes the office .
The President must be at  तनिक 35 सालो of आयु और a ``  natural born '' citizen of the United States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States  संविधान , जिससे  took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For American leaders  पहले इस अनुसमर्थन  , see President of the Continental Congress .
The list does not include any Acting  राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the  Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution .
There have  महरूम 43 लोगों sworn into दफ्तर , और 44 presidencies , as ग्रोवर  Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four were  assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln , जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड , विलियम mckinley , और जॉन F. कैनेडी  ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the  पहला अध्यक्ष , थी उदघाटन in 1789  after a unanimous vote of the Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in  दफ्तर साथ 32 दिनों in 1841 , और फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two terms , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after  हैरी ट्रूमैन , थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स an व्यक्तिगत  can be elected president .
एंड्रयू जैक्सन , the सातवाँ अध्यक्ष , थी the  first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the first elected after women  gained मतदान अधिकारों  in 1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams , Rutherford B. Hayes , Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost  the लोकप्रिय vote लकिन assumed  office .
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith , and the current  अध्यक्ष , बराक ओबामा , is the पहला  president of African descent .

A  suppressor , ध्वनि suppressor , or ध्वनि मॉडरेटर , is a यंत्र संलग्न  to or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise , and usually the amount of muzzle flash , generated by firing the weapon .
A suppressor can be used both  साथ a firearm  and with compressed air gun .
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer , this term is a misnomer popularized  by cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a प्रक्षेप्य , विशेषकर  one moving faster than the speed of sound , through the air can not be eliminated .
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e . greater than 300  मीटर ) can lessen , or retard , the रपट at the पल of प्रभाव , और बनाएँ  the impression of silence near the target .
the रव  heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel , though subdued , is not silent at all .
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to  reduce the ध्वनि of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant  gas and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet .
Early suppressors were created around the beginning of  the 20th सदी  by several inventors .
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim , Hiram Percy 's father , and the  आविष्कारक of the कहावत यंत्र गन ) , is credited साथ inventing और selling the पहला commercially  successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ) .
Maxim gave his device the  trademarked  name Maxim Silencer .
The muffler for internal combustion  इंजन थी विकसित in समानांतर साथ the firearm suppressor  by Maxim in the early 20th century , using many of the same techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers ) .
The word silencer  in सन्दर्भ to गन suppressor remains in फैली उपयोग , हालांकि it रै चूंकि गिरे आउट  of favor with some , especially among the firearms industry , being replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor , because a `` sound suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon , rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging .
Common usage and U.S. legislative language favor the  historically पहले पद  , silencer .
In U.S. law , the terms ``  firearm मफलर '' और `` firearm silencer  '' are synonymous .
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the United States Office of  रणनीतिक सेवाएं ,  who favored the newly designed High Standard HDM .22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II .
OSS Director  William  Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the pistol for President Franklin D. Roosevelt at the White House .
According to OSS research  मुख्य स्टेनली लोवेल , डोनोवन ( an बूढ़ा और विश्वसनीय dost of the अध्यक्ष  ) was waved into the Oval Office , where Roosevelt was dictating a letter .
While Roosevelt finished his message , Donovan turned his back and fired ten shots  into a sandbag he था brought साथ उसे , घोषित  what he had done and handed the smoking gun to the astonished president .
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination pistol with an integral suppressor was also used by the American OSS  on clandestine परिचालन  in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War .
beatrice `` bea '' आर्थर ( may 13 , 1922 – अप्रैल  25 , 2009 ) was an American actress , comedienne , and singer whose career spanned seven decades .
Arthur achieved fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms All in the  परिवार और maude , और as डोरोथी zbornak  on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls , winning Emmy Awards for both roles .
A stage  अभिनेत्री दोनो पहले और बाद उसके टेलीविज़न कामयाबी , वो जीती the टोनी पुरस्कार लिये  Best Featured Actress in a Musical for her performance as Vera Charles in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ) .
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the Tekken video game series , produced by Digital Frontier and  वितरित by asmik इक्का entertainment in संघ  with Bandai Entertainment .
The film premiered in North America by  बंदाई entertainment on जुलाई 26 , 2011  , and in Australia on July 27 , 2011 in a special exclusive one-off screening .
It was released on September 3 , 2011  in जापानी  .
the फिल्मी थी released on  Blu-ray Disc on November 22 , 2011 for USA , and December 1 , 2011 for Japan .
This film was also released on DVD on November 22 , 2011  ( 2d संस्करण तभी )  .
The film was additionally included with the  प्लेस्टेशन 3 खेल , tekken  Hybrid , and the Nintendo 3DS title , Tekken 3D : Prime Edition .
For a discussion of nonprofit , voluntary neighborhood  वकालत समूह , देखिए  neighborhood association .
In  the संयुक्त राज्य , a homeowner संघ is a निगम formed  by a real estate developer for the purpose of marketing , managing , and selling of homes and lots in a residential subdivision .
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the association , while allowing the developer to exit financial and legal  जिम्मेदारी of the संगठन , typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the संघ to the homeowners बाद selling  off a predetermined number of lots .
Membership in the homeowners  संघ by a आवासीय खरीदार is  typically a condition of purchase ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it .
Most homeowner associations are incorporated ,  और हैं विषय to राज्य statutes  that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations .
State oversight of homeowner associations  is minimal , और मुख्यतः takes  the form of laws which are inconsistent from state to state .
Some  राज्य , ऐसे as फ्लोरिडा और कैलिफ़ोर्निया , have a विशाल देह  of homeowner association law , and some states , such as Massachusetts , have virtually no homeowner association law .
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is  common-interest developments ( cids ) , a श्रेणी कि शामिल planned-unit developments  of single-family homes , condominiums , and cooperative apartments .
Since 1964 , homeowner  एसोसिएशन have become  increasingly common in the USA .
The Community Associations Institute trade association estimated that HOAs governed  24.8 लाख अमरीकी घरों और 62  million residents in 2010 .

There are many breeds of Guinea pig which have been developed since its  domestication ca . 5000 bc  .
Breeds vary widely in appearance and purpose , ranging from show breeds with  long , बहती बाल to those in  use as model organisms by science .
From ca . 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532 , selective breeding by indigenous South American peoples resulted in many varieties of domestic Guinea pigs ,  जिससे रूप the आधार लिये कुछ of  the modern domestic breeds .
Early Andean breeds were  primarily रखा as agricultural भण्डार  for food , and efforts at improving the Guinea pig as a food source continue to the modern era .
With the export of Guinea pigs to Europe in the 15th century , the goal in breeding shifted to focus on the  विकास of appealing  pets .
To this end , various competitive  प्रजनन संगठन यहूद संस्थापित  by fanciers .
The American Cavy Breeders  संघ , an adjunct to the अमरीकी खरगोश प्रजनक  Association , is the governing body in the United States and Canada .
The British  cavy परिषद governs cavy  clubs in the United Kingdom .
Similar organizations exist in Australia ( Australian National Cavy Council )  और नई जीलैंड ( नई जीलैंड  Cavy Club ) .
Each club publishes its own  मानक of पूर्णता और  determines which breeds are eligible for showing .
New breeds continue to emerge  in the 21st सदी  .
Though there are  अनेक breeds of गिनी सुअर , तभी  a few breeds are commonly found on the show table as pets .
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found  अवांछनीय by प्रजनक or यहूद करवाया  to be pleasant pets regardless of how well they meet the breed standard of perfection .
The short hair , Abyssinian , Peruvian and  sheltie ( उर्फ silkie ) breeds हैं those सबसे अक्सर  seen as pets , and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs .
In addition to their standard form  , nearly सब breeds आइये  in a Satin variant .
Satins , due to their hollow hair shafts , possess coats of a special  gloss और चमक  .
However , there is growing evidence  कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the  Satin coat also can cause severe bone problems , including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease .
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by some cavy breeders ' associations  क्युकी of एनिमल welfare कारण  .
All cavy breeds have some shared general  मानकों : the सिर  profile should be rounded , with large eyes and large , smooth ears .
the देह चाहिए be दमदार और of कॉम्पैक्ट निर्माण .
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly  पारिभाषित और thorough  from root to tip .
These standards are best met by long  स्थापित , commonly करवाया breeds , as उनके प्रजनक have था पर्याप्त  time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities .
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness  is rarely मिले by अन्य than  the smooth coated breeds , which have had well established , separate breeding lines for different colours .
State schools ( also known as  पब्लिक स्कूलों or सरकारी स्कूलों ) generally refer to प्राथमिक  or secondary schools mandated for or offered to all children without charge paid for , in whole or in part , by taxation .
The term may also refer to institutions of  post-secondary शिक्षा वित्तपोषित  , in whole or in part , and overseen by government .
The  राइबोसोम assembles polymeric  protein molecules whose sequence is controlled by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules .
This is  जरूरी by सब जीना कोशिकाएं  and associated viruses .
The ribosome ( from ribonucleic acid and  the यूनानी सोम , अर्थ `` देह '' ) is a विशाल और जटिल आणविक  machine , found within all living cells , that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ) .
Ribosomes link amino acids together in the order specified by messenger RNA (  mrna ) अणुओं  .
ribosomes consist of दो प्रमुख subunits—the छोटी ribosomal  subunit reads the mRNA , while the large subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide chain .
Each subunit is  रचित of एक or अधिक ribosomal rna ( rrna ) अणुओं  and a variety of proteins .
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may  be कॉपी अनेक टाइम्स  into messenger RNA ( mRNA ) chains of a similar sequence .
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA chain and use it as a template for determining the correct  अनुक्रम of अमीनो acids in a  particular protein .
Amino acids are selected , collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ) , which  डालें एक भाग  of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain .
The attached  अमीनो acids हैं तब linked  together by another part of the ribosome .
Once the protein is produced , it can then 'fold ' to  उपज a विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक  three-dimensional structure .
A ribosome is made from complexes of RNAs and proteins and is  इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein  .
Each ribosome is divided  into दो subunits : the  smaller subunit binds to the mRNA pattern , while the larger subunit binds to the tRNA and the amino acids .
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA molecule , these  दो subunits विभाजित  apart .
Ribosomes are ribozymes , because the catalytic peptidyl transferase  कार्यकलाप कि कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ is performed  by the ribosomal RNA .
Ribosomes from bacteria , archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size , sequence ,  ढांचा , और the  ratio of protein to RNA .
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to kill bacteria by  inhibiting उनके ribosomes  , while leaving human ribosomes unaffected .
In bacteria and archaea , more than one ribosome may move along a single mRNA  कड़ी at एक समय , प्रत्येक `` पढना ''  its sequence and producing a corresponding protein molecule .
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble  अनेक सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु  , reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria .
Albert Claude , Christian de Duve , and George Emil Palade  यहूद jointly awarded the नोबेल पुरस्कार in physiology or आयुर्विज्ञान ,  in 1974 , for the discovery of the ribosomes .
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009  थी awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन , थामस  A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome .

Overview of the Calvin cycle and  कार्बन  fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that  बदलें कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अन्य  compounds into glucose .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma ,  the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes .
These reactions take  the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ  and perform further chemical processes on them .
There are  तीन phases to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ , collectively पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन  fixation , reduction reactions , and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite  इसके नाम , इस  process occurs only when light is available .
Plants do not carry out  the calvin  cycle by night .
They , instead , release sucrose into  the फ्लोएम इससे उनके  starch reserves .
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and  crassulacean एसिड  Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work .
In mathematics , a square number or perfect square is an integer that is the  वर्गाकार of an पूर्णांक ;  in other words , it is the product of some integer with itself .
For example , 9 is a square  क्रमांक , चूंकि  it can be written as .
The usual notation for the formula for the  वर्गाकार of a क्रमांक is नहीं the उत्पाद , लकिन the  equivalent exponentiation , usually pronounced as `` squared '' .
The name square number comes from the  नाम of the  shape ; see below .
Square numbers  हैं non-negative  .
another रास्ता of saying कि a ( non-negative  ) number is a square number , is that its square roots are again integers .
For example , = ±3  , so 9 is  a square number .
A positive  पूर्णांक कि रै no पूर्ण  square divisors except 1 is called square-free .
For a non-negative integer , the th square number  is , साथ होने the  zeroth square .
The concept of square can be  विस्तारित to कुछ अन्य क्रमांक  systems .
If rational numbers are included ,  तब a वर्गाकार is the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार  integers , and , conversely , the ratio of two square integers is a square ( e.g. , 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ) .
Starting with 1 , there are square numbers up to and including , where the  अभिव्यक्ति represents the मंजिल of  the number .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in  the राजनैतिक इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कि reflected  a sense of national purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars .
The era saw the  पतन of the federalist पार्टी और an समाप्त to the कड़वा दलगत विवादों  between it and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System .
President James  मुनरो endeavored to downplay  partisan affiliation in making his nominations , with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics .
The period is so  closely संबद्ध साथ मुनरो 's प्रेसिडेंसी ( 1817–1825  ) and his administrative goals that his name and the era are virtually synonymous .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in American politics with the end of the  federalist पार्टी as अमेरिका began  to develop after the War of 1812 .
जबकि अमेरिका थी experiencing  growth and prosperity after the war with Britain , this era also marks the first instance of economic troubles in the growing United States .
mirroring the अमरीकी प्रणाली प्रस्तावित by  Henry Clay , protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the United States complicated the tension between the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis .
While the term “Era of Good  feelings” is प्रायः viewed साथ विडंबना क्युकी of the राजनैतिक  turmoil , economic factors caused animosity between the North and South .
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism , as the history of the era was one in which the  राजनैतिक माहौल  was strained and divisive , especially among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party .
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell , in the Boston Federalist newspaper , Columbian Centinel , on July 12 , 1817 , following Monroe 's visit to  बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स  as part of his good will tour of America .
mariel मार्गरेट ``  Mia '' Hamm ( born March 17 , 1972 ) is a retired American professional soccer player .
Hamm played many years as a forward for the United  राज्य महिलाओं 's नेशनल सॉकर टोली और थी a  founding member of the Washington Freedom .
Hamm scored 158 international goals , more than any other player , male or female , in the history of soccer and is the third most capped female player in  सॉकर इतिहास पीछे kristine लिली और क्रिस्टी rampone , appearing in 275  international matches .
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first two times that  पुरस्कार थी दिए ( in 2001 और 2002 ) , और is सूचीबद्ध  as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ) .
She was inducted into the  नेशनल सॉकर हॉल of कीर्ति  as well as the Alabama Sports Hall of Fame and Texas Sports Hall of Fame .
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer and  जीवन और appeared in the एचबीओ वृत्तचित्र हिम्मत to सपना  : The Story of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team .
Washington Post  columnist माइकल wilbon पुकारा  Hamm , `` Perhaps the most important athlete of the last 15 years . ''
Hamm takes a corner  लात .
The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team based in Harrison , New  जर्सी , representing the नई यॉर्क महानगर  area .
The team competes in the Eastern  सम्मेलन  of Major League Soccer ( MLS ) .
It is one of the ten charter clubs of MLS ,  having competed in the लीग चूंकि इसके  inception .
The team was a founding  सदस्य of mls ( 1996 )  , but has gone through several name changes .
The team was originally known as the  नई york/new जर्सी metrostars  through 1997 .
From the 1998 season through the 2005 season , the team was  ज्ञात as the metrostars  .
On March 9 , 2006 , the  टोली थी बेची to रेड  Bull GmbH , leading to the team 's current name .
They are the only original MLS franchise not to have won any  significant ट्रॉफी ( सहित  regular season , playoffs , and knockout competition ) since inception .
The team 's best result in the MLS was the MLS Cup  फाइनल in 2008  .
In the US Open Cup , the MetroStars reached  तीन semifinals ( 1997 , 1998 , 2000 ) , पहले  reaching their first final in 2003 , losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire .
On August  26 , 2000 , the metros ' क्लिंट mathis  set an MLS record by scoring five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn .
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese , Tim Howard , Tony Meola , Tab Ramos , Alexi Lalas , Clint Mathis , Jozy Altidore , Michael Bradley , Claudio Reyna , Eddie Pope , Roberto Donadoni , Lothar Matthäus , Adolfo Valencia , Youri Djorkaeff , Amado Guevara , Juan Pablo Ángel , Thierry Henry , Juninho  pernambucano , जन गुन्नार solli , राफेल  Márquez , and Tim Cahill .
The team has also had  well-known कोच , सहित कार्लोस queiroz , कार्लोस अल्बर्टो  Parreira , Bora Milutinović , Bob Bradley , Mo Johnston , Bruce Arena and Hans Backe .
confucianism , taoism , और buddhism हैं एक , a  painting in the litang style portraying three men laughing by a river stream , 12th century , Song Dynasty .
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world , or in  अनेक देशों  , is difficult due to definitional issues as well as practical problems of enumeration .
To begin with , the religious beliefs , practices , and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by any measure ) often blend Buddhism with other traditions  सहित confucianism , the चाइनीज लोक  religion , Daoism , Shinto , and Korean shamanism .
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations , or observe a definite ritual of adherence such as taking Refuge , making   it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners .
An additional challenge is the hostility of several national  सरकारें ( प्रायः कम्युनिस्ट ones ऐसे  as China or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically .
Government policies in these countries  may प्रोत्साहित the under-reporting or non-reporting  of religious adherence , resulting in official totals that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries .
Estimate of the worldwide Buddhist population range from 350 million to over one billion , but cluster nearer to the  पहला फिगर .
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 )  suggests a फिगर  of 397 million .
By major  शाखाओं , the संख्याएँ  are as follows:
( 1 )  महायान buddhism , सहित  East Asian Buddhism , with no fewer than 185 million adherents , and possibly several times that many ( again , depending on definitional issues ) .
This is the  predominant रूप of buddhism  practiced in China , South Korea , Japan , Taiwan , Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism , with no fewer than 125  लाख adherents  .
This is the  predominant रूप  of Buddhism practiced in Cambodia , Thailand , Laos , Sri Lanka , and Burma .
( 3 )  वज्रयान buddhism  , with approximately 20 million adherents .
This form  predominates  in the greater Tibetan and Mongolian regions , as well as in the Himalayas .
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan , and various  territories भीतर कया is अभी पश्चिमी चीन , वज्रयान is परंपरागत to निश्चित  regions of Russia ( e.g . Kalmykia , Buryatia ) , India ( e.g . Ladakh , Sikkim ) , and Nepal ( e.g . Khumbu ) .
Vajrayana , also known as Tibetan Buddhism , is often conflated with Tantric  buddhism , लकिन इस is imprecise  , as Shingon and other forms of East Asian Buddhism also practice tantra .
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka , Thailand , Cambodia , Laos , Burma , Bhutan , and Mongolia )  have unambiguous बौद्ध  majorities .
depending on कैसा एक calculates चाइनीज और अन्य ईस्ट एशियाई adherents  , this figure might expand to include several more countries .
In addition , Buddhism is the state  धर्म of कंबोडिया  and Bhutan , and receives prominent mention in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka .
in उत्तरी इण्डिया और नेपाल , the  land where Buddhism was born , the religion severely declined during the first millennium .
Whether this decline was due to the Islamic conquest of northern  इण्डिया , or to अन्य कारकों , remains  controversial .
See the article Decline of Buddhism in  इण्डिया  .
James Butler Hickok ( May 27 , 1837 – August 2 , 1876 ) , better known as Wild Bill Hickok , was a folk hero of  the अमरीकी  Old West .
His skills as a gunfighter and scout , along with his reputation as a lawman , provided the basis for his fame , although some  of उसके reported  exploits are fictionalized .
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois , Hickok went west at age 18 as a fugitive from justice , first working as  a stagecoach ड्राइवर , पहले he became a lawman in the frontier  territories of Kansas and Nebraska .
He  लड़ा लिये the संघ फौज दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध , और gained  publicity after the war as a scout , marksman , actor , and professional gambler .
Between his law-enforcement duties and gambling ,  जिससे easily  overlapped , Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts .
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the Nuttal & Mann 's Saloon in Deadwood  , डकोटा territory ( अभी  South Dakota ) .
Artist 's  धारणा of the  Curiosity rover vaporizing rock on Mars .
The rover landed on Mars  in अगस्त 2012  .
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which propels itself across the  सतह of the ग्रह  Mars after landing .
Rovers have several advantages over  stationary landers : वे जाँचें अधिक territory , वे can be निर्देशित  to interesting features , they can place themselves in sunny positions to weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control .
There have  महरूम चार  successful robotically operated Mars rovers .
the जेट  Propulsion Laboratory managed the Mars Pathfinder mission and its now inactive Sojourner rover .
It currently manages the Mars Exploration Rover mission  's क्रियाशील अवसर रोवर और  inactive Spirit , and , as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission , the Curiosity rover .
A financial audit , or more  accurately , an ऑडिट of वित्तीय कथन , is the  verification of the financial statements of a legal entity , with a view to express an audit opinion .
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance , but not absolute assurance , that the financial  कथन हैं प्रस्तुत fairly , in सब सामग्री  respects , and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework .
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the financial statements , which increases the value and credibility of the financial statements produced by management , thus increase user confidence in the financial statement , reduce investor risk and consequently  reduce the लागत of पूंजी of the preparer  of the financial statements .
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing  लेखपाल जो हैं  experts in financial reporting .
The financial audit is one of many assurance functions provided  by हिसाब  firms .
Many organizations separately employ or hire internal  auditors , जो do नहीं attest to वित्तीय  reports but focus mainly on the internal controls of the organization .
External auditors may choose to place  सीमित रिलायंस on the कार्य  of internal auditors .
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an  संगठन , इसलिए होता संभावित to reduce  of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings .
Internationally , the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA ) issued by the International  auditing और परख मानकों फलक ( iaasb ) is माना as the बेंचमार्क लिये ऑडिट प्रक्रम  .
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow  the isa or a  local variation of the ISA .
Dollar coins have been minted in the  संयुक्त राज्य  in gold , silver , and base metal versions .
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the United States with a face value of one dollar , although purists insist that a  डालर is नहीं चांदी जबतक it contains  some of that metal .
Silver dollars ,  the पहला डालर सिक्का  issue , were minted beginning in 1794 .
सुनहरा डॉलर  and gold-colored dollars have also been produced by the United States .
The Sacagawea and  अध्यक्षीय डॉलर हैं प्रायः referred  to as `` golden dollars '' .
In modern  टाइम्स , डालर सिक्के have नहीं  been very popular in the United States .
Despite  प्रयत्न by the सरकारी to प्रचार  their use , most Americans currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins .
In straight  और स्तर  flight lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ) .
In a banked turn of 60° ,  लिफ्ट बराबरी दोगुना  the weight ( L=2W ) .
The  पायलट अनुभवों  2g and a doubled weight .
The steeper  the बैंको ,  the greater the g-forces .
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate  इससे शून्य to in 0.86 सेकेंड  .
This is a  आड़ा त्वरण of 5.3 g. संयुक्त साथ  the vertical g-force in the stationary case the Pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g .
g-force ( with g from gravitational ) is a term for  accelerations लगा as  weight and measurable by accelerometers .
It is not  a फ़ोर्स , प्रति  se , but a force per unit mass .
Since such a force is perceived as a  वज़न , कोई g-force can be वर्णित as a `` वज़न प्रति ईकाई  mass '' ( see the synonym specific weight ) .
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass , and ( save for certain  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ोर्स प्रभाव ) is the कारण of  an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall .
This acceleration experienced by an object is  due to the वेक्टर योग of non-gravitational  forces acting on an object free to move .
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity are termed proper  accelerations , और it is तभी ये कि  are measured in g-force units .
They cause stresses  और  strains on objects .
Because of these strains , large g-forces  may be destructive  .
Gravitation acting alone  करता नहीं उपज a g-force , भी हालांकि  g-forces are expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity .
यूँ , the  standard gravitational acceleration at the Earth 's surface produces g-force only indirectly , as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces .
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on  the धरती 's सतह  is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward direction by the ground , keeping the object from going into free-fall .
The upward force from  the मैदान ensures कि an ऑब्जेक्ट at बाकी on the धरती  's surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition , which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth 's center .
Objects allowed to  free-fall in an inertial trajectory  under the influence of gravitation-only , feel no g-force .
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions  अंदर  a freely falling elevator falling toward the Earth 's center ( in vacuum ) , or ( to good approximation ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit .
These are examples of coordinate acceleration ( a change in velocity  ) बगैर a सनसनी of वज़न  .
The  अनुभव of no g-force ( zero-g ) , however  it is produced , is synonymous with weightlessness .
In the  अनुपस्थिति of गुरुत्वाकर्षक फ़ील्ड , or in दिशानिर्देश at सही कोण to उन्हें  , proper and coordinate accelerations are the same , and any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration .
An example here is a  प्रक्षेपास्त्र in फ़्री स्पेस , in जिससे  simple changes in velocity are produced by the engines , and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers .
An augur holding a lituus , the curved wand often  प्रयुक्त as a प्रतीक of  augury on Roman coins
The augur was a  पुजारी और आधिकारिक in the शास्त्रीय संसार  , especially ancient Rome and Etruria .
His main role was to interpret the will of the  देवताओं by अध्ययन the उड़ान of पक्षियों  : whether they are flying in groups or alone , what noises they make as they fly , direction of flight and what kind of birds they are .
This was known as ``  लेने  the auspices . ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to any  प्रमुख undertaking in रोमन society—public  or private—including matters of war , commerce , and religion .
The Roman historian Livy stresses the  महत्व of the augurs : `` जो करता नहीं जान कि इस नगर थी संस्थापित तभी बाद  taking the auspices , that everything in war and in peace , at home and abroad , was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an affluent  जातियाँ in  southeastern Michigan .
It is the second largest city in Oakland  काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of  Michigan .
Its  जनसांख्यिकी थी 79,740  at the 2010 census .
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit and is also northeast  of शहर ऐन arbor  .
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest cities in the United States ,  as खूब as in the राज्य  of Michigan .
In 2010  , the क्षेत्रफल क्रमित as the  30th safest city in America .
Although the two cities have separate services and addresses , Farmington and  farmington पहाड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः विचार  of as the same community .
Features of the community include a recently renovated downtown , boutiques , a vintage  सिनेमा , numerous रेस्तरां , exotic car dealerships  , art galleries , and public parks including Heritage Park .
There are several historical sites including the Longacre House and the  राज्यपाल warner mansion  .
दोनो  cities are served by Farmington Public Schools .
Farmington Hills  serves as a प्रमुख कारोबार बीच  for the greater Detroit area .
present-day छाप  of a Late Bronze Age seal
कस्बा मुहर (  matrix ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a  यंत्र लिये बनाना an छाप in मोम , मिट्टी , पेपर  , or some other medium , including an embossment on paper , and is also the impression thus made .
The  असली purpose थी to authenticate a दस्तावेज़ , a wrapper लिये एक ऐसे as  a modern envelope , or the cover of a container or package holding valuables or other objects .
The  sealing प्रक्रम is essentially  that of a mould , with the final image represented on the device for making the impression by a mirror-image design , incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio .
The seal-making device is also referred to as the seal matrix or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or , more  rarely , the sealing  ) .
If the impression is made purely as a  राहत resulting इससे the वृहद दबाव on the पेपर जहाँ the ऊँची भाग  of the matrix touch , the seal is known as a dry seal ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used , usually in another color than the paper .
For legal purposes , the definition of a seal may be extended to include  रबर stamps , or लिखने निर्दिष्ट शब्द  ( `` seal '' or `` L.S . `` ) .
In the United States , the word `` seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the seal design ( in  मोनोक्रोम or रंग )  , which may be used in a variety of contexts including architectural settings , on flags , or on official letterheads .
Thus , for example , the Great Seal of the United States , among other uses , appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the  seals of the u.S. राज्य appear on  their respective state flags .
In Europe , although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as well as  on seals , the मुहर डिज़ाइन in इसके entirety rarely appears  as an emblem .
The study of seals is known as  sigillography or sphragistics  .
Groundhog Day ( Pennsylvania German : Grundsaudaag ,  murmeltiertag ) is a  day celebrated on February 2 .
According to folklore , if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day , then spring will come early ; if it is sunny , the groundhog will supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into its burrow , and the  शीत मौसम होगा continue लिये छह अधिक सप्ताह  .
Modern  कस्टम of the अवकाश involve जश्न जहाँ  early morning festivals are held to watch the groundhog emerging from its burrow .
In southeastern Pennsylvania , Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday with fersommlinge ,  सोशल कार्यक्रम in जिससे खाना is परोसा , भाषणों हैं बना , और एक  or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment .
The  पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी dialect is the तभी भाषा बोला at the इवेंट , और those जो बोलो  English pay a penalty , usually in the form of a nickel , dime , or quarter per word spoken , with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table .
The largest Groundhog  दिन जश्न  is held in Punxsutawney , Pennsylvania .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized and popular tradition , received widespread attention as a result of the 1993 film  groundhog दिन , जिससे थी नियत in punxsutawney , pa ( हालांकि  filmed primarily in Woodstock , IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil .
High  रेज़ोल्यूशन  image of Tampa Bay region
The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical  जलवायु ( koppen cfa ) , साथ गरम और आर्द्र ग्रीष्म साथ बारंबार thunderstorms  and drier winters with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years .
The area experiences a significant summer wet season , as nearly two-thirds of the annual precipitation falls  in the महीने of जून through  September .
The area is listed by the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) as being in hardiness zone 10 , which is about the northern limit of where coconut palms  और  royal palms can be grown .
Highs usually range between 65 and 95  °f ( 18 और 35 °c )  year round .
हालांकि ज्ञात लिये hot ग्रीष्म , tampa  's official high has never reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ) .
St.  पीटर्सबर्ग 's all-time रिकार्ड  high is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ) .
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the Gulf  of मैक्सिको , और much of the नगर of  Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay .
This proximity to large bodies of water both  नरमपंथियों temperatures और introduces विशाल amounts of  humidity into the atmosphere .
In general , the local communities  farthest इससे the coast have larger तापमान  ranges , both during a single day and throughout the seasons of the year .
A diagram of  the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum , showing various properties across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies of  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण  .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum  '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ  , and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby covering  wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of किलोमीटर bas to a भिन्न  of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself , while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the  vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई , हालांकि in principle the वर्णक्रम  is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing  interactions , as तरीके to पढ़ाई और characterize  matter .
In addition ,  विकिरण इससे विभिन्न भाग  of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his  आद्याक्षर , fdr , थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in  world events during the mid-20th century , leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms , he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned  अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932 , as उसके घरेलू नीतियों  defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy  लोकप्रिय सोंग `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं यहाँ again  `` as his campaign theme , FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932 , at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by  उसके निजी विजय over पोलियो , fdr 's unfailing  optimism and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in  अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और  Japan in World War II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a  profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में  of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
the अर्थव्यवस्था improved rapidly  from 1933 to 1937 , but then relapsed into a deep recession .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any  considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम  when unemployment diminished during World War II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85 , except for the regulation of Wall Street by the  प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग , जिससे  still exists .
Along with several smaller programs , major  surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the संघीय जमा  Insurance Corporation , which was created in 1933 , and Social Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion  of चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी , fdr दिया दमदार राजनयिक और वित्तीय support  to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His goal was to make America the ``  आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र  `` which would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March  1941 , रूज़वेल्ट , साथ congressional  approval , provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after  the जापानी आक्रमण  on Pearl Harbor on December 7 , 1941 , calling it a `` date which will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the  mobilization of the u.S.  economy to support the Allied war effort .
As an active military leader ,  रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts कि ended in the  defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt  ordered the internment of  100,000 Japanese American civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % ,  राहत कार्यक्रम largely ended , और the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था  grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in war centers , and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the twelve  सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी , लकिन भी लिये दशकों afterward  .
He orchestrated the  realignment of मतदाता  that created the Fifth Party System .
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions , big city machines , white ethnics ,  अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और ग्रामीण  white Southerners .
He also influenced the later creation of the United Nations and  bretton  Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. Presidents , along  साथ अब्राहम lincoln और जार्ज  Washington .
A liberal Democrat , Roosevelt defined his ideological position as  `` a छोटी  left of center . ''
A Joint  कमेटी is a पद in राजनीती  that is used to refer to a committee made up of members of both chambers of a bicameral legislature .
In  अन्य contexts , it  refers to a committee with members from more than one organization .
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution , it is  इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to परमिट , prohibit , or वरना विनियमित  commercial sex , except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states , prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public order crime , a  अपराधों कि disrupts the अनुक्रम  of a community .
It was at one time considered to be a vagrancy  अपराधों .
Currently ,  नेवाडा is the तभी राज्य to allow वेश्यालय  prostitution , the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes .
Only 8 counties currently contain  क्रियाशील brothels  .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark  काउंटी ( जिससे contains the लास vegas–paradise महानगर  area ) , Washoe County ( which contains Reno ) , Carson City , Douglas County , and Lincoln County .
The other counties  theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति  , but some of these counties currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and living off of the proceeds of a prostitute  remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा  law , as elsewhere in the country .
As with other  देशों , वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त राज्य can be  divided into three broad categories : street prostitution , brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The national flag of the  संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका , प्रायः बस referred to as the अमरीकी  flag , consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white , with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small , white , five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence  इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और  became the first states in the Union .
Nicknames for the flag  शामिल the `` सितारों और धारियाँ '' , `` बूढ़ा महिमा `` ,  and `` The Star-Spangled Banner . ''
India is a federal  संघ  of states comprising twenty-eight states and seven union territories .
The states and  territories हैं  further subdivided into districts and so on .

Change in apportionment of congressional districts ,  starting in 2013 , as a परिणाम of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
2000 जनसांख्यिकी  change:
Change in  apportionment of  congressional districts , from 2003 to 2013 , as a result of the 2000 census .
This is a  पूरा सूची of congressional  districts for representation in the United States House of Representatives .
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of  जिले हैं संकल्पित बाद प्रत्येक जनसांख्यिकी , हालांकि  in some cases states have changed the boundaries more than once per census .
This list includes the 435 current and over 200 obsolete  जिले  .
For example , since the 2000  जनसांख्यिकी , नेब्रास्का  has had three districts , but it used to have as many as six .
In the first decade of the  twenty-first सदी , टेक्सास था 32 जिले , लकिन रै  since added four due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census .
Other states have lost districts since  the क्रमांक of congressional  seats has been set at 435 by statute .
Also included here are non-voting delegations : six current  और चार obsolete  .
The  सीमाएँ of  districts often shift with each redistricting .
Over time  , the प्रदेश और जनसांख्यिकी  represented in a district can change substantially .
Furthermore ,  जिले sometimes retain  the same boundaries while changing their district numbers .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an American singer ,  songwriter , रिकार्ड निर्माता , अभिनेत्री  , and philanthropist .
अंतर्गत the मार्गदर्शन of कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola  , Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) , and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ) ,  कैरी थी स्थापित as कोलंबिया 's  highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its  दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन `` , a  duet with Boyz II Men , spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album ,  कैरी began to deviate इससे उसके r & b और  pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ) , at which time  कैरी  had separated from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 , and signed a  record-breaking $ 100 लाख रिकॉर्डिंग  contract with Virgin Records .
Before the release of  उसके पहला विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ) , वो suffered  a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was bought out of her recording contract for $ 50 million ,  जिससे led to a मनाही in उसके करियर  .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002 , and  बाद an unsuccessful काल ,  returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s , and was later  नामित `` सोंग of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड  .
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough  प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी  Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career spanning over two decades , Carey has sold more than 200 million records worldwide ,  बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling  music artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as  the संसार  's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards .
Carey was also named the best-selling female artist of the  मिलेनियम in 2000  .
According to the  रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग  Association of America , she is the third best-selling female artist in the United States , with 63.5 million certified albums .
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ) , Carey gained her eighteenth  क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य , अधिक than  any other solo artist .
In 2012 , Carey was ranked second on VH1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest Women in  म्यूज़िक '' .
Aside from her commercial  accomplishments , कैरी रै  won five Grammy Awards , 17 World Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme ''  by the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड , वो is famed लिये उसके  five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
stratocumulus  stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology , a cloud is a visible mass of  द्रव droplets or frozen crystals  made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body .
These  निलंबित अणु हैं  also known as aerosols .
Clouds in  धरती 's माहौल  are studied in the cloud physics branch of meteorology .
Two processes , possibly acting together , can lead to air becoming  संतृप्त ; कूलिंग  the air or adding water vapor to the air .
In general , precipitation will fall to the  सतह ; an एक्सेप्शन  is virga , which evaporates before reaching the surface .
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact clouds in their most basic forms can show free-convective upward growth like cumulus , appear in non-convective  परतदार चादरें ऐसे as स्ट्रेट्स , or लो the रूप of पतला तंतुमय wisps  , as in the case of cirrus .
Prefixes are used in  कनेक्शन साथ बादल to एक्स्प्रेस  variations or complexities in these basic forms or to specify middle or high altitude ranges .
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers , cumulo- for  जटिल highly-convective तूफ़ान बादल , nimbo- लिये मोटा परतदार बादल of कुछ  complexity that can produce moderate to heavy precipitation , alto- for middle clouds , and cirro- for high clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure .
Whether or not a cloud is low ,  मध्य , or ऊँची स्तर depends on कैसा दूर  above the ground its base forms .
Cloud types with significant vertical extent can form in the low or middle altitude ranges  depending on the नमी सामग्री of the एयर  .
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the popular adaptation of Luke Howard 's  बादल categorization  system , which began to spread in popularity during December 1802 .
Synoptic surface weather observations use code  संख्याएँ to रिकार्ड और रपट the प्रकार of tropospheric बादल दृश्य  at each scheduled observation time based on the height and physical appearance of the clouds .
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's troposphere  , वहीँ हैं अवसरों जब  clouds in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed .
These three main layers of the atmosphere  जहाँ बादल may be देखी हैं  collectively known as the homosphere .
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere , which  साथ मेक up the  heterosphere that marks the transition to outer space .
Clouds have been observed on other planets and moons within the Solar System , but , due to their different temperature characteristics , they are composed of other substances  ऐसे as मिथेन , अमोनिया , और sulfuric एसिड  .
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S.  राज्य of टेक्सास भीतर the houston–sugar land–baytown  metropolitan area .
As of the 2010 census ,  the जनसांख्यिकी  was 291,309 .
Its county seat  is galveston  .
League City is the largest city in Galveston  काउंटी in  terms of population ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city .
Galveston  काउंटी थी संस्थापित  in 1838 .
