The Big Ten Conference , formerly Western Conference and Big Nine  सम्मेलन ,  is the oldest Division I college athletic conference in the United States .
Its twelve member institutions ( which are  primarily फ्लैगशिप शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in उनके संबंधित राज्य , well-regarded academically  , and with relatively large student enrollment ) are located primarily in the Midwest , stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east .
The  सम्मेलन competes  in the NCAA 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ) , formerly known as Division I-A , the highest level of NCAA competition in that sport .
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or , in two cases , their parent university systems ) also are members of the Committee on  संस्थागत सहयोग , a अग्रणी शैक्षणिक  and research consortium .
Despite the conference 's name , the Big Ten actually consists of 12 schools , following the addition  of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों in 1993  and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011 .
In 2014 , the  सम्मेलन होगा  expand to 14 members with the additions of the University of Maryland , College Park and Rutgers , The State University of New Jersey .
It is not to be confused with the Big 12 Conference , which  रै तभी टेन स्कूलों और represents  a different region of the country .
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in Scotland using a pot still distillation process at a single  डिस्टिलरी , साथ malted जौ as the तभी  grain ingredient .
As with any Scotch whisky , a single malt Scotch must be distilled in Scotland and matured in oak casks in Scotland for at least three years (  सबसे सिंगल malts हैं matured longer ) .
`` Malt '' indicates that the  व्हिस्की is आसुत  from a `` malted '' grain .
Several types of  दाने can be malted ( लिये उदाहरण , जौ , rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने जिससे  can be malted ) ; however , in the case of single malt Scotch , barley is always the only grain used .
`` Single '' indicates that all the malts in the bottle  आइये इससे a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी  .
bottlings containing malt व्हिस्की इससे  multiple distilleries are called `` blended malt `` .
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ) , the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of Scotch whisky ) on bottles of whisky that contained a mixture of both  जौ और non-barley अनाज व्हिस्की , लकिन इस is no longer the मामला  .
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009 , a `` blended malt Scotch whisky '' is a mixture of single malt Scotch whiskies , not a mixture of malted barley whisky and non-barley whisky ;  those हैं पुकारा `` blended स्कॉच  whisky '' , without the word `` malt '' .
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt  '' प्रयुक्त अंतर्गत the prior  labelling conventions .
The age statement on a  बोतल of सिंगल malt  Scotch is the number of years the whisky spent maturing in cask .
As very few whiskies are bottled from a single cask the age statement  reflects the आयु of the youngest malt in the मिक्सर .
A texture may be arranged so as to , `` closely approach the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres , for  उदाहरण , the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' कॉर्ड ... , in a बहुत दिलचस्प वितरण  of pitches , produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ) , p.166 & 168 ) .
In contrast to more traditional musical textures , sound mass composition ``  minimizes the महत्व of व्यक्तिगत pitches in वरीयता लिये  texture , timbre , and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact . ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and  स्प्रेड to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s  and 1960s , sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001 , pp . 326–27 ) .
Techniques  जिससे may बनाएँ or be प्रयुक्त साथ ध्वनि द्रव्यमान शामिल विस्तारित  techniques such as muted brass or strings , flutter tonguing , wide vibrato , extreme ranges , and glissandos .
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb , Pauline Oliveros ' Sound Patterns for chorus (  1961 ) , norma beecroft 's इससे सपनो of पीतल लिये कोरस (  1963–1964 ) , and Nancy Van de Vate .
Beecroft ``  टुकड़ा व्यक्तिगत pitches in एहसान of a सामूहिक  timbre through the use of vocal and instrumental clusters , choral speech , narrator , and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape . ''
(  ibid  )
A very early example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ) , where chaos is represented by a gradually cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven  टीप of the d नाबालिग स्केल ( henck  2004 , pp . 52–54 ) .
A later example is the third movement of Ruth Crawford Seeger 's String Quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while more recently Phill Niblock 's  अनेक ड्रोन आधारित म्यूज़िक serves as an उदाहरण  .
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and Edgard Varèse often carefully scored individual instrumental parts so that they would fuse into one ensemble timbre or sound mass (  एरिक्सन 1975 , pp . 18 और 21  ) .
Other examples include European `` textural '' compositions of the  fifties और sixties ऐसे as krzysztof penderecki 's threnody  to the Victims of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) and György Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ) .
Other  composers साथ works using इस तकनीक शामिल  Henryk Górecki , Karel Husa , Witold Lutosławski , Kazimierz Serocki , and Steven Stucky .
Sound mass techniques also appear in the music of  जार्ज crumb ( anon . n.d.  ) .
Students attending a lecture on linear algebra at the Helsinki  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Technology
Pupils  in ग्रामीण  Sudan , 2002
A student is a learner , or someone who attends an  शैक्षणिक  institution .
In  कुछ राष्ट्र , the अंग्रेज़ी पद ( or इसके cognate in another भाषा  ) is reserved for those who attend university , while a schoolchild under the age of eighteen is called a pupil in English ( or an equivalent in other languages ) , although in the United States a person enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student .
in इसके widest उपयोग , छात्र  is used for anyone who is learning .
Australia is a continent  comprising मेनलैंड  Australia , Tasmania , New Guinea , Seram , possibly Timor , and neighbouring islands .
The  महाद्वीप is sometimes ज्ञात in  technical contexts by the names Sahul , Australinea or Meganesia , to distinguish it from the Australian mainland .
It is  the smallest of the सात  traditional continents in the English conception .
New Zealand is not part of the continent of Australia , but of  the पृथक , submerged  continent of Zealandia .
Zealandia and Australia are both  भाग of the wider regions  known as Australasia and Oceania .
The  महाद्वीप of ऑस्ट्रेलिया झूठ on a महाद्वीपीय शेल्फ overlain by उथले  seas which divide it into several landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres Strait between mainland Australia and New Guinea , and Bass Strait between mainland Australia and Tasmania .
When sea levels were lower during the Pleistocene ice age , including  the पिछला glacial अधिकतम परिचय 18,000 bc , वे यहूद कनेक्ट  by dry land .
During the past ten thousand years , rising sea levels overflowed the lowlands and separated the continent into today 's low-lying  arid to semi-arid मेनलैंड और the दो mountainous आइलैंड्स  of New Guinea and Tasmania .
Geologically , a continent extends to the edge of its continental shelf , so  the now-separate आइलैंड्स हैं माना  part of the continent .
Due to the spread of animals , fungi and  पौधे आरपार the सिंगल pleistocene landmass  the separate lands have a related biota .
Central Park is nearly twice as  बिग as the संसार 's second-smallest  country , Monaco .
historically इसके टंकी  were important components of the city 's water supply .
Environmental issues in New York City are affected by the city 's size , density , abundant public transportation infrastructure , and  स्थान at the मुँह of the हडसन  River .
New York 's population density  रै पर्यावरणीय  pros and cons .
It facilitates the  उच्चतम द्रव्यमान पारगमन उपयोग in the  United States , but also concentrates pollution .
Gasoline consumption in the city is at the rate the national  औसत थी in the 1920s  , and greenhouse gas emissions are a fraction of the national average , at 7.1 metric tons per person per year , below San Francisco , at 11.2 metric tons , and the national average , at 24.5 metric tons .
New  यॉर्क नगर खाते लिये तभी 1 % of संयुक्त  States greenhouse gas emissions while housing 2.7 % of its population .
In September 2012 , New York was named the # 1 ``  अमेरिका 's dirtiest नगर , '' by a travel+leisure  readership survey that rated the environmental quality of 35 prominent cities in the United States .
Atlanta ( , stressed , locally ) is  the पूंजी of और the सबसे  populous city in the U.S. state of Georgia , with an estimated 2011 population of 432,427 .
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the  अटलांटा महानगर क्षेत्रफल , घर to 5,457,831  people and the ninth largest metropolitan area in the United States .
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton County , and a small portion of the  नगर extends eastward into dekalb  County .
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad lines , and the city rose from the ashes of the  सिविल युद्ध  to become a national center of commerce .
In the decades  following the सिविल अधिकारों गति  , during which the city earned a reputation as `` too busy to hate '' for the progressive views of its citizens and leaders , Atlanta attained international prominence .
Atlanta is the primary  परिवहन हब of the southeastern  United States , via highway , railroad , and air , with Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport being the world 's busiest airport since 1998 .
Atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) world city , '' and , with a gross domestic product of US $ 270 billion , Atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among  संसार शहरों और छठे in the  nation .
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse , dominant sectors include logistics , professional and business services  , मीडिया परिचालन , सरकारी प्रशासन , और  higher education .
Topographically ,  अटलांटा is चिह्नित  by rolling hills and dense tree coverage .
Revitalization of Atlanta 's neighborhoods ,  initially spurred by the 1996 ओलंपिक , रै intensified  in the 21st century , altering the city 's demographics , politics , and culture .
A 1947 propaganda comic book published by the  catechetical गिल्ड शैक्षणिक  Society raising the specter of a Communist takeover
mccarthyism is the अभ्यास of बनाना आरोपों  of disloyalty , subversion , or treason without proper regard for evidence .
It also means `` the practice of making unfair allegations or using unfair investigative techniques , especially in  अनुक्रम to सीमित  dissent or political criticism . ''
The term has its origins in the period in the United States known as the Second Red Scare , lasting roughly from 1950  to 1956 और characterized by heightened fears of  communist influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents .
Originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of Republican U.S . Senator Joseph McCarthy  of विस्कॉन्सिन , `` mccarthyism '' जल्द took on a broader अर्थ  , describing the excesses of similar efforts .
The term is also now used more generally to describe reckless , unsubstantiated accusations , as well as demagogic attacks  on the अक्षर or राष्ट्रभक्ति of राजनैतिक  adversaries .
During the McCarthy era , thousands of Americans were accused of being Communists or communist sympathizers and became the subject of aggressive  investigations और questioning पहले सरकारी or private-industry panels , समितियों और एजेंसियों  .
The primary targets of such suspicions were government employees , those in the entertainment industry ,  शिक्षक और संघ कार्यकर्ताओं  .
Suspicions were often given  credence despite inconclusive or questionable प्रमाण , और the  level of threat posed by a person 's real or supposed leftist associations or beliefs was often greatly exaggerated .
Many people suffered loss of  नियुक्ति and/or विनाश  of their careers ; some even suffered imprisonment .
Most of these punishments came about through trial verdicts later overturned , laws that would be declared unconstitutional , dismissals  लिये कारण बाद घोषित illegal or actionable , or extra-legal  procedures that would come into general disrepute .
The most famous  उदाहरण of mccarthyism शामिल the भाषणों , investigations , और hearings of सीनेटर मैकार्थी  himself ; the Hollywood blacklist , associated with hearings conducted by the House Un-American Activities Committee ( HUAC ) ; and the various anti-communist activities of the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J. Edgar Hoover .
McCarthyism was a widespread social and cultural phenomenon that affected all levels  of समाज और थी the  source of a great deal of debate and conflict in the United States .
Napoleon is a  fictional अक्षर  and the main antagonist in George Orwell 's Animal Farm .
While he is at first a common farm  सुअर , he  gets rid of Snowball , another pig which shares the power .
He then takes advantage of the animals ' uprising against their masters to eventually become the tyrannical ``  अध्यक्ष of एनिमल फार्म , '' जिससे he turns into a तानाशाही  .

The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory that plugs directly into  the अंतरजाल  .
Since December 2009 , it has allowed people to ``  लहरे '' the seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों  run deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world .
Along with its sister project  , शुक्र , वरुण offers a  unique approach to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises  or space-based satellites to carry आउट उनके शोध  , while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated crawler .
The Coronet was a full-size car from Dodge  in the 1950s , initially the प्रभाग 's उच्चतम  trim line but , starting in 1955 , the lowest trim line .
In the 1960s , the name was transferred to Dodge 's  mid-size प्रविष्टि .
ARM9 is an ARM  वास्तुकला  32-bit RISC CPU family .
राष्ट्रमंडल is a परंपरागत अंग्रेज़ी  term for a political community founded for the common good .
historically , it  has sometimes been synonymous with `` republic `` .
More recently it has been  प्रयुक्त लिये fraternal  associations of some sovereign nations .
Most  notably , the राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र , an संघ  primarily of former members of the British Empire , is often referred to as simply `` the Commonwealth '' .
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11 , September 11th , or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by the Islamic terrorist group  al-qaeda upon the संयुक्त राज्य in नई यॉर्क नगर और  the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
Four  यात्री airliners यहूद hijacked by  19 al-Qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks .
Two of those planes , American Airlines Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175 , were crashed into the  उत्तर और दक्षिण मीनारें , क्रमशः  , of the World Trade Center complex in New York City .
Within two hours , both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or complete collapse of  सब अन्य इमारतें in the wtc जटिल , as खूब  as major damage to ten other large surrounding structures .
A third plane , American Airlines Flight 77 , was crashed into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the United States  विभाग of रक्षा ) ,  leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United Airlines Flight 93 , was targeted at the United States  कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , लकिन क्रैश  into a field near Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers .
In total , almost 3,000 people died in the attacks , including the 227 civilians and  19 hijackers सवार the  four planes .
Suspicion  जल्दी गिरी on  al-Qaeda .
Although the group 's leader , Osama bin Laden ,  initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी , in 2004  he claimed responsibility for the attacks .
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of Israel , the presence of U.S.  सैनिकों in सऊदी अरब , और प्रतिबंधों  against Iraq as motives for the attacks .
The  संयुक्त राज्य responded to the हमले by शुभारंभ  the War on Terror and invading Afghanistan to depose the Taliban , which had harbored al-Qaeda .
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism  विधान और विस्तारित  law enforcement powers .
having evaded  capture for years , bin Laden was located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011 .
The destruction of the Twin Towers and other properties caused serious damage to the economy of Lower  मैनहटन और  had a significant effect on global markets .
Cleanup of the World Trade Center  साईट थी  completed in May 2002 , and the Pentagon was repaired within a year .
Numerous memorials  have महरूम constructed , सहित the नेशनल  September 11 Memorial & Museum in New York , the Pentagon Memorial , and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania .
After a lengthy delay , the One World Trade Center is expected to  be समाप्त at  Ground Zero in New York City in 2013 .
Crater Lake National Park is a  संयुक्त राज्य नेशनल पार्क  located in southern Oregon .
Established in 1902 , Crater Lake National Park is the fifth oldest national park in  the संयुक्त  States and the only one in the state of Oregon .
The park encompasses the caldera of Crater Lake , a  remnant of a नष्ट ज्वालामुखी  , Mount Mazama , and the surrounding hills and forests .
The lake is deep at its  deepest पाइंट , जिससे makes it the deepest झील in  the United States , the second deepest in North America and the ninth deepest in the world .
Crater  झील is प्रायः referred to as the सातवाँ deepest झील  in the world , but this former listing excludes the approximately depth of subglacial Lake Vostok in Antarctica , which resides under nearly of ice , and the recent report of a maximum depth for Lake O'Higgins /San Martin , located on the border of Chile and Argentina .
However , when comparing its average depth of to the average depth of other deep lakes , Crater Lake  becomes the deepest in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध और  the third deepest in the world .
The impressive average depth of this volcanic lake is due to the nearly symmetrical deep  caldera formed 7,700 सालो पहले दौरान the हिंसक climactic  eruptions and subsequent collapse of Mount Mazama and the relatively moist climate that is typical of the crest of the Cascade Range .
The caldera rim  सीमाएँ in  elevation from .
The United States Geological Survey  benchmarked उन्नयन  of the lake surface itself is .
इस  National Park encompasses .
Crater Lake has no streams flowing  into or आउट of  it .
All water that enters the lake is  आखिरकार खोया इससे  evaporation or subsurface seepage .
The lake 's water commonly has a striking blue hue , and the lake is  re-filled entirely  from direct precipitation in the form of snow and rain .
The Supreme Court of  the संयुक्त राज्य is the उच्चतम अदालत  in the United States .
It has ultimate ( and largely discretionary ) appellate  क्षेत्राधिकार over सब संघीय न्यायालयों और over  state court cases involving issues of federal law , and original jurisdiction over a small range of cases .
The Court , which meets in the United States Supreme Court Building in Washington , D.C. , consists of a chief justice and  आठ संबद्ध justices जो हैं मनोनीत  by the President and confirmed by the United States Senate .
Once appointed , justices have life tenure unless they resign , retire  , or  are removed after impeachment .
conroe is the सीट  of Montgomery County and falls within the metropolitan area .
It is  स्तिथ परिचय  north of Houston .
As of July 2011 , the city population was  58,973 , up इससे  36,811 in 2000 .
The Book of Mormon is a sacred text of the Latter Day Saint movement , which  adherents मानना contains कृतियाँ of प्राचीन नबियों जो जिया  on the American continent from approximately 2200 BC to AD 421 .
It  थी पहला प्रकाशित in कूच 1830 by जोसेफ स्मिथ as the  Book of Mormon : An Account Written by the Hand of Mormon upon Plates Taken from the Plates of Nephi .
According to Smith 's account , and also according to the  किताब 's कथा , the किताब of mormon थी originally  written in otherwise unknown characters referred to as `` reformed Egyptian `` engraved on golden plates .
Smith claimed that the last prophet to contribute to the book , a man named Moroni , buried it in a hill in present-day New York and then returned to earth in 1827 as an angel , revealing the location of the book to Smith and  instructing उसे to अनुवाद और disseminate it as प्रमाण  of the restoration of Christ 's true church in the latter days .
The Book of Mormon has a number of original and distinctive  doctrinal चर्चाएँ on विषय ऐसे as the पतन  of Adam and Eve , the nature of the Atonement , eschatology , redemption from physical and spiritual death , and the organization of the latter-day church .
The pivotal event  of the किताब is  an appearance of Jesus Christ to the Americas shortly after his resurrection .
The Book of Mormon is the earliest of the unique writings of the Latter Day Saint movement , the denominations of which typically regard the text  नहीं तभी as scripture लकिन भी as a ऐतिहासिक  record of God 's dealings with the ancient inhabitants of the Americas .
The Book of Mormon is divided into smaller books , titled after the individuals named as primary authors and , in most  संस्करण , विभाजित into अध्याय  and verses .
It is written in English , very similar to the Early Modern English linguistic style of the King James Version of the Bible  , और रै चूंकि महरूम  fully or partially translated into 108 languages .
An enlisted rank ( also known as an enlisted grade or enlisted rate ) is , in most  militaries , कोई रैंक नीचे कि of a commissioned  officer or warrant officer .
The term can also be inclusive of non-commissioned  अधिकारियों  .
In most cases , enlisted service personnel perform jobs specific to their own occupational specialty , as  opposed to the अधिक generalized कमांड जिम्मेदारियों  of commissioned officers .
`` What a Wonderful  संसार '' is a सोंग लिखा  by Bob Thiele ( as `` George Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss .
It was first recorded by Louis  आर्मस्ट्रांग और released as a सिंगल  in 1967 .
thiele और वेइस यहूद  both prominent in the music world ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ) .
Armstrong 's recording was inducted  in the ग्रैमी हॉल  of Fame in 1999 .

The Chronomégaphone , designed for large halls , employed compressed air to amplify  the अंकित ध्वनि  .
A sound film is a motion picture with synchronized sound , or sound  technologically coupled to  image , as opposed to a silent film .
The first known public exhibition of projected sound films took place in Paris in 1900 , but decades  होता pass पहले ध्वनि गति तस्वीरें यहूद  made commercially practical .
Reliable synchronization was difficult to achieve with the early sound-on-disc systems , and  प्रवर्धन और रिकॉर्डिंग विशेषता यहूद  also inadequate .
Innovations in  sound-on-film led to the पहला वाणिज्यिक स्क्रीनिंग  of short motion pictures using the technology , which took place in 1923 .
The primary steps in the  व्यावसायीकरण  of sound cinema were taken in the mid- to late 1920s .
At first , the sound films incorporating synchronized dialogue—known as `` talking pictures '' , or `` talkies  '' —were exclusively शॉर्ट्स ; the earliest feature-length फिल्मों साथ अंकित  sound included only music and effects .
The first feature film originally presented as a talkie  थी the जैज़ सिंगर ,  released in October 1927 .
A major hit , it was made with  vitaphone , the अग्रणी ब्रांड  of sound-on-disc technology .
sound-on-film , however , होता जल्द  become the standard for talking pictures .
By the early 1930s , the  टॉकीज़  were a global phenomenon .
In the United States , they helped secure  हॉलीवुड 's स्थिति as एक of the संसार 's सबसे शक्तिशाली cultural/commercial  systems ( see Cinema of the United States ) .
In Europe (  और , to a lesser उपाधि , elsewhere ) the नई विकास थी treated साथ suspicion by  many filmmakers and critics , who worried that a focus on dialogue would subvert the unique aesthetic virtues of soundless cinema .
In Japan , where the  लोकप्रिय फिल्मी परंपरा एकीकृत मूक  movie and live vocal performance , talking pictures were slow to take root .
In  इण्डिया , ध्वनि थी the transformative तत्व कि led  to the rapid expansion of the nation 's film industry—the most productive such industry in the world since the early 1960s .
African people are natives or inhabitants of Africa and  लोगों of अफ़्रीकी descent  .
The Australian Recording Industry Association Music Awards ( commonly known as ARIA Music Awards or ARIA Awards ) is  an सालाना श्रेणी of पुरस्कार नाइट्स  celebrating the Australian music industry , put on by the Australian Recording Industry Association ( ARIA ) .
The event has been held annually since 1987 and encompasses the general genre-specific and popular awards ( these are what is usually being referred to as `` the ARIA awards '' ) as well as Fine Arts Awards and Artisan Awards ( held separately from 2004 ) , Lifetime Achievement  पुरस्कार और aria हॉल of कीर्ति – आयोजित separately इससे 2005 to 2010  but returned to the general ceremony in 2011 .
For 2010 , ARIA  introduced  public voted awards for the first time .
Winning , or even  होने मनोनीत लिये , an aria पुरस्कार परिणाम in a लॉट of मीडिया ध्यान on  an artist , and usually increases recording sales several-fold – in 2005 , for example , after Ben Lee won three awards , his album Awake Is the New Sleep jumped from No . 31 to No . 5 in the ARIA Charts , its highest position .
For-profit education ( also  ज्ञात as the शिक्षा सेवाएं उद्योग or  proprietary education ) refers to educational institutions operated by private , profit -seeking businesses .
There are three types  of for-profit  schools .
One type is known  as an शैक्षणिक  management organization ( EMO ) , and these are primary and secondary educational institutions .
EMOs work with school districts or charter schools , using public funds  to वित्त परिचालन .
The majority of for-profit schools in the K–12 sector in  अमेरिका फलन  as EMOs , and have grown in number in the mid-2000s .
The other major category of for-profit schools are post-secondary  संस्थानों जिससे  operate as businesses , receiving fees from each student they enroll .
A third type of  for-profit स्कूलों ,  which is less prevalent in the United States , are K–12 schools which operate as businesses .
EMOs function differently from charter schools created in order to carry out a particular teaching pedagogy ;  सबसे चार्टर स्कूलों हैं mission-oriented , जबकि emos और  other for-profit institutions are market-oriented .
जबकि समर्थक argue कि the लाभ  motive encourages efficiency , this arrangement has also drawn controversy and criticism .
Kevin Carey , director of the education policy program of the New American Foundation said in a 2010 column in The Chronicle of Higher Education that ``  for-profits  exist in large part to fix educational market failures left by traditional institutions , and they profit by serving students that public and private nonprofit institutions too often ignore . ''
He also noted that `` There 's no doubt that the worst for-profits  हैं निर्मम exploiting  the commodified college degree .
But they did n't commodify it in the  पहला  place . ''
Amendment  xxii in  the National Archives
The Twenty-second Amendment of the United States Constitution sets a term limit for election to  the दफ्तर of अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States .
Congress passed the amendment on  कूच  21 , 1947 .
It was ratified by the  आवश्यक क्रमांक of राज्य  on February 27 , 1951 .
