It was featured on British sitcom The Inbetweeners when the characters Jay and Neil took Will on a 'pussy  पैट्रोल ' in jay 's रेड निसान micra .
It was sampled by  लड़की बात on the पहला track of उसके एल्बम  All Day , `` Oh No '' .
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional  monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य , ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms , और उनके  territories and dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and  , in कुछ of उसके realms , carries the  title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries :  the  United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992 , the number of her realms varied as  territories gained स्वतंत्रता  and some realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and  the grenadines , बेलीज़ , अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा और संत  Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign of years is currently the second  longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया  has reigned longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth was born in London and  शिक्षित  privately at home .
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936  on  the abdication of his brother Edward VIII , from which time she was the heir presumptive .
वो began  to undertake public duties during the Second World War , in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 , she married Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh ,  साथ जिसको वो रै चार children  : Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
Her coronation service took  प्लेस in 1953 और थी the  first to be televised .
The Queen 's  अनेक ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक  include a state visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms , such as devolution in the United Kingdom and the  patriation of the कनाडाई  constitution .
Times of personal  significance have शामिल the births और विवाह of उसके children , the births of उसके  grandchildren , the investiture of the Prince of Wales , and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver , Golden , and Diamond Jubilees in 1977 , 2002 , and 2012 , respectively .
Major  कार्यक्रम in the महारानी 's शासनकाल have शामिल the परेशानियों in उत्तरी  Ireland , the Falklands War , wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan .
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56 , the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle , Lord Mountbatten , the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis  ) , the मौत in 1997 of उसके पूर्व daughter-in-law , डायना  , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments , but support for the  साम्राज्य और उसके निजी लोकप्रियता  remain high .
Christianity is the  largest धर्म सूचीबद्ध  by Australians in the national census .
In the 2011 Census , 61.1  % of australians यहूद सूचीबद्ध as ईसाई  .
Australia has no  आधिकारिक राज्य  religion and the Australian Constitution protects freedom of religion .
The presence of Christianity in Australia began with the  आगमन of the पहला  Fleet of British convicts in 1788 .
The religion grew to account for  96.1 % of the नेशनल  population at the time of the Federation of Australia in 1901 .
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the  गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) remained the largest denomination  until 1986 , when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia .
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among some sections of the  जनसांख्यिकी have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of  religion in Australia .
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011 , the largest denominations were either  रोमन कैथोलिक ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ) , साथ the तीसरा largest denomination  being the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia .
post-war आव्रजन रै grown the संख्याएँ belonging to चर्च  like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of Australia and there are large and growing Pentecostal groups , such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church .
The festivals of Easter and Christmas are public  छुट्टियाँ  in Australia .
Around a quarter of students attend church schools and  ईसाई संगठनों  are leading non-government providers of health and welfare services through organisations like Catholic Health Australia , Anglicare , UnitingCare Australia , the Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society .
Historically significant Australian Christians have included Rev Dr John Dunmore Lang , Saint Mary MacKillop ,  कैथरीन हेलेन spence , पादरी दाउद unaipon , the रेवरेंड  John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls .
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello Baptist minister and current CEO of World Vision Australia , Frank Brennan  , जेसुइट इंसान अधिकारों वकील  , Cardinal George Pell , Catholic Archbishop of Sydney , Phillip Aspinall the current Anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane , Kevin Rudd , former Labor Prime Minister , and Tony Abbott , leader for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party .
Charter creating  कॉलेजिएट स्कूल  , which became Yale College , October 9 , 1701
Yale University is a private Ivy League  शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in नई  Haven , Connecticut .
Founded in 1701 in the  उपनिवेश of कनेक्टिकट , the विश्वविद्यालयों is  the third-oldest institution of higher education in the United States .
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '' , the institution traces its roots to 17th-century  clergymen जो sought to  establish a college to train clergy and political leaders for the colony .
In 1718 , the College was renamed `` Yale College '' to honor a gift from Elihu Yale , a governor of the British East  इण्डिया कम्पनी  .
In 1861 , the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first U.S.  संस्था to पुरस्कार the phd . yale became a founding  member of the Association of American Universities in 1900 .
Yale  कॉलेज थी रूपांतरित , शुरूआत  in the 1930s , through the establishment of residential colleges : 12 now exist and two more are planned .
Yale  employs over 1,100 संकाय to सिखा और सलाह  about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and professional students .
Almost all tenured professors teach undergraduate courses , more than 2,000 of  जिससे हैं  offered annually .
The University 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion , the  second-largest of कोई अकादमिक संस्था  in the world .
Yale 's system of more  than  two dozen libraries holds 12.5 million volumes .
49 Nobel Laureates have  महरूम संबद्ध  with the University as students , faculty , and staff .
Yale has produced many notable alumni , including five U.S. Presidents , 19  u.S. परम् अदालत  Justices , and several foreign heads of state .
At  the ग्रैजुएट स्तर , yale विधि  School , Yale School of Art , and Yale School of Drama are consistently ranked the top programs in their field .
Yale Law  स्कूल is  the most selective law school in the United States .
Yale students compete  intercollegiately as the yale bulldogs  in the NCAA Division I Ivy League .
The oldest intercollegiate  एथलेटिक इवेंट  in the United States is the Yale-Harvard regatta .
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub from  the परिवार asteraceae , जिससे grows in arid और semi-arid  conditions , throughout a range of cold desert , steppe , and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America .
The  देशी नाम ``  sagebrush '' is also used for several related members of the genus Artemisia , such as California Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ) .
Big Sagebrush and other Artemisia species are the dominant plants across large  portions of the ग्रेट जलाशय , covering कुछ 422,000  square miles in 11 western U.S. & Canadian states .
It is the state  पुष्प of  Nevada .
sagebrush provides खाना और  habitat for a variety of species , such as sage grouse , pronghorn antelope , gray vireo , pygmy rabbit , and mule deer .
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North America—especially for preventing infection  in wounds , stopping आतंरिक bleeding , और  treating headaches and colds .
Chemically , the active medicinal  constituents शामिल camphor , terpenoids  , and tannins .
Several major threats exist to sage  ब्रश ecosystems , सहित इंसान settlements , परिवर्तन  to agricultural land , livestock grazing , invasive plant species , wildfires , and climate change .
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email  सेवा offered  by the American search engine company Yahoo !
It was launched in 1997 , and , according to comScore , Yahoo ! Mail is the third-largest web-based email  सेवा साथ 281 लाख उपयोक्ता as of दिसम्बर  2012 .
Currently ,  याहू ! offers तीन  versions of Yahoo ! Mail .
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail Classic  '' continues the उपलब्धता of the असली  interface introduced in 1997 .
A  संस्करण introduced in 2005 शामिल a  new Ajax interface , drag-and-drop features , improved search functionality , keyboard shortcuts , address auto-complete , tabs , and other updated features .
In October 2010 , Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! Mail , which included improvements to the  डिज़ाइन , प्रदर्शन , ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता  , and Facebook integration .
In May 2011 ,  बीटा परीक्षण  for the new version stopped , and it became the default interface for Yahoo ! Mail .
In early 2008 , Yahoo ! began offering  असीमित मेल भंडार to इसके  users in response to heated competition in the free web-mail market segment .
On June 27 , 2009 , Yahoo ! Messenger was  एकीकृत  with Yahoo ! Mail .
टकोमा ( , ) is a mid-sized  urban port city and the county seat of Pierce County , Washington , United States .
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound , southwest of  सिएटल , पूर्वोत्तर of the राज्य पूंजी , ओलंपिया , और उत्तरपश्चिम of माउंट rainier नेशनल  Park .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  198,397 , according to the 2010 census .
Tacoma is the  second-largest नगर in the  Puget Sound area and the third largest in the state .
Tacoma also serves as the center of business activity for the South Sound region ,  जिससे रै a जनसांख्यिकी of around 1  million people .
Tacoma adopted its name  बाद the आसपास माउंट rainier  , originally called Mount Tahoma .
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the area was chosen to be the western terminus of the Northern Pacific  रेलरोड in the लेट 19th  century .
The decision of  the रेलरोड थी बहकावे  by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbor , Commencement Bay .
By connecting the bay with the railroad  टकोमा 's motto became  `` When rails meet sails . ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of  टकोमा , a बीच  of international trade on the Pacific Coast and Washington state 's largest port .
Like most central cities , Tacoma suffered a  prolonged मनाही in the mid-20th सदी  as a result of suburbanization and divestment .
Since the 1990s , developments in the downtown core include the University of Washington Tacoma ; Tacoma Link , the first modern electric light rail service in the state ; the state 's  उच्चतम घनत्व of आर्ट और इतिहास संग्रहालय ; और a लौटी शहरी waterfront , the thea  Foss Waterway .
With a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad workers of the  19th सदी , to the longshoremen of the 20th सदी , to the मजदूर तैयार  workers of today — Tacoma has long been known for its rough , gritty image .
A song about Tacoma , ``  thrice सब अमरीकी '' , by अमरीकी singer-songwriter  and former resident Neko Case , describes it as `` a dusty old jewel in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down '' .
Tacoma-Pierce County  रै महरूम नामित एक of the  most livable areas in the country .
Tacoma was also recently listed as  the 19th सबसे walkable नगर  in the country .
In contrast , the city is  भी क्रमित as the सबसे  stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey .
In 2006 , women 's magazine Self named Tacoma the `` Most  sexually स्वस्थ नगर '' in the संयुक्त  States .
In 2012 , The Advocate gave Tacoma the  शीर्षक of `` gayest नगर in अमेरिका '' , in भाग क्युकी of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक  offices held , and Washington State passing a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry .
Tacoma is famous for the 1940 collapse of the  टकोमा narrows सेतु  .
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego  महानगर क्षेत्रफल , the सातवाँ largest  city in Southern California , the fourteenth largest city in the State of California , and the 77th-largest city in the United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as  of the 2010 census .
Located just from downtown San  डिएगो और इससे the मैक्सिकन किनारा in the दक्षिण खाड़ी प्रदेश of the महानगर  area , the city is at the center of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States .
Chula Vista is  so नामित क्युकी of इसके दर्शनीय  location between the San Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills .
Founded in the early 19th century , fast population  विकास रै recently महरूम observed in the  city .
As the second  largest नगर in सैन डिएगो  County , Chula Vista has quickly become a destination popular to many tourists .
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United States Olympic Training centers and popular tourist  गंतव्यों शामिल  Cricket Wireless Amphitheater , the Chula Vista marina , and the Chula Vista Nature Center .
Metes and bounds is a system or method of describing land , real property ( in contrast to  निजी  property ) or real estate .
The system has been used in England for many  सदियां , और is स्टिल प्रयुक्त वहीँ  in the definition of general boundaries .
By custom , it was applied in the original  तेरह colonies कि became the संयुक्त राज्य , और in अनेक अन्य जमीन  jurisdictions based on English common law .
Typically the system uses physical features of the local geography , along with  दिशानिर्देश और दूरियाँ , to define  and describe the boundaries of a parcel of land .
The boundaries are described in a running prose style , working  around the पार्सल in अनुक्रम , इससे a  point of beginning , returning back to the same point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds .
It may include references to other adjoining parcels ( and their owners ) , and it , in turn , could also be referred to  in बाद  surveys .
At the time the description is compiled , it may have been marked on the ground with permanent monuments placed  जहाँ वहीँ यहूद no उपयुक्त प्राकृतिक  monuments .
The term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the  मापन of प्रत्येक सीधा चलाएं , निर्दिष्ट by a अलहदा between the टर्मिनल  points , and an orientation or direction .
A direction may be a simple compass bearing , or a precise  अभिविन्यास संकल्पित by सटीक सर्वेक्षण विधि  .
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary description ,  ऐसे as साथ a निश्चित watercourse  , a stone wall , an adjoining public road way , or an existing building .
The system is often  प्रयुक्त to define larger टुकड़े of प्रॉपर्टी ( e.g . खेतो  ) , and political subdivisions ( e.g . town boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or would be far too expensive , or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description .
Sir  इसहाक़ न्यूटन ( 25 दिसम्बर 164220  March 1727 ) was an English physicist and mathematician who is widely regarded as one of the most influential scientists of all time and as a key figure in the scientific revolution .
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of  प्राकृतिक दर्शनशास्त्र '' ) , पहला प्रकाशित in 1687 , रखी the मूलाधार  for most of classical mechanics .
Newton also made seminal contributions to optics and shares credit with  गॉटफ्राइड लैबनिट्ज़ लिये the आविष्कार of the infinitesimal  calculus .
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation that dominated scientists ' view of the physical universe for the  अगला तीन सदियां  .
It also demonstrated that  the गति of वस्तुएँ on the धरती और कि of celestial लाशें could  be described by the same principles .
By deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary motion from his  गणितीय वर्णन of गम्भीरता , न्यूटन removed  the last doubts about the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos .
Newton built the first practical reflecting telescope and developed a theory of  रंग आधारित on the अवलोकन कि a प्रिज़्म decomposes  white light into the many colours of the visible spectrum .
He also formulated an empirical law of cooling and  पढ़ाई the गति of ध्वनि  .
In addition to his work on the calculus , as a mathematician Newton contributed to the study of power series ,  generalised the द्विपद प्रमेय to non-integer  exponents , and developed Newton 's method for approximating the roots of a function .
Newton was a fellow of Trinity College and the second Lucasian Professor of  गणित at the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Cambridge .
He was a devout but  अपरंपरागत ईसाई और , unusually लिये a सदस्य  of the Cambridge faculty , he refused to take holy orders in the Church of England , perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism .
In addition to his work on the mathematical sciences , Newton also dedicated much of his time to the study of alchemy and biblical  कालक्रम , लकिन सबसे of उसके कार्य in those क्षेत्रों  remained unpublished until long after his death .
In his later life , Newton  became अध्यक्ष of the royal  Society .
He  भी परोसा the अंग्रेजों  government as Warden and Master of the Royal Mint .
Prof. Walter Lewin explains Newton 's law of  gravitation in एमआईटी कोर्स  8.01
Satellites and projectiles all obey Newton 's law  of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the  ब्रह्मांड attracts प्रत्येक अन्य  point mass with a force that is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them .
( Separately it was  दिखाया कि विशाल spherically सममित masses  attract and are attracted as if all their mass were concentrated at their centers . )
This is a general physical law derived from empirical  observations by कया न्यूटन  called induction .
It is a  भाग of शास्त्रीय यांत्रिकी और थी प्रतिपादित  in Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ) , first published on 5 July 1687 .
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal Society ,  रॉबर्ट hooke बना a अर्जी कि न्यूटन था प्राप्त the  inverse square law from him – see History section below . )
In modern  भाषा , the विधि  states the following:
Assuming SI units , F is measured in newtons ( N ) , m1 and m2  in गामा ( kg ) , r in मीटर ( m ) , और the  constant G is approximately equal to .
The value of the constant G was first accurately determined from the results of the Cavendish experiment conducted  by the अंग्रेजों वैज्ञानिक हेनरी कैवेंडिश in 1798 , हालांकि कैवेंडिश किया नहीं खुद गणना a  numerical value for G .
This experiment was also the first test of Newton 's theory  of gravitation between masses  in the laboratory .
It took place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia and 71 years after Newton 's death , so none of  न्यूटन 's calculations could उपयोग  the value of G ; instead he could only calculate a force relative to another force .
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles  कूलम्ब 's विधि of विद्युत  forces , which is used to calculate the magnitude of electrical force between two charged bodies .
Both are inverse-square laws , in which force is inversely proportional to the square of the distance between  the  bodies .
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product  of the masses , और  the electrostatic constant in place of the gravitational constant .
न्यूटन 's विधि रै चूंकि महरूम superseded  by Einstein 's theory of general relativity , but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity .
Relativity  is जरूरी तभी जब वहीँ is a need लिये चरम  precision , or when dealing with gravitation for extremely massive and dense objects .
White and red flags , representing Iraqi and American deaths , sit in the grass quadrangle of The Valley Library on the Corvallis  , ऑरेगॉन , कैम्पस of ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों  .
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( not  सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह  Count project ) , the flags aim to `` raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War . ''
(  may  2008 )
Casualties  of the विरोध in इराकी चूंकि 2003 ( शुरूआत साथ the  2003 invasion of Iraq , and continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq , as well as the activities of the various armed groups operating in the country ) have come in many forms , and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly .
The table below summarizes various estimates of the Iraqi  casualty आंकड़े  .
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational coalition , the death toll is carefully tracked and updated daily , and the names and  छायाचित्र of those मारे in कार्रवाई as खूब  as in accidents have been published widely .
A total of 4,486 U.S.  सैनिको यहूद मारे  in Iraq between 2003 and 2012 .
Regarding the Iraqis , however , information on both military and civilian  हताहत is दोनो  less precise and less consistent .
Estimates of casualty levels are available  इससे पत्रकारों on the झाँकी , इससे officials  of involved organizations , and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the news media .
The word `` casualties `` in its most  सामान्य  sense includes the injured as well as the dead .
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely , partly because it is not obvious what  चाहिए be गिने : चाहिए तभी those चोटों  serious enough to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do illnesses or injuries caused by accidents count , or should the focus be  प्रतिबंधित to wounds caused by शत्रु सगाई  ?
Sources using different definitions may arrive at very different numbers , and  sometimes the precise परिभाषा  is not clearly specified .
Asalto al coche ( Robbery of  the कोच )  , by Francisco de Goya
A highwayman was a thief  और brigand जो preyed on travellers  .
This type of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by horse , as compared to a footpad who travelled  और robbed on पैर  .
Mounted  लुटेरों यहूद widely  considered to be socially superior to footpads .
Such robbers operated  in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड  from the Elizabethan era until the early 19th century .
The word highwayman is first known to be used in the year 1617 ; other  euphemisms शामिल  `` knights of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road . ''
Two terms applied to  19th-century उत्तर अमरीकी highwaymen यहूद सड़क एजेंटों in कुछ उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं  while in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians .
In the same time  काल in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ,  they were known as bushrangers .
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson , Jr. ( born August 14 , 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball player who played point  गार्ड लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स of the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए  ) .
After winning championships in high  स्कूल और कॉलेज  , Johnson was selected first overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers .
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable  खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार in उसके रुकी ऋतु , और जीती चार अधिक  championships with the Lakers during the 1980s .
Johnson retired abruptly  in 1991 बाद announcing कि he था contracted  HIV , but returned to play in the 1992 All-Star Game , winning the All-Star MVP Award .
After protests from his fellow players , he retired again for four years , but returned in 1996 , at age 36 , to play 32 games for the Lakers before retiring  लिये the तीसरा और फाइनल समय  .
Johnson 's career achievements include  तीन एनबीए mvp पुरस्कार , नौ एनबीए फाइनल दिखावे , बारह all-star खेल ,  and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations .
He led the league in regular-season assists four times , and  is the एनबीए 's all-time  leader in average assists per game , at 11.2 .
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream Team ``  , the  U.S. basketball team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1992 .
After leaving the  एनबीए in 1992 , जॉनसन formed the जादू जॉनसन  All-Stars , a barnstorming team that travelled around the world playing exhibition games .
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 Greatest Players  in एनबीए इतिहास in 1996 , और enshrined  in the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2002 .
He was rated the greatest NBA point  गार्ड of सब समय by  ESPN in 2007 .
His friendship and rivalry with Boston Celtics star Larry Bird , whom  he faced in the 1979 ncaa फाइनल  and three NBA championship series , were well documented .
Since his retirement , Johnson has been an advocate for HIV/ AIDS prevention and safe sex , as well as an entrepreneur , philanthropist ,  प्रसारणकर्ता और प्रेरक  speaker .
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for several years , and was part of a  समूह कि खरीदा the लॉस  Angeles Dodgers in 2012 .
Allium  कोशिकाएं in अलग  phases of the cell cycle
The cells of eukaryotes ( left ) and  prokaryotes ( सही  )
The cell is the basic  संरचनात्मक  , functional and biological unit of all known living organisms .
It is the smallest unit of life that is classified as a living thing ( except virus , which consists only from DNA/RNA covered by protein and lipids )  , और is प्रायः पुकारा the भवन  block of life .
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane , which contains many biomolecules such  as प्रोटीन और nucleic  acids .
जीवों can be वर्गीकृत  as unicellular ( consisting of a single cell ; including most bacteria ) or multicellular ( including plants and animals ) .
While the  क्रमांक of कोशिकाएं in  plants and animals varies from species to species , Humans contain about 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells .
Most plant and animal cells are between 1 and 100 micrometres  और इसलिए हैं दृश्य  only under the microscope .
The cell was discovered by  रॉबर्ट hooke  in 1665 .
The cell theory , first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann , states that all organisms are  रचित of एक or अधिक कोशिकाएं , कि सब कोशिकाएं आइये इससे preexisting कोशिकाएं , कि vital कृत्यों  of an organism occur within cells , and that all cells contain the hereditary information necessary for regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells .
Cells emerged on  ग्रह धरती at तनिक  4.0–4.3 billion years ago .
The  शब्द कोशिका आता इससे  the Latin cella , meaning `` small room '' .
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological  ढांचा थी coined by रॉबर्ट hooke in a किताब he प्रकाशित in 1665 जब he compared  the cork cells he saw through his microscope to the small rooms monks lived in .
Grecian  सूत्र is a मेन 's बाल  coloring product in the United States .
Canada and Europe previously banned the product  क्युकी of इसके  use of lead acetate .
A motor scooter 's front with an impractical  क्रमांक और किस्में of headlamps  , added for decorative purposes
A  headlamp is a बल्ब संलग्न  to the front of a vehicle to light the road ahead .
Headlamp  प्रदर्शन  has steadily improved throughout the automobile age , spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark , despite only 25 % of traffic travelling during darkness .
While it is common  लिये the पद हेडलाइट to be प्रयुक्त interchangeably  in informal discussion , headlamp is the term for the device itself , while headlight properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device .
Other vehicles , such as  रेल और वायुयान  , are required to have headlamps .
Bicycle headlamps are often used on bicycles ,  और हैं जरूरी  in some jurisdictions .
They can  be संचालित  by a battery or a small electrical generator on the wheel .
additionally ऑटोमोटिव रात्रि  vision systems work to supplement headlamps .
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements  claimed लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों  of many societies worldwide .
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law , local custom , and behaviour , whereas in  अन्य वे may be  ignored or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions of human rights through claims of an inherent historical and traditional bias  विरूद्ध the कसरत of अधिकारों by महिलाओं और लड़कियों in पक्ष of  men and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include , though are not limited to , the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote (  suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ;  to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( , ( born November 13 ,  1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne , अभिनेत्री , singer-songwriter , राजनैतिक activist , लेखक  and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple (  1985 ) , playing  Celie , a mistreated black woman in the Deep South .
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress and won her first  सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार  for her role in the film .
In 1990 , she played Oda Mae Brown , a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze )  सहेजें उसके प्रेमी ( demi मूर ) in the  blockbuster Ghost .
This  प्रदर्शन जीती उसके a दूसरी सुनहरी ग्लोब  and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 , The  खिलाड़ी , बना in अमेरिका , कैसा स्टेला  Got Her Groove Back , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also  acclaimed लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as the बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी  , as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash , and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee , as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King .
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy  पुरस्कार लिये उसके कार्य  in television .
She was  co-producer of the लोकप्रिय  game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004 .
She  रै महरूम the  moderator of the daytime talk show The View since 2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two Daytime Emmys , two Golden Globes , a Tony ( for  उत्पादन , नहीं एक्टिंग ) , और an ऑस्कर  .
In addition , Goldberg  रै a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार , चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार , और  has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is one of the few  मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have  won an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar , and Tony Award .
the नेशनल हॉकी लीग ( एनएचएल ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates  a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs , of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New York City , the NHL is widely considered to be the premier  पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग in the संसार , और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग  in the United States and Canada .
The Stanley  कप , the oldest पेशेवर खेल  trophy in North America , is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season .
The league was organized on November 26  , 1917 , in मॉन्ट्रियल , क्यूबेक , कनाडा , बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन  of its predecessor organization , the National Hockey Association ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started  साथ चार टीमों और , through  a series of expansions , contractions , and relocations , the league is now composed of 30 active franchises .
The nation to which the name of the league  originally  referred was Canada , although the league has now been binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States .
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season , the league resumed play under a new collective  bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल a सैलरी  cap .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of  sponsorships  , attendance , and television audiences .
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the world and currently has  खिलाड़ी इससे परिचय 20 अलग देशों .
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority  of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल , over the पास्ट चार प्लस  decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
maggots  feeding on carrion .
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in  particular to the लार्वे of brachyceran उड़ता , ऐसे as houseflies , चीज उड़ता  , and blowflies , rather than larvae of the Nematocera , such as mosquitoes and Crane flies .
`` Maggot  '' is नहीं a तकनीकी  term and should not be taken as such ; in many standard textbooks of entomology it does not appear in the index at all .
In many non-technical texts the term is used for  कीट लार्वे in सामान्य  .
Other sources have coined their own  परिभाषाएं ; लिये उदाहरण :  `` ...
The term applies to a grub when all trace of limbs has disappeared ... '' and `` ...  लागू to the footless लार्वे of  Dipters . ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide importance in ecology and medicine ; among other roles , various species  हैं prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग  carrion and garbage , attacking crops and foodstuffs , spreading microbial infections , and causing myiasis .
Herod ( , Hordos , Greek : , Hērōdēs ) , also known  as हेरोदेस the ग्रेट ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce in जेरिको  ) , was a Roman client king of Judea .
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is described as `` a madman who  murdered उसके अपना परिवार  and a great many rabbis `` .
He is also known for his colossal building projects in Jerusalem and  elsewhere , सहित उसके विस्तार of the दूसरी टेम्पल in जेरूसलम  ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima .
Important  विवरण of उसके जीवनी हैं gleaned इससे the  works of the 1st century CE Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius .
The Romans made Herod 's son , Herod Archelaus , ethnarch of Judea , Samaria , and Idumea (  biblical edom ) इससे 4 bce to 6 ce , referred to as the tetrarchy  of Judea .
Archelaus was judged  incompetent by the रोमन सम्राट augustus जो तब संयुक्त samaria  , Judea proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41 .
Herod 's other son Herod Antipas was  tetrarch of galilee इससे 4 bce–39  CE .
ABO blood group antigens  उपस्थित on रेड रक्त कोशिकाएं और igm  antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most important blood type  प्रणाली ( or रक्त  group system ) in human blood transfusion .
The associated  anti-a और anti-b antibodies हैं प्रायः igm antibodies  , which are usually produced in the first years of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as food , bacteria , and viruses .
ABO blood types are also present in some other animals , for  उदाहरण apes ऐसे as chimpanzees  , bonobos , and gorillas .
Year 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a common  साल starting on मंगलवार ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग  ) of the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Monday of the 13-day-slower Julian calendar .
Northville is an affluent city located in  और विभाजित  by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan .
the क्षेत्रफल is  a suburb of Metropolitan Detroit .
The population was 5,970 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Most of the city is in Oakland County ,  और is घिरी by the नगर of  Novi .
The Wayne County portion is surrounded by  northville township  .
Northville  is परोसा by northville  Public Schools .
The city  is स्तिथ  northeast of Ann Arbor and northwest of Detroit .
Elaine Stritch ( born February 2 , 1925 ) is an  अमरीकी अभिनेत्री और  vocalist .
She has appeared in numerous stage  plays और musicals  , feature films , and many television programs .
She is known for her performance of `` The Ladies Who Lunch '' in Stephen Sondheim 's 1970 musical Company , her 2001 one-woman show , Elaine  stritch at स्वतंत्रता , और recently लिये उसके भूमिका as जोकर donaghy  's mother Colleen on NBC 's 30 Rock .
She has been nominated  लिये the टोनी पुरस्कार पाँच टाइम्स  in various categories .
Stritch is also  a three-time  Emmy Award winner .
Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of young offenders sentenced to work in a community service programme , where  वे obtain अलौकिक शक्तियां बाद a अजीब विद्युत  storm .
The series opened in  2009 और is फिलहाल  ongoing .
Antonia Thomas , Iwan Rheon , Lauren Socha , Nathan Stewart-Jarrett , and Robert Sheehan are introduced as Alisha  डैनियल्स , साइमन bellamy , केली बेली , कर्टिस डोनोवन  , and Nathan Young respectively .
sheehan बाएँ बाद the दूसरी  series , replaced in the third by Joseph Gilgun as Rudy Wade .
After the fourth series was announced Rheon ,  थामस और socha था बाएँ उनके भूमिकाएँ और होता  be replaced by new characters Karla Crome , Nathan McMullen and Matt Stokoe , as Jess , Finn and Alex respectively .
Midway through the fourth series , Stewart-Jarrett left  जबकि नताशा o'keeffe joined the डाल as ऐबी स्मिथ  .
On 19 March 2013 , Channel 4 announced at a press event that they have renewed Misfits for  a पांचवां और फाइनल श्रेणी containing 8 एपीसोड  .
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10 ,  1969 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक जो खर्च the बहुमत of  his career with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL , having played  क्वार्टरबैक लिये the अटलांटा falcons ( 1991 ) , ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स  ( 1992 – 2007 ) , New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ) .
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw for over 70,000 yards , over 500  touchdowns , over 300 interceptions , over 6,000 completions , और  over 10,000 pass attempts .
Favre started at the quarterback position for the University of Southern Mississippi for four years before being  चयनित in the दूसरी गोलाकार of the 1991 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट  by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ) .
He was traded  to ग्रीन खाड़ी on फ़रवरी  10 , 1992 , for the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL Draft .
Favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in  the  fourth game of the 1992 season , stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski , and started every game through the 2007 season .
He was traded to the New York Jets and started at quarterback for the 2008 season  पहले हस्ताक्षर साथ  the Vikings on August 18 , 2009 as their starting quarterback .
he बना an एनएफएल  record 297 consecutive starts ( 321 including playoffs ) .
He is  the तभी खिलाड़ी to जीत the  AP Most Valuable Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ) .
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2002 , 2003 , 2004 , 2007 , 2009 ) , five NFC Championship Games ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 ,  2007 , 2009 ) , और दो सुपर कटोरी दिखावे ( सुपर कटोरी  XXXI , Super Bowl XXXII ) , winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ) .
He holds many NFL records , including most career touchdown passes , most career passing  गज , सबसे  career pass completions , most career pass attempts , most career interceptions thrown , most consecutive starts by a player , most consecutive starts by a quarterback , most career victories as a starting quarterback , most sacked , and most fumbles .
He is also  referred to by उसके उपनाम  `` The Gunslinger '' .
The following is a  सूची of notable वायुयान  hijackings around the world .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly known as  the वेब ) , is a प्रणाली of interlinked  hypertext documents accessed via the Internet .
With a web browser ,  एक can दृश्य वेब पृष्ठों कि may contain  text , images , videos , and other multimedia , and navigate between them via hyperlinks .
Using concepts  इससे उसके पहले हाइपरटेक्स्ट प्रणालियों जैसे enquire , अंग्रेजों  engineer , computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN , Sir Tim Berners-Lee , now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and access information  of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the उपयोक्ता can ब्राउज़ at होगा '' , और वे सरेआम introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in दिसम्बर of the वही  year .
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20 , 1900July 22 , 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from Oregon , United States , known for his proclivity for opposing his parties ' leadership , and specifically  लिये उसके विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध on  constitutional grounds .
Born in Madison , Wisconsin , and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University of Minnesota Law School , Morse moved to Oregon in  1930 और began शिक्षण at the विश्वविद्यालयों of  Oregon School of Law .
During  संसार युद्ध ii he थी निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an स्वतंत्र बाद ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर 's चुनाव to the प्रेसिडेंसी in 1952 .
While an independent , he set a record for performing the second longest one-person filibuster  in the इतिहास  of the Senate .
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955 , and was  reelected twice जबकि a सदस्य  of that party .
Morse made a brief run for the Democratic Party 's  अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1960  .
A few years later , Morse was one of only two Senators who opposed the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution , which authorized the president to take military action  in  Vietnam without a declaration of war .
He continued to speak out against the  युद्ध in the ensuing सालो , और खोया उसके 1968  bid for reelection to Bob Packwood , who criticized his strong opposition to the war .
Morse made  दो अधिक बोलियों लिये reelection  to the Senate before his death in 1974 .
In parliamentary procedure , a motion to table  रै दो  different and contradictory meanings:
In the  संयुक्त राज्य , to तालिका प्रायः अर्थात् the to lay  [ the topic ] on the table or to move for postponement of consideration ; a proposal to suspend consideration of a pending motion .
Much less often , it means a  गति to `` put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or  reconsideration ) , a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world .
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom , to table means to move to place [ the topic ] upon the table ( or to move to place on the  तालिका ) : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार  ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal .
Both the American and the British dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the  तालिका or to कारण [ the टॉपिक ] to झूठ on the तालिका  .
The difference is the idea of what the table is for ,  कि of a शेल्फ बंद to the पक्ष , or an क्रियाशील  work bench .
The British meaning has the sense of the table as being an  क्रियाशील कार्य  bench , with the topic being the center of attention , considered and discussed by all until it can be resolved , at which point it is taken off the 'table ' .
The American sense is that the table is like that of a shelf , archive , or long-term  भंडार यंत्र , जहाँ the टॉपिक रै महरूम disposed of by sending  it to the 'table ' and leaving it there .
Toy Story 3 is a 2010  अमरीकी 3d कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड comedy-drama  prison film , and the third installment in the Toy Story series .
It  थी उत्पादित  by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
निर्देशित by ली unkrich , the फिल्मी थी released  worldwide from June through October in Disney Digital 3-D , RealD , and IMAX 3D .
Toy Story 3  थी भी the पहला फिल्मी  to be released theatrically with Dolby Surround 7.1 sound .
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt , while Unkrich wrote the  स्टोरी साथ साथ जॉन lasseter और एंड्रयू  Stanton , respectively director and co-writer of the two first films .
The plot focuses on the toys Woody , Buzz Lightyear , and their  मित्रों dealing साथ an अनिश्चित  future as their owner , Andy , prepares to leave for college .
Actors Tom Hanks , Tim Allen , Joan Cusack , Don Rickles , Estelle Harris , John Ratzenberger , Wallace Shawn , Jeff Pidgeon , Jodi Benson , R. Lee Ermey , John Morris , and Laurie Metcalf reprised their  voice-over भूमिकाएँ इससे the पिछला  films .
Jim Varney , who played Slinky Dog in the first two films ,  और जो ranft , जो portrayed lenny और wheezy  , both died before production began on Toy Story 3 .
The  भूमिका of slinky श्वान थी लिया  over by Blake Clark ( a friend of Varney ) , while Ranft 's characters and various others were written out of the story .
New characters  शामिल प्रदर्शन by ned beatty , टिमोथी डाल्टन  , Kristen Schaal , Bonnie Hunt , Whoopi Goldberg , Jeff Garlin , Richard Kind , and Michael Keaton .
The  विशेषता broke  Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North American gross for an animated film unadjusted for inflation , and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189 .
It is also the highest-grossing opening  वीकेंड लिये a पिक्चर्स फिल्मी , as खूब as the highest-grossing  opening weekend for a film to have opened in the month of June .
This is the highest-grossing  फिल्मी of 2010 , दोनो in the संयुक्त  States and Canada , and worldwide .
In early August , it became Pixar 's  highest-grossing फिल्मी at the उत्तर अमरीकी बक्सा दफ्तर ( surpassing ढूंढना nemo ) ,  and the highest-grossing animated film of all time worldwide ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later that month , Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide .
It is currently  the 10th-highest-grossing  film of all time .
Toy Story 3 was nominated for five  अकादमी पुरस्कार , सहित बेहतरीन चित्र ,  Best Adapted Screenplay , and Best Sound Editing .
It was the third animated film ( after Beauty and the Beast and Up ) to be  मनोनीत लिये अकादमी  Award for Best Picture .
It won the awards for Best  एनिमेटेड विशेषता  and Best Original Song .
John Levell Starks ( born August 10 ,  1965 ) is an अमरीकी रिटायर्ड पेशेवर  basketball shooting guard .
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190  पाउंड दौरान उसके  NBA playing career .
Although he was not  drafted  in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four colleges in his native Oklahoma , including Oklahoma State University , he gained fame while playing for the New York Knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in  पोर्टेबल डिवाइस , ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन , डिजिटल कैमरे , gps नेविगेशन  devices , and tablet computers .
The Secure Digital standard is  कायम by the sd कार्ड  Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens  of उत्पाद श्रेणी और अधिक than 8,000 मॉडल  .
The Secure  डिजिटल स्वरूप शामिल चार कार्ड  families available in three different form factors .
The four families are the  असली standard-capacity ( sdsc ) , the high-capacity  ( SDHC ) , the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ) , and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The three form factors are the original size , the ``  मिनी '' आकार , और the  `` micro '' size ( see illustration ) .
वहीँ  are many combinations of form factors and device families .
Electrically  passive adapters allow  the use of a smaller card in a host device built to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward  संगतता और accept पुरानी sd ताश , लकिन इस  article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer greater capacity than the  मेजबान यंत्र can हैंडल  .
A newer card may use a file system  the मेजबान यंत्र can  not navigate .
Use of an SDIO card requires  the मेजबान यंत्र be designed  for the input/output functions the card provides .
The  संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला  starting with the SDHC family .
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB before the SDA had  मानकीकृत a विधि of doing  so .
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with  इसके विशेषताएँ और assure उपयोक्ता of संगतता  .
ह्यूज जॉन mungo ग्रान्ट (  born 9 September 1960 ) is a British actor and film producer .
He has received a  सुनहरी ग्लोब , a  BAFTA , and an Honorary César .
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25  नाट्य रिलीज विश्वव्यापी  .
Grant achieved international  स्टारडम बाद appearing  in Richard Curtis 's successful Four Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ) .
He used this breakthrough role  as a बारंबार cinematic persona  during the 1990s , delivering comic performances in mainstream films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ) .
By the turn of the 21st century , he had established himself as a  अग्रणी man skilled साथ a satirical  comic talent .
Grant has expanded his  oeuvre साथ critically  acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ) , About A Boy ( 2002 ) , Love Actually ( 2003 ) , and American Dreamz ( 2006 ) .
He later played against type with  अनेक कैमियो भूमिकाएँ in the एपिक  drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ) .
Within the film industry , Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches his roles like a character actor ,  और कोशिशें to मेक उसके एक्टिंग appear  spontaneous .
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a  nonchalant  touch of irony / sarcasm and studied physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions .
The entertainment media 's coverage of Grant 's life off the big  स्क्रीन  has often overshadowed his work as a thespian .
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the profession  of एक्टिंग , और in उसके तिरस्कार towards the संस्कृति  of celebrity and hostility towards the media .
In a career  spanning 30 सालो , ग्रान्ट रै repeatedly claimed कि एक्टिंग is  not a true calling but just a job he fell into .
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 AD ) was an  इम्पीरियल राजवंश of चीन , preceded by  the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ) .
It was  संस्थापित by  the rebel leader Liu Bang , known posthumously as Emperor Gaozu of Han .
it थी briefly  interrupted by the Xin Dynasty ( 9–23 AD ) of the former regent Wang Mang .
This interregnum separates the Han into two periods : the Western Han ( 206 BC – 9 AD ) and  पूर्वी हान ( 25–220  AD ) .
Spanning over four centuries ,  the काल of the हान राजवंश  is considered a golden age in Chinese history .
To this day , China 's majority ethnic group refers to itself as  the `` हान  people '' and the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters `` .
The  हान साम्राज्य थी विभाजित  into areas directly controlled by the central government , known as commanderies , and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms .
These kingdoms gradually lost all vestiges of their  स्वतंत्रता , विशेषकर  following the Rebellion of the Seven States .
The Xiongnu , a nomadic confederation which dominated the eastern Eurasian Steppe ,  पराजित the हान  army in battle in 200 BC .
Following the defeat , a political marriage alliance was  negotiated in जिससे the हान  became the de facto inferior partner .
When , despite the treaty , the Xiongnu continued to raid  हान सीमायें , सम्राट wu  of Han ( r. 141–87 BC ) launched several military campaigns against them .
The ultimate Han victory in these wars  आखिरकार मजबूर the xiongnu to accept  vassal status as Han tributaries .
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the vast trade network  ज्ञात as the रेशा सड़क , जिससे पहुँचे as दूर as the भूमध्यसागरीय संसार .
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into two competing nations , the Southern  और उत्तरी  Xiongnu , and forced the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River .
Despite these  victories , the territories  north of Han 's borders were quickly overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation .
After 92 AD , the palace eunuchs  increasingly शामिल themselves in अदालत राजनीती , engaging in  violent power struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers , causing the Han 's ultimate downfall .
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist religious societies which instigated the  पीला पगड़ी विद्रोह और the पाँच pecks  of Rice Rebellion .
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ) , the palace eunuchs suffered wholesale  नरसंहार by सैन्य अधिकारियों , allowing सदस्यों of the aristocracy  and military governors to become warlords and divide the empire .
When Cao Pi , King of Wei , usurped the throne from Emperor Xian , the Han  राजवंश ceased to मौजूद  .
The Han Dynasty  थी an आयु of आर्थिक समृद्धि  and saw a significant growth of the money economy first established during the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ) .
the coinage जारी by the  central government mint in 119 BC remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ) .
To pay  लिये इसके सैन्य  campaigns and the settlement of newly conquered frontier territories , the government nationalized the private salt and iron industries in 117 BC .
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han  काल , और the खोया आय थी recouped  through heavily taxing private entrepreneurs .
the सम्राट थी  at the pinnacle of Han society .
He presided over the Han government but shared power with both the nobility  और नियुक्त मंत्रियों जो आए largely इससे  the scholarly gentry class .
From the reign of Emperor Wu onward , the Chinese court officially sponsored  confucianism in शिक्षा और अदालत राजनीती ,  synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong Zhongshu .
This policy endured until the fall of the  चिंग राजवंश in 1911  AD .
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances , including papermaking , the  nautical परिचालन अरित्र , the उपयोग of ऋणात्मक संख्याएँ in गणित  , the raised-relief map , the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for astronomy , and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum .
Tourette syndrome ( also called Tourette 's syndrome , Tourette 's disorder , Gilles de la Tourette syndrome , GTS or , more commonly , simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with  onset in बाल्यकाल , characterized by अनेक शारीरिक  ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic .
These tics characteristically wax and  wane , can be suppressed temporarily  , and are preceded by a premonitory urge .
Tourette 's is defined as part of a spectrum of tic disorders , which includes  क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक  tics .
Tourette 's was once considered a rare and bizarre syndrome , most often associated with the exclamation of obscene  शब्द or socially अनुचित और अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ) , लकिन  this symptom is present in only a small minority of people with Tourette 's .
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition , but it is not always correctly identified because most cases are mild and the severity of  tics decreases लिये सबसे children as वे pass through किशोरावस्था .
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the  व्यापकता of क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age  children is higher , with the more common tics of eye blinking , coughing , throat clearing , sniffing , and facial movements .
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity , and Tourette 's does not  adversely affect प्रज्ञा or जीवन प्रत्याशा  .
Genetic and environmental factors play a role in the etiology of  tourette 's , लकिन the सटीक कल्याणकारी  are unknown .
In most  मामले , दवा  is unnecessary .
There is no effective treatment for every case of  tics , लकिन निश्चित medications  and therapies can help when their use is warranted .
Education is an important part of any treatment plan , and  स्पष्टीकरण और reassurance अलोन  are often sufficient treatment .
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) such as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD )  और obsessive–compulsive विकार ( ओसीडी ) हैं उपस्थित  in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics .
These other  शर्तें प्रायः कारण अधिक कार्यात्मक पुतलियों to the व्यक्तिगत than the tics कि हैं the hallmark  of Tourette 's , hence it is important to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them .
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his resident , Georges Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la Tourette  ( 1859–1904 ) , a फ्रेंच चिकित्सक और neurologist  , who published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885 .
सनबीम  badge .
Sunbeam was a marque registered by John  marston co. ltd of wolverhampton  , England , in 1888 .
The company first made bicycles , then  मोटरसाइकिल और गाड़ियाँ इससे the लेट 19th सदी  until about 1936 , and applied the marque to all three forms of transportation .
The company also  manufactured एयरो इंजन in the पहला  World War and 647 aircraft during the Second World War .
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a Grand Prix  रेस , और नियत a क्रमांक of जमीन गति  records .
The  कम्पनी  went into receivership in 1935 and was purchased by the Rootes Group , which continued to use the Sunbeam marque .
Fox News Channel ( FNC ) , also known as Fox News , is a cable news channel owned by the Fox  entertainment समूह , a subsidiary of न्यूज  Corporation .
As of April 2009 , the  चैनल थी उपलब्धियाँ to 102 लाख  households in the United States and to viewers internationally , broadcasting primarily from its New York studios .
The channel was created by Australian-American media mogul Rupert Murdoch , who hired former NBC executive  रोजर ailes as इसके  founding CEO .
It  शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 7  , 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers .
It  grew दौरान the लेट 1990s  and 2000s to become the dominant cable news network in the United States .
Critics have stated that Fox News Channel promotes  रूढ़िवादी राजनैतिक स्थितियाँ  and biased reporting .
Commentators , news anchors , and reporters at Fox News Channel have responded that news reporting and political commentary operate independently of each  अन्य , और have अस्वीकृत कोई पूर्वाग्रह in न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग  .
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the midline of the face ) from both the  mandibular दूसरी premolars of the मुँह लकिन mesial ( toward  the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars .
it is स्तिथ on the mandibular ( निम्नतर ) मेहराब of the मुँह  , and generally opposes the maxillary ( upper ) first molars and the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion .
The function of this molar is similar to that of  सब molars in लिहाज़ to पीस  being the principal action during mastication , commonly known as chewing .
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars : two on the buccal  ( पक्ष निकटतम the  cheek ) , two lingual ( side nearest the tongue ) , and one distal .
There are great differences between the deciduous  ( baby ) mandibular molars और those of the स्थाई  mandibular molars , even though their function are similar .
The permanent mandibular molars are not considered to have  कोई दांत कि precede  it .
Despite being named molars , the deciduous molars are  followed by स्थाई  premolars .
In the universal   system of notation , the deciduous mandibular first molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase .
The right  पतझड़ी mandibular पहला molar is  known as `` S '' , and the left one is known as `` L '' .
The international notation has a different  प्रणाली of संकेतन  .
Thus , the right deciduous mandibular first  molar is ज्ञात as  `` 84 '' , and the left one is known as `` 74 '' .
In the universal system of notation , the  स्थाई mandibular पहला  molars are designated by a number .
The  सही स्थाई  mandibular first molar is known as `` 30 '' , and the left one is known as `` 19 '' .
The Palmer  संकेतन उपयोग a क्रमांक in संयोजन  with a symbol designating in which quadrant the tooth is found .
For this tooth , the left and right first molars would have  the वही क्रमांक , `` 6 '' , लकिन  the right one would have the symbol , `` ┐ '' , over it , while the left one would have , `` ┌ '' .
The international notation has a different numbering system than the previous two , and the right permanent  mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 46  '' , and the left one is known as `` 36 '' .
Mandibular primary first  molars प्रायः  have four pulp horns .
The first molar is usually the first  स्थाई दाँत to erupt और रै  adult undertones .
Anatomy : The  mandibular पहला molar रै पाँच पुलिन : the mesiobuccal ( mb , toward midline और  cheek ) , mesiolingual ( ML , toward midline and tongue ) , distolingual ( DL , away from midline and towards tongue ) , distobuccal ( DB , away from midline and toward cheek ) , and distal ( D , away from midline ) , listed in order of decreasing size .
Listed in order of  अवरोहण ऊँचाई वे हैं : ml , dl , df  , MF , and D. An eighth cusp was found in a primary second lower molar in an Argentinean child .
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ) ,  the mandibular पहला molar is pentagonal ( पाँच  sided ) in shape and tapers toward the lingual , with the sides being the buccal surface , the mesial surface , the lingual surface , distal surface , and the distobuccal surface .
The  occlusal  surface has four grooves .
The central groove is not straight but  रनों bas the बीच of the दाँत mesially to distally और contains  four pits ( mesial , central , central , and distal ) .
The distobuccal groove runs from the  distal गड्ढे in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally  separating the distal and distobuccal cusps .
The lingual  नाली रनों इससे the अधिक distal of the सेंट्रल  pits in the central groove toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual and distolingual cusps .
The buccal groove runs from the more mesial of the central pits in the  सेंट्रल नाली toward the buccal सतह  between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit .
The portion of the central groove between  the सेंट्रल गड्ढों is termed the लुईस ऑफसेट और is अनिवार्य  to account for the locations of the buccal and lingual grooves ( buccal groove being more mesial than the lingual groove while they are parallel ) .
From the buccal ( buccal view ) , two  जड़ें हैं उपस्थित  .
the distal रूट is generally straighter  , although both often have a slight distal curvature .
The heights of  रुपरेखा on the mesial और distal  contact the adjacent teeth and are located at the junction of the occlusal and middle thirds of the crown .
The Florida  विधानमंडल is the दो घरों कि अधिनियम as the राज्य  legislature of the U.S. state of Florida .
The Florida  संविधान राज्य कि `` the विधान  power of the state shall be vested in a legislature of the State of Florida , '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives .
The legislature is seated  at the  Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee .
Stained glass depiction of Daniel  interceding साथ arioch  , the king 's guard .
Arioch had been charged with killing all the wise men after  वे यहूद नहीं समर्थ to interpret nebuchadnezzar  's dream .
Daniel 2 is the second chapter of the  किताब of डेनियल  in the Hebrew Bible .
The chapter 's source  टेक्स्ट is predominantly  written in Aramaic .
According to the text , Nebuchadnezzar is the king of Babylon who is  troubled by उसके सपनो  .
He demands an interpretation for his  सपनो or होगा have उसके  mystic interpreters executed .
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom to interpret the king  's सपनो और गुणगान  God with a short psalm .
God gives Daniel a vision in the night to reveal the king  's  dream .
Able to satisfy the king , Daniel is promoted over  the पूरे प्रांत of बाबुल  .
One Comcast Center , the headquarters of  comcast in  Philadelphia , PA .
The old Comcast logo from 1969 to  1999 , जब it थी  replaced with the crescent logo .
The Comcast Corporation is an American provider of entertainment , information and  संचार उत्पाद  and services .
It is the largest cable operator , one of the  biggest द्रव्यमान मीडिया , घर अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाता , और तीसरा largest घर  telephone service provider in the United States , providing cable television , broadband Internet , telephone service and in some areas home security ( including burglar alarms , surveillance cameras , fire alarm systems and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia .
The  कम्पनी is headquartered  in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania .
In 2011 , Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal from GE in January 2011 , and  began the प्रक्रम  of purchasing the remaining 49 % on February 12 , 2013 , at a cost of $ 16.7 billion .
It  समाप्त  the purchase on March 19 , 2013 .
Comcast also has significant holding in several cable networks (  सहित  E !
Entertainment Television , Style Network , G4 , the Golf Channel  और एनबीसी खेल संजाल ) , वितरण ( theplatform  ) , and related businesses .
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for activities including its stance on  जाल neutrality , as खूब as ग़रीब परिणाम on ग्राहक  satisfaction surveys .
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of sharp spines , or quills  , कि बचाव और  camouflage them from predators .
They are indigenous to the Americas , southern  एशिया , और अफ़्रीकी .
Porcupines are the third largest of  the rodents , पीछे the capybara  and the beaver .
Most  porcupines हैं परिचय long  , with an long tail .
weighing ,  they are rounded , large and slow .
Porcupines  आइये in विभिन्न  shades of brown , gray , and the unusual white .
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of  the unrelated  erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas .
The common porcupine is a  herbivore  .
It eats leaves , herbs , twigs and green plants like skunk cabbage  और क्लोवर और in the शीत it may  eat bark .
The North American porcupine often climbs trees  to ढूँढें  food .
The African porcupine is not a climber and  forages on the मैदान  .
It is  ज़्यादातर nocturnal , लकिन होगा sometimes  forage for food in the day .
Porcupines have become a pest  in कीनिया और हैं  eaten as a delicacy .
The name porcupine comes from Middle French porc  espin ( spined  pig ) .
A  क्षेत्रीय अमरीकी  name for the animal is quill pig .

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2 , 1844 – October 10 , 1929 ) was a black Canadian-American  आविष्कारक और इंजीनियर  , who was notable for his 57 U.S. patents , most to do with lubrication of steam engines .
Born free in Canada , he returned as a  five-year-old चाइल्ड साथ उसके परिवार to the संयुक्त राज्य in 1847 , जहाँ he जिया  for the rest of his life and became a US citizen .
Honda FCX Clarity , a hydrogen fuel cell  demonstration गाडी  introduced in 2008
A hydrogen  गाडी is a गाडी  that uses hydrogen as its onboard fuel for motive power .
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled  स्पेस rockets , as खूब as ऑटोमोबाइल  and other transportation vehicles .
The power plants of such vehicles convert the chemical energy of hydrogen to  mechanical उर्जा  either by burning hydrogen in an internal combustion engine , or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run electric motors .
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling  परिवहन is a कुंजी तत्व  of a proposed hydrogen economy .
Hydrogen fuel does not occur  naturally on धरती और यूँ is नहीं an उर्जा  source ; rather it is an energy carrier .
It is most frequently made from methane or other fossil fuels , but it can  be  produced using sources ( such as wind , solar , or nuclear ) that are intermittent , too diffuse or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles .
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants , using electrolysis  of जल , हैं exploring technologies  to deliver costs low enough , and quantities great enough , to compete with traditional energy sources .
Many companies are working to develop  technologies कि might efficiently exploit the  potential of hydrogen energy for mobile uses .
the आकर्षण  of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that , if hydrogen is prepared without using fossil fuel inputs , vehicle propulsion would not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions .
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost , low energy content per unit volume , high tankage weights , very high storage vessel pressures , the storage , transportation and filling of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in vehicles , the  विशाल निवेश in अवसंरचना कि होता be जरूरी to ईंधन वाहनों ,  and the inefficiency of production processes .
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी  of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the  अमरीकी नदी in the उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive  Central Valley .
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891 , it is  the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया  and the 35th largest city in the United States .
Sacramento is the core  सांस्कृतिक और आर्थिक बीच of the  Sacramento metropolitan area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area ,  सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल  , as well as the 25th largest in the United States .
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America 's most  ethnically और  racially integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss  अप्रवासी जॉन  Sutter , Sr. , his son John Sutter , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's Fort ,  जिससे थी स्थापित by sutter  in 1839 .
During the California Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major distribution point  , a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural  center , and a terminus for wagon trains , stagecoaches , riverboats , the telegraph , the Pony Express , and the First Transcontinental Railroad .
California State University , Sacramento , more commonly known as Sacramento  राज्य or सैक राज्य , is the largest लोकल विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University  प्रणाली  .
Drexel University Sacramento is  स्तिथ in शहर  , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific 's  mcgeorge स्कूल  of Law is located in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California  , डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास  Davis , west of the capital .
The UC Davis Medical Center , a world-renowned research  हॉस्पिटल , is स्तिथ  in the city of Sacramento .
The Apple Store is a chain of  खुदरा स्टोर्स स्वामित्व और संचालित by  Apple Inc. , dealing in computers and consumer electronics .
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers , software , iPods , iPads , iPhones , third-party  accessories  , and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV .
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and workshops and a Studio for training  साथ ठहराना उत्पाद ; सब स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a प्रतिभाशाली बार लिये तकनीकी support और मरम्मत  , as well as free workshops available to the public .
Under the  नेतृत्व of रॉन जॉनसन , the पूर्व वरिष्ठ वाइस अध्यक्ष  of Retail Operations , the Apple Stores have , according to an article in the New York Times , been responsible for `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets '' .
, Apple has 405 stores worldwide , with global sales of billion in merchandise in  2011 , और वे सीसे the संयुक्त राज्य  retail market in terms of sales per unit area .
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24 , 1955 – October 5 , 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor , best known as  the co-founder , अध्यक्ष , और सीईओ of  Apple Inc .
Through Apple , he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer revolution and for his influential  करियर in the कंप्यूटर और उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स फ़ील्ड , transforming  `` one industry after another , from computers and smartphones to music and movies ... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he  became a सदस्य of the फलक of निर्देशकों of the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी  Company in 2006 , when Disney acquired Pixar .
Jobs was among the first to see the commercial potential of  xerox parc 's चूहा -ड्राइवn आलेखीय  user interface , which led to the creation of the Apple Lisa and , one year later , the Macintosh .
He also played a role in introducing the LaserWriter , one of the first  widely उपलब्धियाँ लेज़र मुद्रक , to the मार्केट  .
After a power struggle with the board of directors in 1985 , Jobs left Apple  और संस्थापित अगला , a कंप्यूटर मंच विकास कम्पनी specializing in the higher-education  and business markets .
In 1986 , he acquired the computer graphics  प्रभाग of लुकासफ़िल्म  , which was spun off as Pixar .
He was credited in Toy Story ( 1995 )  as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता  .
He served as CEO and majority shareholder until Disney 's  खरीदें of पिक्चर्स in  2006 .
In 1996 , after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system , Copland , Gil Amelio turned to NeXT Computer ,  और the nextstep मंच became the न्यास  for the Mac OS X .
Jobs returned to Apple as an advisor , and  took कंट्रोल  of the company as an interim CEO .
Jobs brought  ठहराना इससे निकट दिवालियापन  to profitability by 1998 .
As the new CEO of the company , Jobs oversaw the development of the iMac , iTunes , iPod , iPhone , and iPad , and on the  सेवाएं पक्ष , the कम्पनी 's ठहराना खुदरा स्टोर्स  , iTunes Store and the App Store .
The success of these products and services provided several  सालो of stable वित्तीय रिटर्न ,  and propelled Apple to become the world 's most valuable publicly traded company in 2011 .
The reinvigoration of the company is regarded  by अनेक टीकाकारों as एक of the महानतम  turnarounds in business history .
In 2003 ,  कार्य थी diagnosed  with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor .
Though it was initially treated , he  reported  a hormone imbalance , underwent a liver transplant in 2009 , and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined .
On medical leave for most of 2011 , Jobs resigned in  अगस्त कि साल , और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष of  the Board .
He died of respiratory arrest  सम्बन्धित to उसके metastatic  tumor on October 5 , 2011 .
Jobs received a number of honors and public  मान्यता लिये उसके influence  in the technology and music industries .
He has been referred to as `` legendary '' , a `` futurist '' or simply `` visionary '' , and has been described as the ``  पिता of the डिजिटल क्रान्ति ''  , a `` master of innovation '' , and a `` design perfectionist '' .

Roman numerals , the numeric  प्रणाली in प्राचीन रोम , उपयोग combinations  of letters from the Latin alphabet to signify values .
The numbers 1 to 10 can be  expressed in रोमन  numerals as follows:
और  .
The  रोमन numeral प्रणाली  is a cousin of Etruscan numerals .
Use of Roman numerals continued after  the मनाही of the रोमन साम्राज्य  .
From the 14th  सदी on , रोमन numerals began  to be replaced in most contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this process was gradual , and the use of Roman numerals in some minor applications continues to this day .
Effective  नाभिकीय चार्ज  Diagram
The effective nuclear charge ( often symbolize as or Z*  ) is the जाल धनात्मक चार्ज  experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom .
The term `` effective '' is used because the shielding effect of  negatively चार्ज electrons रोकता उच्चतर कक्षीय electrons  from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons .
The  प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज अनुभवी  by the outer shell electron is also called the core charge .
It is  संभावित to determine the शक्ति  of the nuclear charge by looking at the oxidation number of the atom .
