The Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of  अंतरराज्यीय और रक्षा राजमार्गों ( commonly ज्ञात as the अंतरराज्यीय  Highway System , Interstate Freeway System , Interstate System , or simply the Interstate ) is a network of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United States .
The system is named for President Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर , जो championed  its formation .
Construction was authorized by the Federal Aid Highway Act of 1956 , and  the असली portion थी समाप्त  35 years later .
The network has since been extended , and , it had a total length of , making it the world 's second longest after China  's . , परिचय one-quarter of सब गाडी मील चलित in the देश उपयोग the अंतरराज्यीय  system .
The cost of construction has been estimated at $ 425 billion ( in 2006 dollars ) , making it the `` largest public works  कार्यक्रम चूंकि the पिरामिडों  `` .
The  प्रणाली रै contributed in shaping  the United States into a world economic superpower and a highly industrialized nation .
.eu is the country code top-level  डोमेन ( cctld ) लिये the यूरोपीय  Union ( EU ) .
Launched on 7 December 2005 , the domain is available for  संगठनों in और निवासियों of  EU member states .
The TLD is administered by EURid , a consortium originally consisting of the national ccTLD registry operators of  बेल्जियम , स्वीडन , और इटली  , joined later by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic .
Trademark owners were able to submit registrations  through a सूर्योदय काल , in an प्रयत्न  to prevent cybersquatting .
Full registration  प्रारंभ on 7 अप्रैल  2006 .
Meister means master in German ( as in  निपुण craftsman  , or as an honorific title such as Meister Eckhart ) .
The word is akin to  maestro  .
In  खेल , meister is प्रयुक्त लिये the वर्तमान नेशनल , यूरोपीय  or world champion ( Deutscher Meister , *Europameister , Weltmeister ) .
Many modern day  जर्मनी पुलिस शक्तियां उपयोग  the title Meister .
During the  दूसरी संसार युद्ध , meister थी  the highest enlisted rank of the Ordnungspolizei .
Meister has been  उधार into अंग्रेज़ी कठबोली ,  where it is used in compound nouns .
A person referred to as “Meister” is one who has extensive theoretical knowledge and practical skills in his  व्यवसायिक , कारोबार  , or some other kind of work or activity .
For example , a “puzzle-meister” would be someone  अत्यधिक skilled at solving पहेलियाँ  .
ये neologisms sometimes have a व्यंग्यात्मक intent ( लिये उदाहरण ,  “stubble-meister” for someone with a short , neat beard or “crier-meister” for someone who often cries ) .
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about teenagers with super-powers  , आधारित on the 16th किश्त  of the Japanese Super Sentai franchise , Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger .
Both the show and its related merchandise saw unbridled overnight  कामयाबी , बनने a स्टेपल of 1990s पॉप संस्कृति  in mere months .
Under the original name , `` Mighty  morphin शक्ति रेंजरों '' the श्रेणी भागा इससे  1993 to 1995 and spawned the feature film Mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Movie .
The second and third seasons of the show drew on footage and elements from the Super Sentai  श्रेणी gosei sentai dairanger और निंजा sentai  Kakuranger respectively , though the Zyuranger costumes were still used for the five main Rangers and several regular villains .
Only the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume ( worn by the White Ranger ) were retained from  dairanger लिये the दूसरी ऋतु , जबकि तभी the  mecha from Kakuranger were featured in the third season .
However the Kakuranger costumes were later  प्रयुक्त लिये the शीर्षक  characters of the mini-series , Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers .
The series was produced by  mmpr प्रोडक्शन्स , वितरित  by Saban Entertainment , and aired on Fox Kids .
The  दिखाएँ 's merchandise थी  produced and distributed by Bandai Entertainment .
In 1996 , the series was rebranded as the  शक्ति रेंजरों मताधिकार ; renaming the श्रेणी प्रत्येक साल बाद , और using वेशभूषा  , props , and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series , as well as changing the cast and storyline .
While an overarching storyline would continue until Power  रेंजरों खोया आकाशगंगा , subsequent श्रेणी बाद mmpr हैं नहीं सिक्वेल  or spin-offs in the traditional sense .
In 2010 , a re-version of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers , with a  नई लोगो , कॉमिक book-referenced ग्राफिक्स , और अतिरिक्त वैकल्पिक  special effects , was broadcast on ABC Kids , and Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series .
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19 , 1809 – October 7 , 1849 ) was an American author ,  कवि , एडिटर और साहित्यिक आलोचक , माना  part of the American Romantic Movement .
Best known for his tales of mystery and the macabre , Poe was one  of the earliest अमरीकी practitioners of the  short story and is generally considered the inventor of the detective fiction genre .
He is further credited with contributing to the  उभरते विधा of विज्ञान  fiction .
He was the first  well-known अमरीकी लेखक to कोशिश to  earn a living through writing alone , resulting in a financially difficult life and career .
He was born as  एडगर पो in बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स ; he थी अनाथ यंग  when his mother died shortly after his father abandoned the family .
Poe was taken in by John and Frances Allan , of Richmond ,  वर्जिनिया , लकिन वे never  formally adopted him .
He attended the University  of वर्जिनिया लिये  one semester but left due to lack of money .
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an officer 's cadet at  वेस्ट पाइंट , पो parted  ways with the Allans .
His publishing career began humbly , with  an बेनाम संग्रहण  of poems , Tamerlane and Other Poems ( 1827 ) , credited only to `` a Bostonian '' .
Poe switched  उसके फ़ोकस to गद्य और खर्च the अगला अनेक सालो working  for literary journals and periodicals , becoming known for his own style of literary criticism .
उसके कार्य मजबूर उसे  to move among several cities , including Baltimore , Philadelphia , and New York City .
In Baltimore in 1835 , he  शादीशुदा वर्जिनिया clemm , उसके 13-year-old  cousin .
In January 1845 Poe published his poem , ``  the रेवेन ``  , to instant success .
His wife died of tuberculosis two years  बाद इसके प्रकाशन  .
He began planning to produce his own journal , The Penn ( later  renamed the स्टाइलस ) , हालांकि he died पहले it could  be produced .
On October 7 , 1849 , at age 40 , Poe died in Baltimore ; the cause of his death is unknown and has been variously attributed to  दारू , दिमाग जमघट , हैजा , दवाएँ , दिल बीमारी , rabies , आत्महत्या , तपेदिक  , and other agents .
Poe and his works influenced literature in the United States and around the world , as well as in specialized fields  , ऐसे as cosmology और क्रिप्टोग्राफी  .
Poe and his work appear throughout popular culture in  साहित्य , म्यूज़िक , films  , and television .
A number of his homes are dedicated  संग्रहालय आज  .
The Mystery Writers of America present an annual award  ज्ञात as the एडगर पुरस्कार लिये विशिष्ट कार्य in  the mystery genre .
Lions are obligate  carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to सात  kilograms ( 15 lbs ) of meat per day .
A major component of  उनके आहार is the flesh  of large mammals , like this African buffalo .
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin , caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and vorare meaning 'to devour ' ) is an organism that derives its energy and nutrient requirements from a  आहार consisting मुख्यतः or exclusively of एनिमल ऊतक  , whether through predation or scavenging .
Animals that depend solely on animal flesh for their nutrient requirements are considered carnivores while  those कि भी consume non-animal खाना हैं माना  carnivores .
Omnivores also consume both animal and non-animal food , and apart  इससे the अधिक सामान्य परिभाषा  , there is no clearly defined ratio of plant to animal material that would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore .
a carnivore कि sits  at the top of the foodchain is an apex predator .
Plants that capture and digest insects are  पुकारा मांसाहारी  plants .
Similarly , fungi that capture microscopic animals are often  पुकारा मांसाहारी fungi  .
The FIFA World Cup , often  बस the संसार कप , is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल  teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930 , except in 1942 and 1946 when  it थी नहीं आयोजित क्युकी  of the Second World War .
The current  champions हैं स्पेन ,  who won the 2010 tournament .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues  भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of  about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place over the  preceding तीन सालो , is प्रयुक्त to determine  which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by eight  अलग नेशनल  teams .
Brazil have won five times , and they are the only team to  have निभाई in प्रत्येक टूर्नामेंट  .
The other World Cup  विजेता हैं इटली , साथ चार शीर्षक  ; Germany , with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay , with two titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the  2006 फीफा संसार  Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will  be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014 , रूस  in 2018 , and Qatar in 2022 .
Heroes is an American science fiction television drama series created by Tim Kring that appeared  on एनबीसी लिये चार सीज़न  from September 25 , 2006 through February 8 , 2010 .
The  श्रेणी tells the कहानियां of ordinary लोगों जो discover superhuman  abilities , and how these abilities take effect in the characters ' lives .
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling of American comic books , using multi-episode  स्टोरी arcs कि निर्माण upon  a larger , more encompassing arc .
the श्रेणी थी उत्पादित by tailwind  Productions in association with Universal Media Studios .
It was filmed primarily in  लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Four complete seasons aired , ending on February  8 , 2010  .
The critically acclaimed first season had a run of 23 episodes and garnered an average of 14.3 million  दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य , receiving the  highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years .
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1 million viewers in the U.S. , and  चिह्नित एनबीसी 's एकमात्र श्रेणी  among the top 20 ranked programs in total viewership for the 2007–2008 season .
Heroes has earned a number of awards and nominations , including Primetime Emmy Awards , Golden Globes , People 's  चुनाव पुरस्कार और अंग्रेजों  Academy Television Awards .
An online extension of the series , Heroes 360 Experience , later rebranded as Heroes Evolutions ,  थी निर्मित to explore the नायक ब्रह्मांड  and provides insight into the show 's mythology .
Other official Heroes media include magazines , action figures , tie-in and interactive websites , a  मोबाईल खेल , a अनोखा ,  clothing and other merchandise .
In the fall of 2008 , NBC Digital Entertainment released a series of online content for the  गर्मियाँ , सहित अधिक असली वेब सामग्री  , wireless iTV interactivity , graphic novels available for mobile viewing and webisodes .
NBC announced Heroes cancellation  on  May 14 , 2010 .
Afterward , the network considered making a television special  इवेंट to conclude the श्रेणी ; however ,  on September 9 , 2010 , NBC announced the decision to stop any further development of the Heroes franchise .
Tim Kring then suggested that the broad premise of Heroes storylines allowed for the franchise to return for fans , but he did not specify when or in what media  स्वरूप .
On April  17 , 2013 , tv लकीर reported कि एमएसएन  was in talks to revive the series with a new cast .
जॉन pierpont  `` J. P . ''
Morgan ( April 17 , 1837 – March  31 , 1913 ) थी an अमरीकी फाइनेंसर  , banker , philanthropist and art collector who dominated corporate finance and industrial consolidation during his time .
In 1892 Morgan arranged the merger of Edison General Electric and Thomson-Houston  इलेक्ट्रिक कम्पनी to रूप  General Electric .
After financing the creation of the Federal Steel Company , he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel Company and several other steel and  आयरन व्यवसायों , सहित संचित स्टील और तार कम्पनी स्वामित्व by विलियम  Edenborn , to form the United States Steel Corporation .
Morgan died in Rome , Italy , in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75 , leaving his fortune and  कारोबार to उसके बेटे , जॉन pierpont `` जोकर '' मॉर्गन  , Jr. , and bequeathing his mansion and large book collections to The Morgan Library & Museum in New York .
At the height of Morgan 's career during the early 1900s , he and his partners had financial investments in many large corporations  और यहूद अभियुक्त by आलोचकों of controlling  the nation 's high finance .
He directed the  बैंकिंग गठबन्धन  that stopped the Panic of 1907 .
He was the leading financier of the Progressive Era , and his  समर्पण to दक्षता और modernization  helped transform American business .
This is a  सूची of एपीसोड  of the television series .
The episodes were  निर्देशित by शिगेरू ueda और  produced by the Yggdrasil Executive Committee which included Xebec and Genco .
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo and revolves around Rin  asōgi , an अमर निजी अन्वेषक , as वो explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future  world and the supernatural events that surround the fictional society of immortals like herself .
There are large time gaps in the internal  कालक्रम between the  first five episodes , ranging from one to thirty years .
The six episodes were broadcast monthly on AT-X channel  in जापानी , between  February 3 and July 6 , 2008 .
Each  एपीसोड is 45 मिनट्स  long .
Two pieces of theme music are used  लिये the एपीसोड : the खोलने थीम `` alsatia ''  and the ending theme `` Cause Disarray '' .
Both were composed and performed by  the जापानी मेटल बैंड  Galneryus .
The series was produced to commemorate the tenth anniversary of the AT-X  संजाल it originally  aired on .
Aerial photo of  fletc , जहाँ us डिजिटल  forensics standards were developed in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science ) is a branch of forensic science encompassing the recovery and investigation of material  मिला in डिजिटल डिवाइस ,  often in relation to computer crime .
The term digital  forensics थी originally प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये  computer forensics but has expanded to cover investigation of all devices capable of storing digital data .
With roots in the personal computing revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s , the discipline evolved in a haphazard manner during the  1990s , और it थी नहीं जबतक the जल्दी 21st सदी कि नेशनल नीतियों उभरा  .
Digital forensics  investigations have a  variety of applications .
the सबसे  common is to support or refute a hypothesis before criminal or civil ( as part of the electronic discovery process ) courts .
Forensics may also feature in the private sector ; such as during internal corporate investigations or intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into the  प्रकृति और extent of an अनधिकृत  network intrusion ) .
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into several sub-branches , relating to the type of digital devices involved ; computer forensics , network forensics , forensic data analysis and mobile  यंत्र forensics  .
The typical forensic process encompasses the seizure , forensic imaging ( acquisition ) and analysis of  डिजिटल मीडिया और the उत्पादन of a रपट  into collected evidence .
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime , digital forensics  can be प्रयुक्त to विशेषता प्रमाण to विशिष्ट संदिग्धों ,  confirm alibis or statements , determine intent , identify sources ( for example , in copyright cases ) , or authenticate documents .
Investigations are much  broader in पैमाना than अन्य क्षेत्रों of forensic विश्लेषण ( जहाँ the usual  aim is to provide answers to a series of simpler questions ) often involving complex time-lines or hypotheses .
A comparison  of the chromaticities  enclosed by some color spaces .
A color model is an abstract  गणितीय मॉडल describing the  way colors can be represented as tuples of numbers , typically as three or four values or color components ( e.g . RGB and CMYK are color models ) .
However , a color model with no associated mapping function to an absolute color space is a more or less  मनमानी रंग प्रणाली साथ  no connection to any globally understood system of color interpretation .
Adding a certain  मानचित्रण फलन between the रंग मॉडल  and a certain reference color space results in a definite `` footprint '' within the reference color space .
This `` footprint  '' is ज्ञात as a gamut  , and , in combination with the color model , defines a new color space .
For  उदाहरण , adobe आरजीबी और srgb  are two different absolute color spaces , both based on the RGB model .
In the most generic sense of the definition above  , रंग स्पेसेस can be पारिभाषित  without the use of a color model .
These spaces ,  ऐसे as pantone  , are in effect a given set of names or numbers which are defined by the existence of a corresponding set of physical color swatches .
This article focuses on  the  mathematical model concept .
Labor  दिन is an अमरीकी संघीय अवकाश observed on the  first Monday in September , that celebrates the economic and social contributions of workers .
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) and an insurer , where the insurer  वादे to अदा a designated लाभार्थी a योग of  money ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person .
Depending on the contract , other events such as terminal illness or  नाजुक बीमारी may भी  trigger payment .
The policy  होल्डर typically  pays a premium , either regularly or as a lump sum .
Other expenses ( such as  अंत्येष्टि खर्च ) हैं भी  sometimes included in the benefits .
Life policies are legal contracts  और the शर्तें of the अनुबंध  describe the limitations of the insured events .
Specific exclusions are often written into the contract to limit the  देयता of the insurer ; आम उदाहरण हैं दावा relating to आत्महत्या , धोखाधड़ी  , war , riot and civil commotion .
Life-based contracts tend to fall into two  प्रमुख categories:
Protection policies –  designed to provide a लाभ in the इवेंट of निर्दिष्ट  event , typically a lump sum payment .
A  आम रूप of  this design is term insurance .
Investment policies – where the main objective is  to सुकर the विकास  of capital by regular or single premiums .
Common forms ( in the US ) are whole  जीवन , सार्वभौमिक जीवन  and variable life policies .

Mitzi  gaynor donahue ( born may 2 , 1962 in yorba लिंडा ,  Orange County , California ) is an American actress , also credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture .
Kapture began her career in films ,  सबसे of जिससे यहूद  not huge commercial successes .
She went on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver , 1st & Ten , and as a contestant on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained international exposure with her first  प्रमुख टेलीविज़न भूमिका as सार्जेंट  Rita Lee Lance in the television series Silk Stalkings .
kapture  's role as Rita , the other half of the two `` Sams '' for almost 5 years , cemented her popularity .
Paired with Rob Estes who played Sergeant Chris  lorenzo , kapture gained वैश्विक  recognition along with her costar since the show was broadcast in several countries .
Sergeant Lance eventually became Lieutenant Lance by the time Kapture left the  श्रेणी  in 1995 to have her first child Madison .
During her time with the series , Kapture  briefly सत in the निदेशक 's कुर्सी ,  for two episodes .
She was interviewed for the Silk Stalkings  ऋतु 1 dvd जिससे थी वितरित by लंगर खाड़ी  Entertainment and released in September 2004 .
After a short hiatus from the screen following her exit from Silk  stalkings , kapture लौटे in 1997  to the small screen and USA Network .
She played lead roles in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies , Perfect Crime ( based on a true story , also called Hide and Seek : The Joanne Jensen Story ) , which also   starred Jasmine Guy and His Bodyguard .
वो बाद स्ट्रक्चर in a few अन्य  independent film projects and theatre productions and had several television guest appearances .
Kapture also had a recurring role  on बेवाच as  Alexis Ryker .
She played Anita Hodges on The Young  और the बेचैन इससे  2002 through 2004 , where she was credited as Mitzi Kapture Donahue , and starred in the made-for-TV movie Night of Terror which premiered March 26 , 2006 on Lifetime Network .
Her latest is a  supporting भूमिका in  God 's Ears , released in 2007 .
Kapture is the official  हस्ती प्रवक्ता लिये the xeroderma  Pigmentosum Society .
The Xbox 360 is the second  वीडियो खेल कंसोल विकसित by और  produced for Microsoft and the successor to the Xbox .
The Xbox 360  competes साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन  3 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles .
As of  सितंबर 30 , 2012 , 70 लाख  Xbox 360 consoles have been sold worldwide .
The Xbox  360 थी officially अनावरण on एमटीवी on may 12 , 2005 , साथ  detailed launch and game information divulged later that month at the Electronic Entertainment Expo ( E3 ) .
The console sold out completely upon release  in सब regions  except in Japan .
Several major  सुविधाएँ of the एक्सबॉक्स 360 हैं इसके एकीकृत एक्सबॉक्स सजीव  service that allows players to compete online ; download arcade games , game demos , trailers , TV shows , music and movies ; and its Windows Media Center multimedia capabilities .
The Xbox Live also offers access to various ( often region-specific )  third-party  media streaming applications .
At their E3 presentation on June 14 ,  2010 , microsoft  announced a redesigned Xbox 360 that would ship on the same day .
The redesigned console is  slimmer than the पिछला एक्सबॉक्स 360 मॉडल और सुविधाएँ  integrated 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi , TOSLINK S/PDIF optical audio output , five USB 2.0 ports ( compared to the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port .
Older models of the  एक्सबॉक्स 360 have  since been discontinued .
The  पहला नई कंसोल to be released  features a 250 GB hard drive , while a later , less expensive SKU features 4 GB internal storage .
Backpack may also refer to a  2001 अनोखा  by Emily Barr
a  modern backpack
Swiss  फौज backpack  ca . 1960
Integrated bearer  फ़्रेम .
A backpack ( also called rucksack , knapsack , packsack , pack ) is , in its simplest form , a  cloth बोरी carried on एक 's वापस और secured साथ दो straps  that go over the shoulders , but there can be exceptions .
Lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on  तभी एक कंधे डोरी  .
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or carrying any sort  of उपकरण , क्युकी of the सीमित क्षमता  to carry heavy weights for long periods of time in the hands .
Large  backpacks , प्रयुक्त to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 पाउंड ) , प्रायः offload the largest  part ( up to about 90 % ) of their weight onto padded hip belts , leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the load .
This improves  the संभावित to carry भारी loads , as the कूल्हों हैं stronger  than the shoulders , and also increases agility and balance , since the load rides nearer the wearer 's own center of mass .
In ancient times , the  backpack थी प्रयुक्त as a अर्थात् to carry the शिकारी  's larger game and other types of prey and as a way of easier transport for other materials .
In the cases of larger hunts , the hunters would dismember their prey and  वितरित the टुकड़े of the एनिमल around , प्रत्येक एक पैकिंग  the meat into many wrappings and then into bags which they placed on to their backs .
The bag itself was made up of different animal hide and skin ( depending on what sorts of animals were in the area ) and sewn together by the intestines of  कहा पशु , जिससे यहूद woven साथ tightly to मेक a sturdy thread-like  material .
Mexico ( ; ; ) , officially the  संयुक्त मैक्सिकन  States ( ) , is a federal constitutional republic in North America .
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the south and west by the Pacific Ocean ; on the southeast by Guatemala , Belize , and the Caribbean Sea ; and  on the ईस्ट by the गल्फ of मैक्सिको  .
Covering almost two million square kilometres ( over  760,000 sq  mi ) , Mexico is the fifth largest country in the Americas by total area and the 13th largest independent nation in the world .
With an estimated population of over 113 million , it is the  संसार 's eleventh सबसे  populous country and the most populous Spanish-speaking country .
Mexico is a   federation comprising thirty-one states and a Federal District , the capital city .
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into advanced civilizations such as the Olmec , the Toltec , the Teotihuacan ,  the zapotec , the माया और the एज़टेक पहले पहला सम्पर्क साथ europeans  .
In 1521 ,  स्पेन conquered और colonized the territory इससे  its base in México-Tenochtitlan , which was administered as the Viceroyalty of New Spain .
This territory would eventually  become मैक्सिको following मान्यता of  the colony 's independence in 1821 .
The post-independence period was characterized by  आर्थिक अस्थिरता , the mexican-american  War and territorial cession to the United States , a civil war , two empires and a domestic dictatorship .
The latter led to the  मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति in 1910 , जिससे culminated साथ the promulgation  of the 1917 Constitution and the emergence of the country 's current political system .
Elections held in  जुलाई 2000 चिह्नित  the first time that an opposition party won the presidency from the Institutional Revolutionary Party .
Since 2006 the country has been in the midst of a  ड्रग युद्ध जिससे रै caused 60,000 मौतों  .
मैक्सिको रै एक of the संसार  's largest economies , and is considered both a regional power and middle power .
In addition , Mexico was the first Latin American  सदस्य of the संगठन लिये आर्थिक co-operation और विकास  OECD ( since 1994 ) , and considered an upper-middle income country by the World Bank .
मैक्सिको is माना a newly  industrialized country and an emerging power .
It has the  fourteenth largest नाममात्र जीडीपी और  the eleventh largest GDP by purchasing power parity .
The economy is strongly linked to those of its North American  फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध  ( NAFTA ) partners , especially the United States of America .
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first in the Americas by  क्रमांक of युनेस्को संसार विरासत  Sites with 31 , and in 2007 was the tenth most visited country in the world with 21.4 million international arrivals per year .
Babe Ruth holds the MLB  करियर slugging प्रतिशत  record ( .690 ) .
In baseball statistics ,  slugging प्रतिशत  ( abbreviated SLG ) is a popular measure of the power of a hitter .
It is  गणना as कुल  bases divided by at bats :
where AB is the number of at-bats for a given player , and 1B ,  2b , 3b , और hr हैं the क्रमांक of  singles , doubles , triples , and home runs , respectively .
Walks are specifically excluded  इससे इस गणना  .
For example , in 1920 , Babe Ruth played his  पहला ऋतु लिये  the New York Yankees .
In 458 at bats , Ruth had 172 hits , comprising 73 singles , 36 doubles , 9 triples ,  और 54 घर रनों , जिससे  brings the total base count to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388 .
उसके कुल क्रमांक of bases (  388 ) divided by his total at-bats ( 458 ) is .847 , his slugging percentage for the season .
The next year he slugged .846 , and these records went unbroken until 2001 , when Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases in 476 at-bats , bringing  उसके slugging प्रतिशत to .863 ,  unmatched since .
is a  role-playing वीडियो खेल विकसित  and published by Square ( now Square Enix ) for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1995 .
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : Hironobu  sakaguchi , the निर्माता of वर्गाकार 's फाइनल काल्पनिक श्रेणी ; yuji horii , a freelance पंक्तियां और निर्माता of एनिक्स 's लोकप्रिय  Dragon Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama , a freelance manga artist famed for his work with Dragon Quest and Dragon Ball .
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game , Masato Kato wrote most of the plot , while composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored most of the game before  गिरना बीमार और deferring बाकी ट्रैक्स to फाइनल काल्पनिक  composer Nobuo Uematsu .
The  खेल 's स्टोरी फ़ॉलो a  group of adventurers who travel through time to prevent a global catastrophe .
Square re-released a ported version by Tose in  जापानी लिये सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन in 1999 , बाद repackaged साथ a  Final Fantasy IV port as Final Fantasy Chronicles in 2001 for the North American market .
A slightly enhanced Chrono Trigger was released for the Nintendo DS on November 25 , 2008 , in North America and Japan , and went on sale in Australia on February 3 , 2009 and in Europe on  फ़रवरी 6 , 2009  .
The game  थी never released in pal territories  before the Nintendo DS version .
Chrono Trigger was  a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी  upon release and is considered today to be one of the greatest video games of all time .
Nintendo Power magazine described aspects of Chrono Trigger as revolutionary , including its  अनेक  endings , plot-related sidequests focusing on character development , unique battle system , and detailed graphics .
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling game of 1995 , and the game 's SNES and PlayStation iterations have  shipped 2.65  million copies as of March 2003 .
The version for the  निन्टेंडो ds बेची 790,000  copies as of March 2009 .
Chrono Trigger was also ported to mobile phones , Virtual Console , the PlayStation Network ( only in the USA ) , iOS devices ,  और एंड्रॉइड डिवाइस  .
बकरी चीज
Goat cheese , or chèvre ( from the French word for  बकरी ) , is चीज बना आउट  of the milk of goats .
अतिताप is elevated देह तापमान  due to failed thermoregulation that occurs when a body produces or absorbs more heat than it dissipates .
Extreme temperature elevation then  becomes a चिकित्सा आपात requiring  immediate treatment to prevent disability or death .
The most  आम कल्याणकारी शामिल ऊष्मा  stroke and adverse reactions to drugs .
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive heat , or combination of heat and  आर्द्रता , कि overwhelms the heat-regulating  mechanisms .
The latter is a relatively rare side effect of many  दवाएँ , विशेषकर those कि affect  the central nervous system .
Malignant  अतिताप  is a rare complication of some types of general anesthesia .
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be used in the treatment of some kinds of cancer and other  शर्तें , सबसे commonly in संयोजन साथ radiotherapy  .
Hyperthermia differs from  ज्वर in कि the देह 's तापमान  set point remains unchanged .
The opposite is  hypothermia , जिससे occurs  when the temperature drops below that required to maintain normal metabolism .
Belize , is a country located on the  northeastern coast of सेंट्रल  America .
It is  the तभी देश in the  area where English is the official language , although Kriol and Spanish are more commonly spoken .
Belize is bordered on the north by Mexico , to the south and west by  ग्वाटेमाला और to  the east by the Caribbean Sea .
Its mainland is  परिचय long और चौड़ी  .
With of land and a population of only 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census ) , Belize  possesses the न्यूनतम जनसांख्यिकी  density in Central America .
The country 's  जनसांख्यिकी  growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est . ) is the second highest in the region and one of the highest in the western hemisphere .
Belize 's abundance of terrestrial and marine species , and  इसके विविधता of ecosystems दे it a कुंजी प्लेस भीतर  the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor .
Belize has a  विविध समाज , comprising  many cultures and languages .
It is the only  स्वदेश in the प्रदेश साथ a अंग्रेजों औपनिवेशिक विरासत , लकिन  as a part of the Western Caribbean Zone , it also shares a common heritage with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean countries .
In general ,  बेलीज़ is माना  to be a Central American and Caribbean nation with strong ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America .
Belize is a member of the Caribbean Community (  caricom ) , the जातियाँ of लैटिन अमरीकी  and Caribbean States ( CELAC ) , and Central American Integration System ( SICA ) .
Belize is  ज्ञात लिये इसके सितंबर जश्न  , and is the birthplace of chewing gum and Punta Rock .
The `` Betsy Ross ''  ध्वज
A `` Betsy Ross '' flag flying  बाहर सैन फ्रांसिस्को  City Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an early design of the flag of the  संयुक्त राज्य , popularly attributed to बेट्सी रॉस , using the आम motifs  of alternating red-and-white striped field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton .
The flag was  designed दौरान the अमरीकी  Revolution and features 13 stars to represent the original 13 colonies .
The  distinctive विशेषता of the रॉस  flag is the arrangement of the stars in a circle .
Although the Betsy Ross story is accepted by most Americans , some flag historians and revisionists do not accept the  बेट्सी रॉस डिज़ाइन  as the first American flag .
According to the traditional account , the original flag was made in June 1776 ,  जब a छोटी committee—including जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , रॉबर्ट मॉरिस और सापेक्ष  George Ross —visited Betsy and discussed the need for a new American flag .
Betsy  स्वीकृत the जॉब to manufacture the  flag , altering the committee 's design by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars .
While the Betsy Ross legend is questionable , the flag design is known to have been in use by 1777 ; Alfred B . Street  वर्णित it at the आत्मसमर्पण of सामान्य burgoyne और समझा the वृत्त of सितारों  to represent equality among the American states .
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. flags known to exist ; while it is not the oldest surviving flag artifact in  cloth रूप , इसके likeness appears on पुरानी  physical relics , namely , the contemporary battlefield paintings by John Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale .
They depict the circular star arrangement being flown  इससे जलयान masts और अनेक अन्य स्थान  , and thus provide the first known historical documentation of the flag 's appearance .
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs uses  the बेट्सी रॉस ध्वज to represent सेवा  to all veterans from the American Revolution to the present day .
The Betsy  रॉस डिज़ाइन of 13-star us ध्वज  has been featured in many popular artworks ( sometimes inaccurately , as in Washington Crossing the Delaware ) and films , such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna .
The flag continues to be one of the most  लोकप्रिय  symbols of the American Revolution .
A purr is a sound made by all  प्रजाति of felids और is  a part of cat communication .
It  varies between बिल्लियों ( लिये उदाहरण by loudness  and tone ) , and from species to species , but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing .
The term `` purring '' has been used liberally in literature  , और it रै महरूम claimed कि viverrids  ( civet , mongoose , genet ) , bears , badgers , hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr .
अन्य पशु  that have been said to purr are rabbits , squirrels , guinea pigs , tapirs , ring-tailed lemurs , elephants , raccoons and gorillas while eating .
However , using a strict definition of purring that continuous sound production must alternate between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream ( and usually go on for minutes ) , Peters ( 2002 ) ,  in an विस्तृत पुनर्विलोकन of the वैज्ञानिक साहित्य ,  reached the conclusion that until then only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) and two species of genets , Genetta tigrina , and most likely also Genetta genetta , had been documented to purr .
The platypus (  ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic  to eastern Australia , including Tasmania .
Together with the four species of echidna , it is one of the  पाँच extant प्रजाति of  monotremes , the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth .
It is the sole living representative of its family (  ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus  ) , though a number of related species have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed , beaver -tailed , otter -footed mammal baffled  यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे पहला encountered  it , with some considering it an elaborate fraud .
It is one of the few venomous mammals , the  पुरूष platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर  that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans .
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable and  iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर at नेशनल कार्यक्रम  and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin .
The platypus is the animal emblem of the  राज्य of नई दक्षिण वेल्स  .
Until the early 20th century , it was hunted for its fur , but it is now  सुरक्षित throughout इसके  range .
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of  प्रदूषण , it is नहीं अंतर्गत कोई तात्कालिक  threat .
St. Elizabeth is a village  in  Miller County , Missouri , United States .
The population was  336 at  the 2010 census .
Wilton is a census-designated place ( CDP )  in sacramento  County , California , United States .
It is part of the Sacramento –  arden-arcade – roseville महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The population was 5,363 at the  2010 जनसांख्यिकी , up इससे 4,551 at the  2000 census .
In human-computer interaction , cut and paste and copy and paste are related commands that offer a user-interface interaction technique for transferring text , data , files or objects from a source  to a गंतव्य  .
सबसे ubiquitously  , users require the ability to cut and paste sections of plain text .
The cut command removes the selected data from its original position , while the copy command  creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले  the selected data is placed in a clipboard .
The data in the clipboard is  बाद inserted in the स्थिति जहाँ the  paste command is issued .
The command names are an interface metaphor  आधारित on the शारीरिक कार्यविधि प्रयुक्त in पाण्डुलिपि  editing to create a page layout .
This interaction technique has close associations with related techniques in  आलेखीय उपयोक्ता अंतरफलक कि उपयोग इंगित डिवाइस  such as a computer mouse ( by drag and drop , for example ) .
Economic order quantity is the order quantity that minimizes  कुल inventory पकड़कर लागत और ordering  costs .
It is one  of the oldest  classical production scheduling models .
The framework used to determine this  अनुक्रम मात्रा is भी  known as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula .
The model was developed by Ford W. Harris in 1913 , but R. H. Wilson , a  सलाहकार जो लागू it extensively , is दिए  credit for his in-depth analysis .
Stephen `` Stevie ''  रे vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3 , 1954 –  August 27 , 1990 ) was an American guitarist , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
प्रायः referred  to by his initials SRV , Vaughan is best known as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble .
साथ साथ वादक  Chris Layton and bassist Tommy Shannon , they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s .
With a career spanning seven years , Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently sold  आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि  their albums frequently went gold .
He was born and raised in Dallas , Texas , and for a short  काल of समय जिया in ग्राहम  , Texas .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan , Vaughan started  playing  the guitar at age seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical  करियर , joining समूह  such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed  ट्रिपल threat revue , a बैंड कि आखिरकार  evolved into Double Trouble and regularly performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux  जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड  , catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's  नृत्य , जबकि browne offered the  band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album .
In March 1983 ,  vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to एपिक रिकॉर्ड by दिग्गज  record producer John Hammond Sr. and released their debut album , Texas Flood in June of that year .
After successful touring , the group released the albums , Could n't Stand the  मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा  ( 1985 ) , the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
हालांकि उसके करियर था progressed सफलतापूर्वक  , Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta , Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band .
In June 1989 , In Step  थी released और  earned them a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance .
On August 27 , 1990 , Vaughan was killed  in a हेलीकाप्टर  crash following a performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's  uniquely  eclectic yet intense style was derived from a variety of musical genres .
He was influenced by blues musicians including  अल्बर्ट किंग , फ्रेडी किंग , ओटिस  Rush , and Muddy Waters , and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar playing reflected the classic  ब्लूज़ और  pentatonic scales .
He has received wide critical recognition for his  गिटार playing , रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग  Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was  erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम  Shores park .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to  आइये इससे the  state of Texas .
The Las Vegas  स्ट्रिप संसार of  Coca-Cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants , and vending machines  in प्रत्येक देश मगर  Cuba and North Korea .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta ,  जॉर्जिया , और is प्रायः referred  to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
originally intended as a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th  century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola  bottlers throughout the  world .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company , produce finished product in cans  और बोतलों इससे the concentrate in संयोजन  with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell ,  वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to  retail stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises , which is the largest single  coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और  western Europe .
the coca-cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate  for soda fountains to major restaurants and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has , on occasion ,  introduced अन्य कोला पेय अंतर्गत the  Coke brand name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola ,  आहार कोक caffeine-free , coca-cola  Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best  वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011 ,  Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand .
बैरी लुई larkin ( born अप्रैल 28 , 1964 )  is a retired Major League Baseball player .
Larkin played shortstop for the  सिनसिनाटी लाल इससे 1986 to  2004 and was one of the pivotal players on the 1990 Reds ' World Series championship team .
Larkin was elected to the National Baseball Hall of Fame in  जनवरी 2012 और थी inducted on जुलाई  22 .
Larkin is  माना एक of the शीर्ष खिलाड़ी  of his era , winning nine Silver Slugger awards and three Gold Glove awards .
He was selected to the Major League All-Star Game twelve times , and was elected the 1995 National  लीग सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी  .
Brasília ( ) is the federal capital of Brazil and the seat of  सरकारी of the संघीय  District .
Administratively , the city is located in  the संघीय ज़िला जिससे is in the  Central-West Region .
Physically ,  it is स्तिथ  in the Brazilian Highlands .
It has a population of about 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate , making  it the चौथी largest  city in Brazil .
However ,  as a महानगर क्षेत्रफल  , it ranks lower at sixth in population .
Brasília is the largest city in the world that  किया नहीं मौजूद at the शुरूआत  of the 20th century .
Brasília has the fifth largest GDP among Latin American cities  और the तीसरा in ब्राज़ील  .
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais ( equal  to लगभग $ 30,900  US dollars or €23,000 euros ) , the city 's per capita income is the highest among Brazil 's largest cities .
As  the नेशनल पूंजी  , Brasília is the seat of all three branches of the federal government of Brazil .
The city also hosts the headquarters of many  ब्राज़ीलियाई  companies .
Planning policies such as the location of residential buildings around expansive urban  क्षेत्रों , as खूब as भवन the नगर around विशाल avenues और dividing it into सेक्टर , have  sparked a debate and reflection on life in big cities in the 20th century .
The city 's design divides it into numbered blocks as well as sectors for specified activities , such as the Hotel Sector ,  the बैंकिंग सेक्टर or the दूतावास  Sector .
Brasília hosts 124 foreign  embassies .
The city was planned and developed in 1956  साथ lúcio कोस्टा as the प्रिंसिपल शहरी प्लानर ,  Oscar Niemeyer as the principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape designer .
Brasilia is in the  युनेस्को 's संसार hertitage  List due to its architecture .
On April 22 , 1960 , it  formally became ब्राज़ील  's national capital .
Viewed from above , the  प्रमुख  portion of the city resembles an airplane or a butterfly .
The city is  commonly referred to  as Capital Federal , or simply BSB .
Residents of Brasília  are  known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those not born in the city but who migrated there after it was established ) .
In local usage , the word `` Brasília '' usually refers only to the First Administrative Region ( RA  i ) भीतर the संघीय ज़िला ( distrito संघीय  ) , where the most important government buildings are located .
Brasília has a unique status in Brazil , as it is an administrative division rather than a legal  नगरपालिका  like nearly all cities in Brazil .
Nationally , the term is almost  सदा प्रयुक्त synonymously साथ the संघीय ज़िला , जिससे  constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit , analogous to a state .
Several `` satellite cities '' exist which are also part of  the संघीय  District .
Brasília International Airport is the main airport in Brasília , connecting the  पूंजी to सब प्रमुख ब्राज़ीलियाई  cities and many international destinations .
It is  the तीसरा सबसे महत्वपूर्ण  airport in Brazil , in terms of passengers and aircraft movements .
Personifications of Germany , France , Russia , Austria-Hungary , and the United Kingdom attempting to keep the lid on the simmering cauldron of  imperialist और राष्ट्रवादी तनाव in the balkans to prevent a  general European war .
They were  कामयाब in 1912 और 1913  but did not succeed in in 1914 .
The causes of World War I , which began in central Europe in late July 1914 and finished in 1918 ,  शामिल अनेक कारकों , ऐसे as the विरोध और दुश्मनी of the  four decades leading up to the war .
सैन्यवाद , alliances , साम्राज्यवाद  , and nationalism played major roles in the conflict as well .
The immediate origins of the war , however , lay in the decisions taken by statesmen and generals during the Crisis of 1914 , casus belli for which was  the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड ( the archduke of ऑस्ट्रिया हंगेरियाई ) और उसके बीवी सोफी  by Gavrilo Princip , an irredentist Serb .
The crisis came after a long and  मुश्किल श्रेणी of राजनयिक clashes between the ग्रेट शक्तियां  ( Italy , France , Germany , the British Empire , the Austria-Hungarian Empire and Russia ) over European and colonial issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high .
In turn these diplomatic clashes can  be traced to परिवर्तन  in the balance of power in Europe since 1867 .
The more immediate cause for the war was  तनाव over territory  in the Balkans .
Austria-Hungary competed with Serbia and Russia for territory and influence in the region and they pulled the rest of the Great Powers into  the विरोध through उनके विभिन्न alliances और  treaties .
Although the chain of events unleashed by the assassination triggered the war , the war 's origins go deeper , involving national politics , cultures , economics , and a complex  वेब of alliances और counterbalances कि था विकसित between  the various European powers since 1870 .
Some of the most important long term or structural causes are : the growth of nationalism across Europe , unresolved territorial disputes , an intricate system of alliances , the perceived breakdown of the balance of power in Europe , convoluted and fragmented governance , the arms races of the previous decades , previous military  नियोजन , इम्पीरियल और औपनिवेशिक फंसने लिये माल , शक्ति और प्रतिष्ठा , और आर्थिक और  military rivalry in industry and trade – e.g. , the Pig War between Austria and Serbia .
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic crisis that preceded the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g. , the German belief that the United  किंगडम होता remain न्यूट्रल ) और देरी और misunderstandings  in diplomatic communications .
The various categories of explanation for World  युद्ध i correspond to अलग  historians ' overall methods .
Most historians  और लोकप्रिय टीकाकारों शामिल कल्याणकारी  from more than one category of explanation to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war .
The deepest distinction among these accounts is between stories that see it as the inevitable and  predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित कारकों , और those कि  describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake .
In attributing  कल्याणकारी लिये the युद्ध , इतिहासकारों और लड था to सौदे साथ an unprecedented  flood of memoirs and official documents , released as each country involved tried to avoid blame for starting the war .
Early releases of information by  सरकारें , विशेषकर those released लिये उपयोग by the `` आयोग  on the Responsibility of the Authors of the War '' were shown to be incomplete and biased .
In addition some documents , especially  राजनयिक केबल between  Russia and France , were found to have been doctored .
Even in later decades however , when much more  सूचना था महरूम released , इतिहासकारों इससे the वही संस्कृति  have been shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war .
Johnson 's new  चार्ट of नेशनल  emblems , published c. 1868 .
The  विशाल ध्वज दिखाया in the किनारे हैं the 37-star ध्वज  of the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ) , the Royal Standard of the United Kingdom , the Russian Imperial Standard , and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle .
Various other  ध्वज flown  by ships are shown .
The Flag of Cuba is labelled `` Cuban ( so  पुकारा ) ``  .
The Chinese  ड्रैगन on the ध्वज of चीन  was drawn mistakenly as a western dragon .
A national flag is a  ध्वज कि  symbolizes a country .
The flag is flown by the government ,  लकिन प्रायः can  also be flown by citizens of the country .
Both  पब्लिक और निजी  buildings such as schools and courthouses may fly the national flag .
In some countries , the national flags are only flown from non-military  इमारतें on निश्चित ध्वज दिनों  .
There are three distinct types of national flag for use on land , and three for use at sea , though many countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes  सब ) of ये  types of flag .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and  अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य  that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of  गुलामी , विशेषकर  the extension of slavery into the western territories .
विदेशी शक्तियां  did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring  नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed  slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed  expanding गुलामी  into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before  उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861  , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming  republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his  प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight remaining  स्लेव  states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर  territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a  सुलह , और दोनो पहलू prepared  for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and  none पहचाना the नई confederate  States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by  संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना  .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the  confederacy , bringing उनके कुल  to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and  स्थापित  a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into  मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट  at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the  emancipation  Proclamation , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and the Union at  vicksburg विभाजित  the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate incursion  north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant  कमांड of सब  Union armies in 1864 .
In the  पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन  drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and  जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और  could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court  हाउस  on April 9 , 1865 .
The American  सिविल युद्ध थी एक of  the earliest true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced  हथियार यहूद employed extensively  .
The  mobilization of civilian कारखानों  , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated  750,000 सैनिको और an  undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all  उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो  old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Norrie disease is a genetic disorder that primarily affects the eye and almost  सदा लीड to दृष्टिहीनता  .
In addition to the congenital ocular symptoms , some patients suffer from a progressive hearing loss starting mostly in their 2nd decade of  जीवन , जबकि another portion may be मानसिक  challenged .
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts , leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear white when light is  shone on उन्हें ) , साथ साथ अन्य developmental  issues in the eye , such as shrinking of the globe and the wasting away of the iris .
Around 30–50 % of them will also  have developmental डेलाy/ दिमागी retardation , psychotic-like सुविधाएँ  , incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities .
Most patients are born with normal hearing ; however , the onset of hearing  घाटा is बहुत  common in early adolescence .
About 15 % of the patients are  अनुमानित to develop सब  the features of the disease .
the बीमारी affects लगभग तभी  male infants at birth or soon after birth , because the disease is inherited X-linked recessive .
Only in very rare cases , females have been  diagnosed साथ norrie बीमारी as खूब  .
The exact incidence number  is अनजान  ; only a few hundred cases have been reported so far .
It is a very rare disorder that is not  संबद्ध  with any specific ethnic or racial groups .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by  दो or अधिक पार्टियों , प्रत्येक of जिसको intends to बनाएँ  one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity who  एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of दायित्व  . ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be done  in लिखने  , though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct .
The remedy for  उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can  be `` damages '' in the form of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction .
Both of these remedies  पुरस्कार the पार्टी at घाटा the  `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages , which are greater than mere reliance damages , as in promissory estoppel .
The parties may be natural  व्यक्तियों or juristic  persons .
A contract is a legally  enforceable वादा  or undertaking that something will or will not occur .
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract , although care is required as a promise may not have the full standing of a contract , as when it is an  अनुबंध बगैर  consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another , including differences in common law compared to civil law ,  the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि , विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in आम विधि देशों , और of विधि संहिताबद्ध  in regional legislation .
regarding ऑस्ट्रेलियाई अनुबंध विधि लिये उदाहरण , वहीँ हैं  40 relevant acts which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / national ) level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are  लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings , ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सम्मेलन on  Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
ASP.NET is a  server-side वेब अनुप्रयोग  framework designed for Web development to produce dynamic Web pages .
It was developed by  microsoft to allow प्रोग्रामर्स  to build dynamic web sites , web applications and web services .
It was first  released in जनवरी 2002  with version 1.0 of the .NET Framework , and is the successor to Microsoft 's Active Server Pages ( ASP ) technology .
ASP.NET is built on the Common Language Runtime ( CLR ) , allowing programmers  to लिखें asp.net  code using any supported .NET language .
The ASP.NET SOAP extension  फ्रेमवर्क allows  ASP.NET components to process SOAP messages .
Lysergic acid diethylamide , abbreviated  एलएसडी or lsd-25 , भी ज्ञात as lysergide ( इन ) और colloquially as एसिड , is a semisynthetic साइकेडेलिक ड्रग of the ergoline परिवार , खूब  known for its psychological effects which can include altered thinking processes , closed and open eye visuals , synesthesia , an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences , as well as for its key role in 1960s counterculture .
It is used mainly as an entheogen , recreational drug , and as an agent in  साइकेडेलिक चिकित्सा  .
LSD is  non-addictive , is  not known to cause brain damage , and has extremely low toxicity relative to dose .
However , adverse psychiatric reactions such as anxiety  , paranoia , और delusions  are possible .
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 from ergotamine , a chemical derived by Arthur Stoll from ergot  , a अनाज कवक कि typically grows on  rye .
The short form `` LSD '' comes from its early code name LSD-25 , which  is an संक्षिप्त लिये the जर्मनी `` lysergsäure-diethylamid  '' followed by a sequential number .
LSD is sensitive to oxygen , ultraviolet light , and chlorine ,  विशेषकर in समाधान , हालांकि  its potency may last for years if it is stored away from light and moisture at low temperature .
In pure form it is a colorless ,  गंधहीन , tasteless ठोस  .
LSD is typically delivered orally , usually on  a substrate ऐसे as absorbent  blotter paper , a sugar cube , or gelatin .
In its liquid form , it  can भी be administered  by intramuscular or intravenous injection .
LSD  is बहुत potent , साथ 20–30 μg  ( micrograms ) being the threshold dose .
New experiments with LSD  प्रारंभ in 2009 लिये the  first time in 40 years .
Introduced by Sandoz Laboratories , with trade-name Delysid , as a drug with various psychiatric uses in 1947 , LSD quickly became a  therapeutic एजेंट कि appeared  to show great promise .
In the  1950s , officials at the u.S. सेंट्रल प्रज्ञा एजेंसी ( सीआईए  ) thought the drug might be applicable to mind control and chemical warfare ; the agency 's MKULTRA research program propagated the drug among young servicemen and students .
The  subsequent recreational उपयोग  of the drug by youth culture in the Western world during the 1960s led to a political firestorm that resulted in its prohibition .
Currently , a number of organizations—including the Beckley Foundation , MAPS , Heffter Research Institute and the Albert Hofmann Foundation—exist to fund , encourage  और निर्देशांक शोध into the औषधीय  and spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics .
The United States Navy 's Sea , Air , Land Teams ,  commonly ज्ञात as the नेवी seals , हैं the u.S. नेवी 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन  force and a part of the Naval Special Warfare Command and United States Special Operations Command .
`` SEAL '' is always capitalized in reference to members  of the नवल खास warfare जातियाँ  .
The acronym is  निकला इससे उनके क्षमता  to operate at sea , in the air , and on land .
SEALs are male members of the  संयुक्त राज्य  Navy .
An exchange program with the Coast  गार्ड , जिससे  graduated three Coast Guardsmen as SEALs , was suspended in 2011 .
The CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities  प्रभाग ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन  Group ( SOG ) recruits operators from the SEAL Teams .
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA operations go back to the  famed macv-sog  during the Vietnam War .
This cooperation still exists today and is seen in the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan ,  और in the ढूंढना और हत्या  of Osama bin Laden in Pakistan .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections ( red  , नारंगी , ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक  estimates ( black ) .
Actual recorded  जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े  are in blue .
According to the highest  अनुमान , the संसार जनसांख्यिकी  may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is the total number of living humans on  धरती  .
As of today , it is estimated to number  अरब by the संयुक्त  States Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
The USCB  estimates कि  the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund , it reached this milestone on October 31 ,  2011  .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the  ब्लैक मौत in 1350 , जब it stood at  around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s , and  लिये a longer काल दौरान the  1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , and  था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 %  by 2011 .
Total annual births were  उच्चतम in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख  , and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million , while deaths number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ) ,  साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 और  10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term  estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास , stagnation , or  even overall decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth , citing  the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण , वैश्विक  food supplies , and energy resources .
Memphis is a city in the southwestern corner of the U.S. state of Tennessee , and the county seat of  शेल्बी काउंटी  .
The city is located on the 4th Chickasaw  bluff , दक्षिण of the  confluence of the Wolf and Mississippi rivers .
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the state of Tennessee , the largest city on the Mississippi River , the third  largest in the southeastern संयुक्त  States , and the 20th largest in the United States .
The  वृहद मेम्फिस महानगर क्षेत्रफल , सहित सटा  counties in Mississippi and Arkansas , had a 2010 population of 1,316,100 .
This makes Memphis the second largest metropolitan area in Tennessee , surpassed only by metropolitan  नैशविले , जिससे  has overtaken Memphis in recent years .
मेम्फिस is the  youngest of Tennessee 's major cities .
A resident of Memphis is referred to as a Memphian , and the Memphis region  is ज्ञात , विशेषकर to मीडिया  outlets , as `` Memphis & The Mid-South `` .
The Cattenom Nuclear  शक्ति संयंत्र  in France .
France produces around three  quarters of  its electricity by nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld  नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र  in Germany .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30 , 2011 , that Germany’s 17 nuclear  शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut bas by  2022 , in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68  रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण  in 15 countries .
Nuclear  शक्ति स्टेशन  operate in thirty countries .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year , although according to the World Nuclear Association , of the 17  civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to become operational between 2007 और 2009 , तभी  five actually came on stream .
As of June  2011 , जर्मनी और स्विट्ज़रलैंड  are phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 ,  देशों ऐसे as ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ऑस्ट्रिया , डेनमार्क  , Greece , Ireland , Italy , Latvia , Liechtenstein , Luxembourg , Malaysia , Malta , New Zealand , Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power .
skeletal  muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of  मांसपेशियां of  the human anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one  भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां  , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
nevertheless , the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल  to define because different sources group muscles differently , e.g . regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
Examples range  इससे 640 to  850 .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of  समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन  , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers to the action of each muscle from the standard  anatomical स्थिति  .
In other positions ,  अन्य  actions may be performed .

The Seminole Wars , also known as the Florida Wars , were three conflicts in Florida between the Seminole — the collective name  दिए to the amalgamation of विभिन्न समूह of देशी अमेरिकी और ब्लैक लोगों जो settled in फ्लोरिडा  in the early 18th century — and the United States Army .
The First Seminole War was from 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ) , the Second Seminole War from 1835 to  1842 , और the तीसरा seminole युद्ध इससे 1855  to 1858 .
The first conflict with the Seminoles  arose आउट of तनाव relating to  General Andrew Jackson 's attack and destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816 .
Jackson also attacked the Spanish at  pensacola  .
Ultimately , the Spanish Crown ceded the  उपनिवेश to संयुक्त  States rule .
Orono is a town in Penobscot County ,  maine , संयुक्त राज्य  .
It was  पहला settled in 1774 और  named in honor of Chief Joseph Orono of the Penobscot Nation .
It is home to The  विश्वविद्यालयों of maine  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 10,362 at the 2010 census .

Luxor Las Vegas is a hotel and casino on the Las Vegas Strip  in स्वर्ग , नेवाडा  .
The 30-story hotel , owned and operated by MGM Resorts  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  , has a casino with over 2,000 slot machines and 87 table games .
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation , it has a new , highly modernized , and contemporary design and contains a total of 4,400 rooms , including 442 suites , lining the interior walls of a pyramid  स्टाइल मीनार और भीतर जुड़वा 22-story ziggurat मीनारें कि यहूद  built as later additions .
The hotel is named  बाद the नगर of  Luxor ( ancient Thebes ) in Egypt .
Luxor is the second largest hotel in Las Vegas ( the largest being the MGM Grand ) and  the आठवीं largest  in the world .
As of 2010 , the Luxor has a 4 Key rating from the Green Key  eco-rating कार्यक्रम , जिससे evaluates `` चिरस्थायी  '' hotel operations .
A pilot experiment , also called a pilot study , is a small scale preliminary study  conducted in अनुक्रम to evaluate feasibility , समय , लागत , प्रतिकूल कार्यक्रम , और प्रभाव  size ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project .
Pilot  अध्ययन , इसलिए  , may not be appropriate for case studies .
The Los Angeles Fire Department ( LAFD ) is the agency  कि provides आग सुरक्षा और आपात चिकित्सा सेवाएं  for the city of Los Angeles .
It may be unofficially referred to  as the लॉस एंजिल्स नगर आग विभाग  to distinguish it from the Los Angeles County Fire Department .
The  एकड़ is a ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल  used in the imperial and U.S. customary systems .
An acre  is परिचय 40 % of a  hectare – slightly smaller than an American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the  संयुक्त राज्य , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , बर्मा और the संयुक्त किंगडम (  as of 2010 , the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom , though is still used in real estate descriptions ) .
It is still used  , to कुछ extent  , in Canada .
The international  प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac , और is पारिभाषित  as 1/640 of a square mile .
The most  commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज  is the international acre .
In the United States both  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the थोड़ा अलग  US survey acre are in use .
The most common use of the acre  is to माप  tracts of land .
One international  एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224  square metres .
During  the मध्य  Ages , an acre was the amount of land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen .
