Language processing refers to the way human beings use words to communicate ideas and  जज्बात , और कैसा ऐसे संचार हैं processed  and understood .
Thus it is how the brain creates and understands  भाषा  .
Most recent theories consider that this process is carried out entirely  by और अंदर  the brain .
This is considered one of the most characteristic  abilities of  the human species - perhaps the most characteristic .
However very little is known about it  और वहीँ is विशाल पैमाना लिये  research on it .
Most of the knowledge acquired to date on the subject has come from patients who  have suffered कुछ प्रकार of significant सिर चोट , whether बाह्य ( wounds , बुलेट ) or  internal ( strokes , tumors , degenerative diseases ) .
Studies have shown that most of the language processing functions are  carried आउट in the दिमागी  cortex .
The essential function of the  cortical  language areas is symbolic representation .
Even though language exists in different forms , all of them  हैं आधारित on सांकेतिक  representation .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a  mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car , designed और  developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super Sport  संस्करण of the veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal  production car in the world , with a top speed of .
The original  संस्करण रै a  top speed of .
It was named Car  of the दशक ( 2000–2009  ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best  car चलित सब साल पुरस्कार  in 2005 .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti set the record  लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the  world with the Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse , reaching on average a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss , and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of  volkswagen , साथ  much of the engineering work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A  क्रमांक of खास  variants have been produced .
In December 2010 , Bugatti began offering prospective buyers the  क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स  colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website .
DVD is an optical disc storage format , invented and developed by Philips , Sony  , तोशिबा , और पैनासोनिक  in 1995 .
DVDs offer  उच्चतर भंडार क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट  discs while having the same dimensions .
Pre-recorded DVDs are  mass-produced using सांचा मशीने कि  physically stamp data onto the DVD .
Such discs are known as DVD-  rom , क्युकी  data can only be read and not written nor erased .
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a DVD recorder and then function as a DVD-ROM . Rewritable DVDs (  dvd-rw , dvd+rw , और dvd-ram  ) can be recorded and erased multiple times .
DVDs are used in DVD-Video consumer digital video format and in DVD-Audio consumer  डिजिटल ऑडियो  format , as well as for authoring AVCHD discs .
DVDs containing other types of  सूचना may be referred  to as DVD data discs .
What Chilli Wants is an  अमरीकी वास्तविकता श्रेणी on vh1 अभिनीत  Chilli , one-third of the Grammy Award -winning R & B trio TLC .
The show  क्रॉनिकल्स chilli 's क्वेस्ट to  find love with the help of Tionna T. Smalls , an author and relationship coach .
The  श्रेणी premiered on अप्रैल 11 ,  2010 , and has since been renewed for a second season .
The second season premiered on  संडे , जनवरी 2  , 2011 .
Peter Gene Hernandez ( born October 8  , 1985 ) , ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम ब्रूनो मंगल , is  an American singer-songwriter and record producer .
Raised in Honolulu , Hawaii , by a family of musicians , Mars began making music at a young age and performed in various  musical venues in उसके गृहनगर throughout  his childhood .
He graduated from high school  और तब स्थानांतरित to  Los Angeles , California , to pursue a musical career .
Mars produced songs for other artists , joining  उत्पादन टोली  The Smeezingtons .
Mars  था an unsuccessful  stint with Motown Records , but then signed with Atlantic in 2009 .
He became  पहचाना as a सोलो कलाकार बाद lending उसके vocals और co-writing the hooks  for the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B , and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy .
He also co-wrote the hits `` Right Round `` by Flo Rida featuring Ke $ ha , and `` Wavin '  ध्वज `` by k'naan  .
In October 2010 ,  he released उसके डेब्यू  album , Doo-Wops & Hooligans .
Anchored by the worldwide  number-one singles `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं `` और `` ग्रेनेड `` , the एल्बम  peaked at number three on the Billboard 200 .
Mars was nominated for seven Grammys at  the 53rd ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  , winning Best Male Pop Vocal Performance for `` Just the Way You Are '' .
His second studio album , Unorthodox Jukebox , was released  on दिसम्बर 11 , 2012 .
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide variety of styles and  प्रभाव , और contains तत्व  of many musical genres .
He has worked with an  assortment of कलाकारों  from various genres .
As a child , he was highly  बहकावे by कलाकारों ऐसे as छोटी रिचर्ड , एल्विस प्रेस्ली  and Michael Jackson and would often impersonate these artists from a young age .
Mars also incorporates  रेगी - और motown -inspired  sounds into his work .
Worldwide , Mars became  the best-selling  digital artist in 2011 .
He had three singles in the  शीर्ष टेन , सहित पहला प्लेस साथ  `` Just the Way You Are '' , which sold 12.5 million copies .
Mars won Best International  पुरूष सोलो  Artist at the 2012 BRIT Awards .
Bruno Mars has sold 6 million albums and 40 million singles  विश्वव्यापी as a सिंगर  .
althought  as a song-writer , producer and singer his total single download sales surpass 100 million worldwide .
Bust of Zeus , Otricoli ( Sala Rotonda ,  museo pio-clementino  , Vatican ) .
Greek mythology is the body of myths and teachings that belong to the ancient Greeks , concerning  उनके देवताओं और नायक , the प्रकृति of the संसार  , and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices .
It was a part of the religion in ancient Greece and is part of religion in modern  यूनानियों और around the  world , known as Hellenismos .
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious and political institutions of  प्राचीन यूनानियों और इसके सभ्यता , और to लाभ समझना  of the nature of myth-making itself .
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives , and implicitly in  यूनानी representational कला , ऐसे as  vase-paintings and votive gifts .
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of  the संसार  , and details the lives and adventures of a wide variety of gods , goddesses , heroes , heroines , and mythological creatures .
These accounts initially  यहूद disseminated in an oral-poetic  tradition ; today the Greek myths are known primarily from Greek literature .
The oldest known Greek literary  स्त्रोत , होमर 's एपिक कविताएं इलियड और ओडिसी  , focus on events surrounding the Trojan War .
Two poems by Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod , the Theogony and the Works and Days , contain accounts of the genesis of the world , the succession of divine rulers , the  उत्तराधिकार of इंसान आयु , the उत्पत्ति  of human woes , and the origin of sacrificial practices .
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns , in fragments of epic poems of the Epic Cycle , in lyric poems , in the works of the  tragedians of the पांचवां सदी bc , in कृतियाँ  of scholars and poets of the Hellenistic Age , and in texts from the time of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias .
Archaeological findings  provide a प्रिंसिपल सोर्स of विवरण परिचय  Greek mythology , with gods and heroes featured prominently in the decoration of many artifacts .
Geometric designs on pottery of the eighth  सदी bc depict दृश्यों इससे  the Trojan cycle as well as the adventures of Heracles .
In the succeeding Archaic , Classical , and Hellenistic periods , Homeric and various other mythological scenes appear , supplementing the  मौजूदा  literary evidence .
यूनानी mythology रै था an extensive influence  on the culture , arts , and literature of Western civilization and remains part of Western heritage and language .
Poets and artists from ancient times to the present have derived inspiration from Greek mythology and have discovered  समकालीन significance और  relevance in the themes .
Mouth  & macneal  in 1971
Mouth &  macneal थी  a pop duo from the Netherlands .
They are best known for  उनके लाख selling रिकॉर्डिंग of `` कैसा do  You Do `` .
The Boise State Broncos football program represents Boise  राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों  in college football and compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ) of Division I as a member of the Mountain West Conference .
They are currently led by head  कोच क्रिस petersen और खेल उनके  home games at Bronco Stadium .
The franc ( sign : Fr . or SFr . ; German : Franken , French and Romansh : franc , Italian : franco ;  कोड : chf ) is the करेंसी और विधिक टेंडर of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein  ; it is also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione d'Italia .
Although not formally legal tender in the German exclave  büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक करेंसी is the यूरोपियन  ) , it is in wide daily use there .
The Swiss National Bank issues banknotes and the federal mint  swissmint मुद्दे  coins .
The Swiss  फ़्रैंक is the तभी संस्करण  of the franc still issued in Europe .
The smaller denomination , a hundredth of a franc , is a Rappen ( Rp . ) in German , centime ( c. ) in French , centesimo (  ct. ) in इतालवी , और रैप  ( rp . ) in Romansh .
The ISO code of  the करेंसी प्रयुक्त by बैंको और  financial institutions is CHF , although `` Fr . '' is used by most businesses and advertisers ; some use SFr . ; the Latinate `` CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica .
Given the different languages used in Switzerland , Latin is used for  language-neutral inscriptions  on the coins .
Sir Charles Spencer `` Charlie  '' चैपलिन , ( 16 अप्रैल 188925 दिसम्बर  1977 ) was a British comic actor and filmmaker who rose to fame in the silent era .
Chaplin became a worldwide icon through his  स्क्रीन persona `` the ट्रैम्प  `` and is considered one of the most important figures of the film industry .
His career spanned more than 75 years , from a child in the Victorian  era to बंद to उसके मौत at the आयु of 88 , और  encompassed both adulation and controversy .
उठाया in लंदन  , Chaplin 's childhood was defined by poverty and hardship .
He was sent to  a workhouse twice पहले  the age of nine ; his father was absent , and his mother was committed to a mental asylum .
Chaplin began performing from a young  आयु , touring म्यूज़िक  halls and later working as a stage actor and comedian .
At 19  he थी हस्ताक्षरित to the  prestigious Fred Karno company , which took him to America .
चैपलिन थी scouted by the फिल्मी  industry , and made his first appearances in 1914 with Keystone Studios .
He soon developed the  ट्रैम्प persona और  formed a large fan base .
Chaplin directed his films from an early stage , and continued to hone his craft as he moved to the Essanay ,  परस्पर , और पहला नेशनल corporations  .
By 1918 , he was one of the most famous  मेन in the संसार  .
In 1919 , Chaplin  co-founded the वितरण  company United Artists , giving him complete control over his films .
His first feature-length picture was The Kid ( 1921  ) , followed by a स्त्री of पेरिस ( 1923 ) , the सुनहरा फटाफट  ( 1925 ) , and The Circus ( 1928 ) .
He refused to move to sound films in the 1930s ,  बजाय producing नगर लाइट्स  ( 1931 ) and Modern Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue .
Chaplin became increasingly political and his next film ,  the ग्रेट तानाशाह ( 1940 ) ,  satirised Adolf Hitler .
The 1940s was a decade  चिह्नित साथ विवाद लिये  Chaplin , and his popularity declined rapidly .
He was  अभियुक्त of कम्युनिस्ट sympathies , जबकि  his involvement in a paternity suit and marriages to much younger women were considered scandalous .
An FBI  छानबीन थी  opened on Chaplin , and he was eventually forced to leave the United States and settle in Switzerland .
He abandoned the Tramp for his  बाद films , जिससे शामिल monsieur verdoux  ( 1947 ) , Limelight ( 1952 ) , A King in New York ( 1957 ) , and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ) .
Chaplin wrote ,  निर्देशित , उत्पादित , संपादित  , scored , and starred in most of his films .
He was a perfectionist , and his financial  स्वतंत्रता meant  he often spent years on the development and production of a picture .
His films are characterised by slapstick combined with pathos , and  प्रायः विशेषता the  Tramp struggling against adversity .
Many contain social and political  विषयवस्तु , as खूब as autobiographical तत्व  .
In 1972 , as part of a  नवीनीकृत सराहना  for his work , Chaplin received an Honorary Academy Award for `` the incalculable effect he has had in making motion pictures the art form of this century '' .
He continues to be held in high regard , with The Gold  फटाफट , नगर  Lights , Modern Times , and The Great Dictator often ranked among the greatest films of all time .
नियोजित parenthood संघ of  America ( PPFA ) , commonly shortened to Planned Parenthood , is the U.S. affiliate of the International Planned Parenthood Federation ( IPPF ) and one of its larger members .
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing reproductive health and maternal and  चाइल्ड स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं  .
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund , Inc. ( PPAF ) is a related organization which lobbies  लिये pro-choice विधान  , comprehensive sex education , and access to affordable health care in the United States .
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive  स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं , सहित कर्कट स्क्रीनिंग , hiv स्क्रीनिंग  and counseling , contraception , and abortion .
Contraception accounts for 35 % of PPFA 's total services and abortions account for 3 % ;  ppfa conducts roughly  300,000 abortions each year , among 3 million people served .
The  संगठन रै इसके जड़ें  in Brooklyn , New York , where Margaret Sanger opened the country 's first birth-control clinic .
Sanger founded the American Birth Control League in 1921 , which in 1942 became part of the Planned Parenthood  संघ of अमेरिका .
Since then ,  नियोजित parenthood रै grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक  locations in the U.S. , with a total budget of US $ 1 billion .
PPFA provides  an सरणी of सेवाएं to over तीन लाख लोगों  in the United States , and supports services for over one million clients outside the United States .
Mens rea is Latin  लिये  `` guilty mind '' .
in दण्ड  law , it is viewed as one of the necessary elements of some crimes .
The standard common  विधि परीक्षण of दण्ड देयता is प्रायः expressed in the  Latin phrase , actus non facit reum nisi mens sit rea , which means `` the act is not culpable unless the mind is guilty '' .
Thus , in jurisdictions with due process , there must  be an actus reus , or `` अपराधी अधिनियम , '' accompanied  by some level of mens rea to constitute the crime with which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ) .
As a general rule , criminal liability does  नहीं संलग्न to a व्यक्ति जो acted  with the absence of mental fault .
The  एक्सेप्शन  is strict liability crimes .
In civil law , it is usually not necessary to prove a subjective  दिमागी तत्व to स्थापित  liability for breach of contract or tort , for example .
However , if a tort is intentionally committed or a  अनुबंध is intentionally breached , ऐसे intent may बढ़ाएँ  the scope of liability as well as the measure of damages payable to the plaintiff .
Therefore , mens rea refers to the mental element of the offence that  accompanies the actus reus .
In some jurisdictions , the terms mens rea and  actus reus have महरूम replaced by वैकल्पिक  terminology .
In Australia , for example , the elements of the federal offences are now designated as `` fault elements '' or `` mental  तत्व '' ( पुरुषों rea ) और `` शारीरिक तत्व '' or `` बाह्य तत्व  '' ( actus reus ) .
This terminology was adopted to replace  the अस्पष्टता of the लैटिन शर्तें  with simple and accurate phrasing .
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27 , 1822 – July 23 , 1885 ) was the 18th President of the United States ( 1869–1877 ) following his highly successful role as a war  सामान्य in the दूसरी हाफ of the  Civil War .
Under Grant , the Union Army defeated the Confederate military ; having effectively ended the  युद्ध और secession साथ the आत्मसमर्पण of रॉबर्ट E.  Lee 's army at Appomattox .
As president he led the Radical  republicans in उनके  effort to eliminate all vestiges of Confederate nationalism and slavery .
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the South and having  desired to protect अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी नागरिकता  , President Grant effectively destroyed the Ku Klux Klan in 1871 .
Grant was the first President to establish Civil Service reform  having निर्मित a two-year  federally funded Civil Service Commission in 1871 .
In terms  of विदेशी नीति , ग्रान्ट नाज़िल an `` अनपेक्षित क्षमता  for deliberation and consultation '' that promoted the national interest .
His reputation was marred by his repeated defense of corrupt appointees , and by America 's first  औद्योगिक आयु आर्थिक  depression ( called the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) that dominated his second term .
Although his Republican Party split in 1872 with reformers denouncing him ,  ग्रान्ट थी easily reelected  .
By 1875 the conservative white Southern opposition regained control of every state in the South and as  he बाएँ the श्वेत हाउस in कूच 1877 उसके नीतियों यहूद होने undone  .
A career soldier , he graduated from the United States Military Academy at West Point and served in the  mexican–american युद्ध  .
When the Civil War began in 1861 , Grant  प्रशिक्षित संघ स्वयंसेवी  regiments in Illinois .
In 1862 , as a general he fought  a श्रेणी of लड़ाइयों और थी प्रचारित to प्रमुख सामान्य  after forcing the surrender of a large Confederate army and gaining control of Kentucky and most of Tennessee .
He then led Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh , earning a  प्रतिष्ठा as an आक्रामक कमांडर  .
In July 1863  , बाद a long , जटिल अभियान , ग्रान्ट पराजित  five uncoordinated Confederate armies ( capturing one of them ) and seized Vicksburg .
This famous victory gave the Union full control of  the मिसिसिपी नदी , विभाजित बंद the  western Confederacy , and opened the way for more Union triumphs .
After another win at the Battle of Chattanooga in late 1863 , President  अब्राहम lincoln बना उसे लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य  and commander of all of the Union Armies .
As commanding general of the army ,  ग्रान्ट confronted रॉबर्ट E. ली in a श्रेणी of बहुत खूनी  battles in 1864 known as the Overland Campaign that ended with the bottling up of Lee at Petersburg , outside the Confederate capital of Richmond .
During the siege , Grant coordinated a series of devastating campaigns  शुभारम्भ by विलियम tecumseh शरमन , फिलिप sheridan , और जार्ज थामस  .
Finally  तोड़कर through ली 's trenches  , the Union Army captured Richmond in April 1865 .
Lee surrendered his depleted forces to Grant at Appomattox as  the confederacy collapsed  .
Although pro-Confederate historians attacked  ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर कसाई  who won by brute force , most historians have hailed his military genius .
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President  stabilized the स्वदेश बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध  and during the turbulent Reconstruction period that followed .
As president , he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws and  लड़ ku klux क्लान हिंसा  .
Grant won passage of the Fifteenth Amendment ; giving constitutional protection for  african-american मतदान अधिकारों  .
He used the army to build the Republican Party in the South , based on black voters , Northern newcomers ( `` Carpetbaggers `` )  और देशी श्वेत समर्थक ( `` scalawags .  '' )
As a result , African Americans were represented in the U.S. Congress for the first time in  अमरीकी इतिहास in  1870 .
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by  having टूटा  the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress , the creation of the Board of Indian Commissioners to make reform recommendations , and his enlistment of Quaker Protestants who controlled mid western Indian agencies , that effectively curbed Congressional patronage .
Grant remained determined in keeping Indians from being exterminated from white settler  अतिक्रमण or by  the U.S. military .
Grant 's reputation as president by 1875 was at an all-time high for his previous  वीटो of the महंगाई विधेयक , the ड्योढ़ी of the resumption of specie अधिनियम , और सचिव  Bristow 's successful raids that shut down the Whiskey Ring .
Grant 's foreign policy , led by Secretary of State Hamilton Fish ,  implemented अंतरराष्ट्रीय मध्यस्थता , settled  the Alabama Claims with Britain and avoided war with Spain over the Virginius Affair .
A jukebox is a partially automated music-playing device , usually a coin-operated machine , that will play a patron 's  चयन इससे self-contained मीडिया  .
The classic jukebox has buttons with letters and numbers on them that , when  डाला in संयोजन , हैं प्रयुक्त to  play a specific selection .
A drug test is a technical analysis of a  biological नमूना – लिये उदाहरण मूत्र ,  hair , blood , sweat , or oral fluid / saliva – to determine the presence or absence of specified parent drugs or their metabolites .
Major uses of drug testing are to  detect  the presence of performance enhancing steroids in sport or for drugs prohibited by laws , such as cannabis , cocaine and heroin .

amphetamines (  including Methamphetamine )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids  ( THC )
कोका
methadone
methaqualone
Opiates ( Codeine , Morphine , Heroin , Oxycodone ,  hydrocodone  , etc . )
phencyclidine ( pcp  )
propoxyphene
Saturn V rocket , used for the American manned lunar  लैंडिंग मिशन
Space exploration is the discovery and exploration of outer  स्पेस by अर्थात्  of space technology .
Physical exploration of space is conducted both by human  spaceflights और by रोबोटिक  spacecraft .
While  the अवलोकन of वस्तुएँ  in space , known as astronomy , predates reliable recorded history , it was the development of large and relatively efficient rockets during the early 20th century that allowed physical space exploration to become a reality .
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing scientific  शोध , uniting अलग राष्ट्र , ensuring  the future survival of humanity and developing military and strategic advantages against other countries .
विभिन्न आलोचनाओं  of space exploration are sometimes made .
Space exploration has often been  प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी प्रतियोगिता  for geopolitical rivalries such as the Cold War .
The early era of space exploration was driven by a `` Space Race `` between the Soviet Union and the United States , the launch of the first man-made object to orbit the Earth , the USSR 's Sputnik 1 , on 4  अक्तूबर 1957 , और the पहला चंद्रमा लैंडिंग by the अमरीकी अपोलो 11 शिल्प on 20 जुलाई 1969 हैं प्रायः लिया as the सीमाएँ लिये इस आरंभिक  period .
The Soviet space program achieved many of the first milestones , including the first living being in orbit in 1957 , the first human spaceflight ( Yuri Gagarin aboard Vostok 1 ) in 1961 , the first spacewalk ( by  aleksei leonov ) on 18 कूच 1965 , the पहला स्वचालित लैंडिंग on another celestial  body in 1966 , and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971 .
After the first 20 years of exploration , focus shifted from one-off flights to renewable hardware , such as  the स्पेस शटल कार्यक्रम , और इससे प्रतियोगिता to सहयोग  as with the International Space Station ( ISS ) .
With the substantial completion of the ISS following STS-133 in March 2011 ,  योजनाएँ लिये स्पेस खोजी  by the USA remain in flux .
Constellation , a Bush Administration program for a return to the Moon  by 2020 थी judged  inadequately funded and unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009 .
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to focus on the development of the  काबिलियत लिये crewed मिशन परे कम धरती कक्षा ( leo ) , envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the iss परे 2020 , transferring the विकास of लॉन्च  vehicles for human crews from NASA to the private sector , and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO , such as Earth/Moon L1 , the Moon , Earth/Sun L2 , near-earth asteroids , and Phobos or Mars orbit .
As of March 2011 , the US Senate  और हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  are still working towards a compromise NASA funding bill , which will probably terminate Constellation and fund development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV ) .
In  the 2000s , the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of  China initiated a successful manned spaceflight program , while the European Union , Japan , and India have also planned future manned space missions .
China ,  रूस , जापानी , और इण्डिया have advocated मानवयुक्त  missions to the Moon during the 21st century , while the European Union has advocated manned missions to both the Moon and Mars during the 21st century .
From the 1990s onwards ,  निजी रूचि began promoting स्पेस पर्यटन और तब  private space exploration of the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize ) .
John Calvin Coolidge , Jr. ( July 4 ,  1872january 5  , 1933 ) was the 30th President of the United States ( 1923–1929 ) .
A Republican lawyer from Vermont ,  कूलिज worked उसके रास्ता up the सीढ़ियाँ of मैसाचुसेट्स  state politics , eventually becoming governor of that state .
His conduct during the Boston Police Strike of 1919 thrust  उसे into the नेशनल स्पॉटलाइट और दिया  him a reputation as a man of decisive action .
Soon after , he was elected as the 29th Vice President in 1920 and succeeded to the Presidency upon the  अचानक मौत of वारेन G. हार्डिंग in  1923 .
Elected in his own  सही in 1924 , he gained  a reputation as a small-government conservative , and also as a man who said very little .
Coolidge restored public  विश्वास in the श्वेत हाउस बाद the  scandals of his predecessor 's administration , and left office with considerable popularity .
As a Coolidge biographer put it , `` He embodied the  स्पिरिट और उम्मीदें of the मध्य  class , could interpret their longings and express their opinions .
That he did represent the genius of the average is the most convincing  प्रमाण of उसके शक्ति  . ''
Some later criticized Coolidge  as भाग of a सामान्य आलोचना of  laissez-faire government .
His reputation underwent a renaissance during the Ronald Reagan Administration , but the  परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी is स्टिल विभाजित between those जो स्वीकृति of  his reduction of the size of government programs and those who believe the federal government should be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy .
Espresso is a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water  अंतर्गत दबाव through finely मैदान  coffee beans .
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than  कॉफी brewed by अन्य विधि , a उच्चतर  concentration of suspended and dissolved solids , and crema ( meaning cream , but being a reference to the foam with a creamy texture that forms as a result of the pressure ) .
As a result of the pressurized brewing process the flavors and chemicals  in a ठेठ  cup of espresso are very concentrated .
Espresso is the base for other drinks , such as a latte ,  कापुचीनो  , macchiato , mocha , or americano .
Espresso has more caffeine per unit volume than most beverages , but the usual serving size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of espresso has 80 to 150 mg of caffeine , little  less  than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee .
Brian Keith Kelly (  born अक्तूबर 25 , 1961 ) is an अमरीकी  football coach and former player .
He is currently the head football coach for the Notre Dame Fighting Irish , a  स्थिति he रै  held since December 2009 .
Kelly was  previously सिर कोच at ग्रैंड घाटी  State University ( 1991–2003 ) , Central Michigan University ( 2004–2006 ) , and University of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ) .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by   two or more parties , each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and  `` स्वीकृति '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों  '' having legal capacity who exchange `` consideration '' to create `` mutuality of obligation . ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may  be किया in लिखने , हालांकि  contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct .
The remedy for  उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति ''  in the form of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction .
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the ``  लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or अपेक्षा क्षतिपूर्ति , जिससे  are greater than mere reliance damages , as in promissory estoppel .
The parties may be natural persons or  juristic व्यक्तियों  .
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking that something will or   will not occur .
The word promise  can be प्रयुक्त as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध  , although care is required as a promise may not have the full standing of a contract , as when it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another , including differences in common law compared to civil law , the impact of received  विधि , विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in आम विधि  countries , and of law codified in regional legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example , there are 40 relevant acts which impact on the  निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल )  level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable  लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings , ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सम्मेलन on अनुबंध  for the International Sale of Goods .
Sidney Patrick Crosby , ONS ( born August 7 , 1987 ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player who is  कप्तान of the पिट्सबर्ग penguins  of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Crosby was  drafted पहला overall  by the Penguins out of the Quebec Major Junior Hockey League ( QMJHL ) .
During his two-year major junior career with the Rimouski Océanic , he earned back-to-back  chl खिलाड़ी of the साल पुरस्कार और led  his club to the 2005 Memorial Cup final .
Nicknamed `` The Next One `` , he was one of the most highly regarded draft  चयन in हॉकी इतिहास , अग्रणी अनेक to refer  to the 2005 Draft Lottery as the `` Sidney Crosby Sweepstakes '' .
In his first NHL season , Crosby finished sixth in league  स्कोरिंग साथ 102 अंक ( 39 लक्ष्य ,  63 assists ) and was a runner-up for the Calder Memorial Trophy ( won by Alexander Ovechkin ) .
By his second season , he led the NHL with 120 points (  36 लक्ष्य , 84 assists ) to कैप्चर  the Art Ross Trophy , becoming the youngest player and the only teenager to win a scoring title in any major North American sports league .
That same season , Crosby also won the Hart Memorial Trophy as the Professional Hockey  लेखक संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी और the लेस्टर B. पियर्सन पुरस्कार as the एनएचएल खिलाड़ी संघ 's चुनाव  for most outstanding player , becoming the seventh player in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year .
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the team 's captaincy and subsequently led them to the 2008  स्टेनली कप फाइनल , जहाँ वे यहूद पराजित by the डेट्रॉयट  Red Wings in six games .
The  penguins लौटे to the फाइनल विरूद्ध डेट्रॉयट  the following year and won in seven games ; Crosby became the youngest captain in NHL history to win the Stanley Cup .
In  the 2009–10 ऋतु  , Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals , tying him with Steven Stamkos for the Rocket Richard Trophy as the league-leader ; with 58 assists , he totaled 109 points , second in the NHL .
During  the off-season , crosby  received the Mark Messier Leadership Award .
In 2010–11 ,  crosby sustained a concussion as a  result of hits to the head in back-to-back games .
The injury  बाएँ उसे sidelined  for ten and a half months .
However , after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season , Crosby 's concussion-like symptoms returned in December 2011  , और he किया नहीं वापसी  until mid-March 2012 .
Internationally , Crosby has represented Canada in numerous  tournaments लिये the देश  's junior and men 's teams .
After competing in the 2003 U-18 Junior World Cup , he represented Canada in back-to-back  iihf संसार u20 championships , जीतना चांदी in 2004 और सुनहरा  in 2005 .
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship , he led the  टूर्नामेंट in स्कोरिंग , जबकि भी कमाई  Top Forward and All-Star Team honours .
Four years later ,  crosby थी नामित to टोली कनाडा  for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver .
Playing the United States in the gold  पदक खेल , he  scored the game-winning goal in overtime .
A United States cent , also  ज्ञात as a पैनी  .
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version `` put my  दो सेंट in '' is an संयुक्त  States ( US ) idiomatic expression , taken from the original English idiom expression : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth . ''
It is used to preface the tentative stating of  one’s राय  .
By deprecating the  राय to follow – suggesting इसके मान is तभी दो सेंट , a बहुत  small amount – the user of the phrase hopes to lessen the impact of a possibly statement , showing politeness and humility .
However , it is also sometimes used with  विडंबना जब expressing a strongly  felt opinion .
the phrase is  also used out of habit to preface uncontentious opinions .

The Chinese Civil War was a civil war in China   fought between forces loyal to the government of the Republic of China led by the Kuomintang ( KMT ) and forces of the Communist Party of China ( CPC ) .
The war began in  अप्रैल 1927 , amidst the  Northern Expedition , and essentially ended when major active battles ceased in 1950 .
The conflict eventually resulted in two de facto states , the Republic of China ( ROC )  in ताईवान और the  People 's Republic of China ( PRC ) in mainland China , both claiming to be the legitimate government of China .
The war  represented an वैचारिक विभाजित ( बाएँ  vs . Right ) between the Communist CPC , and the KMT 's brand of Nationalism .
The civil war continued intermittently  जबतक लेट 1937 , जब  the two parties formed a Second United Front to counter a Japanese invasion .
China 's  full-scale सिविल  war resumed in 1946 , a year after the end of hostilities with Japan .
After four more years , 1950 saw the cessation of major military hostilities—with the newly founded People 's Republic of China controlling mainland China ( including Hainan ) , and the Republic of  चीन 's क्षेत्राधिकार होने प्रतिबंधित  to Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy , Matsu and several outlying islands .
The  kuomintang शिकस्त is attributed to अनेक कारकों :  Corruption - Chiang wrote in his diary on June 1948 that the KMT had failed , not because of external enemies but because of rot from within .
Strong  आरंभिक support इससे  the U.S. diminished , and then , stopped .
( Partly because of KMT corruption and anti-democratic regime , and partly because of the uncertain U.S.  विदेशी नीति towards साम्यवादी between 1945 और 1950  ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords .
This ensured  pla लोकप्रिय  support .
After the surrender of Japan at the end of World War II , Soviet forces turned over their  captured जापानी हथियार to the cpc और अनुमत the cpc to लो कंट्रोल of territory  in Manchuria .
To this day , no armistice or peace treaty has  कभी महरूम हस्ताक्षरित , और it is debated  as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended .
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by military threats and political and economic pressure , particularly  over ताईवान 's राजनैतिक औकात , साथ दोनो  governments officially adhering to a `` One-China policy . ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan  as भाग of इसके territory और continues to threaten  the ROC with a military invasion if the ROC officially declares independence by changing its name to and gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan .
The ROC  mutually दावा मेनलैंड  China , and they both continue the fight over diplomatic recognition .
Today , the war as such occurs  on the राजनैतिक और आर्थिक  fronts in the form of cross-Strait relations ; however , the two separate de facto states have close economic ties .
The One Hundred Twelfth United States Congress was the meeting of the  विधान शाखा of the संयुक्त राज्य  federal government , from January 3 , 2011 until January 3 , 2013 .
It convened in  वॉशिंगटन , d.C. on जनवरी 3 , 2011 ,  and ended on January 3 , 2013 , 17 days before the end of the presidential term to which Barack Obama was elected in 2008 .
Senators elected to regular terms in 2006 completed those  शर्तें in इस कॉंग्रेस  .
This Congress included the last House of Representatives elected from congressional districts that were  apportioned आधारित on the 2000  census .
In  the 2010 मध्यावधि चुनावों  , the Republican Party won the majority in the House of Representatives .
While the Democrats kept their Senate majority , it was reduced from  the पिछला कॉंग्रेस  .
This was the first  कॉंग्रेस in जिससे the हाउस और सीनेट यहूद नियंत्रित by अलग  parties since the 107th Congress ( 2001–2003 ) , and the first Congress to begin that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ) .
In this Congress , the House  of प्रतिनिधि था the largest क्रमांक  of Republican members , 242 , since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ) .
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in which no member of the Kennedy family served , as well as the most politically polarized  कॉंग्रेस चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण , साथ रिकार्ड  low approval ratings .
Wealth in the United States is commonly measured in terms of net worth , which is the sum of all assets ,  सहित घर इक्विटी , ऋण सब देनदारी  .
The  कुल जाल लायक of us households और nonprofit  organizations 1945–2009 , unadjusted for inflation or population change .
For example , a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house , $ 5,000 in mutual  निधि  , $ 30,000 in cars , $ 20,000 worth of stock in their own company , and a $ 45,000 IRA would have assets totaling $ 900,000 .
Assuming that this household would have a $  250,000 बंधक , $ 40,000 in car लोन , और $ 10,000  in credit card debt , its debts would total $ 300,000 .
Subtracting the debts from the worth of this household 's assets ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ) , this household would have a net  लायक of $ 600,000 .
Net worth can vary  साथ fluctuations  in value of the underlying assets .
The wealth —more specifically , the median net worth—of  households in the संयुक्त  States is varied with relation to race , education , geographic location and gender .
As one would expect , households with greater income feature the highest net worths , though high income can not  be लिया as an सदा  accurate indicator of net worth .
Overall the number of wealthier households  is on the वृद्धि  , with baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers .
In addition , wealth is unevenly distributed , with the wealthiest 25 % of US households owning 87 % of the wealth in the United States , which was $ 54.2  खरब in  2009 .
Including human capital such as skills , the United Nations  अनुमानित the कुल माल of the संयुक्त  States in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion .
This article deals with  चयनात्मक पृष्ठीय rhizotomy ( sdr ) बल्कि than the rhizotomy प्रक्रियाओं लिये पीड़ा राहत ; लिये those प्रक्रियाओं ,  which have begun to take the name `` rhizotomy '' in certain instances , see facet rhizotomy and similar .
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in the spinal cord  , सबसे प्रायः to relieve the लक्षण  of neuromuscular conditions such as spastic diplegia and other forms of spastic cerebral palsy .
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has been the main use of rhizotomy for neurosurgeons specialising in spastic  cp चूंकि the 1980s ; in इस सर्जरी , the spasticity-causing nerves  are isolated and then targeted and destroyed .
The sensory nerve roots , where spasticity is located , are first separated from the motor ones , and the nerve fibres to be  काटें हैं तब पहचाना  via electromyographic stimulation .
The ones producing spasticity are then selectively  lesioned साथ छोटा  electrical pulses .
In spasticity , rhizotomy precisely targets and destroys the damaged  nerves कि don’t प्राप्त गामा अमीनो butyric एसिड , जिससे is  the core problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy .
These over-firing , non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity during the EMG testing phase in SDR and are thus considered to be the source of the patient 's hypertonia ; they are eliminated  साथ the विद्युत pulses एकबार पहचाना , जबकि the  remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched .
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved , and that this is done without affecting nervous system sensitivity or function in other areas , because the  तभी nerves नष्ट हैं the over-firing ones जिम्मेदार  for the muscle tightness .
The  शर्तें rhizotomy और neurotomy  are also increasingly becoming interchangeable in the treatment of chronic back pain from degenerative disc disease .
इस is a कार्यविधि पुकारा a facet  rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure but is instead done on an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply radiofrequency waves to the impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body .
Such radio frequency nerve  lesioning परिणाम in पाँच to आठ or अधिक महीने of पीड़ा राहत  before the nerve regenerates and another round of the procedure needs to be performed .
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many  अलग फ़ॉर्म of radiofrequency ablation  , and its use of the `` rhizotomy '' name should not be confused with the SDR procedure .

The  पद migrant कार्यकर्ता रै अलग  official meanings and connotations in different parts of the world .
The United Nations ' definition is broad ,  सहित कोई लोगों working बाहर  of their home country .
The term can also be  प्रयुक्त to describe किसी  who migrates within a country , possibly their own , in order to pursue work such as seasonal work .

The teardrop  टैटू or आंसू टैटू is a  symbolic tattoo that is placed underneath the eye .
It has no fixed meaning but almost all meanings ( see below )  have कुछ कनेक्शन to थाना  .
U.S. Route 75 is a  north–south u.S.  Highway .
The highway 's northern terminus is in Kittson  काउंटी , मिनेसोटा , at the कनाडाई किनारा , जहाँ it एकबार  continued as Manitoba Highway 75 on the other side of the now-closed border crossing .
Its southern terminus is at Interstate 30 and Interstate 45 in Dallas , Texas , where it is known as North  सेंट्रल  Expressway .
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border route , from Canada to the Gulf of  मैक्सिको at galveston , टेक्सास  .
However , the entire segment south of Dallas , Texas has been decommissioned in favor of  अंतरराज्यीय 45 , a कटऑफ खण्ड of  town-to-town surface road having become State Highway 75 .
Lower Ninth Ward is a neighborhood  of the नगर of  New Orleans .
As the name implies  , it is भाग of  the Ninth Ward of New Orleans .
The Lower Ninth Ward is often thought of as the entire area within New Orleans downriver of the Industrial Canal ;  however , the  City Planning Commission divides this area into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods .
The term `` Lower '' refers to its location farther towards  the मुँह of the मिसिसिपी नदी , `` bas '' or `` नीचे  '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology .
But the  9th वार्ड ,  like all Wards in New Orleans , is a voting district .
The 9th Ward was added as a  मतदान ज़िला  in 1852 .
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1 , 2 , 4 , and 7 which make up the Holy Cross Area  और वार्ड 9 जिले 3 , 5 , 6 , और  8 .
Higher voting district numbers in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) are on  the upriver पक्ष  of the Industrial Canal .
The area came to national attention for its devastation in the aftermath  of hurricane कैटरीना in  2005 .
Hubble views of Copernicus crater ( inset  ) , जिससे is परिचय 58 मील  ( 93 km ) wide
Red and orange tinted Moon , as seen from Earth  दौरान a चंद्र ग्रहण  , where the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only natural satellite of the Earth  , और the  fifth largest satellite in the Solar System .
It is the largest natural  उपग्रह of a ग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली सापेक्ष to the आकार  of its primary , having 27 % the diameter and 60 % the density of Earth , resulting in its mass .
The Moon is the second densest satellite after Io , a satellite  of  Jupiter .
The Moon is in synchronous rotation with Earth , always showing  the वही फेस साथ इसके निकट पक्ष  marked by dark volcanic maria that fill between the bright ancient crustal highlands and the prominent impact craters .
It is the brightest object in the sky after the Sun , although its surface is actually very  अंधेरा , साथ a reflectance समान to कि of कोयले  .
Its prominence in the sky and its regular cycle of phases have , since ancient times , made the Moon an  महत्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक influence on भाषा , पंचांग , आर्ट  and mythology .
The  Moon  's gravitational influence produces the ocean tides and the minute lengthening of the day .
The Moon 's current orbital distance , about thirty times the diameter of the Earth , causes it  to  appear almost the same size in the sky as the Sun , allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in total solar eclipses .
This matching of apparent visual size is a  संयोग  .
The Moon 's linear distance from the Earth is currently increasing at a rate of  3.82±0.07cm प्रति साल , लकिन इस रेट  is not constant .
The Moon is thought to have  formed nearly 4.5 अरब सालो पहले  , not long after the Earth .
हालांकि वहीँ have महरूम अनेक hypotheses लिये इसके उत्पत्ति  in the past , the current most widely accepted explanation is that the Moon formed from the debris left over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars -sized body .
The Moon is the  तभी celestial देह अन्य than  Earth on which humans have set foot .
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with  unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the संयुक्त राज्य ' नासा अपोलो कार्यक्रम  achieved the only manned missions to date , beginning with the first manned lunar orbiting mission by Apollo 8 in 1968 , and six manned lunar landings between 1969 and 1972 , with the first being Apollo 11 .
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar  रॉक्स , जिससे have महरूम प्रयुक्त to develop a geological समझना of the चंद्रमा  's origins , the formation of its internal structure , and its subsequent history .
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972 , the Moon has been  visited तभी by unmanned  spacecraft , notably by the final Soviet Lunokhod rover .
Since 2004 ,  जापानी , चीन , इण्डिया ,  the United States , and the European Space Agency have each sent lunar orbiters .
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of lunar water ice  in permanently shadowed craters at  the poles and bound into the lunar regolith .
भविष्य मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा  have been planned , including government as well as privately funded efforts .
The Moon remains , under the Outer Space Treaty , free  to सब राष्ट्र  to explore for peaceful purposes .
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ; February 6 , 1911 –  जून 5 , 2004 ) थी the 40th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States ( 1981–1989 ) .
Prior to that , he was the 33rd Governor  of कैलिफ़ोर्निया (  1967–1975 ) , and a radio , film and television actor .
Born in Tampico , Illinois , and raised in Dixon , Reagan was  शिक्षित at यूरेका कॉलेज , कमाई a स्नातक of कला  degree in economics and sociology .
After graduating , Reagan moved first to Iowa to work as a radio broadcaster and then  , in 1937 , to लॉस एंजिल्स जहाँ he began a करियर  as an actor , first in films and later television .
Some of his most notable films include  knute rockne  , All American ( 1940 ) , Kings Row ( 1942 ) , and Bedtime for Bonzo ( 1951 ) .
Reagan served as President of the Screen Actors Guild and later as a spokesman for  सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in राजनीती  occurred during his work for GE .
Originally a member of the Democratic Party , his positions  began shifting rightward in the 1950s , और he switched  to the Republican Party in 1962 .
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry Goldwater 's presidential candidacy in 1964 , he was persuaded to seek  the कैलिफ़ोर्निया governorship  , winning two years later and again in 1970 .
He was  पराजित in उसके चलाएं लिये the रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1968  and in 1976 , but won both the nomination and general election in 1980 , defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter .
As president , Reagan  implemented sweeping नई  political and economic initiatives .
His supply-side economic policies , dubbed `` Reaganomics `` , advocated reducing tax rates to  spur आर्थिक विकास , controlling the धन सप्लाई  to reduce inflation , deregulation of the economy , and reducing government spending .
In his first term he survived an assassination  attempt , took a मुश्किल लकीर विरूद्ध मजदूर  unions , announced a new War on Drugs , and ordered an invasion of Grenada .
He was re-elected in a landslide in 1984 , proclaiming that it  थी `` morning  in America `` .
His second term was primarily marked by foreign matters , such as the ending of the Cold War , the  1986 bombing of लीबिया , और the रहस्योद्घाटन of the iran-contra  affair .
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire `` , he supported anti-communist movements worldwide and spent his first term forgoing  the रणनीति of détente  by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR .
Reagan negotiated  साथ सोवियत सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव  , culminating in the INF Treaty and the decrease of both countries ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan left  दफ्तर in 1989  .
In 1994 , the former president disclosed that he had been  diagnosed साथ अल्जाइमर 's बीमारी पहले in the साल  ; he died ten years later at the age of 93 .
A conservative icon , he ranks highly in public  राय पोल of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  and is credited for generating an ideological renaissance on the American political right .
Complete set of scrolls , constituting the  संपूर्ण tanakh  .
The Tanakh ( , or ; also Tenakh , Tenak , Tanach )  is a नाम प्रयुक्त in judaism  for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh is also known as the  masoretic टेक्स्ट or the miqra  .
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional  subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '' , भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ) , nevi'im  ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) , meaning `` that which is read  '' , is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी पद लिये  the Tanakh .
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying  मौखिक परंपरा passed on by प्रत्येक  generation , called the Oral Torah .
the कावासाकी निंजा  ZX-6R is a Kawasaki 600 cc class sport motorcycle .
It was introduced in 1995 , and has been constantly updated throughout the years in response  to नई उत्पाद इससे होंडा , suzuki , और  Yamaha .
The ZX series is what was known as the Ninja  लकीर of कावासाकी मोटरसाइकिल  in the 1980s and still carries the name today .
Assassination  कोशिशें और भूखंड on राष्ट्रपतियों of the संयुक्त राज्य  have been numerous : more than 20 attempts to kill sitting and former presidents , as well as the Presidents-elect , are known .
Four sitting presidents have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President ) , James A. Garfield ( the 20th  अध्यक्ष ) , विलियम mckinley ( the 25th अध्यक्ष  ) and John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ) .
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations : former  अध्यक्ष थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ( the 26th अध्यक्ष ) , और अध्यक्ष  Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ) .
Although the historian J.W . Clarke has suggested that most American assassinations were politically motivated actions , carried out by rational men , not all such attacks have been undertaken for political  कारण  .
Some  हमलावर था questionable  mental stability , and a few were judged legally insane .
Since the Vice President of the United States has for more than a century been elected from the same  राजनैतिक पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष  , the assassination of the President is unlikely to result in major policy changes .
This may explain why political groups typically do not  मेक ऐसे हमले  .
Where the Red Fern Grows is a novel written by Wilson Rawls in 1961 about a boy who buys and trains two  redbone coonhound शिकार  dogs .
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa  , cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a  state located in West South Central United States .
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive  और the 28th सबसे populous  of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma  , अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '' , और it is ज्ञात informally by इसके उपनाम  , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of  ओक्लाहोमा territory और भारतीय territory  on November 16 , 1907 , Oklahoma was the 46th state to enter the union .
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or , informally `` Okies '' , and its  पूंजी और largest  city is Oklahoma City .
A major producer of natural gas , oil , and  कृषि , ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक  base of aviation , energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the  स्वदेश , रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य  in per capita income growth and gross domestic product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors , with nearly two thirds  of oklahomans  living within their metropolitan statistical areas .
With small mountain ranges , prairie , mesas , and eastern  वनों , सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s . आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स  —a region especially prone to severe weather .
In addition to having a  व्यापकता of अंग्रेज़ी , जर्मनी , स्कॉटिश  , Irish and Native American ancestry , more than 25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and historically  परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव , a गंतव्य लिये दक्षिणी settlers  , and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans .
Redwall , by Brian Jacques , is a series of  children 's काल्पनिक  novels .
It is the title of the first book of the series , published in 1986 , as well as the name of the Abbey featured in the book and the name of an animated TV series  आधारित on तीन of the novels ( redwall , mattimeo , और मार्टिन the योद्धा  ) , which first aired in 1999 .
The books are primarily aimed at older children , but  have प्रशंसक of सब  ages .
There have been twenty-two novels and two picture  किताबे प्रकाशित  .
The  twenty-second , और फाइनल , अनोखा  , The Rogue Crew , was posthumously released on May 3 , 2011 .
Natural Gas is usually  measured by आवाज़ in the संयुक्त राज्य  and is stated in cubic feet .
A cubic foot of gas is the amount of gas needed to fill a volume of one cubic foot under set conditions of pressure and temperature.To measure larger amounts of natural gas , a `` therm '' is used to  denote 100 घन फीट , और `` mcf '' is प्रयुक्त to denote  1,000 cubic feet .
To  provide वृहद सटीकता in comparing  fuels , energy content is measured in terms of `` British Thermal Units ( BTU 's ) . ''
A  btu is the राशि of  heat required to raise one pound of water ( approximately a pint ) , one degree Fahrenheit at or close to its point of maximum density .
One British therm  ( प्रतीक thm ) is a non- si  unit of heat energy equal to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU ) .
it is लगभग the उर्जा समतुल्य  of burning 100 cubic feet ( often referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas .
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume  और नहीं  energy content , a therm factor is used by ( Natural ) gas companies to convert the volume of gas used to its heat equivalent , and thus calculate the actual energy use .
The therm factor is  प्रायः in the इकाई  therms/CCF .
It will vary with the mix of hydrocarbons in the  प्राकृतिक  gas .
Natural gas with a higher than average  विशेषज्ञता of  ethane , propane or butane will have a higher therm factor .
Impurities , such as carbon dioxide or nitrogen ,  निम्नतर the therm  factor .
The volume of the gas is  गणना as if measured at मानक  temperature and pressure ( STP ) .
The heat content of natural gas is  solely निर्भर on the संयोजन  of the gas , and is independent of temperature and pressure .
One therm is equal to about 105.5 megajoules , 25,200  kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours  .
One  therm can  also be provided by about of natural gas .
The therm sometimes has been  उलझन साथ  the thermie ( see below ) .
The names of both units  आइये इससे the यूनानी शब्द लिये ऊष्मा  .
A thermie ( th ) is a metric unit of heat energy , part of the meter-tonne-second  प्रणाली sometimes प्रयुक्त  by European engineers .
The thermie is equal to the  राशि of उर्जा जरूरी to उठाएँ the तापमान  of 1 tonne of water by 1 °C .
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories ,  4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 btu .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and  formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy  '' or the `` South '' ) .
the युद्ध था इसके  origin in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers  किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and  guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began  .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United  राज्य ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven  cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन  and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his  प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
आठ बाकी स्लेव राज्य  continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous  संघीय दुर्गों भीतर  territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed  to ढूँढें  a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
The  confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so  dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by  संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण  Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ;  नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy  , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states  और स्थापित  a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The  पूर्वी थिएटर  was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of  antietam , dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति  slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and  the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी  River .
In  1863 , रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western  सफलताओं  led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove  ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate  infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford  to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland  Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at  appomattox  Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of  the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads  , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships  , and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian  कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको  , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an  undetermined क्रमांक of civilian हताहत  .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all  उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of  all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28 , 1949 )  is a पूर्व u.S. track और फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी , प्रेरक स्पीकर ,  socialite , television personality and businessman .
He won  the सुनहरा पदक लिये decathlon  in the Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics .
Following his Olympic win and the related recognition , he married Kris  कार्दशियन , और उसके पेशेवर करियर  evolved into being a television celebrity .
By 1981 , he had starred in several made-for-TV movies and was Erik Estrada 's  बदलना on the शीर्ष रेटेड tv श्रेणी  CHiPs .
he रै  six children : Burt , Casey , Brandon , Brody , Kendall and Kylie .
Since his 1991 marriage to Kris Jenner , he is the stepfather to  कोर्टनी , किम , khloe और रोब  Kardashian .
Since 2007 , he has appeared  साथ उसके blended  family on Keeping Up with the Kardashians .
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a Gram-negative  , rod-shaped bacterium कि is commonly मिला  in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ) .
Most E. coli strains are harmless , but some  serotypes can कारण गंभीर खाना  poisoning in humans , and are occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination .
The harmless strains  हैं भाग of the सामान्य फ्लोरा of the आंत , और can लाभ उनके  hosts by producing vitamin K2 , and by preventing the establishment of pathogenic bacteria within the intestine .
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about 0.1 % of gut flora , and fecal–oral transmission is the major route through  जिससे रोगजनक strains of the bacterium  cause disease .
कोशिकाएं हैं समर्थ to जीवित बाहर the  body for a limited amount of time , which makes them ideal indicator organisms to test environmental samples for fecal contamination .
There is , however , a growing body of research that has examined environmentally persistent E. coli which can survive for extended periods  बाहर of the  host .
The bacterium can also be grown easily and inexpensively in a laboratory setting , and has been  intensively investigated लिये  over 60 years .
E. coli is the most widely  पढ़ाई prokaryotic मॉडल सजीव , और an महत्वपूर्ण प्रजाति  in the fields of biotechnology and microbiology , where it has served as the host organism for the majority of work with recombinant DNA .
Area code 217  is the उत्तर अमरीकी टेलीफोन  area code for much of western and central Illinois .
The 217 area includes Illinois ' capital , Springfield , plus Champaign ,  urbana , decatur , danville  , Quincy , and Rantoul .
217 थी एक  of the original area codes , which were created in 1947 .
The only significant change in 217 's boundaries was in 1957 , when its northern portion was combined  साथ भाग of क्षेत्रफल कोड  815 to form area code 309 .
