Ozone  depletion describes दो पृथक लकिन सम्बन्धित phenomena  observed since the late 1970s : a steady decline of about 4 % per decade in the total volume of ozone in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ) , and a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions .
The latter phenomenon is referred  to as the ओज़ोन छेद  .
In addition to  ये well-known stratospheric phenomena  , there are also springtime polar tropospheric ozone depletion events .
The details of polar ozone  छेद गठन differ इससे कि of mid-latitude thinning  , but the most important process in both is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens .
The  प्रमुख सोर्स  of these halogen atoms in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs , freons , halons ) .
These compounds are  transported into the stratosphere  after being emitted at the surface .
Both types of ozone depletion  यहूद observed to बढ़ाएँ  as emissions of halo-carbons increased .
cfcs और अन्य contributory substances  are referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ) .
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's atmosphere , observed and  प्रक्षिप्त decreases in ओज़ोन have उत्पन्न  worldwide concern leading to adoption of the Montreal Protocol that bans the production of CFCs , halons , and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane .
It is suspected that a variety of biological  consequences ऐसे as increases in स्किन कर्कट , cataracts , क्षति to पौधे , और कटौती of  plankton populations in the ocean 's photic zone may result from the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion .
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a brief  परिचयात्मक बयान of the  Constitution 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
It  राज्य in सामान्य शर्तें , और न्यायालयों have referred to it as विश्वसनीय प्रमाण of , the  Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the  लोगों of the संयुक्त  States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that vast population concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy .
czechoslovakian शॉट putter  Plihan at the 1957 East German Indoor Athletics Championships
The shot put ( pronounced ) is a track and field event involving `` throwing '' / '' putting '' ( throwing in a  pushing गति ) a भारी गोलाकार  object —the shot—as far as possible .
The shot put competition for men has been a part of the modern Olympics  चूंकि उनके पुनरुद्धार in 1896 , महिलाओं  's competition began in 1948 .
Map of the United Nations ( UN ) member states , with their territories  ( सहित निर्भर territories  ) recognized by the UN in blue
There are United Nations ( UN ) member states , and each of them is a member  of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सामान्य सभा  .
The criteria for admission of new members are set out in  the संयुक्त  Nations Charter , Chapter II , Article 4:
A recommendation for  प्रवेश  from the Security Council requires affirmative votes from at least nine of the council 's fifteen members , with none of the five permanent members voting against .
The Security Council 's  अनुशंसा  must then be subsequently approved in the General Assembly by a two-thirds majority vote .
In principle , only sovereign states can become UN members , and currently all UN members are sovereign states ( although a few members  यहूद नहीं sovereign जब वे joined the  UN ) .
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security Council and the General Assembly , a number of  राज्य कि may be माना sovereign राज्य according to the  Montevideo Convention criteria are not members because the UN does not consider them to possess sovereignty , mainly due to the lack of international recognition or opposition from certain members .
In addition to the member states , the UN also invites non-member states ( currently two : the Holy See and Palestine ) , intergovernmental organizations , and other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन और entities जिनकी statehood or प्रभुता हैं नहीं precisely पारिभाषित , to become observers  at the General Assembly , allowing them to participate and speak , but not vote , in General Assembly meetings .
The Eiffel Tower ( , ) is an iron  जाली मीनार स्तिथ on  the Champ de Mars in Paris , named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel , whose company designed and built the tower .
Erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World 's Fair , it has  become दोनो a वैश्विक सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक of फ़्रांस और  one of the most recognizable structures in the world .
The tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the most-visited paid  स्मारक in the संसार ; 7.1 लाख  people ascended it in 2011 .
The third level observatory 's upper platform is at the highest accessible to public in the European Union and the highest in  यूरोपीय as long as the मंच of the ostankino  Tower , at , remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000 .
The tower received its  250 millionth आगंतुक  in 2010 .
The  मीनार स्टैंड लम्बा , परिचय  the same height as an 81-storey building .
During  इसके निर्माण , the एफिल  Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the title of the tallest man-made structure in the world , a title it held for 41 years , until the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930 .
Because of  the जोड ,  in 1957 , of the antenna atop the Eiffel Tower , it is now taller than the Chrysler Building .
Not including broadcast antennas , it is the second-tallest  ढांचा in फ़्रांस , बाद the millau  Viaduct .
The tower has  तीन स्तर  for visitors .
Tickets can be purchased to ascend ,  by सीढ़ियाँ or लिफ्ट ( लिफ्ट  ) , to the first and second levels .
The walk from  मैदान स्तर  to the first level is over 300 steps , as is the walk from the first to the second level .
The third and highest level is  accessible तभी  by lift—stairs do exist but are usually closed to the public .
the पहला और  second levels have restaurants .
The tower has  become the सबसे prominent  symbol of both Paris and France , often in the establishing shot of films set in the city .
Kenneth Wayne `` Ken '' Jennings III ( born May 23 , 1974 ) is an  अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ प्रतियोगी  and author .
Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest winning streak on  the u.S. syndicated  game show Jeopardy !
और as होने the all-time  leading money winner on American game shows .
In 2004 , Jennings  जीती 74 jeopardy  !
games before he was  पराजित by चैलेंजर  Nancy Zerg on his 75th appearance .
His  कुल आय on  Jeopardy !
are $  3,172,700 , consisting  of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins , a $ 2,000 second-place prize in his 75th appearance , a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of  champions , as खूब as हाफ of a $ 300,000  prize in the IBM Challenge .
During his first  चलाएं of jeopardy  !
appearances , Jennings earned the record for the highest  अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ winnings .
His total was surpassed by Brad Rutter , who defeated Jennings  in the फाइनल  of the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions ( first aired on May 25  , 2005 ) , adding  $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings  .
Jennings regained the record  बाद appearing on अनेक  other game shows , culminating in an appearance on Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader ?
( first  aired on अक्तूबर 10  , 2008 ) , though Rutter retains the Jeopardy !
रिकार्ड  .
After his success on Jeopardy ! , Jennings wrote about his experience and explored American trivia history and culture in his  किताब brainiac : adventures in the जिज्ञासु  , Competitive , Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs , published in 2006 .
The Canadian Football League or CFL ( ' [ LCF ] in  फ्रेंच ) is a पेशेवर खेल  league located in Canada .
the cfl is the उच्चतम स्तर of प्रतियोगिता  in Canadian football , a form of gridiron football closely related to American football .
Its eight current  टीमों , जिससे हैं स्तिथ in आठ पृथक  cities , are divided into two divisions of four teams each — the East Division and the West Division .
The league 's 19-week regular season runs from late  जून to जल्दी नवम्बर ; प्रत्येक  team plays 18 games with one bye week .
Following the regular season , the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the fourth place team in one division has a better record than the third place team in the other division , when the team with the better record makes the  playoffs और `` crosses over '' to the अन्य प्रभाग 's  playoff ) compete in the league 's three-week divisional playoffs , which culminate in the late-November Grey Cup championship , the country 's largest annual sports and television event .
The CFL was officially founded on January 19  , 1958 , बनाना it the दूसरी oldest  gridiron football league in North America still in operation , although all its teams long predate the modern formation of the league .
It is the highest level of play in Canadian football , the most popular football league in Canada , and the second-most  लोकप्रिय प्रमुख खेल लीग in कनाडा , बाद the नेशनल  Hockey League .
Although ice hockey is Canada 's most popular sport , the CFL has increased the  लोकप्रियता of कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल in क्यूबेक और पश्चिमी  Canada .
Canadian football is also played at amateur levels ( i.e . youth , high school , CJFL , QJFL , CIS  और वरिष्ठ लीग ऐसे as the अलबर्टा फ़ुटबॉल  League ) .
The 2010s will be a significant decade for the CFL in terms of growth ,  as टीमों have संवर  , expanded stadiums , or plan to build entirely new stadiums .
the मॉन्ट्रियल अलॉतेस संपन्नता इस  first , adding 5,000 seats to Percival Molson Memorial Stadium in time for the 2010 CFL season .
The Edmonton Eskimos and Calgary Stampeders also renovated their respective stadiums  और सुविधाएं लिये the 2010  season .
In 2011 , the BC Lions played under a new , retractable roof in BC Place after  बिता एक और a हाफ सीज़न  at Empire Field .
Then the Winnipeg Blue Bombers will play in an entirely new  स्टेडियम at the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Manitoba , scheduled to open in time for the 2013 season .
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats , Saskatchewan  roughriders और the नई ओटावा  franchise are also looking at new or extensively-renovated stadiums in the following years .
There are also hopes of expanding the   league to Atlantic Canada ( ideally basing a team in either the more populated Halifax , or the more centralized Moncton ) , as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton .
According to sports historian Douglas Brei , the Canadian Football League holds the distinction of being the only professional sports league in North America  , प्रमुख or नाबालिग लीग , in जिससे प्रत्येक  existing franchise has won at least one league title while in their current location .
Each antibody binds to a specific antigen ; an interaction similar to a lock and   key .
An antibody ( Ab ) ,  भी ज्ञात as an immunoglobulin ( ig ) , is a विशाल  Y-shaped protein produced by B-cells that is used by the immune system to identify and neutralize foreign objects such as bacteria and viruses .
The antibody recognizes a unique part of  the विदेशी निशाना , पुकारा  an antigen .
Each tip of the `` Y  '' of an एंटीबॉडी contains a paratope ( a ढांचा analogous  to a lock ) that is specific for one particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a key ) on an antigen , allowing these two structures to bind together with precision .
Using this binding mechanism , an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected cell for attack by other parts of the immune system , or  can neutralize इसके  target directly ( for example , by blocking a part of a microbe that is essential for its invasion and survival ) .
The production of antibodies is the main function of the humoral  प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली  .
Antibodies are secreted by a type  of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका  called a plasma cell .
Antibodies can occur in two physical forms , a soluble form that is secreted from the cell , and a membrane -bound form that is attached to  the सतह of a  B cell and is referred to as the B cell receptor ( BCR ) .
The BCR is only found on the surface of B cells and facilitates the activation of  ये कोशिकाएं और उनके subsequent differentiation  into either antibody factories called plasma cells , or memory B cells that will survive in the body and remember that same antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure .
In most cases ,  बातचीत of the b  cell with a T helper cell is necessary to produce full activation of the B cell and , therefore , antibody generation following antigen binding .
Soluble antibodies are released into the blood and tissue fluids , as well as many secretions  to continue to सर्वेक्षण लिये आक्रमणकारी microorganisms  .
Antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to  the immunoglobulin superfamily ;  the terms antibody and immunoglobulin are often used interchangeably .
Antibodies are  typically बना of मौलिक संरचनात्मक  units—each with two large heavy chains and two small light chains .
There are several  अलग प्रकार  of antibody heavy chains , and several different kinds of antibodies , which are grouped into different isotypes based on which heavy chain they possess .
Five different antibody isotypes are known in mammals , which perform different  भूमिकाएँ , और सहायता  direct the appropriate immune response for each different type of foreign object they encounter .
Though the general structure of all antibodies is very similar , a small region at the tip of the protein is extremely variable , allowing  लाखो of antibodies साथ थोड़ा अलग टिप structures  , or antigen binding sites , to exist .
This region is known  as the hypervariable  region .
Each of these variants can  bind to  a different antigen .
This enormous  विविधता of antibodies  allows the immune system to recognize an equally wide variety of antigens .
The large and diverse population of  antibodies  is generated by random combinations of a set of gene segments that encode different antigen binding sites ( or paratopes ) , followed by random mutations in this area of the antibody gene , which create further diversity .
Antibody genes also re-organize in a process called class switching that changes the base of the heavy chain to another , creating a different isotype of the  एंटीबॉडी कि retains the प्रतिजन विशिष्ट परिवर्तनीय प्रदेश  .
This allows a  सिंगल एंटीबॉडी  to be used by several different parts of the immune system .
The symbol used by the Zodiac Killer to sign his  पत्राचार
The Zodiac Killer was a serial killer who operated in Northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी  1970s .
The killer 's  पहचान remains  unknown .
The Zodiac murdered victims  in benicia  , Vallejo , Lake Berryessa , and San Francisco between December 1968 and October 1969 .
Four men and three women between the ages of 16  और 29 यहूद  targeted .
The killer originated the name `` Zodiac ''  in a श्रेणी of taunting अक्षर भेजा to  the local Bay Area press .
These letters included four cryptograms  ( or ciphers )  .
Of  the चार cryptograms  sent , only one has been definitively solved .
Suspects have been named by law enforcement and  amateur जांचकर्ताओं , लकिन no  conclusive evidence has surfaced .
In  अप्रैल 2004 , the सैन फ्रांसिस्को पुलिस विभाग  marked the case `` inactive '' , yet re-opened the case at some point prior to March 2007 .
The case also remains open in the  नगर of vallejo , as खूब as in नापा  County and Solano County .
the कैलिफ़ोर्निया विभाग  of Justice has maintained an open case file on the Zodiac murders since 1969 .
Jennings is a small city in and the parish seat of Jefferson Davis Parish , Louisiana  , संयुक्त राज्य , निकट झील चार्ल्स  .
The population was 10,383 at the 2010 census , a small decline  इससे  the 2000 tabulation .
The city is 68 percent  श्वेत  .
Jennings is the principal city of the Jennings Micropolitan Statistical Area , which includes all  of जेफरसन डेविस  Parish .
It is also part of the larger Lake Charles-Jennings  संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल  .
Nanotechnology (  sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the  manipulation of matter on an atomic and molecular scale .
The earliest , widespread description of nanotechnology referred to  the particular technological  goal of precisely manipulating atoms and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products , also now referred to as molecular nanotechnology .
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently established by the National Nanotechnology Initiative , which defines  nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of पदार्थ साथ at तनिक एक आयाम sized  from 1 to 100 nanometers .
This definition reflects the fact that quantum mechanical effects are important at this quantum-realm scale , and so the  परिभाषा shifted इससे a particular technological लक्ष्य to a शोध  category inclusive of all types of research and technologies that deal with the special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold .
It is therefore common to see the plural form `` nanotechnologies ''  as खूब as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the व्यापक दायरा of शोध और  applications whose common trait is size .
Because of the variety of potential applications ( including industrial  और सैन्य ) , सरकारें have  invested billions of dollars in nanotechnology research .
Through its National Nanotechnology  पहल , the  USA has invested 3.7 billion dollars .
The European Union has  invested 1.2 अरब और  Japan 750 million dollars .
Nanotechnology as  पारिभाषित by आकार is naturally  very broad , including fields of science as diverse as surface science , organic chemistry , molecular biology , semiconductor physics , microfabrication , etc .
The associated research and  अनुप्रयोग हैं बराबर विविध , ranging इससे एक्सटेंशन of conventional यंत्र भौतिकी to completely नई approaches आधारित upon  molecular self-assembly , from developing new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale to direct control of matter on the atomic scale .
Scientists currently  बहस the भविष्य implications  of nanotechnology .
nanotechnology may be समर्थ to बनाएँ अनेक नई सामग्री और डिवाइस  with a vast range of applications , such as in medicine , electronics , biomaterials and energy production .
On the other hand , nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as any  नई प्रौद्योगिकी , सहित चिंताएं परिचय the toxicity और पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of nanomaterials  , and their potential effects on global economics , as well as speculation about various doomsday scenarios .
These concerns have led to a debate  among वकालत  groups and governments on whether special regulation of nanotechnology is warranted .
Map  of the पूर्वी  Bloc
The term  पूर्वी bloc or कम्युनिस्ट bloc refers to the पूर्व  communist states of Central and Eastern Europe , generally the Soviet Union and the countries of the Warsaw Pact .
The terms Communist Bloc and  सोवियत bloc यहूद भी प्रयुक्त to denote  groupings of states aligned with the Soviet Union , although these terms might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe .
The New Jersey gubernatorial election of 2009 took place on  नवम्बर  3 , 2009 .
Democratic Governor Jon Corzine was running for a second term  और थी होने challenged  by Republican Chris Christie , Independent Christopher Daggett and nine others , in addition to several write-in candidates .
Christie won the election , with about 48.5 percent of the vote  , to 44.9  percent for Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett .
Christie won the largest margin for  a पहला पद रिपब्लिकन चूंकि  1969 .
Christie assumed office on  जनवरी 19 , 2010  .
This was  the पहला चुनाव  to fill the newly created office of Lieutenant Governor .
The candidates for governor and lieutenant  राज्यपाल यहूद joined साथ as a सिंगल चुनाव , so  that voters did not have the opportunity to split the ticket .
Kim Guadagno , Christie 's  कार्यशील mate , became  New Jersey 's first lieutenant governor following her inauguration .
Health care in the United States is provided by  अनेक पृथक संगठन .
Health care facilities are largely owned and operated by private sector  व्यवसायों  .
Health insurance for public sector  कर्मचारी is primarily  provided by the government .
60-65 % of healthcare provision and spending comes from programs such as Medicare , Medicaid , TRICARE , the Children 's  स्वास्थ्य बीमे कार्यक्रम , और the दिग्गजों स्वास्थ्य प्रशासन  .
Most of  the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत 65 is insured  by their or a family member 's employer , some buy health insurance on their own , and the remainder are uninsured .
Of 17 high-income countries studied by the National Institutes of Health in 2013 , the United States was at or near  the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु  , heart and lung disease , sexually transmitted infections , adolescent pregnancies , injuries , homicides , and rates of disability .
Together , such issues place the  u.S. at the नीचे  of the list for life expectancy .
On average , a U.S. male can be  अपेक्षित to सजीव लगभग चार  fewer years than those in the top-ranked country .
According to the World Health Organization ( WHO ) , the United States spent more on  स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रति capita ( $ 7,146 ) , और अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह as प्रतिशत  of its GDP ( 15.2 % ) , than any other nation in 2008 .
The Commonwealth Fund ranked the United  राज्य पिछला in the विशेषता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह among समान  countries , and notes U.S. care costs the most .
The U.S. Census Bureau reported that 49.9 million residents , 16.3 % of the population , were  uninsured in 2010 ( up इससे  49.0 million residents , 16.1 % of the population , in 2009 ) .
A 2004 Institute of Medicine ( IOM )  रपट कहा : `` the संयुक्त राज्य is among the few industrialized  nations in the world that does not guarantee access to health care for its population . ''
A 2004 OECD report said : `` With the exception of Mexico , Turkey , and the United States , all OECD countries had achieved universal or near-universal ( at least  98.4 % insured ) कवरेज  of their populations by 1990 . ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of health insurance  कल्याणकारी roughly 48,000 अनावश्यक  deaths every year in the United States .
In 2007 , 62.1 % of filers  लिये  bankruptcies claimed high medical expenses .
A 2013  पढ़ाई मिला कि परिचय 25 % of सब  senior citizens declare bankruptcy due to medical expenses , and 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence .
On March 23 , 2010 , the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act ( PPACA  ) became विधि , providing  for major changes in health insurance .
In physiology , body water is the water  सामग्री of the इंसान  body .
A significant fraction of the  इंसान देह is जल  .
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of Medical Physiology states that `` the total amount of water in a man of average weight (  70 गामा ) is लगभग 40 लीटर , averaging 57 प्रतिशत of  his total body weight .
In a newborn infant , this may be as high as 75  प्रतिशत of the देह वज़न , लकिन it progressively decreases  from birth to old age , most of the decrease occurring during the first 10 years of life .
Also , obesity decreases the percentage of water in the body , sometimes to  as  low as 45 percent '' .
These figures are statistical averages , so are illustrative , and  जैसे सब biostatistics  , will vary with things like type of population , age and number of people sampled , and methodology .
So there is not , and can not be , a figure that is exactly the same for all people ,  लिये इस or कोई अन्य physiological  measure .
For example , Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy &  physiology लिये नर्स देता a फिगर of 60 % लिये the proportion of body-weight  attributable to water , which approximates Guyton 's 57 % .
In  diseased राज्य जहाँ देह जल is प्रभावित , the कम्पार्टमेंट or compartments  that have changed can give clues to the nature of the problem .
Body water is regulated by hormones ,  सहित anti-diuretic  hormone ( ADH ) , aldosterone and atrial natriuretic peptide .
Per  netter 's एटलस  of Human Physiology , body water is broken down into the following compartments:
intracellular द्रव  ( 2/3 of body water ) .
Per Guyton , in a body  containing 40 लीटर of द्रव  , about 25 litres is intracellular , which amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ) , close enough to the 2/3 rule of thumb .
जैक्सन 's  texts states 70 % of body fluid is intracellular .
extracellular  fluid ( 1/3 of body water ) .
Per Guyton 's  उदाहरण , लिये a 40 लीटर देह  , about 15 litres is extracellular , which amounts to 37.5 % Again , this is close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here .
प्लाज्मा (  1/5 of extracellular fluid ) .
Per Guyton 's  उदाहरण , of the 15  litres of extracellular fluid , plasma volume averages 3 litres .
This amounts to  20 % , the वही  as per Netter 's Atlas .
Interstitial fluid ( 4/5 of  extracellular द्रव  )
Transcellular  द्रव ( a.k.a .  `` third space , '' normally ignored in calculations )
contained अंदर अंगों  , such as the gastrointestinal , cerebrospinal , peritoneal , and ocular fluids .
Self-esteem is a term used in psychology to reflect a person 's overall  emotional मूल्यांकन of उसके or उसके अपना लायक  .
It is a  निर्णय of oneself  as well as an attitude toward the self .
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for example , `` I am competent , '' `` I am worthy '' ) and  भाव ऐसे as triumph , despair , अभिमान और  shame .
Smith and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is what we think about the self ; self-esteem , is the  धनात्मक or ऋणात्मक evaluations of the स्वः , as in  how we feel about it . ''
self-esteem is भी ज्ञात as the evaluative आयाम  of the self that includes feelings of worthiness , prides and discouragement .
One 's self-esteem is  भी closely संबद्ध  with self-consciousness .
Self-esteem is a disposition that a person has which represents their judgements  of उनके  own worthiness .
In the mid-1960s , Morris Rosenberg and social-learning  पैरोकार पारिभाषित  self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness .
Nathaniel Branden  in 1969 पारिभाषित self-esteem as  `` the experience of being competent to cope with the basic challenges of life and being worthy of happiness . ''
According to Branden , self-esteem is the sum of self-confidence ( a  अहसास of निजी  capacity ) and self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth ) .
It exists as a consequence of the implicit judgement that every person has of  उनके क्षमता to फेस जीवन 's  challenges , to understand and solve problems , and their right to achieve happiness , and be given respect .
As a social psychological construct ,  self-esteem is आकर्षक क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized  it as an influential predictor of relevant outcomes , such as academic achievement ( Marsh 1990 ) or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al . 1998 ) .
In addition , self-esteem has  भी महरूम treated as an महत्वपूर्ण निष्कर्ष  due to its close relation with psychological well-being ( Marsh 1989 ) .
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example , `` I believe I am a good writer and I feel happy about that '' ) or a global extent ( for example , `` I believe I am a bad person , and feel bad about myself in  सामान्य  '' ) .
Psychologists usually regard self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic (  `` trait '' self-esteem ) , हालांकि सामान्य ,  short-term variations ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist .
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem include :  self-worth , self-regard ,  self-respect , and self-integrity .
A Masonic Lodge , often termed a Private Lodge or Constituent Lodge ,  is the मौलिक organisational  unit of Freemasonry .
Every new Lodge must be warranted or chartered by a Grand Lodge , but is subject to its  दिशा तभी in enforcing the प्रकाशित संविधान of  the jurisdiction .
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the  संसार 's पहला ज्ञात ग्रैंड आवास in लंदन ( आज पुकारा the संयुक्त ग्रैंड आवास of इंग्लैण्ड ) have the अद्वितीय विशेषाधिकार  to operate as time immemorial i.e . without such warrant ; only one other lodge operates without a warrant - this is the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in London , although it is not also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title .
A  freemason is  generally entitled to visit any Lodge , in any jurisdiction ( i.e . under any Grand Lodge ) in amity with his own .
In some jurisdictions this  विशेषाधिकार is प्रतिबंधित to निपुण masons ( कि is  , Freemasons who have attained the Order 's third degree ) .
He is first usually required to check , and certify , the regularity of the relationship of the Lodge - and be able to  satisfy कि आवास of उसके नियमितता of सदस्यता  .
Freemasons gather together as a Lodge to work  the तीन मौलिक डिग्री of  Entered Apprentice , Fellowcraft and Master Mason .
Pilkington Group Limited is a  बहुराष्ट्रीय कांच निर्माण कम्पनी  headquartered in St Helens , United Kingdom and a wholly owned subsidiary of the Japan-based NSG Group .
Prior to its acquisition by NSG in 2006 it was an  स्वतंत्र कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध on the लंदन भण्डार  Exchange and for a time was a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index .
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as part of another one , particularly when the quoted   expression is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to its original source , and it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks .
A quotation can also refer to the repeated use of units of any other form of expression ,  विशेषकर भाग of कलाकारी works : तत्व  of a painting , scenes from a movie or sections from a musical composition .
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a common  साल starting on सोमवार ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग  ) of the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in  the परिवार piperaceae , cultivated लिये इसके फल  , which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning .
The fruit , known as a peppercorn when  सूखी , is लगभग in व्यास , अंधेरा रेड जब fully वयस्क  , and , like all drupes , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from them , may be described simply as pepper , or more precisely as  ब्लैक pepper ( पकाया और सूखी unripe फल ) , ग्रीन pepper ( सूखी unripe फल  ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is  देशी to दक्षिण इण्डिया , और is extensively  cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical regions .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper , producing 34 %  of the संसार 's  Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper has been used since antiquity for  दोनो इसके फ्लेवर और as a  medicine .
ब्लैक pepper  is the world 's most traded spice .
it is एक of the सबसे आम मसाले added to यूरोपीय भोजन और इसके वंशजों .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical  piperine , नहीं to be उलझन साथ the  capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in the  आधुनिक संसार ,  often paired with salt .
Fire  hydrant in charlottesville  , Virginia , USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug in the United States or as a johnny pump in New York City ) , is an active fire protection measure , and a  सोर्स of जल provided in सबसे शहरी , suburban और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों साथ नगरपालिका जल  service to enable firefighters to tap into the municipal water supply to assist in extinguishing a fire .
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an  बीमे छूट चूंकि अग्निशमन चाहिए be समर्थ to अधिक rapidly बुझा  a fire on the insured property .
The concept of fire plugs  तिथियाँ to at तनिक the  17th century .
This was a time when  अग्निशमन responding to a कॉल होता खुदाई bas to  the wooden water mains and hastily bore a hole to secure water to fight fires .
The water would fill the hole creating a temporary well , and be transported from the well to the  आग by बाल्टी brigades or , बाद ,  by hand-pumped fire engines .
The holes  यहूद तब  plugged with stoppers , normally redwood , which over time came to be known as fire plugs .
The location  of the प्लग होता प्रायः  be recorded or marked so that it could be reused in future fires .
This is the source  of the colloquial  term fire plug still used for fire hydrants today .
After the Great Fire of London  in 1666  , the city installed water mains with holes drilled at intervals , equipped with risers , allowing an access point to the wooden fire plugs from street level .
The invention of a post- or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally credited to  फ्रेडरिक graff sr. , मुख्य इंजीनियर of the फिलाडेल्फिया जल works around  the year 1801 .
It had a combination hose/faucet outlet and was of `` wet  बैरल '' डिज़ाइन साथ the वाल्व  in the top .
It is said that Graff held the first patent for a fire hydrant , but this can not be verified  क्युकी the पेटेंट दफ्तर in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on  fire in 1836 destroying many patent records from that period in the process .
The President of the Republic of South Africa is the head of state and head of  सरकारी  under South Africa 's Constitution .
From 1961 to 1994 , the  सिर of राज्य थी  called the State President .
The President is elected by members of the National Assembly , the lower house of Parliament , and is usually  the नेता of the largest पार्टी , जिससे रै महरूम the अफ़्रीकी नेशनल कॉंग्रेस चूंकि  the first non-racial elections were held on 27 April 1994 .
The role was originally founded to be distinct from the now defunct role of prime minister , but the two roles were merged  in the 1983 संविधान जिससे निर्दिष्ट a four-year  term of office .
The 1993 and later  constitutions हद the अध्यक्ष  's time in office to two five-year terms .
The first President to be  निर्वाचित अंतर्गत the नई संविधान  was Nelson Mandela , and the incumbent president is Jacob Zuma .
Under the interim Constitution ( valid from 1994 to 1996 ) , there  थी a सरकारी of नेशनल एकता , in जिससे an mp इससे the largest  opposition party was entitled to a position as Deputy President .
Along  साथ thabo mbeki , the पिछला राज्य अध्यक्ष , f.w . de klerk भी परोसा  as Deputy President , in his capacity as the leader of the National Party which was the second-largest party in the new Parliament .
But De Klerk  बाद resigned और  went into opposition with his party .
A  voluntary गठबन्धन सरकारी continues to मौजूद अंतर्गत the नई  constitution ( adopted in 1996 ) , although there have been no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of deputy president .
Special education or special needs education is the education of students  साथ खास needs in a रास्ता कि  addresses the students ' individual differences and needs .
Ideally , this process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of  शिक्षण प्रक्रियाओं , adapted उपकरण और सामग्री , accessible जमावट , और अन्य interventions designed to सहायता learners  with special needs achieve a higher level of personal self-sufficiency and success in school and community than would be available if the student were only given access to a typical classroom education .
Common special needs include challenges with learning , communication challenges , emotional and behavioral disorders ,  शारीरिक disabilities , और developmental  disorders .
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from additional educational  सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches  to teaching , use of technology , a specifically adapted teaching area , or resource room .
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can also benefit from specialized teaching techniques or different educational programs , but the term `` special education '' is generally used to specifically indicate  निर्देश of विद्यार्थी जिनकी खास needs reduce उनके क्षमता to सीख independently or in an ordinary  classroom , and gifted education is handled separately .
In most developed countries , educators are modifying teaching  विधि और environments so कि the अधिकतम  number of students are served in general education environments .
Special education in developed countries is often regarded less as a ``  प्लेस '' और अधिक as `` a दायरा  of services , available in every school . ''
Integration can reduce social stigmas and improve  अकादमिक उपलब्धि लिये अनेक विद्यार्थी  .
The opposite of  खास शिक्षा  is general education .
General  शिक्षा is the मानक curriculum  presented with standard teaching methods and without additional supports .
George Soros ( or ; ; ;  born अगस्त 12 , 1930 , as schwartz györgy  ) is a Hungarian-American business magnate , investor , and philanthropist .
He is the chairman of Soros  निधि प्रबन्धन  .
Soros supports  progressive-liberal  causes .
He is known as `` The Man Who Broke the Bank  of इंग्लैण्ड `` क्युकी of उसके  in investment profits during the 1992 Black Wednesday UK currency crisis .
Between 1979 and 2011 , Soros gave  दूर over $ 8 अरब to  human rights , public health , and education causes .
He played a significant role in the peaceful transition  इससे साम्यवादी to पूंजीवाद  in Hungary ( 1984–89 ) and provided one of Europe 's largest higher education endowments to Central European University in Budapest .
Soros is also  the अध्यक्ष  of the Open Society Institute .
An actor portraying Alexander Graham Bell  बोलना into an  early model telephone .
The invention of the  टेलीफोन is the culmination of कार्य किया by अनेक  individuals , the history of which involves a collection of claims and counterclaims .
The development of the modern electrical telephone involved an array of lawsuits founded upon the patent  दावा of अनेक individuals और numerous कंपनियाँ  .
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898 , from conception of the idea of an electric voice-transmission device , to failed attempts to use ``  make-and-break '' वर्तमान , to कामयाब प्रयोग  with electromagnetic telephones by Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson , and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th century .
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA , M.F.A . ) is a graduate degree typically requiring 2–3 years of postgraduate study beyond the bachelor 's degree ( BFA ) , although the term of  पढ़ाई होगा vary by देश or by  university .
The MFA is a creative degree usually awarded as a terminal degree in  विज़ुअल कला , रचनात्मक लिखने , filmmaking  , dance , or theatre and other performing arts .
Coursework is primarily of an applied or performing nature with the program often  culminating in a प्रमुख कार्य or प्रदर्शन  .
Master of  ठीक कला कार्यक्रम have generally जरूरी  a bachelor 's degree prior to admission , but many do not require that the undergraduate major be the same as the MFA field of study .
The most important  admissions आवश्यकता रै प्रायः  been a sample portfolio or a performance audition .
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of  कला in कि the mfa , जबकि  an academic program , centers around practice in the particular field , whereas programs leading to the MA usually center on the scholarly , academic , or critical study of the field .
Additionally , in the United States , an MFA is recognized as a terminal degree for practitioners of Visual Art , Design , Dance , Theatre , Film/Video , New Media , and Creative Writing - meaning  कि it is माना to be the उच्चतम उपाधि in इसके फ़ील्ड ,  and is used as a minimum qualification to be able to apply to become a Full-Time Professor teaching at the University level in these disciplines .
There are exceptions to this standard in the Arts , notably in the case of music performance , where the  mfa is नहीं देखी as a टर्मिनल  degree in the context of the more standardized DMA degree .
It is also critical to  नोट कि in the ब्याज of extending the  connection between creative production and continued academic research , some universities have established practice-based Ph.D programs in fields such as creative writing , visual arts , new media , design and theater .
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing ,  और to a lesser extent in डिज़ाइन और नई मीडिया , the influx of graduates इससे practice-based  PhD programs has not appreciably changed the standard for the MFA as the terminal degree in most Arts disciplines yet .
This is an ongoing  contentious टॉपिक , और is  the frequent subject of academic panels , especially at the annual College Art Association conference .
The CAA 2008 guidelines regarding the MFA strongly  re-affirms कि the phd is नहीं जरूरी as a टर्मिनल  degree in the visual arts .
The atomic bombings of the  शहरों of हिरोशिमा और  Nagasaki in Japan were conducted by the United States during the final stages of World War II in 1945 .
The two events are the only use of  नाभिकीय  weapons in war to date .
Following a firebombing  अभियान कि नष्ट  many Japanese cities , the Allies prepared for a costly invasion of Japan .
The war in Europe ended when Nazi Germany  हस्ताक्षरित इसके यंत्र  of surrender on 8 May , but the Pacific War continued .
Together with the United Kingdom and the Republic of China , the United States called for a surrender of Japan in the Potsdam Declaration on 26 July 1945 ,  threatening जापानी साथ `` संकेत और utter विनाश  '' .
The Japanese government ignored this ultimatum , and the United States deployed two nuclear  हथियार  developed by the Manhattan Project .
American airmen dropped Little Boy on the city of Hiroshima on 6 August 1945  , followed by मोटे man over नागासाकी on 9 अगस्त  .
Within the first two to four months of the bombings , the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000 people in Hiroshima and 60,000–80,000 in Nagasaki , with roughly half of the  मौतों in प्रत्येक नगर occurring on the पहला दिन  .
The Hiroshima  प्रीफ़ेक्चर स्वास्थ्य विभाग अनुमानित कि  , of the people who died on the day of the explosion , 60 % died from flash or flame burns , 30 % from falling debris and 10 % from other causes .
During the following months , large numbers died from the  प्रभाव of burns , विकिरण बीमारी , और अन्य  injuries , compounded by illness .
In a US estimate of the total immediate and short term cause of death , 15–20 % died from radiation  बीमारी , 20–30 % इससे burns , और 50–60 % इससे अन्य  injuries , compounded by illness .
In both cities , most of the dead were civilians , although  हिरोशिमा था a sizeable गैरीसन  .
On 15 August , six days after the bombing of Nagasaki , Japan announced its surrender to the Allies , signing the Instrument of  आत्मसमर्पण on 2 सितंबर , officially समाप्ति संसार युद्ध ii .
The bombings led , in part , to post-war Japan 's adopting Three Non-Nuclear  सिद्धान्त , forbidding the स्वदेश इससे  nuclear armament .
The role of the bombings in Japan 's  आत्मसमर्पण  and their ethical justification are still debated .
Mohandas Karamchand  गांधी ( ; 2 अक्तूबर 1869 – 30 जनवरी 1948 ) ,  commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi , was the preeminent leader of Indian nationalism in British-ruled India .
Employing non-violent civil disobedience , Gandhi led India to independence  और प्रेरित आंदोलनों लिये non-violence  , civil rights and freedom across the world .
The son of a senior  सरकारी आधिकारिक  , Gandhi was born and raised in a Hindu Bania community in coastal Gujarat , and trained in law in London .
Gandhi became famous by fighting  लिये the सिविल अधिकारों of मुस्लिम  and Hindu Indians in South Africa , using new techniques of non-violent civil disobedience that he developed .
returning to इण्डिया in 1915 , he  set about organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes .
A lifelong  प्रतिद्वन्दी of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e . basing राजनीती on धर्म  ) he reached out widely to all religious groups .
He became a leader of Muslims protesting the  घटती औकात of  the Caliphate .
Assuming leadership of the Indian National Congress in 1921 , Gandhi led nationwide campaigns for easing poverty , expanding women 's rights , building  धार्मिक और जातीय सौहार्द , समाप्ति अस्पृश्यता , increasing आर्थिक self-reliance , और ऊपर सब लिये achieving स्वराज —the स्वतंत्रता  of India from British domination .
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national salt tax with the Dandi Salt March in 1930 , and later in demanding the British to immediately Quit  इण्डिया in 1942 , दौरान  World War II .
He was imprisoned for that and for numerous other political  offenses over the सालो  .
Gandhi sought to practice  non-violence और सच्चाई  in all situations , and advocated that others do the same .
He saw the villages as  the कोर of the सच्चा इण्डिया और प्रचारित  self-sufficiency ; he did not support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru .
He lived  modestly in a self-sufficient  residential community and wore the traditional Indian dhoti and shawl , woven with yarn he had hand spun on a charkha .
His chief political enemy  in ब्रिटेन थी विंस्टन चर्चिल , जो  ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir . ''
He was a dedicated vegetarian , and undertook long fasts as means of both  self-purification और राजनैतिक  mobilization .
In his last year , unhappy at the  विभाजन of इण्डिया , गांधी  worked to stop the carnage between Muslims , Hindus and Sikhs that raged in the border area between India and Pakistan .
He  थी assassinated on 30 जनवरी 1948 by nathuram गोडसे जो  thought Gandhi was too sympathetic to India 's Muslims .
30 January is observed as Martyrs ' Day in  इण्डिया  .
The honorific Mahatma  ( `` ग्रेट आत्मा  '' ) was applied to him by 1914 .
In India he was also  पुकारा bapu ( `` पिता  '' ) .
He is known in India as the Father of the Nation ; his birthday , 2 October , is  commemorated वहीँ as गांधी  Jayanti , a national holiday , and world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence .
Gandhi 's philosophy was not theoretical but one of pragmatism  , कि is , practicing उसके  principles in the moment .
Asked to  दे a संदेश to the  people , he would respond , `` My life is my message . ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23 , ca . 1904  – may 10 , 1977 ) , born  Lucille Fay LeSueur , was an American actress in film , television and theatre .
Starting as a dancer in traveling theatrical companies  पहले debuting on ब्रॉडवे , क्रॉफर्ड थी हस्ताक्षरित to a गति चित्र अनुबंध  by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925 .
Initially frustrated by the size and quality of her parts , Crawford began a campaign of  self-publicity और became nationally ज्ञात as a flapper by the समाप्त of the 1920s  .
In the 1930s , Crawford 's fame rivaled , and later outlasted , MGM colleagues Norma  शियर्र और greta  Garbo .
Crawford often played  मेहनती यंग महिलाओं  who find romance and financial success .
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were well received by  अवसाद -era ऑडियंस और यहूद लोकप्रिय साथ महिलाओं  .
Crawford became one of Hollywood 's most prominent movie stars and one of the highest paid women in the United States , but her films began  खोने धन और  by the end of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office poison '' .
After an absence of nearly two  सालो इससे the स्क्रीन , क्रॉफर्ड  staged a comeback by starring in Mildred Pierce ( 1945 ) , for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress .
In 1955 , she  became शामिल  with the Pepsi-Cola Company through her marriage to company Chairman Alfred Steele .
After his death in 1959 , Crawford was elected to fill  उसके रिक्ति on the फलक  of directors but was forcibly retired in 1973 .
She continued acting in film and television regularly through the  1960s , जब उसके प्रदर्शन  became fewer ; after the release of the British horror film Trog in 1970 , Crawford retired from the screen .
Following a public appearance in 1974 , after which unflattering photographs were published ,  क्रॉफर्ड withdrew इससे पब्लिक जीवन और became increasingly  reclusive until her death in 1977 .
Crawford married  चार  times .
Her first three marriages  ended in तलाक ; the पिछला  ended with the death of husband Alfred Steele .
She adopted five children ,  एक of जिसको थी reclaimed by उसके  birth mother .
Crawford 's  संबंध साथ उसके  two older children , Christina and Christopher , were acrimonious .
Crawford disinherited the two and , after Crawford 's death , Christina wrote a `` tell-all '' memoir , Mommie Dearest , in which she alleged a lifelong  पैटर्न of शारीरिक और emotional गाली perpetrated  by Crawford .
She was voted the tenth greatest female  स्टार in the इतिहास  of American cinema by the American Film Institute .

1903 Ford  मॉडल a  rear-door Tonneau
1903  lanchester rear-door  Tonneau
Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a  मुश्किल or नरम कवर प्रयुक्त to protect unoccupied यात्री  seats in a convertible or roadster , or the cargo bed in a pickup truck .
Hard tonneau  कवर खोलें by a hinging or फोल्डिंग  mechanism while soft covers open by rolling up .
The tonneau cover  is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते  cargo .
When the cover is pulled out , it keeps items out of the sun and provides extra  सुरक्षा by keeping निजी वस्तुएं आउट of sight , as खूब as shielding  the driver from view .
Twitter is an online social networking service and  microblogging सेवा कि enables इसके उपयोक्ता to  send and read text-based messages of up to 140 characters , known as `` tweets '' .
Twitter was created in  कूच 2006  by Jack Dorsey and by July , the social networking site was launched .
The service rapidly gained worldwide popularity ,  साथ over 500 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता  as of 2012 , generating over 340 million tweets daily and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day .
चूंकि इसके लॉन्च  , Twitter has become one of the ten most visited websites on the Internet , and has been described as `` the SMS of the Internet . ''
Unregistered users can read  tweets , जबकि पंजीकृत  users can post tweets through the website interface , SMS , or a range of apps for mobile devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco , with additional servers and offices in New York City , Boston  , और  San Antonio .
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film  , co-produced और निर्देशित  by Todd Phillips and written by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore .
It is the first film of The  hangover मताधिकार .the फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर , ed helms , zach galifianakis  , Heather Graham , Justin Bartha , and Jeffrey Tambor .
The Hangover tells the story of Phil Wenneck , Stu Price and Alan  गार्नर , जो सफर to लास वेगास  for a bachelor party to celebrate their friend Doug Billings ' impending marriage .
However , Phil , Stu and Alan have no memory of the previous night 's events  और जरूर ढूँढें डग पहले the विवाह  can take place .
Lucas and Moore wrote  the स्क्रिप्ट बाद कार्यपालिका  producer Chris Bender 's friend disappeared and had a large bill after being sent to a strip club .
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 million , Philips and Jeremy Garelick rewrote the script to include a  बाघ as खूब as a subplot involving  a baby and a police cruiser , and also including boxer Mike Tyson .
Filming took place in Nevada for 15 days , and during filming , the three main actors ( Cooper ,  helms और galifianakis  ) formed a friendship .
The  hangover थी released on जून 5 , 2009  , becoming a critical and commercial success .
It became the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 , with a worldwide gross of over US  $ 467 लाख  .
Critics praised the film 's comedic approach but  criticized it लिये इसके  vulgarity .
The film won  the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार  for Best Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy , and received multiple other accolades .
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the world , as well as the second highest-grossing R-rated comedy ever in the United States , surpassing  a रिकार्ड previously आयोजित by बेवर्ली पहाड़ियाँ cop लिये लगभग 25 सालो और बाद  being surpassed by Ted in 2012 .
Out of all  r-rated  films , it is the third highest-grossing ever in the U.S. , behind only The Passion of the Christ and The Matrix Reloaded .
A sequel , The Hangover Part II , was released in 2011 , and a third and final film , The  hangover भाग iii , is नियत लिये रिलीज  in 2013 .
Events  involving meiosis , प्रर्दशित  chromosomal crossover
Meiosis (  ) is a खास  type of cell division necessary for sexual reproduction in eukaryotes .
the कोशिकाएं उत्पादित  by meiosis are gametes or spores .
In many organisms , including all animals and land plants ( but  नहीं कुछ अन्य समूह ऐसे as fungi  ) , gametes are called sperm and egg cells .
Whilst the process  of meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities  with the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis , it differs in two important respects:
the  गुणसूत्रों in meiosis  undergo a recombination which shuffles the genes producing a different genetic combination in each gamete , compared with the co-existence of each of the two separate pairs of each chromosome ( one received from each parent ) in each cell which results from mitosis .
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically unique ) haploid cells ,  compared साथ the दो ( genetically  identical ) diploid cells produced from mitosis .
Meiosis begins with one diploid cell containing two copies of each chromosome —one  इससे the सजीव 's माँ और एक इससे  its father .
The cell divides twice , potentially producing up to four  अगुणित कोशिकाएं containing एक नक़ल  of each chromosome .
( `` Potentially '' because in some cases , such as the formation of oocytes in mammals , only one  of the संभावित चार अगुणित कोशिकाएं survives  . )
In animals the  अगुणित कोशिका resulting  from meiosis is a male or female gamete .
Each of the  resulting गुणसूत्रों in the gamete कोशिकाएं is a अद्वितीय मिश्रण  of maternal and paternal DNA , resulting in offspring that are genetically distinct from either parent .
This  देता वृद्धि to  genetic diversity in sexually reproducing populations .
This genetic diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural  गुण ( phenotypes ) upon जिससे  natural selection can act , but , as described below in Section 6 , Origin and function of meiosis , the genetic diversity may be largely a by-product of the homologous recombination that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis .
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis , specific genes   are more highly transcribed , and these are called the meiome , the term used in functional genomics for the meiotic transcriptome .
meiosis is a कुंजी विशेषता लिये सब sexually reproducing  eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing , synapse and recombination occur .
In addition to  दमदार meiotic stage-specific अभिव्यक्ति of mrna ( the meiome )  , however , there are also pervasive translational controls ( e.g . selective usage of preformed mRNA ) , regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes during meiosis .
Thus , both the meiome and translational controls determine the broad restructuring of meiotic cells needed to  carry आउट meiosis  .
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a round of DNA replication , creating from the  मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of प्रत्येक chromosome  ( homologs ) two exact copies , sister chromatids , attached at the centromere region .
In the  शुरूआत of meiosis  the maternal and paternal homologs pair to each other .
Then they typically exchange parts by  समजात recombination अग्रणी to crossovers of डीएनए  between the maternal and paternal versions of the chromosome .
Spindle fibers bind to the centromeres of  प्रत्येक जोड़ी of homologs और  arrange the pairs at the spindle equator .
Then the fibers pull the  recombined homologs to विपरीत  poles of the cell .
As the chromosomes move away from the center the cell divides into two daughter cells , each  containing a अगुणित क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों  composed of two chromatids .
After the recombined maternal and paternal homologs  have अलग into the दो बेटी  cells , a second round of cell division occurs .
There meiosis ends as the two sister chromatids making up each homolog   are separated and move into one of the four resulting gamete cells .
Upon  fertilization , लिये  example when a sperm enters an egg cell , two gamete cells produced by meiosis fuse .
The gamete from the mother and the gamete from the father each contribute one half of  the नियत of गुणसूत्रों  that make up the new offspring 's genome .
Meiosis uses many of the same mechanisms as mitosis , a type of cell division used by eukaryotes like plants and  पशु to विभाजित एक कोशिका into दो एकसमान बेटी  cells .
In all plants and in many protists  meiosis परिणाम in  the formation of spores : haploid cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize fighting , the sweet science or in  यूनानी pygmachia ) is a martial आर्ट और कॉम्बैट खेल in जिससे  two people engage in a contest of strength , speed , reflexes , endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands .
Amateur boxing is an Olympic and Commonwealth sport and is a common fixture in most of the major  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  games - it also has its own World Championships .
Boxing is supervised by a referee over a series of one- to  three-minute intervals पुकारा  rounds .
The result is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by  a रेफरी , is disqualified लिये तोड़कर a नियम ,  resigns by throwing in a towel , or is pronounced the winner or loser based on the judges ' scorecards at the end of the contest .
The birth hour of boxing as a  खेल may be इसके स्वीकृति by the प्राचीन  Greeks as an Olympic game as early as 688 BC .
Boxing evolved from 16th- and 18th-century prizefights , largely in Great Britain , to  the forerunner of आधुनिक मुक्केबाज़ी in the mid-19th  century , again initially in Great Britain and later in the United States .
In 2004 , ESPN ranked boxing as  the  most difficult sport in the world .
Agreement or concord happens when a word changes form depending on  the अन्य शब्द to जिससे it relates  .
It is an instance of  inflection , और प्रायः involves बनाना the मान of कुछ व्याकरणिक  category ( such as gender or person ) `` agree '' between different words or parts of the sentence .
लिये उदाहरण , in  Standard English , one may say I am or he is , but not `` I is '' or `` he am '' .
इस is क्युकी  the grammar of the language requires that the verb and its subject agree in person .
The pronouns  i और he हैं पहला और  third person respectively , as are the verb forms am and is .
The verb form must be selected so that it has the same  व्यक्ति as the  subject .
The agreement based on overt grammatical categories as above  is औपचारिक अनुबंध , in कंट्रास्ट to notional  agreement , which is based on meaning .
For instance , the phrase The United States is treated as singular for purposes  of अनुबंध , भी हालांकि  it is formally plural .
This  is a सूची of स्थान  below mean sea level that are on land .
Places in tunnels ,  खानों , तहखानों , खोदा छेद  ( also with open sky ) , under water , under ice , or existing temporarily as a result of ebbing of sea tide etc . are not included .
सब आंकड़े  are in meters below sea level:
Debbie Macomber ( born October 22 , 1948 in Yakima , Washington ) is a best-selling American author  of over 150 रोमांस novels और समकालीन  women 's fiction .
Over 140 million copies of her books are in print throughout the world ,  और चार have become made-for-tv-movies  .
Macomber was the inaugural   winner of the fan-voted Quill Award for romance in 2005 and has been awarded both a Romance Writers of America RITA and a lifetime achievement award by the Romance Writers of America .
Catonsville is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in  बाल्टीमोर काउंटी ,  Maryland , United States .
The population was  41,567  at the 2010 census .
the जातियाँ झूठ to the वेस्ट  of Baltimore along the city 's border .
Catonsville is the home  of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड , बाल्टीमोर  County ( UMBC ) , a public research university with over 12,000 students .
A lawyer , according to Black 's Law Dictionary , is `` a person learned in the law ; as an attorney  , counsel or solicitor ; a व्यक्ति जो is practicing विधि .  ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct established by the sovereign government  of a समाज to सही wrongs , maintain the स्थिरता of राजनैतिक  and social authority , and deliver justice .
Working as a lawyer involves the practical application of abstract legal theories and  ज्ञान  to solve specific individualized problems , or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e. , hire ) lawyers to perform legal services .
The role of the lawyer varies significantly across legal  jurisdictions , और so it can be treated  here in only the most general terms .
Vector Marketing is the domestic sales arm of Cutco Corporation , an Olean ,  नई यॉर्क आधारित cutlery निर्माता  .
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a United States federal law  requiring covered नियोक्ता to provide कर्मचारी job-protected  and unpaid leave for qualified medical and family reasons .
योग्य चिकित्सा और परिवार कारण शामिल  : personal or family illness , family military leave , pregnancy , adoption , or the foster care placement of a child .
The FMLA is administered by the Wage and Hour Division of the United  राज्य विभाग  of Labor .
The bill was a major  भाग of अध्यक्ष  Bill Clinton 's agenda in his first term .
अध्यक्ष क्लिंटन हस्ताक्षरित the विधेयक  into law on February 5 , 1993 ( ; 29 U.S.C . sec . 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) and it took effect on August 5 , 1993 , six months later .
The FMLA was intended `` to balance the demands of the  कार्यस्थल साथ  the needs of families . ''
The Act allows eligible employees to  लो up to 12 कार्य सप्ताह of unpaid छोड़ दौरान कोई 12-month काल to attend to the  serious health condition of the employee , parent , spouse or child , or for pregnancy or care of a newborn child , or for adoption or foster care of a child .
In order to be  योग्य लिये fmla छोड़  , an employee must have been at the business at least 12 months , and worked at least 1,250 hours over the past 12 months , and work at a location where the company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles .
The FMLA covers both public- and private-sector employees , but certain categories of  कर्मचारी हैं excluded  , including elected officials and their personal staff members .
The Vietnam War ( ) was a Cold War -era military conflict that occurred in Vietnam , Laos , and Cambodia from 1 November  1955 to the पतन of साइगॉन on 30 अप्रैल  1975 .
This war followed the First  इंडोचायना युद्ध और थी लड़ा between उत्तर वियतनाम , समर्थित  by its communist allies , and the government of South Vietnam , supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries .
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National Liberation Front , or NLF ) , a lightly armed South Vietnamese  कम्युनिस्ट आम सामने निर्देशित by the उत्तर , largely लड़ा a छापामार  war against anti-communist forces in the region .
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) engaged in a more  conventional युद्ध , at टाइम्स committing विशाल  units into battle .
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct   search and destroy operations , involving ground forces , artillery , and airstrikes .
The U.S. government viewed  भागीदारी in the युद्ध as a रास्ता to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा  of South Vietnam as part of their wider strategy of containment .
The North Vietnamese government and Viet Cong were  लड़ to reunify वियतनाम  under communist rule .
They viewed the conflict as a colonial war , fought  initially विरूद्ध फ़्रांस , समर्थित  by the U.S. , and later against South Vietnam , which it regarded as a U.S. puppet state .
American military advisors arrived in what was then French  इंडोचायना शुरूआत in 1950  .
U.S. involvement escalated in the early 1960s ,  साथ troop स्तर tripling  in 1961 and tripling again in 1962 .
U.S. combat units  यहूद तैनात  beginning in 1965 .
Operations spanned international  सीमायें , साथ लाओस  and Cambodia heavily bombed .
American involvement in the war peaked in 1968 , at the  समय of the tet अप्रिय  .
बाद इस , u.S. मैदान शक्तियां यहूद  gradually withdrawn as part of a policy known as Vietnamization .
Despite the Paris  सलाम accords  , signed by all parties in January 1973 , fighting continued .
U.S. military  भागीदारी  ended on 15 August 1973 as a result of the Case–Church Amendment passed by the U.S. Congress .
the कैप्चर  of Saigon by the Vietnam People 's Army in April 1975 marked the end of the war , and North and South Vietnam were reunified the following year .
The war exacted a huge human cost in  शर्तें of fatalities  ( see Vietnam War casualties ) .
Estimates  of the क्रमांक of  Vietnamese soldiers and civilians killed vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million .
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians , 20,000–200,000  laotians , और 58,220  U.S. service members also died in the conflict .
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian  आइलैंड्स of अलास्का photographed  from the International Space Station , May 2006 .
Ash plumes reached a height of 19 km during  the  climactic eruption at Mount Pinatubo , Philippines in 1991 .
A volcano is an opening , or rupture , in a planet 's surface or crust , which allows hot magma , volcanic ash and  गैसों to एस्केप इससे the  magma chamber below the surface .
Volcanoes are generally found where tectonic  प्लेटों हैं diverging or converging  .
A mid-oceanic ridge , for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge , has examples of volcanoes caused by divergent tectonic plates pulling apart ; the Pacific Ring of Fire has  उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by अभिसारी  tectonic plates coming together .
By contrast ,  ज्वालामुखी हैं प्रायः नहीं  created where two tectonic plates slide past one another .
Volcanoes can also form where there is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's crust in the interiors of plates , e.g. , in the East African Rift , the Wells  gray-clearwater  volcanic field and the Rio Grande Rift in North America .
इस प्रकार of volcanism जलप्रपात अंतर्गत  the umbrella of `` Plate hypothesis '' volcanism .
Volcanism away from plate  सीमाएँ रै  also been explained as mantle plumes .
These so-called  `` हॉटस्पॉट `` , लिये उदाहरण हवाई , हैं postulated to उठता इससे  upwelling diapirs with magma from the core–mantle boundary , 3,000 km deep in the Earth .
Erupting volcanoes can pose many hazards  , नहीं तभी in the तात्कालिक  vicinity of the eruption .
Volcanic  राख can be a threat to वायुयान , in particular those  with jet engines where ash particles can be melted by the high operating temperature .
विशाल eruptions can affect तापमान as राख और droplets of  sulfuric acid obscure the sun and cool the Earth 's lower atmosphere or troposphere ; however , they also absorb heat radiated up from the Earth , thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically , so-called volcanic winters have  caused अनर्थकारी  famines .
A deep  pothole on नई  York City 's Second Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a kettle and known in parts of the Western United States as a chuckhole  ) is a प्रकार of disruption in the सतह of a roadway जहाँ a portion of the  road material has broken away , leaving a hole .
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC , also known as hypernephroma ) is a kidney cancer that  originates in the अस्तर of the proximal  convoluted tubule , the very small tubes in the kidney that transport GF ( glomerular filtrate ) from the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron .
RCC is the most common type of kidney cancer in adults , responsible for  लगभग 80 % of  cases .
It is also known  to be the सबसे lethal  of all the genitourinary tumors .
Initial treatment is most commonly a radical or partial nephrectomy and  remains the  mainstay of curative treatment .
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma  , the  5-year survival rate is 60-70 % , but this is lowered considerably where metastases have spread .
It is relatively resistant to  विकिरण चिकित्सा और कीमोथेरेपी , हालांकि  some cases respond to immunotherapy .
Targeted cancer therapies such as  sunitinib , temsirolimus  , bevacizumab , interferon-alpha , and sorafenib have improved the outlook for RCC .
Estée Lauder Companies , Inc. is a manufacturer and marketer of prestige skincare , makeup ,  महक और बाल परवाह  products .
The company has  इसके मुख्यालय in midtown  Manhattan , New York City .
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous membrane that forms the lining of the abdominal cavity or the coelom —it covers most of the  intra-abdominal ( or coelomic  ) organs—in amniotes and some invertebrates ( annelids , for instance ) .
It is  रचित of a परत of mesothelium  supported by a thin layer of connective tissue .
The peritoneum both  supports the abdominal  organs and serves as a conduit for their blood and lymph vessels and nerves .
The abdominal cavity ( the  स्पेस bounded by the vertebrae , abdominal मांसपेशियां  , diaphragm and pelvic floor ) should not be confused with the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity , but wrapped in peritoneum ) .
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the stomach ) , the structures in the abdominal cavity that are located  पीछे the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g . the गुर्दे  ) , and those structures below the intraperitoneal space are called `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the bladder ) .
आधुनिक 2.5 '' ssd प्रयुक्त in  consumer laptops and desktop computers .
DDR  sdram आधारित  SSD .
अधिकतम  and .
PCI attached IO Accelerator  ssd
PCI-E ,  dram ,  and NAND based SSD .
It  उपयोग an बाह्य शक्ति सप्लाई to  make the DRAM non-volatile .
A solid-state drive ( SSD ) ( also known as a solid-state disk or electronic disk , though it contains no actual `` disk '' of any kind ) is a data  भंडार यंत्र using एकीकृत सर्किट सभाओं as मेमोरी to स्टोर आंकड़ा  persistently .
SSD technology uses electronic  अंतरफलक संगत साथ परंपरागत ब्लाक input/output  ( I/O ) hard disk drives .
SSDs have no moving mechanical components , which distinguish them from traditional electromechanical magnetic disks such  as मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव ( hdds ) or फ्लॉपी डिस्क , जिससे contain घूम डिस्क  and movable read/write heads .
Compared with  electromechanical डिस्क , ssds हैं typically कम susceptible  to physical shock , much quieter , have lower access time , and less latency .
However , while the price of SSDs has continued to decline in 2012 , SSDs are still  परिचय 7 to 8 टाइम्स अधिक महंगी प्रति ईकाई of  storage than HDDs .
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces developed for hard disk drives ,  यूँ permitting  simple replacement in common applications .
, most SSDs use  nand-based फ्लैश  memory , which retains data without power .
For applications requiring fast access , but not necessarily data persistence after power loss , SSDs may be  constructed इससे random-access मेमोरी ( राम  ) .
Such devices may employ separate power sources ,  ऐसे as बैटरी , to maintain  data after power loss .
Hybrid drives or solid state hybrid drives ( SSHD ) combine  the सुविधाएँ of ssds और hdds in the वही ईकाई , containing a विशाल मुश्किल  disk drive and an SSD cache to improve performance of frequently accessed data .
These devices may  प्रस्ताव near-ssd प्रदर्शन लिये  many applications .
