Caviar , according to the Food and  कृषि संगठन , is a उत्पाद बना  from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family .
The roe can be `` fresh '' (  non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized , साथ pasteurization reducing  its culinary and economic value .
Traditionally the term caviar refers only to  roe इससे जंगली  sturgeon in the Caspian and Black Seas ( Beluga , Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ) .
Depending on the country , caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other fish such as salmon , steelhead , trout  , lumpfish , whitefish , और अन्य प्रजाति  of sturgeon .
Caviar  is माना a लक्ज़री कोमलता  and is eaten as a garnish or a spread .
In 2012 , caviar sold for  $ 2,500 प्रति पाउंड , or  $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo .
The SEC Network is  a टेलीविज़न अनुप्रयोग संजाल featuring सजीव प्रसारण  of college football and basketball events from the Southeastern Conference .
It is owned and operated by ESPN Plus and is shown in more than 50 percent of households in the United States , mostly Southeastern  संयुक्त राज्य बाज़ार  .
The  सेक संजाल typically  airs in the noon eastern slot that was former home to the Raycom Sports SEC game of the week .
Games are shown  locally on ब्रॉडकास्ट स्टेशन , क्षेत्रीय खेल संजाल  , as well as on ESPN GamePlan , ESPN Full Court , and ESPN3.com .
The SEC Network is also  उपलब्धियाँ in कनाडा  via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV .
The SEC Network uses the same on-screen graphics currently used by  ईएसपीएन on एबीसी , a संस्करण of ईएसपीएन  's graphics package .
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because  most of  its affiliates do not Letterbox their Standard Definition feeds , while ESPN 's television networks have allowed their graphics to abandon the title safe , but letterbox for SD viewers .
Starting  साथ the सेक 2012  Basketball season , SEC Network 's graphics have been converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format .
This is also being used for the 2013 Basketball season , but had still adapted the former 4:3-safe  ग्राफिक्स स्वरूप लिये the 2012 सेक  football season .
The 1990s , pronounced and also known as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the Nineties '' or `` the '90s '' ,  थी a दशक कि began on जनवरी 1 , 1990 , और ended  on December 31 , 1999 .
It was the 10th and last decade of the  20th सदी और the  100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium .
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold War at the beginning of the decade and the expansion and  व्यावसायीकरण of the अंतरजाल दौरान the दूसरी हाफ  of the decade .
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of unprecedented peace and prosperity , though many parts of the so-called Third World faced various problems including genocide , AIDS and new or continuing ethnic tensions and  सिविल युद्धों  .
Culturally  बोलना the दशक थी  characterized by the rise of multiculturalism and alternative media .
Movements such as grunge , the rave scene and hip hop spread around the world to young people during the decade , aided  by then-new प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as केबल टेलीविज़न और the  Internet .
A combination of factors , including the mass mobilization of capital markets  through neoliberalism , the शुरूआत of  the widespread proliferation of new media such as the Internet , and the dissolution of the Soviet Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of economic and political power across the world , and within countries .
Income inequality among countries in the world rose sharply between the 1980s and  the mid-1990s , पहले levelling बंद और तब गिरना बाद  2000 .
New ethnic conflicts emerged in Africa , the Balkans  और the काकेशस , the पूर्व दो जिससे led to the rwandan  genocide and Bosnian genocide , respectively .
The United States began its current military occupation of the  मध्य ईस्ट दौरान the गर्मियाँ of 1990 साथ  Desert Shield after it cut off a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply .
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab world remained elusive , though the  आयरिश परेशानियों आए to a standstill  in 1998 with the Good Friday Agreement after 30 years of violence .
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a species of canid  देशी to the wilderness और रिमोट क्षेत्रों of उत्तर अमेरिका , यूरेशिया  , and North Africa .
It is the largest member of its family , with  males averaging , और महिलाओं  .
It is similar in general appearance and proportions to a German shepherd , or sled dog ,  लकिन रै a larger सिर , narrower छाती , longer टाँगे , straighter  tail and bigger paws .
Its winter fur is long and bushy , and predominantly a mottled gray in colour , although nearly pure white , red , or brown to  ब्लैक भी  occur .
Within the genus Canis , the gray wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its  छोटी cousins ( the कायोटी और सुनहरी jackal ) , as demonstrated by इसके  morphological adaptations to hunting large prey , its more gregarious nature and its highly advanced expressive behavior .
It is a social animal , travelling in nuclear families consisting of a mated pair , accompanied by the  जोड़ी 's वयस्क  offspring .
The gray  भेड़िया is typically an apex  predator throughout its range , with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it .
It feeds primarily on  विशाल ungulates , हालांकि  it also eats smaller animals , livestock , carrion , and garbage .
The gray wolf is one of the world 's most  खूब शोधकार्य पशु , साथ संभवतः  more books written about it than any other wildlife species .
It has a long history of association with humans , having been despised and hunted in most agricultural communities due to its attacks on livestock ,  जबकि conversely होने  respected by some Native American tribes .
It  is the एकमात्र पूर्वज of  the dog , which was first domesticated in the Middle East .
Although the fear of wolves is prevalent  in अनेक इंसान समाजों ,  the majority of recorded attacks on people have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies .
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and killed people , mainly children , but this is unusual , as  भेड़ियों हैं अपेक्षाकृत few , सजीव दूर इससे लोगों , और have  been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds .
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to , though its still relatively widespread range and stable population means that the species is not threatened at a global level ,  और is इसलिए वर्गीकृत by the आईयूसीएन as तनिक चिंता .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization , characterised by an autocratic form  of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings  around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which preceded it , had been  destabilized through  a series of civil wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the  granting of the honorific augustus to octavian by the रोमन  Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented  स्थिरता और समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax romana (  `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached  इसके महानतम expanse  during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ) .
In the 3rd century , the Empire underwent a crisis  कि  threatened its existence , but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century , during which time a system of dual rule was  विकसित in the लैटिन वेस्ट और यूनानी ईस्ट .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th  सदी , the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as  what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of Rome had a  profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा , धर्म , वास्तुकला ,  philosophy , law , and forms of government in the territory it governed , particularly Europe , and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world .
Education in the  संयुक्त राज्य is मुख्यतः provided  by the public sector , with control and funding coming from three levels : local , state , and federal , in that order .
Child education is compulsory , and  वहीँ हैं भी a विशाल क्रमांक और चौड़ी किस्में of उच्चतर शिक्षा संस्थानों  throughout the country that one can choose to attend , both publicly and privately administered .
Public  शिक्षा is universally  available .
स्कूल curricula , funding , शिक्षण , नियुक्ति  , and other policies are set through locally elected school boards with jurisdiction over school districts with many directives from state legislatures .
School districts are usually separate from other  लोकल jurisdictions , साथ स्वतंत्र  officials and budgets .
Educational standards and standardized testing  निर्णय हैं प्रायः बना  by state governments .
The ages for  अनिवार्य शिक्षा  vary by state .
It begins from ages five to eight and ends  इससे आयु  fourteen to eighteen .
Compulsory education requirements can generally be satisfied by  educating children in पब्लिक स्कूलों , state-certified निजी  schools , or an approved home school program .
In most  पब्लिक और निजी स्कूलों , शिक्षा is विभाजित into तीन स्तर : elementary  school , middle school ( sometimes called junior high school ) , and high school ( sometimes referred to as secondary education ) .
In almost all schools at these levels , children are divided by age groups into grades , ranging from kindergarten ( followed by first grade ) for the youngest children in  elementary स्कूल , up to बारहवीं ग्रेड , the  final year of high school .
The  सटीक आयु दायरा of विद्यार्थी  in these grade levels varies slightly from area to area .
Post-secondary education , better known as  `` कॉलेज `` in the संयुक्त राज्य , is generally  governed separately from the elementary and high school system , and is described in a separate section below .
Government supported , free public schools for all started  होने स्थापित बाद the क्रान्ति  , and expanded in the 19th century , as the results of efforts of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington .
By 1870  , सब राज्य  had free elementary schools , albeit only in urban centers .
As the 20th century drew nearer , states  प्रारंभ गुजर कानून to मेक schooling अनिवार्य  , and by 1910 , 72 percent of children attended school .
Private schools  जारी to स्प्रेड दौरान इस समय  , as well as colleges and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges .
The year of 1910  भी देखी the पहला सच्चा  high schools .
During the rest of the 20th century , educational efforts centered on reducing  the असमानता of the schooling प्रणाली  .
The landmark Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of Education made the desegregation of elementary  और ऊँची स्कूलों a नेशनल प्रधानता , जबकि  the Pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access to college .
Special education was made  into संघीय  law in 1975 .
The Elementary and Secondary Education Act of  1965 बना मानकीकृत परीक्षण a आवश्यकता , और in 1983 , a आयोग थी स्थापित  to evaluate their results and propose a course of action .
The resulting No Child Left Behind Act of  2001 थी विवादास्पद  and its goals proved to be unrealistic .
A commission  स्थापित in 2006  evaluated higher education , but its recommendations have yet to be fully implemented .
पॉल ब्रैग ( फ़रवरी 6  , 1895 – December 7 , 1976 ) , nutritionist , was a pioneer in America’s wellness movement .
Health  बिता प्रति capita , in  $ US PPP-adjusted , with the US and Canada compared amongst other first world nations .
Comparison of the health care systems in Canada and the United States  हैं प्रायः बना by सरकारी  , public health and public policy analysts .
The two countries had similar health care systems before  कनाडा reformed  its system in the 1960s and 1970s .
The United States spends much more money on health care than Canada ,  on दोनो a per-capita  basis and as a percentage of GDP .
In 2006 , per-capita spending for health  परवाह in कनाडा थी  US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S. , US $ 6,714 .
The  u.S. खर्च  15.3 % of GDP on health care in that year ; Canada spent 10.0 % .
In 2006 , 70 % of health care spending in Canada was financed  by सरकारी , बनाम  46 % in the United States .
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on health care was 23 % higher than Canadian government spending , and U.S. government expenditure on health care was just under 83 % of  कुल कनाडाई बिता ( पब्लिक और निजी ) हालांकि ये आंकडे do n't लो into खाता  population differences .
Studies have come to different  conclusions परिचय the परिणाम  of this disparity in spending .
A 2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes may be  श्रेष्ठ in मरीजों cared लिये in कनाडा बनाम the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन मतभेद हैं नहीं सतत  . ''
Life expectancy is longer in  कनाडा  , and its infant mortality rate is lower than that of the U.S. , but there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences .
One commonly cited comparison , the 2000 World Health Organization 's ratings of `` overall health service performance '' , which used a `` composite measure of achievement in the level of  स्वास्थ्य , the वितरण  of health , the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '' , ranked Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations .
This study rated the US `` responsiveness '' , or quality of  सेवा लिये individuals receiving उपचार , as 1st  , compared with 7th for Canada .
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US , simply comparing the life expectancy of two groups with different racial makeup and different obesity  दरों is संभावित नहीं an प्रभावी रास्ता of determining जिससे healthcare प्रणाली  is superior .
The WHO 's study methods  यहूद criticized  by some analyses .
Although there is a measure of consensus that life-expectancy and infant mortality mark the  सबसे विश्वसनीय तरीके to compare nation-wide स्वास्थ्य परवाह , assuming the  population makeup is similar , a recent report by the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons .
The sound source has now  टूटा through the ध्वनि गति अवरोध ,  and is traveling at 1.4 times the speed of sound , ( Mach 1.4 ) .
Since the source  is चलती तेज़ ( साथ a गति ) than the ध्वनि लहरें it creates ,  it actually leads the advancing wavefront .
The sound source  होगा pass by a stationary निरीक्षक ( साथ  a speed ) before the observer actually hears the sound it creates .
As a result , an  निरीक्षक in  front of the source will detect
और an  observer behind the source .
A sonic boom produced by an aircraft moving at M=2.92  , गणना  from the cone angle of 20 degrees .
An observer hears the boom when the shock wave , on the  किनारे of the कोन  , crosses his or her location .
Mach  कोन कोण
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock waves  निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the एयर तेज़  than the speed of sound .
Sonic booms generate  विशाल amounts of ध्वनि उर्जा  , sounding much like an explosion .
The crack of a supersonic bullet passing overhead is an  उदाहरण of a सोनिक बूम in  miniature .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American  late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by jay लीनो कि initially  aired from May 25 , 1992 to May 29 , 2009 , and resumed production on March 1 , 2010 .
The fourth incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise made its debut on May 25 , 1992 ,  तीन दिनों following जॉनी कार्सन 's रिटायरमेंट  as host of the program .
The program originates from NBC Studios in Burbank , California , and is  ब्रॉडकास्ट सोमवार through शुक्रवार at 11:35 pm in the पूर्वी  and Pacific time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ) .
Unlike  कार्सन or उसके पूर्ववर्ती जोकर paar  , Leno only once utilized a guest host , preferring to host the series by himself .
On April 26 , 1999 , the show began broadcasting in 1080i HDTV , becoming the  पहला अमरीकी  nightly talk show to be shot in high definition .
the दिखाएँ  is shot in 16:9 aspect ratio .
The series , which followed the same basic format as that of his predecessors ( an  खोलने monologue followed by कॉमेडी दिनचर्या , साक्षात्कार  and performances ) , ran until May 29 , 2009 , after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien .
NBC signed Leno to a new deal for a  nightly बात दिखाएँ in the 10:00  pm ET timeslot .
The primetime series , titled The Jay Leno Show , debuted on September 14 ,  2009 , following a  similar format to the Leno incarnation of Tonight .
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program , which premiered June 1 , 2009 , nor The Jay Leno  दिखाएँ उत्पन्न the  ratings that NBC had expected .
The network decided to move a  सघन 30-minute  version of Leno 's show to O'Brien 's time slot , and O'Brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour later .
This decision met with opposition from O'Brien , whose stint on The Tonight Show ended January 22 ,  2010 , बाद जिससे he began उसके अपना बात दिखाएँ on  TBS .
The Tonight Show  साथ jay लीनो तब began इसके दूसरी  and current incarnation , the sixth of the franchise , on March 1 , 2010 .
RFID chip  अगला to a  grain of rice .
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a  coded पहचान क्रमांक जब  queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer products  , और implanted in पालतु  , for identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact  उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा , लिये the उद्देश्य  of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
The tags contain electronically  भंडारित सूचना  .
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters )  via चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड  ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field , and then act as a passive transponder to emit  microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e. , इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation at high frequencies ) .
बैटरी संचालित टैग may  operate at hundreds of meters .
Unlike a bar code , the tag does not necessarily need to be within  लकीर of sight of the रीडर  , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are  प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग  .
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to track its  प्रगति through  the assembly line .
Pharmaceuticals can  be tracked through  warehouses .
Livestock and pets may have  टैग injected , allowing धनात्मक  identification of the animal .
Since RFID tags  can be संलग्न to कपडे , possessions , or भी  implanted within people , the possibility of reading personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Id , ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus defined in  सिग्मुंड फ्रायड 's संरचनात्मक मॉडल of the psyche ; वे हैं the  three theoretical constructs in terms of whose activity and interaction mental life is described .
According to this model of the psyche , the id is the set of uncoordinated  instinctual रुझान ; the super-ego plays the नाजुक और moralizing भूमिका ; और  the ego is the organized , realistic part that mediates between the desires of the id and the super-ego .
The super-ego can stop you from doing  निश्चित बाते कि अपना id  may want you to do .
Even though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus , the id , ego and super-ego are functions of the mind rather than parts of the brain and do not  correspond one-to-one साथ वास्तविक दैहिक structures of  the kind dealt with by neuroscience .
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' and `` topographical model '' ) was first discussed in his 1920 essay `` Beyond  the  Pleasure Principle `` and was formalized and elaborated upon three years later in his `` The Ego and the Id `` .
Freud 's proposal was  बहकावे by the ambiguity of the पद  `` unconscious `` and its many conflicting uses .
एयर फ़ोर्स  ROTC emblem
The Air Force  आरक्षित अधिकारी प्रशिक्षण  Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the United States Air Force , the other two being the United States Air Force Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force Officer Training School ( OTS ) .
A subordinate command of the Air University within the Air Education and Training Command  ( aetc ) , afrotc is लकीर अंतर्गत the jeanne M. holm बीच लिये अधिकारी  Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB , Alabama .
The Holm Center , formerly known as the Air Force Officer  accession और प्रशिक्षण स्कूलों ( afoats ) , retains सीधा जिम्मेदारी लिये  both AFROTC and OTS .
AFROTC is  the largest और oldest सोर्स  of commissioned officers for the U.S. Air Force .
AFROTC 's stated mission is to produce quality  नेताओ लिये  the U.S. Air Force .
AFROTC units  हैं स्तिथ on 144 कॉलेज और विश्वविद्यालयों campuses साथ 984 अतिरिक्त संस्थानों of उच्चतर सीखना participating  in cross-town agreements that allow their students to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university .
According to AFOATS HQ , in 2006 ,  afrotc commissioned 2,083 यूएसएएफ दूसरी lieutenants  , with AFROTC enrollment ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993 , and around 13,000 enrolled today .
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called `` detachments , '' and are typically headed by an active duty USAF officer in the rank of colonel or lieutenant colonel who functions as both the Detachment  कमांडर लिये यूएसएएफ उद्देश्य और साथ the नाममात्र शीर्षक of प्राध्यापक of aerospace अध्ययन  ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community .
Most  कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों  will designate the AFROTC detachment as the Department of Aerospace Studies .
The PAS is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors of Aerospace  अध्ययन ( apas ) , सब क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारियों  in the ranks of major or captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide military  प्रशासनिक support और हैं प्रायः augmented by एक to दो civilian  staff support employees of the academic institution .
Within AFROTC detachments , the students ( referred to as ``  cadets '' ) हैं व्यवस्थित into  wings , groups , squadrons , and flights , mirroring the USAF functional wing structure .
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the  सामान्य सैन्य कोर्स ( जीएमसी  ) consisting of the first two years of training , and the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last two years of training .
The AFROTC program is also  विभाजित into दो प्रशिक्षण कृत्यों : the अकादमिक कक्षा कार्यक्रम ( aerospace  Studies classes ) and Cadet Activities ( i.e. , Leadership Laboratory , Physical Training , and other training ) .
Paper density (  भी ज्ञात as आधार वज़न और grammage  ) is a term used in the pulp and paper industry and also for fabric industry to denote a measure of mass of the product per unit of area for a type of fabric , paper or paperboard .
The  पद `` घनत्व ''  is not used in its traditional sense of mass per unit volume .
``  पेपर घनत्व '' , बल्कि  , is a measure of the area density .
Paper products that let  छोटी or no लाइट pass through  ( e.g . poster board ) are considered dense or heavy .
Paper products that allow some light to pass through ( e.g .  ऊतक पेपर ) हैं माना  lightweight .
In the pulp and paper industry , it is common to set a commercial  पेपर यंत्र to उपज पेपर to  a target paper density .
Paper density can also be used to distinguish paper from paperboard as  the latter  usually has a grammage greater than 134 g/m2 .
Two ways of expressing paper  घनत्व हैं  commonly used:
Expressed in grams per square meter ( g/m2 ) , paper density  is भी ज्ञात as  grammage .
This is the measure  प्रयुक्त in  most parts of the world .
Expressed in terms of the mass (  expressed as वज़न ) प्रति  number of sheets , it is known as basis weight .
the सम्मेलन प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त  States and a few other countries using US paper sizes is pounds of a ream of 500 ( or in some cases 1000 ) sheets of a given ( raw , still uncut ) basis size .
Japanese  पेपर is expressed  as the weight in kg of 1000 sheets .
Candace Nicole Parker  ( born अप्रैल 19 , 1986 ) is an अमरीकी बास्केट खिलाड़ी लिये the wnba  's Los Angeles Sparks and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia .
She  is the  younger sister of NBA player Anthony Parker .
She attended the University of Tennessee and was drafted by the  स्पार्क्स in 2008  .
She may be best known for  होने the पहला स्त्री to डंक in an ncaa टूर्नामेंट खेल और the पहला स्त्री  to dunk twice in a college game—she set both milestones as a redshirt freshman on March 19 , 2006 .
She also became only the second player to dunk in a  wnba खेल on जून  22 , 2008 .
A versatile player , she is mainly a forward , but was listed on Tennessee 's  रोस्टर as a आगे , बीच  , and guard .
She was  a प्रारंभ  on the Lady Vols basketball team , winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships .
Parker won the 2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' Choice award as the favorite  मादा खिलाड़ी in the खेल श्रेणी  .
And she was a guest star  on फिगर  It Out .
A food guide pyramid is a pyramid shaped guide of healthy foods  विभाजित into भाग  to show the recommended intake for each food group .
the पहला खाना पिरामिड  was published in Sweden in 1974 .
The most widely known food pyramid was introduced by the United States  विभाग of कृषि in the साल 1992 , थी अद्यतनीकृत in  2005 , and then replaced in 2011 .
Over 25 other countries and  संगठनों have भी प्रकाशित  food pyramids .
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as  H. C. andersen ; अप्रैल 2 , 1805august 4 , 1875 ) थी a डैनिश लेखक और कवि  .
Although a prolific writer of plays , travelogues , novels , and poems , Andersen is best remembered for his fairy tales , a literary genre he so mastered that he himself has  become as mythical as the किस्से  he wrote .
Andersen 's popularity  is नहीं सीमित to children  ; his stories—called , or `` fantastic tales '' —express themes that transcend age and nationality .
During his lifetime he was acclaimed for  having प्रसन्न children विश्वव्यापी  and was feted by royalty .
Andersen 's fairy tales , which have been translated into more than 125 languages , have become culturally embedded in the West 's collective consciousness , readily accessible to children , but presenting lessons  of पुण्य और resilience in the फेस of adversity लिये वयस्क पाठक as खूब  .
They have inspired motion pictures , plays , ballets , and  एनिमेटेड films  .
Two figures locking eyes in  caravaggio 's  The Fortune Teller
Eye contact occurs when `` two people look at each  अन्य 's आँखें at the  same time . ''
In human beings , eye contact is a form of nonverbal communication and is  विचार to have a विशाल  influence on social behavior .
Coined in  the जल्दी to mid-1960s , the पद रै आइये  in the West to often define the act as a meaningful and important sign of confidence and social communication .
The customs and significance of eye contact vary  widely between संस्कृतियों , साथ  religious and social differences often altering its meaning greatly .
The study of eye contact is  sometimes ज्ञात as  oculesics .
Bed bugs are parasitic insects of the cimicid family that feed  exclusively on  blood .
The term most commonly refers to  सदस्यों of the genus cimex of जिससे cimex lectularius , the आम  bed bug , is the best known as it prefers to feed on human blood although other Cimex species are specialized to other animals , e.g. , bat bugs , C. pipistrelli ( Europe ) , C. pilosellus ( western US ) , and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ) .
The name  of the `` bed कीड़ा '' is निकला इससे the पसन्दीदा  habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm houses and especially nearby or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep areas .
Bed bugs are mainly active at night , but are  नहीं exclusively nocturnal  .
They usually feed  on उनके  hosts without being noticed .
A number of adverse health effects may result from bed bug  bites , सहित स्किन rashes , मनोवैज्ञानिक  effects , and allergic symptoms .
Diagnosis involves  दोनो ढूंढना bed बग और the  occurrence of compatible symptoms .
Bed bugs have been known as human parasites  लिये हज़ारों of  years .
At  a पाइंट in the  early 1940s , they were mostly eradicated in the developed world , but have increased in prevalence since 1995 .
Because infestation of human habitats has been on the increase , bed bug  bites और सम्बन्धित शर्तें  have been on the rise as well .
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible  , preceding ezekiel , यिर्मयाह और the  Book of the Twelve .
( The order of the  subsequent किताबे differs  somewhat in the Christian Old Testament ) .
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a sinful Judah and for all  the राष्ट्र of the संसार कि oppose परमेश्वर , जबकि the पिछला 27 prophesy the बहाली of the स्वदेश of इसराईल और a नई सृष्टि  in God 's glorious future kingdom ; this section includes the Songs of the Suffering Servant , four separate passages referring to the nation of Israel , interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ .
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah son of Amoz , but now scholars widely agree that the book is the work of three  अलग लेखक - few विद्वानों इनकार इस दृश्य , और those  that do , do so for theological reasons .
The first , termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ) , contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second , Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ) , is the work of a 6th-century BCE author writing near the end of the Babylonian captivity ; and the third , the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters  56–66 ) , थी रचित in जेरूसलम shortly बाद the वापसी इससे निर्वासन ,  probably by multiple authors .
Oregon State University (  osu ) is a  coeducational , public research university located in Corvallis , Oregon , United States .
The university offers  undergraduate , ग्रैजुएट और डॉक्टरेट  degrees and a multitude of research opportunities .
There are more than 200 academic  उपाधि कार्यक्रम offered through  the university .
OSU 's programs in microbiology , nuclear engineering , ecology ,  वानिकी , पब्लिक  health , biochemistry , zoology , oceanography , food science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier programs .
The  osu 's उदार कला कार्यक्रम  have also grown significantly and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution .
More than 200,000 people have attended OSU  चूंकि इसके founding  .
The Carnegie Foundation classifies Oregon State University as part of its  शीर्ष टियर of शोध संस्थानों  .
As of 2008 , OSU is one of  तभी seventy-three  land-grant universities .
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant , space-grant and sun-grant institution , making it one of only two US institutions to retain all four designations and the only  पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों to do  so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ) .
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon  विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली , osu receives  more funding for research , annually , than all other public higher education institutions in Oregon combined .
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around  the मादा urethra दौरान or पहले  an orgasm .
It is also  ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting , हालांकि ये हैं  considered to be different phenomena in some research publications .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue  to be a टॉपिक of बहस among चिकित्सा पेशेवर ,  which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot .
The Kanab ambersnail , scientific name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma kanabense , is a critically endangered subspecies or species of small , air-breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in  the परिवार succineidae , the एम्बर  snails .
the आम नाम of the एम्बर घोंघे is आधारित  on the shell , which is translucent and when empty usually resembles amber in color .
This species is endemic to the United States , specifically the state of Arizona and  यूटा , जहाँ it थी पहला एकत्रित  in the early 20th century .
It has been listed as  endangered on the संयुक्त राज्य मछली और वन्यजीव सेवा  list of endangered species since 8 August 1991 .
This snail lives in wetlands , springs , and seeps , and only two of its natural habitats are known to exist : Three  झीलों , a मर्ग निकट kanab , यूटा , और vasey 's स्वर्ग , a वसन्त साथ the कोलोराडो नदी भीतर ग्रैंड  Canyon National Park .
In its natural habitat  it is बल्कि polyphagous , feeding मुख्यतः  on bacteria , plants and fungi , and reproduces during the summer .
Now considered a Critically Endangered species  on the आईयूसीएन रेड सूची of threatened प्रजाति due to a श्रेणी of कारकों  ( including influence ) , the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three springs above the historic high water level along the Colorado River .
The Spanish language is the second  सबसे प्रयुक्त भाषा in the संयुक्त  States .
There are more Spanish speakers in the United States than there are speakers of Chinese , French ,  जर्मनी , इतालवी , हवाई  , and the Native American languages combined .
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. Census Bureau ,  स्पेनी is the प्राथमिक भाषा बोला at घर  by almost 37 million people aged five or older , a figure more than double that of 1990 .
There are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language , as well as six million Spanish  भाषा विद्यार्थी , composing the largest नेशनल spanish-speaking  community outside of Mexico and making Spanish the Romance language and the Indo-European language with largest number of native speakers in the world .
Roughly half of all U.S. Spanish speakers also  बोलो अंग्रेज़ी `` बहुत खूब , '' आधारित  on the self-assessment Census question respondents .
The language came to the country since the 16th and  17th सदियां साथ the आगमन of स्पेनी colonists in क्षेत्रों कि होता बाद  become the states of Florida , Texas , Colorado , New Mexico , Arizona , Nevada , Utah , and California and of the Spanish explorers - who explored areas of 42 states- .
Also west of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French recovery of territory ) ,  बाद the फ्रेंच और भारतीय  War .
After of the incorporation of these states to the U.S. in first half of 19th century ,  the स्पेनी भाषा थी बाद reinforced by the अधिग्रहण of प्यूर्टो रीको in 1898 और by  later waves of the Hispanic emigration , basically from Hispanic America , to the United States beginning in the second half of 19th century until today .

The  टोकियो mew mew manga और दुश्मनी  series features a cast of characters designed by Mia Ikumi .
The series  takes प्लेस in टोकियो , जापानी , जहाँ पाँच adolescent लड़कियों , पुकारा  Mew Mews , are infused with the DNA of endangered species to combat aliens attempting to take over the Earth .
The manga series is followed by a short sequel series , Tokyo Mew Mew a la Mode , which  introduces a नई mew mew और a नई threat  .
The Mew Mews are led by the main character , Ichigo Momomiya  , जिनकी पहला कार्य is to एकत्रित the अन्य चार mew mews : मिंट aizawa  , Lettuce Midorikawa , Pudding Fong , and Zakuro Fujiwara .
As the series progresses , Ichigo  goes इससे having a crush on masaya aoyama to  becoming his girlfriend while trying to hide her secret double life from him .
The series antagonists include three aliens , Kish , Pie , and Tart , and  उनके नेता  , Deep Blue .
Originally from Earth , the aliens were forced to leave long ago due to  घातक पर्यावरणीय परिवर्तन  .
They have returned to kill the humans , who they feel are destroying their  ग्रह , और reclaim the ग्रह  .
In a la Mode , middle school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew Mew and , in the absence  of ichigo , the अस्थाई नेता  of the Mew Mews .
A la Mode also introduces new  नियत of antagonists , the  Saint Rose Crusaders , a group of human teenagers with various psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia .
Led by Duke , they make several attempts to  मार बेरी ,  eventually turning the local populace against the Mew Mews .
ikumi 's आरंभिक दृष्टि लिये टोकियो  Mew Mew was a story called Tokyo Black Cat Girl that featured a cat-girl battling alien invaders .
After the  स्टोरी थी transitioned to a  more upbeat story of five female superheroes , the character designs were redone to have a lighter , more colorful feel .
The main series characters were praised for  होने a पूर्ण अनुरूप लिये the overall स्टोरी  , as well as for their cute appearances .
The characters introduced in a la Mode  यहूद भी praised  for their visual appearances , but criticized as being repeats of the original series .
The character Duke was also criticized for having a  डिज़ाइन reminiscent of the श्वेत  supremacy group , the Ku Klux Klan .

Sedimentary rocks are types of  चट्टान कि हैं formed by the deposition  of material at the Earth 's surface and within bodies of water .
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral and/or organic particles ( detritus ) to settle and  accumulate or खनिज to precipitate इससे  a solution .
Particles that form a sedimentary rock by  accumulating हैं पुकारा sediment  .
Before  होने deposited , sediment थी formed  by weathering and erosion in a source area , and then transported to the place of deposition by water , wind , ice , mass movement or glaciers which are called agents of denudation .
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents of the Earth 's crust is extensive , but the total contribution of sedimentary rocks is estimated to be only 8 % of the  कुल आवाज़  of the crust .
Sedimentary rocks are only a thin veneer  over a क्रस्ट consisting  mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks .
Sedimentary rocks are deposited in layers as strata , forming a  ढांचा पुकारा bedding .
The study of sedimentary  रॉक्स और चट्टान strata provides  information about the subsurface that is useful for civil engineering , for example in the construction of roads , houses , tunnels , canals or other constructions .
Sedimentary rocks are also important sources of natural resources like coal , fossil fuels ,  पीने  water or ores .
The study of the sequence  of sedimentary चट्टान strata is the प्रमुख सोर्स लिये वैज्ञानिक  knowledge about the Earth 's history , including palaeogeography , paleoclimatology and the history of life .
the वैज्ञानिक अनुशासन  that studies the properties and origin of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology .
Sedimentology is both part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the Earth sciences  , ऐसे as pedology , geomorphology  , geochemistry or structural geology .
