A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês , from σταλαγμίας -  stalagmias , `` छोड़ने , trickling '' ) is a प्रकार  of speleothem that rises from the floor of a limestone cave due to the dripping of mineralized solutions and the deposition of calcium carbonate .
This stalagmite  गठन occurs तभी अंतर्गत निश्चित  pH conditions within the underground cavern .
The corresponding  गठन on the छत of a  cave is known as a stalactite .
If these formations grow together , the result  is ज्ञात as a कालम  .
The Hall of Giants in the  carlsbad caverns
Stalagmites should normally not be touched , since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating out of the water solution onto the old surface ; skin oils can  alter the सतह जहाँ the खनिज जल होगा चिपकी , यूँ affecting  the growth of the formation .
Oils and dirt from human  सम्पर्क can भी दाग the गठन  and change its color permanently .
Similar structures can also form in lava tubes ,  संबद्ध साथ कुछ प्रकार of lavacicles , हालांकि the यांत्रिकी  of formation is very different .
Stalactites and stalagmites can also form on concrete ceilings and  floors , हालांकि वे रूप much अधिक rapidly  there than in the natural cave environment .
The largest stalagmite in the world is high and is  स्तिथ in the गुफा of cueva  Martin Infierno , Cuba .
In the  ज़ाग्रोस kyu  of south Iran , approximately from the ancient city of Bishapur , in the Shapur cave on the fourth of five terraces stands the 3rd century CE statue of Shapur I , second ruler of the Sassanid Empire .
The statue , carved from one stalagmite , is  nearly ऊँची  .
How I Met Your Mother is an American sitcom that  premiered on सीबीएस on सितंबर  19 , 2005 .
The show was created by  क्रेग थामस और  Carter Bays .
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030 , when Ted Mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter (  lyndsy fonseca  ) and son ( David Henrie ) to tell them the story of how he met their mother .
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single , 27-year-old architect  जीना साथ उसके दो बेहतरीन मित्रों इससे wesleyan विश्वविद्यालयों , मार्शल eriksen ( जेसन सेगल ) , a विधि छात्र , और लिली एल्ड्रिन ( alyson हनिंगन ) , a किंडरगार्टन  teacher , who have been dating for almost nine years when Marshall proposes .
Their engagement causes Ted to think about finding his own soul mate , much  to the disgust  of his friend Barney Stinson ( Neil Patrick Harris ) , a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job .
And thus , Ted begins his search for his perfect mate , and  meets रोबिन scherbatsky  ( Cobie Smulders ) , whom he also befriends .
The 100th episode of How I Met Your  माँ aired  on January 11 , 2010 .
On December 21 , 2012 ,  the श्रेणी थी नवीनीकृत  for a ninth season .
On January 30 , 2013  , it थी घोषित  that Season 9 will be its final season .
Gringo ( , , ) is a slang Spanish and Portuguese word used in Ibero-America , to denote  विदेशियों , प्रायः इससे the संयुक्त  States .
The term can be applied to  किसी जो is दरअसल a foreigner  , or it can denote a strong association or assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture .
In Spanish it does not have a  ऋणात्मक connotation  .
Roger Axtell , a travel  तहज़ीब विशेषज्ञ , टीप कि ``  [ t ] he word gringo is not necessarily a bad word .
It is  कठबोली लकिन is अपमानजनक  only in its use and context . ''
The  शब्द थी प्रयुक्त in स्पेन long पहले it crossed  the Atlantic to denote foreign , non-native speakers of Spanish .
The  ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क , carcharodon carcharias , भी ज्ञात as  the great white , white pointer , white shark , or white death , is a species of large lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal surface waters of all the major oceans .
The great white shark is mainly known for its size , with the largest individuals known to have approached or  exceeded in लंबाई  , and in weight .
This shark reaches  इसके परिपक्वता around  15 years of age and can have a life span of over 30 years .
The great white shark is arguably the world 's largest known extant macropredatory fish ,  और is एक of the प्राथमिक  predators of marine mammals .
It is also known  to शिकार upon a किस्में of अन्य समुद्री  animals , including fish and seabirds .
It is the only known surviving  प्रजाति of इसके genus carcharodon ,  and is ranked first in having the most attacks on humans .
The IUCN list the great white shark as a vulnerable species , while it is included in  परिशिष्ट ii of  CITES .
The bestselling novel Jaws by Peter Benchley and  the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर फिल्मी  by Steven Spielberg depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious man eater `` .
in वास्तविकता , इंसानो  are not the preferred prey of the great white shark .
The United States Armed Forces are  the सैन्य शक्तियां of  the United States of America .
वे consist of the फौज  , Navy , Marine Corps , Air Force , and Coast Guard .
The U.S. has a  दमदार परंपरा of  civilian control of the military .
The President is the military 's overall head , and helps form military policy with the U.S. Department of Defense ( DoD )  , a संघीय कार्यपालिका विभाग , एक्टिंग as the प्रिंसिपल अंग by  which military policy is carried out .
the dod is headed  by the Secretary of Defense , who is a civilian and Cabinet member .
The Defense Secretary is second in the military 's chain of command , just below the President , and serves as  the प्रिंसिपल सहायक to the  President in all DoD-related matters .
To coordinate military action with  कूटनीति , the अध्यक्ष रै an सलाहकार नेशनल  Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor .
Both the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member Joint Chiefs of Staff , which includes the head of each  of the रक्षा विभाग  's service branches as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau .
Leadership is provided  by the अध्यक्ष of the  Joint Chiefs of Staff and the Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff .
The Commandant of the Coast Guard is not a member of the  संयुक्त chiefs  of Staff .
All of the branches work  साथ दौरान परिचालन और संयुक्त मिशन ,  under the Unified Combatant Commands , under the authority of the Secretary of Defense with the exception of the Coast Guard .
The Coast Guard falls  अंतर्गत the प्रशासन of the  Department of Homeland Security and receives its operational orders from the Secretary of Homeland Security .
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the Department of the Navy by the  अध्यक्ष or कॉंग्रेस दौरान a  time of war .
All five armed services are among the seven uniformed services of the United States ; the others are the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps and the National Oceanic  और वायुमंडलीय प्रशासन commissioned  Corps .
From the time of its inception , the military  निभाई a निर्णायक  role in the history of the United States .
A sense of national unity and identity was forged as a result of victory in the First  barbary युद्ध और the दूसरी  Barbary War .
Even so , the Founders were suspicious of a permanent  सैन्य फ़ोर्स और नहीं जबतक the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii किया  a large standing army become officially established .
The National Security Act of 1947 , adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset , created the modern U.S. military framework ;  the अधिनियम मिलाया previously cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध और the विभाग of the नेवी into  the National Military Establishment ( renamed the Department of Defense in 1949 ) , headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council .
The U.S. military is one of the largest  militaries in शर्तें of क्रमांक  of personnel .
It draws its manpower from a large pool of paid volunteers ; although  conscription रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in the पास्ट in विभिन्न टाइम्स of दोनो  war and peace , it has not been used since 1972 .
As of 2013 , the U.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to fund its military forces , and  appropriates लगभग  $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations .
Put together , the U.S. constitutes roughly 43  प्रतिशत of the संसार 's  military expenditures .
The U.S. Armed Forces as a whole possess large quantities of advanced and powerful equipment , along with widespread placement of forces around the world  , giving उन्हें significant सामर्थ्य in दोनो रक्षा और  power projection .
Freedom of speech is the  राजनैतिक सही to communicate  one 's opinions and ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive them .
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously , but includes any act of  seeking , receiving और imparting सूचना or विचार  , regardless of the medium used .
In practice , the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations , as with libel , slander , obscenity , sedition ( including , for example inciting ethnic hatred ) ,  कापीराइट उल्लंघन , रहस्योद्घाटन  of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights  और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय  human rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek , receive and impart information and ideas of  सब kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in लिखने or in छपाई , in the रूप of आर्ट , or through  any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and  जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी ``  [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to  कारण धार्मिक ठोकर , ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों  Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
The Big Bang Theory  लोगो  .
The Big Bang Theory is an American comedy television series created and executive produced  by चक lorre और  Bill Prady .
Like the name of the series itself ,  साथ the एक्सेप्शन of the पहला episode— '' पायलट '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग  Theory always start with `` The '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle , theory or experiment , whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk .
, 133  एपीसोड  have aired .
the बिग बंग  Theory has been renewed for a seventh season .
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced , ; October 14 , 1890 – March 28 , 1969 ) was the  34th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States from 1953 until 1961 .
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States Army during World War II and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility for planning and supervising  the आक्रमण of उत्तर अफ़्रीकी in आपरेशन मशाल in 1942–43  and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front .
In 1951 , he became the first supreme  कमांडर of  NATO .
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry and was reared in a large family in Kansas by parents with  a मजबूत कार्य ethic और  religious background .
as एक of छह  sons , he was conditioned by a competitive atmosphere which instilled self-reliance .
he attended और  graduated from West Point and later married and had two sons .
After World War II , Eisenhower served as Army Chief of Staff under  अध्यक्ष हैरी S. ट्रूमैन , तब assumed  the post of President at Columbia University .
Eisenhower entered the 1952  अध्यक्षीय रेस as a रिपब्लिकन  to counter the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft and to crusade against `` Communism , Korea and corruption '' .
He won by a  भूस्खलन , defeating  Democrat Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition .
In the first year of his presidency , Eisenhower deposed the leader of Iran in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear threats to  conclude the कोरियाई युद्ध साथ चीन  .
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive  नाभिकीय हथियार जबकि reducing the funding  for conventional military forces ; the goal was to keep pressure on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits .
In  1954 , आइज़नहावर पहला articulated the domino  theory in his description of the threat presented by the spread of communism .
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution ,  जिससे सक्रिय उसे to prevent चाइनीज कम्युनिस्ट आक्रामकता विरूद्ध  Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending Taiwan .
When the  soviets शुभारम्भ sputnik in  1957 , he had to play catch-up in the space race .
Eisenhower forced Israel , the UK , and France to end  उनके आक्रमण  of Egypt during the Suez Crisis of 1956 .
In  1958 , he भेजा 15,000 us सैनिकों to लेबनान to prevent  the pro-Western government from falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution .
Near the end of his term , his efforts to set up a summit meeting with the Soviets  collapsed क्युकी of the  U-2 incident .
On the domestic front , he covertly opposed Joseph McCarthy and contributed to the end of McCarthyism  by खुलकर invoking the आधुनिक विस्तारित संस्करण  of executive privilege .
He otherwise left most political  कार्यकलाप to उसके वाइस  President , Richard Nixon .
He was a  मॉडरेट रूढ़िवादी जो  continued New Deal agencies and expanded Social Security .
Among his enduring innovations , he  शुभारम्भ the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली ; the रक्षा उन्नत शोध  Projects Agency ( DARPA ) , which led to the internet , among many invaluable outputs ; the National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA ) , driving peaceful discovery in space ; the establishment of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act .
In  सोशल नीति , he भेजा संघीय  troops to Little Rock , Arkansas , for the first time since Reconstruction to enforce federal court orders to desegregate public schools .
He also signed civil rights  विधान in  1957 and 1960 to protect the right to vote .
He implemented  desegregation of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां in दो  years and made five appointments to the Supreme Court .
He was  the पहला term-limited  president in accordance with the 22nd Amendment .
Eisenhower 's two terms were peaceful ones for the most part and saw considerable economic  समृद्धि मगर लिये a शार्प  recession in 1958–59 .
Eisenhower is often ranked  अत्यधिक among the u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  .
Air Force One is the official air traffic  कंट्रोल कॉल चिह्न of  a United States Air Force aircraft carrying the President of the United States .
In common parlance the term refers to those Air Force aircraft  specifically designed , निर्मित ,  and used for the purpose of transporting the president .
The Presidential aircraft is a prominent symbol of the  अमरीकी प्रेसिडेंसी और इसके शक्ति  .
The idea of designating specific military aircraft  to हस्तांतरण  the President arose in 1943 , when officials of the United States Army Air Forces – the predecessor to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport the President .
A C-87 Liberator Express was reconfigured for use as a presidential  हस्तांतरण ; however , it थी अस्वीकृत by the रहस्य सेवा  amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety record .
A C-54 Skymaster was then converted for presidential use ; this aircraft , dubbed the Sacred Cow , transported President Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference in February 1945 , and was  subsequently प्रयुक्त  for another two years by President Harry S. Truman .
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was created after a 1953 incident during which a flight carrying President Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर डाला the वही airspace  as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign .
Several aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the  सृष्टि of the अध्यक्षीय बेड़े , सहित दो बोइंग 707s introduced  in the 1960s and 1970s , respectively ; since 1990 , the presidential fleet has consisted of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically configured , highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft .
The Air Force is  looking into replacing the दो  VC-25 aircraft with three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017 .
A wedding  वर्षगांठ is the  anniversary of the date a wedding took place .
Traditional  names मौजूद लिये सबसे of उन्हें : लिये उदाहरण , 50 सालो of  marriage is called a `` golden wedding anniversary '' or simply a `` golden anniversary '' .
A scanner with  duplexing स्वचालित  Document Feeder .
In multifunction or all-in-one printers , fax machines , photocopiers and scanners , an automatic document feeder or ADF is a feature which takes several pages and feeds the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier , allowing the user to scan , and  thereby नक़ल , छपाई , or फैक्स , multiple-page दस्तावेज़ बगैर having to हस्तचालित  replace each page .
Most  copiers allow स्कैनिंग on  the flatbed or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a document feeder .
The vast majority of fax machines have an ADF ,  allowing the unattended sending  of multi-page faxes .
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines , some fax machine owners use the fax machine as a  स्कैनर , faxing multi-page  documents to themselves .
Document feeders are described by  गति , in पृष्ठों प्रति मिनट or ppm  , and capacity , usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200 .
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing  स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर  or RADF scans one side of a page , then flips it and scans the other side .
A duplexing automatic document feeder or  dadf scans दोनो पहलू  in one pass .
The advantage of the DADF  is तेज़ गति लिये two-sided  originals .
radfs और dadfs हैं रेटेड in बिंब  per minute ( IPM ) , the number of sides they can scan each minute .
Fair Park is a recreational  और शैक्षणिक जटिल स्तिथ in  Dallas , Texas ( USA ) .
The complex is registered as a Dallas Landmark , National Historic Landmark and is home to nine museums , six performance  सुविधाएं , a लैगून , और the largest  Ferris wheel in North America .
Many of the buildings on the complex were constructed for the Texas Centennial  exposition in 1936 जिससे खींचा over  six million visitors .
Most of the  इमारतें निर्मित लिये the exposition स्टिल  survive and it is recognized as a significant example of Art Deco architecture .
Fair Park  रै महरूम designated  a Great Place in America by the American Planning Association .
The American Planning Association ( APA ) “is an independent ,  not-for-profit शैक्षणिक संगठन कि  provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great Places in American program helps to celebrate  क्षेत्रों साथ “exemplary अक्षर ,  quality , and planning.”
Being designated as a Great Place in America , Fair Park was one of only  टेन शहरों चुनी  in 2011 .
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph ) is the  third-largest  city in California , the tenth-largest in the U.S. , and the county seat of Santa Clara County which is located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay .
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley , which is a major component of  the वृहद सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , a प्रदेश of 8.4  million people and the fifth largest metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the United States .
It is the  largest नगर in उत्तरी  California .
San Jose was founded on November 29 , 1777 , as El Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe  , the पहला civilian  town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California , which later became Alta California .
The city  परोसा as a खेती जातियाँ  to support Spanish military installations at San Francisco and Monterey .
When  कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained statehood in  1850 , San Jose served as its first capital .
After more than 150 years as a  छोटी खेती नगर , सैन जोस और the surrounding  Santa Clara Valley became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay .
San Jose  अनुभवी increased  demand for housing from soldiers and veterans returning from World War II .
सैन जोस तब जारी  its aggressive expansion during the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land area .
The rapid growth of the high-technology and electronics industries further accelerated the transition  इससे an agricultural बीच , to an  urbanized metropolitan area .
By the 1990s , San Jose 's location within the booming local  प्रौद्योगिकी उद्योग  earned the city its nickname , Capital of Silicon Valley .
San Jose now maintains global city status and is the largest city in the San Francisco Bay Area in terms of  जनसांख्यिकी , जमीन क्षेत्रफल , और औद्योगिक विकास  .
The U.S. Census Bureau reported the  जनसांख्यिकी of the  city to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census .
As of  अप्रैल 2013 , the अनुमानित  population of San Jose was 984,000 .
San Jose , along with the Santa Clara Valley , experienced about half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl , with characteristics of intense  शहरी समान to the लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
the नगर रै  taken definite steps to avoid becoming `` L.A. North '' .
However , the sprawl in San Jose is worse than in Los Angeles by measures such as  जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व और पब्लिक पारगमन  safety , investment , and ridership .
Europe depicted  by antwerp cartographer  Abraham Ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers the people inhabiting the European continent since it was first populated in prehistoric times to present , with the first Homo  sapiens arriving between  45,000 and 25,000 BC .
The earliest  settlers to प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय आए दौरान  the paleolithic era .
the आगमन of कृषि  around 7000 BC ushered in the neolithic age .
Neolithic Europe lasted for 4000 years ,  अतिव्यापी साथ metal-using संस्कृतियों कि धीरे  spread throughout the continent .
Technological advances  दौरान the प्रागैतिहासिक आयु tended to arrive  from the Middle East , spreading gradually to the northwest .
Some of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric Europe were Minoan and Mycenaean , which flourished  दौरान the कांस्य आयु जबतक वे collapsed in a छोटी  period of time around 1200 BC .
The period known as classical antiquity  began साथ the वृद्धि of the city-states  of Ancient Greece .
Greek influence reached its  zenith अंतर्गत the  expansive empire of Alexander the Great , spreading throughout Asia .
Northern and western Europe were dominated by the La Tène culture  , a precursor to the  Celts .
रोम , a छोटी city-state traditionally  founded in 753 BC , would grow to become the Roman Republic in 509 BC and would succeed Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization .
the कार्यक्रम of the नियम of जूलियस सीज़र  led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire .
The  साम्राज्य थी बाद विभाजित  by the emperor Diocletian into the Western and Eastern empires .
During the later years of the Roman Empire , the Germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in strength and repeated  हमले led to the पतन of  the Western Roman Empire in AD 476 , a date which traditionally marks the end of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages .
During the Middle Ages , the Eastern Roman Empire survived , though modern  इतिहासकारों refer to इस  state as the Byzantine Empire .
In  पश्चिमी यूरोपीय , germanic peoples स्थानांतरित  into positions of power in the remnants of the former Western Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own .
Of all of the Germanic peoples , the Franks would rise to a position of Hegemony over western Europe , the Frankish Empire reaching  इसके शिखर अंतर्गत शारलेमेन  around AD 800 .
Francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia  होता evolve into the किंगडम of फ़्रांस  , while East Francia would evolve into the Holy Roman Empire , a precursor to modern Germany .
The British Isles were the site of several  large-scale migrations .
Native Celtic peoples had been marginalized during the period of Roman Britain  , और जब the romans abandoned  the British Isles during the 400s , waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927 .
During this period , the Kingdom of Poland  और किंगडम of हंगेरियाई ( 1000–1945 ) यहूद व्यवस्थित  as well .
The Viking Age , a period of  migrations of scandinavian  peoples , dominated the period from the late 700s to the middle 1000s .
Chief among the  viking राज्य थी the साम्राज्य of cnut  the Great , a Danish leader who would become king of England , Denmark , and Norway .
The Normans , a Viking people who settled in Northern France and founded the Duchy of Normandy , would have a significant impact on many parts of Europe , from the Norman conquest of  इंग्लैण्ड to दक्षिणी  Italy and Sicily .
another scandinavian  people , the Rus ' people , would go on to found Kievan Rus ' , an early state which was a precursor for the modern country of Russia .
As the Viking Age drew to a close , the period known as the Crusades  , a श्रेणी of religiously-motivated  military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule , began .
अनेक जेहादी  states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean .
ये यहूद  all short-lived .
The Crusaders would have a  profound प्रभाव  on many parts of Europe .
Their Sack of Constantinople in  1204 brought an abrupt  end to the Byzantine Empire .
विलुप्त श्वान breeds is  a compilation of dog breeds that have become extinct .
Wii Speak  is a माइक्रोफोन  accessory for Nintendo 's Wii video game console .
Connected to the console via USB , the  यंत्र can be लगाई निकट the वीडियो प्रदर्शक ,  allowing voice chat to be conducted with the entire room .
The device features an LED to indicate when the  माइक्रोफोन  is active .
Wii Speak  थी घोषित at निन्टेंडो  's 2008 E3 media briefing .
It was  released separately और bundled  with Animal Crossing : City Folk on November 16 , 2008 , in North America , and was released on December 5 , 2008 , in Europe .
The Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's  gamepad नियंत्रक  .
Nissan  बुद्धिमान  Key®
A smart key is an electronic access and  प्राधिकरण प्रणाली जिससे is उपलब्धियाँ  as an option or standard in several cars .
It was first developed by Siemens in the mid-1990s and introduced by Mercedes-Benz under the  नाम `` keyless go '' in 1998 on the w220 s-class following इसके डिज़ाइन पेटेंट दायर by daimler-benz  on May 17 , 1997 .
univisión ( ) is a  Spanish-language television network in the United States .
The network is primarily dedicated for Latin  अमरीकी परिवारों जो reside  in the United States .
It has the largest audience of Spanish-language television viewers in the world  according to nielsen दरजा  .
Randy Falco , ( CEO as of June 29  , 2011  ) COO , has been in charge of the company since the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010 .
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major  english-language टेलीविज़न संजाल , और is प्रायः a  strong fifth , outranking The CW , with some fourth-place weekly placings , and as of 2012 , even first place rankings for individual programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year .
Univisión is headquartered in New York , and has its major studios , production facilities , and operations in Doral ,  फ्लोरिडा  , a suburb of Miami .
In 2009 , another television studio was  घोषित , univision studios  , to be built in Doral .
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country , with local stations in over 50 markets with large Hispanic and Latino populations and a national cable network feed distributed in markets without either the availability or the  माँग लिये a locally-based स्टेशन  .
Most of  ये स्टेशन एयर पूरा लोकल न्यूज और अन्य लोकल प्रोग्रामिंग in जोड to संजाल shows , और  in major markets such as Los Angeles , New York , and Miami the local newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated station ( O & O ) stations are equally competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise .
Univisión was acquired on March 29 , 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's Saban Capital Group ( who had previously owned the entity Saban Entertainment ) , TPG Capital , L.P. , Providence Equity Partners , Madison Dearborn Partners , and  थामस H. ली साझेदार लिये $ 13.7 अरब or $ 36.25 प्रति  share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt .
The buyout left the company with a debt level of twelve times its annual cash flow , which was  twice the norm in buyouts किया over  the previous two years .
Artist 's  धारणा of a आदिग्रह  disk
The formation and of the Solar System is estimated to have begun 4.6 billion years ago with the gravitational collapse of a small part of a  दानव आणविक बादल  .
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre , forming the Sun , while the rest flattened into a protoplanetary disk out  of जिससे the ग्रह , moons , क्षुद्रग्रह , और अन्य  small Solar System bodies formed .
This widely accepted model , known as the nebular hypothesis , was first developed in the 18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg ,  immanuel kant , और pierre-simon लाप्लास  .
Its  subsequent विकास रै interwoven a किस्में  of scientific disciplines including astronomy , physics , geology , and planetary science .
Since the dawn of the space age in the 1950s and  the डिस्कवरी of extrasolar ग्रह in the 1990s  , the model has been both challenged and refined to account for new observations .
The Solar System has evolved considerably since its  आरंभिक गठन  .
Many moons have formed from  घूमना discs of गैस  and dust around their parent planets , while other moons are thought to have formed independently and later been captured by their planets .
Still others , as the  धरती 's चंद्रमा , may be the  result of giant collisions .
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the present  दिन और have महरूम सेंट्रल to the एवोल्यूशन of the सौर  System .
The positions of the planets often shifted  , और ग्रह have switched स्थान  .
This planetary  माइग्रेशन is अभी विचार to  have been responsible for much of the Solar System 's early evolution .
In roughly 5 billion years , the Sun will cool and expand outward many times its current  व्यास ( बनने a रेड  giant ) , before casting off its outer layers as a planetary nebula and leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a white dwarf .
In the far distant future , the gravity of passing stars will  धीरे reduce the सूर्य 's  retinue of planets .
Some  ग्रह होगा  be destroyed , others ejected into interstellar space .
ultimately , over the कोर्स of  tens of billions of years , it is likely that the Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it .
The Trial (  काफ्का 's असली जर्मनी  title : , later as , and ) is a novel written by Franz Kafka in 1914 and 1915 but not published until 1925 .
One of Kafka 's best-known works , it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by  a रिमोट , अभिगम्य प्राधिकार , साथ  the nature of his crime revealed to neither him nor the reader .
Like Kafka 's other novels , The Trial was never completed ,  हालांकि it करता शामिल a अध्याय जिससे brings  the story to an end .
Because of this there are  निश्चित  inconsistencies which exist within the novel , such as disparities in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration .
बाद काफ्का 's मौत in  1924 his friend and literary executor Max Brod edited the text for publication by Verlag Die Schmiede .
The original manuscript is held at the Museum of Modern  साहित्य , marbach am neckar  , Germany .
In 1999 , the  किताब थी सूचीबद्ध in le mondes 100 किताबे of the  Century and as No . 2 of the Best German Novels of the Twentieth Century .
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born March 11 , 1968 ) is an  अमरीकी singer-songwriter  and actress .
She launched her career in 1994 with the song , `` Stay ( I Missed You ) `` , which was included  in the फिल्मी वास्तविकता bites  .
She was the  पहला कलाकार to  have a number one single in the United States while not signed to a recording contract .
Her five studio CDs include her major label debut , the gold-selling Tails and its  follow-up , the grammy-nominated , gold-selling पटाखा  .
Loeb has  भी worked in फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न  , voice-over work and children’s recordings .
Loeb has appeared in two television series , Dweezil & Lisa  , a साप्ताहिक culinary एडवेंचर लिये the खाना संजाल और क्रमांक  1 Single , a reality show on the E !
Network in 2006 focused  on उसके क्वेस्ट लिये प्रेम  , success , career , and family .
Her children 's music includes the albums  कैच the चंद्रमा  ( 2003 ) , and Camp Lisa ( 2008 ) .
Her first joint children 's book and album Lisa Loeb 's Silly  sing-along : the निराशाजनक पैनकेक  and Other Zany Songs was published in 2011 .
In 2010 she founded the Lisa Loeb Eyewear Collection ,  जिससे is आधारित  on her own designs .
The Coat of arms of the State of  नई जर्सी शामिलs:
A shield with three  plows emblazoned , प्रतिनिधि  of New Jersey 's agricultural tradition .
A  forward-facing  knight 's helmet .
A horse 's head as the crest of  the हेल्मेट  .
The female figures Liberty and Ceres , representative of  the राज्य 's motto ( देखिए अगला  item ) .
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a ``  स्वतंत्रता कैप `` ; ceres  is holding an overflowing cornucopia .
The streamer at the  पैर of the emblem  contains the State Motto of New Jersey , `` Liberty and Prosperity '' , and the year of statehood , 1776 .
It was originally  designed  by Pierre Eugene du Simitiere in 1777 and was modified slightly in 1928 .
The seal is the central motif in the flag of New Jersey and the  ग्रेट मुहर of the राज्य  of New Jersey .
The Coat of arms  contains a घोड़ा  's head .
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows  on a शील्ड referring to the राज्य  's agriculture tradition , giving it the nickname `` Garden State '' .
The  दो देवियाँ represent the  State motto , `` Liberty and Prosperity '' .
स्वतंत्रता  is on the left .
She is holding a staff with a liberty cap on it , and the word liberty  underneath उसके  .
the देवी  on the right is Ceres , goddess of agriculture .
She is  पकड़कर a cornucopia  with prosperity written below her .
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11 , 1896 , the date in which the Assembly officially approved the flag as the state emblem , the buff color is  due indirectly to जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , जो था ordered on अक्तूबर 2 , 1779 , कि the वर्दी coats of the नई  Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue , with buff facings .
Buff-colored facings  था जबतक तब महरूम सुरक्षित तभी लिये उसके अपना  uniform and those of other Continental generals and their aides .
Then , on February 28 , 1780 , the Continental War Officers in Philadelphia directed that the  वर्दी कोट facings of सब regiments यहूद to be the वही  as the background color of the regiments ' state flag .
the मुहर is  described in New Jersey statute Title 52 , §2-1:
`` We Can Work It Out  '' is a सोंग by the  Beatles , written by Paul McCartney and John Lennon .
It was released as a `` double A-sided `` single with `` Day Tripper `` , the first time both sides of a single were so  designated  in an initial release .
Both songs were  अंकित दौरान  the Rubber Soul sessions .
The song is an example of  lennon–mccartney सहयोग at a गहराई कि happened  only rarely after they wrote the hit singles of 1963 .
This song , `` A Day in the Life `` , `` Baby  , तुम 're a समृद्ध man `` और ``  I 've Got a Feeling `` , are among the notable exceptions .
As a  चिकित्सा निदान , pedophilia or paedophilia  is a psychiatric disorder in persons 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger , though specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ) .
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or older must be at least  पाँच सालो पुरानी than the prepubescent चाइल्ड पहले the आकर्षण  can be diagnosed as pedophilia .
The term has a range of  परिभाषाएं  , as found in psychiatry , psychology , the vernacular , and law enforcement .
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder  of वयस्क व्यक्तित्व और आचरण '' in जिससे वहीँ is a यौन वरीयता  for children of prepubertal or early pubertal age .
according to the निदान और सांख्यिकीय हस्तचालित of दिमागी विकार  ( DSM ) , it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 years of age or older have intense and recurrent sexual urges towards and fantasies about prepubescent children that they have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty .
In popular usage ,  pedophilia अर्थात् कोई यौन ब्याज  in children or the act of child sexual abuse , often termed `` pedophilic behavior '' .
For example , The American Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states , ``  pedophilia is the अधिनियम or  fantasy on the part of an adult of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children . ''
इस आम उपयोग अनुप्रयोग भी extends to the यौन ब्याज  in and sexual contact with pubescent or post-pubescent minors .
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who commit child sexual abuse commonly exhibit the disorder , some offenders do not meet the  नैदानिक निदान मानकों लिये pedophilia और ये मानकों pertain to prepubescents  .
Additionally , not all pedophiles actually commit  ऐसे गाली  .
Pedophilia was first formally recognized and named in  the लेट 19th सदी  .
A significant amount of research in the  क्षेत्रफल  has taken place since the 1980s .
Although mostly documented in men , there are also women who exhibit the disorder , and researchers assume available estimates underrepresent the true number  of मादा pedophiles  .
No cure for pedophilia has been developed , but there are therapies that can reduce the  incidence of a व्यक्ति  committing child sexual abuse .
In the United States , following Kansas v. Hendricks , sex offenders  जो हैं diagnosed साथ  certain mental disorders , particularly pedophilia , can be subject to indefinite civil commitment , under various state laws ( generically called SVP laws ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 .
At present , the exact causes  of  pedophilia have not been conclusively established .
Research suggests that pedophilia may  be correlated साथ  several different neurological abnormalities , and often co-exists with other personality disorders and psychological pathologies .
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement , a variety of typologies have been suggested to categorize  pedophiles according to बर्ताव  and motivations .
Julio César Chávez ( born Julio César Chávez  gonzález on जुलाई 12 , 1962 ) is a  retired Mexican professional boxer .
Chávez is considered by many people for their sport statistics the  महानतम सेनानी कभी  to come out of Mexico .
He is a six-time world champion in three weight  विभाजन , और लिये अनेक सालो he थी माना  one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world .
In a career that spanned over 25 years , Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984 , WBA  lightweight in 1987 , wbc lightweight  in 1988 , WBC Light Welterweight in 1989 , IBF Light Welterweight in 1990 , and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994 .
He holds records for most successful consecutive defenses of world titles ( 27 ) , most title fights ( 37 ) , most title-fight victories ( 31 )  और he is बाद जो लुई साथ ( 23 ) लिये सबसे  title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ) .
Chávez also has the  longest अपराजित  streak in boxing history , 13 years .
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to  फ्रेंकी रान्डेल और था an 87 लड़ो जीत  streak until his `` draw '' with Whitaker .
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding punching power , devastating body attack , remarkably  दमदार chin  and the relentless stalking of his opponents .
He  बाँधने # 24 on ईएसपीएन  's 50 Greatest Boxers Of All Time .
on दिसम्बर  7 , 2010 , he was inducted in the prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011 .
He is the father of  prospect  Omar Chávez and former WBC Middleweight Champion Julio César Chávez , Jr .

To be sent to the right meant slave labor ; to  the बाएँ , the  gas chamber .

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos , `` whole '' and kaustós , `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( Hebrew : , HaShoah , `` catastrophe '' ; Yiddish : , Churben or Hurban , from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ) , was the mass  हत्या or नरसंहार of लगभग छह लाख यहूदियों दौरान संसार युद्ध ii , a कार्यक्रम of व्यवस्थित  state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany , led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party , throughout German-occupied territory .
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in Europe  पहले  the Holocaust , approximately two-thirds were killed .
Over one  लाख यहूदी children यहूद मारे  in the Holocaust , as were approximately two million Jewish women and three million Jewish men .
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied territory were used to concentrate , hold , and kill Jews  और अन्य पीड़ितों  .
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition , and some use the  आम संज्ञा `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य नाजी द्रव्यमान हत्याएं , सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of युद्ध  , Polish and Soviet civilians , and homosexuals .
Recent estimates  आधारित on आंकड़े प्राप्त  since the fall of the Soviet Union indicates some ten to eleven million civilians and prisoners of war were intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime .
The persecution and  नरसंहार यहूद  carried out in stages .
Various laws to remove the Jews from civil society , most prominently the Nuremberg Laws , were enacted in Germany  सालो पहले the outbreak of संसार  War II .
Concentration camps were established in which  inmates यहूद वशीभूत to स्लेव  labor until they died of exhaustion or disease .
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern  यूरोपीय , specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered  Jews and political opponents in mass shootings .
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined  in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by भाड़ा  train to extermination camps where , if they survived the journey , most were systematically killed in gas chambers .
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the logistics that led to the genocides , turning  the तीसरा reich into कया एक holocaust विद्वान रै पुकारा ``  a genocidal state '' .
4-H in the United States is  a युवावस्था संगठन administered by the नेशनल संस्थान of खाना और कृषि of the  United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) , with the mission of `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development . ''
The name represents four personal development areas of focus for the  संगठन : सिर , दिल  , hands , and health .
The organization has over 6.5  लाख सदस्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य , इससे आयु  five to twenty-one , in approximately 90,000 clubs .
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship ,  नेतृत्व , जिम्मेदारी और जीवन कौशल of युवावस्था through  experiential learning programs and a positive youth development approach .
Though typically  विचार of as an agriculturally केन्द्रित संगठन  as a result of its history , 4-H today focuses on citizenship , healthy living , science , engineering , and technology programs .
Today , 4-H and related programs  मौजूद in over अस्सी देशों  around the world ; the organization and administration varies from country to country .
Each of these programs operates independently , but cooperatively through  अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges  , global education programs , and communications .
The 4-H motto is  `` to मेक the बेहतरीन बेहतर '' , जबकि  its slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ) .
The national flag of Chile ,  consists of दो गैरबराबरी आड़ा bands of श्वेत  and red and a blue square the same height as the white band in the canton , which bears a white five-pointed star in the center .
It was  अपनाया on 18  October 1817 .
The Chilean flag is also known in Spanish as La  estrella solitaria ( the लोन  Star ) .
The star represents a guide to  प्रगति और सम्मान ; ब्लू symbolizes the आसमान और the  Pacific Ocean , white is for the snow-covered Andes , and red stands for the blood spilled to achieve independence .
According to the epic poem La Araucana , the colors were  निकला इससे those इससे the ध्वज flown  by the Mapuche during the Arauco War .
`` Flag Day '' is held each year on the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers  जो died in the 1882 बैटल of la concepción  .
पीढी y , भी ज्ञात as  the Millennial Generation , is the demographic cohort following Generation X .
वहीँ हैं no precise  dates for when Generation Y starts and ends .
Commentators use beginning birth dates  इससे the latter  1970s , or from the early 1980s to the early 2000s .
The Torches of Nero , by Henryk  siemiradzki  .
According to Tacitus , Nero targeted Christians as  those जिम्मेदार लिये the आग  .
the ग्रेट आग  of Rome ( ) was an urban fire that occurred beginning 19 July AD 64 .
Virginia ( ) , officially the Commonwealth of Virginia , is a U.S. state  स्तिथ in the दक्षिण अटलांटिक प्रदेश of the संयुक्त  States .
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion ''  और the `` माँ of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद  the eight U.S. presidents born there .
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped by the Blue  लकीरें kyu  and the Chesapeake Bay , which provide habitat for much of its flora and fauna .
The capital  of the राष्ट्रमंडल is  Richmond ; and Virginia Beach is the most populous city .
फेयरफैक्स  County is the most populous political subdivision .
The wealthiest is Loudoun  काउंटी .
The  राष्ट्रमंडल 's जनसांख्यिकी  is over eight million .
The area 's history begins with  अनेक स्वदेशी  groups , including the Powhatan .
In 1607 the London Company established the  उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया as the पहला स्थाई  New World English colony .
Slave labor and  the जमीन acquired इससे विस्थापित देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों  each played a significant role in the colony 's early politics and plantation economy .
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in the American Revolution and joined the Confederacy in the American Civil War , during which  रिचमंड थी बना the confederate पूंजी और वर्जिनिया 's northwestern  counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia .
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction  , दोनो प्रमुख  national parties are competitive in modern Virginia .
The Virginia General  सभा is the oldest विधानमंडल  in the Western Hemisphere .
The state  सरकारी रै महरूम repeatedly  ranked most effective by the Pew Center on the States .
It is unique in how it treats cities and counties equally , manages local  सड़कें , और prohibits इसके राज्यपालों इससे सेवारत लगातार  terms .
Virginia 's economy has many  सेक्टर : कृषि in the shenandoah  Valley ; federal agencies in Northern Virginia , including the headquarters of the Department of Defense and CIA ; and military facilities in Hampton Roads , the site of the region 's main seaport .
Virginia 's public  स्कूलों और अनेक कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों  have contributed to growing media and technology sectors .
As a result ,  कंप्यूटर चिप्स have become  the state 's leading export .
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie Maker ,  codenamed sundance ) is a फ्रीवेयर वीडियो संपादन तन्त्र  by Microsoft .
It is  a भाग of खिड़कियाँ अनिवार्य तन्त्र सुइट और offers the  ability to create and edit videos as well as to publish them on SkyDrive , Facebook , YouTube , and Flickr .
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut  सिंगल by तुपाक  Shakur , and tenth track from his debut album , 2Pacalypse Now .
The  सोंग , जिससे सुविधाएँ r & b सिंगर  Dave Hollister , is about a twelve year-old girl named Brenda who lives in a ghetto , has a baby , and is incapable of supporting it .
The song explores the issue of  टीन गर्भावस्था  and its effect on the young mothers and their families .
Like many of Shakur 's songs , `` Brenda  's मिला a baby '' draws इससे the  plight of the impoverished .
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in general , Shakur criticises the low level  of support इससे the baby 's पिता , the सरकारी  , and society in general .
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got pregnant from her cousin and , because she did not want her parents to know about  the baby , फेंका it in a कचरा can  .
The official logo of Pokémon for its international release ; ``  पोकीमॉन '' is छोटी लिये the असली जापानी  title of `` Pocket Monsters '' .
is a मीडिया मताधिकार प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by जापानी  video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996 .
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable  खेल लड़के role-playing वीडियो  games developed by Game Freak , Pokémon has since become the second-most successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world , behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise .
Pokémon properties have since  महरूम merchandised into दुश्मनी , manga  , trading cards , toys , books , and other media .
The franchise celebrated in 2006 , and , cumulative sales of the video games  ( सहित घर कंसोल संस्करण , ऐसे as the `` pikachu '' निन्टेंडो  64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies .
In November 2005 , 4Kids Entertainment , which had managed the non-game related  लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन , घोषित कि it  had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation agreement .
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International ) , a subsidiary of Japan 's Pokémon Co. , now  oversees सब पोकीमॉन लाइसेंसिंग बाहर of एशिया .
The name Pokémon is the romanized  संकुचन of the जापानी ब्रांड  .
The term Pokémon , in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself , also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in Pokémon media as of the  रिलीज of the पांचवां पीढी शीर्षक पोकीमॉन ब्लैक 2 और श्वेत 2 ; साथ the आगामी रिलीज of पोकीमॉन x और y , 6 नई पोकीमॉन have महरूम प्रदर्शित in प्रचार  for the games .
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and plural , as is each individual species name ; it is grammatically correct to say `` one Pokémon '' and ``  अनेक पोकीमॉन '' , as खूब  as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu '' .

Dada ( ) or  dadaism थी an आर्ट गति of the यूरोपीय  avant-garde in the early 20th century .
Many claim Dada began in  ज्यूरिख , स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1916 , spreading  to Berlin shortly thereafter but the height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915 .
To quote Dona Budd 's  the भाषा of आर्ट ज्ञान , दादा थी  born out of negative reaction to the horrors of World War I .
This international movement was  begun by a समूह of कलाकार और  poets associated with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich .
Dada rejected  कारण और लॉजिक , prizing  nonsense , irrationality and intuition .
The  उत्पत्ति of the नाम  Dada is unclear ; some believe that it is a nonsensical word .
Others  maintain कि it originates  from the Romanian artists Tristan Tzara and Marcel Janco 's frequent use of the words da , da , meaning yes , yes in the Romanian language .
Another  सिद्धान्त says कि the नाम ``  Dada '' came during a meeting of the group when a paper knife stuck into a French-German dictionary happened to point to 'dada ' , a French word for 'hobbyhorse ' .
The movement  primarily शामिल विज़ुअल कला , साहित्य , काव्य  , art manifestoes , art theory , theatre , and graphic design , and concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works .
In addition to being anti-war , Dada was also anti- bourgeois and  था  political affinities with the radical left .
Dada activities included public gatherings , demonstrations , and publication of art/literary journals ; passionate  कवरेज of आर्ट , राजनीती , और संस्कृति यहूद  topics often discussed in a variety of media .
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball , Emmy Hennings , Hans Arp , Raoul Hausmann , Hannah Höch , Johannes Baader ,  ट्रिस्टन tzara , फ्रांसिस picabia , रिचर्ड huelsenbeck , georg  Grosz , John Heartfield , Marcel Duchamp , Beatrice Wood , Kurt Schwitters , and Hans Richter , among others .
The movement influenced later styles like the avant-garde and downtown  म्यूज़िक आंदोलनों , और समूह सहित  surrealism , Nouveau réalisme , pop art and Fluxus .
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound poetry , a starting point for performance art , a prelude to postmodernism , an  influence on पॉप आर्ट , a जश्न of antiart to be बाद embraced लिये  anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism .
पहला  trophic level .
The plants in this image , and the algae and  phytoplankton  in the lake , are primary producers .
They take nutrients from the soil or the water ,  और manufacture उनके अपना खाना by  photosynthesis , using energy from the sun .
The trophic level of an  सजीव is the स्थिति  it occupies in a food chain .
the शब्द trophic गर्भाशयी इससे  the Greek τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding .
A food chain represents a succession of organisms  कि खा  another organism and are , in turn , eaten themselves .
The number of steps an organism is from the start of the chain is a  माप of इसके trophic  level .
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary producers such as plants , move to herbivores at level 2 , predators at  स्तर 3 और typically समाप्त साथ  carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5 .
The path along the chain  can रूप either a one-way  flow , or a food `` web . ''
Ecological  समुदायों साथ  higher biodiversity form more complex trophic paths .
Four of the most important  domesticated रेशा शलभ  .
Top to bottom : Bombyx mori , Hyalophora  cecropia , antheraea  pernyi , Samia cynthia .
From Meyers  konversations-lexikon (  1885-1892 )
A  silk-producing  raspy cricket .
Silk is a natural protein fibre , some  फ़ॉर्म of जिससे can be woven into वस्त्र .
The protein fibre of silk is composed  मुख्यतः of fibroin और  produced by certain insect larvae to form cocoons .
The best-known type of silk is obtained from the cocoons of the larvae of  the शहतूत silkworm bombyx mori reared in  captivity ( sericulture ) .
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the silk fibre  , जिससे allows रेशा cloth to  refract incoming light at different angles , thus producing different colors .
Silks are produced by several other insects , but  generally तभी  the silk of moth caterpillars has been used for textile manufacturing .
There has been some research into other silks , which differ  at the आणविक स्तर .
Many silks are mainly produced by the larvae of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis , but some adult insects such as webspinners produce silk , and some insects such  as raspy झींगुर उपज रेशा  throughout their lives .
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees , wasps , and ants )  , silverfish , mayflies , thrips  , leafhoppers , beetles , lacewings , fleas , flies and midges .
अन्य प्रकार  of arthropod produce silk , most notably various arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ) .
Late Show with David Letterman is an  अमरीकी late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted  by David Letterman on CBS .
The  दिखाएँ debuted on अगस्त 30 , 1993 , और is उत्पादित  by Letterman 's production company , Worldwide Pants Incorporated .
The show  's म्यूज़िक निदेशक और band-leader of the हाउस  band , the CBS Orchestra , is Paul Shaffer .
The head  लेखक is मैट रॉबर्ट्स  and the announcer is Alan Kalter .
Of  the प्रमुख u.S. late-night कार्यक्रम  , Late Show ranks second in cumulative average viewers over time and third in number of episodes over time .
The  दिखाएँ लीड अन्य लेट रात्रि shows  in ad revenue with $ 271 million in 2009 .
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time , but is recorded Monday through  बुधवार at 4:30 p.m. , और गुरुवार at 3:30 p.m और 6:00  p.m .
The second Thursday episode usually  airs on शुक्रवार of कि सप्ताह  .
In 2002 , Late Show with David  लेटरमैन थी क्रमित no . 7 on tv  Guide 's 50 Greatest TV Shows of All Time .
CBS has a contract with  विश्वव्यापी पैंट to continue  the show through 2014 ; by then , Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host .
The Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality documentary television  कार्यक्रम on ब्रावो , नियत in नारंगी काउंटी  , California .
It was the first The Real  housewives कार्यक्रम in the  series .
The series is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy lives of these housewives , as  वे दूकान , मिलेंगी प्लास्टिक सर्जरी , गपशप  , fight and live lavishly .
The financial crisis , the beginning of which coincided almost exactly with the first season 's broadcast ,  रै चूंकि trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles साथ जॉब नुकसान , evictions , बंधक मूलभूत  , foreclosures , and marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show .
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or other  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अर्थात् to stalk or harass an व्यक्तिगत  , a group of individuals , or an organization .
It may include the making of false accusations or statements of fact ( as in defamation ) , monitoring , making threats , identity theft , damage to data or equipment , the  solicitation of नाबालिग लिये sex , or  gathering information that may be used to harass .
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a  उचित व्यक्ति , in कब्ज़ा of the वही सूचना , होता  regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress .
Cyberstalking is different from  स्थानिक or ऑफ़लाइन stalking in कि it occurs  through the use of electronic communications technology such as the internet .
However , it sometimes leads to it  , or  is accompanied by it .
Both are  दण्ड  offenses .
Cyberstalking shares important  विशेषताएँ साथ ऑफ़लाइन stalking  .
Many stalkers – online or off – are  प्रेरित by a ख्वाहिश  to control their victims .
A cyberstalker may be an  ऑनलाइन अजनबी  or a person whom the target knows .
A cyberstalker may be  बेनाम और may  solicit involvement of other people online who do not even know the target .
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that comes into play under state  anti-stalking कानून , बदनामी कानून , और  harassment laws .
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining order , probation , or even criminal penalties  विरूद्ध the assailant , सहित  jail .
A business letter is usually used when writing from one company to another , or for correspondence between such organizations and their customers ,  क्लाइंट और अन्य  external parties .
The overall style of letter will  निर्भर on the संबंध  between the parties concerned .
वहीँ हैं अनेक कारण  to write a business letter .
It  could  be to request direct information or action from another party , to order supplies from a supplier , to identify a mistake that was committed , to reply directly to a request , to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill .
Even today , the business letter  is स्टिल बहुत उपयोगी  because it produces a permanent record , is confidential , formal and delivers persuasive , well-considered messages .
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a hundred  प्रजाति of cichlid मछली इससे  the tilapiine cichlid tribe .
tilapia हैं मुख्यतः freshwater  fish , inhabiting shallow streams , ponds , rivers and lakes , and less commonly found living in brackish water .
Historically , they have been of major importance in artisan fishing in Africa  और the levant , और  are of increasing importance in aquaculture .
Tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats , whether deliberately or accidentally introduced ,  लकिन generally नहीं in शीतोष्ण climates due to  their inability to survive in cooler waters below about .
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy drama crime film starring Tom Hanks  और beasley the श्वान as the eponymous वर्ण  , Turner and Hooch respectively .
The film also stars Mare  winningham  , Craig T. Nelson , and Reginald VelJohnson .
It was directed by Roger Spottiswoode ; the film was originally slated to be  निर्देशित  by Henry Winkler , but he was terminated due to `` creative differences '' .
It  थी co-written  by Michael Blodgett from Beyond the Valley of the Dolls fame .
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released prior to this  फिल्मी ( exactly तीन महीने पहले ) , टर्नर & hooch  became more popular and seemingly overshadowed its greater success , even though K-9 had a very similar plot .
A pilot for a Turner & Hooch TV series was  बना और भागा as a भाग of  The Magical World of Disney .

Adolf Hitler (  ; 20 अप्रैल 1889 – 30 अप्रैल 1945 ) थी an आस्ट्रिया -born  German politician and the leader of the Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ) .
He  थी चांसलर of जर्मनी इससे  1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi Germany ( as Führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945 .
हिटलर थी at the केन्द्र  of Nazi Germany , World War II in Europe , and the Holocaust .
Hitler was a decorated  दिग्गज of  World War I .
He joined the German Workers ' Party ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919 , and became leader of  the nsdap  in 1921 .
In  1923 , he attempted  a coup d'état in Munich , known as the Beer Hall Putsch .
The failed coup resulted in  हिटलर 's कारावास  , during which time he wrote his memoir , Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ) .
After his release in 1924 , Hitler gained popular support by attacking the Treaty of  versailles और promoting pan-germanism , antisemitism  , and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda .
After his appointment as  चांसलर in 1933 , he रूपांतरित the  Weimar Republic into the Third Reich , a single-party dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism .
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New Order of  निरपेक्ष नाजी जर्मनी  hegemony in continental Europe .
To this end , his foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing  lebensraum ( `` जीना स्पेस '' ) लिये the  Germanic people .
He directed the  rearmament  of Germany and the invasion of Poland by the Wehrmacht in September 1939 , resulting in the outbreak of World War II in Europe .
Under Hitler 's rule , in 1941 German forces and their European  allies occupied सबसे of यूरोपीय  and North Africa .
In 1943 , Germany had  महरूम मजबूर onto the रक्षात्मक  and suffered a series of escalating defeats .
In the final  दिनों of the युद्ध , दौरान  the Battle of Berlin in 1945 , Hitler married his long-time partner , Eva Braun .
On 30 April 1945 , less than two days later , the two committed  आत्महत्या to avoid कैप्चर by the रेड  Army , and their corpses were burned .
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is  माना the प्रमुख कारण  of the outbreak of World War II in Europe .
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated ideology  resulted in the मौतों of at तनिक 5.5 लाख यहूदियों , और लाखो  of other people deemed racially inferior .
अंगूठा
A domain name is an  पहचान स्ट्रिंग कि defines a फ्रेम of  administrative autonomy , authority , or control on the Internet .
Domain names are formed by the rules and procedures of the  डोमेन  Name System ( DNS ) .
Technically , any name registered in  the डीएनएस is  a domain name .
Domain names are used  in विभिन्न नेटवर्किंग contexts और  application-specific naming and addressing purposes .
In general , a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource , such as a personal computer used to access the Internet , a server  कंप्यूटर होस्टिंग a वेब साईट , or the वेब साईट itself  or any other service communicated via the Internet .
Domain names are organized in subordinate levels  ( subdomains ) of  the DNS root domain , which is nameless .
The first-level set of domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ) , including the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs ) , such as  the prominent डोमेन com , सूचना , जाल और  org , and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ) .
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are  typically खोलें लिये रिज़र्वेशन by end-users जो काश to कनेक्ट लोकल  area networks to the Internet , create other publicly accessible Internet resources or run web sites .
the पंजीकरण of ये  domain names is usually administered by domain name registrars who sell their services to the public .
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN ) is a domain  नाम कि is completely  specified in the hierarchy of the DNS , having no omitted parts .
Domain names are usually  लिखा in लोअरकेस  , although labels in the Domain Name System are case-insensitive .
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the  आणविक सूत्र no3− और a आणविक द्रव्यमान of 62.0049  g/mol . Nitrates also describe the organic functional group RONO2 .
These nitrate  esters हैं a specialized  class of explosives .
A  गेहूं कटाई  in Idaho
This photo from a 1921  ज्ञानकोष shows a ट्रैक्टर  ploughing a crop field .
Agriculture is a major industry in the United States and the country is a  जाल निर्यातक of खाना  .
As of the last census of agriculture in 2007 , there were 2.2 million farms ,  covering an क्षेत्रफल of , an  average of per farm .
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states , it is particularly  concentrated in the विशाल expanse  of flat , arable land known as the Great Plains , which encompasses the central region of the nation .
The Mpemba effect , named after Tanzanian student  erasto mpemba , is the assertion  that warmer water can freeze faster than colder water .
Although there is anecdotal support for the effect , there is no agreement on  exactly कया the प्रभाव is और  under what circumstances it occurs .
There have been reports of similar phenomena since  प्राचीन टाइम्स , हालांकि साथ अपर्याप्त विवरण  for the claims to be replicated .
The phenomenon seems contrary to  ऊष्मागतिकी , लकिन a क्रमांक of संभावित स्पष्टीकरण  for the effect have been proposed .
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise definition of `` freezing '' and control a vast number  of starting पैरामीटर्स in अनुक्रम  to confirm or explain the effect .
The  siamese ( ,  ) is one of the first distinctly recognized breeds of Oriental cat .
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam ) , where they are one of several native breeds and are  पुकारा wichian mat ( วิเชียรมาศ  , a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ) .
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became one of the most popular  breeds in यूरोपीय और  North America .
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue , Washington , with 64 stores in the Puget Sound  प्रदेश of वॉशिंगटन राज्य और in  the Portland , Oregon metropolitan area .
In economics , the money supply or money stock , is the total amount of monetary assets available in an  अर्थव्यवस्था at a विशिष्ट समय  .
There are several ways to define `` money , '' but standard measures usually include currency in circulation and demand deposits ( depositors ' easily accessed assets on the books  of वित्तीय संस्थानों ) .
Money supply data are recorded and published , usually by  the सरकारी or  the central bank of the country .
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored  परिवर्तन in धन सप्लाई क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव  on the price level , inflation , the exchange rate and the business cycle .
That relation between money  और कीमतें is historically  associated with the quantity theory of money .
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth and long-term price inflation , at least for rapid increases in the  राशि of धन in the अर्थव्यवस्था .
That is , a country such as Zimbabwe which saw rapid increases in its money  सप्लाई भी देखी रैपिड increases  in prices ( hyperinflation ) .
This is one  कारण लिये  the reliance on monetary policy as a means of controlling inflation .
The nature  of इस  causal chain is the subject of contention .
Some heterodox economists argue that the money supply is  endogenous ( संकल्पित by the workings  of the economy , not by the central bank ) and that the sources of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the economy .
In addition , those economists  देखकर the सेंट्रल बैंको 's कंट्रोल over the धन सप्लाई as feeble कह कि  there are two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate .
First , in the aftermath of a recession , when many resources are underutilized ,  an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई can कारण a sustained  increase in real production instead of inflation .
Second , if the velocity of money , i.e. , the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply , changes ,  an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई could have  either no effect , an exaggerated effect , or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP .
