IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion picture film format and a  नियत of सिनेमा प्रक्षेप मानकों  created by the Canadian company IMAX Corporation .
IMAX has the  क्षमता to रिकार्ड और प्रदर्शक बिंब  of far greater size and resolution than conventional film systems .
Since 2002 , some feature films have been converted ( or  upgraded ) into imax स्वरूप लिये प्रदर्शक in imax  theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX .
IMAX is the most widely used system for special-venue  फिल्मी प्रस्तुतियों  .
, वहीँ हैं  697 IMAX theatres in 52 countries .
Today 's Special is a Canadian children 's  टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ उत्पादित by क्लाइव vanderburgh  at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987 .
It also ran on  निकलोडियन और the आस्था और मान channel/odyssey  ( now the Hallmark Channel ) as well as many PBS stations throughout the United States .
It was set in a department store , based on  the फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the अभी defunct  Simpson 's in Toronto .
Many sequences for it were shot at the Queen  गली  West and Yonge Street store after hours .
संविधानवाद , in इसके सबसे सामान्य अर्थ , is ``  a complex of ideas , attitudes , and patterns of behavior elaborating the principle that the authority of government derives from and is limited by a body of fundamental law '' .
A political organization is constitutional to the  extent कि it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल लिये the सुरक्षा of the रूचि  and liberties of the citizenry , including those that may be in the minority `` .
As described by political  वैज्ञानिक और संवैधानिक  scholar David Fellman :
An ice-cream headache , also known as brain freeze ,  cold-stimulus सिरदर्द , or इसके दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia (  meaning `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ) , is a form of brief cranial pain or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops .
It is caused by having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ) , and  is believed to परिणाम  from a nerve response causing rapid constriction and swelling of blood vessels or a `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the head .
The rate of intake for  ठंडा भोजन रै महरूम  studied as a contributing factor .
There are people who  can नहीं अनुभव `` दिमाग  freeze '' or similar symptoms .
The term ice-cream headache has been in use since at least 31 January 1937 , contained in  a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by रेबेका timbres प्रकाशित in  the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia .
The first published use of the term brain freeze , as  it pertains to cold-induced headaches , थी on  27 May 1991 .
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s ''  बल्कि than ``  z '' ) is a Scots poem written by Robert Burns in 1788 and set to the tune of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ) .
It is well known in many countries , especially in the  english-speaking संसार ; इसके परंपरागत उपयोग होने to celebrate the  start of the New Year at the stroke of midnight .
By extension , it is also  सुंग at अंत्येष्टि , graduations और  as a farewell or ending to other occasions .
The international Boy Scout youth movement , in  अनेक देशों , उपयोग it as a बंद  to jamborees and other functions .
The song 's Scots title may be translated into English literally as `` old long since '' , or more idiomatically  , `` long long पहले '' , `` दिनों गए by '' or ``  old times '' .
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '' ,  as it appears  in the first line of the chorus , might be loosely translated as `` for ( the sake of ) old times '' .
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in similar poems by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ) , Allan Ramsay ( 1686–1757 ) , and James Watson ( 1711  ) as खूब as पुरानी लोक गीतों predating  Burns .
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase  `` in the दिनों of auld लैंग syne ''  as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time ...
`` in his retelling of fairy  किस्से in the स्कॉट्स भाषा  .
Ben Schulz  , खिलाड़ी of  Leeroy Jenkins at BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins , sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and often elongated  साथ numerous अतिरिक्त अक्षर , is  an Internet meme named for a player character created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG , World of Warcraft .
The character became popular due to a video of  the खेल कि परिचालित around  the Internet .
The phenomenon has since  स्प्रेड परे the सीमाएँ  of the gaming community into other online and mainstream media .
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police  अधिकारी योहानेस mehserle in ओकलैंड  , California , United States , in the early morning hours of New Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit train returning from San Francisco , BART Police officers detained Oscar  ग्रान्ट और अनेक अन्य यात्री on the मंच at the fruitvale बार्ट स्टेशन  .
Officer Johannes Mehserle and another officer  यहूद restraining  Grant , who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest .
Officer Mehserle stood and , according to witnesses , said : `` Get back  , i 'm gon na tase  him . ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun and shot  ग्रान्ट एकबार in the वापस ; mehserle appeared  stunned , put his hands to his head and exclaimed , `` Oh , my God ! ''
During his court testimony  , mehserle कहा कि ग्रान्ट  then exclaimed , `` You shot me ! ''
Grant turned out  to be निहत्थे ; he  was pronounced dead the next morning at Highland Hospital in Oakland .
The events were captured on multiple  डिजिटल वीडियो और कोशिका  phone cameras .
The footage was disseminated to media  आउटलेट और to विभिन्न वेबसाइटों  , where it was watched millions of times .
The following days saw  दोनो शांतिपूर्ण और हिंसक  protests .
The shooting  रै महरूम variously  labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution .
On January 13 , Alameda County prosecutors charged Mehserle with  हत्या लिये the शूटिंग  .
He  resigned उसके स्थिति  and pleaded not guilty .
the विचारण began  on June 10 , 2010 .
Michael Rains , Mehserle 's criminal  रक्षा attorney , argued कि  Mehserle mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol , intending to use his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband .
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los Angeles judge to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either  second-degree हत्या or  acquittal .
Oakland civil  अधिकारों attorney जॉन burris दायर a $ 25 लाख  wrongful death claim against BART on behalf of Grant 's family .
On July 8 , 2010 , the jury returned its verdict : Mehserle was found guilty of involuntary  manslaughter और नहीं अपराधी  of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter .
Initial protests against the ruling were peacefully organized ; looting , arson , destruction of property , and small riots broke out  बाद  dark .
Nearly 80 people were  आखिरकार  arrested .
On Friday , July 9 , 2010 , the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil  अधिकारों मामला विरूद्ध mehserle ; the संघीय सरकारी can prosecute उसे independently  for the same act under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy .
The Department of Justice will be working  साथ the u.S. attorney 's दफ्तर  in San Francisco and the FBI .
On November 5 , 2010 , Mehserle was sentenced to two years , minus  समय परोसा  .
He served his time in the  लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी  Jail , occupying a private cell away from other prisoners .
he थी released on  June 13 , 2011 and is now on parole .
Major representatives of the  हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण  .
The Harlem Renaissance was a cultural movement that  spanned the  1920s .
At the time , it was  ज्ञात as the `` नई नीग्रो  Movement '' , named after the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke .
Though it was centered in the Harlem neighborhood of New York City , many French-speaking black writers from African and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris  यहूद भी बहकावे  by the Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem  पुनर्जागरण is  unofficially recognized to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s .
Many of its ideas  जिया on much longer  .
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '' , as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance , was placed between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A Journal of Negro Life hosted a party for black  लेखक जहाँ अनेक श्वेत प्रकाशक यहूद in उपस्थिति  ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ) .
अफ़्रीकी राज्य between  500 BCE and 1500 CE
Obelisk at  टेम्पल  of Luxor , Egypt .
c.  1200 BCE .
African knight of Baguirmi  in पूरा padded armour  suit .
The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of  अफ़्रीकी और the emergence of होमो sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी , continuing into the  present as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation states .
Some early evidence of agriculture in Africa dates from 16,000 BCE , and  metallurgy  from about 4000 BCE .
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt , and later in Nubia ,  the मग़रिब और the सींग of अफ़्रीकी  .
During the Middle  आयु , islam स्प्रेड  through the regions .
Crossing the Maghreb and the Sahel , a major center of  मुस्लिम संस्कृति थी  Timbuktu .
Some notable  pre-colonial राज्य और समाजों in अफ़्रीकी शामिल the nok संस्कृति  , Mali Empire , Ashanti Empire , Kingdom of Mapungubwe , Kingdom of Sine , Kingdom of Saloum , Kingdom of Baol , Kingdom of Zimbabwe , Kingdom of Kongo , Ancient Carthage , Numidia , Mauretania , the Aksumite Empire , the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate .
From the late 15th century , Europeans and Arabs took slaves from West , Central and  southeast अफ़्रीकी विदेशी  in the African slave trade .
European colonization of Africa developed  rapidly in the हाथापाई लिये अफ़्रीकी of the  late 19th and early 20th centuries .
following struggles लिये स्वतंत्रता in अनेक  parts of the continent , as well as a weakened Europe after the Second World War ; decolonization took place .
अफ़्रीकी 's इतिहास रै महरूम चुनौतीपूर्ण लिये शोधकर्ताओं  in the field of African studies because of the scarcity of written sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa .
Scholarly techniques such as the recording of  मौखिक इतिहास , ऐतिहासिक  linguistics , archaeology and genetics have been crucial .
Curry Foley was the first player in Major League  बेसबॉल इतिहास to  hit for the cycle .
In baseball , hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one  बैटर hitting a सिंगल ,  a double , a triple , and a home run in the same game .
Collecting the hits in that order is known as  a `` प्राकृतिक साईकिल  '' .
Cycles are uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB ) , and have occurred 294 times since the first by  curry फोली in 1882  .
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB  इतिहास ) ; it रै महरूम पुकारा `` एक of the rarest '' और `` सबसे मुश्किल  feats '' in baseball .
Based on 2009 offensive levels , the probability of an average MLB player  hitting लिये a साईकिल विरूद्ध an औसत टोली in a खेल is लगभग 0.00590 % ; इस corresponds  to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams .
In other baseball leagues , the cycle is  हासिल कम अक्सर  .
Through September 4 , 2008 , 62 players in  निप्पन पेशेवर बेसबॉल ( npb ) , the top-level  baseball organization in Japan , have hit for the cycle , the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara .
Two players have hit for the cycle on the same day once in NPB history ;  इस रै occurred twice in एमएलबी इतिहास  .
One NPB player has also hit for the  साईकिल in an npb all-star  game .
No player has ever hit for the  साईकिल in the एमएलबी all-star  Game or the postseason .
the प्रमुख  slave routes in medieval Africa .
This article discusses systems , history , and  प्रभाव of गुलामी भीतर अफ़्रीकी  .
See Arab slave trade , Atlantic slave trade , Maafa , and Slavery in  समकालीन अफ़्रीकी लिये अन्य चर्चाएँ  .
`` Slave  हस्तांतरण in  Africa '' .
Europeans usually did not  डालें the आंतरिक  regions .
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout  the महाद्वीप लिये अनेक  centuries , and continues in the current day .
Systems of servitude and slavery were common in many parts of the continent , as they  यहूद in much of the प्राचीन संसार .
In most African societies where slavery was prevalent , the enslaved people were largely  treated as indentured बन्दों और  not treated as chattel slaves .
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began , many of the local slave systems changed and began supplying captives for slave  बाज़ार बाहर of  Africa .
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced in many different  फ़ॉर्म और कुछ of ये do नहीं clearly अनुरूप the  definitions of slavery elsewhere in the world .
Debt slavery , enslavement of war captives , military slavery , and criminal slavery were all  practiced  in various parts of Africa .
Although there had been some trans-Saharan  व्यापार इससे the आंतरिक of sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी to अन्य regions  , slavery was a small part of the economic life of many societies in Africa until the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab and Atlantic ) .
Slave practices were again transformed with European colonization of Africa and the formal  abolition of गुलामी in the जल्दी  1900s .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications , processes and CPU usage , commit charge and memory information , network activity and statistics , logged-in users , and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows , 3rd  पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly , e.g , `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '' , `` विस्तारित कार्य मैनेजर '' , `` anvir कार्य मैनेजर '' , `` प्रक्रम हैकर  '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities , processor affinity , forcibly  terminate प्रक्रियाओं , और shut bas  , restart , hibernate or log off from Windows .
Windows Task Manager was  introduced साथ खिड़कियाँ  NT 4.0 .
Previous  संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ  NT included the Task List application , which had far fewer features .
The task list was capable of listing currently running  प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें , or बनाना  a new process .
In Windows  xp तभी , a shutdown मेनू is भी उपस्थित कि  allows access to Standby , Hibernate , Turn off , Restart , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier  संस्करण of microsoft खिड़कियाँ  ( Microsoft Windows 3.x , Windows 95 , Windows 98 ) had a program known as tasks to display the programs currently running .
This file was  चलाया by कार्यशील the taskman.exe  file from the C : \Windows directory .
The Troop is an American-Canadian live-action , single camera comedy -adventure  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय a तिकड़ी of teenagers जो लड़ो और कैप्चर  monsters and other supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional town of Lakewood .
Created and executive produced by Max Burnett ,  ग्रेग कूलिज और क्रिस मॉर्गन  , the series premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18 , 2009 .
The second season premiered on June 25 ,  2011 और निकलोडियन रद्द  the series midway through it 's second season .
The remaining episodes of season 2 were aired on Nicktoons  मगर the पिछला 3..
Sparsely populated in relation to its area , the Democratic Republic of the Congo (  drc ) is घर to a विशाल संभावित of प्राकृतिक  resources and mineral wealth , its untapped deposits of raw minerals are estimated to be worth in excess of US $ 24 trillion , yet the economy of the DRC has declined drastically since the mid-1980s .
At the time  of इसके स्वतंत्रता in 1960 , drc थी the दूसरी सबसे industrialized  country in Africa after South Africa ; it boasted a thriving mining sector and its agriculture sector was relatively productive .
If the viewer stares at this image for 20–60 seconds and  stares at a श्वेत ऑब्जेक्ट , a ऋणात्मक afterimage  will appear ( in this case , it will be cyan on magenta ) .
This can also be achieved by the viewer closing  his/her आँखें और tilting  their head up .
An afterimage or  भुत चित्र or चित्र burn-in is an ऑप्टिकल भ्रम कि refers  to an image continuing to appear in one 's vision after the exposure to the original image has ceased .
One of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems to float before one 's eyes after  looking into a लाइट सोर्स लिये a few  seconds .
Closing the eye can help  achieve a बेहतर भाव of the रंग  in its own aspect .
afterimages आइये in दो फ़ॉर्म  , negative ( inverted ) and positive ( retaining original color ) .
The process behind positive afterimages is unknown ,  हालांकि विचार to be सम्बन्धित  to neural adaptation .
On the other hand , negative  afterimages हैं a retinal  phenomenon and are well understood .
Lost is an American serial drama television series that premiered on September 22 , 2004 on the  अमरीकी प्रसारण कम्पनी  ( ABC ) .
The series was created by J. J. Abrams and Damon  lindelof , आधारित upon an असली पायलट स्क्रिप्ट  titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber .
छह सीज़न of the दिखाएँ aired , in जोड to numerous काटें shows to पूर्वावलोकन पिछला एपीसोड .
ABC announced that Lost would end after six seasons ,  having उत्पादित a कुल of 121 एपीसोड  .
The series follows the past , present , and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a  प्लेन क्रैश on a यात्री जेट , oceanic उड़ान 815 , उड़ती  from Sydney to Los Angeles after it crashes on a tropical island in the South Pacific .
The series also  शामिल कहानियां of the जीवनदान of लोगों already  living on the island — they include the `` Others `` , who initially antagonize the survivors , as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana .
Each episode typically  सुविधाएँ कार्रवाई on the द्वीप  as well as a secondary storyline from another point in a character 's life .
Season 6 features a detailing of the lives of  the survivors in a अलग  reality , as if the flight had never crashed .
In the following list , the term `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the  अक्षर or वर्ण  who are featured in the secondary storyline of each episode .
``  no  .
in series  '' refers to the एपीसोड  's number in the overall series , whereas `` No .
in season '' refers to the episode 's number in each  particular ऋतु  .
`` U.S. viewers ( million ) '' refers to the  क्रमांक of अमेरिकी  in millions who watched the episode live .
A total of 121 episodes of Lost were produced  , the पिछला of जिससे  aired on May 23 , 2010 .
All seasons are available on DVD in Regions 1–4 and on Blu-ray in  regions a और  B .
Flat feet ( also called pes  planus or गिरे arches  ) is a formal reference to a medical condition in which the arch of the foot collapses , with the entire sole of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground .
in कुछ individuals ( an अनुमानित 20–30 % of the सामान्य  population ) the arch simply never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ) .
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have shown no evidence of later increased injury , or foot problems , due to  चपटा फीट , in a जनसांख्यिकी of लोगों जो पहुँचें सैन्य सेवा आयु बगैर prior  foot problems .
However , these studies can not  be प्रयुक्त to न्यायधीश संभावित भविष्य  damage from this condition when diagnosed at younger ages .
They also can not be  लागू to व्यक्तियों जिनकी चपटा फीट हैं संबद्ध साथ पैर  symptoms , or certain symptoms in other parts of the body ( such as the leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot .
Generation X , commonly abbreviated to Gen X , is the generation born  बाद the पश्चिमी  post-World War II baby boom .
Demographers , historians and commentators use beginning  जनम तिथियाँ इससे the जल्दी  1960s to the early 1980s .
The term was  popularized by डगलस coupland  's 1991 novel Generation X : Tales for an Accelerated Culture .
Before that , it had been used for various subcultures or  countercultures बाद the 1950s  .
Pressure ulcers , also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores , are localized injuries to the  स्किन and/or underlying ऊतक प्रायः over a  bony prominence , as a result of pressure , or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction .
Most commonly this will be the sacrum , coccyx , heels or the hips , but other sites such as the  elbows , अदब , ankles or the वापस of the cranium can  be affected .
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure applied to soft tissue  so कि रक्त प्रवाह to the  soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed .
Shear is also a  कारण ; shear खींचता on  blood vessels that feed the skin .
Pressure ulcers most commonly  develop in व्यक्तियों जो हैं नहीं  moving about or are confined to wheelchairs .
It is  widely believed कि अन्य  factors can influence the tolerance of skin for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of pressure ulcer development .
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition ,  microclimate ( स्किन wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ) , रोगों कि  reduce blood flow to the skin , such as arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the feeling in the skin , such as paralysis or neuropathy .
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by  the आयु of the  person , medical conditions ( such as arteriosclerosis , diabetes or infection ) , smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs .
Although often prevented and treatable if found early , pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in critically ill patients , frail elders  , व्हीलचेयर उपयोक्ता ( विशेषकर जहाँ स्पाइनल चोट is शामिल  ) and terminally ill patients .
Primary  रोकथाम is to redistribute दबाव  by turning the patient regularly .
The benefit of turning to avoid further sores is well documented  चूंकि at तनिक the  19th century .
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or  व्हीलचेयर , खाने a संतुलित आहार  with adequate protein and keeping the skin free from exposure to urine and stool is very important .
The prevalence of pressure ulcers in hospital settings is high , but  सुधार हैं होने  made .
according to the 2010 ipup ( अंतरराष्ट्रीय दबाव अल्सर व्यापकता सर्वेक्षण ) conducted in  Canada , there was a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers were most commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however , heel ulcers were the most common  facility-acquired स्थान in  the survey .
Overboard is a 1987 American  रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत goldie  Hawn and Kurt Russell .
It was directed by Garry Marshall , produced by Roddy McDowell , and loosely inspired by  the  1974 Italian film Swept Away .
In turn , Overboard was  adapted into the 2006  South Korean television series , Couple or Trouble .
Green Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown County in  the u.S. राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन , स्तिथ at  the head of Green Bay , a sub-basin of Lake Michigan , at the mouth of the Fox River .
It has  an उन्नयन of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर  and is located north of Milwaukee .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  104,057 at the 2010 census .
It is the  third-largest नगर  in the state of Wisconsin , after Milwaukee and Madison .
It is also the  third-largest नगर on the वेस्ट shore of झील मिशिगन  , after Chicago and Milwaukee .
Green Bay is home to the  ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League , making it by far the smallest metropolitan area in the USA to host a major professional sports franchise .
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area , which covers Brown , Kewaunee ,  और oconto काउंटी  and had a combined population of 282,599 at the 2000 census .
Green Bay is an industrial city with several meatpacking and  पेपर पौधे , और  a port on Green Bay , an arm of Lake Michigan that locals call the Bay of Green Bay , to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city .
It is home to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville Public Museum , with exhibitions of art , history , and science ; and  the  University of Wisconsin–Green Bay .
Luteinizing hormone ( LH , also known as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone produced by gonadotroph  कोशिकाएं  in the anterior pituitary gland .
In females , an acute rise of LH ( `` LH surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development  of the कॉर्पस luteum  .
In males , where LH had also been called interstitial  cell-stimulating हार्मोन ( icsh ) , it stimulates  Leydig cell production of testosterone .
it अधिनियमों synergistically  with FSH .
Selena  quintanilla-pérez (  April 16 , 1971 – March 31 , 1995 ) , known simply as Selena , was an American singer-songwriter .
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best selling Latin artist of the decade '' by Billboard for her fourteen top-ten singles  in the शीर्ष लैटिन गीतों चार्ट , सहित सात  number-one hits .
Selena had the most successful singles of 1994 and  1995 , `` amor prohibido `` और `` no me queda más ``  .
She was called `` The Queen of Tejano music `` and the  मैक्सिकन समतुल्य of  Madonna .
Selena released her first album , Selena y Los Dinos , at  the आयु of बारह  .
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano Music  पुरस्कार और उतरा a रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध  with EMI a few years later .
Her fame grew throughout the early 1990s ,  विशेषकर in spanish-speaking  countries , and she had begun recording in English as well .
Selena was  murdered at the आयु of  23 on March 31 , 1995 by Yolanda Saldívar , the former president of her fan club .
on अप्रैल 12  , 1995 , two weeks after her death , George W. Bush , governor of Texas at the time , declared her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas .
Warner Bros. produced Selena , a film  आधारित on उसके जीवन अभिनीत जेनिफर  Lopez , in 1997 .
Selena 's life was also the basis of the musical Selena Forever  अभिनीत वेरोनिका vazquez as सेलिना  .
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated with a life-sized  कांस्य प्रतिमा ( mirador de la flor in कॉर्पस  Christi , Texas ) and a Selena museum opened there .
She has sold over  60 लाख  albums worldwide , making her one of the best-selling artists of all time .
She is also the only female artist to  have पाँच एल्बम in u.s . बिलबोर्ड  200 at the same time .
German Stahlhelm  इससे संसार  War II
Insignia of the  bolivian फौज colorados रेजीमेंट , प्रर्दशित  a Stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( plural , Stahlhelme ) is  जर्मनी लिये `` स्टील  helmet '' .
The Imperial German Army began to replace the traditional  boiled-leather pickelhaube  ( spiked combat helmet ) with the Stahlhelm during World War I in 1916 .
The term Stahlhelm refers both to a generic steel  हेल्मेट , और अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( और  iconic ) German design .
The Stahlhelm ,  साथ इसके distinctive `` कोयले scuttle `` आकार  , was an instantly recognizable icon for military imagery and became a common element of military propaganda on both sides , just like the Pickelhaube before it .
Its name was also used by the Stahlhelm , a paramilitary nationalist  संगठन  established at the end of 1918 .
glow-in-the-dark  may refer to:
Bioluminescence , the  उत्पादन और उत्सर्जन of लाइट  by a living organism
Chemiluminescence , is the emission of light ( luminescence  ) बगैर उत्सर्जन of ऊष्मा
Phosphorescence , a specific type of photoluminescence related to  प्रतिदीप्ति
Radioluminescence , production of luminescence in a material by  the बमबारी of आयनकारी  radiation
Glow in the Dark Tour , a 2008 concert tour by  kanye  West
Frankfurt Airport serves as a hub city for Lufthansa  और receives फ़्लाइट इससे स्टार  Alliance carriers .
Airline hubs are airports ranked as large , medium , small , and non-hubs as one of the FAA airport categories which are  re-evaluated प्रत्येक साल आधारित on क्रमांक of वाणिज्यिक  passengers .
The more  आम लकिन अनौपचारिक उपयोग लिये  the phrase airline hub is an airport that an airline uses as a transfer point to get passengers to their intended destination .
It is part of a hub and spoke model , where travelers moving between airports not served by direct  फ़्लाइट बदलें  planes en route to their destinations .
This is as  opposed to the  Point to Point model .
Many hubs of the airlines  हैं भी situated at एयरपोर्ट in the शहरों  of the respective head offices .
Some airlines  may उपयोग तभी a सिंगल हब  , while other airlines use multiple hubs .
Hubs are used for both  यात्री फ़्लाइट as  well as cargo flights .
Many  एयरलाइंस  also use focus cities , which function much the same as hubs .
Airlines may also use  द्वितीयक hubs , a non-technical  term for large focus cities .
A  हब in the मध्य of a रूट is अधिक प्रभावी than at either समाप्त as connecting  traffic more easily fills the plane - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route .

Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ) , or Lacedaemon , was a prominent city-state in ancient Greece ,  situated on the बैंको of the eurotas नदी in laconia , in south-eastern  Peloponnese .
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th century BC , when the invading Dorians  subjugated the लोकल , non-dorian  population .
around 650 bc , it रोज़ to become the प्रबल  military land-power in ancient Greece .
Given its military pre-eminence , Sparta was recognized as the  overall नेता of the संयुक्त  Greek forces during the Greco-Persian Wars .
between 431 और 404 bc , स्पार्टा थी the प्रिंसिपल  enemy of Athens during the Peloponnesian War , from which it emerged victorious , though at great cost .
Sparta 's defeat  by thebes in the बैटल of leuctra  in 371 BC ended Sparta 's prominent role in Greece .
However , it  कायम इसके  political independence until the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC .
It  तब underwent a long  period of decline , especially in the Middle Ages , when many Spartans moved to live in Mystras .
Modern Sparta is the capital of the Greek regional unit of Laconia and a center for the processing of goods  ऐसे as citrus और  olives .
Sparta was unique in ancient Greece for its social system and  संविधान , जिससे completely केन्द्रित on सैन्य  training and excellence .
Its inhabitants were classified as Spartiates ( Spartan citizens , who enjoyed full rights ) , Mothakes (  non-spartan फ़्री मेन उठाया as spartans ) , perioikoi ( freedmen  ) , and Helots ( state-owned serfs , enslaved non-Spartan local population ) .
Spartiates  underwent the कठोर agoge प्रशिक्षण  and education regimen , and Spartan phalanges were widely considered to be among the best in battle .
Spartan women  enjoyed considerably अधिक अधिकारों  and equality to men than elsewhere in the classical world .
Sparta was the subject of fascination in its own day , as well as in the West following the  पुनरुद्धार of शास्त्रीय सीखना  .
This love or  admiration of स्पार्टा is ज्ञात  as Laconism or Laconophilia .
Fantasy football is  an इंटरैक्टिव  competition in which users compete against each other as general managers of virtual teams .
The players that an individual is able to manage are professional American football players in  the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग  .
The different actions  लोगों हैं समर्थ to मेक हैं drafting  , trading , adding or dropping players , and changing rosters .
Due  to the विकास of the अंतरजाल , काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल रै vastly increased in लोकप्रियता  , particularly because Fantasy football providers such as ESPN , Yahoo , CBS , and the NFL itself are able to keep track of statistics entirely online , eliminating the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players .
Most leagues have a  सिंगल सप्ताह चैंपियनशिप in सप्ताह  16 of the NFL season .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections ( red , orange ,  ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो  historical estimates ( black ) .
Actual recorded population figures are  in  blue .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise  to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम  estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is  the कुल  number of living humans on Earth .
As of today , it is estimated to  क्रमांक अरब by  the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
the uscb estimates कि  the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund ,  it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव  on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine  और the ब्लैक मौत in 1350 , जब it stood at  around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth –  वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the  1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The  विकास  rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million , and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million ,  जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल , और हैं अपेक्षित  to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the  जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) , साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 और  10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth , stagnation , or even overall  मनाही in the वैश्विक  population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth , citing the growing  pressures on the पर्यावरण , वैश्विक  food supplies , and energy resources .
Skeletal muscles  होमो sapiens
This is  a तालिका  of muscles of the human anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of  एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां , मिला on दोनो पहलू , resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां  , as presented in this article .
nevertheless , the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी  different sources group muscles differently , e.g . regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
Examples  दायरा इससे  640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized  into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर  and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers to the action of  प्रत्येक मांसपेशी  from the standard anatomical position .
in अन्य स्थितियाँ  , other actions may be performed .
A gold bar is a quantity of refined metallic gold  of कोई आकार कि is बना by a बार निर्माता  meeting standard conditions of manufacture , labeling , and record keeping .
larger सुनहरा बार कि  are produced by pouring the molten metal into molds are called ingots .
Smaller bars may be  manufactured by minting  or stamping from appropriately rolled gold sheets .
the मानक सुनहरा बार आयोजित as सुनहरा  reserves by central banks and traded among bullion dealers is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold bar .
The kilobar , which is to say 1000 grams in  द्रव्यमान , is the बार कि is  more manageable and is used extensively for trading and investment .
The premium on these bars when traded is very low  over the स्पॉट  value of the gold making it ideal for small transfers between banks and traders .
Most kilobars are flat , although some  निवेशकों , विशेषकर in यूरोपीय  , prefer the brick shape .
Elisha  आर्चिबाल्ड `` आर्ची '' मैनिंग iii ( born may 19 , 1949 ) is a पूर्व  American football quarterback in the National Football League , playing for the New Orleans Saints from 1971 to 1982 , then for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings .
He is the father of current Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning , current New York Giants starting  क्वार्टरबैक एली मैनिंग , और पूर्व ओले मिस receiver  Cooper Manning .
Advocacy is a  राजनैतिक प्रक्रम by an  individual or group which aims to influence public-policy and resource allocation decisions within political , economic , and social systems and institutions .
Advocacy can include many activities that a person  or संगठन undertakes सहित  media campaigns , public speaking , commissioning and publishing research or polls or the filing of an amicus brief .
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy where a  सीधा दृष्टिकोण is बना to विधायक  on an issue which plays a significant role in modern politics .
Research is beginning to explore how  वकालत समूह in the u.S. और कनाडा हैं  using social media to facilitate civic engagement and collective action .
The  ध्वज of मैक्सिको (  Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a vertical tricolor of green , white , and red with the national coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe .
While the meaning of the colors has changed  over समय , ये तीन रंगों यहूद अपनाया by मैक्सिको following  independence from Spain during the country 's War of Independence , and subsequent First Mexican Empire .
The current flag was adopted in 1968 , but the overall design has been used since 1821 ,  जब the पहला नेशनल ध्वज थी  created .
The current law of  नेशनल प्रतीकों , विधि on the नेशनल  Arms , Flag , and Anthem , that governs the use of the national flag has been in place since 1984 .
Red , white , and green  हैं the रंगों of the नेशनल  liberation army in Mexico .
The central emblem is the Aztec pictogram for Tenochtitlan ( now  मैक्सिको  City ) , the center of their empire .
It recalls the legend that inspired  the aztecs to  settle on what was originally a lake-island .
The form of the coat of arms was most  recently संशोधित  in 1968 .
A ribbon in the national  रंगों is at the नीचे  of the coat of arms .
Throughout history ,  the ध्वज रै बदला चार टाइम्स  , as the design of the coat of arms and the length-width ratios of the flag have been modified .
However , the coat of arms has had the same features throughout : an eagle , holding a serpent in its talon ,  is perched on शीर्ष of a prickly नाशपाती कैक्टस ; the कैक्टस  is situated on a rock that rises above a lake .
The  कोट of बाहें is निकला इससे  an Aztec legend that their gods told them to build a city where they spot an eagle on a nopal eating a serpent , which is now Mexico City .
The current national flag , the Fourth National Flag , is also used as the Mexican naval  ensign by जहाजों पंजीकृत  in Mexico .
A destination marketing  संगठन  or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town , city , region , or country in order to increase the number of visitors .
It promotes the development  और विपणन of  a destination , focusing on convention sales , tourism marketing , and services .
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing visits from tourists and business travelers , which generates overnight lodging for a  गंतव्य  , visits to restaurants , and shopping revenues .
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most important tourism marketing organizations in their respective tourist destinations , as they are directly responsible for marketing the destination brand through  सफर और पर्यटन `` उत्पाद जागरूकता ''  to visitors .
DMOs produce billions of dollars in direct and indirect revenue and taxes for  उनके गंतव्यों ' economies साथ उनके  marketing and sales expertise .
गंतव्य विपणन संगठन हैं प्रायः पुकारा  travel , convention , visitors , or tourism bureaux , welcome centers , information centers and more .
Regardless  of the नाम , ये संगठन  offer many services to the traveling public .
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is one  of the largest  species of deer in the world , and one of the largest land mammals in North America and eastern Asia .
It was long  believed to be a subspecies of the यूरोपीय  red deer ( Cervus elaphus ) , but evidence from a 2004 study of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the two are distinct species .
This animal should not be confused with the larger moose ( Alces alces ) , to which  the नाम `` नीलगाय '' applies in  Eurasia .
अलावा इससे  the moose , the only other member of the deer family to rival the elk in size is the south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor ) .
नीलगाय दायरा in वन और forest-edge आवास , feeding  on grasses , plants , leaves , and bark .
Although native to North America and eastern Asia , they  have adapted खूब to देशों जहाँ वे have  been introduced , including Argentina , Australia , and New Zealand .
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic  प्रजाति और ecosystems  into which they have been introduced .
Male elk have large antlers  जिससे हैं शेड प्रत्येक  year .
Males also engage in ritualized mating behaviors during the rut , including posturing , antler wrestling ( sparring ) , and  bugling , a लाउड श्रेणी of vocalizations जिससे  establishes dominance over other males and attracts females .
Elk are susceptible to a number of infectious diseases , some  of जिससे can be transmitted to पशुधन  .
Efforts to eliminate  संक्रामक रोगों इससे नीलगाय populations  , largely through vaccination , have had mixed success .
Some cultures  आदर the नीलगाय  as a spiritual force .
In parts of Asia , antlers and their velvet are used in  परंपरागत दवाइयाँ  .
Elk are hunted as  a खेल प्रजाति ; the  meat is leaner and higher in protein than beef or chicken .
The George Washington  विश्वविद्यालयों ( gw , gwu , or  George Washington ) is a comprehensive private , coeducational research university located in Washington , D.C. .
It awards certificates , Bachelor degrees , Masters degrees ,  और phds आरपार अनेक दर्जन  disciplines .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों थी चार्टर्ड by an अधिनियम of  Congress on February 9 , 1821 as The Columbian College in the District of Columbia .
The lion ( Panthera  leo ) is एक of the चार  big cats in the genus Panthera and a member of the family Felidae .
With some males exceeding in weight , it is the  second-largest जीना  cat after the tiger .
Wild lions currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population  resides in गिर वन नेशनल पार्क in इण्डिया ) जबकि अन्य प्रकार of शेर have  disappeared from North Africa and Southwest Asia in historic times .
Until the late Pleistocene , about  10,000 सालो पहले ,  the lion was the most widespread large land mammal after humans .
They were found  in सबसे of अफ़्रीकी , आरपार यूरेशिया  from western Europe to India , and in the Americas from the Yukon to Peru .
The lion is a vulnerable species , having seen a major population decline of 30–50 % over the past two decades in  इसके अफ़्रीकी दायरा  .
Lion populations are  untenable बाहर  designated reserves and national parks .
Although the cause of the decline is not fully  समझा , आवास घाटा और विरोध साथ इंसानो  are currently the greatest causes of concern .
Within Africa , the West  अफ़्रीकी शेर जनसांख्यिकी is विशेषकर  endangered .
Lions live for 10–14 years in the wild , while  in captivity  they can live longer than 20 years .
In the wild , males  seldom सजीव  longer than 10 years , as injuries sustained from continual fighting with rival males greatly reduce their longevity .
They typically inhabit savanna and  घासभूमि  , although they may take to bush and forest .
Lions are unusually social  compared to अन्य  cats .
A pride of lions consists of related females and offspring and a small number of adult  males  .
समूह of मादा शेर  typically hunt together , preying mostly on large ungulates .
Lions are apex and keystone predators ,  हालांकि वे scavenge as अवसर  allows .
While lions do not typically hunt  इंसानो , कुछ have महरूम ज्ञात  to do so .
Sleeping mainly during the day , lions are primarily nocturnal ,  हालांकि bordering on crepuscular in प्रकृति  .
Highly  distinctive , the पुरूष शेर is easily recognised by इसके  mane , and its face is one of the most widely recognised animal symbols in human culture .
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period ,  साथ उत्कीर्णन और paintings इससे the lascaux और chauvet गुफाएं , through  virtually all ancient and medieval cultures where they once occurred .
It has been extensively depicted in  sculptures , in paintings , on नेशनल ध्वज , और  in contemporary films and literature .
Lions have been kept in  menageries चूंकि the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य  , and have been a key species sought for exhibition in zoos over the world since the late 18th century .
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in breeding programs for the endangered   Asiatic subspecies .
In the  इतिहास of वीडियो खेल , the सातवाँ पीढी of  consoles is the previous generation , and includes consoles released since late by Nintendo , Microsoft , and Sony .
For home consoles , the seventh generation began on 22 November 2005 with  the रिलीज of एक्सबॉक्स 360 और जारी  with the release of PlayStation 3 on 11 November 2006 , and Wii on 19 November 2006 .
Each new console introduced a new type of breakthrough  in प्रौद्योगिकी  .
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions , the PlayStation 3  offered , in जोड to fhd गेमिंग , hd फिल्म प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी , और the  Wii focused on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks .
Joining Nintendo in the motion market , Sony released the  प्लेस्टेशन मूव in सितंबर 2010  .
The PlayStation Move features motion sensing  गेमिंग , समान to कि of the  Wii .
Microsoft  भी joined सोनी और  Nintendo , with its Kinect .
Unlike the other  दो प्रणालियों ( प्लेस्टेशन  3 and Wii ) , Kinect does not use any controllers of any sort and makes the users the `` controller . ''
Having sold 8 million units in its first 60 days on the market , Kinect has claimed the Guinness World Record  of होने the ``  fastest selling consumer electronics device '' .
While the Xbox 360 offers wired controllers as a standalone product ,  सब प्लेस्टेशन 3 परिरक्षक can  be used in wired and wireless configurations .
Starting with handheld  consoles , the सातवाँ पीढी began on 21 नवम्बर 2004 साथ  the North American introduction of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar '' , alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles .
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch screen and  built-in माइक्रोफोन  , and supports wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards .
Additionally , the revised version of the NDS , the DSi , features two built in cameras , the ability to download games from  the dsi स्टोर , और a वेब  browser .
The  प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल , or psp , released  later the same year on 12 December 2004 , followed a different pattern .
It became the first handheld video game console to use an optical disc format , Universal  मीडिया डिस्क ( umd ) , as इसके प्राथमिक  storage media .
Sony also gave the PSP robust multi-media capability , connectivity with  the प्लेस्टेशन 3 और अन्य  PSPs , and Internet connectivity .
The Nintendo DS likewise has connectivity to the internet  through the निन्टेंडो wi-fi कनेक्शन  and Nintendo DS Browser , as well as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles .
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles , PlayStation Portable sales have consistently lagged behind those of the Nintendo DS ;  nevertheless , the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल रै the भेद  of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system .
Sgt . Pepper 's Lonely Hearts  क्लबों बैंड ( प्रायः shortened to sgt . pepper ) is the आठवीं स्टुडियो  album by English rock band the Beatles .
Released in June 1967 , the album included songs such as `` With a Little Help from My Friends `` , `` Lucy in the Sky with  ईंट `` , और `` a दिन in the जीवन  `` .
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ) , Sgt . Pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock idiom of the time and incorporated  balladry , साइकेडेलिक , म्यूज़िक हॉल , और symphonic  influences .
दौरान the sgt . pepper सत्र ,  the group improved upon the quality of their music 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques .
Producer George Martin 's innovative approach  शामिल the उपयोग of an ऑर्केस्ट्रा  .
Widely acclaimed and imitated , the  एल्बम कवर , designed by अंग्रेज़ी पॉप कलाकारों पीटर ब्लेक और jann haworth , थी प्रेरित  by a sketch by Paul McCartney that depicted the band posing in front of a collage of some of their favourite celebrities .
Sgt . Pepper was a worldwide critical and  वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष of the uk एल्बम चार्ट और  15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200 .
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic rock style , the  एल्बम थी critically acclaimed upon रिलीज और  won four Grammy Awards in 1968 .
साथ an अनुमानित 32 लाख  copies sold , it is one of the world 's best selling albums .
Sgt . Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential and famous rock album ever , and has been named the greatest album of all  समय by दोनो सब समय शीर्ष 1000 एल्बम और  Rolling Stone .
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that is  स्तिथ beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती फिशर on दोनो दिमागी बांटती  of the mammalian brain .
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories , processing sensory  इनपुट , comprehending भाषा , storing नई  memories , emotion , and deriving meaning .
The human lungs are the organs of  श्वसन  in humans .
Humans have two  फेफड़े  , a right lung and a left lung .
The right lung consists of three lobes while the left lung is slightly smaller  consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` हृदय  notch '' allowing space for the heart within the chest ) .
Together , the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli , having a  कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों  — roughly the same area as one side of a tennis court .
Furthermore , if all of the capillaries that  घेर the alveoli यहूद  unwound and laid end to end , they would extend for about .
Each lung weighs , therefore  बनाना the संपूर्ण अंग  about .
Human  फेफड़े
The   trachea divides into two bronchi ( one for each side ) at the level of T4 .
This junction is  भी ज्ञात as the  carina .
The conducting zone  contains the श्वासनली , the bronchi , the bronchioles ,  and the terminal bronchioles The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles , the alveolar ducts , and the alveoli .
The conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers  ( लकिन नहीं the alveoli ) हैं बना up of एयरवेज़  .
The conducting zone has no  गैस एक्सचेंज साथ the रक्त , और is reinforced साथ उपास्थि  in order to hold open the airways .
The conducting  मण्डल warms  the air to and humidifies the air .
it भी cleanses the एयर by निकालना अणु  via cilia located on the walls of all the passageways .
the फेफड़े  are surrounded by the rib cage .
The  respiratory मण्डल is the  site of gas exchange with blood .
The sympathetic nervous system via  noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the बीटा receptors  causes bronchodilation .
The parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine , which acts on the M-3  muscarinic receptors , maintains  the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This action is related ,  हालांकि माना पृथक  from bronchoconstriction .
Many other  non-autonomic बेचैन और biochemical stimuli , सहित  carbon dioxide and oxygen , are also involved in the regulation process .
The pleural cavity is the potential space between the parietal pleura , lining the inner wall of  the thoracic पिंजरा , और the visceral pleura अस्तर  the lungs .
The lung parenchyma is strictly used  to refer solely to alveolar ऊतक  with respiratory bronchioles , alveolar ducts and terminal bronchioles .
However , it often  शामिल कोई रूप of फेफड़ों ऊतक , भी सहित bronchioles  , bronchi , blood vessels and lung interstitium .
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila mixed with Cointreau or similar orange -flavoured liqueur and lime or  नीबू रस , प्रायः परोसा साथ नमक  on the glass rim .
It is the most common  tequila-based कॉकटेल in  the United States .
The drink is served shaken with ice ( on the rocks ) , blended  साथ बर्फ ( frozen मार्गरिटा ) , or बगैर  ice ( straight up ) .

Burgundy is a  अंधेरा रेड रंग संबद्ध  with the Burgundy wine of the same name , which in turn is named after the Burgundy region of France .
The color  बरगंडी is समान to  other shades of dark red such as maroon .
जब referring  to the color , `` burgundy '' is usually not capitalized .
The first recorded use of `` burgundy ''  as a रंग नाम in अंग्रेज़ी  was in 1881 .

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty  श्रेणी आबंटित  under the Status of Missing to armed services personnel who are reported missing during active service .
They may have been killed , wounded , become a  कैदी of युद्ध , or उजाड़  .
If deceased , neither their remains nor grave  can be positively  identified .
Becoming MIA has been an occupational risk for service personnel for as  long as वहीँ रै महरूम warfare  .

This building is the original jail  , निर्मित साथ साथ the ऐतिहासिक  Courthouse .
