The Rio  थिएटर in  Center
First Baptist Church at 117 Cora Street in Center  is स्तिथ  next to the downtown section .
First Christian Church at 124 Cora Street in Center is one of the  oldest congregations in the जातियाँ  .
Center is a city in  शेल्बी काउंटी ,  Texas , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 5,193 at the 2010 census .
It is the county  सीट of  Shelby County .
It is named for its location near the  बीच of  Shelby County , not for its location in Texas as it is located near the Louisiana border .
Intense  red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें  with dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common appearance of red pupils in  रंग छायाचित्र of आँखें .
It occurs  जब using a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  flash very close to the camera lens ( as with most compact cameras ) , in ambient low light .
The  प्रभाव appears in the आँखें of  humans and animals that have tapetum lucidum .
Theatrical followspot operators , positioned  nearly coincidentally साथ  a very bright light and somewhat distant from the actors , occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage .
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience because it is reliant on the very small  कोण between the followspot ऑपरेटर  and the light .
The University of California ,  सांता बारबरा ( commonly referred to as uc सांता बारबरा or ucsb ) is  a public research university and one of the ten general campuses of the University of California system .
The main campus is located on a site in Goleta  , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त राज्य , इससे सांता बारबरा  and northwest of Los Angeles .
Tracing its roots back to 1891 as an independent teachers ' college , UCSB joined the University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया प्रणाली in 1944 और is the third-oldest general-education  campus in the system .
UCSB is one of America 's Public Ivy  विश्वविद्यालयों , जिससे recognizes  top public research universities in the United States .
The university is a comprehensive doctoral university and is organized into five colleges and schools offering 87 undergraduate  डिग्री और 55 ग्रैजुएट डिग्री  .
The campus is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment  साथ 18,977 undergraduate  and 2,950 graduate students .
in 2012  , UCSB was ranked 41st among `` National Universities '' and 10th among public universities by U.S. News & World Report .
The university was also ranked 35th worldwide by the Times Higher Education World University Rankings and 34th worldwide ( 6th worldwide for  अभियान्त्रिकी ) by the अकादमिक रैंकिंग of संसार विश्वविद्यालयों in 2012.  < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity '' research university and spent $ 191.2 million on research expenditures in the 2007 fiscal  साल , 97th-largest in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
UCSB houses twelve  नेशनल शोध centers  , including the renowned Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics .
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates , one Fields Medalist ,  29 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of sciences  , 27 members of the National Academy of Engineering , and 31 members of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences .
UCSB was the No . 3 host on the ARPAnet  और थी निर्वाचित  to the Association of American Universities in 1995 .
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos compete in the NCAA Division  i बिग वेस्ट सम्मेलन .
The Gauchos have won NCAA national championships in  मेन 's सॉकर और मेन  's water polo .
Saint Joseph with the Infant Jesus by  guido reni
Saint Joseph 's Day , March 19 , the Feast of St.  जोसेफ is in पश्चिमी christianity the  principal feast day of Saint Joseph , Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary .
He is also  the step-father of यीशु  of Nazareth /Jesus Christ .
It has the rank of a solemnity in the  रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; catholics जो follow the missal  of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast .
Previous to 1962 it was celebrated as a feast of the rank of double of the  पहला  class .
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the  anglican नियाज़ , और  a feast or festival in the Lutheran Church .
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as for Canada , persons named Joseph , Josephine , etc. , for religious institutes  , स्कूलों और parishes bearing उसके नाम , और लिये बढ़ई  .
It is also Father 's Day in some Catholic countries ,  मुख्यतः स्पेन , पुर्तगाल ,  and Italy .
March 19 was dedicated to Saint Joseph in several Western calendars by the tenth  सदी , और इस कस्टम थी स्थापित  in Rome by 1479 .
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the entire Roman Rite by his Apostolic  संविधान quo primum ( जुलाई 14 ,  1570 ) .
चूंकि 1969 , एपिस्कोपल सम्मेलनों may , if वे काश , ट्रांसफ़र  it to a date outside Lent .
between 1870 और 1955 , a feast थी मनाये in सम्मान  of St. Joseph as Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of the Universal Church , the latter title having been given to him by Pope Pius IX .
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after Easter with an octave ,  बाद divino afflatu of st. पायस x ( देखिए  Reform of the Roman Breviary by Pope Pius X ) , it was moved to the preceding Wednesday .
The feast was also retitled The Solemnity of  संत जोसेफ  .
This  जश्न और इसके accompanying  octave was abolished during the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955 .
It is  स्टिल कायम by catholics  who follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals .
As  the परंपरागत अवकाश of the रसूलों ss . फिलिप और जेम्स , may 1  , had faded from the memory of most Catholics by the mid-twentieth century , that of Joseph the Worker was created in order to coincide with the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries .
The feast of Ss . Philip and James , which had been celebrated on  कि तिथि चूंकि the  sixth century , was moved from its traditional place .
In the new calendar published in 1969 , the feast , which at one time occupied the highest possible rank  in the गिरिजाघर पंचांग , थी घटाया  to an optional Memorial , the lowest rank for a saint 's day .
The Eastern Orthodox Church celebrates Saint Joseph on  the  Sunday after Christmas .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an American singer , songwriter ,  रिकार्ड निर्माता , अभिनेत्री , और लोकसेवक  .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola , Carey released her self-titled debut studio album  mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित चार लगातार क्रमांक एक singles on the u.s . बिलबोर्ड hot  100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in  1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव (  1991 ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) , and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music  इतिहास जब इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन `` , a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन , खर्च a रिकार्ड  sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album , Carey began to  deviate इससे उसके  R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became evident with the release of  तितली ( 1997 ) , at जिससे समय कैरी था अलग इससे  Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 ,  और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 लाख  recording contract with Virgin Records .
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001  ) , वो suffered a शारीरिक और emotional  breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion .
Following  the फिल्मी 's ग़रीब रिसेप्शन , वो थी खरीदा आउट of उसके  recording contract for $ 50 million , which led to a decline in her career .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002 , and after  an unsuccessful  period , returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We  belong साथ `` became  her most successful single of the 2000s , and was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard .
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at  the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व , और ब्लैक रील और  NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career spanning over two decades , Carey has sold more  than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड  worldwide , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as the  संसार 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग  artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards .
Carey was also named the  best-selling  female artist of the millennium in 2000 .
According to the  रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ  of America , she is the third best-selling female artist in the United States , with 63.5 million certified albums .
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ) , Carey gained her  eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the  United States , more than any other solo artist .
In 2012 , Carey was ranked second on VH1 's list of the  ``  100 Greatest Women in Music '' .
Aside from her commercial accomplishments , Carey has won five Grammy Awards , 17 World Music  पुरस्कार , 11 अमरीकी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार  , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the  गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड , वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave  vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
A  bumblebee is कोई सदस्य of the  bee genus Bombus , in the family Apidae .
There are over 250 known species ,  मौजूदा primarily in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध  although they also occur in South America .
They have been  introduced to नई जीलैंड  and the Australian state of Tasmania .
Bumblebees are social insects that are  characterised by ब्लैक और पीला देह बालों  , often in bands .
However , some species have orange or red on their bodies , or  may be entirely  black .
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the soft nature of the hair ( long , branched setae ) , called pile , that covers their  संपूर्ण देह , बनाना उन्हें appear  and feel fuzzy .
They are best distinguished from similarly large , fuzzy bees by the form of the female hind leg , which is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave surface that is bare , but surrounded by a fringe of hairs used to  हस्तांतरण पराग ( in समान मधुमक्खियों , the हिन्द लेग is completely बालदार , और पराग दाने  are wedged into the hairs for transport ) .
Like their relatives the honey bees ,  bumblebees फीड on मकरंद  and gather pollen to feed their young .
A man openly carrying a handgun in a Burger King  in त्रिभुज , कोलोराडो  .
In the United States , open carry is shorthand terminology for ``  खुलकर carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '' , as विशिष्ट  from concealed carry , where firearms can not be seen by the casual observer .
The practice of open carry , where  गन स्वामी खुलकर carry firearms  while they go about their daily business , has seen an increase in the U.S. in recent years .
This has been  चिह्नित by a क्रमांक of व्यवस्थित  events intended to increase the visibility of open carry and public awareness about the practice .
Proponents of open carry point to  इतिहास और आंकडे , noting कि  criminals usually conceal their weapons .
Encouraged  by समूह जैसे opencarry.org , georgiacarry.org और  some participants of the Free State Project , open carry has seen a revival in recent years , but it is not yet clear if this represents just a short-term trend .
The gun rights community  रै महरूम मिश्रित  in its response .
एलन gottlieb of the दूसरी amendment न्यास और the nra have महरूम cautious  in expressing support , while special-interest groups such as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org , and certain national groups such as the Gun Owners of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice .
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control  समूह ऐसे as the ब्रैडी अभियान और the गठबन्धन  to Stop Gun Violence .
The Cattenom  नाभिकीय शक्ति  Plant in France .
France produces around three  quarters of इसके  electricity by nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant in  जर्मनी  .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced  on may 30 , 2011 , कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut  down by 2022 , in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors are under  निर्माण in 15 देशों  .
Nuclear power stations operate in thirty  देशों  .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year , although according to the World Nuclear Association , of the 17 civilian reactors planned to  become operational between 2007 और 2009 , तभी पाँच दरअसल आए  on stream .
As of June 2011 , Germany  और स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं  phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark , Greece , Ireland , Italy ,  लातवियाई , liechtenstein , ध्वज  , Malaysia , Malta , New Zealand , Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power .
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed color photographic film in a  स्वरूप उपयुक्त लिये उपयोग in a गति चित्र कैमरा , और  to finished motion picture film , ready for use in a projector , which bears images in color .
The first color cinematography  थी by अर्थात् of योगात्मक रंग प्रणालियों  such as the one patented in England by Edward Raymond Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902 .
A simplified additive system was developed by George Albert Smith  और सफलतापूर्वक commercialized  in 1909 as Kinemacolor .
These early systems used black-and-white film to photograph and project  दो or अधिक घटक बिंब through अलग रंग  filters .
Still from  फुटेज अंकित  by Edward Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology , there are two distinct processes : Eastman Color Negative 2 chemistry ( camera negative stocks , duplicating interpositive and internegative stocks ) and Eastman Color Positive 2 chemistry ( positive  prints लिये सीधा प्रक्षेप ) , प्रायः abbreviated as  ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
Fuji 's products are  संगत साथ ecn-2  and ECP-2 .
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13 , 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter ,  रिकार्ड निर्माता , और अभिनेत्री  .
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album ,  जिससे प्रदर्शित the hit सोंग `` foolish `` , और बेची over 503,000  copies in its first week of release throughout the U.S. in April 2002 .
The album set a Soundscan  रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने सप्ताह बिक्री  for a new female artist , outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill .
In the same week , she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two places on  the  Billboard Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '' , and `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with  मोटे जो ) .
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs , `` Foolish , '' `` What 's Luv ? '' and `` Always on Time `` , on the Billboard Hot 100 charts in the same week ,  होने the पहला स्त्री to accomplish इस feat और  being second only to the Beatles .
In 2003 , the self-titled debut album won Ashanti her first Grammy Award for Best  समकालीन r & b एल्बम  .
As of April 1st 2013 , Ashanti has sold over 27.7 million  रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी  .
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the  तीसरा शीर्ष नई r & b कलाकार पीछे  Alicia Keys and Beyoncé .
She also ended the decade at number 38 on the Top  कलाकार of the दशक  list .
She is currently on the list of The Twenty Best Selling  म्यूज़िक singles चूंकि 1990 लिये उसके सिंगल  Foolish for selling 7.2 million copies to-date .
ashanti रै an अनुमानित  net worth of $ 40 million dollars [ USD ] .
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It Funny ( Murder Remix ) `` , which reached number one on  बिलबोर्ड hot 100 , जिससे थी भी in the शीर्ष 10 चार्ट  at the same time as `` Foolish '' , `` Always on Time '' ( with Ja Rule ) , and `` What 's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ) .
Later that year , she was acclaimed as the ``  राजकुमारी of hip-hop & r & b '' by उसके लेबल और  capped off her successful debut by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards .
Within seven years of Ashanti 's career , she has  scored 16 शीर्ष 40 हिट्स on the hot  100 .
Ashanti  रै endorsed numerous  products including Gap , Herbal Essences and Mudd Jeans .
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston , Janet Jackson , Prince , Madonna , Tupac Shakur , Mary J. Blige , Ella Fitzgerald , Smokey Robinson , Donna Summer  , और ब्लू जादू as उसके musical  influences .
Praised as a gifted songwriter by her peers and critics alike  , ashanti रै written/co-written  the bulk of all her music .
She is currently working on her own  प्रकाशन कम्पनी  entitled Written Entertainment .
She released her fourth studio album entitled  the घोषणा on जून 3 , 2008 और is  currently in the studio working on her fifth .
She also  performed the दान धुन `` बस  Stand Up `` alongside 15 other female singers for the `` Stand Up to Cancer '' live television special which helped raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research .
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or AAF ) was the military aviation arm of the United States of America during and immediately after World War II , and the  सीधा पूर्ववर्ती of the संयुक्त राज्य एयर  Force .
The AAF was a component of the United States Army , which in 1942 was divided functionally by executive order into three autonomous forces : the Army Ground Forces , the Services  of सप्लाई ( जिससे in 1943 became the फौज सेवा शक्तियां  ) , and the AAF .
Each of these forces had a commanding general  जो reported सीधे to  the Chief of Staff of the United States Army .
The AAF administered all parts of  सैन्य विमानन formerly वितरित among the फौज एयर corps , सामान्य मुख्यालय  Air Force , and ground forces corps area commanders , and thus became the first air organization of the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel .
In practice , the AAF was  वस्तुतः autonomous अंदर  the Army .
The  शिखर आकार of the aaf थी over  2.4 million men and women in service and nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944 , and 783 domestic bases in December 1943 .
By VE Day it had 1.25  लाख मेन stationed विदेशी  and operated from more than 1,600 airfields worldwide .
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in June 1941 to provide the air arm a greater autonomy in which to expand more efficiently , and to provide a  ढांचा लिये the अतिरिक्त कमांड echelons जरूरी  by a vastly increased force .
Although other nations already had separate air forces independent of the army or navy ( such as the British Royal  एयर फ़ोर्स और the जर्मनी luftwaffe ) , the aaf remained a भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज जबतक the संयुक्त राज्य एयर  Force came into being in September 1947 .
However , in its expansion and conduct of the war  , the aaf became अधिक than बस an भुजा  of the greater organization .
By the end of World War II the AAF had  become वस्तुतः an स्वतंत्र  service .
By regulation and  कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम , the aaf थी a अधीनस्थ एजेंसी  of the War Department tasked only with organizing , training , and equipping combat units , limited in responsibility to the continental United States , as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces .
In reality , Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air  युद्ध in प्रत्येक भाग of the संसार  , determining air policy and issuing orders without transmitting them through the Chief of Staff .
This `` contrast between theory and fact is ...  आधारभूत to an समझना  of the AAF . ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of  सूचना विधि कि allows लिये the पूरा or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना और दस्तावेज़ नियंत्रित  by the United States government .
The Act defines agency records subject to disclosure , outlines mandatory disclosure procedures and  अनुदान नौ छूटों to the statute  .
It was originally signed into law by  अध्यक्ष lyndon B. जॉनसन , despite उसके misgivings  , on July 4 , 1966 as and went into effect the following year .
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act  चाहिए नहीं be उलझन  with the different and varying Freedom of Information Acts passed by the individual states .
Many of those state acts  may be समान लकिन नहीं एकसमान  to the federal act .
The European Union ( EU ) is an economic and political union of 27 member states that  हैं स्तिथ primarily in यूरोपीय  .
The EU operates through a system of supranational independent institutions  और intergovernmental negotiated  decisions by the member states .
Institutions of the EU include the European Commission , the Council of the European Union , the European Council , the Court of Justice  of the यूरोपीय संघ , the यूरोपीय सेंट्रल  Bank , the Court of Auditors , and the European Parliament .
The European  पार्लियामेंट is निर्वाचित प्रत्येक  five years by EU citizens .
The EU 's  de facto पूंजी  is Brussels .
The EU traces its  origins इससे the यूरोपीय कोयले और स्टील  Community ( ECSC ) and the European Economic Community ( EEC ) , formed by the Inner Six countries in 1951 and 1958 respectively .
In the  intervening सालो the जातियाँ और इसके successors have grown in आकार  by the accession of new member states and in power by the addition of policy areas to its remit .
The Maastricht Treaty established the European Union under its  वर्तमान  name in 1993 .
The latest major amendment to the constitutional basis of the EU ,  the सन्धि of  Lisbon , came into force in 2009 .
The EU has developed a single market  through a standardised प्रणाली of कानून कि  apply in all member states .
Within the Schengen Area ( which  शामिल 22 eu और 4  non-EU states ) passport controls have been abolished .
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people , goods , services , and capital , enact legislation in justice and home affairs , and maintain  आम नीतियों on व्यापार , कृषि ,  fisheries and regional development .
A monetary union , the eurozone , was  स्थापित in 1999 और is रचित  of 17 member states .
Through the Common  विदेशी और सुरक्षा नीति the eu  has developed a role in external relations and defence .
Permanent  राजनयिक मिशन  have been established around the world .
The EU is represented at the United Nations , the WTO ,  the g8 और the g-20  .
With a combined population of over 500 million inhabitants , or 7.3 % of the world population , the EU , in 2012 , generated a nominal gross domestic product  ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 खरब us डॉलर , representing लगभग  20 % of the global GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity , and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world .
The EU was the recipient of  the 2012 नोबेल सलाम  Prize .
The Wales national rugby league team  represent वेल्स in अंतरराष्ट्रीय  rugby league football matches .
Currently the team is  सातवाँ in the rlif संसार  Rankings .
The team were run under the auspices of the Rugby Football League , but  an स्वतंत्र देह  , Wales Rugby League , now runs the team from Cardiff .
A  कुल of तीन वेल्श खिलाड़ी have  been entered into the Rugby League Hall Of Fame .
Similar to many other Welsh national sporting teams ,  वेल्स स्ट्रिप रै महरूम primarily  red for many years , including now .
However in their last World Cup campaign  in 2000 वे किया पहनें a  shirt featuring the Welsh flag , adding a touch of green and white .
The team is known as  `` the ड्रेगन '' और so the  teams logo on the shirt is a red dragon .
The team date back to 1907 , making them the third  oldest नेशनल पक्ष बाद  England and New Zealand .
And it was a touring New Zealand  पक्ष कि वेल्स पहला निभाई विरूद्ध  in 1908 , winning 9-8 at Aberdare .
Since  तब वेल्स have regularly निभाई इंग्लैण्ड , चूंकि 1935 फ़्रांस , as खूब as सत्कार  the touring Australia and New Zealand teams , although they rarely toured themselves , not playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975 .
For twenty-six years Wales competed against their two biggest rivals , England and France  , in the यूरोपीय राष्ट्र कप , जीतना the  trophy four times .
Wales  have भी competed in the  World Cup on three occasions , the first time being in 1975 .
In 1995 and 2000 they had their most successful tournaments to date , surprisingly making the Semi-Finals on  दोनो अवसरों पहले होने पिटे by इंग्लैण्ड और ऑस्ट्रेलिया क्रमशः  .
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup , being the second highest ranked side not to do so , having lost to Scotland on points difference  over दो मिलान  .
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new head coach and appointed Lee  briers as कप्तान ,  having played for Wales since 1998 .
In recent seasons Wales have taken massive strides under former player Iestyn Harris who has coached Wales to back to  वापस यूरोपीय कप सफलताओं  , which culminated in a Four Nations appearance in 2011 .
cardiomyopathy ( वस्तुतः `` दिल  muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the heart muscle ) for any reason , usually leading to heart failure ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and peripheral edema ( swelling of the legs ) .
People with  cardiomyopathy हैं प्रायः at  risk of dangerous forms of irregular heart beat and sudden cardiac death .
The most common  रूप of cardiomyopathy is  dilated cardiomyopathy .
Fuck in  इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the  act of sexual intercourse .
It is an  अंग्रेज़ी शब्द कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as  a profanity , either to denote disdain or as an intensifier .
The  उत्पत्ति  of the word is obscure .
It is usually considered to be first attested to around 1475 ,  लकिन  it may be considerably older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking  ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति  of a noun , a verb , an adjective or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the  शब्द , as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों  incorporating it , such as motherfucker .
Note  : इस आलेख adopts the u.S. विभाग of परिवहन  's definition of a passenger vehicle , to mean a car or truck , used for passengers , excluding buses and trains .
The United States is home to the  largest  passenger vehicle market of any country in the world .
Overall , there were an estimated 254.4 million registered  यात्री वाहनों in the  United States according to a 2007 DOT study .
This number , along with the average age of vehicles , has increased steadily  चूंकि 1960 , indicating a growing क्रमांक  of vehicles per capita .
The Chinese car market , however , is poised to soon exceed the United States ; by the end of 2012 , there were  over 240 लाख गाड़ियाँ on the सड़क in चीन  .
The United  राज्य is भी घर to तीन विशाल गाडी निर्माताओं  : General Motors , Ford Motor Company and Chrysler , which have historically been referred to as the `` Big Three . ''
Chrysler however is no  longer among the शीर्ष  three ; but is number five , behind Toyota and Honda .
The  मोटर car रै clearly become  an integral part of American life , with vehicles outnumbering licensed drivers .
नैदानिक प्रयोगशाला in a हॉस्पिटल  setting showing several automated analysers .
A medical laboratory or clinical laboratory is a laboratory where tests are done on clinical specimens in order to get information about the health of a patient as  pertaining to the निदान  , treatment , and prevention of disease .
In poker , players construct hands of five cards  according to predetermined नियम , जिससे vary according  to which variant of poker is being played .
These hands are compared using a hand ranking system that is standard across all variants of poker , the player with the highest-ranking  हाथ जीतना कि particular सौदे in सबसे विसंगतियाँ  of poker .
In some variants , the lowest-ranking  हाथ can जीत or टाई .
These hand  rankings हैं भी प्रयुक्त in कुछ  other card games , and in poker dice .
The ranking of a particular hand is  increased by सहित अनेक ताश of the  same card rank , by all five cards being from the same suit , or by all five cards being of consecutive rank .
The relative ranking of the  विभिन्न हाथ श्रेणी  is based on the probability of being randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck .
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23 , 1954 ) is an American virtuoso ; a singer , pianist , synthesizer , accordion , and  dulcimer खिलाड़ी , और songwriter  .
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances , Hornsby draws frequently from classical , jazz , bluegrass , folk , Motown ,  इन्जील , चट्टान , ब्लूज़ , और jam बैंड musical परंपराओं साथ उसके songwriting और the seamless improvisations  contained within .
hornsby 's रिकार्डिंग have महरूम recognised  on a number of occasions with industry awards , including the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 with Bruce Hornsby and the Range , the Best Bluegrass Recording Grammy in 1990 , and the Best Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993 .
Hornsby has also  हासिल मान्यता लिये उसके सोलो एल्बम  and performances , his touring band Bruce Hornsby and the Noisemakers , his bluegrass project with Ricky Skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician .
He also collaborated with Grateful  मुर्दे और थी a सदस्य of the बैंड इससे सितंबर  1990 to March 1992 , playing at over one hundred shows during that period .
Sugarcane  वृक्षारोपण  in rural Cuba
Agriculture in  क्यूबा रै निभाई  an important part in the economy for several hundred years .
Agriculture contributes less than 10 percent to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , but it employs  roughly 20 प्रतिशत  of the working population .
परिचय 30 प्रतिशत  of the country 's land is used for crop cultivation .
The inefficient  agricultural  industry in Cuba has led to the need to import large amounts of foods .
Cuba now imports about 80 % of the food  it rations to the पब्लिक  .
The rationing program accounts for about a third of the food energy the  औसत क्यूबन  consumes .
Overall , however ,  क्यूबा is निर्भर  on imports for only 16 % of its food .

Mega Millions ( initially called  the बिग खेल आचमन लाखो as  the successor of The Big Game ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game .
The first (  the बिग खेल ) आचमन  Millions drawing was in 2002 ( see below ) .
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000 , paid in 26 equal yearly installments ( unless the cash  विकल्प is चुनी ) ; प्रायः , the जैकपॉट increases जब  there is no top-prize winner .
However , despite no jackpot winner for  the $ 12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18 ,  2012 drawing , the jackpot remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21 .
( See below for  सूचना on कैसा the  game 's jackpot is funded . )
Reflecting common practice among American lotteries  , the जैकपॉट is advertised as a नाममात्र मान  of annual installments .
A cash value option ( the usual choice  ) , जब चुनी by a जैकपॉट  winner ( see below ) , pays the approximate present value of the installments .
Mega  लाखो फिलहाल उपयोग a 5/56 ( श्वेत  balls ) plus 1/46 ( the Mega Ball ) double matrix to select its winning numbers .
Each  खेल लागत $  1 .
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is  the एक्सेप्शन ) , वहीँ is an विकल्प , पुकारा megaplier  ( such games are $ 2 each ) where non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2 , 3 , or 4 .
The Megaplier was made  उपलब्धियाँ to सब आचमन लाखो  jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option .
Mega  लाखो is  drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays and Fridays , including holidays .
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of its 12 original  lotteries और the drawings हैं आयोजित at wsb-tv in अटलांटा  , Georgia .
पर्यवेक्षित  by the Georgia Lottery .
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions , as well as in American lottery history , was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a cash option of $ 474,000,000  ) लिये the कूच 30 , 2012 आरेखण in जिससे वहीँ यहूद तीन jackpot-winning  tickets ; one each in Illinois , Kansas , and Maryland .
All three tickets had been  claimed as of अप्रैल 18 ,  with each set of winners choosing the cash option .
is a Japanese manga series  निर्मित by  writer Tsugumi Ohba and manga artist Takeshi Obata .
The main character is  लाइट yagami , a ऊँची स्कूल छात्र  who discovers a supernatural notebook , the `` Death Note '' , dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk .
The Death Note grants its user the ability to kill anyone whose name and  फेस वे जान , by लिखने the नाम in the कोपी  while picturing their face .
the श्रेणी centers around लाइट 's attempt to बनाएँ और नियम a संसार `` cleansed of दुष्ट '' as `` परमेश्वर '' using the कोपी , और the प्रयत्न of a जासूस ज्ञात as l  to stop him .
Death Note was first serialized in 108 chapters  by shueisha in the जापानी manga  magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to May 2006 .
The series was also published in tankōbon format in Japan starting in May 2004 and ending in October 2006 with a total of   thirteen volumes .
the दुश्मनी श्रेणी aired  in Japan from October 3 , 2006 , to June 26 , 2007 .
Composed of 37 episodes , the anime was  विकसित by madhouse और निर्देशित  by Tetsuro Araki .
A light novel based on the series ,  लिखा by nisio isin , थी  released in Japan .
Additionally , various video games have been published  by कोनामी लिये निन्टेंडो  DS .
The series was adapted into live-action films  released in जापानी on जून 17 ,  2006 , November 3 , 2006 , and February 2 , 2008 .
Viz Media licensed the  मौत नोट manga in उत्तर अमेरिका  and has published all the twelve volumes from the series , a 13th volume which serves as a `` reader 's guide '' , as well as the light novels .
The episodes from the anime first  appeared in उत्तर  America as downloadable by IGN .
Viz later licensed  the दुश्मनी श्रेणी और it  aired on Bionix in Canada and on Cartoon Network in the United States .
The live-action films briefly played in  निश्चित उत्तर अमरीकी थिएटर  since 2008 .
However , none of the video  खेल have यूँ दूर महरूम प्रकाशित  in North America or Europe .
मौत नोट is एक of साप्ताहिक shōnen  Jumps best-selling manga series of all time , with sales over 26.5 million copies .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ) , also known as All Hallows ' Eve , is a yearly celebration observed  in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31 , the संध्या of the पश्चिमी ईसाई feast  of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally  बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार  , and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain and  रै solely ईसाई  roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties ,  नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , ठहराना bobbing , visiting haunted  attractions , playing pranks , telling scary stories , and watching horror films .
New York City taxicabs  दौरान  Midtown rush hour in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New York City , with their distinctive yellow paint , are a  widely पहचाना प्रतीक of the  city .
Taxicabs  हैं संचालित by निजी  companies and licensed by the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission ( TLC ) .
It also oversees over 40,000 other for-hire vehicles , including `` black  गाड़ियाँ '' , commuter वैन और ambulettes  .
`` Medallion taxis , '' the familiar yellow cabs , are the only  वाहनों in the नगर permitted  to pick up passengers in response to a street hail .

Xylem  is एक of the दो  types of transport tissue in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ) ,  अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक  is wood , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its basic function  is to हस्तांतरण जल , लकिन it भी  transports some nutrients through the plant .
U.S. women  suffragists demonstrating  for the right to vote , February 1913 .
Women 's suffrage  भी ज्ञात as स्त्री suffrage  is the right of women to vote and to run for office .
Limited voting rights were gained by women in Sweden , Finland  और कुछ पश्चिमी u.S. राज्य in the  late 19th century .
International organizations were formed to coordinate  प्रयत्न , विशेषकर the अंतरराष्ट्रीय परिषद of महिलाओं ( 1888 ) और the  International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ) .
In 1893 , New Zealand , then a self-governing  अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश , granted वयस्क महिलाओं the सही to vote और the self-governing  British colony of South Australia did the same in 1895 , but also permitted women to run for office .
Australia federated in 1901 , and women acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902 , though uneven restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in  नेशनल चुनावों यहूद नहीं completely removed जबतक  1962 .
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of Finland , then part of the Russian Empire , which  भी उत्पादित the संसार 's पहला मादा सदस्यों  of parliament in the 1907 parliamentary elections .
Norway followed , granting full  महिलाओं 's suffrage  in 1913 .
In most Western countries , women 's suffrage came after World I War I I , with some important late adopters  होने फ़्रांस in 1944 और स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1971  .
Women 's suffrage has generally been recognized after  राजनैतिक अभियान to obtain it  were waged .
In many  देशों it थी granted  before universal suffrage .
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of  पक्षपात विरूद्ध महिलाओं , अपनाया by the संयुक्त  Nations in 1979 .
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by Diane Setterfield is a  गोथिक  suspense novel , the author 's first published book .
Jehovah 's  गवाह is a millenarian restorationist ईसाई denomination साथ nontrinitarian मान्यताओं पृथक इससे  mainstream Christianity .Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination : The organization reports worldwide membership of over 7.78 million adherents involved in evangelism , convention attendance of over 12 million , and annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million .
They are directed by the Governing Body of  यहोवा 's गवाह  , a group of elders in Brooklyn , New York , that establishes all doctrines .
Jehovah 's Witnesses ' beliefs are based on their interpretations of the Bible  और वे prefer to उपयोग उनके अपना अनुवाद  , the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures .
They believe that the destruction of the present world system at Armageddon is  निकट , और कि the स्थापना of परमेश्वर 's किंगडम  on earth is the only solution for all problems faced by mankind .
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement —founded in the late 1870s by Charles Taze Russell with the formation of Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society  —with significant organizational और doctrinal परिवर्तन अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व of जोसेफ फ्रैंकलिन  Rutherford .
The name Jehovah 's witnesses , based on Isaiah 43:10–12 , was adopted in 1931 to distinguish themselves from other Bible  छात्र समूह और symbolize a ब्रेक साथ the विरासत of रसेल  's traditions .
Jehovah 's Witnesses are best known for their  door-to-door उपदेश  , distributing literature such as The Watchtower and Awake !
, and refusing military service and blood  transfusions  .
वे consider उपयोग of the  name Jehovah vital for proper worship .
They reject Trinitarianism , inherent immortality of the soul , and  hellfire , जिससे वे consider to be unscriptural doctrines  .
They do not observe Christmas , Easter , birthdays  , or अन्य छुट्टियाँ  and customs they consider to have pagan origins incompatible with Christianity .
Adherents  commonly refer to उनके देह  of beliefs as `` the truth '' and consider themselves to be `` in the truth '' .
They  consider धर्मनिरपेक्ष समाज  to be morally corrupt and under the influence of Satan , and most limit their social interaction with non-Witnesses .
Congregational disciplinary actions  शामिल disfellowshipping , उनके  term for formal expulsion and shunning .
Baptized individuals who  formally छोड़ हैं माना disassociated  and are also shunned .
Disfellowshipped and  disassociated individuals may आखिरकार  be reinstated if deemed repentant .
The religion 's position regarding conscientious objection to military  सेवा और refusal to सलाम नेशनल ध्वज रै brought it into विरोध  with some governments .
Consequently , Jehovah 's Witnesses have been  persecuted और उनके क्रियाएँ हैं बैन  or restricted in some countries .
Persistent legal challenges by Jehovah 's  गवाह have बहकावे  legislation related to civil rights in several countries .
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972  franco-italian रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे  portrays a recent American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young , betrothed Parisian woman .
It stars Marlon  ब्रैंडो , मरिया श्नाइडर  , and Jean-Pierre Léaud .
The film 's raw portrayal of sexual violence and  emotional turmoil  led to international controversy and drew various levels of government censorship .
The MPAA gave the film an X rating upon  रिलीज in the संयुक्त  States .
After revisions were made to the MPAA ratings code  , it थी वर्गीकृत as an  NC-17 in 1997 .
MGM released a  censored r-rated  cut in 1981 .
The film has its  nc-17 दरजा  for `` some explicit sexual content . ''
Windows XP is  an ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली उत्पादित by microsoft लिये  use on personal computers , including home and business desktops , laptops and media centers .
First released to computer manufacturers on August 24  , 2001 , it is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय  version of Windows , based on installed user base .
The name `` XP '' is short for `` eXPerience '' ,  highlighting the उन्नत उपयोक्ता अनुभव  .
Windows XP , the successor to Windows 2000 and Windows ME  , थी the पहला consumer-oriented  operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel .
Windows XP was released worldwide for retail sale  on अक्तूबर 25 , 2001 , और over  400 million copies were in use in January 2006 .
It was succeeded by  खिड़कियाँ विस्टा in  January 2007 .
Direct OEM and retail sales of  खिड़कियाँ  XP ceased on June 30 , 2008 .
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through their System Builders ( smaller  oems जो बेचें समवेत कंप्यूटर ) कार्यक्रम  until January 31 , 2009 .
On April 10 , 2012 , Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support for Windows XP and Office 2003 would end on April 8 , 2014 and suggested  कि प्रशासकों शुरू तैयारी to migrate to a नए os  .
The NT -based versions of Windows , which are programmed in C , C++ , and assembly , are known for their improved stability and efficiency  over the 9x संस्करण of microsoft खिड़कियाँ  .
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user interface , a change Microsoft promoted as more  user-friendly than पिछला संस्करण  of Windows .
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell `` that plagued the  पास्ट संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ , improved side-by-side सभा प्रौद्योगिकी in खिड़कियाँ xp allows  side-by-side installation , registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared software components in full isolation .
It is also the first version of Windows to use  उत्पाद सक्रियण  to combat illegal copying .
During Windows XP 's development , the project was codenamed `` Whistler '' , after Whistler  , अंग्रेजों कोलंबिया  , as many Microsoft employees skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort .
According to web analytics data generated by Net Applications ,  खिड़कियाँ xp थी the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली  until August 2012 , when Windows 7 overtook it .
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 % , having decreased almost every month since at least November 2007 , the  पहला माह लिये जिससे आंकडे हैं सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ इससे जाल अनुप्रयोग  .
`` Por  ऊना cabeza  '' is an Argentine tango with music and lyrics written in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera respectively .
The name is a Spanish horse-racing  phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर '' , जिससे refers  to a horse winning a race by the length of one head .
The lyrics speak of a compulsive horse-track  जुआरी जो compares उसके व्यसन  for horses with his attraction to women .
Alfredo Le Pera was a  ब्राज़ीलियाई इससे são पाउलो , a much italian-influenced क्षेत्रफल in ब्राज़ील  , and also the birthplace of Zequinha de Abreu , composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá .
Le Pera and Gardel died in an airplane crash in  medellín , ( कोलंबिया ) , on जून  24 , 1935 .
पोर  una Cabeza
The tango has since been  performed by numerous  tango orchestras .
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ) , Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , Schindler 's List ( 1993 ) , True Lies ( 1994 ) , Titanic ( 1996 ) , Bad Santa ( Uncut Version , 2003 ) , All the King 's Men ( 2006 ) ,  ग्रह 51 ( 2009 ) , एपीसोड 37 of nip/tuck ( 2003–2010 ) , एपीसोड 9 of दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक  series Sweet Spy ( 2005–08 ) , the beginning and ending credits of the South Korean drama broadcast I 'm Sorry , I Love You ( 2004 ) , and the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007 ) .
In the  फिल्म frida ( सलमा  Hayek , 2002 ) , Gardel is heard singing it on a radio .
it is भी कोटेड  in David Del Tredici 's `` Good News !
Nilda is Back '' (  इससे the सोंग साईकिल  Miz Inez Sez ) .
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , the tango is performed by the ``  the टैंगो प्रोजेक्ट '' , जो दरअसल appear  in the dancing scene starring Al Pacino ( the recording used is available on one of their CD albums ) .
John Williams arranged a version of the piece that appears on the album ``  सिनेमा serenade '' साथ the सारंगी सोलो  performed by Itzhak Perlman .
Perlman and  विलियम्स ( conducting  ) have also performed the piece together in live concerts .
In 2012 a dance version was released by the group `` Da  करेरा '' featuring  the original vocal recording by Carlos Gardel .
The  baroreflex or baroreceptor  reflex is one of the body 's homeostatic mechanisms for maintaining blood pressure .
It provides a negative  प्रतिक्रिया लूप in जिससे an elevated रक्त दबाव reflexively  causes heart rate to decrease therefore causing blood pressure to decrease ; likewise , decreased blood pressure activates the baroreflex , causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure .
The system relies  on specialized न्यूरॉन्स , ज्ञात as baroreceptors , in the aortic मेहराब , carotid साइनस  , and elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem .
Subsequent changes in blood pressure are mediated by  the autonomic बेचैन  system .
Atrial natriuretic  पेप्टाइड फ़ॉर्म a समानांतर ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया  loop in an endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin system .
The Loma Prieta earthquake , also known as the Quake of '89 and the  संसार श्रेणी भूकंप , थी a प्रमुख भूकंप कि struck the सैन फ्रांसिस्को  Bay Area of California on October 17 , 1989 , at 5:04 pm local time .
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault , the quake lasted 10–15 seconds and measured 6.9  on दोनो the पल परिमाण स्केल ( surface-wave  magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale .
The quake killed 63 people throughout northern California ,  घायल 3,757 और बाएँ कुछ 3,000–12,000 लोगों  homeless .
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 World Series , featuring both of the  खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल 's  Major League Baseball teams , the Oakland Athletics and the San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage , this was the first major earthquake in the United States to have  इसके आरंभिक धक्का ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव on  television .
Pawn in the standard  staunton पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest piece in the game of chess ,  historically representing infantry or , अधिक विशेषकर  , armed peasants or pikemen .
In chess , each  खिलाड़ी begins the खेल साथ आठ प्यादे , एक on  each square of the rank immediately in front of the other pieces .
( In algebraic notation , the white pawns start on a2 , b2 , c2 , ... , h2 , while  ब्लैक प्यादे प्रारंभ on a7 , b7 , c7 , ... , h7 .  )
Individual pawns are  referred to by the  file on which they stand .
For example , one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` Black 's b-pawn '' , or less commonly ( using descriptive notation ) ,  `` श्वेत 's किंग 's बिशप  pawn '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight pawn '' .
It is also common to refer to  a rook साहूकार , अर्थ कोई साहूकार on the a- or h-file  , a knight pawn ( on the b- or g-file ) , a bishop pawn ( on the c- or f-file ) , a queen pawn ( on the d-file ) , a king pawn ( on the e-file ) , and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ) .
The military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian )  और द्विलिंगी individuals  .
the हथियारबंद शक्तियां of सबसे विकसित देशों  have now removed policies excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ) .
Nations that permit gay people to serve openly in the military include the 4 of the 5 members of the UN Security  परिषद ( संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस , और रूस  ) , the Republic of China ( Taiwan ) , Australia , Israel , South Africa , Argentina , and all NATO members excluding Turkey .
Hydrogen production is the  परिवार of औद्योगिक विधि लिये  generating hydrogen .
फिलहाल the प्रबल प्रौद्योगिकी  for direct production is steam reforming from hydrocarbons .
Many other methods are known  सहित electrolysis  and thermolysis .
In 2006 , the United States was  अनुमानित to have a उत्पादन क्षमता of 11 लाख  tonnes of hydrogen .
5 million tonnes of hydrogen  यहूद खपत on-site in आयल  refining , and in the production of ammonia ( Haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ) .
0.4 million  टन यहूद an incidental  by-product of the chlor-alkali process .
Hydrogen production  is an अनुमानित  $ 100 billion industry .
A basis point ( often denoted as bp , colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips '' , also known as a  `` बीप '' ) is a ईकाई बराबर to एक hundredth of a प्रतिशत  point , or one part per ten thousand , 1/10000 .
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad , literally meaning 'for ( every ) myriad ( ten thousand ) ' , and in that context is written with which looks like a percent sign ( % ) with  दो अतिरिक्त zeroes at the समाप्त ( जैसे a stylized रूप of the चार zeros in the denominator , हालांकि it originates as a प्राकृतिक एक्सटेंशन of the प्रतिशत  ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ) .
A basis point is  पारिभाषित  as:
1 basis  पाइंट = 1 permyriad  = one one-hundredth percent
1 bp =  1 = 0.01 % =  0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp  =  100
आधार अंक हैं प्रयुक्त as a सुविधाजनक ईकाई of  measurement in contexts where percentage differences of less than 1 % are discussed .
The most common example is interest  दरों , जहाँ मतभेद in ब्याज दरों  of less than 1 % per year are usually meaningful to talk about .
लिये उदाहरण , a अंतर  of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 basis points ( e.g . a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ) .
Like percentage points , basis points avoid the ambiguity between relative and absolute discussions about  ब्याज दरों by  dealing only with the absolute change in numeric value of a rate .
For example , if a report says there  रै महरूम a `` 1 % बढ़ाएँ '' इससे  a 10 % interest rate , this could refer to an increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative , 1 % of 10 % ) , or from 10 % to 11 % ( absolute , 1 % plus 10 % ) .
If , however , the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10 % interest rate , then we know that the interest   rate of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the absolute change ) to a 10.1 % rate .
It is common  अभ्यास in the वित्तीय उद्योग to उपयोग आधार अंक to denote a रेट बदलें in a वित्तीय  instrument , or the difference ( spread ) between two interest rates , including the yields of fixed-income securities .
Since certain loans and bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to some index or  underlying सुरक्षा , वे होगा प्रायः be कोटेड  as a spread over ( or under ) the index .
For example , a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 basis points over LIBOR ,  जिससे is commonly expressed as `` l+50bps '' or बस  `` L+50 '' .
The term `` basis point ''  रै इसके origins in व्यापार  the `` basis '' or the spread between two interest rates .
Since the basis is usually small ,  ये हैं कोटेड  multiplied up by 10000 , and hence a `` full point '' movement in the `` basis '' is a basis point .
Contrast with pips in FX  आगे  markets .
The relationship between percentage changes and basis points can  be summarized as फ़ॉलो : 1 प्रतिशत  point change = 100 basis points , and 0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point .
So , a bond whose yield increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by 50  आधार अंक ; or ब्याज दरों कि have risen 1 प्रतिशत  point are said to have increased by 100 basis points .
The British Royal Family is the group of close relatives of  the monarch of the संयुक्त  Kingdom .
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of people who are the relations of the monarch in her or his role as sovereign of any of the other Commonwealth  realms , यूँ sometimes at variance साथ आधिकारिक  national terms for the family .
Members of the Royal Family belong to , either by birth or marriage , the House of  विंडसर , चूंकि 1917 , जब जार्ज v बदला the नाम of the royal हाउस  from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha .
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at war with Germany and given the British Royal  परिवार 's दमदार जर्मनी ancestry ; it थी लगा कि इसके पब्लिक चित्र could  be improved by choosing a more British house name .
The new name chosen , Windsor , had absolutely no connection other than as the name of the castle which  थी और  continues to be a royal residence .
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal Family , and different lists will include different people , those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ) , or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered members , which usually results in the  अनुप्रयोग of the पद to the monarch , the consort of the monarch , the विधवा consorts of पिछला monarchs , the children of the monarch और पिछला monarchs , the male-line grandchildren  of the monarch and previous monarchs , and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons .
On 30  नवम्बर 1917 , किंग जार्ज v जारी अक्षर पेटेंट  defining who are members of the Royal Family ; the text of the notice from the London Gazette is as follows:
In 1996 , Her  majesty the महारानी परिवर्धित  these Letters Patent , as was evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and a style borne by members of the Royal Family  to अतिरिक्त व्यक्तियों  to be born , evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
Members and  रिश्तेदारों of the अंग्रेजों  Royal Family historically represented the monarch in various places throughout the British Empire , sometimes for extended periods as viceroys , or for specific ceremonies or events .
Today , they often perform ceremonial  और सोशल  duties throughout the United Kingdom and abroad on behalf of the United Kingdom .
Aside from the monarch , their only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve , if eligible and when appointed by letters patent , as  a काउंसलर of राज्य , दो or अधिक of जिसको कसरत the प्राधिकार of the क्राउन ( भीतर stipulated हद ) in the indisposal or अनुपस्थिति इससे the  British realm of the monarch .
In the other realms of the Commonwealth royalty do not  serve as counsellors of  State .
However in each such realm the monarch 's  परिवार सदस्यों may अधिनियम on  behalf of , are funded by , and represent the sovereign of that particular state , and not the United Kingdom .
The  महारानी , उसके consort , उसके children और  grandchildren , as well as all former sovereigns ' children and grandchildren hold places in the first sections of the official orders of precedence in England and Wales , Scotland , and Northern Ireland .
Wives of the said enjoy their husbands ' precedence , and husbands of princesses are  unofficially लकिन habitually लगाई  with their wives as well .
However , the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and Alexandra , who henceforth take private precedence over the Duchess of Cornwall ,  जो is वरना the फ्रेम 's उच्चतम रैंकिंग स्त्री बाद the महारानी herself  .
वो किया  not alter the relative precedence of other born-princesses , such as the daughters of her younger sons .
हैती ( ; haitian  Creole Ayiti ) , officially the Republic of Haiti ( ; ) , is a Caribbean country .
It occupies  the पश्चिमी , छोटी portion of the  island of Hispaniola , in the Greater Antillean archipelago , which it shares with the Dominican Republic .
Ayiti ( land of high  kyu ) थी the स्वदेशी  Taíno or Amerindian name for the island .
The  देश 's उच्चतम पाइंट  is Pic la Selle , at .
The total area of Haiti is and  इसके पूंजी is port-au-prince  .
Haitian  क्रियोल और फ्रेंच  are the official languages .
Haiti 's regional , historical , and ethno-linguistic  स्थिति is अद्वितीय  for several reasons .
It was the first independent nation of Latin America and the Caribbean , the first black -led republic in the world , and the second republic in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804  as भाग of a कामयाब स्लेव क्रान्ति स्थायी nearly a दशक .
In  2012 , हैती घोषित  its intention to seek associate membership status in the African Union .
Haiti is the  सबसे populous of the predominantly  Francophone independent nations in the Americas .
It is one of only two independent nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to designate French as an official language ; the  अन्य french-speaking क्षेत्रों हैं सब विदेशी départements , or collectivités  , of France .
Haiti is the most  populous पूरा member-state of  the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) .
It is the poorest  देश in the americas  as measured by the Human Development Index .
Political violence  रै occurred regularly  throughout its history , leading to government instability .
Most recently , in February 2004 , a coup d'état originating in the north of the country forced  the इस्तीफा और निर्वासन  of President Jean-Bertrand Aristide .
A  अस्थायी सरकारी took कंट्रोल साथ सुरक्षा  provided by the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ) .
Michel Martelly , the current president , was elected in the  haitian सामान्य चुनाव  , 2011 .
The  द्वीप रै था a इतिहास  of destructive earthquakes .
A 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck Haiti on 12 January 2010 and  तबाह port-au-prince  .
The highest  विश्वसनीय मौत  count was estimated at 220,000 .
Haitian government  estimates यहूद उच्चतर  .
The Presidential palace , Parliament and many other important structures were destroyed , along with countless homes and businesses , leaving  सैंकड़ों of हज़ारों of लोगों  homeless .
The country has yet  to रिकवर इससे the 2010 भूकंप ( और subsequent incidents ) due  to both the severity of the damage Haiti endured in 2010 , as well as a government that was ineffective well before the earthquake .
United States aid organizations have  दान $ 2 अरब  .
संयुक्त साथ अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय  donations , these funds are intended to contribute to the rebuilding of the country .
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo , the Italian electro house and dance-punk  म्यूज़िक निर्माता , dj और फ़ोटोग्राफ़र  .
The  खूनी beetroots is well-known लिये  the black Venom mask he wears during performances .
In fact , the only identifying public feature of Rifo  is the साल `` 1977 '' tattooed  across his chest , which is both the year that the producer and punk-rock was born .
`` The Bloody  beetroots dj नियत '' contains  Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo and Tommy Tea .
A Motorola Advisor alphanumeric pager  प्रयुक्त in ब्राज़ील in the 1990s  , operated by Teletrim
A pager is  a बेतार दूरसंचार  device that receives and displays numeric or text messages , or receives and announces voice messages .
One-way pagers can only receive messages , while response  pagers और two-way pagers can भी acknowledge , जवाब to , और originate  messages using an internal transmitter .
Pagers operate as  भाग of a paging प्रणाली जिससे शामिल एक or अधिक फिक्स्ड ट्रांसमीटरों ( or in the मामला of जवाब pagers और two-way  pagers , one or more base stations ) , as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users .
These systems can range from a restaurant system with a single low-power  ट्रांसमीटर , to a देशभर  system with thousands of high-power base stations .
One of the first practical paging services was launched in 1950 for  physicians in the नई यॉर्क नगर क्षेत्रफल  .
Physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the  सेवा और carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर कि  would receive phone messages within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower .
the प्रणाली थी manufactured  by the Reevesound Company and operated by Telanswerphone .
In 1960 , John Francis Mitchell combined elements of Motorola 's Walkie Talkie and automobile radio  technologies to बनाएँ the पहला transistorized पेजर  , and from this point , paging technology continued to advance , and pager adoption continued to expand , until the early 1990s .
However , by the mid-1990s , as  सेल्यूलर technologies  became cheaper and more widely available , advanced services began to displace paging as a commercial product .
Today , pagers  मौजूद largely as niche उत्पाद  , finding preferential use in applications such as hospitals , public safety , and retail locations where their simplicity , high reliability , and low cost represent significant advantages .

The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 196 at the  2010 census .
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget , and used by the U.S. Census Bureau for statistical  उद्देश्य तभी , reevesville is शामिल भीतर the charleston-north  Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area .
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; July 6 , 1907  – जुलाई 13 , 1954 ) थी a मैक्सिकन  painter , born in Coyoacán , who is best known for her self-portraits .
Kahlo 's life began and  ended in मैक्सिको नगर  , in her home known as the Blue House .
She gave her birth date as July 7 , 1910 , but her birth  प्रमाणपत्र  shows July 6 , 1907 .
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of  उसके जनम to coincide साथ the साल of the शुरूआत of the मैक्सिकन  revolution so that her life would begin with the birth of modern Mexico .
Her work has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of national and indigenous tradition , and by  नारीवादी लिये इसके uncompromising चित्रण  of the female experience and form .
Mexican  संस्कृति और amerindian सांस्कृतिक परंपरा  are important in her work , which has been sometimes characterized as Naïve art or folk art .
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '' , and in 1938 André Breton , principal initiator of the  surrealist  movement , described Kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb '' .
Kahlo had a volatile marriage with the famous Mexican  कलाकार डिएगो रिवेरा  .
She suffered lifelong  स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं  .
Many of her health problems were the result of  a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना वो  survived as a teenager .
Recovering from her injuries isolated her from other people and this  अलगाव बहकावे उसके works , अनेक of जिससे हैं self-portraits  of one sort or another .
Kahlo  सुझाया , `` i पेंट खुद  because I am so often alone and because I am the subject I know best . ''
She also stated , ``  i थी born a कुतिया  .
I was born  a चित्रकार  . ''

theresienwiese on the  day before Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer held annually in Munich , Bavaria , Germany , running from late  सितंबर to the पहला वीकेंड in अक्तूबर .
It is one of the most famous events in Germany and is the  संसार 's largest मेला  , with more than 6 million people from around the world attending the event every year .
To the locals , it is not  पुकारा oktoberfest , लकिन `` die wiesn ''  , after the colloquial name of the fairgrounds themselves .
The Oktoberfest is an important  भाग of bar संस्कृति  , having been held since 1810 .
Other cities across the world also hold Oktoberfest  जश्न , modeled बाद  the original Munich event .
The Munich Oktoberfest  originally took प्लेस दौरान the  sixteen days up to , and including , the first Sunday in October .
In 1994 , the schedule was modified in response to German reunification so that if the first Sunday in October falls on the 1st or 2nd , then the  पर्व होता go on जबतक अक्तूबर 3 ( जर्मनी एकता दिन )  .
Thus , the festival is now 17 days when the first Sunday is October 2 and 18  दिनों जब it is अक्तूबर 1 .
In 2010 , the festival lasted until  the पहला सोमवार in अक्तूबर , to  mark the anniversary of the event .
The festival is held in an area named the  theresienwiese ( फ़ील्ड ,  or meadow , of Therese ) , often called Wiesn for short , located near Munich 's center .
Large quantities of  oktoberfest बियर हैं खपत  , with almost 7 million liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007 .
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl ( chicken ) , Schweinebraten ( roast pork ) , Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock ) , Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick )  , würstl ( sausages ) साथ साथ brezeln ( pretzel  ) , Knödel ( potato or bread dumplings ) , Käsespätzle ( cheese noodles ) , Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes ) , Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ) .
