Cheese is a generic term for a diverse  समूह of milk-based  food products .
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging flavors ,  बनावट , और  forms .
Cheese consists of proteins and fat from milk , usually  the मिल्क of गायों , भैंस , बकरियों  , or sheep .
It is  उत्पादित by  coagulation of the milk protein casein .
Typically , the milk is  acidified और जोड of the एंजाइम  rennet causes coagulation .
The solids are  अलग और  pressed into final form .
Some  cheeses have  molds on the rind or throughout .
सबसे cheeses  melt at cooking temperature .
Hundreds of types of cheese from  विभिन्न देशों हैं  produced .
Their styles , textures and flavors  निर्भर on the उत्पत्ति of the मिल्क ( सहित the एनिमल 's आहार  ) , whether they have been pasteurized , the butterfat content , the bacteria and mold , the processing , and aging .
Herbs , spices , or  लकडी धुँआ may  be used as flavoring agents .
The yellow to red color of many  cheeses , ऐसे  as Red Leicester , is normally formed from adding annatto .
For a few cheeses , the milk is curdled by adding acids such as  सिरका or  lemon juice .
Most cheeses are acidified to a lesser degree by bacteria , which turn milk sugars  into लैक्टिक एसिड , तब the जोड  of rennet completes the curdling .
शाकाहारी विकल्प to rennet हैं उपलब्धियाँ ; सबसे  are produced by fermentation of the fungus Mucor miehei , but others have been extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family .
Cheese is  valued लिये इसके पोर्टेबिलिटी  , long life , and high content of fat , protein , calcium , and phosphorus .
Cheese is more  कॉम्पैक्ट और रै a longer शेल्फ जीवन than मिल्क , हालांकि कैसा long  a cheese will keep may depend on the type of cheese ; labels on packets of cheese often claim that a cheese should be consumed within three to five days of opening .
Generally speaking , hard cheeses last longer than soft cheeses , such as Brie or  बकरी 's  milk cheese .
Cheesemakers  निकट a दुग्ध प्रदेश may लाभ  from fresher , lower-priced milk , and lower shipping costs .
The long storage life of some cheese , especially if it is encased in a  सुरक्षात्मक rind , allows selling  when markets are favorable .
Additional ingredients may be added to some cheeses , such as black  मिर्च , लहसुन , chives  or cranberries .
A  विशेषज्ञ विक्रेता of  cheese is sometimes known as a cheesemonger .
To become an expert in this field , like wine or cooking , requires some formal education and  सालो of चख और hands-on अनुभव  .
This position is typically responsible for  सब पहलुओं of the चीज inventory  ; selecting the cheese menu , purchasing , receiving , storage , and ripening .
Legal citation  सिग्नल हैं a नियत of  brief abbreviated phrases or words used to clarify the authority or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition .
Signals help a reader quickly discern meaning or usefulness of a  particular सन्दर्भ जब the सन्दर्भ itself करता नहीं provide  adequate information .
Most citation signals  हैं लगाई  in front of the citation to which they apply .
For  उदाहरण , in the अनुच्छेद  When writing a legal argument , it is important to refer to primary sources .
To assist readers in locating these sources  , it  is desirable to use a standardized citation format .
See generally Harvard  विधि पुनर्विलोकन संघ ,  The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) .
Note , however , that some courts may require any legal papers that are submitted to them to conform  to a अलग citation  format .
the signal is the phrase `` see generally , '' which indicates that the citation `` The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) '' provides general  पृष्ठभूमि सूचना on the टॉपिक  .
Neil Alden  आर्मस्ट्रांग  ( August 5 , 1930 – August 25 , 2012 ) was an American astronaut and the first person to walk on the Moon .
he थी भी an aerospace इंजीनियर  , naval aviator , test pilot , and university professor .
Before becoming an astronaut , Armstrong was  an अधिकारी in  the U.S. Navy and served in the Korean War .
After the war , he  अर्जित उसके स्नातक 's उपाधि at purdue विश्वविद्यालयों और परोसा as a परीक्षण पायलट at the  National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics High-Speed Flight Station , now known as the Dryden Flight Research Center , where he logged over 900 flights .
He later completed graduate studies at the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Southern California .
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in  स्पेस soonest और x-20 dyna-soar इंसान spaceflight  programs , Armstrong joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962 .
He made his first space flight , as command pilot  of मिथुन 8 , in 1966  , becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly in space .
On this mission , he performed the first  डॉकिंग of दो spacecraft ,  with pilot David Scott .
Armstrong 's  दूसरी और पिछला spaceflight थी as मिशन  commander of the Apollo 11 moon landing , in July 1969 .
On this mission , Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin descended to the lunar surface  और खर्च दो और a हाफ घंटों exploring , जबकि माइकल कॉलिन्स remained  in lunar orbit in the Command Module .
Along with Collins and Aldrin ,  आर्मस्ट्रांग थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता by अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन ; in 1978 , अध्यक्ष jimmy  Carter presented Armstrong the Congressional Space Medal of Honor in 1978 ; he and his former crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009 .
Armstrong died in  सिनसिनाटी , ओहियो , on अगस्त 25 , 2012 ,  at the age of 82 , after complications from coronary artery bypass surgery .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 – October 4 , 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred  racehorse कि in 1973 became the पहला u.s . ट्रिपल क्राउन चैंपियन in  25 years .
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ) , the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ) , and the  belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — रिकॉर्ड  that still stand today .
He  is माना  to be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th  सदी , the उच्चतम रैंकिंग  racehorse on the list URL_http .
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The  blood-horse 's सूची of  the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century .
Secretariat was sired by  बिंदास शासक आउट of somethingroyal  , by Princequillo .
He was foaled at The  मर्ग in  Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War , Secretariat was a large chestnut colt  और थी दिए the वही उपनाम  , `` Big Red . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire , Nasrullah , is also the great-great-grandsire of  1977 ट्रिपल क्राउन विजेता सिएटल slew  .
Owned by Penny  chenery , he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई  jockey Ron Turcotte , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced in Chenery 's  मर्ग stable 's ब्लू  and white checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat stood approximately tall , and weighed  , साथ a 75-inch girth , in  his racing prime .
Madrid  ( , ) is the  capital and largest city of Spain .
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire population of the  मैड्रिड महानगर क्षेत्रफल is गणना to be around 6.5  million .
It is the  third-largest नगर in the यूरोपीय संघ , बाद लंदन  and Berlin , and its metropolitan area is the third-largest in the European Union after London and Paris .
The city spans a  कुल of  .
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the country and the Community of Madrid ( which comprises the city of Madrid , its conurbation and extended suburbs  और गांवों ) ; इस जातियाँ is bordered by the autonomous समुदायों  of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha .
As the  पूंजी नगर of स्पेन  , seat of government , and residence of the Spanish monarch , Madrid is also the political , economic and cultural centre of Spain .
The  वर्तमान महापौर is ana botella  from the People 's Party ( PP ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the European Union and its influences in politics , education , entertainment ,  पर्यावरण , मीडिया , फ़ैशन , विज्ञान , संस्कृति , और the कला सब योगदान to इसके औकात  as one of the world 's major global cities .
Due to its economic output , high standard of living , and market size , Madrid is  माना the प्रमुख वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी यूरोपीय और the इबेरिया प्रायद्वीप  ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies , such as Telefónica , Iberia or Repsol .
Madrid is the most touristic city of Spain , the fourth-most touristic of the continent  , और the सातवाँ सबसे visited  city in the world according to Forbes .
Is the 10th most livable  नगर in the संसार according  to Monocle magazine , in its 2010 index .
Madrid  भी बाँधने among  the 12 greenest European cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics .
Madrid houses the headquarters of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO ) , belonging to the United Nations Organization ( UN ) , the SEGIB , the  संगठन of ibero-american राज्य ( oei  ) , and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ) .
It also hosts major international institutions  regulators of स्पेनी : the खड़ा कमेटी of the संघ  of Spanish Language Academies , headquarters of the Royal Spanish Academy ( RAE ) , the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ) .
Madrid organizes fairs as FITUR , ARCO , SIMO  tci और the cibeles मैड्रिड  Fashion Week .
While Madrid possesses a modern  अवसंरचना , it रै preserved the dekh  and feel of many of its historic neighbourhoods and streets .
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park , founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century National Library building ( founded in 1712 ) containing some of Spain 's historical archives ; a large number of  नेशनल संग्रहालय , और the सुनहरी त्रिभुज of आर्ट , स्तिथ साथ the paseo डेल प्राडो  and comprising three art museums : Prado Museum , the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía , a museum of modern art , and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum , which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums .
Cibeles  राजमहल और फव्वारा  have become the monument symbol of the city .
The path of the Via Appia  और of the via  Appia Traiana .
Remains of  the appian रास्ता in  Rome , near Quarto Miglio
Near  रोम  .
The Appian Way ( Latin and  इतालवी : via appia ) थी एक of the earliest और रणनीतिक  most important Roman roads of the ancient republic .
It  कनेक्ट रोम to brindisi  , Apulia , in southeast Italy .
Its importance is  indicated by इसके आम  name , recorded by Statius :
Appia  teritur रेजिना  longarum viarum
`` the  appian रास्ता  is the queen of the long roads ''
The road is named  बाद appius claudius caecus , the  Roman censor who began and completed the first section as a military road to the south in 312 BC during the Samnite Wars .
The Draupner wave , a single giant wave  measured on नई साल 's  Day 1995 , finally confirmed the existence of freak waves , which had previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak waves , monster waves , killer waves , extreme waves , and abnormal waves ) are relatively large and spontaneous ocean surface waves  कि occur दूर आउट at समुद्र , और हैं a threat भी to विशाल जहाजों और समंदर liners  .
In oceanography , they  हैं अधिक precisely पारिभाषित as लहरें जिनकी ऊँचाई  is more than twice the significant wave height ( SWH ) , which is itself defined as the mean of the largest third of waves in a wave record .
Therefore rogue waves are not necessarily the biggest waves found at sea ; they are ,  बल्कि , surprisingly  large waves for a given sea state .
Rogue waves seem not to have a single distinct cause , but occur where physical factors such as high winds and strong currents cause waves to merge to  बनाएँ a सिंगल exceptional विशाल  wave .
electress sophia  of Hanover ( 1630–1714 )
The  लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन is the ordered अनुक्रम  of all those people eligible to succeed to the throne of the United Kingdom and the other 15 Commonwealth realms .
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed succession on the  electress sophia of हनोवर और उसके वंशजों जबकि excluding  Roman Catholics .
The British government does not publish an official list of all those in line to succeed , but the work of genealogical authors and amateur researchers suggests that there are several thousand  लोगों potentially in लकीर  .
At a  समिट in पर्थ , पश्चिमी ऑस्ट्रेलिया  in 2011 , the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms agreed to take steps to adopt absolute primogeniture , end the exclusion of people married to Roman Catholics , and make other changes in the succession rules .
The line of succession is also used to select the Counsellors of State ( and a regent if the need arises ) under  the प्रावधानों of the रीजेंसी अधिनियम 1937  .
For earlier versions of the line  of उत्तराधिकार , देखिए  History of the British line of succession .
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17 ,  1920july 23 , 1966 ) थी  an American film and stage actor The New York Times’ obituary noted his portrayal of `` moody , sensitive young men '' .
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber in George Stevens 's A Place in the Sun , the anguished Catholic priest in Hitchcock 's I Confess ,  the doomed नियमित सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली prewitt in फ्रेड zinnemann 's इससे यहाँ to शाश्वत , और the यहूदी gi bullied by antisemites in एडवर्ड dmytryk 's the यंग  Lions .
Later , after a disfiguring car crash in 1956 , and alcohol and prescription drug  गाली , he became  erratic .
Nevertheless important roles were still his , including  `` the लापरवाह , alcoholic , mother-fixated रोडियो यजमान '' in जॉन  Huston 's The Misfits , the title role in Huston 's , and the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg . ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations during his career , three for Best Actor and one for Best  supporting  Actor .
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a  पद commonly लागू to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान जिससे प्रारंभ as a परिणाम of the  11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States .
This resulted in an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान  to eliminate al-Qaeda and other militant organizations .
The United Kingdom and many other NATO and  non-nato राष्ट्र  participate in the conflict .
The phrase 'War on Terror ' was first used by US  अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश on  20 September 2001 .
The Bush  प्रशासन और the पश्चिमी मीडिया have चूंकि प्रयुक्त the पद to signify  a global military , political , lawful , and conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated as terrorist and regimes accused of supporting them .
It was  typically प्रयुक्त साथ a particular फ़ोकस  on militant Islamists , al-Qaeda , and other jihadi groups .
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency Operation ) , it is still commonly used by politicians , in  the मीडिया और by कुछ पहलुओं of सरकारी officially  , such as the United States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal .

The main causes of  संसार युद्ध ii यहूद nationalistic मुद्दे , अनसुलझे मुद्दे , और resentments  resulting from World War I and the interwar period in Europe , in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s .
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of war are generally  समझा to be the  1939 invasion of Poland by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan .
These military aggressions were the result of decisions made by the authoritarian ruling Nazi elite in Germany and  by the नेतृत्व of the kwantung  Army in Japan .
World War II started  बाद ये आक्रामक क्रियाएँ यहूद मिले साथ an आधिकारिक  declaration of war and/or armed resistance .

The list does not include creatures ; for  ये , देखिए सूची of यूनानी पौराणिक  creatures .
The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile  manufactured by मित्सुबिशी  Motors between 1969 and 2012 .
The name was  निकला इससे the  French word galant , meaning `` chivalrous '' .
There have been nine  पृथक पीढियां , और संचयी  sales now exceed five million .
It began as a compact sedan ,  लकिन over the कोर्स of इसके जीवन  has evolved into a larger mid-size car .
Initial production was only based in Japan , but since 1994 the American market has been served by vehicles assembled at the former Diamond-Star Motors ( DSM ) facility  in  Normal , Illinois .
Blood pressure ( BP ) , sometimes referred to as arterial blood pressure , is the pressure exerted by circulating  रक्त upon the दीवारें of रक्त बरतन , और is एक of the प्रिंसिपल vital  signs .
When used without further specification , `` blood pressure '' usually refers to the arterial pressure of the systemic  परिसंचरण  .
During each  धड़कन , रक्त दबाव varies between  a maximum ( systolic ) and a minimum ( diastolic ) pressure .
The blood pressure in  the परिसंचरण  is principally due to the pumping action of the heart .
Differences in mean  रक्त दबाव हैं जिम्मेदार लिये  blood flow from one location to another in the circulation .
The rate of mean blood flow depends on the resistance to flow presented by  the रक्त  vessels .
Mean blood pressure decreases as the circulating blood moves away from the heart  through धमनियों और capillaries  due to viscous losses of energy .
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole circulation ,  हालांकि सबसे of the पतन occurs साथ the  small arteries and arterioles .
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g. , during standing ) and valves in veins , breathing , and pumping from contraction of skeletal muscles  भी influence रक्त दबाव in रगों  .
Blood pressure without further specification  प्रायः refers to the प्रणालीगत arterial दबाव  measured at a person 's upper arm and is a measure of the pressure in the brachial artery , the major artery in the upper arm .
A person’s blood pressure is usually  expressed in शर्तें  of the systolic pressure over diastolic pressure and is measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg ) , for example 120/80 .
A veto – Latin for `` I forbid '' – is the power ( used by an  अधिकारी of the राज्य , लिये उदाहरण ) to unilaterally रोकें an आधिकारिक कार्रवाई , विशेषकर  the enactment of legislation .
A veto can be absolute , as for instance in the United Nations Security Council , whose permanent members  ( चीन , फ़्रांस , रूस , संयुक्त  Kingdom , United States of America ) can block any resolution .
Or it can be limited , as in the  विधान प्रक्रम of the संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ a two-thirds vote in  both the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation .
A veto only gives power to stop changes ,  नहीं to अपनाना उन्हें  ( except for the rare `` amendatory veto '' ) .
Thus a veto allows  इसके होल्डर to protect  the status quo .
The concept of a veto body originated  साथ the रोमन  consuls and tribunes .
Either of the two consuls holding office in a given year could block a military or  सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई ट्रिब्यून था the शक्ति to unilaterally  block legislation passed by the Roman Senate .
Sulfur dioxide ( also sulphur dioxide ) is the  रासायनिक यौगिक साथ the  formula .
It is a toxic gas with a pungent , irritating  महकते , कि is released by ज्वालामुखी और  in various industrial processes .
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds , their combustion generates sulfur dioxide unless  the गंधक यौगिकों हैं removed पहले burning the ईंधन  .
Further oxidation of SO2 , usually in the presence of a catalyst such as NO2 , forms  h2so4 , और यूँ एसिड बरसात  .
Sulfur  डाइऑक्साइड emissions हैं भी  a precursor to particulates in the atmosphere .
Both of these impacts  हैं कारण लिये चिंता  over the environmental impact of these fuels .
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '' , `` weakness '' , and `` serious '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an autoimmune neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating muscle  कमज़ोरी और fatigability  .
It is an autoimmune  विकार , in जिससे कमज़ोरी is caused by circulating antibodies कि ब्लाक acetylcholine  receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular junction , inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions .
Myasthenia is treated medically with  acetylcholinesterase inhibitors  or immunosuppressants , and , in selected cases , thymectomy .
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases per million per  साल और उठती as a परिणाम of increased  awareness .
MG must be distinguished from congenital myasthenic  syndromes कि can उपस्थित समान  symptoms but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments .
Reflective twisted nematic  द्रव क्रिस्टल प्रदर्शक  .
polarizing फिल्टर फिल्मी साथ  a vertical axis to polarize light as it enters .
Glass  substrate साथ  ITO electrodes .
The  आकार  of these electrodes will determine the shapes that will appear when the LCD is turned ON .
Vertical ridges etched on the  सतह हैं चिकना  .
Twisted  nematic  liquid crystal .
Glass substrate with  आम एलेक्ट्रोड फिल्मी ( ito ) साथ आड़ा  ridges to line up with the horizontal filter .
Polarizing filter film  साथ a आड़ा अक्ष  to block/pass light .
Reflective  सतह to भेजें  light back to viewer .
( In a backlit LCD ,  इस परत is replaced  with a light source . )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD ) is a flat panel display  , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक विज़ुअल  display , or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals .
Liquid crystals do not emit  लाइट सीधे  .
LCDs are available to display arbitrary  बिंब ( as in a general-purpose कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शक ) or  fixed images which can be displayed or hidden , such as preset words , digits , and 7-segment displays as in a digital clock .
They use the same basic technology ,  मगर कि मनमानी बिंब हैं बना up of a विशाल क्रमांक  of small pixels , while other displays have larger elements .
LCDs are used in a wide range of applications including computer monitors , televisions , instrument  panels , वायुयान कॉकपिट प्रदर्शक , और साइनेज  .
They are common in consumer devices such as video players , gaming devices , clocks , watches , calculators , and  telephones , और have replaced कैथोड रे ट्यूब ( crt ) प्रदर्शक in  most applications .
They are available in a wider range of screen sizes  than crt और प्लाज्मा प्रदर्शक , और चूंकि  they do not use phosphors , they do not suffer image burn-in .
LCDs are , however ,  susceptible to चित्र  persistence .
The LCD screen is more energy  कुशल और can be disposed  of more safely than a CRT .
Its low electrical power consumption enables it to be used in battery -powered electronic  उपकरण .
It is an electronically modulated optical device made up of any number of segments filled with  द्रव crystals और arrayed  in front of a light source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome .
द्रव crystals यहूद  first discovered in 1888 .
By 2008 , worldwide sales of televisions with LCD screens exceeded annual sales of CRT units ; the CRT  became obsolete लिये सबसे उद्देश्य  .
The Borgata Hotel  कसीनो और स्पा is a लक्ज़री  hotel , casino , and spa in Atlantic City , New Jersey , United States .
It is owned by Marina District Development , a joint venture between Boyd Gaming and a divesture trust  स्थापित by mgm रिसॉर्ट  International .
The $ 1.1 billion casino hotel features 2,002 rooms  और is the largest  hotel in New Jersey .
The Borgata opened in July 2003 as a Las Vegas-style  megaresort और is the top-grossing कसीनो  in Atlantic City .
A bottle of high  potency b-complex विटामिन  supplement pills .
A vitamin ( or ) is an  सशुल्क यौगिक जरूरी  by an organism as a vital nutrient in limited amounts .
an सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक ( or  related set of compounds ) is called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from the diet .
Thus ,  the पद is सशर्त दोनो on the हालातों  and on the particular organism .
For example , ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for humans , but not for most other animals , and biotin and vitamin D are  जरूरी in the इंसान आहार तभी in निश्चित हालातों  .
By convention , the term vitamin includes neither other essential nutrients , such as dietary minerals  , अनिवार्य वसीय acids , or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( जिससे हैं needed in larger amounts than विटामिन ) nor the विशाल क्रमांक  of other nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required less often .
Thirteen  विटामिन हैं  universally recognized at present .
Vitamins are  वर्गीकृत by उनके biological और रासायनिक  activity , not their structure .
Thus ,  प्रत्येक `` विटामिन '' refers to a क्रमांक  of vitamer compounds that all show the biological activity associated with a particular vitamin .
Such a set of chemicals is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` generic descriptor '' title , such as `` vitamin A `` , which includes the compounds retinal , retinol ,  और चार ज्ञात carotenoids  .
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active form of the  विटामिन in the देह , और हैं sometimes inter-convertible  to one another , as well .
विटामिन have  diverse biochemical functions .
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of mineral  चयापचय ( ऐसे as विटामिन d ) , or regulators  of cell and tissue growth and differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ) .
Others  फलन as antioxidants ( e.g. ,  vitamin E and sometimes vitamin C ) .
The largest number of vitamins (  ऐसे as b जटिल विटामिन ) फलन as precursors लिये एंजाइम cofactors  , that help enzymes in their work as catalysts in metabolism .
In this role , vitamins may be tightly bound to enzymes as part of prosthetic  समूह : लिये उदाहरण , biotin is भाग of  enzymes involved in making fatty acids .
Vitamins may also be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes , detachable molecules that function to carry chemical  समूह or electrons  between molecules .
For example , folic acid may  carry मिथाइल , formyl , और methylene  groups in the cell .
Although these roles in assisting  enzyme-substrate प्रतिक्रियाएँ  are vitamins ' best-known function , the other vitamin functions are equally important .
Until the mid-1930s , when the first commercial  yeast-extract विटामिन b जटिल  and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement tablets were sold , vitamins were obtained solely through food intake , and changes in diet ( which , for example , could occur during a particular growing season ) usually greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested .
However , vitamins have been  उत्पादित as कमोडिटी रसायन  and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and food supplements and additives , since the middle of the 20th century .
World Muslim  जनसांख्यिकी by प्रतिशत  ( Pew Research Center , 2009 )
World  मुस्लिम जनसांख्यिकी  in millions
Islam is the  संसार  's second largest religion after Christianity .
According to a  2010 पढ़ाई  , Islam has 1.62 billion adherents , making up over 23 % of the world population .
Islam is the predominant religion in the Middle East , in Sahel , in the Horn of Africa and  उत्तरी अफ़्रीकी , और in कुछ भाग of एशिया  .
Large communities of Muslims are also found in China ,  the balkans , और  Russia .
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe , for instance ,  islam is the दूसरी largest धर्म बाद christianity , जहाँ it represents  6 % of the total population .
According to the Pew Research Center in 2010  वहीँ यहूद 49 muslim-majority  countries .
Around 62 % of the world 's  मुसलमान सजीव in  South and Southeast Asia , with over 1 billion adherents .
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia , home  to 12.7 % of the संसार 's मुसलमान  , followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ) , India ( 10.9 % ) , and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ) .
About  20 %  of Muslims live in Arab countries .
In the Middle East  , the non-arab देशों of तुर्कों और इरान हैं the largest  Muslim-majority countries ; in Africa , Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities .
A study conducted  by the pew शोध बीच in 2010 और released जनवरी 2011  found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world .
The study found more Muslims in  the संयुक्त  Kingdom than in Lebanon and more in China than in Syria .
Rhode Island ( or ) , officially the State of Rhode Island and Providence  बागानों , is a राज्य in the  New England region of the United States .
Rhode Island is the smallest in area ,  the आठवीं तनिक populous  , but the second most densely populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey .
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the west and Massachusetts to the north and east , and it shares a water boundary with New York  's long द्वीप to the दक्षिणपश्चिम .
Rhode Island was the first of the 13 original colonies to declare independence from British rule , declaring itself independent on  may 4 , 1776 , दो  months before any other colony .
The State was also the last of the thirteen original colonies to  ratify the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution .
Rhode Island 's official  उपनाम is `` the समंदर राज्य '' , a सन्दर्भ  to the State 's geography , since Rhode Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to about 14 % of its total area .
Its land  क्षेत्रफल is , लकिन इसके  total area is significantly larger .
Dubai ( ; ' , ) is  a नगर  in the United Arab Emirates , located within the emirate of the same name .
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of the Persian  गल्फ on the arabian प्रायद्वीप और  is one of the seven emirates that make up the country .
It has the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land  territory by क्षेत्रफल ( 4,114 km2 ) बाद abu धाबी  .
Dubai and Abu Dhabi , the  नेशनल पूंजी , हैं the तभी दो अमीरात  to have veto power over critical matters of national importance in the country 's legislature .
The city of Dubai is located on the  अमीर 's उत्तरी तटरेखा और heads up the  Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan area .
Dubai is nowadays often  misperceived as a देश  or city-state and , in some cases , the UAE as a whole has been described as 'Dubai ' .
the earliest जिक्र of दुबई is in 1095 ad , और the earliest  recorded settlement in the region dates from 1799 .
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum bin Butti Al-Maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members of  उसके जनजाति of the bani yas , जीना in कया थी तब the दूसरी सऊदी राज्य और अभी भाग  of Saudi Arabia , to follow him to the Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani Yas .
It remained under the tribe 's control  जब the संयुक्त किंगडम assumed सुरक्षा of the sheikhdom in 1892 और joined  the nascent United Arab Emirates upon independence in 1971 as the country 's second emirate .
Its strategic geographic location made the town an important trading hub and by the beginning of the 20th century , Dubai was  already an महत्वपूर्ण क्षेत्रीय  port .
Today , Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis  कि रै grown steadily to become a वैश्विक नगर  and a business and cultural hub of the Middle East and the Persian Gulf region .
Although Dubai 's economy was historically built on the oil industry , the emirate 's  western-style मॉडल of कारोबार ड्राइव इसके अर्थव्यवस्था साथ the  main revenues now coming from tourism , real estate , and financial services .
Dubai has recently attracted world attention through many innovative large  निर्माण प्रोजेक्ट और खेल  events .
The city  रै become सांकेतिक लिये इसके skyscrapers और high-rise इमारतें , ऐसे as  the world 's tallest Burj Khalifa , in addition to ambitious development projects including man-made islands , hotels , and some of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world .
This increased attention has also highlighted labor and human rights issues concerning the city 's  largely दक्षिण एशियाई सशुल्क workforce  .
दुबई 's प्रॉपर्टी मार्केट अनुभवी a प्रमुख deterioration  in 2008–2009 as a result of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008 .
however , दुबई रै बना a स्थिर  and gradual recovery with help coming from neighboring emirates .
the handful of नई प्रोजेक्ट कि  are in the pipeline have been able to help Dubai real estate make a comeback .
As of 2012 , Dubai is the 22nd most expensive city in the world , and  the सबसे महंगी  city in the Middle East , surpassing Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ) .
Dubai has also been rated as one of the best places to  सजीव in the मध्य ईस्ट , सहित by us अमरीकी वैश्विक  consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011 .
