This animation uses Earth science data from a variety of sensors on NASA Earth  observing satellites to माप  physical oceanography parameters such as ocean currents , ocean winds , sea surface height and sea surface temperature .
An  समंदर ( ; the संसार समंदर of शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता  ) is a body of saline water that composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere .
In the context of Earth , it refers to one or all of the  प्रमुख विभाजन of the ग्रह 's संसार समंदर –  they are , in descending order of area , the Pacific , Atlantic , Indian , Southern ( Antarctic ) , and Arctic Oceans .
The word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably with `` ocean '' , but  सख्ती बोलना  a sea is a body of saline water ( possibly a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land .
Earth is the only planet known to  have an  ocean ( or any large amounts of open liquid water ) .
लगभग 72 % of the ग्रह 's सतह ( ~3.6x108  km2 ) is covered by saline water that is customarily divided into several principal oceans and smaller seas , with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface .
In terms of the hydrosphere of  the धरती , the समंदर  contains 97 % of the Earth 's water .
Oceanographers have stated that out of 97 % , only 5 %  of the समंदर as a पूरे  on Earth has been explored .
क्युकी it is the प्रिंसिपल घटक of धरती 's जलमंडल  , the world ocean is integral to all known life , forms part of the carbon cycle , and influences climate and weather patterns .
The total volume is  लगभग 1.3 अरब घन किलोमीटर  ( 310 million cu mi ) with an average depth of .
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species , although much of the ocean 's depths remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two  लाख  marine species exist .
The  उत्पत्ति of धरती 's महासागर is स्टिल अनजान , लकिन  oceans are believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have been the impetus for the emergence of life .
extraterrestrial  oceans may be composed of a wide range of elements and compounds .
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the  झीलों of टाइटन , हालांकि वहीँ is प्रमाण लिये the अस्तित्व  of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System .
Early in their  भूगर्भिक histories , मंगल  and Venus are theorized to have had large water oceans .
The Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly a third  of the सतह of मंगल थी एकबार covered by जल , हालांकि the जल on  Mars is no longer oceanic , and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus .
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point  , so कि जल might मौजूद in विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial  environments as brine or convecting ice .
Unconfirmed oceans are  speculated beneath the सतह of अनेक बौना ग्रह और  natural satellites ; notably , the ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth .
The Solar System 's gas giant planets are  भी believed to possess द्रव वायुमंडलीय परतों  of yet to be confirmed compositions .
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and  exomoons , सहित सतह महासागर of  liquid water within a circumstellar habitable zone .
Ocean planets are  a काल्पनिक प्रकार  of planet with a surface completely covered with liquid .
Elvis Aaron Presley ( January 8 , 1935 – August 16 , 1977 ) was  an अमरीकी सिंगर  and actor .
A cultural icon , he is commonly known by the  सिंगल नाम एल्विस  .
One of the most  लोकप्रिय संगीतकारों of the 20th सदी , he is प्रायः referred to as  the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the King '' .
Born in Tupelo , Mississippi , Presley moved to Memphis ,  टेनेसी , साथ उसके परिवार at the आयु  of 13 .
He began his career there in 1954 , working with Sun Records owner Sam Phillips , who wanted  to लाओ the ध्वनि of african-american  music to a wider audience .
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black , Presley was the most important  popularizer of rockabilly , an uptempo , backbeat -ड्राइवn  fusion of country and rhythm and blues .
RCA Victor acquired his contract in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom Parker , who  गई on to मैनेज the सिंगर लिये over दो दशकों  .
Presley 's first RCA single , `` Heartbreak Hotel ``  , released in जनवरी 1956 , थी  a number-one hit .
he became the अग्रणी फिगर  of the newly popular sound of rock and roll with a series of network television appearances and chart-topping records .
His energized interpretations of songs , many from African-American sources , and his  uninhibited प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना उसे enormously  popular—and controversial .
In November  1956 , he  made his film debut in Love Me Tender .
Drafted into military service in 1958 , Presley relaunched his recording career two years  बाद  with some of his most commercially successful work .
He staged few concerts however , and guided by Parker , proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making Hollywood movies and soundtrack albums , most of them critically   derided .
In 1968 , after seven years away from the stage , he returned to live performance in a  मनाये वापसी टेलीविज़न  special that led to an extended Las Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours .
In  1973 प्रेस्ली मंचन  the first concert broadcast globally via satellite , Aloha from Hawaii .
Prescription drug abuse severely deteriorated his  स्वास्थ्य , और he died एकाएक  in 1977 at the age of 42 .
प्रेस्ली is regarded  as one of the most important figures of 20th-century popular culture .
He had a versatile voice and unusually wide success  encompassing अनेक जाति ,  including country , pop ballads , gospel , and blues .
He is the best-selling solo artist in the history of  लोकप्रिय  music .
Nominated for 14 competitive  grammys , he जीती तीन , और प्राप्त  the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award at age 36 .
He has been inducted into multiple music halls  of कीर्ति .
A  कांच of रूट  beer with foam
Root beer is a carbonated , sweetened beverage , originally made using the root of a sassafras  संयंत्र ( or the छाल of a sassafras पेड़ ) as the  primary flavor .
Root beer , popularized in North  अमेरिका , आता  in two forms : alcoholic and soft drink .
The historical root beer  थी analogous to छोटी बियर in कि the  process provided a drink with a very low alcohol content .
Although roots are used  as the सोर्स of अनेक  soft drinks throughout the world , often different names are used .
Fluorescent minerals  emit दृश्य लाइट जब  exposed to ultraviolet light
Fluorescence is the emission of light by a substance that has absorbed light or  अन्य इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation .
it is  a form of luminescence .
In most cases  , the उत्सर्जित लाइट रै  a longer wavelength , and therefore lower energy , than the absorbed radiation .
However , when the  अवशोषित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण is तीव्र , it is संभावित लिये एक इलेक्ट्रॉन  to absorb two photons ; this two-photon absorption can lead to emission of radiation having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation .
The emitted radiation may also be of the same wavelength as the  अवशोषित विकिरण , termed  `` resonance fluorescence '' .
The most striking examples of fluorescence occur when the absorbed radiation is in the ultraviolet region of the spectrum , and thus invisible to the human eye , and the emitted  लाइट is in the दृश्य प्रदेश  .
Fluorescence has many practical applications ,  सहित mineralogy , gemology  , chemical sensors ( fluorescence spectroscopy ) , fluorescent labelling , dyes , biological detectors , and , most commonly , fluorescent lamps .
Informal logic ,  intuitively  , refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside of a formal setting .
However , perhaps because of the informal in  the शीर्षक , the  precise definition of informal logic is a matter of some dispute .
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define informal logic as `` a branch of logic whose task is to  develop non-formal मानकों , मापदण्ड , प्रक्रियाओं लिये  the analysis , interpretation , evaluation , criticism and construction of argumentation . ''
This definition reflects  कया था महरूम अव्यक्त in उनके अभ्यास और कया  others were doing in their informal logic texts .
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies , critical  सोच , the सोच कौशल  Movement and the interdisciplinary inquiry known as argumentation theory .
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that  the लेबल `` अनौपचारिक लॉजिक '' कवर a `` संग्रहण  of normative approaches to the study of reasoning in ordinary language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic . ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60 , with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 )  highlighted  .
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960 ,  साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद  ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great  अवसाद began in अगस्त of  1929 , when the United States economy first went into an economic recession .
Although the country spent two months with  घटती जीडीपी , it थी नहीं जबतक the वॉल गली क्रैश of अक्तूबर , 1929 कि the प्रभाव of a घटती  economy were felt , and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued .
The market crash marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment , poverty , low profits , deflation ,  plunging फार्म incomes  , and lost opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement .
Although its causes are still uncertain and controversial , the net effect  थी a अचानक और  general loss of confidence in the economic future .
The usual explanations  शामिल numerous कारकों ,  especially high consumer debt , ill-regulated markets that permitted overoptimistic loans by banks and investors , and the lack of high-growth new industries , all interacting to create a downward economic spiral of reduced spending , falling confidence , and lowered production .
उद्योग कि suffered the सबसे शामिल निर्माण , कृषि as dust-bowl शर्तें  persisted in the agricultural heartland , shipping , mining , and logging as well as durable goods like automobiles and appliances that could be postponed .
The economy reached bottom in the winter of  1932–33 ; तब आए चार सालो of बहुत  rapid growth until 1937 , when the Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment .
The Depression caused major political  परिवर्तन in अमेरिका  .
Three years into the depression , Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 presidential election to  फ्रैंकलिन  Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide .
Roosevelt 's economic  रिकवरी योजना , the नई सौदे , instituted unprecedented  programs for relief , recovery and reform , and brought about a major realignment of American politics .
The  अवसाद भी resulted in an बढ़ाएँ  of emigration of people to other countries for the first time in American history .
For example , some immigrants went back to their native countries , and some native US citizens went to Canada ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और दक्षिण  Africa .
It also resulted in the mass migration of people  इससे badly hit क्षेत्रों in the ग्रेट मैदान और the दक्षिण to स्थान  such as California and the North , respectively ( see Okies and the Great Migration of African Americans ) .
जातिगत तनाव  also increased during this time .
By the 1940s immigration had returned  वापस to सामान्य ,  and emigration declined .
A well-known example of an  emigrant थी फ़्रैंक  McCourt , who went to Ireland , as recounted in his book Angela 's Ashes .
The memory of the Depression also shaped modern theories of economics and resulted in many changes in how the  सरकारी dealt साथ आर्थिक downturns , ऐसे  as the use of stimulus packages , Keynesian economics , and Social Security .
It also shaped modern American  साहित्य , resulting in  famous novels such as John Steinbeck 's `` The Grapes of Wrath `` and `` Of Mice and Men `` .
The Great Depression of the 1930s started with the  भण्डार मार्केट क्रैश  of October 1929 .
Turkey ( ) , officially the Republic of Turkey , is a transcontinental country , located mostly on Anatolia in  पश्चिमी एशिया और on ईस्ट thrace  in Southeastern Europe .
Turkey is  bordered by आठ देशों : बुल्गारिया  to the northwest ; Greece to the west ; Georgia to the northeast ; Armenia , Iran and the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast .
The Mediterranean Sea is to the south ; the Aegean  समुद्र is to the वेस्ट ; और  the Black Sea is to the north .
The Sea of Marmara , the Bosphorus and the  dardanelles ( जिससे  together form the Turkish Straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace and Anatolia ; they also separate Europe and Asia .
Turkey 's location at the crossroads of Europe and Asia makes it a  देश of significant  geostrategic importance .
The country 's official language is Turkish , a Turkic language , which is spoken by approximately 85 %  of the जनसांख्यिकी as माँ जीभ  .
The most numerous ethnic  समूह is the turks , जो constitute  between 70 % and 75 % of the population according to The World Factbook .
Kurds are the largest ethnic minority and ,  according to the वही सोर्स , क्रमांक around 18 % of the जनसांख्यिकी  while other ethnic minorities are estimated to be at 7–12 % .
The  विशाल बहुमत  of the population is Muslim .
The area now called Turkey has  महरूम inhabited चूंकि  the Paleolithic , including various Ancient Anatolian civilizations and Thracian peoples .
After Alexander the Great 's conquest  , the क्षेत्रफल थी hellenized , जिससे जारी साथ  the Roman rule and the transition into the Byzantine Empire .
The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century , starting the process of Turkification , which was greatly accelerated by the  सलजूक़ विजय over  the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071 .
The Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion in 1243 , upon which it  disintegrated into अनेक छोटी तुर्की beyliks  .
Starting from the late 13th century , the Ottoman beylik united Anatolia and created an empire  encompassing much of southeastern यूरोपीय , पश्चिमी  Asia and North Africa .
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following its defeat in World War  i , भाग of it यहूद occupied by the  victorious Allies .
A cadre of young military officers , led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues , organized a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they established the modern Republic of Turkey , with  अतातुर्क as इसके पहला  president .
Turkey is a democratic , secular ,  एकात्मक , संवैधानिक गणतंत्र  with a diverse cultural heritage .
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West  through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे  as the Council of Europe , NATO , OECD , OSCE and the G-20 major economies .
Turkey began full membership negotiations with the  यूरोपीय संघ in 2005 , having महरूम an संबद्ध सदस्य  of the European Economic Community since 1963 and having joined the EU Customs Union in 1995 .
Turkey has also fostered close cultural , political and economic relations with the Middle East , Caucasus , the Turkic states of Central Asia and the African countries  through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे as the turkic  Council , Joint Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture , Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation .
Turkey 's growing economy and diplomatic initiatives have led to  इसके मान्यता as a क्षेत्रीय शक्ति  .
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest economy by  नाममात्र जीडीपी और the 16th  largest by purchasing power parity .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as  whoopi गोल्डबर्ग ( , ( born नवम्बर 13 , 1955 ) is an अमरीकी  comedienne , actress , singer-songwriter , political activist , author and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ) , playing Celie , a mistreated black  स्त्री in the गहन दक्षिण  .
She received a nomination  लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film .
In 1990 , she played Oda Mae Brown , a wacky psychic helping a slain man (  पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें  his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win  an एक्टिंग oscar—the पहला होने हैटी mcdaniel जो जीती लिये गए साथ the  Wind in 1939 .
Notable  बाद films शामिल सिस्टर अधिनियम और  Sister Act 2 , The Player , Made in America , How Stella Got Her Groove Back , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation , as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash , and as  कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली , as खूब as the आवाज़ of shenzi the  hyena in The Lion King .
गोल्डबर्ग रै  been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television .
She was co-producer of the popular  खेल दिखाएँ हॉलीवुड वर्गों इससे  1998 to 2004 .
She has been the  मॉडरेटर of the दिन  talk show The View since 2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two Daytime Emmys , two Golden Globes , a Tony ( for production  , नहीं एक्टिंग ) , और an  Oscar .
in जोड , गोल्डबर्ग रै a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार , चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार , और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of  Fame .
She is  एक of the  few entertainers who have won an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar , and Tony Award .
Augusta is a consolidated city in the U.S. state of Georgia ,  स्तिथ at the पतन लकीर of the savannah नदी , at the सिर of इसके navigable  portion .
as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , the  Augusta– Richmond County population was 195,844 not counting the unconsolidated cities of Hephzibah and Blythe .
augusta is the प्रिंसिपल नगर of the augusta – रिचमंड  County Metropolitan Statistical Area , which as of 2010 had an estimated population of 556,877 , making it both the second-largest city and the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta .
It is the  116th-largest  city in the United States .
Internationally , Augusta is best known for  होस्टिंग the मास्टर्स टूर्नामेंट  in golf each spring .
A CD-ROM  ( ) is a pre-pressed  compact disc which contains data .
The name is an  एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड लिये ``  Compact Disc Read-only memory `` .
कंप्यूटर can  read CD-ROMs , but can not write on them .
CD-ROMs  हैं popularly प्रयुक्त to वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र  , including video games and multimedia applications , though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced CDs , hold  दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा  and audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player , while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book is the technical  मानक कि defines  the format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for all CD formats , the Yellow Book , created by Sony and Philips  , थी the पहला एक्सटेंशन of कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क  Digital Audio .
It adapted the  स्वरूप to थाम  any form of data .
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks before 1986 , and known  colloquially as the चीलों ) हैं a पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी टोली  based in Chicago , Illinois .
वे हैं सदस्यों of the सेंट्रल प्रभाग of the पश्चिमी  Conference of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
They  have जीती चार स्टेनली  Cup championships since their founding in 1926 , most recently in 2009–10 .
The Blackhawks are one of the Original Six NHL teams , along with the Detroit Red Wings , Montreal  canadiens , टोरंटो मेपल  Leafs , Boston Bruins and New York Rangers .
चूंकि the ब्लैकहॉक्स  have played their home games at the United Center after having spent 65 years playing at Chicago Stadium .
Lent  याजकों carrying आउट a गली  procession during Holy Week .
The violet color is often  संबद्ध साथ penance  and detachment .
Similar  ईसाई penitential अभ्यास is देखी in अन्य कैथोलिक  countries , sometimes associated with mortification of the flesh .
Granada ,  निकारागुआ  .
Lent (  लैटिन : quadragesima ) is  a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many Christian denominations , lasting for a period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday .
In the general Latin-rite and most Western denominations Lent is taken to run from Ash Wednesday to Maundy Thursday (  पावन गुरुवार ) morning  or to Easter Eve .
In the Catholic Church , Lent lasts until Holy Thursday , while other  denominations चलाएं जबतक ईस्टर  Eve .
The  परंपरागत purpose of lent is the तैयारी  of the believer through prayer , penance , repentance , almsgiving , and self-denial .
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of Holy Week , marking the death , burial and resurrection of Jesus , which recalls the events of the Bible when Jesus is crucified on Good Friday , which then culminates in the celebration on Easter Sunday of  the क़यामत of  Jesus Christ .
During Lent , many of the faithful commit to fasting or giving  up निश्चित प्रकार of luxuries  as a form of penitence .
The Stations of the Cross , a devotional commemoration of Christ 's carrying the Cross and  of उसके निष्पादन , हैं प्रायः  observed .
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches remove flowers from their  altars , जबकि crucifixes , धार्मिक मूर्तियाँ , और अन्य विस्तृत धार्मिक प्रतीकों हैं प्रायः रहमत in  violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event .
In certain pious Catholic countries , some adherents mark the  ऋतु साथ the परंपरागत abstention  from the consumption of meat .
In some countries , grand religious processions and cultural customs are observed , and the faithful attempt to visit  सात चर्च दौरान पावन सप्ताह in सम्मान of यीशु मसीह heading to माउंट कलवारी  .
Lent is traditionally described as  स्थायी लिये चालीस दिनों , in commemoration of the  forty days which , according to the Gospels of Matthew , Mark and Luke , Jesus spent fasting in the desert before the beginning of his public ministry , where he endured temptation by the Devil .
However , different  ईसाई denominations  calculate the forty days of Lent differently .
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of  lent ; यूँ the काल इससे राख  Wednesday until Easter consists of 40 days when the Sundays are excluded .
However in the Roman Catholic Church Lent is now taken to end on Holy Thursday rather than Easter  संध्या , और hence lasts 38 दिनों excluding sundays  , or 44 days in total .
This event , along with its pious  कस्टम हैं observed by catholics  , Lutherans , Methodists , Presbyterians , and Anglicans .
स्थान  of Chernobyl nuclear power plant
The abandoned  नगर of pripyat साथ  Chernobyl plant in the distance
abandoned  housing blocks in Pripyat
The Chernobyl disaster ( , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear  दुर्घटना कि occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl  Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ) , which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive particles into the atmosphere , which spread over much of  the  western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history , and is one of only two  वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य  being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately involved  over 500,000 मजदूर और लागत an अनुमानित 18 अरब rubles  .
The official Soviet  casualty गिनती of 31 मौतों रै महरूम विवादित , और  long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for .
In grammar , a subject complement is a predicative expression that follows a linking verb ( copula ) and that complements ( completes ) the  विषय of the वाक्य by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing  it .
In the former case , a renaming noun phrase such as a noun or pronoun is  पुकारा a predicative  nominal .
An adjective following  the copula और describing  the subject is called a predicative adjective .
In  either मामला the predicative  complement in effect mirrors the subject .
Subject complements are used with a small class of verbs called linking verbs or copula  , of जिससे be is the सबसे  common .
Since copula are  stative क्रियाएँ  , subject complements are not affected by any action of the verb .
Subject  complements हैं typically नहीं  clause arguments , nor are they clause adjuncts .
Throughout the fifty-five year history of  the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , अनेक  significant records have been set .
This page only includes the competitive  पुरस्कार जीती by विभिन्न कलाकारों  .
This does not include the various special awards that are presented by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences  ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार , trustees पुरस्कार , तकनीकी पुरस्कार  or Legend Awards .
The page however does include other non-performance  सम्बन्धित grammys  ( known as the Craft & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ) .
मार्शल ब्रूस mathers iii ( born अक्तूबर 17 , 1972 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके  stage name Eminem ( stylized as EMINƎM ) and by his alter ego Slim Shady , is an American rapper , record producer , songwriter and actor .
Eminem , along with his solo career , is a member of his group D12 , and also one half of the hip hop  duo ख़राब meets दुष्ट , साथ रॉयस da 5'9 ''  .
Eminem is one  of the best-selling कलाकारों  in the world and is the best-selling artist of the 2000s .
He has been listed and ranked as one of the greatest artists of all time by many magazines , including Rolling Stone magazine which ranked him  82nd on इसके सूची  of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
The  वही पत्रिका घोषित  him The King of Hip Hop .
Including his work with D12 and Bad Meets  दुष्ट , एमिनेम रै हासिल टेन number-one एल्बम  on the Billboard 200 .
He has sold more than 100 million records  विश्वव्यापी , सहित  42 million tracks and 49.1 million albums in the United States .
As an underground rapper Eminem  released  his debut solo album , Infinite in 1996 .
The album was a critical and  वाणिज्यिक विफलता  .
He gained mainstream popularity in 1999 after the release of his  major-label डेब्यू एल्बम the पतला छायादार  LP .
The LP  भी अर्जित एमिनेम उसके  first Grammy Award for Best Rap Album .
His next two records The Marshall Mathers LP , and The Eminem Show , also won Best Rap Album Grammy Awards , making Eminem the first artist to  जीत बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम लिये तीन लगातार  LPs .
This was followed by another studio  रिलीज in 2004  titled Encore .
Eminem then went on hiatus after  touring in 2005  .
he released उसके  first album in five years titled Relapse , on May 15 , 2009 .
In 2010 ,  एमिनेम released उसके  seventh studio album Recovery .
Recovery was an international success and was named the best selling album of 2010 worldwide , joining The  एमिनेम दिखाएँ , जिससे थी the बेहतरीन विक्रेता of 2002  .
Eminem won Grammy Awards for both Relapse and Recovery , giving  उसे a कुल of 13  Grammys in his career .
Eminem has opened other ventures , including his own record label  छायादार रिकॉर्ड साथ उसके मैनेजर  Paul Rosenberg .
He also has  उसके अपना रेडियो चैनल  , Shade 45 on Sirius XM Radio .
Eminem began an acting career in 2002 , when he starred in  the हिप हॉप नाटक  film 8 Mile .
He won the  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन असली  Song , becoming the first rap artist ever to win the award .
He has also made cameo appearances in The Wash ( 2001 ) ,  मजेदार  People ( 2009 ) and the television series Entourage .
The acre is a unit of area used in the imperial  और u.S. प्रथागत  systems .
An acre is about 40 % of a  हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा छोटी than an  American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United States , Australia , Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010 , the acre is no  longer officially  used in the United Kingdom , though is still used in real estate descriptions ) .
It is still used , to  कुछ extent ,  in Canada .
The international symbol of the acre is ac , and  is पारिभाषित as 1/640  of a square mile .
The  सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़  today is the international acre .
In the United States both the international acre  और the थोड़ा अलग  US survey acre are in use .
The  सबसे आम उपयोग of  the acre is to measure tracts of land .
One international acre  is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224  square metres .
दौरान the मध्य आयु , an एकड़ थी the राशि of  land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen .
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of Mass  led to अनेक नई  findings in the 19th century .
Joseph Proust 's  विधि of definite proportions और जॉन  Dalton 's atomic theory branched from the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier .
Lavoisier 's  quantitative प्रयोग नाज़िल  that combustion involved oxygen rather than what was previously thought to be phlogiston .
The law of conservation of mass , or principle of mass conservation , states that for any system closed to all transfers of  पदार्थ और उर्जा ( दोनो of जिससे have द्रव्यमान ) , the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली जरूर  remain constant over time , as system mass can not change quantity if it is not added or removed .
Hence , the quantity of mass is ``  conserved '' over  time .
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor destroyed , although it may be rearranged in space , or the entities associated with it may be changed in form , as for example when light or physical work is transformed into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or  work had  contributed .
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical reaction ,  नाभिकीय प्रतिक्रिया , or रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय in an पृथक प्रणाली  , the mass of the reactants or starting material must equal the mass of the products .
The concept of mass conservation is widely used in many fields such as chemistry , mechanics ,  और द्रव डायनामिक्स  .
Historically ,  द्रव्यमान संरक्षण थी खोजा in रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये  in the late 18th century , and was of crucial importance in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry .
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in chemistry to such high approximation that it failed only for the high energies treated by  the बाद refinements of आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त , लकिन वरना remains  useful and sufficiently accurate for most chemical calculations , even in modern practice .
In special relativity , needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between systems is involved , the difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes important , since conservation of  द्रव्यमान is सख्ती और perfectly upheld तभी लिये so-called पृथक प्रणालियों , i.e . those  completely isolated from all exchanges with the environment .
In this circumstance , the mass-energy equivalence theorem states that mass conservation is  समतुल्य to कुल उर्जा संरक्षण ,  which is the first law of thermodynamics .
By contrast ,  लिये a thermodynamically बंद प्रणाली ( i.e. , एक जिससे is बंद to  exchanges of matter , but open to exchanges of non-material energy , such as heat and work , with the surroundings ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved .
The  इनपुट or आउटपुट of non-material उर्जा जरूर बदलें the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली in आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त , हालांकि the बदलें is प्रायः  small , since relatively large amounts of such energy ( by comparison with ordinary experience ) carry only a small amount of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ) .
In special relativity , mass is not converted to energy , since energy in all of its forms always retains its equivalent amount of mass throughout any transformation or  translocation into , or आउट of , a प्रणाली  .
however , निश्चित प्रकार of पदार्थ (  a different concept ) may be converted to energy , so long as the mass of the system is unchanged in the process .
However , if such energy is removed from systems , they must lose the  द्रव्यमान कि is संबद्ध साथ  it .
In general relativity , mass ( and energy  ) संरक्षण in expanding आयतन of स्पेस is a जटिल  concept , subject to different definitions , and neither mass nor energy is as strictly and simply conserved as is the case in special relativity and in Minkowski space .
For a  चर्चा ,  see mass in general relativity .
A pig is any of the  पशु in the  genus Sus , within the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates .
Pigs include the  घरेलू सुअर , इसके  ancestor the wild boar , and several other wild relatives .
Young and  छोटी सूअर  are known as piglets .
Pigs are  omnivores  and are highly social and intelligent animals .
8-inch ,  -inch , and -inch floppy disks
8-inch  , -inch ( पूरा  height ) , and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch diskette 's ``  फ्लॉपी '' चुम्बकीय  material , removed from its housing
A floppy disk , or diskette , is a disk storage medium composed of  a डिस्क of पतला और लचीली चुम्बकीय भंडार मीडियम , sealed in a आयताकार प्लास्टिक वाहक  lined with fabric that removes dust particles .
They  हैं पढ़ा और लिखा  by a floppy disk drive ( FDD ) .
Floppy disks , initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes , were a ubiquitous form of data storage and exchange from the mid-1970s well into the  पहला दशक of the 21st सदी  .
By 2010 , computer motherboards were  rarely manufactured साथ फ्लॉपी ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an  external USB drive , but `` , 8 `` , and non-standard drives could only be handled by old equipment .
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses , especially with legacy industrial computer equipment , they have been superseded by data storage methods with much greater capacity , such as USB flash drives , portable external hard  डिस्क ड्राइव , ऑप्टिकल discs , मेमोरी ताश , और कंप्यूटर संजाल  .
An  एनिमेटेड आरेख  of a cutter
In  बेसबॉल , a कटर , or काटें fastball ,  is a type of fastball which breaks slightly toward the pitcher 's glove side as it reaches home plate .
This pitch is somewhere between a slider and a fastball , as it is usually thrown  तेज़ than a स्लाइडर लकिन साथ अधिक  motion than a typical fastball .
Some pitchers use a cutter as a way to  prevent hitters  from expecting their regular fastballs .
A common technique used to throw a cutter is to  उपयोग a four-seam fastball पकड़ साथ the बेसबॉल नियत थोड़ा  off center in the hand .
When a batter is able to hit a  कटर पिच , it प्रायः परिणाम  in soft contact and an easy out , due to the pitch 's movement keeping the ball away from the bat 's sweet spot .
The  कटर is typically 2–5 किमी  slower than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball .
In 2010 , the average pitch classified as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher was 88.6 mph ; the average four-seamer  थी 92.1  mph .
`` What It Takes '' is a power  ballad  by American hard rock band Aerosmith .
it थी लिखा by स्टीवन  Tyler , Joe Perry , and Desmond Child .
It was released in 1990 as the third single from Aerosmith 's critically and commercially  कामयाब 1989 एल्बम पंप  .
In the video The Making of Pump , A & R man  जॉन kalodner वर्णित  the song as `` a masterpiece '' .
During live performances , Tyler sings  the पहला श्लोक a cappella  and belts out one of his signature screams right before the chorus .
The album version  of the सोंग is followed by  an untitled hidden track .
Head of Odysseus from a Greek 2nd century BC marble group representing Odysseus blinding Polyphemus , found at the villa of Tiberius at  sperlonga
Detail of an ancient  रोमन मोज़ेक of ulysses in ट्यूनीशिया
Odysseus ( or ; Greek : , ) ,  भी ज्ञात by the रोमन नाम ulysses ( ; ) , थी a legendary यूनानी  king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey .
Odysseus also plays a key role in Homer 's Iliad and other  works in कि वही एपिक  Cycle .
Husband of Penelope , father of Telemachus , and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea , Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance , guile , and versatility ( polytropos ) , and is hence known  by the epithet odysseus the cunning  ( mētis , or `` cunning intelligence `` ) .
He is most famous for the ten eventful years he took to  वापसी घर बाद  the decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy .
Erie is a Statutory Town  in बोल्डर और वेल्ड काउंटी  in the U.S. state of Colorado .
The population according to the  2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135  and was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 census .
The Town of Erie is located just west of I-25  लिये आसान अभिगम  to I-70 , Denver International Airport and Colorado 's entire Front Range .
Erie 's Planning Area  spans 48 वर्गाकार मील , extending इससे  the north side of State Highway 52 south to State Highway 7 , and between US 287 on the west and Interstate 25 to the east .
Erie is approximately 35 minutes from Denver International Airport , 25  मिनट्स to डेनवर और 20 मिनट्स  from Boulder .
The Board of Trustees serves as the legislative  और शासी देह of the कस्बा of erie  and is responsible for establishing Town policies and goals .
The Board has the authority to adopt laws , ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business of the Town , and by  अध्यादेश may डालें into अनुबंध or intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish , प्राप्त  services or to provide for cooperative service delivery .
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees , the Town Administrator is the chief operating and  प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर नेतृत्व  in the administration and execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board .
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to communicate and work with the community  to maintain a सुरक्षित पर्यावरण ,  prevent crime and enforce the law , while protecting the rights of all .
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is owned and operated by the Town of Erie and is  रणनीतिक स्तिथ in the denver-boulder महानगर क्षेत्रफल on कोलोराडो  Highway 7 , a little over three miles west of Interstate 25 .
The main runway is  कंक्रीट प्रशस्त और 4,700  feet long .
The is a home  वीडियो खेल कंसोल उत्पादित  by Sony Computer Entertainment .
It is the successor to the PlayStation 2  , as भाग of the प्लेस्टेशन  series .
The PlayStation 3 competes with  microsoft 's एक्सबॉक्स 360 और निन्टेंडो  's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles .
It was first released on November 11 , 2006 , in Japan , with international markets following shortly  thereafter  .
The console was  पहला officially घोषित  at E3 2005 .
Originally set for a spring  2006 रिलीज तिथि , it थी  delayed several times until finally hitting stores at the end of the year .
It was the first and currently only console  to उपयोग blu-ray  Disc as its primary storage medium .
Major features of the console include its unified online gaming service , the PlayStation Network , and its connectivity with the PlayStation Portable and  प्लेस्टेशन वीटा  , In September 2009 the updated PlayStation 3 Slim , was released .
This Slim is lighter and thinner than the original version , although it lacks PlayStation 2 backwards compatibility ( removed on later original models ) , but notably featured a  re-designed लोगो और विपणन डिज़ाइन  .
As of November 4 , 2012 , 70 million PlayStation 3s have  महरूम बेची विश्वव्यापी  .
Its  successor  , PlayStation 4 , is set for a Q4 2013 release .
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech , 1st Marqués de Dalí  de pubol  ( May 11 , 1904January 23 , 1989 ) , known as Salvador Dalí ( ) , was a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in Figueres , Spain .
Dalí  थी a skilled draftsman  , best known for the striking and bizarre images in his surrealist work .
उसके painterly  skills are often attributed to the influence of Renaissance masters .
His best-known work , The  हठ  of Memory , was completed in 1931 .
Dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included film , sculpture , and photography , in  सहयोग साथ a दायरा of कलाकारों  in a variety of media .
Dalí attributed his `` love  of सबकुछ कि is gilded और excessive , my  passion for luxury and my love of oriental clothes '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '' , claiming that his ancestors were descended from the Moors .
Dalí was highly imaginative , and also enjoyed  indulging in असामान्य और वैभवशाली बर्ताव  .
उसके eccentric manner और  attention-grabbing public actions sometimes drew more attention than his artwork , to the dismay of those who held his work in high esteem , and to the irritation of his critics .
पारस प्लेटो  by Silanion
The humanities are academic disciplines that study human culture , using methods that are primarily analytical , critical , or speculative , and having a significant historical element , as distinguished from the mainly  अनुभवजन्य approaches of the प्राकृतिक sciences  .
The humanities  शामिल प्राचीन और आधुनिक भाषाएं  , literature , philosophy , religion , and visual and performing arts such as music and theatre .
The humanities  कि हैं भी regarded as सोशल sciences  include history , anthropology , area studies , communication studies , cultural studies , law , economics and linguistics .
विद्वानों working in the मानवता  are sometimes described as `` humanists '' .
however , कि पद भी describes the philosophical  position of humanism , which some `` antihumanist `` scholars in the humanities reject .
Some secondary schools offer humanities classes , usually consisting of English literature , global  अध्ययन , और आर्ट  .
Human disciplines like history , cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis study subject  matters to जिससे the प्रायोगिक विधि  does not apply , and they have access instead to the comparative method and comparative research .
The 2005 Blue Room  क्रिसमस पेड़
The White House Christmas Tree ,  भी ज्ञात as the ब्लू रूम क्रिसमस पेड़ , is the आधिकारिक अंदर  Christmas tree at the residence of the President of the United States , the White House .
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White House sometime in the 19th century ( there are varying claims as to the exact year ) and since 1961 the  पेड़ रै था a प्रसंग मोटिफ  at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States .
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the  सिर of राज्य  and head of government of the United States .
The president leads the executive branch of the federal government  और is the commander-in-chief of the  United States Armed Forces .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the  निष्पादन of संघीय विधि , alongside the जिम्मेदारी of  appointing federal executive , diplomatic , regulatory , and judicial officers , and concluding treaties with foreign powers , with the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant  संघीय pardons और reprieves , और to convene और adjourn  either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president , despite possessing no formal legislative  शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स ,  is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States .
The  अध्यक्ष is अक्सर वर्णित  as the most powerful person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the  लोगों through the चुनावी  College to a four-year term , and is one of only two nationally elected federal officers , the other being the Vice President of the United States .
The Twenty-second Amendment  ,  adopted in 1951 , prohibits anyone from ever being elected to the presidency for a third full term .
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously had served as  अध्यक्ष ,  or acting president , for more than two years of another person 's term as president .
In all , 43 individuals have served  55 four-year  terms .
On January 20 , 2009 , Barack Obama  became the 44th और वर्तमान  president .
On November 6  , 2012 , he थी re-elected और is अनुसूचित  to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Senses are physiological capacities  of जीवों कि provide  data for perception .
The senses and their operation , classification , and  सिद्धान्त हैं अतिव्यापी विषय पढ़ाई by a किस्में of फ़ील्ड , सबसे  notably neuroscience , cognitive psychology ( or cognitive science ) , and philosophy of perception .
The nervous system has a specific  संवेदी प्रणाली or अंग , समर्पित to  each sense .
इंसानो have  a multitude of senses .
Sight ( ophthalmoception ) , hearing ( audioception ) , taste ( gustaoception ) , smell ( olfacoception or olfacception ) , and touch  ( tactioception ) हैं  the five traditionally recognized .
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses exists , including temperature ( thermoception ) , kinesthetic sense ( proprioception ) , pain ( nociception ) , balance ( equilibrioception ) ,  त्वरण ( kinesthesioception ) , और विभिन्न आतंरिक stimuli  ( e.g . the different chemoreceptors for detecting salt and carbon dioxide concentrations in the blood ) , only a small number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves .
What constitutes a sense is a matter of some debate ,  अग्रणी to कठिनाइयों in धमक  what exactly a sense is .
पशु भी have receptors  to sense the world around them , with degrees of capability varying greatly between species .
Humans have a comparatively weak sense of smell , while some animals may lack one or more of  the परंपरागत पाँच होश  .
Some  पशु may भी सेवन  and interpret sensory stimuli in very different ways .
Some  प्रजाति of पशु हैं समर्थ  to sense the world in a way that humans can not , with some species able to sense electrical and magnetic fields , and detect water pressure and currents .
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have eight  टाँगे और  chelicerae with fangs that inject venom .
They are the largest order of arachnids and rank seventh in total species diversity  among सब अन्य समूह of जीवों  .
Spiders are found worldwide on every  महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक , और have become स्थापित  in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at  तनिक 43,678 मकड़ी प्रजाति , और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however , वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर the  scientific community as to how all these families should be classified , as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ from other arthropods  in कि the usual  body segments are fused into two tagmata , the cephalothorax and abdomen , and joined by a small , cylindrical pedicel .
Unlike insects , spiders do  नहीं have antennae  .
In all except the most primitive group , the Mesothelae , spiders have the most centralized nervous systems of all arthropods , as all their ganglia are  fused into एक द्रव्यमान  in the cephalothorax .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders have no extensor muscles in  उनके limbs और बजाय  extend them by hydraulic pressure .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to six types of silk glands  भीतर उनके  abdomen .
मकड़ी webs vary widely  in size , shape and the amount of sticky thread used .
It now appears that the spiral orb  वेब may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म , और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे cobwebs  are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about , but these  पशु जाहिर lacked  spinnerets .
True spiders have been found  in carboniferous रॉक्स  from , and are very similar to the most primitive surviving order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups of modern spiders , Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae , first appeared  in the triassic  period , before .
A herbivorous  प्रजाति , bagheera kiplingi , थी वर्णित in  2008 , but all other known species are predators , mostly preying on insects and on other spiders , although a few large species also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide  दायरा of रणनीति to कैप्चर  prey : trapping it in sticky webs , lassoing it with sticky bolas , mimicking the prey to avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing  कंपन , लकिन the क्रियाशील hunters have अधि  vision , and hunters of the genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones .
Spiders '  गुस्ताखी हैं too सीमित to लो solids , और वे liquidize  their food by flooding it with digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps , as they do not have true jaws .
Male spiders identify  themselves by a किस्में of जटिल  courtship rituals to avoid being eaten by the females .
Males of most species  जीवित a few matings  , limited mainly by their short life spans .
Females  बुनते रेशा egg-cases , प्रत्येक  of which may contain hundreds of eggs .
Females of many  प्रजाति परवाह लिये उनके यंग , लिये उदाहरण  by carrying them around or by sharing food with them .
A minority of species are social , building  सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere इससे  a few to 50,000 individuals .
Social behavior ranges from  precarious toleration ,  as in the widow spiders , to co-operative hunting and food-sharing .
Although most spiders live for at most two years ,  tarantulas और अन्य mygalomorph मकड़ियों can  live up to 25 years in captivity .
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans , scientists are now researching the use of spider venom in medicine and as  non-polluting  pesticides .
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness , strength and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials , and spider silk genes have been inserted into mammals  और पौधे to देखिए if ये  can be used as silk factories .
As a result of their wide range of behaviors , spiders have become common symbols in art and  mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of सब्र  , cruelty and creative powers .
Grey 's Anatomy is an American television medical drama that  premiered on the अमरीकी  Broadcasting Company ( ABC ) , as a mid-season replacement on March 27 , 2005 .
The series has aired nine seasons , and focuses on the fictional lives of surgical interns and residents as they gradually  evolve into seasoned डॉक्टर , जबकि trying to  maintain personal lives .
the दिखाएँ 's आधार originated साथ शोंडा rhimes , जो serves as  an executive producer , along with Betsy Beers , Mark Gordon , Krista Vernoff , Rob Corn , Mark Wilding , and Allan Heinberg .
The series was created to be racially diverse , utilizing a color-blind  ढलाई तकनीक  .
It is  primarily फिल्माया in लॉस  Angeles , California .
The series ' protagonist is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen Pompeo ) , who originally is accepted into  the रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम at the fictional  Seattle Grace Hospital .
Meredith is assigned to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra Wilson ) , along with Dr. Cristina Yang ( Sandra Oh ) , Dr. George O'Malley ( T. R. Knight ) , Dr.  izzie स्टीवंस ( कैथरीन heigl ) , और dr. एलेक्स karev ( जस्टिन  Chambers ) .
Following O'Malley 's death and Stevens ' departure , the hospital 's merger with Mercy West brings in  dr. जैक्सन एवेरी ( जेसी  Williams ) and Dr. April Kepner ( Sarah Drew ) , in the sixth season .
The surgical wing is primarily supervised by Dr. Richard Webber ( James Pickens , Jr. ) , who is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek  गड़रिये ( पैट्रिक डेम्पसे ) , और बाद dr. ओवन हंट ( केविन  McKidd ) .
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the conclusion of the third season , and is replaced by Dr. Erica Hahn (  ब्रुक स्मिथ ) , जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ दौरान  the fifth season , and later Dr. Teddy Altman ( Kim Raver ) , who departs at the end of the eighth season .
Introduced in the second season is Dr.  एडीसन मोंटगोमरी ( केट वाल्श ) , जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ at the समाप्त  of the third season , in order to launch her own spin-off medical drama Private Practice .
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric Dane ) also enter the  दिखाएँ in the दूसरी ऋतु , जबकि the latter मरता in the प्रीमियर  of the ninth season .
Meredith 's half-sister , Dr. Lexie Grey ( Chyler  leigh ) , appears  from season three and dies at the end of season eight .
Dr. Arizona Robbins ( Jessica Capshaw ) is given series regular  औकात at the शुरूआत  of the sixth season .
Grey 's Anatomy  is the highest-rated  drama in the key 18–49 demographic .
Previously among the overall  top-ten रेटेड  shows in the United States , Grey 's Anatomy has been well received by critics .
Considered an impact on culture , the series has received numerous  पुरस्कार , और रै भी महरूम  included in various critics ' top ten lists .
The show has produced several specials , as well as distributed all seasons to DVD , and  released a संग्रहण of merchandise  .
In 2012 , Grey 's Anatomy was named  the fifth-highest  revenue earning show , in terms of advertising per half-hour .
On May 11 , 2012 , the series was renewed for a ninth season ,  जिससे premiered on सितंबर 27 ,  2012 .
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a  दिमागी विकार characterized  by a breakdown of thought processes and by a deficit of typical emotional responses .
Common symptoms include auditory hallucinations , paranoid or bizarre delusions , or disorganized speech and thinking , and it is  accompanied  by significant social or occupational dysfunction .
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in young adulthood , with a global  आजीवन  prevalence of about 0.3–0.7 % .
Diagnosis is based on  observed बर्ताव और  the patient 's reported experiences .
Genetics , early environment , neurobiology , and psychological and social processes appear to be  महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों ;  some recreational and prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms .
Current research is focused on the  भूमिका of neurobiology , हालांकि  no single isolated organic cause has been found .
The many possible  combinations of लक्षण have  triggered debate about whether the diagnosis represents a single disorder or a number of discrete syndromes .
Despite the etymology of the term from the Greek roots skhizein ( σχίζειν , `` to split '' ) and phrēn , phren- ( φρήν , φρεν- ; ``  दिमाग '' ) , schizophrenia करता नहीं imply a `` विभाजित व्यक्तित्व '' , or `` अनेक व्यक्तित्व  disorder '' ( which is known these days as dissociative identity disorder ) —a condition with which it is often confused in public perception .
Rather , the term means a `` splitting of mental functions '' , because of the symptomatic  प्रस्तुतीकरण of  the illness .
The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic medication , which primarily  दबा dopamine (  and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity .
Psychotherapy and vocational and  सोशल पुनर्वास हैं  also important in treatment .
In more serious cases—where there is risk to self and others— involuntary hospitalization may be necessary , although hospital  stays हैं अभी shorter और कम  frequent than they once were .
The disorder is thought mainly to affect cognition , but it also usually contributes  to दीर्घकालिक समस्याएं साथ बर्ताव और जज्बात  .
People with schizophrenia are likely to have additional (   comorbid ) conditions , including major depression and anxiety disorders ; the lifetime occurrence of substance use disorder is almost 50 % .
Social problems , such as long-term  बेरोजगारी , गरीबी , और  homelessness are common .
The average life expectancy  of लोगों साथ the विकार is 12 to 15 सालो कम  than those without , the result of increased physical health problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5 % ) .
पॉल लेस्ली snider ( अप्रैल 15 , 1951–august 14 , 1980 ) थी  the estranged husband and manager of Playboy model Dorothy Stratten , whom he murdered before killing himself the same day .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from Mesopotamia , is amongst the  earliest surviving  works of literature .
The literary history of  gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र  Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk .
Four of  ये यहूद प्रयुक्त as  source material for a combined epic in Akkadian .
This first combined epic , known as the `` Old  babylonian '' संस्करण , तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी  BC and is titled after its incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a few  fragments of it have  survived .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the  गहन  '' ) .
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this longer ,  twelve-tablet संस्करण  have been recovered .
Some of the best copies were discovered  in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह  of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a  दोस्ती between  Gilgamesh and Enkidu .
enkidu is a जंगली man निर्मित by the  gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk .
Together , they journey   to the Cedar Mountain to defeat Humbaba , its monstrous guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven ,  जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा  Gilgamesh for spurning her advances .
As a punishment for these actions , the gods sentence  enkidu  to death .
The second half of the epic  focuses on gilgamesh  's distress at Enkidu 's death , and his quest for immortality .
In order to learn the secret  of अनन्त जीवन , gilgamesh  undertakes a long and perilous journey .
He learns that `` The life  कि तुम  are seeking you will never find .
When  the देवताओं निर्मित  man they allotted to him death , but life they retained in their own keeping . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic , and then  attributed to the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim  in the Akkadian version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death , because of his great building projects , and his account of what  utnapishtim बताई उसे happened दौरान the  flood .
The story has been translated into many different languages , and Gilgamesh has since become  adapted in works of लोकप्रिय  fiction .
A eukaryote ( or ) is an organism whose cells contain complex  structures enclosed भीतर  membranes .
Eukaryotes may more formally be referred to as the taxon Eukarya or  eukaryota .
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic cells apart from prokaryotic cells is the nucleus , or nuclear  लिफाफा , भीतर जिससे the जेनेटिक सामग्री is carried  .
The presence of a nucleus gives eukaryotes their name , which comes  इससे the यूनानी  ( eu , `` good '' ) and ( karyon , `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ) .
Most eukaryotic cells also contain other membrane-bound organelles  ऐसे as mitochondria ,  chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus .
All large complex  जीवों हैं eukaryotes , सहित  animals , plants and fungi .
The group also includes many unicellular  जीवों  .
Cell division in eukaryotes is different from that in  जीवों बगैर a केंद्रक  ( Prokaryote ) .
It involves separating the duplicated  गुणसूत्रों , through आंदोलनों  directed by microtubules .
There are two  प्रकार of प्रभाग  processes .
In mitosis , one  कोशिका divides to उपज दो  genetically identical cells .
In meiosis , which is required in sexual reproduction , one diploid cell ( having two instances of each chromosome , one from each parent ) undergoes recombination of each pair  of parental गुणसूत्रों , और तब दो चरण of कोशिका प्रभाग  , resulting in four haploid cells ( gametes ) .
Each gamete has just one complement of chromosomes , each a unique mix of  the सम्बन्धित जोड़ी of parental गुणसूत्रों  .
eukaryota appears to be monophyletic ,  and so makes up one of the three domains of life .
The two other domains , Bacteria  और आर्किया , हैं prokaryotes और have  none of the above features .
Eukaryotes represent a tiny minority of all living things ; even in a human  देह वहीँ हैं 10  times more microbes than human cells .
However , due to their much larger size their collective worldwide  बायोमास is अनुमानित at परिचय बराबर to कि of prokaryotes  .
They are considered to have first developed  लगभग 1.6–2.1 अरब सालो पहले  .
The use of Internet services or software with Internet access to defraud victims or to otherwise take advantage of them , for  उदाहरण by चोरी निजी सूचना ,  which can even lead to identity theft .
A very common  रूप of अंतरजाल धोखाधड़ी  is the distribution of rogue security software .
Internet services can be used to present fraudulent solicitations to prospective victims , to conduct fraudulent transactions , or to transmit the  proceeds of धोखाधड़ी to वित्तीय  institutions or to others connected with the scheme .
Internet fraud can occur in chat rooms ,  ईमेल , संदेश  boards , or on websites .
The International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) is a NATO -led security mission in Afghanistan that was established by the United Nations  सुरक्षा परिषद in दिसम्बर 2001 by रेज़ोल्यूशन 1386 , as  envisaged by the Bonn Agreement .
Its main purpose is to  ट्रैन the अफगान नेशनल सुरक्षा शक्तियां  ( ANSF ) and assist Afghanistan in rebuilding key government institutions but is also engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups .
ISAF was initially charged with securing Kabul and surrounding areas from the Taliban ,  al qaeda और factional warlords , so as to allow लिये the स्थापना of  the Afghan Transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai .
In October 2003 , the UN Security Council authorized the expansion of the ISAF mission throughout Afghanistan , and ISAF subsequently  विस्तारित  the mission in four main stages over the whole of the country .
From 2006 to 2011 , ISAF had been involved in increasingly  अधिक intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन  in southern and eastern Afghanistan .
Troop contributors include from the United States , United Kingdom , NATO  सदस्य  states and a number of other countries .
The intensity of the combat faced by  contributing राष्ट्र varies greatly , साथ the संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम  , and Canada sustaining the majority of casualties in intensive combat operations , with other contributors sustaining significantly less .
As of early 2010 ,  वहीँ यहूद  at least 700 military bases inside Afghanistan but more were expected to be built in the coming years .
About 400 of  ये यहूद प्रयुक्त by  American‐led NATO forces and 300 by ANSF .
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine  ) ( इन ) is a crystalline tropane एल्कलॉएड कि is  obtained from the leaves of the coca plant .
The  नाम आता इससे ``  coca '' and the alkaloid suffix -ine , forming cocaine .
It is a stimulant , an appetite  suppressant , और a topical  anesthetic .
Biologically , cocaine acts as a  serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake  inhibitor , also known as a triple reuptake inhibitor ( TRI ) .
It is addictive because of its  प्रभाव on the mesolimbic  reward pathway .
Unlike most molecules , cocaine has pockets with both high  hydrophilic और lipophilic दक्षता , violating  the rule of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance .
This causes it to cross the blood–brain barrier far better  than अन्य psychoactive रसायन  and may even induce blood-brain barrier breakdown .
It is illegal to possess , produce , or distribute cocaine  लिये non-medicinal और  non-government-sanctioned purposes in almost every country .
Whole beef tri-tip  rump , roasted मीडियम  rare
The  tri-tip is a काटें  of beef from the bottom sirloin primal cut .
It is a small triangular  मांसपेशी , प्रायः 1.5 to 2.5  lbs . ( 675 to 1,150g ) per side of beef .
The scientific name  of इस मांसपेशी is प्रदिश fasciae latae , inserted in the fascia lata ,  the connective tissue covering the quadriceps femoris , also called quadriceps extensor , a group of four muscles which in turn insert in the patella , or knee cap of the animal .
Willmar is a city in , and the county seat of , Kandiyohi County ,  मिनेसोटा , संयुक्त  States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 19,610 at the 2010 census .
Willmar has been  आबंटित  ZIP code 56201 by the United States Postal Service .
U.S . Routes 12 and 71 and Minnesota State  राजमार्गों 23 और 40 हैं  four of the main routes in the city .
The  स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य  House of Representatives ( or Speaker of the House ) is the presiding officer of the chamber .
The office was established in 1789 by Article I ,  खण्ड 2 of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , जिससे राज्य  in part , `` The House of Representatives shall chuse their Speaker ... ''
The current Speaker  is जॉन boehner , a रिपब्लिकन  who represents Ohio 's 8th congressional district .
The Constitution does  नहीं आवश्यकता कि the स्पीकर be a सदस्य  of Congress , but no non-member has ever been elected to the office .
The Speaker is  दूसरी in the संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय लकीर of  succession , after the Vice President and ahead of the President pro tempore of the U.S. Senate .
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments , in which the office of Speaker is considered non-partisan , in the United States the Speaker of the House  is a नेतृत्व स्थिति और the office-holder  actively works to set the majority party 's legislative agenda .
the स्पीकर प्रायः करता नहीं personally  preside over debates , instead delegating the duty to members of the House from the majority party .
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority political party , the Speaker also  performs प्रशासनिक और  procedural functions , and represents his or her Congressional district .
A bicycle frame  is the प्रमुख घटक of a सायकिल  , on to which wheels and other components are fitted .
The modern and most common frame design for an upright bicycle is based on the safety bicycle , and  consists of दो त्रिकोण , a प्रमुख त्रिभुज और a युग्म पश्च त्रिभुज  .
This is known as the  डायमंड फ़्रेम  .
फ्रेम्स हैं जरूरी to  be strong , stiff and light , which they do by combining different materials and shapes .
`` Simple gravity  लोलक '' मॉडल assumes no  friction or air resistance .
An exemplar animation of a pendulum showing the velocity and  त्वरण  vectors
A pendulum is a weight  निलंबित इससे a so  that it can swing freely .
When a pendulum is displaced sideways from its resting  संतुलन स्थिति , it is  subject to a restoring force due to gravity that will accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position .
When released , the restoring force combined with the pendulum 's mass causes it to  oscillate परिचय the संतुलन स्थिति , सुहाने वापस  and forth .
The time for one complete cycle , a left swing and a  सही झूले ,  is called the period .
A pendulum  swings साथ a विशिष्ट  period which depends ( mainly ) on its length .
From its  डिस्कवरी around 1602 by गैलीलियो गैलिली the नियमित  motion of pendulums was used for timekeeping , and was the world 's most accurate timekeeping technology until the 1930s .
Pendulums are used to regulate pendulum clocks , and are used in scientific instruments  ऐसे as accelerometers और seismometers  .
Historically they were used as gravimeters to measure the  त्वरण of गम्भीरता in geophysical सर्वेक्षण  , and even as a standard of length .
The word 'pendulum ' is new Latin , from the  लैटिन pendulus  , meaning 'hanging ' .
The simple gravity  लोलक is an idealized  mathematical model of a pendulum .
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the end of a massless cord suspended from a , without   friction .
When given an  आरंभिक धक्का , it होगा  swing back and forth at a constant amplitude .
Real pendulums are subject to friction and air drag , so  the आयाम  of their swings declines .
The First Battle of Bull Run , also known as First Manassas ( the name used  by confederate शक्तियां ) , थी लड़ा on जुलाई 21 , 1861 , in प्रिंस  William County , Virginia , near the city of Manassas .
it थी the पहला प्रमुख  land battle of the American Civil War .
Just months after the start of the war at Fort Sumter , the Northern public clamored for a march  विरूद्ध  the Confederate capital of Richmond , Virginia , which they expected to bring an early end to the rebellion .
Yielding to political pressure , Brig . Gen. Irvin McDowell led  उसके unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the  equally inexperienced Confederate Army of Brig . Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction .
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a surprise flank attack on  the confederate बाएँ थी poorly चलाया by उसके अधिकारियों  and men ; nevertheless , the Confederates , who had been planning to attack the Union left flank , found themselves at an initial disadvantage .
Confederate  सुदृढीकरण अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर . gen. जोसेफ E.  Johnston arrived from the Shenandoah Valley by railroad and the course of the battle quickly changed .
A brigade of Virginians  अंतर्गत a अपेक्षाकृत अनजान कर्नल इससे the वर्जिनिया सैन्य  Institute , Thomas J. Jackson , stood their ground and Jackson received his famous nickname , `` Stonewall Jackson '' .
The Confederates then launched a strong counterattack , and as the Union troops began withdrawing under fire ,  अनेक panicked और it turned into a rout as mcdowell 's मेन frantically  ran without order in the direction of Washington , D.C .
Both armies were sobered by the fierce fighting and many casualties , and realized the war was going to be much longer and bloodier than either had  anticipated  .
