Weather is the state of the atmosphere , to the degree that it is  hot or ठंडा , गीला or  dry , calm or stormy , clear or cloudy .
Most  मौसम phenomena occur in the  troposphere , just below the stratosphere .
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and precipitation activity , whereas climate is the term for the average atmospheric  शर्तें over longer अवधि of समय  .
When used  बगैर योग्यता  , `` weather '' is understood to be the weather of Earth .
Weather is driven by air pressure ( temperature and moisture )  मतभेद between एक प्लेस  and another .
These pressure and temperature differences can occur due to the sun  कोण at कोई particular  spot , which varies by latitude from the tropics .
The strong temperature contrast between polar and tropical  एयर देता वृद्धि  to the jet stream .
Weather  प्रणालियों in the mid-latitudes  , such as extratropical cyclones , are caused by instabilities of the jet stream flow .
Because the Earth 's axis is tilted relative to its orbital plane , sunlight is incident at  अलग कोण at अलग  times of the year .
On Earth 's surface , temperatures usually range ±40 °C ( −40  °f to 100 °f ) annually  .
Over thousands of years ,  परिवर्तन in धरती 's कक्षा affect the राशि और वितरण  of solar energy received by the Earth and influence long-term climate and global climate change .
Surface  तापमान मतभेद  in turn cause pressure differences .
उच्चतर altitudes हैं कूलर  than lower altitudes due to differences in compressional heating .
Weather forecasting is the application of  विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी to भविष्यवाणी the राज्य  of the atmosphere for a future time and a given location .
The atmosphere is a chaotic  प्रणाली , so छोटी परिवर्तन  to one part of the system can grow to have large effects on the system as a whole .
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout human history , and there is evidence that  इंसान कार्यकलाप ऐसे as कृषि और उद्योग  has inadvertently modified weather patterns .
Studying how the weather works on other planets has been helpful  in समझना कैसा मौसम  works on Earth .
A famous landmark in the  सौर प्रणाली , बृहस्पति  's Great Red Spot , is an anticyclonic storm known to have existed for at least 300 years .
however , मौसम  is not limited to planetary bodies .
A star 's corona is constantly being lost to space ,  बनाना कया is essentially a बहुत  thin atmosphere throughout the Solar System .
The movement of mass ejected from  the सूर्य is ज्ञात  as the solar wind .
Katy Perry is an American  singer-songwriter इससे सांता  Barbara , California .
She signed  साथ कैपिटल  Records .
Perry has  released तीन स्टुडियो एल्बम  , including her debut Christian effort Katy Hudson , One of the Boys , and Teenage Dream .
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked off with the massive chart  कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू सिंगल  `` I Kissed a Girl `` .
During her career , Perry has been nominated for numerous major music awards ,  primarily लिये teenage  Dream and One of the Boys .
The following is a list of sovereign states and territories where  अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक भाषा or भाषा  of government .
In 2012 , there were 88  राज्य in कुल ( 60 sovereign  states and 28 non-sovereign states ) .
In many countries English is the dominant language , but  करता नहीं have आधिकारिक औकात  .
In Australia , English is spoken by the vast majority of the population and is the only language used in  सरकारी संस्थानों , लकिन ऑस्ट्रेलिया करता नहीं have an  official language .
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the United  राज्य , हालांकि अनेक राज्य और regions भीतर  the U.S. do have English as an official language .
English is the dominant language of New Zealand and an official language of Canada ( along with French ) , India (  साथ साथ हिंदी और अनेक अन्य  languages ) , Ireland ( along with Irish ) , and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ) .
English is  the एकमात्र आधिकारिक  language of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Commonwealth Games .
English is one of the official languages of the United Nations , the  यूरोपीय संघ और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक  Committee .
Many of these countries are current or former colonies or  dependencies of the संयुक्त किंगडम ( देखिए भी अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य  ) , or of the United States , itself a former colony of the UK .
Notable exceptions include Rwanda , which was a former Belgian colony and Eritrea , which was an Italian colony where the  अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य spanned इसके कंट्रोल तभी in संसार युद्ध ii और  shortly after ( 1941-1952 ) .
India  's भाषाई  picture is complex .
According to the Constitution of India , `` Hindi in the Devanagari script '' is the official  भाषा of the संघ ; और अंग्रेज़ी the 'subsidiary आधिकारिक  language ' ; however , English is mandated for the authoritative texts of all federal laws and Supreme Court decisions and ( along with Hindi ) is one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament .
English  is प्रयुक्त लगभग exclusively  for higher education , business and science .
Courses in majority of  the स्कूलों हैं सिखाया  exclusively in English .
English is  extensively प्रयुक्त  for administrative purposes in India .
India is the second-largest English-speaking country in  the संसार by क्रमांक of अध्यक्षों  , after the United States .
As such , many consider English to be the de  facto आधिकारिक भाषा  of India .
See Official languages of  इण्डिया  .
The linguistic makeup of  पाकिस्तानी is similarly  complex .
While the national language is Urdu , English is an official  भाषा और प्रयुक्त in कारोबार , सरकारी  and law .
अंग्रेज़ी  is a compulsory language in schools .
All school  पाठ्यक्रम हैं  taught in English .
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking country in the world  by जनसांख्यिकी  .
Southern Cone ( , ) is a geographic region composed of the southernmost areas of South America , south  of  the Tropic of Capricorn .
Although geographically this includes Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo ) of  ब्राज़ील , in शर्तें of राजनैतिक भूगोल the दक्षिणी  cone has traditionally comprised Argentina , Chile , Paraguay , and Uruguay .
In the narrowest sense , it only covers Argentina ,  चिली और उरुग्वे , bounded on the उत्तर by the राज्य of ब्राज़ील , पैराग्वे , बोलीविया  and Peru , on the west by the Pacific Ocean , and south to the junction between the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans , which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ) .
High life expectancy , the highest Human Development Index of Latin America , high Standard  of जीना , significant भागीदारी in the वैश्विक  markets and the emerging economy of its members make the Southern Cone the most prosperous macro-region in South America .
For multi-event athletic competitions see Track and Field Competitions ,  खण्ड `` बैठक  '' .
Meetings are sometimes held around  सम्मेलन टेबल  .
In a meeting , two or more people come together to  discuss एक or अधिक  topics , often in a formal setting .
An official game in baseball , also sometimes called a regulation game , is a game that has  progressed परे the पाइंट at  which it can be considered complete if necessary .
This is  लगभग  the halfway point of the game .
In the case of inclement weather , any game which has reached this point may be stopped and shortened as needed , with the result being  फाइनल , और सब रिकॉर्ड और  statistics counted .
A  खेल जिससे रै नहीं पहुँचे इस पाइंट पहले होने रोका  is either considered a suspended game ( to be continued at a later date from the point of stoppage ) , or is simply canceled and replayed from the start .
( This depends on the rules of each  व्यक्तिगत लीग  . )
In either  मामला , no आंकडे  are counted until the game becomes official .
Since most professional baseball games are nine  पारी long  , the fifth inning is used as the threshold for an official game .
If the visiting team is leading , or the game is  tied , the समाप्त of the पांचवां inning marks  this point .
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the score , and theoretically would  नहीं need इसके हाफ of the पांचवां  inning , then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e. , the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game .
The game is also considered official if the home team scores to take the lead in the bottom of the fifth inning , since the game would end immediately  if the वही बात happened  in the ninth .
In nearly all cases , the `` official game '' status is used to  determine whether  a rain check will be honored for fans holding tickets .
If a game is started but does not reach the point of becoming official , fans are entitled to a new ticket for the make-up game  or ( in सबसे मामले ) कोई अन्य उपलब्धियाँ  game of their choice .
If a game is halted after it becomes official , the  खेल is बस shortened और  no rain check is given .
The `` official game '' statistic received some attention during the 1995 season , when Cal Ripken , Jr. was approaching the record for  लगातार खेल निभाई , previously आयोजित by  Lou Gehrig .
Large numbers were hung on the side of  the b & o गोदाम at oriole पार्क  at Camden Yards to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak .
प्रत्येक दिन , a नई क्रमांक थी unfurled दौरान the  fifth inning after each game had become official ( since the statistic would not have counted if the game had been stopped before that point ) .
A similar practice has been used to count down toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including Veterans Stadium in Philadelphia in 2003 , Busch Memorial Stadium in St. Louis in 2005 , and the original  यांकी स्टेडियम और shea स्टेडियम in नई यॉर्क नगर in 2008 ) ; as प्रत्येक खेल became आधिकारिक ,  the team would unveil a new ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be played in the stadium .
A telephone number or phone  क्रमांक is a अनुक्रम of अंक प्रयुक्त to कॉल इससे एक  telephone line to another in a public switched telephone network .
When telephone numbers were invented , they were short — as few as one , two or three  अंक — और यहूद दिए orally to a switchboard ऑपरेटर  .
As phone systems have grown and  interconnected to encompass the संसार  , telephone numbers have become longer .
In addition to telephones , they now  अभिगम अन्य डिवाइस , ऐसे  as computers and fax machines .
the क्रमांक contains the  information necessary to identify uniquely the intended endpoint for the telephone call .
Each such  endpoint जरूर have a अद्वितीय  number within the public switched telephone network .
Most countries use fixed length numbers ( for normal lines at least ) and therefore the number of  endpoints determines  the necessary length of the telephone number .
It is also possible  लिये प्रत्येक सदस्य to have a नियत  of shorter numbers for the endpoints most often used .
ये `` आशुलिपि '' or `` गति  calling '' numbers are automatically translated to unique telephone numbers before the call can be connected .
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g. , 1-1-9 , 9-1-1 , 0-0-0 , 9-9-9 , 1-1-1 , and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers for China , Japan , South Korea , Taiwan and Sri Lanka ; Canada and the United States ;  ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; the संयुक्त किंगडम , आयरलैंड , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , कैंडल , सऊदी अरब , the  United Arab Emirates , Morocco , Macao , Bahrain , Qatar , Bangladesh , Botswana , Ghana , Kenya , Hong Kong , Malaysia , Mauritius , Singapore , Zimbabwe , Trinidad , Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union , respectively . )
Many systems also allow calls within a local  क्षेत्रफल to be बना बगैर डायलिंग  the local area code .
For example , a phone number in North America will start with three numbers ( such as 661 ) , which  is the क्षेत्रफल कोड , followed  by seven digits split into sections of three and four ( such as 550-1212 ) , which is the local number .
Some areas now have  अनिवार्य ten-digit डायलिंग in  place , even for local calls .
Most telephone networks today  ( अपवाद होने  private intercom and secure phone networks ) are interconnected in the international telephone network , where the format of telephone numbers is standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164 .
This specifies  कि the संपूर्ण क्रमांक चाहिए  be 15 digits or shorter , and begin with a country prefix .
For most countries , this is followed by an area code or city code and the  सदस्य क्रमांक  , which might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange .
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to  represent an अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन क्रमांक in लिखने or  print , starting with a plus sign ( `` + '' ) and the country code .
When calling an international number from a fixed line phone , the  + जरूर be replaced साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कॉल उपसर्ग चुनी by the देश  the call is being made from .
Some mobile phones allow the + to be  डाला  directly .
The format and allocation of local phone numbers are controlled by each nation 's respective government , either directly or by sponsored organizations (  ऐसे as nanpa overseen  by NeuStar Inc. ) .
Before a telephone call is connected  , the टेलीफोन क्रमांक  must be dialed by the calling party or Caller .
The called party might have equipment that presents caller  id पहले the कॉल is answered  .
A collection agency is a business that pursues payments of debts  owed  by individuals or businesses .
Most collection agencies operate as agents of creditors and collect debts for a fee or percentage of  the कुल राशि  owed .
वहीँ हैं अनेक  types of collection agencies .
First-party agencies are  oftentimes subsidiaries of the  original company the debt is owed to .
Third-party agencies are separate companies  contracted by a कम्पनी to collect  debts on their behalf for a fee .
Debt buyers purchase the debt at a  प्रतिशत of इसके मान  , then attempt to collect it .
Each country has its  अपना नियम  and regulations regarding them .
कैनबिस  flower with visible trichomes
Cannabis , also known as marijuana ( from the Mexican Spanish marihuana ) , and by other names , is a preparation of the Cannabis  संयंत्र intended लिये उपयोग as a psychoactive ड्रग  and as medicine .
Pharmacologically , the principal psychoactive constituent of cannabis is tetrahydrocannabinol (  thc ) ; it is एक of 483 ज्ञात  compounds in the plant , including at least 84 other cannabinoids , such as cannabidiol ( CBD ) , cannabinol ( CBN ) , tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ) .
and  cannabigerol ( cbg  ) .
This is a list of American  फ़ुटबॉल quarterbacks जो have प्रारंभ लिये the वॉशिंगटन redskins  , as well as its predecessors the Boston Braves ( 1932 ) and Boston Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ) , in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
The  वॉशिंगटन redskins मताधिकार थी  originally founded in Boston , Massachusetts as the Boston Braves , named after the local baseball franchise .
The name was  बदला the following साल to  the Redskins .
In  1937 , the मताधिकार  moved to Washington , D.C .
Of the 49 Redskins starting  quarterbacks , दो have महरूम  inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame : Sammy Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen .

1st Special Forces Operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st SFOD-D ) , popularly known as Delta  फ़ोर्स , is एक of the संयुक्त राज्य  ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units .
It was  formerly सूचीबद्ध as  the Combat Applications Group by the Department of Defense but has since been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ) .
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively  समर्थित by usasoc , it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the operational कंट्रोल  of the Joint Special Operations Command .
डेल्टा फ़ोर्स और इसके नेवी बंटवारा  , the Naval Special Warfare Development Group , are the United States military 's primary counter-terrorism units .
Delta Force  's प्राथमिक कार्य हैं counter-terrorism , सीधा कार्रवाई ,  and national intervention operations , although it is an extremely versatile group capable of conducting many types of covert missions , including , but not limited to , hostage rescues and raids .
The Central Intelligence  एजेंसी  's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically its elite Special Operations Group ( SOG ) often works with – and recruits – operators from Delta Force .
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive decay , in which an atomic nucleus emits an alpha particle , and thereby  परिणत ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into  an atom with a mass number 4 less and atomic number 2 less .
Many other types of  decays हैं संभावित  .
रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय , भी ज्ञात as नाभिकीय  decay or radioactivity , is the process by which a nucleus of an unstable atom loses energy by emitting particles of ionizing radiation .
A material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation —  जिससे शामिल the उत्सर्जन of  energetic alpha particles , beta particles , and gamma rays — is considered radioactive .
There are many different types of  रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय ( देखिए तालिका  below ) .
A decay , or loss of  उर्जा , परिणाम  when an atom with one type of nucleus , called the parent radionuclide , transforms to an atom with a nucleus in a different state , or to a different nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons .
either of ये  products is named the daughter nuclide .
In some decays the parent and daughter are different chemical elements , and thus the  क्षय प्रक्रम परिणाम in नाभिकीय  transmutation ( creation of an atom of a new element ) .
The first decay processes to be  खोजा यहूद अल्फा क्षय  , beta decay , and gamma decay .
Alpha decay occurs when the nucleus  ejects an अल्फा कण ( हीलियम केंद्रक  ) .
This is the most common process of emitting nucleons , but in rarer types of decays , nuclei can eject protons , or  विशिष्ट nuclei of अन्य तत्व  ( in the process called cluster decay ) .
Beta decay occurs when the nucleus emits an  इलेक्ट्रॉन or positron और a प्रकार of  neutrino , in a process that changes a proton to a neutron or the other way around .
The nucleus may capture an orbiting electron , converting a proton into a  न्यूट्रॉन ( इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर  ) .
All of these processes result in  नाभिकीय transmutation  .
By contrast , there exist radioactive  क्षय प्रक्रियाओं कि do नहीं परिणाम  in transmutation .
The energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted as a gamma ray in gamma decay , or used to eject an orbital electron by interaction  साथ the उत्साहित केंद्रक in a प्रक्रम  called internal conversion .
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons , and this results in a change in  an तत्व  from one isotope to another .
One type of radioactive decay  परिणाम in उत्पाद जिससे हैं नहीं पारिभाषित , लकिन appear  in a range of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus .
This  क्षय  is called spontaneous fission .
This decay happens when a large unstable nucleus spontaneously splits into two ( and occasionally three )  छोटी बेटी nuclei ,  and usually emits gamma rays , neutrons , or other particles as a consequence .
Radioactive decay is a  stochastic ( i.e. , यादृच्छिक ) प्रक्रम  at the level of single atoms , in that , according to quantum theory , it is impossible to predict when a particular atom will decay .
However , the chance that a given atom will  क्षय is निरंतर  over time .
For a large number of atoms , the decay rate for the  संग्रहण is computable इससे the  measured decay constants of the nuclides ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ) .
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent hair removal which removes the  बाल इससे the रूट .
New hair will not grow back in the previously waxed area for two to eight weeks , although  कुछ लोगों होगा प्रारंभ to देखिए regrowth  in only a week .
Almost  कोई क्षेत्रफल of the देह can be waxed  , including eyebrows , face , bikini area , legs , arms , back , abdomen and feet .
There are many types of waxing  उपयुक्त लिये निकालना  unwanted hair .
Strip waxing is accomplished by  spreading a मोम thinly over  the skin .
A cloth or paper strip is then  दबाया on the शीर्ष और ripped बंद the दिशा  of hair growth .
This removes the wax  साथ साथ the बाल  .
Strip wax can also be made at home using lemon juice , water ,  शुगर और मधु  .
Hot waxing utilizes Hot wax  ( as opposed to स्ट्रिप  wax ) .
In this case , the wax is applied somewhat thickly  और साथ no cloth  or paper strips .
the मोम तब hardens जब  it cools , thus allowing the easy removal by a therapist without the aid of cloths .
This waxing method is very beneficial to people  जो have संवेदनशील  skin .
Wall  पेंटिंग ( 1st सदी ad  ) from Pompeii depicting a multigenerational banquet
Ancient Roman culture existed throughout the almost 1200-year history of  the सभ्यता of प्राचीन  Rome .
The term refers to the culture of the Roman  गणतंत्र , बाद the रोमन साम्राज्य , जिससे , at  its peak , covered an area from Lowland Scotland and Morocco to the Euphrates .
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the city of Rome , its  famed सात पहाड़ियाँ , और इसके स्मारकीय structures  such as the Flavian Amphitheatre ( now called the Colosseum ) , the Forum of Trajan , and the Pantheon .
The city also  था अनेक थिएटर , gymnasiums  , and many taverns , baths , and brothels .
Throughout the territory under ancient Rome 's control ,  आवासीय वास्तुकला ranged इससे बहुत modest  houses to country villas , and in the capital city of Rome , there were imperial residences on the elegant Palatine Hill , from which the word palace is derived .
The vast  बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी जिया  in the city center , packed into insulae ( apartment blocks ) .
The  नगर of रोम थी the largest megalopolis  of that time , with a population that may well have exceeded one million people , with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000 .
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the population under the city 's jurisdiction lived in innumerable urban centers , with  जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000 और अनेक सैन्य settlements , a बहुत ऊँची रेट of शहरी by pre-industrial  standards .
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy  , जिससे था an अनुमानित रेट  of urbanization of 32 % , the same rate of urbanization of England in 1800 .
Most Roman towns  और शहरों था a फ़ोरम , मंदिरों  and the same type of buildings , on a smaller scale , as found in Rome .
The large urban population required an endless supply of food which was a complex logistical task , including acquiring , transporting , storing and  वितरण of खाना लिये रोम और अन्य  urban centers .
Italian farms supplied vegetables and fruits , but  मछली और मांस यहूद luxuries  .
Aqueducts were built to bring water to urban centers and  वाइन और आयल यहूद आयातित इससे hispania , gaul और अफ़्रीकी  .
There was a very large amount of commerce between the provinces of the Roman  साम्राज्य , चूंकि  its transportation technology was very efficient .
The average costs of  हस्तांतरण और the  technology were comparable with 18th-century Europe .
The later city of Rome did not fill the space within its ancient Aurelian  दीवारें जबतक  after 1870 .
Eighty percent of the population  अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of प्राचीन रोम  lived in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants .
Landlords generally resided in cities and their estates were left in the care of  फार्म  managers .
The plight  of ग्रामीण स्लेव थी  generally worse than their counterparts working in urban aristocratic households .
to stimulate a उच्चतर मजदूर उत्पादकता  most landlords freed a large number of slaves and many received wages .
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in one  छोटी फार्म हट in  Egypt , while six families owned a single olive tree . '' .
Such a rural environment continued to induce migration of population to urban centers until the early 2nd century , when the urban population  रोका growing और प्रारंभ  to decline .
starting in the मध्य of the 2nd सदी bc , निजी यूनानी संस्कृति थी increasingly in ascendancy , in spite of  tirades against the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists .
By the time of Augustus ,  संस्कारी यूनानी household स्लेव सिखाया the रोमन यंग ( sometimes  even the girls ) ; chefs , decorators , secretaries , doctors , and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East .
Greek sculptures adorned Hellenistic  लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the palatine  or in the villas , or were imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves .
The Roman cuisine preserved in the cookery books ascribed to  apicius is essentially  Greek .
Roman writers disdained  लैटिन लिये a संस्कारी यूनानी  style .
Only in law and governance was the Italic nature of Rome 's  accretive संस्कृति  supreme .
Against this human background , both the urban and rural  सेटिंग , एक of इतिहास  's most influential civilizations took shape , leaving behind a cultural legacy that survives in part today .
James Joseph ``  डफी '' waldorf , jr. ( born  August 20 , 1962 ) is an American professional golfer .
Glass bottles (  लिये खीरा स्लाइस  ) on shipping pallets
A Soviet  मेयोनेज़  jar
A  आधुनिक  `` French Kilner '' jar
Glass production involves two main methods – the float glass process , which  produces चादर कांच , और glassblowing जिससे  produces bottles and other containers .
A season is a subdivision of the year , marked by  परिवर्तन in मौसम , पारिस्थितिकी  , and hours of daylight .
सीज़न परिणाम इससे the वार्षिक क्रान्ति  of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution .
In temperate and polar regions , the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface ,  विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may कारण पशु to go into शीतनिष्क्रियता  or to migrate , and plants to be dormant .
During May , June and July , the northern hemisphere is exposed to more direct  धूप क्युकी the गोलार्ध  faces the sun .
The same is true  of the दक्षिणी  hemisphere in November , December and January .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the  सूर्य to be उच्चतर in the  sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux .
However , due to seasonal lag , June , July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December ,  जनवरी और फ़रवरी हैं the hottest  months in the southern hemisphere .
in शीतोष्ण और subpolar  regions , generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ) , summer ( estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate climate  regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal  ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot  regions have दो or तीन सीज़न  ; the rainy ( or wet , or monsoon ) season and the dry season , and in some tropical areas , a cool or mild season .
In some parts of the world , special `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on important events such as a hurricane  ऋतु , बवंडर ऋतु or a  wildfire season .
The  छह ecological  seasons
The  चार पंचांग सीज़न ,  depicted in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
The Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14 , 1861 ) was the bombardment and surrender of Fort Sumter , near Charleston  , दक्षिण कैरोलिना , कि प्रारंभ the  American Civil War .
Following declarations of secession by seven Southern states , South Carolina demanded that the U.S.  फौज लापरवाही इसके सुविधाएं in  Charleston Harbor .
On December 26 , 1860 , U.S. Major Robert Anderson surreptitiously moved his small command from the indefensible Fort Moultrie on Sullivan 's Island to Fort  sumter , a substantial किला controlling the  entrance of Charleston Harbor .
An attempt by U.S. President James Buchanan to reinforce and resupply Anderson , using the unarmed  व्यापारी  ship Star of the West , failed when it was fired upon by shore batteries on January 9 , 1861 .
South Carolina authorities then seized all  संघीय प्रॉपर्टी in the चार्ल्सटन  area , except for Fort Sumter .
During the early months of 1861 , the situation around Fort Sumter increasingly began  to resemble a घेरा  .
In March , Brig . Gen. P. G. T.  beauregard , the पहला सामान्य अधिकारी of the newly  formed Confederate States of America , was placed in command of Confederate forces in Charleston .
Beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of   batteries around Charleston harbor aimed at Fort Sumter .
Conditions in the  फोर्ट grew dire as the संघ  soldiers rushed to complete the installation of additional guns .
Anderson  थी छोटी of मेन  , food , and supplies .
The  resupply of फोर्ट  Sumter became the first crisis of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln .
He notified the  राज्यपाल of दक्षिण कैरोलिना  , Francis W. Pickens , that he was sending supply ships , which resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately .
प्रमुख एंडरसन  refused to surrender .
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12 , the Confederates bombarded the fort  इससे तोपखाने  batteries surrounding the harbor .
हालांकि the संघ गैरीसन लौटे  fire , they were significantly outgunned and , after 34 hours , Major Anderson agreed to evacuate .
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result of this engagement , although a gun  विस्फोट दौरान the आत्मसमर्पण ceremonies  on April 14 caused two Union deaths .
following the  battle , there was widespread support from both North and South for further military action .
Lincoln 's immediate call for  75,000 स्वयंसेवक to दबाने  the rebellion resulted in an additional four southern slave states also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy .
The  सिविल युद्ध  had begun .
3G ,  छोटी लिये तीसरा पीढी , is  the third generation of mobile telecommunications technology .
3G telecommunication networks support services that provide an information  ट्रांसफ़र रेट of at  least 200 kbit/s .
However , many services advertised as 3G provide higher  गति than the न्यूनतम तकनीकी  requirements for a 3G service .
Recent 3G releases ,  प्रायः denoted 3.5g और 3.75g ,  also provide mobile broadband access of several Mbit/s to smartphones and mobile modems in laptop computers .
3G finds application  in बेतार आवाज़ telephony  , mobile Internet access , fixed wireless Internet access , video calls and mobile TV .
`` Mazel Tov ! '' written on a  वाइन कांच टैग
Traditionally , after the groom  ब्रेक the कांच  , the guests shout `` Mazel Tov ! `` .
A birthday  केक , आइस्ड  with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ) , as is often done in Israel .
Here the phrase is written in  यहूदी  cursive .
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' (  यहूदी / यहूदी : `` מזל טוב '' , यहूदी  : `` mazal tov '' ; Yiddish : `` mazel tov '' ; lit .
`` good luck '' ) is a  phrase प्रयुक्त to एक्स्प्रेस बधाई  for a happy and significant occasion or event .
Hepatitis C is an infectious disease affecting primarily the  जिगर , caused by  the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) .
The infection is often asymptomatic , but chronic infection can lead to scarring of the liver and ultimately to cirrhosis ,  जिससे is generally apparent बाद अनेक  years .
In some cases , those with cirrhosis will go on to develop liver failure ,  जिगर कर्कट or life-threatening esophageal और  gastric varices .
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood contact  संबद्ध साथ intravenous  drug use , poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions .
An estimated  130–200 लाख लोगों  worldwide are infected with .
The existence of  ( originally `` non-  A non- B hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s and proven in 1989 .
only infects  इंसानो और  chimpanzees .
The virus  persists in the  liver in about 85 % of those infected .
This persistent infection can be treated with medication : the standard therapy is a combination  of peginterferon और ribavirin , साथ  either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases .
Overall , 50–80 % of  लोगों treated  are cured .
Those  जो develop cirrhosis  or liver cancer may require a liver transplant .
is the leading  कारण of जिगर प्रत्यारोपण  , though the virus usually recurs after transplantation .
No vaccine against is  उपलब्धियाँ  .
A flexible spending account ( FSA ) , also known as a flexible spending arrangement , is one of a number of  tax-advantaged वित्तीय खाते कि can be नियत up through a कैफेटेरिया योजना of an नियोक्ता  in the United States .
An FSA allows an employee to set aside a portion of earnings to pay for qualified expenses as  स्थापित in the कैफेटेरिया योजना , सबसे commonly लिये चिकित्सा खर्च  but often for dependent care or other expenses .
Money deducted from an  कर्मचारी 's अदा into an fsa is नहीं विषय to  payroll taxes , resulting in substantial payroll tax savings .
One significant disadvantage to using an FSA is that funds not used by the  समाप्त of the योजना साल हैं खोया to the कर्मचारी  , known as the `` use it or lose it '' rule .
The most common type of flexible spending account , the medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or health FSA ) , is similar to a  स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता ( hsa ) or a स्वास्थ्य reimbursement  account ( HRA ) .
However , while HSAs and HRAs are almost exclusively used as components of a consumer  चलित  health care plan , medical FSAs are commonly offered with more traditional health plans as well .
In addition ,  निधि in a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता  are not lost when the plan year is over , unlike funds in an FSA .
Paper forms or an FSA debit  कार्ड , भी ज्ञात as  a Flexcard , may be used to access the account funds .
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a U.S.  राज्य स्तिथ in the southeastern  United States .
Tennessee is the 36th most  extensive और the  17th most populous of the 50 United States .
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky and  वर्जिनिया to the उत्तर , उत्तर कैरोलिना to the ईस्ट , जॉर्जिया , अलबामा  , and Mississippi to the south , and Arkansas and Missouri to the west .
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the eastern  भाग of the राज्य , और the मिसिसिपी  River forms the state 's western border .
Tennessee 's capital and second largest  नगर is  Nashville , which has a population of 609,644 .
Memphis is  the राज्य 's largest  city , with a population of 652,050 .
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga  संघ , a 1772 frontier अनुबंध generally  regarded as the first constitutional government west of the Appalachians .
What is now  टेनेसी थी initially  part of North Carolina , and later part of the Southwest Territory .
Tennessee was  admitted to the संघ  as the 16th state on June 1 , 1796 .
Tennessee was the last state to leave the Union and join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. Civil War in 1861 , and the  पहला राज्य to be readmitted  to the Union at the end of the war .
टेनेसी सुसज्जित अधिक सैनिको  for the Confederate Army than any other state , and more soldiers for the Union Army than any other Southern state .
In the  20th सदी , टेनेसी  transitioned from an agrarian economy to a more diversified economy , aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority .
In the early 1940s , the city of Oak Ridge was established to house the Manhattan Project 's uranium enrichment facilities , helping to build the world  's पहला परमाणु बमबारी  .
Tennessee has played a critical role in the development of  अनेक फ़ॉर्म of अमरीकी लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक , सहित  rock and roll , blues , country , and rockabilly .
Beale Street  in मेम्फिस is माना  by many to be the birthplace of the blues , with musicians such as W.C . Handy performing in its clubs as early as 1909 .
Memphis was also home to Sun Records , where musicians such as Elvis Presley , Isaac Hayes , Johnny Cash , Carl Perkins , Jerry Lee Lewis , Roy Orbison , and  चार्ली समृद्ध began उनके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर , और जहाँ चट्टान और फेंकें took आकार  in the 1950s .
The 1927 Victor recording  सत्र in ब्रिस्टल generally चिह्नित the शुरूआत  of the country music genre and the rise of the Grand Ole Opry in the 1930s helped make Nashville the center of the country music recording industry .
Three  ईंटें और गारा संग्रहालय recognize टेनेसी 's भूमिका in nurturing विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of लोकप्रिय  music : the Memphis Rock N ' Soul Museum , the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum in Nashville , and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson .
In addition , the Rockabilly Hall of Fame , an  ऑनलाइन साईट recognizing the विकास of rockabilly in जिससे  Tennessee played a crucial role , is based in Nashville .
Tennessee 's major  उद्योग शामिल कृषि  , manufacturing , and tourism .
Poultry , soybeans , and cattle are the state 's primary agricultural  उत्पाद , और प्रमुख निर्माण निर्यात शामिल  chemicals , transportation equipment , and electrical equipment .
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park , the nation 's most visited national park , is headquartered in the eastern  भाग of the राज्य , और a खण्ड of the एपलाशियन  Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border .
Other major tourist attractions  शामिल the टेनेसी एक्वेरियम  in Chattanooga , the Sunsphere in Knoxville , Dollywood in Pigeon Forge , the Parthenon , the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum , and Ryman Auditorium in Nashville , and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis .
One design  रूपांतर of  a cock ring .
A cock  रिंग is a रिंग कि can be लगाई around  a man 's penis , usually at the base , primarily to slow the flow of blood from the erect penile tissue , thus maintaining an erection for a much longer period of time .
Cock rings can be worn around just the penis or both  the शिश्न और scrotum  , or just the scrotum alone , though this is usually called a testicle cuff .
Rings can be made of a variety of different materials , most commonly leather , rubber , or silicone , though nylon and metal are also used either  as the प्रमुख घटक  or part of the closure .
The term cock ring is  sometimes प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये a प्रिंस अल्बर्ट piercing , a piercing  of the penis that is usually , though not always , a metal ring .
When used in cases of erectile dysfunction they are known by various names such as ``  स्तंभन रिंग '' और `` टेंशन रिंग  '' .
The headquarters of Major  लीग बेसबॉल at 245 पार्क  Avenue , Midtown Manhattan , New York City , USA .
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a professional baseball  लीग , consisting of टीमों कि खेल in the नेशनल  League and the American League .
Dating to 1876 and 1901  क्रमशः , the दो लीग मिलाया in 2000 into a सिंगल संगठन led by the  Commissioner of Baseball , after 100 years as separate legal entities .
MLB constitutes one of the major professional sports leagues of the  संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा  .
It is composed of 30 teams —  29 in the संयुक्त राज्य  and one in Canada .
Teams in MLB play 162 games  प्रत्येक ऋतु over छह महीने  ( April through September ) .
Five teams in  प्रत्येक लीग अग्रिम to a four-round postseason  tournament that culminates in the World Series , a best-of-seven-games championship series between the two league champions which dates to 1903 .
The organization oversees many minor-league baseball leagues which operate  परिचय 240 टीमों संबद्ध  with the major-league clubs .
With the International Baseball Federation , the  लीग भी manages the  international World Baseball Classic tournament .
MLB has the highest season attendance of any sports league in the world  साथ nearly 75 लाख spectators in  2012 .
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. state located  on the अटलांटिक  Coast in the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States .
It is  bordered to the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by मेरीलैंड  , to the northeast by New Jersey , and to the north by Pennsylvania .
The state takes its name from Thomas West , 3rd Baron De La Warr , an   English nobleman and Virginia 's first colonial governor , after whom what is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named .
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva Peninsula and is the second smallest , the sixth  तनिक populous , लकिन the छठे  most densely populated of the fifty United States .
Delaware is  विभाजित into  three counties .
From north to south ,  ये तीन काउंटी हैं नई  Castle , Kent , and Sussex .
While the southern two  काउंटी have historically  been predominantly agricultural , New Castle County has been more industrialized .
Before its  तटरेखा थी छान by  Europeans in the 16th century , Delaware was inhabited by several groups of Native Americans , including the Lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south .
It was initially colonized by Dutch traders at Zwaanendael ,  स्तिथ निकट the  present town of Lewes , in 1631 .
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American Revolution and on December 7 , 1787 , became the first state to ratify the Constitution of the  संयुक्त राज्य , thereby बनने  known as The First State .
उर्जा परिवर्तन  in Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or energy  परिवर्तन is the प्रक्रम  of changing one form of energy to another .
In physics , the term  उर्जा describes the क्षमता  to produce certain changes within a system , without regard to limitations in transformation imposed by Entropy .
Changes in total energy of systems can only be accomplished by adding or subtracting energy from  उन्हें , as उर्जा is a मात्रा जिससे is conserved ,  according to the first law of thermodynamics .
According to special relativity , changes in the energy of systems will also coincide with changes in the system 's mass ,  और the कुल राशि of द्रव्यमान of a प्रणाली is  a measure of its energy .
उर्जा in a प्रणाली may  be transformed so that it resides in a different state , or a different type of energy .
Energy in  अनेक राज्य may  be used to do many varieties of physical work .
Energy may be used in natural processes or machines , or else  to provide कुछ सेवा  to society ( such as heat , light , or motion ) .
For example , an internal combustion engine converts the potential chemical  उर्जा in गैसोलीन और ऑक्सीजन into ऊष्मा , जिससे  is then transformed into the propulsive energy ( kinetic energy that moves a vehicle ) .
A solar cell converts solar radiation into electrical  उर्जा कि can तब be प्रयुक्त  to light a bulb or power a computer .
The generic name for a  यंत्र जिससे converts उर्जा  from one form to another , is a transducer .
In general ,  सबसे प्रकार of उर्जा , सहेजें  for thermal energy , may be converted efficiently to any other kind of energy .
sometimes इस occurs साथ an दक्षता of essentially 100 % , ऐसे as जब संभावित उर्जा is परिवर्तित  to kinetic energy as an object falls in vacuum , or when it orbits nearer or farther from another object , in space .
Conversion of other types of energies to heat may also occurs with  nearly पूर्ण दक्षता ( अनेक  types of friction do this ) .
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for isolated systems ) occur when energy has already been partly distributed among many  उपलब्धियाँ क्वांटम राज्य लिये a संग्रहण of अणु  , which are freely allowed to explore any state of momentum and position ( phase space ) .
In such  हालातों , a माप पुकारा एन्ट्रॉपी , or evening-out of उर्जा वितरण in ऐसे  states , dictates that future states of the system must be of at least equal evenness in energy distribution .
( There is no way , taking the universe as a whole , to  collect उर्जा  into fewer states , once it has spread to them ) .
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations to the efficiency with which thermal energy can be converted  to अन्य kinds of उर्जा , चूंकि थर्मल उर्जा in संतुलन at a दिए तापमान  already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states .
Such energy is  sometimes माना ``  degraded energy , '' because it is not entirely usable .
The  दूसरी विधि of ऊष्मागतिकी is a रास्ता of stating कि , लिये इस कारण  , thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with efficiencies approaching 100 % , only if the entropy ( even-ness or disorder ) of the universe is increased by other means , to compensate for the decrease in entropy associated with the disappearance of the thermal energy and its entropy content .
Otherwise , only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus , useful work ) , since the remainder of the heat must be reserved to be transferred to a thermal reservoir at a lower temperature , in such a way that the increase in Entropy for this process more than compensates for the entropy  घटी संबद्ध साथ परिवर्तन of  the rest of the heat into other types of energy .
The National  हॉकी  League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs , of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New York City , the NHL is widely considered to  be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर  ice hockey league in the world , and one of the major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada .
The Stanley Cup ,  the oldest पेशेवर खेल  trophy in North America , is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season .
The league was organized on November 26 , 1917 , in Montreal , Quebec , Canada , after the suspension of  परिचालन of इसके  predecessor organization , the National Hockey Association ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started with four teams and , through a series of expansions , contractions , and  relocations , the लीग is अभी रचित of 30 क्रियाशील franchises  .
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada , although the league has now been  binational चूंकि 1924 जब it विस्तारित into  the United States .
After a labour dispute that led to the  रद्दीकरण of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 ऋतु , the लीग  resumed play under a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships , attendance , and  टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस  .
The NHL draws many  अत्यधिक skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब  over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries .
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL , over the past four plus decades the percentages of  us और यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी have increased दोनो क्युकी of the एनएचएल 's जारी विस्तार  from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
इस is the पूरा सूची of the ratified  and unratified amendments to the United States Constitution which received the approval of the United States Congress .
Twenty-seven amendments have been ratified since the original signing of the Constitution , the  पहला टेन of जिससे हैं ज्ञात collectively as the विधेयक of  Rights .
The procedure  लिये amending the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution is governed by Article V of the original text .
There have been many other proposals for amendments to the United States  संविधान introduced in कॉंग्रेस , लकिन नहीं सुपुर्द  to the states .
Before an amendment can take effect , it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of both houses of Congress or by a convention ( known as an Article V convention ) called by two-thirds of  the राज्य  , and ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof , the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal .
To date , no convention for proposing amendments has been called by the states , and only once—in 1933 for the  अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the सम्मेलन विधि of अनुसमर्थन  been employed .
FMR LLC (  वफ़ादारी प्रबन्धन  and Research ) or Fidelity Investments is an American multinational financial services corporation .
It is one of the largest mutual fund  और वित्तीय सेवाएं समूह  in the world .
It was founded in 1946 and serves North American  निवेशकों  .
Fidelity Ventures is its  venture पूंजी भुजा .
Fidelity International Limited ( FIL ) , was  an अंतरराष्ट्रीय  affiliate founded in 1969 , serving most countries in the rest of the world .
In September 2011 , FIL was rebranded as 'Fidelity  विश्वव्यापी  Investment ' .
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual funds ,  provides निधि वितरण और निवेश सलाह सेवाएं  , as well as providing discount brokerage services , retirement services , wealth management , securities execution and clearance , life insurance and a number of other services .

It began on a Thursday and ended after 30 days on a Friday The following   events also occurred during the month:
Sociology is the scientific study of human  समाज और इसके origins , विकास  , organizations , and institutions .
It is a social science which uses various methods of empirical  छानबीन और नाजुक विश्लेषण to develop a देह of ज्ञान  about human social activity , structures , and functions .
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be applied directly to social  नीति और welfare , जबकि अन्य फ़ोकस primarily  on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes .
Subject matter  सीमाएँ इससे the सूक्ष्म स्तर of व्यक्तिगत  agency and interaction to the macro level of systems and the social structure .
The traditional focuses of sociology include social stratification , social class , culture , race and ethnicity ,  लिंग और कामुकता , सोशल गतिशीलता , धर्म , secularization  , law , and deviance .
As all spheres of human activity are affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency , sociology has gradually expanded its focus to further subjects ,  ऐसे as स्वास्थ्य , चिकित्सा , सैन्य और penal संस्थानों , the अंतरजाल  , environmental sociology , political economy and the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge .
the दायरा of  social scientific methods has also expanded .
सोशल शोधकर्ताओं चित्रण  upon a variety of qualitative and quantitative techniques .
The linguistic and cultural  turns of the mid-twentieth सदी led to increasingly interpretative  , hermeneutic , and philosophic approaches to the analysis of society .
Conversely , recent decades have seen the rise of new analytically , mathematically  और computationally कठोर तकनीकों  , such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis .
Sociology should not be confused with various general social studies courses which bear  छोटी संबंध to समाजशास्त्रीय सिद्धान्त  or social science research methodology .
Thunder is the sound  caused by बिजली  .
Depending on the nature of the lightning and distance of the listener , thunder can range from a sharp , loud crack to  a long ,  low rumble ( brontide ) .
The sudden increase in pressure and temperature from lightning produces rapid expansion of the air surrounding and within a  bolt of बिजली  .
In turn , this expansion of air creates a sonic shock wave , similar to a sonic boom , which produces the sound of thunder ,  प्रायः referred to  as a clap , crack , or peal of thunder .
The distance of  the बिजली can be  calculated by the listener based on the time interval from when the lightning is seen to when the sound is heard .
Palma  ( , , ) , in पूरा पालमा de mallorca  , is the major city and port on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and capital city of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands in Spain .
The names  ciutat de mallorca ( नगर of majorca  ) and Ciutat ( City ) were used before the War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by people in Majorca .
However , the  आधिकारिक नाम थी mallorca , the  same as the island .
It is situated on the south coast of the  द्वीप on the खाड़ी of पालमा  .
As of the 2009 census , the population of the city of Palma  उचित थी 401,270 , और the जनसांख्यिकी of the  entire urban area was 517,285 , ranking as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain .
Almost half of the total population of Majorca  सजीव in पालमा  .
The Cabrera Archipelago , though widely separated from Palma proper , is  administratively माना भाग of the  municipality .
Its airport , Son Sant  जोन , serves over 22 लाख  passengers each year .
the marivent  Palace was offered by the city to the then Prince Juan Carlos I of Spain .
The royals have since  खर्च उनके गर्मियाँ छुट्टियाँ  in Palma .

Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor  is a fictional अक्षर , a supervillain  appearing in comic books published by DC Comics .
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman , and as a high-status supervillain , has also come into conflict with Batman and  अन्य superheroes in the  DC Universe .
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe  shuster , the अक्षर  first appeared in Action Comics # 23 ( April 1940 ) .
Luthor is described as `` a power-mad , evil scientist '' of high intelligence  और अविश्वसनीय technological  prowess .
Luthor 's goals typically center on  हत्या सुपरमैन  , the foremost obstacle to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals .
Despite periodically wearing a powered exoskeleton , Luthor has traditionally lacked  superpowers or a डुअल पहचान  .
The character was originally depicted as a mad scientist who , in the vein of pulp novels , wreaks  कहर on the संसार साथ उसके अत्याधुनिक  weaponry .
In his  earliest दिखावे , luthor  is shown with a full head of red hair .
Despite this ,  the  character later became hairless as the result of an artist 's mistake .
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations , revealing him to be a childhood  dost of सुपरमैन 's जो खोया उसके बाल जब a आग नष्ट उसके प्रयोगशाला ;  Luthor vowed revenge .
Following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths , the character was re-imagined as a Machiavellian  उद्योगपति और white-collar दण्ड ,  even briefly serving as President of the United States .
In recent years , various  लेखक have revived luthor  's mad scientist persona from the 1940s .
The  अक्षर थी क्रमित  as the 8th Greatest Villain by Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains of All Time list .
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic Book Villains of  सब समय क्रमित luthor  as # 4 .
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic book critic Peter Sanderson , one of a few genre-crossing villains whose adventures take place `` in a world in which the ordinary laws of nature are slightly suspended '' ; characters such as Professor Moriarty , Count Dracula , Hannibal Lecter , Doctor Doom , and Darth  vader , भी अनुरूप इस  description .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday marking the  जन्मदिवस of रेव . dr. मार्टिन  Luther King , Jr .
It is observed on the third Monday  of जनवरी प्रत्येक साल  , which is around the time of King 's birthday , January 15 .
The floating holiday is similar to holidays set under the Uniform Monday Holiday Act , though the act predated the establishment of Martin Luther King , Jr. Day by 15  सालो  .
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent activism in the civil rights movement , which  सफलतापूर्वक protested जातिगत पक्षपात in संघीय और  state law .
The campaign for a federal holiday in King 's honor began  जल्द बाद उसके हत्या  in 1968 .
Ronald Reagan signed the  अवकाश into विधि in 1983 , और  it was first observed on January 20 , 1986 .
At first , some states resisted observing the holiday as such , giving it alternative names  or combining it साथ  other holidays .
It was officially  observed in सब 50 राज्य  for the first time in 2000 .
The camera phone solution  allows तत्काल sharing of  pictures .
As it 's automatic and instant , the user does not have to use a cable  or removable मीडिया to कनेक्ट to a निजी  computer .
A camera phone is a mobile  फोन जिससे is समर्थ to  capture still photographs ( and usually video ) .
Since  जल्दी in the 21st सदी  the majority of mobile phones in use are camera phones .
Most camera phones are simpler than  पृथक डिजिटल  cameras .
Their usual fixed focus  lenses और छोटी सेंसर  limit their performance in poor lighting .
Lacking  a शारीरिक  shutter , most have a long shutter lag .
Flash , where  उपस्थित ,  is usually weak .
Optical  जूम  and tripod screws are rare .
Some also lack a USB connection ,  removable मेमोरी कार्ड , or अन्य  way of transferring their pictures more quickly than by the phone 's inherent communication feature .
Some of the more expensive camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages , which apply most acutely in low  लाइट शर्तें और in कोई मामला have नहीं inhibited  their widespread use .
Most model  लाइनों improve in ये  regards every year or two .
Some ,  ऐसे as the droid  Incredible only have a menu choice to start an application program to activate the camera .
Others , such as  the ब्लैकबेरी तूफ़ान 2 , droid  X , Motorola V980 and Nokia 5800 also have a separate camera button for quickness and convenience .
Windows Phones can be configured to  operate as a कैमरा भी if  the phone is asleep .
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end digital compact cameras in appearance and to some extent in features and picture quality , and are branded as both  मोबाईल फोन और कैमरे , सहित निश्चित सोनी  phones .
The principal advantages of camera phones are cost and compactness ; indeed for a user who  carries a मोबाईल फोन वैसे , the अतिरिक्त  size and cost are negligible .
Smartphones that are camera phones  may चलाएं मोबाईल अनुप्रयोग  to add capabilities such as geotagging and image stitching .
A few high end phones can use their touch screen to direct their camera to focus on a  particular ऑब्जेक्ट in the फ़ील्ड of दृश्य , giving भी an अनुभवहीन उपयोक्ता a उपाधि  of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus .
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of Tomorrow  ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring  the DC Comics character of Superman .
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time , and soon to be retiring , Superman editor , Julius Schwartz , the story was published in two parts , beginning in Superman # 423 and  समाप्ति in  Action Comics # 583 , both published in September 1986 .
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan , in his final major contribution to the Superman titles , and was inked by George Pérez in  the समस्या of सुपरमैन और कर्ट schaffenberger in the समस्या of कार्रवाई  Comics .
The story  थी an काल्पनिक टेल जिससे बताई the फाइनल स्टोरी of the चांदी आयु सुपरमैन और  his long history , which was being rebooted following the events of Crisis on Infinite Earths , before his modern introduction in the John Byrne series , The Man of Steel .
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history of the character and to serve as a  पूरा निष्कर्ष to उसके mythology  .
The story is a frame story set ten years after Superman  थी पिछला देखी , जहाँ लोइस लेन recounts the टेल of the समाप्त of सुपरमैन 's  career to a reporter from the Daily Planet .
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by his enemies , the public  रहस्योद्घाटन of उसके रहस्य  identity of Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him .
The story has been cited as one of the best stories of  the अक्षर of सुपरमैन , और आलोचकों और ऑडियंस अक्सर  choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published .
It is used as an  उदाहरण of कैसा to बंद  the long-time continuity of a comic book character .
The story 's legacy has endured with similar  कहानियां लिखा as श्रद्धांजलि to it .
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of Tomorrow , and was used in  the शीर्षक of another सुपरमैन  .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring  car , designed और विकसित by  the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
the सुपर खेल संस्करण  of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the world , with a top speed of .
The original version has a top  गति of  .
It was named Car  of the दशक ( 2000–2009  ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best  car चलित सब साल पुरस्कार  in 2005 .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the world with the Veyron  ग्रैंड खेल  Vitesse , reaching on average a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss , and the exterior was designed by Jozef  kabaň of volkswagen , साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी  work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A number of special  विसंगतियाँ have महरूम  produced .
In December 2010 , Bugatti began offering prospective buyers  the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स  colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website .
the संस्था of the eucharist रै महरूम a कुंजी थीम  in the depictions of the Last Supper in Christian art , as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes painting .
`` At the  पिछला भोजन , on the रात्रि he  was betrayed , our Savior instituted the Eucharistic sacrifice of his Body and Blood . ''
( Catechism of the  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर 1323  )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass , that is , the Eucharist liturgy , and the bread and wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ , Lord and God , a declaration  प्रतिपादित by the परिषद of ट्रेंट साथ an anathema विरूद्ध anyone जो अस्वीकृत  this .
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term used in the Roman Catholic Church to refer to the Eucharistic species ( the  देह और रक्त of मसीह ) .
