A short story is a brief work of literature ,  प्रायः लिखा in कथा  prose .
Emerging from earlier oral  storytelling परंपराओं  in the 17th century , the short story has grown to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization .
At  इसके सबसे prototypical  the short story features a small cast of named characters , and focuses on a self-contained incident with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood .
In so doing ,  छोटी कहानियां मेक उपयोग of प्लाट , अनुनाद , और अन्य डायनेमिक  components to a far greater degree than is typical of an anecdote , yet to a far lesser degree than a novel .
While the short story is largely distinct from the novel ,  लेखक of दोनो generally चित्रण इससे a आम पूल  of literary techniques .
Short stories  have no नियत  length .
In terms of word count there is no  आधिकारिक demarcation between  an anecdote , a short story , and a novel .
Rather , the form 's parameters are given by the  rhetorical और व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे a  given story is produced and considered , so that what constitutes a short story may differ between genres , countries , eras , and commentators .
Like the novel , the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of the available markets for publication , and the evolution of the form seems  closely tied to the एवोल्यूशन of the प्रकाशन उद्योग और the  submission guidelines of its constituent houses .
The short story has been considered both an apprenticeship form preceding more lengthy works , and a crafted form in  इसके अपना सही , एकत्रित  together in books of similar length , price , and distribution as novels .
Short story  लेखक may define उनके  works as part of the artistic and personal expression of the form .
वे may भी  attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form .
Area codes  in मिशिगन
Area code 810 is the telephone  क्षेत्रफल कोड  serving eastern Michigan .
The raccoon ( , Procyon lotor ) , sometimes spelled racoon ,  भी ज्ञात as the आम raccoon , उत्तर अमरीकी raccoon ,  northern raccoon and colloquially as coon , is a medium-sized mammal native to North America .
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid  परिवार , having a देह लंबाई  of and a body weight of .
Its grayish coat mostly consists of dense  underfur जिससे insulates विरूद्ध ठंडा  weather .
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features are its extremely dexterous front paws and its facial  मुखौटा , जिससे हैं विषयवस्तु  in the mythology of several Native American tribes .
Raccoons are noted  लिये उनके प्रज्ञा , साथ अध्ययन प्रर्दशित  that they are able to remember the solution to tasks for up to three years .
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon , which is usually nocturnal ,  consists of परिचय 40 % invertebrates ,  33 % plant foods , and 27 % vertebrates .
The  असली habitats of the raccoon हैं पतझड़ी और मिश्रित वनों , लकिन due to उनके adaptability वे have विस्तारित उनके  range to mountainous areas , coastal marshes , and urban areas , where some homeowners consider them to be pests .
As a  परिणाम of escapes और deliberate introductions  in the mid-20th century , raccoons are now also distributed across the European mainland , the Caucasus region and Japan .
Though previously thought to be  एकान्त , वहीँ is अभी प्रमाण कि  raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior .
Related females often share a common area ,  जबकि unrelated males सजीव साथ in समूह of up to चार पशु to maintain उनके स्थितियाँ विरूद्ध विदेशी  males during the mating season , and other potential invaders .
Home range sizes vary anywhere from 3 hectares ( 7 acres ) for females in cities to 50 km2  ( 20 sq mi ) लिये males in prairies  .
After a gestation period of  परिचय 65 दिनों , दो to पाँच  young , known as `` kits '' , are born in spring .
The  kits हैं subsequently उठाया  by their mother until dispersion in late fall .
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over  20 सालो , उनके औसत जीवन  expectancy in the wild is only 1.8 to 3.1 years .
In many areas , hunting  और vehicular चोट  are the two most common causes of death .
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake , with an epicenter near the town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department ) , approximately west of  port-au-prince , हैती 's पूंजी .
The earthquake occurred at  16:53 लोकल समय ( 21:53 utc  ) on Tuesday , 12 January 2010 .
By 24 January , at least 52 aftershocks measuring  4.5 or वृहद था महरूम अंकित  .
An estimated three million people  यहूद प्रभावित by  the quake .
The  उच्चतम विश्वसनीय मौत  count was estimated at 220,000 .
haitian सरकारी  estimates were higher .
The government of Haiti estimated that  250,000 निवास  and 30,000 commercial buildings had collapsed or were severely damaged .
the भूकंप caused  major damage in Port-au-Prince , Jacmel and other settlements in the region .
Many notable landmark buildings were significantly damaged or destroyed , including the Presidential Palace ,  the नेशनल सभा  building , the Port-au-Prince Cathedral , and the main jail .
Among those killed were Archbishop of  port-au-prince जोसेफ सर्ज miot , और विपक्ष  leader Micha Gaillard .
The headquarters of the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH )  , स्तिथ in the पूंजी , collapsed , हत्या अनेक , सहित  the Mission 's Chief , Hédi Annabi .
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian aid , pledging funds and dispatching rescue and medical  टीमों  , engineers and support personnel .
Communication systems , air , land , and  समुद्र हस्तांतरण सुविधाएं , अस्पताल , और विद्युत संजाल  had been damaged by the earthquake , which hampered rescue and aid efforts ; confusion over who was in charge , air traffic congestion , and problems with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work .
port-au-prince 's morgues  were overwhelmed with tens of thousands of bodies .
These had  to be दफ्न  in mass graves .
As rescues  tailed  off , supplies , medical care and sanitation became priorities .
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals from aid workers and survivors , and  लूटने और विरल हिंसा यहूद  observed .
On 22 January the United Nations  विख्यात कि the आपात phase of the राहत आपरेशन थी आरेखण to a बंद  , and on the following day the Haitian government officially called off the search for survivors .
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse , originally appearing in short stories by Walter R. Brooks , and later in an American television situation comedy produced by Filmways that first aired in  अनुप्रयोग इससे जनवरी 5 to जुलाई 2 , 1961 , और तब on सीबीएस इससे अक्तूबर  1 , 1961 to February 6 , 1966 .
The stars of the show were Mister Ed , a palomino horse who could `` talk '' , played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited for the entire  लंबाई of the श्रेणी ) , और उसके मालिक , an eccentric और enormously  klutzy , yet friendly , architect named Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ) .
Much of the  कार्यक्रम 's ह्यूमर stemmed इससे the फैक्ट मिस्टर ed होता  speak only to Wilbur , as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker .
Other running  चुटकुले केन्द्रित on wilbur  's character being a huge klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or others .
According to the show 's producer , Arthur Lubin , Young was chosen as the lead  अक्षर क्युकी he `` बस लगा जैसे the sort of guy a घोड़ा होता  talk to '' .
Lubin , a friend of Mae West , scored a coup by persuading the screen  प्रतीक to अतिथि  star in one episode .
In the United States , reruns aired  on उपनाम at नाइट इससे कूच 3  , 1986 , to February 1 , 1993 .
Sister station TV Land also reran the show  इससे 1996–98  and again from 2003-06 .
The series is currently broadcast every morning on This TV , along with  राजमार्ग पैट्रोल , और the पैटी  Duke Show .
It is also currently  ब्रॉडकास्ट on hallmark  Movie Channel .
As of January 1 , 2011 , the  पहला दो सीज़न of the दिखाएँ हैं  available on Hulu .
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up  '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17 , जब the `` मुर्दे in मसीह '' और `` we जो  are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the Lord in the air '' .
The term `` Rapture '' is used in  at तनिक दो होश  .
In the pre-tribulation view , a group of people will be  बाएँ पीछे on धरती बाद  another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air . ''
This is now the most common use of the term ,  विशेषकर among fundamentalist  Christians and in the United States .
The other , older use of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the  फाइनल क़यामत generally , बगैर a विश्वास कि a समूह  of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
This distinction is important as some types of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in religious education , but might use the older and more general  भाव of the शब्द `` rapture '' in referring to कया happens दौरान the फाइनल  resurrection .
There are many views among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return ( including whether it will occur in one event or two ) , and various views  regarding the गंतव्य of the aerial महफ़िल वर्णित in 1  Thessalonians 4 .
Denominations  ऐसे as रोमन catholics , परंपरागत ईसाइयों  , Lutheran Christians , and Reformed Christians believe in a rapture only in the sense of a general final resurrection , when Christ returns a single time .
They do not believe that a group of people is  बाएँ पीछे on धरती  for an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby and the Plymouth  brethren , और popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in  the early 20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February 6 , 1985 ) is an  अमरीकी पेशेवर  basketball player with the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philistine cities of Gaza , Ashdod , Ashkelon ,  ekron , और  Gath
The  philistines ( , , , or ; , plištim ) , pleshet or peleset , यहूद a लोगों जो  as part of the Sea Peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron Age ( circa 1175 BC ) , most probably from the Aegean region .
According to the Bible , they ruled the five city-states ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of  गाजा , ashkelon , ashdod , ekron और gath , इससे wadi गाजा in  the south to the Yarqon River in the north , but with no fixed border to the east .
The Bible paints them as the Kingdom of Israel 's  सबसे खतरनाक दुश्मन  .
Originating somewhere in the Aegean ,  उनके जनसांख्यिकी थी around 25,000 in the  12th century BC , rising to a peak of 30,000 in the 11th century BC , of which the Aegean element was not more than half the total , and perhaps much less .
Nothing is known for certain about the  असली भाषा or भाषाएं  of the Philistines , however they were not part of the Semitic Canaanite population .
There is some limited evidence in favour of the  assumption कि the philistines  were Indo-European-speakers either from Greece and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor .
philistine-related शब्द मिला in the बाइबल हैं नहीं  Semitic , and can in some cases , with reservations , be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots .
By the beginning of the 1st Millennium BCE they had adopted the general Canaanite  भाषा of the प्रदेश  .
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a multiple choice test , administered by the United States Military  प्रवेश प्रसंस्करण कमांड , प्रयुक्त to determine योग्यता लिये enlistment  in the United States armed forces .
It is often offered to  अमरीकी ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी जब वे हैं  in the 10th , 11th and 12th grade , though anyone eligible for enlistment may take it .
Although the test is administered by the military , it is not ( and never  रै महरूम ) a आवश्यकता कि a test-taker साथ a qualifying  score enlist in the armed forces .
In financial accounting , a balance sheet  or बयान of वित्तीय स्थिति  is a summary of the financial balances of a sole proprietorship , a business partnership , a corporation or other business organization , such as an LLC or an LLP .
Assets , liabilities and ownership equity  हैं सूचीबद्ध as of a विशिष्ट तिथि , ऐसे  as the end of its financial year .
A balance sheet is often described as a `` snapshot of a  कम्पनी 's वित्तीय  condition '' .
Of the four basic  वित्तीय कथन , the  balance sheet is the only statement which applies to a single point in time of a business ' calendar year .
A standard company  संतुलन चादर रै  three parts : assets , liabilities and ownership equity .
The main categories of assets are  प्रायः  listed first , and typically in order of liquidity .
Assets are followed by  the देनदारी  .
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is known as equity or the net assets or the net worth  or पूंजी of the कम्पनी और according  to the accounting equation , net worth must equal assets minus liabilities .
Another way to look at the same equation is that assets equals  देनदारी प्लस मालिक 's इक्विटी  .
Looking at the equation in this way shows how  एसेट यहूद financed : either by  borrowing money ( liability ) or by using the owner 's money ( owner 's equity ) .
Balance sheets are usually presented with assets in one section and liabilities and  जाल लायक in the अन्य  section with the two sections `` balancing . ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing  the संपूर्ण बैंको संतुलन  at the end of the period , plus any cash in hand .
However ,  अनेक व्यवसायों  are not paid immediately ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment .
In other words : businesses have assets and so  वे can नहीं , भी if वे want to , तत्काल फेरे  these into cash at the end of each period .
Often , these businesses owe money to suppliers and to tax authorities , and the proprietors do not withdraw all their  असली पूंजी और profits at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक काल  .
In other words  व्यवसायों भी  have liabilities .
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire , commonly known as the .17 HMR  , is a rimfire राइफल कार्ट्रिज  developed by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002 .
It descended from the .22 Magnum by  necking bas the .22 मैग्नम मामला to लो a .17  caliber ( 4.5 mm ) bullet , and it is more costly to shoot than traditional .22 caliber rimfire cartridges .
Commonly loaded with a 17 grain ( 1.1 g )  गोली , it can उद्धार muzzle  velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ) .
The Schaumburg Flyers were a professional baseball team based in  schaumburg , इलिनोइस , in the संयुक्त  States .
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the North American League , which is  नहीं संबद्ध साथ प्रमुख लीग  Baseball , however , the team folded in March 2011 , before they began play in the NAL .
From the 1999 season to the 2010  ऋतु , the flyers निभाई उनके  home games at Alexian Field , near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway .
The team formerly played  in थंडर खाड़ी , ओंटारियो , जहाँ  they were known as the Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks .
The team was originally  a सदस्य of the  Northern League from 1993 to 2010 .
On July 27  , 2009 , the flyers निभाई मेजबान to बैटल of  the Sexes II , which pitted the Flyers against the National Pro Fastpitch Softball Champions , the Chicago Bandits .
Played by official softball rules , the game was seen by an overflow record crowd of 8,918 ,  और थी जीती by the डाकुओं  4-2 .
In 1999 , the Flyers hired their first manager ,  रॉन  Kittle .
Kittle is best known for his playing days with the Chicago White Sox , and former Chicago Cubs and White Sox player Greg  hibbard थी the pitching  coach .
During the early years of the franchise ,  kittle किया a श्रेणी of tv commercials to प्रचार  the team , using the gimmick `` Ma Kittle . '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma . ''
The ads were successful at sparking some initial interest in the team as the Flyers hoped to steal  दूर प्रशंसक इससे the आसपास  Kane County Cougars .
The ad mimicked the highly successful Converse ads where Larry Johnson starred as  दोनो खुद और  `` Gramama . ''
At the end of the 2001 season , however , Kittle resigned from his managerial position , and Jim Boynewicz  थी नियुक्त to बदलें उसे  .
In 2004 , the Flyers made it to the  उत्तरी लीग चैंपियनशिप  Series against the St. Paul Saints .
Despite leading the five-game series 2-1 , Schaumburg  आखिरकार खोया  the series .
In Game 5 , Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas allowed a game winning grand  स्लैम by st. पॉल infielder  Marc Mirizzi in the ninth inning .
The Flyers  appeared in the उत्तरी लीग playoffs  four times ( 1999 , 2003 , 2004 , 2006 ) but never won the championship .
Some famous players who played for the Flyers were former Oakland A 's outfielder Ozzie  canseco और पूर्व शिकागो  Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith .
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice /  ; born 7 कूच 1970 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी फिल्मी और  theatre actress and former fashion model .
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall , Cambridge  in the जल्दी 1990s , तब प्रारंभ working in  television , appearing in Inspector Morse , the British mini-series Scarlet and Black , and the television film Advocates II .
She made her film début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ) , but her breakthrough role came in the film  कड़ी प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ) , अग्रणी to a high-profile भूमिका as एवलिन carnahan-o'connell  in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ) .
Other notable films featuring Weisz are Enemy at the Gates , About a Boy , Constantine ,  the फव्वारा और the निरंतर माली , लिये  which she received an Academy Award , a Golden Globe and a Screen Actors ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle .
वो रै महरूम labelled  an `` English rose '' since her minor role in Stealing Beauty ( 1996 ) .
वाइज़  also works in theatre .
Her stage  भेदन थी the 1994 पुनरुद्धार of noël कायर 's खेल डिज़ाइन  for Living , which earned her the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer .
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999 Donmar  गोदाम उत्पादन  of Tennessee Williams ' Suddenly , Last Summer , and their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire .
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in  the latter खेल अर्जित उसके the  Critics ' Circle Theatre Award for Best Actress .
She has recently played Evanora in Oz the  ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली  .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the ``  संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके  secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its  उत्पत्ति in the  issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
विदेशी  powers did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure ,  the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल  Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans  , led by अब्राहम  Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his  उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming  republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address  घोषित  his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject  काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate forces seized  numerous  federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन विफल  to find a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did  और none पहचाना the नई confederate  States of America .
Hostilities began on  अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब  Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake  the fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the  किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल  blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive in 1861–62  .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate  रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam , dissuading  British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation , which made  समाप्ति गुलामी a  war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union  नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी , तब  much of their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 ,  रॉबर्ट E.  Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant  कमांड of सब संघ सेना in  1864 .
In  the पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T.  Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The  संघ marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति  to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate  फौज  failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of  the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships  , और mass-produced हथियार यहूद  employed extensively .
The  mobilization of civilian  factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history ,  resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000  soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old , and 30  प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी  white males aged 18–40 .
Potato bread is a form of bread in which potato replaces a  portion of the नियमित  wheat flour .
It is cooked in a variety of methods , including by baking it on a hot  तवे  or pan , or in an oven .
It may be leavened or  unleavened , और may have a किस्में  of other ingredients baked into it .
The  अनुपात of आलू to गेहूं आटा  varies significantly from recipe to recipe , with some recipes having a majority of potato , and others having a majority of wheat flour .
Some recipes call  लिये mashed आलू  , with others calling for dehydrated potato flakes .
It is available as a commercial product in many countries , with similar variations in ingredients , cooking  विधि , और अन्य परिवर्तनीय  .
The  प्रशांत समय मण्डल observes मानक  time by subtracting eight hours from Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
The clock time in this zone is based on the mean  सौर समय of the  120th meridian west of the Greenwich Observatory .
During  daylight छायांकन  time , its time offset is .
In the United States and  कनाडा , इस समय  zone is generically called Pacific Time ( PT ) .
Specifically , it is Pacific Standard Time ( PST ) when observing standard  समय ( शीत ) , और प्रशांत  Daylight Time ( PDT ) when observing daylight saving time ( summer ) .
Most  of कनाडा उपयोग daylight  saving time .
In Mexico the UTC−8 time zone is known as the Northwest Zone  , जिससे is synchronized साथ the u.S. पीडीटी  daylight saving schedule .
The largest  नगर in the प्रशांत समय मण्डल  is Los Angeles in California from USA ; the city 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone .
The zone is one hour ahead of the Alaska Time Zone , one  घंटा पीछे the पहाड़ समय  Zone and three hours behind the Eastern Time Zone .
स्टीरियो 8 , commonly ज्ञात as the eight-track  cartridge , eight-track tape , or simply eight-track , is a magnetic tape sound recording technology .
It was  लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the mid-1960s  through to the early 1980s , but was relatively unknown in many European countries .
It was , however , very popular in  the संयुक्त किंगडम  during this period .
Stereo 8 was created  in 1964 by a consortium led by विधेयक lear of lear जेट निगम , साथ  with Ampex , Ford Motor Company , General Motors , Motorola , and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ) .
It was a further development of  the समान stereo-pak  four-track cartridge created by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz .
A later quadraphonic version of the format was announced by  आरसीए in अप्रैल 1970  and first known as Quad-8 , then later changed to just Q8 .
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian : , alternatively transcribed  as rameses और ramses or ) , referred to as रामेसेस the ग्रेट , थी  the third Egyptian pharaoh ( reigned 1279 BC – 1213 BC ) of the Nineteenth dynasty .
He is often regarded as the greatest , most  मनाये  , and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian Empire .
His successors  और बाद उन्होंने  called him the `` Great Ancestor . ''
रामेसेस ii led अनेक सैन्य रिझाने into  the Levant , re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan .
He also led expeditions to the south , into Nubia ,  commemorated in inscriptions  at Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein .
At age fourteen , Ramesses was  नियुक्त प्रिंस रीजेंट by  his father Seti I .
He is believed to have taken the throne in his late teens and is known to have ruled Egypt from 1279 BC to 1213 BC for 66 years and 2 months , according to both Manetho and Egypt 's contemporary  ऐतिहासिक  records .
He was once said to have  जिया to be 99 सालो बूढ़ा , लकिन it  is more likely that he died in his 90th or 91st year .
If he  became pharaoh in 1279 bc as सबसे egyptologists आज मानना , he  would have assumed the throne on May 31 , 1279 BC , based on his known accession date of III Shemu day 27 .
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the first held after thirty years of a pharaoh  's शासनकाल , और तब प्रत्येक तीन सालो  ) during his reign—more than any other pharaoh .
On his death , he was buried in a tomb in the  घाटी of the किंग्स ; उसके देह थी बाद स्थानांतरित to a royal संचय जहाँ  it was discovered in 1881 , and is now on display in the Cairo Museum .
The early part of his reign  थी केन्द्रित on भवन  cities , temples and monuments .
He established the  नगर of pi-ramesses  in the Nile Delta as his new capital and main base for his campaigns in Syria .
इस नगर थी निर्मित  on the remains of the city of Avaris , the capital of the Hyksos when they took over , and was the location of the main Temple of Set .
He is also known as Ozymandias in the Greek sources , from a transliteration into Greek of a part  of रामेसेस 's सिंहासन नाम , , `` ra 's mighty सच्चाई  , chosen of Ra '' .
The  टेक्सास रेंजरों हैं a पेशेवर  baseball team located in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex , based in Arlington , Texas .
The Rangers franchise is currently a member of the  पश्चिमी प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल  's American League .
Since , the  रेंजरों have निभाई  in Rangers Ballpark in Arlington in Arlington , Texas .
The team 's name is borrowed from the famous  विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसी of  the same name .
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the Washington Senators , an expansion team awarded to Washington , D.C. , after the city 's  पहला ballclub  , the original Washington Senators , moved to Minnesota and became the Twins .
After the season , the new Senators moved to  आर्लिंगटन , टेक्सास , और debuted  as the Rangers the following spring .
the टेक्सास रेंजरों बेसबॉल क्लबों रै बना छह  appearances in the MLB postseason , all following division championships , in 1996 , 1998 , 1999 , 2010 , 2011 and 2012 .
In 2010 , the Rangers advanced past the Division  श्रेणी लिये the पहला समय , defeating  the Tampa Bay Rays .
Texas then brought  घर उनके पहला अमरीकी लीग pennant  after beating the New York Yankees in six games .
In the 2010 World Series , the franchise 's first , the Rangers fell to the  सैन फ्रांसिस्को दिग्गज  in five games .
Their lone victory made them the first Texas team to win a World  श्रेणी खेल , the  Houston Astros having been swept in their 2005 World Series appearance .
They repeated as American League champions the  following साल , तब  lost the 2011 World Series to the St. Louis Cardinals in seven games .
gaius जूलियस सीज़र  ( , July 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) was a Roman general , statesman , Consul and notable author of Latin prose .
He played a critical role in the  कार्यक्रम कि  led to the demise of the Roman Republic and the rise of the Roman Empire .
In 60 BC , Caesar , Crassus and Pompey formed a political alliance that was  to dominate रोमन राजनीती लिये अनेक  years .
Their attempts to amass  शक्ति through populist  tactics were opposed by the conservative elite within the Roman Senate , among them Cato the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero .
Caesar 's conquest of Gaul , completed by 51 BC , extended Rome 's  territory to the अंग्रेज़ी चैनल और the राइन  .
Caesar became the first Roman general to  क्रॉस दोनो जब he निर्मित a सेतु आरपार  the Rhine and conducted the first invasion of Britain .
These achievements granted him unmatched military power and  threatened to ग्रहण the खड़ा of pompey , जो था realigned खुद साथ the  Senate after the death of Crassus in 53 BC .
With the Gallic Wars concluded , the  सीनेट ordered सीज़र to lay bas उसके  military command and return to Rome .
Caesar refused , and marked his defiance in 49 BC by crossing the Rubicon with a legion , leaving his  प्रांत और illegally प्रवेश रोमन territory  under arms .
Civil war  resulted , इससे जिससे he उभरा  as the unrivaled leader of Rome .
After  assuming कंट्रोल of सरकारी , सीज़र  began a program of social and governmental reforms , including the creation of the Julian calendar .
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic and was  आखिरकार proclaimed `` तानाशाह in perpetuity  '' .
But the underlying political conflicts had not been  resolved , और on the ides of कूच  ( 15 March ) 44 BC , Caesar was assassinated by a group of senators led by Marcus Junius Brutus .
A new series of civil wars broke out , and  the संवैधानिक सरकारी of the  Republic was never restored .
Caesar 's adopted heir Octavian , later  ज्ञात as augustus , रोज़ to एकमात्र  power , and the era of the Roman Empire began .
Much of Caesar 's life is known from his own accounts of his military campaigns , and from other contemporary sources , mainly  the अक्षर और भाषणों of सिसरो और the ऐतिहासिक कृतियाँ of sallust  .
The later biographies of Caesar by Suetonius and Plutarch  हैं भी प्रमुख स्त्रोत  .
Caesar is  deemed to be एक of the महानतम  military commanders of history .
Linguistic map of  सीरियल , कैमरून  , and Benin .
Sign in English , outside the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Lagos
There are hundreds of languages  बोला  in Nigeria .
The major languages are Yoruba ,  हौसा , इग्बो , ईदो , fulfulde ,  Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English , the former colonial language , was chosen to facilitate the cultural and  भाषाई एकता of the देश .
English , however , remains an exclusive  बचाना of the देश 's शहरी elite , और is नहीं widely बोला  in rural areas , which comprise three quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of  अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे , encompassing  three major African languages families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several as-yet  unclassified भाषाएं , ऐसे as cen tuum , जिससे may represent a relic  of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families .
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot , ( UK ) bird 's nest , bishop 's lace , and Queen Anne 's lace ( North America ) ) is a flowering plant in  the परिवार apiaceae , देशी to शीतोष्ण regions of यूरोपीय , दक्षिणपश्चिम एशिया और  naturalised to North America and Australia .
domesticated गाजर हैं cultivars  of a subspecies , Daucus carota subsp . sativus .
In the United States  , the शीर्षक of संघीय न्यायधीश प्रायः अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the  President of the United States and confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States , whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of  कॉंग्रेस to alter , अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13  courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the  परम् अदालत ,  Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals , and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges ''  क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक  branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the Court of International Trade exercise  न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant  to Article III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts ,  सहित मजिस्ट्रेट न्यायाधीशों और दिवालियापन  judges , are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however , they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate , and their power derives from Article I instead .
See Article I and Article  iii अधिकरणों  .
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2 ,  1978 ) is a कनाडाई सिंगर , songwriter  and actress .
She has sold 20 million albums worldwide and more 20 million singles , bringing her total sales to over  40 लाख रिकॉर्ड around the संसार  .
Furtado first gained fame with  उसके डेब्यू  album , Whoa , Nelly !
, जिससे शाखित दो  successful singles , `` I 'm Like a Bird `` and `` Turn Off the Light `` . ``
I 'm  जैसे a बर्ड '' जीती a 2001 juno पुरस्कार लिये सिंगल of the साल  and a 2002 Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
In 2003 , Furtado released Folklore , which produced three international singles— `` Powerless ( Say What You Want ) `` ,  `` कोशिश `` और `` força  `` .
Three years later she released Loose , a  विश्वव्यापी वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी  .
The album spawned four number-one  हिट्स : `` promiscuous `` , `` maneater ``  , `` Say It Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) `` .
After a three-year break , she released her first full-length Spanish album , Mi  योजना , और फ़र्टाडो प्राप्त a लैटिन ग्रैमी  for Best Female Pop Vocal Album .
In  2012 , फ़र्टाडो 's चौथी english-language  studio album , The Spirit Indestructible was released .
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous  पुरस्कार और accolades , सहित  2 Grammy Awards , 10 Juno Awards , 3 MuchMusic Video Awards and a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame .
Creatures of the Night is the  दसवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम  by Kiss .
It is the  बैंड 's पिछला एल्बम लिये कासाब्लांका रिकॉर्ड  , the only label the group had ever recorded for at that point .
The album was  समर्पित to the  memory of Casablanca founder and early Kiss supporter Neil Bogart , who had died of cancer during the recording sessions .
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's  psycho सर्कस ) , और इसके पहला एल्बम साथ  Vinnie Vincent as the initially uncredited lead guitarist ( Vincent would later be credited , but not featured pictorially on the cover , of 1985 's reissue of the album ) .
Touch is a crucial  अर्थात् of receiving  information .
This photo  shows tactile markings identifying  stairs for visually impaired people .
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system comprising the receptors and processing centres to produce the sensory  modalities ऐसे as टच , तापमान , proprioception  ( body position ) , and nociception ( pain ) .
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia , skeletal muscles , bones and joints , internal organs , and the  cardiovascular प्रणाली  .
While touch is considered one of the five traditional senses , the  छाप of टच is formed इससे अनेक modalities  .
In medicine , the colloquial term `` touch '' is  प्रायः  replaced with `` somatic senses '' to better reflect the variety of mechanisms involved .
Somatic senses are sometimes referred to as somesthetic senses , with the understanding  कि somesthesis शामिल टच ,  proprioception and ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception .
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using  अलग receptors : thermoreceptors  , nociceptors , mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors .
Transmission of information from the receptors passes via sensory nerves through tracts  in the स्पाइनल cord और  into the brain .
Processing primarily occurs in the primary  somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in  the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex .
The cortical homunculus  थी devised  by Wilder Penfield .
At its simplest , the system works when activity in a sensory neuron is triggered by a  विशिष्ट stimulus ऐसे as ऊष्मा ; इस सिग्नल आखिरकार गुजरता to  an area in the brain uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location .
The point-to-point mapping of the body surfaces in the brain is  पुकारा a homunculus और is अनिवार्य  in the creation of a body image .
This brain-surface ( `` cortical '' )  मैप is नहीं अपरिवर्तनीय  , however .
Dramatic  शिफ्ट  can occur in response to stroke or injury .
Magnolia is a large genus of about 210 flowering plant species  in the subfamily  Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae .
It is named after French  वनस्पतिशास्त्री पियरे  Magnol .
Magnolia is an ancient  genus  .
Appearing before bees did , the flowers evolved to  प्रोत्साहित परागण  by beetles .
To avoid damage from pollinating  भृंग , the carpels of magnolia पुष्प  are extremely tough .
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have been found dating to 20 million years ago , and of plants identifiably belonging  to the magnoliaceae  dating to 95 million years ago .
Another aspect of Magnolias that is considered to  represent an ancestral राज्य is कि the पुष्प कली is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals  ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated and called tepals rather than distinct sepals and petals .
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic  साथ अनेक अन्य flowering पौधे निकट the आधार of the flowering  plant lineage such as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently derived plants such as Lilium ) .
The natural range of Magnolia species is a disjunct distribution , with a main centre in east and  southeast एशिया और a द्वितीयक केन्द्र in पूर्वी  North America , Central America , the West Indies , and some species in South America .

`` White Christmas '' is an Irving Berlin song  reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned  Christmas setting .
According to the Guinness Book of World Records , the version sung by Bing  crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of सब समय  , with estimated sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide .
Accounts vary as to when and where Berlin wrote the  सोंग  .
One story is that he wrote it in 1940 , in warm La Quinta , California , while staying at the La Quinta Hotel , a frequent  हॉलीवुड रिट्रीट भी favored by writer-producer फ़्रैंक capra , हालांकि the  Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there .
He often stayed up all night writing — he told  उसके सचिव , `` पकड़ें  your pen and take down this song .
I just wrote  the बेहतरीन सोंग i 've कभी लिखा  — heck , I just wrote the best song that anybody 's ever written ! ''
cross-country स्कीइंग ( or xc  skiing ) is a form of ski touring in which participants propel themselves across snow-covered terrain using skis and poles .
The activity is popular in many  स्थान साथ विशाल snowfields , primarily उत्तरी यूरोपीय  , Canada , and Alaska .
cross-country स्कीइंग is भाग of the nordic स्कीइंग खेल परिवार , जिससे शामिल स्की कूद , nordic संयुक्त  ( cross-country skiing and ski jumping ) , Biathlon ( skiing and rifle marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ) .
cross-country स्कीइंग is the आधुनिक स्टाइल  of skiing that most resembles prehistoric skiing , particularly when done in the backcountry .
It is also related to  telemark स्कीइंग  .
A use tax in  संयुक्त राज्य  is complementary to sales tax which means , if you buy a Taxable product/services without paying any Sales tax to vendor , you owe use tax .
You must self assess use tax and pay it directly to the  राज्य जहाँ the उत्पाद  were consumed or services were rendered .
Use tax typically is a tax on consumption but if you buy an item ( without paying sales tax ) and store it in your warehouse initially , use tax applies to that location where goods were  भंडारित .
Later on when  the फाइनल खपत takes प्लेस at कुछ अन्य स्थान , तुम हैं जरूरी  to pay the differential of tax rate to the jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption .
This really means that you do n't have to pay both Sales Tax  as खूब as  Use Tax on one transaction .
It  is तभी एक or the  other that you are required to pay on purchase of taxable products/services .
If vendor  करता n't चार्ज कोई बिक्री कर on इसके  invoice then it is the obligation of the buyer to self assess Use tax and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication .
Use Tax is generally charged at the same tax rate of Sales Tax but in some states  the कर रेट is अलग  .
Use tax is also termed as ``  खपत कर '' or `` उपभोक्ता  Use Tax '' .
A use tax is a type of excise tax levied in the United States by  numerous राज्य सरकारें  .
It is assessed upon tangible personal property  खरीदा by a निवासी of the assessing राज्य लिये  use , storage , or consumption in that state ( not for resale ) , regardless of where the purchase took place .
If a resident of a state  makes a खरीदें भीतर  his home state , full sales tax is paid at the time of the transaction .
The use tax applies when a resident of the assessing state purchases an item that is  नहीं विषय to उसके घर राज्य 's बिक्री  tax .
Usually , this is due to out-of-state  purchases , as खूब as ordering वस्तुएं through the मेल , by  phone , or over the Internet from other states .
The use tax is typically assessed at the same rate as the sales tax that would have been  owed ( if कोई ) था the वही goods महरूम खरीदा  in the state of residence .
For example , a resident of Massachusetts , with a 6.25 %  `` बिक्री और उपयोग कर '' on निश्चित goods और सेवाएं  , purchases non-exempt goods or services in New Hampshire for use , storage or other consumption in Massachusetts .
Under New Hampshire law , the New  हैम्पशायर विक्रेता collects no बिक्री कर on  the goods , but the Massachusetts purchaser/user must still pay 6.25 % of the sales price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax .
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase , whatever taxes were paid by the purchaser to that  राज्य can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग , भंडार or खपत  in Massachusetts .
With few exceptions , no state 's  विक्रेता होगा चार्ज the देशी राज्य 's बिक्री कर on goods shipped आउट of  state , meaning all goods ordered from out-of-state are essentially free of sales tax .
The purchaser is therefore required  to घोषित और अदा  the use tax to his home state on these ordered goods .
The assessing jurisdiction may make the use tax payable annually , but  कुछ राज्य आवश्यकता  a monthly payment .
For example ,  जहाँ a वर्मांट निवासी रै नहीं सशुल्क at तनिक 6 % बिक्री कर on  property brought in for use in the state , Vermont law requires filing a tax return ( Form SU-452 and payment ) by the 20th day of the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late fee , a 5 % penalty per month , to a maximum of 25 % , plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties .
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or governmental  एजेंसियों , purchases लिये पुनर्विक्रय in कॉमर्स  , and purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business .
भी नोट कि वहीँ हैं हज़ारों  of tax jurisdictions in the U.S. and many have ever-changing lists of specific types of goods and services that are not taxable .
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment of tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased and downloaded over the Internet for installation and use in Massachusetts , regardless of where it   originates .
However , the actual use of the same software downloaded by a Massachusetts resident  to a सर्वर in another राज्य remains a non-taxed `` सेवा ''  .
In contrast , Arkansas  generally करता नहीं कर anything वितरित  over the Internet ( such as downloaded software or music ) , except VoIP which is specifically defined as taxable `` telecommunications services '' .
Software (  pre-written or कस्टम ) `` वितरित thru a ठोस मीडियम '' ( i.e. , on डिस्क ) in अरकंसास is taxable  even if ordered online , except `` custom software for a particular customer '' which is non-taxable `` programming services '' even if delivered on a disk .
In most cases , this complexity is part of the underlying sales tax laws ; but while a brick-and-mortar store has to deal with only the sales tax  कानून of इसके अपना स्थान , रिमोट विक्रेता have to सौदे साथ the उपयोग कर कानून of अनेक jurisdictions—up to प्रत्येक us राज्य और मोहल्ले कि  assesses them , if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ) .
In medicine , pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an increase of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery , pulmonary vein , or pulmonary capillaries , together known as the lung vasculature , leading to shortness of breath , dizziness , fainting , and other  लक्षण , सब of जिससे हैं exacerbated by exertion  .
pulmonary hypertension can  be a severe disease with a markedly decreased exercise tolerance and heart failure .
It was  पहला पहचाना  by Dr. Ernst von Romberg in 1891 .
According to the most recent classification , it can be one of five different types :  arterial , venous , hypoxic , thromboembolic  or miscellaneous .

Sanuk , a  प्रभाग of deckers बाहरी निगम  , is a footwear brand based in Southern California .
Sanuk  , the थाई  word for fun , was founded by Southern California native Jeff Kelley when he started making sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet .
The first product created was green carpeted and entitled the ``  फर रियल '' बाद एक दूकान मालिक पूछा  if the novelty sandal was `` For Real . ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through boutique stores  और नहीं the intended  surf shops .
The novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped in  तार जाल , a तेंदुआ छपाई संस्करण , और शैलियाँ बना आउट  of a poncho material in a variety of colors .
Sanuk has grown to include  स्टाइल विकल्प लिये मेन , महिलाओं और युवावस्था और is वितरित आरपार  the United States and in over 50 countries throughout Europe , Asia , South America and Australia .
Sanuk centers itself around a positive lifestyle  वकालत the स्लोगन , `` मुस्कान  , Pass it on ! `` .
in कंप्यूटर विज्ञान , सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाएं ( भी ज्ञात as वेक्टर or multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize परिचालन on scalars to लागू transparently to सदिश , matrices , और उच्चतर आयामी arrays .
Array  प्रोग्रामिंग primitives  concisely express broad ideas about data manipulation .
The level  of conciseness can be नाटकीय in निश्चित मामले : it is  not uncommon to find array programming language one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of Java code .
APL , designed by Ken Iverson , was the first programming language to provide  array  programming capabilities .
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A Programming Language '' and  नहीं to arrays प्रति se . iverson 's योगदान to rigor और  clarity was probably more important than the simple extension of dimensions to functions .
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party , usually an individual , pays a life insurance company  a सिंगल प्रीमियम कि होगा बाद be वितरित वापस to the insured पार्टी over  time .
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time , such as via fixed payments , until the death of  the व्यक्ति or व्यक्तियों नामित  in the contract or until a final date , whichever comes first .
However , the majority of modern annuity customers use annuities only to accumulate funds free of income and capital gains  कर और to बाद लो lump-sum withdrawals  without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature .
अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama .
बराक ओबामा साथ उसके पहला  Supreme Court nominee , Sonia Sotomayor .
Following is a list of all United States federal  न्यायाधीशों नियुक्त by अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा दौरान उसके  presidency .
As of April 30 , 2013 , 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the United States Senate , namely two Justices to the Supreme Court of the United  राज्य , 35 न्यायाधीशों to the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals और 150 न्यायाधीशों to the संयुक्त  States district courts .
25 further  nominations हैं  currently awaiting Senate action .
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of Appeals , 67 vacancies on the United States district courts and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies  कि हैं anticipated to  occur before the end of Obama 's second term .
Obama has not made any  recess नियुक्ति  to the federal courts .
Obama has made two nominations to the United States Court of International  व्यापार , an आलेख iii  tribunal .
Obama also designated sitting  न्यायधीश एमिली C. हेविट of the  United States Court of Federal Claims , an Article I court , to be Chief Judge of that court .
This is a list  of एयरपोर्ट in  Mexico , sorted by location .
Mexico has about 1,834  एयरपोर्ट , रैंकिंग 2nd in क्रमांक  of airports in North America , and 3rd in the world .
Only major National and International  एयरपोर्ट हैं दिखाया  .
Agency debt also known as an Agency bond is  a सुरक्षा , प्रायः a बंध , जारी  by a U.S. government-sponsored agency .
The offerings of these agencies are backed but not  गारंटी by the us  government since the agencies are private entities .
कुछ prominent issuers of ये प्रतिभूति हैं छात्र ऋण विपणन संघ ( sallie mae ) , संघीय नेशनल बंधक संघ ( fannie mae ) और संघीय घर ऋण बंधक निगम ( फ्रेडी मैक  ) .
एजेंसी प्रतिभूति हैं प्रायः exempt  from state and local taxes , but not federal tax .
Agency debt is also called an  एजेंसी सुरक्षा  .
The  susquehanna  Steam Electric Station , a boiling water reactor .
The reactors are located inside the  आयताकार containment इमारतें towards the सामने  of the cooling towers .
Three nuclear-powered American warships , ( top to bottom ) nuclear cruisers USS Bainbridge and USS   Long Beach with USS Enterprise the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964 .
Crew members are  स्पेलिंग आउट आइंस्टीन 's mass-energy  equivalence formula E = mc2 on the flight deck .
The Russian nuclear-powered  हिमभंजक ns yamal on a 1994  joint expedition with the NSF .
Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear  परिवर्द्धन to  generate heat and electricity .
Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7 % of the world  's उर्जा और  13 % of the world 's electricity , in 2012 .
In 2013 , the IAEA  रपट कि वहीँ हैं 437 operational नाभिकीय  power reactors ( although not all are producing electricity ) , in 31 countries .
In addition , there are approximately 140 naval  बरतन using नाभिकीय नोदन  in operation , powered by some 180 reactors .
There is an ongoing debate about the use  of नाभिकीय उर्जा  .
Proponents , such as the World Nuclear Association , the IAEA and Environmentalists for  नाभिकीय उर्जा contend कि नाभिकीय शक्ति  is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions .
Opponents , such as Greenpeace  अंतरराष्ट्रीय और nirs , मानना  that nuclear power poses many threats to people and the environment .
Nuclear power  संयंत्र दुर्घटनाओं  include the Chernobyl disaster ( 1986 ) , Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster ( 2011 ) , and the Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ) .
वहीँ have भी  been some nuclear-powered submarine mishaps .
Research into safety improvements is  continuing और नाभिकीय  fusion , believed to be safer , may be used in the future .
As of 2012 , according to the IAEA ,  विश्वव्यापी वहीँ  were 68 civil nuclear power reactors under construction in 15 countries .
In the US the licenses of almost half its reactors have  महरूम विस्तारित to 60 सालो  , and plans to build another dozen are under serious consideration .
However , Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster  prompted a पुनर्विचार of नाभिकीय  energy policy in many countries .
जर्मनी decided  to close all its reactors by 2022 , and Italy has banned nuclear power .
Following Fukushima , the International Energy Agency  halved इसके  estimate of additional nuclear generating capacity to be built by 2035 .
Photograph  of the बर्लिन वॉल लिया  from the West side .
The Wall was built in 1961 to prevent  ईस्ट germans इससे fleeing  from Communism .
It was an iconic  प्रतीक of the ठंडा  War and its fall in 1989 marked the end of the War .
The Cold War ,  प्रायः दिनाँक इससे 1947 to 1991 , थी a sustained राज्य of राजनैतिक और सैन्य टेंशन between  powers in the Western Bloc , dominated by the United States with NATO among its allies , and powers in the Eastern Bloc , dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact .
This began after the success of their temporary wartime alliance against Nazi Germany ,  leaving the ussr और the us as दो superpowers साथ  profound economic and political differences .
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned Movement founded by Egypt , India , and Yugoslavia ; this faction rejected association  साथ either the us-led वेस्ट or the soviet-led  East .
The Cold War was so named because the two major powers—each  possessing नाभिकीय हथियार और thereby  threatened with mutual assured destruction —never met in direct military combat .
Instead , in their struggle for global influence  वे सगाई in जारी मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare और in  regular indirect confrontations through proxy wars .
Cycles of relative calm would  be followed by ऊँची टेंशन  , which could have led to world war .
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ) , the Korean War (  1950–1953 ) , the स्वेज संकट ( 1956 )  , the Berlin Crisis of 1961 , the Cuban missile crisis ( 1962 ) , the Vietnam War ( 1959–1975 ) , the Yom Kippur War ( 1973 ) , the Soviet war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ) , the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ) , and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ) .
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions , strategic conventional force deployments , extensive  सहायता to क्लाएंट राज्य , espionage , विशाल प्रचार अभियान , conventional और नाभिकीय बाहें  races , appeals to neutral nations , rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ) , and technological competitions such as the Space Race .
The US and USSR became involved in political and military conflicts in the Third World  देशों of  Latin America , Africa , the Middle East , and Southeast Asia .
To alleviate the risk of a  संभावित  nuclear war , both sides sought relief of political tensions through détente in the 1970s .
In the 1980s ,  the संयुक्त राज्य increased  diplomatic , military , and economic pressures on the Soviet Union , at a time when the communist state was already suffering from economic stagnation .
In the mid-1980s , the new Soviet President Mikhail Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization ''  , 1987 ) और ग्लास्नोस्त ( `` खुलेपन  '' , ca . 1985 ) .
Pressures for national  स्वतंत्रता grew stronger in  Eastern Europe , especially Poland .
They reached a breaking point when Gorbachev refused to use Soviet troops to support the faltering  सरकारी of ईस्ट जर्मनी  in late 1989 .
Within weeks all the satellite states broke free from Moscow  in a शांतिपूर्ण वेव of revolutions  ( there was some violence in Romania ) .
The  pressures escalated अंदर the सोवियत  Union , where Communism fell and the USSR was formally dissolved in late 1991 .
The United  राज्य remained as  the world 's only superpower .
The Cold War and its  कार्यक्रम  have left a significant legacy , and it is often referred to in popular culture , especially in media featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare .
Pikes Peak State Park is a state park of Iowa , USA , featuring a bluff  निहार the अपर मिसिसिपी नदी विपरीत  the confluence of the Wisconsin River .
The park is operated by the Iowa Department  of प्राकृतिक संसाधन  .
It  is nearly a  thousand acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent .
The nearest city is McGregor  , आयोवा  .
Iowa Highway 76 approximately defines  इसके उत्तरी boundary  .
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of Pikes Peak , a particularly high point overlooking the gorge of the Upper Mississippi , and like Pikes Peak  in कोलोराडो , is नामित लिये zebulon  Pike .
There are  चढ़ाई trails , campgrounds  and RV facilities .
Mountain bikes are  permitted in निश्चित portions  of the park .
aside इससे recreational विकास , the जमीन in the पार्क थी  never cleared and to a large extent remains as it was before the advent of white settlement .
It is part of a larger complex of  पार्क , reserves और refuges जिससे शामिल पुतला mounds नेशनल स्मारक , the विभिन्न components  of the Yellow River State Forest , the enormous Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller , much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge .
The Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing development  , और  will connect elements of these sites .
Zac Brown Band is an American country/folk band  आधारित in अटलांटा ,  Georgia .
The lineup consists of Zac  भूरा ( सीसे vocals , गिटार ) , jimmy de मार्टिनी ( चलाऊ , vocals ) , जॉन driskell हॉपकिंस ( बास  guitar , vocals ) , Coy Bowles ( guitar , keyboards ) , Chris Fryar ( drums ) , Clay Cook ( guitar , keyboards , mandolin , steel guitar , vocals ) , and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ) .
The band has toured  throughout the संयुक्त राज्य ,  including a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival .
They have also recorded five studio albums , and charted nine Number One  singles on the Billboard country  charts : `` Chicken Fried `` , `` Toes `` , `` Highway 20 Ride `` , `` Free `` , `` As She 's Walking Away `` , `` Colder Weather `` , `` Knee Deep `` , `` Keep Me In Mind `` , and `` Goodbye in Her Eyes `` in addition to the singles `` Whatever It Is `` and `` No Hurry `` , which peaked at number 2 on the same chart .
Talk radio is a radio format containing  चर्चा परिचय topical मुद्दे  .
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single  व्यक्तिगत , और प्रायः विशेषता साक्षात्कार  with a number of different guests .
Talk radio typically includes an element of listener participation , usually by broadcasting live conversations between the host and  श्रोता जो `` कॉल in '' ( प्रायः via  telephone ) to the show .
Listener contributions are usually screened by a show 's producer ( s ) in order to maximize audience interest and , in the  मामला of वाणिज्यिक बात रेडियो , आकर्षित  advertisers .
Generally , the shows are organized into segments , each separated by a pause for advertisements ;  however  , in public or non-commercial radio , music is sometimes played in place of commercials to separate the program segments .
Variations of  बात रेडियो शामिल  conservative talk , hot talk , liberal talk and sports talk .
While talk radio has historically been associated with AM/FM , starting around 2005 the technology for Internet-based talk-radio shows became cost  प्रभावी in the रूप  of podcasts .
Now , it is possible for an individual  to उपयोग a किस्में of सेवाएं to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio  show without carriage by a traditional radio station .
In addition TV programming from talk and news outlets such as BBC , CNN ,  ब्लूमबर्ग और फॉक्स हैं अभी प्रायः उपलब्धियाँ  expanding the world of talk radio further .
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios , but a wide variety of other devices and services including PCs using iTunes , station directories such as Tunein  , दिखाएँ निर्देशिका स्मार्टफ़ोन साथ ऐप्स  such as Stitcher .
Hippa is a  genus  of decapod crustaceans in the family Hippidae , containing the following species:
hippa adactyla  Fabricius , 1787
hippa  admirabilis ( Thallwitz , 1892 )
hippa alcimede  ( De Man , 1902 )
Hippa  australis  Hale , 1927
hippa carcineutes  Holthuis & Manning , 1970
Hippa  celaeno (  de Man , 1896 )
Hippa  granulatus  ( Borradaile , 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes (  दाना , 1852  )
Hippa  इंडिका haig  , Murugan & Balakrishnan Nair , 1986
Hippa  marmorata ( hombron  & Jacquinot , 1846 )
Hippa  ovalis ( A. milne-edwards  , 1862 )
Hippa picta (  heller , 1861  )
Hippa  strigillata  ( Stimpson , 1860 )
hippa testudinaria  ( Herbst , 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons (  miers ,  1878 )
It is closely related to the genus Emerita , and species have often been  transferred between  the two genera .
Jakarta ( ) , officially known as the Special Capital  प्रदेश of  Jakarta ( ) , is the capital and largest city of Indonesia .
Located on the northwest coast of Java , Jakarta is the country 's economic ,  सांस्कृतिक और राजनैतिक केन्द्र , और साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 10,187,595  as of November 2011 , it is the most populous city in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia , and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world .
The official metropolitan area , known  as  Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the initial syllables of Jakarta , Bogor , Depok , Tangerang and Bekasi ) , is the second largest in the world , yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it .
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008 Globalization and World  शहरों पढ़ाई समूह और संजाल ( gawc ) शोध  .
and has  an क्षेत्रफल  of .
This area has population of well over 28 million  , बनाना it एक of the संसार 's largest conurbations in  terms of number of inhabitants .
In 2011 , Jakarta ranked 17th among the world 's 200 largest cities , a jump  इससे इसके 2007 रैंकिंग of 171  .
Jakarta has grown more rapidly than  kuala lumpur , बीजिंग और बैंकॉक  .
Established in the fourth  सदी , the नगर became an महत्वपूर्ण  trading port for the Kingdom of Sunda .
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known as Batavia ) and has continued as the capital of Indonesia since the  देश 's स्वतंत्रता थी  declared in 1945 .
The city  is the सीट  of the ASEAN Secretariat .
Jakarta is  परोसा by the soekarno–hatta अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , हलीम perdanakusuma अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport , and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is connected by several intercity and commuter railways , and served by several bus lines running on reserved busways .
A  ठेठ घर एयर  conditioning window unit .
Air conditioning is  the प्रक्रम of altering the गुण of एयर  ( primarily temperature and humidity ) to more favourable conditions .
More generally , air conditioning can refer to any form of technological cooling , heating , ventilation , or  कीटाणुशोधन कि modifies  the condition of air .
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air  कॉन , ac or a/c , और नहीं to be उलझन साथ the संक्षिप्त  for alternating current ) is a major or home appliance , system , or mechanism designed to change the air temperature and humidity within an area ( used for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ) .
the कूलिंग is typically किया  using a simple refrigeration cycle , but sometimes evaporation is used , commonly for comfort cooling in buildings and motor vehicles .
In construction , a complete system of  हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन  and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC `` .

DC Talk (  styled as  dc Talk ) , is a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio .
The group was formed in Lynchburg , Virginia in  1987 by टोबी mckeehan  , Michael Tait , and Kevin Max Smith .
They have released five major studio albums together : DC Talk ( 1989 ) , Nu Thang ( 1990 ) , Free at Last ( 1992 ) , Jesus Freak (  1995 )  , and Supernatural ( 1998 ) .
In 2002 , the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian Music called DC Talk `` the most popular overtly  ईसाई अधिनियम of सब समय  . ''
In 2000 , the group released an EP titled Solo which  contained दो सोलो गीतों  from each member .
Since that time , DC Talk has been on an  indefinite अंतराल  , and the three band members have each led solo careers .
They have performed and recorded individual songs together several times during the 2000s , although the  समूह never officially  reunited or disbanded .
The group 's musical style evolved  significantly  throughout their career .
Their first two releases , DC Talk  और nu थांग , यहूद of the  hip hop genre .
DC Talk 's third album , Free at Last  , भी  mainly took influence from the hip hop style , although their music began taking on a rock sound .
The trio 's last two albums , Jesus  freak और अलौकिक  , were predominantly pop rock .
The Bible is a  संकलन of अनेक shorter  books written at different times and later assembled into the biblical canon .
All but the shortest of these books have been divided into chapters ,  generally a पेज or so in लंबाई , चूंकि  the early 13th century .
Since the mid-16th century , each chapter has been  further विभाजित into  `` verses '' of a few short lines or sentences .
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse , as in the case of , and sometimes there is more than one sentence in a single   verse , as in the case of .
As the chapter and verse divisions were not part of the original  ग्रन्थ , वे रूप भाग of  the paratext of the Bible .
The Jewish divisions of the Hebrew text differ at various points from those  प्रयुक्त by ईसाइयों  .
For instance , in Jewish tradition , the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as independent  आयतें , बनाना 116 अधिक आयतें , whereas the स्थापित  Christian practice is to count and number each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it .
Some chapter divisions also  occur in अलग  places , e.g . in Hebrew Bibles is numbered as in Christian translations .
An index ( plural : indexes ) is a list of words or phrases (  'headings ' ) और संबद्ध संकेतक ( 'लोकेटरs  ' ) to where useful material relating to that heading can be found in a document .
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings will include names of people , places and  कार्यक्रम , और अवधारणाओं चयनित by a व्यक्ति  as being relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book .
The pointers are  typically पेज  numbers , paragraph numbers or section numbers .
In a library catalog the words are authors , titles ,  विषय headings , etc. , और the संकेतक  are call numbers .
Internet search engines , such as Google , and full text searching help provide access to  सूचना लकिन हैं नहीं as चयनात्मक as an अनुक्रमणिका , as  they provide non-relevant links , and may miss relevant information if it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect .
In United States financial regulation , a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report made by a financial institution to the  वित्तीय अपराधों प्रवर्तन संजाल ( fincen ) , an एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग  of the Treasury , regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity .

Facebook is an online social networking service , whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to  विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of the अकादमिक साल by कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the संयुक्त राज्य  to help students get to know each other .
It was founded in February  2004 by चिह्नित zuckerberg साथ  his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The  जालस्थल 's सदस्यता थी initially सीमित by the संस्थापकों  to Harvard students , but was expanded to other colleges in the Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually added support for students at various other universities before opening  to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी , और आखिरकार to  anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook  अभी allows कोई उपयोक्ता जो घोषित themselves  to be at least 13 years old to become registered users of the site .
Users must register before using the site , after  जिससे वे may बनाएँ  a personal profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including automatic notifications when they update their profile .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups ,  व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल , स्कूल or कॉलेज , or अन्य  characteristics , and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As  of सितंबर 2012  , Facebook has over one billion active users .
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey , there are 7.5 million children under 13 with  खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10 , violating the  site 's terms of service .
in may 2005 , accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक , और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख of उसके अपना धन to  the pot .
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used social networking  सेवा by विश्वव्यापी  monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade ``  best-of '' सूची , saying , `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes ,  remember our co-workers ' birthdays , bug our friends , and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics , such as Facebook Detox , state that Facebook has turned into a national  obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य , resulting in विशाल amounts of समय खोया  and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million  मासिक अद्वितीय u.S.  visitors in May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today , in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 %  ( 129.5 लाख ) of the  U.S. population had a Facebook account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some regions , with the site losing 7 million active users in the  संयुक्त राज्य  and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial  पब्लिक offering on फ़रवरी 1 , 2012 , और  was headquartered in Menlo Park , California .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the  पब्लिक और व्यापार on the नैस्डैक  on May 18 , 2012 .

Hydrochlorothiazide is  a सल्फोनेमाइड  and a thiazide .
Furosemide is a  सल्फोनेमाइड , लकिन  not a thiazide .
Sulfonamide or  sulphonamide  is the basis of several groups of drugs .
The original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or  sulpha दवाएँ ) हैं सिंथेटिक रोगाणुरोधी  agents that contain the sulfonamide group .
Some sulfonamides are  भी विहीन of जीवाणुरोधी  activity , e.g. , the anticonvulsant sultiame .
The sulfonylureas  और thiazide diuretics हैं नए ड्रग समूह  based on the antibacterial sulfonamides .
Sulfa allergies are common ,  hence medications containing sulfonamides हैं विहित  carefully .
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa  दवाएँ और अन्य sulfur-containing दवाएँ और एडिटिव  , such as sulfates and sulfites , which are chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide group , and do not cause the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides .

Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are  domesticated धूसर geese ( either ग्रेलैग  Geese or Swan Geese ) kept as poultry for their meat , eggs , and down feathers since ancient times .
30  सेकेंड to मंगल is an अमरीकी  rock band from Los Angeles , formed in 1998 .
Since 2007 , the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals , rhythm guitar , songwriter ) , Shannon Leto ( drums , percussion ) and Tomo Miličević  ( सीसे गिटार ,  keyboards ) .

Previously , the group also  प्रदर्शित guitarists  Solon Bixler ( now of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ) .
To date , 30 Seconds to Mars have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ) , A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ) , This Is War ( 2009 ) and  तीन विस्तारित plays – एओएल सत्र  Undercover ( 2007 ) , To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ) , and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ) .
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated mostly with neo-prog , progressive metal and post-grunge , but they have also  शामिल भावनाएं , screamo , स्पेस चट्टान और synthrock into उनके म्यूज़िक  .
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who were an influence on  उनके कार्य ) और औजार क्युकी of उनके उपयोग of philosophical  and spiritual lyrics , concept albums and their use of experimental music .
A Christmas Story is a 1983 American Christmas comedy film based on the short stories and semi-fictional anecdotes of author and raconteur Jean Shepherd , based on his book In God We  विश्वास , सब अन्य अदा नकदी , साथ कुछ तत्व  derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories .
It was  निर्देशित by bob  Clark .

In 2012 , the film was selected for preservation in the National Film Registry by the Library of  कॉंग्रेस लिये होने `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically  significant '' .

New York City Cruise Liner Terminal in  नरक 's रसोईघर  at 52nd Street .
The New York Passenger Ship Terminal ( also known as the Luxury Liner Row or  मैनहटन क्रूज टर्मिनल or नई  York Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side .
The terminal consists of North River Piers 88 , 90 , 92 and 94 on the Hudson River between  वेस्ट 46th और वेस्ट  54th Street .
( As a general rule , pier numbers in Manhattan can be determined by adding 40 to the  सम्बन्धित  cross-street . )
जहाजों अभी डॉक  at Piers 88 , 90 and 92 .
Pier 94 on the north side is  अभी प्रयुक्त लिये  exhibition space .
Pier 86 , once used by  संयुक्त राज्य लाइनों  , is now home to the USS Intrepid .
In 2003 , the terminal handled 900,000  यात्री  .
The city is forecasting that 1.5 million  होगा उपयोग the टर्मिनल  by 2017 .
the पियर हैं  long and apart .
They were first completed in 1935 to replace the  चेल्सी पियर as the नगर 's लक्ज़री  liner terminal .
The new  टर्मिनल  was built to handle bigger ships that had outgrown the Chelsea Piers .
The  पियर यहूद संवर  in 1970 and are currently undergoing another $ 150 million renovation .
The renovated plans call for it to handle  तीन विशाल जहाजों  at a time .
In doing renovations , the city is also considering   decommissioning Pier 92 .
Logo of the New York Cruise  terminal.for
decades the terminal was  the  only ocean-going passenger terminal in New York harbor .
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to  हैंडल comfortably तभी तीन विशाल जहाजों at a समय , दो नई terminals have खोली  in the harbor — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened in 2004 in Bayonne , New Jersey ( used by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line , Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ) , and the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal ( used by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn , New York .
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to  नीचे वेस्ट 42nd गली क्युकी जब  the terminal was built land had to be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers .
The US Army Corps of Engineers  ,  who control the waterfront dimension , would not extend the pierhead line farther into the river , so the city extended the pier by cutting away at the land .
The city earlier did this for  the चेल्सी पियर  ; however in Chelsea only landfill was taken away .
At the Passenger Terminal  वास्तविक मैनहटन  schist was taken away .

Many major passenger ships have docked there , including the RMS Queen Mary 2 and  स्वतंत्रता of the समंदर , पहले the  Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened .

Christian right is a term used in the United States to describe  right-wing ईसाई राजनैतिक समूह कि हैं characterized  by their strong support of socially conservative policies .
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the teachings of Christianity to politics and public policy by proclaiming  the मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or by seeking to उपयोग those शिक्षाओं  to influence law and public policy .
In the U.S. , the Christian right is an informal coalition formed around a core of evangelical Protestants that draws ``  support इससे नीतियां रूढ़िवादी catholics  , Jews , Mormons , and occasionally secularists '' who share their goals .
the गति रै  its roots in American politics going back as far the 1940s and has been especially influential since the 1970s .
Their influence draws , in part , from grassroots activism as  खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on सोशल मुद्दे और क्षमता to  motivate the electorate around those issues .
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially conservative  स्थितियाँ on मुद्दे सहित स्कूल दुआ , स्टेम कोशिका शोध , समलैंगिकता  , contraception , abortion , and pornography .
Although the Christian right is usually  संबद्ध साथ the u.S. , the गति रै महरूम a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर  in the politics of Canada , The Netherlands , Northern Ireland and Australia , among others .
Far East Movement ( stylized as Far★East Movement or  abbreviated  FM ) is an American hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles .
The group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ) ,  prohgress ( जेम्स roh ) , j-splif  ( Jae Choung ) , and DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ) .
Far East Movement 's first claim to fame was their song `` Round Round '' featured in the  हॉलीवुड फिल्म , the तेज़ और the क्रोधित : टोकियो बहाव  , and its subsequent soundtrack , video game and DVD .
Since `` Round Round '' , the group has been featured on  विभिन्न संजाल shows सहित  , , Entourage , Gossip Girl , and Finishing the Game ( a featured film at Sundance 2007 ) .
Their single `` Like a G6 `` hit number one on  the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट और on itunes  as well in late October 2010 .
Far East Movement also has the distinction of being the first Asian-American group to earn a # 1 hit on the  बिलबोर्ड hot 100  in the United States .
LR44 is the IEC designation for an alkaline 1.5  वोल्ट बटन कोशिका ,  commonly used in small LED flashlights , digital thermometers , calculators , calipers , watches , clocks , toys and laser pointers .
LR44  क्षारीय  cell
The battery nomenclature is defined by the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्युततकनीकी आयोग ( आईईसी ) in इसके 60086-3 मानक ( प्राथमिक बैटरी  , part 3 Watch batteries ) .
The letter L indicates the electrochemical system used ; a  जस्ता ऋणात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड , मैंगनीज डाइऑक्साइड depolarizer और धनात्मक  electrode , and an alkaline electrolyte .
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2 mm height as  पारिभाषित by the आईईसी मानक 60086  .
Manufacturers have their own part  संख्याएँ लिये आईईसी प्रकार  LR44 batteries including:
lr44 , lr44g  , LR44GD , LR44H

4.5-volt  , d , c , aa , aaa  , AAAA , A23 , 9-volt , CR2032 and LR44 batteries
Other  प्रकार of बैटरी  are or were made in the R44 size .
Formerly , mercury batteries were  बना as बटन कोशिकाएं  ( types MR44 and NR44 ) .
Zinc-air batteries  प्रकार pr44 आवश्यकता  air to work .
Silver-oxide batteries type  sr44 may provide  extra capacity compared to LR44 types but have slightly different voltage characteristics .
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded with  प्रतिस्थापन of  LR44 types .
