Hurricane Katrina was the deadliest and most destructive Atlantic  hurricane of the 2005 अटलांटिक hurricane  season .
It was the  costliest प्राकृतिक विपत्ति ,  as well as one of the five deadliest hurricanes , in the history of the United States .
among अंकित अटलांटिक  hurricanes , it was the sixth strongest overall .
At least 1,833 people died in the hurricane and subsequent floods , making it the deadliest U.S. hurricane since the 1928 Okeechobee hurricane ;  कुल प्रॉपर्टी क्षति थी अनुमानित at $ 81 अरब ( 2005 usd ) , nearly ट्रिपल the  damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992 .
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on August 23 , 2005 and crossed  दक्षिणी फ्लोरिडा as a मॉडरेट श्रेणी 1 hurricane , causing  some deaths and flooding there before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico .
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the warm Gulf water , but weakened before making  इसके दूसरी  landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday , August 29 in southeast Louisiana .
It caused severe  विनाश साथ the गल्फ coast इससे सेंट्रल फ्लोरिडा  to Texas , much of it due to the storm surge .
The most significant number of deaths occurred in New Orleans , Louisiana ,  जिससे flooded as the तटबन्ध प्रणाली catastrophically  failed , in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland .
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded , and the  floodwaters lingered लिये सप्ताह .
However , the worst property  क्षति occurred in तटीय क्षेत्रों , ऐसे as सब मिसिसिपी  beachfront towns , which were flooded over 90 % in hours , as boats and casino barges rammed buildings , pushing cars and houses inland , with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach .
The hurricane surge protection failures in New Orleans are considered the worst civil engineering  विपत्ति in u.S. इतिहास और prompted a मुकदमा विरूद्ध the u.S. फौज corps of  Engineers ( USACE ) , the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965 .
Responsibility for the failures and flooding was laid squarely on the Army  corps in जनवरी 2008 by न्यायधीश stanwood  Duval , U.S. District Court , but the federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928 .
There was also an investigation of the  प्रतिक्रियाएँ इससे संघीय , राज्य और लोकल सरकारें  , resulting in the resignation of Federal Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ) director Michael D. Brown , and of New Orleans Police Department ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie Compass .
Several agencies including  the संयुक्त राज्य coast गार्ड ( uscg ) , नेशनल hurricane  Center ( NHC ) , and National Weather Service ( NWS ) were commended for their actions .
They provided accurate hurricane weather  ट्रैकिंग forecasts साथ sufficient  lead time .
Even the most insistent appeals from national , state and local  पब्लिक  officials to residents to evacuate before the storm did not warn that the levees could breach and fail .
U.S. debt from  1940 to  2011 .
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public ''  और ब्लैक लाइनों indicate the  total national debt or gross public debt .
The  अंतर is the `` intragovernmental कर्ज़ ,  '' which includes obligations to government programs such as Social Security .
Stated as a formula , National Debt = Debt held by the Public +  intragovernmental  Debt .
the दूसरी फलक  shows the two debt figures as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar value of U.S. economic production for that year ) .
The top panel is deflated so every  साल is in 2010 डॉलर  .
The  संयुक्त राज्य पब्लिक कर्ज़ is the धन उधार  by the federal government of the United States through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal government agencies .
US public debt consists of two  घटकs:
Debt held by the public includes Treasury securities held by investors outside the federal government , including that held by individuals , corporations , the Federal Reserve System and  विदेशी , राज्य और लोकल सरकारें  .
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in accounts administered by the federal government that are owed to program  beneficiaries , ऐसे as the सोशल सुरक्षा विश्वास  Fund .
Debt held by government accounts represents the cumulative surpluses , including interest earnings , of these accounts that have been  invested in राजकोष प्रतिभूति  .
Public debt increases or decreases as a result of the annual unified budget deficit  or  surplus .
The federal government budget deficit or surplus is the  अंतर between  government receipts and spending , ignoring intra-governmental transfers .
However , some spending that is excluded from the deficit (  supplemental appropriations ) भी adds to the कर्ज़  .
Historically , the US public debt as a share of GDP increased  दौरान युद्धों और recessions  , and subsequently declined .
For example , debt held  by the पब्लिक as a share of  GDP peaked just after World War II ( 113 % of GDP in 1945 ) , but then fell over the following 30 years .
In recent decades , however , large budget deficits and the resulting increases in debt have led to concern about the  long-term स्थिरता of the संघीय  government 's fiscal policies .
On 2 April 2013 , debt held by the public  थी लगभग $ 11.959 खरब  or about 75 % of GDP .
Intragovernmental  holdings stood  at $ 4.846 trillion , giving a combined total public debt of $ 16.805 trillion .
As of January 2013  , $ 5.6 खरब or लगभग 47 % of the कर्ज़ आयोजित by the  public was owned by foreign investors , the largest of which were the People 's Republic of China and Japan at just over $ 1.1 trillion each .
In basketball , an assist is  attributed to a खिलाड़ी जो गुजरता the बॉल to a teammate in a रास्ता कि लीड  to a score by field goal , meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket .
There is some  निर्णय शामिल in deciding  whether a passer should be credited with an assist .
An assist can  be scored लिये the passer  even if the player who receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the ball .
However , the original definition of an assist did not include such situations , so the comparison of assist statistics across eras is a  जटिल पदार्थ  .
Only the pass directly before the score may be counted as an assist , so no more than one assist can be recorded per field  लक्ष्य ( नापसंद in अन्य  sports , such as ice hockey ) .
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by free throws does not count as an assist in the NBA , but does in FIBA play ( only one  assist is awarded प्रति नियत of फ़्री throws in  which at least one free throw is made ) .
Point guards tend to get  the सबसे assists प्रति खेल (  apg ) , as their role is primarily that of a passer and ballhandler .
Centers tend to get fewer assists , but centers with good floor  उपस्थिति और अदालत दृष्टि can  dominate a team by assisting .
Being inside the key , the center often has the best angles and  the बेहतरीन स्थिति लिये `` बर्तन '' और अन्य छोटी  passes in the scoring area .
बीच wilt चेम्बरलेन  led the NBA in assists in 1968 .
A strong center with inside-scoring prowess , such as former NBA  बीच hakeem olajuwon , can भी  be an effective assistor because the defense 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters .
The NBA single-game assist record is 30 , held by  स्कॉट skiles of the ऑरलैंडो  Magic against the Denver Nuggets , on December 30 , 1990 .
The  एनबीए रिकार्ड लिये सबसे  career assists is held by John Stockton with 15,806 .
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK , when  discussing प्रॉपर्टी कर in the संयुक्त राज्य , or previously in साइप्रस और माल्टा ) is a now-abstract  unit of currency used sometimes in accounting .
In the United States , it is a notional unit equivalent to of a  संयुक्त राज्य डालर ( a दसवाँ  of a cent ) .
In the United Kingdom it was proposed during  the दशकों of चर्चा on  the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling .
Several other  मुद्राएँ प्रयुक्त  the mill , such as the Maltese lira .
The term comes from the Latin `` millesimum ''  , अर्थ  `` thousandth part '' .
the greco-persian युद्धों ( भी  often called the Persian Wars ) were a series of conflicts between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia and city-states of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC .
The  टक्कर between  the fractious political world of the Greeks and the enormous empire of the Persians began when Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC .
Struggling to rule the independent-minded cities of  ionia , the फारसियों नियुक्त  tyrants to rule each of them .
This would prove to be the source of much trouble  लिये the यूनानियों और फारसियों  alike .
In 499 BC , the then tyrant of Miletus , Aristagoras , embarked on an expedition to conquer the island of Naxos ,  साथ पारसी support ; however , the expedition  was a debacle and , pre-empting his dismissal , Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians .
This was the beginning of the Ionian Revolt , which would last until 493 BC  , progressively आरेखण अधिक regions  of Asia Minor into the conflict .
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and Eretria , and in 498 BC  ये शक्तियां helped to कैप्चर और बर्न the पारसी  regional capital of Sardis .
The Persian king Darius the Great vowed to  have बदला  on Athens and Eretria for this act .
The revolt continued , with the two sides  effectively stalemated throughout  497–495 BC .
In 494 BC , the Persians regrouped ,  और attacked the  epicentre of the revolt in Miletus .
At the Battle of Lade , the Ionians suffered a decisive defeat , and the  विद्रोह collapsed , साथ the फाइनल सदस्यों  being stamped out the following year .
Seeking  to सुरक्षित उसके साम्राज्य इससे  further revolts and from the interference of the mainland Greeks , Darius embarked on a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis .
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC ,  साथ the पारसी सामान्य mardonius  conquering Thrace and Macedon before several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign .
In 490 BC a second force  थी भेजा to यूनानियों ,  this time across the Aegean Sea , under the command of Datis and Artaphernes .
This expedition subjugated the Cyclades  , पहले besieging ,  capturing and razing Eretria .
However , while en route to attack Athens , the Persian force was decisively defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of  मैराथन , समाप्ति पारसी  efforts for the time being .
Darius then began to plan to complete the conquest of  यूनानियों , लकिन died in 486 bc और  responsibility for the conquest passed to his son Xerxes I .
In 480 BC , Xerxes personally led the second Persian invasion of  यूनानियों साथ एक of the largest प्राचीन  armies ever assembled .
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by Sparta  और एथेंस ) at the बैटल of thermopylae  allowed the Persians to torch Athens and overrun most of Greece .
However , while seeking to destroy the combined Greek fleet , the Persians suffered a severe defeat at  the बैटल of  Salamis .
The following year , the confederated Greeks went on the offensive , defeating the Persian army at  the बैटल of plataea , और समाप्ति  the invasion of Greece .
The allied Greeks followed up their success by destroying the rest of the Persian fleet at the Battle  of mycale , पहले expelling पारसी garrisons इससे sestos ( 479 bc  ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ) .
The actions of the general Pausanias at the siege  of byzantium alienated अनेक of the यूनानी  states from the Spartans , and the anti-Persian alliance was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership , as the so-called Delian League .
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia for the next three decades , beginning with the expulsion of the remaining Persian  garrisons इससे यूरोपीय  .
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466 BC , the League won a double victory  कि आखिरकार secured स्वतंत्रता  for the cities of Ionia .
However  , the लीग 's भागीदारी  in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted in a disastrous defeat , and further campaigning was suspended .
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 BC , but achieved little , and when it withdrew the  greco-persian युद्धों खींचा to  a quiet end .
Some historical  स्त्रोत सुझाएँ the समाप्त of hostilities  was marked by a peace treaty between Athens and Persia , the so-called Peace of Callias .
hooverville  near Portland , Oregon
A `` Hooverville '' is the popular  नाम लिये shanty कस्बों निर्मित by बेघर  people during the Great Depression .
वे यहूद नामित बाद हर्बर्ट  Hoover , who was President of the United States during the onset of the Depression and widely blamed for it .
The term  थी coined by चार्ल्स माइकेल्सन  , publicity chief of the Democratic National Committee .
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born September 25  , 1975 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  quarterback for the Indianapolis Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was drafted in the sixth round of the 1998  एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट by the  Green Bay Packers .
After a season on the practice  स्क्वाड और दो सीज़न बैकिंग up ब्रेट  Favre , he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001 .
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003 , and led Seattle to six playoff appearances and a Super Bowl appearance ; he was selected to three Pro Bowls and an  all-pro चयन  .
Following  टेन सीज़न साथ the  Seahawks , Hasselbeck joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011 .
Hasselbeck then signed a contract with the  इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस in 2013 कम than 24 घंटों  after being released by the Tennessee Titans .
ICT  is inevitably सम्बन्धित  to the computer network .
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ) , is often used as an extended synonym for information  प्रौद्योगिकी ( it ) , लकिन is a अधिक विशिष्ट पद कि तनावों the भूमिका of एकीकृत संचार और the संयोजन of दूरसंचार ( टेलीफोन लाइनों और बेतार सिग्नल ) , कंप्यूटर  as well as necessary enterprise software , middleware , storage , and audio-visual systems , which enable users to access , store , transmit , and manipulate information .
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s , but it became popular after it was used in a report to the UK government by Dennis Stevenson in 1997 and in the revised National Curriculum  लिये इंग्लैण्ड , वेल्स और उत्तरी आयरलैंड  in 2000 .
The term ICT is now also used to refer to the convergence of audio-visual and telephone  संजाल साथ कंप्यूटर संजाल  through a single cabling or link system .
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the  टेलीफोन संजाल ) to विलय the audio-visual  , building management and telephone network with the computer network system using a single unified system of cabling , signal distribution and management .
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as a shorter  रूप of सूचना और संचार  ( s ) technology .
In  फैक्ट infocommunications is the विस्तार of दूरसंचार  with information processing and content handling functions on a common digital technology base .
For a  तुलना of ये और  other terms , see .
लिये आईसीटी  Development Index around the world , see .
This is a list of characters from  जार्ज  Lopez .
A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the atom ; in  thomson 's गणितीय मॉडल the `` corpuscles '' (  or modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly , in rotating rings
The  वर्तमान मॉडल of the sub-atomic  structure involves a dense nucleus surrounded by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J. Thomson , who discovered the electron in 1897 , was  प्रस्तावित in 1904 पहले the डिस्कवरी of the  atomic nucleus in order to add the electron to the atomic model .
In this model , the atom is composed of electrons ( which Thomson still called `` corpuscles '' , though  G. J. stoney था प्रस्तावित कि अणु of विद्युत be पुकारा electrons in 1894 ) घिरी by a सूप of धनात्मक चार्ज to संतुलन  the electrons ' negative charges , like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding `` .
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout  the अणु , लकिन साथ अनेक structures संभावित  for positioning multiple electrons , particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ) .
Instead of a soup , the atom was also sometimes  कहा to have था a `` बादल  '' of positive charge .
With this model , Thomson abandoned his earlier `` nebular atom '' hypothesis in which  the अणु थी रचित of  immaterial vortices .
Now , at least part of the atom was to be composed of  thomson 's particulate ऋणात्मक corpuscles  , although the rest of the positively charged part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined .
The 1904 Thomson model was disproved by the 1909 gold foil experiment of Hans  geiger और अर्नेस्ट मार्सडेन  .
This was interpreted  by अर्नेस्ट  Rutherford in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a  बहुत ऊँची धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the मामला of  gold , enough to balance about 100 electrons ) , thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom .
Although gold has an  परमाणु क्रमांक of 79 , तत्काल बाद  Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius Van den Broek made the intuitive suggestion that atomic number is nuclear charge .
the पदार्थ जरूरी  experiment to decide .
Henry Moseley 's  कार्य दिखाया experimentally in 1913 ( देखिए moseley 's विधि ) कि  the effective nuclear charge was very close to the atomic number ( Moseley found only one unit difference ) , and Moseley referenced only the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford .
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the same year , in which a nucleus containing an atomic number of positive charge is  घिरी by an बराबर क्रमांक of electrons in कक्षीय शेल  .
Bohr had  भी प्रेरित  Moseley 's work .
Thomson 's model was compared ( though not by  thomson ) to a अंग्रेजों मिठाई  called plum pudding , hence the name .
Thomson 's paper was published in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine , the leading British  विज्ञान  journal of the day .
In  thomson 's दृश्य : ... the  atoms of the elements consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of uniform positive electrification , ...
In this model , the electrons were free to rotate within the  blob or बादल of धनात्मक पदार्थ  .
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the fact that when an electron moved farther from the center of the positive cloud , it felt a larger net positive inward force , because there was more material of opposite charge , inside its orbit ( see  गाउस 's विधि  ) .
In Thomson 's model , electrons were free to rotate  in बजती जिससे यहूद further stabilized by interactions  between the electrons , and spectra were to be accounted for by energy differences of different ring orbits .
Thomson  attempted to मेक उसके मॉडल  account for some of the major spectral lines known for some elements , but was not notably successful at this .
Still , Thomson 's model ( along with a similar Saturnian ring model for atomic  electrons , भी  put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings ) , were earlier harbingers of the later and more successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom .
ठेठ  strip of bacon .
Bacon is a  cured मांस prepared  from a pig .
It is first cured using large  quantities of नमक , either in a brine  or in a dry packing ; the result is fresh bacon ( also known as green bacon ) .
Fresh bacon may then be further dried for weeks or months in cold air , or it may be  boiled or स्मोक्ड  .
Fresh and dried  बेकन is typically  cooked before eating .
boiled बेकन is तैयार to खा , as is कुछ  smoked bacon , but may be cooked further before eating .
Bacon is prepared from  अनेक  different cuts of meat .
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork , except in the United States , where it  is लगभग सदा prepared इससे पोर्क पेट  ( typically referred to as `` streaky '' , `` fatty '' , or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ) .
The side cut has  अधिक मांस और  less fat than the belly .
Bacon may be prepared from either of two distinct back cuts : fatback , which is almost pure fat ,  और पोर्क loin , जिससे is बहुत झुकना  .
Bacon-cured  पोर्क loin is ज्ञात  as back bacon .
uncooked पोर्क  belly bacon strips .
Bacon may be eaten smoked , boiled , fried , baked , or  ग्रील्ड , or प्रयुक्त as a नाबालिग संघटक  to flavor dishes .
Bacon is also used for  barding और larding roasts , विशेषकर  game , e.g . venison , pheasant .
The word is derived from the Old High German bacho , meaning `` buttock '' , `` ham '' or `` side of bacon '' , and  cognate साथ the बूढ़ा फ्रेंच बेकन  .
In continental Europe , this part of the pig is usually not smoked like bacon is in the United States ; it  is प्रयुक्त primarily in घन ( lardons ) as a कुकिंग संघटक ,  valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor .
In Italy , this is called pancetta and is  प्रायः पकाया in छोटी घन or परोसा  uncooked and thinly sliced as part of an antipasto .
Meat from other animals , such  as बीफ , मेमने  , chicken , goat , or turkey , may also be cut , cured , or otherwise prepared to resemble bacon , and may even be referred to as `` bacon '' .
Such use is common in areas with significant  यहूदी और मुस्लिम  populations .
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured  पेट of a स्वाइन  carcass '' ; other cuts and characteristics must be separately qualified ( e.g. , `` smoked pork loin bacon '' ) .
For safety , bacon must be treated to prevent trichinosis , caused by  trichinella , a parasitic roundworm जिससे can be नष्ट  by heating , freezing , drying , or smoking .
Bacon is distinguished from salt pork  और हैम by मतभेद in the  brine ( or dry packing ) .
Bacon brine  रै added curing  ingredients , most notably sodium nitrite , and occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium nitrate ( saltpeter ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate are added to accelerate curing and stabilize color .
Flavorings such  as भूरा शुगर  or maple are used for some products .
If used ,  सोडियम polyphosphates हैं  added to improve sliceability and reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried .
Today , a brine for ham , but not bacon , includes a large  राशि of शुगर .
Historically , `` ham '' and `` bacon '' referred to different cuts of meat that were  brined or packed identically , प्रायः  together in the same barrel .
The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 ( ERISA ) ( , codified in part at ) is a federal law  जिससे establishes न्यूनतम मानकों लिये पेंशन योजनाएँ in निजी उद्योग और provides लिये extensive नियम on the संघीय आय  tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans .
ERISA was enacted to protect the  रूचि of कर्मचारी लाभ  plan participants and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the  प्रकटीकरण of वित्तीय  and other information concerning the plan to beneficiaries ;
establishing मानकों  of conduct for plan fiduciaries ;
Providing for appropriate remedies and access to  the संघीय न्यायालयों  .
ERISA is sometimes used  to refer to the पूरा देह of कानून regulating कर्मचारी लाभ योजनाएँ , जिससे  are found mainly in the Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself .
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided  among the विभाग of मजदूर , the विभाग of  the Treasury ( particularly the Internal Revenue Service ) , and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation .
Illegal immigration to the United States is the act of  विदेशी नागरिकों प्रवेश the संयुक्त राज्य , बगैर सरकारी अनुमति  and in violation of United States nationality law , or staying beyond the termination date of a visa , also in violation of the law .
A warning sign at the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary between the संयुक्त राज्य  and Canada in Point Roberts , Washington .
A much  अलग दृष्टिकोण at the  U.S.-Mexico border near El Paso , Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the Center for  आव्रजन अध्ययन to be परिचय 11 लाख लोगों  , down from 12.5 million people in 2007 .
Other estimates  दायरा इससे 7 to 20  million .
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic Center report , 56 %  of undocumented आप्रवासियों यहूद इससे मैक्सिको ; 22 % यहूद इससे  other Latin American countries ; 13 % were from Asia ; 6 % were from Europe and Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world .
Alvin  स्वतंत्र स्कूल ज़िला is a स्कूल  district based in Alvin , Texas ( USA ) .
Alvin ISD is a large suburban school district south of Houston in the communities of Alvin , Manvel , Pearland ,  hillcrest , rosharon , आयोवा  Colony , Liverpool , and Amsterdam .
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing western portion of the city including the new large  master-planned समुदायों of छाया क्रीक ranch , दक्षिण कांटा ,  and Southern Trails .
Alvin ISD covers  of जमीन  .
In human  anatomy , the ulnar तंत्रिका  is a nerve which runs near the ulna bone .
The ulnar collateral  स्नायु  of elbow joint is in relation with the ulnar nerve .
The nerve is the  largest unprotected तंत्रिका in the इंसान देह ( अर्थ  unprotected by muscle or bone ) , so injury is common .
This nerve is directly connected to the little finger , and the adjacent half of the ring  उंगली , supplying the palmar पक्ष of ये उंगलियाँ , सहित दोनो सामने और वापस of the  tips , perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds .
One method  of injuring the तंत्रिका is to स्ट्राइक  the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly , or inferiorly with the elbow flexed .
The  ulnar तंत्रिका is फंस between  the bone and the overlying skin at this point .
This is commonly  referred to as bumping  one 's `` funny bone '' .
This name is thought to be a pun ,  आधारित on the ध्वनि प्रतिरूप between the नाम of the अस्थि of  the upper arm , the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous `` .
Alternatively ,  according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष  it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation experienced when it is struck '' .
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry , shortened  हॉग्वार्ट्स , is a fictional अंग्रेजों स्कूल  of magic for students aged eleven to eighteen , and is the primary setting for the first six books in J.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series .
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ) , which she had seen at Kew Gardens some time before writing the series , although the names `` The Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book  कैसा to be topp by geoffrey willans  .
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th best Scottish educational  स्थापना in a  2008 online ranking , outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School .
According to a director of the Independent Schools   Network Rankings , it was added to the schools listing `` for fun '' and was then voted on .
The U.S. subprime mortgage crisis was a set of events  और शर्तें कि led to a वित्तीय संकट और subsequent  recession that began in 2008 .
It was characterized  by a वृद्धि in subprime बंधक delinquencies  and foreclosures , and the resulting decline of securities backed by said mortgages .
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008 , with significant disruption in the flow of credit to businesses and consumers  और the onset of a कठोर  global recession .
There were many causes of the crisis ,  साथ टीकाकारों assigning अलग स्तर of दोष to वित्तीय संस्थानों  , regulators , credit agencies , government housing policies , and consumers , among others .
A proximate cause was the rise in subprime  lending .
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given year rose from the historical 8 % or lower range to approximately 20 % from 2004 to 2006 , with much higher ratios  in कुछ  parts of the U.S .
A high percentage of these subprime mortgages  , over 90 % in 2006 लिये उदाहरण , यहूद adjustable-rate  mortgages .
These two changes were part of a broader trend of lowered lending  मानकों और higher-risk बंधक उत्पाद  .
Further , U.S. households had become increasingly indebted , with the ratio of debt to disposable personal  आय उठती इससे  77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007 , much of this increase mortgage-related .
When U.S. home prices declined steeply after peaking in  mid-2006 , borrowers ' क्षमता to  refinance their loans became more difficult .
As  adjustable-rate mortgages began to रीसेट at उच्चतर ब्याज  rates ( causing higher monthly payments ) , mortgage delinquencies soared .
Securities backed with mortgages , including  subprime mortgages , widely आयोजित by वित्तीय  firms globally , lost most of their value .
Global investors also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed debt and other securities as part of a  मनाही in the क्षमता और willingness of the निजी वित्तीय प्रणाली  to support lending .
Concerns about the soundness of U.S.  क्रेडिट और वित्तीय बाज़ार led  to tightening credit around the world and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe .
The crisis had severe ,  long-lasting consequences लिये the u.S. और यूरोपीय  economies .
The U.S. entered a deep recession , with nearly 9 million jobs lost during 2008 and  2009 , roughly 6 % of the  workforce .
U.S. housing prices fell nearly 30 % on average and the U.S. stock  मार्केट गिरी लगभग  50 % by early 2009 .
As of early 2013 , the U.S. stock market had  बरामद to इसके  pre-crisis peak but housing prices remained near their low point and unemployment remained elevated .
Economic growth remained  नीचे pre-crisis  levels .
Europe  भी जारी  to struggle with its own economic crisis .
Carl Jung in  1910  .
Myers and Briggs extrapolated  उनके mbti सिद्धान्त इससे जंग 's कृतियाँ  in his book Psychological Types .
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI ) assessment is a psychometric  प्रश्नावली designed to माप मनोवैज्ञानिक वरीयताओं in कैसा  people perceive the world and make decisions .
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by Carl Gustav  जंग और पहला प्रकाशित in उसके 1921 किताब  Psychological Types ( English edition , 1923 ) .
Jung theorized that there are four principal psychological  कृत्यों by जिससे we अनुभव the संसार : सनसनी  , intuition , feeling , and thinking .
One of these four  कृत्यों is प्रबल सबसे  of the time .
The original developers of the personality inventory were Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter , Isabel Briggs Myers ; these two , having  पढ़ाई extensively the कार्य of जंग , turned उनके ब्याज  of human behavior into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use .
They began creating the indicator  दौरान संसार  War II , believing that a knowledge of personality preferences would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective '' .
The initial questionnaire grew into the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ,  जिससे थी पहला  published in 1962 .
The  mbti focuses on सामान्य populations  and emphasizes the value of naturally occurring differences .
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we all have specific preferences in the way we construe our experiences , and these  वरीयताओं underlie हमारी रूचि , needs , मान , और प्रेरणा  '' ( p. 499 ) .
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga , from her second  स्टुडियो एल्बम  Born This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was released by Interscope  रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15 , 2011 , चार  days ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and  उत्पादित by महिला गागा और redone , `` यहूदा  '' is a dance and electro house song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her .
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga  in the पास्ट , और इसके कोर अर्थ  refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further explained that the song was also about honoring one 's inner darkness in order to  लाओ oneself  into the light .
The artwork for the single was designed by  गागा in microsoft  Word .
In spite of a polarizing  प्रभाव on अनेक धार्मिक समूह , the सोंग थी generally  well received by critics , who likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single .
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced  ट्रैक्स , सहित  `` Poker Face `` , `` LoveGame `` , `` Bad Romance '' , and `` Alejandro `` .
It  contains तीन पृथक  hooks and a house -influenced break down .
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk about her as beyond redemption  , regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य  of what a woman should be .
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening , but was less successful  commercially  in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music  बाज़ार , और भी  reached the top of the charts in South Korea .
A music video for the song was filmed in April  2011 , co-directed by  Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus .
It has a Biblical storyline where Reedus played Judas Iscariot  और गागा निभाई मरियम  Magdalene .
The video portrays them as modern day  प्रचारकों going to जेरूसलम  .
It included the Biblical story of Judas  betraying  Jesus , and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the alleged  उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके भूमिका in  the video .
However , critics generally praised the  वीडियो , नहीं ढूंढना  any offensive content .
The video was nominated for two awards at  the 2011 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक  Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows , including The Graham Norton Show , Saturday Night Live , Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '' ,  the फ्रेंच x फ़ैक्टर as खूब as on the एलेन  DeGeneres Show .
Marvin Gaye ( April 2 , 1939April 1 , 1984  ) , born मारविन pentz gay , jr. , थी an अमरीकी singer-songwriter  and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the  grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और tammi terrell , बाद  earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It  on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक  away from the reins of its production company .
gaye 's बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे  several R & B subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s , Gaye  released the 1982 ग्रैमी  Award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions ,  सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार और the चट्टान और फेंकें  Hall of Fame .
The Academy Award  लिये बेहतरीन चित्र is एक of  the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences ( AMPAS ) to producers working in the motion picture industry and is the only category in which every member is eligible to nominate for .
Best Picture is considered the most important of the Academy Awards , as it represents all the directing , acting  , म्यूज़िक composing , लिखने , संपादन और अन्य प्रयत्न  put forth into a film .
Consequently , Best Picture is the final award  और the निष्कर्ष of the सालाना  Academy Awards ceremony .
The Grand Staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles , where the Academy Awards  ceremonies have महरूम आयोजित चूंकि 2002  , showcase every film that has won the Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago .
Heavy Rain is an interactive drama action-adventure video game created by French  डेवलपर quantic सपना exclusively  for the PlayStation 3 .
The game is written and directed by Quantic Dream 's  संस्थापक और सीईओ दाउद  Cage .
Heavy Rains story is a dramatic  थ्रिलर modelled बाद फिल्मी noir , featuring चार protagonists  involved with the mystery of the Origami Killer , a serial killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims .
Ethan Mars is  trying to सहेजें उसके बेटे इससे होने the अगला शिकार , जबकि investigative पत्रकार  Madison Paige , FBI profiler Norman Jayden , and private detective Scott Shelby are each trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity .
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on screen related to motions on  the नियंत्रक , और in कुछ मामले , performing a श्रेणी  of quick time events during fast-paced action sequences .
The player 's decisions and actions during the  खेल होगा affect the कथा  .
The main  वर्ण can be मारे , और निश्चित  actions may lead to different scenes and endings .
A playable demo was released on 11  फ़रवरी 2010  .
The demo was released prior to this date for people who  took भाग in a चार दिन चुनौती  on 5 February 2010 .
A patch to allow use of the PlayStation Move  नियंत्रक to खेल the खेल  was released in September 2010 .
भारी बरसात थी  critically acclaimed and has sold over two million copies .
It won 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN and  गेमिंग संघ , और बेहतरीन ps3 खेल of  2010 by GameSpy and IGN .
A modified version of the game was released  titled भारी बरसात संस्करण modifiée exclusively in फ़्रांस , aimed towards a younger दर्शक  .
In 2010 , the game was included in the book 1001  वीडियो खेल तुम  Must Play Before You Die .
Total superannuation industry  देनदारी : सदस्यों निधि और  reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988 .
सालाना कुल superannuation  industry asset growth 1996-2005 .
superannuation in ऑस्ट्रेलिया refers to the इंतजाम  which people make in Australia to have funds available for them in retirement .
In Australia , superannuation arrangements are government-supported and  प्रोत्साहित , और न्यूनतम प्रावधानों  are compulsory for employees .
For example , employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries  और मजदूरी ( फिलहाल  9 % ) into a superannuation fund , but people are encouraged to put aside additional funds into superannuation .
The minimum obligation required by  नियोक्ता  is set to increase to 12 % gradually stepping annually from 2013 to 2020 .
An individual can  withdraw निधि आउट of a superannuation निधि जब the व्यक्ति meets एक  of the conditions of release contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994 .

Electoral College map showing the  परिणाम of the 2012 u.S.  presidential election .
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the popular vote in 26 states and the District of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to  कैप्चर 332 चुनावी मत  .
Former Governor Mitt Romney ( R - MA ) won  the लोकप्रिय vote in 24  states ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 electoral votes .
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College vote  लिये the 2012 चुनाव  , with each square representing one electoral vote .
The United States Electoral College is the institution that officially elects the President and  वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य प्रत्येक चार  years .
The President and Vice President are not  निर्वाचित सीधे by  the voters .
Instead , they are elected by `` electors '' who are chosen by popular vote on a  state-by-state  basis .
Electors are apportioned to each state and the  ज़िला of कोलंबिया , लकिन नहीं to territorial  possessions of the United States , such as Puerto Rico and Guam .
The number  of निर्वाचक in प्रत्येक  state is equal to the number of members of Congress to which the state is entitled .
The Twenty-third  amendment रै सदा  resulted in the District of Columbia having three electors .
There are 538 electors , based on there being 435 representatives and 100 senators , plus the  तीन निर्वाचक इससे the ज़िला of कोलंबिया  .
Electors are pledged to particular presidential and vice presidential candidates , though  unpledged निर्वाचक हैं संभावित  .
In all states , except Maine  और नेब्रास्का , निर्वाचक हैं  elected on a `` winner-take-all '' basis .
That is , all electors pledged to the presidential candidate who  विन्स the सबसे मत in a राज्य  become electors for that state .
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '' , selecting one elector within each  congressional ज़िला by लोकप्रिय  vote and selecting the remaining two electors by a statewide popular vote .
Although no elector is required by federal law to honor a pledge , there have only been very  few अवसरों जब an elector  voted contrary to a pledge .
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and Vice President are elected and requires each elector to  डाल एक vote लिये अध्यक्ष  and another vote for Vice President .
Critics argue that the Electoral College is inherently  undemocratic और देता झूले राज्य अनुपातहीन influence in electing  the President and Vice President .
The  चुनावी कॉलेज देता a न्यूमेरिक लाभ in the चुनाव of the अध्यक्ष to the छोटी राज्य  , as the minimum number of electors for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives .
On the other hand , the winner-take-all method of  मतदान favors the larger  states .
A number of constitutional amendments have been proposed seeking to  alter the चुनावी कॉलेज or बदलें it साथ a सीधा लोकप्रिय  vote .
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4 , 1961 ) is the 44th and current President of the  संयुक्त राज्य , the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी  to hold the office .
Born in  होनोलूलू , हवाई , ओबामा is a ग्रैजुएट  of Columbia University and Harvard Law School , where he was president of the Harvard Law Review .
He was a community organizer in Chicago  पहले कमाई उसके विधि उपाधि  .
He worked as a civil rights attorney in Chicago and taught constitutional law  at the विश्वविद्यालयों of शिकागो  Law School from 1992 to 2004 .
He served three terms representing the 13th District in the Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004 ,  कार्यशील unsuccessfully लिये the संयुक्त  States House of Representatives in 2000 .
In 2004 , Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the United States Senate  साथ उसके विजय in the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक , उसके keynote पता at the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल सम्मेलन in जुलाई , और  his election to the Senate in November .
He began his  अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 2007 , और in 2008 , बाद a बंद प्राथमिक  campaign against Hillary Rodham Clinton , he won sufficient delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential nomination .
He then defeated Republican  nominee जॉन मैक्केन in  the general election , and was inaugurated as president on January 20 , 2009 .
Nine months later , Obama  थी नामित the 2009  Nobel Peace Prize laureate .
He was re-elected president in November 2012 , defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney , and  थी sworn in लिये a दूसरी  term on January 20 , 2013 .
Early in his first term in office , Obama signed  into विधि आर्थिक stimulus विधान in जवाब to  the Great Recession in the form of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 and the Tax Relief , Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization , and Job Creation Act of 2010 .
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act , often referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank Wall  गली सुधार और उपभोक्ता सुरक्षा अधिनियम ; the  Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012 .
In May 2012 , he became the first sitting U.S. president to publicly support same-sex marriage and in 2013 his administration filed briefs which urged the Supreme Court to rule in favor  of same-sex युगल in दो high-profile  cases .
In foreign policy , Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War , increased troop levels  in अफगानिस्तान , हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ  Russia , ordered U.S. military involvement in Libya , and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden .

Sample view of an electronic health record  आधारित on बिंब
नमूना दृश्य  of an electronic health record
An electronic health  रिकार्ड ( ehr ) is an evolving अवधारणा पारिभाषित  as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations .
It is a record in  डिजिटल स्वरूप  that is theoretically capable of being shared across different health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information  संजाल or exchanges  .
EHRs may include a range of data , including demographics , medical  इतिहास , दवा और allergies , immunization औकात , प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण  results , radiology images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .

The Rime of the  प्राचीन मेरिनर ( originally the rime of the ancyent  Marinere ) is the longest major poem by the English poet Samuel Taylor Coleridge , written in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads .
Modern editions use a  बाद संशोधित संस्करण  printed in 1817 that featured a gloss .
Along with other poems in Lyrical Ballads , it  थी a सिग्नल शिफ़्ट to आधुनिक काव्य और the शुरूआत  of British Romantic literature .
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines how web browsers and other user agents can automatically choose the appropriate proxy server (  अभिगम विधि ) लिये fetching  a given URL .
A PAC file contains a JavaScript function  “findproxyforurl  ( url , host ) ” .
This function returns  a स्ट्रिंग साथ  one or more access method specifications .
These specifications cause the  उपयोक्ता एजेंट to उपयोग a  particular proxy server or to connect directly .
Multiple  विशेषताएँ provide a  fall-back when a proxy fails to respond .
The browser fetches this PAC file before  requesting  other URLs .
The URL of the PAC file is either  विन्यस्त हस्तचालित or संकल्पित automatically  by the Web Proxy Autodiscovery Protocol .
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1 , 1996 ) , known mononymously as Zendaya , is an American  अभिनेत्री , सिंगर  and dancer .
she stars on the Disney Channel sitcom  शेक it  Up as Rocky Blue .

She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the  एपीसोड ``  Walk The Prank '' and on A.N.T . Farm as Sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative ConsultANT . ''
zendaya is भी  a musician .
She signed a deal with Hollywood Records on August 8 , 2012 and started recording songs for her debut album  on अगस्त  12 , 2012 .
She released a single from an independent label called `` Swag It Out ``  और another सिंगल साथ बेला thorne  called `` Watch Me , '' which is featured on the Break It Down album .
On March 20 , 2012 , Zendaya and Bella Thorne released an album together called Shake It Up : Live 2 Dance , each have their own song on it  , साथ साथ a mash-up of दोनो गीतों  together as one .

This is a list  of एयरपोर्ट in पेन्सिलवेनिया  ( a U.S. state ) , grouped by type and sorted by location .
It contains all public-use and  सैन्य एयरपोर्ट  in the state .
Some  private-use और पूर्व एयरपोर्ट may be शामिल  where notable , such as airports that were previously public-use , those with commercial enplanements recorded by the FAA or airports assigned an IATA airport code .
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc . Originally released in 2007 for the iPhone and iPod Touch platforms ,  it रै महरूम विस्तारित to support अन्य ठहराना डिवाइस ऐसे as the ipad और ठहराना tv  .
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows Phone and Google 's  एंड्रॉइड , ठहराना करता नहीं अनुज्ञा आईओएस लिये संस्थापना  on non-Apple hardware .
, Apple 's App Store  contained अधिक than 700,000 आईओएस अनुप्रयोग  , which have collectively been downloaded more than 30 billion times .
It had a  21 % share of the स्मार्टफोन मोबाईल ऑपरेटिंग  system units shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012 , behind only Google 's Android .
In June 2012 , it accounted for 65 % of mobile web data consumption (  सहित उपयोग on दोनो the ipod टच और the  iPad ) .
At the  हाफ of 2012 , वहीँ यहूद  410 million devices activated .
According to the special  मीडिया इवेंट आयोजित by ठहराना on सितंबर  12 , 2012 , 400 million devices have been sold through June 2012 .
The user interface of iOS is based on the concept of direct  हेरफेर , using  multi-touch gestures .
Interface control elements consist of  sliders , switches , और बटन  .
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe , tap , pinch , and reverse pinch , all of  जिससे have विशिष्ट परिभाषाएं भीतर  the context of the iOS operating system and its multi-touch interface .
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to respond to shaking the device ( one common  परिणाम is the undo कमांड  ) or rotating it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching from portrait to landscape mode ) .
iOS is derived from  os x ,  with which it shares the Darwin foundation .
iOS is  ठहराना 's मोबाईल संस्करण of the  OS X operating system used on Apple computers .
In iOS , there  हैं चार abstraction परतों : the  Core OS layer , the Core Services layer , the Media layer , and the Cocoa Touch layer .
The  वर्तमान संस्करण of the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली  ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's flash memory for the system partition , using roughly 800 MB of that partition ( varying by model ) for iOS itself .
iOS currently runs on iPhone ,  ipad , ipod टच और ठहराना tv  .

A spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic device whose  intended डिज़ाइन फलन is to 'spoil  ' unfavorable air movement across a body of a vehicle in motion , usually described as turbulence or drag .
Spoilers on the front of a vehicle are often called air dams , because in addition to directing air flow  वे भी reduce the राशि of एयर बहती underneath the गाडी जिससे generally reduces aerodynamic  lift and drag .
Spoilers are often fitted to race and high-performance sports cars ,  हालांकि वे have become आम on यात्री  vehicles as well .
Some spoilers are  added to गाड़ियाँ primarily  for styling purposes and have either little aerodynamic benefit or even make the aerodynamics worse .
Spoilers for cars are often  incorrectly उलझन  with , or the term used interchangeably with , wings .
Automotive wings are devices whose intended design is to   generate downforce as air passes around them , not simply disrupt existing airflow patterns .
Mario , who serves as  निन्टेंडो 's शुभंकर , is a fictional अक्षर  created by game designer Shigeru Miyamoto and voiced by Charles Martinet .
This  is a सूची of वीडियो खेल जहाँ the अक्षर  Mario plays a part , either as the protagonist , antagonist , supporting character , as part of an ensemble cast , as a cameo , or in a game within a game .
It does not include simple references to the character , such as the portraits of  मारियो मिला in the लेजेंड of zelda : a  Link to the Past .
The year indicated is the year the game was first released , most commonly in Japan  ; खेल यहूद sometimes released सालो बाद in अन्य regions of the  world .
The list includes ports , remakes and  compilations  .
It does n't include any Virtual  कंसोल re-releases  .
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I Am  a man of निरंतर विषाद '' ) is a परंपरागत  American folk song first recorded by Dick Burnett , a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky .
The song was originally recorded by Burnett as `` Farewell Song '' printed in a Richard Burnett songbook , circa 1913  .
An early version was  अंकित by emry आर्थर in 1928 ( vocalion  Vo 5208 ) .
Public interest in the song was renewed after the  रिलीज of the 2000 फिल्मी o bhai  , Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a central role  in the  film 's plot .
The song was also included in  the फिल्मी 's अत्यधिक  successful , multiple-platinum selling soundtrack .
Josephson junction array chip developed by the National Bureau of  मानकों as a मानक वोल्ट
The volt ( symbol : V ) is the SI derived unit for electric potential  ( वोल्टेज )  , electric potential difference , and electromotive force .
The volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist  alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ) , जो invented the वोल्टायिक  pile , possibly the first chemical battery .
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo  हत्या और कदम of gavrilo princip  ( image taken in 1987 , before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque  commemorating the स्थान  of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne , and his wife , Sophie , Duchess of  hohenberg , यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो  , by Gavrilo Princip , one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of the assassination was to break off  austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त  into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia .
The assassins ' motives were  सतत साथ the गति कि बाद became ज्ञात as यंग  Bosnia .
Serbian military  अधिकारियों stood पीछे  the attack .
At the top of  ये सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों थी मुख्य of सर्बियाई  Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević , his righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić , and Masterspy Rade Malobabić .
Major  tankosić हथियारबंद the हत्यारे  with bombs and pistols and trained them .
The  हत्यारे यहूद दिए अभिगम to the वही clandestine टनल of  safe-houses and agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
the हत्यारे , the कुंजी सदस्यों of the clandestine  tunnel , and the key Serbian military conspirators who were still alive were arrested , tried , convicted and punished .
Those who were  गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया यहूद आजमाया  in Sarajevo in October 1914 .
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in  1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन of the  top military conspirators .
Much of what is known about  the assassinations  comes from these two trials and related records .
कार्यभार of जिम्मेदारी लिये the bombing  and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later .
Mission San Juan Capistrano was a Spanish mission in Southern California  , स्तिथ in present-day सैन जुआन  Capistrano .
it थी संस्थापित on सब संतो  ' Day November 1 , 1776 , by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan Order .
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano , a 15th century theologian and `` warrior priest '' who resided in the Abruzzo region of Italy , San  जुआन capistrano रै the भेद of होने घर to the oldest भवन  in California still in use , a chapel built in 1782 .
Known  alternately as `` सेरा 's चैपल '' और  `` Father Serra 's Church , '' it is the only extant structure where it has been documented that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass .
One of the best known of  the alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया  missions ( and one of the few missions to have actually been founded twice—others being Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ) .
The site was originally consecrated on October 30 , 1775 , by Father Fermín Lasuén , but was quickly abandoned  due to अशांति among  the indigenous population in San Diego .
The success of the  उपनिवेश is evident in इसके  historical records .
Prior to the  आगमन of the प्रचारकों  , some 550 natives were scattered throughout the local area .
By 1790 , the number of converted Christians had grown to 700 , and just six years  बाद nearly 1,000  `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) lived in or around the Mission compound .
1,649 baptisms were conducted that  साल अलोन , आउट of the कुल 4,639 souls परिवर्तित  between 1776 and 1847 .
More than 2,000 former inhabitants  ( ज़्यादातर juaneño इंडियंस ) हैं दफ्न in  unmarked graves in the Mission 's cemetery ( campo santo ) .
the remains of पिता ( बाद monsignor ) st. जॉन  O'Sullivan , who recognized the property 's historic value and working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its structures , are buried at the entrance to the cemetery on the west side of the property , and a statue raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt .
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while serving at  the मिशन : fathers  José Barona , Vicente Fustér , and Vicente Pascual Oliva are all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor .
The  criolla or `` मिशन  grape , '' was first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783 , the first wine produced in Alta California emerged from the Mission 's winery .
The Mission entered a long period of  क्रमिक मनाही बाद  secularization in 1833 .
Numerous efforts were made over the years to restore the Mission to its former glory , but none  मिले साथ ग्रेट  success until the arrival of Father O'Sullivan in 1910 .
Restoration efforts continue , and `` Serra 's Chapel ''  is स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये  religious services .
About  half-a-million विज़िटर  , including 80,000 school children , come to the Mission each year .
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are a renowned architectural wonder , the Mission is perhaps  बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the सालाना `` वापसी of the दात  '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ) .
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite subject for many notable artists , and has been immortalized in literature  और on फिल्मी numerous टाइम्स ,  perhaps more than any other mission .
in 1984 , a आधुनिक गिरिजाघर जटिल  was constructed just north and west of the Mission compound and is now known as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano .
Today , the mission compound serves as a museum , with the  सेरा चैपल भीतर the यौगिक सेवारत  as a chapel for the mission parish .
Better  बंद मुर्दे is a 1985 अमरीकी टीन रोमांटिक  comedy film starring John Cusack and written and directed by Savage Steve Holland .
It tells the story of  ऊँची स्कूल छात्र लेन myer जो  is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him .
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally  louisiana superdome और commonly the  Superdome ) is a sports and exhibition stadium , located in the Central Business District of New Orleans , Louisiana , USA .
Plans  यहूद drawn up in 1967 , by the नई  Orleans modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis .
Its steel  फ़्रेम कवर  a expanse .
Its dome is made of a  lamella multi-ringed  frame and has a diameter of , making it the largest fixed domed structure in the world .
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints , the  ncaa 's प्रभाग i-a tulane ग्रीन वेव  football team ( the largest football stadium in Conference USA ) , the State Farm Bayou Classic , the R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl , the Allstate Sugar Bowl and , every fourth year , the BCS National Championship Game .
Because of the size and location in one of the major tourist destinations in the United States , the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of candidates  होने माना  for major sporting events , such as the Super Bowl and the Final Four .
In 2005 , the  superdome gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय  attention of a different type when it housed thousands of people seeking shelter from Hurricane Katrina .
The building suffered extensive damage as  a परिणाम of the तूफ़ान  , and was closed for many months afterward .
On October 3 , 2011 , it was announced that German  automaker mercedes-benz खरीदा नामकरण  rights to the stadium .
The new name took effect on  अक्तूबर 23 , 2011  .
It is the third stadium that has  नामकरण अधिकारों इससे mercedes-benz ( और पहला in the संयुक्त राज्य ) , बाद  the Mercedes-Benz Arena , the stadium of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart , in Stuttgart , Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai , China .
