Disney 's Animal  किंगडम आवास is an african-themed  deluxe resort at the Walt Disney World Resort .
It  खोली on  April 16 , 2001 .
The resort  is स्वामित्व और संचालित  by Walt Disney Parks and Resorts .
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is  स्तिथ in the एनिमल  Kingdom Resort Area , adjacent to Disney 's Animal Kingdom .
It gives guests the opportunity to view grazing wildlife outside their rooms and public areas in the resort within  निकटता of the पशु , conveying the अहसास of होने  in an African savanna .
The People 's Party , also known as the `` Populists '' , was a short-lived political party in the United States  स्थापित in 1891 दौरान the populist गति ( संयुक्त  States , 19th Century ) .
It  थी सबसे महत्वपूर्ण  in 1892-96 , and then rapidly faded away .
आधारित among ग़रीब , श्वेत कपास किसानो in the दक्षिण (  especially North Carolina , Alabama , and Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ) , it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism and hostility to banks , railroads , and elites generally .
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions , and in 1896 the Democrats endorsed their  अध्यक्षीय nominee , विलियम जेनिंग्स  Bryan .
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism  `` हैं commonly प्रयुक्त लिये anti-elitist appeals  in opposition to established interests and mainstream parties .
भाषाई मैप  of Nigeria , Cameroon , and Benin .
Sign in English , outside  the विश्वविद्यालयों of  Lagos
There are hundreds  of भाषाएं बोला  in Nigeria .
The major languages are Yoruba , Hausa , Igbo , Edo ,  fulfulde , कनूरी  , and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English , the former colonial language , was chosen to  सुकर the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई एकता of the देश  .
English , however , remains an  विशेष बचाना of the देश 's शहरी elite , और is नहीं  widely spoken in rural areas , which comprise three quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a  microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे , encompassing तीन प्रमुख  African languages families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several  as-yet unclassified भाषाएं , ऐसे as cen tuum  , which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families .
A  श्रेणी of कार्यक्रम led  to the attack on Pearl Harbor .
War between Japan and the United States had been a  सम्भावना कि प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित लिये चूंकि the 1920s  , though real tension did not begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan .
Over the next decade , Japan expanded slowly into China , leading to all out war  between  the two in 1937 .
In  1940 जापानी invaded फ्रेंच इंडोचायना  in an effort to embargo all imports into China , including war supplies purchased from the U.S .
This move prompted the United States to embargo all oil exports , leading the Imperial Japanese Navy to estimate that it had less than two years of bunker oil remaining and to support  the मौजूदा योजनाएँ to seize आयल संसाधन in the  Dutch East Indies .
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater East Asia  co-prosperity गोला  that Japan envisioned in the Pacific .
The Philippine islands , at that time an American  territory , यहूद भी  a Japanese target .
The  जापानी सैन्य concluded कि an आक्रमण  of the Philippines would provoke an American military response .
Rather than seize and fortify the islands , and wait for the inevitable US counterattack , Japan 's military leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive Pearl Harbor attack , which they  assumed होता negate the अमरीकी शक्तियां needed लिये the मुक्ति  and reconquest of the islands .
Planning for the attack had begun in very  जल्दी 1941 , by admiral isoroku यामामोटो  .
He finally won assent from the Naval High Command by ,  among अन्य बाते , threatening  to resign .
the आक्रमण थी स्वीकृत in the गर्मियाँ at an इम्पीरियल  Conference and again at a second Conference in the fall .
Simultaneously  over the साल  , pilots were trained , and ships prepared for its execution .
Authority for the  आक्रमण थी granted at the दूसरी  Imperial Conference if a diplomatic result satisfactory to Japan was not reached .
After final approval by Emperor Hirohito the order to attack was  जारी  at the beginning of December .
A  आम दफ्तर  stapler
A common  स्कूल  stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins sheets of paper or similar  सामग्री by ड्राइविंग a पतला मेटल स्टेपल through  the sheets and folding the ends .
Staplers are widely used in  सरकारी , कारोबार ,  offices , homes and schools .
The word `` stapler '' can actually refer to a number of  अलग डिवाइस of varying  uses .
In addition to joining paper sheets together , staplers can also be used in a surgical setting to join  ऊतक साथ साथ सर्जिकल स्टेपल्स to बंद a सर्जिकल  wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ) .
Typically , most staplers are used to join  अनेक चादरें of पेपर .
Paper staplers come in two distinct types :  हस्तचालित और  electric .
Manual staplers are normally hand-held , although models that are used while set on a desk or other  सतह हैं नहीं uncommon  .
Electric staplers exist in a variety  of अलग डिजाइन और  models .
Their primary operating function is to join large  संख्याएँ of पेपर चादरें साथ  in rapid succession .
Some electric  staplers can जुड़ें up  to 20 sheets at a time .
Swallowing , known  scientifically as deglutition , is the प्रक्रम in the इंसान or एनिमल  body that makes something pass from the mouth , to the pharynx , and into the esophagus , while shutting the epiglottis .
If this fails and the object goes through the  श्वासनली  , then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur .
In the human body it is controlled by the  swallowing reflex  .
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4 , 1792 – August 11 , 1868 ) , of Pennsylvania , was a leader of the Radical  रिपब्लिकन गुट of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और a fierce  opponent of slavery .
He was one of the most influential members in  the इतिहास of कॉंग्रेस  .
As chairman of the  शक्तिशाली हाउस तरीके और अर्थात्  Committee , Stevens , a witty , sarcastic speaker and flamboyant party leader , dominated the House from 1861 until his death .
He wrote much of  the वित्तीय  legislation that paid for the American Civil War .
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the  प्रधान नेताओ of the कट्टरपंथी  Republicans during the war and Reconstruction era .
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply since his death as interpretations  of पुनर्निर्माण  have changed .
Historians of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding harsh treatment of the white South and violating American traditions  of republicanism , depicting स्टीवंस as a विलेन  for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates .
This highly negative  characterization  held sway into the 1950s .
The rise of the neo-abolitionist school  in the 1950s led  to a strong positive appreciation of Stevens ' work on civil rights for Freedmen .
A recent biographer characterizes him as , `` The Great Commoner , savior of free public education in Pennsylvania , national Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United States and intrepid  mainstay of the  attempt to secure racial justice for the Freedmen during Reconstruction , the only member of the House of Representatives ever to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress . ''
Overview of the  अनुवाद  of eukaryotic messenger RNA
आरेख प्रर्दशित the अनुवाद  of mRNA and the synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
in आणविक जीवविज्ञान  and genetics , translation is the process through which cellular ribosomes manufacture proteins .
It is  भाग of the प्रक्रम of जीन  expression .
In translation , messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by transcription is decoded by the ribosome to produce a specific amino acid  कड़ी , or polypeptide , कि  will later fold into an active protein .
In bacteria , translation occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm , where the large and  छोटी subunits of the राइबोसोम  are located , and bind to the mRNA .
In eukaryotes ,  अनुवाद occurs आरपार the झिल्ली  of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis .
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the binding of tRNAs with complementary anticodon  sequences to कि  of the mRNA .
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids that are chained together into a polypeptide as the  mrna गुजरता through और is `` पढ़ा  '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape .
In many instances , the entire ribosome/mRNA complex  बांधता to the बाहरी झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और  releases the nascent protein polypeptide inside for later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell .
Many types of transcribed RNA  , ऐसे as ट्रांसफ़र rna , ribosomal  RNA , and small nuclear RNA , do not undergo translation into proteins .
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation , elongation , translocation and termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain , or  polypeptide कि is the उत्पाद of अनुवाद  ) .
अमीनो acids हैं  brought to ribosomes and assembled into proteins .
In activation  , the सही अमीनो  acid is covalently bonded to the correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ) .
The amino acid is  joined by इसके carboxyl समूह  to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond .
When the tRNA has an amino acid  linked to it , it is  termed `` charged '' .
Initiation involves the small subunit of  the राइबोसोम बाइंडिंग  to the 5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation factors ( IF ) .
Termination of the polypeptide happens when the A site of the ribosome faces a stop  codon ( uaa , uag  , or UGA ) .
No tRNA can recognize  or bind to  this codon .
Instead , the stop codon induces the binding of a release factor protein that prompts the disassembly of the entire  ribosome/mrna जटिल  .
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these include anisomycin , cycloheximide , chloramphenicol , tetracycline , streptomycin  , erythromycin , और puromycin , among  others .
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic  ribosomes , और यूँ एंटीबायोटिक can specifically निशाना बैक्टीरियल  infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells .
A multimedia message  on a मोबाईल  phone .
मल्टीमीडिया messaging सेवा ( mms  ) is a standard way to send messages that include multimedia content to and from mobile phones .
It extends the core SMS ( Short Message Service ) capability that allowed exchange of text messages only up to 160  वर्ण in  length .
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets , although it is also popular as a method of  delivering न्यूज और entertainment  content including videos , pictures , text pages and ringtones .
The standard is developed by the Open Mobile Alliance ( OMA ) ,  हालांकि दौरान विकास  it was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups .
Smallpox was an infectious disease unique to humans  ,  caused by either of two virus variants , Variola major and Variola minor .
The disease is also known by the Latin names Variola or  variola वीरा , निकला इससे varius (  `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ) .
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox '' or `` red plague  '' ; the पद `` smallpox '' थी पहला प्रयुक्त in ब्रिटेन  in the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ) .
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola  नाबालिग ) थी diagnosed on 26 अक्तूबर  1977 .
Smallpox localized in small blood vessels of the skin and in the mouth  और  throat .
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular  खाज और , बाद , उठाया fluid-filled फफोले  .
V. major produces a more serious disease and has an overall mortality rate of  30–35  % .
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known  as alastrim , cottonpox , milkpox , whitepox , और क्यूबन  itch ) which kills about 1 % of its victims .
Long-term complications of V. major infection include  characteristic scars , commonly on the फेस ,  which occur in 65–85 % of survivors .
Blindness resulting  इससे corneal ulceration और scarring , और  limb deformities due to arthritis and osteomyelitis are less common complications , seen in about 2–5 % of cases .
Smallpox is believed to have emerged in  इंसान populations  about 10,000 BC .
the earliest शारीरिक  evidence of it is probably the pustular rash on the mummified body of Pharaoh Ramses V of Egypt .
The disease  मारे an अनुमानित 400,000 europeans  annually during the closing years of the 18th century ( including five reigning monarchs ) , and was responsible for a third of all blindness .
Of all those infected , 20–60 % —and over 80 % of  संक्रमित children—died  from the disease .
Smallpox was responsible for an estimated 300–500 million deaths  दौरान the 20th  century .
As recently as 1967 , the World Health Organization (  जो ) अनुमानित कि  15 million people contracted the disease and that two million died in that year .
After vaccination  अभियान  throughout the 19th and 20th centuries , the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979 .
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have been eradicated , the other being rinderpest ,  जिससे थी घोषित eradicated  in 2011 .
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' is a song by the  अंग्रेज़ी  rock band the Beatles .
Written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney , and recorded in October 1963 , it was the  पहला बीटल्स रिकार्ड to be बना using four-track  equipment .
With advance orders exceeding one  लाख नक़ल in the संयुक्त किंगडम , `` i want to थाम अपना हाथ  '' would ordinarily have gone straight to the top of the British record charts on its day of release ( 29 November 1963 ) had it not been blocked by the group 's first million seller `` She Loves You `` , the Beatles ' previous UK single , which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the group .
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor , `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' stayed at number one for  पाँच सप्ताह और remained in the uk शीर्ष  fifty for twenty-one weeks in total .
It was also the group 's first American number one , entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the  अमरीकी म्यूज़िक उद्योग .
By 1  फ़रवरी it आयोजित the क्रमांक एक स्पॉट — लिये सात सप्ताह — पहले होने replaced  by `` She Loves You '' , a reverse scenario of what had occurred in Britain , and remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks .
`` I Want to Hold  अपना हाथ '' became the बीटल्स  ' best-selling single worldwide .
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips  of the संयुक्त राज्य in the  late 1950s and continued until the early 1970s .
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s  , जिससे have महरूम stripped  of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide better weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an independent front suspension ) , though a raised stock front suspension is common as well .
Common weight reduction techniques include fiberglass body panels ,  stripped इंटीरियर्स और plexiglass खिड़कियाँ ( sometimes  color tinted ) .
Because they were primarily built for racing , these cars typically had the engine swapped to a larger or more powerful one , the existing stock  इंजन परिवर्धित  ( often heavily ) or both .
It was very common to fit a Roots  supercharger और mechanical ईंधन इंजेक्शन  , such as one from Algon , Hilborn , or Crower .
With form being dictated by  फलन , उनके रूप is प्रायः बहुत शीर्ष भारी और ungainly , largely  due to front ends being raised higher than stock , to assist in the weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ) .
having उनके exhaust पाइप निकास through the सामने  fender well is a common characteristic of gassers , as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes , pearls , and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts .
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline  -fueled खीचें रेसिंग क्लास , बल्कि than एक  using methanol or nitromethane .
The gasser is the predecessor of the  आधुनिक मजेदार car  .
Twelve-lead  ईकेजी of  a 26-year-old male
Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time , as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of  the स्किन और अंकित by a यंत्र  external to the body .
The recording produced by this  noninvasive कार्यविधि  is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ) .
An ECG is used to measure the rate  और नियमितता of heartbeats , as खूब as the आकार और  position of the chambers , the presence of any damage to the heart , and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart , such as a pacemaker .
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts , but  may भी be performed on पशु , प्रायः लिये निदान of  heart abnormalities or research .
Donald John  ट्रम्प , sr. ( born जून 14 , 1946 )  is an American business magnate , television personality and author .
He is the chairman and president of The Trump Organization  और the संस्थापक of  Trump Entertainment Resorts .
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle , outspoken manner , and role on the NBC reality show The Apprentice have  बना उसे a well-known हस्ती जो थी no . 14 on the 2012 फोर्ब्स हस्ती  100 list .
Trump is the son of Fred  ट्रम्प , a धनवान नई यॉर्क  City real-estate developer .
He worked for his father 's firm , Elizabeth Trump & Son , while attending the Wharton School of the  विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया , और in 1968 officially joined the कम्पनी  .
He was given control of the company in 1971 and  renamed it the  Trump Organization .
In 2010 , Trump expressed an interest in becoming a  प्रत्याशी लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in the 2012  election , though in May 2011 , he announced he would not be a candidate .
In December 2011 , Trump was suggested as a  संभावित वाइस अध्यक्षीय चयन by मिशेल  Bachmann , if she were to win the Republican nomination .
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B  singer-songwriter sam  Cooke , written and first recorded in 1963 and released under the RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964 .
Though only a modest hit for Cooke in comparison with  उसके पिछला singles , the सोंग आए  to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement .
The song has gained in popularity and  नाजुक acclaim in the दशकों चूंकि इसके  release , and is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time .
Steam  उठती इससे the nesjavellir  Geothermal Power Station in Iceland .
Geothermal energy is thermal energy  उत्पन्न और भंडारित in  the Earth .
Thermal energy is the  उर्जा कि  determines the temperature of matter .
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the  ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे  radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in  तापमान between the कोर of the ग्रह और इसके  surface , drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal originates from  the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge )  , meaning earth , and θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning hot .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy is  निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय  decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
Heat  conducts इससे the कोर  to surrounding cooler rock .
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt , creating magma convection  upward चूंकि  it is lighter than the solid rock .
The magma heats rock  और जल  in the crust , sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
इससे hot स्रोतों , geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान  since Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide , about  10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal  power is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct  geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला  heating , space heating , spas , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal power is cost effective ,  विश्वसनीय , चिरस्थायी  , and environmentally friendly , but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources , especially for applications such as home heating ,  खोलने a संभावित लिये फैली  exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth , but these  emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those  of fossil fuels .
As a result , geothermal power has  the संभावित to सहायता mitigate वैश्विक  warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more  than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा needs  , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and  खोजी लिये गहन  resources is very expensive .
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions about technology , energy prices  , subsidies , और ब्याज  rates .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers would be willing to pay a  छोटी अधिक लिये a बेदर्दी  energy source like geothermal .
लकिन as a परिणाम  of government assisted research and industry experience , the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 , geothermal  उर्जा लागत between  two and ten cents per kwh .
Ownership of property  may be निजी , सामूहिक  , or common and the property may be objects , land/real estate , or intellectual property .
Determining  स्वामित्व in विधि involves determining  who has certain rights and duties over the property .
These rights and duties , sometimes called a 'bundle of  अधिकारों ' , can  be separated and held by different parties .
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient philosophers , Plato  और अरस्तू , जो आयोजित अलग  opinions on the subject .
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought private property created divisive inequalities , while Aristotle ( 384 BC – 322 BC ) thought private property enabled people to receive the full  लाभ of उनके मजदूर  .
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ tragedy of the commons ” problem , where people tend to degrade common  प्रॉपर्टी अधिक than  they do private property .
Given a short-sighted owner , however , a private property system can make these tragedies  worse—for उदाहरण , a निजी मालिक of a टुकड़ा of oil-rich प्रॉपर्टी , depending  on his worldview , might be more interested in short-term financial gain than incremental use with an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g. , those of future generations , the disenfranchised , etc . ) .
While Aristotle justified the existence of private ownership , he left open  सवाल of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate प्रॉपर्टी between कया is निजी और आम और ( 2  ) how to allocate the private property within society .
Over the millennia , and across cultures what can be property and how  it is regarded culturally have varied  widely .
Ownership is the basis for many other  अवधारणाओं कि रूप the मूलाधार of प्राचीन और आधुनिक समाजों  such as money , trade , debt , bankruptcy , the criminality of theft , and private vs. public property .
Ownership is the key building block in the development of the  पूंजीवादी socio-economic  system .
Adam Smith stated that one  of the पवित्र  laws of justice was to guard a person 's property and possessions .
The process and mechanics of ownership are fairly complex : one can gain , transfer and lose  स्वामित्व of प्रॉपर्टी in a क्रमांक of तरीके  .
To acquire  प्रॉपर्टी एक can खरीदें it साथ धन  , trade it for other property , receive it as a gift , steal it , find it , make , it or homestead it .
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money , exchanging it for other property , giving it as a  तोहफा , होने robbed of it , it , or having it stripped  from one 's ownership through legal means such as eviction , foreclosure , seizure , or taking .
Ownership is self-propagating in that  the मालिक of कोई प्रॉपर्टी  will also own the economic benefits of that property .
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a song  अंकित by barbadian  recording artist Rihanna , for her fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ) .
Featuring guest  vocals  from Canadian rapper Drake , the song was released as the second single from Loud on October 29 , 2010 through Def Jam Recordings .
The R & B  सोंग थी उत्पादित by the नॉर्वेजियाई  production duo StarGate , and was written by the duo along with Ester Dean , Traci Hale , and Drake .
lyrically , it incorporates विषयवस्तु  of sexual intercourse and romance .
Music critics gave the song  धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ , citing it कुछ of रिहाना  's best vocal work to date ; there was a praise regarding its romantic nature , as well as its sexual tones .
``  कया 's my नाम ? '' थी a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी और अव्वल the us  Billboard Hot 100 chart , giving Rihanna her third number-one single in 2010 , as well as her eighth overall on the chart .
The song also topped the charts in Hungary and the United Kingdom and reached the  शीर्ष पाँच in कनाडा , आयरलैंड , नई जीलैंड  , Norway and Slovakia .
The song received a nomination  at the 54th ग्रैमी  Awards for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration .
An accompanying music video , directed by Philip Andelman , portrays a romantic  एनकाउंटर between रिहाना और ड्रेक in a किराना स्टोर साथ साथ रोमांटिक दृश्यों between  the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side .
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live performances  आरपार दोनो पहलू of the अटलांटिक , सहित  Saturday Night Live in America and the series seven finale of The X Factor in the United Kingdom .
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the country 's  मीडिया नियामक , ofcom  , for the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit .
A mathematical constant is a special number , usually a real number , that is ``  significantly दिलचस्प in कुछ रास्ता ''  .
Constants arise in many different areas of mathematics , with  स्थिरांक ऐसे as e ( गणितीय निरंतर )  | and pi| occurring in such diverse contexts as geometry , number theory and calculus .
What it means for a constant to arise `` naturally '' , and what makes a constant `` interesting '' , is ultimately a matter of taste , and some  गणितीय स्थिरांक हैं notable अधिक लिये ऐतिहासिक  reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest .
The more popular constants have been studied  throughout the आयु  and computed to many decimal places .
All mathematical constants are  definable संख्याएँ और प्रायः हैं भी  computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ) .
Elections to the United States  सीनेट यहूद आयोजित on नवम्बर 2 ,  2010 , for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 seats .
( A special election on January 19 , 2010 in Massachusetts was  आयोजित पहले  in the year . )
Thirty-four of the seats were for six-year terms to the Senate 's `` class three  '' , और तीन यहूद खास चुनावों लिये  shorter terms .
Of the 37 elections , 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or were  पराजित in the प्राथमिक ) और 18 प्रदर्शित लाज़िम republicans  ( eight of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ) .
After the previous elections ( in 2008 ) , the United States Senate was composed of 58 Democrats , 40 Republicans ,  और 2 independents जो caucus साथ  the Democrats .
Republicans won four seats held by retiring Democrats and  republicans पराजित दो लाज़िम डेमोक्रेट  .
This was the  largest क्रमांक of republicans gains चूंकि the 1994 चुनावों और भी  the first time since that election that Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats .
This was the fourth consecutive election of `` class 3 '' senators where Democrats have failed to gain seats and the third consecutive mid-term  चुनाव आयोजित in a अध्यक्ष 's पहला  term where Republicans have picked-up seats .
Despite these  रिपब्लिकन विन्स , however , the डेमोक्रेट retained a बहुमत of the  Senate with 51 seats plus 2 independents who caucus with them , compared to the 47 Republicans .
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each year as the  सूर्य पहुँच इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम excursion  relative to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere .
As a result , on the day of the solstice , the  सूर्य appears to have पहुँचे इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम  annual altitude in the sky above the horizon at local solar noon .
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( sun ) and sistere ( to  स्टैंड स्टिल ) , क्युकी  at the solstices , the Sun stands still in declination ; that is , the seasonal movement of the Sun 's path ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction .
The solstices ,  साथ साथ the  equinoxes , are connected with the seasons .
In  अनेक संस्कृतियों the  solstices mark either the beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer .
The term solstice can also be used in a broader sense ,  as the तिथि ( दिन  ) when this occurs .
The day of the solstice is either the longest day of the year ( in summer ) or the shortest day of the year ( in  शीत ) लिये कोई प्लेस बाहर  of the tropics .
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29  , 1935 ) is an अमरीकी चट्टान और फेंकें और  country music singer-songwriter and pianist .
He is known by the  उपनाम  `` The Killer '' and is often viewed as “rock & roll 's first great wild man” .
An early pioneer of rock and roll music , in 1956 Lewis  बना उसके पहला  recordings at Sun Records .
`` Crazy Arms ``  बेची 300,000 नक़ल in the दक्षिण ,  but it was his 1957 hit `` Whole Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide .
Lewis followed this in that same year when he  अंकित गीतों ऐसे as `` ग्रेट गेंदें of आग `` , ``  Breathless `` and `` High School Confidential `` .
Lewis sold  अधिक रिकॉर्ड than  Elvis Presley at this time .
However , Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll  करियर faltered in the वेक of उसके विवाह  to his young cousin .
He had  छोटी कामयाबी  in the charts following the scandal and his popularity quickly faded .
His live  प्रदर्शन शुल्क plummeted  from $ 10,000 per night to $ 250 .
in the meantime he  was determined to gain back some of his popularity .
During the early 60’s he did n't have much chart success with few exceptions  ऐसे as ``  What 'd I Say `` .
His live performances at this time were  increasingly जंगली और  energetic .
His album Live at the Star Club , Hamburg from 1964 is often regarded  by अनेक म्यूज़िक पत्रकारों और प्रशंसक  as one of the wildest and greatest rock and roll concert albums ever .
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years with little success , in 1968 Lewis made a transition into country music and had hits with songs such as ``  another प्लेस , another समय ''  .
This reignited his career and  throughout the लेट  '60s and '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts .
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You `` , `` There Must Be More to Love Than This `` , `` Would  तुम लो another मौका on me `` और  `` Me And Bobby McGee `` .
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he  embraced उसके चट्टान 'n ' फेंकें पास्ट साथ गीतों  such as a cover of the Big Bopper 's `` Chantilly Lace `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away `` .
In the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to  ऑडियंस around  the world and still releases new albums .
One such album , titled Last Man Standing , is his best selling to  तिथि at over a लाख नक़ल बेची विश्वव्यापी  .
This was followed by Mean Old Man which has  प्राप्त कुछ of the बेहतरीन  sales of Lewis’s career .
लुईस रै था a दर्जन सुनहरा रिकॉर्ड in  both rock and country , won several Grammy awards , including a Lifetime Achievement Award .
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1986 , and his  pioneering योगदान to the विधा  has been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame .
In 1989 , his life was chronicled in the movie Great Balls  of आग , अभिनीत  Dennis Quaid .
In 2003 , Rolling Stone Magazine listed his box set All  कातिल , no फिलर : the anthology क्रमांक 242 on उनके सूची of `` 500  greatest albums of all time `` .
In 2004 ,  वे क्रमित उसे क्रमांक 24 on उनके  list of the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar  quartet और the क्लास of '55 एल्बम , जिससे  also included Johnny Cash , Carl Perkins , Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley .
Henry Louis Stephens , untitled watercolor ( 1863  ) of a man पढना a समाचारपत्र साथ शीर्षक  `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery '' .
The Emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to all segments of the Executive branch (  सहित the फौज और नेवी ) of the संयुक्त राज्य by अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln on जनवरी 1 ,  1863 , during the American Civil War .
It was based on the president  's संवैधानिक प्राधिकार as कमांडर  in chief of the armed forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress .
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate  territory to be forever फ़्री , और ordered the फौज ( और सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत  as free all those enslaved in ten states that were still in rebellion , thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S .
The Proclamation could  नहीं be enforced in क्षेत्रों स्टिल अंतर्गत  rebellion , but as the army took control of Confederate regions , the slaves in those regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters .
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had already been subdued were immediately emancipated  , और over 3 लाख अधिक  were emancipated as the Union army advanced .
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave states that were not in rebellion , nor to most regions already controlled by the Union army ; emancipation there would come  बाद पृथक राज्य क्रियाएँ and/or the दिसम्बर 1865 अनुसमर्थन  of the Thirteenth Amendment , which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S .
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners , did not itself outlaw slavery , and did not make the ex-slaves (  पुकारा freedmen ) नागरिकों  .
It made the eradication of slavery an explicit war goal , in addition  to the लक्ष्य of reuniting  the Union .
On  सितंबर 22 , 1862 , lincoln था  issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the Confederate States of America that did not return to Union control by January 1 , 1863 .
None returned , and the order , signed and issued January 1 , 1863 , took effect except in locations where the  संघ था already ज़्यादातर regained  control .
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race  युद्ध , angered कुछ उत्तरी डेमोक्रेट , सक्रिय  anti-slavery forces , and weakened forces in Europe that wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy .
It also lifted the spirits of African Americans both in  the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी राज्य , और led to अनेक स्लेव escaping उनके मास्टर्स  and running behind Union lines in order to have their emancipation enforced .
Sucker Punch is a 2011  अमरीकी काल्पनिक  action film directed by Zack Snyder and co-written by him and Steve Shibuya .
It is Snyder 's first  फिल्मी आधारित on an  original script .
The film stars  एमिली ब्राउनिंग , abbie cornish  , Jena Malone , Vanessa Hudgens , Jamie Chung , and Carla Gugino .
The storyline follows  the कल्पनाओं of a यंग स्त्री जो is वचनबद्ध to a  mental institution , as she makes a plan to escape the hospital before suffering a lobotomy .
The film was released in both conventional and IMAX theatres  in the संयुक्त राज्य at मध्यरात्रि on कूच  25 , 2011 .
It  प्राप्त generally ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ  from critics , but was a moderate box office success .
Front and back of Canon  powershot a95 , a  typical pocket-size digital camera
Haselblad 503CW  साथ ixpress v96c डिजिटल  back , an example of a professional digital camera system
A digital camera ( or  digicam ) is a कैमरा कि takes  video or still photographs by recording images on an electronic image sensor .
Most cameras sold today are digital , and digital cameras are incorporated into many  डिवाइस ranging इससे गुस्से और मोबाईल फोन  ( called camera phones ) to vehicles .
Digital and film  कैमरे share an ऑप्टिकल  system , typically using a lens with a variable diaphragm to focus light onto an image pickup device .
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount of light to the imager , just as with film  लकिन the चित्र  pickup device is electronic rather than chemical .
However , unlike film cameras , digital cameras can display images on a screen immediately after being recorded , and store and  हटाएँ बिंब इससे मेमोरी  .
Many  डिजिटल कैमरे  can also record moving video with sound .
Some digital cameras can crop and stitch pictures and  perform अन्य elementary चित्र संपादन .
The inside and front of a Dell  poweredge वेब सर्वर , a कंप्यूटर designed  for rack mounting
Multiple web servers  may be प्रयुक्त लिये  a high traffic website , here four Sun Fire X4200 servers are installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer application ) that helps to deliver web content that  can be पहुँचा through the अंतरजाल  .
The most common use of web servers is to host websites , but there are other uses such as gaming , data storage or  कार्यशील एंटरप्राइज़ अनुप्रयोग  .
The American Red Cross ( ARC ) , also known as the American National Red Cross , is a humanitarian organization that provides  आपात सहायता , विपत्ति राहत  and education inside the United States .
It is the designated U.S. affiliate of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent  समाजों  .
Today , in addition to domestic disaster relief , the American Red Cross offers services in five other areas : community services that help the needy ; communications services and comfort for military members and their  परिवार सदस्यों  ; the collection , processing and distribution of blood and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness , health , and safety ; and international relief and development programs .
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of the United States Code , Section  3001 , the अमरीकी नेशनल रेड क्रॉस is governed by स्वयंसेवक और समर्थित by जातियाँ  donations , income from health and safety training and products , and income from blood products .
The American Red  क्रॉस is headquartered  in Washington , D.C .
The  अध्यक्ष of  the Board of Governors , serving her second three-year term , is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter .
The current President and  मुख्य कार्यपालिका  Officer is Gail J. McGovern .

A rooster ( also called a cockerel or cock ) is a  पुरूष gallinaceous  bird .
It  प्रायः refers to a  male chicken ( Gallus gallus ) .
Immature male chickens less than  एक साल बूढ़ा हैं पुकारा  cockerels .
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United States , and the term is widely used throughout North America , as well as  ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड  .
in the संयुक्त किंगडम और  Ireland the older term `` cockerel '' is more commonly used .
``  मुर्गा '' is in सामान्य उपयोग as the नाम लिये a  male of other species of bird , for example `` Cock sparrow '' .
``  roosting '' is the  action of perching aloft to sleep at night , and is done by both sexes .
The rooster is polygamous , but can not  गार्ड अनेक nests of अंडे  at once .
He guards the general area where his hens are nesting , and will attack other  roosters कि डालें उसके territory  .
During the daytime , he usually sits on a high perch , usually 3–5 feet off the  मैदान to serve as a lookout  for his flock .
He will sound a  distinctive सचेतक कॉल  if predators are nearby .
The Pokémon Trading Card Game (  पोकीमॉन tcg ) is a collectible कार्ड  game based on the Pokémon video game series , first published in October 1996 by Media Factory in Japan .
In the US  , it थी initially प्रकाशित by  Wizards of the Coast , the company that produces , in December 1998 .
Nintendo took over  प्रकाशन in जून  2003 .
It is one of Nintendo 's last  बाकी  strong links to its heritage as a playing card company .
Land Rover is a British car manufacturer with its headquarters in Gaydon ,  warwickshire , संयुक्त किंगडम  which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles .
It is part of the Jaguar Land Rover group ,  a subsidiary of tata मोटर्स  of India .
It is the second  oldest four-wheel-drive  car brand in the world ( after Jeep ) .
The Land Rover name was originally used by the Rover Company for one  विशिष्ट गाडी मॉडल , नामित बस the जमीन  Rover , launched by Rover in 1948 .
Over the following years it developed into a marque encompassing a range of  four-wheel-drive मॉडल , सहित the defender , डिस्कवरी  , Freelander , Range Rover , Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque .
Land Rovers are currently assembled in the company 's Halewood and Solihull plants , with  शोध और विकास लेने प्लेस at  JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres .
Land Rover sold  194,000  vehicles worldwide in 2009 .
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 model , Land Rover as a  कम्पनी रै तभी existed चूंकि 1978  .
Prior  to इस , it थी a उत्पाद लकीर of the रोवर कम्पनी  which was subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of the British Leyland Motor Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of Rover in 1967 .
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models , and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well documented business troubles prompted the establishment of a separate Land Rover company but still under the BL umbrella , remaining  भाग of the subsequent रोवर समूह in 1988 , अंतर्गत the स्वामित्व of अंग्रेजों aerospace बाद the remains of अंग्रेजों leyland  were broken up and privatised .
In 1994 Rover Group plc was  acquired  by BMW .
In 2000 , Rover Group was broken-up by BMW and Land Rover was  बेची to घाट मोटर कम्पनी , बनने  part of its Premier Automotive Group .
In 2006 Ford purchased  the रोवर ब्रांड  from BMW for around £6 million .
This reunited the Rover and Land Rover brands for the first time since  2000 जब the रोवर समूह थी टूटा  up by BMW .
In June 2008 , Ford  बेची दोनो जमीन रोवर और  Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors .
This sale also included  the dormant रोवर  brand
The cover of the first DVD  संकलन  released by Aniplex of The New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The ninth season of the Bleach  दुश्मनी श्रेणी is  named .
The series is based on Tite Kubo 's manga  साथ वही  name .
The episodes are directed by Noriyuki Abe  और उत्पादित by  TV Tokyo , Dentsu , and Studio Pierrot .
The episodes ' plot focuses on  the परिचय of a नई आत्मा reaper कप्तान , shūsuke amagai , और  the mystery surrounding the Kasumiōji clan , one of the families that constitute the nobility of Soul Society .
The season began airing on April 23 , 2008  in जापानी on tv टोकियो और  ended on October 7 , 2008 .
The  अंग्रेज़ी अनुकूलन of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी is licensed  by Viz Media , and this arc began airing on August 28 , 2010 on Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim , and finished on January 29 , 2011 .
Five DVD compilations , each containing four episodes of the season ,  have महरूम released by aniplex ; the पहला  DVD compilation was released on November 26 , 2008 and the fifth on March 25 , 2009 .
A DVD box will be published by Viz  मीडिया  on December 13 , 2011 .
The episodes use three pieces of theme  म्यूज़िक : एक खोलने थीम  and two closing themes .
The opening theme is `` Chu-Bura  `` by kelun  .
The first closing  थीम is `` नारंगी '' by lil'b , प्रयुक्त लिये  episodes 168 to 179 , and the second closing theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku , used for the remainder of the episodes .
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal  सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ  Amendment to the United States Constitution , it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit , prohibit , or otherwise regulate commercial sex , except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states , prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public order  अपराधों , a अपराधों कि  disrupts the order of a community .
It was at one time considered to be a  vagrancy अपराधों .
Currently , Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution ,  the शर्तें  of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes .
Only 8 counties currently contain  क्रियाशील brothels  .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ) , Washoe County (  जिससे contains रेनो ) , कार्सन नगर , डगलस काउंटी , और lincoln काउंटी  .
The other counties  theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति ,  but some of these counties currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and  जीना बंद of the proceeds of a वेश्या  remain illegal under Nevada law , as elsewhere in the country .
as साथ अन्य देशों , वेश्यावृति  in the United States can be divided into three broad categories : street prostitution , brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The East Coast of the United States ,  भी ज्ञात as the पूर्वी seaboard or the अटलांटिक seaboard और  commonly shortened to East Coast , refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic Ocean .
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast are , from north to south , the U.S. states of Maine , New Hampshire , Massachusetts , Rhode Island , Connecticut ,  नई यॉर्क , नई जर्सी , डेलावेयर , मेरीलैंड ,  Virginia , North Carolina , South Carolina , Georgia , and Florida .
Richard Milhous  निक्सन ( जनवरी 9 , 1913 – अप्रैल  22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States , serving from 1969 to 1974 , when he became the only president to resign the office .
Nixon had  previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि  and senator from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
Nixon was born in  yorba लिंडा  , California .
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School of Law  in 1937 , returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया  to practice law .
He and his wife , Pat  निक्सन , स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य  for the federal government in 1942 .
He  subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य  Navy during World War II .
Nixon was elected in California to the House  of प्रतिनिधि in 1946  and to the Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading  anti-communist , और elevated  him to national prominence .
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower , the  रिपब्लिकन पार्टी अध्यक्षीय  nominee in the 1952 election .
Nixon  परोसा लिये आठ  years as vice president .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960 , narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy , and lost a race for  राज्यपाल  of California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he ran again for the  प्रेसिडेंसी और थी  elected .
हालांकि निक्सन initially  escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War , he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations , and he initiated détente and the  anti-ballistic मिसाइल सन्धि साथ the सोवियत संघ the वही  year .
Domestically , his administration generally embraced  नीतियों कि transferred  power from Washington to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs , imposed wage and price controls ,  enforced desegregation of कुछ  Southern schools , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he  presided over the चंद्र  landings beginning with Apollo 11 , he scaled back manned space exploration .
He was  re-elected by a भूस्खलन  in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president  , spiro agnew , और a continuing  series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support , and on August  9 , 1974 , he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित  impeachment and removal from office .
After his resignation , he controversially  प्राप्त a pardon जारी by उसके successor ,  Gerald Ford .
In retirement , Nixon 's work as an elder statesman , authoring several books and undertaking many foreign  यात्राएँ , helped to rehabilitate उसके  public image .
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18 , 1994 , and died four  दिनों बाद  at the age of 81 .
sertraline hydrochloride ( व्यापार names zoloft  , Lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class .
It  थी introduced  to the market by Pfizer in 1991 .
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive ,  दहशत , और सोशल चिंता विकार in दोनो वयस्कों और children  .
in 2011 , it थी the second-most विहित antidepressant on the u.S. खुदरा मार्केट , साथ 37,208,000 prescriptions .
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to that of older tricyclic  antidepressants , लकिन इसके पक्ष प्रभाव हैं much कम सुनाया  .
Differences with newer  antidepressants हैं subtler और भी ज़्यादातर confined to पक्ष  effects .
Evidence suggests that  sertraline may कार्य बेहतर than  fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of depression .
Treatment of panic disorder with sertraline results in a  significant घटी of the  number of panic attacks and in improved quality of life .
For obsessive-compulsive disorder , sertraline is not as effective as cognitive behavioral  चिकित्सा ; the बेहतरीन परिणाम have महरूम हासिल by combining ये  two treatments .
Although  स्वीकृत लिये सोशल phobia और posttraumatic तनाव विकार  , sertraline leads to only modest improvement in these conditions .
Sertraline also alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be used in  sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently  for its treatment .
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications  of अन्य ssris , साथ ऊँची दरों of मतली , अतिसार , अनिद्रा , और यौन पक्ष प्रभाव ; however , it  does not cause weight gain , and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild .
In pregnant women taking sertraline , the drug was present in significant  एकाग्रता in fetal रक्त , और थी भी संबद्ध साथ  a higher rate of various birth defects .
similarly to अन्य antidepressants  , the use of sertraline for depression may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality .
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film directed by Robert Townsend , who  co-wrote  the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans .
Distributed by 20th Century Fox , the film 's main cast includes Townsend , Michael Wright , Leon Robinson , Harry J.  lennix , tico कुएं , हेरोल्ड निकोलस of the निकोलस भाइयो , और diahann  Carroll .
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based on the lives of several artists : The Dells , The Temptations , Four Tops , Wilson Pickett , James Brown , Frankie Lymon , Sam Cooke and others ) follows the three decade  करियर of the r  & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats .
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired soul act through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist , Donald `` Duck '' Matthews ( portrayed by  टाउनसेंड ) , जो serves as a narrator throughout  the film .
However , a  बहुमत of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत  in a consecutive time line as opposed to traditional flash backs .
The film includes a significant amount of  असली म्यूज़िक conceived by विभिन्न कलाकारों लिये  the film 's soundtrack , including singles such as `` A Heart Is a House for Love `` , `` We Have n't Finished Yet '' , and `` Nothing But Love '' .
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29 , 1991 however it was not made available to audiences in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another  dvd रिलीज in 2006 लिये the फिल्मी 's 15th वर्षगांठ  .
The movie received  मिश्रित समीक्षाएँ  from critics .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 – October  4 , 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी  Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years .
He set race records in all three events in  the श्रेणी — the केंटकी डर्बी  ( 1:59.4 ) , the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ) , and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today .
He is considered to be one of the  महानतम  Thoroughbreds of all time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked  सचिवालय the 35th बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी  of the 20th century , the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http .
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the Top 100 U.S.  racehorses of the 20th  Century .
Secretariat was sired by Bold  शासक आउट of somethingroyal  , by Princequillo .
He was  foaled at the मर्ग in  Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War , Secretariat was a large chestnut colt and was  दिए the वही उपनाम  , `` Big Red . ''
सचिवालय 's grandsire , nasrullah  , is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery , he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by  Canadian  jockey Ron Turcotte , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white checkered colors and his  दूल्हे थी एडी स्वेद  .
Secretariat  stood लगभग लम्बा , और  weighed , with a 75-inch girth , in his racing prime .
A typical  12 v , 40 ah lead-acid  car battery
an ऑटोमोटिव  battery is a type of rechargeable battery that supplies electric energy to an automobile .
Usually this refers to an SLI  बैटरी ( starting , lighting  , ignition ) to power the starter motor , the lights , and the ignition system of a vehicle’s engine .
Automotive SLI batteries are usually lead-acid type , and are made of six galvanic cells  in श्रेणी to provide a 12 वोल्ट प्रणाली  .
Each cell provides  2.1 volts लिये  a total of 12.6 volt at full charge .
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors ,  प्रायः equipped साथ डीज़ल इंजन , may have दो बैटरी in श्रेणी लिये a 24  volt system , or may have parallel strings of batteries .
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead and separate plates of lead dioxide , which are submerged  into an electrolyte समाधान of परिचय 38 %  sulfuric acid and 62 % water .
This  कल्याणकारी a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया कि  releases electrons , allowing them to flow through conductors to produce electricity .
As the battery discharges , the acid of the electrolyte reacts  साथ the सामग्री of the प्लेटों , बदलना  their surface to lead sulfate .
When the battery is recharged , the chemical reaction is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms  into सीसे डाइऑक्साइड और सीसे  .
With the plates restored to their original condition , the  प्रक्रम may अभी  be repeated .
बैटरी रीसाइक्लिंग of  automotive batteries reduces the need for resources required for manufacture of new batteries , diverts toxic lead from landfills , and prevents risk of improper disposal .
full-time नियुक्ति is नियुक्ति in जिससे  a person works a minimum number of hours defined as such by his/her employer .
Full-time employment  प्रायः आता साथ लाभ कि हैं नहीं typically  offered to part-time , temporary , or flexible workers , such as annual leave , sickleave , and health insurance .
full-time कार्य  are often considered careers .
They generally pay more than part-time jobs ,  और प्रायः carry अधिक  hours per week .
The Fair Labor Standards Act ( FLSA ) does not define  full-time  employment or part-time employment .
This is a matter generally to be determined by the  नियोक्ता ( us विभाग of  Labor ) .
The definition by employer can  vary और is generally  published in a company 's Employee Handbook .
Companies commonly require from 30–35 or 40 hours per week to be defined as  full-time और इसलिए योग्य  for benefits .
Full-Time status varies between company and is often based on  the शिफ़्ट the कर्मचारी जरूर कार्य  during each work week .
The `` standard '' work week consists of five  eight-hour दिनों , commonly परोसा between  9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours .
While a four-day week generally consists of four ten-hour days ; it  may भी consist of as छोटी as नौ घंटों लिये  a total of a 36 hour work week .
Twelve-hour shifts  हैं प्रायः तीन दिनों  per week , unless the company has the intention of paying out the employee overtime .
Overtime is legally paid out anytime  an कर्मचारी works  more than 40 hours per week .
The  विधिक न्यूनतम लिये  overtime starts at Base Pay + One-Half .
The increased payout  is माना to compensate थोड़ा  for the increased fatigue which a person experiences on such long shifts .
Shifts can also be very irregular , as in retail , but are still full-time if  the जरूरी क्रमांक of घंटों is  reached .
There are some situations where a person who needs full-time work is dropped to  part-time , जिससे  is sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker .
Seahorse is the title given  to 54 प्रजाति of  marine fish in the genus Hippocampus .
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the Ancient Greek hippos meaning ``  घोड़ा '' और kampos अर्थ  `` sea monster '' .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by  the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii  of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution of certain substances  is regulated  .
The Act also  परोसा as the नेशनल  implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs .
The  विधान निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications )  , with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes  अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000 , जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate  in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
माया  numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal ( base - twenty ) numeral system used by the  pre-columbian माया सभ्यता  .
The numerals are made up of three symbols ;  शून्य ( शेल आकार ) , एक ( a  dot ) and five ( a bar ) .
For example , thirteen is written as three dots in a horizontal  पंक्ति ऊपर दो आड़ा लाइनों stacked ऊपर प्रत्येक अन्य  .
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27 , 1908 – January 22 , 1973 ) , often referred to as LBJ , was the 36th President of the United  राज्य ( 1963–1969 ) , a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके सेवा as the  37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only four people who served in all four elected federal offices of the United States : Representative , Senator , Vice  अध्यक्ष , और अध्यक्ष  .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a United States  प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961 ,  including six years as United States Senate Majority Leader , two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960 , Johnson was asked  by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये the 1960 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव  .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John  F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22 , 1963 , समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद  and was elected President in his own right , winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President , he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld civil rights , public broadcasting ,  medicare , medicaid , पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा , सहायता to शिक्षा ,  and his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson was  प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार  , '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation .
Meanwhile ,  जॉनसन escalated अमरीकी भागीदारी in the वियतनाम  War , from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968 , as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar movement based especially on  विश्वविद्यालयों campuses  in the U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965 , and  अपराधों दरों soared , as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  raised demands for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions , and after Johnson did  poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर  primary , he ended his bid for reelection .
रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड  Nixon was elected to succeed him .
Historians argue  कि जॉनसन 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित  the peak of modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era .
Johnson is ranked favorably by some historians  क्युकी of उसके घरेलू  policies .
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione )  is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन शामिल in the  female menstrual cycle , pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species .
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormones called progestogens , and is the  प्रमुख naturally occurring  human progestogen .
Big Bird is a protagonist of the children 's  टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ तिल गली  .
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969 , he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm  ) लम्बा उज्जवल primrose-yellow  bird .
He can roller skate , ice skate , dance , sing , write poetry , draw  और भी सवारी a unicycle  .
But despite this wide array of talents , he is prone to frequent misunderstandings , on one occasion even singing  the वर्णमाला as एक बिग long शब्द  ( from the song called `` ABC-DEF-GHI , '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ) , pondering what it could ever mean .
He lives in a large nest behind the 123 Sesame Street  brownstone और रै a टेडी भालू नामित रडार  .
Webtrends is  a निजी कम्पनी headquartered  in Portland , Oregon , United States .
It provides web , social ,  और मोबाईल analytics और अन्य तन्त्र  solutions related to marketing intelligence .
The  कम्पनी थी संस्थापित in 1993 और अभी serves  more than 10,000 large and small firms. < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
The Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 )  थी the दूसरी  major crusade launched from Europe .
The Second Crusade was started in response to the  पतन of the काउंटी of edessa the  previous year to the forces of Zengi .
The county had been founded during the  पहला crusade ( 1096–1099 )  by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098 .
While  it थी the पहला जेहादी  state to be founded , it was also the first to fall .
The Second Crusade was announced by Pope Eugene III , and was the first of the crusades to be led by  यूरोपीय किंग्स , namely लुई सात of फ़्रांस और कोनराड iii of जर्मनी , साथ सहायता इससे  a number of other European nobles .
The armies of the two  किंग्स marched separately  across Europe .
After crossing Byzantine territory into Anatolia ,  दोनो सेना यहूद separately  defeated by the Seljuq Turks .
The main Western Christian source , Odo of Deuil , and Syriac Christian sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress ,  विशेषकर in आनातोलिया जहाँ he is कथित to have deliberately  ordered Turks to attack them .
Louis and Conrad and  the remnants of उनके सेना पहुँचे  Jerusalem and , in 1148 , participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus .
The crusade in the east was a  विफलता लिये the  crusaders and a great victory for the Muslims .
It would ultimately have a key influence on the  पतन of जेरूसलम और दे वृद्धि  to the Third Crusade at the end of the 12th century .
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a combined  फ़ोर्स of 13,000 फ्लेमिश , frisian , नॉर्मन , अंग्रेज़ी  , Scottish , and German crusaders in 1147 .
Travelling from England , by ship , to the Holy  जमीन , the फौज रोका  and helped the smaller ( 7,000 ) Portuguese army in the capture of Lisbon , expelling its Moorish occupants .
Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. ( ) ,  ब्रांडेड as walmart , is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय खुदरा  corporation that runs chains of large discount department stores and warehouse stores .
The company is the world 's third largest public corporation , according to the Fortune Global 500 list in 2012 , the biggest  निजी नियोक्ता in the संसार साथ over  two million employees , and is the largest retailer in the world .
Walmart remains a family-owned business , as the company is  नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार , जो  own a 48 percent stake in Walmart .
It is also one of  the संसार  's most valuable companies .
The company  थी संस्थापित by sam वाल्टन  in 1962 , incorporated on October 31 , 1969 , and publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972 .
It  is  headquartered in Bentonville , Arkansas .
Walmart is  भी the largest  grocery retailer in the United States .
In 2009 , it  उत्पन्न 51 प्रतिशत  of its US $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from grocery business .
It  भी owns  and operates the Sam 's Club retail warehouses in North America .
By 1988 ,  wal-mart थी the सबसे लाभप्रद  retailer in the US , and by November 1990 , it outsold K-mart .
By  1991 it outsold सियर्स in खुदरा  , making it America 's largest retailer , a distinction it still holds .
walmart रै 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 देशों  , under 55 different names .
the कम्पनी operates अंतर्गत the walmart नाम in the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित the 50 राज्य और प्यूर्टो रीको .
It operates  in मैक्सिको as  Walmex , in the United Kingdom as Asda , in Japan as Seiyu , and in India as Best Price .
It has  wholly  owned operations in Argentina , Brazil , and Canada .
Walmart 's investments outside North America have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom , South America , and China  हैं अत्यधिक कामयाब , whereas ventures in जर्मनी और दक्षिण कोरियाई यहूद unsuccessful  .
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 April 1952 – 6 February 2011  ) , थी a उत्तरी आयरिश संगीतकार , सबसे widely  recognised as a singer and guitarist .
In a career dating back to the 1960s , Moore played with artists including Phil Lynott and Brian Downey during his teens , leading  उसे to सदस्यताएँ साथ the आयरिश bands स्किड पंक्ति और  Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions .
Moore shared the stage with such blues and rock luminaries as B.B . King , Albert King ,  कोलोसियम ii , जार्ज हैरिसन  and Greg Lake , as well as having a successful solo career .
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high profile musicians , including a cameo  रूप playing the सीसे गिटार सोलो on `` वो  's My Baby `` from Traveling Wilburys Vol . 3 .
An example of  रैक आरोहित  servers
A web hosting  सेवा is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग  service that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned  or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट , as खूब as providing अंतरजाल  connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can  भी provide आंकड़ा बीच स्पेस  and connectivity to the Internet for other servers located in their data center , called colocation , also known as Housing in Latin America or France .
The scope of web  होस्टिंग सेवाएं varies  greatly .
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting , where  फाइलें can be अपलोड  via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or  साथ minimal प्रसंस्करण  .
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer this service free  to सदस्य  .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting  इससे वैकल्पिक सेवा  providers .
Personal web site  होस्टिंग is  typically free , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web site  होस्टिंग प्रायः रै a उच्चतर व्यय  depending upon the size and type of the website .
सिंगल पेज होस्टिंग  is generally sufficient for personal web pages .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive  पैकेज कि provides डेटाबेस  support and application development platforms ( e.g . PHP , Java , Ruby on Rails , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for applications  जैसे forums और सामग्री प्रबन्धन  .
Also , Secure Sockets  परत ( एसएसएल  ) is typically used for e-commerce .
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for  मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट , as खूब  as other modules and service applications like e-mail .
Some hosts  specialize in निश्चित तन्त्र or सेवाएं  ( e.g . e-commerce ) , which are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure .
Obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare , `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women  's reproductive tracts और उनके children दौरान गर्भावस्था (  prenatal period ) , childbirth and the postnatal period .
Many  obstetricians हैं भी  gynecologists , meaning they perform in both specialties .
In the United States , these physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs  .
The Wright brothers , Orville ( August 19 , 1871 – January 30 , 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16 , 1867 – May 30 , 1912 ) , were two American brothers , inventors , and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and  भवन the संसार 's पहला कामयाब वायुयान और बनाना the पहला  controlled , powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight , on December 17 , 1903 .
From 1905 to 1907 , the brothers developed their flying machine  into the पहला  practical fixed-wing aircraft .
Although not the first to build and fly experimental aircraft , the Wright brothers were the first  to इफ़तेरा वायुयान नियंत्रण कि बना fixed-wing संचालित  flight possible .
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was  उनके आविष्कार of three-axis  control , which enabled the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively and to maintain its equilibrium .
This method became standard and remains standard on  fixed-wing वायुयान  of all kinds .
From the beginning of their aeronautical work , the Wright brothers focused on  विकासशील a विश्वसनीय विधि of  pilot control as the key to solving `` the flying problem '' .
This approach differed significantly from other  experimenters of the समय जो put अधिक  emphasis on developing powerful engines .
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel , the Wrights also collected more accurate data than any before , enabling them to design and build wings and  propellers कि यहूद अधिक कुशल  than any before .
Their first U.S. patent , 821,393 , did not claim invention of a flying machine , but  बल्कि , the आविष्कार of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic  control that manipulated a flying machine 's surfaces .
They gained the  mechanical कौशल अनिवार्य लिये उनके  success by working for years in their shop with printing presses , bicycles , motors , and other machinery .
Their work with bicycles in particular  बहकावे उनके विश्वास कि an अस्थिर  vehicle like a flying machine could be controlled and balanced with practice .
From 1900 until their first powered flights in late 1903 , they  conducted extensive glider परीक्षण कि भी  developed their skills as pilots .
उनके सायकिल दूकान कर्मचारी  Charlie Taylor became an important part of the team , building their first aircraft engine in close collaboration with the brothers .
The Wright brothers ' status as inventors of the  वायुयान रै महरूम विषय  to counter-claims by various parties .
Much controversy persists over  the अनेक स्पर्धा  claims of early aviators .
America 's Next Top Model , Cycle 12 is the  बारहवीं साईकिल of अमेरिका 's अगला शीर्ष मॉडल और the  sixth season to air on The CW network .
It premiered on  कूच  4 , 2009 .
The cycle 's catch phrase is  `` मिलेंगी in the  Fold . ''
The cycle 's promotional song  is महिला गागा 's `` the  Fame '' .
The prizes for  इस साईकिल  are:
A modeling contract with  elite मॉडल प्रबन्धन  .
A fashion spread  और कवर  in Seventeen .
A 100,000 contract  साथ covergirl  cosmetics .
The first half of the cycle took place in New  यॉर्क नगर , चलती the  show back from Los Angeles last season .
The international  गंतव्य लिये इस साईकिल is são पाउलो  , Brazil , the series first visit to South America .
the क्रमांक of लड़कियों थी घटाया to  13 , the first time since Cycle 9 , after being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles .
This was the last time Paulina Porizkova participated  as न्यायधीश  .
The winner was 20-year-old Teyona  एंडरसन इससे woodstown , नई जर्सी .
This season  averaged 4.35 लाख  viewers per episode .
Exxon Mobil Corporation ,  or exxonmobil , is an अमरीकी  multinational oil and gas corporation headquartered in Irving , Texas , United States .
It is a direct descendant of John D.  rockefeller 's मानक आयल कम्पनी , और  was formed on November 30 , 1999 , by the merger of Exxon and Mobil .
It is affiliated with  इम्पीरियल आयल जिससे operates  in Canada .
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013 , became the  largest सरेआम traded कम्पनी by मार्केट capitalization  in the world .
The company is  क्रमित # 5  globally in Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013 .
exxon mobil 's reserves यहूद 72 अरब  oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and , at then ( 2007 ) rates of production , are expected to last over 14 years .
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily refining capacity of , Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the world , a title that was also associated with Standard Oil since its  incorporation  in 1870 .
ExxonMobil  is the largest of the संसार 's supermajors  with daily production of 3.921 million BOE ( barrels of oil equivalent ) .
In 2008 , this was  लगभग 3 % of  world production , which is less than several of the largest state-owned petroleum companies .
When ranked by oil  और गैस reserves  it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total .
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into one of the planet’s most hated corporations , able to  determine अमरीकी विदेशी नीति और the भाग्य of संपूर्ण राष्ट्र ''  .
In terms of its environmental record ,  exxonmobil increasingly drills in terrains  leased to them by dictatorships , such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea .
Lee Raymond , the  corporation’s मुख्य कार्यपालिका जबतक 2005 , थी  `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked government interference at any level '' .
The company was widely criticized for its slow response to cleaning its  1989 valdez आयल spill in अलास्का  .
This article is about the  ग्लोब थिएटर  of Shakespeare .
For the modern reconstruction in  लंदन , देखिए शेक्सपियर  's Globe .
For other uses , see Globe  थिएटर (  disambiguation ) .
The Globe Theatre was a theatre in  लंदन संबद्ध साथ विलियम शेक्सपियर  .
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company , the Lord Chamberlain 's Men , on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son , Nicholas Brend and  पोता सर मैथ्यू  Brend , and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613 .
A  दूसरी ग्लोब  Theatre was built on the same site by June 1614 and closed in 1642 .
A  आधुनिक पुनर्निर्माण of the ग्लोब  , named `` Shakespeare 's Globe `` , opened in 1997 approximately from the site of the original theatre .
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced and directed  by फ़्रैंक capra , आधारित on the छोटी  story `` The Greatest Gift `` , which Philip Van Doren Stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945 .
The film is considered one of the most loved films in American cinema and has become traditional viewing during the Christmas season ,  alongside लोकप्रिय क्लासिक ऐसे as चार्ल्स डिकेंस  ' A Christmas Carol .
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey , a man who has given  up उसके सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता अन्य और जिनकी निकट आत्महत्या on क्रिसमस संध्या brings परिचय  the intervention of his guardian angel , Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers ) .
Clarence shows George all the lives he has touched and how different  जीवन in उसके जातियाँ of bedford जलप्रपात होता  be had he never been born .
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff competition at the time of its release , the film has come to be regarded as a classic  और is a स्टेपल of क्रिसमस टेलीविज़न around the संसार  .
Theatrically , the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 million , approximately twice the  उत्पादन लागत , a फिगर it never  came close to achieving in its initial release .
An appraisal in 2006 reported : ``  हालांकि it थी नहीं the पूरा बक्सा दफ्तर विफलता कि आज everyone मानता ... it थी initially  a major disappointment and confirmed , at least to the studios , that Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see , money-making events they once were . ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the American Film Institute as one of the 100 best American films ever made , placing number  11 on इसके आरंभिक 1998  greatest movie list , and would also place number one on its list of the most inspirational American films of all time .
Data  गोदाम  Overview
In computing  , a आंकड़ा गोदाम  or enterprise data warehouse ( DW , DWH , or EDW ) is a database used for reporting and data analysis .
It is  a सेंट्रल repository  of data which is created by integrating data from one or more disparate sources .
Data warehouses store current as well as historical data and are used for creating trending  रिपोर्ट्स लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन रिपोर्टिंग ऐसे as सालाना और त्रैमासिक  comparisons .
The data stored in the warehouse are  अपलोड इससे the operational प्रणालियों  ( such as marketing , sales etc. , shown in the figure to the right ) .
The data may pass through an  operational आंकड़ा स्टोर  for additional operations before they are used in the DW for reporting .
The  ठेठ etl -आधारd आंकड़ा गोदाम उपयोग  staging , data integration , and access layers to house its key functions .
The staging  परत or स्टेजिंग डेटाबेस  stores raw data extracted from each of the disparate source data systems .
The integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by  transforming the आंकड़ा इससे the स्टेजिंग  layer often storing this transformed data in an operational data store ( ODS ) database .
The integrated data are then moved  to yet another डेटाबेस , प्रायः पुकारा the आंकड़ा गोदाम डेटाबेस , जहाँ  the data is arranged into hierarchical groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate facts .
The combination of facts and  आयाम is sometimes पुकारा a स्टार  schema .
The access layer helps  उपयोक्ता retrieve  data .
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated  आंकड़ा सोर्स प्रणालियों करता नहीं आवश्यकता  ETL , staging databases , or operational data store databases .
The integrated data source  प्रणालियों may be माना to be a भाग of a वितरित  operational data store layer .
आंकड़ा संघ विधि or आंकड़ा आभासीकरण विधि may be प्रयुक्त  to access the distributed integrated source data systems to consolidate and aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables .
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse , the integrated source data systems and the data warehouse  are  all integrated since there is no transformation of dimensional or reference data .
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the drill down from the  कुल आंकड़ा of the आंकड़ा गोदाम to the transactional आंकड़ा  of the integrated source data systems .
Data warehouses can  be subdivided  into data marts .
Data marts  स्टोर subsets of  data from a warehouse .
This definition of the data warehouse focuses  on आंकड़ा भंडार  .
