The main source  of the आंकड़ा is cleaned ,  transformed , cataloged and made available for use by managers and other business professionals for data mining , online analytical processing , market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ) .
However , the means to retrieve and analyze  आंकड़ा , to निकालें , रूपांतरण और  load data , and to manage the data dictionary are also considered essential components of a data warehousing system .
Many  सन्दर्भ to आंकड़ा warehousing  use this broader context .
Thus , an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence  टूल्स , टूल्स to निकालें , रूपांतरण और लोड आंकड़ा into the  repository , and tools to manage and retrieve metadata .
Portland stone  पाषाण on the आइल  of Portland , England
An abandoned construction aggregate  पाषाण निकट  Adelaide , South Australia
A quarry is a type of open-pit mine from  जिससे चट्टान or खनिज हैं  extracted .
Quarries are generally used for  extracting भवन सामग्री , ऐसे as  dimension stone , construction aggregate , riprap , sand , and gravel .
They are often collocated with concrete and asphalt  पौधे due to the आवश्यकता लिये विशाल amounts of कुल  in those materials .
Open mines that produce minerals are typically referred to as  खोलें गड्ढे खानों  .
The word quarry can include underground quarrying for stone ,  ऐसे as नहाना  stone .
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to Mormonism , the principal branch of the Latter Day Saint movement of  restorationist christianity  , which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s .
बाद स्मिथ 's मौत  in 1844 the Mormons followed Brigham Young to what would become the Utah Territory .
Today Mormons are understood to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ  of latter-day संतो ( lds  Church ) .
Some Mormons are also either independent or  non-practicing .
the बीच of mormon सांस्कृतिक influence is in  Utah , and North America has more Mormons than any other continent , though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States .
Mormons have developed a strong sense of  communality कि तना इससे उनके  doctrine and history .
दौरान the 19th सदी mormon converts tended to  gather to a central geographic location , and between 1852 and 1890 a minority of Mormons openly practiced plural marriage , a form of religious polygamy .
Mormons dedicate large amounts  of समय और संसाधन to सेवारत in उनके गिरिजाघर  , and many young Mormons choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission .
Mormons have a health code that eschews   alcoholic beverages , tobacco , coffee , tea , and other addictive substances .
They tend to be very family-oriented , and have strong connections across generations and with extended  परिवार , परावर्तक of उनके विश्वास  that families can be sealed together beyond death and throughout eternity .
Mormons also have a strict law  of शुद्धता , requiring abstention  from sexual relations outside of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage .
Mormons  self-identify as ईसाई  , though some of their beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity .
Mormons believe in the Bible , as well  as अन्य किताबे  of scripture , such as the Book of Mormon .
They have a unique  दृश्य of cosmology , और मानना कि  all people are spirit-children of God .
mormons मानना कि returning  to God requires following the example of Jesus Christ , and accepting his atonement through ordinances such as baptism .
They believe that  मसीह 's गिरिजाघर थी लौटी  through Joseph Smith , and is guided by living prophets and apostles .
सेंट्रल to mormon आस्था is the विश्वास कि  God speaks to his children and answers their prayers .
In financial accounting , assets are  आर्थिक  resources .
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable of being owned or controlled to produce value and that is  आयोजित to have धनात्मक आर्थिक  value is considered an asset .
Simply stated , assets  represent मान of स्वामित्व कि can be परिवर्तित into नकदी  ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ) .
The  संतुलन चादर of  a firm records the monetaryJ .
G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest  जेब cpa '' , wiley  , 2005.There are different methods of assessing the monetary value of the assets recorded on the Balance Sheet .
In some cases , the  ऐतिहासिक लागत is प्रयुक्त ; ऐसे  that the value of the asset when it was bought in the past is used as the monetary value .
In other instances , the present fair market value of the asset  is प्रयुक्त to determine the मान  shown on the balance sheet .
value  of the एसेट  owned by the firm .
It is money and  अन्य valuables belonging  to an individual or business .
Two major asset classes are tangible  एसेट और intangible एसेट  .
Tangible  एसेट contain विभिन्न subclasses  , including current assets and fixed assets.J .
Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 Current assets include inventory , while fixed assets include such items as buildings and  उपकरण .J . downes , j.e . गुडमैन , `` शब्दकोष  of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005 .
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and rights that have a value to the firm because they give the firm some kind of advantage in  the मार्केट प्लेस  .
Examples of intangible assets are  साख , copyrights ,  trademarks , patents and computer programs , and financial assets , including such items as accounts receivable , bonds and stocks .
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically  excitable कोशिका कि प्रक्रियाओं और transmits सूचना  through electrical and chemical signals .
A chemical  सिग्नल occurs via  a synapse , a specialized connection with other cells .
Neurons connect to  प्रत्येक अन्य to रूप neural  networks .
Neurons  हैं the कोर components  of the nervous system , which includes the brain , spinal cord , and peripheral ganglia .
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch , sound , light  और numerous अन्य stimuli affecting  cells of the sensory organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain .
Motor neurons  प्राप्त सिग्नल इससे the दिमाग  and spinal cord , cause muscle contractions , and affect glands .
Interneurons connect neurons  to अन्य न्यूरॉन्स भीतर the  same region of the brain or spinal cord .
A typical  न्यूरॉन possesses a  cell body ( often called the soma ) , dendrites , and an axon .
dendrites हैं पतला structures कि उठता इससे the कोशिका देह ,  often extending for hundreds of micrometres and branching multiple times , giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree '' .
An axon is  a खास सेल्यूलर एक्सटेंशन कि arises इससे  the cell body at a site called the axon hillock and travels for a distance , as far as 1 meter in humans or even more in other species .
The cell body of a neuron frequently gives rise to multiple dendrites , but never  to अधिक than एक  axon , although the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates .
At the  बहुमत of synapses , सिग्नल हैं भेजा  from the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another .
There  हैं , however , अनेक अपवाद to ये नियम : न्यूरॉन्स  that lack dendrites , neurons that have no axon , synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite , etc .
All neurons are  electrically excitable , maintaining वोल्टेज अनुपात आरपार उनके झिल्लियों by अर्थात् of metabolically  driven ion pumps , which combine with ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium , potassium , chloride , and calcium .
Changes in the  cross-membrane वोल्टेज can alter the  function of voltage-dependent ion channels .
If the voltage changes by a large enough amount , an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an action potential is generated , which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon , and  activates सिनेप्टिक कनेक्शन्स साथ  other cells when it arrives .
न्यूरॉन्स  do not undergo cell division .
In most cases , neurons are  उत्पन्न by खास प्रकार of स्टेम  cells .
Astrocytes , a type of glial cell , have also been observed to turn into neurons by virtue of  the स्टेम  cell characteristic pluripotency .
In humans , neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in two brain areas , the hippocampus and olfactory bulb , there is strong evidence for  पीढी of substantial संख्याएँ of नई न्यूरॉन्स  .
Super Bowl XLIII was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Pittsburgh Steelers and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion  एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स to decide the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) चैंपियन  for the 2008 season .
The Steelers  पराजित  the Cardinals by the score of 27–23 .
The game was played on February 1 , 2009 , at Raymond James  स्टेडियम in tampa , फ्लोरिडा  .
With this win , the Steelers became the first  टोली to जीत छह  Super Bowls .
Pittsburgh , who finished the regular season with  a 12–4 रिकार्ड , भी जीती  their second Super Bowl in four years after winning Super Bowl XL at the end of the 2005 season .
The Cardinals entered the game seeking their first NFL title since 1947 ,  the longest चैंपियनशिप सूखा in the  league .
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season , compiling a 9–7 record , and  the playoffs साथ the सहायता of सिर कोच  Ken Whisenhunt , who was the Steelers ' offensive coordinator in Super Bowl XL , and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner , who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team , St. Louis Rams .
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime lead , aided by linebacker James Harrison  's सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड 100-yard interception  return for a touchdown .
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the fourth quarter , Arizona scored 16  अनुत्तरित अंक , सहित चौड़ी receiver लैरी fitzgerald  's 64-yard touchdown reception , to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game .
But  the स्टीलर्स marched 78 गज to स्कोर on चौड़ी  receiver Santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left .
Holmes , who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a  touchdown , सहित चार receptions लिये 73  yards on that final game-winning drive , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the award , and also was  the तीसरा पिट्सबर्ग receiver  to win the award , following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward .
Despite the global financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that are normally held before the game , the NBC television network broadcast attracted an  औसत u.S. दर्शक of 98.7 लाख दर्शक , बनाना it the सबसे देखी सुपर कटोरी in  history to that point .
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum , showing various  गुण आरपार the  range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the  दायरा of सब संभावित  frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning , and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or  अवशोषित by कि  particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for  आधुनिक  radio communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long  wavelengths is the आकार of the ब्रह्मांड itself , जबकि  it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length , although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions , as ways to  पढ़ाई और characterize पदार्थ  .
In addition , radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications and  निर्माण ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण  for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
Marchantia , a  liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to all embryophytes ( land plants ) that do not have true vascular tissue and are  इसलिए पुकारा ' non-vascular पौधे  ' .
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for  the हस्तांतरण  of water ; however since these do not contain lignin , they are not considered to be true vascular tissue .
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic group ; however the name is convenient and remains in use as a collective term for  mosses , hornworts , और liverworts  .
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia  और sporangia ) , लकिन वे उपज neither  flowers nor seeds , reproducing via spores .
The term bryophyte  आता इससे  Greek βρύον , bryon , `` tree-moss , oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant '' .
A bank is a financial institution and a financial intermediary that  स्वीकृत जमा और चैनल्स those जमा into lending  activities , either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets .
A bank is the connection between  ग्राहक कि have पूंजी deficits और ग्राहक  with capital surpluses .
Due to their influence within a financial system and an economy , banks are generally  अत्यधिक  regulated in most countries .
Most banks operate under a system known as fractional reserve banking where they hold only a small reserve of the  निधि deposited और lend आउट the  rest for profit .
They are generally subject to minimum capital requirements which are based on an international   set of capital standards , known as the Basel Accords .
The oldest bank still in  अस्तित्व is मोंटे देई paschi di सियेना  , headquartered in Siena , Italy , which has been operating continuously since 1472 .
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 )  और sveriges riksbank of  Sweden ( 1668 ) .
Banking in its modern  भाव विकसित in समृद्ध शहरों of  Renaissance Italy , such as Florence , Venice and Genoa .
In the history of banking , a number of banking  dynasties —among उन्हें notably medici  , Fugger , Welser , Berenberg , Baring and Rothschild —have played a central role over many centuries .
the एक्सबॉक्स is a  video game console manufactured by Microsoft .
It was released on November 15 , 2001 in North America , February 22 , 2002 in  जापानी , और कूच 14 , 2002 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और यूरोपीय .
It was Microsoft 's first foray into the  गेमिंग कंसोल मार्केट  .
As part of the sixth-generation of gaming , the Xbox competed with  सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2 , sega 's dreamcast ( जिससे रोका  American sales before the Xbox went on sale ) , and Nintendo 's GameCube .
The Xbox was the first console offered by an  अमरीकी  company after the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996 .
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in November 2002 allowed players to play  खेल ऑनलाइन साथ a ब्रॉडबैंड कनेक्शन  .
It first competed with Dreamcast 's  ऑनलाइन सेवा लकिन बाद primarily  competed with PlayStation 2 's online service .
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription , as well as broadband-only connection which was not completely adopted yet , Xbox Live was a success due to better servers , features  ऐसे as a दोस्त सूची , और पड़ाव शीर्षक जैसे हेलो 2 released in नवम्बर 2004  , which is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years .
Xbox 's successor , the Xbox 360  , थी शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर  2005 .
The Xbox was  discontinued  in late 2005 in Japan where sales were poor .
It was  discontinued in लेट 2006  in Europe and early 2007 in North America .
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's Project 8 released in November 2006 , and the last game in  उत्तर अमेरिका थी मैडेन एनएफएल 09 released  in August 2008 .
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on March 2 , 2009 , stating that any in-warranty  मरम्मत अभी needed होगा नहीं be undertaken  .
Xbox access to Xbox  सजीव थी रोका  on April 15 , 2010 .
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ) , commonly referred to as the Gospel of  जॉन or बस जॉन और प्रायः referred  to in New Testament scholarship as the Fourth Gospel , is an account of the public ministry of Jesus .
It begins with the witness and affirmation by John the  बैपटिस्ट और concludes साथ the मौत , दफ़न , क़यामत  , and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus .
This account is fourth of the canonical gospels , after the synoptics Matthew , Mark and  ल्यूक  .
states that the book derives from the testimony  of the ' शिष्य  whom Jesus loved . '
Along with Peter , the unnamed disciple is especially close to Jesus , and early-church tradition identified  उसे as जॉन the apostle  , one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles .
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such that commentators treat the four books together , yet , according to most modern  विद्वानों , जॉन थी नहीं the लेखक of  any of these books .
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more  और अधिक रै लगाई  John within a first-century Jewish context .
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to  ट्रेस the विकास  of the tradition from which the gospel arose .
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the  church-and-synagogue बहस at the  time when the Gospel was written .
It is notable that , in the gospel , the community still appears to define itself primarily against  judaism , बल्कि than as भाग of a wider ईसाई  church .
Though Christianity started as a  गति भीतर judaism , धीरे  Christians and Jews became bitterly opposed .
John  presents a `` उच्चतर '' christology  than the synoptics , meaning that it describes Jesus as the incarnation of the divine Logos through whom all things were made , as the object of veneration , and more explicitly as God incarnate .
Only in John  करता यीशु  talk at length about himself and his divine role , often shared with the disciples only .
Against  the synoptics , जॉन focuses largely on अलग  miracles ( including resurrecting Lazarus ) , given as signs meant to engender faith .
Synoptic elements such as parables  और exorcisms हैं नहीं मिला  in John .
It  presents a एहसास eschatology  in which salvation is already present for the believer .
The Plagues of Egypt ( ) , also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues , were ten calamities that , according to the biblical Book of  exodus , इसराईल 's परमेश्वर , yahweh , inflicted upon मिश्र to राजी  Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery .
Pharaoh capitulated after the tenth plague , triggering the Exodus of  the यहूदी लोगों  .
The plagues  यहूद designed to कंट्रास्ट  the power of Yahweh with the impotence of Egypt 's various gods .
Some commentators have associated several  of the plagues साथ निर्णय on  specific gods associated with the Nile , fertility and natural phenomena .
The plagues of Egypt are  भी उल्लेखित in the कुरान  ( 7,133–136 ) .
According to the Book of  exodus , परमेश्वर proclaims  that all the gods of Egypt will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the  प्लेग of hail और आग  ( 1823 ) .
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game in which players assume  the भूमिकाएँ of वर्ण in a fictional सेटिंग  .
Players take responsibility  लिये एक्टिंग आउट ये भूमिकाएँ भीतर  a narrative , either through literal acting or through a process of structured decision-making or character development .
Actions taken within many games succeed or fail  according to a औपचारिक  system of rules and guidelines .
There are several forms  of आरपीजी  .
The original form , sometimes called the tabletop RPG , is conducted through discussion , whereas in live action  role-playing खेल ( larp ) खिलाड़ी physically perform उनके  characters ' actions .
In both of these forms , an arranger called a game master ( GM ) usually decides on the  नियम और सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त  and acts as referee , while each of the other players plays the role of a single character .
Several varieties of RPG also exist in electronic media , such as multi-player  text-based muds और उनके graphics-based successors , massively  multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ) .
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video games in which players control a character or team who  undertake quests , और may शामिल सामर्थ्य कि अग्रिम using सांख्यिकीय  mechanics .
These games often share settings and rules with tabletop  rpgs , लकिन emphasize अक्षर  advancement more than collaborative storytelling .
Despite this  किस्में of  forms , some game forms such as trading card games and wargames that are related to role-playing games may not be included .
Role-playing activity may sometimes be present in such games , but  it is नहीं the प्राथमिक  focus .
The term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and  exercises प्रयुक्त in शिक्षण  , training , and academic research .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a  सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर ''  ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of  गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories  .
विदेशी शक्तियां  did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the  confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished  , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed  expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories  .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven  cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the  आवक republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would  नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject  काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate  शक्तियां जब्त numerous  federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a  सुलह , और दोनो  sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none  किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य  of America .
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब confederate  forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to  provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन  , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval  नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी  economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading  अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation , which made  समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध लक्ष्य .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy  , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ  at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate incursion  north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to  ulysses S. ग्रान्ट  command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture  अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate  infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to  लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland  Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at  appomattox अदालत हाउस  on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of  the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the  टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और mass-produced  weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines ,  shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest  युद्ध  in American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the  मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी  males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
The definition of the world 's busiest  विमानक्षेत्र रै महरूम निर्दिष्ट  by the Airports Council International in Geneva , Switzerland .
The ACI defines and  उपायों the following तीन  types of airport traffic:
Passenger  ट्रैफ़िक : कुल यात्री  emplaned and deplaned , passengers in transit counted once
Cargo traffic : loaded  और मोड भाड़ा और  mail in metric tonnes
Traffic  आंदोलनों : अवतरण  and take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that  began on 28  July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its  occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध  II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great  शक्तियां , जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances  : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the  युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और  the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million  सैन्य कर्मियों , सहित 60 लाख europeans , यहूद  mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More  than 9 लाख combatants यहूद मारे , largely  because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various  राजनैतिक परिवर्तन , ऐसे as revolutions  in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the  विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां  of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28  जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो  triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the  पिछला दशकों यहूद  invoked .
Within weeks , the major  शक्तियां यहूद at  war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as  तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण  of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised ,  the  Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench  लकीर कि बदला छोटी जबतक 1917  .
on the पूर्वी सामने , the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध  the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In  नवम्बर the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined  the war , opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria  गई to युद्ध in  1915 and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a  subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर  brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the  पश्चिमी सामने , the allies  drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to an  armistice on 11  November 1918 .
The war  ended in विजय  for the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the  बैटल fronts , as the भागीदार  tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the  युद्ध , चार प्रमुख  imperial powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount  of territory , जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled  entirely .
The map of central Europe  थी redrawn into अनेक  smaller states .
The League of  राष्ट्र थी formed  in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and  समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be  factors contributing to World War II .
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill , the BP oil disaster , the Gulf of Mexico oil spill , and the Macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo Prospect , considered the  largest आकस्मिक समुद्री आयल spill in the इतिहास of the  petroleum industry , estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill .
Following the explosion and sinking of the Deepwater Horizon oil rig , which claimed 11  जीवनदान , a sea-floor आयल gusher flowed unabated लिये 87 दिनों , जबतक  it was capped on 15 July 2010 .
The total  निर्वहन is अनुमानित  at .
A massive response ensued  to protect समुद्रतट , वेटलैंड्स और मुहानों  from the spreading oil utilizing skimmer ships , floating booms , controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant .
After several failed efforts to contain the  प्रवाह , the खूब थी घोषित  sealed on 19 September 2010 .
Some  रिपोर्ट्स indicate the  well site continues to leak .
Due to the months-long spill , along with adverse effects from the response and cleanup activities , extensive damage to marine and wildlife habitats , fishing and tourism industries , and human health problems have  जारी through 2013.three  years after the spill , tar balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast .
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the  विस्फोट और record-setting  spill .
Notably , the U.S.  सरकारी 's सितंबर 2011 रपट pointed to defective सीमेंट  on the well , faulting mostly BP , but also well operator Transocean and contractor Halliburton .
Earlier in 2011 , a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of  cost-cutting निर्णय और an अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा प्रणाली , लकिन भी concluded कि the  spill resulted from `` systemic '' root causes and `` absent significant reform in both industry practices and government policies , might well recur '' .
In November 2012 , BP and the United States Department of Justice settled federal criminal charges with BP pleading guilty to 11 counts of manslaughter , two  misdemeanors , और a felony गिनती of lying  to Congress .
BP also agreed to four years of government monitoring of its safety  practices और आचार , और  the Environmental Protection Agency announced that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government .
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines and other payments but further legal proceedings not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to  determine payouts और जुर्माना  under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment .
As of February 2013 , criminal and civil settlements and payments to a trust fund had cost the  कम्पनी $ 42.2  billion .
`` Where the  गलियों  Have No Name '' is a song by rock band U2 .
It is the opening  track इससे उनके 1987 एल्बम the जोशुआ  Tree and was released as the album 's third single in August 1987 .
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a delay effect , played during the song 's introduction  और again at the समाप्त  .
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is  संभावित to पहचानो a व्यक्ति 's धर्म और आय आधारित on the गली  on which they lived , particularly in Belfast .
During the band 's difficulties recording the song , producer Brian Eno considered erasing the song 's  टेपों to have उन्हें प्रारंभ  from scratch .
``  जहाँ the गलियों have no नाम  '' was praised by critics and became a commercial success , peaking at number thirteen in the US , number fourteen in Canada , number ten in the Netherlands , and number four in the United Kingdom .
The song has become one of the band 's  सबसे लोकप्रिय  songs and has remained a staple of their live act since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour .
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for  the फिल्मांकन of  its music video , which won a Grammy Award for Best Performance Music Video .Recently the song has been used by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9 , 1956 ) is an  अमरीकी कर्ता , निर्माता , लेखक , और निदेशक  .
Hanks is known for his roles in Apollo 13 , Big , That  बात तुम  Do !
, The Green Mile , You 've Got Mail ,  sleepless in सिएटल , चार्ली विल्सन 's युद्ध , कैच me if तुम can  , Forrest Gump , Cast Away , A League of Their Own , The Da Vinci Code , Angels & Demons , as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series , The Polar Express , and The Simpsons Movie .
He has earned and  महरूम मनोनीत लिये numerous पुरस्कार  during his career , including winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Philadelphia and a Golden Globe , an Academy Award , a Screen Actors Guild Award , and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump , and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004 .
Hanks is also known for his collaboration with film director Steven Spielberg on Saving Private Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers , which  शुभारम्भ हैंक्स भी as a कामयाब निदेशक  , producer and writer .
As of 2012 , Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at the United States box office alone ,  और over $ 8.5 अरब विश्वव्यापी बनाना उसे the उच्चतम  all-time box office star .
The Cape is an  अमरीकी सुपरहीरो  drama series .
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement beginning  साथ a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड  on Sunday , January 9 , 2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time .
An  encore निभाई on सोमवार , जनवरी  10 , with follow-up episodes continuing on Monday evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17 .
NBC subsequently cut the total number of episodes to be aired from 13  to 10 as a परिणाम of कम दरजा  .
On March 2 , 2011  , एनबीसी घोषित कि the  series finale would only be aired on the network 's website .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ) , officially designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known of the  short-period धूमकेतुओं और is दृश्य इससे धरती प्रत्येक 75–76 सालो  .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from  धरती , और यूँ  the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may  be उज्जवल और  more spectacular , but will appear only once in thousands of years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been observed and recorded by  खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि  at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by  चाइनीज , babylonian , और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय  chroniclers , but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time .
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond  हैली , बाद जिसको it is अभी नामित  .
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar  प्रणाली in 1986  and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition ,  हैली became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft , providing  the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred  whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल ''  model , which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is  अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह is largely  composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
The following is a  सूची of the  most populous incorporated places of the United States of America .
As  पारिभाषित by the  United States Census Bureau , an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few exceptional Census  designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं भी शामिल in  the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places .
संचित city-counties represent a  distinct type of government that includes the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित city-counties  , however , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties  कि हैं नहीं a भाग of another incorporated  place .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities  भीतर उनके पारिभाषित हद , जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities  or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S.  महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations .
The Mayflower was the  जलयान कि in 1620 transported  102 English Pilgrims , including a core group of Separatists , to New England .
Their story is one of travail and survival in  a हर्ष  New World environment .
a नई जीलैंड आगे ( in श्वेत  ) takes a shot on goal against Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup .
Forwards , also known as strikers , are the players on a team in association  फ़ुटबॉल जो खेल निकटतम to  the opposing team 's goal , and are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals .
This very advanced  स्थिति और इसके सीमित रक्षात्मक  responsibilities mean forwards normally score more goals than other players .
This position requires intelligence , speed , and power , both of  निष्पादन और of विचार ,  to perform the role well .
Modern  टोली formations  usually include one to three forwards ; two is the most common .
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an advanced position ( the centre forward ) , and another attacking  आगे जो plays somewhat deeper और assists in बनाना लक्ष्य as खूब as  scoring ( the second striker ) .
It should be noted that inside forwards develop from  attacking midfield स्थितियाँ  and hence are naturally midfielders .
Barcelona FC star Lionel Messi is a  ठेठ attacking मिडफील्डर  seen as a forward due to his shot accuracy .
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship  उपलब्धियाँ to same-sex युगल  , and to certain opposite-sex couples in which at least one party is at least 18 years of age .
It affords the couple `` the same rights , protections , and benefits , and  ... the वही जिम्मेदारियों , दायित्वों , और कर्तव्य अंतर्गत  law ... '' as married spouses .
Enacted in 1999 , the domestic  साझेदारी रजिस्ट्री थी  the first of its kind in the United States created by a legislature without court intervention .
Initially , domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally just hospital-visitation  अधिकारों और the सही to be claimed as a  next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner .
The legislature has since expanded the  पैमाना of कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू partnerships to शामिल सब  of the rights and responsibilities common to marriage .
As such , California domestic partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil  संघ offered  in several other states .
Although the program enjoys broad support in California , it  रै महरूम the सोर्स of कुछ  controversy .
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have  challenged the विस्तार  of domestic partnerships in court .
Conversely , advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything less than full marriage rights extended to same-sex  साझेदार is analogous to the `` पृथक लकिन बराबर '' जातिगत  laws of the Jim Crow era .
Mark A.  जैक्सन ( born अप्रैल 1 ,  1965 ) is an American basketball coach , and former player who is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA .
A point guard from St. John 's University , he played for the New York  knicks , इंडियाना पेसर्स , लॉस एंजिल्स  Clippers , Denver Nuggets , Toronto Raptors , Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004 .
Jackson has also  worked as a कमेंटेटर लिये ईएसपीएन और  ABC alongside his former coach Jeff Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen .
He was previously an NBA analyst for  the यस संजाल 's नई जर्सी  Nets games .
South Africa has eleven official languages :  अफ्रीकी , अंग्रेज़ी , ndebele , उत्तरी  Sotho , Sotho , Swazi , Tswana , Tsonga , Venda , Xhosa and Zulu .
Fewer than two  प्रतिशत of दक्षिण africans बोलो a  first language other than an official one .
Most South Africans can speak  अधिक than एक भाषा  .
Dutch and  अंग्रेज़ी यहूद the पहला  official languages of South Africa from 1910 to 1925 .
Afrikaans was added as a part  of डच  in 1925 .
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a republic in 1961 , and Dutch  थी dropped in 1983 , so between  1983 and 1994 , South Africa had two official languages : English and Afrikaans .
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu , isiXhosa ,  अफ्रीकी , sepedi ( referring to उत्तरी sotho ) , setswana , अंग्रेज़ी  , Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ) , Xitsonga , Siswati , Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ) .
In South Africa , Southern Ndebele is known simply as Ndebele , as  सबसे अध्यक्षों of उत्तरी ndebele सजीव  in Zimbabwe .
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho  as sesotho sa leboa , लकिन  the 1996 version referred to the language as Sepedi .
Different government departments and official bodies  उपयोग अलग  terms to denote Northern Sotho .
The main language of government is English even if South Africans often take pride in  using स्वदेशी भाषाएं लिये कोई purpose  .
Afrikaans also features prominently in commerce together with English as the languages with the highest  क्रमांक of धाराप्रवाह अध्यक्षों  are Afrikaans and English .
In terms of linguistic classification , the official languages include two  west-germanic भाषाएं ( अंग्रेज़ी और अफ्रीकी  ) and nine Bantu languages .
Four  of ये हैं nguni  languages ( Zulu , Xhosa , Swati and Ndebele ) and three are Sotho–Tswana languages ( Northern Sotho , Southern Sotho and Tswana ) .
Tsonga is a  tswa–ronga  language .
South African Sign Language is a distinct though incompletely emerged  नेशनल मानक  language which also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects .
Aluminium  नाइट्रेट is a नमक  of aluminium and nitric acid , existing normally as a crystalline hydrate , most commonly as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate , Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O .
The New York Jets are a professional football team headquartered in Florham Park , New Jersey  , representing the नई यॉर्क महानगर क्षेत्रफल  .
The team is a member of the Eastern Division of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल )  .
In a unique  व्यवस्था लिये the लीग , the jets  share MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford , New Jersey with the New York Giants .
The  मताधिकार is legally और  corporately registered as New York Jets , LLC .
The team  was founded in 1959  as the Titans of New York , an original member of the American Football League ; later , the franchise joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger .
the टोली  began to play in 1960 at the Polo Grounds .
अंतर्गत नई स्वामित्व , the वर्तमान नाम  was adopted in 1963 and the franchise was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984 .
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in Super Bowl  iii जहाँ वे पराजित the बाल्टीमोर कोल्टस  , becoming the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game .
Since 1968 , the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen times , and in the  afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार टाइम्स , सबसे recently  losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010 .
However , the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl , making them one of three NFL teams to win their lone Super Bowl appearance , along  साथ the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो और tampa  Bay Buccaneers .
The team 's training facility , Atlantic Health Jets Training Center ,  जिससे खोली  in 2008 , is located in Florham Park .
The team currently holds their  सालाना प्रशिक्षण शिविर सत्र on the कैम्पस of the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई  York at Cortland in Cortland , New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex .
psilocybe  semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms , also known as psychedelic mushrooms , are fungi that  contain psychoactive  indole alkaloids .
There are multiple colloquial  शर्तें लिये psilocybin मशरूम , the सबसे आम  being shrooms and magic mushrooms .
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe , Conocybe , Copelandia , Galerina ,  gerronema , gymnopilus , hypholoma , inocybe , mycena , panaeolus , pluteus  , and Psilocybe .
There are approximately 190 species  of psilocybin मशरूम  and most of them fall in the genus Psilocybe .
psilocybin मशरूम have  likely been used since prehistoric times and may have been depicted in rock art .
Many cultures have used these mushrooms in  धार्मिक संस्कार  .
In modern Western society they are used  recreationally लिये उनके साइकेडेलिक  effects .
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins School of Medicine conclude that when used properly , psilocybin acts as an  anti-depressant as  suggested by fMRI brain scans .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent , with the international  boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट , the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर , और the प्रशांत  Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest state in the  संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल , the 4th तनिक populous  and the least densely populated of the 50 United States .
लगभग  half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil , natural gas , and fishing  उद्योग ; it रै ये संसाधन  in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30 , 1867 ,  लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये  inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes  पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित (  or incorporated ) territory on May 11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska  '' ( аляска ) थी already introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल , जब it थी  used only for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq , meaning `` the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the `` great land  '' , an aleut शब्द निकला इससे  the same root .
The 101 French departments are divided into 342  arrondissements , जिससे may  be translated into English as districts .
The capital of an arrondissement/district is called  a subprefecture  .
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the department , that prefecture is the  पूंजी of the arrondissement  , acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture .
Arrondissements are further divided into  cantons और communes  .
The  योनि ( इससे लैटिन vāgīna , वस्तुतः  `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular tract which is a sex organ and has two main functions ; sexual intercourse and childbirth .
In humans , this passage leads from  the खोलने of the भग to the गर्भाशय (  womb ) , but the vaginal tract ends at the cervix .
Unlike men , who  have तभी एक genital  orifice , women have two , the urethra and the vagina .
The vaginal opening is much larger than the  urethral खोलने , और  both openings are protected by the labia .
The inner mould of the vagina has a foldy texture which can create  घर्षण लिये the  penis during intercourse .
दौरान arousal , the  vagina gets moist to facilitate the entrance of the penis .
The Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely  प्रयुक्त in अंग्रेज़ी  .
Colloquially , the word  योनि  is often used to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in general .
however , by इसके शब्दकोष  and anatomical definitions , vagina refers exclusively to the specific internal structure .
The Cincinnati Reds are a Major League  बेसबॉल टोली  based in Cincinnati , Ohio .
They are members of  the नेशनल लीग  Central Division .
Established in 1881 as an independent club , the  टोली became a चार्टर सदस्य of the अमरीकी  Association in 1882 , and joined the National League in 1890 .
The club traditionally traces its origin  to बेसबॉल  's first openly professional team in 1869 .
The Reds have won five World Series  शीर्षक , एक अमरीकी संघ  pennant , nine National League pennants and ten division titles .
The Reds  निभाई in  the National League West between 1969 and 1993 and have been in the National League Central since 1994 .
Since 2003 , the Reds have played at Great  अमरीकी बॉल पार्क  , built next to their home from 1970 to 2002 , Riverfront Stadium .
Bob  castellini रै स्वामित्व the सिनसिनाटी  Reds since 2006 .
A prank  बदबू  bomb .
A  बदबू बमबारी  is a device designed to create an unpleasant smell .
They range in  प्रभावकारिता इससे सरल pranks  to military grade malodorants or riot control chemical agents .
The Guinness Book of Records lists  दो  smelliest substances .
One is `` US  सरकारी मानक बाथरूम malodor '' ; a मिश्रण of आठ रसायन  with a stench resembling human feces , only much stronger , designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners .
Another one , `` Who me ? `` , is a mixture of  पाँच sulfur-containing  chemicals and smells like rotting food and carcasses .
the कहावत `` a चित्र is लायक a हजार शब्द ''  refers to the notion that a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image .
It also aptly characterizes one of the main goals of  कल्पना , namely बनाना it संभावित  to absorb large amounts of data quickly .
The  अभिव्यक्ति `` उपयोग  a picture .
It 's  लायक a हजार शब्द  . '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper editor Arthur Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity .
1913  समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन
A similar phrase , `` One  dekh is लायक a हजार शब्द  '' , appears in a 1913 newspaper advertisement for the Piqua Auto Supply House of Piqua , Ohio .
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper  विज्ञापन  for the San Antonio Light which says : One of the Nation 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is Worth a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers .
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the advertising trade journal Printers ' Ink , promoting the use of  बिंब in विज्ञापन कि appeared on the पहलू of streetcars  .
The December  8 , 1921 समस्या  carries an ad entitled , `` One Look is Worth A Thousand Words . ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10 , 1927 issue  साथ the phrase `` एक चित्र लायक  Ten Thousand Words , '' where it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ) .
The Home Book of Proverbs , Maxims , and Familiar Phrases quotes Barnard as saying  he पुकारा it `` a चाइनीज कहावत , so कि  people would take it seriously . ''
Soon  बाद , the कहावत  would become popularly attributed to Confucius .
The discussion of `` One Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words '' Wan yen I hua and 10.000 miles worth  10.000 किताबे is cited in सूचना ग्राफिक्स  where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures .
A  चित्र is लायक  a thousand words
Despite this modern origin of  the लोकप्रिय phrase  , the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers .
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers and Sons in 1862 )  , `` a चित्र shows me at a glance कया it  takes dozens of pages of a book to expound . ''
Computer programmer and author Fred Brooks makes an  विपरीत बयान regarding प्रोग्रामिंग in the mythical man-month :  `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your tables , and I shall continue to be mystified .
Show me your tables , and I won’t usually need your  flowcharts ; they’ll be स्पष्ट  . ''
The phrase has also  महरूम spoofed by जॉन मैकार्थी , the प्रसिद्ध  computer scientist , to make the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say , 1001 words is worth more than a picture . ''
A season is a subdivision of the year , marked by changes in  मौसम , पारिस्थितिकी , और घंटों of daylight  .
Seasons result from the  वार्षिक क्रान्ति  of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution .
In  शीतोष्ण और ध्रुवीय regions , the सीज़न हैं  marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface , variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate , and plants to be dormant .
During May , June and  जुलाई , the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is उजागर  to more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is true of the southern hemisphere  in नवम्बर , दिसम्बर  and January .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the sky during the  गर्मियाँ महीने जिससे increases the सौर  flux .
However , due to seasonal lag , June , July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December , January  और फ़रवरी हैं  the hottest months in the southern hemisphere .
In temperate and subpolar regions ,  generally चार पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) हैं पहचाना  : spring ( vernal ) , summer ( estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly  उपयोग a छह ऋतु मॉडल लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु  regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or  गीला , or मानसून ) ऋतु और the  dry season , and in some tropical areas , a cool or mild season .
In some parts of the  संसार , खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on  important events such as a hurricane season , tornado season or a wildfire season .
The six  ecological  seasons
The four  पंचांग सीज़न , चित्रित  in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
Dutch  निर्यात  in 2006
At  the समय of  writing the Netherlands is the 17th largest economy of the world .
( see : List of  देशों by  GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the top 10  of richest राष्ट्र  in the world ( see : List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) per capita ) .
Between 1996 and  2000 सालाना आर्थिक विकास ( जीडीपी ) averaged  over 4 % , well above the European average .
Growth slowed  considerably  in 2001-05 as part of the global economic slowdown .
2006 and 2007  however दिखाया आर्थिक  growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 % .
The Dutch economy was hit  considerably by the जारी वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट  and the ensuing European debt crisis .
अनेक बैंको गई  bankrupt , and a number of others had to receive governmental aid .
In 2009 the economy declined with 3.5 % ,  followed by दो सालो  of mild growth .
The Dutch economy is  फिलहाल in a मंदी again  , with an economic decline of 0.5 % in 2012 .
महंगाई is at  3.2 % in February 2013 .
Unemployment has been relatively low compared to  अन्य eu  nations for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 % .
The Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA rating at least until March 2013 according to the three major credit rating  एजेंसियों .
Historically , the Dutch introduced and  invented the भण्डार मार्केट  by the merchandise trading through Dutch West India Company .
The Netherlands is a founding member of  the यूरोपीय संघ  , the OECD and the World Trade Organization .
Loyal to the Game is the tenth  स्टुडियो एल्बम और छठे  studio album by Tupac Shakur .
It contains  remixes of previously unreleased  music recorded by Shakur before his death in 1996 .
released in the संयुक्त राज्य on दिसम्बर  14 , 2004 ( December 12 in the United Kingdom ) , Loyal to the Game was produced by Eminem .
The original panel of The View ; Meredith Vieira , Star Jones  , डिब्बी matenopoulos  and Barbara Walters in 1997 .
The View is an  अमरीकी  talk show broadcast on ABC that debuted in 1997 as part of the network 's daytime programming block .
Created by Barbara Walters and Bill Geddie , who both also serve  as the दिखाएँ 's कार्यपालिका निर्माता ,  the program features a panel of women as co-hosts .
Along with Walters , the current panel includes Whoopi Goldberg , who serves  as the मॉडरेटर , आनन्द behar ,  Elisabeth Hasselbeck , and Sherri Shepherd .
International versions of the  कार्यक्रम हैं aired in अनेक  countries .
As of the 2012–13 season  , इसके 16th , the दृश्य is the fourth-longest  running national daytime talk show in history , behind The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 ) , the variously-named Live !
programs ( 25 ) , and The Oprah Winfrey  दिखाएँ ( 25 )  .
Prunus virginiana , commonly called bitter-berry , chokecherry , Virginia bird cherry and western chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P.  virginiana var . demissa ) , is a प्रजाति of बर्ड चेरी ( prunus subgenus padus ) देशी  to North America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana includes most of the continent , except for the far north and far south .
Los Angeles International Airport is the primary airport serving the Greater  लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल , the second-most  populated metropolitan area in the United States .
It is most often referred to by its IATA airport code LAX , with the letters  सुनाया individually  .
LAX is located in  southwestern लॉस एंजिल्स साथ the प्रशांत coast in the पड़ोस of westchester  , from the downtown core and is the primary airport of Los Angeles World Airports ( LAWA ) , an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports .
In 2011 , LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world after Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport , Beijing Capital International Airport ,  लंदन हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र , शिकागो o'hare अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport , and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers .
The airport holds the claim for `` the world 's busiest origin and destination ( O & D )  विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 कि involves  non-connecting passenger traffic .
It is also the only  विमानक्षेत्र to रैंक among the शीर्ष  five U.S. airports for both passenger and cargo traffic .
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area , but other airports including Bob Hope Airport , John Wayne Airport , Long Beach Airport , LA/Ontario International Airport , and  ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र  also serve the region .
LAX is also  the व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the वेस्ट coast of the संयुक्त  States in terms of flight operations , passenger traffic and air cargo activity , leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim `` .
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24 , 1976 ) is an American  फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the डेनवर broncos of the  National Football League ( NFL ) .
He played for the  इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस लिये 14  seasons from 1998 to 2011 .
He is the son of  पूर्व एनएफएल क्वार्टरबैक आर्ची मैनिंग और an  elder brother of New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning .
Manning played  कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Tennessee , leading the Volunteers to the 1997 SEC Championship in his senior season .
However , No . 3 Tennessee lost to the No . 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the Orange Bowl giving Nebraska and Tom  ओसबोर्न उनके 3rd नेशनल चैंपियनशिप  in 4 years .
he थी चुनी by the इंडियानापोलिस  Colts with the first overall pick in the 1998 NFL Draft .
From 1998 to 2010 , he led the  कोल्टस to आठ ( सात afc दक्षिण और एक afc ईस्ट ) प्रभाग  championships , two AFC championships , and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ) .
He has won a record four league most valuable player  पुरस्कार , थी the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of सुपर कटोरी xli , रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो  Bowls , has twelve 4,000-yard passing seasons , and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ) .
In 2009 , he was named the best player in the NFL and Fox Sports along  साथ खेल illustrated नामित उसे the एनएफएल खिलाड़ी of  the decade of the 2000s .
In May 2011 , he underwent neck surgery to alleviate neck pain and arm weakness he dealt with during the previous few seasons before signing a five-year , $ 90   million contract extension with the Colts in July 2011 .
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011  ऋतु , लकिन in सितंबर 2011 , he underwent  a much more serious second surgery : a level one cervical fusion procedure .
Manning had never missed an NFL game  in उसके करियर , लकिन थी मजबूर to मिस  the entire 2011 season .
He was released by the Colts on March 7 , 2012 , and after an almost  two-week काल जहाँ he visited साथ और  worked out for several NFL teams , he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20 , 2012 .
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the nickname , `` The Sheriff '' and is one of the most  recognizable  and parodied in the NFL .
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led  to मैनिंग using an सरणी of इशारों और मौखिक कमांड to कॉल the खेल at the लकीर of  scrimmage rather than in the huddle .
The America Tower of the American General Center , the  मुख्यालय of बेकर  Hughes
Baker  ह्यूजेस is एक of  the world 's largest oilfield services companies .
It operates in over 90 countries , providing  the आयल और गैस उद्योग साथ उत्पाद और सेवाएं लिये खुदाई  , formation evaluation , completion , production and reservoir consulting .
बेकर ह्यूजेस रै इसके मुख्यालय  in the America Tower in the American General Center in Neartown , Houston .
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when Baker International and  ह्यूजेस औजार कम्पनी मिलाया  in 1987 .
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major  कार्यालयों in लिवरपूल , संयुक्त किंगडम ; सिंगापुर ; दुबई ; a शोध और  maintenance facility in Celle , Germany ; Lafayette , Louisiana ; Houston , Texas ; Pescara , Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur , Malaysia .
The company is administered broadly in two hemispheres : the eastern  गोलार्ध साथ पाँच regions ( यूरोपीय  , Africa , the Middle East , Asia Pacific and Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada , US Land , US Gulf , and Latin America ) .
Each of these regions is  subdivided  into markets .
The United  राज्य one- cent सिक्का , commonly ज्ञात  as a penny , is a unit of currency equaling one one-hundredth of a United States dollar .
The cent 's  प्रतीक is ¢ .
Its obverse has featured the profile of President  अब्राहम lincoln चूंकि  1909 , the centennial of his birth .
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln  's जनम ) to 2008 , the  reverse featured the Lincoln Memorial .
Four different reverse designs in 2009 honored Lincoln 's 200th birthday and a new , permanent reverse  – the  Union Shield – was introduced in 2010 .
The coin is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm  )  in diameter and 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness .
The U.S. Mint 's official name for a penny is `` '' and the  u.S. राजकोष 's आधिकारिक  name is `` one cent piece '' .
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin of the same name , the pre-decimal  संस्करण of जिससे  had a similar value .
In American English , pennies is the plural form , other plural forms pence and  पेशाब ( मानक उपयोग in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी  ) are not used .
As of 2012 , it costs  the u.S. मिंट 2.00 सेंट  to make a cent because of the cost of materials and production .
This figure includes the  mint’s फिक्स्ड  components for distribution and fabrication , estimated at $ 13 million in FY 2011 .
It also includes Mint  ओवरहेड आबंटित to the पैनी , जिससे  was $ 17.7 million for 2011 .
Fixed costs and overhead would have to be  अवशोषित by अन्य  circulating coins without the penny .
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent coin in the United  राज्य लिये the साल of 2012 थी $ 58,000,000  .
This was a slight  घटी  from 2011 , the year before , which had a production loss of $ 60,200,000 .
or more specifically , are  शोभायमान किस्में  of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus carpio ) that are kept for decorative purposes in outdoor koi ponds or water gardens .
Koi varieties  हैं विशिष्ट by coloration  , patterning , and scalation .
Some of  the प्रमुख रंगों  are white , black , red , yellow , blue , and cream .
The most  लोकप्रिय  category of koi is the Gosanke , which is made up of the Kohaku , Taisho Sanshoku , and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government , about 5,000  कर्मचारी of the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और a few सौ निजी सेक्टर कर्मचारी  , mostly in and around federal facilities .
AFGE is the largest  संघ लिये civilian , non- डाक संघीय कर्मचारी और the largest संघ  for District of Columbia employees who report directly to the mayor ( i.e. , outside of D.C. public schools ) .
It is  संबद्ध साथ the  AFL-CIO .

Blue :  a spore bearing a  trilete mark – the -shaped scar .
