The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing levels of complexity , from the earliest algal mats ,  through bryophytes  , lycopods , ferns to the complex gymnosperms and angiosperms of today .
While many of the groups which appeared earlier continue to thrive ,  विशेषकर in the environments in जिससे वे विकसित , लिये a  time each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors .
In the  ordovician काल , around , the  first land plants appeared .
These began to diversify in the late Silurian Period , around ,  और the परिणाम of उनके diversification हैं प्रदर्शित in उल्लेखनीय  detail in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert .
This chert  preserved जल्दी पौधे in सेल्यूलर  detail , petrified in volcanic springs .
By the middle of the Devonian Period , most of the features recognised in plants today are present , including roots , leaves and secondary  लकडी ; और , by लेट devonian टाइम्स , बीज था विकसित  .
Late Devonian plants had thereby reached a degree of  परिष्कार कि  allowed them to form forests of tall trees .
Evolutionary innovation  जारी into the carboniferous  period and is still ongoing today .
Most plant groups  यहूद अपेक्षाकृत unscathed by the permo-triassic  extinction event , although the structures of communities changed .
इस may have नियत the झाँकी लिये the रूप of  the flowering plants in the Triassic ( ~ ) , and their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene .
The latest major group of plants  to evolve  were the grasses , which became important in the mid-Paleogene , from around .
The grasses , as well as many other groups , evolved new mechanisms of  चयापचय to जीवित the कम और गरम , शुष्क  conditions of the tropics over the last .
The winning Super Bowl team receives the Vince  लोम्बार्डी  Trophy .
The Super Bowl is an annual American football game that determines the  चैंपियन of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) .
The contest is held in an American city that is chosen three to four years beforehand ,  प्रायः in warm-weather or domed साइट  .
Since 1971 , the winner of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) Championship Game has faced the winner of the National  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल in the  culmination of the NFL playoffs .
Before the 1970 merger between the American Football League ( AFL ) and the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल  ) , the two leagues met in four such contests .
The first two were  ज्ञात as the `` afl-nfl संसार  Championship Game . ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first such game that carried  the `` सुपर कटोरी '' moniker , the names `` सुपर कटोरी  I `` and `` Super Bowl II `` were retroactively applied to the first two games .
The NFC  /nfL  leads in Super Bowl wins with 25 , while the AFC /AFL has won 22 .
Eighteen different  franchises , सहित  teams that relocated to another city , have won the Super Bowl .
The  पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स have जीती the  most Super Bowls with six championships ( record 6–2 ) , while both the Dallas Cowboys and San Francisco 49ers have five wins each ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ) .
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most Super Bowl appearances with eight , while  the भैंस बिल्स have the सबसे लगातार दिखावे साथ चार  losses in a row from 1990 to 1993 .
The New England Patriots , Denver Broncos and Minnesota  वाइकिंग्स have भी  lost a record four Super Bowls .
Buffalo and Minnesota are both 0–4 ,  डेनवर is 2–4 और नई  England is 3–4 .
The record for consecutive wins is two and is shared by seven  franchises : the 1966-67 ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स , the 1972-73 मियामी डॉल्फिन , the 1974-75 और 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स ( the तभी टोली to accomplish इस feat  twice ) , the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers , the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys , the 1997-98 Denver Broncos , and the 2003-04 New England Patriots .
The only team with multiple  सुपर कटोरी दिखावे और no  losses is the Baltimore Ravens , who in winning Super Bowl XLVII unseated and replaced the 49ers in that position .
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a Super Bowl , including franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns ,  डेट्रॉयट शेर , jacksonville jaguars , और  Houston Texans , though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl .
Martin County is a county located in the U.S. state of  टेक्सास .
As  of the 2010  census , its population was 4,799 .
Its seat  is stanton  .
The county is named for Wylie  मार्टिन , an  early settler .
Martin County is one  of 30 निषेध , or entirely शुष्क  , counties in the state of Texas .
Alkaline  phosphatase ( alp , alkp ) (  ) is a hydrolase enzyme responsible for removing phosphate groups from many types of molecules , including nucleotides , proteins , and alkaloids .
The  प्रक्रम of निकालना the फास्फेट समूह  is called dephosphorylation .
As the name suggests , alkaline  phosphatases हैं सबसे प्रभावी  in an alkaline environment .
It is sometimes used  synonymously as मौलिक  phosphatase .
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ) , ( ) is a hybrid of wheat  (  Triticum ) and rye ( Secale ) first bred in laboratories during the late 19th century .
The grain was  originally करवाया  in Scotland and Sweden .
commercially उपलब्धियाँ triticale is लगभग  always a second generation hybrid , i.e. , a cross between two kinds of primary ( first cross ) triticales .
As a rule , triticale combines the yield potential and grain quality of wheat with the disease and  पर्यावरणीय सहिष्णुता (  including soil conditions ) of rye .
Only recently has it  महरूम विकसित into  a commercially viable crop .
depending on  the cultivar , triticale can more or less resemble either of its parents .
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder , although  कुछ triticale-based  foods can be purchased at health food stores or are to be found in some breakfast cereals .
When crossing wheat  और rye , गेहूं is प्रयुक्त as the मादा जनक और  rye as the male parent ( pollen donor ) .
The resulting hybrid is sterile , and must be treated with colchicine to induce  polyploidy और यूँ the क्षमता  to reproduce itself .
The primary producers of  triticale हैं कैंडल , जर्मनी  , France , Belarus and Australia .
In 2009 , according to the Food and  कृषि संगठन ( fao ) ,  15.0 million tons were harvested in 29 countries across the world .
The triticale hybrids are all amphidiploid , which means the plant is diploid for two  genomes निकला इससे अलग प्रजाति  .
In other words , triticale is an  allotetraploid  .
In earlier years , most  कार्य थी किया on octoploid  triticale .
Different ploidy levels have been created  और  evaluated over time .
The tetraploids showed little promise , but hexaploid triticale was  कामयाब पर्याप्त to ढूँढें वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग  .
The CIMMYT triticale improvement program wanted to improve food production  और पोषण  in developing countries .
Triticale has potential in the production of bread and other  खाना उत्पाद , ऐसे as कुकीज़ , पास्ता , पिज़्ज़ा आटा  and breakfast cereals .
The protein content is higher than that of wheat , although the  glutenin भिन्न is  less .
The grain has also been  stated to have उच्चतर  levels of lysine than wheat .
Assuming increased acceptance , the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale , as  the मिलिंग तकनीकों employed लिये गेहूं हैं मुलम्मा to triticale  .
Sell et al . found triticale could be used as a feed grain , and  बाद शोध मिला इसके मंड  was particularly readily digested .
As a feed  अनाज , triticale is  already well established and of high economic importance .
It has  प्राप्त ध्यान as a संभावित उर्जा  crop , and research is currently being conducted on the use of the crop 's biomass in bioethanol production .
`` Puff , the  जादू ड्रैगन  '' is a song written by Leonard Lipton and Peter Yarrow , and made popular by Yarrow 's group Peter , Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording .
The song achieved  ग्रेट लोकप्रियता  .
A college football national championship in the highest level of collegiate play in the United States , currently the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ) Division I  फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी  Subdivision ( FBS ) , is a designation awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ) .
Division I FBS ( formerly Division I-A ) football is the only  ncaa खेल in जिससे a वार्षिक चैंपियन  is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event .
Because the championship team is not determined by a NCAA championship or  टूर्नामेंट इवेंट , it is sometimes unofficially  referred to as a `` mythical national championship `` .
Since the NCAA , the sport 's governing body , does not determine or declare a national champion in this field ,  determination of ऐसे  has often engendered controversy .
A championship team is independently declared by  विभिन्न individuals और संगठन  , often referred to as `` selectors '' .
These choices are sometimes at  हालात साथ प्रत्येक अन्य  .
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed an annual championship team , it has documented the  चुनाव  of several selectors in the official NCAA Football Bowl Subdivision Records .
In  जोड , विभिन्न तीसरा पार्टी विश्लेषकों have  independently published their own lists of what they have determined to be the most legitimate selections for each season .
These are also often at odds with  प्रत्येक अन्य as खूब as व्यक्तिगत स्कूल 's दावा on नेशनल championships  , which , for any particular season , may or may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere .
Currently , two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press , which conducts a poll of football sportswriters , and the USA  आज कोच ' पोल , a पोल of अमरीकी  Football Coaches Association active coaches that is contractually obligated to name the winner of the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion .
The Milwaukee Brewers are a professional baseball team  आधारित in मिल्वौकी , विस्कॉन्सिन  .
The team is a member of the Central Division of Major League  बेसबॉल  's National League and plays its home games at Miller Park .
The team is so named because of the city  's संघ साथ the  brewing industry .
The Washington Nationals are a professional  बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in  Washington , D.C .
The Nationals are a  सदस्य of the ईस्ट प्रभाग of the  National League of Major League Baseball ( MLB ) .
The team 's home  ballpark is नागरिकों पार्क ,  located on South Capitol Street in Southeast D.C. , near the Anacostia River .
The park opened in 2008 , replacing RFK  स्टेडियम , the  team 's home from 2005 to 2007 .
The Nationals ' name derives from the former Washington baseball team that had the same name ( used  interchangeably साथ सीनेटरों )  .
Their nickname is `` the Nats '' —a shortened version  कि थी भी प्रयुक्त by the बूढ़ा  D.C. teams .
An expansion  मताधिकार , the क्लबों थी संस्थापित  in as the Montreal Expos , the first major league team in Canada .
They were based in Montreal ,  क्यूबेक , और निभाई उनके  home games at Jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium .
In , the Expos won a division championship , won their  first-ever playoff श्रेणी by defeating the फिलाडेल्फिया फ़िलीज़ , 3–2 , और उन्नत to the नेशनल लीग  Championship Series , where they would go on to lose to the Los Angeles Dodgers , 3–2 , in their only postseason appearance during the strike-shortened season .
The Expos had their highest winning percentage in the strike-shortened season of  , जब the टोली था the बेहतरीन रिकार्ड in  baseball .
The team 's subsequent shedding of players  caused प्रशंसक ब्याज to बूँद बंद  .
After the 2001 season , MLB considered revoking the team 's franchise , along with either the Minnesota Twins or the Tampa Bay   Devil Rays .
After being purchased by MLB in 2002 , the team was moved before the season to Washington and renamed the Nationals , the first relocation since the second Washington  सीनेटरों स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन , टेक्सास , और became the टेक्सास रेंजरों in  .
The Nationals are one of two MLB franchises , and the only one in the National League , that has never  निभाई in a संसार श्रेणी ( the  Seattle Mariners are the other ) .
A  निर्भर शुल्क ( in the संयुक्त राज्य  ) or conditional fee ( in England and Wales ) is any fee for services provided where the fee is payable only if there is a favourable result .
In  the विधि , it is  defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's services only if the lawsuit is successful or is favorably settled out of court ... .
निर्भर शुल्क हैं प्रायः  calculated as a percentage of the client 's net recovery . ''
In  the अंग्रेज़ी विधिक  system , it is generally referred to as no win no fee .
A  सशर्त शुल्क  agreement between a law firm and a client .
The usual form of this  अनुबंध is कि the solicitor होगा लो  a law case on the understanding that if lost , no payment is made .
However , if the case is won , the lawyer will be  हकदार to the सामान्य शुल्क आधारित on hourly बिलिंग  , plus a success fee .
The success fee in England must be as a percentage no greater than 100 %  of the सामान्य शुल्क  .
This contrasts with  the आकस्मिकता  fee in the US , which gives the successful attorney a percentage of the damages awarded in favor of his client .
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their civil rights since otherwise , to  मुकदमा किसी लिये a अपकृत्य , एक जरूर पहला be धनवान पर्याप्त to pursue ऐसे वाद  in the first place .
However , because of the high risk , few attorneys will take cases  on a आकस्मिकता आधार जबतक वे  feel the case has good merit .
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer , contingent fees were allowed as of that year in the following countries :  ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ब्राज़ील  , Canada , the Dominican Republic , France , Greece , Ireland , Japan , New Zealand , the United Kingdom and the United States .
They are also allowed in  निजी चोट  actions in Lithuania .
recently , वे  have been allowed in Belgium as well .
A Convocation ( Latin 'calling together ' , translating the Greek ecclesia )  is a समूह of लोगों  formally assembled for a special purpose .
Sons of Anarchy is a television drama series created by Kurt Sutter about the lives of a close-knit outlaw motorcycle club operating in Charming , a fictional town in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's  Central Valley .
The show centers on protagonist Jackson `` Jax '' Teller ( Charlie  hunnam ) , the then-vice अध्यक्ष of the क्लबों , जो begins questioning  the club and himself .
Sons of Anarchy premiered on  सितंबर 3 , 2008 , on केबल  network FX .
The third season of the series attracted an average of 4.9 million viewers per  सप्ताह , बनाना it fx 's उच्चतम रेटेड श्रेणी कभी , surpassing fx  's other hits The Shield , Nip/Tuck , and Rescue Me .
On February 3 , 2012 , Sons of Anarchy was renewed for two additional seasons , a  पांचवां और a छठे  .
Those involved in the production of the series imply that a seventh and final season is creator  कर्ट sutter  's plan .
The Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '' , singular : )  और the ज्वालामुखी  of the same name are in South-East Iceland .
They are in the highlands of Iceland at the  northwestern  side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap .
the झीलों  are at , at an elevation of .
Beneath the lakes is  the मैग्मा कक्ष  of the Grímsvötn volcano .
Grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano which has the highest  फटना आवृत्ति of सब the ज्वालामुखी in आइसलैंड और रै  a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system .
The massive climate-impacting Laki fissure eruption of  1783–1784 थी a भाग of the वही फिशर प्रणाली  .
Grímsvötn was  erupting at the वही  time as Laki during 1783 , but continued to erupt until 1785 .
Because most of the volcano lies underneath  vatnajökull , सबसे of इसके eruptions have महरूम subglacial  and the interaction of magma and meltwater from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity .
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC , an eruption began , with high plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes , resulting in cancellation of 900 flights in  आइसलैंड , और in the संयुक्त किंगडम ,  Greenland , Germany , Ireland and Norway on 22–25 May .
Until 25 May the eruption scale had  महरूम larger than कि of the 2010  eruption of Eyjafjallajökull .
The eruption  रोका at 02:40 utc on 25 may 2011 , हालांकि वहीँ थी कुछ विस्फोटक  activity from the tephra vents affecting only the area around the crater .
Vetting is the process of performing  a पृष्ठभूमि जाँच on किसी पहले offering  them employment , conferring an award , etc .
A prospective person or project may be  vetted पहले बनाना  a hiring decision .
In  जोड , in प्रज्ञा महफ़िल  , assets are vetted to determine their usefulness .

Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's  entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an अमरीकी  public gaming corporation that owns and operates over 50 casinos , hotels , and seven golf courses under several brands .
The company , based in Paradise , Nevada , is  the largest गेमिंग  company in the world , with annual revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ) .
Caesars is a public company , with a joint venture of Apollo Global Management and Texas Pacific Group ownig  a विशाल portion of the स्टेक और blackstone समूह भी पकड़कर  a significant stake .
The name change from ``  harrah 's entertainment inc. '' to `` caesars  Entertainment Corporation '' was made official on November 23 , 2010 .
Harrah 's remains a key  ब्रांड in the कम्पनी  .
On November 5 , 2010 , Harrah 's announced an initial public offering of 31,250,000 shares but retracted this  offering on  November 19 .
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person who is not a Canadian citizen but who has been granted permission to live and work in Canada  बगैर कोई समय सीमा on उसके or उसके रहो  .
A permanent resident  जरूर सजीव in कनाडा लिये  two years out of every five or risk losing that status .
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same rights and  जिम्मेदारियों as a कनाडाई नागरिक  , among others the right to work for any enterprise as well as for the federal or provincial government ( under restriction of access rights to certain regulated professions ) .
The main differences are that  निवासियों can नहीं  :
vote in elections  in कनाडा  ;
run for  निर्वाचित दफ्तर  ;
hold Canadian  passports  ;
In addition , they may be allowed to join Canada 's armed forces if the national interest  होता नहीं be prejudiced  .
Permanent  निवासियों भी रिस्क प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर  crimes committed while resident in Canada .
Permanent residents may apply for  कनाडाई नागरिकता बाद तीन सालो  in Canada ; however this is not mandatory .
Erica  केन is  a fictional character from the American ABC Daytime soap opera All My Children .
The character was portrayed by actress Susan Lucci from her debut on January 16 , 1970 until the  पिछला ब्रॉडकास्ट टेलीविज़न एपीसोड aired  on September 23 , 2011 .
On February 11 ,  2013 , it थी घोषित  that Lucci will guest-star on the Prospect Park 's continuation of All My Children .
In the U.S. , Erica is considered to be the most popular  अक्षर in साबुन ओपेरा इतिहास  .
Regarding the North-American market , TV Guide calls her `` unequivocally the most famous soap opera character in the history of daytime TV '' , and included her in their 2013 list of  the 60 nastiest खलनायक  of All Time .
A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue )  , और इसके प्रतिशत सालाना  change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) measures changes in the price level of a market basket of  उपभोक्ता goods और सेवाएं  purchased by households .
The CPI in the United States is defined by the Bureau of Labor Statistics as `` a  माप of the औसत बदलें over समय  in the prices paid by urban consumers for a market basket of consumer goods and services . ''
The CPI is a statistical estimate constructed using the  कीमतें of a नमूना of प्रतिनिधि  items whose prices are collected periodically .
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for different  श्रेणी और sub-categories of goods और सेवाएं , होने संयुक्त to उपज the overall अनुक्रमणिका  with weights reflecting their shares in the total of the consumer expenditures covered by the index .
It is one of several  दाम indices गणना  by most national statistical agencies .
The annual percentage change in a CPI  is प्रयुक्त as a माप  of inflation .
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e. , adjust for the effect of inflation ) the real value of wages ,  salaries , pensions , लिये regulating कीमतें और लिये deflating  monetary magnitudes to show changes in real values .
In most countries , the CPI is , along with the population census and the USA National Income and Product Accounts , one of the most  closely देखी नेशनल  economic statistics .
Knocking on wood , or to touch wood ,  refers to the apotropaic परंपरा in पश्चिमी लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking  on wood , or merely stating that you are doing or intend same , in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` after making a favourable observation , a boast , or declaration concerning one 's own death .
Rocker  भुजा
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of automotive , marine , motorcycle and reciprocating aviation engines , the  रॉकर भुजा is an oscillating लीवर कि conveys रेडियल गति इससे  the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it .
One end is raised and  lowered by a घूर्णन पालि of the camshaft  ( either directly or via a tappet ( lifter ) and pushrod ) while the other end acts on the valve stem .
जब the camshaft पालि उठाता the बाहर  of the arm , the inside presses down on the valve stem , opening the valve .
When the outside  of the भुजा is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts  rotation , the inside rises , allowing the valve spring to close the valve .
The drive cam is driven by  the camshaft .
This pushes the rocker arm  up और bas  about the trunnion pin or rocker shaft .
Friction may be reduced at  the पाइंट of सम्पर्क साथ  the valve stem by a roller cam follower .
A similar arrangement transfers the motion via another roller cam  अनुसरणकर्ता to a दूसरी रॉकर  arm .
This rotates about the rocker shaft , and  हस्तांतरण the गति via a  tappet to the poppet valve .
In this case this opens the intake valve  to the बेलन सिर  .
The effective leverage of the arm ( and thus the force it can exert on the valve stem ) is determined by the rocker arm  अनुपात , the अनुपात of the अलहदा इससे the रॉकर भुजा 's बीच of रोटेशन to the  tip divided by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod .
Current  ऑटोमोटिव डिज़ाइन favors  rocker arm ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1 .
However , in the past smaller positive ratios ( the valve lift is  वृहद than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और भी ऋणात्मक  ratios ( valve lift smaller than the cam lift ) have been used .
अनेक pre-ww2 इंजन  use 1:1 ( neutral ) ratios .
For car engines the rocker arms are generally steel stampings , providing a reasonable  संतुलन of शक्ति  , weight and economical cost .
Because the rocker arms are , in part , reciprocating weight , excessive mass especially at the lever  ends हद the इंजन 's क्षमता to पहुँचें  high operating speeds .
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia '' is a Southern Gothic  सोंग लिखा by songwriter  Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife Vicki Lawrence .
Reba McEntire  बाद  covered it in 1991 .
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western Studios on Sunset in Hollywood and  released कम than दो सप्ताह बाद in नवम्बर 1972  , the song centers around the older brother of the narrator , falsely convicted of and executed for a murder , which the narrator herself has committed .
In postal mail , a return  पता is an सुस्पष्ट  inclusion of the address of the person sending the message .
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine how to respond to the  प्रेषक of the संदेश  if needed .
The return  पता need नहीं शामिल a प्रेषक  's name , but should include address or P.O . box details in the same way as the delivery address should .
In some  देशों , the वापसी पता is conventionally स्तिथ  in the upper left hand corner of the envelope , card , or label .
In the United Kingdom , the return address is  प्रायः लगाई on the रिवर्स of the लिफाफा  , near the top .
Businesses often use envelopes  preprinted साथ a वापसी पता  .
Many individuals have sheets of adhesive labels preprinted  साथ उनके घर पता to affix  to their correspondence .
Charities sometimes  शामिल ऐसे चादरें in  mailshots .
Rolls of Return Address  लेबल्स can be खरीदा इससे कंपनियाँ कि बेचें personalized लेबल्स  to provide individuals an easy way to peel and stick return address labels to their envelopes .
The return address is not required on  डाक  mail .
However , lack of a return address prevents the postal service from being able to return the item if it proves undeliverable ; such as  इससे क्षति , postage due , or  invalid destination .
Such  मेल  may thus become dead letter mail .
Should the return address be of a different state or country ,  the मेल may be routed through  that location for ease of return .
A nerve guidance conduit ( also referred to as an artificial nerve conduit or artificial nerve graft , as opposed to an autograft ) is an artificial means of guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve  regeneration और is एक of अनेक नैदानिक उपचार लिये तंत्रिका चोटों  .
When direct suturing of the two stumps of a  severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be संपन्नता  without tension , the standard clinical treatment for peripheral nerve injuries is autologous nerve grafting .
Due to the limited availability of donor tissue and functional recovery  in autologous तंत्रिका कलम , neural ऊतक अभियान्त्रिकी  research has focused on the development of bioartificial nerve guidance conduits as an alternative treatment , especially for large defects .
Similar techniques are also being explored for nerve repair in the spinal cord but nerve regeneration in the central nervous system  मुद्राएँ a वृहद चुनौती क्युकी इसके axons do नहीं regenerate appreciably in उनके देशी पर्यावरण  .
The creation of artificial conduits is also known as entubulation because the  तंत्रिका ends और intervening गैप  are enclosed within a tube composed of biological or synthetic materials .
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube , synthetic tube or tissue-engineered conduit , it should  सुकर neurotropic और neurotrophic संचार between the proximal और distal  ends of the nerve gap , block external inhibitory factors , and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth .
The most basic objective of a nerve guidance conduit is to combine physical ,  रासायनिक , और biological cues अंतर्गत शर्तें कि होगा  foster tissue formation .
Materials  कि have महरूम  used to make biologic tubes include blood vessels and skeletal muscles , while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been made from silicone and polyglycolide respectively .
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a combination of many elements : scaffold structure  , scaffold सामग्री , सेल्यूलर therapies  , neurotrophic factors and biomimetic materials .
The choice of which  शारीरिक , रासायनिक और biological cues to उपयोग  is based on the properties of the nerve environment , which is critical in creating the most desirable environment for axon regeneration .
The factors that control  सामग्री चयन शामिल biocompatibility , biodegradability , mechanical  integrity , controllability during nerve growth , implantation and sterilization .
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television series  उत्पादित by rdf यूएसए ( बाद zodiak यूएसए ) और रिचर्ड dominick प्रोडक्शन्स  for truTV about the day-to-day operations of American Jewelry and Loan , a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road , between 8 Mile Road and the John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit , Michigan .
The series premiered on August 16 , 2010 , delivering two million viewers , setting  a रिकार्ड as trutv 's most-watched श्रेणी प्रीमियर  ever .
amoxicillin  BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ) , formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ) , and abbreviated amox , is a moderate-spectrum , bacteriolytic , β-lactam antibiotic  प्रयुक्त to दावत बैक्टीरियल infections caused by susceptible  microorganisms .
It is usually the drug of choice within the class because it  is बेहतर अवशोषित  , following oral administration , than other β-lactam antibiotics .
Amoxicillin is one  of the  most common antibiotics prescribed for children .
The drug  became उपलब्धियाँ  in 1972 .
Amoxicillin is susceptible to  degradation by β-lactamase -producing जीवाणु , जिससे  are resistant to a broad spectrum of β-lactam antibiotics , such as penicillin .
For this reason ,  it is प्रायः संयुक्त साथ clavulanic  acid , a β-lactamase inhibitor .
This increases  प्रभावकारिता by reducing  its susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance .
Lyndon Baines  जॉनसन ( अगस्त 27 , 1908  – January 22 , 1973 ) , often referred to as LBJ , was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ) , a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only four people who  परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य  : Representative , Senator , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a United States Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961 , including six years as United States  सीनेट बहुमत नेता , दो as सीनेट अल्पसंख्यक नेता और दो as सीनेट बहुमत  Whip .
After  campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960 , जॉनसन  was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency  following the हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22 , 1963 , समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और  was elected President in his own right , winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President , he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society ``  विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों , पब्लिक प्रसारण  , Medicare , Medicaid , environmental protection , aid to education , and his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering personality and the ``  जॉनसन उपचार  , '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War , from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to  550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968 , as अमरीकी  casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a  विशाल एंग्री antiwar गति  based especially on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965 , and crime rates soared , as his opponents  उठाया  demands for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic  पार्टी विभाजित in अनेक feuding गिरोहों , और बाद  Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary , he ended his bid for reelection .
Republican Richard Nixon was elected to  सफल उसे  .
इतिहासकारों  argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the peak of modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era .
Johnson is ranked favorably by some historians because of his  घरेलू नीतियों  .
The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त डाल at कॉमिक कॉन 2009  , from left : Kunal Nayyar , Simon Helberg , Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory , created and executive  उत्पादित by चक lorre  and Bill Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and  लियोनार्ड hofstadter , दो caltech physicists ; पैनी , a वेट्रेस और aspiring अभिनेत्री  who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz , and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist colleague , and , at different times , a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , a microbiologist , Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife , and former part-time waitress alongside  पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि ; ऋतु 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , जो joins  the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also features numerous supporting characters , each of  जिसको plays a prominent  role in a small group of episodes .
The American Civil  युद्ध ( acw ) , भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between  the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war  था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर  the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers  किया नहीं  intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and  guaranteeing अधिकारों  to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election ,  republicans , led by अब्राहम  Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won  , लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात  cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James  बुकानन और  the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared  उसके प्रशासन  would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to  अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory  claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise ,  और दोनो पहलू  prepared for war .
The  confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद  so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces  fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी  fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the  confederacy , bringing उनके कुल  to eleven .
the संघ जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य  and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862  confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ  state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना  ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer  1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate  river navy , then much of their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command  of सब संघ सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and  marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate  infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from  सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण  through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at  appomattox अदालत  House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War  थी एक of the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced weapons  यहूद employed extensively  .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food supplies  सब foreshadowed संसार  War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history ,  resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000  soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all  दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40  .
Human evolution refers to  the विकासवादी प्रक्रम  leading up to the appearance of modern humans .
While it began with the last common ancestor of all life , the  टॉपिक प्रायः कवर तभी the  evolutionary history of primates , in particular the genus Homo , and the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ) .
The study of human evolution  involves अनेक वैज्ञानिक disciplines , सहित शारीरिक  anthropology , primatology , archaeology , linguistics , evolutionary psychology , embryology and genetics .
According to genetic  अध्ययन , primates diverged इससे अन्य  mammals about in the Late Cretaceous period , and the earliest fossils appear in the Paleocene , around .
The family Hominidae diverged from the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon )  परिवार 15-20 लाख सालो पहले , और around , the ponginae  ( orangutans ) , diverged from the Hominidae family .
bipedalism is the मौलिक  adaption of the Hominin line , and the earliest bipedal Hominin is considered to be either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin , with Ardipithecus , a full bipedal , coming somewhat later .
The gorilla and  चिंपैंजी diverged around the वही समय , परिचय 4-6  million years ago , and either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them .
The early bipedals eventually evolved into the australopithecines  और बाद the  genus Homo .
The earliest  प्रलेखित सदस्यों of the genus होमो हैं होमो habilis जिससे विकसित  around ; the earliest species for which there is positive evidence of use of stone tools .
The brains of these  जल्दी hominins यहूद परिचय the वही आकार as  that of a chimpanzee .
During the next million years a process of  encephalization began , और साथ the आगमन  of Homo erectus in the fossil record , cranial capacity had doubled to 850 cm3 .
Homo erectus and Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to leave Africa ,  और ये प्रजाति स्प्रेड through  Africa , Asia , and Europe between .
It is believed that these species were  the पहला to उपयोग आग और जटिल  tools .
According to the Recent African Ancestry theory , modern humans evolved in Africa possibly from Homo heidelbergensis , Homo rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated  आउट of the महाद्वीप कुछ 50,000 to 100,000 सालो  ago , replacing local populations of Homo erectus , Homo denisova , Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis .
Archaic Homo sapiens , the forerunner of anatomically modern humans , evolved between 400,000 and  250,000 सालो पहले .
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among all non-African populations , and Neanderthals and other hominids , such as  denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of उनके genome to present-day इंसानs. < संदर्भ name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202  '' > Anatomically modern humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic , about 200,000 years ago .
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development of symbolic culture , language , and  specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000  years ago according to many anthropologists although some suggest a gradual change in behavior over a longer time span .
Lisa Cuddy , M.D . , is a fictional character on the Fox network  चिकित्सा नाटक  House .
She  is portrayed  by Lisa Edelstein .
Cuddy was the Dean of Medicine and hospital  व्यवस्थापक of the fictional princeton-plainsboro  Teaching Hospital in New Jersey .
She also  becomes हाउस 's प्रेम  interest through the years to start a relationship with him in season seven .
Cuddy  छोड़ो उसके जॉब बाद  the events of season seven 's finale `` Moving On `` .
Track and field is a sport comprising various  प्रतिस्पर्धी एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं आधारित on कार्यशील  , jumping , and throwing .
The name of the sport derives from  the  competition venue : a stadium with an oval running track around a grass field .
The throwing and  कूद कार्यक्रम generally  take place in the central enclosed area .
Track and field falls under the umbrella sport of athletics , which  भी शामिल सड़क कार्यशील , क्रॉस देश कार्यशील , और रेस  walking .
The two most prestigious international track and field competitions are held under the banner of athletics : the  एथलेटिक्स प्रतियोगिता at the ओलम्पिक  Games and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics .
The International  संघ of एथलेटिक्स federations  is the international governing body for track and field .
Track and field events are generally  व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ एथलीट चुनौतीपूर्ण प्रत्येक अन्य  to decide a single victor .
The racing events are won by the athlete with the fastest time , while the jumping and throwing events are won by the  खिलाड़ी जो रै हासिल the  greatest distance or height in the contest .
The running  कार्यक्रम हैं categorised as sprints  , middle and long-distance events , relays , and hurdling .
नियमित कूद कार्यक्रम शामिल long जम्प , ट्रिपल जम्प , ऊँची जम्प  and pole vault , while the most common throwing events are shot put , javelin , discus and hammer .
There are also `` combined events '' , such as heptathlon and  decathlon , in जिससे एथलीट compete  in a number of the above events .
रिकॉर्ड हैं रखा of the बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन in विशिष्ट  events , at world and national levels , right down to a personal level .
However , if athletes are deemed to have violated the event 's rules or regulations , they  हैं disqualified इससे  the competition and their marks are erased .
In North America , the term track and field may be used to refer to athletics in  सामान्य , बल्कि than specifically track और फ़ील्ड  events .
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ) , codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 January 1991 – 28 February 1991 ) was a war waged by a  u.n.-authorized गठबन्धन फ़ोर्स इससे 34 राष्ट्र led by the संयुक्त  States , against Iraq in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait .
The war is also known under other names , such as the Persian Gulf War , First  गल्फ युद्ध , गल्फ युद्ध i  , or the First Iraq War , before the term `` Iraq War '' became identified instead with the 2003 Iraq War ( also referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ) .
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began 2 August 1990 was met with international condemnation , and brought immediate  आर्थिक प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी by  members of the U.N. Security Council .
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed U.S. forces into Saudi Arabia , and urged other  देशों to भेजें उनके  own forces to the scene .
An array of nations  joined the गठबन्धन  .
The great majority of the Coalition 's military forces were from the U.S.  , साथ सऊदी अरब , the संयुक्त किंगडम और मिश्र as अग्रणी योगदानकर्ता  , in that order .
Saudi Arabia paid around US $ 36 billion  of the us $ 60 अरब लागत  .
The war was marked  by the शुरूआत of सजीव न्यूज on the सामने  lines of the fight , with the primacy of the U.S. network CNN .
The war has  भी अर्जित the उपनाम वीडियो खेल  War after the daily broadcast images on board the U.S. bombers during Operation Desert Storm .
The initial conflict to expel Iraqi troops from Kuwait  began साथ an aerial बमबारी on  17 January 1991 .
This was followed by  a मैदान  assault on 24 February .
This was a decisive victory for the Coalition forces  , जो liberated  Kuwait and advanced into Iraqi territory .
The Coalition ceased their  अग्रिम , और घोषित a cease-fire  100 hours after the ground campaign started .
aerial और मैदान कॉम्बैट थी confined  to Iraq , Kuwait , and areas on Saudi Arabia 's border .
Iraq launched Scud missiles against  गठबन्धन सैन्य लक्ष्य in सऊदी  Arabia and against Israel .
The nickel , in American usage , is a five- cent coin  जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य  Mint .
रचित of  75 % copper and 25 % nickel , the piece has been struck since 1866 .
The silver half dime , equal  to पाँच सेंट  , had been issued since the 1790s .
The American Civil War caused economic hardship , driving gold  और चांदी इससे परिसंचरण ; in जवाब  , in place of low-value coins , the government at first issued paper currency .
In 1865 , Congress abolished the  five-cent fractional करेंसी नोट बाद  Spencer M. Clark , head of the Currency Bureau ( today the Bureau of Engraving and Printing ) , placed his own portrait on the denomination .
After successful  परिचय of two-cent और three-cent टुकड़े  , without precious metal , Congress also authorized a five-cent piece consisting of base metal ; the Mint began striking this version in 1866 .
The initial design of the Shield nickel was struck until 1883 , then replaced  by the स्वतंत्रता  Head nickel .
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in 1913 as  भाग of a ड्राइव to बढ़ाएँ the सौंदर्य of  American coinage ; in 1938 , the Jefferson nickel followed .
in 2004 और 2005 , खास  designs in honor of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark Expedition were issued .
In 2006 , the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nickel designer Felix Schlag 's original  रिवर्स ( or `` tails '' पक्ष ) , हालांकि a  new obverse , by Jamie Franki , was substituted .
As of 2013 , it costs more than eleven cents to produce a nickel ; the Mint is exploring the  सम्भावना of reducing लागत by using  less expensive metals .
A poster with flowers or clusters of  पुष्प उत्पादित by बारह प्रजाति of  flowering plants from different families
A flower , sometimes known as a bloom or blossom , is the reproductive structure found in flowering plants ( plants of  the प्रभाग magnoliophyta , भी पुकारा  angiosperms ) .
The biological function of  a पुष्प is to  effect reproduction , usually by providing a mechanism for the union of sperm with eggs .
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from  अलग individuals in a जनसांख्यिकी )  or allow selfing ( fusion of sperm and egg from the same flower ) .
Some flowers produce diaspores  बगैर fertilization  ( parthenocarpy ) .
Flowers contain sporangia and are the site where   gametophytes develop .
Flowers give  वृद्धि to फल  and seeds .
Many flowers have evolved to be attractive to animals , so as to cause them to be  सदिश लिये the ट्रांसफ़र  of pollen .
In addition to  facilitating the जनन of flowering  plants , flowers have long been admired and used by humans to beautify their environment , and also as objects of romance , ritual , religion , medicine and as a source of food .
The McDonnell  डगलस ( अभी बोइंग ) f-15 त्रिभुज is a  twin-engine , all-weather tactical fighter designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat .
It is considered  among the सबसे कामयाब आधुनिक सेनानी  , with over 100 aerial combat victories with no losses in dogfights .
following समीक्षाएँ of प्रस्ताव , the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स चयनित mcdonnell  Douglas ' design in 1967 to meet the service 's need for a dedicated air superiority fighter .
The Eagle first flew in July 1972 , and  डाला सेवा  in 1976 .
Since the 1970s , the Eagle has  महरूम exported to इसराईल , जापानी , सऊदी  Arabia , and other nations .
The F-15 was originally envisioned  as a pure  air superiority aircraft .
Its design included a secondary ground-attack capability that was  largely अप्रयुक्त  .
The design proved flexible enough that an all-weather  स्ट्राइक डेरिवेटिव , the f-15e स्ट्राइक त्रिभुज  , was later developed , and entered service in 1989 .
The F-15  त्रिभुज is अपेक्षित  to be in service with the U.S. Air Force past 2025 .
Mimio is a brand name of a line of  प्रौद्योगिकी उत्पाद aimed  at the education market .
The primary products are focused around computer whiteboard  इंटरैक्टिव शिक्षण डिवाइस  .
mimiocapture डिवाइस  also allow users to capture all of the ink strokes that are written on the whiteboard .
When used in conjunction with a video projector it turns the  ordinary whiteboard सतह into  a fully interactive whiteboard .
The product line was originally  designed by आभासी  Ink .
On October 4 , 2006  newell rubbermaid acquired the  Mimio interactive whiteboard ( iWB ) product line .
rahab of  Jericho
Rahab , ( ; ; ) was , according to the Book of Joshua , a woman who lived in Jericho  in the promised जमीन और  assisted the Israelites in capturing the city .
Nearly all English translations of  जोशुआ describe  her as a harlot or prostitute .
The Organization of American States ( Spanish : Organización de los Estados Americanos ,  पुर्तगाली : organização डॉस estados americanos , फ्रेंच : संगठन  des États américains ) , or the OAS , is a regional international organization .
the oas थी संस्थापित on 30 अप्रैल 1948  , and has its headquarters in Washington , D.C. , United States .
Its members are the 35 independent states  of the  Americas .
Since 26 May 2005 , the  सचिव सामान्य of oas रै महरूम जोस  Miguel Insulza .
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo ; before 31 October 145120 May 1506 ) was an Italian explorer , navigator , and colonizer , born in the  गणतंत्र of जेनोआ , in कया  is today northwestern Italy .
अंतर्गत the  auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of Spain , he completed four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean that led to general European awareness of the American continents .
Those voyages , and his efforts to establish  स्थाई settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला  , initiated the Spanish colonization of the New World .
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking wealth through the establishment of trade routes and colonies , Columbus 's speculative proposal , to reach the East Indies by sailing westward , eventually received the support of the Spanish crown , which saw in it a promise , however remote , of gaining the upper  हाथ over प्रतिद्वंद्वी शक्तियां in the प्रतियोगिता लिये the lucrative मसाला व्यापार साथ  Asia .
During his first voyage in 1492 , instead of reaching Japan as he had intended , Columbus landed in the Bahamas archipelago , at  a locale he नामित सैन साल्वाडोर .
Over the course of three more voyages , Columbus visited the Greater and Lesser Antilles , as well as  the caribbean coast of वेनेजुएला और सेंट्रल  America , claiming them for the Spanish Empire .
Though Columbus was not the first European explorer  to पहुँचें the americas ( having महरूम preceded by the नॉर्स expedition led by leif ericson in the  11th century ) , Columbus 's voyages led to the first lasting European contact with the Americas , inaugurating a period of European exploration , conquest , and colonization that lasted for several centuries .
वे था , इसलिए , an  enormous impact in the historical development of the modern Western world .
Columbus himself saw his  accomplishments primarily  in the light of the spreading of the Christian religion .
Never admitting that he had reached a continent previously unknown to Europeans , rather than the East Indies he had  नियत आउट लिये , कोलंबस पुकारा the निवासियों of the  lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ) .
Columbus 's strained relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial administrators in America led to his  गिरफ़्तार और dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the  island of Hispaniola in 1500 , and later to protracted litigation over the benefits which Columbus and his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown .
Bred in Germany , the Boxer is a breed  of stocky , medium-sized  , short-haired dogs .
The coat is smooth and  tight-fitting ; रंगों हैं fawn or brindled  , with or without white markings , which may cover the entire body .
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have broad , short skulls ) , and have a square  muzzle , mandibular prognathism  ( an underbite ) , very strong jaws , and a powerful bite ideal for hanging on to large prey .
The Boxer was bred  इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी बुल और the अभी विलुप्त  Bullenbeisser , and is part of the Molosser group .
Boxers were first exhibited in a dog show  लिये st. bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895 , the पहला boxer  club being founded the next year .
Based on 2012 American Kennel Club statistics , Boxers held steady as the seventh most popular breed of dog in the United  राज्य लिये the तीसरा लगातार  year .
सीरियल ata ( sata ) is a कंप्यूटर  bus interface that connects host bus adapters to mass storage devices such as hard disk drives and optical drives .
Serial ATA replaces the  पुरानी at अनुलग्नक  standard ( ATA ; later referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ) , offering several advantages over the older interface : reduced cable size and cost ( seven conductors instead of 40 ) , native hot swapping , faster data transfer through higher signalling rates , and more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol .
SATA host adapters and devices communicate via a  high-speed सीरियल केबल over  two pairs of conductors .
In contrast , parallel ATA ( the redesignation for the legacy ATA specifications )  प्रयुक्त a 16-bit चौड़ी आंकड़ा बस साथ अनेक अतिरिक्त support और  control signals , all operating at much lower frequency .
To ensure backward compatibility with legacy ATA software and applications , SATA uses the  वही मौलिक ata और atapi command-set as विरासत  ATA devices .
SATA has  replaced समानांतर ata in उपभोक्ता डेस्कटॉप और लैपटॉप  computers , and has largely replaced PATA in new embedded applications .
sata 's मार्केट share in the  desktop PC market was 99 % in 2008 .
PATA remains widely used in industrial and embedded applications that use CompactFlash storage , even though the  नई cfast मानक  is based on SATA .
Serial ATA industry  संगतता  specifications originate from The Serial ATA International Organization ( aka .
sata-io  , serialata.org ) .
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates , reviews ,  ratifies , और publishes the interoperability  specifications , the test cases , and plug-fests .
As  साथ अनेक अन्य उद्योग संगतता  standards , the SATA content ownership is transferred to other industry bodies : primarily the INCITS T13 subcommittee ATA , the INCITS T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of T10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) .
The complete  specification  from SATA-IO .
The remainder of this article will  कोशिश to उपयोग the शब्दावली  and specifications of SATA-IO .
The history of the Internet began with the  विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर  in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead  to the अंतरजाल जब a संदेश  was sent over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California , Los Angeles ( UCLA ) , after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I at NPL in the UK , CYCLADES , Merit Network , Tymnet , and  telenet , यहूद विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s using a किस्में of प्रोटोकॉल  .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking , in which multiple separate networks could be  joined साथ into a संजाल  of networks .
In 1982 , the Internet  प्रोटोकॉल सुइट ( tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत , और नतीजतन  , the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the  कंप्यूटर विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) और again in 1986 जब nsfnet provided  access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations .
Commercial Internet  सेवा प्रदाताओं (  ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s .
The ARPANET was  decommissioned  in 1990 .
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned , removing the last restrictions on the use of  the अंतरजाल to carry वाणिज्यिक ट्रैफ़िक  .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce , including the rise of  near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल , तत्काल messaging , आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '' , two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स , और the संसार चौड़ी वेब साथ  its discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and online shopping sites .
The research  और शिक्षा जातियाँ continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे  as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and higher speeds   over fiber optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only  communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way दूरसंचार  networks in the year 1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007 .
Today the  अंतरजाल continues to grow , चलित by कभी वृहद  amounts of online information , commerce , entertainment , and social networking .

Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is a major character and protagonist of J. K.  रोलिंग 's हैरी कुम्हार श्रेणी  .
For most of the  श्रेणी , he is the हेडमास्टर  of the wizarding school Hogwarts .
As part of his backstory , it is revealed  कि he is the संस्थापक और नेता of the अनुक्रम of  the Phoenix , an organisation dedicated to fighting the main antagonist of the series , Lord Voldemort .
Dumbledore is portrayed by Richard Harris in the film adaptions of Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone and Harry  Potter and the  Chamber of Secrets .
After Harris ' death , Michael Gambon  portrayed डम्बल्डोर लिये सब  of the remaining films .
Rowling stated she chose  the नाम डम्बल्डोर , जिससे is an जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी  word for `` bumblebee `` , because of Dumbledore 's love of music : she imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot '' .
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide  हार्मोन कि is उत्पादित in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular कोशिकाएं ( भी  known as C-cells ) of the thyroid , and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body .
It acts to reduce blood  कैल्सियम ( ca2+  ) , opposing the effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) .
Calcitonin has been  मिला in मछली  , reptiles , birds , and mammals .
Its importance in humans has not been as well established as its importance in other animals , as its function is usually not  significant  in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis .
it belongs to calcitonin-like  protein family .
A  mousepad साथ  a padded wrist rest .
A  mousepad ( us )  or mouse mat ( UK ) is a surface for placing and moving a computer mouse .
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse directly on a  तालिका by providing a सतह to allow the  tracking LED or ball ( in former models ) to measure movement accurately and without jitter .
Some mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a  padded कलाई  rest .

the  Cincinnati Bengals ' Paul Brown Stadium is in the distance .
Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ) , later known as  cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ) , थी the घर of the सिनसिनाटी  Reds National League baseball team and the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team .
Located on the Ohio River in downtown Cincinnati , the stadium was  बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the घर of `` the बिग रेड यंत्र  `` , as the Reds were often called in the 1970s .
Construction began on February 1 , 1968 , and was completed at a  लागत  of less than $ 50 million .
On June 30 , 1970 , the  लाल  hosted the Atlanta Braves in their grand opening , with Hank Aaron hitting the first ever home run at Riverfront .
Two weeks later on July 14 , 1970 , Riverfront hosted the 1970 Major  लीग बेसबॉल all-star खेल  .
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed collision at home plate between  लाल स्टार पीट रोज़ और catcher  Ray Fosse of the Cleveland Indians .
In September 1996 ,  riverfront स्टेडियम थी renamed `` cinergy फ़ील्ड '' in a प्रायोजन सौदे साथ  Greater Cincinnati 's energy company , Cinergy Corporation .
In 2001 , to make room for Great  अमरीकी बॉल पार्क , the seating  capacity at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000 .
There was a huge wall in Center Field visible after the  renovations , to serve  as the batter 's eye .
the स्टेडियम थी demolished  by implosion on December 29 , 2002 .

The silent majority is an unspecified large majority  of लोगों in a देश or समूह  who do not express their opinions publicly .
The term was popularized  ( हालांकि नहीं पहला प्रयुक्त ) by u.S. अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड  Nixon in a November 3 , 1969 , speech in which he said , `` And so tonight—to you , the great silent majority of my fellow Americans—I ask for your support . ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans who did not join in the large demonstrations against the Vietnam War at the  समय , जो किया नहीं जुड़ें  in the counterculture , and who did not participate in public discourse .
Nixon along with many others saw this group of Middle  अमेरिकी as होने निष्प्रभ in the मीडिया  by the more vocal minority .
The phrase was used in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to all the people  जो have died , और अन्य have प्रयुक्त it पहले और बाद निक्सन to refer  to groups of voters in various nations of the world .
Sam , a rhesus monkey , flew to  an ऊँचाई of 88 km  in 1959 .
(  नासा )
Before humans went into space , several animals were launched into space , including numerous monkeys , so that scientists could investigate the  biological प्रभाव of स्पेस सफर  .
The United States launched flights containing primate cargo primarily  between 1948-1961 साथ एक उड़ान in 1969  and one in 1985 .
France launched  दो monkey-carrying फ़्लाइट  in 1967 .
The Soviet Union and  रूस  launched monkeys between 1983 and 1996 .
Most monkeys were anesthetized  पहले lift-off  .
Overall thirty-two monkeys flew in the  स्पेस कार्यक्रम ; none उड़ाया  more than once .
Numerous  back-up बंदरों  also went through the programs but never flew .
बंदरों इससे अनेक  species were used , including rhesus monkeys , cynomolgus monkeys , squirrel monkeys , and pig-tailed macaques .
Some chimpanzees ( which are  apes बल्कि than बंदरों )  were also used .
रेड ( अनावश्यक सरणी of स्वतंत्र डिस्क , originally  redundant array of inexpensive disks ) is a storage technology that combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit .
Data is distributed across the drives in one of several ways called `` RAID  स्तर '' , depending on the स्तर of अतिरेक  and performance required .
The term `` RAID '' was first defined by David Patterson , Garth  A. गिब्सन , और रैंडी katz at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया ,  Berkeley in 1987 .
Marketers  representing उद्योग रेड निर्माताओं बाद attempted to reinvent the पद to describe  a redundant array of independent disks as a means of disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology .
RAID is now used as an umbrella term for computer data storage schemes that can  divide और replicate आंकड़ा among अनेक  physical drives : RAID is an example of storage virtualization and the array can be accessed by the operating system as one single drive .
The different schemes or architectures are named by the word RAID followed by a  क्रमांक ( e.g . रेड 0 , रेड 1 )  .
Each scheme provides a  अलग संतुलन between the  key goals : reliability and availability , performance and capacity .
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide  सुरक्षा  against unrecoverable ( sector ) read errors , as well as whole disk failure .
A lymphocyte is a type of white blood cell in the  vertebrate प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली  .
Under the microscope ,  lymphocytes can be विभाजित into  large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes .
Large granular  lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल  cells ( NK cells ) .
Small lymphocytes consist of T cells  और b कोशिकाएं  .
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy film written and  निर्देशित by  Joel and Ethan Coen .
जेफ़ पुलों सितारों as जेफ़ lebowski  , an unemployed Los Angeles slacker and avid bowler , nicknamed `` The Dude . ''
After a case of mistaken identity , The Dude is  introduced to a करोड़पति  also named Jeffrey Lebowski .
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped , he commissions The Dude to deliver the ransom to  सुरक्षित उसके रिलीज  .
The plan goes awry when The Dude 's friend Walter Sobchak ( John Goodman )  योजनाएं to रखना the पूरा फिरौती  .
Steve  buscemi , फिलिप seymour हॉफमन , दाउद huddleston  , Julianne Moore , Tara Reid , and John Turturro also star in the film , which is narrated by a cowboy known only as `` The Stranger '' , played by Sam Elliott .
the फिल्मी  is loosely inspired by the work of Raymond Chandler .
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a Chandler kind of story – how it moves episodically , and deals with the characters trying to unravel a mystery ,  as खूब as having a hopelessly जटिल प्लाट कि 's ultimately महत्वहीन .  ''
The original score was composed by Carter Burwell , a  longtime collaborator of the कोएन  Brothers .
The Big Lebowski was a disappointment at the U.S. box office and received mixed reviews at the time  of इसके रिलीज .
Reviews have trended towards the positive over time , and the film has become a cult favorite , noted for its idiosyncratic characters ,  सपना sequences ,  unconventional dialogue , and eclectic soundtrack .
Severus Snape is a fictional character in the Harry Potter book series  लिखा by j.K. रोलिंग  .
In the first novel of the series , he is hostile toward Harry and is built up to be  the प्राथमिक विपक्षी जबतक  the final chapters .
As the series progresses ,  snape 's अक्षर  becomes more layered and complex .
Rowling does not fully reveal the details of his  सच्चा loyalties जबतक the समाप्त of the फाइनल  book , Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows .
Over the course  of the श्रेणी , snape 's portrayal  evolves from that of a malicious and partisan teacher to that of a pivotal character of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity .
Snape primarily teaches Potions at Hogwarts , though in the sixth novel he teaches Defence Against the   Dark Arts , a position which he was known to have desired throughout the series .
He ultimately  becomes हेडमास्टर  of Hogwarts in the final novel .
Rowling has described him as `` a gift of  a अक्षर ''  .
grits refers to a ground-corn खाना of देशी  American origin , that is common in the Southern United States and mainly eaten at breakfast .
Modern grits are commonly made of alkali-treated  मकई ज्ञात as hominy  .
Grits are similar to other thick maize-based porridges from around the world  ऐसे as polenta or the  thinner farina .
`` Instant  grits '' have  been processed to speed cooking .
The word `` grits '' derives from  the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी शब्द `` grytt , ''  meaning coarse meal .
This word originally referred to wheat and other porridges now known as groats  in भाग of  the U.K..
Maize , unknown in Europe in the Middle Ages , is a food derived  इससे मकई ( a नई संसार संयंत्र ) और ``  corn '' had been used to describe wheat products in many European regions .
`` Grits '' may be either singular or plural ; historically , in the American South the word was invariably singular notwithstanding its plural form ( cf . such food names  as `` स्पघेटी '' or `` linguine '' , likewise बहुवचन in रूप  , but singular in use ) .
Sometimes , grits are called sofkee or  sofkey ( इससे a देशी  American Muskogee word ) .
In molecular biology , human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone  उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा बाद धारणा  .
बाद दौरान गर्भावस्था it is बना by  the developing placenta , and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast .
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore , elevated levels measured when the patient is not  गर्भवती can सीसे  to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not  ज्ञात whether इस उत्पादन is a contributing  cause or an effect of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as luteinizing  हार्मोन ( lh ) , is  produced in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages .
,  the एफडीए रै निषिद्ध the  sale of `` homeopathic '' and over the counter hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal .
The Las Vegas Strip World  of coca-cola संग्रहालय  in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores  , रेस्तरां , और वेंडिंग मशीने  in every country except Cuba and North Korea .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta , Georgia , and is  प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a  registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs  candler , जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to इसके दबदबा of the संसार soft-drink मार्केट throughout  the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then  बेची  to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company , produce finished product in cans and bottles from  the concentrate  in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell , distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail  स्टोर्स और वेंडिंग मशीने  .
Such  bottlers शामिल coca-cola  Enterprises , which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western Europe .
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for  सोडा  fountains to major restaurants and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has , on occasion , introduced other cola drinks under  the कोक ब्रांड  name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free ,  coca-cola चेरी , coca-cola शून्य  , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011 , Coca-Cola was  the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान  brand .
An ombudsman is an official , usually appointed by the government or by parliament but with a significant degree of independence , who is charged with representing the interests of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of  maladministration or उल्लंघन of  rights .
In some countries an Inspector General , Citizen Advocate or other official may have duties similar to those of  a नेशनल ombudsman , और may भी be नियुक्त by the विधानमंडल  .
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state , local or municipal government , and  unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by , or भी कार्य लिये , a निगम ऐसे as a यूटिलिटी  supplier or a newspaper , for an NGO , or for a professional regulatory body .
Whether appointed by the legislature , the executive , or an organization ( or , less frequently , elected by the constituency that he or she serves ) ,  the ठेठ कर्तव्य of an ombudsman हैं to investigate शिकायत और attempt to निराकरण उन्हें , प्रायः through  recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation .
Ombudsmen sometimes also aim to  पहचानो प्रणालीगत मुद्दे अग्रणी to ग़रीब सेवा or breaches  of people 's rights .
At the national level , most ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal with  the संपूर्ण पब्लिक सेक्टर , और sometimes भी  elements of the private sector ( for example , contracted service providers ) .
In some cases , there is a more  प्रतिबंधित जनादेश  , for example with particular sectors of society .
More  हाल developments have शामिल the सृष्टि  of specialised Children 's Ombudsman and Information Commissioner agencies .
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns about national government is more formally referred to as the `` Parliamentary  कमिश्नर '' ( e.g . the संयुक्त किंगडम संसदीय कमिश्नर लिये प्रशासन  , and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ) .
In many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing with alleged maladministration to  promoting और protecting इंसान अधिकारों , the ombudsman  is recognised as the national human rights institution .
The post of ombudsman had by  the समाप्त of the 20th सदी महरूम instituted by सबसे सरकारें  and by some intergovernmental organizations such as the European Union .
बनाना a शिकायत to  an ombudsman is usually free of charge .
