New  इंग्लैण्ड  is a region in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of the six states of Maine , New Hampshire , Vermont , Massachusetts , Rhode Island , and Connecticut .
New England is bordered  by नई यॉर्क राज्य to the दक्षिणपश्चिम , क्यूबेक  to the northwest , and New Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the east .
In one of the earliest English settlements in North America , Pilgrims  इससे इंग्लैण्ड पहला settled  in New England in 1620 , to form Plymouth Colony .
Ten years  बाद , the puritans settled उत्तर of plymouth  Colony in Boston , thus forming Massachusetts Bay Colony .
Over the next 130 years , New England fought in four French and Indian Wars ,  जबतक the अंग्रेजों पराजित the फ्रेंच  and their native allies in North America .
In  the लेट 18th सदी , the  New England Colonies initiated the resistance to the British Parliament 's efforts to impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists .
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded  साथ a श्रेणी of दंडात्मक कानून stripping मैसाचुसेट्स  of self-government , which were termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists .
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775 , the expulsion of the British authorities  इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड in वसन्त 1776 , और the घोषणा  of Independence in July 1776 .
Some of the first movements of American literature , philosophy , and education originated in New   England .
The region played a prominent  भूमिका in the गति to abolish गुलामी ,  and was the first region of the United States to be transformed by the Industrial Revolution .
Today , New  इंग्लैण्ड is  a major world center of education , high technology , insurance , and medicine .
Boston is its cultural , financial  , शैक्षणिक , चिकित्सा और परिवहन  center .
Each state is principally subdivided  into छोटी incorporated municipalities ज्ञात as नई  England towns , which are often governed by town meeting .
The only  unincorporated territory in नई इंग्लैण्ड exists in the sparse  , northern regions of Vermont , New Hampshire , and Maine .
Since 1970 , voters have more  प्रायः समर्थित उदार उम्मीदवार at  the state and federal level than those of any other region in the United States .
New England is the only one of the United  राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's नौ क्षेत्रीय विभाजन जिनकी  name does not derive from its geography , and it is the only multi-state region with clear , consistent boundaries .
It  maintains a दमदार भाव of सांस्कृतिक पहचान नियत अलावा इससे the बाकी of the देश  , although the terms of this identity are often contested , combining Puritanism with liberalism , agrarian life with industry , and isolation with immigration .
आपात  !
is an  अमरीकी टेलीविज़न  series that combines the medical drama and action-adventure genres .
It was produced by Mark VII Limited and  वितरित by सार्वभौमिक  Studios .
It debuted as a midseason replacement on January 15 , 1972 , on NBC , replacing the two short-lived series The Partners  और the शुभ जीवन , और भागा जबतक सितंबर 3 , 1977 , साथ छह अतिरिक्त two-hour टेलीविज़न films  during the following two years .
आपात  !
was created and produced by Jack Webb and Robert A. Cinader , both of whom were also  जिम्मेदार लिये the पुलिस dramas adam-12 और dragnet .
The Eastern Time Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 U.S. states in the eastern  भाग of the संलग्न संयुक्त  States , parts of Canada and three countries in South America .
Places that use Eastern Standard Time ( EST ) when  observing मानक  time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ) , when observing  daylight छायांकन समय ( spring/summer  ) is 4 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
In the northern parts of the time zone , during the second Sunday in March , at 2:00 a.m. EST , clocks are advanced to 3:00 a.m. EDT  leaving a एक घंटा `` गैप . ''
During the first Sunday in November , at  2:00 a.m. edt , घड़ियाँ  are moved back to 1:00 a.m. EST , thus `` duplicating '' one hour .
Southern parts of the zone ( Panama and the Caribbean ) do  नहीं observe daylight  saving .
Standard form of the  आवधिक तालिका .
The colors  represent अलग  categories of elements explained below .
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements , organized on the basis  of their  atomic numbers , electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties .
Elements are presented in order of increasing atomic number (  क्रमांक of  protons ) .
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body  of तत्व , positioned ऊपर a छोटी  double row of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left , the p-block to the right , the d-block in the  मध्य , और the f-block नीचे कि  .
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s- , d- , and p-blocks are called groups ,  साथ कुछ of ये having  names such as the halogens or the noble gases .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates  पुनरावर्ती रुझान , कोई ऐसे तालिका can be प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध  between the properties of the elements and predict the properties of new , yet to be discovered or synthesized , elements .
As a  परिणाम , a आवधिक table—whether in the मानक  form or some other variant—provides a useful framework for analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
Although precursors exist , Dmitri  mendeleev is generally credited  with the publication , in 1869 , of the first widely recognized periodic table .
He developed his table to illustrate  आवधिक रुझान  in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that would be  अपेक्षित to भरण गैप in इस  table .
Most of his predictions were  proved सही जब  the elements in question were subsequently discovered .
Mendeleev 's periodic table  रै चूंकि महरूम विस्तारित  and refined with the discovery or synthesis of further new elements and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior .
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen  ) to 118 ( ununoctium  ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been  मिला to मौजूद naturally  , although some are found only in trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories .
The elements  बाद 98 have  only been synthesized in laboratories .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued , with the question  of कैसा the आवधिक तालिका may need to be परिवर्धित  to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides  of naturally occurring तत्व  have also been produced in laboratories .
Minecraft is a sandbox indie game originally created by  स्वीडिश प्रोग्रामर markus `` पायदान '' persson और बाद  developed and published by Mojang .
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17 , 2009 , as a developmental  अल्फा संस्करण और , बाद क्रमिक  updates , was published as a full release version on November 18 , 2011 .
A  संस्करण लिये एंड्रॉइड थी released  a month earlier on October 7 , and an iOS version was released on November 17 , 2011 .
On May 9 , 2012 , the game was released on Xbox 360 as an Xbox Live  आर्केड खेल , co-developed by  4J Studios .
All  संस्करण  of Minecraft receive periodic updates .
The creative and building aspects of Minecraft allow players to build  constructions आउट of textured  cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world .
Other activities in the game include exploration ,  महफ़िल संसाधन , crafting  and combat .
Gameplay in its commercial release has two  प्रिंसिपल मोड्स : अस्तित्व , जिससे  requires players to acquire resources and maintain their health and hunger ; and creative , where players have an unlimited supply of resources , the ability to fly , and no health or hunger .
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as  अस्तित्व , differing तभी in परेशानी ; it is  set to hardest setting and respawning is disabled , forcing players to delete their worlds upon death .
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game Developers  सम्मेलन : it थी awarded the नवीनता पुरस्कार , बेहतरीन downloadable खेल पुरस्कार , और the बेहतरीन  Debut Game Award from the Game Developers Choice Awards ; and the Audience Award , as well as the Seumas McNally Grand Prize , from the Independent Games Festival in 2011 .
In 2012 , Minecraft was  awarded a सुनहरी जॉयस्टिक पुरस्कार in  the category Best Downloadable Game .
As of April 8 , 2013 , the  खेल रै बेची over 10 लाख  copies on PC and as of January 22 , 2013 , over 20 million copies across all platforms .
The Dark Knight is a 2008 British-American  सुपरहीरो फिल्मी निर्देशित , उत्पादित , और co-written  by Christopher Nolan .
Based on the DC Comics character Batman , the film is the second part of Nolan 's Batman  फिल्मी श्रेणी और a sequel to 2005 's बैटमैन  Begins .
Christian Bale reprises the  सीसे भूमिका of ब्रूस wayne/batman , साथ a  returning cast of Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth , Gary Oldman as James Gordon and Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox .
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent  ( आरोन eckhart ) , गोथम 's newly निर्वाचित ज़िला attorney और the consort of ब्रूस वेन  's childhood friend Rachel Dawes ( Maggie Gyllenhaal ) , who joins Batman and the police in combating the new rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ) .
Nolan 's inspiration for the film was the Joker 's comic book debut in 1940 , the 1988 graphic novel  , और the 1996 श्रेणी , जिससे retold  Two-Face 's origin .
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to  बैटमैन in बैटमैन no .  1 ( 1940 ) , in a story written by Bill Finger .
The Dark Knight was filmed primarily in Chicago , as well as in several other locations in the United States ,  the संयुक्त किंगडम ,  and Hong Kong .
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some  sequences , सहित  the Joker 's first appearance in the film .
On January 22 , 2008 , some months after he had completed filming on The Dark Knight and six months before the film 's release , Heath Ledger died from a toxic combination of prescription drugs ,  अग्रणी to तीव्र ध्यान  from the press and movie-going public .
Warner Bros. had initially created a viral marketing campaign for The Dark Knight  , विकासशील promotional वेबसाइटों और trailers highlighting स्क्रीन गोलियाँ  of Ledger as the Joker , but after Ledger 's death , the studio refocused its promotional campaign .
The Dark Knight was released on July 16 , 2008 in Australia , on July 18 ,  2008 in उत्तर अमेरिका , और on जुलाई 24 ,  2008 in the United Kingdom .
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the best superhero films ever made , the film received highly positive reviews and set numerous records during its theatrical   run .
With over $ 1 billion in revenue  विश्वव्यापी  , it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of all time , unadjusted for inflation .
The film received eight Academy Award  nominations ; it जीती the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि  Editing and Ledger was posthumously awarded Best Supporting Actor .
The Dark Knight Rises , the final  भाग of the  trilogy , was released on July 20 , 2012 .
The timeline of radio lists within the history of radio , the technology and events that  उत्पादित यंत्र कि उपयोग रेडियो लहरें और क्रियाएँ  that people undertook .
Later , the history is dominated by programming and contents  , जिससे is करीब to  general history .
The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue  performing कला केन्द्र in  New South Wales , Australia .
It was conceived and largely built by Danish architect Jørn Utzon ,  खोलने in 1973 बाद a long gestation कि  began with his competition-winning design in 1957 .
Joseph Cahill 's New South Wales Government gave the go-ahead  लिये कार्य  to begin in 1958 .
The government 's bold decision to select  utzon 's डिज़ाइन is प्रायः निष्प्रभ  by the scandal that followed .
It is on Bennelong Point in Sydney Harbour , close  to the सिडनी harbour सेतु  .
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central business district ( the CBD ) ,  घिरी on तीन पहलू by the harbour ( सिडनी कोव और फार्म  Cove ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens .
Contrary to its name , it houses multiple performance  venues  .
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the world , hosting over 1,500 performances each  साल attended by कुछ 1.2 लाख लोगों  .
It provides a venue for many performing-arts companies , including the four key resident companies Opera Australia , The Australian Ballet , the Sydney Theatre Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra  , और presents a चौड़ी दायरा of  productions on its own account .
It is also one of  the सबसे लोकप्रिय आगंतुक आकर्षण in ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , with more than seven million people visiting each year , 300,000 of whom take a guided tour .
It is administered by  the सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस विश्वास , अंतर्गत  the New South Wales Ministry of the Arts .
On 28 June 2007 , it was made a  युनेस्को  World Heritage Site .
It is one of the 20th century 's  सबसे distinctive इमारतें और एक of  the most famous performing arts centres in the world .
A graph of body mass index as a function of  देह द्रव्यमान और देह ऊँचाई  is shown above .
The dashed lines  represent  subdivisions within a major class .
For instance the `` Underweight '' classification is  further विभाजित into `` कठोर  '' , `` moderate '' , and `` mild '' subclasses .
The body mass  अनुक्रमणिका ( बीएमआई ) , or quetelet  index , is a measure for human body shape based on an individual 's weight and height .
it थी devised between 1830 और 1850  by the Belgian polymath Adolphe Quetelet during the course of developing `` social physics '' .
Body mass index is defined as the individual 's body mass  विभाजित by  the square of their height .
the formulae universally  used in medicine produce a unit of measure of kg/m2 .
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart , which displays BMI as a  फलन of वज़न ( आड़ा अक्ष  ) and height ( vertical axis ) using contour lines for different values of BMI or colors for different BMI categories .
† The factor for UK/US units is more precisely  703.06957964 , लकिन कि स्तर of परिशुद्धता  is not meaningful for this calculation .
To work from stone and pounds first multiply the stone by 14 then add the pounds to give the whole mass in pounds ; to work from feet  और इंच पहला गुणा the फीट by 12 तब add the इंच to  give the whole height in inches .
Thomas Paine ( January 29 , 1737 ( NS February 9 , 1737 ) – June  8 , 1809 ) थी an english-american राजनैतिक activist  , author , political theorist and revolutionary .
As the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the start of the American Revolution , he inspired  the देशप्रेमी in 1776  to declare independence from Britain .
His ideas reflected Enlightenment era rhetoric of  transnational इंसान अधिकारों .
He has been called `` a corsetmaker by trade , a journalist by  व्यवसायिक , और a propagandist  by inclination . ''
Born in Thetford , England , in the county of Norfolk , Paine emigrated  to the अंग्रेजों अमरीकी  colonies in 1774 with the help of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in time to participate in the American Revolution .
His principal contributions were the powerful , widely read pamphlet Common  भाव ( 1776 ) , the all-time best-selling  American book that advocated colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain , and The American Crisis ( 1776–83 ) , a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series .
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams said ,  `` बगैर the  pen of the author of Common Sense , the sword of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France for most of the 1790s ,  बनने deeply शामिल  in the French Revolution .
He wrote the Rights of Man ( 1791 ) , in part a  रक्षा of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति  against its critics .
His attacks on British writer Edmund Burke led to a trial and conviction in absentia in 1792 for the crime  of seditious मानहानि  .
In 1792 , despite  नहीं होने समर्थ to बोलो  French , he was elected to the French National Convention .
The Girondists  regarded उसे as an  ally .
Consequently , the Montagnards ,  विशेषकर robespierre , regarded  him as an enemy .
In December 1793 , he was  गिरफ्तार और imprisoned  in Paris , then released in 1794 .
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ) , his book that  अधिवक्ताओं देववाद , promotes कारण और freethinking , और argues  against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular .
He  भी लिखा the pamphlet  Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ) , discussing the origins of property , and introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income .
In 1802 , he  लौटे to अमेरिका  where he died on June 8 , 1809 .
Only six  लोगों attended उसके अंत्येष्टि as he था  been ostracized for his ridicule of Christianity .
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and efficacy data  ( or अधिक specifically , सूचना परिचय प्रतिकूल ड्रग प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of अन्य  treatments ) for health interventions ( e.g. , drugs , diagnostics , devices , therapy protocols ) .
They are conducted only after  संतोषजनक सूचना रै महरूम  gathered on the quality of the non clinical safety , and health authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought .
Previously , many emerging countries  किया नहीं आवश्यकता लोकल ट्रायल  for product approvals .
Now , though emerging countries still accept data  इससे u.s./europe , वे भी आवश्यकता  some local trials .
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its development , investigators  initially enroll स्वयंसेवक and/or  patients into small pilot studies , and subsequently conduct larger scale studies in patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest .
As  धनात्मक सुरक्षा और efficacy  data are gathered , the number of patients is typically increased .
Clinical trials can vary in size , and  can involve a सिंगल शोध एंटिटी in एक देश or  many such entities in multiple countries .
A full series of trials may incur sizable costs , and the burden of paying for all the necessary people and services is usually borne  by the प्रायोजक , जिससे may be a सरकारी संगठन  or a pharmaceutical , biotechnology or medical device company .
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the sponsor , a clinical trial is managed by an outsourced partner , such as a  अनुबंध शोध संगठन or a नैदानिक ट्रायल ईकाई in  the academic sector .
The Green Bay  पैकर्स हैं an अमरीकी  football team based in Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They are members of the North Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football  लीग  ( NFL ) .
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the  एनएफएल , having महरूम व्यवस्थित  and playing in 1919 .
The Packers are the only non-profit , community-owned major league  पेशेवर खेल टोली  in the United States .
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were once common in  the एनएफएल दौरान the 1920s और 1930s  .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George  व्हिटनी calhoun , the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional  teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the  पैकर्स competed as a semi-professional  football team against clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest .
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921 , the  forerunner to कया is  known today as the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team , its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ;  the टोली भी निभाई चयनित  home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ) , including  नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in  1967 ( Super Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing , bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the  nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , the शिकागो  Bears , Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions .
The  bears-packers फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries  in NFL history , dating back to 1921 .
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol ) , the same type of alcohol found in  alcoholic पेय  .
It is most often used as a motor fuel , mainly  as a biofuel योगात्मक लिये  gasoline .
World ethanol production for transport fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 from 17 billion to  अधिक than 52 अरब liters  .
From 2007 to 2008 , the share  of इथेनॉल in वैश्विक  gasoline type fuel use increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 % .
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ) , with the  संयुक्त राज्य as the शीर्ष निर्माता साथ 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ) , हिसाब  for 62.2 % of global production , followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ) .
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline gallon  equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of , जिससे  means 1.5 gallons of ethanol produce the energy of one gallon of gasoline .
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and in the United States , and together both  देशों यहूद  responsible for 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011 .
Most cars on the road today in the U.S. can run on blends of up to 10 % ethanol , and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S.  गैसोलीन ईंधन सप्लाई  derived from domestic sources in 2011 .
Since 1976 the Brazilian government has made it mandatory to blend ethanol with gasoline , and since 2007 the  विधिक मिश्रण is around 25 %  ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ) .
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet  of 14.8 लाख flex-fuel ऑटोमोबाइल और  light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycles that regularly use neat ethanol fuel ( known as E100 ) .
Bioethanol is a form of renewable energy that can  be उत्पादित इससे agricultural  feedstocks .
It can be  बना इससे बहुत आम फसलों  such as sugar cane , potato , manioc and corn .
There has been  considerable बहस परिचय कैसा उपयोगी  bioethanol will be in replacing gasoline .
Concerns about its production and use relate to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required for  फसलों , as खूब as the उर्जा और प्रदूषण  balance of the whole cycle of ethanol production , especially from corn .
Recent developments with cellulosic ethanol production and commercialization  may allay कुछ of ये चिंताएं  .
Cellulosic  इथेनॉल offers वादा क्युकी cellulose मछली , a प्रमुख और सार्वभौमिक  component in plant cells walls , can be used to produce ethanol .
According to  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी , cellulosic इथेनॉल could allow  ethanol fuels to play a much bigger role in the future than previously thought .

A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987 , before  कदम यहूद removed in 1992  and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo  हत्या  ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 ,  archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड  of Austria , heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne , and his wife , Sophie , Duchess of Hohenberg , were shot dead in Sarajevo , by Gavrilo Princip , one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so they could be combined into a Greater Serbia  or a  Yugoslavia .
The assassins ' motives were  सतत साथ the गति  that later became known as Young Bosnia .
Serbian military  अधिकारियों  stood behind the attack .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin  dimitrijević  , his righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić , and Masterspy Rade Malobabić .
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs and pistols and   trained them .
The assassins were given access to  the वही clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić  used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the  कुंजी सदस्यों of the clandestine  tunnel , and the key Serbian military conspirators who were still alive were arrested , tried , convicted and punished .
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were  आजमाया in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर  1914 .
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia  चलाया तीन of the शीर्ष सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों  .
Much of what is known about the assassinations comes from these two trials and  सम्बन्धित रिकॉर्ड  .
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month   later .
Renée Kathleen  zellweger ( born अप्रैल 25 ,  1969 ) is an American actress and producer .
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ) , and subsequently received two nominations for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her roles as Bridget Jones in the comedy Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ) , and as Roxie Hart in the musical  शिकागो ( 2002  ) .
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her  प्रदर्शन in the नाटक ठंडा  Mountain ( 2003 ) .
She has won an Academy Award , three  सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार , तीन  Screen Actors Guild Awards , and a BAFTA Award ; was named Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007 .
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the three smallest  हड्डियों in the इंसान देह ,  the malleus , the incus and the stapes .
They are contained within the middle ear space and  serve to संचारण ध्वनि इससे the  air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ) .
The absence  of the auditory  ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss .
The term `` ossicles '' literally means `` tiny bones ''  और commonly refers to the auditory  ossicles , though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body .
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke  kaine ) is a biblical  interpretation originally derived from a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah , in the Hebrew Scriptures .
It is often  विचार of as an eschatological  Messianic Age or world to come and is related to the biblical concept of the Kingdom of God .
Generally , Christians believe that the New Covenant was  instituted at the पिछला भोजन as भाग of the eucharist , जिससे  in the Gospel of John includes the New Commandment .
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant , as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing relationship between Christian believers and God that will be in full fruition after the Second  coming of मसीह ; कि is , it होगा  not only be in full fruition in believing hearts , but in the future external world as well .
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the New Covenant is seen in  सबसे आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद  of the New Testament with the saying : `` this cup that is poured out for you is the new covenant in my blood '' .
Christians believe that Jesus is the mediator of the New Covenant , and that the Blood of Christ shed at his  crucifixion is the जरूरी रक्त of the वचन  .
As with all covenants between God and man described in the Bible , the New Covenant is  माना `` a बंध in रक्त sovereignly  administered by God . ''
It has been theorized that the New Covenant is the Law of Christ as spoken during  उसके उपदेश on the  Mount .
The following List of people pardoned or granted clemency by the President  of the संयुक्त राज्य दस्तावेज़ the सबसे  prominent cases of each presidency .
As granted by the Constitution (  आलेख ii , खण्ड 2 , clause 1 ) , राष्ट्रपतियों have the शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया in एक or अधिक of the  following ways : the ability to grant a full pardon , to commute a sentence , or to rescind a fine .
U.S. Presidents have no power to  ग्रान्ट दया लिये  crimes prosecuted under state law .
As to the difference between a pardon and a  commutation:
A pardon is  an कार्यपालिका  order vacating a conviction .
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently serving a sentence for a crime pursuant to a  conviction , बगैर vacating the conviction  itself .
Approximately 20,000 pardons and clemencies were issued by U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  in the 20th century alone .
The  रिकॉर्ड of अधिनियमों  of clemency were public until 1934 .
In 1981 the Office  of the pardon attorney  was created and records from President H. W. Bush forward are now listed .
This  सूची शामिल  pardons and commutations .
Tampa ( ) is a city in the U.S. state  of फ्लोरिडा  .
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is located  on the वेस्ट coast of  Florida , on Tampa Bay near the Gulf of Mexico .
The population of Tampa in 2011 was  346,037  .
the वर्तमान स्थान of tampa थी एकबार inhabited by स्वदेशी peoples of the  Safety Harbor culture , most notably the Tocobaga and the Pohoy , who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay .
It was briefly explored by Spanish explorers in the early 16th century , but there were no  स्थाई अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements भीतर  today 's city limits until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819 .
In 1824 , the United States Army  स्थापित a frontier चौकी  called Fort Brooke at the mouth of the Hillsborough River , near the site of today 's Tampa Convention Center .
The first  civilian निवासियों यहूद pioneers जो  settled near the fort for protection from the nearby Seminole population .
The town grew slowly until the 1880s , when railroad links , the discovery of phosphate , and the arrival of the cigar industry jump-started  tampa 's विकास और helped it to grow into  an important city by the early 1900s .
आज , tampa is  a part of the metropolitan area most commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay Area .
For U.S. Census purposes , Tampa is part of the Tampa-St.  petersburg-clearwater , फ्लोरिडा महानगर  Statistical Area .
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents , making it the second largest  महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) in the राज्य , और the चौथी largest in the  Southeastern United States , behind Miami , Washington , D.C. , and Atlanta .
The Greater Tampa Bay area has just over 4  लाख निवासियों और generally शामिल  the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas .
The Tampa Bay Partnership  और u.S. जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़ा दिखाया an औसत सालाना विकास of 2.47 प्रतिशत  , or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year .
Between 2000 and 2006 , the  वृहद tampa खाड़ी मार्केट अनुभवी a संयुक्त विकास रेट of  14.8 percent , growing from 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1 , 2007 .
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have  4,310,524 लोगों और a 2017  projection of 4,536,854 people .
Tampa has a number of sports teams , such as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League , the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League , and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League .
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League Baseball and the Tampa Bay Rowdies of the North American  सॉकर लीग खेल उनके घर  games in neighboring St. Petersburg , Florida .
In 2008 , Tampa was ranked as the  5th बेहतरीन बाहरी  city by Forbes .
A 2004 survey by the  nyu समाचारपत्र  Washington Square News ranked Tampa as a top city for `` twenty-somethings . ''
Tampa is now ranked as a `` Gamma '' world city by  loughborough विश्वविद्यालयों  .
According to  loughborough , tampa बाँधने alongside अन्य संसार  cities such as Phoenix , Santo Domingo , and Osaka .
In recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in  high-market माँग इससे उपभोक्ता , signaling अधिक  wealth concentrated in the area .
Tampa  hosted the  2012 Republican National Convention .
The Chevrolet Cavalier  थी a कॉम्पैक्ट ऑटोमोबाइल उत्पादित  from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors .
निर्मित on the कम्पनी 's  J platform , the Cavalier produced the highest sales in 1984 .
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and  referred to as at & t ( formerly cingular बेतार llc ) , is a wholly स्वामित्व  subsidiary of AT & T Inc. that provides wireless services to 107 million subscribers in the United States , including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands .
AT & T Mobility is the second largest wireless telecommunications provider in the United States and Puerto Rico , behind  verizon बेतार , जिससे serves 115.78 लाख ग्राहक as of the  fourth quarter of 2012 .
AT & T Mobility  is headquartered in  the Lenox Park area of DeKalb Co. Georgia , just outside Atlanta .
originally cingular बेतार llc इससे 2000 to 2007 , a संयुक्त venture  between SBC Communications and BellSouth , the company acquired the old AT & T Wireless in 2004 ; SBC later acquired the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T '' .
Cingular  became wholly  owned by AT & T in December 2006 as a result of AT & T 's acquisition of BellSouth .
In January 2007 ,  cingular पुष्टि it होता  re-brand itself under the AT & T name .
हालांकि the विधिक कॉरपोरेट नाम बदलें occurred तत्काल , लिये दोनो नियामक और brand-awareness कारण दोनो ब्रांड्स यहूद प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's साइनेज और विज्ञापन दौरान a परिवर्तन काल .
The transition  concluded in लेट  June , just prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone .
On March 20 , 2011 , AT & T Mobility announced its intention to acquire T-Mobile USA  इससे डॉयचे  Telekom for $ 39 billion .
If it had received  सरकारी और  regulatory approval , AT & T would have had more than 130 million subscribers .
However , the U.S. Department of Justice , the Federal Communications Commission , and AT & T Mobility 's competitors ( such as Sprint  nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds कि it होता reduce  competition in the cellular communications market .
In December 2011 , in the face of both governmental and widespread  उपभोक्ता विपक्ष  , AT & T withdrew their offer to complete the merger .
Martin Luther King , Jr. (  जनवरी 15 , 1929 – अप्रैल 4 , 1968 )  was an American clergyman , activist , and leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement .
He is best known for his role in the advancement of civil rights using  nonviolent सिविल disobedience  .
King has become a  नेशनल प्रतीक  in the history of American progressivism .
A  बैपटिस्ट मंत्री , किंग  became a civil rights activist early in his career .
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus Boycott and helped  मिला the दक्षिणी ईसाई नेतृत्व  Conference ( SCLC ) in 1957 , serving as its first president .
With the SCLC , King led an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in Albany , Georgia , in 1962 ,  और व्यवस्थित nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम , अलबामा , कि  attracted national attention following television news coverage of the brutal police response .
King also helped to organize the 1963 March  on वॉशिंगटन , जहाँ  he delivered his `` I Have a Dream `` speech .
वहीँ , he स्थापित  his reputation as one of the greatest orators in American history .
He also established his reputation as a radical , and became an  ऑब्जेक्ट of the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन  's COINTELPRO for the rest of his life .
FBI agents investigated him for possible communist ties , recorded his extramarital liaisons and reported on them to government officials , and on one occasion , mailed King a threatening anonymous  अक्षर कि he interpreted as an attempt to मेक उसे कमिट आत्महत्या  .
On October 14 , 1964 , King received the  नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार लिये combating जातिगत  inequality through nonviolence .
In 1965 , he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to Montgomery marches and the  following साल , he took the गति  north to Chicago .
In the final years of  उसके जीवन , किंग विस्तारित उसके फ़ोकस to शामिल गरीबी  and the Vietnam War , alienating many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam '' .
King was planning a national  occupation of वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. , called the Poor People 's Campaign .
King  थी assassinated on अप्रैल 4  , 1968 , in Memphis , Tennessee .
His death was followed by riots in many U.S.  शहरों  .
Allegations that James Earl Ray , the man convicted of killing King ,  था महरूम framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ सरकारी एजेंटों persisted लिये दशकों  after the shooting , and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King .
King was awarded the  अध्यक्षीय पदक  of Freedom and the Congressional Gold Medal posthumously .
Martin Luther King , Jr.  दिन  was established as a U.S. federal holiday in 1986 .
Hundreds of streets in the U.S.  have महरूम renamed  in his honor .
A memorial statue on the National Mall was opened to the public  in  2011 .
The tiger ( Panthera tigris ) is  the largest बिल्ली प्रजाति , reaching a कुल  body length of up to and weighing up to .
It is the third largest land carnivore ( behind only the  ध्रुवीय भालू और the  brown bear ) .
Its most recognizable feature is a pattern of dark vertical stripes  on reddish-orange फर  with a lighter underside .
It has exceptionally stout  दांत , और the canines  are the longest among living felids with a crown height of as much as or even .
In zoos , tigers have lived for 20 to 26 years , which  भी seems to be उनके  longevity in the wild .
They are territorial and generally solitary but social animals , often  requiring विशाल संलग्न क्षेत्रों of आवास  that support their prey requirements .
This , coupled with the fact that they are indigenous to some of the more densely populated places on Earth  , रै caused significant विरोध साथ  humans .
Tigers once ranged widely across Asia , from  तुर्कों in the वेस्ट to the पूर्वी coast  of Russia .
Over the past 100 years , they have lost 93 % of their historic range , and have been extirpated from southwest and central Asia , from the islands of Java and Bali , and from large areas of  southeast और  Eastern Asia .
Today , they range from the Siberian  ताइगा to खोलें grasslands  and tropical mangrove swamps .
The remaining  छह बाघ subspecies  have been classified as endangered by IUCN .
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals , down from around 100,000 at the start of the 20th century , with most  बाकी populations occurring in छोटी pockets  isolated from each other .
Major reasons for population decline include habitat destruction , habitat fragmentation and  poaching .
The extent of area occupied by tigers is  अनुमानित at कम than , a 41  % decline from the area estimated in the mid-1990s .
Tigers are among the most recognisable  और लोकप्रिय of the संसार  's charismatic megafauna .
They have featured  prominently in प्राचीन mythology और लोकगीत  , and continue to be depicted in modern films and literature .
Tigers appear on many flags , coats of  बाहें  , and as mascots for sporting teams .
the बंगाल बाघ is the  national animal of both India and Bangladesh .
The simplified  आतंरिक ढांचा  of a chloroplast
Overview of the  calvin साईकिल और कार्बन  fixation
The  light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis हैं  chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma , the fluid-filled  area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes .
ये प्रतिक्रियाएँ लो the light-dependent  reactions and perform further chemical processes on them .
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions , collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon  fixation , कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ  , and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name , this process  occurs तभी जब लाइट is  available .
Plants do not carry out the Calvin  साईकिल by रात्रि  .
They ,  बजाय , रिलीज sucrose  into the phloem from their starch reserves .
This  प्रक्रम happens जब लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ स्वतंत्र of the दयालु of photosynthesis  ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work .
A  लिनेन रूमाल साथ खींचा लड़ी  embroidery around the edges
Linen cloth recovered from Qumran Cave 1  निकट the मुर्दे समुद्र  .
Linen ( ) is a textile made from the fibers  of the flax संयंत्र , linum usitatissimum  .
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture , but when it  is बना into garments , it is valued  for its exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather .
The word `` linen '' is of West Germanic origin and cognates with  the लैटिन नाम लिये the flax संयंत्र linum , और the पहले  Greek λινόν ( linon ) .
This word history has  दिए वृद्धि to a क्रमांक of अन्य शर्तें in अंग्रेज़ी , the सबसे notable of  which is the English word line , derived from the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line .
Textiles in a  लिनेन बुनते बनावट , भी जब बना  of cotton , hemp and other non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` linen '' .
Such fabrics  generally have उनके अपना विशिष्ट names  other than linen ; for example , fine cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is called Madapolam .
The collective term `` linens `` is still often used generically  to describe a क्लास of woven और भी knitted bed , नहाना  , table and kitchen textiles .
The name linens is retained because  traditionally , लिनेन थी प्रयुक्त लिये  many of these items .
In the past , the word `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight undergarments such as shirts , chemises , waistshirts , lingerie ( a word also  cognate साथ लिनेन ) , और detachable कमीज़ छल्लों और cuffs , जिससे यहूद historically  made almost exclusively out of linen .
The inside cloth layer of fine composite clothing garments ( as for example jackets  ) थी traditionally बना of लिनेन , और  this is the origin of the word lining .
Linen textiles appear  to be कुछ of the oldest in the संसार  : their history goes back many thousands of years .
Fragments of straw , seeds ,  मछली , yarns , और विभिन्न प्रकार of fabrics  which date back to about 8000 BC have been found in Swiss lake dwellings .
Dyed  flax मछली मिला in a प्रागैतिहासिक  cave in Georgia suggest the use of woven linen fabrics from wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP .
Linen was  sometimes  used as currency in ancient Egypt .
Egyptian mummies were  लपेटा in लिनेन क्युकी  it was seen as a symbol of light and purity , and as a display of wealth .
Some of  ये fabrics ,  woven from hand spun yarns , were very fine for their day , but are coarse compared to modern linen .
Today , linen is usually an expensive textile , and is produced in  अपेक्षाकृत छोटी quantities  .
It  रै a long `` स्टेपल '' ( व्यक्तिगत रेशा  length ) relative to cotton and other natural fibers .
Many products are made of linen : aprons , bags  , तौलिये ( swimmers , नहाना , बीच , देह और  wash towels ) , napkins , bed linens , linen tablecloths , runners , chair covers , and men 's & women 's wear .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested by the senior men 's national teams of  the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de  Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
the चैंपियनशिप रै महरूम awarded  every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930 , except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War .
The  वर्तमान champions हैं  Spain , who won the 2010 tournament .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the host nation  ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस  phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place  over the preceding तीन सालो , is प्रयुक्त  to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup tournaments have  महरूम जीती by आठ अलग  national teams .
Brazil have won five times , and they are the only team to have played  in प्रत्येक  tournament .
The other World Cup winners are Italy ,  साथ चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी , साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और  inaugural winners Uruguay , with two titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is  the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट  ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World  cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील  in 2014 , Russia in 2018 , and Qatar in 2022 .
The is an expansion device for the Wii Remote video game controller for  the वी कि  allows it to more accurately capture complex motion .
According to Nintendo , the sensor in the device supplements the accelerometer and Sensor Bar capabilities of the Wii Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the  स्क्रीन in  real time .
The Wii 's successor console , the Wii U ,  supports the वी motionplus  and its peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary .
Majulah  singapura ( onward  Singapore ) is the national anthem of Singapore .
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song  लिये आधिकारिक कृत्यों of the नगर परिषद of सिंगापुर , the सोंग  was selected in 1959 as the island 's anthem when it attained self-government .
upon पूरा स्वतंत्रता  in 1965 , Majulah Singapura was formally adopted as Singapore 's national anthem .
By law the anthem  may तभी be सुंग साथ इसके असली मलय गीत , हालांकि  there exist authorized translations of the lyrics of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official languages : English , Mandarin and Tamil .
Originally  रचित in the कुंजी of g प्रमुख , in 2001 the नेशनल गान  was officially relaunched in the lower key of F major as this was said to allow for a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement '' .
The national anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools and armed  शक्तियां शिविरों at ceremonies आयोजित at the शुरूआत and/or the समाप्त of प्रत्येक  day , during which the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken .
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on occasions of national celebration or national significance such as at the National Day Parade , at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions and government  विभाग , और at sporting कार्यक्रम  at which Singapore teams are participating .
An  expedition 's shipwrights  building a brigantine , 1541 .
Shipbuilding is the  निर्माण  of ships and floating vessels .
It normally takes  प्लेस in a specialized  facility known as a shipyard .
Shipbuilders , also called shipwrights , follow a specialized occupation that traces  its  roots to before recorded history .
Shipbuilding and ship  मरम्मत , दोनो वाणिज्यिक  and military , are referred to as `` naval engineering '' .
The construction of boats is a similar activity called  नाव भवन  .
The dismantling  of जहाजों is  called ship breaking .
Wakonda is a town in Clay County ,  दक्षिण डकोटा  , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  321 at the 2010 census .
The  following is a सूची of the सबसे  populous incorporated places of the United States of America .
As  पारिभाषित by  the United States Census Bureau , an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also  शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो  's listing of incorporated places .
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of government that includes the entire  जनसांख्यिकी of a काउंटी , or काउंटी समतुल्य  .
Some consolidated  city-counties  , however , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance ''  ) of ऐसे संचित city-counties कि  are not a part of another incorporated place .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual  municipalities भीतर उनके पारिभाषित हद , जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य  municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A  अलग  ranking is evident when considering U.S. metropolitan area populations .

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress images , homebrew  वीडियो खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक  games ( since the Nintendo DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ) .
Licensed developers , however , can use a blue Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to  फ्लैश ताश  .
ये डिवाइस  are also known as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards '' .
There are two main classes of  flashcarts : पुरानी डिवाइस जिससे अनुरूप in  Slot-2 ( the Game Boy Advance Game Pak slot ) and newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ) .
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their use with Game Boy Advance ) , but require a  booting औजार in slot-1 in अनुक्रम  to use the touch screen and other DS features .
Second-generation devices ( those which only use Slot-1 ) do not work with GBA homebrew , but became less expensive and easier to use  , rivaling अनेक slot-2 डिवाइस  in price .
First-generation devices  शामिल gba फ्लैश कारतूस  , GBAMP CF , SuperCard , and M3 .
second-generation डिवाइस शामिल r4 क्रान्ति  , CycloDS , G6 Real and DS-X .
The storage device either contains flash memory or a slot for a memory  कार्ड to स्टोर homebrew  .
Storage devices with a memory-card slot usually  have अधिक भंडार क्षमता  than flash-memory devices .
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in  megabits ( mb ) , memory-card क्षमता is प्रायः measured in मेगाबाइट  ( MB ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ) .
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; DS and  खेल लड़के अग्रिम roms ;  special features ( such as ability to play media files ) ; physical size and cost .
Strictly speaking , a storage device is not  जरुरी लिये  DS with FlashMe installed because homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB .
However , this is not an  easily-portable  method because the DS needs to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi card .
are American  लोगों of  Japanese heritage .
Japanese  अमेरिकी have historically महरूम among the तीन largest एशियाई  American communities , but in recent decades , it has become the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286 , including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity .
In the 2010 census , the largest Japanese American communities were found in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया साथ 272,528 , हवाई साथ 185,502 , नई  York with 37,780 , Washington with 35,008 , and Illinois with 17,542 .
Southern California has the largest Japanese-American population in  उत्तर अमेरिका .

This is a comprehensive listing which highlights significant  उपलब्धियाँ और माइलस्टोन आधारित upon बिलबोर्ड  magazine 's singles charts , most notably the Billboard Hot 100 .
इस सूची spans इससे  the issue dated January 1 , 1955 to present .
The Billboard Hot 100  began साथ the समस्या दिनाँक अगस्त 4 , 1958 , और is फिलहाल the मानक  popular music chart in the United States .
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100 ,  बिलबोर्ड प्रकाशित  four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '' , `` Most Played by Jockeys '' , `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 '' .
These charts , which ranged from 20 to 100 slots ,  यहूद phased आउट at अलग  times between 1957 and 1958 .
Though technically not part of the Hot  100 चार्ट इतिहास , उनके आंकड़ा is शामिल लिये  computational purposes , and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations .
All items  सूचीबद्ध नीचे हैं इससे the hot 100 era  , unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ) .
V is an American science fiction television series that ran for  दो सीज़न on एबीसी , इससे नवम्बर  3 , 2009 to March 15 , 2011 .
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson , the new  श्रेणी क्रॉनिकल्स the आगमन on धरती of a technologically उन्नत एलियन प्रजाति जिससे ostensibly आता  in peace , but actually has sinister motives .
V stars  मुरैना baccarin , lourdes benedicto , मॉरिस  Chestnut , Joel Gretsch , Logan Huffman , Charles Mesure , Elizabeth Mitchell , Laura Vandervoort and Scott Wolf , and was executive produced by Scott Rosenbaum , Yves Simoneau , Scott Peters , and Jace Hall .

geocaching is an बाहरी recreational कार्यकलाप , in जिससे the भागीदार उपयोग  a Global Positioning System ( GPS ) receiver or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and seek containers , called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '' , anywhere in the world .
A typical cache  is a छोटी waterproof संग्राहक containing  a logbook where the geocacher enters the date they found it and signs it with their established code name .
After signing into the log , the cache  जरूर be लगाई वापस exactly  where the person found it .
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers (  tupperware or समान ) or ammunition  boxes can also contain items for trading , usually toys or trinkets of little value .
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking ,  trigpointing , orienteering , treasure-hunting  , letterboxing , and waymarking .
Boogie Down  प्रोडक्शन्स थी  a hip hop group that was originally composed of KRS-One , D-Nice , and DJ Scott La Rock .
DJ Scott La Rock was murdered on August 27 , 1987 ,  महीने बाद the रिलीज of bdp 's डेब्यू  album , Criminal Minded .

The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and their debut LP Criminal Minded contained frank descriptions of life in  the दक्षिण bronx of the लेट 1980s यूँ सेटिंग the स्टेज  for what would eventually become gangsta rap .
A municipal bond  is a बंध जारी by  a local government , or their agencies .
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states , cities ,  काउंटी , redevelopment एजेंसियों , special-purpose जिले , स्कूल जिले , पब्लिक यूटिलिटी  districts , publicly owned airports and seaports , and any other governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state level .
Municipal  bonds may be सामान्य दायित्वों of  the issuer or secured by specified revenues .
In  the संयुक्त राज्य , ब्याज आय प्राप्त by धारकों of नगरपालिका bonds  is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the income tax of the state in which they are issued , although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax exempt .
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the deal is sold ,  नगरपालिका bonds हैं फ़्री to व्यापार at कोई समय एकबार वे हैं खरीदा  by the investor .
Professional traders regularly trade and retrade the same  bonds अनेक टाइम्स  a week .
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve Winwood , Spencer Davis and Muff  winwood , और originally  performed by The Spencer Davis Group .

The song is ranked # 247 on the Rolling Stone magazine 's list of  the 500  Greatest Songs of All Time .

( The US  संस्करण रै अधिक प्रायः  been used on reissue CDs , even those coming from Europe . )
The single  सुविधाएँ the ध्वनि of  the Hammond B-3 organ .
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of information related to films , television  कार्यक्रम , और वीडियो खेल .
This includes actors , production crew  कर्मियों , और fictional वर्ण प्रदर्शित  in these three visual entertainment media .
It is one of the most  लोकप्रिय ऑनलाइन entertainment  destinations , with over 100 million unique users each month and a solid and rapidly growing mobile presence .
IMDb was  शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 17 , 1990  , and in 1998 was acquired by Amazon.com .
As of April 27 , 2013 , IMDb had 2,503,783  शीर्षक ( शामिल एपीसोड ) और 5,192,493 personalities  in its database , as well as 43 million registered users .
The website has an Alexa  रैंक  of 48 .
Fibre Channel Host Bus Adapter (  64-bit pci-x कार्ड  )
SCSI  मेजबान बस एडाप्टर  ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware , a host controller ,  मेजबान एडाप्टर , or मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a मेजबान प्रणाली  ( the computer ) to other network and storage devices .
The terms are primarily used to refer to  डिवाइस लिये connecting  SCSI , Fibre Channel and eSATA devices .
However , devices for connecting to IDE , Ethernet , FireWire , USB and other systems may also  be पुकारा  host adapters .
Recently , the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has  brought परिचय ईथरनेट hbas , जिससे हैं अलग  from Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines .
There are also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and Fibre  चैनल पुकारा converged संजाल adapters  ( CNAs ) .

Modern men  's cashmere sweaters  for sale .
Cashmere wool , usually simply known as cashmere , is a fiber obtained  इससे cashmere बकरियों और अन्य प्रकार of बकरी .
the शब्द cashmere गर्भाशयी  from an old spelling of Kashmir .
Cashmere  is ठीक in बनावट  , strong , light , and soft .
Garments made from it provide  बेहतरीन इन्सुलेशन  .
In the United States , under the U.S . Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 ,  as amended , ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ) , राज्य  that a wool or textile product may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool product is  the ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat मछली  produced by a cashmere goat ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the fiber of such wool product does not exceed 19  माइक्रोन  ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3  प्रतिशत ( by वज़न ) of cashmere मछली साथ औसत  diameters that exceed 30 microns .
The average fiber  व्यास may be विषय to a गुणांक of विभिन्नता  around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent .
Jennifer  convertibles inc. is the मालिक और licensor of sofabed और चमड़े specialty  retail stores in the United States , with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard , in the Midwest , on the West Coast and in the Southwest .
The company was  संस्थापित in 1975 और is आधारित in  Woodbury , New York .
On July  19 ,  2010 , the company announced that it had filed for bankruptcy as a consequence of `` substantial losses '' .
According to Furniture Today the company was number 48 among furniture retailers with US $ 114 million in sales for  the साल समाप्ति अगस्त 29 , 2009 .
It subsequently emerged from Chapter 11  अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल of इसके प्रमुख प्रदायक  , the Haining Mengnu Group .
Egg roll is a term used for many  अलग भोजन  around the world .
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg  रोल्स हैं मिला in मेनलैंड चीन ,  many Chinese-speaking regions of Asia , and Chinese immigrant communities around the world .
Egg rolls as  referred to  in China .
In Guangdong and Hong Kong ,  अंडा फेंकें प्रायः  refers to biscuit roll .
This is a type of  बिस्किट  .
The  संघटक  included egg , flour and sugar .
Egg roll also is a dish in Canton and  हांग काँग , इस is  usually made with vegetable .
भीतर चीन अंडा  rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and are not as commonly consumed in the north and western parts of China .
In American Chinese  भोजन , an अंडा फेंकें is a savory  dish typically served as an appetizer .
It is usually  भरवां साथ मुर्गा , पोर्क or झींगा  , cabbage , carrots , tomatoes , bean sprouts and other vegetables , and then deep fried .
This variety of the egg roll is very common and popular , across even regional varieties of American Chinese food , and is  प्रायः शामिल as भाग of a `` संयोजन  platter '' .
In Montreal , Canada , open-ended eggrolls  हैं a jewish-chinese संलयन  dish .
They can be either  कोषेर certified  or merely kosher style .
Pain and suffering is the legal term for the physical and emotional  तनाव caused  from an injury ( see also pain and suffering ) .
Some damages that might be under this category would be  : aches , अस्थाई और स्थाई सीमाएं on कार्यकलाप  , potential shortening of life , depression or scarring .
When filing  a मुकदमा as a परिणाम of an चोट , it is  common for someone to seek money both in compensation for actual money that is lost and for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury .
In a suit  , पीड़ा और  suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's claim , or , alternatively , it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress .
Apart from money damages awarded in  विचारण , धन क्षतिपूर्ति  are also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations , arbitration ( both of which may be court annexed or non litigated claims ) as well as in routine insurance settlements .
Individual claimants or those represented  by वकील प्रायः उपस्थित मांगे to insurers  to settle for money .
ये माँग लिये bodily चोट मुआवजे  monies often set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings .
मांगे हैं प्रायः लिखा summaries of a claimant  's medical care and the facts which resulted in the injury .
Sample of a  medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी  stampIn
the United  राज्य और कनाडा , a medallion हस्ताक्षर  guarantee is a special signature guarantee for the transfer of securities .
It is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the signature is  वास्तविक और the वित्तीय संस्था स्वीकृत  liability for any forgery .
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by  preventing अनधिकृत  transfers and possible investor losses .
They also limit the liability of the transfer agent who  स्वीकृत  the certificates .
Different institutions have different policies as to what type  of पहचान वे आवश्यकता to provide the गारंटी  and whether they charge a fee for such service ( usually nominal if any ) .
Most institutions will not guarantee a signature of  किसी जो रै नहीं already महरूम  their customer .
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public , in the sense that a `` signature guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is authentic , and an acknowledgment is a certification by a  नोटरी पब्लिक attesting कि the signer हस्ताक्षरित a दस्तावेज़  voluntarily .
Some banks may no longer provide this service , however ,  अनेक स्टिल do as खूब as अन्य वित्तीय संस्थानों  such as a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions .
at उनके एकमात्र  discretion , these institutions may still decline to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees .
When US citizens are abroad , some financial institutions may accept  संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास seals , in प्लेस  of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp .
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars  stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल द्वीप , लॉस एंजिल्स  County , California , March 1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also known as the  ग्रेट अमरीकी स्ट्रीटकार कांड ) refers  to allegations and convictions in relation to a program by General Motors ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many American cities .
Between 1936 and 1950 , National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM , Firestone Tire ,  मानक आयल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , phillips पेट्रोलियम , mack ट्रक , और the संघीय अभियान्त्रिकी corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction  systems in 45 cities including Baltimore , Newark , Los Angeles , New York City , Oakland and San Diego and converted them into bus operation .
Several of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of conspiracy to  monopolize अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स लकिन यहूद acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the स्वामित्व  of these companies .
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the United States ; notably Edwin J. Quinby , who first drew attention to the program in 1946 , and then Bradford C. Snell ,  an anti-trust attorney लिये the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट जिनकी विवादास्पद 1974 गवाही to a सीनेट पूछताछ  brought the issue to national awareness .
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate destruction of streetcars was  भाग of a larger रणनीति to धक्का the संयुक्त  States into automobile dependency .
Others say that independent economic factors brought about changes in the transit system , including the Great Depression , the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 , labor unrest , market forces , rapidly increasing traffic congestion , urban sprawl , taxation policies that favored private vehicle  स्वामित्व , और सामान्य enthusiasm लिये the ऑटोमोबाइल  .
One writer on the subject has suggested that  snell और अन्य गिरी into simplistic  conspiracy theory thinking , bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly , GM waged a war on electric traction .
It was indeed an all out assault , but by no means the single  कारण लिये the विफलता of  rapid transit .
Also , it is just as clear that  क्रियाएँ और inactions by सरकारी  contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction . ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based urban transport systems  आधारित on streetcars or  trams , including Newark , Philadelphia , San Francisco , Pittsburgh , and Boston ; others are re-introducing them .
The story has been explored several  टाइम्स in छपाई , फिल्मी और अन्य  media , notably in Who Framed Roger Rabbit , Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia .
Corwin  हाउस , सलेम , मैसाचुसेट्स  , built ca . 1660 , First Period English
American colonial architecture includes several building design styles associated with the colonial period of the United States , including First Period  अंग्रेज़ी ( late-medieval ) , फ्रेंच औपनिवेशिक , स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक , डच  Colonial and Georgian .
These styles are associated  साथ the घरों , चर्च  and government buildings of the period from about 1600 through the 19th century .
`` In the Mood '' is a big band era # 1 hit recorded by American  bandleader ग्लेन मिलर  .
It topped the charts in  1940 in the u.S.  and one year later was featured in the movie Sun Valley Serenade .
In 1999 , National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939 Glenn Miller  रिकॉर्डिंग on आरसीए bluebird on the npr 100 , the सूची of `` the  100 most important American musical works of the 20th century '' .

The NEPTUNE Canada project is the  world’s  first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory that plugs directly into the Internet .
Since December  2009 , it रै अनुमत लोगों  to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world .
Along with its sister project , VENUS , NEPTUNE  offers a अद्वितीय  approach to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship  क्रूज़ or space-based satellites to carry  out their research , while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated crawler .
A gramophone record , commonly known as a phonograph record ( in American English ) , vinyl record ( in reference to vinyl , the material most commonly used after  परिचय  1950 ) , or colloquially , `` a record '' , is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed , modulated spiral groove .
The groove  प्रायः starts निकट the  periphery and ends near the center of the disc .
Phonograph records are  generally वर्णित by उनके व्यास in इंच ( 12-inch , 10-inch , 7-inch , इत्यादि . ) , the rotational गति at जिससे  they are played ( `` 33 rpm `` , `` 78 '' , `` 45 '' , etc . ) , their time capacity ( `` long playing '' ) , their reproductive accuracy , or `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '' , `` Orthophonic '' , `` full-range '' , etc . ) , and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono `` , `` stereo `` , `` quadraphonic `` , etc . ) .
Phonograph records were the primary medium used for music reproduction for most of the 20th century , replacing the  फोनोग्राफ बेलन , साथ जिससे it था co-existed ,  by the 1920s .
By the late  1980s , डिजिटल मीडिया था gained a  larger market share , and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991 .
They continue to be manufactured and sold  in the 21st सदी  .
In 2008  , nearly 2.9 लाख इकाई shipped  , the most in any year since 1998 and the format has continued to slowly regain popularity .
वे हैं विशेषकर  used by DJs and audiophiles for many types of music .
as of 2013 , विनाइल  records continue to be used for distribution .

Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is dominated by grasses (  पोएसी ) , however sedge ( cyperaceae ) और फटाफट ( juncaceae  ) families can also be found .
grasslands occur naturally  on all continents except Antarctica .
In temperate latitudes , such as  northwestern यूरोपीय और the ग्रेट मैदान और कैलिफ़ोर्निया in उत्तर अमेरिका , देशी grasslands  are dominated by perennial bunch grass species , whereas in warmer climates annual species form a greater component of the vegetation .
grasslands हैं  found in most ecoregions of the Earth .
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate  grasslands , savannas , और shrublands बायोम ( ' ecosystem  ' ) , which is one of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's surface .
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis , also called henna tree ) or  हिना is  a flowering plant , the sole species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae .
The English name `` henna '' comes from the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ  / सुनाया ) or colloquially  , loosely pronounced .
The name is also used for dye preparations derived from the plant , and for the  आर्ट of अस्थाई गोदना आधारित on those dyes  .
Henna has been used since antiquity to dye skin , hair , and  fingernails , as खूब as  fabrics including Silk , wool and leather .
additionally , the नाम  is misused for other skin and hair dyes , such as black henna or neutral henna , which are not derived from the plant .
A thin film is a layer of material ranging from fractions of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several  micrometers in मोटाई  .
Electronic semiconductor  डिवाइस और ऑप्टिकल coatings  are the main applications benefiting from thin-film construction .
A familiar application of thin films is the household mirror ,  जिससे typically रै  a thin metal coating on the back of a sheet of glass to form a reflective interface .
The process of silvering  थी एकबार commonly प्रयुक्त to  produce mirrors .
A  very-thin-film कोटिंग ( कम than  a nanometer thick ) is used to produce two-way mirrors .
the प्रदर्शन of ऑप्टिकल coatings ( e.g . antireflective , or ar , coatings  ) are typically enhanced when the thin-film coating consists of multiple layers having varying thicknesses and refractive indices .
Similarly , a periodic structure of alternating thin films of  अलग सामग्री may collectively रूप a so-called superlattice जिससे कारनामे the घटना  of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions .
Work is being done with ferromagnetic and  ferroelectric पतला films लिये उपयोग as  computer memory .
It is also  होने लागू  to pharmaceuticals , via thin-film drug delivery .
Thin-films are used to  उपज thin-film  batteries .
Thin films are also  प्रयुक्त in dye-sensitized  solar cells .
Ceramic  पतला films हैं  in wide use .
The relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic materials make this type  of पतला कोटिंग of ब्याज लिये सुरक्षा of substrate सामग्री  against corrosion , oxidation and wear .
In  particular , the उपयोग of  such coatings on cutting tools can extend the life of these items by several orders of magnitude .
Research is being done on a new class of thin-film inorganic oxide materials , called amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent oxides , which could be used to make transparent  transistors कि  are inexpensive , stable , and environmentally benign .
Gears  of युद्ध is a सैन्य विज्ञान fiction  third-person shooter video game developed by Epic Games and published by Microsoft Game Studios .
It was initially released as an exclusive title  लिये the एक्सबॉक्स 360 in नवम्बर 2005 in उत्तर अमेरिका , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और सबसे  of Europe and included a `` Limited Collector 's Edition '' with added content and an art book titled Destroyed Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story .
Despite the initial  कथन of एक्सबॉक्स 360 exclusivity , a microsoft खिड़कियाँ संस्करण of the खेल थी विकसित in संयोजन साथ  People Can Fly and released a year later , featuring new content including additional campaign levels , a new multiplayer game mode , and Games for Windows Live functionality .
The game focuses on the troops of Delta Squad as they wield a desperate , last-ditch  attempt to सहेजें the बाकी इंसान निवासियों of the fictional ग्रह sera इससे a अथक और seemingly अजेय subterranean दुश्मन  known as the Locust Horde .
The player assumes the role of  मार्कस  Fenix ( but can also play as Dominic Santiago ) , a former prisoner and war-hardened soldier .
The game  is आधारित on the उपयोग of कवर और  strategic fire for the player to advance through the scenarios ; a second player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist .
The game also features several online multiplayer game  मोड्स लिये up to  eight players .
Gears of War sold over three million copies in just ten weeks and was the fastest-selling video game of 2005 as well as the  second-most निभाई खेल over एक्सबॉक्स  Live during .
It currently stands as the 5th  बेहतरीन selling एक्सबॉक्स 360  game of all time .
The game has since  बेची over  five million copies by September 2008 .
The  खेल थी खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों , जो praised  its gameplay and detailed visuals , and it won several `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006 .
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War franchise , including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and its  follow-up , गियर्स of युद्ध 3 , जिससे थी released on सितंबर 20 , 2011 , बाद having initially महरूम नियत to have महरूम  released on April 5 , 2011 , the date upon which Epic Games ' Cliff Bleszinski was a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon .
Adaptations to books , comics , as well  as a विशेषता फिल्मी हैं to  be expected .
A Tree Grows in  ब्रुकलीन is  a 1943 novel written by Betty Smith .
The story focuses on an Irish-American family in Williamsburg  , ब्रुकलीन  , New York City .
The novel is set in the first and second decades of the 20th  सदी  .
The  किताब थी an  immense success .

World map with the  intertropical  zone highlighted in red .
Tropical climate zones of the Earth where all twelve months have mean  temperatures ऊपर 18 °c ( 64  °F ) .
The  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध  is a region of the Earth surrounding the Equator .
It  is सीमित in अक्षांश by the tropic of कर्कट in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध  at approximately N and the Tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth .
The tropics are also referred to as the tropical zone and  the torrid मण्डल ( देखिए भौगोलिक मण्डल  ) .
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth where the Sun reaches a point directly overhead  at तनिक एकबार दौरान the सौर साल  .
The tropics are distinguished from the other climatic and biomatic regions of Earth , the middle latitudes  और the ध्रुवीय regions on either पक्ष of the  equatorial zone .
