`` What You Need  '' is an एपीसोड of the अमरीकी  television anthology series The Twilight Zone .
It is based on the short  स्टोरी of the वही नाम by लुईस padgett  ( Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore ) .
PlayhouseSquare , in the Cleveland Theater District in downtown Cleveland , Ohio , is the second-largest theater complex in the United States , second only  to  New York City 's Lincoln Center ) .
Constructed in a span of 19 months in the early 1920s , the theaters were subsequently closed down , but were  revived through a grassroots प्रयत्न  .
Their renovation and reopening helped usher  in a नई era of शहर पुनरोद्धार in क्लीवलैंड , और थी  called `` one of the top ten successes in Cleveland history . ''
The driver and  यात्री सामने airbags ,  after having been deployed , in a British Peugeot 306 car .
An airbag is a vehicle  सुरक्षा यंत्र  .
It is an occupant  संयम  system consisting of a flexible fabric envelope or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision .
Its purpose is to cushion  occupants दौरान a क्रैश और provide सुरक्षा to उनके  bodies when they strike interior objects such as the steering wheel or a window .
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag modules in various side and frontal locations of the passenger seating positions , and sensors may deploy one or more airbags in an impact zone at variable  दरों आधारित on the प्रकार , कोण और गंभीरता of प्रभाव ; the एयरबैग is designed to तभी  inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes .
Airbags are normally designed with the intention of supplementing the protection of an occupant who is  correctly  restrained with a seatbelt .
Most designs are inflated through pyrotechnic  अर्थात् और can तभी be संचालित  once .
Newer  side-impact एयरबैग मौड्यूल consist of संपीडित  air cylinders that are triggered in the event of a side impact vehicle impact .
The first commercial designs were introduced in passenger  ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान the 1970s साथ सीमित कामयाबी  .
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many markets during  the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s साथ a ड्राइवर एयरबैग , और a सामने  passenger airbag as well on some cars ; and many modern vehicles now include four or more units .
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to report financial  सूचना to the आतंरिक आय सेवा ( irs )  of the United States .
They are used to report income , calculate taxes to be  सशुल्क to the  federal government of the United States , and disclose other information as required by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ) .
There are over 800 various forms and  schedules  .
The  best-known of  these is Form 1040 used by individuals .
In the United States , driver 's licenses are issued by each individual state ( including Washington , D.C. and territories ) , rather than  the संघीय सरकारी क्युकी  of the political concept of federalism .
Drivers are normally required to obtain a license from their state of  निवास और सब राज्य recognize  each other 's licenses for temporary visitors subject to normal age requirements .
A  राज्य may भी बर्खास्तगी an व्यक्तिगत  's driving privilege within its borders for traffic violations .
Many states share a common system of license classes , with some exceptions , and commercial  अनुज्ञा वर्ग हैं मानकीकृत by संघीय  regulation at 49 CFR part 383 .
China has been the source of many inventions , including the Four Great  आविष्कारों : papermaking , the कम्पास , बारूद  , and printing ( both woodblock and movable type ) .
The list  नीचे contains  these and other inventions .
The Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics , hydraulics , and mathematics applied to horology , metallurgy , astronomy , agriculture , engineering , music theory , craftsmanship , nautics  , और  warfare .
By the Warring States Period ( 403–221 BC ) , they had advanced metallurgic technology , including the blast furnace and cupola furnace  , जबकि the finery forge और puddling प्रक्रम यहूद ज्ञात by  the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ) .
A  sophisticated आर्थिक प्रणाली in चीन दिया जनम  to inventions such as paper money during the Song Dynasty ( 960–1279 ) .
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array of inventions such as the fire lance , land mine , naval mine , hand  तोपों , exploding गोलों , multistage प्रक्षेपास्त्र , और प्रक्षेपास्त्र बम साथ aerodynamic  wings and explosive payloads .
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century compass and ability to steer at high sea with  the 1st-century sternpost अरित्र , premodern  Chinese sailors sailed as far as East Africa and Egypt .
In water-powered clockworks , the premodern Chinese had used the escapement  यांत्रिकी चूंकि the 8th सदी और the अंतहीन  power-transmitting chain drive in the 11th century .
They  भी बना विशाल mechanical कठपुतली  theaters driven by waterwheels and carriage wheels and wine-serving automatons driven by paddle wheel boats .
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan cultures represent the oldest  पाषाणकालीन संस्कृतियों of चीन और यहूद formed around 7000 bc  .
Some of  the पहला आविष्कारों of पाषाणकालीन , प्रागैतिहासिक चीन शामिल semilunar और आयताकार स्टोन knives , स्टोन hoes और हुकुम , the cultivation of बाजरा  , rice and the soybean , the refinement of sericulture , the building of rammed earth structures with lime -plastered house floors , the creation of the potter 's wheel , the creation of pottery with cord-mat-basket designs , the creation of pottery tripods and pottery steamers , and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination .
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and buffalo during the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c . 2000 BC ) period , the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops , full evidence of Longshan cultivation of dry-land cereal crops which gave high yields `` only when the soil was carefully  cultivated , '' सुझाएँ कि the हल थी ज्ञात at तनिक by the longshan संस्कृति काल और explains the ऊँची agricultural उत्पादन yields जिससे अनुमत the वृद्धि of चाइनीज सभ्यता दौरान the शांग राजवंश ( c. 1600–c . 1050 bc )  .
With later inventions such as the multiple-tube seed drill and heavy moldboard iron plow , China 's agricultural output could  sustain a much larger  population .
For the purposes of this list , inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in China , and as such does not include foreign  technologies जिससे the चाइनीज acquired through सम्पर्क , ऐसे  as the windmill from the Middle East or the telescope from Early modern Europe .
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere and later invented  separately by the चाइनीज , ऐसे as the ओडोमीटर और कड़ी  pump .
Scientific , mathematic or natural  discoveries , परिवर्तन in नाबालिग अवधारणाओं  of design or style and artistic innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the list .
Gross domestic product in 2011 US dollars per capita , adjusted for inflation and purchasing power parity ( log scale ) from 1860 to 2011 , with population  ( डिस्क क्षेत्रफल ) लिये the us ( पीला ) , uk ( नारंगी ) , जापानी ( रेड ) , चीन  ( red ) , and India ( blue ) .
Globalization ( or globalisation—see spelling differences ) is the process of international integration arising from the interchange of  संसार दृश्य , उत्पाद  , ideas , and other aspects of culture .
Put in simple terms , globalization refers to  प्रक्रियाओं कि प्रचार  world-wide exchanges of national and cultural resources .
Advances in transportation and telecommunications infrastructure , including the rise of the  अंतरजाल , हैं प्रमुख कारकों  in globalization , generating further interdependence of economic and cultural activities .
Though several scholars place the  origins of वैश्वीकरण in आधुनिक टाइम्स , अन्य  trace its history long before the European age of discovery and voyages to the New World .
Some even trace the origins to the third  मिलेनियम  BCE .
Since the beginning of the 20th century , the pace of globalization has intensified  at a रैपिड रेट , विशेषकर दौरान the पोस्ट ठंडा  War era .
The term globalization has been in increasing use since  the mid-1980s  and especially since the mid-1990s .
In 2000 , the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) identified four basic aspects of globalization : trade  और ट्रांजेक्शन , पूंजी और निवेश  movements , migration and movement of people and the dissemination of knowledge .
Further , environmental  चुनौतियां ऐसे as जलवायु बदलें , cross-boundary  water and air pollution , and over-fishing of the ocean are linked with globalization .
Globalizing processes affect and  हैं प्रभावित by कारोबार और कार्य संगठन , अर्थशास्त्र  , socio-cultural resources , and the natural environment .

It stars Keanu Reeves , Gene Hackman , and  ब्रुक langton  .

This  विमानक्षेत्र is the  airline 's largest hub .
American Airlines flies to 79 domestic  गंतव्यों और 78  international destinations in 48 countries .

The list includes the city , country ,  the कोड of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयर हस्तांतरण संघ ( iata विमानक्षेत्र कोड )  and the International Civil Aviation Organization ( ICAO airport code ) , and the airport 's name , with the airline 's hubs , focus cities and seasonal destinations marked .
The list also contains destinations no longer  परोसा by the एयरलाइन  , which are marked as terminated destinations .
It does not include destinations served for  अमरीकी एयरलाइंस  by its regional affiliates American Eagle Airlines , Executive Airlines , and AmericanConnection .
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song , the best-known version of which was sung by Harry Belafonte and an alternate version interspersed with  another jamaican folksong , हिल और गुल्ली सवार  , by Dame Shirley Bassey .
Despite the song 's mento influences , `` Day-O ( The  banana नाव सोंग ) '' is widely  known as an example of calypso music .
It is a work song , from  the पाइंट of दृश्य of डॉक मजदूर working  the night shift loading bananas onto ships .
Daylight has come , the shift is over and  वे want उनके कार्य to be गिने  up so that they can go home .
World War I (  wwi ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित  in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939 ,  और the पहला संसार  War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's  ग्रेट शक्तियां , जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente  of the United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as  अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और  the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel , including 60 million  europeans , यहूद  mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the  lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार  in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving  the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन  , such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence  of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों  of the great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of  austria-hungary , on 28 जून  1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over  the पिछला दशकों यहूद  invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers were at war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon  स्प्रेड around the संसार  .
On 28 July  , the austro-hungarians  fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing  a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध  Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the  पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of  attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its  आक्रमण of ईस्ट prussia  by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman  साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध ,  opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war  in 1915 और रोमानिया  in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a  subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर  brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies  drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी  of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had  इसके अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों  , agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended in victory  लिये the allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as  the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize  their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German , Russian ,  austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased  to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great  राशि of territory , जबकि  the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of central  यूरोपीय थी  redrawn into several smaller states .
The  लीग of राष्ट्र  was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and  समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार युद्ध  II .
Nurse Jackie is an American series that  premiered on जून 8 , 2009 , on showtime , फिल्म सेंट्रल  and The Movie Network .
The series stars Edie Falco as the title character Jackie  peyton , an आपात विभाग नर्स at  All Saints ' Hospital in New York City .
For Jackie , `` Every day is a high wire act of juggling patients , doctors , fellow  नर्स और उसके अपना indiscretions  . ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians ( often  referred to बस as the kardashians ) is an  American reality television series that premiered on October 14 , 2007 , on E ! .
It follows the lives of the  kardashian/jenner  family , including sisters Kourtney , Kim , and Khloé Kardashian .
The series ' success has led to the  spin-offs कोर्टनी  and Kim Take New York , Khloé & Lamar , Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami , and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
Afghanistan ( ; ; ) , officially the Islamic Republic of  अफगानिस्तान , is a landlocked  sovereign state forming part of South Asia , Central Asia , and to some extent Western Asia .
It has a population of around 30 million inhabiting an area of approximately , making it  the 42nd सबसे populous और 41st largest  nation in the world .
It is bordered by Pakistan in the south and the east , Iran in the west ,  तुर्कमेनिस्तान , उज़्बेकिस्तान और  Tajikistan in the north , and China in the far northeast .
Afghanistan has been an ancient focal  पाइंट of the रेशा सड़क और इंसान माइग्रेशन  .
Archaeologists have  मिला प्रमाण of इंसान habitation इससे  as far back as the Middle Paleolithic .
Urban civilization may have begun in  the क्षेत्रफल as जल्दी as  3,000 to 2,000 BCE .
Sitting at an important geostrategic  स्थान कि connects the मध्य ईस्ट संस्कृति साथ सेंट्रल एशिया और the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप , the जमीन रै महरूम घर to विभिन्न peoples  through the ages and witnessed many military campaigns , notably by Alexander the Great , Genghis Khan , and in modern era Western forces .
The land also served as a source from which the Greco-Bactrians , Kushans , Hephthalites ,  saffarids , ghaznavids , ghorids , khiljis , timurids , मुगलों , durranis  , and others have risen to form major empires .
The  राजनैतिक इतिहास of the आधुनिक राज्य of अफगानिस्तान  begins in 1709 , when the Hotaki dynasty was established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad Shah Durrani 's rise to power in 1747 .
In the late 19th century ,  अफगानिस्तान became a बफ़र राज्य  in the `` Great Game `` between the British and Russian empires .
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War , King Amanullah began a European style modernization of the country but was stopped by the  ultra-conservatives  .
During the Cold War , after the withdrawal of the British from neighboring India in 1947 , the United States and the Soviet Union began spreading influences in Afghanistan , which led to a bloody war between the US-backed  मुजाहिदीन शक्तियां और the soviet-backed अफगान सरकारी in जिससे over a लाख afghans खोया  their lives .
This was followed by  the 1990s सिविल युद्ध  , the rise and fall of the extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war .
In December 2001 , the United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा सहायता फ़ोर्स ( isaf  ) to help maintain security in Afghanistan and assist the Karzai administration .
Three decades of war made  अफगानिस्तान एक of the संसार  's most dangerous countries , including the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers .
While the international community is rebuilding war-torn  अफगानिस्तान , आतंकवादी समूह ऐसे as the हक्कानी संजाल और hezbi islami हैं actively  involved in a nationwide Taliban -led insurgency , which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks .
According to  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , the insurgents यहूद  responsible for 80 % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012 .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought  इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव  states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into  the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000  सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना  , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by  अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य  ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven  cotton-based स्लेव  states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक  Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address  घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं  initiate civil war .
आठ बाकी  slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal  दुर्गों भीतर  territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to  ढूँढें a सुलह  , and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King  कपास `` कि वे होता intervene  ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 ,  जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon  Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state  to provide सैनिकों to retake  the fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval  नाकेबंदी कि अबोध  the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive in 1861–62  .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland  ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी  a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate  नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी  armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 ,  रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all  संघ सेना in 1864  .
In the Western  थिएटर , विलियम  T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to  लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड  , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's  आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox  Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil  युद्ध थी एक of the earliest  true industrial wars .
railroads , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships  , and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food  आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed  World War I .
It remains the deadliest  युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of  सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30  percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Cost of goods sold ( COGS ) refer to the inventory costs of those goods a  कारोबार रै  sold during a particular period .
Costs are associated with particular goods using  एक of अनेक  formulas , including specific identification , first-in first-out ( FIFO ) , or average cost .
लागत शामिल सब लागत of खरीदें , लागत  of conversion and other costs incurred in bringing the inventories to their present location and condition .
Costs of  goods बना by the  business include material , labor , and allocated overhead .
The costs of those  goods नहीं yet बेची हैं deferred as लागत  of inventory until the inventory is sold or written down in value .
Freak Lunchbox candy  स्टोर in halifax  , Nova Scotia
A confectionery  स्टोर ( अधिक commonly referred  to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom , a candy store in the North America , or a lolly shop in Australia ) sells confectionery and is usually targeted to children .
Most confectionery stores are filled with an assortment of sweets far larger than a grocer or convenience   store could accommodate .
They often offer  a चयन of  old fashioned treats , and sweets from different countries .
Very  प्रायः अपरिवर्तित in लेआउट चूंकि उनके  inception , confectioneries are known for their warming and nostalgic feel .
The village of Pateley Bridge claims to have the  oldest confectionery  store in England .
The oldest sweet shop in  इंग्लैण्ड , in the गाँव  of Pateley Bridge
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee :  uukuhuúwa , cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh  ) is a state located in West South Central United States .
Oklahoma is the 20th most  extensive और the  28th most populous of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma , meaning `` red people '' , and it is known  informally by इसके उपनाम  , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on November 16 , 1907 ,  ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to डालें  the union .
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or ,  informally `` okies '' , और इसके पूंजी और  largest city is Oklahoma City .
A major producer of natural gas , oil , and agriculture , Oklahoma relies on an economic  आधार of विमानन ,  energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest  growing economies in the स्वदेश  , ranking among the top states in per capita income growth and gross domestic product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa  serve as ओक्लाहोमा 's प्राथमिक आर्थिक anchors  , with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within their metropolitan statistical areas .
With small mountain  सीमाएँ , प्रेयरी , mesas , और पूर्वी वनों , सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ  in the Great Plains and the U.S . Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather .
In addition to having a prevalence of English , German , Scottish , Irish and Native American ancestry ,  अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in ओक्लाहोमा  , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and historically served as a route for cattle drives , a destination for southern  settlers , और a government-sanctioned  territory for Native Americans .
Stacked and  खड़ा car  tires
a टायर ( or टायर ) is a ring-shaped covering  that fits around a wheel 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle performance .
Most tires , such as those for automobiles and bicycles , provide traction between the  गाडी और the सड़क जबकि providing a लचीली cushion कि absorbs  shock .
The materials of modern pneumatic tires are synthetic rubber , natural rubber , fabric and wire  , साथ साथ कार्बन ब्लैक और  other chemical compounds .
They consist of a  tread और a देह  .
The tread provides traction while the body provides containment for a  मात्रा of संपीडित  air .
Before rubber was  विकसित , the पहला संस्करण of टायर यहूद  simply bands of metal that fitted around wooden wheels to prevent wear and tear .
Early  रबर टायर  were solid ( not pneumatic ) .
Today , the majority of tires are pneumatic  inflatable structures  , comprising a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires encased in rubber and generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion .
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of vehicles , including cars , bicycles , motorcycles ,  ट्रक , earthmovers  , and aircraft .
Metal tires are still used on locomotives and railcars , and solid rubber ( or other polymer ) tires  हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न non-automotive अनुप्रयोग , ऐसे as कुछ  casters , carts , lawnmowers , and wheelbarrows .
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11 , 1741 – June 17 , 1775 ) was an  अमरीकी डॉक्टर जो निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in अमरीकी  Patriot organizations in Boston in early days of the American Revolution , eventually serving as president of the revolutionary Massachusetts Provincial Congress .
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on April 18 , 1775 , to leave Boston and spread the alarm that the British garrison in  बोस्टन थी सेटिंग आउट to रेड the कस्बा of concord और गिरफ़्तार विद्रोही नेताओ  John Hancock and Samuel Adams .
वारेन participated  in the next day 's Battles of Lexington and Concord , which are commonly considered to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War .
Warren had been commissioned a Major General  in the उपनिवेश 's मिलिशिया shortly  before the June 17 , 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill .
Rather than exercising his rank , Warren served  in the बैटल as a निजी सिपाही , और थी मारे in  combat when British troops stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's Hill .
His death ,  immortalized in जॉन  Trumbull 's painting , The Death of General Warren at the Battle of Bunker 's Hill , June 17 , 1775 , galvanized the rebel forces , and he has been memorialized in many place names in the United States .
STM image of self-assembled supramolecular chains of the  सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर quinacridone on  Graphite .
an सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर is an सशुल्क सामग्री साथ सेमीकंडक्टर  properties , that is , with an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals .
Single molecules , short chain ( oligomers ) and  सशुल्क polymers can be semiconductive  .
Semiconducting  छोटी अणुओं ( खुशबूदार hydrocarbons  ) include the polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene , anthracene , and rubrene .
Polymeric organic semiconductors include poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ) , poly (  p-phenylene vinylene ) , as खूब  as polyacetylene and its derivatives .
There are two major overlapping classes of organic  semiconductors  .
These are organic charge-transfer  देवालय  and various linear-backbone conductive polymers derived from polyacetylene .
Linear  रीढ़ सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल polyacetylene  itself and its derivatives polypyrrole , and polyaniline .
At least locally , charge-transfer complexes often exhibit similar conduction  mechanisms to अकार्बनिक semiconductors  .
Such mechanisms arise from the  उपस्थिति of छेद और इलेक्ट्रॉन  conduction layers separated by a band gap .
While such classic mechanisms  हैं महत्वपूर्ण locally , as साथ अकार्बनिक amorphous semiconductors , tunnelling  , localized states , mobility gaps , and phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction , particularly in polyacetylenes .
Like inorganic  semiconductors , सशुल्क semiconductors  can be doped .
Organic  semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे  as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) and are also known as organic metals .
Typical current carriers in  सशुल्क semiconductors  are holes and electrons in π-bonds .
Almost  सब सशुल्क  solids are insulators .
But when their constituent molecules  have π-conjugate प्रणालियों , electrons  can move via π-electron cloud overlaps , especially by hopping , tunnelling and related mechanisms .
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and  phthalocyanine नमक crystals हैं  examples of this type of organic semiconductor .
Mainly due to low mobility , even unpaired  electrons may be stable in  charge-transfer complexes .
Such unpaired electrons  can फलन  as current carriers .
This type of semiconductor is  भी प्राप्त by pairing an इलेक्ट्रॉन  donor molecule with an electron acceptor molecule .
Female  स्खलन is the expulsion  of fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm .
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting , although these are considered to  be अलग phenomena in कुछ शोध publications  .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals , which is also  सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the अस्तित्व of  the G-Spot .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international association football competition contested by the senior women 's national teams of the members of Fédération  internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ) , the खेल 's वैश्विक  governing body .
The  चैंपियनशिप रै महरूम awarded प्रत्येक  four years since the inaugural tournament in 1991 .
Japan won  the 2011 टूर्नामेंट  in a penalty shootout .
The current format of the tournament involves 16 teams  स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान  nation ( s ) over a period of about three weeks ; – this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
a योग्यता phase , जिससे फिलहाल takes प्लेस over  the preceding three years , is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The FIFA  महिलाओं 's संसार कप is पहचाना as the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिता  in women 's football and is played amongst women 's national football teams of the member states of FIFA , the sport 's global governing body .
The first Women 's World Cup tournament , named the Women 's World  चैंपियनशिप , थी आयोजित in 1991 , sixty-one सालो  after the men 's first FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930 .
The six  संसार कप tournaments have महरूम  won by four different national teams .
The next World Cup  होगा be hosted by कनाडा  in 2015 .
Scorpions is a young adult novel written by Walter  डीन मायर्स , पहला  published in the United States by Harper & Row on June 20 , 1988 .
Front page of a 17th century Hebrew Bible by  जोसेफ athias , अभी at बेथ  Hatefutsoth , Israel
'Son of man ' is the translation of various Hebrew and Greek phrases used  in दोनो the यहूदी  Bible and the New Testament .
It has diverse meanings , ranging from a normal human being to a prophesied  अनन्त ,  divine ruler .
the यहूदी अभिव्यक्ति  `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e . ben-'adam ) appears one hundred and seven times in the Hebrew Bible .
This is the  सबसे आम  Hebrew construction for the singular but is used mostly in Ezekiel ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere .
In thirty two  मामले the phrase appears  in intermediate plural form `` sons of men '' , i.e . human beings .
As generally  interpreted by यहूदियों  , it denotes humankind generally .
In the Koine Greek of the New Testament , `` the son of man '' is invariably used as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου  '' साथ a definite आलेख  .
The use of the definite article in `` the son of man '' in the Christian gospels is novel , and  पहले इसके उपयोग वहीँ , no रिकॉर्ड of इसके उपयोग in कोई of the surviving  Greek documents of antiquity exist .
Geza Vermes has stated that `` the Son of man '' in  the ईसाई  gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages .
In Christian  उपयोग , नापसंद the बेटे of परमेश्वर शीर्षक , जिससे रै  been an essential element of Christian creeds since the Apostolic age , the proclamation of `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity .
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the New Testament has  remained चुनौतीपूर्ण और बाद 150 सालो  of debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars .
निपुण of foxhounds लीड the फ़ील्ड इससे powderham किला in देवों , इंग्लैण्ड , साथ the hounds in सामने  .
Fox hunting  is an कार्यकलाप involving  the tracking , chase , and sometimes killing of a fox , traditionally a red fox , by trained foxhounds or other scent hounds , and a group of unarmed followers led by a master of foxhounds , who follow the hounds on foot or on horseback .
Fox hunting originated in  the रूप practised जबतक recently in the संयुक्त किंगडम in the 16th  century , but is practised all over the world , including in Australia , Canada , France , Ireland , Italy and the United States .
In Australia ,  the पद भी refers to the  hunting of foxes with firearms similar to spotlighting or deer hunting .
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g. , deer hunting with bow and arrow ) ; in Britain and Ireland , ``  शिकार '' बगैर योग्यता implies  fox hunting ( or other forms of hunting with hounds- beagling , stag hunting , mink hunting , drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here .
The sport is controversial , particularly in the UK , where it was banned in Scotland in 2002 , and in England and Wales  in नवम्बर 2004 ( विधि  enforced from February 2005 ) , though shooting foxes as vermin remained legal .
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an important part of rural culture and useful for reasons of conservation and pest control , while  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि it is बेदर्द और अनावश्यक  .
Tobacco  विज्ञापन is the विज्ञापन of तम्बाकू उत्पाद or  use ( typically cigarette smoking ) by the tobacco industry through a variety of media including sponsorship , particularly of sporting events .
it is अभी एक  of the most highly regulated forms of marketing .
Some or all forms of tobacco  विज्ञापन हैं बैन in अनेक  countries .
Bally Technologies  , inc. is a निर्माता  of slot machines and other gaming technology based in Las Vegas , Nevada .
The company was  संस्थापित in 1968 as उन्नत पेटेंट  Technology .
It eventually changed its name to Alliance Gaming and acquired , in 1996 , Bally Gaming  अंतरराष्ट्रीय , a पूर्व प्रभाग of  Bally Manufacturing .
In 2006 , the entire company adopted the Bally name , a  ट्रेडमार्क कि originated in 1932 by the बल्ली निर्माण निगम  .
Gustave Doré 's engravings illustrated the Divine Comedy ( 1861–1868 ) ; here , Dante is lost in Canto  1 of the inferno  .
Inferno  ( इतालवी  for `` Hell `` ) is the first part of Dante Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy .
It is followed by Purgatorio and  paradiso  .
It is an allegory telling of the   journey of Dante through Hell , guided by the Roman poet Virgil .
In the poem , Hell is depicted as nine circles of suffering located  भीतर the  Earth .
Allegorically , the Divine Comedy represents the journey of the soul towards God , with the Inferno describing the  मान्यता और अस्वीकृति of  sin .
स्मरनॉफ is  a brand of vodka owned and produced by the British company Diageo .
The Smirnoff brand began with a vodka distillery  संस्थापित in मास्को by pyotr  Arsenievich Smirnov ( 1831–1898 ) .
It is now distributed in 130  देशों  .
It is produced in several countries including  इण्डिया , आयरलैंड , इटली  , the United Kingdom and the United States .
Smirnoff products include vodka , flavoured  वोदका , और  malt beverages .
In March 2006 , Diageo North America claimed that Smirnoff vodka was the  best-selling आसुत स्पिरिट ब्रांड in the संसार  .
Big Brown ( foaled April 10 , 2005 in Kentucky )  is a रिटायर्ड चैंपियन अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse  and winner of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes .
Bred by Dr. Gary B. Knapp 's Monticule Farms in  lexington , केंटकी  , he won his first five race starts .
He was sired by Grade III  विजेता boundary , a बेटे of  North American Champion sire Danzig , a son of Northern Dancer .
Big Brown 's dam was Mien , also a granddaughter of Northern  नर्तकी  through her sire , Nureyev .
the serenity दुआ is the आम  name for an originally untitled prayer by the American theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ) .
it रै महरूम अपनाया  by Alcoholics Anonymous and other twelve-step programs .
the best-known रूप is : परमेश्वर  , grant me the serenity to accept the things I can not change,
The courage to change the things I  can,
And  अक्ल to जान  the difference .
The Declaration and Resolves of the First Continental Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights , or the  घोषणा of अधिकारों ) , थी a बयान अपनाया by the पहला महाद्वीपीय  Congress on October 14 , 1774 , in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the British Parliament .
the घोषणा outlined  colonial objections to the Intolerable Acts , listed a colonial bill of rights , and provided a detailed list of grievances .
It was similar to the Declaration of Rights  और grievances , passed by the स्टैम्प  Act Congress a decade earlier .
The Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's plans : to enter into a boycott of British trade  ( the महाद्वीपीय संघ ) जबतक उनके grievances यहूद redressed , to प्रकाशित पता  to the people of Great Britain and British America , and to send a petition to the King .
Pulse  दबाव is the दबाव  that is felt when feeling the pulse .
Measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ) , the pressure difference  between the systolic और diastolic  pressures is the pressure change to create the pulse , which is the pulse pressure .
If resting blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic )  120/80 millimeters of पारा ( mmhg ) , पल्स दबाव  is 40 .
The Hills is a  वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी जिससे  originally aired on MTV from May 31 , 2006 until July 13 , 2010 .
The show uses a reality television format , following the personal  जीवनदान of अनेक यंग वयस्कों जीना in लॉस एंजिल्स  , California , but tends towards a narrative format more commonly found in scripted genres such as soap operas .
The series originally followed the personal  जीवन of पूर्व लगुना बीच  star Lauren Conrad and her friends ' new lives in Los Angeles .
After five seasons ,  कोनराड बाएँ the श्रेणी और थी  replaced by another former Laguna Beach star , Kristin Cavallari , beginning in the second half of the fifth season .
The series  concluded at  the end of the sixth season .
Entertainment  साप्ताहिक क्रमित the पहाड़ियाँ 82nd on उनके  list of `` The 100 Best Shows of the Last 25 Years , '' stating that the series was a `` New Classic . ''
AOL TV called it TV 's  biggest अपराधी  Pleasure .
The series  premiered in अनुप्रयोग in the  fall of 2009 alongside Laguna Beach : The Real Orange County .
In poker , bad  ताल is a subjective पद लिये  a hand in which a player with what appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses .
It most often occurs where one player bets the clearly stronger hand and their opponent makes a poor call  कि  eventually `` hits '' and wins .
There is no consensus among  पोकर खिलाड़ी as to कया exactly constitutes a ख़राब ताल और प्रायः खिलाड़ी  will disagree about whether a particular hand was a bad beat .
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater fish in the family  cyprinidae  of order Cypriniformes .
It was one of the earliest fish  to be domesticated  , and is one of the most commonly kept aquarium fish .
A relatively small  सदस्य of the कार्प परिवार ( जिससे भी शामिल the कोई कार्प  and the crucian carp ) , the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia .
It was first  domesticated in चीन अधिक than a हजार सालो  ago , and several distinct breeds have since been developed .
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size , body  आकार , जोडे विन्यास और coloration ( विभिन्न combinations of  white , yellow , orange , red , brown , and black are known ) .
Uncooked   Rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade , singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade usually consisting of bacon ,  प्याज , सरसों और  pickles wrapped in thinly sliced beef which is then cooked .
In some countries , the roulade is also known  as `` बीफ  olive '' .
Beef or veal is used as meat though some food scholars tend to  मानना कि the असली संस्करण थी संभवतः venison  or pork , and pork is still popular in some areas .
The beef rouladen as we know them today have become  लोकप्रिय over the पिछला  century .
The cut is usually topside beef or silverside  चूंकि इस is the सस्ता  cut .
The more expensive version would be the  गोलाकार स्टीक , भी ज्ञात as rump  steak .
the मांस is काटें into  large , thin slices .
The filling is a mixture of smoked and cooked pork belly , chopped onions and chopped pickles ( gurken ) which is at times varied by  adding minced मांस , सॉसेज मांस , पाइन nuts और सरसों  .
the मिश्रण  varies from region to region .
Rouladen are traditionally  परोसा लिये  dinner .
Red wine is often served  साथ इस डिश  .
Typical eukaryotic  कोशिका  .
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic reactions and processes that take place in the cells  of जीवों to बदलें biochemical उर्जा इससे  nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) , and then release waste products .
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic reactions , which break large molecules into smaller ones , releasing energy in the process as weak so-called ``  high-energy '' bonds हैं replaced by stronger bonds in  the products .
Respiration is one of the key ways a cell gains useful energy to  ईंधन सेल्यूलर  activity .
Cellular  श्वसन is माना  an exothermic redox reaction .
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs  in the देह , सबसे of जिससे  are redox reactions themselves .
Although technically , cellular respiration is a  दहन प्रतिक्रिया , it clearly करता नहीं resemble एक  when it occurs in a living cell .
This difference is because it occurs  in अनेक पृथक कदम  .
While the overall reaction is a combustion reaction  , no सिंगल प्रतिक्रिया कि comprises  it is a combustion reaction .
Nutrients  कि हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by एनिमल और संयंत्र कोशिकाएं in श्वसन  include sugar , amino acids and fatty acids , and a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ) .
The energy stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is weakly bonded to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form , thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive processes requiring  उर्जा , सहित जैवसंश्लेषण , locomotion or परिवहन of अणुओं आरपार  cell membranes .
Countries by 2011  जीडीपी ( नाममात्र  ) according to the CIA World Factbook .
This article includes a list of countries in the world sorted by their gross domestic product ( GDP ) , the market value of all final goods  और सेवाएं  from a nation in a given year .
The GDP dollar estimates presented here are calculated at  मार्केट or सरकारी आधिकारिक  exchange rates .
Several economies which are not  माना to be देशों ( संसार , the eu ,  and some dependent territories ) are included in the lists because they appear in the sources .
These economies are not ranked in the charts here  , लकिन हैं सूचीबद्ध जहाँ लागू  .
The figures presented here do not take into account differences in the cost of living in different countries , and the results can vary  greatly इससे एक साल to another आधारित on fluctuations in the एक्सचेंज  rates of the country 's currency .
Such  fluctuations may बदलें a देश 's रैंकिंग  from one year to the next , even though they often make little or no difference to the standard of living of its population .
Therefore these figures should be  प्रयुक्त साथ  caution .
Some  countries/regions  may have citizens which are on average wealthy .
These  countries/regions  could appear in this list as having a small GDP .
This would be because the country/region listed has a small population , and therefore small total economy ; the GDP is calculated  as the जनसांख्यिकी टाइम्स the माल प्रति  capita .
Comparisons of national wealth  हैं भी अक्सर बना on the आधार of  purchasing power parity ( PPP ) , to adjust for differences in the cost of living in different countries .
( See List of  देशों by जीडीपी ( ppp  ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem , but has its own drawbacks ;  it  does not reflect the value of economic output in international trade , and it also requires more estimation than nominal GDP .
On the whole , PPP per capita figures are  अधिक narrowly स्प्रेड than नाममात्र  GDP per capita figures .
The  पहला सूची शामिल  data compiled by the United Nations Statistics Division for 2011 .
The second list largely includes data ( estimate )  compiled by  the International Monetary Fund for 2012 .
The third list shows the World Bank 's mostly 2011  estimates , और the चौथी सूची शामिल ज़्यादातर  2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook .
Lapping is a machining process , in which two surfaces are  मला साथ साथ an अक्खड़ between  them , by hand movement or by way of a machine .
इस can  take two forms .
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ) , typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a surface such as iron or glass itself ( also known as the `` lap '' or  पीस औजार ) साथ an अक्खड़ ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम  oxide , jeweller 's rouge , optician 's rouge , emery , silicon carbide , diamond , etc. , in between them .
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the abrasive rolls about between  the दो सतहों और removes  material from both .
the अन्य रूप of lapping involves a softer  material such as pitch or a ceramic for the lap , which is `` charged '' with the abrasive .
The  गोद is तब प्रयुक्त  to cut a harder material—the workpiece .
The abrasive embeds within the softer material which holds it and  permits it to स्कोर आरपार और काटें the harder सामग्री  .
Taken to a finer limit , this will produce a polished surface such as with a polishing cloth on an automobile , or a polishing cloth or  पॉलिशिंग पिच upon कांच or  steel .
Taken to the ultimate limit , with the aid of accurate interferometry and specialized  पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग , lensmakers  can produce surfaces that are flat to better than 30 nanometers .
This is one twentieth of the wavelength  of लाइट इससे the commonly  used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light source .
Surfaces this flat  can be molecularly बंधुआ ( optically  contacted ) by bringing them together under the right conditions .
( This is not the same as the  wringing प्रभाव  of Johansson blocks , although it is similar ) .
The term `` America 's Team '' is a popular nickname in the United States that refers to the Dallas  cowboys in the नेशनल  Football League .
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film ,  जहाँ the narrator opens साथ  the following introduction : The term is recognized and often used by media outlets , including ESPN , Yahoo ! , HBO Sports , and Sports Illustrated .

In Canada , the series premiered in French on Télétoon on February 28 ,  2011 , in  English on Teletoon on March 14 , 2011 , and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27 , 2011 .
The show was  निर्मित by भैस  TV , creators of 6teen and Total Drama .

In the film , he learns he is  समर्थ to have visions और उसके बेहतरीन dost  Benny Weir ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster .
The  श्रेणी फ़ॉलो the तीन as वे लो on अलौकिक शक्तियां और have adventures  , with occasional help from fellow vampires Rory ( Cameron Kennedy ) and Erica ( Kate Todd ) , while dealing with the troubles of regular high school life .
A second season was  पुष्टि to प्रारंभ उत्पादन in सितंबर 2011 और  it first premiered on Disney Channel on June 29 , 2012 , it premiered on Teletoon September 6 , 2012 .

A pickup  ट्रक or pick-up , प्रायः बस referred  to as a pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
In North America , the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built , integrated bed , as well as for  coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों , प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis  , but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use .
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup , such  as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड ,  or bakkie in South Africa .
Large pickup trucks are somewhat rare in  यूरोपीय , जहाँ वैन और लाइट lorries हैं  commonly used for similar roles .
The President of the United  राज्य of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the सिर of राज्य और  head of government of the United States .
The president leads the executive branch of the federal government and  is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त  States Armed Forces .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of federal law ,  alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका , राजनयिक , नियामक , और न्यायिक  officers , and concluding treaties with foreign powers , with the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons  और reprieves , और to convene और adjourn  either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president , despite possessing no  औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally  passed bills , is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States .
The president is frequently  वर्णित as the सबसे शक्तिशाली  person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term , and is  एक of तभी दो nationally निर्वाचित  federal officers , the other being the Vice President of the United States .
The Twenty-second Amendment , adopted in 1951 , prohibits anyone from ever  होने निर्वाचित to the  presidency for a third full term .
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously had  परोसा as अध्यक्ष , or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष  , for more than two years of another person 's term as president .
In all , 43  individuals  have served 55 four-year terms .
On January 20 , 2009 ,  बराक ओबामा became the 44th और  current president .
On November 6 , 2012 , he was re-elected and is scheduled  to serve जबतक जनवरी  20 , 2017 .
बोतलबंद  mineral water
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g. , well water , distilled water ,  खनिज जल , or वसन्त जल ) packaged in  plastic or glass water bottles .
Bottled water  may be कार्बोनेटेड  or not .
आकार दायरा इससे छोटी सिंगल सेवारत  bottles to large carboys for water coolers .
Map of the major rivers , lakes ,  और टंकी  in India
Map  प्रर्दशित नदियाँ और बाढ़  prone areas in India
Rivers  of इण्डिया खेल an महत्वपूर्ण  role in the lives of the Indian people .
The river systems provide irrigation , potable water , cheap  परिवहन , विद्युत , और  the livelihoods for a large number of people all over the country and to rural areas .
This easily explains why nearly all  the प्रमुख शहरों of इण्डिया हैं स्तिथ  by the banks of rivers .
The rivers also have an important role in Hindu  mythology और हैं माना पावन  by all Hindus in the country .
Seven major rivers along with their numerous tributaries make up the river  प्रणाली of इण्डिया  .
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ;  however , कुछ of the नदियाँ जिनकी पाठ्यक्रम लो उन्हें through  the western part of the country and towards the east of the state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea .
Parts of Ladakh , northern parts of the Aravlli range and the  arid भाग of the थार मरुस्थल  have inland drainage .
Dr.Francis Buchanan  surveyed the  courses of the rivers of India along with their tributaries and branches in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it .
The  shifting of the पाठ्यक्रम और  bed over the centuries is very remarkable .
Many of the channels mentioned in  कि सर्वेक्षण have अभी become मुर्दे , सूखी  or even extinct .
All major rivers of India originate from  एक of the तीन प्रमुख  watersheds :
The  हिमालय और the  Karakoram ranges
Vindhya and Satpura  सीमाएँ और chotanagpur पठार  in central India
Sahyadri or Western  ghats in पश्चिमी  India
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management established the rules for commercial and financial relations among the world 's major  औद्योगिक राज्य in the mid-20th सदी  .
The Bretton Woods system was the  पहला उदाहरण of a fully negotiated मौद्रिक अनुक्रम intended  to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states .
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II was still raging , 730 delegates from all 44 Allied nations gathered at the Mount Washington Hotel in Bretton Woods ,  नई हैम्पशायर , संयुक्त राज्य , लिये the संयुक्त राष्ट्र मौद्रिक और वित्तीय सम्मेलन  .
The delegates deliberated during 1–22 July 1944 , and signed the  अनुबंध on इसके फाइनल दिन .
Setting up a system of rules , institutions , and procedures to regulate the international monetary system , the planners at Bretton Woods established the International  मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बैंको लिये पुनर्निर्माण और विकास  ( IBRD ) , which today is part of the World Bank Group .
These organizations became operational in 1945  बाद a sufficient क्रमांक of देशों था ratified  the agreement .
The chief features of the Bretton Woods system were an obligation for each country to  अपनाना a मौद्रिक नीति कि कायम the एक्सचेंज रेट by tying इसके करेंसी to the u.S. डालर और the क्षमता  of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments .
On 15 August 1971 ,  the संयुक्त राज्य  unilaterally terminated convertibility of the US $ to gold .
This brought the Bretton Woods system to an end and  देखी the डालर become fiat  currency .
This action , referred to as the  निक्सन शॉक , निर्मित the हालात in जिससे the संयुक्त  States dollar became a reserve currency used by many states .
At the same time , many fixed currencies ( such as GBP ,  लिये उदाहरण ) , भी  became free floating .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian company that designs  और  manufactures motorcycles .
Headquartered   in Bologna , Italy , Ducati is owned by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini .
A credit score is a  numerical अभिव्यक्ति आधारित on a सांख्यिकीय विश्लेषण  of a person 's credit files , to represent the creditworthiness of that person .
A credit score is primarily based on credit report  सूचना typically sourced  from credit bureaus .
Lenders , such as banks and credit card companies , use credit scores to evaluate the potential risk posed by lending money to consumers and to  mitigate  losses due to bad debt .
Lenders use credit scores to  determine जो qualifies  for a loan , at what interest rate , and what credit limits .
Lenders also use credit scores to determine which customers are likely  to लाओ in  the most revenue .
The use of credit or identity scoring prior to authorizing access or granting credit is  an क्रियान्वयन of  a trusted system .
Credit  स्कोरिंग is नहीं सीमित to  banks .
Other organizations , such as mobile phone companies ,  बीमे कंपनियाँ , जमींदार ,  and government departments employ the same techniques .
Credit scoring also has a lot  of ओवरलैप  with data mining , which uses many similar techniques .
These  तकनीकों combine हज़ारों  of factors but they are more or less similar or the same .
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of their  परिभाषाएं : लिये उदाहरण , to निकालें the परिभाषा of the मीटर इससे the गति of लाइट , the परिभाषा  of the second must be known while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length , mass and time .
The International System of Units ( SI ) defines seven units of measure as a basic  नियत इससे जिससे  all other SI units are derived .
These SI base units and  उनके शारीरिक quantities  are:
metre for  लंबाई  ( US English : meter )
kilogram for mass ( note : not the  ग्राम  )
second  लिये समय
ampere for  इलेक्ट्रिक  current
kelvin  लिये तापमान
candela for  चमकदार  intensity
mole for the amount  of पदार्थ  .
The SI base quantities form a set of mutually  स्वतंत्र आयाम as जरूरी by आयामी विश्लेषण  commonly employed in science and technology .
However  , in a दिए realization of ये  units they may well be interdependent , i.e . defined in terms of each other .
The names of SI units are written in lowercase characters  ( the 'degree सेल्सियस ' meets  this rule , as 'degree ' is the unit , and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ) .
The symbols of units are written in lowercase ( e.g . metre has the symbol m ) , except that symbols for units named after persons  हैं लिखा  with an initial capital letter ( e.g. , the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ) .
Many other units , such as the litre ( US English : liter ) , are formally not  भाग of the si , लकिन हैं  accepted for use with SI .
Monument  canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The Monument ) is a part of the National Park Service near  the नगर of ग्रैंड जंक्शन  , Colorado .
Spectacular  canyons काटें गहन into sandstone और  even granite–gneiss–schist rock formations , in some areas .
This is an area of desert land high on  the कोलोराडो पठार , साथ पिनियन  and juniper forests on the plateau .
The park hosts a wide range of  वन्यजीव , सहित red-tailed चीलों  and golden eagles , ravens , jays , desert bighorn sheep , and coyotes .
Activities include hiking , horseback riding , road bicycling , and scenic drives ; a  आगंतुक बीच on the  west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop .
There are magnificent views from trails and the Rim  चट्टान ड्राइव , जिससे हवाएँ साथ the  plateau .
Nearby are the Book Cliffs , and the largest  flat-topped पहाड़ in the संसार  , the Grand Mesa .
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon , which runs the width of the park , and includes rock formations such as  स्वतंत्रता स्मारक , the  Kissing Couple , and Coke Ovens .
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square miles ) , much of which has been recommended to  कॉंग्रेस लिये नामांकन  as wilderness .
left to  सही : यूटिलिटी  Uniform , Blue Dress Uniform , Service Uniform , and Evening Dress uniforms
The Uniforms of the United States Marine Corps serve to distinguish  marines इससे सदस्यों of अन्य  services .
Among current uniforms in the United States  हथियारबंद शक्तियां , the marines ' वर्दी  have been in service the longest .
The Marine Dress Blue uniform has , with few changes , been worn in essentially its current form since  the 19th सदी  .
North American telephone  क्षेत्रफल कोड 419 और 567 serve the  northwest quadrant of the U.S. state of Ohio .
The largest city served by these area codes is Toledo ( and its suburbs of Holland , Maumee , Northwood , Oregon , Ottawa Hills ,  perrysburg , rossford , sylvania , swanton , waterville  , and Whitehouse ) .
Other cities served by these area codes include Ada , Ashland , Bellevue , Bluffton , Bowling Green , Bryan , Bucyrus , Celina , Clyde , Crestline , Defiance , Delphos , Edison , Erastus , Findlay , Fostoria , Fremont , Galion , Kenton , Lima , Mansfield , Mount Gilead , Napoleon , Norwalk , Oak Harbor , Port Clinton , Sandusky ,  शेल्बी , st. marys , tiffin , अपर sandusky , वैन wert , wapakoneta  , Wauseon , Willard .
Other areas served include the Lake Erie Islands north of   Port Clinton and west of Sandusky .
The main area code , 419 , was created as one of the  असली क्षेत्रफल कोड in अक्तूबर  1947 ; the overlay area code 567 was created on January 1 , 2002 .
Despite the presence of Toledo , the state 's fourth-largest city , 419 was  the पिछला of ओहियो 's असली चार क्षेत्रफल कोड to have  been split or overlaid .
Mickey Leroy  gilley ( born  March 9 , 1936 ) is an American country music singer and musician .
Although he started out singing straight-up country  और पश्चिमी सामग्री in the 1970s , he स्थानांतरित  towards a more pop -friendly sound in the 1980s , bringing him further success on not just the country charts , but the pop charts as well .
Among his biggest hits are `` Room Full of Roses , '' `` Do n't the Girls All Get Prettier at Closing Time , '' and the remake of the Soul  hit `` स्टैंड by me  `` .
He is also the cousin of Jerry Lee Lewis , Carl  mcvoy , जिम gilley और jimmy swaggart  .
According to the Federal Aviation Administration , Gilley is a licensed pilot , who holds an instrument rating with commercial pilot privileges for  multi-engine airplanes , as खूब as निजी पायलट  privileges for single engine aircraft .
The September  11 हमले ( भी referred  to as September 11 , September 11th , or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York City and the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners  यहूद hijacked by  19 al-Qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks .
Two of those planes , American Airlines Flight  11 और संयुक्त एयरलाइंस उड़ान 175 , यहूद क्रैश into the उत्तर और दक्षिण मीनारें  , respectively , of the World Trade Center complex in New York City .
Within two hours , both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or complete collapse of all other  इमारतें in the wtc जटिल , as खूब as प्रमुख क्षति to टेन अन्य विशाल surrounding  structures .
A third plane , American Airlines  उड़ान 77 , थी क्रैश into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय  of the United States Department of Defense ) , leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United Airlines Flight 93 ,  थी targeted at the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , लकिन क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड  near Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers .
In total , almost 3,000 people died in the attacks , including the 227 civilians and 19  hijackers सवार  the four planes .
suspicion  quickly fell on al-Qaeda .
Although the group 's leader , Osama bin Laden , initially denied  कोई भागीदारी , in  2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks .
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of Israel , the presence of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia  , और प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी as motives  for the attacks .
The United States responded to the attacks by launching the War on Terror and invading Afghanistan to depose the  तालिबान , जिससे था harbored al-qaeda  .
Many countries strengthened  उनके anti-terrorism विधान  and expanded law enforcement powers .
Having evaded capture  लिये सालो , बिन  Laden was located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011 .
The destruction of the  जुड़वा मीनारें और अन्य गुण caused  serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets .
क्लीनअप of the संसार व्यापार बीच  site was completed in May 2002 , and the Pentagon was repaired within a year .
Numerous memorials have been constructed , including the National September 11  मेमोरियल & संग्रहालय in नई यॉर्क , the प्रस्तुतीकरण मेमोरियल , और  the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania .
After a lengthy delay , the  एक संसार व्यापार बीच is अपेक्षित  to be completed at Ground Zero in New York City in 2013 .
Finding Nemo is a 2003 American computer-animated  comedy-drama एडवेंचर  film written and directed by Andrew Stanton , released by Walt Disney Pictures , and the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation Studios .
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who , along with a regal tang named Dory (  एलेन degeneres ) , खोज लिये उसके abducted  son Nemo ( Alexander Gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour .
Along the way , Marlin learns to take risks and  let nemo लो परवाह of खुद  .
It is Pixar 's first film to be released in  cinemas in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध  summer .
The film was re-released for  the पहला समय in 3d on सितंबर 14 ,  2012 , and it was released on Blu-ray on December 4 , 2012 .
A  sequel , ढूंढना dory , is फिलहाल  in development , set to be released on November 25 , 2015 .
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature , and was nominated in three  अधिक श्रेणी  including Best Original Screenplay .
It was the second highest-grossing film of 2003 , earning a total  of $ 921 लाख विश्वव्यापी  .
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time , with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006 , and was the  highest-grossing g-rated फिल्मी of सब समय पहले  Pixar 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it .
it is भी the 23rd highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब  time , as well as the 3rd highest-grossing animated film .
In 2008  , the अमरीकी  Film Institute named it the tenth greatest animated film ever made during their Top 10 .
The sixth season of America 's Best Dance Crew , also known as America 's Best Dance Crew  : ऋतु of the सुपरस्टार , premiered on अप्रैल 7 , 2011 और concluded on जून 5  , 2011 .
auditions यहूद आयोजित in चार शहरों इससे  January 21 through February 5 : Chicago , Houston , New York , and Los Angeles .
This season takes a different  रूट इससे पास्ट सीज़न  .

In the United  राज्य , सोशल सुरक्षा refers to the old-age , survivors , और विकलांगता  Insurance ( OASDI ) federal program .
The original Social Security Act ( 1935 ) and the current version of the  अधिनियम , as amended , encompass अनेक सोशल  welfare and social insurance programs .
Social  सुरक्षा is primarily वित्तपोषित through  dedicated payroll taxes called Federal Insurance Contributions Act tax ( FICA ) .
Tax deposits  हैं formally entrusted to the संघीय old-age और survivors  Insurance Trust Fund , the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund , the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund , or the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund which comprise the Social Security Trust Fund .
Upward redistribution of income is  जिम्मेदार लिये परिचय  43 % of the projected Social Security shortfall over the next 75 years .
According to economist Martin Feldstein , the combined spending for all social insurance programs in  2003 गठित 37 %  of government expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic product .
Social Security is currently estimated to keep roughly  40 प्रतिशत of सब अमेरिकी आयु 65  or older out of poverty .
The Social Security Administration is headquartered  in woodlawn , मेरीलैंड  , just west of Baltimore .
The alcohol by volume shown on a bottle  of absinthe .
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV , abv , or alc/vol ) is a standard measure of how much alcohol ( ethanol ) is  contained in an alcoholic पेय ( expressed as a प्रतिशत  of total volume ) .
The ABV  मानक is प्रयुक्त विश्वव्यापी  .
In some countries , alcohol by volume is referred to as degrees  gay-lussac ( बाद the  French chemist Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac ) .
