Charles John Huffam Dickens ( ; 7 February 1812 – 9 June 1870 )  थी an अंग्रेज़ी लेखक  and social critic .
He created some of the world 's most memorable fictional characters  और is generally regarded  as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period .
During his life , his works enjoyed  unprecedented  fame , and by the twentieth century his literary genius was broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars .
His novels  और छोटी कहानियां  continue to be widely popular .
Born in Portsmouth ,  इंग्लैण्ड , डिकेंस बाएँ स्कूल to कार्य in a फैक्टरी  after his father was thrown into debtors ' prison .
Although he had little formal education , his early  impoverishment drove उसे to  succeed .
over उसके करियर he संपादित a साप्ताहिक  journal for 20 years , wrote 15 novels , 5 novellas and hundreds of short stories and non-fiction articles , lectured and performed extensively , was an indefatigable letter writer , and campaigned vigorously for children 's rights , education , and other social reforms .
Dickens sprang to fame  साथ the 1836 सीरियल प्रकाशन  of The Pickwick Papers .
Within a few years he  था become an अंतरराष्ट्रीय  literary celebrity , famous for his humour , satire , and keen observation of character and society .
His novels , most published in monthly or weekly instalments , pioneered the serial publication of narrative fiction  , जिससे became the प्रबल विक्टोरियन  mode for novel publication .
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's reaction , and he often modified his plot and  अक्षर विकास आधारित on ऐसे  feedback .
For example , when his wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the way Miss Mowcher in David  कॉपरफील्ड लगा to प्रतिबिंबित उसके disabilities , डिकेंस  went on to improve the character with positive lineaments .
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; His caricature of Leigh  हंट in the फिगर of mr skimpole in bleak हाउस थी likewise toned bas on सलाह इससे  some of his friends , as they read episodes .
In the same novel , both Lawrence Boythorne and Mooney the beadle are  drawn इससे रियल जीवन – boythorne इससे  Walter Savage Landor and Mooney from 'Looney ' , a beadle at Salisbury Square .
His plots were carefully constructed , and Dickens often wove in elements from topical events  into उसके कहानियां .
masses of the अनपढ़ ग़रीब chipped  in ha'pennies to have each new monthly episode read to them , opening up and inspiring a new class of readers .
Dickens was regarded as the literary  colossus of उसके  age .
His 1843 novella , A Christmas Carol , is one of the most influential works ever written ,  और it remains लोकप्रिय और continues  to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre .
His  रचनात्मक प्रतिभाशाली रै महरूम praised by fellow  writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell —for its realism , comedy , prose style , unique characterisations , and social criticism .
On the other hand Oscar Wilde , Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a lack of psychological depth , loose  लिखने , और a रग of  saccharine sentimentalism .
मार्टिन लूथर किंग  and other civil rights leaders in front of the statue of Abraham Lincoln , August 28 , 1963
The civil rights movement was a series of worldwide  राजनैतिक आंदोलनों लिये समता पहले  the law that peaked in the 1960s .
In many situations it took the form of campaigns of civil resistance  aimed at achieving बदलें by nonviolent  forms of resistance .
In some  परिस्थितियों it थी accompanied  , or followed , by civil unrest and armed rebellion .
The process was long and tenuous in many countries , and many of these movements did not fully achieve their goals although , the efforts of  ये आंदोलनों  did lead to improvements in the legal rights of previously oppressed groups of people .
The main aim of the civil rights movement included , and include  , ensuring कि  the rights of all people are equally protected by the law , including the rights of minorities .
Civil  अधिकारों आंदोलनों ranging इससे the वैश्विक lgbt  rights movement to the global Women 's rights movement to various racial minority rights movements around the world continue .
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup , the  संसार चैंपियनशिप लिये मेन 's नेशनल  association football teams .
It took place  in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी  from 11 June to 11 July 2010 .
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open only to African nations ; in 2004 , the international football federation , FIFA , selected South Africa over Egypt and Morocco to become the first   African nation to host the finals .
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the country , with the final played  at the सॉकर नगर स्टेडियम in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's  largest city , Johannesburg .
Thirty-two teams were selected for participation  via  a worldwide qualification tournament that began in August 2007 .
In the first round of the tournament finals , the  टीमों competed in round-robin  groups of four teams for points , with the top two teams in each group proceeding .
These sixteen teams advanced to the knockout stage , where three rounds of play decided  जिससे टीमों  would participate in the final .
In the final , Spain , the European champions , defeated third-time finalists the Netherlands 1–0 after extra time , with Andrés Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain their first world title  , बनने the आठवीं स्वदेश to जीत the टूर्नामेंट , और the पहला यूरोपीय स्वदेश to जीत the टूर्नामेंट  outside its home continent .
मेजबान स्वदेश दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , 2006 संसार champions इटली और 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस यहूद सब eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार of the टूर्नामेंट  .
It was the first time that the hosts  यहूद eliminated in the  first round .
New Zealand with their three draws were the only undefeated team in the tournament , but  यहूद भी eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार  .
The McMuffin is a family  of  breakfast sandwiches in various sizes and configurations , sold by the fast-food restaurant chain McDonald 's .
The Egg  mcmuffin is the हस्ताक्षर नाश्ता  sandwich ; it was invented by the late McDonald 's franchisee Herb Peterson in the late 1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972 .
John Lennon was an English musician who gained worldwide fame as one of the  संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स , लिये उसके  subsequent solo career , and for his political activism and pacifism .
He  थी शॉट by चिह्नित दाउद chapman at the प्रवेश of  the building where he lived , The Dakota , in New York City on 8 December 1980 .
Lennon had just returned from Record Plant Studio  साथ उसके बीवी ,  Yoko Ono .
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt  हॉस्पिटल बीच , जहाँ it थी  stated that nobody could have lived for more than a few minutes after sustaining such injuries .
Shortly after local news stations reported Lennon 's death , crowds gathered at  रूज़वेल्ट हॉस्पिटल और in सामने of  the Dakota .
Lennon was cremated on 10 December 1980 at the Ferncliff Cemetery in Hartsdale , New  यॉर्क ; the राख यहूद दिए to ओनो  , who chose not to hold a funeral for him .
The first  रपट of लेनन 's मौत to a u.S. नेशनल दर्शक  was announced by Howard Cosell , on ABC 's Monday Night Football .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major  संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों और the  largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana .
The population of the city  थी 343,829 as of the  2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010  and was the 46th largest in the United States .
The New  orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त  Statistical Area , a larger trading area , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans , a city located  on the loire नदी in केन्द्र , फ़्रांस , और is खूब ज्ञात लिये  its distinct French Creole architecture , as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage .
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine , music (  विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ) , और  its annual celebrations and festivals , most notably Mardi Gras .
The city is often referred to as the  `` सबसे अद्वितीय  '' in America .
New Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana  , straddling the मिसिसिपी  River .
The city  और ऑरलियन्स  Parish ( ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by the  parishes of st. tammany to the उत्तर ,  St. Bernard to the east , Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain , part of which is included in the city limits , lies to  the उत्तर और झील  Borgne lies to the east .
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential  चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर 5  , 1968 .
The Republican nominee , former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the  चुनाव over the लोकतांत्रिक  nominee , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a  अभियान कि  promised to restore law and order to the nation 's cities , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the  चुनाव of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently  disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide , the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected for  the पहला समय in बारह सालो  .
It was a wrenching national experience , conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King , Jr. , and subsequent race riots across the  स्वदेश , the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक  presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy , widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses , and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The election featured the strongest third party effort  चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा राज्यपाल  George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention  in the दक्षिण to समाप्त  school segregation , he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
इस थी the पिछला चुनाव in जिससे  New York had the most votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census , California gained the most electoral votes and has  remained the सबसे  populous state since then .
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won  बगैर carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी  's home state .
Karak ( ; also known as Garak , Garrak , and  gorg ) is a गाँव in gamasiyab ग्रामीण ज़िला , in  the Central District of Nahavand County , Hamadan Province , Iran .
At the 2006 census , its population was 294 , in 65  परिवारों .
Kurt 's  हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald  कोबेन ( फ़रवरी 20 , 1967 – अप्रैल  5 , 1994 ) was an American musician and artist , best known as the lead singer , guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain  formed निर्वाण साथ krist novoselic in एबरडीन  , Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle music scene , having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit ``  इससे  its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ) .
Following the success  of nevermind , निर्वाण थी labeled  `` the flagship band '' of Generation X , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and frustrated , believing his message and artistic  दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक , साथ उसके निजी मुद्दे प्रायः  subject to media attention .
He  challenged निर्वाण  's audience with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years of his life , Cobain  struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन  , illness and depression .
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image , and the professional and lifelong  निजी pressures  surrounding himself and his wife , musician Courtney Love .
On April  8 , 1994 , कोबेन  was found dead at his home in Seattle , the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The circumstances of his death at age 27  have become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination  and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana ,  साथ कोबेन as a songwriter , रै  sold over 25 million albums in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .
A millwright is a craftsman or tradesman engaged with the construction and  मेंटेनेंस  of machinery .
More generally in the English  बोलना संसार , जल्दी millwrights यहूद विशेषज्ञ  carpenters who erected machines used in agriculture , food processing and processing lumber and paper .
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution , their skills  यहूद दबाया into सेवा  building the earliest powered textile mills .
Modern millwrights work with steel and other materials in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of several skilled trades in order to successfully fabricate  औद्योगिक मशीनरी or to इकट्ठे मशीने इससे pre-fabricated  parts .
The modern millwright  जरूर भी be समर्थ to पढ़ा blueprints और अन्य  schematics to aid him in the construction of complex systems .
Millwrights are frequently unionized , with around 45  % unionized in the us , हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights  often set themselves up as independent contractors .
The Adjustment  ब्यूरो is a 2011 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कार्रवाई  thriller film loosely based on the Philip K. Dick short story , `` Adjustment Team `` .
The film was written and  निर्देशित by  George Nolfi and stars Matt Damon and Emily Blunt .
The cast also includes  एंथोनी mackie , जॉन  Slattery , Michael Kelly , and Terence Stamp .
The score was composed by Thomas Newman , with two   songs by Richard Ashcroft ( `` Future 's Bright '' for the opening sequence ; `` Are You Ready ? '' for the closing credits ) .
Sodium azide is  the अकार्बनिक  compound with the formula NaN3 .
This colorless salt is the  gas-forming घटक in अनेक car एयरबैग  systems .
It is used for the preparation of other  azide  compounds .
It is an ionic substance , is  अत्यधिक घुलनशील in जल  , and is very acutely toxic .
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on  the अंदर of the प्राथमिक चाप  .
The shadow of the  फ़ोटोग्राफ़र 's सिर  on the bottom marks the centre of the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ) .
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon that is caused by reflection of light in water droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere , resulting in a spectrum  of लाइट appearing in the आसमान  .
It  takes the  form of a multicoloured arc .
rainbows caused by धूप  always appear in the section of sky directly opposite the sun .
In a `` primary  रेनबो '' , the चाप shows  red on the outer part and violet on the inner side .
This rainbow is caused by light being refracted while entering a  droplet of जल , तब reflected अंदर on the  back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it .
In a double rainbow , a second arc is seen outside the primary arc , and has the order of its colours reversed ,  रेड facing toward the अन्य एक , in दोनो rainbows .
This second rainbow is  caused by लाइट reflecting  twice inside water droplets .
The Conservative Party , officially the Conservative and Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories , is a  centre-right राजनैतिक पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम कि espouses the तत्त्वज्ञान  of conservatism and British unionism .
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom , being the  largest सिंगल पार्टी in the हाउस  of Commons with 303 MPs , the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors , and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs .
It governs in coalition with the Liberal Democrats , with  पार्टी नेता दाउद cameron  as Prime Minister .
The Conservative Party was founded in 1834 , and was one  of दो प्रबल पार्टियों in the 19th सदी  , along with the Liberal Party .
It changed its  नाम to the रूढ़िवादी और यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी in 1912 बाद विलय साथ the  Liberal Unionist Party , although that name is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party .
In the 1920s , the Liberal  vote greatly  diminished and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals .
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57  सालो of the 20th सदी , सहित विंस्टन चर्चिल  ( 1940–45 , 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ) .
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and saw the  conservatives become the  most eurosceptic of the three major parties .
The party was returned to government in coalition , having failed to win a majority , in 2010 under the more ``  उदार '' नेतृत्व of दाउद cameron  .
In the European Parliament , the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs , who sit with the soft eurosceptic  यूरोपीय conservatives और reformists ( ecr ) संसदीय समूह , जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the गठबंधन  of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty .
They are the third-largest party in the Scottish  पार्लियामेंट और second-largest  in the Welsh Assembly .
They were formally  अलाइड to the ulster यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी ( uup ) as भाग of  the Ulster Conservatives and Unionists arrangement , with the UUP currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive .
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final , and perhaps most recognizable , line-up  comprised  Beyoncé Knowles , Kelly Rowland and Michelle Williams .
Formed in 1990 in  ह्यूस्टन , टेक्सास , नियति  's Child members began their musical endeavors as Girl 's Tyme comprising , among others , Knowles , Rowland , LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett .
After years of  सीमित कामयाबी , वे यहूद  signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child .
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition following the release of their best-selling second album , The Writing 's on the Wall , which contained  the number-one singles `` बिल्स , बिल्स  , Bills `` and `` Say My Name `` .
Despite  नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , the समूह थी plagued  by internal conflict and legal turmoil , as Roberson and Luckett attempted to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles , citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland , his daughter and niece , respectively .
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with Williams and Farrah Franklin ; however  , in 2000 , फ्रैंकलिन थी बर्खास्त  , leaving them as a trio .
Their third album , Survivor , which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to  the समूह 's अनुभव  , contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women `` , `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious `` .
In 2002 , they announced a hiatus and  re-united दो सालो  later for the release of their fourth studio album , Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ) .
Destiny 's Child has sold more than 50 million  रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी  to date .
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one  of the महानतम musical trios of सब समय , the नवीं  most successful artist/band of the 2000s , and placed the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008 .
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States federal agency under the Department of  स्वास्थ्य और इंसान सेवाएं headquartered in druid पहाड़ियाँ , unincorporated  DeKalb County , Georgia , in Greater Atlanta .
It works to protect public health and safety by providing information to  बढ़ाएँ स्वास्थ्य निर्णय  , and it promotes health through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations .
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens and other microbial infections ) , environmental  स्वास्थ्य , occupational सुरक्षा और स्वास्थ्य , स्वास्थ्य प्रमोशन , चोट रोकथाम और  education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States .
The CDC is the United States ' national  पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य संस्थान और is a founding  member of the International Association of National Public Health Institutes .
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the  समय , स्थान , और परिमाण  of a future earthquake within stated limits '' , and particularly of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region . ''
This  can be विशिष्ट इससे भूकंप forecasting  , which is the probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard , including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes , in a given area over periods of years or decades .
This can be further distinguished from real-time  भूकंप चेतावनी प्रणालियों , जिससे , upon डिटेक्शन of a कठोर भूकंप  , can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking .
To be useful , an earthquake prediction must be  precise पर्याप्त to वारंट the लागत of increased  precautions , including disruption of ordinary activities and commerce , and timely enough that preparation can be made .
Predictions must also be reliable , as false alarms and cancelled alarms are not only  economically costly , लकिन seriously undermine विश्वास in  , and thereby the effectiveness of , any kind of warning .
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a magnitude of 4.0 or  वृहद , नगण्य कामयाबी in भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily  obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of time , location , or magnitude .
however , ऐसे  trivial `` successful predictions '' are not useful .
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were predicted , or at least  anticipated , लकिन no अर्जी of a कामयाब भविष्यवाणी of a प्रमुख भूकंप रै  survived close inquiry .
In the 1970s there was  तीव्र आशावाद amongst वैज्ञानिकों कि कुछ विधि of  predicting earthquakes might be found , but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it was even possible .
While many scientists still hold that , given enough resources , prediction might be possible , many others maintain that earthquake  भविष्यवाणी is inherently नामुमकिन  .
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13 , 1993 )  is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , सिंगर  , musician , songwriter and record producer .
Ryan is best known for starring as Bailey  पिकेट in the डिज़्नी चैनल  Original Series The Suite Life on Deck .
In 2008 , The Suite Life on Deck ranked as TV 's top series among kids 6-11 and the No . 2 scripted series  among tweens 9-14  .
Ryan started acting in professional theatres at  the  age of seven ; in 2007 she appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the Firehouse and then was discovered in a nationwide search by Disney .
She is also known for appearing in the 2008  विशेषता फिल्मी the  Longshots as Edith .
In 2009 , she guest starred in  an एपीसोड of wizards of waverly प्लेस in wizards on डेक साथ हन्ना  Montana as Bailey Pickett along with her other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck .
Then , in 2010 , she  स्ट्रक्चर in the फिल्मी 16 बधाइयां , जिससे थी the  most watched cable program on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel .
16 Wishes  introduced रयान to नई ऑडियंस ; the फिल्म प्राप्त ऊँची viewership in the वयस्कों जनसांख्यिकी ( 18-34 ) .
Soon after that ,  रयान स्ट्रक्चर in the स्वतंत्र नाट्य  film , What If ... , which premiered on August 20 , 2010 .
Ryan also starred in the new Disney Channel Original movie , Radio Rebel , where she portrays  the भूमिका of tara एडम्स , a शर्मीले 17-year-old लड़की जो  adopts the radio personality , Radio Rebel .
released  February 17 , 2012 .
Ryan stars in  the titular भूमिका in the  Disney Channel Original Series , Jessie .
Stührling Tourbillon  गति  ( ) .
In horology , a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an  जोड to the यांत्रिकी of  a watch escapement .
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet from an earlier idea by the English chronometer  मेकर जॉन अर्नाल्ड , a tourbillon aims to काउंटर the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता by mounting the escapement और  balance wheel in a rotating cage , to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position .
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy , tourbillons are still included in some  महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a विलक्षणता  and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity .
The mechanism is usually  उजागर on the देखें 's फेस  to show it off .
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a software component used for the installation ,  मेंटेनेंस , और हटाना of तन्त्र on आधुनिक  Microsoft Windows systems .
The installation information , and often the files themselves  , हैं packaged in संस्थापना पैकेज , loosely  relational databases structured as COM Structured Storages and commonly known as `` MSI files '' , from their default file extension .
Windows Installer contains significant changes from its  पूर्ववर्ती , सेटअप  API .
New features include a GUI  फ्रेमवर्क और स्वचालित  generation of the uninstallation sequence .
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable  installer frameworks ऐसे  as older versions of InstallShield and NSIS .
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows  installer as the आधार लिये संस्थापना frameworks , so कि वे synchronize  correctly with other installers and keep the internal database of installed products consistent .
Important features such as rollback and  versioning निर्भर on a सतत  internal database for reliable operation .
Furthermore , Windows Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by  performing तन्त्र संस्थापना by प्रॉक्सी लिये unprivileged उपयोक्ता  .
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages , originally marketed  as उर्जा पेय , बेची by phusion  Projects of Chicago , Illinois .
Phusion  operates as पेय  Four Brewing Company .
Four Loko , the company 's most popular beverage  , debuted in the संयुक्त  States market in 2005 .
It  is अभी बेची in 48 राज्य  , and in Canada , The Bahamas , Bolivia , Honduras , and Europe .
The name `` Four '' is derived from the original energy drink 's four main ingredients :  दारू , कैफीन , taurine , और  guarana .
Four branded products have been the object of legal , ethical ,  और स्वास्थ्य चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the कम्पनी allegedly  marketing them to the underaged and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine .
बाद the पेय थी बैन in अनेक राज्य , a उत्पाद reintroduction  in December 2010 removed caffeine , taurine , and guarana as ingredients , and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink .
The neck of a guitar showing the nut ( in the background ,  coloured श्वेत ) और पहला  four metal frets .
A fret  is a उठाया तत्व on the  neck of a stringed instrument .
Frets usually extend across the full width   of the neck .
On most modern  पश्चिमी fretted यंत्र  , frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard .
On some historical  यंत्र और non-european यंत्र ,  frets are made of pieces of string tied around the neck .
Frets divide the neck into fixed segments  at intervals सम्बन्धित to a  musical framework .
On instruments such as guitars , each fret  represents एक semitone in the मानक  western system where one octave is divided into twelve semitones .
Fret is often used as a verb , meaning  बस `` to दबायें  down the string behind a fret . ''
Fretting often refers to the  frets and/or  their system of placement .
There was consumption of  दारू दोनो दौरान  and after prohibition .
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production , distribution and  बिक्री of alcoholic पेय in the संयुक्त राज्य और थी widely समर्थित  by the American public when it went into effect in 1920 .
The  temperance गति था popularized  the belief that alcohol was the major cause of most personal and social problems and prohibition was seen as the solution to the nation 's poverty , crime , violence , and other ills .
Upon ratification of the amendment , the famous  इंजीलवादी बिली संडे कहा कि ``  The slums will soon be only a memory .
we होगा फेरे हमारी जेलों into कारखानों  and our jails into storehouses and corncribs . ''
(  compare christianity  and alcohol . )
Since alcohol was to be banned and since it was seen as the  कारण of सबसे , if नहीं सब , अपराधों , कुछ  communities sold their jails .
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United  राज्य कॉंग्रेस confidently asserted  that `` There is as much chance of repealing the Eighteenth Amendment as there is for a hummingbird to fly to the planet Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ) , ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI dimension symbol : L ) ,  is the आधारभूत ईकाई of लंबाई in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली  of Units ( SI ) .
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator to the North Pole ( at sea level ) , its definition has been periodically refined to reflect  growing ज्ञान of metrology  .
Since 1983 , it has been defined as `` the length of the path travelled by light in vacuum during  a समय अंतराल  of 1/299,792,458 of a second . ''
Geologists exploring Jurassic sedimentary rocks in  makhtesh gadol , negev  Desert , Israel
Geologists explaining the importance of volcanic ash  परतों to विद्यार्थी on फ़ील्ड  in Iceland
A  भूवैज्ञानिक is a वैज्ञानिक जो अध्ययन the ठोस  and liquid matter that constitutes the Earth as well as the processes and history that has shaped it .
Geologists usually  engage in अध्ययन  geology .
Geologists , studying more of an applied science than a theoretical one , must approach Geology  using भौतिकी , रसायन और जीवविज्ञान  as well as other sciences .
Geologists ,  compared to वैज्ञानिकों सगाई in अन्य फ़ील्ड , हैं generally अधिक उजागर  to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab .
Geologists are engaged in exploration for  खनन कंपनियाँ in ढूंढें of धातुओं  , oils , and other Earth resources .
They are also in the forefront of natural hazards and  आपदाओं चेतावनी और शमन  , studying earthquakes , volcanic activity , tsunamis , weather storms , and the like ; their studies are used to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events .
Currently , geologists are also engaged in the discussion of climate  बदलें , as वे पढ़ाई the इतिहास और प्रमाण लिये  this Earth process .
Below is a comprehensive drill and tap size chart for  सब drills , इम्पीरियल  and metric , and taps up to 36.5 mm .
Modern  वैक्यूम tubes , ज़्यादातर  miniature style
In electronics , a vacuum tube , electron tube ( in North America  ) , तापायनिक वाल्व , ट्यूब , or वाल्व is a  device controlling electric current through a vacuum in a sealed container .
The container is often thin  पारदर्शी कांच  in a roughly cylindrical shape .
The  सरलतम वैक्यूम ट्यूब , the डायोड , is essentially  an incandescent light bulb with an added electrode inside .
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot , electrons are ``  boiled '' बंद इसके सतह और  into the vacuum inside the bulb .
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is made more positive than the hot filament , a direct current flows through  the वैक्यूम to the एलेक्ट्रोड ( a demonstration of the एडिसन  effect ) .
as the वर्तमान तभी  flows in one direction , it makes it possible to convert an alternating current applied to the filament to direct current .
The introduction of a  तीसरा एलेक्ट्रोड  , a grid between the filament and the plate , yields another function .
A voltage applied to the grid controls the  वर्तमान बहती इससे  the filament to the plate .
Thus , it  allows the यंत्र  to be used as an electronic amplifier .
Vacuum tubes are thus used for rectification , amplification , switching , or similar  प्रसंस्करण or सृष्टि of विद्युत सिग्नल  .
The vast majority of modern day  tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक साथ a वैक्यूम अंदर  , and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament .
Some  अपवाद to इस हैं dealt साथ  in the section about gas-filled tubes below .
Vacuum   tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology , which drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting , television , radar , sound reinforcement , sound recording and reproduction , large telephone networks , analog and digital computers , and industrial process control .
Although some applications had counterparts using earlier technologies such as the spark gap transmitter or mechanical computers , it was the invention of the vacuum tube with  तीन electrodes ( पुकारा a ट्रायोड ) और इसके काबिलियत of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical .
In most applications , solid-state  डिवाइस ऐसे as transistors  and other semiconductor devices have replaced tubes .
Solid-state devices last longer and are smaller , more efficient ,  अधिक विश्वसनीय , और सस्ता  than tubes .
Tubes can be fragile , sometimes generate significant unwanted heat , and can take many seconds—many minutes  in नाजुक applications—after powering  on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance .
However , tubes still find uses where solid-state devices  have नहीं महरूम विकसित , हैं अव्यवहारिक , or जहाँ a ट्यूब रै श्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन  , as with some devices in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters .
Tubes are still produced for   such applications .
Tubes  हैं कम संभावित than सेमीकंडक्टर  devices to be destroyed by the electromagnetic pulse produced by nuclear explosions and geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares .
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured sweets , currently produced and marketed by the Wm . Wrigley Jr.  कम्पनी , a प्रभाग of मंगल  , Inc .
They have hard sugar  शेल जिससे carry  the letter S .
The inside is mainly sugar , corn syrup , and hydrogenated   palm kernel oil along with fruit juice , citric acid , and natural and artificial flavours .
The confectionery has been sold in a variety of  फ्लेवर संग्रहण , ऐसे as तीव्र  and Wild Berry .
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill , ( 30  नवम्बर 1874 – 24 जनवरी 1965 ) थी a अंग्रेजों राजनेता जो थी  the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955 .
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century ,  चर्चिल थी भी an अधिकारी in the अंग्रेजों फौज  , a historian , a writer , and an artist .
He is the only British Prime Minister in history to have received the Nobel Prize in Literature , and was also  the पहला व्यक्ति to be बना an मानद नागरिक of the  United States .
Churchill was born into  an वैभवशाली परिवार as the  grandson of the 7th Duke of Marlborough .
His father ,  रब randolph चर्चिल , थी a charismatic राजनेता जो परोसा  as Chancellor of the Exchequer ; his mother , Jennie Jerome , was an American socialite .
As a young army officer , he saw action in British  इण्डिया , the सूडान , और the  Second Boer War .
He  gained कीर्ति as  a war correspondent and wrote books about his campaigns .
At the forefront of  राजनीती लिये पचास सालो , he आयोजित  many political and cabinet positions .
Before the First World War , he served as President of  the फलक of व्यापार , घर सचिव , और  First Lord of the Admiralty as part of the Asquith Liberal government .
During the war , he continued as First Lord  of the admiralty जबतक the विनाशकारी gallipoli  Campaign caused his departure from government .
He then briefly resumed active army service on the Western  सामने as कमांडर of the 6th बटालियन of the royal  Scots Fusiliers .
He returned to government as Minister of Munitions , Secretary of State for War , and  सचिव  of State for Air .
After the War , Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( Baldwin )  सरकारी of 1924–29 , controversially  returning the pound sterling in 1925 to the gold standard at its pre-war parity , a move widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy .
Also controversial was his opposition to increased  घर नियम लिये इण्डिया और उसके प्रतिरोध to the 1936  abdication of Edward VIII .
Out of office and politically `` in the  wilderness '' दौरान the 1930s , चर्चिल took the  lead in warning about Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament .
On the outbreak of the Second World War , he was again  नियुक्त पहला रब of the  Admiralty .
Following the resignation of  नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10 may 1940 , चर्चिल  became Prime Minister .
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat , surrender , or a compromise peace helped inspire British resistance , especially during the  मुश्किल जल्दी दिनों of the युद्ध जब ब्रिटेन stood अलोन among यूरोपीय  countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler .
Churchill was particularly noted for  उसके भाषणों  and radio broadcasts , which helped inspire the British people .
He led Britain as Prime Minister until victory over Nazi Germany had  महरूम secured  .
After the Conservative Party lost the 1945 election ,  he became नेता of  the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government .
After winning the 1951 election , he again became  प्रधान मंत्री  , before retiring in 1955 .
Upon his death , Elizabeth II granted him the honour of a state funeral ,  जिससे देखी  one of the largest assemblies of world statesmen in history .
Named  the महानतम briton  of all time in a 2002 poll , Churchill is widely regarded as being among the most influential people in British history .

The Ford Focus is a compact car ( C-segment in Europe ) manufactured by the  घाट मोटर कम्पनी चूंकि  1998 .
Ford began sales of the Focus to  यूरोपीय in जुलाई 1998 और in उत्तर अमेरिका  during 1999 for the 2000 model year .
In Europe , South America , North America and South Africa , the Focus replaced the various  संस्करण of the घाट अनुरक्षण बेची in those  markets .
In Asia and Australasia  , it replaced  the Ford Laser .
As of the first  हाफ of 2012 , the फ़ोकस  surpassed the Toyota Corolla to become the world 's best selling automobile nameplate .
The Focus has been considered one of the 50 greatest cars of the past fifty years by British magazine  car  .
An  आगर थाली -- an  example of a bacterial growth medium .
Specifically , it is a streak plate ; the orange lines and dots are formed by  बैक्टीरियल colonies  .
A growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or gel designed to support the growth of  microorganisms or कोशिकाएं ,  or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens .
There are different types of media  लिये growing अलग प्रकार of कोशिकाएं  .
There are two major types of  विकास मीडिया : those  used for cell culture , which use specific cell types derived from plants or animals , and microbiological culture , which are used for growing microorganisms , such as bacteria or yeast .
The  सबसे आम विकास मीडिया लिये microorganisms हैं nutrient broths और आगर  plates ; specialized media are sometimes required for microorganism and cell culture growth .
Some  जीवों , termed सुकुमार जीवों  , require specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements .
Viruses , for example , are obligate intracellular parasites and require a  विकास मीडियम  containing living cells .
A talent agent , or booking agent , is a person who finds jobs for  अभिनेताओं , लेखक , फिल्मी निर्देशकों  , musicians , models , producers , professional athletes , writers and other people in various entertainment businesses .
An agent also defends , supports and promotes the  ब्याज of his/her  clients .
Agents can not produce their own shows due to  विरोध of ब्याज .
A talent agent  जरूर be  familiar with their clients .
An agent has to  जान कया दयालु of कार्य the  client can and can not do in order to match them with various jobs .
Having an agent is not required , but does  सहायता the कलाकार  in getting jobs .
In many cases casting directors , or  अन्य व्यवसायों , go to हुनर  agencies to find artists they are looking for .
The agent is paid a percentage of the star 's earnings (  typically 10 % ) .
एजेंटों sometimes होगा  be referred to as `` 10 percenters . ''
There are different regulations that govern  अलग प्रकार of एजेंटों कि हैं स्थापित by कलाकार  's unions and the legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates .
वहीँ हैं भी पेशेवर  organizations that license talent agencies .
Since the decline in viewership in theaters , from the 1950s to 1960s , this caused a  स्मारकीय शिफ़्ट in कैसा studios होता उपज films  and thus reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors .
अभिनेताओं और अभिनेत्रियों यहूद working  for the studios but were not owned by one major studio entity and so were able to work on within their time and with other studios .
Because of this , agents were now seen as a necessity  बजाय of an विकल्प  .
Agents now became third parties that negotiated  between studios और क्लाइंट , इस बनाना  their services imperative between each party .
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts , all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the California Labor Code , which calls an agent a `` person or corporation who engages in  the occupation of procuring , offering , होनहार , or attempting  to procure employment for artist or artists . ''
Mars has two known moons , Phobos and  deimos , जिससे हैं विचार  to be captured asteroids .
Both satellites  यहूद खोजा in 1877 by asaph  Hall and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) who , in Greek mythology , accompanied their father Ares , god of war , into battle .
Ares  थी ज्ञात as मंगल  to the Romans .
It is possible that  मंगल may have moons छोटी than  50 - 100 meters and a dust ring between Phobos and Deimos may be present but none have been discovered .
In law enforcement  parlance , the पद  murder book refers to the case file of a murder investigation .
Typically , murder  किताबे  include crime scene photographs and sketches , autopsy and forensic reports , transcripts of investigators ' notes and witness interviews .
The murder book encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder  छानबीन , इससे the समय the हत्या is पहला reported through the गिरफ़्तार  of a suspect .
Law enforcement  एजेंसियों typically गार्ड हत्या किताबे carefully  , and it is unusual for civilians to be given unfettered access to these kinds of records , especially for unsolved cases .

Melon balls are balls of melon  बना using a melon baller कि varies  from around 1 centimeter to 3 centimeters ( about 3/8 inch to 1 inch ) .
वे हैं generally  used in fruit salad .
A KSA , or Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities  , is a श्रेणी of कथा कथन कि हैं जरूरी जब applying  to United States Federal government job openings .
KSAs are used to  determine , साथ साथ resumes  , who the best applicants are when several candidates qualify for a job .
The knowledge , skills and abilities ( KSAs ) necessary  लिये the कामयाब प्रदर्शन of  a position are contained on each job vacancy announcement .
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal agencies to stop requiring job applicants to fill out  the questionnaires , to be phased आउट  within a year .
KSAs are brief and  केन्द्रित essays परिचय एक 's करियर और शैक्षणिक  background that presumably qualify one to perform the duties of the position being applied for .
A knowledge , skills , and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay about one 's talent and expertise and  सम्बन्धित अनुभवों ( कार्य , शिक्षा , स्वयंसेवी  ) and accomplishments .
A series of KSA statements are usually required when applying for most  संघीय सरकारी  and some state and city government jobs .
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of a prospective applicant in terms of  संभावित क्षमता to perform the कर्तव्य  of the job .
Most government hiring officials look for a short , crisp and clear KSA that  emphasizes परिणाम or accomplishments  obtained in previous work .
KSA statements are also known  as मूल्यांकन कारकों  .
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating  कारकों '' , `` विशेषता रैंकिंग कारकों '' , `` ज्ञान  , Abilities , skills and Other Characteristics '' , or `` Job Elements '' .
The name can be just a name  लकिन प्रायः  it influences content and length of the essay .
Every agency has its own regulations but most of the time  the प्रत्येक ksa फ़ैक्टर चाहिए be 1/2 to 11⁄2 पृष्ठों  long .
The  नीचे परिभाषाएं हैं पारिभाषित by  the U.S. Office of Personnel Management :
Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes required to perform a  जॉब और हैं  generally demonstrated through qualifying service , education , or training .
Knowledge - Is a body of information  लागू सीधे to the प्रदर्शन  of a function .
Skill - Is an  observable competence to perform  a learned psychomotor act .
Ability - Is  competence to perform an  observable behavior or a behavior that results in an observable product .
The  स्कोरिंग of ksa  essays is based on a scale of from one to 100 .
Job applicants must score above  70 to be माना लिये the स्थिति  .
High scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible , providing  उदाहरण इससे पिछला नियुक्ति or प्रशिक्षण कि clearly demonstrate तुम मिलें the  qualifications .
When applying to federal government positions , a Federal  पुनरारंभ is प्रायः जरूरी in जोड  to KSA statements .

Love Always is the debut album of American R & B duo K-Ci  & जोजो , released on जून 17 ,  1997 , by MCA Records .
It was recorded at various studios in New York and the Los  एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल  in 1996 and 1997 .
It was produced by JoJo and several   others , including DeVante Swing , James Mtume , and Jeff Redd .
The duo were  originally a भाग of jodeci  before this album .
The album  peaked at छठे on the us बिलबोर्ड  200 and also appeared on international charts .
the सिंगल `` सब my जीवन `` charted क्रमांक एक in  multiple countries , and all four of the album 's singles peaked above the top 25 in the US Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles .
Love Always was  प्राप्त favorably by आलोचकों ,  who praised the brothers ' singing ability and the production .
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and gold by Music  कनाडा और ifpi स्वीडन  .
As of June 1999 it had sold 2.9  लाख नक़ल in the संयुक्त  States .
A variable-rate mortgage , adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ) , or tracker mortgage is a mortgage loan with the interest rate on  the नोट periodically समायोजित आधारित on an अनुक्रमणिका  which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets .
The  ऋण may be offered  at the lender 's standard variable rate/ base rate .
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index , but where the  lender offers no विशिष्ट कड़ी to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the रेट  can be changed at the lender 's discretion .
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the United States , whilst in the United States , `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common , and implies a mortgage regulated by the  संघीय सरकारी , साथ कैप्स  on charges .
In many  देशों , समायोज्य  rate mortgages are the norm , and in such places , may simply be referred to as mortgages .
Among the most common indices are the rates on  1-year constant-maturity राजकोष (  CMT ) securities , the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ) , and the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) .
A few lenders  उपयोग उनके अपना लागत  of funds as an index , rather than using other indices .
This is done to ensure a steady  हाशिया लिये the lender , जिनकी  own cost of funding will usually be related to the index .
Consequently , payments made by the borrower may change over time with the  बदलना ब्याज रेट ( alternatively , the  term of the loan may change ) .
This is distinct from the  ग्रैजुएट भुगतान बंधक  , which offers changing payment amounts but a fixed interest rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage , the  फिक्स्ड रेट बंधक , the ऋणात्मक  amortization mortgage , and the balloon payment mortgage .
Adjustable rates transfer part of the  ब्याज रेट रिस्क इससे  the lender to the borrower .
वे can be प्रयुक्त जहाँ मनमौजी  interest rates make fixed rate loans difficult to obtain .
The borrower  लाभ if the ब्याज  rate falls but loses if the interest rate increases .
The borrower benefits from reduced margins to the underlying  लागत of उधार compared to फिक्स्ड or capped  rate mortgages .
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy , a United States Senator and brother of assassinated President John  fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी , took प्लेस shortly बाद मध्यरात्रि on जून 5 , 1968 , in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , during the campaign season for the United States Presidential election , 1968 .
After winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for the  लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  , Kennedy was shot as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later .
Sirhan Sirhan , a 24-year-old Palestinian / Jordanian immigrant  , थी convicted of कैनेडी 's हत्या  and is serving a life sentence for the crime .
Sirhan 's lawyers have  released कथन claiming प्रमाण  that he was framed .
The shooting was recorded on  ऑडियो टेप by a freelance समाचारपत्र  reporter , and the aftermath was captured on film .
Kennedy 's  देह lay in repose at st. पैट्रिक 's  Cathedral in New York for two days before a funeral mass was held on June 8 .
उसके देह थी interred  near his brother John at Arlington National Cemetery .
His death prompted the protection  of अध्यक्षीय  candidates by the United States Secret Service .
Hubert Humphrey went on to win the  लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी  , but ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon .
As with his brother Jack 's death ,  bobby 's हत्या और the  circumstances surrounding it have spawned a variety of conspiracy theories .
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one of only two sitting United States Senators to be  assassinated ( the अन्य  being Huey Long ) .
The Modern Age of Comic Books is  an अनौपचारिक  name for the period in the history of mainstream American comic books generally considered to last from the mid-1980s until present day .
In this period , comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically complex ,  creators became better-known  and active in changing the industry , independent comics flourished , and larger publishing houses became more commercialized .
An alternate name for this period is the Dark Age of Comic Books , due to the  लोकप्रियता और कलाकारी influence of grim शीर्षक  , such as and Watchmen .
When Harry Met Sally ... is a 1989 American  रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा by नोरा ephron  and directed by Rob Reiner .
It  सितारों बिली  Crystal as Harry and Meg Ryan as Sally .
The story follows the title characters from the time they meet just before sharing  a cross-country ड्राइव , through बारह सालो or so of मौका मुठभेड़ों  in New York City .
The film raises the question `` Can men and women ever  बस be मित्रों ? '' और अग्रिम अनेक विचार परिचय संबंध  that became household concepts , such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person '' .
The origins of the film came from Reiner  's वापसी  to single life after a divorce .
An interview Ephron conducted with Reiner provided  the आधार  for Harry .
Sally  थी आधारित on ephron  and some of her friends .
Crystal came on  फलक और बना उसके अपना योगदान  to the screenplay , making Harry funnier .
Ephron supplied the structure of the  फिल्मी साथ much of the संवाद आधारित on the real-life  friendship between Reiner and Crystal .
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by Harry Connick , Jr. , with a big  बैंड और ऑर्केस्ट्रा arranged by मार्क  Shaiman .
Connick won his first Grammy Award for Best Jazz Male Vocal  प्रदर्शन  .
Columbia Pictures released the  फिल्मी using the `` मंच '' तकनीक , जिससे शामिल  opening it in a few select cities , letting positive word of mouth generate interest , and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks .
When Harry Met Sally ... grossed a total of US $ 92 .8  लाख in उत्तर  America .
Ephron received a British Academy Film  पुरस्कार , an ऑस्कर नामांकन , और a लेखक  Guild of America Award nomination for her screenplay .
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years ... 100  हंसते सूची of the शीर्ष कॉमेडी films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और  number 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 Funniest Movies '' .
In early 2004 , the film was adapted for the stage in a  उत्पादन अभिनीत ल्यूक पेरी  and Alyson Hannigan .

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food products primarily consisting of  boxed पास्ता bundled साथ  a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings .
The contents of each box are combined with browned ground beef ,  जल और मिल्क to बनाएँ  a complete dish .
The product line also features products with  अन्य starches ऐसे as  rice or potatoes instead of pasta .
It is  बना  by General Mills .
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the sauce packets , some  किस्में of the उत्पाद शामिल  ground beef .
These include a frozen food line , which features some of  the ब्रांड 's क्लासिक किस्में in a पूरा भोजन kit रूप  , with frozen ground beef and frozen sauce packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag .
There is also an ``  तत्काल '' संस्करण of हैमबर्गर  Helper containing dehydrated meat , noodles and seasonings in a small pouch , requiring only water to be added .
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '' , an anthropomorphic  एनिमेटेड , चार fingered left-hand दस्ताने , जिससे appears in the उत्पाद 's टेलीविज़न commercials  and on the packages .
ceres as  seen with the Hubble Space Telescope .
It is the  तभी  dwarf planet in the asteroid belt .
