A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object that is neither a  ग्रह nor a उपग्रह  .
More explicitly , the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a  celestial देह in सीधा कक्षा of the सूर्य कि is विशाल  enough for its shape to be controlled by gravitation , but that unlike a planet has not cleared its orbital region of other objects .
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the Sun ,  brought परिचय by an बढ़ाएँ in discoveries of trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ  that rivaled Pluto in size , and finally precipitated by the discovery of an even more massive object , Eris .
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of their orbit are   defined as planets , while those that are not massive enough to be rounded by their own gravity are defined as small Solar System bodies .
बौना  planets come in between .
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it  थी कहा to be the `` सही निर्णय '' by माइक भूरा , जो खोजा और अन्य नई बौना ग्रह , लकिन रै महरूम अस्वीकृत by एलन stern  , who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990 .
The IAU currently recognizes  पाँच बौना ग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली  : , Pluto , , , and .
However , only two of these bodies , Ceres and Pluto ,  have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त विवरण to  demonstrate that they fit the definition .
Eris has been accepted as a dwarf planet because it is more  विशाल than  Pluto .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with an absolute magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a diameter of ≥838 km assuming a  ज्यामितीय ऐल्बीडो of ≤1 ) हैं to be नामित अंतर्गत the assumption  that they are dwarf planets .
The only two such objects known at the time  , माकेमाके और हउमेया , गई through इस नामकरण  procedure and were declared to be dwarf planets .
It is suspected that another hundred or  so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ in the  Solar System are dwarf planets .
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the entire region known as the Kuiper belt is explored , and that the number may exceed  10,000 जब वस्तुएँ बिखरे  outside the Kuiper belt are considered .
Individual astronomers recognize several of these ,  और  in August 2011 Mike Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects , ranging from `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets . '
Brown  identifies नौ ज्ञात वस्तुएँ – the पाँच स्वीकृत by the iau प्लस  , , , and – as `` virtually certain '' , with another two dozen highly likely , and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total .
The classification  of लाशें in अन्य ग्रहीय प्रणालियों साथ the विशेषताएँ  of dwarf planets has not been addressed .
A debit card ( also known as a bank card  or जाँच कार्ड ) is a प्लास्टिक भुगतान कार्ड  that provides the cardholder electronic access to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution .
Some cards have a stored value with which a payment is made , while most relay a message  to the cardholder 's  bank to withdraw funds from a payee 's designated bank account .
The card , where accepted , can be used  बजाय of नकदी जब बनाना  purchases .
In some cases , the primary account number is assigned  exclusively लिये उपयोग on the अंतरजाल और  there is no physical card .
In many countries , the use of debit cards has become so widespread  कि उनके आवाज़ रै overtaken or entirely replaced cheques और  , in some instances , cash transactions .
The development of debit cards , unlike credit cards and charge cards , has generally been country specific resulting in a number of different systems around the world , which were  प्रायः असंगत  .
Since the  mid-2000s , a क्रमांक of पहलों have अनुमत  debit cards issued in one country to be used in other countries and allowed their use for internet and phone purchases .
Unlike credit and charge cards , payments using a debit card are  तत्काल transferred इससे the cardholder  's designated bank account , instead of them paying the money back at a later date .
Debit cards usually also allow for instant withdrawal of cash , acting as the ATM card  लिये withdrawing  cash .
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to customers , where a  ग्राहक can withdraw नकदी साथ साथ उनके  purchase .
Francois Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26 , 1914 - January 23 , 2011 ) was an American fitness , exercise , and nutritional expert and motivational speaker who is sometimes called `` the godfather of  फ़िटनेस  '' and the `` first fitness superhero . ''
He described himself as being a  `` sugarholic '' और a `` जंक खाना junkie  '' until he was 15 .
He also had behavioral problems , but `` turned his life around '' after listening to a public lecture by Paul Bragg , a  well-known पोषण स्पीकर  .
During his career , he  आए to मानना कि the देश 's overall  health depended on the health of its population , writing that `` physical culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America . ''
Decades before health and fitness began being promoted by  हस्तियाँ जैसे जेन फोंडा और रिचर्ड  Simmons , LaLanne was already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet .
He published numerous books on fitness and hosted a fitness television show  between 1953 और 1985  .
As early as 1936 ,  at आयु 21 , he खोली एक of the स्वदेश 's पहला फ़िटनेस gyms  in Oakland , California , which became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name .
One of his 1950s television exercise programs was aimed  toward महिलाओं , जिसको he  also encouraged to join his health clubs .
He invented a number of exercise  मशीने , सहित  leg-extension and pulley devices .
Besides producing his own series of videos , he coached the  बुजुर्ग और निष्क्रिय नहीं to forgo कसरत  , believing it would enable them to enhance their strength .
LaLanne also gained recognition for his success as a  bodybuilder , as खूब  as for his prodigious feats of strength .
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated , `` That Jack LaLanne 's an animal ! , ''  बाद lalanne , at 54 , ताल a 21-year-old  Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest .
On the  अवसर of lalanne 's मौत , श्वार्ज़नेगर credited lalanne  for being `` an apostle for fitness '' by inspiring `` billions all over the world to live healthier lives , '' and , as governor of California , had earlier placed him on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness .
Steve  रीव्स credited lalanne as उसके प्रेरणा to  build his muscular physique while keeping a slim waist .
He was  inducted to the कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल  of Fame and has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Air forces of most of  the देशों उपयोग प्रणाली  similar to Armies .
However , the RAF and the air forces of many Commonwealth countries , or those formerly under a British influence , use a different set of ranks loosely based on naval equivalents ; Lieutenant , Commander ,  कप्तान और commodore हैं prefixed लिये एयर फ़ोर्स उपयोग साथ उड़ान , wing , समूह और एयर , क्रमशः ( the पहला तीन होने the  units that they used to command ) .
Penélope Cruz  sánchez ( ; born  April 28 , 1974 ) is a Spanish actress .
Signed by an agent at age 15 , she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the following  साल  in Jamón , jamón ( 1992 ) , to critical acclaim .
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes  ( 1997 ) , the hi-lo देश ( 1999 ) , the लड़की of अपना सपनो ( 2000 )  and Woman on Top ( 2000 ) .
Cruz achieved  मान्यता लिये उसके सीसे  roles in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow .
She has since built a successful career , appearing in films from a wide range of genres , including  the कॉमेडी waking up in रेनो ( 2002 ) , the थ्रिलर gothika (  2003 ) , the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ) , and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ) .
She has received critical  acclaim लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ in volver  ( 2006 ) and Nine ( 2009 ) receiving Golden Globe and Academy Award nominations for each .
She  जीती the अकादमी  Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008 for Vicky Cristina Barcelona .
वो थी the पहला स्पेनी अभिनेत्री  in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Cruz has modeled  लिये कंपनियाँ  such as Mango , Ralph Lauren and L'Oréal .
पेनेलोपे और उसके younger सिस्टर  Mónica Cruz have designed items for Mango .
She has donated both her time  और धन to धर्मार्थ  .
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India , where she spent one week working for Mother Teresa ;  वो दान  her salary from ' to help fund the late nun 's mission .
A wax sculpture of Cruz will be placed in a premier spot  in the grevin मोम संग्रहालय  in Paris .
File  एक्सप्लोरर , previously ज्ञात as खिड़कियाँ एक्सप्लोरर  , is a file manager application and also a navigation tool that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from Windows 95 onwards .
It provides a  आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस लिये  accessing the file systems .
It is also the component of the operating system that presents many  उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस वस्तुएं on the मॉनिटर ऐसे  as the taskbar and desktop .
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer running ( for example , the File | Run command in Task Manager on NT-derived  संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ होगा फलन बगैर it , as होगा कमांड typed in a कमांड संकेत खिड़की  ) .
Located in the C : \Windows directory , it is  sometimes referred to as the खिड़कियाँ शेल  , explorer.exe , or simply “Explorer” .
The  परवाह bears हैं वर्ण  created by American Greetings in 1981 for use on greeting cards .
The original artwork  लिये the ताश थी चित्रित by कलाकार  Elena Kucharik .
In 1983 , Kenner turned the Care Bears into  plush टेडी bears .
the परवाह bears appeared in उनके अपना tv specials पुकारा the  Care Bears in the Land Without Feelings ( 1983 ) and The Care Bears Battle the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ) .
They also had their own television series from 1985 to 1988 , in addition to three  विशेषता films : the परवाह bears फिल्म ( 1985 ) , परवाह bears फिल्म ii :  A New Generation ( 1986 ) , and The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland ( 1987 ) .
प्रत्येक परवाह भालू आता in  a different color and has a specialized insignia on its belly that represents its duty and personality .
This insignia  थी ज्ञात as उनके  `` tummy symbol . ''
However , the movie Care  bears : oopsy  Does It ! renamed them `` belly badges '' .
Adding to the Care Bear family are the `` Care Bear Cousins '' , which  विशेषता a शेर , खरगोश  , penguin , raccoon , and other such animals created in the same style as the teddy bears .
In 2002 , the bears were reintroduced  साथ नई खिलौने .
बना by play-along खिलौने , the  new toys offered features such as illuminated bellies upon touch , aerobic bears , and glow-in-the-dark bears .
As part of this comeback , the Bears have appeared in two  computer-animated फिल्मों : परवाह bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004  ) and The Care Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ) .
In 2007 , the franchise celebrated its 25th anniversary ; another relaunch took place , as well as the release of  परवाह bears : oopsy करता  It ! .
In  mid-2011 , ag घोषित a पुनरुद्धार  TV animated series titled `` Care Bears : Welcome to Care-a-Lot `` .
The premiere of the series utilizes ``  30  years of caring '' .
It premiered on The Hub  on जून 2  , 2012 .
As of 2013  , परवाह  Bears merchandise is still being marketed .
During 2008 and  2009 , कनाडा 's कुकी जार समूह और फ़्रांस 's moonscoop  Group attempted to acquire the franchise from AGC , with no apparent success .
Interstate 70 (  i-70 ) is an अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग in the संयुक्त राज्य कि रनों इससे  Interstate 15 near Cove Fort , Utah , to a Park and Ride near Baltimore , Maryland .
It was the first  अंतरराज्यीय  Highway project in the United States .
I-70 approximately traces the path of  u.S.  Route 40 ( and also the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains .
West of the Rockies , the route of I-70 was  निकला इससे अनेक  sources .
I-70 is the fifth longest  अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग , बाद i-90  , I-80 , I-40 , and I-10 .
The  निर्माण of i-70 in कोलोराडो और यूटा is माना  an engineering marvel as the route passes through the Eisenhower Tunnel , Glenwood Canyon , and the San Rafael Swell .
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the  उच्चतम  point along the Interstate Highway system with an elevation of .
The sections of the interstate in Missouri and Kansas have  रखी अर्जी to be the  first interstate in the United States .
Though disputed , the Federal Highway  प्रशासन रै claimed the खण्ड of i-70 through glenwood  Canyon , completed in 1992 , was the last piece of the Interstate Highway system , as originally planned , to open to traffic .
Photo of  1999 कुल  eclipse
As seen from the Earth , a solar  ग्रहण occurs जब the चंद्रमा गुजरता between  the Sun and Earth , and the Moon fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the Sun .
This can happen only at new moon , when the Sun and the Moon are in conjunction as seen from Earth in an alignment  referred  to as syzygy .
In a total eclipse , the disk of the  सूर्य is fully obscured  by the Moon .
In partial and  annular  eclipses only part of the Sun is obscured .
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit , a little closer  to  the Earth , and in the same orbital plane , there would be total solar eclipses every single month .
However , the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at more than 5 degrees to Earth 's orbit around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so its shadow at new moon  प्रायः  misses Earth .
Earth 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the  चंद्रमा 's कक्षा जरूर क्रॉस इस प्लेन in अनुक्रम लिये an ग्रहण ( दोनो  solar as well as lunar ) to occur .
In addition , the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical , often taking it far enough away  इससे धरती कि इसके apparent आकार is नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to ब्लाक  the Sun totally .
The orbital planes cross each year  at a लकीर of नोड resulting in at तनिक दो , और up to पाँच  , solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses .
However , total  सौर eclipses हैं विरल at कोई particular  location because totality exists only along a narrow path on Earth 's surface traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra .
an ग्रहण  is a natural phenomenon .
Nevertheless , in some ancient and modern cultures , solar  eclipses have महरूम  attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens .
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people who are unaware of its astronomical explanation , as the  सूर्य seems to गायब दौरान the दिन और the आसमान darkens  in a matter of minutes .
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the Sun , observers should use special eye protection or indirect viewing techniques  जब देखने a आंशिक ग्रहण ,  or the partial phases of a total eclipse .
It is safe to view the total phase of a total solar eclipse  साथ the unaided नजर और  without protection , however .
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles will  सफर to रिमोट स्थितियाँ  to observe or witness predicted central solar eclipses .
A political party ( from , Genitive partis , `` part '' , `` portion '' ) is a political organization that typically seeks to influence , or entirely control ,  सरकारी नीति , प्रायः by  nominating candidates with aligned political views and trying to seat them in political office .
Parties  participate in चुनावी अभियान और  educational outreach or protest actions .
Parties often espouse an ideology or vision , expressed in a party program , bolstered by a written platform with specific goals ,  forming a गठबन्धन among disparate रूचि  .
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus  mangifera  , consisting of numerous tropical fruiting trees in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae .
The mango is native to South Asia , from where it has been  वितरित विश्वव्यापी to become एक of the सबसे cultivated  fruits in the tropics .
While other Mangifera species ( e.g . horse mango , M. foetida ) are also grown  on a अधिक स्थानीयकृत आधार , mangifera इंडिका – the 'common आम ' or 'इण्डियाn  mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions .
It is the national fruit of India ,  पाकिस्तानी और फिलीपीन  .
In several cultures , its fruit and leaves  हैं ritually प्रयुक्त as पुष्पक सजावट  at weddings , public celebrations and religious ceremonies .
Gill Arnette Byrd , < ref name > http :  //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm  ( born February 20 , 1961 in San Francisco , California ) is a former professional American football player .
He was a two time Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 and 1992 for the  सैन डिएगो chargers बाद graduating इससे  San Jose State University .
Byrd was  inducted into the  Chargers Hall of Fame in 1998 .
He was an All-City running back and defensive back at Lowell High School ( San Francisco ) ,  helping to सीसे the कार्डिनल्स  to the city championship in his senior season of 1978 .
World  मैप प्रर्दशित  the Tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer , also referred to as the Northern tropic , is the circle of latitude on the Earth that marks the most northerly position at  जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे ओवरहेड  at its zenith .
This event occurs once per year , at the time of the June solstice  , जब the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is tilted toward the सूर्य  to its maximum extent .
It currently ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′ 15.143′′  उत्तर of the  Equator .
Its Southern Hemisphere counterpart , marking the most southerly position at  जिससे the सूर्य may  appear directly overhead , is the Tropic of Capricorn .
These tropics are two of the five major degree measures or major circles of  अक्षांश कि चिह्नित मानचित्र of  the Earth , besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator .
The positions of these circles of latitude ( other than  the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष of रोटेशन  relative to the plane of its orbit .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on  dvd discs , और is फिलहाल  the dominant consumer video format in Asia , North America , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video  specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2  Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats (  प्रायः multi-channel  formats as described below ) .
Typically , the data rate for DVD movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s ,  और the बिट रेट is प्रायः  adaptive .
It was first  उपलब्धियाँ लिये  retail around 1997 .
The  dvd-video specification थी निर्मित  by DVD Forum and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not publicly available , because  प्रत्येक सदस्य  must sign a non-disclosure agreement .
निश्चित  information in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential .
in कम्प्यूटिंग और specifically अंतरजाल , a जोंक is एक  who benefits , usually deliberately , from others ' information or effort but does not offer anything in return , or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech .
In economics , this type of behavior is called `` free riding '' and is  संबद्ध साथ the फ़्री  rider problem .
Depending on context , leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer resources , but often instead to greedy use according to etiquette : to wit ,  using too much of कया is freely दिए बगैर contributing a उचित  amount back to the community that provides it .
the नाम गर्भाशयी इससे  the leech , an animal that sucks blood and then tries to leave unnoticed .
Other terms are used , such as `` freeloader '' ,  लकिन जोंक is the सबसे  common .
The full eagle logo  , प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न  versions from 1970 to 1993 .
The United States Postal  सेवा ( usps ) , भी ज्ञात as  the Post Office and U.S. Mail , is an independent agency of the United States federal government responsible for providing postal service in the United States .
It is one of the few government agencies  explicitly प्राधिकृत by  the United States Constitution .
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the  दूसरी महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस  , where Benjamin Franklin was appointed the first postmaster general .
The  cabinet-level पोस्ट दफ्तर विभाग थी निर्मित  in 1792 from Franklin 's operation and transformed into its current form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act .
The USPS employs over  574,000 मजदूर और operates  over 260,000 vehicles .
The USPS is the operator of the largest vehicle  बेड़े  in the world .
The USPS is legally  obligated to  serve all Americans , regardless of geography , at uniform price and quality .
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal letterboxes in the United States , but still competes against private package delivery  सेवाएं  , such as UPS and FedEx .
the usps रै नहीं सीधे प्राप्त taxpayer-dollars  since the early 1980s with the minor exception of subsidies for costs associated with the disabled and overseas voters .
Since the 2006 all-time peak mail volume , after which Congress passed the Postal Accountability and Enhancement Act `` , ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into  an खाता to pre-fund retiree health-care , 75 सालो into the भविष्य , a आवश्यकता अद्वितीय among संगठन और व्यवसायों in the u.S.  ) , revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume , prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit .
Washington , D.C. has been the capital of  the संयुक्त राज्य चूंकि  1800 .
Eight other cities  have परोसा as the बैठक प्लेस लिये  Congress and are therefore considered to have once been the capital of the United States .
In addition , each of the 50 U.S. states and the five principal territories  of the संयुक्त राज्य maintains इसके  own capital .
राजकुमारी काटें  diamond set in a ring
The Princess  काटें is the दूसरी सबसे  popular cut shape for diamonds , next to a round brilliant .
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on shape is similar to that of an  उलट पिरामिड साथ चार beveled  sides .
The princess cut is a  अपेक्षाकृत नई डायमंड काटें , having  been created in the 1960s .
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more popular round brilliant cut , in which the top of diamond , called the crown , is  काटें साथ a गोलाकार face-up आकार  and the bottom , called the pavilion , is shaped similar to a cone .
A princess cut with the same width as the diameter of a round brilliant will weigh more as it has  चार  corners which would otherwise have been cut off and rounded to form a round brilliant .
the राजकुमारी काटें  is sometimes referred to as a square modified brilliant .
However , while displaying the same high degree of brilliance , its faceting style is unique and  completely अलग इससे कि  of a round brilliant .
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut , having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` Cross '' cut crown and a series of unique , chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion which combine to give a distinct  cross-shaped प्रतिबिंब जब the स्टोन is viewed  directly through the table .
Effectively , the Princess cut combines the high degree of light  वापसी of a गोलाकार शानदार काटें साथ a distinctive  square or rectangular shape .
The square princess cut diamond is usually slightly  सस्ता than गोलाकार शानदार काटें ईंट of the वही कैरेट वज़न क्युकी  it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond , as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough .
The ability to retain more crystal weight makes  इस  shape popular amongst diamond cutters .
Accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA ) and American Gem Society  प्रयोगशाला ( agsl ) और यूरोपीय gem laboratories-usa  ( EGL-USA ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut .
There is no universal definition of what measurements make an ideal princess cut diamond and many diamond manufacturers  मार्केट आदर्श ईंट साथ differing facet पैटर्न  and angles as `` ideal cut '' .
In contrast to the AGSL , AGA , and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough industry consensus or empirical data to specify cut grading standards for Princess cut  ईंट और to do so is at the रिस्क of उपभोक्ता जो may be धोखे by ईंट accompanied by निर्गुण आदर्श or बेहतरीन  cut grades .
The name ``  राजकुमारी काटें '' थी originally प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन  with another diamond cut , otherwise known as the `` Profile '' cut , designed by Arpad Nagy , a London cutter , in 1961 .
The same name was later used and  बना लोकप्रिय by ygal पर्लमैन , betzalel  Ambar , and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979 .
A  समान काटें साथ तभी 49 facets , as opposed  to the original 58 facets of the princess cut , was later branded the `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three years of optical research yielded a square stone with faceting similar to that of a round  शानदार काटें डायमंड .
A  तुलना
The  क्रमांक of chevrons can affect  the overall outlook of a princess cut diamond .
This can usually be determined by the wire diagram  कि is plotted in डायमंड ग्रेडिंग  reports .
By adding more chevrons on the pavilion side of the diamond ,  the व्यक्तिगत facets of the  diamond will now be broken down into smaller facets .
As a result , it  can दे a राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड  a `` crushed ice '' look .
Vice versa , when a princess cut diamond has lesser chevrons , it  tends to दे the डायमंड a चंकी  outlook due to broader facets .
The domestic dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is  a subspecies of the धूसर भेड़िया  ( Canis lupus ) , a member of the Canidae family of the mammalian order Carnivora .
the पद `` घरेलू  dog '' is generally used for both domesticated and feral varieties .
The dog has been the first animal to be  domesticated और  has been the most widely kept working , hunting , and pet animal in human history .
The  शब्द `` श्वान '' may भी  mean the male of a canine species , as opposed to the word `` bitch '' for the female of the species .
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 years ago but , , the oldest fossil specimens genetically  linked to the आधुनिक श्वान 's lineage तिथि to लगभग 33,000-36,000  years ago .
Dogs '  मान to जल्दी इंसान hunter-gatherers  led to them quickly becoming ubiquitous across world cultures .
Dogs perform many roles for people , such as hunting , herding , pulling loads , protection , assisting police and military , companionship , and , more recently , aiding   handicapped individuals .
This impact on human society has given them the nickname `` Man 's  बेहतरीन dost '' in the पश्चिमी  world .
In some cultures , dogs are  भी a सोर्स  of meat .
In 2001 ,  वहीँ यहूद अनुमानित  to be 400 million dogs in the world .
Most  breeds of कुत्तो हैं at सबसे a few सौ सालो बूढ़ा ,  having been artificially selected for particular morphologies and behaviors by people for specific functional roles .
Through this selective breeding , the dog has developed into hundreds of  varied breeds ,  and shows more behavioral and morphological variation than any other land mammal .
For example , height measured to the withers ranges from in the  चिहुआहुआ to परिचय in the आयरिश wolfhound ; रंग varies इससे श्वेत through grays ( प्रायः पुकारा  `` blue '' ) to black , and browns from light ( tan ) to dark ( `` red '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long , coarse-haired to wool-like , straight , curly , or smooth .
It  is आम लिये  most breeds to shed this coat .
Diagram of a transmission  इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope
A 1973 Siemens electron microscope , Musée  देस कला et métiers  , Paris
an इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी ( em ) is a प्रकार of  microscope that uses an electron beam to illuminate a specimen and produce a magnified image .
An EM has greater resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the  ढांचा  of smaller objects because electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons .
They can  achieve बेहतर than 50 pm रेज़ोल्यूशन और magnifications of up to  about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary , non-confocal light microscopes are limited by diffraction to about 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x .
The  इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी उपयोग  electrostatic and electromagnetic lenses to control the electron beam and focus it to form an image .
These electron optical lenses are analogous to the glass lenses of a light optical  सूक्ष्मदर्शी  .
Electron  microscopes हैं प्रयुक्त to investigate the ultrastructure of a चौड़ी दायरा of biological और  inorganic specimens including microorganisms , cells , large molecules , biopsy samples , metals , and crystals .
Industrially , the electron microscope is  प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये विशेषता  control and failure analysis .
Modern electron  microscopes उपज इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs  , using specialized digital cameras or frame grabbers to capture the image .
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried chicken fast  खाना रेस्तरां संस्थापित in 1972 in नई  Orleans , Louisiana .
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & Seafood , It was acquired by Sandy Springs , Georgia -based AFC Enterprises , originally  अमेरिका  's Favorite Chicken Company , in 1993 .
According to a company press release dated June 29 , 2007 , Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group , measured by number of units '' , with more than 1,800  रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और over 22 देशों विश्वव्यापी सहित तुर्कों , उत्तरी साइप्रस  , Bahrain , China , Hong Kong , Iraq , Indonesia , Jordan , Kuwait , United Arab Emirates , Japan , Malaysia , Saudi Arabia , South Korea , Singapore , Canada , Jamaica , Guyana , Suriname , Mexico , Trinidad , Puerto Rico , Honduras , Vietnam , Panama , Peru , and Costa Rica .
परिचय तीस  locations are company-owned , the rest franchised .
The leg press is a weight  प्रशिक्षण कसरत in जिससे the व्यक्तिगत pushes a  weight or resistance away from them using their legs .
The term leg press also refers to the  apparatus प्रयुक्त to perform  this exercise .
The leg press can be used to evaluate an  खिलाड़ी 's overall निम्नतर  body strength ( from knee joint to hip ) .
Using the diagonal  sled-type लेग  press machine .
वहीँ हैं दो  main types of leg press:
The diagonal or vertical  'sled ' प्रकार  leg press .
वज़न डिस्क (  plates ) are attached directly to the sled , which is mounted on rails .
The user sits below the sled  और pushes it upward  with their feet .
ये मशीने सामान्यतः शामिल  adjustable safety brackets that prevent the user from being trapped under the weight .
The 'cable ' type leg press , or 'seated leg press ' , commonly found on  multigyms  .
The user  sits कतरा  and pushes forward with their feet onto a plate that is attached to the weight stack by means of a long steel cable .
Wendy Williams Hunter ( born Wendy Joan Williams ; July 18 , 1964  ) is an अमरीकी  media personality , actress and author .
She hosts a syndicated television talk show , The  वेन्डी विलियम्स  Show .
Prior to television , Williams was a `` shock jockette `` on  अनेक रेडियो  shows .
Williams has  gained सुर्खी लिये उसके  on-air spats with celebrities .
She was the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality TV series called The Wendy  विलियम्स अनुभव जिससे ब्रॉडकास्ट  events surrounding her radio show .
She  रै लिखा an आत्मकथा  and several other books , and has created a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams .
Patrick Henry `` Treason '' speech before the House of Burgesses in an  1851 पेंटिंग by पीटर F. rothermel
`` Give me liberty ,  or दे me मौत ! '' is a quotation attributed to  Patrick Henry from a speech he made to the Virginia Convention .
On that day , at St. John 's Church in Richmond , Virginia , and is credited with having swung the balance in convincing the  वर्जिनिया हाउस of burgesses to pass a रेज़ोल्यूशन delivering the वर्जिनिया सैनिकों to the  Revolutionary War .
Among  the delegates to the सम्मेलन यहूद भविष्य  US Presidents Thomas Jefferson and George Washington .
Newfoundland  और labrador ( , locally  ) is the easternmost province of Canada .
Situated in the country 's  अटलांटिक प्रदेश , it incorporates  the island of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to the northwest , with a combined area of .
in 2011 , the  province 's population was 514,536 .
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population lives on the Island of Newfoundland ( including its associated smaller islands ) , of which more than half  सजीव on the  Avalon Peninsula .
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous , with 97.6 % of residents reporting English ( Newfoundland English ) as their mother tongue in the  2006 जनसांख्यिकी ; .
Historically , Newfoundland was also home to unique varieties of French , and Irish  , as खूब as the now-extinct  Beothuk language .
In  labrador , लोकल  dialects of Innu-aimun and Inuktitut are also spoken .
Newfoundland and Labrador 's capital and largest city , St. John 's , is Canada  's 20th-largest जनसांख्यिकी महानगर  Area , and is home to almost 40 percent of the province 's population .
St. John 's is the seat of government ,  घर to the हाउस of सभा of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador and the highest court in the jurisdiction , the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of Appeal .
A former colony and dominion of the United Kingdom ,  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador became the दसवाँ प्रांत to डालें the कनाडाई  Confederation on March 31 , 1949 , as Newfoundland .
On December 6 , 2001 , an amendment was made to the Constitution of Canada to change the province 's  आधिकारिक नाम to न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador  .
In day-to-day conversation , however , Canadians generally  स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और to the प्रदेश on the  Canadian mainland as Labrador .
थियोडोर  `` T.R . ''
रूज़वेल्ट , jr.  ( ; October 27 , 1858—January 6 , 1919 ) was the 26th President of the United States ( 1901–1909 ) .
He is noted for his exuberant personality , range of interests and achievements , and  उसके नेतृत्व of the प्रगतिशील गति , as खूब  as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity .
He was a leader of the Republican Party and founder of the first incarnation of the  short-lived प्रगतिशील ( `` सांड मूस '' ) पार्टी  of 1912 .
Before becoming  अध्यक्ष , he आयोजित कार्यालयों  at the city , state , and federal levels .
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist , explorer , hunter , author , and soldier are as much a part  of उसके कीर्ति as कोई दफ्तर he आयोजित  as a politician .
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the United States in 1901 , making him the youngest president ever ; he beat out the  youngest निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष , जॉन F. कैनेडी , by तभी एक  year .
रूज़वेल्ट थी भी the  first of only three sitting presidents to have won the Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy bear is named after him , despite his  अवमानना लिये होने  called `` Teddy '' .
Born into a wealthy family in New York City , Roosevelt was  a sickly चाइल्ड जो suffered इससे दमा और ठहरे  at home studying natural history .
To  overcome उसके शारीरिक  weakness , he embraced a strenuous life .
Home-schooled , he became an  eager छात्र of  nature .
He attended Harvard University , where he studied biology , boxed and developed  an ब्याज in नवल अफेयर्स  .
In 1881 , one year out of Harvard , he was  निर्वाचित to the नई यॉर्क राज्य सभा , जहाँ he became a नेता  of the reform faction of his Republican Party ( the `` GOP '' ) .
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his professional reputation as a serious historian ; he wrote numerous books on  शिकार , the बाहरी , और वर्तमान राजनैतिक मुद्दे  , as well as frontier history .
In  1884 , उसके पहला  wife and his mother died on the same day .
He temporarily left politics and went to the  frontier , बनने a rancher in  the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas .
Returning  to नई यॉर्क नगर  , he ran for mayor in 1886 , finishing third with 60,000 votes .
He later gained fame by taking vigorous charge  of the नगर पुलिस  .
At the national level , he was a leader in  सिविल सेवा  reform .
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898 while  रूज़वेल्ट थी , effectively  , running the Department of the Navy .
He promptly resigned and  formed the अशिष्ट राइडर्स  – a volunteer cavalry regiment that fought in Cuba .
The war hero was elected governor in 1898 and in 1900  थी मनोनीत लिये वाइस अध्यक्ष  .
He successfully energized the GOP base as a highly visible campaigner to reelect President William McKinley on a platform of high tariffs , the gold standard ,  साम्राज्यवाद , समृद्धि at घर और विजय विदेश  .
In 1901 , President  विलियम mckinley थी assassinated  and Roosevelt became President .
He attempted to move the Republican Party ( GOP ) toward  प्रगतिवाद , सहित विश्वास busting और increased  regulation of businesses .
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his  पूर्ववर्ती , जीतना the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय vote चूंकि  the uncontested election of 1820 .
रूज़वेल्ट coined the phrase  `` Square Deal `` to describe his domestic agenda , emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies .
As an outdoorsman and naturalist  , he प्रचारित the  conservation movement .
On the world stage , Roosevelt 's policies were characterized by his slogan , `` Speak  softly और carry  a big stick `` .
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common ancestor ( s ) ( other than a parent , child/descendant , sibling ,  child/descendant of a सहोदर , or सहोदर of a parent/ancestor )  .
However in common parlance , `` cousin '' normally  specifically अर्थात् ``  first cousin '' .
Systems of `` degrees '' and ``  removals '' हैं प्रयुक्त in the english-speaking  world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad sense ) and the ancestor they have in common .
Various governmental entities have  स्थापित प्रणालियों लिये विधिक उपयोग कि can अधिक precisely बताएँ kinships साथ आम पूर्वजो मौजूदा कोई क्रमांक of पीढियां in the पास्ट , हालांकि आम  usage often eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives '' .
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC from September 16 , 1983 until May 8 , 1987 , and  in first-run अनुप्रयोग इससे सितंबर  21 , 1987 until March 10 , 1989 .
The series was created  by stu चांदी  .
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who , after losing his parents , is  अपनाया by उसके एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर , portrayed by एलेक्स  Karras , and his new socialite wife , played by Susan Clark .
The focus  थी largely on कैसा इस impulsively शादीशुदा युगल  had to adjust to their new lives and sudden parenthood , but it was the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot .
The series  थी उत्पादित by जॉर्जियाई खाड़ी  Ltd. , Emmanuel Lewis Entertainment Enterprises , Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television .
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes , Webster featured a  यंग african-american लड़के अपनाया  by a white family .
Three types  of कोशिका  division
Cell division is the process by which a parent cell  divides into दो or अधिक बेटी  cells .
कोशिका प्रभाग प्रायः  occurs as part of a larger cell cycle .
In eukaryotes , there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division , whereby each daughter cell is genetically identical to the parent cell ( mitosis ) , and a reductive cell division , whereby the  क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों in the बेटी कोशिकाएं is  reduced by half , to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ) .
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some point in  उनके जीवन साईकिल , और दोनो हैं believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic  common ancestor Prokaryotes also undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission , where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells .
All cell divisions , regardless of  सजीव , हैं preceded  by a single round of DNA replication .
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba , one cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an  संपूर्ण नई सजीव is  created .
On a larger scale , mitotic cell  प्रभाग  can create progeny from multicellular organisms , such as plants that grow from cuttings .
Cell division also enables sexually  reproducing जीवों to develop इससे the one-celled zygote , जिससे  itself was produced by cell division from gametes .
And after  विकास , कोशिका प्रभाग allows  for continual construction and repair of the organism .
a इंसान होने 's देह  experiences about 10,000 trillion cell divisions in a lifetime .
Cell  प्रभाग रै महरूम modeled  by finite subdivision rules .
The primary concern  of कोशिका प्रभाग is  the maintenance of the original cell 's genome .
Before division can  occur , the genomic सूचना कि is भंडारित in  chromosomes must be replicated , and the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells .
A great deal of  सेल्यूलर अवसंरचना is शामिल in keeping  genomic information consistent between `` generations '' .
Mountain ranges of  मैसाचुसेट्स  , United States .
Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones , 23 February 1955 ,  southampton , हैम्पशायर , इंग्लैण्ड  ) is a British musician , singer and songwriter .
According to the Guinness Book of British Hit Singles & Albums , ``  जोन्स is an संपन्नता singer-songwriter  who was a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop .
Jones , who was equally popular in the U.S. , appeared at Live  सहायता ``  .
Allmusic journalist , Stephen Thomas Erlewine adds , `` Jones was one  of the धमक आंकड़े of mid-1980s synthpop  .
His music merged the technology intensive sound of New Wave with the cheery  आशावाद of hippies और लेट 1960s  pop .
Jones racked up  a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स in the मिड और लेट 1980s  , before he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s '' .
The International Isle of Man TT ( Tourist  ट्रॉफी ) रेस is a मोटरसाइकिल रेसिंग इवेंट आयोजित  on the Isle of Man and was for many years the most prestigious motorcycle race in the world .
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix  संसार चैंपियनशिप  during the period 1949–1976 before being transferred to the United Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season .
The  आइल of man tt दौड़  became part of the TT Formula 1 Championship from 1977 to 1990 to preserve the event 's racing status .
From 1989 the racing has been developed by the Isle of Man Department of  पर्यटन as the आइल of man tt  Festival .
The race is run in a time-trial  स्वरूप on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद लिये रेसिंग by the प्रावधानों of an  Act of Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ) .
The  पहला रेस थी आयोजित on  Tuesday 28 May 1907 and was called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy .
The event was organised by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10 laps of  the st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 मील  1,470 yards for road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers , saddles , pedals and mud-guards .
The winner of the single-cylinder class , and overall winner of the first event in 1907 , was Charlie Collier riding a Matchless motorcycle in a time of 4 hours , 8 minutes  और 8 सेकेंड at an औसत रेस गति  of 38.21 mph .
The  विजेता of the twin-cylinder  class was Rem Fowler riding a Peugeot engined Norton in a time of 4 hours 21 minutes and 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph .
the ट्रॉफी  presented to Charlie Collier as the winner of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race , was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars .
It featured a stylised version of Olympic  परमेश्वर hermes by giovanni da बोलोग्ना as a चांदी figurine  astride a winged wheel .
The trophy was similar in design to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy presented to John Napier ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural  विजेता of the आइल of man पर्यटक  Trophy car race in 1905 now known as the RAC Tourist Trophy .
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is now presented  annually to the विजेता of the आइल  of Man Senior TT Motor-Cycle Race .
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the Centenary event which ran between 26 May and 8 June 2007 and featured a  खास re-enactment of the 1907 आइल of man tt रेस आयोजित on the गाँव ग्रीन अगला to  Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007 .
The vintage parade of 100 classic motorcycles for the Centenary Re-enactment on the  असली st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स थी flagged दूर by पूर्व संसार  Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff Duke .
The first of the participants to be flagged away was the recently restored twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during  the पहला आइल of man tt रेस in 1907  .
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race competitor Guy Martin riding a 1938 Triumph Tiger 100 500 cc and other former TT  प्रतिस्पर्धी सहित एलन cathcart , सैमी मिलर , उपनाम jefferies  and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap .

Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs  जब लोगों हैं  without work and actively seeking work .
The unemployment rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed  individuals by सब individuals  currently in the labor force .
During periods of recession , an economy usually  अनुभवों a अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची बेरोजगारी  rate .
According to  अंतरराष्ट्रीय श्रमिक संगठन रपट  , more than 197 million people globally are out of work or 6 % of the world 's workforce were without a job in 2012 .
There remains considerable theoretical debate regarding the causes , consequences and  समाधान लिये बेरोजगारी  .
Classical economics , New classical economics , and the Austrian School of economics argue that market  mechanisms हैं विश्वसनीय अर्थात् of resolving  unemployment .
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the labor market from the outside , such as unionization , minimum wage laws , taxes , and other regulations that they claim discourage  the  hiring of workers .
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical nature of  बेरोजगारी और अनुशंसा सरकारी interventions  in the economy that it claims will reduce unemployment during recessions .
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks that suddenly reduce aggregate demand for goods and services  और यूँ reduce माँग लिये  workers .
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to increase demand for workers ; these can include  वित्तीय stimuli , सरेआम वित्तपोषित जॉब  creation , and expansionist monetary policies .
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment , there are  a few categorizations of बेरोजगारी कि हैं प्रयुक्त  to more precisely model the effects of unemployment within the economic system .
The main types of unemployment include structural unemployment which focuses on structural problems in the economy and  inefficiencies अंतर्निहित in श्रमिक बाज़ार , सहित a बेमेल between the सप्लाई और माँग of laborers साथ जरुरी कौशल  sets .
संरचनात्मक वितर्क emphasize कल्याणकारी और समाधान  related to disruptive technologies and globalization .
चर्चाएँ of frictional बेरोजगारी फ़ोकस on voluntary निर्णय  to work based on each individuals ' valuation of their own work and how that compares to current wage rates plus the time and effort required to find a job .
Causes and solutions  लिये frictional बेरोजगारी  often address job entry threshold and wage rates .
Behavioral economists highlight individual biases in decision making , and often involve problems and solutions concerning sticky wages  और दक्षता  wages .
Collectivism is any philosophic , political , religious , economic , or social outlook that  emphasizes the interdependence of प्रत्येक इंसान होने in a समाज  or civilization .
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse of individualism in human  प्रकृति ( in the वही रास्ता  high context culture exists as the reverse of low context culture ) .
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within social  समूह ( ऐसे as an `` in-group '' , in कया विशिष्ट  context it is defined ) and in some cases , the priority of group goals over individual goals .
Collectivists  प्रायः फ़ोकस on जातियाँ  , society , nation or country .
It has been used as an element in many different and diverse types of government and political , economic and educational philosophies throughout history  और सबसे इंसान समाजों in अभ्यास contain तत्व of दोनो व्यक्तिगत  and collectivism .
Some  उदाहरण of collectivist  cultures include India and Japan .
Collectivism can be divided into  आड़ा collectivism  and vertical collectivism .
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals , and  is यूँ प्रायः आधारित on  decentralization and egalitarianism .
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power and on moral  और सांस्कृतिक conformity , और is इसलिए आधारित  on centralization and hierarchy .
A cooperative enterprise would be an example of horizontal collectivism , whereas a military  पदानुक्रम होता be an उदाहरण  of vertical collectivism .
Acute disseminated  encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an  immune mediated disease of the brain .
It usually occurs following a viral  संक्रमण लकिन may appear following टीकाकरण , बैक्टीरियल  or parasitic infection , or even appear spontaneously .
As it involves autoimmune demyelination , it is similar to multiple sclerosis , and is considered part of  the अनेक काठिन्य borderline रोगों .
The incidence rate is about 8  प्रति 1,000,000 लोगों  per year .
Although it occurs in all ages , most reported cases are in children and  adolescents , साथ the औसत आयु around  5 to 8 years old .
The mortality rate may be as high as 5 % , full recovery is seen in 50 to 75 %  of मामले , जबकि up to 70 to 90 % रिकवर साथ कुछ नाबालिग  residual disability .
The average time to  रिकवर is एक  to six months .
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the brain and spinal  cord , विशेषकर  in the white matter .
Usually these are  मिला in the subcortical और सेंट्रल श्वेत पदार्थ  and cortical gray-white junction of both cerebral hemispheres , cerebellum , brainstem , and spinal cord , but periventricular white matter and gray matter of the cortex , thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved .
When the patient suffers more than one demyelinating episode , it is  पुकारा तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic  disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ) .
The stomach is a muscular , hollow , dilated part of the digestion system which functions as an important organ of the digestive tract in  कुछ पशु , सहित vertebrates , echinoderms  , insects ( mid-gut ) , and molluscs .
It is involved  in the दूसरी  phase of digestion , following mastication ( chewing ) .
The stomach is located between the  ग्रासनाल और the छोटी  intestine .
It secretes  protein-digesting एंजाइमों पुकारा  protease and strong acids to aid in food digestion , ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth muscular contortions ( called segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines .
The  शब्द पेट is निकला इससे the लैटिन  stomachus which is derived from the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ) , ultimately from stoma ( ) , `` mouth '' .
the शब्द gastro- और gastric ( अर्थ  related to the stomach ) are both derived from the Greek word gaster ( ) .
1940 Pontiac  खास श्रेणी  25 Woodie
A woodie is a car body style , especially  a स्टेशन वैगन , जहाँ the पश्च bodywork is constructed  of wood framework with infill panels of wood or painted metal .
After the demise of actual wood construction , manufacturers  प्रयुक्त अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented साथ three-dimensional  , simulated framework—to recall wood construction .
In 2008 , wood construction was  जगाई abstractly on the घाट फ्लेक्स  with a series of side and rear horizontal grooves .
A pearl is a hard object produced within the soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of  a जीना shelled mollusc  .
Just like the shell of a clam , a pearl is made up of calcium  कार्बोनेट in मिनट  crystalline form , which has been deposited in concentric layers .
The ideal pearl is perfectly round and smooth , but many other shapes of pearls (  बरॉक मोती ) occur  .
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as  रत्नों और वस्तुएँ of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक  centuries , and because of this , the word pearl has become a metaphor for something very rare , fine , admirable , and valuable .
The most valuable pearls occur spontaneously in the  जंगली , लकिन वे हैं  extremely rare .
These wild pearls  हैं referred to  as natural pearls .
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl  oysters और freshwater mussels  make up the majority of those that are currently sold .
Imitation pearls  हैं भी widely बेची in inexpensive आभूषण ,  but the quality of their iridescence is usually very poor , and often , artificial pearls are easily distinguished from genuine pearls .
Pearls have been harvested and cultivated primarily for use in jewelry , but in the past they were also stitched onto  lavish कपडे  .
Pearls have also been crushed and  प्रयुक्त in कॉस्मेटिक्स , दवाइयाँ  , and in paint formulations .
whether जंगली or संस्कारी , gem  quality pearls are almost always nacreous and , as is the interior of the shell that produces them .
However ,  लगभग सब प्रजाति of shelled molluscs हैं सक्षम of producing मोती (  formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape .
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also under U.S. Federal Trade Commission rules , and are formed in the same way , most of them  have no मान , मगर as curiosities  .
Bing ( known previously as Live Search , Windows Live Search , and MSN  ढूंढें ) is a वेब ढूंढें  engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) from Microsoft .
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer on May 28 , 2009 at the All Things  डिजिटल सम्मेलन in सैन डिएगो लिये रिलीज  on June 1 .
Notable changes include the listing of search suggestions while queries are entered and a list of related searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset  जिससे microsoft खरीदा  in 2008 .
on जुलाई 29 , 2009 , microsoft  and Yahoo ! announced a deal in which Bing would power Yahoo ! Search .
All Yahoo ! Search global  ग्राहक और साझेदार हैं अपेक्षित  to have made the transition by early 2012 .
In October 2011 , Bing announced it was  working on नई back-end ढूंढें अवसंरचना  , with the goal of delivering faster and slightly more relevant search results for users .
Known as `` Tiger '' , the new index-serving technology  रै महरूम incorporated  into Bing globally , since August 2011 .
In May 2012 , Bing announced another redesign of its search engine that includes `` Sidebar ''  , a सोशल विशेषता कि खोज उपयोक्ता  ' social networks for information relevant to the search query .
A diagram showing an I Formation on offense and a 4-3  गठन  on defense
In American football , each team has eleven players on the field  at एक समय .
The  विशिष्ट भूमिका कि  a player takes on the field is called their position .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions ,  कि is टीमों may बदलें कोई क्रमांक of खिलाड़ी  after any play .
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players , the offense ( the team with the ball , who is trying to score ) , the defense ( the  टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे स्कोरिंग , और to लो the बॉल इससे उन्हें ) , और the खास  teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons , various specific positions exist  depending on कया the खिलाड़ी 's  main job is .
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ;  ulster-scots : airish fowk ) हैं  an ethnic group who originate in Ireland , an island in northwestern Europe .
Ireland has been populated for around 9,000  सालो ( according to पुरातत्व अध्ययन , देखिए प्रागैतिहासिक  Ireland ) .
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in legends – they  हैं claimed to be descended इससे समूह  such as the Nemedians , Fomorians , Fir Bolg , Tuatha Dé Danann and the Milesians .
Lebor Gabála Érenn , a book of Irish mythology tells that  milesians यहूद स्काइथियन वंशजों  .
The main groups that  interacted साथ  the Irish in the Middle Ages include the Picts , Scots , and the Vikings .
Due to this contact ,  icelanders हैं  noted for having some Irish descent .
The Anglo-Norman invasion of the High Middle Ages , the English plantations and the subsequent English rule of the country  introduced the normans  and Flemish into Ireland .
Welsh , Picts , Bretons , and small parties of Gauls and even  anglo-saxons हैं ज्ञात in आयरलैंड इससे much पहले  times .
वहीँ have महरूम अनेक notable  Irish people throughout history .
The 6th century Irish monk and  मिशनरी columbanus is regarded  as one of the `` fathers of Europe '' , followed by Kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg .
the वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट  Boyle is considered the `` father of chemistry `` .
Famous Irish explorers include Brendan the  नाविक , रॉबर्ट mcclure , अर्नेस्ट shackleton  and Tom Crean .
By some accounts  , the पहला यूरोपीय चाइल्ड born in उत्तर  America had Irish descent on both sides ; and an Irishman was the first European to set foot on American soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492 .
There are  वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों  living in many western countries , particularly in English-speaking countries .
Historically , emigration has been caused by  राजनीती , अकाल और आर्थिक  issues .
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are descendants of Irish people , primarily in the United Kingdom , the United States , Australia , Canada and Iceland ; there are also smaller numbers in Argentina ,  चिली , मैक्सिको , जमैका , बारबाडोस  , South Africa , New Zealand , France , Germany and Brazil .
The largest  क्रमांक of वंशजों of आयरिश  people live in the United States .
The number of  लोगों जीना in ऑस्ट्रेलिया जो हैं  of Irish descent is higher , as a percentage of total population , than that of any other country .
Approximately forty percent of the  उपनिवेश जनसांख्यिकी of  Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland .
The very first inhabitants of Iceland  यहूद आयरिश  .
The Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that was carried into orbit by a Space  शटल in 1990 और remains  in operation .
A aperture telescope in low Earth orbit , Hubble 's four main instruments observe in the near  पराबैंगनी , दृश्य , और  near infrared .
The telescope is named after  the  astronomer Edwin Hubble .
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of Earth 's atmosphere allows it to take extremely sharp images  साथ लगभग no पृष्ठभूमि  light .
Hubble 's Deep Field have been some of the most detailed visible-light images ever ,  allowing a गहन दृश्य into स्पेस और समय .
Many  हबल observations have led to सफलताएँ in  astrophysics , such as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe .
Although not the first space telescope , Hubble is one of the largest and most versatile , and is well known as  दोनो a vital शोध  tool and a public relations boon for astronomy .
the hst थी निर्मित by the संयुक्त राज्य स्पेस  agency NASA , with contributions from the European Space Agency , and is operated by the Space Telescope Science Institute .
The HST is one of NASA 's Great Observatories , along  साथ the कॉम्पटन गामा रे वेधशाला , the  Chandra X-ray Observatory , and the Spitzer Space Telescope .
Space  telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित as  early as 1923 .
Hubble was funded in the 1970s , with a proposed launch in 1983 , but the project  थी घिरा by तकनीकी देरी , बजट समस्याएं , और the  Challenger disaster .
When finally launched in 1990 , scientists found  कि the प्रमुख दर्पण  had been ground incorrectly , compromising the telescope 's capabilities .
The telescope was restored to  इसके intended  quality by a servicing mission in 1993 .
Hubble is the only  दूरदर्शी designed  to be serviced in space by astronauts .
Between 1993 and 2002 , four missions repaired , upgraded , and replaced  प्रणालियों on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी रद्द  on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster .
however , बाद spirited पब्लिक  discussion , NASA administrator Mike Griffin approved one final servicing mission , completed in 2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis .
The  दूरदर्शी is अभी  expected to function until at least 2013 .
Its scientific successor ,  the जेम्स webb स्पेस दूरदर्शी ( jwst ) ,  is to be launched in 2018 or possibly later .
Anti-inflammatory refers  to the प्रॉपर्टी of a पदार्थ or उपचार  that reduces inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory  दवाएँ मेक up परिचय हाफ of analgesics , remedying पीड़ा  by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids , which affect the central nervous system .
The  tonight दिखाएँ is a us  late-night talk show that has aired on NBC since 1954 .
It is the longest currently running  regularly अनुसूचित entertainment  program in the US and the third longest-running show on NBC after Meet the Press and Today .
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ) , Jack  paar ( 1957–1962 ) , जॉनी कार्सन (  1962–1992 ) , Jay Leno ( 1992–2009 , 2010–present ) , and Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ) .
Several  अतिथि होस्ट भी appeared  , particularly during the Paar and Carson eras .
The  longest-serving मेजबान to तिथि  was Johnny Carson , who hosted The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992 .
The current host of the show is Jay Leno , who had previously  hosted the दिखाएँ इससे 1992 to  2009 and began his second tenure on March 1 , 2010 .
On April 3 , 2013 , NBC announced Jimmy Fallon would become the new host  of the tonight दिखाएँ  .
The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon will premiere February 24 , 2014 , the day  बाद the closing  ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics .
ss एंड्रिया  Doria .
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione  इटालिया ) घर ported in जेनोआ , इटली , सबसे  famous for its sinking in 1956 , when 52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact ) .
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria , the ship had a gross register tonnage  of 29,100 और a क्षमता of परिचय  1,200 passengers and 500 crew .
लिये a देश attempting to rebuild इसके  economy and reputation after World War II , Andrea Doria was an icon of Italian national pride .
Of all Italy 's ships at the time , Andrea Doria was  the largest , तीव्रतम  and supposedly safest .
Launched on 16 June 1951 , the ship undertook its maiden voyage  on 14 जनवरी  1953 .
On 25 July 1956  , जबकि the एंड्रिया डोरिया थी approaching the coast of nantucket  , Massachusetts , bound for New York City , the eastbound of the Swedish American Line collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters .
Struck in the side , the top-heavy Andrea Doria immediately started  to सूची severely to स्टारबोर्ड  , which left half of its lifeboats unusable .
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant loss of life ,  लकिन the दक्षता of the जलयान 's तकनीकी डिज़ाइन अनुमत  it to stay afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming .
The good behavior of the  क्रू , सुधार in संचार और the  rapid response of other ships averted a disaster similar in scale to that of the in 1912 .
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued and  बच , जबकि 46 लोगों  died as a consequence of the collision .
The evacuated  लक्ज़री लाइनर capsized और  sank the following morning .
This accident remains the worst maritime disaster to occur in United  राज्य  waters since the sinking of the in 1915 .
The incident and its aftermath were  heavily covered by  the news media .
While the rescue efforts were both successful and commendable , the cause of the collision with the Stockholm and  the घाटा of एंड्रिया डोरिया उत्पन्न much  interest in the media and many lawsuits .
Largely  क्युकी of an out-of-court उपनिवेश अनुबंध  between the two shipping companies during hearings immediately after the disaster , no determination of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published .
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the Italian liner , more recent discoveries have indicated  कि a misreading of रडार on the स्वीडिश जलयान may have initiated the टक्कर  course , leading to errors on both ships .
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic passenger vessel to sink before aircraft  became the  preferred method of travel .
डायलिसिस  tubing
Dialysis tubing is a  प्रकार of सेमi-  or partially permeable membrane tubing made from regenerated cellulose or cellophane .
It  can be प्रयुक्त लिये diffusion साथ  solutes or osmosis if used with water only .
Osmosis is when water passes through a semi-permeable layer to  पहुँचें संतुलन  .
Diffusion , on the other  हाथ , allows  the movement of molecules from high concentration to low concentration .
It will only allow  अणुओं to pass through a semi-permeable  membrane or layer if the molecule is small enough to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore .
This usually results with the effects of diffusion through a membrane only really affects small molecules  , और  almost never larger molecules .
डायलिसिस tubing is प्रयुक्त in  clinical circumstances to ensure a filtered flow of molecules , preventing the flow of larger solute molecules .
Small molecules can be `` washed '' out of a solution  जिससे is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a  solvent , usually water , which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away .
In demonstrations of  semi-permeable झिल्लियों , a समाधान containing अनेक प्रकार  of molecules , usually glucose and starch , is placed into a semi-permeable dialysis bag , such as a cellulose membrane with pores , and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band .
The sealed dialysis bag is  लगाई in a संग्राहक  of a different solution , or water .
Molecules small enough to pass  through the tubing ( जल , लवण , monosaccharides  , and other small molecules ) tend to move into or out of the dialysis bag in the direction of decreasing concentration , therefore displaying diffusion .
Larger molecules ( such as proteins , or polysaccharides ) that have dimensions significantly greater than the pore diameter are retained  अंदर the डायलिसिस थैला .
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution  कि रै a lesser solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) होगा क्रॉस a semi-permeable झिल्ली , जैसे डायलिसिस tubing , into a hypertonic  solution ( a solution that has a higher solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) in an attempt to reach equilibrium , where the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium .
पारा प्रयोगशाला  thermometer
A  थर्मामीटर ( इससे the यूनानी , thermos , अर्थ `` hot '' और  μἐτρον , metron , `` measure '' ) is a device that measures temperature or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles .
A thermometer has two important elements : the temperature sensor ( e.g .  the बल्ब on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें occurs  with temperature , plus some means of converting this physical change into a numerical value ( e.g . the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) .
There are  अनेक प्रकार  and many uses for thermometers , as detailed below in sections of this article .
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs is a 1937  अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक  film produced by Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures .
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm , it is the first full-length cel animated feature film and  the earliest in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड  Classics series .
The story was adapted by storyboard artists Dorothy Ann Blank , Richard Creedon , Merrill De Maris , Otto Englander  , अर्ल hurd , लंड rickard , टेड सियर्स और webb स्मिथ  .
David Hand was the supervising director , while William Cottrell , Wilfred  जैक्सन , लैरी morey , perce pearce  , and Ben Sharpsteen directed the film 's individual sequences .
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on  दिसम्बर 21 , 1937 , followed by a देशभर रिलीज on फ़रवरी 4 , 1938 , और साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय  earnings of $ 8 million during its initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound film at the time .
The popularity of the film has  led to it होने re-released  theatrically many times , until its home video release in the 1990s .
Adjusted for inflation , it is one of  the शीर्ष टेन performers at the  North American box office .
At the  11th अकादमी पुरस्कार , वॉल्ट डिज़्नी  was awarded an honorary Oscar , and the film was nominated for Best Musical Score .
It was added to the United States National Film Registry  in 1989 और is क्रमित in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान  's list of the 100 greatest American films , who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008 .
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had a big cultural impact , resulting in a popular theme park attraction , a  वीडियो खेल , और a ब्रॉडवे musical  .
Childbirth , labour , delivery , birth , partus , or parturition is the  culmination of a गर्भावस्था काल साथ the expulsion of एक or अधिक नवजात infants इससे  a woman 's uterus .
The process  of सामान्य प्रसव is categorized  in three stages of labour : the shortening and dilation of the cervix , descent and birth of the infant , and birth of the placenta .
In many cases and with increasing frequency , childbirth is achieved through induction of labor or caesarean section , which is the removal  of the neonate through a सर्जिकल incision  in the abdomen , rather than through vaginal birth .
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. from 1996 to 2006  , और comprise nearly 32 % of births  in the U.S. and Canada .
With respect to  induced मजदूर , अधिक than 22 % of  women undergo induction of labour in the United States .
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be harmful to the fetus and neonate as well  as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the माँ , और have स्थापित  strict guidelines for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks .
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show which  followed bam margera और उसके क्रू  as they undertook challenges , performed stunts and traveled the world .
The show ran for 5  सीज़न between 2003  and 2005 .
Flushed Away is a 2006 British/American computer animated action /  एडवेंचर कॉमेडी फिल्मी निर्देशित  by David Bowers and Sam Fell .
It was made in the partnership between Aardman Animations and DreamWorks  एनिमेशन , और is aardman 's पहला completely  computer-animated feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion .
The film stars the voice talents  of ह्यूज जैकमैन , केट  Winslet , Andy Serkis , Bill Nighy , Ian McKellen , Shane Richie and Jean Reno .
The story was by Sam Fell , Peter Lord , Dick Clement , and Ian La Frenais , and the screenplay was written by Dick Clement , Ian La Frenais , Christopher Lloyd  , जो  Keenan , and William Davies .
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006 , and in UK  on दिसम्बर 1 2006  , and was distributed by Paramount Pictures , except for Switzerland , Spain , and the Netherlands , which were handled by Universal Pictures .
The Atlanta Braves are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली  based in Atlanta .
the braves  are a member of the Eastern Division of Major League Baseball 's National League .
The Braves have  निभाई in टर्नर फ़ील्ड  since 1997 .
The `` Braves '' name , which was first used in 1912 ,  originates इससे a पद लिये  a Native American warrior .
They are nicknamed `` the Bravos '' , and often  referred to as `` अमेरिका  's Team `` in reference to the team 's games being broadcast on the nationally available TBS from the 1970s until 2007 , gaining a wide fanbase .
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most  successful  franchises in baseball , winning division titles an unprecedented 14 consecutive times in that period ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in which there were no official division champions ) .
The Braves won the NL West 1991–93 and the NL East 1995–2005 , and  लौटे to the playoffs as the नेशनल  League Wild Card in 2010 .
the braves उन्नत to the  World Series five times in the 1990s , winning the title in 1995 .
Since their debut in the National League in 1876 , the franchise has won 16 divisional titles , 17 National League pennants , as well as three World Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves  , in 1957 as the मिल्वौकी braves , और in 1995  in Atlanta .
The  braves हैं the तभी  MLB franchise to have won the World Series in three different home cities .
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other being the Chicago Cubs ) and was founded in Boston , Massachusetts , in 1871 as the Boston Red Stockings ( not to be  उलझन साथ the अमरीकी लीग 's बोस्टन रेड sox  ) .
They are considered `` the oldest continuously  playing  team in major North American sports . ''
There is an argument as to who is actually  पुरानी क्युकी हालांकि the शावक हैं a पूरा ऋतु `` पुरानी '' ( formed as the  Chicago White Stockings in 1870 ) Chicago lost two seasons to the Great Chicago Fire , thus the Braves have played more consecutive seasons .
After various name changes ( such as the Boston Beaneaters ) ,  the टोली संचालित as the बोस्टन braves लिये सबसे of the  first half of the 20th century .
In 1953 , the team moved to Milwaukee , Wisconsin and became the Milwaukee  braves , followed  by the move to Atlanta in 1966 .
The team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous for Hank Aaron breaking  बेब रुथ 's करियर घर चलाएं रिकार्ड in 1974 , हालांकि the बहुमत  of Aaron 's home runs were hit while the team was in Milwaukee .
His record stood until 2007 , when San Francisco  बाएँ क्षेत्ररक्षक बैरी bonds  broke the record .
The leaves  of a  Beech tree
3D rendering of a μCT scan of a leaf piece ,  रेज़ोल्यूशन circa 40 μm/ voxel  .
A leaf is an organ  of a vascular संयंत्र , as पारिभाषित  in botanical terms , and in particular in plant morphology .
Foliage is a mass noun that refers to  पत्ते as a विशेषता of  plants .
Typically a leaf is a thin , flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis , but many types of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are not flat ( for example many succulent leaves and conifers ) , some are not above ground ( such as bulb scales ) ,  और कुछ हैं बगैर प्रमुख photosynthetic फलन ( consider लिये उदाहरण cataphylls  , spines , and cotyledons ) .
Conversely , many structures of non-vascular plants , or even of some lichens , which are not plants at all (  in the भाव of होने सदस्यों of the किंगडम plantae ) , do dekh और फलन much  like leaves .
Furthermore , several  structures मिला in vascular पौधे  look like leaves but are not actually leaves ; they differ from leaves in their structures and origins .
Examples  शामिल phyllodes  , cladodes , and phylloclades .
Title card   for the 1937 Our Gang comedy Rushin ' Ballet .
Our Gang ( also known as The Little Rascals or Hal Roach 's Rascals ) are a series of American  कॉमेडी छोटी films परिचय a समूह of ग़रीब पड़ोस children और उनके adventures  .
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach , the series is noted for showing children behaving in a relatively natural  रास्ता , as रोच और असली निदेशक रॉबर्ट F. mcgowan worked to फिल्मी the unaffected  , raw nuances apparent in regular children rather than have them imitate adult acting styles .
In addition , Our Gang notably put boys , girls , whites and blacks together  in a समूह as बराबरी , कुछ कि `` broke नई मैदान  , '' according to film historian Leonard Maltin .
Such a thing had never been done before in  सिनेमा लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम दोहराया  after the success of Our Gang .
the पहला उत्पादन at  the Roach studio in 1922 was a series of silent short subjects .
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( MGM ) in  1927 , और परिवर्तित the श्रेणी to ध्वनि in 1929 , the श्रेणी  took off even further .
Production continued at the Roach studio until  1938 , जब  the series was sold to MGM , who then continued producing the comedies until 1944 .
The Our Gang series includes a total of 220 shorts and one feature film , General Spanky ,  featuring over forty-one चाइल्ड  actors .
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang trademark following their purchase of the  उत्पादन अधिकारों , the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated लिये  television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM  's हमारी गिरोह पैकेज ( अभी स्वामित्व by warner भाईs. entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in अनुप्रयोग , साथ आवधिक  new productions based on the shorts surfacing over the years , including a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures .
Zacharias Janssen ( also  zacharias जानसन or sacharias जानसन ) ( b.1580-88  , d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker from Middelburg associated with the invention of the first optical telescope .
Janssen is sometimes also credited for inventing the first truly compound  सूक्ष्मदर्शी  .
However , the origin of the microscope , just like the origin  of the दूरदर्शी  , is a matter of debate .
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a large freshwater  झील in the सिएरा नेवाडा  of the United States .
At a surface elevation of , it is  स्तिथ साथ the किनारा  between California and Nevada , west of Carson City .
Lake Tahoe is the  largest अल्पाइन झील  in North America .
Its  गहराई is , बनाना it the संयुक्त राज्य 's second-deepest  ( the deepest is Crater Lake in Oregon , being deeper , at ) .
Additionally , Lake Tahoe is listed  as the 26th  largest lake by volume in the world at .
the झील थी formed परिचय  2 million years ago and is a part of the Lake Tahoe Basin with the modern lake being shaped during the ice ages .
It is known for the clarity of its water and  the परिदृश्य of surrounding  mountains on all sides .
The area surrounding the lake is also referred to as  झील tahoe , or बस  Tahoe .
Lake Tahoe is a major tourist  आकर्षण  in both Nevada and California .
it is घर to a क्रमांक  of ski resorts , summer outdoor recreation , and tourist attractions .
हिम और स्कीइंग हैं a  significant part of the area 's economy and reputation .
Mountain  और झील नजारा हैं आकर्षण  throughout the year .
The Nevada side also  शामिल विशाल  casinos .
Highways provide year-round access from  रेनो , कार्सन नगर  , and Sacramento .

The Twenty-seventh Amendment (  amendment xxvii ) prohibits कोई विधि कि increases or decreases the सैलरी  of members of the Congress from taking effect until the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives .
It  is the सबसे हाल amendment  to the United States Constitution .
It was  सुपुर्द to the राज्य  for ratification in 1789 and was adopted in 1992 .
“First they came ... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to pastor Martin Niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) about the sloth of  जर्मनी intellectuals following the nazis ' वृद्धि to शक्ति और the subsequent  purging of their chosen targets , group after group .
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of the quotation and when it was created ;  the सामग्री of the quotation may have महरूम प्रस्तुत  differently by Niemöller on different occasions .
