Four Thirds  लोगो
The Four Thirds system is a  मानक निर्मित by ओलम्पस और कोडक लिये डिजिटल  single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
the प्रणाली provides a मानक कि , साथ  digital cameras and lenses available from multiple manufacturers , allows for the interchange of lenses and bodies from different manufacturers .
seems to  कवर the  standard .
Proponents  describe  it as an open standard , but companies may only use it under a non-disclosure agreement .
नापसंद पुरानी slr  systems , Four Thirds has been designed from the ground up to be entirely digital .
Many lenses are extensively computerized , to the point that  ओलम्पस offers फर्मवेयर  updates for many of them .
Lens design has been tailored to the requirements of digital sensors , most  notably through telecentric डिजाइन  .
The  आकार of the सेंसर is significantly  smaller than for most DSLRs and this implies that lenses , especially telephoto lenses , can be smaller .
For example , a Four Thirds lens with a 300 mm focal length would cover about the same angle of view as a 600 mm focal length lens for the 35 mm film  मानक , और is correspondingly  more compact .
Thus , the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of  परिचय 2 , और जबकि इस enables longer फोकल  length for greater magnification , it does n't aid the manufacture of wide angle lenses .
The image  सेंसर स्वरूप , generally इंटरमीडिएट between those of  larger SLRs and smaller compact cameras , generally gives levels of cost , performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes .
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed  throughout a भवन  to supply conditioned air to a room through outlet vents , called diffusers ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles .
HVAC ( heating , ventilation ,  और एयर कंडीशनिंग  ) is the technology of indoor and automotive environmental comfort .
HVAC system design is a subdiscipline of mechanical  अभियान्त्रिकी , आधारित on the सिद्धान्त  of thermodynamics , fluid mechanics , and heat transfer .
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or HVACR , or ventilating is dropped as in HACR ( such as the  नामांकन of hacr-rated सर्किट ब्रेकर्स  ) .
HVAC is important in the design of medium to large industrial and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine environments  ऐसे as एक्वैरियम , जहाँ सुरक्षित और स्वस्थ भवन शर्तें हैं regulated साथ  respect to temperature and humidity , using fresh air from outdoors .
Ventilation on the downdraught  प्रणाली , by impulsion , or the 'plenum  ' principle , applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating , ventilating , and air conditioning is based on inventions and discoveries  made by  Nikolay Lvov , Michael Faraday , Willis Carrier , Reuben Trane , James Joule , William Rankine , Sadi Carnot , and many others .
The invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial revolution , and new methods of modernization , higher efficiency , and system   control are constantly introduced by companies and inventors worldwide .
The three central functions of heating , ventilating , and air-conditioning are  interrelated , विशेषकर साथ the need to provide थर्मल सुकून और स्वीकार्य अंदर  air quality within reasonable installation , operation , and maintenance costs .
HVAC systems can provide  वेंटिलेशन , reduce एयर  infiltration , and maintain pressure relationships between spaces .
The means of air delivery and removal from spaces is known as room air  वितरण  .
The starting point in carrying out an estimate both for cooling and heating depends on the exterior climate and interior  निर्दिष्ट शर्तें .
However before taking up the heat load calculation , it is necessary to find fresh air requirements for each  क्षेत्रफल in विवरण , as pressurization is  an important consideration .
In modern buildings the design , installation , and control systems of these  कृत्यों  are integrated into one or more HVAC systems .
For very small buildings , contractors normally  क्षमता इंजीनियर  and select HVAC systems and equipment .
For larger buildings , building  सेवाएं designers और इंजीनियर्स , ऐसे as mechanical , architectural  , or building services engineers analyze , design , and specify the HVAC systems , and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them .
भवन permits और code-compliance  inspections of the installations are normally required for all sizes of buildings .
The HVAC industry is a worldwide enterprise , with roles including operation and maintenance , system  डिज़ाइन  and construction , equipment manufacturing and sales , and in education and research .
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC equipment , but regulating and standards organizations such as HARDI , ASHRAE , SMACNA , ACCA , Uniform Mechanical Code , International Mechanical Code ,  और amca have महरूम स्थापित to support the  industry and encourage high standards and achievement .
Royal Navy Commander James Bond , CMG , RNVR ,  is a fictional अक्षर  created by British journalist and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953 .
He is the protagonist of the James Bond series of  novels , films , कॉमिक्स और वीडियो  games .
Fleming  लिखा बारह बंध  novels and two short story collections before his death , although the last two books— The Man with the Golden Gun and Octopussy and The Living Daylights —were published posthumously .
The Bond character is a  रहस्य सेवा एजेंट , कोड क्रमांक  007 , residing in London but active internationally .
Bond was a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom Fleming knew during his service in the Naval Intelligence Division during World War II , to whom Fleming added  उसके अपना स्टाइल और a क्रमांक of उसके अपना tastes ; बंध 's नाम थी appropriated इससे अमरीकी  ornithologist James Bond .
Bond has a  क्रमांक of अक्षर traits जिससे चलाएं throughout the किताबे , सहित an enjoyment  of cars , a love of food and drink , and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day .
Since Fleming 's death in 1964 , there have been other authorised writers of Bond material , including John Gardner , who wrote fourteen novels and two novelizations and Raymond Benson , who wrote six novels ,  तीन novelizations और तीन  short stories .
There have also been three authors who wrote one book each ,  किंग्सले एमिस  ( writing as Robert Markham ) , Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver .
Additionally a  श्रेणी of novels आधारित on बंध 's  youth— Young Bond —was written by Charlie Higson .
As spin-offs from the literary works , there was a television  अनुकूलन of the पहला अनोखा , कसीनो royale  , in which Bond was played as an American agent .
a कॉमिक स्ट्रिप  series also ran in the Daily Express newspaper .
वहीँ have भी महरूम twenty-five  Bond films ; seven actors have played Bond in these films .
`` Nature  लड़के ''  is a song by Eden Ahbez , published in 1947 .
The song tells a fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy ... who wandered very far '' only to learn that `` the  महानतम बात ... थी बस  to love and be loved in return '' .
Nat King Cole 's  1948 रिकॉर्डिंग of the  song was a major hit and `` Nature Boy '' has since become a pop and jazz standard , with dozens of major artists interpreting the song .
Louisiana ( or ; , ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a state  स्तिथ in the दक्षिणी प्रदेश of the संयुक्त  States of America .
Louisiana is the 31st  सबसे  extensive and the 25th most populous of the 50 United States .
Its capital is Baton Rouge and largest  नगर is नई ऑरलियन्स  .
Louisiana is the only state in the U.S. with political subdivisions termed parishes , which are local government 's  समतुल्य to काउंटी  .
The largest parish by population is East Baton Rouge Parish , and  the largest by जमीन क्षेत्रफल  is Cameron Parish .
Much of the  राज्य 's lands यहूद formed इससे sediment  washed down the Mississippi River , leaving enormous deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp .
These  contain a समृद्ध  southern biota ; typical examples include birds such as ibis and egrets .
There are also many species of tree frogs , and  मछली  such as sturgeon and paddlefish .
In more  elevated क्षेत्रों , आग is a प्राकृतिक  process in the landscape , and has produced extensive areas of longleaf pine forest and wet savannas .
These support an  exceptional विशाल क्रमांक  of plant species , including many species of orchids and carnivorous plants .
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural , multilingual heritage , being so strongly influenced by an admixture of 18th-century French , Spanish ,  देशी अमरीकी ( भारतीय ) और अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों कि वे हैं माना to be somewhat असाधारण  in the U.S .
Before the American  खरीदें of the territory  , the current Louisiana State had been both a Spanish and French colony .
In addition , the pattern of development included importing numerous African slaves in the  18th सदी , साथ अनेक इससे the  same region of West Africa , thus concentrating their culture .
In the post-Civil War environment ,  anglo-americans increased the दबाव  for Anglicization , and in 1915 , English was made the only official language of the state .
Women 's rights  हैं the अधिकारों और entitlements  claimed for women and girls of many societies worldwide .
In some places these rights are institutionalized or  समर्थित by विधि , लोकल कस्टम ,  and behaviour , whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions  of इंसान अधिकारों through दावा of an  inherent historical and traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include , though are not limited to , the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to fair  मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to डालें into विधिक अनुबंध  ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
The laws of science or  वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं कथन  that describe , predict , and perhaps explain why , a range of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature .
The term `` law '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate , accurate , broad or  सीमित theories , in सब प्राकृतिक वैज्ञानिक disciplines (  physics , chemistry , biology , geology , astronomy etc . ) .
An analogous  पद लिये a  scientific law is a principle .
वैज्ञानिक  laws:
summarize a विशाल संग्रहण  of facts determined by experiment into a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation , or at least stated in a single sentence , so that it can be used to predict the outcome of an  प्रयोग , दिए the आरंभिक , boundary , और अन्य शारीरिक शर्तें of the प्रक्रियाओं जिससे लो place,
are strongly supported by empirical evidence - they are scientific knowledge that experiments have repeatedly  सत्यापित ( और never  falsified ) .
Their accuracy does not change when new theories are worked out ,  लकिन बल्कि the पैमाना of अनुप्रयोग , चूंकि the  equation ( if any ) representing the law does not change .
As with  अन्य वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान , वे  do not have absolute certainty like mathematical theorems or identities , and it is always possible for a law to be overturned by future observations .
are often quoted as a  आधारभूत controlling  influence rather than a description of observed facts .
I.e . `` the laws  of गति  require that ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates , which are  प्रस्तावित दौरान the वैज्ञानिक प्रक्रम  before and during validation by experiment and observation .
ये हैं नहीं कानून चूंकि वे  have not been verified to the same degree and may not be sufficiently general , although they may lead to the formulation of laws .
A law  is a अधिक solidified  and formal statement , distilled from repeated experiment .
Although the concepts of a law or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy , and presents the depth to which mathematics can describe nature , scientific laws are  माना इससे a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the वैज्ञानिक  method ; they `` serve their purpose '' rather than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ) .
For example , whether a law `` refers  to वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical समस्या , बल्कि  than scientific .
Fundamentally , all scientific laws follow from physics , laws  जिससे occur in अन्य sciences  ultimately follow from physical laws .
Often , from  mathematically आधारभूत  viewpoints , universal constants emerge from scientific laws .
The launch of the  प्लेस्टेशन 3 into the जापानी मार्केट on 10 नवम्बर  2006 marked the second major seventh generation entertainment system to be released .
The system was released seven days  बाद on 17 नवम्बर in  the United States .
Introduction into other world markets was delayed by a shortage of diodes for use in  the blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी ; the  device was launched in European and other world markets in the first half of 2007 .
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams and  grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the सीबीएस  soap operas The Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful , portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman .
She made her debut during the  एपीसोड airing  on January 21 , 1983 .
In 1992 , Bregman began making sporadic appearances on The Bold and the Beautiful , later resulting in the character migrating there  fully in 1995  .
Following a guest appearance in 2000 , Bregman returned to The Young and the  बेचैन on अगस्त 24 , 2001 , बाकी on पुनरावर्ती  status .
In 2013 , it was announced that Bregman  था महरूम लगाई  on contract .
Much of Lauren 's history has revolved around her romances with Paul Williams , Scott Grainger , Sr. , and Michael Baldwin among many  अन्य causing a fierce फंसने  with Traci Abbott Connolly .
Lauren is also famous for her long , violent rivalry with  शीला कार्टर  .
The 2010 NBA Finals was the National Basketball  संघ ( एनबीए ) चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी  for the 2009–10 season .
The best-of-seven playoff was contested between the Los Angeles Lakers , champions of the Western Conference and defending NBA champions , and the Boston Celtics , champions  of the पूर्वी सम्मेलन  .
The Lakers defeated the  सेल्टिक्स , चार खेल to तीन , to जीत the मताधिकार  's 16th NBA championship .
the 64th संस्करण of the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी थी निभाई between  June 3 and June 17 , was broadcast on ABC , and was watched by an average of 18.1 million people .
The Celtics earned their  berth into the playoffs  by winning the Atlantic Division .
The Lakers won the Pacific  प्रभाग to earn  their berth .
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating  the मियामी ऊष्मा in the best-of-seven पूर्वी  Conference First Round , the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Semifinals , and defending Eastern conference champion Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals .
The Lakers  पहुँचे the एनबीए फाइनल by defeating the ओक्लाहोमा नगर थंडर in the best-of-seven  Western Conference First Round , the Utah Jazz in the best-of-seven Western Conference Semifinals , and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals .
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the Major League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven game format , with the Lakers possessing  home-court लाभ as a बदला लिये finishing साथ बेहतर नियमित ऋतु  record than the Celtics .
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant , Pau Gasol , and Ron Artest brought the  लेकर्स बंद to विजय in खेल  1 .
A record breaking performance from Ray Allen 's  आठ three-point  baskets ensured the Celtics a Game 2 triumph .
Derek Fisher ’s 11 points in the fourth quarter helped the  लेकर्स जीत खेल 3  .
The Celtics  जीती खेल 4 ; it किया n't ठेस कि वे netted  an excellent performance in baskets by the team’s reserves , while Paul Pierce led the team to a Game 5 win with 27 points on 57 % shooting from the floor .
The Lakers avoided elimination by winning a decisive Game 6 with  24 अंक contributed by  their bench .
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points early in the third quarter , the Lakers rallied and won their second consecutive championship by taking over an  रोमांचक खेल 7 aided by लेट योगदान on ठोकर by pau gasol और artest और  rebounding .
Bryant was named Most Valuable Player of the Finals for his  दूसरी लगातार ट्रॉफी  .
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full seven games  चूंकि और तभी the चौथी चूंकि the एनबीए  Finals returned to a 2–3–2 format in .
The Laker  मताधिकार रै 16 एनबीए championships  ( Five in Minneapolis , 11 in Los Angeles ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships .
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949  मिनियापोलिस लेकर्स पराजित the वॉशिंगटन capitols 4 खेल to 2 ; in 1953 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the नई यॉर्क knicks 4 खेल  to 1 ; in 1954 Minneapolis defeated the Syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; and in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3 .
The NBA would return to the 2–2–1–1–1 National Hockey League  सात खेल श्रेणी स्वरूप जबतक  1985 .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum  ) is a flowering बेल in the  family Piperaceae , cultivated for its fruit , which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning .
The  फल , ज्ञात  as a peppercorn when dried , is approximately in diameter , dark red when fully mature , and , like all drupes , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from them , may be described simply as  pepper , or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper  ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ) , green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to south India , and is  extensively cultivated  there and elsewhere in tropical regions .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer  और निर्यातक of pepper , producing 34  % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper has been used since  प्राचीनता  for both its flavour and as a medicine .
Black pepper is the world 's most  traded मसाला  .
It is one of the most  आम मसाले added to  European cuisine and its descendants .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine , not to be confused with the capsaicin that  देता मांसल मिर्च  theirs .
It is in the modern world , often paired  साथ नमक  .
In cardiovascular physiology , ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each  दिल ताल or हृदय  cycle .
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the  pulmonary वाल्व into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle जिससे  ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation .
इमेजिंग of the physiology of  the mammalian heart is the art that allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a worldwide utility enabling study of  हृदय प्रदर्शन  reproducibly and inexpensively .
सरलीकृत , ejection भिन्न  is a mathematical product allowed by cardiac imaging .
As a  गणितीय पद , ejection भिन्न  is an extension of the work of Adolph Fick in cardiac output .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography , Computed Tomography , Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA scanning have  definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित regarding ischemia  , Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure .
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of the prosecution in  देशों साथ either the आम  law adversarial system , or the civil law inquisitorial system .
The prosecution is the legal party responsible for presenting  the मामला in a दण्ड विचारण विरूद्ध an  individual accused of breaking the law .
Strawberry shortcake most commonly means a dessert in the  shortcake परिवार of  cakes .

Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ) , also transliterated as Muhammad ( ) , was a religious , political , and military leader from  मक्का जो एकीकृत अरब into  a single religious polity under Islam .
He is believed by Muslims and  bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर  and prophet of God .
मुहम्मद is लगभग universally माना  by Muslims as the last prophet sent by God for mankind .
non-muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the संस्थापक of islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered  असली monotheistic  faith of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus , and other prophets .
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city  of मक्का , he थी अनाथ at an जल्दी आयु और brought  up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly as a merchant , as well as  a गड़रिये , और  was first married by age 25 .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains  लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ  , he later reported that it was there , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly , proclaiming that `` God is One `` , that  पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण ''  to Him ( lit .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God , and that he  खुद थी a नबी और मेसेंजर of परमेश्वर , in the  same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few followers early on , and was met with hostility from some Meccan  जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता यहूद  treated harshly .
To escape persecution , Muhammad sent some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca  migrated to मदीना ( तब ज्ञात as  Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This event , the Hijra  , marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी  calendar , which is also known as the Hijri Calendar .
In Medina , Muhammad  संयुक्त the जनजातियों  under the Constitution of Medina .
After eight  सालो of लड़ साथ the meccan जनजातियों , उसके  followers , who by then had grown to 10,000 , took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his  अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब of the बाकी  pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
In 632  , a few महीने बाद returning  to Medina from The Farewell Pilgrimage , Muhammad fell ill and died .
By the time of his death , most of the Arabian  प्रायद्वीप था परिवर्तित to islam ,  and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The  खुलासे  ( or Ayah , lit .
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which  मुहम्मद reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत –  form the verses of the Quran , regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based .
Besides the Quran , Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and  परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by  Muslims as the sources of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and  अन्य नबियों of islam साथ reverence , adding the  phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were largely  ऋणात्मक , appraisals in आधुनिक  history have been far less so .
The Great Books (  दूसरी संस्करण )
Great Books of the  पश्चिमी संसार  is a series of books originally published in the United States in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica Inc. to present the Great Books in a single package of 54 volumes .
The series is now in its second edition  और contains 60  volumes .
The original editors of the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a book must be relevant to contemporary issues , and not only important in its historical context ; it must reward rereading ; and it must be a part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas ,  '' प्रासंगिक to at तनिक 25 of the 102 ग्रेट विचार पहचाना by the  editors .
Books were not chosen on the basis of ethnic or cultural inclusiveness , historical  influence , or the सम्पादक ' अनुबंध साथ the दृश्य expressed  .
`` Cocaine '' is a song written and recorded by JJ Cale  in 1976 , लकिन भी ज्ञात  as a cover version recorded by Eric Clapton .
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [  क्लैप्टन 's ] सबसे enduringly लोकप्रिय हिट्स '' और टीप कि ``  even for an artist like Clapton with a huge body of high-quality work , 'Cocaine ' ranks among his best . ''
Glyn Johns , who had previously worked with The Who , Led Zeppelin and The Rolling Stones ,  उत्पादित the क्लैप्टन  recording , which was released on Clapton 's 1977 album Slowhand and as a single in 1980 .
The live version of `` Cocaine '' , from the Just One  रात्रि एल्बम अंकित in टोकियो , charted on the  Billboard Hot 100 as the B-side of `` Tulsa Time `` , which was a No . 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine ''  थी एक of अनेक of cale 's गीतों अंकित  by Clapton , including `` After Midnight `` and `` Travelin ' Light '' .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese  नेवी विरूद्ध the संयुक्त राज्य नवल आधार at पर्ल हार्बर , हवाई , on the morning of दिसम्बर 7 , 1941 ( दिसम्बर 8 in जापानी )  .
इससे the standpoint of the defenders  , the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions the  साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the  United Kingdom , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters , bombers and torpedo planes in two  लहरें  , launched from six aircraft carriers .
All  आठ u.S. नेवी battleships  were damaged , with four being sunk .
Two of these were later raised , and with the remaining four  repaired , छह battleships लौटे  to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank or damaged three  cruisers , तीन destroyers  , an anti-aircraft training ship , and one minelayer .
188 U.S. aircraft were destroyed ; 2,402 Americans  यहूद मारे और 1,282  wounded .
महत्वपूर्ण आधार संस्थापना ऐसे as the शक्ति स्टेशन , डॉकयार्ड , मेंटेनेंस  , and fuel and torpedo storage facilities , as well as the submarine piers and headquarters building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses were light : 29  वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines  lost , and 65 servicemen killed or wounded .
One  जापानी  sailor was captured .
The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly   to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters .
The following day ( December   8 ) , the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for non-interventionism , which had  महरूम दमदार  , disappeared .
clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( लिये  example the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to declare war on the  u.S. on दिसम्बर 11 , जिससे थी reciprocated by  the U.S. the same day .
There were numerous historical precedents for  unannounced सैन्य कार्रवाई by  Japan .
However , the lack of any formal warning , particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing , led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7  , 1941 , `` a तिथि जिससे होगा सजीव in infamy `` .
Project Runway Season 2 was the  दूसरी ऋतु of ब्रावो  's successful Project Runway , a reality competition for fashion designers .
Season 2 began airing  on दिसम्बर  7 , 2005 .
Following a nationwide search earlier in the year , sixteen  designers यहूद चुनी as semi-finalists और brought to नई यॉर्क नगर  in June , 2005 .
After the first challenge , called `` Road To The Runway '' ,  चौदह गई on to compete as finalists  .
The winning designer , Chloe Dao , received $ 100,000  in बीज धन to सहायता लॉन्च उसके अपना लकीर , a 2007  Saturn Sky roadster , a spread in ELLE magazine , and a mentorship with the Banana Republic Design Team .
Winning alongside Dao was her model , Grace Kelsey , who received  the elle पत्रिका  spread .
माइकल kors और नीना गार्सिया  returned as judges for the second season .
The fourth  judging सीट घुमाया  each week , based on the challenge .
Tim Gunn , fashion chair at Parsons The New School for Design ,  लौटे as a mentor लिये the designers  .
Kara Janx later appeared  in प्रोजेक्ट रनवे : सब सितारों in  2012 , where she finished 7th out of 13 .

An example  of a heraclius  mule
In numismatics  , a खच्चर is  a coin or medal minted with obverse and reverse designs not normally seen on the same piece .
These can be intentional or  उत्पादित by गलती  .
This type of error is highly sought after , and examples can fetch  steep कीमतें इससे collectors  .
The  earliest mules हैं मिला  among ancient Greek and Roman coins .
Opinion is divided between those who think that they are accidental , the result of an incorrect combination of a new  die साथ एक कि था officially महरूम withdrawn इससे उपयोग , or the कार्य of coiners working साथ मरता चुराया इससे an आधिकारिक मिंट , शायद at a समय जब एक of उन्हें चाहिए  have been destroyed .
The name derives from the mule , the hybrid offspring of a horse and a donkey , due to such a coin  having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग  coins , much as a mule has parents of two different species .
This page documents the tornadoes and  बवंडर outbreaks  of 2010 .
The majority of tornadoes form in the U.S. , but  वे can occur  almost anywhere under the right conditions .
A lesser number occur outside the U.S. , most notably in parts of neighboring southern  कनाडा दौरान the उत्तरी गोलार्ध 's गर्मियाँ ऋतु , लकिन हैं भी  known in South America , Europe , Asia , and Australia .
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United States in 2010 ( of  जिससे at तनिक 1,266 यहूद पुष्टि ) ,  with 45 confirmed fatalities .
Elsewhere in the world , 11 people were killed in tornadoes , six in Argentina ,  तीन in the बहामा , एक in बांग्लादेश , और  one in Germany .
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early  वसन्त काल , however  such changed after a huge upswing starting in late April and a busy late spring and summer period .
The autumn months  यहूद थोड़ा ऊपर औसत  .
A lymphocyte is a type of white blood cell in  the vertebrate  immune system .
Under the microscope ,  lymphocytes can be विभाजित into  large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes .
Large granular lymphocytes  शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल कोशिकाएं  ( NK cells ) .
Small lymphocytes  consist of t कोशिकाएं  and B cells .
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's task automation framework , consisting of a  command-line शेल और  associated scripting language built on .NET Framework .
PowerShell provides full access to COM and WMI , enabling administrators  to perform प्रशासनिक कार्य on दोनो लोकल और रिमोट खिड़कियाँ प्रणालियों  .
In PowerShell , administrative tasks are generally performed by cmdlets ( pronounced command-lets ) ,  जिससे हैं specialized .neT वर्ग implementing  a particular operation .
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together in  स्क्रिप्ट , executables ( जिससे हैं स्टैंडअलोन अनुप्रयोग ) , or by instantiating  regular .NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ) .
These work by  accessing आंकड़ा in अलग आंकड़ा स्टोर्स  , like the filesystem or registry , which are made available to the PowerShell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers .
Windows PowerShell also provides a hosting API with  जिससे the खिड़कियाँ powershell runtime can  be embedded inside other applications .
These applications can then use Windows PowerShell functionality to implement certain  परिचालन , सहित those उजागर  via the graphical interface .
This capability has  महरूम प्रयुक्त by microsoft एक्सचेंज  Server 2007 to expose its management functionality as PowerShell cmdlets and providers and implement the graphical management tools as PowerShell hosts which invoke the necessary cmdlets .
Other Microsoft applications including Microsoft SQL Server 2008 also expose their management interface  via powershell  cmdlets .
With PowerShell , graphical  interface-based प्रबन्धन  applications on Windows are layered on top of Windows PowerShell .
A  powershell एनक्रिप्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये खिड़कियाँ  products is mandated by the Common Engineering Criteria .
Windows PowerShell includes its own extensive ,  console-based सहायता , समान to man  pages in Unix shells , via the Get-Help cmdlet .
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring Julie Andrews , Dick Van Dyke , David Tomlinson , and  glynis जॉन्स , उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी , और आधारित on the  Mary Poppins books series by P. L. Travers .
The film was directed by Robert Stevenson and written by Bill Walsh and Don DaGradi , with  गीतों by the शरमन भाइयो  .
It was shot at  वॉल्ट डिज़्नी studios  in Burbank , California .
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her  प्रदर्शन as मरियम poppins और the फिल्मी भी जीती ऑस्कर लिये बेहतरीन फिल्मी  Editing , Original Music Score , Best Song for `` Chim Chim Cher-ee '' and Best Visual Effects , and received a total of 13 nominations .
A story arc is an extended or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media such as television , comic books ,  कॉमिक स्ट्रिप्स , boardgames , वीडियो खेल , और in कुछ मामले  , films .
On a television program , for example , the story would unfold  over अनेक एपीसोड  .
In television  , the उपयोग of the स्टोरी चाप is much अधिक  common in dramas than in comedies , especially in soap operas .
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs than  समाचारपत्र कॉमिक्स , as सबसे वेब कॉमिक्स have पठनीय अभिलेख ऑनलाइन कि a newcomer  to the strip can read in order to understand what is going on .
Although story arcs have existed for decades , the term `` story arc '' was coined in 1988 in  संबंध to the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी wiseguy  , and was quickly adapted for other uses .
Many American comic  किताब श्रेणी हैं अभी लिखा  in four or six-issue arcs , within a continuing series .
Short story arcs are easier to package as trade paperbacks  लिये पुनर्विक्रय , और अधिक accessible to the  casual reader than the never-ending continuity that once characterised comics .
Black Friday is the day following Thanksgiving Day in the United States , often  regarded as the शुरूआत of the  Christmas shopping season .
In recent years , most major retailers have opened extremely early and offered  promotional बिक्री to  kick off the holiday shopping season , similar to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations .
Black Friday is not an official public holiday as such , but many non-retail employees and schools  have दोनो थैंक्सगिविंग और the दिन बाद बंद , followed by a वीकेंड  , thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers .
It has routinely been the busiest shopping day of the year since 2005 , although news reports , which at that time were  inaccurate , have वर्णित it as the व्यस्ततम खरीदारी  day of the year for a much longer period of time .
The day 's name originated in Philadelphia , where it  originally थी प्रयुक्त  to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic which would occur on the day after Thanksgiving .
Use of the term started before 1961 and began to see broader use outside  फिलाडेल्फिया  around 1975 .
Later an alternative  स्पष्टीकरण began to be offered : कि `` ब्लैक शुक्रवार '' indicates  the point at which retailers begin to turn a profit , or are `` '' .
For many years , it was common for  रिटेलर to खोलें at 6:00 a.m.  , but in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00 .
This was taken to a new extreme in 2011 ,  जब अनेक  retailers ( including Target , Kohl 's , Macy 's , Best Buy , and Bealls ) opened at midnight for the first time .
In 2012 , Walmart and several other retailers announced that they would open most of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on  थैंक्सगिविंग दिन ( मगर in राज्य जहाँ खोलने on थैंक्सगिविंग is निषिद्ध  due to blue laws , such as Massachusetts where they still opened around midnight ) , prompting calls for a walkout among some workers .
Black Friday shopping is  ज्ञात लिये attracting आक्रामक crowds  , with annual reports of assaults , shootings , and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product before supplies run out .
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American  फिल्म नाटक लिखा , उत्पादित  , and directed by Tyler Perry .
The screenplay focuses on two families , one wealthy and the  अन्य working क्लास , जिनकी जीवनदान हैं intertwined  in both love and business .
The movie is the second of four in which Perry  's हस्ताक्षर अक्षर , madea , करता नहीं  make an appearance .
It is also the second  perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside पापा 's  Little Girls ) that is not based on any of the filmmaker 's stage plays .
Net 10 , Net 15 , Net 30 and  जाल 60 ( भी जाल 10 दिनों , et al ) हैं फ़ॉर्म of व्यापार क्रेडिट जिससे बताएँ कि the जाल राशि ( the  total outstanding on the invoice ) is expected to be paid in full and received by the seller within 10 , 15 , 30 or 60 days after the goods are dispatched or service is completed .
Net 30 or Net 60 terms are often coupled  साथ a क्रेडिट लिये जल्दी  payment .
The word net  in इस भाव  means `` total after all discounts . ''
It originally derives from the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( elegant , trim ) , and  अधिक recently इससे the फ्रेंच जाल ( शार्प  , neat , clean ) .

The British West Indies were the islands in and around  the caribbean कि यहूद भाग of  the British Empire .
In 1912 , the British West Indies were divided into eight colonies : The Bahamas , Barbados , British Guiana , British Honduras , Jamaica ( with its dependencies  the turks और caicos आइलैंड्स और the केमन आइलैंड्स ) , त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो  , the Windward Islands and the Leeward Islands .
Between 1958 and 1962 , all of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands , the Bahamas , British  होंडुरास और अंग्रेजों guiana  were organised into the West Indies Federation .
It was hoped that the Federation would become independent as a single nation , but  it था सीमित शक्तियां , अनेक व्यावहारिक समस्याएं , और  a lack of popular support .
Consequently , the West  इंडीज संघ  was dissolved .
Most of the territories , including all the larger ones , are now independent as separate countries , with membership to many international forums such as  the संगठन of अमरीकी राज्य , the संघ of caribbean राज्य , the संसार व्यापार संगठन  , the United Nations , the Caribbean Community , the Commonwealth of Nations and the Caribbean Development Bank among others .
The remainder  हैं अंग्रेजों विदेशी territories  .
All the former nations of the British West Indies , except the  राष्ट्रमंडल of डोमिनिकन , गुयाना और त्रिनिदाद  and Tobago , are Commonwealth Realms .
The term is still  प्रयुक्त लिये अंग्रेजों विदेशी  Territories in the Caribbean , such as the Cayman Islands .
The remaining British  वेस्ट इंडीज
`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written  by bob thiele ( as `` जार्ज  Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss .
it थी पहला अंकित  by Louis Armstrong and released as a single in 1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both  prominent in the म्यूज़िक संसार  ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ) .
Armstrong 's recording was  inducted in the  Grammy Hall of Fame in 1999 .
The publishing for this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music  समूह , कार्लिन  Music Corp. , and Bug Music , Inc .

The inauguration of the president of  the संयुक्त राज्य  is a ceremonial event marking the commencement of a new four-year term of a president of the United States .
The  दिन a अध्यक्षीय  inauguration occurs is known as `` Inauguration Day '' and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ) .
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment , the date was March 4 , the day of the year on which the Constitution of the United States first took effect in 1789 ; the last inauguration to take place on the older date was Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट 's पहला एक on कूच 4 , 1933  . )
The most recent public presidential  उद्घाटन रस्म , the swearing in of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा to  begin his second four-year term in office , took place on Monday , January 21 , 2013 .
The only inauguration  तत्व mandated by the संयुक्त  States Constitution is that the president make an oath or affirmation before that person can `` enter on the Execution '' of the office of the presidency .
However , over the years , various traditions have arisen that have expanded the inauguration from a simple  oath-taking रस्म to a day-long इवेंट  , including parades , speeches , and balls .
From the presidency of Andrew Jackson  through कि of jimmy कार्टर , the प्राथमिक उद्घाटन  Day ceremony took place on the Capitol 's East Portico .
Since the 1981  उद्घाटन of  Ronald Reagan , the ceremony has been held at the Capitol 's West Front .
The inaugurations of William Howard Taft in 1909 and Reagan in 1985 were moved  indoors at the कैपिटल due to ठंडा  weather .
The War of 1812 and World War  ii caused दो inaugurations  to be held at other locations in Washington , D.C .
When George Washington was inaugurated , the oath was administered by Robert Livingston ,  चांसलर of नई यॉर्क राज्य , in  1789 , and by William Cushing , Associate Justice of the Supreme Court , in 1793 .
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth  swore in अध्यक्ष  John Adams , no chief justice has missed an Inauguration Day .
When Inauguration Day has fallen on a Sunday , the chief justice has administered  the शपथ to the अध्यक्ष on the संडे privately और तब again  the next day publicly .
When a new president takes over mid-term due to the death or resignation of a president , the  शपथ of दफ्तर is administered लकिन औपचारिक  , public inauguration events have not been held .
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta ( ; born March 28 , 1986 ) , known by her stage name Lady Gaga , is an American singer , songwriter , record producer , dancer  , activist , businesswoman , फ़ैशन पंक्तियां , अभिनेत्री और लोकसेवक  .
Born and raised in New York City , she primarily studied at the Convent of the Sacred Heart and briefly attended New York University 's Tisch  स्कूल of the कला पहले  withdrawing to focus on her musical career .
She soon began  performing in the  rock music scene of Manhattan 's Lower East Side .
By the end of 2007 , record executive and producer Vincent  हर्बर्ट हस्ताक्षरित उसके to उसके लेबल  Streamline Records , an imprint of Interscope Records .
Initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records , her vocal abilities  captured the ध्यान of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार एकॉन , जो  also signed her to Kon Live Distribution , his own label under Interscope .
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a recording artist following the release  of उसके डेब्यू एल्बम , the कीर्ति ( 2008 ) , जिससे थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी कि अव्वल  charts around the world and included the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face `` .
After embarking on the The Fame Ball Tour , she followed the album with The Fame Monster ( 2009 ) , which spawned the worldwide hit singles ``  ख़राब रोमांस `` ,  `` Telephone `` , and `` Alejandro `` .
The Fame Monsters  कामयाबी अनुमत उसके to embark on the eighteen-month long  Monster Ball Tour , which later became one of the highest-grossing concert tours of all time .
Her most recent album , Born  इस रास्ता ( 2011 ) , अव्वल the चार्ट  of most major markets and generated more international chart-topping singles , including `` Born This Way `` , `` Judas `` , and `` The Edge of Glory `` .
Influenced by Britney Spears , David Bowie , Michael  जैक्सन , मैडोना , और महारानी , महिला गागा is पहचाना  for her flamboyant , diverse and outré contributions to the music industry through her fashion , performances and music videos .
As of October 2011 , she has sold an estimated 23 million albums  और 64 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी और उसके singles हैं कुछ  of the best-selling worldwide .
Her achievements  शामिल पाँच ग्रैमी  Awards and 13 MTV Video Music Awards .
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ) , ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest Women in Music , is the sixth best selling digital singles artist in  us according to riaa  , is regularly placed on lists composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most influential people in the world by Time magazine .
Besides her musical career , she involves herself  साथ humanitarian कल्याणकारी और lgbt  activism .

The Florida Gators baseball  टोली represents  the University of Florida in the sport of baseball .
The Florida Gators compete in Division I of the National Collegiate Athletics Association ( NCAA ) , and the Eastern  प्रभाग of the southeastern सम्मेलन  ( SEC ) .
They play their home  खेल in अल्फ्रेड A. mckethan  Stadium on the university 's Gainesville , Florida campus , and are currently led by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan .
In the ninety-eight season history of the Gators baseball program , the team has won twelve SEC championships and  रै appeared in आठ  College World Series tournaments .

A political campaign  is an व्यवस्थित प्रयत्न जिससे  seeks to influence the decision making process within a specific group .
In democracies , political campaigns often refer to electoral campaigns ,  wherein प्रतिनिधि हैं चुनी or referendums  are decided .
In modern politics , the most high profile political campaigns are  केन्द्रित on उम्मीदवार लिये सिर of राज्य or सिर of सरकारी  , often a President or Prime Minister .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton and her  बेटी  , Harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12  , 1815 – अक्तूबर  26 , 1902 ) was an American social activist , abolitionist , and leading figure of the early women 's rights movement .
Her Declaration of Sentiments , presented at the first women 's rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls , New York , is often credited with initiating the first organized women 's rights and  महिलाओं 's suffrage आंदोलनों  in the United States .
Before Stanton narrowed her political focus almost exclusively to women 's rights , she was an active abolitionist together with her husband , Henry Brewster  stanton और cousin , gerrit  Smith .
Unlike many of those involved in the women 's  अधिकारों गति , stanton addressed  various issues pertaining to women beyond voting rights .
Her concerns included women 's parental and custody rights , property rights , employment and income rights , divorce , the economic  स्वास्थ्य of the परिवार  , and birth control .
She was also an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century  temperance गति  .
After the American Civil  युद्ध , stanton 's प्रतिबद्धता to मादा suffrage caused a schism in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों  movement when she , together with Susan B. Anthony , declined to support passage of the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments to the United States Constitution .
She opposed giving added legal protection and voting rights  to अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी मेन जबकि महिलाओं , ब्लैक  and white , were denied those same rights .
Her position on this issue , together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and women 's issues beyond  मतदान अधिकारों , led to the गठन of दो पृथक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों संगठन कि यहूद आखिरकार rejoined , साथ stanton  as president of the joint organization , approximately twenty years after her break from the original women 's suffrage movement .
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both The Woman 's  बाइबल और उसके आत्मकथा  , along with many articles and pamphlets concerning female suffrage and women 's rights .
My Fair Lady is a musical based upon  जार्ज बर्नार्ड शॉ 's pygmalion और साथ  book and lyrics by Alan Jay Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe .
the स्टोरी चिंताएं eliza doolittle , a काकनी  flower girl who takes speech lessons from professor Henry Higgins , a phoneticist , so that she may pass as a well-born lady .
The musical 's  1956 ब्रॉडवे उत्पादन थी a hit , सेटिंग कया  was then the record for the longest run of any major musical theatre production in history .
It was  followed by a hit लंदन उत्पादन , a लोकप्रिय  film version , and numerous revivals .
It  रै महरूम पुकारा  `` the perfect musical '' .
Deregulation is the act or process of removing or  reducing राज्य regulations  .
It is therefore opposite of regulation , which refers to the process of  the सरकारी regulating  certain activities .

`` There Will Come Soft Rains  '' is a छोटी स्टोरी by विज्ञान fiction  author Ray Bradbury which was first published in the May 6 , 1950 issue of Collier 's .
Later  कि वही साल the स्टोरी थी  included in Bradbury 's The Martian Chronicles ( 1950 ) .

Ethnicity or ethnic group is a socially defined  श्रेणी आधारित on आम संस्कृति or राष्ट्रीयता  .
Ethnicity can , but does not have to , include common ancestry , appearance , cuisine , dressing style , heritage , history , language or dialect ,  धर्म , प्रतीकों , परंपराओं , or अन्य सांस्कृतिक  factor .
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through common characteristics  जिससे नियत the समूह अलावा इससे  other groups .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply  शक्ति  24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from the sun , has been harnessed by  इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using a दायरा of  ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar  photovoltaics , सौर थर्मल विद्युत , सौर वास्तुकला  and artificial photosynthesis , which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly  characterized as either passive  solar or active solar depending on the way they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar  तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic  panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light  dispersing गुण , और  designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the  विकास of सस्ती , inexhaustible और साफ  solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase countries’ energy security through  रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी , inexhaustible  and mostly import-independent resource , enhance sustainability , reduce pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These advantages  हैं वैश्विक  .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment  चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; वे  must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved from a western variety of the Greek alphabet called the Cumaean alphabet , which was adopted and modified  by  the Etruscans who ruled early Rome .
The Etruscan alphabet was in turn adopted and further  परिवर्धित by  the ancient Romans to write the Latin language .
During the Middle Ages , the Latin alphabet was adapted to Romance languages  , सीधा वंशजों of लैटिन , as खूब  as to Celtic , Germanic , Baltic , and some Slavic languages .
With the age of colonialism and Christian evangelism , the Latin  स्क्रिप्ट थी स्प्रेड विदेशी , और लागू to स्वदेशी अमरीकी  , Australian , Austronesian , Austroasiatic , and African languages .
More recently , linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or the International Phonetic Alphabet ( itself largely based on Latin script ) when transcribing or creating written standards for  non-european भाषाएं , ऐसे as the अफ़्रीकी सन्दर्भ वर्णमाला  .
The term Latin alphabet may refer to either the alphabet used to write Latin ( as described in this article ) , or other alphabets based on the Latin script , which is the basic set of letters common to the  विभिन्न alphabets descended इससे the शास्त्रीय लैटिन एक , ऐसे as the  English alphabet .
These Latin-derived alphabets may discard letters , like the Rotokas alphabet , or add   new letters , like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet .
Letter shapes have changed over the centuries , including the creation for Medieval Latin of lower case forms which  किया नहीं मौजूद  in the Classical period .
The assassination of United States President Abraham Lincoln took place on Good Friday , April 14 , 1865 , as the  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी आरेखण to a बंद .
The assassination occurred five days after the commander of the Confederate Army  of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया , सामान्य रॉबर्ट E. ली , surrendered  to Lieutenant General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac .
Lincoln was the first American president to be assassinated , though an  unsuccessful attempt था महरूम बना on एंड्रयू जैक्सन  30 years before in 1835 .
The  हत्या थी नियोजित और carried आउट by the well-known  stage actor John Wilkes Booth , as part of a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause .
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and David Herold , who were assigned to kill Secretary of State William H. Seward , and George Atzerodt who was  to मार वाइस अध्यक्ष एंड्रयू जॉनसन  .
By simultaneously eliminating the top three people in the administration ,  बूथ और उसके co-conspirators hoped to sever the  continuity of the United States government .
Lincoln was shot while watching the play Our American Cousin with his wife Mary Todd Lincoln at Ford 's  थिएटर  in Washington , D.C. on the night of April 14 , 1865 .
He died early the  अगला morning  .
The rest of the conspirators ' plot failed ; Powell only managed to wound Seward , while Atzerodt , Johnson 's would-be  हत्यारे , खोया उसके तंत्रिका और fled वॉशिंगटन  .
add-on  might mean:
Plug-in ( computing ) , a  टुकड़ा of तन्त्र जिससे enhances another  software application and usually can not be run independently
Browser extension , which modifies the interface  and/or बर्ताव of वेब  browsers
Add-on ( Mozilla ) , a piece  of तन्त्र कि enhances और  customizes Mozilla-based applications
Add-ons for Firefox ( addons.mozilla.org  ) ,  the official Mozilla Foundation web site which serves as a repository of add-ons for Mozilla-based applications
Peripheral , an optional computer  हार्डवेयर  component that significantly supplements or enhances the functionality of the original unit
Video game accessory , a piece of hardware used in  संयोजन साथ a वीडियो खेल कंसोल लिये playing वीडियो  games
क्लबों स्तर seating is a  special section of seating in modern sports stadiums .
The Club Level is usually located towards the middle  of the स्टेज of seating  sections , above the lower deck but below the upper deck .
They are usually right next to the Luxury Boxes , either right above , right  नीचे , or sandwiched between दो स्तर of लक्ज़री  Boxes .
Club Level seating is considered as higher class than sitting anywhere else in the arena  , लकिन निम्नतर क्लास compared to the लक्ज़री  Boxes .
Unlike the Luxury Boxes , most club levels do not wrap  entirely around the एरिना  .
Some club levels stop at a certain point ,  giving रास्ता to an विस्तार of the  Mezzanine , while others give way to lower class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ) .
A notable exception to this is Emirates Stadium in London , which has a  पूरा टियर of क्लबों  seating .
Club Levels  allow प्रशंसक अनेक स्तर  of entertainment .
Club Level seating is open to the elements , as opposed to the entirely enclosed luxury boxes , which gives more of an outdoors impression at  roofless  and open-roof stadiums and arenas .
Club Level seating is normally bought on a contract basis to allow for maximum  लाभ  on the part of the stadium .
The Club Level provides fans with  खास अभिगम to an अंदर  part of the arena exclusive to fans with special tickets .
These areas are air conditioned and allow access to special restaurants , merchandise stands , and lounge areas of the  स्टेडियम कि हैं नहीं वरना  available .
रियायत स्टैंड और विक्रेता on the क्लबों  Level also often offer different menus than in other stands to give more of a special feel to the Club .
These areas are closed off to the rest of the stadium , and  वे प्रायः can तभी be पहुँचा through  the exclusive , private club entrances .
Sophia Loren ( ; born Sofia  villani scicolone ; 20 सितंबर  1934 ) is an Italian actress .
Loren is widely  पहचाना as इटली 's सबसे  renowned and honored actress .
She was the first actress of the talkie era to win an Academy Award for a non-English-speaking  प्रदर्शन , लिये उसके portrayal of cesira in vittorio  De Sica 's Two Women .
Her other awards include a Grammy Award ,  पाँच खास सुनहरी ग्लोब्स  , a BAFTA Award and a Laurel Award .
In 1995 she received the  सेसिल B. demille पुरस्कार  for lifetime achievements , one of many such awards .
Her films include : Houseboat ( 1958 ) ,  el सीआईडी ( 1961  ) , Yesterday , Today and Tomorrow ( 1963 ) , Marriage Italian-Style ( 1964 ) , and A Special Day ( 1977 ) .
In later years she has appeared  in अमरीकी blockbusters ऐसे as grumpier बूढ़ा मेन  ( 1995 ) , and Nine ( 2009 ) .
In 1994 she starred in Robert Altman 's  prêt-à-porter , जिससे अर्जित उसके a  Golden Globe nomination the same year .
She  रै भी हासिल नाजुक और  commercial success in TV movies such as Courage ( 1986 ) .
मौतों लिये self-inflicted  injuries per 100,000 inhabitants in 2004 .
Incidence of suicide  is underreported  due to both religious and social pressures , and possibly completely unreported in some areas .
Nevertheless , from reported cases , certain trends are  apparent  .
Since the data is skewed , comparing suicide rates  between राष्ट्र is statistically  unsound .
The trends themselves are not the  कारण , लकिन may  be indicative of a root cause .
The Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy for Girls - South Africa is a female boarding  स्कूल संस्थापित in जनवरी 2007 और स्तिथ in henley on klip निकट  Meyerton , south of Johannesburg , South Africa .
The academy was founded by Oprah Winfrey with the goal of providing educational and leadership opportunities for academically gifted girls  इससे impoverished पृष्ठभूमि .

Digicel is a mobile phone network provider operating in 31 markets across the  caribbean , सेंट्रल अमेरिका  , and Oceania regions .
The company is owned by Irishman Denis O'Brien , is incorporated in  बरमूडा , और आधारित  in Jamaica .
It has about 13  लाख बेतार  users .
As of 2012 , Digicel 's markets comprise : Anguilla , Antigua and Barbuda , Aruba , Barbados , Bermuda , Bonaire , the British Virgin Islands , the Cayman Islands , Curacao , Dominica , El Salvador , Fiji , French Guiana , Grenada , Guadeloupe , Guyana , Haiti ,  जमैका , मार्टीनिक , प्रकृति , पनामा  , Papua New Guinea , Samoa , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Suriname , Tonga , Trinidad & Tobago , Turks and Caicos , and Vanuatu .
This is a  सूची of रिकॉर्ड of the फीफा  World Cup and its qualification matches .
Hospital Emergency Codes are used in hospitals worldwide to alert  स्टाफ to विभिन्न  emergencies .
The use of codes is intended to convey essential information quickly and with minimal misunderstanding to staff  , जबकि preventing तनाव और  panic among visitors to the hospital .
These codes may be posted on placards  throughout the हॉस्पिटल , or मुद्रित  on employee identification badges for ready reference .
Back of a hospital ID badge  प्रर्दशित विपत्ति  codes .
Hospital emergency codes may denote  अलग कार्यक्रम at अलग अस्पताल  , including nearby ones .
Because many physicians work at more than one facility , this may lead to confusion in emergencies , so uniform   systems have been proposed .
The route of the Eifel aqueduct ,  साथ इसके  average slope .
the eifel जलसेतु थी एक of  the longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire .
The aqueduct , constructed in AD 80 , carried water some from the hilly Eifel  प्रदेश of कया is अभी जर्मनी to the  ancient city of Colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ) .
If the auxiliary spurs to additional springs are included ,  the लंबाई थी  .
The construction was almost  entirely नीचे मैदान , और  the flow of the water was produced entirely by gravity .
A few  पुलों , सहित एक up to  in length , were needed to pass over valleys .
Unlike some of the other  प्रसिद्ध रोमन aqueducts , the eifel जलसेतु थी specifically  designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing .
In chemistry , a disulfide bond ( Br.E . disulphide bond ) is a covalent bond , usually  निकला by  the coupling of two thiol groups .
The linkage is also called  an ss-bond or disulfide  bridge .
The overall  कनेक्टिविटी is इसलिए r-s-s-r  .
The terminology is  widely प्रयुक्त in biochemistry  .
In formal terms , the connection is a persulfide , in analogy to its congener , peroxide ( R-O-O-R ) , but this terminology  is अस्पष्ट और is no longer प्रयुक्त ( मगर in सन्दर्भ to  R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ) .
Formal depiction of disulfide bond formation as an  ऑक्सीकरण  .

Religion in the United Kingdom and in the countries that preceded it , has been dominated , for over 1,400 years , by  विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of  Christianity .
According to some surveys , a majority of  नागरिकों स्टिल पहचानो साथ christianity , हालांकि नियमित गिरिजाघर  attendance has fallen dramatically since the middle of the 20th century , and immigration and demographic change have contributed to the growth of other faiths .
Religious affiliations of UK  नागरिकों हैं अंकित by नियमित सर्वेक्षण , the चार प्रमुख ones  being the UK Census , the Labour Force Survey , the British Social Attitudes survey and the European Social Survey .
According to the 2001 UK census , Christianity is the major religion , followed by Islam ,  हिंदुत्व , sikhism , judaism और  Buddhism in terms of number of adherents .
This , and the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or no religious affiliations has led commentators to variously describe the United Kingdom as a  multi-faith , secularised , or post-christian  society .
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries from 1707 , and consequently most of the largest religious groups do not  have uk-wide organisational  structures .
While some groups have separate structures for the individual countries  of the संयुक्त किंगडम , अन्य may have a सिंगल ढांचा covering इंग्लैण्ड और  Wales or Great Britain .
Similarly ,  due to the अपेक्षाकृत हाल सृष्टि  of Northern Ireland in 1921 , most major religious groups in Northern Ireland are organised on an all-Ireland basis .
The 1967 Newark riots were a major civil disturbance that occurred in the city of Newark , New Jersey between  जुलाई 12 और जुलाई 17 , 1967  .
The six  दिनों of rioting , लूटने  , and destruction left 26 dead and hundreds injured .
In United States college athletics , redshirt is a  विलंब or बर्खास्तगी of an खिलाड़ी 's भागीदारी  in order to lengthen his or her period of eligibility .
Typically , a student 's athletic eligibility in a given sport is four seasons , a  क्रमांक  derived from the four years of academic classes that are normally required to obtain a bachelor 's degree at an American college or university .
However , a student athlete may be offered  the अवसर to redshirt  for up to two years , which allows the athlete to spread those four years of eligibility over five , or sometimes six years .
In a redshirt year , a student athlete may attend classes at the college or university ,  अभ्यास साथ an एथलेटिक टोली  , and dress for play but he or she may not compete during the game .
Using this mechanism , a student athlete has up to  पाँच अकादमिक सालो to उपयोग  the four years of eligibility , thus becoming a fifth-year senior .
The term is used  as a क्रिया ,  noun , and adjective .
For example , a coach  may चुनें to redshirt a खिलाड़ी जो is तब  referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt .
The opposite of this is a `` true  freshman . ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a  वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on  28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the  ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार  War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France and Russia )  और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी , austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन , as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय  against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and  the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया  the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel , including 60  लाख europeans ,  were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed ,  largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality  of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various political  परिवर्तन , ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक  of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great  शक्तियां of यूरोपीय  .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an  ultimatum to the किंगडम  of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the previous decades  यहूद invoked  .
Within weeks , the major  शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध  and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
on 28 जुलाई , the austro-hungarians  fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised ,  the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज  on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled  into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त  line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the  रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध  the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In  नवम्बर  the Ottoman Empire joined the war , opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to  युद्ध in 1915 और  Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar  's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a  subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful  offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began प्रवेश  the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to  an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918  .
The  युद्ध ended in  victory for the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the participants tried to mobilize their  जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन  to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial  powers—the जर्मनी , रूसी ,  Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great  राशि of territory , जबकि the  latter two were dismantled entirely .
the मैप of  central Europe was redrawn into several smaller states .
The League of  राष्ट्र थी formed in the आशा  of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of  versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार  War II .
Map of countries that  घोषित themselves to be समाजवादी राज्य अंतर्गत the marxist–leninist  or Maoist definition - that is to say , `` Communist states '' - between 1979 and 1983 .
This period  चिह्नित the महानतम  territorial extent of Communist states .
A  कम्युनिस्ट राज्य is a  state where the means of production are collectively owned by the society .
It has a form of government characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party rule of a communist party ( referred as Dictatorship of the Proletariat by its  proponents ) और a professed निष्ठा to a leninist or marxist–leninist  ideology as the guiding principle of the state .
Technically , `` communist state '' is a contradictio in terminis as a communist society as defined by  दोनो माक्र्सवादी और anarcho-communists is in principle  stateless .
From this perspective , the term Marxist-Leninist state is  अधिक उचित  .
Historically , a `` communist state ''  referred to a प्रणाली जहाँ पब्लिक स्वामित्व of सब or सबसे अर्थात् of उत्पादन by the कम्युनिस्ट  party -run state is deemed necessary to further the interests of the working class ; today , a communist state can also , for instance , refer to contemporary China and Vietnam , where a Communist Party-run state exists alongside a mixed economy .
According to Marxist–Leninists , the state is a tool in the hands of the ruling  क्लास , जिससे in a समाजवादी समाज  is the working class , so a socialist state is , according to Leninists , a state of the working class .
In practice , communist states do not actually refer to  themselves as ऐसे  .
They do this not to disguise the fact that the ruling party is communist , but  बल्कि क्युकी वे do नहीं consider themselves  to be a communist society at present .
Instead , they constitutionally  पहचानो themselves  as socialist states or workers ' states .
The primary goal of these  राज्य , जिससे भी explains उनके आधिकारिक नाम , is to मार्गदर्शिका उनके संबंधित  countries in the process of building socialism , ultimately leading to communism .
Communist states may have several legal political parties , but the  कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी is प्रायः granted a खास  or dominant role in government , often by statute or under the constitution .
Consequently , the institutions of the state and of the communist party become intimately entwined , such as in the  विकास of समानांतर संस्थानों  .
In the 20th  सदी , सबसे कम्युनिस्ट  states adopted planned economies .
However , there were exceptions : The Soviet Union during  the 1920s और लेट 1980s और यूगोस्लाविया बाद संसार युद्ध ii अनुमत  limited markets and a degree of worker self-management , while China , Vietnam and Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s .
In the 21st century , China and Vietnam have  अनुमत a मिश्रित अर्थव्यवस्था  to develop .
The fundamental concepts of communist  राज्य प्रायः diverge इससे  the original socio-economic ideologies from which they develop .
As a result , many adherents of these ideologies often oppose the political systems commonly  संबद्ध साथ ये राज्य  .
For example , dissenting communists such as Trotskyists were often opposed to the communist states of the 20th century , claiming either that they had nothing to do with `` real '' communism or that the ideology of  ऐसे राज्य था पहुँचे a पाइंट of अटल भ्रष्टाचार  .
Michael Fred Phelps II ( born June 30 , 1985 ) is a retired American swimmer  और the सबसे सजा ओलंपियन of सब समय ,  with a total of 22 medals .
Phelps also holds  the all-time रिकॉर्ड लिये ओलम्पिक सुनहरा medals ( 18 , दोगुना the दूसरी उच्चतम  record holders ) , Olympic gold medals in individual events ( 11 ) , and Olympic medals in individual events for a male ( 13 ) .
In winning eight gold medals at the 2008 Beijing Games , Phelps took the record  लिये the सबसे first-place finishes at कोई सिंगल  Olympic Games .
Five of those victories were in individual events , tying the  सिंगल खेल रिकार्ड  .
In the 2012 Summer Olympics in London , Phelps won four golds and two silver medals , making him  the सबसे कामयाब खिलाड़ी of the खेल लिये  the third Olympics in a row .
Phelps is the long course world recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly , 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter individual medley as well as  the पूर्व long कोर्स संसार recordholder in the 200-meter  freestyle and 200-meter individual medley .
He has won a total of 71 medals in major international long-course competition , 57 gold , 11 silver , and three bronze spanning the Olympics , the World ,  और the पण प्रशांत championships  .
Phelps 's international titles and record-breaking performances have earned him the World Swimmer of the Year Award seven times and  अमरीकी तैराक of  the Year Award nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012 .
His  unprecedented ओलम्पिक कामयाबी in 2008 अर्जित  Phelps Sports Illustrated magazine 's Sportsman of the Year award .
After the 2008 Summer Olympics , Phelps started the Michael Phelps Foundation , which  focuses on growing the खेल of तैराकी और promoting  healthier lifestyles .
He   expects to do further work with his foundation after the 2012 Olympics , which he has said will be his last .
Lenovo Group Limited ( ) is a Chinese multinational computer hardware and electronics company with its headquarters in Beijing , China and Morrisville , North Carolina and its  पंजीकृत दफ्तर in हांग काँग , चीन  .
Its products include personal  कंप्यूटर , टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर , मोबाईल फोन  , workstations , servers , electronic storage devices , IT management software and smart televisions .
लेनोवो is the संसार  's second-largest PC vendor by 2012 unit sales .
it बाज़ार the थिंकपैड लकीर  of notebook computers and the ThinkCentre line of desktops .
Lenovo has operations  in  more than 60 countries and sells its products in around 160 countries .
Lenovo was founded in  बीजिंग in 1984  and incorporated in Hong Kong in 1988 under its previous name , Legend .
Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong Stock  एक्सचेंज और is a constituent of the हैंग  Seng China-Affiliated Corporations Index .
Slug is a common name for an  जाहिर shell-less  terrestrial gastropod mollusk .
the शब्द `` स्लग '' is भी प्रायः प्रयुक्त  as part of the common name of any gastropod mollusc that has no shell , has a very reduced shell , or has only a small internal shell .
( This is in contrast to the common name `` snail `` , which is applied to gastropods that have a coiled shell that is  विशाल पर्याप्त कि the नरम भाग of the  animal can retract fully into it . )
Slugs exist on land and in  the समुद्र , और वहीँ is भी एक genus of  freshwater slugs , Acochlidium .
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however applied primarily to land slugs , whereas slugs from the sea or from freshwater are usually referred to as `` sea  slugs `` और `` freshwater  slugs '' .
Land gastropods with a shell that is not quite vestigial , but is too small to retract  into ( जैसे अनेक in the परिवार urocyclidae ) , हैं  known as semislugs .
The various taxonomic families of  slugs रूप भाग of अनेक काफी  different evolutionary lineages which also include snails .
Thus ,  लिये उदाहरण , the विभिन्न परिवारों of जमीन slugs हैं नहीं बहुत closely  related to one another , despite a superficial similarity in the overall body form .
The shell-less condition has  arisen अनेक टाइम्स independently दौरान  the evolutionary past , and thus the category `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one .
Slugs , like all other gastropods , undergo torsion ( a 180°  टेढ़ी of the आतंरिक  organs ) during development .
Internally , slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this rotation , but externally the bodies of  जमीन slugs appear to be अधिक or कम सममित , मगर लिये the positioning  of the pneumostome , which is on one side of the animal , normally the right hand side .
The soft , slimy bodies of slugs are prone to desiccation , so land-living slugs are confined to moist environments and must  रिट्रीट to नम  hiding places when the weather is dry .
The subsequent  सूचना in इस आलेख  applies to land slugs .
is a Latin word  कि अर्थात् `` यूँ ''  or , in writing , `` it was thus in the source material '' .

Segmented  पूर्णांक काउंटर  mode , a mode of operation in cryptography
Sepang International Circuit , a high-end  racetrack कि होस्ट the  Malaysian round of Formula 1

सरलीकृत निर्देशात्मक  computer , a hypothetical computer used in systems programming
SIC ( Sons  idées couleurs ) , an जल्दी  twentieth-century art magazine produced by French author Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College , a two year Junior College in  harrisburg , इलिनोइस ,  United States
Specific inductive capacity , abbreviated to SIC ,  जिससे is अधिक commonly ज्ञात as the सापेक्ष विद्युतशीलता  or the dielectric constant
