Napoleon Bonaparte ( ,  ;  15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military and political leader who rose to prominence during the latter stages of the French Revolution and its associated wars in Europe .
As Napoleon I , he was  सम्राट  of the French from 1804 to 1815 .
His legal reform , the Napoleonic Code , has been a major influence on many civil law jurisdictions worldwide , but he is best remembered for his role in  the युद्धों led विरूद्ध फ़्रांस by a श्रेणी  of coalitions , the so-called Napoleonic Wars .
He established hegemony over most of continental Europe and sought to spread the ideals of the French Revolution , while consolidating an imperial monarchy which  लौटी पहलुओं  of the deposed Ancien Régime .
Due to his success in these wars , often against numerically superior enemies , he is generally regarded as one of the greatest military  कमांडरों of सब समय , और  his campaigns are studied at military academies worldwide .
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble  इतालवी  ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century .
He trained as an artillery  अधिकारी in मेनलैंड  France .
He rose to prominence under the French  पहला गणतंत्र और led कामयाब  campaigns against the First and Second Coalitions arrayed against France .
He  led a कामयाब  invasion of the Italian peninsula .
In 1799 , he  मंचन a तख्तापलट d'état और  installed himself as First Consul ; five years later the French Senate proclaimed him emperor , following a plebiscite in his favour .
In the first decade of the 19th century , the French Empire under Napoleon engaged in a series of  conflicts—the  Napoleonic Wars —that involved every major European power .
After a streak of victories , France secured a dominant position in continental Europe , and Napoleon maintained the French sphere of influence through the formation of extensive alliances and the appointment of  मित्रों और परिवार सदस्यों to नियम  other European countries as French client states .
The Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of Russia marked  turning अंक in  Napoleon 's fortunes .
His Grande Armée was badly damaged in  the अभियान  and never fully recovered .
In  1813 , the छठे गठबन्धन  defeated his forces at Leipzig ; the following year the Coalition invaded France , forced Napoleon to abdicate and exiled him to the island of Elba .
Less than a year later , he escaped Elba and returned to power ,  लकिन थी पराजित at the बैटल of वाटरलू  in June 1815 .
Napoleon spent the last six years of his life in  कारावास by the अंग्रेजों on the  island of Saint Helena .
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer ,  लकिन वहीँ रै महरूम  some debate about the cause of his death , as some scholars have speculated that he was a victim of arsenic poisoning .
This is a chronological listing of the United States Senators from  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
United States Senators are popularly  निर्वाचित , लिये a six-year  term , beginning January 3 .
चुनावों हैं  held the first Tuesday after November 1 .
Before 1914 , they were chosen by the Pennsylvania  सामान्य सभा  , and before 1935 , their terms began March 4 .
The South Africa national rugby union  टोली ( ज्ञात as the springboks  ) represents South Africa in rugby union .
They compete in the annual Rugby Championship , along with southern-hemisphere  counterparts अर्जेंटीना , ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand .
They have won this championship on three  अवसरों in सोलह  years .
They are currently ranked second in the world by the International Rugby   Board , and were named 2008 World Team of the Year at the Laureus World Sports Awards .
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the  रग्बी संसार कप प्रतियोगिता , the springboks किया  not compete in the first two World Cups in 1987 and 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa .
The team made its World Cup debut in 1995 ,  जब  the newly democratic South Africa hosted the tournament .
The Springboks then defeated the All Blacks 15–12 in the final , which  is now remembered as one  of the greatest moments in South Africa 's sporting history , and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process .
South Africa regained their title as champions 12 years later , when they  पराजित इंग्लैण्ड 15–6 in the 2007 फाइनल  .
As a result of the 2007 World Cup  टूर्नामेंट the springboks  were promoted to first place in the IRB World Rankings , a position they held until July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot .
The  springboks खेल in ग्रीन और सुनहरा jerseys  , and their emblems are the Springbok and the Protea .
The side has been playing international rugby since 1891 , when a British Isles  पक्ष toured the स्वदेश  , playing South Africa in their first Test on 30 July .
South  अफ़्रीकी थी coached by जेक श्वेत , जो led the boks  to the 2007 World Cup title , announcing his resignation effectively from the end of 2007 .
His replacement 's (  पीटर de villiers  ) contract expired in 2011 , following a 11–9 defeat to Australia in the Rugby World Cup quarter-final , who then stated he would not be signing a new deal .
The previous captain was John Smit , who before he retired in 2011  निभाई वेश्या लिये सबसे of उसके करियर , हालांकि  he has also been a prop , mainly in 2008 and 2009 .
Due to Smit being  अनुपलब्ध लिये the नवम्बर 2010 परीक्षण  after surgery , lock Victor Matfield took Smit 's place as captain for that tour .
The current captain is  जां de villiers  .
The Battle of  gettysburg ( , साथ an ध्वनि ) , थी लड़ा  July 1–3 , 1863 , in and around the town of Gettysburg , Pennsylvania .
It was the battle with the largest number of casualties in the  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और is  often described as the war 's turning point .
Union Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade 's Army of the Potomac defeated attacks by Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee  's फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया  , ending Lee 's invasion of the North .
After his success at Chancellorsville in  वर्जिनिया in may 1863 , ली led उसके फौज through the shenandoah घाटी to  begin his second invasion of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign .
With his army in high spirits , Lee intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern  राजनेता to दे up उनके अभियोजन of the युद्ध by penetrating as  far as Harrisburg , Pennsylvania , or even Philadelphia .
Prodded by President  अब्राहम lincoln , maj.  Gen. Joseph Hooker moved his army in pursuit , but was relieved just three days before the battle and replaced by Meade .
Elements of the two armies  initially collided at gettysburg on जुलाई  1 , 1863 , as Lee urgently concentrated his forces there , his objective being to engage the Union army and destroy it .
Low ridges to the northwest of  कस्बा यहूद defended initially by a संघ प्यादे प्रभाग  under Brig . Gen. John Buford , and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry .
however , दो विशाल confederate corps फहरा  them from the northwest and north , collapsing the hastily developed Union lines , sending the defenders retreating through the streets of town to the hills just to the south .
On the second day of battle ,  सबसे of दोनो सेना  had assembled .
The  संघ लकीर थी रखी  out in a defensive formation resembling a fishhook .
In the late afternoon of July 2 , Lee launched a heavy assault on the Union left flank , and fierce fighting  raged at छोटी गोलाकार शीर्ष , the wheatfield , शैतान  's Den , and the Peach Orchard .
On the Union right ,  demonstrations escalated into full-scale  assaults on Culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill .
All across the battlefield , despite  significant नुकसान , the संघ defenders  held their lines .
On the third day of battle , July 3 , fighting resumed on Culp 's Hill , and cavalry battles raged to the east and south , but the main event was  a नाटकीय  infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates against the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge , known as Pickett 's Charge .
The charge was repulsed by Union rifle  और तोपखाने  fire , at great losses to the Confederate army .
Lee led  उसके फौज on a  torturous retreat back to Virginia .
Between 46,000 and 51,000  सैनिको इससे दोनो  armies were casualties in the three-day battle .
That November , President Lincoln used  the समर्पण रस्म लिये  the Gettysburg National Cemetery to honor the fallen Union soldiers and redefine the purpose of the war in his historic Gettysburg Address .
An academic discipline , or field of study , is a  शाखा of ज्ञान कि is  taught and researched at the college or university level .
Disciplines are defined ( in part ) , and recognized by the academic journals in which research is published , and the learned  समाजों और अकादमिक विभाग or faculties  to which their practitioners belong .
However , there exists no formal criteria for when  शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम और scholarly जर्नल्स रूप  an academic discipline .
A huge difference exists between , on the one hand , well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities all over the world , have a long history , and have a well established set of journals and conferences , and , on the other hand , suggestions for  नई फ़ील्ड समर्थित तभी by few विश्वविद्यालयों और publications  .
Fields of study usually have several sub-disciplines or branches , and the distinguishing lines  between ये हैं प्रायः दोनो मनमानी  and ambiguous .
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web  विकास लकिन भी प्रयुक्त as a general-purpose  programming language .
PHP is now installed on more  than 244 लाख वेबसाइटों  and 2.1 million web servers .
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995 , the reference  क्रियान्वयन of पीएचपी is अभी उत्पादित by the पीएचपी समूह  .
While PHP originally stood for Personal Home Page , it now stands for  पीएचपी : हाइपरटेक्स्ट preprocessor , a  recursive acronym .
PHP code is interpreted by a web server with a PHP processor module which generates the resulting web page : PHP commands  can be अंतःस्थापित सीधे into an एचटीएमएल सोर्स दस्तावेज़ बल्कि than कॉलिंग  an external file to process data .
It has also evolved to include a command-line interface  काबिलियत और can be प्रयुक्त in स्टैंडअलोन आलेखीय  applications .
PHP is free software released under the PHP License , which is  असंगत साथ  the GNU General Public License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP .
PHP can be deployed on most web  सर्वर और भी  as a standalone shell on almost every operating system and platform , free of charge .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack ''  कैनेडी ( may 29 , 1917 – नवम्बर 22 , 1963 ) , प्रायः referred  to by his initials JFK , was the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as  कमांडर of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59  during World War II in the South Pacific , Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter , he served in  the u.S. सीनेट इससे  1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice President and  रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड  Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
at 43 सालो of आयु , he is the  youngest to have been elected to the office , the second-youngest President ( after Theodore Roosevelt ) , and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only non- Protestant  अध्यक्ष , और is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have  won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs  आक्रमण , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट , the भवन of the बर्लिन वॉल , the  Space Race , the African-American Civil Rights Movement , and early stages of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number of military advisers , special operation forces , and  helicopters in an प्रयत्न to कोर the स्प्रेड of साम्यवादी in दक्षिण ईस्ट  Asia .
The Kennedy  प्रशासन अपनाया the नीति of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट  Program which was implemented by the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment , and segregation of  ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the उत्तरी और  southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on  नवम्बर 22 , 1963  in Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged  साथ the अपराधों , लकिन he थी शॉट और मारे by जोकर  Ruby two days later , before a trial could take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission  officially concluded  that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However , the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA  ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद  flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
however , एबीसी न्यूज in उनके छानबीन , the  Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's  विवादास्पद विभाग of  Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the  1960s सूचना  concerning Kennedy 's private life has come to light .
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become better known ,  विशेषकर चूंकि the 1990s  .
हालांकि initially रखा  secret from the general public , reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks  अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय  ratings of U.S. presidents .
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. King  और लिखा by किंग , जेरी leiber , और माइक  Stoller , inspired by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me , '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3 .
वहीँ have  been over 400 recorded versions of the song .
A political cartoon from an 1894 Puck magazine by illustrator S.D . Ehrhart , shows a farm  स्त्री labeled `` लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी '' sheltering इससे a बवंडर  of political change .
A metaphor is a figure of speech that  describes a विषय by asserting कि it is , on कुछ  point of comparison , the same as another otherwise unrelated object .
रूपक  is a type of analogy and is closely related to other rhetorical figures of speech that achieve their effects via association , comparison or resemblance including allegory , hyperbole , and simile .
In simpler terms , a metaphor  compares दो वस्तुएँ or बाते बगैर  using the words `` like '' or `` as '' .
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in English literature is the All the world 's a stage  monologue इससे  As You Like It :
All the  संसार  's a stage,
And all the men  और महिलाओं merely  players ;
वे have उनके  exits and their entrances ; — William Shakespeare , As You Like It , 2/7
This quote is a metaphor because  the संसार is  not literally a stage .
By figuratively asserting that the world is a stage , Shakespeare uses the points of comparison between the world and  a स्टेज to convey an समझना परिचय the यांत्रिकी  of the world and the lives of the people within it .

Rembrandt van Rijn , Self-portrait ,  etching  , c.1630
Francisco Goya , There  is no एक to सहायता उन्हें , आपदाओं  of War series , aquatint c.1810
Felix  vallotton ,  La raison probante ( The Cogent Reason ) , woodcut from the series Intimités , 1898
Printmaking is the process of making artworks by printing ,  सामान्यतः on पेपर  .
Printmaking normally covers only the process of creating prints with an element of originality , rather than just being a  फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक जनन  of a painting .
Except in  the मामला of monotyping , the प्रक्रम is सक्षम  of producing multiples of the same piece , which is called a print .
Each print produced is not  माना a ``  copy '' but rather is considered an `` original '' .
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process , and also because the imagery of a print is typically not simply a reproduction of another work  लकिन बल्कि is प्रायः a अद्वितीय चित्र designed इससे the प्रारंभ to be expressed in a particular  printmaking technique .
A print  may be ज्ञात  as an impression .
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not chosen only for its ability to produce multiple impressions , but rather  लिये the अद्वितीय qualities कि प्रत्येक of the printmaking प्रक्रियाओं lends  itself to .
prints हैं निर्मित by transferring  ink from a matrix or through a prepared screen to a sheet of paper or other material .
Common types of matrices include : metal plates , usually copper or zinc , or polymer plates for engraving or etching ; stone , aluminum , or polymer for lithography ;  ब्लॉक of लकडी लिये woodcuts और लकडी engravings  ; and linoleum for linocuts .
Screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics are used for the  screenprinting प्रक्रम  .
Other types of matrix substrates and related  प्रक्रियाओं हैं  discussed below .
Multiple impressions printed from the same matrix form  an संस्करण  .
Since the late 19th century , artists have generally signed individual impressions  इससे an संस्करण और प्रायः क्रमांक the  impressions to form a limited edition .
Prints may also be printed in  किताब रूप , ऐसे as  illustrated books or artist 's books .
Il Divo is an English multinational operatic pop vocal group created by music  मैनेजर , कार्यपालिका , और वास्तविकता  TV star Simon Cowell .
Formed in the  संयुक्त किंगडम , वे  are also signed to Cowell 's record label , Syco Music .
il divo is a समूह  of four male singers : French pop singer Sébastien Izambard , Spanish baritone Carlos Marín , American tenor David Miller , and Swiss tenor Urs Bühler .
To date , they   have sold more than 26 million albums worldwide .
Su-15 , one of the principal Soviet Air Defence interceptors in the  1970s और  1980s
An interceptor aircraft ( or simply interceptor ) is a type of fighter aircraft designed specifically to prevent missions of enemy aircraft , particularly  बमवर्षक और reconnaissance वायुयान ,  and destroy them , relying usually on great speed and powerful armament .
Being used since the First World War , after the late 1960s , interceptors became less  महत्वपूर्ण due to shifting इससे बमवर्षक to इंटरकांटिनेंटल बैलिस्टिक  missiles ( ICBMs ) for nuclear warfare .
A Vietnamese American (  ) is an अमरीकी  of Vietnamese descent .
They make up about half of all  विदेशी वियतनामी ( người việt hải ngoại  ) and are the fourth-largest Asian American group .
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the United States started after  1975 , बाद the समाप्त of  the Vietnam War .
Early immigrants were refugee boat people fleeing  persecution or गरीबी .
Forced to flee from their homeland and often thrust into poor urban neighborhoods ,  ये newcomers have nevertheless प्रबंधित to स्थापित दमदार  communities in a short amount of time .
More than sixty percent of Vietnamese Americans reside in the states of California  , टेक्सास , वॉशिंगटन , फ्लोरिडा  , and Virginia .

Adolf Hitler committed suicide by  gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945 in उसके führerbunker  in Berlin .
His wife Eva ( née Braun ) committed suicide with  उसे by ingesting साइनाइड  .
That afternoon , in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions , their remains were carried up the stairs  through the बंकर 's आपात निकास , doused in पेट्रोल और नियत alight in  the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker .
The Soviet archives record that their burnt  remains यहूद बरामद  and interred in successive locations until 1970 when they were again exhumed , cremated and the ashes scattered .
Accounts differ as to the  कारण of मौत ; एक कि he died  by poison only and another that he died by a self-inflicted gunshot , while biting down on a cyanide capsule .
Contemporary historians have rejected these accounts as being either Soviet  प्रचार or an attempted सुलह in अनुक्रम to  reconcile the different conclusions .
One eye-witness  अंकित कि the देह  showed signs of having been shot through the mouth , but this has been proven unlikely .
There is  भी विवाद  regarding the authenticity of skull and jaw fragments which were recovered .
In 2009 , DNA tests were performed on a skull Soviet  officials था  long believed to be Hitler 's .
The  परीक्षण नाज़िल कि the कपाल  was actually that of a woman less than 40 years old .
Location  of मिसौरी
The alcohol  कानून of मिसौरी  are among the least restrictive and most lax and permissive in the United States .
Missouri is known throughout the Midwest for its largely  laissez-faire दृष्टिकोण to दारू विनियमन , in शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the बहुत सख्त  alcohol laws of some of its neighbors , like Kansas and Oklahoma .
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF , commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome , is  a विरल संक्रमण of the deeper परतों  of skin and subcutaneous tissues , easily spreading across the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue .
Necrotizing fasciitis is  जल्दी progressing , having वृहद  risk of developing in the immunocompromised due to conditions like diabetes , cancer , etc .
It is a severe disease of sudden onset and is usually treated  तत्काल साथ ऊँची doses of intravenous  antibiotics .
Type I describes a polymicrobial  संक्रमण , whereas प्रकार ii describes  a monomicrobial infection .
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g. , Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ) , Staphylococcus  aureus , clostridium perfringens , bacteroides fragilis  , Aeromonas hydrophila ) .
Such infections are more likely to occur in people with compromised immune   systems .
Historically , Group A  streptococcus बना  up most cases of Type II infections .
However , since as early as 2001 , another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis has been observed with increasing  आवृत्ति , caused by methicillin-resistant  Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ) .
Some published case reports have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and NF , though the evidence of the link was said to be weak because of a small  क्रमांक  of case patients and it was unclear whether the drugs just masked the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se .
संसार युद्ध ii ( wwii or ww2 ) , भी ज्ञात  as the Second World War , was a global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945 .
It involved the vast majority of the world 's nations —including all  of the ग्रेट शक्तियां —eventually  forming two opposing military alliances : the Allies and the Axis .
It was the most  फैली युद्ध in इतिहास , साथ अधिक than 100 लाख लोगों  serving in military units from over 30 different countries .
In a state of `` total war `` , the major  भागीदार लगाई उनके संपूर्ण आर्थिक , औद्योगिक , और वैज्ञानिक सामर्थ्य at the सेवा of the युद्ध  effort , erasing the distinction between civilian and military resources .
Marked by mass deaths of civilians , including the Holocaust and the only use of nuclear weapons  in warfare , it resulted in 50 लाख  to over 75 million fatalities .
These  मौतों मेक संसार युद्ध  II by far the deadliest conflict in human history .
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was  already at युद्ध साथ the गणतंत्र of चीन in 1937 , लकिन the संसार युद्ध is generally  said to have begun on 1 September 1939 with the invasion of Poland by Germany and subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain .
From late 1939 to early 1941 , in a series of campaigns and treaties ,  जर्मनी formed the अक्ष गठबंधन साथ इटली , conquering or subduing  much of continental Europe .
Following  the molotov–ribbentrop  Pact , Germany and the Soviet Union partitioned and annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours , including Poland .
The United Kingdom and the other members of the  अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल यहूद the तभी प्रमुख  Allied forces continuing the fight against the Axis , with battles taking place in North Africa as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic .
In June 1941 , the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union , giving a start to the largest land theatre of war in history , which tied down the major part of the Axis '  सैन्य शक्तियां लिये the बाकी of the युद्ध  .
In December 1941 , Japan joined the Axis ,  attacked the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय territories in the प्रशांत  Ocean , and quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific .
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942 , after Japan lost a series of naval battles and European Axis troops were defeated in  उत्तर अफ़्रीकी और , decisively , at  Stalingrad .
In 1943 , with a series of German defeats in Eastern Europe , the  अलाइड आक्रमण of इटली , और अमरीकी victories in  the Pacific , the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts .
In 1944 , the Western Allies invaded France , while the Soviet Union  regained सब of इसके territorial  losses and invaded Germany and its allies .
During 1944 and 1945 the  संयुक्त राज्य पराजित the  Japanese Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands .
The war in Europe ended with the  कैप्चर of बर्लिन  by Soviet and Polish troops and the subsequent German unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945 .
Following the Potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 July 1945 , the United States  dropped परमाणु बम  on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 August , and Nagasaki on 9 August .
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent , and the Soviet Union having declared war on  जापानी by आक्रमणकारी मंचूरिया , जापानी surrendered  on 15 August 1945 , ending the war in Asia and cementing the total victory of the Allies over the Axis .
World War II altered the  राजनैतिक संरेखण और  social structure of the world .
The United Nations ( UN ) was established to foster international  सहयोग और prevent भविष्य विरोध  .
The great powers that were  the victors of the war—the संयुक्त राज्य , the सोवियत संघ  , China , the United Kingdom , and France—became the permanent members of the United Nations Security Council .
The Soviet Union and the United States emerged as  प्रतिद्वंद्वी superpowers , सेटिंग  the stage for the Cold War , which lasted for the next 46 years .
Meanwhile , the influence of  यूरोपीय ग्रेट शक्तियां प्रारंभ  to decline , while the decolonisation of Asia and Africa began .
Most countries  जिनकी उद्योग  had been damaged moved towards economic recovery .
Political integration , especially in  यूरोपीय , उभरा as an प्रयत्न to stabilise  postwar relations and fight more effectively in the Cold War .
A limited liability company ( LLC ) is a  लचीली रूप of एंटरप्राइज़  that blends elements of partnership and corporate structures .
Note than an LLC is not a  निगम , और कॉलिंग an llc  a corporation is technically incorrect .
An LLC is a legal  रूप of कम्पनी कि provides सीमित  liability to its owners in the vast majority of United States jurisdictions .
LLCs do  नहीं need to be व्यवस्थित  for profit .
Five  k-cups
The inside of a used K-Cup , with the top foil and the used coffee  grounds removed  .
This shows the filter  अंदर the k-cup  .
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or other single cup brewing systems to  काढ़ा a कप  of coffee , tea , or hot chocolate .
Each K-Cup is a plastic container with a coffee  फिल्टर  inside .
Ground coffee beans are packed in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight with a  संयोजन प्लास्टिक और  foil lid .
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer  , the brewer punctures  the foil lid and the bottom of the K-Cup and forces hot water under pressure through the K-Cup and into a mug .
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters ,  diedrich/ ग्लोरिया जीन्स , टिमोथी 's संसार  Coffee , Van Houtte , Caribou Coffee , Celestial Seasonings , Bigelow Tea Company , Twinings , Tully 's , Coffee People and Newman 's Own .
Keurig  's patents on the असली  K-Cup design expired in September 2012 .
Keurig holds at  तनिक एक अतिरिक्त  , still-active US patent and another patent application , detailing improvements that have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design .

Gallet  multichron astronomic ( ca . 1959 ) —complex mechanical chronograph  with 12 hour recoding capabilities , automatic day , date , month , and moon phase display
A modern Seiko quartz  wristwatch using the chronograph फलन  ( movement 7T92 ) .
Citizen Atessa Eco-Drive ATV53-3023 analog-digital chronograph with 4  क्षेत्रफल रेडियो नियंत्रित रिसेप्शन ( उत्तर  America , Europe , China , Japan ) .
A chronograph is a specific type of watch that is used as a stopwatch  संयुक्त साथ a प्रदर्शक  watch .
A basic chronograph has an independent sweep second  हाथ ; it can be प्रारंभ  , stopped , and returned to zero by successive pressure on the stem .
Louis Moinet invented the  chronograph  in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect , part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often  shortened to बस पीसीआई ) is a लोकल  computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a  प्रोसेसर बस , लकिन in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र  of any particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly to the processor bus , and are  आबंटित पता in the  processor 's address space .
Attached devices can take either the form of an  एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड  itself , called a planar device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles , where it displaced the combination of ISA plus  एक vesa लोकल बस as the  bus configuration .
It has subsequently been  अपनाया लिये  other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are  होने replaced by पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस , लकिन , सबसे motherboards हैं स्टिल  made with one or more PCI slots , which are sufficient for many uses .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ) ,  विद्युत विशेषताएँ , बस समय , और प्रोटोकॉल  .
The  specification can be खरीदा  from the PCI Special Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network cards , sound  ताश , modems  , extra ports such as USB or serial , TV tuner cards and disk controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video  ताश  became AGP , and then PCI Express .
पीसीआई वीडियो ताश remain उपलब्धियाँ  for use with old PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards  or उपलब्धियाँ in  universal serial bus and PCI Express versions .
Michael Whitaker Smith ( born October 7 , 1957 ) is an American contemporary  ईसाई संगीतकार  , who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts .
His biggest success in mainstream music was in 1991 when `` Place in  इस संसार '' hit no . 6  on the Billboard Hot 100 .
Smith is a three-time Grammy  पुरस्कार विजेता ,  and has earned 40 Dove Awards .
Over  the कोर्स of उसके करियर , he बेची अधिक than 13 लाख  albums and recorded 29 No . 1 Hit songs , fourteen gold albums , and five platinum albums .
Smith is an American  म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार प्राप्तकर्ता  ; he was also named one of People magazine 's `` Most Beautiful People '' .
An American poster from the World War II -era that was used to inform people  परिचय कया वे चाहिए  do if they suspect sabotage .
Sabotage is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another entity through  subversion , रुकावट , disruption  , or destruction .
In a workplace setting , sabotage is  the सचेत वापसी of दक्षता generally  directed at causing some change in workplace conditions .
One who engages in sabotage  is a saboteur  .
As a rule ,  saboteurs कोशिश to छिपाते उनके पहचान क्युकी  of the consequences of their actions .
For example , whereas an environmental pressure group  might be प्रसन्न  to be identified with an act of sabotage , it would not want the individual identities of the perpetrators known .
Patrick Henry College  ( phc ) is a निजी , स्वतंत्र  college with an Evangelical Christian basis that focuses on teaching classical liberal arts and government , located in Purcellville , Virginia , United States .
Patrick Henry is known for its  रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण ईसाई  focus .
As of April 17 , 2007 , the college was  accredited by the transnational संघ of ईसाई कॉलेजों और स्कूलों  , a national faith-related accrediting organization recognized by the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation .
The school was founded with the help of the  घर स्कूल विधिक रक्षा संघ , और अभी serves  as the headquarters for the organization , with which it is still closely connected .
The history of  टेलीविज़न comprises the कार्य of  numerous engineers and inventors in several countries over many decades .
The earliest proposal was in 1908 , in a paper by A . A. Campbell-Swinton and  postulated the उपयोग of कैथोड  rays .
The first practical demonstrations of television ,  however , यहूद विकसित using electromechanical विधि  to scan , transmit , and reproduce an image .
As electronic camera and display tubes were perfected , electromechanical television  दिया रास्ता to all-electronic  systems in nearly all applications .

A movie theater ( also called a cinema ,  फिल्म हाउस , फिल्मी हाउस , फिल्मी थिएटर  or picture house ) is a venue , usually a building , for viewing films .
Most but  नहीं सब फिल्म  theaters are commercial operations catering to the general public , who attend by purchasing a ticket .
The movie is projected with a movie projector onto a large projection screen  at the सामने  of the auditorium .
Most  फिल्म थिएटर हैं अभी equipped लिये  digital cinema projection , removing the need to create and transport a physical film print .

Lyme disease , Lyme borreliosis is an  संक्रामक बीमारी caused by at तनिक  three species of bacteria belonging to the genus Borrelia .
Borrelia  burgdorferi sensu stricto is the प्रमुख कारण of lyme  disease in North America , whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii cause most European cases .
The disease is named after the towns of Lyme and Old Lyme ,  कनेक्टिकट , यूएसए , जहाँ a क्रमांक  of cases were identified in 1975 .
हालांकि एलन steere एहसास कि lyme बीमारी थी a tick-borne बीमारी in  1978 , the cause of the disease remained a mystery until 1981 , when B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy Burgdorfer .
Lyme disease  is the सबसे  common tick-borne disease in the Northern Hemisphere .
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the bite of infected ticks belonging to a few  प्रजाति of the genus  Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ) .
Early symptoms may include fever , headache , fatigue , depression , and a characteristic circular skin  खाज पुकारा erythema migrans  ( EM ) .
Left untreated , later symptoms may involve  the joints , दिल  , and central nervous system .
In most cases , the infection and its symptoms are  eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक , विशेषकर if the बीमारी is treated  early .
Delayed or inadequate  उपचार can सीसे  to more serious symptoms , which can be disabling and difficult to treat .

Penis ( plural penises or  penes  ) is a general term for the organs with which male and hermaphrodite animals introduce sperm into receptive females during copulation .
Such organs occur in many animals , both vertebrate and invertebrate , but males do not bear a penis in every animal species , and in those  प्रजाति in जिससे the पुरूष करता भालू a so-called शिश्न , the penes in the विभिन्न  species are not necessarily homologous .
For example , the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to the  शिश्न of a पुरूष कीट or  barnacle .
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs , but not to all ; for example the intromittent organ of most cephalopoda is the  hectocotylus , a specialised भुजा , और पुरूष  spiders use their pedipalps .
In most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis , it  रै no प्रमुख फलन अन्य than intromission , or at तनिक  conveying the sperm to the female , but in the placental mammals the penis bears the distal part of the urethra , which discharges both urine during urination and semen during copulation as the occasion requires .
Artists and repertoire ( A & R ) is the division of a record label or music  प्रकाशन कम्पनी कि  is responsible for talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters .
It also acts as a liaison between artists and the record label or publishing  कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is  generally considered under the purview of , and responsibility of , A & R .
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and U.S. customary units equal to  one-eighth of a मील , समतुल्य to 220 गज , 660 फीट , 40 छड़  , or 10 chains .
The exact  मान of the furlong  varies slightly among English-speaking countries .
Five  furlongs हैं लगभग 1 किलोमीटर  ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ) .
Since the original definition of the metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the circumference  of the धरती ( साथ the ग्रेट वृत्त coincident साथ the मध्याह्न of देशांतर  passing through Paris ) , the circumference of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs .

Lithium batteries  हैं डिस्पोजेबल ( प्राथमिक  ) batteries that have lithium metal or lithium compounds as an anode .
They stand apart  इससे अन्य  batteries in their high charge density ( long life ) and high cost per unit .
Depending on the design and chemical compounds used , lithium cells can produce voltages from 1.5 V  ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or क्षारीय बैटरी ) to परिचय 3.7 V. लिथियम बैटरी हैं  widely used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices .
Raymond `` Ray '' Charles Jack LaMontagne ( ; born June  18 , 1973 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter  .
lamontagne रै released चार स्टुडियो एल्बम  , Trouble , Till the Sun Turns Black , Gossip in the Grain and God Willin ' & the Creek Do n't Rise .
He was born in New Hampshire and was inspired to create music after  सुनना an एल्बम by स्टीफन stills  .

He lives in Massachusetts with his wife and  दो children  .

It is the precursor to The Lake  हाउस और प्रेरित the अधिकतम  Ride series .

The team colors ,  वर्दी , और  logo are often ranked as being among the best in the NFL .
Facebook on the  ad-tech  2010
Facebook is an online social networking service , whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some  विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the  United States to help students get to know each other .
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his  कॉलेज roommates और fellow  Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to Harvard  विद्यार्थी , लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य  colleges in the Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually added support for students at various other universities before opening to  ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी , और आखिरकार to  anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at least 13 years old  to become  registered users of the site .
Users must register before using the  साईट , बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ  a personal profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including automatic notifications when they update their profile .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups , organized by  कार्यस्थल , स्कूल or कॉलेज , or अन्य विशेषताएँ , और  categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As of September 2012 ,  फेसबुक रै over एक  billion active users .
according to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता रिपोर्ट्स सर्वेक्षण , वहीँ  are 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10 , violating the site 's terms of service .
In May 2005 ,  accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 लाख  in Facebook , and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot .
A January 2009 Compete.com study  क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त  social networking service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list , saying , `` How on earth did we stalk our exes , remember our  co-workers ' जन्मदिन , कीड़ा हमारी मित्रों  , and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
आलोचकों , ऐसे as फेसबुक detox , राज्य कि  Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the United States , resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast  estimates फेसबुक रै 138.9  million monthly unique U.S. visitors in May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today , in April 2010 an  अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5  million ) of the U.S. population had a Facebook account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some regions , with the site losing 7  लाख क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता  in the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1 , 2012 , and was  headquartered in मेनलो पार्क , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Facebook Inc.  began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक और  trading on the NASDAQ on May 18 , 2012 .
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15 November 1891 – 14 October 1944 ) , popularly known as The Desert  फॉक्स ( wüstenfuchs , ) , थी a जर्मनी फ़ील्ड मार्शल  of World War II .
He earned the respect of both  उसके अपना सैनिकों  and the enemies he fought .
Rommel was a highly decorated officer  in संसार युद्ध i और थी awarded  the Pour le Mérite for his exploits on the Italian front .
In World War II , he  further विशिष्ट  himself as the commander of the 7th Panzer Division during the 1940 invasion of France .
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North African  अभियान स्थापित उसे as एक of  the most able commanders of the war , and earned him the appellation of the Desert Fox .
He is regarded as one of the most  skilled कमांडरों of मरुस्थल  warfare in the conflict .
He later commanded the German forces opposing the Allied  cross-channel आक्रमण in normandy  .
His  कार्यभार never  took him to the Eastern Front .
Rommel is regarded as having been a humane  और पेशेवर  officer .
His Afrika Korps was never accused of war crimes , and soldiers  captured दौरान उसके अफ़्रीकी अभियान  were reported to have been treated humanely .
Orders to kill Jewish soldiers , civilians and  captured कमांडो यहूद  ignored .
Late in the war , Rommel was linked to the  षड्यंत्र to assassinate  Adolf Hitler .
Since Rommel was a national  नायिका , हिटलर desired  to eliminate him quietly .
He forced  ख़बरों to कमिट आत्महत्या साथ a साइनाइड गोली , in  return for assurances that Rommel 's family would not be persecuted following his death .
stained  glass representation of the Holy Spirit as a dove , c. 1660 .
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic authors , later elaborated by five  बौद्धिक virtues और चार अन्य समूह of नैतिक विशेषताएँ  .
They are : wisdom , understanding , wonder and awe ( fear of the Lord ) , counsel ,  ज्ञान , fortitude , और  piety ( reverence ) .
The Earth Day Flag , the latest proposal of John  mcconnell लिये a ध्वज of धरती  Day
Earth Day is an annual event , celebrated on April 22 , on which events are held  विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate  support for environmental protection .
It was  पहला मनाये in 1970 , और  is now coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network , and celebrated in more than 192 countries each year .
In 1969 at a  युनेस्को सम्मेलन in सैन फ्रांसिस्को  , the date proposed was March 21 , 1970 , the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere .
This day of  प्रकृति 's equipoise थी बाद  sanctioned in a Proclamation signed by Secretary General U Thant at the United Nations .
A month later a separate Earth Day was founded by United States Senator Gaylord Nelson  as an पर्यावरणीय teach-in पहला आयोजित on अप्रैल  22 , 1970 .
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom Award in recognition of  उसके कार्य  .
While this April 22 Earth Day was  केन्द्रित on the संयुक्त राज्य  , an organization launched by Denis Hayes , who was the original national coordinator in 1970 , took it international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations .
Numerous communities celebrate  धरती सप्ताह , an संपूर्ण  week of activities focused on environmental issues .
आयोडीन is a रासायनिक  element with symbol I and atomic number 53 .
The name is from Greek  ioeidēs , अर्थ  violet or purple , due to the color of elemental iodine vapor .
Iodine and  इसके यौगिकों हैं primarily  used in nutrition , and industrially in the production of acetic acid and certain polymers .
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number , low toxicity , and ease of attachment to organic  यौगिकों have बना it a भाग of अनेक x-ray  contrast materials in modern medicine .
Iodine  रै तभी एक  stable isotope .
A number of  आयोडीन radioisotopes हैं  also used in medical applications .
Iodine is found  on धरती मुख्यतः as the अत्यधिक  water-soluble iodide ion , I− , which concentrates it in oceans and brine pools .
Like the other halogens ,  फ़्री आयोडीन occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic  molecule I2 , and then only momentarily after being oxidized from iodide by an oxidant like free oxygen .
In the universe and on Earth , iodine 's high  परमाणु क्रमांक  makes it a relatively rare element .
However , its presence in ocean water  रै दिए  it a role in biology .
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by life in biological functions ( only tungsten , employed  in एंजाइमों by a few प्रजाति of जीवाणु  , is heavier ) .
Iodine 's rarity in many soils , due to initial low abundance as a crust-element , and also leaching  of घुलनशील आयोडाइड by rainwater , रै led to अनेक कमियां समस्याएं in  land animals and inland human populations .
Iodine deficiency affects  परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी preventable  cause of intellectual disabilities .
Iodine is  जरूरी by उच्चतर पशु , जिससे  use it to synthesize thyroid hormones , which contain the element .
Because of this function , radioisotopes of iodine are concentrated in the  थायराइड ग्रंथि साथ  with nonradioactive iodine .
If inhaled , the radioisotope iodine-131 , which has a high fission product yield , concentrates in the thyroid , but is easily remedied with potassium  आयोडाइड उपचार  .
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of attempting to influence decisions made by officials in the  सरकारी , सबसे प्रायः विधायक or सदस्यों  of regulatory agencies .
Lobbying is done by many different types of people and organized groups , including individuals in the private sector , corporations , fellow legislators or government officials , or advocacy  समूह (  interest groups ) .
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies ,  अर्थ a वोटर or bloc of मतदाता भीतर उसके or उसके चुनावी  district , or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a business , or not .
Professional lobbyists are people whose business is trying to influence legislation on behalf of  a समूह or व्यक्तिगत  who hires them .
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their  सामान्य जॉब ( लिये उदाहरण , a सीईओ बैठक साथ a प्रतिनिधि परिचय a प्रोजेक्ट महत्वपूर्ण to his/her  company , or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ) .
Governments often define and regulate organized group lobbying  कि रै become influential  .
The ethics and morality of  lobbying  are .
Lobbying  is प्रायः बोला of साथ  contempt , when the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting the law ( twisting it away from fairness ) in order to serve their own conflict of interest .
But  another पक्ष of lobbying is बनाना  sure that others ' interests are duly defended against others ' corruption , or even simply making sure that minority interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority .
For example , a medical association , or a trade association of health insurance companies , may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of tobacco companies  , in जिससे मामला the lobbying होता be viewed by सबसे लोगों as जायज  ( duly defending against others ' corruption ) .
The difficulty in drawing objective lines  between जिससे lobbyists हैं `` शुभ  lobbyists '' and which ones are `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with which lobbyists or their clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind .
At heart , the effort to  influence विधान  is a power struggle .
as in अन्य फ़ॉर्म of शक्ति संघर्ष , ऐसे as युद्ध or विधि  enforcement , motives range from to self-defense to fighting for justice , and the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization .
Sunshine of your  प्रेम गिटार  riff
Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce , guitarist/vocalist  eric क्लैप्टन , और वादक अदरक बेकर .
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues rock , hard rock and  साइकेडेलिक चट्टान , combining the psychedelia-themed  lyrics , Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing and vocals , Jack Bruce 's voice and prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming .
the समूह 's तीसरा  album , Wheels of Fire , was the world 's first platinum-selling double album .
Cream are widely regarded as being the world 's first successful  supergroup .
In their career , they sold over 15  लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी  .
Cream 's music included songs  आधारित on परंपरागत ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` क्रॉसरोड्स  `` and `` Spoonful `` , and modern blues such as `` Born Under a Bad Sign `` , as well as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew `` , `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad `` .
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK , number 11 ) , `` Sunshine of Your Love  `` ( us , क्रमांक 5 ) , `` श्वेत रूम `` ( us , क्रमांक  6 ) , `` Crossroads '' ( US , number 28 ) , and `` Badge `` ( UK , number 18 ) .
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of the time , and ,  साथ साथ जिमि हेंड्रिक्स , और टेरी कठ  of Chicago , popularised the use of the wah-wah pedal .
They provided a heavy yet technically proficient  musical थीम कि foreshadowed  and influenced the emergence of British bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s .
The band 's live  प्रदर्शन बहकावे  progressive rock acts such as Rush .
Cream were inducted into the Rock  और फेंकें हॉल  of Fame in 1993 .
They were  शामिल in दोनो रोलिंग स्टोन और vh1 's सूचियाँ  of the `` 100 Greatest Artists of All Time '' .
They were also ranked  क्रमांक 16 on vh1 's  `` 100 Greatest Artists of Hard Rock '' .
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters , and starring Ricki Lake , Sonny  बोनो , डिब्बी हैरी , माइकल st. जेरार्ड , shawn  Thompson , Colleen Fitzpatrick , Jerry Stiller , and in his last film role , Divine .
Hairspray was a dramatic departure from Waters '  पहले works , साथ a  much broader intended audience .
In fact , Hairsprays PG is the  mildest दरजा a waters फिल्मी रै प्राप्त ;  most of his previous films were rated X by the MPAA .
Set in 1962 Baltimore , Maryland , the film revolves around  self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था ट्रेसी turnblad as वो pursues  stardom as a dancer on a local TV show and rallies against racial segregation .
Hairspray  थी तभी a मॉडरेट कामयाबी upon इसके आरंभिक  theatrical release , earning a modest gross of $ 8 million .
However ,  it प्रबंधित to आकर्षित a larger  audience on home video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic .
Most critics praised the film , although some were displeased with the overall  campiness  .
In 2002 , the film was adapted into a  ब्रॉडवे musical of the वही नाम , जिससे जीती आठ टोनी  Awards , including Best Musical in 2003 .
A second film version of Hairspray , an adaptation of the stage musical , was also released by New Line Cinema  in 2007 , जिससे शामिल अनेक परिवर्तन of scripted  items from the original .
The film also ranks #  444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's  2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all time .
A Christian denomination is  an identifiable धार्मिक  body under a common name , structure , and doctrine within Christianity .
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g. , the Catholic Church considers itself  the एक सच्चा गिरिजाघर और the अपोस्टोलिक देखिए  , and as pre-denominational ) .
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do not have any formal denominational structure , authority , or record-keeping beyond the  लोकल सभा ; अनेक समूह भीतर बहाली गति  fall into this category .
Some groups are large ( e.g . Catholics , Lutherans , Anglicans or Baptists  ) , जबकि अन्य हैं बस a few छोटी चर्च  , and in most cases the relative size is not evident in this list .
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity , Pietism , Evangelicalism , Pentecostalism and the Holiness movement sometimes cross denominational lines , or in some cases create new  denominations आउट of दो or अधिक continuing समूह , ( as is the मामला लिये  many United and uniting churches , for example ) .
ऐसे subtleties और  complexities are not clearly depicted here .
Major divisions  भीतर christianity  .
Note : This is not a complete list , but aims to  provide a comprehensible अवलोकन  of the diversity among denominations of Christianity .
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations , many of which can not be verified to be  significant , तभी those denominations साथ विकिपीडिया आलेख होगा be सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to  ensure that all entries on this list are notable and verifiable .
Between denominations , theologians  , और तुलनात्मक religionists वहीँ हैं considerable मतभिन्नता परिचय जिससे  groups can be properly called Christian , disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups .
For  the purpose of सादगी  , this list is intended to reflect the self-understanding of each denomination .
Explanations of different opinions  concerning उनके औकात as ईसाई denominations  can be found at their respective articles .
There is no official recognition in most parts of the world for religious bodies , and there is no official clearinghouse which could determine the status or  respectability of धार्मिक लाशें  .
Often there is  considerable असहमति between विभिन्न  churches about whether other churches should be labeled with pejorative terms such as `` cult '' , or about whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability .
Such considerations often vary from place to  प्लेस , जहाँ एक धार्मिक समूह may आनंद बहुमत औकात in  one region , but be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world .
Inclusion on this list does not indicate any judgment about the size , importance , or  अक्षर of a समूह  or its members .
1804 map of ``  louisiana `` , edged on the  west by the Rocky Mountains .
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the United States of  अमेरिका in 1803  of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana .
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11 ,250,000 ) plus cancellation of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ) , for a total sum of 15  लाख डॉलर ( कम than 3 सेंट प्रति एकड़  ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars , less than 42 cents per acre ) .
The  louisiana territory encompassed  all or part of 15 present U.S. states and two Canadian provinces .
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas , Missouri , Iowa , Oklahoma , Kansas , and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ; northern Texas ;  the portions of मोंटाना , व्योमिंग , और कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी , सहित  the city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan .
France  नियंत्रित इस  vast area from 1699 until 1762 , the year it gave the territory to its ally Spain .
Under Napoleon Bonaparte , France took back the  territory in 1800  in the hope of building an empire in North America .
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending war with Britain , however , led France to  लापरवाही ये योजनाएँ और बेचें the संपूर्ण territory to the  United States , who had originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands .
The purchase of the territory of  louisiana took प्लेस दौरान  the presidency of Thomas Jefferson .
At the time  , the खरीदें faced घरेलू  opposition because it was thought to be unconstitutional .
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory , Jefferson decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in order to remove France 's presence in the region and to protect both  u.S. व्यापार अभिगम to the बंदरगाहों of नई ऑरलियन्स  and free passage on the Mississippi River .
Ceremony at Place d'Armes , New Orleans marking transfer of Louisiana to the United States , 10 March  1804 , as चित्रित by thure  de Thulstrup .
`` Cool Jerk '' is a popular song written by Donald Storball and originally  performed by the capitols  .
Released in 1966 , it reached No . 2 on the American R & B  चार्ट और no . 7  on the pop chart .
The backing track for this song was actually  अंकित ( secretly  ) by the Motown house band The Funk Brothers .
Per one  of the दुर्गंध भाइयो , the सोंग थी originally  to be called `` Pimp Jerk . ''
This was taken  इससे watching पड़ोस pimps  , who would dance in the clubs , but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks .
Their  संस्करण  was subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk . ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word pimp in the title would be banned or not  प्राप्त much धनात्मक ध्यान  , and had the title changed to its current form .
The Go-Go 's , Todd Rundgren , Big Trouble , Human Sexual Response , The La De Da 's , The Creation , and  the coasters have covered  the song .
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd time signature ( 7/4 ) ,  giving  an obviously jerky feel to the song .
The  go-go 's covered the  song for their 1982 album Vacation and later re-recorded it for their 1990 album Greatest .
In the feature film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York , Uncle Frank ( Gerry  bamman ) गाती `` कूल झटका  '' in the shower .
A version of the song  साथ अलग गीत ( `` do the  Cool Whip '' ) is used in Cool Whip commercials .
A recording of `` Cool  झटका '' by  Ricardo Ray is featured in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ) .
The song features in the film Standing in the Shadows of Motown , performed by  the दुर्गंध भाइयो साथ  lead vocals by Bootsy Collins .
The song is heard briefly  in the एनिमेटेड विशेषता  , Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted .
Despite this reason , it is  सूचीबद्ध in कुछ विसंगतियाँ  of the film 's soundtrack .
A league is a unit of  लंबाई ( or , rarely  , area ) .
It was long common in Europe and Latin America , but it is no longer an official  ईकाई in कोई स्वदेश .
The league originally  referred to the अलहदा  a person could walk in an hour .
Since the Middle Ages , many values have been  निर्दिष्ट in अनेक  countries .
In the context of nautical distances , the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance  corresponds to कैसा दूर an निरीक्षक of औसत ऊँचाई ( 5'9 '' or 1.78  m ) can see when standing at sea level .
Thus , a ship traveling  एक  `` league '' has reached what was previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon .
The lack of a historical and global standard for the exact measure of a `` league '' can be accounted for by the variable elevation of the observer ( i.e. ,  sightings इससे a जलयान 's डेक vs. masthead ) .
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State ,  a डोमिनियन of the अंग्रेजों  Commonwealth , having seceded from the United Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty .
It comprises 26 of Ireland  's 32 काउंटी  .
Since 1949 it has existed as the  गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड  .
From its foundation , the Irish Free State was  embroiled in a सिविल युद्ध between राष्ट्रवादियों  supporting the Treaty and opponents who supported a republic .
The pro-Treaty  पक्ष , संगठित as cumann na ngaedheal उभरा  victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections .
They formed the government of the state until 1932 , when they peacefully  हात over शक्ति to  the anti-Treaty faction in Fianna Fáil , who defeated them in an election .
The Irish state , despite its violent  beginnings , रै remained  a liberal democracy throughout its existence .
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's  neutrality in the दूसरी संसार युद्ध demonstrated इसके स्वतंत्रता  in foreign policy matters from Britain .
In  1948 आयरलैंड  formally left the British Commonwealth and adopted the title of `` Republic '' .
In the  आर्थिक गोला ,  the Irish state has had a mixed performance .
On independence , it was one of the wealthier  देशों in  Europe per head of population .
However it  भी inherited इससे अंग्रेजों नियम the समस्याएं of बेरोजगारी  , emigration , uneven geographical development and lack of a native industrial base .
For much of its history , the state struggled to  rectify ये समस्याएं  .
Particular peaks  of करणों यहूद अंकित दौरान the लेट 1930s , 1950s  and 1980s , when the Irish economy recorded little growth .
In the 1930s , Fianna Fáil governments attempted to create Irish domestic industries using  subsidies और सुरक्षात्मक  tarifs .
In the late 1950s , these policies were dropped in favour of free trade with  चयनित देशों और प्रोत्साहित  of foreign investment with low taxes .
This was expanded when Ireland  डाला the यूरोपीय आर्थिक  Community in 1972 .
In the 1990s and 2000s , Ireland experienced an economic boom known as the Celtic  बाघ , in जिससे the देश 's  GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours .
Immigration also surpassed emigration , bringing the state  's जनसांख्यिकी up to over 4 लाख  .
However , since 2008 , Ireland has  अनुभवी a कठोर संकट in the  banking sector and with sovereign debt .
The resultant economic slump has deepened the effect of the world recession on  आयरलैंड  .
From 1937 to 1998 , the Irish constitution included a  अर्जी on उत्तरी आयरलैंड as a भाग of  the national territory .
However , the state also opposed and  प्रयुक्त इसके सुरक्षा शक्तियां  against those armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army , who tried to unite Ireland by force .
This  occurred in the 1950s , throughout  the 1970s and 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale .
Irish governments  meanwhile आजमाया to दलाली  an agreement to the conflict known as The Troubles within Northern Ireland from 1968 to the late 1990s .
The British government officially recognised  the सही  of the Irish government to be a party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985 .
In 1998 , as part of the Good Friday Agreement , the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to  उत्तरी आयरलैंड और बजाय extend the सही of आयरिश नागरिकता to सब the लोगों of  the island should they wish to have it .
John Quincy Adams ( July 11 , 1767February 23 , 1848 ) was the sixth President of the United  राज्य ( 1825–1829 ) .
He served as American diplomat , Senator , and  congressional प्रतिनिधि  .
He was a member of the  federalist , democratic-republican  , National Republican , and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties .
एडम्स  was the son of former President John Adams and Abigail Adams .
As a  राजनयिक , एडम्स निभाई an  important role in negotiating many international treaties , most notably the Treaty of Ghent , which ended the War of 1812 .
As Secretary of State , he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's  उत्तरी किनारा साथ कनाडा  , negotiated with Spain the annexation of Florida , and authored the Monroe Doctrine .
Historians agree he was one of the greatest  राजनयिकों और secretaries  of state in American history .
As president ,  he sought to modernize  the American economy and promoted education .
एडम्स enacted a भाग  of his agenda and paid off much of the national debt .
He was stymied by a Congress controlled by his enemies , and  उसके कमी of patronage संजाल  helped politicians eager to undercut him .
He lost his 1828  बोली लिये re-election  to Andrew Jackson .
In doing so , he became the first president since his father to serve  a सिंगल  term .
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's foreign policy in line with his ardently nationalist commitment to  अमेरिका 's रिपब्लिकन  values .
अधिक recently होवे ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स  as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization .
During Adams ' lifetime , technological innovations and new means of  संचार स्प्रेड संदेश of धार्मिक  revival , social reform , and party politics .
Goods , money , and people traveled more rapidly and efficiently than  कभी पहले .
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts after leaving office , serving for the last 17 years of his life with far  वृहद acclamation  than he had achieved as president .
He is , so far , the only president later elected  to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  ( though John Tyler was elected to the House of Representatives of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ) .
Animated by his growing revulsion against slavery , Adams became a leading opponent of  the स्लेव शक्ति  .
He predicted that if a civil war were to break out , the president could  abolish गुलामी by using उसके युद्ध शक्तियां  .
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery issue , but said that  if the दक्षिण became स्वतंत्र  there would be a series of bloody slave revolts .
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a version of the  अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर  web browser from Microsoft .
It was released to the public  on कूच 14  , 2011 .
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 as a major  out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the रिलीज अनुसूची of कोई  particular version of Windows , unlike previous versions .
It is the first version since Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a Windows operating system , although some OEMs have  संस्थापित it साथ खिड़कियाँ 7 on उनके pcs , as खूब as नई खिड़कियाँ 7  laptops .
The system requirements for Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7 , Windows Server 2008 R2 , Windows Vista Service Pack 2  or खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008  SP2 with the Platform Update .
Windows  xp और पहले हैं नहीं  supported .
Internet Explorer 9  is the पिछला संस्करण of अंतरजाल  Explorer to be supported on Windows Vista .
Both IA-32 and x64  builds हैं उपलब्धियाँ  .
अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 supports अनेक  CSS 3 properties , embedded ICC v2 or v4 color profiles support via Windows Color System , and has improved JavaScript performance .
It is the last of  the पाँच प्रमुख वेब browsers  to implement support for Scalable Vector Graphics ( SVG ) .
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D , hardware-accelerated text  रेंडरिंग using directwrite , hardware-accelerated वीडियो रेंडरिंग using मीडिया  Foundation , imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component , and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline .
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the  html5 वीडियो और ऑडियो  tags and the Web Open Font Format .
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid and pain reliever  पहला marketed by the dr . मील आयुर्विज्ञान  Company .
It was developed by Maurice Treener , head chemist at  मील , in  Elkhart , Indiana .
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches , pains , inflammation , fever , headache , heartburn , sour  पेट , अपच  , and hangovers , while neutralizing excess stomach acid .
It was  शुभारम्भ  in 1931 .
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and flu  , alka-seltzer  Plus , was later introduced .
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant ,  alka-mints , थी introduced in  1994 and discontinued in 1997 .
Alka-Seltzer is currently owned by Bayer Schering  फार्मा ag , जर्मनी  .
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications sold over the counter and taken  by अर्थात् of rapidly dissolving टैबलेट कि रूप  a carbonated solution in water .

A stalactite ( , ; from the Greek stalasso , ( σταλάσσω ) , `` to drip '' , and meaning `` that which drips '' ) is a type of speleothem (  द्वितीयक खनिज ) कि hangs इससे the छत of  limestone caves .
It is a type  of dripstone  .
The  सम्बन्धित गठन  on the floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite .
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an academic degree instead of spelling out the title in full , such as in reference   books like Who 's Who and on business cards .
Many  डिग्री  have more than one abbreviation .
In  the  UK , it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for degrees with full stops ( e.g . `` BSc '' rather than `` B.Sc . `` .
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large and distinct populations or  समूह by anatomical , सांस्कृतिक , जातीय , जेनेटिक , भौगोलिक , ऐतिहासिक  , linguistic , religious , or social affiliation .
First used to denote national  संबद्धों , the पद began to be प्रयुक्त  to relate to physical traits in the 17th century .
In the early 20th century the term was often  प्रयुक्त , in a taxonomic भाव  , to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype .
जबकि biologists sometimes उपयोग the अवधारणा of रेस to मेक भेद among फजी सेट of traits , अन्य in the वैज्ञानिक  community suggest that the idea of race often is used in a naive or simplistic way , i.e . that among humans , race has no taxonomic significance : all living humans belong to the same species , Homo sapiens and subspecies , Homo sapiens sapiens .
Social conceptions  और groupings of दौड़  vary over time , involving folk taxonomies
that  define of individuals  based on perceived traits .
Scientists consider biological  essentialism obsolete , और generally discourage  racial explanations for collective differentiation in both physical and behavioral traits .
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the  विचारधाराओं और theories  that grew out of the work of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic .
Although  स्टिल प्रयुक्त in सामान्य contexts ,  it is now often replaced by other words which are less ambiguous and emotionally charged , such as populations , people ( s ) , ethnic groups or communities depending on context .
Lucy  स्टोन ( अगस्त 13 , 1818 – अक्तूबर 19 , 1893 ) थी  a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist , and a vocal advocate and organizer promoting rights for women .
In 1847 , Stone became the first woman from Massachusetts to  earn a कॉलेज उपाधि  .
She spoke out for women 's rights and against slavery at a  समय जब महिलाओं यहूद हतोत्साहित  and prevented from public speaking .
Stone was the first recorded American woman to retain her own   last name after marriage .
Stone 's organizational activities for the  कारण of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस  gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century .
Stone helped initiate the first National Women 's Rights Convention and she supported and sustained it annually along with a number of  अन्य लोकल , राज्य और क्षेत्रीय activist  conventions .
Stone spoke in front of  a क्रमांक of  legislative bodies to promote laws giving more rights to women .
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery , after which she helped form the largest group of like-minded women  's अधिकारों reformers , the नीतियां मॉडरेट अमरीकी स्त्री suffrage  Association , which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote .
Stone wrote  extensively परिचय a चौड़ी दायरा of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों  , publishing and distributing speeches by herself and others , and convention proceedings .
In the long-running and influential Woman  's जर्नल , a साप्ताहिक periodical कि वो  established and promoted , Stone aired both her own and differing views about women 's rights .
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the woman 's rights movement '' , Stone delivered a speech which sparked Susan B.  एंथोनी to लो up the कारण of महिलाओं 's  suffrage .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that ``  लुसी स्टोन थी the पहला व्यक्ति by जिसको the दिल of the  American public was deeply stirred on the woman question . ''
Together , Anthony , Stanton , and Stone have been called  the 19th सदी `` triumvirate  `` of women 's suffrage and feminism .
In  वित्त , a बंध  is an instrument of indebtedness of the bond issuer to the holders .
It is a debt security , under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and , depending on the terms of the bond , is obliged to pay them interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the  प्रिंसिपल at a बाद तिथि , termed the परिपक्वता  .
Interest is  प्रायः देय  at fixed intervals ( semiannual , annual , sometimes monthly ) .
Very often the bond is negotiable , i.e . the  स्वामित्व of the यंत्र  can be transferred in the secondary market .
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder  of the बंध is the lender  ( creditor ) , the issuer of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ) , and the coupon is the interest .
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to finance long-term investments , or , in the  मामला of सरकारी bonds , to वित्त वर्तमान व्यय  .
प्रमाणपत्र of जमा ( cds ) or छोटी पद वाणिज्यिक पेपर हैं माना  to be money market instruments and not bonds : the main difference is in the length of the term of the instrument .
Bonds and  स्टॉक्स हैं दोनो प्रतिभूति , लकिन the  major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an equity stake in the company ( i.e . they are owners ) , whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e . they are lenders ) .
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined term  , or परिपक्वता , बाद जिससे the बंध is redeemed ,  whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely .
An exception is an  irredeemable बंध , ऐसे  as Consols , which is a perpetuity , i.e . a bond with no maturity .
