मॉडल जहाजों  and castle
A scale model is a physical model , a representation  or नक़ल of an ऑब्जेक्ट कि is larger or छोटी than the वास्तविक  size of the object , which seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object .
Very often the scale  मॉडल is प्रयुक्त as a  guide to making the object in full size .
Scale  मॉडल हैं निर्मित or एकत्रित  for many reasons .
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the Zune product family  released on सितंबर  15 , 2009 by Microsoft .
It was a direct  प्रतिस्पर्धी साथ the ठहराना  iPod and iPhone series of mobile devices .
It  थी initially  released in 16 and 32 GB capacities .
A  64 gb  version was released on April 9 , 2010 .
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and included Wi-Fi for  तुल्यकालन , अभिगम to the zune मार्केटप्लेस  and Web browsing .
The Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 chip , allowing it to play 720p video  through the वैकल्पिक hdmi zune डॉक  on a high-definition television .
Otherwise , content would be scaled down to 480x272  पिक्सेल on the खिलाड़ी 's oled  touchscreen .
Old Sparky , the electric  कुर्सी प्रयुक्त at गाओ गाओ  prison
Execution by electrocution , usually performed using an electric chair , is an execution method  originating in the संयुक्त राज्य  in which the condemned person is strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body .
This  निष्पादन विधि थी निर्मित by  employees of Thomas Edison during the War of Currents , and has been used only in the United States and , for a period of several decades , in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation , last in 1976 ) .
Historically , once the condemned person was attached to the chair , various cycles ( differing in voltage and duration ) of alternating current would be passed through the individual  's देह , in अनुक्रम to  cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ) .
The first jolt of electric current was designed to cause immediate  unconsciousness और दिमाग मौत ; the दूसरी  one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs .
Death  थी अक्सर  caused by electrical overstimulation of the heart .
Although in the United States the electric chair has become a symbol of the death penalty , its use is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection , which is  widely believed to be a अधिक दयालु विधि of निष्पादन  .
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method  of निष्पादन , आज it is तभी कायम as a द्वितीयक  method that may be chosen over lethal injection at the request of the prisoner .
As of 2010 , electrocution is an optional  रूप of निष्पादन  in Alabama , Florida , South Carolina and Virginia .
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal  इंजेक्शन  as an alternative method .
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee , the electric chair has been retired except for those whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31 , 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31 ,  1998 ) और जो  chose electrocution .
In both states , inmates who do not choose electrocution or inmates who committed their crimes after the  designated तिथि हैं मारे by lethal इंजेक्शन  .
The electric chair is an alternate form  of निष्पादन स्वीकृत लिये संभावित उपयोग in अरकंसास और ओक्लाहोमा if अन्य फ़ॉर्म of निष्पादन  are found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution .
It is the sole method of  निष्पादन in वर्मांट  , where treason is the only capital crime .
On February 8 , 2008 , the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by electric chair was a `` cruel and  असामान्य दंड '' अंतर्गत the राज्य 's  constitution .
This brought  executions of इस प्रकार to an  end in Nebraska , the only remaining state to retain electrocution as its sole method of execution for murder .
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General  सभा , the राज्य विधानमंडल of the अमरीकी  State of Maryland , and is composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts .
The House of Delegates Chamber is  स्तिथ in the मेरीलैंड राज्य हाउस  ( state capitol ) on State Circle in Annapolis , which is the state capital .
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and  the कार्यालयों of the राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट  Governor of the State of Maryland .
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis , in the nearby Casper R. Taylor , Jr. House  दफ्तर भवन  .
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as  the बैटल लिये पेरिस ) took प्लेस  during World War II from 19 August 1944 until the surrender of the occupying German garrison on 25 August .
The Liberation of  पेरिस प्रारंभ साथ an uprising by the फ्रेंच  Resistance against the German garrison .
On 24 August , the French Forces of the Interior ( Forces françaises de  l'intérieur , ffi ) प्राप्त सुदृढीकरण  from the Free French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton .
The capital region  of फ़्रांस था  been governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice in June 1940 , when the German Army occupied northern and westernmost France , and when the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France .
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the  निर्वासन of the vichy  government to Sigmaringen in Germany .
However , there was still much heavy  लड़ to be किया पहले फ़्रांस थी liberated , सहित the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस दौरान  August-September ( in Provence and extending into the southwestern region of the Vosges Mountains ) , along the German-held seaports of western France ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ) , in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France , and in northeastern France , such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers .
The German Army  और ss लड़ा doggedly  in these areas for the remainder of 1944 and into 1945 .
`` Feelin ' Alright ? ''  भी ज्ञात as `` अहसास alright '' is a सोंग लिखा by डेव मेसन of the  English rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album , Traffic .
The song  थी भी a hit सिंगल लिये अनेक performers  : Joe Cocker ( 1969 , # 69 , recharted in 1972 , US # 33 ) , Mongo Santamaría ( 1969 , # 95 ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971 , US # 54 ) .
It has also been recorded by Three Dog Night ( 1969 ) , The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ) , Lou Rawls , Freddie King , Paul Weller , Lulu , Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 ) , Rare Earth , The Electric Concept Orchestra , Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ) , The Ohio Players ( 1971 ) , Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ) , Maceo Parker , Gladys Knight & the  pips , फैली  Panic and The Black Crowes .
A Steel Drum version by Trinidad Oil Company was  reissued on the dancefloor जैज़  compilation Blue Juice 2 .
It was also featured in the  2000 फिल्मी  Duets , sung by Huey Lewis .
Both the original and the Joe Cocker cover were  प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म उड़ान , अभिनीत  Denzel Washington .
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an  अमरीकी कर्ता , आवाज़ कर्ता , सिंगर , songwriter और संगीतकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके अभिनीत  role as Ned Bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned 's Declassified School Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules , as the lead character Nolan Byrd .
Werkheiser also played Peter Parkes in the fourth and final  ऋतु of  the ABC Family show Greek .
Sample  दृश्य of an  electronic health record based on images
Sample view of  an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य  record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic health  सूचना परिचय  individual patients or populations .
It is a record  in डिजिटल स्वरूप कि  is theoretically capable of being shared across different health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of  network-connected enterprise-wide  information systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a range of data , including demographics , medical history , medication and allergies , immunization status , laboratory test results ,  radiology बिंब , vital  signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .
ऋण origination  is the process by which a borrower applies for a new loan , and a lender processes that application .
Origination generally includes all the steps from taking a loan  अनुप्रयोग  up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ) .
Loan servicing covers everything after disbursing the  निधि जबतक the ऋण is fully  paid off .
Loan origination is a specialized version  of  new account opening for financial services organizations .
Certain people and organizations  specialize in ऋण origination  .
Mortgage brokers and other mortgage originator companies serve as a  prominent उदाहरण  .
वहीँ हैं अनेक  different types of loans .
For more information on loan  प्रकार , देखिए the ऋण और उपभोक्ता lending आलेख  .
Steps involved in originating a loan vary  by ऋण प्रकार , विभिन्न kinds of ऋण रिस्क , नियामक  , lender policy , and other factors .
Top left : The Tennessee Valley  प्राधिकार , भाग of the  New Deal , being signed into law in 1933 .
Top right : Franklin  delano रूज़वेल्ट , जो थी जिम्मेदार  for initiatives and programs collectively known as the New Deal .
नीचे : a पब्लिक  mural from one of the artists employed by the New Deal .
The New Deal was a series of economic programs  enacted in the संयुक्त राज्य between 1933 और  1936 .
They involved presidential executive orders or laws  passed by कॉंग्रेस दौरान the पहला  term of President Franklin D. Roosevelt .
The programs were  in जवाब to the ग्रेट अवसाद  , and focused on what historians call the `` 3 Rs '' : Relief , Recovery , and Reform .
कि is राहत लिये the बेरोजगार  and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and Reform of the financial system to prevent a repeat depression .
The New Deal produced a political realignment , making the Democratic Party  the बहुमत ( as खूब as the पार्टी कि आयोजित the श्वेत हाउस लिये सात आउट of नौ अध्यक्षीय शर्तें इससे 1933 to 1969  ) , with its base in liberal ideas , the white South , traditional Democrats , big city machines , and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities .
The Republicans were split , with conservatives opposing the  संपूर्ण नई सौदे as an दुश्मन of कारोबार  and growth , and liberals accepting some of it and promising to make it more efficient .
The realignment crystallized into the New Deal Coalition that dominated most presidential elections into the 1960s , while the opposition Conservative  गठबन्धन largely  controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
By 1936 the term  `` उदार ''  typically was used for supporters of the New Deal , and `` conservative `` for its opponents .
From 1934 to 1938 , Roosevelt was  assisted in उसके  endeavours by a “pro-spender” majority in Congress ( drawn from two-party , competitive , non-machine , Progressive , and Left party districts ) .
As noted by Alexander Hicks , “Roosevelt , backed by rare , non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern  डेमोक्रेट प्रतिनिधि और 71 non-southern डेमोक्रेट सीनेटरों  — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ) , with the second one  अधिक उदार  and more controversial .
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with diverse groups , from banking and railroads to  उद्योग और खेती , सब of जिससे मांगे  help for economic survival .
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration , for instance , provided $ 500 million for relief operations by states and  शहरों , जबकि the short-lived cwa ( सिविल works प्रशासन  ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34 .
The ``  दूसरी नई सौदे `` in 1935–38 शामिल the वेगनर अधिनियम to प्रचार मजदूर संघ , the works  Progress Administration ( WPA ) relief program ( which made the federal government by far the largest single employer in the nation ) , the Social Security Act , and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers .
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration , both in 1937 , and the Fair  मजदूर मानकों अधिनियम of 1938 , जिससे नियत अधिकतम घंटों और न्यूनतम  wages for most categories of workers .
The economic downturn of 1937–38 , and the bitter split  between the afl और cio मजदूर संघ  led to major Republican gains in Congress in 1938 .
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined in the informal  रूढ़िवादी  Coalition .
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA and CCC and blocked  प्रमुख उदार प्रस्ताव  .
Roosevelt himself turned his attention  to the युद्ध प्रयत्न ,  and won reelection in 1940 and 1944 .
The Supreme Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA ) and the first version of the Agricultural  समायोजन अधिनियम (  AAA ) unconstitutional , however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld .
As the first  रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित बाद fdr ,  Dwight D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the New Deal largely intact , even expanding it in some areas .
In the 1960s , Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the New Deal as inspiration for a dramatic  विस्तार of उदार कार्यक्रम , जिससे  Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained .
After 1974 , however , the call for deregulation of the  अर्थव्यवस्था gained bipartisan support  .
The New Deal regulation of banking (  glass–steagall  Act ) was suspended in the 1990s .
Many New Deal programs remain active , with some still operating under the original names , including the Federal Deposit  बीमे निगम ( fdic ) , the संघीय क्रॉप बीमे निगम ( fcic ) , the संघीय आवास  Administration ( FHA ) , and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ) .
The largest programs still in existence today are the Social Security System and the Securities and Exchange Commission  ( SEC )  .
A woman ( ) , pl :  महिलाओं ( ) is a मादा  human .
The term woman is usually reserved for an adult , with the  पद लड़की होने the usual  term for a female child or adolescent .
However , the term woman is also  sometimes प्रयुक्त to पहचानो a मादा इंसान , regardless  of age , as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights `` .
Women are typically capable of giving birth , though older women who have gone through menopause  और कुछ intersex महिलाओं can  not .
`` I Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a song  performed by अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ  for the 1998 film Armageddon .
Written by Diane Warren , the song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100 ( the first #  1 लिये the बैंड बाद  28 years together ) .
The song stayed at  क्रमांक एक लिये चार सप्ताह इससे  September 5 to September 26 , 1998 .
the सोंग भी  stayed at number 1 for several weeks in several other countries .
in the uk , the सोंग  peaked at number four , becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the UK , where it was the 17th best-selling single of 1998 , and has sold over a million copies .
Although not used by the majority of the world 's countries , daylight  छायांकन समय is आम in  the Western world .
Daylight saving time ( DST )  —also गर्मियाँ समय in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी — is the अभ्यास of advancing  clocks during the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less .
typically  clocks are adjusted forward one hour near the start of spring and are adjusted backward in autumn .
The modern idea of daylight saving was first  प्रस्तावित in 1895 by जार्ज vernon हडसन और it थी पहला implemented  during the First World War .
Many countries have used it  at विभिन्न टाइम्स चूंकि  then .
Much of the United States  प्रयुक्त dst in the 1950s और 1960s , और dst उपयोग विस्तारित following  the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely used in North America and Europe since then .
The practice has been both praised  और criticized  .
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing , sports , and other activities that exploit sunlight after working  घंटों , लकिन can कारण समस्याएं लिये संध्या entertainment  and other occupations tied to the sun .
Although an early goal of DST  थी to reduce संध्या उपयोग of incandescent lighting ( formerly a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत ) , आधुनिक  heating and cooling usage patterns differ greatly , and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory .
DST  क्लॉक शिफ्ट  present other challenges .
They complicate timekeeping , and can disrupt meetings , travel , billing , record keeping , medical  डिवाइस , भारी उपकरण , और नींद  patterns .
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically , but  इस can be सीमित और error-prone  , particularly when DST dates are changed .
floorplan of  the Château de Montargis
Montargis is a commune in the Loiret  विभाग in north-central  France on the Loing river .
The town is located about  दक्षिण of पेरिस और ईस्ट  of Orléans in the Gâtinais .
Montargis is the second largest city in  the loiret  , after Orléans .
It is near a large forest ,  और contains लाइट उद्योग  and farming , including saffron .
Due to its numerous canals and  पुलों , montargis sometimes बिल्स itself  as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais . ''
Though quite modern , it retains a medieval charm in  इसके  downtown area .
In computer storage , a logical unit number , or LUN , is a number used to identify a logical unit , which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocols which encapsulate SCSI  , ऐसे as fibre चैनल or iscsi  .
A LUN may be used with any device which supports read/write operations , such as a tape drive , but is most often  प्रयुक्त to refer to a लॉजिकल डिस्क as निर्मित  on a SAN .
Though not  technically सही , the पद `` lun ''  is often also used to refer to the logical disk itself .
The Gospel According to Mark ( , , to euangelion  kata markon ) , commonly shortened to the इन्जील of चिह्नित  or simply Mark , is the second book of the New Testament .
This canonical account of  the जीवन of यीशु of नासरत is एक of  the three synoptic gospels .
It was thought to be an epitome , which accounts for its  प्लेस as the दूसरी  gospel in the Bible .
However ,  सबसे समकालीन  scholars now regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ) .
That Mark was used as a source for the other  synoptic gospels इन्जील  of Matthew and Gospel of Luke is widely held by many , although not all , New Testament scholars .
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus from his baptism  by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट  to his death and resurrection .
It focuses particularly on the  पिछला सप्ताह of उसके जीवन  ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem .
Its swift narrative portrays  यीशु as a वीर man of  action , an exorcist , healer and miracle worker .
An important theme of Mark is  the मुक्तिदाता रहस्य  .
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals , tries unsuccessfully to  रखना उसके मुक्तिदाता पहचान रहस्य  , and conceals his message with parables .
Meanwhile , the disciples fail to understand both the implication of the miracles of Jesus and the meaning of the  बाते he predicts परिचय उसके गिरफ़्तार , मौत और क़यामत  .
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of Jesus ' empty tomb and that  the following खाता of उसके क़यामत  appearances is a later addition .
According to  परंपरा और कुछ जल्दी गिरिजाघर  writers , the author is Mark the Evangelist , the companion of the apostle Peter .
The gospel , however , appears to rely on several underlying sources , varying in form and in theology ,  जिससे tells विरूद्ध the परंपरा  that the gospel was based on Peter 's preaching .
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as well as known apostolic  preachings  , and pre-existing written records that do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators .
Some of the stories in the gospel may have been transmitted orally  पहले होने लिखा  down .
विभिन्न तत्व  within the gospel suggest that the author wrote in Syria or Palestine for a non-Jewish Christian community .
The Lord of the Rings is an  एपिक ऊँची काल्पनिक अनोखा लिखा  by English philologist and University of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien .
The story began as a  sequel to tolkien  's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit , but eventually developed into a much larger work .
It was written in stages between  1937 और 1949 , much  of it during World War II .
It is the second best-selling novel ever written , with  over 150 लाख  copies sold .
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist , the Dark Lord Sauron , who had in an earlier age created the One Ring to rule the other Rings of  शक्ति as the परम हथियार in उसके अभियान to जीतें और नियम सब  of Middle-earth .
From quiet beginnings in the Shire , a Hobbit land not unlike the English countryside , the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth , following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters , notably the hobbits Frodo Baggins , Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee , Meriadoc  `` मैरी '' brandybuck और peregrin `` pippin '' took , लकिन भी the hobbits ' मुख्य allies और यात्राएं companions : aragorn , a इंसान  Ranger ; Boromir , a man from Gondor ; Gimli , a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas , an Elven prince ; and Gandalf , a Wizard .
The work was initially intended by Tolkien to be one volume of a two-volume set ,  साथ the अन्य होने the silmarillion , लकिन इस विचार थी बर्खास्त by उसके  publisher .
It was decided for economic reasons to publish The Lord of the Rings as  तीन आयतन over the कोर्स of a साल  from 29 July 1954 to 20 October 1955 , thus creating the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy .
The three volumes were entitled The Fellowship of the Ring ,  the दो मीनारें  , and The Return of the King .
Structurally , the novel is divided internally into six books , two per  आवाज़ , साथ अनेक appendices of पृष्ठभूमि  material included at the end of the third volume .
The Lord of the Rings has since been  reprinted numerous टाइम्स और अनूदित  into many languages .
Tolkien 's work has  महरूम the विषय  of extensive analysis of its themes and origins .
Although a major work in itself ,   the story was only the last movement of a larger epic Tolkien had worked on since 1917 , in a process he described as mythopoeia .
प्रभाव on इस पहले कार्य , और on the स्टोरी of the रब of the बजती , शामिल  philology , mythology , religion and the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization , as well as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I .
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on modern fantasy ; the impact of Tolkien  's works is ऐसे कि the उपयोग of the शब्द `` tolkienian '' और  `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary .
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular culture , the founding of many societies by fans of Tolkien 's works , and the publication of many books about  tolkien और उसके works  .
The Lord of the Rings has inspired , and continues to inspire , artwork , music , films and television , video  खेल , और subsequent साहित्य  .
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made  लिये रेडियो ,  theatre , and film .
The following is an  एपीसोड सूची लिये the  Nickelodeon sitcom Drake & Josh .
The series debuted on  जनवरी 11 ,  2004 .
A TV film Merry Christmas , Drake & Josh was  बना अलावा इससे the नियमित श्रेणी  on December 5 , 2008 .
There are a total of 60 episodes  यहूद उत्पादित spanning  four seasons .
Drake Bell , Josh Peck , and Miranda Cosgrove were  the तभी अभिनेताओं to appear in सब  60 episodes .
The San Francisco  49ers conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर at  the team 's headquarters and practice facility in Santa Clara , California in August 2010 .
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the exception of quarterback  एलेक्स स्मिथ , जो is in a ब्लैक जर्सी  ; the defense in white .
In the National Football League , training camp  refers to the समय पहले the ऋतु  commences .
During this time ,  टीमों होगा sometimes congregate  at an outside location , usually a university , to conduct training camp for at least the first few weeks .
This  is समान to बेसबॉल  's spring training .
Training camp is used in  अनेक अलग तरीके  .
New players and coaches  उपयोग it to acclimate themselves  to new teammates and systems .
For younger players , it serves as a period of  मूल्यांकन ; लिये दिग्गजों , it is समय  to round back into form .
Training camp is divided into  अनेक अलग  components .
The first is  scrimmages .
These are pseudo-games  जहाँ टीमों चलाएं nearly पूरा खेल '  worth of plays .
sometimes  , two practice sessions are held on the same day .
This concept is  referred to as two-a-days  .
Other parts of training camp include drills , meetings with coaches and other players at one  's स्थिति , वज़न प्रशिक्षण , और pre-season खेल  .
The  latter हाफ of  training camp leads directly into the exhibition season .
साथ एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण  camps starting in late-July , the biggest concern has been dehydration .
In 2001 , Minnesota  वाइकिंग्स खिलाड़ी korey stringer  died of a medical condition based from dehydration and heatstroke .
The death of Stringer prompted the NFL  to  change their training policies .
At each practice , every team must have the team doctor and  प्रशिक्षकों on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally  , an ambulance must be present during practices .
साथ एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण  camps beginning in late July , severe weather can affect practice and exhibition games .
In 2002 , a Cleveland Browns exhibition  खेल ended due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड भूरा स्टेडियम  , and severe storms have been known to disrupt training camps .
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an early look at the players ; admission to practices is often free or substantially less expensive than a game ticket , making training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend  अनेक खेल due to वित्तीय  or other reasons .
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at camp sites along with offering activities and  कार्यक्रम to मेक प्रशिक्षण शिविर a अधिक  fan-friendly experience .
In computing , a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which  can be प्रयुक्त to स्टोर , retrieve  and update a set of files .
The term could refer to the abstract data structures used to define files , or to the actual software or firmware components that  implement  the abstract ideas .
Some file systems are used on local data storage  डिवाइस ; अन्य provide संचिका  access via a network protocol ( e.g . NFS , SMB , or 9P clients ) .
Some  संचिका प्रणालियों हैं `` आभासी ''  , in that the `` files '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g . procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store .
The file system  manages अभिगम to दोनो the सामग्री  of files and the metadata about those files .
It is responsible for  arranging भंडार स्पेस ; विश्वसनीयता  , efficiency , and tuning with regard to the physical storage medium are important design considerations .
William Howard Taft ( September 15 ,  1857 – कूच 8 , 1930 ) थी the 27th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ) .
He is the only person  to have परोसा  in both of these offices .
Before becoming President , Taft , a Republican , was selected  to serve on the श्रेष्ठ अदालत  of Cincinnati in 1887 .
In 1890 , Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the United States and in 1891 a judge on the  संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of appeals लिये the  Sixth Circuit .
In 1900 , President William  mckinley नियुक्त taft governor-general  of the Philippines .
In 1904 , President Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an effort to groom Taft , then his close political ally , into  उसके handpicked अध्यक्षीय  successor .
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving , assuming on some occasions the role of acting Secretary of State , while declining repeated offers from  रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the  Supreme Court .
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt , Taft won an easy victory in  उसके 1908 बोली लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी .
in उसके तभी पद , taft 's घरेलू कार्यसूची emphasized  trust-busting , civil service reform , strengthening the Interstate Commerce Commission , improving the performance of the postal service , and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment .
Abroad , Taft sought to further the economic development of nations in Latin America and Asia through `` Dollar  कूटनीति `` , और दिखाया decisiveness और  restraint in response to revolution in Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the  राजनैतिक ramifications of उसके निर्णय , प्रायः  alienated his own key constituencies , and was overwhelmingly defeated in his bid for a second term in the presidential election of 1912 .
In surveys of presidential  विद्वानों , taft is प्रायः क्रमित  near the middle of lists of all American Presidents .
After leaving office , Taft spent his time in  academia , मध्यस्थता , और the ढूंढें लिये संसार  peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace .
In 1921 , after the First World War , President Warren G. Harding appointed Taft Chief Justice of the  संयुक्त राज्य  .
Taft served in this capacity until  shortly पहले उसके  death in 1930 .
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus , in which the Hebrew-born Moses , an  अपनाया मिश्र प्रिंस , becomes  the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves .
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role , Yul Brynner  as उसके adoptive bhai , pharaoh rameses ii , ऐनी बैक्सटर as nefretiri  , Edward G. Robinson as Dathan , Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora , Debra Paget as Lilia , and John Derek as Joshua .
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh Seti I , Nina Foch as  bithiah , मार्था स्कॉट as yoshebel ,  Judith Anderson as Memnet , Vincent Price as Baka , and John Carradine as Aaron .
The film was released by Paramount Pictures in  vistavision on अक्तूबर 5  , 1956 .
The Ten Commandments , which DeMille  narrated , थी the पिछला फिल्मी कि  he directed .
He was set to direct the  1958 रीमेक of उसके 1938 फिल्मी  The Buccaneer , but his final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law , actor Anthony Quinn .
DeMille had also planned to  फिल्मी the जीवन of रब baden पावेल , the संस्थापक  of the Scout movement , with David Niven ; this project was never realized .
The Ten  आयतें is a आंशिक रीमेक  of DeMille 's 1923 silent film .
Some of the cast and crew of the 1956 version  worked  on the original .
It has since been remade as a  टेलीविज़न miniseries ब्रॉडकास्ट in अप्रैल  2006 .
The Ten Commandments is one of the most financially  कामयाब films कभी  made , grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office .
Adjusting for inflation , this makes it  the छठे highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically , साथ  an adjusted total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012 .
The  बक्सा दफ्तर जालस्थल  `` The Numbers '' lists the domestic gross at $ 80 million .
In 1999 , The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being `` culturally , historically , or  aesthetically significant  '' .
In June 2008 , the American Film Institute revealed its `` Ten Top Ten ``  —the बेहतरीन टेन films in टेन अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 लोगों  from the creative community .
The Ten Commandments was  सूचीबद्ध as the दसवाँ बेहतरीन फिल्मी  in the epic genre .
The film received seven Academy  पुरस्कार nominations सहित बेहतरीन चित्र  , and won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects .
Charlton Heston was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for  बेहतरीन गति चित्र कर्ता in the नाटक  category .
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review Award for Best Actor for his role as Rameses , along with his other  भूमिकाएँ in the किंग और i और अनास्तासिया  .
Louisville ( , or ) is a major city and the largest city in the U.S. state of Kentucky and the  काउंटी सीट of जेफरसन काउंटी .
Since 2003 , the city 's borders have been with those of the county  क्युकी of a city-county  merger .
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census was 741,096  ( louisville 's संतुलन कुल  , 602,011 , excludes semi-autonomous towns and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ) .
As of 2010 , the Louisville metropolitan area ( MSA ) had a population of 1,307,647  रैंकिंग 42nd nationally  .
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12  surrounding काउंटी , आठ in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी इंडियाना  ( see Geography below ) .
The Louisville Combined  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , having a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,451,564 , शामिल the एमएसए ,  Hardin County and Larue County in Kentucky , and Scott County , Indiana .
An important internal  शिपिंग बंदरगाहों in the 19th सदी , louisville आज  is best known as the location of the Kentucky Derby , the first of three annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown .
A typical  प्रायोगिक सेटअप  for an aldol reaction .
Both  flasks हैं submerged  in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the temperature of which is being monitored by a thermocouple ( the wire on the left ) .
A cooling bath , in laboratory chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry )  अभ्यास , is a द्रव मिश्रण जिससे is प्रयुक्त to maintain  low temperatures , typically between 13 °C and −196 °C .
These low temperatures are used to collect liquids after  आसवन , to हटाएँ सॉल्वैंट्स using a रोटरी evaporator , or to perform a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया  below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ) .
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen , water , or even air ) — but most commonly the term refers to (  b ) a मिश्रण of 3 components : ( 1 ) a कूलिंग एजेंट ( ऐसे as शुष्क बर्फ or जल बर्फ ) ; ( b ) a द्रव 'कैरीr ' ( ऐसे as द्रव जल , एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल , एसीटोन , इत्यादि . ) , जिससे  transfers heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system .
( A familiar example of this is the use of  an ice/rock-salt मिश्रण to फ्रीज  ice cream .
The phase-change of ice  into द्रव जल requires  energy , 'pulling ' heat from the system .
Adding salt lowers the temp at  जिससे इस happens , अर्थ अधिक उर्जा रै  to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice .
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull ' more heat from its  पर्यावरण to become द्रव  . )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or  excessive खाना सेवन to the detriment of an व्यक्तिगत 's शारीरिक  and mental health .
Bulimia nervosa and  एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा हैं  the most common specific forms in the United Kingdom .
Other types of eating disorders include binge eating disorder and eating disorder  नहीं वरना निर्दिष्ट  .
Bulimia nervosa is a disorder characterized by  binge  eating and purging .
Purging can include self-induce vomiting , over-exercising , and  the उपयोग of diuretics , enemas ,  and laxatives .
Anorexia nervosa is  characterized by चरम  food restriction to the point of self-starvation and excessive weight loss .
Though primarily thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10  लाख होने प्रभावित in the  U.K. ) , eating disorders affect males as well .
An  अनुमानित 10 – 15 % of लोगों साथ  eating disorders are males ( Gorgan , 1999 ) .
( an estimated 1  लाख u.K. males  being affected ) .
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both  मेन और महिलाओं , वहीँ is प्रमाण to सुझाएँ कि it  is women in the Western world who are at the highest risk of developing them and the degree of westernization increases the risk .
Nearly half of all Americans personally know  किसी साथ an खाने विकार  .
The skill to  comprehend the सेंट्रल प्रक्रियाओं of भूख रै increased  tremendously since leptin was discovered , and the skill to observe the functions of the brain as well .
Interactions between motivational , homeostatic and  self-regulatory कंट्रोल प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल in खाने आचरण  , which is a key component in eating disorders .
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely  समझा , लकिन वहीँ is प्रमाण कि it may be linked  to other medical conditions and situations .
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating  विकार affecting  diverse populations .
One study showed that girls with ADHD have a greater chance of getting an eating disorder  than those नहीं प्रभावित by  ADHD .
Another study suggested that women with PTSD , especially due to  sexually सम्बन्धित आघात  , are more likely to develop anorexia nervosa .
One study showed that foster girls are  अधिक संभावित to develop  bulimia nervosa .
Some think that peer pressure and idealized body-types seen in the  मीडिया हैं भी  a significant factor .
Some research show  कि लिये निश्चित लोगों वहीँ हैं जेनेटिक  reasons why they may be prone to developing an eating disorder .
Recent studies have found  प्रमाण a सहसंबंध between  patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders .
In addition , anxiety disorders and personality disorders are  आम आवृत्ति साथ क्लाइंट  of eating disorders .
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific types of eating disorders , the consequences of eating disorders can be  कठोर , सहित मौत ( whether इससे सीधा चिकित्सा प्रभाव of अशांत खाने आदतें or इससे comorbid शर्तें ऐसे  as suicidal thinking ) .
गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य existed इससे the जल्दी सालो  of the colonial period ; it was firmly established by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776 .
However , by 1804 , all states north of the  मेसन और डिक्सन लकीर था either abolished गुलामी  outright or passed laws for the gradual abolition of slavery .
In 1787 Congress  निषिद्ध  slavery in the Northwest Territory .
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton  उद्योग बाद 1800 , और विस्तारित into  the Southwest .
The nation was polarized into slave and free states along the  mason-dixon लकीर , जिससे अलग पेन्सिलवेनिया और मेरीलैंड  .
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्लेव व्यापार in 1808 , लकिन the घरेलू व्यापार , साथ बिक्री to the गहन दक्षिण , विस्तारित dramatically  , and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade .
Before the 1840s , the South was  vigorously defending गुलामी और इसके विस्तार  into the territories .
In the North some  abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार , और numerous anti-slavery  forces rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free men .
After failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's election , in 1861 eleven slave states broke away to  रूप the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका , अग्रणी to  the American Civil War .
The federal government in 1862  बना abolition  of slavery a war goal .
In January 1863 President Lincoln freed slaves in the  confederacy through the emancipation  Proclamation .
After the war , the Thirteenth Amendment , effective December 1865 , abolished slavery throughout the entire United States ,  सहित the किनारा राज्य और the भारतीय territories  .
From the 16th to the 19th centuries , an estimated 12 million Africans  यहूद shipped  as slaves to the Americas .
See Slavery in the  americas  .
The great majority went to the sugar plantations of the West Indies or  ब्राज़ील , जहाँ मृत्यु थी  high .
About 645,000  यहूद brought to कया is अभी  the United States .
By the 1860  संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी  , the slave population in the American South had grown to four million .
Of all 1,515,605 families  in the 15 स्लेव राज्य , nearly 400,000  held slaves ( roughly one in four ) , amounting to 8 % of all American families .
While some slaves worked as house servants and urban artisans , the great majority worked on plantations or large farms , cultivating lucrative cash crops , such as rice  , तम्बाकू , शुगर और , बाद 1800 ,  chiefly cotton .
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South ,  जहाँ वे परोसा in work-gangs ; two-thirds  worked in cotton .
In small  परिचालन , वे  worked with their owners .
In large  बागानों वे यहूद निर्देशित  by white paid overseers .
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership  of a इंसान होने , और of his/her वंशजों ) , a जातिगत तत्व थी आधारभूत : स्लेव  were blacks of African descent and owned , almost universally , by whites of European descent .
In the 17th century , Virginia , followed by other southern colonies , enacted law  कि children of स्लेव माताओं यहूद  born into slavery .
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( which was difficult and illegal  to do ) , or by manumission by स्वामी , जिससे थी regulated by राज्य , और  became increasingly difficult or prohibited .
In the earliest era of chattel slavery , the colonies also organized work by a system of  बंधुआ मजदूर ज्ञात as  indentured servitude .
This typically lasted for several years for both poor Europeans and Africans  alike , to अदा बंद the  costs of transport to the colonies .
They contracted for such arrangements because  of ग़रीब economies in उनके घर  countries .
Between 1680 and 1700 , as fewer Europeans  migrated to the colonies  , planters began to import more Africans as slaves .
Recognizing the importance of slavery , the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it combined a variety of  विधान  and added new provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law .
Schematic cross section of part of leaf , xylem  दिखाया as रेड वृत्त at फिगर  8 .
Xylem is one of the two types of transport  ऊतक in vascular पौधे (  phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek  शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ) , अर्थ  `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its basic function is to transport water , but it also transports  some  nutrients through the plant .
This clock representation shows some of  the प्रमुख इकाई  of geological time and definitive events of Earth history .
The Hadean eon represents the time  पहले चट्टान रिकार्ड of जीवन on धरती ; इसके अपर boundary is अभी  regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ) .
Other subdivisions reflect the evolution of life ; the Archean and Proterozoic are both eons ,  the palaeozoic , mesozoic  and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon .
The two million year Quaternary period , the time of recognizable  इंसानो , is too छोटी  to be visible at this scale .
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time , and is used by  geologists , paleontologists  , and other earth scientists to describe the timing and relationships between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history .
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with the dates and nomenclature set forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color  कोड of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आयोग on स्तरिकी  .
Evidence from radiometric dating indicates  कि the धरती  is about 4.54 billion years old .
The geology or deep time of Earth 's past has been  व्यवस्थित into विभिन्न  units according to events which took place in each period .
Different spans of time on  the gts हैं प्रायः सीमांकित by परिवर्तन in the संयोजन of strata जिससे correspond to उन्हें , indicating  major geological or paleontological events , such as mass extinctions .
For example , the boundary between the  cretaceous काल और the paleogene काल  is defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event , which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life .
Older time spans which predate the reliable  चट्टान रिकार्ड ( पहले the proterozoic  Eon ) are defined by absolute age .
The TI-82 is a  graphing परिपथ बना by टेक्सास यंत्र  .
The TI-82 was  designed in 1993 as a stripped bas ,  more user friendly version of the TI-85 , and as a replacement for the TI-81 .
It  थी the सीधा पूर्ववर्ती  of the TI-83 .
It  साझा साथ  the TI-85 a 6 MHz Zilog Z80 microprocessor .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel display , and the core feature set of the TI-81  साथ अनेक नई  features .
The cast of  वर्ण of the  King of Fighters XI .
The King of Fighters fighting  खेल श्रेणी , उत्पादित by snk playmore , शामिल a चौड़ी  cast of characters , some of which are taken from other SNK games .
The  स्टोरी takes प्लेस in a fictional  universe in which an annual series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held .
The first game in the series introduces the initial main character of the series , Kyo  kusanagi , a यंग जापानी सेनानी जो is  the heir to a powerful group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities .
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi clan 's enemies , his rival Iori  yagami , और the परमेश्वर orochi और इसके इंसान अनुसरणकर्ता  , among others .
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights , while The King of Fighters '99  introduces a नई स्टोरी चाप , घूमती around k ' , a  young man who seeks to destroy the mysterious NESTS organization because they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of his past memories , so that they could force him to be a fighter under their control .
In The King of Fighters 2003 , a new character named Ash Crimson enters the tournament , to steal the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi  in the पास्ट लिये an अनजान  reason .
A new group of antagonists , known as Those From the Past , also appears in the series ; they want  to  obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to their unknown master .
the प्लाट और the  characters came from the Yamata no Orochi legend .
There are also several characters in the games that are parodies or homages to several popular  दुश्मनी , manga , और films  .
Merchandise based on the characters has also been  released , सहित  action figures and keychains .
The characters have garnered praise  इससे अनेक वीडियो खेल publications लिये the विशेषता of उनके  designs and movesets .
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in some of the characters , but  added कि the रोस्टर is greatly  diverse .
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style  वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on नवम्बर 7 , 2008  on the Animal Planet cable channel .
The program follows Paul Watson , founder of the Sea  गड़रिये संरक्षण समाज , as he और the क्रू  aboard their various vessels harass Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica .
On January 5 , 2013 , Animal Planet renewed the series  लिये a छठे ऋतु  .
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia  harpyja ) is a neotropical  species of eagle .
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan Eagle which is sometimes known as the New Guinea  harpy त्रिभुज or पापुआई harpy त्रिभुज  .
It is the largest and most powerful raptor found in the Americas , and among  the largest extant प्रजाति  of eagles in the world .
It  प्रायः inhabits तीव्र lowland  rainforests in the upper ( emergent ) canopy layer .
Destruction of its natural habitat has seen it vanish from many parts of its former  दायरा , और it is nearly  extirpated in Central America .
biological वर्गीकरण  , or scientific classification in biology , is a method of scientific taxonomy used to group and categorize organisms into groups such as genus or species .
These groups are  ज्ञात as taxa (  singular : taxon ) .
आधुनिक biological  classification has its root in the work of Carolus Linnaeus , who grouped species according to shared physical characteristics .
These groupings  have चूंकि महरूम संशोधित to improve  consistency with the Darwinian principle of common descent .
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the late 20th century ,  phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों हैं grouped आधारित purely on  inferred evolutionary relatedness , ignoring morphological similarity , has become common in some areas of biology .
Molecular phylogenetics , which uses DNA sequences as data , has also driven many recent revisions and is likely to  continue  doing so .
Biological  वर्गीकरण  belongs to the science of biological systematics .
लेनन 's  signature
John Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician ,  सिंगर और songwriter जो रोज़ to विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as a संस्थापक सदस्य of the बीटल्स , एक  of the most commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music .
With Paul McCartney , he formed one of the most  मनाये songwriting partnerships  of the 20th century .
Born and raised in Liverpool , as a teenager Lennon became involved in the  skiffle craze ; उसके पहला बैंड , the quarrymen , विकसित  into the Beatles in 1960 .
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade , Lennon embarked on a solo career that  उत्पादित the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic ओनो  Band and Imagine , and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` Imagine `` .
After his  विवाह to  Yoko Ono in 1969 , he changed his name to John Ono Lennon .
लेनन disengaged खुद इससे the म्यूज़िक  business in 1975 to devote time to raising his infant son Sean , but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy .
He was murdered three  सप्ताह बाद  its release .
Lennon  नाज़िल a rebellious प्रकृति और acerbic  wit in his music , writing , drawings , on film and in interviews .
Controversial through his political and peace activism , he moved to New York City in 1971 ,  जहाँ उसके आलोचना of the  Vietnam War resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's administration to deport him , while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement .
As of 2012 , Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 million units , and as writer ,  co-writer or यजमान , he is जिम्मेदार  for 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart .
In 2002  , a बीबीसी पोल on the 100 महानतम britons voted उसे आठवीं , और in 2008 , रोलिंग स्टोन क्रमित उसे the fifth-greatest सिंगर of सब समय .
He was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters  हॉल of कीर्ति in 1987 और into the चट्टान और  Roll Hall of Fame in 1994 .
Statue of Rip van Winkle in Irvington , New York ,  नहीं दूर इससे `` sunnyside  `` , the home of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short story by American author Washington Irving  प्रकाशित in  1819 , as well as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist .
Written while Irving was living in  बर्मिंघम , इंग्लैण्ड  , it was part of a collection entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon .
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill Mountains ,  इरविंग बाद  admitted , `` When I wrote the story , I had never been on the Catskills . ''

The page however does include other non-performance related Grammys ( known as the Craft & Production Fields )  कि may have महरूम प्रस्तुत to  the artist ( s ) .
Pee-wee Herman  is a कॉमिक fictional  character created and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens .
He is best known for his two television series  और फिल्मी श्रेणी  during the 1980s .
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a stage act that  जल्दी led to an एचबीओ खास in 1981  .
As the stage performance gained further popularity , Reubens took the character to motion  चित्र साथ pee-wee  's Big Adventure in 1985 , toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children .
This paved the way for Pee-wee 's Playhouse , an Emmy Award  जीतना children 's श्रेणी कि भागा on  CBS from 1986-1991 .
Another film , Big Top  pee-wee , थी released  in 1988 .
Due to negative media attention following a scandal  in 1991 , reubens decided  to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s , and then gradually resurrected it during the following decade .
It was at that time  कि reubens addressed  plans to write a new Pee-wee film , Pee-wee 's Playhouse : The Movie .
In June 2007 , Reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first time since 1991  at स्पाइक tv 's यारों ' चुनाव पुरस्कार .
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of teenage friends living in the fictional suburban town of Point Place , Wisconsin , from May 17  ,  1976 , to December 31 , 1979 .
It debuted on the Fox television network , first  airing on अगस्त 23 , 1998 , कार्यशील लिये आठ  consecutive seasons , and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast members were Topher Grace , Mila  kunis , एश्टन  Kutcher , Danny Masterson , Laura Prepon , and Wilmer Valderrama .
The main adult cast members were Debra Jo  rupp , kurtwood स्मिथ , डॉन स्टार्क और ,  during the first three seasons , Tanya Roberts .
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state located in  the midwestern संयुक्त राज्य  .
It is named after the Kansas River which flows through it , which in turn was named after the  कंस देशी अमरीकी जनजाति , जिससे  inhabited the area .
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to  औसत `` लोगों of the  wind '' or `` people of the south wind , '' although this was probably not the term 's original meaning .
Residents of Kansas are called ``  kansans .  ''
For thousands of years what is now Kansas was home  to numerous और  diverse Native American tribes .
Tribes in the Eastern part of the state generally lived in villages  साथ the नदी घाटियों .
Tribes in the Western part of the state were semi-  nomadic और hunted विशाल herds of बाइसन  .
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s , but the pace of settlement accelerated  in the 1850s , in the midst of राजनैतिक  wars over the slavery issue .
When officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854 ,  abolitionist free-staters इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड और pro-slavery settlers  from neighboring Missouri rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state .
Thus , the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in its  जल्दी दिनों as ये शक्तियां collided , और थी  known as Bleeding Kansas .
The abolitionists  आखिरकार prevailed और on जनवरी 29 , 1861  , Kansas entered the Union as a free state .
After the Civil War , the population of Kansas grew rapidly , when waves  of आप्रवासियों turned the प्रेयरी  into farmland .
Today , Kansas is one of the most productive  agricultural राज्य  , producing high yields of wheat , sorghum and sunflowers .
Kansas is the 15th  सबसे extensive  and the 33rd most populous of the 50 United States .
Psychology is an academic and  लागू अनुशासन कि involves the वैज्ञानिक  study of mental functions and behaviors .
Psychology has the immediate goal of understanding individuals and groups by both establishing general  सिद्धान्त और researching विशिष्ट मामले  , and by many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society .
In this field , a professional or researcher is called a psychologist and can be classified as a social , behavioral , or  संज्ञानात्मक वैज्ञानिक  .
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental  कृत्यों in व्यक्तिगत और सोशल बर्ताव , जबकि भी exploring  the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors .
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception , cognition , attention , emotion , phenomenology , motivation , brain  कामकाज , व्यक्तित्व , बर्ताव , और interpersonal  relationships .
Psychologists of diverse  धारियाँ भी consider  the unconscious mind .
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer causal and  correlational संबंध  between psychosocial variables .
In addition , or in opposition , to employing  अनुभवजन्य और निगमनात्मक विधि  , some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at times rely upon symbolic interpretation and other inductive techniques .
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '' , with psychological findings linking to research and perspectives from the social  sciences , प्राकृतिक  sciences , medicine , and the humanities , such as philosophy .
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment and treatment of mental  स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं , it is भी निर्देशित towards समझना और solving समस्याएं in अनेक अलग  spheres of human activity .
The majority of psychologists are involved in  कुछ दयालु of therapeutic भूमिका  , practicing in clinical , counseling , or school settings .
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior  , और typically कार्य in विश्वविद्यालयों मनोविज्ञान विभाग  or teach in other academic settings ( e.g. , medical schools , hospitals ) .
Some are employed in industrial and organizational  जमावट , or in अन्य क्षेत्रों ऐसे as इंसान विकास और वृद्धावस्था , खेल  , health , and the media , as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law .
Thomas  जेफरसन ( अप्रैल 13 , 1743 ( अप्रैल  2 , 1743 O.S. ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was an American Founding Father , the principal author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ) .
At the  शुरूआत of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति  , he served in the Continental Congress , representing Virginia and then served as a wartime Governor of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ) .
बस बाद the युद्ध ended ,  from mid-1784 Jefferson served as a diplomat , stationed in Paris .
In May 1785 , he became the United States Minister to  फ़्रांस .
जेफरसन थी  the first United States Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President George Washington .
With his close friend James Madison he organized the Democratic-Republican Party , and  subsequently resigned इससे  Washington 's cabinet .
Elected Vice President in 1796 , when he came in second to John Adams of the Federalists ,  जेफरसन opposed एडम्स और साथ मैडिसन secretly लिखा the केंटकी और वर्जिनिया  Resolutions , which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts .
Elected president in what Jefferson called the  क्रान्ति of 1800 , he oversaw the खरीदें of the विशाल louisiana  Territory from France ( 1803 ) , and sent the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west .
उसके दूसरी पद थी घिरा साथ परेशानियों  at home , such as the failed treason trial of his former Vice President Aaron Burr .
With escalating trouble with Britain who was challenging American neutrality and threatening shipping at sea , he tried economic warfare  साथ उसके embargo कानून जिससे तभी क्षतिग्रस्त अमरीकी व्यापार .
In 1803 , President Jefferson initiated a  प्रक्रम of भारतीय जनजातीय हटाना  and relocation to the Louisiana Territory west of the Mississippi River , in order to open lands for eventual American settlers .
A leader in the Enlightenment , Jefferson was a polymath  जो spoke पाँच भाषाएं धड़ल्ले और थी deeply दिलचस्पी in विज्ञान , आविष्कार  , architecture , religion and philosophy , interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency .
He designed his own large mansion on a 5,000  एकड़ वृक्षारोपण निकट charlottesville , वर्जिनिया  , which he named Monticello .
While not a  notable orator , जेफरसन थी a skilled लेखक और corresponded  with many influential people in America and Europe throughout his adult life .
Though Jefferson owned many slaves , he opposed the institution all his life and consequently treated and took care of them very well and  अपेक्षित उन्हें to कार्य no अधिक than फ़्री  farmers .
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over the controversy of whether  जेफरसन थी the पिता of एक or अधिक children belonging to सैली hemings  , a slave at Monticello . ''
Historians are also in disagreement with how much  जेफरसन थी वचनबद्ध to  the anti-slavery cause .
In 1807 , President  जेफरसन हस्ताक्षरित  into law a bill that banned the importation of slaves into the United States .
After Martha Jefferson , his wife of eleven years , died in 1782 , Jefferson remained a widower for the  बाकी of उसके जीवन ; उनके विवाह  produced six children , of whom two survived to adulthood .
Though Jefferson has been criticized by many modern day scholars over the  समस्या of गुलामी  , he remains rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents .
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by Steven Van Zandt , produced by Van Zandt and Arthur Baker and recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid to  convey विपक्ष to the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी नीति  of apartheid .
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun City , a resort which was located in Bantustan of Bophuthatswana , one of a number of internationally  अपरिचित supposed `` स्वतंत्र '' राज्य निर्मित by the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी सरकारी to forcibly relocate इसके ब्लैक  population .

This is a list of NBA players with most  championships जीती as a खिलाड़ी  .
The National Basketball  संघ ( एनबीए ) is a प्रमुख पेशेवर  basketball league in North America .
It was founded in 1946 as  the बास्केट  Association of America ( BAA ) .
The league  अपनाया इसके वर्तमान नाम at the प्रारंभ of the जब it  merged with the National Basketball League ( NBL ) .
The NBA Finals is  the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी  for the NBA and the conclusion of the sport 's postseason .
The winning team of the  श्रेणी receives the  Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy .
Players  इससे the जीतना टोली प्रायः  receive championship rings from the team honoring their contribution .
However , in some rare occasion , the  टीमों opted to दिया अन्य commemorative  items , such as wrist watches , instead of rings .
The number of championships won by NBA  सुपरस्टार is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a  measurement of their greatness .
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the record for the most NBA  championships जीती साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान उसके 13-year playing करियर  .
He won his first championship with the  बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स in उसके रुकी साल  .
Afterwards , he went on to win 10 championships in the next 12 years , including eight  लगातार championships इससे  1959 to 1966 .
he जीती the  last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach .
Russell 's teammate , Sam Jones , won 10 championships  इससे 1959 to 1969  , the second most in NBA history .
Four Celtics players , Tom Heinsohn , K. C. Jones , Satch Sanders and  जॉन havlicek , जीती  eight championships each .
दो अन्य सेल्टिक्स  , Jim Loscutoff and Frank Ramsey , won seven championships each .
Four  खिलाड़ी , bob cousy , kareem abdul-jabbar  , Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen , won six championships each .
Jordan and Pippen are members of the Chicago Bulls team who won three consecutive  championships twice in the  1990s .
Robert Horry and John Salley are the only players to have won the  championships साथ तीन अलग टीमों  .
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets , the Los Angeles  लेकर्स और the सैन अंतोनियो स्पर्स , जबकि salley जीती चार championships  with the Detroit Pistons , the Bulls and the Lakers .
Frank Saul and Steve Kerr are the only  खिलाड़ी to जीत दो championships साथ दो अलग  teams in consecutive seasons .
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s , while Kerr won  लगातार championships साथ the bulls और  the Spurs in the 1990s,
सटीकता indicates निकटता of मापन  results to the true value , precision to the repeatability , or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science , engineering , industry , and statistics , the accuracy of a measurement system is the degree of closeness  of माप of a मात्रा to कि मात्रा 's वास्तविक  ( true ) value .
The precision of a  मापन प्रणाली , भी पुकारा reproducibility or repeatability  , is the degree to which repeated measurements under unchanged conditions show the same results .
Although the two words reproducibility and  repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial  use , they are deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific method .
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise , precise but  नहीं सटीक , neither  , or both .
For example , if an experiment contains a systematic error , then increasing the sample size generally increases precision but does not improve  सटीकता .
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate  स्ट्रिंग of परिणाम इससे the  flawed experiment .
Eliminating the systematic error improves  सटीकता लकिन करता नहीं  change precision .
A measurement system is  designated मान्य  if it is both accurate and precise .
Related terms include  पूर्वाग्रह ( non- यादृच्छिक or निर्देशित प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर  or factors unrelated to the independent variable ) and error ( random variability ) .
The terminology is also applied to indirect  measurements—that is , मान प्राप्त by a कम्प्यूटेशनल  procedure from observed data .
In addition to accuracy  और परिशुद्धता , माप may भी have a मापन  resolution , which is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement .
In the case of full reproducibility , such as when rounding a number to a  representable फ्लोटिंग पाइंट क्रमांक  , the word precision has a meaning not related to reproducibility .
For example , in the IEEE 754-2008 standard it means the number of bits in the significand , so it  is प्रयुक्त as a माप लिये the सापेक्ष सटीकता साथ जिससे  an arbitrary number can be represented .
Fuck in its literal meaning refers to  the अधिनियम of यौन  intercourse .
It is an English word that is often used as a profanity ,  either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier  .
the उत्पत्ति  of the word is obscure .
It is usually considered to be first attested to  around 1475 , लकिन it may be  considerably older .
In modern usage , fuck  और इसके डेरिवेटिव ( ऐसे as कमीने  and fucking ) can be used in the position of a noun , a verb , an adjective or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the  शब्द , as खूब as a क्रमांक  of compounds incorporating it , such as motherfucker .
Animated , color-coded map showing the various continents and  regions .
Depending on the convention and model , some continents may be consolidated or subdivided : for example , Eurasia is most often subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red shades ) , while North and South America  हैं sometimes पहचाना as एक अमरीकी महाद्वीप  ( green shades ) .
A continent is one  of अनेक  very large landmasses on Earth .
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria , with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia , Africa , North America , South America , Antarctica , Europe , and  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
In geology  , महाद्वीपों  are described by means of tectonic plates .
Plate  विवर्तनिकी is the प्रक्रम और पढ़ाई of the  movement , collision and division of continents , earlier known as continental drift .
Biker Boyz is a 2003  फिल्मी परिचय a समूह of भूमिगत  motorcycle drag racers .
It stars Laurence Fishburne , Djimon Hounsou , Derek  ल्यूक , meagan शुभ , और larenz  Tate and is written and directed by Reggie Rock Bythewood .

Community property is a marital property regime that  originated in सिविल विधि jurisdictions और is अभी भी मिला  in some common law jurisdictions .
The states of the United States that recognize community property  हैं primarily in the वेस्ट ; it थी  inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system , which itself was inherited from Spanish law ( a Roman -derived civil law system ) and ultimately from the Visigoths .
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial community system of acquests and gains , which replaced the traditional  फ्रेंच जातियाँ  of movables and acquests in its civil law system .
Map of the United States with  जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी  states highlighted in red .
In addition to the highlighted states , Alaska is a separate property state  कि permits युगल to ऑप्ट into  a community property arrangement .
in a जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी क्षेत्राधिकार , सबसे प्रॉपर्टी  acquired during the marriage ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the community , or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce , annulment or death .
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence of specific evidence that would  पाइंट to a contrary निष्कर्ष लिये a particular टुकड़ा of प्रॉपर्टी  .
Division of community property may take place by item , by  splitting सब वस्तुएं or by मान .
In some jurisdictions , such as California , a 50/50 division of community property is strictly mandated by statute , meaning that the focus then shifts to whether  particular वस्तुएं हैं to be वर्गीकृत as  community or separate property .
In other jurisdictions , such as Texas , a divorce court may decree an `` equitable distribution `` of  जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी , जिससे may परिणाम in an गैरबराबरी  division of such .
In  non-community प्रॉपर्टी  states property may be divided by equitable distribution .
Generally speaking , the property that each partner brings into the marriage or receives by gift , bequest or devise during  विवाह is पुकारा पृथक प्रॉपर्टी (  i.e. , not community property ) .
See  प्रभाग  of property .
प्रभाग  of community debts may not be the same as division of community property .
For example , in California , community property is required to be divided `` equally ''  जबकि जातियाँ कर्ज़ is जरूरी  to be divided `` equitably '' .
Property that is owned by one spouse  पहले the  marriage is the separate property of that spouse , unless the property is `` transmuted '' into community property .
The  नियम लिये इस vary इससे क्षेत्राधिकार  to jurisdiction .
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to  the भीड at the मॉल shortly बाद  the wedding .
The wedding of Prince William , Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज , और कैथरीन मिडलटन took प्लेस on 29 अप्रैल 2011  at Westminster Abbey in London .
The groom , Prince William , Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज , is the ज्येष्ठ बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स  , and is second in the line of succession to the British Throne and the thrones of fifteen other Commonwealth realms .
The bride , Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the eldest of three children of Michael and Carole Middleton of  bucklebury , बर्कशायर  .
The Dean of Westminster , John Hall , presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury , Rowan Williams , conducted the marriage ; Richard Chartres ,  the बिशप of लंदन , preached the उपदेश ; और a पढना  was given by the bride 's brother , James .
विलियम 's बेहतरीन man थी उसके  brother , Prince Harry , while the bride 's sister , Pippa , was maid of honour .
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's and groom 's families , as well as many foreign royals , diplomats ,  और the युगल 's चुनी  personal guests .
After the ceremony , the couple made the  परंपरागत रूप on the  balcony of Buckingham Palace .
As Prince William was not the heir apparent to the throne , the wedding was not a full state occasion and many details were left to the  युगल to decide , ऐसे as much of the अतिथि सूची of परिचय 1,900  .
Prince William and  केट मिडलटन  met in 2001 .
Their  सगाई on 20 अक्तूबर 2010  was announced on 16 November 2010 .
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much media attention , being compared in many ways with the 1981 marriage of  विलियम 's  parents .
The occasion was a public holiday in the United Kingdom and featured many ceremonial  पहलुओं , सहित उपयोग of the राज्य carriages  and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry .
Events were held around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; organisations and hotels held events across Canada , over 5,000 street parties were held throughout the United Kingdom , and one million people lined the route  between वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी और बकिंघम  Palace .
The ceremony was viewed live by tens of millions more around the world , including  72 लाख on the youtube royal चैनल  .
In the United Kingdom , television audiences peaked at 26.3  लाख दर्शक , साथ a कुल of 36.7 लाख  watching part of the coverage .
