A hand ( med . / lat . : manus , pl . manūs ) is a prehensile , multi- fingered extremity located at the end of an arm  or forelimb of primates और इंसानो , chimpanzees , बंदरों ,  and lemurs .
A few other  vertebrates ऐसे as the कोआला ( जिससे रै दो opposable thumbs  on each `` hand '' and fingerprints remarkably similar to human fingerprints ) are often described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs .
Hands are the main structures for physically manipulating  the पर्यावरण , प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो सकल मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे as grasping a विशाल ऑब्जेक्ट ) और ठीक मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे  as picking up a small pebble ) .
The fingertips contain some of the densest areas of nerve endings on the  देह , हैं the richest सोर्स of tactile प्रतिक्रिया  , and have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands .
Like other paired organs ( eyes , feet , legs ) , each hand is dominantly controlled by the  opposing दिमाग गोलार्ध , so कि handedness , or the पसन्दीदा हाथ चुनाव  for single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil , reflects individual brain functioning .
Some evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for example , in the context of whether the three digits of the bird hand  शामिल the वही समजात घाटा of दो अंक as in the डायनासोर हाथ  .
The human hand has 27 bones , not including the  sesamoid हड्डियों जिससे क्रमांक  varies between people .
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal , intermediate and distal ) of the  उंगलियाँ .
The metacarpals are the bones  कि connects the  fingers and the wrist .
Each  इंसान हाथ रै 5  metacarpals and 8 carpal bones .
too कूल थी a पेशेवर कुश्ती टैग टोली  and former faction most notably active in World Wrestling Federation/Entertainment between 1998 and 2001 and for a short time in 2004 .
Basic  डिजिटल सचेतक क्लॉक  without a radio .
The mark in the top-left of the display  indicates कि the  time is 4:00pm , not 4:00am .
A 1969 radio alarm clock ( Sony Digimatic 8FC-59W )  साथ an जल्दी mechanical-digital  display .
A digital clock is a type of clock that displays the time digitally , i.e . in numerals or other symbols , as opposed to an  एनालॉग क्लॉक , जहाँ the समय is indicated by  the positions of rotating hands .
Digital clocks  हैं प्रायः संबद्ध साथ इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ड्राइव , लकिन the  `` digital '' description refers only to the display , not to the drive mechanism .
( Both analog and digital clocks  can be चलित either mechanically  or electronically , but `` clockwork '' mechanisms with digital displays are rare . )
The biggest digital clock is  the lichtzeitpegel ( `` लाइट समय स्तर  '' ) on the television tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf , Germany .
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter Griffin , Stewie  griffin , ब्रायन griffin , और ग्लेन कीचड़  .
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom  कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं ,  and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex Borstein , Seth Green , Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and  माइक हेनरी और अभी  , the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West , John G. Brennan , Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly , and  repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल फिलिस  Diller , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast members provide voices  लिये अनेक वर्ण  .
The voice actors , in  portraying the  various character personalities on the show , draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one actor ,  बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ बाएँ the  series or had conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and  an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production , though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series .
The five sets of the board  खेल एकाधिकार चित्रित यहाँ दिखाएँ the एवोल्यूशन of the  game 's artwork and designs in the United States from 1935–2005 .
The history of the  फलक खेल एकाधिकार can be traced  back to the early 20th century .
The earliest known design was by the American ,  एलिज़ाबेथ magie , patented in  1904 but existing as early as 1902 .
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle , namely the Georgist concept of a  सिंगल जमीन मान  tax .
A series of board games were developed from 1906 through the 1930s that involved the buying and  selling of जमीन और the विकास  of that land .
By 1934 , a board game had been created much like the version of Monopoly sold by Parker Brothers and its related companies through  the बाकी of the 20th सदी  , and into the 21st .
Several  लोगों , ज़्यादातर in the midwestern संयुक्त राज्य और निकट  the East Coast , contributed to the game 's design and evolution .
By the 1970s , the idea that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ; it was printed in  the खेल 's निर्देश लिये अनेक सालो , in a 1974 किताब devoted to एकाधिकार  , and was cited in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007 .
Even a guide to family games published for Reader 's Digest in  2003 तभी दिया क्रेडिट to darrow और एलिज़ाबेथ magie , erroneously  stating that Magie 's original game was created in the 1800s , and not acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game , and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers .
Also in the 1970s , Professor Ralph Anspach , who had himself published a board game intended to illustrate the principles  of दोनो monopolies और विश्वास busting , लड़ा पार्कर भाइयो  and its then parent company , General Mills , over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game .
through the शोध of anspach  and others , much of the early history of the game was `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady , author of the 1974 book The Monopoly Book : Strategy and Tactics of the World 's Most Popular Game over the actual history of the  खेल on  Barry Farber 's New York City talk show in 1975 .
Because of the lengthy court process , including appeals , the legal status of Parker  भाइयो ' trademarks on  the game was not settled until 1985 .
The game 's  नाम remains a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of पार्कर  Brothers , as do its specific design elements .
At the conclusion of the court case , the game 's logo and graphic design elements became part of a larger  एकाधिकार ब्रांड , licensed by पार्कर भाइयो ' जनक कंपनियाँ  onto a variety of items through the present day .
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's early history in the 1970s and 1980s , and several books and journal articles on the subject , Hasbro ( Parker Brothers ' current parent  कम्पनी ) किया नहीं acknowledge कोई of the खेल 's इतिहास  before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012 .
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone other than Darrow in materials  प्रकाशित or प्रायोजित by उन्हें  , at least as recently as 2006 .
International tournaments , first held in the early 1970s ,  continue to the उपस्थित , साथ the अगला संसार  championship likely scheduled for 2013 .
starting in 1985 , a नई पीढी of spin-off  board games and card games appeared on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean .
In 1989 , the  पहला of अनेक वीडियो खेल  and computer game editions was published .
Since 1994 , many official variants of the game , based on locations other than Atlantic City , New Jersey ( the official U.S. setting ) or London ( the official Commonwealth setting , excepting Canada )  , have महरूम प्रकाशित by हास्ब्रो  or its licensees .
In 2008  , हास्ब्रो permanently  changed the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the standard U.S . Edition of the game to match the UK Edition , although the U.S. standard edition maintains the Atlantic City property names .
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr .  एकाधिकार '' अक्षर a 3-d computer-generated dekh , जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम अपनाया  by licensees USAopoly , Winning Moves and Winning Solutions .
And Hasbro has also been including the  गति die , introduced in 2006 's एकाधिकार  : The Mega Edition by Winning Moves Games , in versions produced directly by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship Edition ) .
In  बेसबॉल , a बलिदान  fly is a batted ball that satisfies four criteria:
There are  कम than दो outs  when the ball is hit .
the बॉल is hit  to the outfield ( fair or foul ) , or to infield foul territory .
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield , or foul territory ) catches the ball on the fly ( alternatively if the batter would have  महरूम आउट if नहीं लिये an गलती or if the outfielder बूंदें the बॉल और another धावक  is put out ) .
A  धावक  who is already on base scores on the play .
It is called  a `` बलिदान  '' fly because the batter presumably intends to cause a teammate to score a run , while sacrificing his own ability to do so .
Minnesota ( )  is a u.S. राज्य  located in the Midwestern United States .
Minnesota was carved out of the eastern half of the Minnesota Territory and admitted  to the संघ as the 32nd राज्य on may 11 , 1858  .
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '' , the state 's  नाम आता इससे a डकोटा  word for `` sky-tinted water '' .
Those waters , together with forests , parks , and wilderness areas , offer residents and tourists a  किस्में of बाहरी recreational अवसर  .
Minnesota is the 12th  सबसे extensive और  the 21st most populous of the U.S. states .
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area ( known  as the `` जुड़वा शहरों '' ) , the बीच of परिवहन , कारोबार , उद्योग  , education , government and home to an internationally known arts community .
The remainder of the state consists of western prairies now given over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous  वनों in the southeast , अभी साफ , farmed और settled ; और  the less populated North Woods , used for mining , forestry , and recreation .
Minnesota is known for its relatively mixed social and political orientations , and has a high  रेट of नागरिक भागीदारी और  voter turnout .
मिनेसोटा बाँधने among the healthiest  states , and has a highly literate population .
The large majority of  निवासियों हैं of scandinavian  and German descent .
The state is known as a center of  scandinavian अमरीकी संस्कृति  .
Ethnic diversity has increased  in हाल दशकों  .
Substantial influxes of Asian ,  अफ़्रीकी , और लैटिन अमरीकी आप्रवासियों  have joined the descendants of European settlers and the original Native American inhabitants .
Grants are non-repayable funds by one party ( grant  makers ) , प्रायः a सरकारी विभाग , निगम  , foundation or trust , to a , often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity , educational institution , business or an individual .
In order to  प्राप्त  a grant , some form of `` Grant Writing '' often referred to as either a proposal or an application is usually required .
Most grants are made to fund a specific project and  आवश्यकता कुछ स्तर of अनुपालन  and reporting .
The grant writing process involves an applicant submitting a proposal ( or submission ) to a potential funder , either on the applicant 's  अपना पहल or in जवाब to a निवेदन  for Proposal from the funder .
Other grants can be given to individuals , such as victims  of प्राकृतिक  disasters or individuals who seek to open a small business .
Sometimes grant makers require grant seekers to have some form of  tax-exempt  status , be a registered nonprofit organization or a local government .
For example , tiered funding for a  फ्रीवे हैं बहुत  large grants negotiated at government policy level .
However smaller grants may be provided  by a सरकारी एजेंसी  ( e.g . municipal government ) .
Project-related funding involving governments , business , communities , and individuals is often arranged by application  either in लिखने  or online .
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope , 59Co . 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with the  सबसे stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो , 57co साथ a half-life  of 271.79 days , 56Co with a half-life of 77.27 days , and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days .
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives that are less than  18 घंटों और the बहुमत of ये have  half-lives that are less than 1 second .
This element also has 11 meta states , all of which have  half-lives कम than 15  minutes .
The isotopes  of कोबाल्ट दायरा in परमाणु  weight from 47Co to 75Co .
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic mass unit values less than that of the most abundant stable isotope , 59Co , is  इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर और the  primary mode of decay for those of greater than 59 atomic mass units is beta decay .
The primary  क्षय उत्पाद पहले 59co हैं आयरन  isotopes and the primary products after are nickel isotopes .
मानक परमाणु द्रव्यमान  : 58.933195 ( 5 ) u
Who  स्थानांतरित my चीज  ?
An  अद्भुत रास्ता to सौदे साथ बदलें  in Your Work and in Your Life , published in 1998 , is a motivational book by Spencer Johnson written in the style of a parable or business fable .
It describes change in one 's work and life , and four typical reactions to said change by two mice and two  `` littlepeople  '' , during their hunt for cheese .
A New York Times  कारोबार बेस्टसेलर  since release , Who Moved My Cheese ?
remained on the list for  लगभग पाँच सालो और खर्च over 200 सप्ताह on प्रकाशक  Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list .
It has sold more than 26 million copies worldwide in  37 भाषाएं और remains to be एक of  the best-selling business books .
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( – September 11 , 1971 ) led  the सोवियत संघ दौरान  part of the Cold War .
He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964 , and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers , or Premier  , इससे 1958 to 1964 .
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization  of the सोवियत संघ , लिये बैकिंग  the progress of the early Soviet space program , and for several relatively liberal reforms in areas of domestic policy .
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him from  शक्ति in 1964 , replacing  him with Leonid Brezhnev as First Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier .
Khrushchev was born in the Russian village of Kalinovka in 1894  , बंद to the present-day किनारा between  Russia and Ukraine .
he थी employed as a metalworker  in his youth , and during the Russian Civil War was a political commissar .
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich , he worked his way up the  सोवियत पदानुक्रम  .
He supported Joseph  स्टालिन 's purges , और स्वीकृत  thousands of arrests .
In 1939 , Stalin sent him to govern Ukraine , and  he जारी  the purges there .
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the  ग्रेट patriotic युद्ध ( पूर्वी  Front of World War II ) , Khrushchev was again a commissar , serving as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals .
Khrushchev was present at the bloody defense of  stalingrad , a फैक्ट he took ग्रेट अभिमान  in throughout his life .
After  the युद्ध , he लौटे to युक्त  before being recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers .
In the power struggle triggered by Stalin 's death in 1953 ,  khrushchev , बाद  several years , emerged victorious .
On February 25 ,  1956 , at the 20th पार्टी कॉंग्रेस , he वितरित  the `` Secret Speech , '' denouncing Stalin 's purges and ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union .
His domestic policies , aimed at bettering the lives of ordinary citizens , were often  अप्रभावी , विशेषकर in the क्षेत्रफल of कृषि  .
Hoping eventually to rely on missiles for national defense , Khrushchev ordered  प्रमुख कटौती in conventional शक्तियां  .
Despite the cuts , Khrushchev 's rule  देखी the tensest सालो of the ठंडा युद्ध , culminating  in the Cuban Missile Crisis .
Some of Khrushchev 's  नीतियों  were seen as erratic , particularly by his emerging rivals , who quietly rose in strength and deposed him in October 1964 .
He did not suffer the deadly fate of  कुछ पिछला losers of सोवियत शक्ति struggles  , but was pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside .
His lengthy memoirs  यहूद smuggled  to the West and published in part in 1970 .
Khrushchev died in 1971 of  दिल  disease .
Upper gastrointestinal  ( gi ) bleeding refers  to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal tract .
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the  स्नायु of treitz , जिससे connects the चौथी portion  of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon .
Upper GI bleeds are  माना चिकित्सा emergencies ,  and require admission to hospital for urgent diagnosis and management .
Due to advances in medications and endoscopy , upper GI hemorrhage is  अभी प्रायः treated बगैर सर्जरी  .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections  ( रेड , नारंगी , ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक  estimates ( black ) .
Actual recorded population figures  हैं in ब्लू .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise to 16 billion by 2100  ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान , it  may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is the total number of  जीना इंसानो on धरती  .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion by  the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो  ( USCB ) .
The USCB estimates that the world population  exceeded 7 अरब  on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी  Fund , it reached this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since  the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the ब्लैक  Death in 1350 , when it stood at around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth –  वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर  1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2  % in 1963 , और  had declined to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were  उच्चतम in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख , और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially  constant at their 2011 level of 134 million , while deaths number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but  a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) , साथ the  global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various  longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further  growth , stagnation , or even overall decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth ,  citing the growing pressures on the  environment , global food supplies , and energy resources .

Knuckle mnemonic for the number of days in each month of  the gregorian  Calendar .
Each projecting  knuckle represents  a 31-day month .
A mnemonic ( , with a silent `` m '' ) , or mnemonic device , is any learning technique that  एड्स सूचना स्तंभन  .
Mnemonics aim to  अनुवाद सूचना  into a form that the human brain can retain better than its original form .
Even the process of applying this conversion might already aid the transfer of  सूचना to long-term  memory .
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory form , such as short poems , acronyms , or memorable phrases , but mnemonics can also be for other types  of सूचना और in विज़ुअल or kinesthetic  forms .
Their  उपयोग is आधारित on the अवलोकन कि the इंसान दिमाग अधिक easily  remembers spatial , personal , surprising , physical , sexual , humorous , or otherwise 'relatable ' information , rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information .
The word mnemonic is  निकला इससे  the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ) , meaning `` of memory '' and is related to Mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ) , the name of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology .
Both of these words are derived from μνήμη ( mnēmē )  , `` स्मरण  , memory '' .
Mnemonics in antiquity were most often  माना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of  what is today known as the Art of memory .
Ancient Greeks and Romans distinguished between two types  of मेमोरी : the 'natural ' मेमोरी  and the 'artificial ' memory .
The former  is inborn , और is the एक कि everyone  uses automatically and without thinking .
The artificial memory in contrast has to be  प्रशिक्षित और विकसित through  the learning and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques .
Mnemonic systems are special techniques or strategies consciously used to improve   memory , it helps employ information already stored in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task .
President Bush signing the No Child Left  पीछे अधिनियम at हैमिल्टन  H.S . in Hamilton , Ohio .
The No Child Left  पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 ( nclb ) is a संयुक्त राज्य अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the elementary  and Secondary Education Act , which included Title I , the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students .
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based on the  आधार कि सेटिंग ऊँची  standards and establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education .
The Act requires states   to develop assessments in basic skills .
States must give these assessments to all students at select grade  स्तर in अनुक्रम  to receive federal school funding .
The Act does not assert a national achievement standard ;  मानकों हैं नियत by प्रत्येक  individual state .
NCLB expanded  the संघीय भूमिका in पब्लिक शिक्षा  through annual testing , annual academic progress , report cards , teacher qualifications , and funding changes .
The bill passed in  the u.S. कॉंग्रेस साथ bipartisan support  .

A pickup truck or  pick-up  , often simply referred to as a pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
in उत्तर अमेरिका , the पद पिकअप is प्रयुक्त  for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built , integrated bed , as well as for coupé utility vehicles , often based on a personal car chassis , but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use .
Some countries have their own terms similar  to पिकअप , ऐसे  as ute in Australia and New Zealand , or bakkie in South Africa .
Large  पिकअप ट्रक हैं  somewhat rare in Europe , where vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles .
This 15th-century  चित्रण  of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred medieval horse with arched neck , refined head and elegant gait .
Horses in the Middle Ages differed  in आकार , निर्माण और नस्ल इससे  the modern horse , and were , on average , smaller .
They were also more  सेंट्रल to समाज  than their modern counterparts , being essential for war , agriculture , and transport .
नतीजतन , विशिष्ट  types of horse developed , many of which have no modern equivalent .
While an understanding of modern horse breeds and  equestrianism is vital लिये कोई विश्लेषण of the मध्यकालीन घोड़ा , शोधकर्ताओं  also need to consider documentary ( both written and pictorial ) and archaeological evidence .
Horses in the Middle Ages were  rarely differentiated by नस्ल  , but rather by use .
This led them to be  वर्णित , लिये उदाहरण , as `` chargers ``  ( war horses ) , `` palfreys `` ( riding horses ) , cart horses or packhorses .
Reference is also given to their place of origin , such as `` Spanish horses , '' but whether this  referred to एक नस्ल or अनेक  is unknown .
Another difficulty arising during any study of medieval  दस्तावेज़ or साहित्य is the लचीलापन of the  medieval languages , where several words can be used for one thing ( or , conversely , several objects are referred to by one word ) .
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even within  एक दस्तावेज़ ) , और जहाँ एक  epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey , another praises its skill and swiftness .
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment , often  introduced इससे अन्य संस्कृतियों , अनुमत  for significant changes in both warfare and agriculture .
In particular , improved designs for the solid-treed saddle as well as the arrival of the stirrup , horseshoe and horse collar were significant advances in  मध्यकालीन  society .
Consequently , the assumptions and theories developed by  इतिहासकारों हैं नहीं निर्णायक , और बहस स्टिल rages on अनेक मुद्दे , ऐसे as the प्रजनन  or size of the horse , and a number of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject .
The Music Man is a musical with book , music  , और गीत by मेरेडिथ willson , आधारित on a स्टोरी by willson  and Franklin Lacey .
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill , who poses as a boys '  बैंड आयोजक और नेता और बिकता बैंड  instruments and uniforms to naive townsfolk before skipping town with the cash .
In River City , Iowa , prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo sees through him , but when Hill helps her younger brother overcome his fear of social interactions due  to उसके लिस्प , marian begins to पतन in प्रेम साथ  Harold .
Harold , in turn falling for Marian ,  risks होने caught  to win her .
In 1957 , the  दिखाएँ  became a hit on Broadway , winning five Tony Awards , including Best Musical , and running for 1,375 performances .
The cast album won the first Grammy Award for `` Best  असली डाल एल्बम '' और थी क्रमांक एक on the  Billboard charts for 245 weeks .
The show 's success led to revivals and a popular 1962 film adaptation  और a 2003 टेलीविज़न  remake .
It frequently is produced by both  पेशेवर  and amateur theater companies .
निरीक्षक  's wheel
A surveyor  's व्हील , भी पुकारा a clickwheel , hodometer  , waywiser , trundle wheel , measuring wheel , or perambulator is a device for measuring distance .
Largest  non-polar रेगिस्तान
Sand dunes in the Rub ' al Khali  ( `` खाली क्वार्टर  '' ) of Saudi Arabia .
Makhtesh Ramon , Negev  मरुस्थल , इसराईल
A  मरुस्थल is a लैंडस्केप or प्रदेश of जमीन कि is बहुत शुष्क क्युकी of कम वर्षा amounts (  precipitation ) , often has little coverage by plants , and in which streams dry up unless they are supplied by water from outside areas .
Deserts can also be described as areas where  अधिक जल is  lost by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation .
Desert plants must  have खास adaptations  to survive with this little water .
Deserts generally receive less than 25 cm of rain  ( वर्षण ) प्रत्येक  year .
Semideserts or  steppes हैं regions  which receive between and .
In the Köppen climate classification system , deserts are  classed as bwh ( hot मरुस्थल )  or BWk ( temperate desert ) .
In the Thornthwaite climate classification system ,  रेगिस्तान होता be वर्गीकृत as arid megathermal  climates .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July  1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर  1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great  युद्ध इससे इसके  occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the  ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally  the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United  राज्य joined the allies  , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more  than 70 लाख सैन्य  personnel , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of  technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases  in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various political changes ,  ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the राष्ट्र  involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in  the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of यूरोपीय  .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28  जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट  when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed  over the पिछला दशकों  were invoked .
Within weeks , the major  शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies  , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for  the आक्रमण of सर्बिया  .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium  और ध्वज  on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle  of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला छोटी जबतक  1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians , but was  रोका in इसके आक्रमण  of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire  joined the युद्ध , खोलने up fronts  in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915  और रोमानिया  in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's  सरकारी collapsed in  March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the  पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove  back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
जर्मनी , जिससे था इसके अपना ट्रबल  with revolutionaries , agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended in  विजय लिये the allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as  उग्र as on the बैटल fronts , as the  participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By  the समाप्त of the युद्ध , चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the  German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two  खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory ,  while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of central Europe was  redrawn into अनेक  smaller states .
The  लीग of राष्ट्र थी formed  in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions  of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be  factors contributing to World War II .
`` Girls  बस want to have  Fun '' is a 1979 song originally written by Robert Hazard and made famous by singer Cyndi Lauper .
It was the first  प्रमुख सिंगल released by lauper as a सोलो कलाकार  and the lead-off single from her debut album She 's So Unusual .
Lauper’s  संस्करण gained मान्यता as a  feminist anthem and promoted by an award-winning video .
It has been covered on either an album  or in सजीव कॉन्सर्ट  by over 30 other artists .
The single was Lauper 's  भेदन hit , reaching  # 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984 .
It remains one of Lauper  's हस्ताक्षर गीतों और थी a widely लोकप्रिय सोंग  during the era of its release , the 1980s .
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '' , `` Rolling  स्टोन : `` the 100 शीर्ष म्यूज़िक वीडियो '' '' और the  `` VH1 : 100 Greatest Videos '' lists ranked the song at # 22 , # 39 and # 45 , respectively .
The song  प्राप्त a ग्रैमी  Award nomination for Record of the Year and Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
View of  defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड  position and placement .
Defibrillation is a common  उपचार लिये life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias  , ventricular fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy  to the प्रभावित दिल साथ a यंत्र  called a defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the  दिल मांसपेशी , terminates the dysrhythmia , और  allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be external , transvenous , or implanted ,  depending on the प्रकार  of device used or needed .
Some external units , known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ) , automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms , meaning that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little , or in some  मामले no प्रशिक्षण  at all .
The Cato Institute is an American libertarian think tank  headquartered in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
It was founded as  the चार्ल्स koch न्यास in 1974 by मरे rothbard , ed  Crane and Charles Koch , chairman of the board and chief executive officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries , Inc. .
In July 1976 , the  नाम थी बदला  to the Cato Institute .
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think Tank Index , Cato  is the 6th सबसे influential  US based think tank , ranking 3rd in Economic Policy and 2nd in Social Policy .
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the understanding of public policies based on the principles of limited government , free  बाज़ार , व्यक्तिगत स्वतंत्रता , और  peace .
The Institute will use the most effective means to  originate , एडवोकेट , प्रचार , और disseminate  applicable policy proposals that create free , open , and civil societies in the United States and throughout the world . ''
Cato scholars  यहूद नाजुक of जार्ज W. बुश 's रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन  ( 2001–2009 ) on several issues , including the Iraq War , civil liberties , education , agriculture , energy policy , and excessive government spending .
On other issues , they supported Bush  प्रशासन पहलों , सबसे notably  health care , Social Security , global warming , tax policy , and immigration .
During the 2008 U.S. presidential election , Cato  विद्वानों criticized दोनो major-party उम्मीदवार  , John McCain and Barack Obama .
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since his inauguration , such as fiscal stimulus , healthcare reform , foreign policy ,  और the युद्ध on दवाएँ , जबकि supporting  his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy .
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by  आयरिश लेखक  Bram Stoker .
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count Dracula , the novel tells the story of Dracula 's attempt to relocate from Transylvania to England , and the battle between Dracula and a  छोटी समूह of मेन और महिलाओं led by प्राध्यापक अब्राहम  Van Helsing .
Dracula has been assigned to many literary genres including vampire  साहित्य , हॉरर fiction , the गोथिक  novel and invasion literature .
The novel touches on themes such as the role of women in  विक्टोरियन संस्कृति , यौन  conventions , immigration , colonialism , and post-colonialism .
Although Stoker did not invent the vampire , he defined its modern form , and the novel has spawned numerous theatrical , film and  टेलीविज़न interpretations  .
Quidditch is a competitive sport in the wizarding world of the Harry Potter universe ,  और is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels  and movies .
It  is an अत्यधिक अशिष्ट लकिन बहुत  popular semi-contact sport , played by wizards and witches .
Matches are played between two teams of seven players riding flying broomsticks , using four balls and six elevated ring-shaped goals ,  तीन on प्रत्येक पक्ष of the quidditch पिच  ( field ) .
In the Harry Potter universe ,  quidditch holds a fervent following समान  to the position that association football holds as a globally popular sport .
The sport is monumental throughout  the wizarding  world .
Harry plays an important position for his house team at Hogwarts : he is the seeker and becomes the captain  in उसके छठे साल वहीँ  .
Regional and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिताओं  are mentioned throughout the series .
In Goblet of Fire ,  quidditch at हॉग्वार्ट्स  is cancelled for the Tri-Wizard Tournament , but Harry and the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup .
In addition , Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the  हंगेरियाई horntail ( in the पहला कार्य of the tri-wizard टूर्नामेंट ) , to कैप्चर a उड़ती कुंजी in पारस 's स्टोन , और on दो कुंजी अवसरों  in Deathly Hallows — getting hold of Ravenclaw 's Diadem , and during the final fight with Voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the Seeker '' is useful to him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the air .
हैरी कुम्हार रै स्वामित्व दो broomsticks , the  Nimbus 2000 and the Firebolt , both of which are destroyed by the series ' end .
the खेल रै महरूम  adopted in the real world in the form of Muggle Quidditch .
The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the federal government of the United States consisting of two  घरों : the निम्नतर हाउस ज्ञात as the  House of Representatives and the upper house known as the Senate .
Congress meets in  the कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Both representatives and senators  हैं चुनी through  direct election .
Congress has a total of 535 voting members : 435  सदस्यों in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  and 100 members in the Senate .
Members of the House of Representatives serve two-year terms representing the  लोगों of a ज़िला  .
Congressional districts are apportioned to states by population using the United States Census results , each state in the union having at least one  प्रतिनिधि in the हाउस  of Representatives .
Regardless of population  , प्रत्येक of the 50 राज्य रै दो  senators ; the 100 senators each serve a six-year term .
the शर्तें हैं लड़खड़ाते so प्रत्येक दो  years approximately one-third of the Senate is up for election .
Each staggered group of  one-third of the सीनेटरों  are called 'classes ' .
No state of the United States has  दो सीनेटरों इससे the  same class .
Most  incumbents तलाश re-election  , and their historical likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent .
In August 2012  ,  a Gallup poll reported that Congress’s approval rating amongst Americans was at 10 % , matching a 38-year low reached in November 2011 .
`` A Little More Country Than That '' is the title of a song written by Joey + Rory 's Rory Lee Feek , Wynn  varble , और डॉन poythress , और  recorded by American country artist Easton Corbin .
it थी released in अगस्त 2009  as Corbin 's debut single and is included on his self-titled debut album .
In April 2010 , the song reached  क्रमांक एक on the देश म्यूज़िक चार्ट , बनाना कोर्बिन  the first male solo artist in seven years to send a debut single to Number One .
It has been certified  सुनहरा by the  RIAA .
The BlackBerry is a line of wireless handheld devices and services designed and marketed by Research In Motion Limited ( RIM )  ऑपरेटिंग as ब्लैकबेरी  .
The first BlackBerry device , an email pager , was released in 1999 ; the most recent BlackBerry devices , the Z10 and Q10 , were announced on January   30 , 2013 .
The user interface varies by model ; most  विशेषता a शारीरिक क्वर्टी कुंजीपटल , जबकि नए पीढियां have relied on  a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard .
A BlackBerry can shoot video , take photos , play music , and perform online  कृत्यों ऐसे as web-browsing और emailing  .
They can also send and receive push email and instant messages while maintaining a high level of security through on-device  संदेश एन्क्रिप्शन , और हैं designed to फलन as निजी  digital assistants .
BlackBerry devices  support a विशाल किस्में of तत्काल  messaging features , with the most popular being the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger service .
The BlackBerry PlayBook is  a टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर  offered by the company .
The 100 millionth BlackBerry smartphone was shipped in June quarter of 2010  और the 200 millionth स्मार्टफोन  was shipped in September quarter of 2012 .
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011 , making its manufacturer the sixth most popular device  मेकर ( 25 % of मोबाईल यंत्र बिक्री हैं स्मार्टफ़ोन  ) .
The consumer BlackBerry Internet Service is  उपलब्धियाँ in 91 देशों  worldwide on over 500 mobile service operators using various mobile technologies .
As of September 2012 , there were eighty  लाख सदस्य विश्वव्यापी  to BlackBerry .
In 2011 the Caribbean and Latin America had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry smartphones  विश्वव्यापी , साथ up to परिचय 45 प्रति cent in the  region having a RIM device .
BlackBerry , iPhone , Android , and  खिड़कियाँ फोन हैं माना  the four major smartphone brands .
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United States , which alludes to its excessive  उपयोग by इसके स्वामी और is a सन्दर्भ to the addictiveness of  crack cocaine .
Use of the term CrackBerry became so  फैली कि in नवम्बर 2006 वेबस्टर 's नई  World College Dictionary named `` crackberry '' the `` New Word of the Year . ''
An  उदाहरण of a  demand curve shifting .
The shift from D1 To D2 means an increase  in माँग साथ consequences  for the other variables
In economics , the demand curve is the graph  depicting the संबंध  between the price of a certain commodity and the amount of it that consumers are willing and able to purchase at that given price .
It is a graphic  प्रतिनिधित्व of a  demand schedule .
The demand curve for all consumers together follows  इससे the माँग वक्र of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत उपभोक्ता :  the individual demands at each price are added together .
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets , and are often combined with supply curves to estimate  the संतुलन दाम ( the दाम at जिससे विक्रेता साथ हैं willing to बेचें the वही राशि as  buyers together are willing to buy , also known as market clearing price ) and the equilibrium quantity ( the amount of that good or service that will be produced and bought without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of that market .
In a monopolistic market , the demand curve facing the monopolist is simply  the मार्केट माँग वक्र  .
historia
by  nikolaos gysis  ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia , meaning `` inquiry , knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an umbrella term that relates to  पास्ट कार्यक्रम as खूब as the  discovery , collection , organization , and presentation of information about these events .
The term includes cosmic , geologic , and organic history , but is often  generically implied to औसत इंसान  history .
Scholars who write about  इतिहास हैं  called historians .
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a narrative to examine and analyse a sequence of past events , and  objectively determine the  patterns of cause and effect that determine them .
Historians sometimes debate  the प्रकृति of इतिहास  and its usefulness by discussing the study of the discipline as an end in itself and as a way of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the present .
Stories common to a particular culture , but not supported by external sources ( such as  the किस्से surrounding किंग आर्थर ) हैं प्रायः वर्गीकृत as सांस्कृतिक विरासत  or legends , because they do not support the `` disinterested investigation '' required of the discipline of history .
कार्यक्रम occurring prior to लिखा  record are considered prehistory .
Herodotus , a 5th century B.C . Greek historian is considered within the Western tradition to be the `` father of history '' , and  , साथ साथ उसके समकालीन  Thucydides , helped form the foundations for the modern study of human history .
Their work continues to be read today and the divide between the culture-focused Herodotus  और the military-focused thucydides remains  a point of contention or approach in modern historical writing .
In the Eastern tradition , a state chronicle the Spring and Autumn Annals was known to be compiled  इससे as जल्दी as 722 bce  although only 2nd century BCE texts survived .
Ancient  प्रभाव have helped spawn रूपांतर interpretations  of the nature of history which have evolved over the centuries and continue to change today .
The modern study of history is wide-ranging , and includes the  पढ़ाई of विशिष्ट regions और the पढ़ाई of निश्चित topical  or thematical elements of historical investigation .
Often history is taught as part of  प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक शिक्षा , और  the academic study of history is a major discipline in University studies .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ) , was an African-American Muslim  मंत्री और इंसान अधिकारों  activist .
To his  admirers , he थी a साहसी एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों  of blacks , a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans .
Detractors accused him of preaching  जातिवाद , ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता ,  and violence .
He has  महरूम पुकारा एक of  the greatest and most influential African Americans in history .
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by  श्वेत supremacists , it थी rumored—when  he was young , and at least one of his uncles was lynched .
When he  थी 13 , उसके माँ थी लगाई  in a mental hospital , and he was placed in a series of foster homes .
In 1946 , at age 20 , he went  to थाना लिये तोड़कर  and entering .
In prison ,  मैल्कम x became a सदस्य of the  Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952 , he quickly rose to become one of its leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led  उसे to छोड़ the स्वदेश in कूच 1964  .
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East , he returned to the United States , where he founded Muslim Mosque , Inc. and the  संगठन  of Afro-American Unity .
In February 1965 , less than a year  बाद leaving the स्वदेश of islam , he  was assassinated by three members of the group .
Malcolm X 's expressed  मान्यताओं बदला  substantially over time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white Americans —in contrast to the  सिविल अधिकारों गति 's जोर  on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam  in 1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it , ``  I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now .
I was a zombie then ... pointed in a certain direction and  बताई to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी  Muslim , he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with civil rights leaders , he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
Henry Merritt `` Hank ''  paulson , jr. ( born कूच 28 , 1946 )  is an American banker who served as the 74th United States Secretary of the Treasury .
He had served as the Chairman  और मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी of गोल्डमैन sachs  , and is now chairman of the Paulson Institute , which he founded in 2011 to promote sustainable economic growth and a cleaner environment around the world , with an initial focus on the United States and China .
A virtual machine ( VM ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying hardware , which is presented to  the अनुप्रयोग परत of the प्रणाली  .
Virtual machines may be based  on विशेषताएँ of a काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर or  emulate the computer architecture and functions of a real world computer .
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing  arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae साथ  fangs that inject venom .
वे हैं the largest अनुक्रम  of arachnids and rank seventh in total species diversity among all other groups of organisms .
Spiders are found worldwide on every  महाद्वीप मगर  for Antarctica , and have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at least 43,678 spider species , and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however , there has been confusion within the scientific community as to how all these families  चाहिए  be classified , as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body segments are fused into two tagmata , the cephalothorax and  उदर , और joined by a छोटी  , cylindrical pedicel .
Unlike insects  , मकड़ियों  do not have antennae .
In all except the most primitive group , the Mesothelae , spiders have the most  centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods , as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused  into one mass in the cephalothorax .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead extend  उन्हें by हाइड्रोलिक दबाव  .
Their abdomens bear appendages  कि have महरूम परिवर्धित  into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen .
Spider webs vary widely in size , shape and the amount of sticky thread  प्रयुक्त  .
It now  appears कि the सर्पिल orb वेब may be  one of the earliest forms , and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared  in the devonian काल परिचय  , but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets .
True spiders  have महरूम मिला in carboniferous रॉक्स इससे , और हैं  very similar to the most primitive surviving order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups of modern spiders ,  mygalomorphae और araneomorphae  , first appeared in the Triassic period , before .
A herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was described in 2008 , but all other  ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी , ज़्यादातर preying on कीट और on अन्य मकड़ियों  , although a few large species also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs , lassoing it with sticky  bolas , mimicking the शिकार to avoid  detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing  कंपन , लकिन the क्रियाशील hunters have अधि दृष्टि , और hunters of the  genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones .
Spiders '  गुस्ताखी हैं too सीमित  to take solids , and they liquidize their food by flooding it with digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps , as they do not have true jaws .
Male spiders  पहचानो themselves  by a variety of complex courtship rituals to avoid being eaten by the females .
Males of most species survive a few matings ,  सीमित मुख्यतः by उनके  short life spans .
Females weave silk egg-cases ,  प्रत्येक of जिससे may  contain hundreds of eggs .
महिलाओं of  many species care for their young , for example by carrying them around or by sharing food with them .
A  अल्पसंख्यक of प्रजाति हैं सोशल  , building communal webs that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals .
Social behavior  सीमाएँ इससे precarious toleration , as in the  widow spiders , to co-operative hunting and food-sharing .
Although most spiders live for  at सबसे दो सालो  , tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity .
While the venom of a few species is  खतरनाक to इंसानो , वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the  use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides .
Spider silk provides a  संयोजन of lightness , शक्ति  and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials , and spider silk genes have been inserted into mammals and plants to see if these can be used as silk factories .
As a result  of उनके चौड़ी दायरा of व्यवहार , मकड़ियों  have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience , cruelty and creative powers .
Donna Marie Pinciotti ( Born February 13 , 1960 ) is a fictional character and  एक of the दो मादा लीड in  the Fox sitcom That '70s Show , appearing in all eight seasons .
Portrayed by  लौरा prepon , डोना  is the love interest to Eric Forman .
US county household  मध्य आय 2009  .
Median  us household  income , 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly used by the United States  सरकारी और निजी संस्थानों  .
प्रत्येक household  is measured by the income of every resident over the age of 15 .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment insurance , disability  भुगतान , चाइल्ड support भुगतान प्राप्त , नियमित rental  receipts , as well as any personal business , investment , or other kinds of income received routinely .
While inflation-adjusted (  `` रियल '' ) household आय था महरूम  increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999 , it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
U.S. median  household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144  in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty  in the संयुक्त राज्य , अर्थ households  living on less than $ 2 per day before government benefits , doubled from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011 , including 2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do not have  to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of  the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income .
As households tend to share a similar economic context , the use of  household आय  remains among the most widely accepted measures of income .
कि the आकार of a household is नहीं commonly लिया into खाता in ऐसे उपायों may विकृत कोई  analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income categories , and may render direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible .
A registered agent , also known as a resident agent or statutory agent , in United States business law , is a business  or व्यक्तिगत  designated to receive service of process ( SOP ) when a business entity is a party in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons .
The registered agent 's address may also be where the  राज्य होगा भेजें the  paperwork for the yearly renewal of the business entity 's charter .
The  पंजीकृत एजेंट लिये a कारोबार एंटिटी may  be an individual member of the company , or ( more often ) a third party , such as the organization 's lawyer or a service company .
Failure to properly maintain a registered agent can  affect a कम्पनी negatively  .
दफ्तर लिये  Emergency Management .
Office of War  सूचना  war poster 1941 - 1945
`` Life , Liberty , and the pursuit of Happiness '' is a well-known phrase  in the संयुक्त राज्य घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता  .
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with which all human beings are endowed by their creator  लिये उनके सुरक्षा of जिससे वे संस्थान  governments .
Fencing , is typically divided into Olympic fencing ,  शास्त्रीय तलवारबाजी और  historical fencing , .
The sport of fencing (  commonly पुकारा ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी or प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी ) is  divided into three weapon categories : foil , sabre and épée .
Classical fencing uses the same three  हथियार  , but approaches fencing as a martial art .
Competitive  तलवारबाजी is एक of पाँच खेल जिससे रै महरूम प्रदर्शित at प्रत्येक एक  of the modern Olympic Games , the other four being Athletics , Cycling , Swimming , and Gymnastics .
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ) , also called simply the quadriceps , quadriceps extensor , quads , is a large muscle group  कि शामिल the चार प्रचलित मांसपेशियां on the सामने  of the thigh .
It is the great extensor muscle  of the घुटना , forming a विशाल मांसल  mass which covers the front and sides of the femur .
The proper Latin plural form of the adjective  quadriceps होता be quadricipites .
In modern English usage , quadriceps is used in both  एकवचन और बहुवचन .
The singular form quadricep , produced by  hypercorrection , is  frequently used .
RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April  1912 बाद colliding साथ an हिमशैल दौरान उसके maiden  voyage from Southampton , UK to New York City , US .
The sinking of Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502  लोगों in एक of the deadliest  peacetime maritime disasters in modern history .
The RMS Titanic was the  largest  ship afloat at the time of her maiden voyage .
She was the second of three Olympic class  समंदर liners संचालित by the श्वेत स्टार लकीर , और वो थी निर्मित by the harland और  Wolff shipyard in Belfast with Thomas Andrews , who perished with the ship , as her naval architect .
On her maiden voyage , she carried 2,224  यात्री  and crew .
Under the command of Edward Smith , her passengers included some of the wealthiest people in the world , as well as hundreds of  emigrants इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , scandinavia और elsewhere  throughout Europe seeking a new life in North America .
The ship was  designed  to be the last word in comfort and luxury , with an on-board gymnasium , swimming pool , libraries , high-class restaurants and opulent cabins .
She also had a powerful wireless telegraph provided for the  convenience of यात्री  as well as for operational use .
हालांकि वो था उन्नत सुरक्षा सुविधाएँ ऐसे as watertight  compartments and remotely activated watertight doors , she lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard .
Because of outdated maritime safety regulations , she carried only  पर्याप्त lifeboats लिये 1,178 people—slightly अधिक than हाफ of the  number travelling on the maiden voyage , and one-third her total passenger and crew capacity .
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912 , Titanic called at Cherbourg in France and Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in Ireland  पहले heading westwards  towards New York .
On 14  अप्रैल 1912 , चार दिनों into the क्रासिंग और परिचय 375 मील (  600 km ) south of Newfoundland , she hit an iceberg at 11:40 pm ship 's time .
The glancing collision caused Titanics hull plates to  बकल inwards साथ उसके स्टारबोर्ड पक्ष और खोली  five of her sixteen watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water .
Meanwhile , passengers and some crew members were evacuated in  lifeboats , अनेक of जिससे  were launched only partly loaded .
A  अनुपातहीन क्रमांक of मेन यहूद बाएँ सवार क्युकी of a `` महिलाओं  and children first `` protocol followed by some of the officers loading the lifeboats .
By 2:20 AM , she broke apart and foundered , with well over  एक हजार लोगों स्टिल सवार  .
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered , the Cunard liner RMS Carpathia arrived on the scene of the sinking  , जहाँ वो brought सवार an अनुमानित  705 survivors .
The disaster was greeted with worldwide shock and outrage at the huge loss of life  और the नियामक और  operational failures that had led to it .
Public inquiries in Britain and the  संयुक्त राज्य led to प्रमुख  improvements in maritime safety .
One of their most important legacies was the establishment in 1914 of the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय सम्मेलन लिये the सुरक्षा  of Life at Sea ( SOLAS ) , which still governs maritime safety today .
Additionally , several new wireless regulations were passed around the world in an effort to learn from  the अनेक missteps in बेतार संचार --  -which could have saved many more passengers .
Many of the survivors lost all of their  धन और possessions और यहूद बाएँ अक्षम  ; many families , particularly those of crew members from Southampton , lost their primary bread-winners .
They were helped by an outpouring of  पब्लिक सहानुभूति  and charitable donations .
Some of the male survivors were accused of cowardice for leaving the ship while people were still on board  ; the श्वेत स्टार लकीर  's chairman , J. Bruce Ismay , faced social ostracism for the rest of his life .
The wreck of the  टाइटैनिक remains on the  seabed , split in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of .
Since its discovery in 1985 ,  हज़ारों of artefacts have महरूम बरामद  and put on display at museums around the world .
Titanic has become one of the most famous ships in history , her memory kept alive by  numerous किताबे , लोक गीतों , films  , exhibits , and memorials .
The human leg is the entire lower extremity or limb of the human body , including the foot ,  जांघ और भी the हिप or gluteal प्रदेश ; however , the precise परिभाषा in इंसान  anatomy refers only to the section of the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle .
Legs are used for standing ,  चलना , कूद , कार्यशील , kicking  , and similar activities , and constitute a significant portion of a person 's mass .
This article is about the demographic features of the population  of तुर्कों , सहित जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व ,  ethnicity , education level , health of the populace , economic status , religious affiliations and other aspects of the population .
As of 2010 , the population of Turkey is estimated to be 73.7 million with a growth rate of  1.21 % प्रति annum ( 2009 फिगर ) .
The population is  अपेक्षाकृत यंग साथ  26.6 % falling in the 0-14 age bracket .
According to the OECD/World Bank population statistics in Turkey the population growth from  1990 to 2008 थी 16 लाख  or 29 % .

A full-size car is a marketing term used in North America for an  ऑटोमोबाइल larger than  a mid-size car .
In the United  राज्य , the epa उपयोग  the term `` large car '' to denote full-size cars .
Joel Grey ( born April 11 , 1932 ) is an American stage and screen actor , singer , and dancer , known for his role as the  निपुण of ceremonies in  both the stage and film adaptation of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret .
He  रै जीती the अकादमी  Award , Tony Award and Golden Globe Award .
