James Madison , Jr. ( March 16  , 1751 ( o.s . कूच 5 ) – जून 28 ,  1836 ) was an American statesman and political theorist , the fourth President of the United States ( 1809–1817 ) .
He is hailed as the “Father of the  constitution” लिये होने इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting  of the United States Constitution and as the key champion and author of the United States Bill of Rights .
He served as a politician much of  उसके वयस्क जीवन  .
बाद the संविधान  had been drafted , Madison became one of the leaders in the movement to ratify it .
His collaboration with  सिकंदर हैमिल्टन और  John Jay produced the Federalist Papers ( 1788 ) .
परिचालित तभी in नई यॉर्क at the समय  , they would later be considered among the most important polemics in support of the Constitution .
He was also a delegate to the Virginia constitutional ratifying convention , and was  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the कामयाब अनुसमर्थन प्रयत्न in वर्जिनिया  .
Like most of his  contemporaries , मैडिसन  changed his political views during his life .
During the drafting and ratification of the constitution , he favored a strong national government , though later he grew to  एहसान stronger राज्य सरकारें , पहले settling  between the two extremes late in his life .
In 1789 , Madison  became a नेता in the नई हाउस  of Representatives , drafting many basic laws .
He is notable for drafting the  पहला टेन amendments  to the Constitution , and thus is known as the `` Father of the Bill of Rights `` .
Madison worked closely with President George Washington to organize  the नई संघीय  government .
Breaking with Hamilton and what became the Federalist Party in 1791 , Madison and Thomas Jefferson organized what they  पुकारा the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( बाद पुकारा  by historians the Democratic-Republican Party )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ) , Madison  पर्यवेक्षित the louisiana खरीदें  , which doubled the nation’s size .
After his election to the presidency , he presided over  नवीनीकृत समृद्धि  for several years .
As president ( 1809–17 ) , after the failure of diplomatic protests and a trade embargo  विरूद्ध ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , he  led the nation into the War of 1812 .
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in addition , he wanted to end the influence of the British among  उनके भारतीय allies , जिनकी प्रतिरोध अवरोधित संयुक्त राज्य उपनिवेश in the मिडवेस्ट around  the Great Lakes .
Madison found the war to be an administrative  दुःस्वप्न , as the संयुक्त राज्य था neither a दमदार फौज nor वित्तीय प्रणाली  ; as a result , he afterward supported a stronger national government and a strong military , as well as the national bank , which he had long opposed .
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave society , he was a slaveholder who inherited his plantation known as Montpelier , and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate  तम्बाकू और अन्य फसलों  .
मैडिसन समर्थित the three-fifths सुलह  that allowed three-fifths of the enumerated population of slaves to be counted for representation .
``  रोमन 's बदला '' is a  song performed by American rapper Nicki Minaj from her debut studio album Pink Friday .
It was written by Minaj and rapper Eminem , who is also featured in the song  , और थी उत्पादित by swizz beatz .
it थी released exclusively on अक्तूबर 30 , 2010  through the US iTunes Store , as a promotional release preceding the album 's release .
The song initiated a feud between Lil ' Kim and Minaj , where many people felt the song was directed  at लील ' किम और regarded around उसके जज्बात  towards Minaj 's rise to fame .
The song references Minaj 's alter-ego , Roman  zolanski , और  Eminem 's alter-ego , Slim Shady .
The song garnered very positive reviews from  आलोचकों , सबसे of जिससे praised the सोंग as  a stand-out track on the album .
An official remix featuring Minaj 's  mentor , लील वेन , थी released to the us itunes स्टोर  on January 19 , 2011 .
the इंस्ट्रूमेंटल थी प्रयुक्त in  the song 'Firing Squad ' by Horseshoe G.A.N.G .
Hydraulic fluid  होने poured  .
Hydraulic  fluids , भी पुकारा हाइड्रोलिक  liquids , are the medium by which power is transferred in hydraulic machinery .
Common  हाइड्रोलिक fluids हैं  based on mineral oil or water .
Examples of equipment that might use hydraulic fluids include excavators and backhoes , hydraulic brakes , power steering systems ,  ट्रांसमिशन , कचरा ट्रक , वायुयान उड़ान  control systems , lifts , and industrial machinery .
Hydraulic systems like the ones mentioned above will work most efficiently if the  हाइड्रोलिक द्रव  used has no compressibility
महिंद्रा ट्रैक्टर
Mahindra Tractors , the farm equipment division of  महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा , builds और स्त्रोत tractors  that are sold worldwide across six continents .
Mahindra is also among the top  तीन ट्रैक्टर निर्माताओं  in the world .
Mahindra has a huge consumer base in India , China and  अमेरिका  and a growing base in Australia .
The company builds more  tractors in इण्डिया than कोई अन्य  manufacturer , and has the capacity to build 150,000 tractors a year .
In 1963 , M & M formed a joint venture with International Harvester to manufacture tractors  carrying the महिंद्रा nameplate लिये the भारतीय मार्केट  .
Armed with engineering , tooling and manufacturing know-how gained  इससे इस संबंध ,  M & M developed its first tractor , the B-275 .
Mahindra Tractors with sales of nearly 85,000 units annually is one of the largest  ट्रैक्टर कंपनियाँ in the संसार , और is  number one in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the world .
To expand into the growing  ट्रैक्टर मार्केट in चीन , महिंद्रा acquired  majority stake in Jiangling .
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the US , Mahindra USA announced its new sponsorship in  the nascar देशभर श्रेणी साथ r3  Motorsports , which is participating with a # 23 Mahindra Tractors Chevrolet .
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson , Jr. Mahindra USA , Inc. announced a 17-race  प्राथमिक और 18-race संबद्ध प्रायोजन लिये the 2009  NASCAR Nationwide Series .
With this sponsorship , Mahindra was the first Indian company to  प्रायोजक a car in nascar  .
In 2008 , Mahindra was a sponsor of the McDonald Motorsports team which  भागा the # 81 car in the  NASCAR Nationwide Series .
The POWER6 is a  माइक्रोप्रोसेसर विकसित  by IBM that implemented the Power ISA v.2.03 .
When it became available in systems in 2007 , it succeeded the  शक्ति5+ as  IBM 's flagship Power microprocessor .
It is part of the eCLipz project , said to have a  goal of  converging IBM 's server hardware where practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the acronym : iSeries , pSeries , and zSeries ) .
The American middle  क्लास  is a social class in the United States .
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion and common language use , contemporary social scientists have put forward several , more or less congruent  , theories on the अमरीकी  middle class .
Depending on class model used ,  the मध्य क्लास may constitute anywhere  from 25 % to 66 % of households .
One of the first major studies of the middle class in America was White Collar : The American Middle Classes ,  प्रकाशित in 1951 by समाजशास्त्री C.  Wright Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills .
Later  sociologists ऐसे as डेनिस गिल्बर्ट  of Hamilton College commonly divide the middle class into two sub-groups .
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the  अपर or पेशेवर मध्य क्लास  consisting of highly educated , salaried professionals and managers .
Constituting roughly one third of households is the lower middle class consisting mostly of semi-professionals ,  skilled कारीगरों और lower-level  management .
Middle-class persons commonly have a comfortable standard of  जीना , significant  economic security , considerable work autonomy and rely on their expertise to sustain themselves .
सदस्यों of the मध्य क्लास  belong to diverse groups which overlap with each other .
Overall ,  middle-class व्यक्तियों , विशेषकर  upper-middle-class individuals , are characterized by conceptualizing , creating and consulting .
Thus , college education is one of the main  indicators of middle-class  status .
Largely attributed to the nature of middle-class  occupations , मध्य क्लास  values tend to emphasize independence , adherence to intrinsic standards , valuing innovation and respecting non-conformity .
Politically more active than  अन्य जनसांख्यिकी , कॉलेज शिक्षित मध्य क्लास  professionals are split between the two major parties .
Income varies  considerably इससे निकट  the national median to well in excess of $ 100,000 .
Household income figures , however , do not always reflect  क्लास औकात और मानक  of living , as they are largely influenced by the number of income earners and fail to recognize household size .
It is therefore possible for a large , dual-earner , lower middle class household to out-earn a  छोटी , one-earner , अपर मध्य क्लास  household .
The  मध्य वर्ग हैं बहुत  influential , as they encompass the majority of voters , writers , teachers , journalists , and editors .
सबसे societal रुझान  in the US originate within the middle classes .
The following is a list of Saturday Night Live  डाल सदस्यों , पास्ट और  present .
The cast members of Saturday Night Live were originally referred to as the `` Not Ready For  प्रधान समय खिलाड़ी  '' .
The original cast ( l to r ) : Laraine Newman ,  जॉन belushi , जेन कर्टिन , gilda radner ,  Dan Aykroyd , Garrett Morris , and Chevy Chase
Ruins from the 1906 San Francisco earthquake ,  remembered as एक of the worst  natural disasters in United States history
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an event of substantial extent causing significant physical  क्षति or विनाश , घाटा of जीवन , or drastic बदलें to the पर्यावरण  .
A disaster can be  ostensively पारिभाषित as कोई  tragic event stemming from events such as earthquakes , floods , catastrophic accidents , fires , or explosions .
It is a phenomenon  कि can कारण  damage to life and property and destroy the economic , social and cultural life of people .
In contemporary academia  , आपदाओं हैं देखी as  the consequence of inappropriately managed risk .
These risks are  the उत्पाद of  a combination of both hazard/s and vulnerability .
Hazards that strike in areas  साथ कम vulnerability होगा never  become disasters , as is the case in uninhabited regions .
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all deaths caused by disasters  occur in विकासशील देशों , और नुकसान due to प्राकृतिक आपदाओं हैं 20 टाइम्स वृहद ( as a प्रतिशत  of GDP ) in developing countries than in industrialized countries .
In computing , booting ( also known as booting up ) is the initial set of operations that a computer  प्रणाली performs जब विद्युत  power to the CPU is switched on .
The process begins when a computer is  turned on लिये the पहला समय or is re-energized  after being turned off , and ends when the computer is ready to perform its normal operations .
On modern general purpose computers , this can take tens of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test , locating and initializing peripheral  डिवाइस , और तब ढूंढना , लदान और starting  an operating system .
Many computer systems also allow these  परिचालन to be initiated by a तन्त्र कमांड बगैर साइकिलिंग शक्ति , in कया  is known as a soft reboot , though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot .
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the main operating system or runtime  पर्यावरण लिये the कंप्यूटर बाद पूर्णता  of the self-tests .
The computer term boot is short for bootstrap or bootstrap load  और गर्भाशयी इससे the phrase to खींचो oneself up  by one 's bootstraps .
The usage calls attention to the requirement that , if most software is loaded onto a computer by other software already running on the  कंप्यूटर , कुछ यांत्रिकी जरूर मौजूद to लोड आरंभिक तन्त्र onto the कंप्यूटर  .
Early computers used a variety of ad-hoc methods to  मिलेंगी a छोटी कार्यक्रम into  memory to solve this problem .
The invention of integrated circuit read-only memory ( ROM ) of  विभिन्न प्रकार हल इस  paradox by allowing computers to be shipped with a start up program that could not be erased .
Growth in  the क्षमता  of ROM has allowed ever more elaborate start up procedures to be implemented .
On general purpose  कंप्यूटर , the बूट प्रक्रम begins  with the execution of an initial program stored in boot ROMs or read in another fashion .
In some  पुरानी कंप्यूटर ,  the initial program might have been the application to run , if no operating system was used , or the operating system .
In other computers , the initial program is a boot loader that may then load into random-access memory ( RAM ) , from nonvolatile secondary storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or , in some older computers , from a medium such as punched cards , punched tape , or magnetic tape in older computers , the binary  कोड of an ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण और तब चलाएँ  it .
If the boot loader is limited in its size and capabilities , it may , instead , load a larger and more capable secondary boot  लोडर , जिससे होता तब लोड  the operating system or runtime environment .
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot sequence to  शुरू कामकाज  and when turned on may simply run operational programs that are stored in ROM .
Firebird is an open source  एसक्यूएल रिलेशनल डेटाबेस  management system that runs on Linux , Windows , and a variety of Unix .
The database forked  इससे borland 's खोलें सोर्स  edition of InterBase in 2000 , but since Firebird 1.5 the code has been largely rewritten .
Outsourcing  is the contracting  out of an internal business process to a third-party organization .
The  अभ्यास of contracting  a business process out to a third party rather than staffing it internally is common in the modern economy .
The term ``  आउटसोर्सिंग '' became लोकप्रिय in  the United States near the turn of the 21st century .
Outsourcing sometimes  involves transferring कर्मचारी और  assets from one firm to another , but not always .
The definition of outsourcing includes both foreign and  घरेलू contracting , और sometimes शामिल offshoring  , which means relocating a business function to another country .
Financial savings from lower international labor rates is a big  प्रेरणा लिये outsourcing/offshoring  .
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing , which entails bringing  प्रक्रियाओं संभाला by third-party  firms in-house , and is sometimes accomplished via vertical integration .
However  , a कारोबार can provide a अनुबंध  service to another business without necessarily insourcing that business process .
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS  ) , a कंडीशन in इंसानो in जिससे प्रगतिशील विफलता of the  immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive .
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood , semen ,  vaginal द्रव , pre-ejaculate , or स्तन  milk .
Within these bodily fluids , HIV is present as both free virus  अणु और वायरस भीतर संक्रमित  immune cells .
HIV infects vital cells in the human immune system  ऐसे as हेल्पर t कोशिकाएं ( specifically cd4 + t  cells ) , macrophages , and dendritic cells .
HIV  संक्रमण लीड to कम स्तर of cd4+ t कोशिकाएं through a क्रमांक of mechanisms सहित : apoptosis  of uninfected bystander cells , direct viral killing of infected cells , and killing of infected CD4+ T cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize infected cells .
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a critical level , cell-mediated immunity is lost , and the body becomes progressively more susceptible  to opportunistic infections .
The  firepole in a  fire station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube  or पाइप संस्थापित between floors in आग स्टेशन , allowing अग्निशमन responding  to an alarm to quickly descend to the ground floor faster than by using a standard staircase .
The device was invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon , in Chicago , Illinois , although it is often  incorrectly credited to the बोस्टन  Fire Department .
Mary Poppins is the title character of a series of children 's  किताबे लिखा by  P. L. Travers .
Throughout the Mary Poppins  श्रेणी , जिससे lasted  from 1934 to 1988 , Mary Shepard was the illustrator and acted as a second author .
The books centre on a magical English nanny  , मरियम poppins .
She is blown  by the ईस्ट हवा to क्रमांक सत्रह चेरी पेड़  Lane , London , and into the Banks ' household to care for their children .
Encounters with chimney sweeps , shopkeepers and various  adventures follow जबतक मरियम poppins abruptly पत्ते  , i.e. , `` pops-out '' .
The adventures take place  over a कुल  of eight books .
However , only the first three  किताबे विशेषता मरियम  Poppins arriving and leaving .
The later five books recount  previously unrecorded adventures  from her original three visits .
As  P. L. ट्रेवर्स explains in उसके परिचय to मरियम poppins  in the Park , `` She can not forever arrive and depart . ''
The books were  adapted in 1964 into a  musical Disney film starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke .
In 2004 , Disney Theatrical  उत्पादित a स्टेज musical  adaptation in the West End theatre .
The stage musical was  transferred to ब्रॉडवे  in 2006 where it ran until its closing on March 3 , 2013 .
It has been highly successful , as was  the 1964 फिल्मी  .
The Last Song is  a 2010 अमरीकी coming of आयु टीन  romantic drama film developed alongside Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the same name .
The film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson in  उसके विशेषता फिल्मी directorial डेब्यू  and co-written by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie .
The Last Song stars Miley Cyrus , Liam  hemsworth , और ग्रेग kinnear और फ़ॉलो a troubled किशोरावस्था as  she reconnects with her estranged father and falls in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town .
The film is distributed by  touchstone  Pictures .
Sparks  थी approached to लिखें दोनो  the film 's screenplay and the novel .
Sparks completed the screenplay in January 2009 ,  prior to the पूर्णता of the अनोखा  , making The Last Song his first script to be optioned for film .
The setting , originally in North Carolina  जैसे the अनोखा ,  moved to Georgia after the states had campaigned for months to host production .
Upon beginning production in Tybee Island , Georgia and nearby Savannah , The Last Song became the first movie to be  दोनो शॉट और नियत in tybee द्वीप  .
Filming lasted from June 15 to August 18 , 2009 with much of it occurring  on the द्वीप 's बीच और  pier .
The  पिछला सोंग थी originally अनुसूचित लिये चौड़ी रिलीज on  January 8 , 2010 , but was postponed to March 31 , 2010 .
लिखा simlish
Simlish is a fictional  भाषा प्रदर्शित  in EA Games ' Sim series of games .
It  debuted in simcopter  , and has been especially prominent in The Sims , The Sims 2 and The Sims 3 .
The Sims  विकास टोली निर्मित the अद्वितीय simlish  language by experimenting with fractured Ukrainian , French , Latin , Finnish , English , Fijian , Cebuano , and Tagalog .
Simlish can also be heard in SimCity 4 , SimCity Societies  और simcity  2013 , but far less frequently .
Civilized Creatures in Spore can also be taught to speak  simlish  .
It is also featured to an extent in Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's  simgolf  .
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need for dialogue in the game , but thought that using a real language would make it sound too repetitive and would also be too costly to hire translators  लिये संसार भाषाएं  .
Initially , inspired by the Native American code talkers of World War II , Sims creator Will Wright and language expert  मार्क gimbel सुझाया experimenting साथ the navajo भाषा to बनाएँ  Simlish .
However , they ultimately decided that Simlish worked best as a `` language '' made up of gibberish words that could n't be translated , so that its meaning would be left open to the  कल्पना of the खिलाड़ी  .
Wright later  commented कि using `` बकवास भाषा  '' turned out to be the right development choice , as people were capable of imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real one .
The actual sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by voice actors  स्टीफन kearin और gerri lawlor  .
An example of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on  ब्लेड जड़ें of a v2500 iae वायुयान  engine .
Step 1 : The UT probe is placed on the  रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected  with the help of a special borescope tool ( video probe ) .
कदम 2 :  Instrument settings are input .
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over  the ब्लेड रूट  .
In this case , an  indication ( शिखर in the आंकड़ा ) through the  red line ( or gate ) indicates a good blade ; an indication to the left of that range indicates a crack .
Principle of  अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण  .
LEFT : A probe  भेजना a  sound wave into a test material .
There are two indications , one from the initial pulse of the  जांच , और  the second due to the back wall echo .
RIGHT  : a defect  creates a third indication and simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back wall indication .
The depth of the  defect is संकल्पित  by the ratio D/E
In ultrasonic testing ( UT ) , very short  अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves साथ बीच बारंबारता ranging इससे 0.1-15 mhz  and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize materials .
A common example  is अल्ट्रासोनिक मोटाई मापन , जिससे परीक्षण the मोटाई of the परीक्षण  object , for example , to monitor pipework corrosion .
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on steel and other metals and alloys , though it can also be used  on कंक्रीट , लकडी और composites , albeit साथ कम रेज़ोल्यूशन  .
It is a form of non-destructive testing used in many industries including aerospace ,  ऑटोमोटिव और अन्य  transportation sectors .
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ) , also called ductus deferens ( Latin : ``  carrying-away पोत '' ; बहुवचन : ductus deferentes ) , is भाग of the पुरूष anatomy of अनेक vertebrates  ; they transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation .
vascular ischemia  of the toes with characteristic cyanosis .
In medicine , ischemia , also  spelled  as ischaemia or ischæmia , ( ; from Greek language ισχαιμία , ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a restriction or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean , haema blood ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues , causing a shortage of oxygen and glucose needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ) .
Ischemia is generally caused by problems with blood vessels , with resultant damage to   or dysfunction of tissue .
It also means local anemia in a  दिए भाग of a देह sometimes resulting  from congestion ( such as vasoconstriction , thrombosis or embolism ) .
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome , also known as  trisomy 21 , is a जेनेटिक विकार caused by the उपस्थिति  of all or part of a third copy of chromosome 21 .
Down  सिंड्रोम is the सबसे  common chromosome abnormality in humans .
It is typically associated with a delay in cognitive ability ( mental  retardation , or mr ) और शारीरिक विकास , और a particular नियत  of facial characteristics .
The average IQ of young adults with Down syndrome is  around 50 , whereas यंग वयस्कों बगैर the कंडीशन  typically have an IQ of 100 .
( MR has historically  महरूम पारिभाषित as an  IQ below 70 . )
A large proportion of  individuals साथ bas सिंड्रोम have a कठोर उपाधि of बौद्धिक  disability .
Down syndrome is named after John Langdon Down , the British  चिकित्सक जो वर्णित  the syndrome in 1866 .
The condition   was clinically described earlier by Jean Etienne Dominique Esquirol in 1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844 .
Down syndrome was  पहचाना as a chromosome  21 trisomy by Dr. Jérôme Lejeune in 1959 .
Down syndrome can be identified in a baby at birth  or पहले जनम  by prenatal screening .
Pregnancies with  इस निदान हैं प्रायः  terminated .
The CDC  estimates कि परिचय एक of  every 691 babies born in the United States each year is born with Down syndrome .
Many children with Down syndrome  हैं शिक्षित in नियमित स्कूल वर्ग जबकि अन्य आवश्यकता  specialised educational facilities .
Some children graduate from high school , and , in the US , there are increasing opportunities for  participating in  post-secondary education .
Education and proper care has been shown  to improve विशेषता of  life significantly .
Many adults  साथ bas सिंड्रोम हैं समर्थ  to work at paid employment in the community , while others require a more sheltered work environment .
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes , or night sweats if they happen at night ) are a symptom which may have several other causes , but which is often caused by the changing hormone  स्तर कि हैं characteristic  of menopause .
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L . 78-346 , 58 Stat . 284m ) , known informally as the G.I . Bill , was a  विधि कि provided a दायरा of लाभ लिये returning संसार युद्ध ii दिग्गजों ( commonly  referred to as G.I.s ) .
Benefits included low-cost  mortgages , low-interest लोन to प्रारंभ a कारोबार or फार्म , नकदी भुगतान  of tuition and living expenses to attend college , high school or vocational education , as well as one year of unemployment compensation .
It was available to every veteran who  था महरूम on क्रियाशील ड्यूटी दौरान  the war years for at least ninety days and had not been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required .
By the end of the program in 1956 , roughly 2.2 million veterans had used the G.I . Bill education benefits in order to attend colleges or universities ,  और an अतिरिक्त 6.6 लाख  used these benefits for some kind of training program .
Since  the असली 1944 विधि , the पद रै आइये to शामिल  other veteran benefit programs created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service .
Historians and economists consider the G.I  . विधेयक a प्रमुख राजनैतिक success—especially  in contrast to the treatments of World War I veterans—and a major contribution to America 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth .
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred in the United States in the 1970s as a result of the June 17 , 1972 break-in at the Democratic National Committee headquarters at the Watergate  दफ्तर जटिल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , और the निक्सन  administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement .
The scandal eventually led to the resignation of Richard Nixon , the President  of the संयुक्त राज्य ,  on August 9 , 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President .
The scandal  भी  resulted in the indictment , trial , conviction , and incarceration of forty-three persons , dozens of whom were Nixon 's top administration officials .
the affair began साथ the गिरफ़्तार  of five men for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC ) headquarters at the Watergate complex on June 17 , 1972 .
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on the burglars to a slush fund used by the Committee for the Re-Election  of the अध्यक्ष , the आधिकारिक संगठन of निक्सन 's अभियान .
In July 1973 , as evidence mounted against the president 's staff , including testimony provided by former staff members in an investigation conducted by the Senate Watergate Committee , it was revealed that  अध्यक्ष निक्सन था a tape-recording प्रणाली in उसके कार्यालयों  and he had recorded many conversations .
Recordings from these tapes implicated the president , revealing he had attempted to cover up the questionable ( and illegal )  goings-on कि था लिया प्लेस दौरान उसके प्रशासन , दोनो पहले और बाद the break-in  .
After a  protracted श्रेणी of कड़वा अदालत लड़ाइयों , the  U.S. Supreme Court unanimously ruled that the president had to hand over the tapes to government investigators ; he ultimately complied .
Facing near-certain  महाभियोग in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और a दमदार सम्भावना  of a conviction in the Senate , Nixon resigned the presidency on August 9 , 1974 .
His successor ,  जेराल्ड  Ford , then issued a pardon to him .
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly  lansing और स्पेंसर ) is a fictional अक्षर on the  ABC Daytime soap opera General Hospital .
एलिज़ाबेथ is the पोती  of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John Beradino ) , one of the originating core characters of the series .
Rebecca Herbst originated the character on August 1 , 1997 and has been the  तभी अनुबंध अभिनेत्री to खेल the  role .
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings , Lucky Spencer and  एलिज़ाबेथ webber और  Jason Morgan and Elizabeth Webber .
The United States presidency of  रोनाल्ड reagan  , also known as the Reagan administration , was a Republican administration headed by Ronald Reagan from January 20 , 1981 , to January 20 , 1989 .
Domestically , the administration favored reducing government programs and  introduced the largest  across-the-board tax cuts in American history .
The economic policies enacted in 1981  , known  as `` Reaganomics `` , were an example of supply-side economics .
Reagan aimed to encourage  उद्यमिता  and limit the growth of social spending , as well as the reduction of regulation and inflation .
Economic growth saw a strong recovery in  the 1980s  , helping Reagan to win a landslide re-election .
The  नेशनल कर्ज़ increased  significantly , however .
Regarding foreign policy , the  प्रशासन थी steadfastly anti-communist , कॉलिंग  the Soviet Union an `` evil empire `` and ending 1970s détente .
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by his predecessor , including an invasion of  हरा , the पहला प्रमुख विदेशी कार्रवाई by u.S. सैनिकों  since the end of the Vietnam War .
The `` Reagan Doctrine ``  controversially granted सहायता to अर्धसैनिक शक्तियां seeking  to overthrow communist governments , particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan .
Reagan also promoted new technologies such as missile defense systems in order to  confront the soviets और उनके allies  .
In diplomacy , Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime  मंत्री मार्गरेट थैचर  , and he met with Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev four times , aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution '' , or the Age of Reagan in recognition of the political realignment both within and beyond the U.S. in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in  फ़्री बाज़ार  .
The Reagan administration worked toward the  पतन of सोवियत साम्यवादी , और  it did collapse just as he left office .
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar world with  the u.S. as the संसार 's  sole superpower .
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several Reagan aides during his second term , Reagan himself left office with a 63 percent  स्वीकृति दरजा , एक of the  higher approval ratings of departing presidents .
After years of unstinting praise from the right , and  unrelenting आलोचना इससे the बाएँ , इतिहासकार दाउद हेनरी पाता  that by 2009 a consensus had emerged among scholars that Reagan revived conservatism and turned the nation to the right by demonstrating a `` pragmatic conservatism '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system .
Furthermore , says Henry , the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the  प्रेसिडेंसी और अमरीकी self-confidence , और contributed critically  to ending the Cold War .
Crude death rate by country (  2006 )  .
मृत्यु रेट is a माप of the क्रमांक of मौतों  ( in general , or due to a specific cause ) in a population .
Scaled to the  आकार of कि जनसांख्यिकी  , per unit of time .
मृत्यु रेट is typically expressed in इकाई of मौतों प्रति  1000 individuals per year ; thus , a mortality rate of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population , or 0.95 % out of the total .
It is distinct from morbidity rate , which refers to  the क्रमांक of individuals in ग़रीब स्वास्थ्य दौरान  a given time period ( the prevalence rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ) .
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the number of deaths among a set of diagnosed  हॉस्पिटल मामले लिये a बीमारी or चोट , बल्कि than  for the general population of a country or ethnic group .
This disease mortality statistic is more  precisely referred to as ``  case fatality rate `` ( CFR ) .
One  distinguishes:
The crude death rate , the  कुल क्रमांक of मौतों  per year per 1000 people .
the crude death rate for the whole world is  परिचय 8.37 प्रति 1000 प्रति  year according to the current CIA World Factbook .
The perinatal mortality rate , the sum of neonatal  मौतों और fetal मौतों ( stillbirths ) प्रति  1000 births .
The  मातृ मृत्यु अनुपात ,  the number of maternal deaths per 100,000 live births in same time period .
The maternal mortality rate , the number of maternal deaths per 1,000 women of reproductive age  in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally  defined as 15–44 years of age ) .
The infant mortality rate , the number of deaths of children  कम than 1 साल बूढ़ा प्रति 1000 सजीव  births .
The child mortality rate , the number of  मौतों of children कम than 5 सालो बूढ़ा  per 1000 live births .
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional comparison to  the संख्याएँ of मौतों कि होता have महरूम अपेक्षित  if the population had been of a standard composition in terms of age , gender , etc .
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR ) - This  refers to the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल  per 1000 people of a given age ( e.g . age 62 last birthday ) .
In regard to the or failure  of चिकित्सा उपचार or  procedures , one would also distinguish:
The early mortality rate , the total number of deaths in the early stages of  an जारी उपचार , or in the काल तत्काल following an उपचार  .
The late mortality rate , the total number of deaths in the  लेट चरण of an जारी  treatment , or a significant length of time after an acute treatment .
Note that the crude death rate as  पारिभाषित ऊपर और लागू  to a whole population can give a misleading impression .
The crude death rate depends on  the आयु ( और लिंग )  specific mortality rates and the age ( and gender ) distribution of the population .
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for developed nations than in less-developed  देशों , despite जीवन प्रत्याशा होने उच्चतर  in developed countries due to standards of health being better .
इस happens क्युकी विकसित देशों typically have a completely अलग जनसांख्यिकी  age distribution , with a much higher proportion of older people , due to both lower recent birth rates and lower mortality rates .
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a life  तालिका जिससे shows the मृत्यु रेट separately  for each age .
A life table is  जरुरी to दे  a good estimate of life expectancy .
An  otoacoustic उत्सर्जन (  OAE ) is a sound which is generated from within the inner ear .
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948 , its existence was first demonstrated experimentally by David Kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have since been shown to arise  by a क्रमांक of अलग  cellular mechanisms within the inner ear .
Studies have shown  कि oaes गायब बाद the भीतरी कान रै महरूम  damaged , so OAEs are often used in the laboratory and the clinic as a measure of inner ear health .
broadly बोलना , वहीँ हैं दो प्रकार of otoacoustic emissions  : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( SOAEs ) , which can occur without external stimulation , and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ) , which require an evoking stimulus .
Hurricane Tomas was  the उन्नीसवीं नामित तूफ़ान और  twelfth hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season .
Tomas developed from a tropical  वेव ईस्ट of the windward आइलैंड्स on  October 29 .
Quickly intensifying  into a hurricane , it स्थानांतरित through  the Windward Islands and passed very near Saint Lucia .
After reaching Category 2  औकात on the saffir-simpson  scale , Tomas quickly weakened to a tropical storm in the central Caribbean Sea , due to strong wind shear and dry air .
Tomas later  regained hurricane औकात as it reorganized  near the Windward passage .
Throughout the hurricane 's path , 71 people are known to have been killed , 14  of जिसको यहूद in संत लूसिया  .
Monetary losses throughout the Windward Islands were  अनुमानित at us $ 588 लाख  , mainly in Saint Lucia .
In the wake of the storm in Haiti , flooding intensified an ongoing cholera outbreak  indirectly causing अधिक  fatalities .
According to a report released in December 2010 , 55 people were killed in Cuba and  hispanola , हालांकि the वितरण of ये fatalities  are unknown .
Overall  क्षति इससे the  storm was at least $ 741 million .
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2 , 1959 ) is an American comedian , actress , satirist , singer and internet blogger  बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a  cast member of the NBC television sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992 .
She has received attention as a vocal critic of President Barack Obama , and is an active  भागीदार in the चाय  Party movement .
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by heavy reliance on techniques like  fragmentation , विरोधाभास , और questionable narrators , और  is often ( though not exclusively ) defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era .
Postmodern works are seen as a reaction against Enlightenment  सोच और modernist  approaches to literature .
Postmodern literature ,  जैसे postmodernism as a पूरे  , tends to resist definition or classification as a `` movement '' .
Indeed , the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory , particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches , and the subversions of the implicit contract between author , text and reader by which its works are often  characterised , have led to pre-modern fictions ऐसे as cervantes ' डॉन quixote ( 1605,1615 ) और laurence sterne 's eighteenth-century व्यंग्य tristram shandy होने retrospectively  inducted into the fold .
While there is little consensus on the precise  विशेषताएँ , पैमाना , और महत्व of postmodern साहित्य , as is प्रायः  the case with artistic movements , postmodern literature is commonly defined in relation to a precursor .
For example , a postmodern literary  कार्य tends  not to conclude with the neatly tied-up ending as is often found in modernist literature , but often parodies it .
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate chance  over शिल्प , और  further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority .
another characteristic of postmodern  literature is the questioning of distinctions between high and low culture through the use of pastiche , the combination of subjects and genres not previously deemed fit for literature .
Enigma is an electronic musical project founded in Germany by Michael  cretu , दाउद fairstein और फ़्रैंक पीटरसन  in 1990 .
The Romanian-born Cretu  conceived the पहेली प्रोजेक्ट जबकि working in जर्मनी , लकिन आधारित उसके रिकॉर्डिंग  studio A.R.T . Studios in Ibiza , Spain , from the early 1990s until May 2009 , where he has recorded all of Enigma 's studio releases to date .
cretu  is both the composer and the producer of the project .
His former wife , pop singer  सैंड्रा , प्रायः provided  vocals on Enigma tracks .
Jens Gad co-arranged and played  गिटार on तीन of the  Enigma albums .
Peter Cornelius also  contributed to पहेली  during the 1990s .
सात स्टुडियो एल्बम have महरूम  produced under the name of the project .
Scooby-Doo is  an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड कार्टून मताधिकार  , comprising several animated television series produced from 1969 to the present day .
The  असली  series , Scooby-Doo , Where Are You !
, was created for Hanna-Barbera Productions by writers  जो माणिक्य और केन स्पीयर्स  in 1969 .
This Saturday morning cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones , Daphne Blake , Velma Dinkley  , और norville `` shaggy '' रोजर्स  — and their talking brown Great Dane dog named Scooby-Doo , who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps .
Following the success of the original series ,  hanna-barbera और इसके successor warner ब्रदर्स . एनिमेशन have  produced numerous follow-up and spin-off animated series and several related works , including television specials and telefilms , a line of direct-to-video films , and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films .
Some versions of Scooby-Doo feature different variations on the show 's  अलौकिक थीम , और शामिल वर्ण ऐसे as स्कूबी 's cousin scooby-dum और भतीजे  Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters .
Scooby-Doo was originally broadcast on CBS from  1969 to 1976 , जब  it moved to ABC .
ABC aired the show until canceling it in 1986 , and presented a  spin-off featuring the वर्ण as children , a pup नामित scooby-doo  , from 1988 until 1991 .
Two new Scooby-Doo series , What 's New ,  scooby-doo  ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue ! ] ] , aired as part of Kids WB on The WB network  और इसके successor ,  The CW network , from 2002 until 2008 .
The most recent  scooby-doo  series , Scooby-Doo !
Mystery  incorporated , aired on कार्टून  Network from 2010 to 2013 .
Repeats of the various Scooby-Doo series are broadcast frequently on Cartoon Network  और boomerang in the संयुक्त राज्य  and other countries .
Call of Duty is  a first-person और  third-person shooter computer/ video game franchise .
The  श्रेणी began on the  PC , and later expanded to consoles and handhelds .
अनेक  spin-off games have also been released .
The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II , this  शामिल : कॉल of ड्यूटी , कॉल  of Duty 2 , and Call of Duty 3 .
Beginning with Modern Warfare , which is set in modern times , the series has shifted focus away  इससे संसार युद्ध ii  .
Call of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare ( released  नवम्बर 2007 ) थी followed by कॉल of ड्यूटी : संसार at  War and Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2 .
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the Cold War , while  आधुनिक warfare 3 ( released नवम्बर 2011 ) takes  place in the near-future setting .
Black Ops 2 ( Released November  13 , 2012 ) takes प्लेस in the  year 2025 .
The  कॉल of ड्यूटी  games are published and owned by Activision with Aspyr Media publishing it for Apple OS X .
जबकि the स्टुडियो अनंत वार्ड primarily स्टिल  develops them , Treyarch has also developed several of the titles with the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other .
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter Interactive , Spark Unlimited , Amaze Entertainment , n-Space ,  विद्रोह developments , ideaworks खेल स्टुडियो , sledgehammer  Games and nStigate Games .
The games use a variety of engines , including the id Tech 3 , the  treyarch ngl , और the iw  5.0 .
Other products in the franchise  शामिल a लकीर of कार्रवाई आंकड़े designed by  Plan-B Toys , a card game created by Upper Deck , and a comic book mini-series published by WildStorm .
as of नवम्बर 11 ,  2011 , the Call Of Duty series have sold over 100 million copies .
As of March 31 , 2012 there are 40 million monthly active players across all of the Call of Duty titles , with 10  लाख कॉल of ड्यूटी : elite  users and 2 million paying annual members .
Over 1.6 billion hours of  ऑनलाइन gameplay have महरूम logged  Modern Warfare 3 since its 2011 release .
The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person , whether such property is transferred via  a होगा , according to the राज्य कानून of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of the मौत of the  owner , such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust , or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries .
The estate tax is one  भाग of the एकीकृत  Gift and Estate Tax system in the United States .
The other part of the system , the gift tax , imposes a tax on transfers of property during a person 's life ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a  व्यक्ति want to दे दूर  his/her estate .
In  जोड to the संघीय  government , many states also impose an estate tax , with the state version called either an estate tax or an inheritance tax .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of the एस्टेट  tax call it the `` death tax '' .
If an asset is left to a spouse or a Federally recognized  दान , the कर प्रायः करता  not apply .
In addition , up to $  5,250,000 can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत , पहले and/or  upon their death , without incurring federal gift or estate taxes .
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an English actor and musician , known as the  सीसे सिंगर और लय guitarist  of the rock band Bush .
Following Bush 's separation in 2002 , which lasted for eight years , he was the lead singer and  guitarist लिये संस्थान , और बाद  began a solo career .
When  performing सोलो , गेविन plays  songs from his extensive musical libraries .
Rossdale has been  क्रमित in the शीर्ष  100 Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ) .
raffaello sanzio da  Urbino ( April 6 or March 28 , 1483 – April 6 , 1520 ) , better known simply as Raphael , was an Italian painter and architect of the High Renaissance .
His work is admired for its clarity of form and ease of composition  और लिये इसके विज़ुअल उपलब्धि  of the Neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur .
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci , he forms the traditional  ट्रिनिटी of ग्रेट मास्टर्स  of that period .
Raphael was enormously productive  , कार्यशील an unusually विशाल  workshop , and despite his death at 37 , a large body of his work remains .
Many of his works are found in the Vatican Palace , where the frescoed  राफेल कक्ष यहूद the सेंट्रल , और the largest  , work of his career .
The best known work is The School of Athens in  the वेटिकन stanza देला  Segnatura .
After his early years in Rome much of his work was self-designed ,  लकिन लिये the सबसे भाग चलाया by the कार्यशाला  from his drawings , with considerable loss of quality .
He was extremely influential in his lifetime , though outside Rome his  कार्य थी ज़्यादातर ज्ञात इससे उसके collaborative  printmaking .
After his death , the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th centuries  , जब राफेल 's अधिक निर्मल  and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest models .
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles , first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria , then a  काल of परिचय चार सालो ( इससे 1504–1508 ) absorbing the कलाकारी  traditions of Florence , followed by his last hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome , working for two Popes and their close associates .
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born October 28 ,  1967 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  .
She became a Hollywood  स्टार बाद headlining the रोमांटिक कॉमेडी pretty  Woman ( 1990 ) , which grossed $ 464 million worldwide .
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman , she won  the अकादमी  Award for Best Actress for her performance in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ) .
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ) , My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ) , Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ) ,  नॉटिंग हिल ( 1999 ) , runaway बहू ( 1999 ) , समंदर 's ग्यारह ( 2001 ) , समंदर 's बारह ( 2004 )  , Charlie Wilson 's War ( 2007 ) , Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ) , Eat Pray Love ( 2010 ) , and Mirror Mirror ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion , making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts .
Roberts had become one of the  highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in the संसार  , topping The Hollywood Reporters annual `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006 .
Her fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman was $ 300,000 ; in 2003 , she was paid an unprecedented $ 25 million for her role in Mona Lisa  मुस्कान ( 2003 ) .
As of 2010 , Roberts 's net worth was  अनुमानित  to be $ 140 million .
Roberts has been named one of People  पत्रिका 's `` 50 सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों in the संसार  '' eleven times , tied with Halle Berry .
In  2011 , वो थी नामित एक of the `` 100  Hottest Women of All-Time '' by Men 's Health .
In 2001 , Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the 11th  सबसे शक्तिशाली स्त्री  in the United States .
Mark Elliot  zuckerberg ( born may 14 , 1984  ) is an American computer programmer and Internet entrepreneur .
He is best known as one  of पाँच co-founders  of the social networking website Facebook .
As of April 2013 , Zuckerberg is the chairman and chief  कार्यपालिका of फेसबुक , inc. और in 2013 उसके निजी माल  was estimated to be US $ 13 .3 billion .
Together with his college roommates and fellow  हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो  Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes , Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms .
The group then introduced Facebook onto  अन्य campuses देशभर और स्थानांतरित to  Palo Alto , California , United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards .
In 2007 , at the  आयु of twenty-three सालो , zuckerberg became a अरबपति  as a result of Facebook and the number of Facebook users worldwide reached a total of one billion in 2012 .
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by others in the group , who  claimed a share of  the company based upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook .
Since 2010 , Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest and most  influential लोगों in the संसार by समय पत्रिका as a भाग of इसके व्यक्ति of the  Year accolade .
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg  in the 2010 हॉलीवुड फिल्मी the सोशल संजाल in  which the rise of Facebook is portrayed .
The Mayflower was the ship that in  1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों , सहित  a core group of Separatists , to New England .
Their  स्टोरी is एक of travail और  survival in a harsh New World environment .
framedthe
Committee of  तरीके और अर्थात् is the मुख्य कर  -writing committee of the United States House of Representatives .
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any other  हाउस समितियों जबतक वे  apply for a waiver from their party 's congressional leadership .
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation , tariffs and other  revenue-raising उपायों , as खूब as a  number of other programs including:
सोशल  Security
बेरोजगारी  benefits
medicare
Enforcement of  चाइल्ड  support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy Families , a  संघीय welfare कार्यक्रम
Foster care and  अपनाना कार्यक्रम
The U.S. Constitution requires that all bills regarding taxation  जरूर originate in the  House of Representatives .
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this  कमेटी , the कमेटी is  very influential , as is its Senate counterpart , the U.S. Senate Committee on Finance .
The Ways and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by Charlie Rangel , who had taken a leave of absence as chairman until House  आचार उल्लंघनों यहूद  resolved .
However , his leave of absence as  अध्यक्ष थी शासित to be  a resignation .
पीट स्टार्क resigned as एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष , so sander levin आयोजित कि स्थिति जबतक the प्रारंभ of the 112th कॉंग्रेस .
Dave Camp became the committee chair for the 112th  कॉंग्रेस , बाद the republicans जीती  control of the House in the 2010 election .
The blue  व्हेल ( balaenoptera musculus ) is a समुद्री स्तनधारी  belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ) .
At in length and or more in weight , it is the  largest ज्ञात एनिमल to have कभी  existed .
Long and slender , the blue whale 's body can be various shades of  bluish-grey dorsally और somewhat  lighter underneath .
There are at least three distinct subspecies :  B. m. musculus of the उत्तर अटलांटिक और उत्तर प्रशांत ,  B. m. intermedia of the Southern Ocean and B. m. brevicauda ( also known as the pygmy blue whale ) found in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean .
B. m. indica , found in the  भारतीय समंदर , may  be another subspecies .
As with other baleen  whales , इसके आहार  consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill .
Blue whales were abundant in nearly all the oceans on Earth until the beginning of  the बीसवीं  century .
For over a century , they were hunted  लगभग to extinction  by whalers until protected by the international community in 1966 .
A 2002 report estimated there  यहूद 5,000 to 12,000 ब्लू whales  worldwide , located in at least five groups .
More  हाल शोध into the सानो subspecies  suggests this may be an underestimate .
Before whaling , the largest population was in the Antarctic , numbering approximately  239,000 ( दायरा 202,000 to 311,000  ) .
There remain only much  छोटी ( around 2,000 ) एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of  the eastern North Pacific , Antarctic , and Indian Ocean groups .
There are two more groups in the  उत्तर अटलांटिक  , and at least two in the Southern Hemisphere .
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var . scolymus ) is a  किस्में of a प्रजाति of thistle cultivated as  a food .
The  खाद्य पदार्थ is कलियों कि रूप भीतर  the flower heads before the flowers come into bloom .
The buds go away or change to a  coarse , मुश्किल खाद्य  form when the flower blooms .
The  uncultivated or जंगली किस्में  of the species is called a cardoon .
It is a  बारहमासी संयंत्र देशी  to the Mediterranean region .
The United States one hundred-dollar  विधेयक ( $ 100 ) is  a denomination of United States currency .
U.S. statesman , inventor  , और राजनयिक बेंजामिन  Franklin is currently featured on the obverse of the bill .
On the reverse of  the banknote is  an image of Independence Hall .
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has  महरूम मुद्रित चूंकि जुलाई 13 , 1969  , when the denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were retired .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says  the औसत जीवन of a $ 100 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने  ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to wear and tear .
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '' , in reference to the use of Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on the  denomination , or `` c-notes '' , आधारित on the रोमन  numeral for 100 .
The bill is one of two denominations printed today that does not feature a  अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  ; the other is the $ 10 bill , featuring Alexander Hamilton .
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the reverse , according to  the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी  and Printing , shows approximately 4:10 .
One hundred hundred-dollar bills are  वितरित by संघीय  Reserve Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ) .
The Series 2009 $  100 विधेयक redesign थी अनावरण on अप्रैल 21 , 2010 , और  was to be issued to the public on February 11 , 2011 , but production was shut down in December 2010 because as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw .
A  लंबवत क्रीज in  the paper reveals a blank space on the bill when pulled out .
In their  बदलना , और  continuing the high demand of this denomination , the Series 2006A was launched retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ) .
On April 24 , 2013 , the Federal  आरक्षित घोषित  the new $ 100 bill would enter circulation on October 8 , 2013 .
King David in robes  of a बीज़ान्टिन  emperor .
Miniature from  the  Paris Psalter .
David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the Hebrew Bible , was the second  किंग of the संयुक्त किंगडम of इसराईल , और according to the  New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke , an ancestor of Jesus .
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970  bce , उसके शासनकाल over यहूदा c. 1010–1002  BCE , and his reign over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE .
The Books of Samuel , 1 Kings , and 1 Chronicles are the only sources of information on David , although the Tel Dan  stele ( दिनाँक c. 850–835 bce ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ) , पढ़ा as `` हाउस of दाउद '' , जिससे सबसे  scholars take as confirmation of the existence in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of David .
He is depicted as a righteous king , although not  बगैर त्रुटियां , as खूब as an acclaimed योद्धा  , musician , and poet , traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms .
David  is सेंट्रल to यहूदी  , Christian , and Islamic doctrine and culture .
biblical परंपरा  maintains that a direct descendant of David will be the Messiah .
In Islam he is considered to be a prophet  और the किंग of  a nation .
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the  पूंजी और  largest urban agglomerate of Nepal .
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu Metropolitan City at its core , and its sister cities  patan , kirtipur  , Thimi , and Bhaktapur .
It  भी शामिल the recently  recognized urban areas of Shankhapur , Karyabinayak , and Champapur .
Banepa , Dhulikhel , and Panauti are satellite urban areas of  काठमांडू स्तिथ बस  outside the Kathmandu valley .
Kathmandu is also  ज्ञात informally as `` ktm  '' or the `` tri-city '' .
According to a census conducted in 2011 , Kathmandu  metropolis अलोन रै 975,453 निवासियों  ; and the agglomerate has a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants .
The metropolitan  नगर क्षेत्रफल  is and has a population density of 19,250 per km2 .
The city stands  at an उन्नयन of लगभग  in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley of central Nepal .
It is surrounded by four major  kyu : shivapuri , phulchoki  , Nagarjun , and Chandragiri .
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu , Lalitpur ,  और भक्तपुर ) , रै the उच्चतम जनसांख्यिकी  density in the country , and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population .
During Rana and Shah eras , the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the Kathmandu Valley ; it was what  लोगों जो जिया बाहर the घाटी  called it .
During  इस काल , अंग्रेजों इतिहासकारों  called the valley itself `` Nepal Proper '' .
Today , Kathmandu is not only the capital of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal , but also the  मुख्यालय of the सेंट्रल विकास  Region of Nepal .
The Central Region comprises three zones : Bagmati ,  narayani , और जनकपुर  .
Kathmandu  is स्तिथ  in the Bagmati Zone .
Kathmandu is the gateway  to पर्यटन  in Nepal .
It is also the nerve center  of the देश 's  economy .
It has the most advanced infrastructure of any urban area in Nepal , and its  अर्थव्यवस्था is केन्द्रित on पर्यटन  , which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96 .
( Tourism in  काठमांडू अस्वीकृत  thereafter during a period of political unrest , but since then has improved . )
The city has a rich history , spanning nearly  2000 सालो , as inferred  from inscriptions found in the valley .
Religious and cultural  festivities रूप a प्रमुख भाग  of the lives of people residing in Kathmandu .
Most of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and  अनेक अन्य follow  Buddhism .
There are people of other religious beliefs as well , giving  काठमांडू a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन  culture .
नेपाली is the  most commonly spoken language in the city .
नेपाल bhasa is the स्वदेशी भाषा  spoken by the Newar people .
Hindi is widely understood and English  is समझा  by Kathmandu 's educated residents .
the नगर  's literacy rate is 98 % .
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage ,  पर्यटन उद्योग , और अर्थव्यवस्था ; इसलिए युनेस्को 's संसार विरासत साईट सूचियाँ  all three cities ' monuments and attractions together under one heading , `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site `` .
Field hockey , usually referred to simply as hockey ,  is a टोली खेल of the हॉकी परिवार जिससे is निभाई between  two teams of eleven players with hockey sticks and a hard , solid plastic ball .
At the turn of the 21st century , the game is played globally , with  particular लोकप्रियता throughout यूरोपीय , एशिया  , Oceania , and South America – in addition to being the national sport of Pakistan and India .
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada , the  संयुक्त राज्य , और अन्य regions  of the world where the sport of ice hockey is more popular .
During play , goal keepers are the only players who are allowed to touch the ball with any part of their body ( with the exception of a player 's hand considered 'part of the stick ' ) , with this only applying within the  शूटिंग वृत्त ( भी ज्ञात as the d , or शूटिंग चाप  , or just the circle ) , while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick .
The team that scores the most goals by  the समाप्त of the मैच  wins .
If the score is tied at the end of the game , either a draw is declared or the game goes into extra time and/or a penalty shootout  , depending on the प्रतियोगिता 's स्वरूप  .
The governing body of  हॉकी is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय हॉकी संघ ( fih ) , साथ मेन और महिलाओं  being represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games , Commonwealth games , Hockey World Cup , Champions Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup , with many countries running extensive junior , senior , and masters ' club competitions .
The FIH is also responsible for organising the Hockey Rules Board and developing  the नियम लिये the खेल  .
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor hockey , which differs in a number of  respects जबकि मूर्त the प्राथमिक सिद्धान्त of हॉकी  .
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side variant , with a field which is  घटाया to लगभग 40m  × 20m .
With many of the rules remaining the same , including obstruction and feet , there are several key variations - Players may  नहीं उठाएँ the बॉल जबतक शूटिंग on लक्ष्य , खिलाड़ी may नहीं hit the बॉल ( बजाय utilising pushes to ट्रांसफ़र the  ball ) , and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off .
Ethan `` Cane '' Ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from the  अमरीकी सीबीएस साबुन ओपेरा  The Young and the Restless .
He is portrayed by Australian actor Daniel Goddard , who originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the World Turns but was recommended for a role  on the यंग और the बेचैन  instead .
The role was to be portrayed as an American , but Goddard 's Australian descent  बहकावे the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि  .
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the episode airing on January 12 , 2007 as an Australian bartender  in ढूंढें of  his family , a debut that received a mixed response .
Latham created  cane as the बेटे of फिलिप चांसलर ii ( donnelly  Rhodes ) and Jill Foster Abbott ( Jess Walton ) but the character 's background was rewritten by Maria Arena Bell in 2009 , reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ) .
Though characterized as `` mysterious '' , Cane is `` loyal and dedicated '' , while Goddard described the  अक्षर as a `` ठेठ ऑस्ट्रेलियाई ,  working-class kind of guy '' .
He was the first member of the Atkinson family to appear on the series , followed by his  अभिभावक और एकसमान जुड़वा bhai  .
Soon after his debut , he became a leading  अक्षर , a निर्णय praised  by viewers and critics .
The character has been involved with Amber Moore (  adrienne frantz ) , क्लो मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ hendrickson ) और सबसे notably लिली सर्दियों ( christel खलील  ) , a romance that garnered significant fan attention .
In 2009 , Cane and Lily were married ;  वैश्विक bc होता  later call Lily the love of Cane 's life .
The pair had two children , Charlie  और mattie ashby .
In 2011 , the actor was fired , and Cane was shot  to मौत onscreen  .
However , Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return , revealing that  cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा bhai  was in fact the man who died .
This sacrificed his marriage to Lily , but the couple were  remarried on वेलेंटाइन 's दिन in 2012  .
Goddard has been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News  कहा कि he portrays the अक्षर honestly ,  and is `` always dependable , on fire and exciting '' .
John  क्रिस्टोफर `` जॉनी '' डेप  II ( born June 9 , 1963 ) is an American actor , film producer , and musician .
He has won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors  गिल्ड पुरस्कार  for Best Actor .
डेप रोज़ to prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न  series 21 Jump Street , becoming a teen idol .
Dissatisfied with that status , Depp turned to film for more challenging  भूमिकाएँ ; he निभाई the शीर्षक अक्षर  of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office success in films such as Sleepy Hollow ( 1999 ) , Charlie and the Chocolate Factory ( 2005 ) , Alice in Wonderland ( 2010 ) , Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ) .
He has collaborated with  निदेशक  and friend Tim Burton in eight films ; the most recent being Dark Shadows ( 2012 ) .
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of  ऐसे लोगों as ed लकडी in ed लकडी , जोसेफ D. pistone in donnie brasco , शिकारी S. थॉम्पसन in  Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas , George Jung in Blow , and the bank robber John Dillinger in Michael Mann 's Public Enemies .
Films featuring Depp have  grossed over $ 3.1 अरब at the  United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide .
He has been nominated for top awards many times , winning the Best  कर्ता पुरस्कार इससे the सुनहरी –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy ग्लोब्स  –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy for Sweeney Todd : The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl .
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in American  सिनेमा  , being twice named as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009 .
He  रै महरूम सूचीबद्ध in  the 2012 Guinness Book of World Records as the highest paid actor , with $ 75 million .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly known as the  वेब ) , is a प्रणाली of interlinked  hypertext documents accessed via the Internet .
With a web browser , one can view web pages that may contain text , images , videos , and other  मल्टीमीडिया , और navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks  .
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE , British engineer , computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN , Sir Tim Berners-Lee , now  निदेशक of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ) , लिखा a प्रस्ताव in कूच 1989 लिये कया होता आखिरकार become  the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau  प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम  information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '' , and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year .
Mark Travis John  सांचेज़ ( born  November 11 , 1986 ) is an American football quarterback for the New York Jets of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He  थी drafted in the पहला गोलाकार of the 2009 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट as  the fifth overall selection by the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall .
He played college  फ़ुटबॉल at the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Southern California ( USC ) .
Sanchez grew  up in a well-disciplined  and athletic family .
In the eighth grade , he began to play football and learn  the intricacies of the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति , प्रशिक्षण साथ उसके पिता , उपनाम  .
A well-regarded prospect , Sanchez committed  to दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया following उसके कामयाब ऊँची स्कूल करियर in  which he led his team to a championship title during his final season .
At USC , Sanchez was relegated  as the बैकअप क्वार्टरबैक दौरान  his first three years though he rose to prominence due to his brief appearances on the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty .
Sanchez also became  लोकप्रिय भीतर the  community due to his Mexican-American heritage .
नामित the प्रारंभ in 2008 , सांचेज़ led  USC to a 12–1 record and won the Rose Bowl against Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense .
Although many considered him too inexperienced , Sanchez announced his intention to enter the 2009  एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट  .
He was  चयनित by the jets बाद वे traded up साथ the क्लीवलैंड भूरा  , and was named the starting quarterback prior to the start of the season .
Despite a subpar  प्रदर्शन , सांचेज़ led the jets to the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल , a खोने प्रयत्न to the इंडियानापोलिस  Colts , becoming the fourth rookie quarterback in NFL history to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games .
In his second season , Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second  लगातार afc चैंपियनशिप खेल जहाँ वे  narrowly lost to the Pittsburgh Steelers , 24–19 .
With the win over the New  इंग्लैण्ड देशप्रेमी the सप्ताह prior , सांचेज़ tied चार अन्य  quarterbacks for the second most post-season road victories by a quarterback in NFL history .
In leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships , Sanchez joined quarterback Ben  roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks  in NFL history to reach the conference championship in their first two seasons in the league .
The  अगला दो सीज़न होता  be a regression for both the team and Sanchez as they failed to reach the playoffs .
Fans and media  आलोचकों पुकारा लिये a struggling  Sanchez to be benched .
He eventually  थी replaced towards the  end of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy .
Paul Avery ( April 2 , 1934December 10 , 2000 ) was an American  पुलिस रिपोर्टर , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके कहानियां  on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac , and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping .
A  छोटी submersible  AC sump pump with a garden hose connector
A sump pump is a pump used to remove water that has accumulated in a  जल collecting sump  basin , commonly found in the basement of homes .
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of  a तहखाने waterproofing प्रणाली , funneling into the जलाशय  or because of rain or natural ground water , if the basement is below the water table level .
Sump pumps are  प्रयुक्त जहाँ तहखाने बाढ़ happens  regularly and to remedy dampness where the water table is above the foundation of a home .
Sump pumps send water away from a house to any place where it is no longer problematic , such as a  नगरपालिका तूफ़ान नाली  or a dry well .
Pumps may discharge to  the sanitary सीवर  in older installations .
Once considered acceptable , this practice may now violate the plumbing code or municipal bylaws , because it can  overwhelm the नगरपालिका मलजल उपचार  system .
municipalities urge homeowners  to disconnect and reroute sump pump discharge away from sanitary sewers .
Fines may be  imposed लिये noncompliance  .
Many homeowners have inherited  उनके sump पंप configurations और  do not realize that the pump discharges to the sewer .
If the discharge is fed to a laundry sink in the basement , it 's  संभावित going to the सीवर  .
Usually hardwired into a  घर 's विद्युत प्रणाली , sump  pumps may have a battery backup .
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some pumps , eliminating the need for electricity at  the व्यय of using potable जल , potentially बनाना उन्हें  more expensive to operate than electrical pumps and creating an additional water disposal problem .
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped , a backup  प्रणाली is महत्वपूर्ण लिये मामले  when the main power is out for prolonged periods of time , as during a severe storm .
There are generally two types of sump pumps —  pedestal और submersible  .
The pedestal pump 's motor is  आरोहित ऊपर the  sump , where it is more easily serviced , but is also more conspicuous .
The pump impeller is driven by a long , vertical extension shaft and the impeller is in a scroll housing in  the आधार of the पंप .
The submersible pump is entirely mounted inside the sump , and is specially sealed to  prevent विद्युत  short circuits .
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial applications to control  जल तालिका -सुनानाd  problems in surface soil .
An artesian aquifer or periodic high water table situation can cause  the मैदान to become  unstable due to water saturation .
As long as the  पंप कृत्यों , the सतह मृदा  will remain stable .
These sumps are typically ten feet in depth or more ;  lined साथ corrugated मेटल पाइप कि contains  perforations or drain holes throughout .
They may include electronic control systems with visual and audible alarms and are usually covered to  prevent मलबा और पशु  from falling in .
Bleeding Kansas , Bloody Kansas or the Border War , was a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery  free-staters और pro-slavery `` किनारा ruffian `` तत्व , कि took प्लेस in the कान्सास territory  and the neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861 .
At the heart of the  विरोध थी the  question of whether Kansas would enter the Union as a free state or slave state .
As such , Bleeding  कान्सास थी a  proxy war between Northerners and Southerners over the issue of slavery in the United States .
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was  coined by होरेस greeley of the  New York Tribune ; the events it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War .
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of  pro-slavery शक्तियां और anti-slavery  forces .
The events later known as Bleeding Kansas were set into motion by the Kansas–Nebraska Act of 1854 , which nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the concept  of लोकप्रिय प्रभुता  .
An ostensibly democratic idea , popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it would be a free or  स्लेव राज्य ; however , इस resulted in आव्रजन  en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides .
at एक पाइंट , कान्सास था दो  separate governments , each with its own constitution , although only one was federally recognized .
On January 29 , 1861 , Kansas was admitted to the Union as a free state , less than three months before the Battle of  फोर्ट sumter जिससे began the सिविल युद्ध .
Benzene is an organic chemical compound  साथ the आणविक सूत्र  C6 H|Hydrogen|H6 .
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon atoms joined in a ring , with 1 hydrogen  अणु संलग्न to प्रत्येक कार्बन अणु  .
Because its molecules contain only carbon and  हाइड्रोजन अणु , बेंजीन is classed as  a hydrocarbon .
Benzene is a natural constituent of crude oil , and is one of the  सबसे मौलिक petrochemicals  .
बेंजीन is an खुशबूदार हाइड्रोकार्बन और  the second [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ) , a cyclic hydrocarbon with a continuous pi bond .
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H . Benzene is a colorless and highly  ज्वलनशील द्रव साथ a मीठी  smell .
It is mainly used as a precursor to heavy chemicals , such as ethylbenzene and  cumene , जिससे हैं उत्पादित  on a billion kilogram scale .
Because it has a high octane number , it is an important component of  गैसोलीन , composing a few प्रतिशत of  its mass .
Most  non-industrial अनुप्रयोग  have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity .
Giovanni Virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an Italian  astronomer और विज्ञान इतिहासकार  .
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's Wii game console to  चलाएं तन्त्र कि रै नहीं महरूम प्राधिकृत by  Nintendo .
It achieves this by  defeating the वी 's नक़ल सुरक्षा और  code signing measures .
In more general terms , Wii  homebrew refers to the उपयोग of the  Wii 's hardware , accessories and software for purposes outside those intended by the manufacturer .
Original efforts focused on using the Wii Remote as a  इंगित यंत्र on  other operating systems , or running web-based games in the built-in web browser .
Subsequent developments in games exploits , such as the `` Twilight hack `` , `` Bannerbomb '' and its later incarnation `` LetterBomb '' , `` Smash Stack '' , `` Indiana Pwns '' , `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '' , `` bathaxx '' , and `` Return of the Jodi  '' , बना installing the `` homebrew चैनल `` संभावित  .
Hadley ( right )  discussing the  2006 Israel-Lebanon crisis with Bush and Rice .
Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13 , 1947 ) was the 21st U.S. Assistant to the President for National  सुरक्षा अफेयर्स ( commonly referred as नेशनल सुरक्षा सलाहकार  ) , serving under President George W. Bush .
Take  एकसमान growing पौधे और दे  fertilizer to half of them .
If there are differences between the fertilized  संयंत्र समूह और the unfertilized  `` control '' group , these differences may be due to the fertilizer .
A scientific control is an experiment or observation  designed to minimize the प्रभाव  of variables other than the single independent variable .
This increases the reliability of the results ,  प्रायः  through a comparison between control measurements and the other measurements .
वैज्ञानिक नियंत्रण  are a part of the scientific method .
For  उदाहरण  , during drug testing , scientists will try to control two groups to keep them as identical as possible , then allow one group to try the drug .
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a garden : the plants that receive no fertilizer are the control group , because  वे स्थापित the बेसलाइन स्तर of विकास कि the fertilizer-treated पौधे होगा  be compared against .
Without a control group , the experiment can not determine  whether the fertilizer-treated पौधे  grow more than they would have if untreated .
Ideally , all  परिवर्तनीय in an प्रयोग होगा be नियंत्रित  ( accounted for by the control measurements ) and none will be uncontrolled .
In such an experiment , if all  the नियंत्रण कार्य as अपेक्षित , it is संभावित to conclude  that the experiment is working as intended and that the results of the experiment are due to the effect of the variable being tested .
That is , scientific  नियंत्रण allow an अन्वेषक to मेक a अर्जी  like `` Two situations were identical until factor X occurred .
Since factor X is the only difference  between  the two situations , the new outcome was caused by factor X . ''
