John Adams  ( अक्तूबर 30 , 1735 ( o.s . अक्तूबर 19 , 1735 )  – July 4 , 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ) , having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States .
An American Founding Father , he was a statesman , diplomat , and a leading  एडवोकेट of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  .
Well educated , he  थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो  promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas , both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to prominence in the early stages of the American  क्रान्ति  .
A lawyer and public figure in Boston  , as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स  to the Continental Congress , he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता in 1776 , और थी इसके प्राथमिक  advocate in the Congress .
बाद , as a राजनयिक in यूरोपीय , he helped negotiate  the eventual peace treaty with Great Britain , and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and historian  , एडम्स largely लिखा the  Massachusetts Constitution in 1780 , which together with his earlier Thoughts on Government , influenced American political thought .
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775 , he nominated George Washington to be  commander-in-chief , और 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत जॉन मार्शल to be मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त  States .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's  वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the  second president .
During his one term ,  he encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian republicans , as  well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and  निर्मित up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the  face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France , 1798–1800 .
The major accomplishment of  उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन  of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition .
In  1800 , एडम्स थी पराजित  for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts .
He later resumed his  दोस्ती साथ  Jefferson .
He and  उसके बीवी , अबीगैल एडम्स ,  founded an accomplished family line of politicians , diplomats , and historians now referred to as the Adams political family .
Adams was  the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी  Adams , the sixth President of the United States .
His achievements have  प्राप्त वृहद मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स  , though his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders .
Adams was the first U.S. president  to reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार  became known as the White House .
A Watt steam  इंजन  .
The  भाप इंजन , fuelled  primarily by coal , propelled the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain and the world .
The Industrial Revolution was the transition to new manufacturing processes that occurred in the period from about 1760 to  कुछ समय between 1820 और 1840 .
This transition included going from hand production methods to machines , new chemical manufacturing and iron production processes , improved  दक्षता of जल शक्ति , the  increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools .
The transition  भी शामिल the बदलें  from wood and other bio-fuels to coal .
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few decades  स्प्रेड to पश्चिमी यूरोपीय  and the United States .
The Industrial Revolution  marks a प्रमुख turning पाइंट  in history ; almost every aspect of daily life was influenced in some way .
Most notably , average income and population began to exhibit  unprecedented sustained विकास  .
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas , Jr. , `` For the first time in history , the living  मानकों of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained विकास ... nothing  remotely like this economic behavior is mentioned by the classical economists , even as a theoretical possibility . ''
William  घंटी स्कॉट आयरन  and Coal , 1855-60
The period of time  covered by the औद्योगिक  Revolution varies with different historians .
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s and was not fully felt until the 1830s or 1840s , while T. S. Ashton held that  it occurred roughly between 1760 और  1830 .
Some 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued  कि the प्रक्रम of आर्थिक और सोशल बदलें took प्लेस धीरे  and the term revolution is a misnomer .
This is still a subject of  बहस among इतिहासकारों  .
GDP per capita was broadly stable before the  औद्योगिक क्रान्ति और the emergence  of the modern capitalist economy .
The Industrial Revolution began an era  of per-capita आर्थिक विकास in  capitalist economies .
Economic historians are in agreement that the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most important event in  the इतिहास of मानवता चूंकि  the domestication of animals and plants .
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and 1870 , when technological and economic progress gained momentum with the  increasing अपनाना of steam-powered नौकाएँ , जहाजों और रेल , the विशाल स्केल manufacture of यंत्र  tools and the increasing use of steam powered factories .
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy ( born September 27 , 1969 ) ,  is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न  news reporter , currently appearing on Fox News Channel .
This list ranks U.S. cities by land area (  नहीं सहित  bodies of water ) .
Total  क्षेत्रों ( सहित जल ) हैं भी  given , but note that , when ranked by total area , a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger '' .
San Francisco is an extreme example ; water makes up nearly 80 % of its total area of 232  वर्गाकार मील ( 601  km2 ) .
Note also that in many cases a city may be  geographically विशाल primarily क्युकी इसके नगरपालिका  government has merged with the government of the surrounding county .
In some cases the county no longer  exists , जबकि  in others the arrangement has formed a Consolidated city–county ( or city- borough in Alaska , or city- parish in Louisiana ) .
ये हैं दिखाया in बिंदास in  the list below ( but not all examples may be indicated ) .

The large  आंत ( or bowel , कोलन )  is the last part of the digestive system in vertebrate animals .
Its  फलन is  to absorb water from the remaining indigestible food matter , and then to pass useless waste material from the body .
इस आलेख is primarily  about the human gut , though the information about its processes are directly applicable to most mammals .
The large  आंत consists  of the cecum , rectum and anal canal .
It starts in the right  iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis , बस at  or below the right waist , where it is joined to the bottom end of the small intestine .
From  यहाँ it continues up the उदर  , then across the width of the abdominal cavity , and then it turns down , continuing to its endpoint at the anus .
The large intestine  is परिचय long ,  which is about one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal canal .
In Terminologia  anatomica the विशाल आंत  includes the cecum , colon , rectum , and anal canal .
However ,  कुछ स्त्रोत  exclude the anal canal .
The Green Bay  पैकर्स हैं an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  team based in Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They are members of the North Division of the National Football  सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in  the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Green Bay is the  third-oldest मताधिकार  in the NFL , having been organized and playing in 1919 .
The Packers are the only non-profit , community-owned major  लीग पेशेवर खेल  team in the United States .
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were once common in the NFL  दौरान the 1920s और 1930s  .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun ,  the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स  can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a  semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध  clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest .
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921 , the forerunner to what is known today as the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग (  NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is  the  last NFL `` small town '' team , its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay  पैकर्स have जीती 13 लीग championships ( अधिक  than any other team in the NFL ) , including nine NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing , bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents , the Chicago  bears , मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स और the डेट्रॉयट  Lions .
The Bears-Packers  फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries  in NFL history , dating back to 1921 .
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is an urbanized valley located in the Los Angeles metropolitan area of southern California , United States , defined by the  kyu of the अनुप्रस्थ  Ranges circling it .
Home to 1.76 million  लोगों , it झूठ उत्तर  of the larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin .
Nearly two thirds of the Valley 's land area is part of  the नगर of लॉस एंजिल्स  .
the अन्य  incorporated cities in the valley are Glendale , Burbank , San Fernando , Hidden Hills and Calabasas .

Pretties is a 2005 science fiction novel and the  दूसरी किताब of the uglies  Trilogy written by Scott Westerfeld .
It is set in a future dystopian world in which everyone is turned ``  pretty '' by चरम कॉस्मेटिक सर्जरी  upon reaching age 16 .
It tells the story of teenager Tally Youngblood  जो विद्रोहियों विरूद्ध  society 's enforced conformity .
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26 , 1971 ) is an American woman sentenced to life in  थाना लिये murdering उसके children  .
Born in Union , South Carolina , and a former student of the University of South Carolina Union , she was convicted on July 22 , 1995 for  murdering उसके दो बेटे , 3-year-old माइकल  Daniel Smith , born October 10 , 1991 , and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith , born August 5 , 1993 .
The case gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed , due to her claiming that a black man stole her car and  kidnapped  her sons .
She later claimed that she suffered  इससे दिमागी स्वास्थ्य मुद्दे  that impaired her judgment .
According to the South Carolina Department of Corrections , Smith will be eligible for parole on November 4  , 2024 , बाद सेवारत a न्यूनतम of तीस सालो  .
She is incarcerated at South Carolina  's leath correctional संस्था  , near Greenwood .
Mount  mckinley ( भी ज्ञात as denali लिया इससे the इनुइट koyukon athabaskan भाषा  meaning `` The Great One '' ) is the highest mountain peak in the United States and in North America with a summit elevation of above sea level .
At some , the base to peak rise is  माना the largest of कोई पहाड़  situated entirely above sea level .
measured by स्थलाकृतिक  prominence , it is the third most prominent peak after Mount Everest and Aconcagua .
Located in the Alaska Range in the  आंतरिक of us राज्य  of Alaska , it is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve .
The first European to document sighting the mountain was George  वैंकूवर in 1794 .
In  1903 , जेम्स  Wickersham recorded the first attempt at climbing McKinley which was unsuccessful .
In 1906 , Frederick Cook claimed the first ascent  जिससे थी बाद  proven to be false .
the पहला verifiable ascent to mckinley 's समिट  was achieved on June 7 , 1913 by climbers Hudson Stuck , Harry Karstens , Walter Harper , and Robert Tatum .
In 1951 ,  ब्रैडफोर्ड washburn pioneered the वेस्ट buttress रूट माना to  be the safest and easiest route and therefore the most popular currently in use .
The Honda S600  is an ऑटोमोबाइल  manufactured by Honda .
It  थी शुभारम्भ  in March 1964 .
Available  as a roadster – bearing दमदार प्रतिरूप to the होंडा s500 – और  as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the S600 was the first Honda available in two trim levels .
During its production run up to 1966 , the model styling would  remain pretty much the वही ,  with the most notable changes coming to the front grille , bumper , and headlights .
Powered by a DOHC , water-cooled ,  four-cylinder इनलाइन इंजन साथ  four carburetors , the engine capacity was increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc .
The engine produced at 8,500 rpm and had  a शीर्ष गति of  .
With the convertible  weighing in at mere , the अतिरिक्त चादर मेटल  of the coupe only added to the overall weight .
Suspension was independent with sealed  रोलर कड़ी ड्राइव to प्रत्येक  rear wheel .
The S600 was  the पहला द्रव्यमान  marketed Honda car .
First offered only in right-hand drive , it soon became  उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand ड्राइव to अपील to निर्यात  markets .
There were a few pre-production S500s manufactured in left hand drive , two or  तीन भी होने दिखाया in  some early sales brochures .
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a special , upgraded package called the SM600 which included , among other items , special paint colors , exclusive badging , a standard radio and speaker , a  खास एंटीना in the यात्री पक्ष सूर्य छज्जा , मानक reversing लाइट्स , a मानक सिगरेट  lighter , a standard heater , better cushioned seats , and a detachable seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat .
Honda built 3,912  roadsters in 1964 , साथ उत्पादन चढ़ाई to 7,261 convertibles  and 1,519 coupes in 1965 .
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the S800 ) with only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes ,  giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes लिये the 3 साल स्पैन  .
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television period sitcom that depicts the  teenage अनुभवों of हास्य क्रिस चट्टान ( जो  is also the narrator ) while growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn , New York .
The show is set  between 1983  and 1987 ; however , Rock himself was a teenager between 1978 and 1983 .
Rock grew up with a boy named Kenny Montero , whom he has often referred to  as the प्रेरणा  for a lot of the episodes .
In  अनेक साक्षात्कार  , Rock has described Kenny as the reason he got into comedy in the first place .
The show 's  शीर्षक parodies the सीबीएस sitcom  Everybody Loves Raymond .
Rock stated : `` Everybody  loves रेमंड लकिन everybody hates  Chris ! `` .
The show 's lead actors are Tyler James Williams , Terry Crews ,  tichina अर्नाल्ड , tequan रिचमंड ,  Imani Hakim , and Vincent Martella .
In Fall 2008 , the The CW moved Everybody Hates Chris and The  खेल to the शुक्रवार रात्रि मौत  slot .
The fourth season of the series premiered Friday , October 3 ,  2008 , at 8:00pm eastern/7:00pm  Central .
On  may 21 , 2009  , The CW announced that it had cancelled Everybody Hates Chris .
Prior to this , executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end of season 4 matched up with his own  past—dropping आउट of ऊँची स्कूल to become a comedian—and कि  it was time to end the show .
Pleural  उत्सर्ग is excess द्रव कि accumulates  between the two pleural layers , the fluid-filled space that surrounds the lungs .
Excessive amounts of such  द्रव can impair श्वास by limiting  the expansion of the lungs during ventilation .
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an Old English heroic epic poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long  लाइनों , नियत in scandinavia , commonly cited as एक of  the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature .
it survives in  a single manuscript known as the Nowell Codex .
Its  संयोजन by an बेनाम  Anglo-Saxon poet is dated between the 8th and the early 11th century .
In 1731 , the manuscript was badly damaged by a  आग कि swept through a भवन आवास a संग्रहण  of Medieval manuscripts assembled by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton .
The poem fell into obscurity for decades , and its existence did not become widely known again  जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared by the icelandic-danish  scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin .
In the poem , Beowulf , a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia , comes to the help of Hroðgar , the  किंग of the danes , जिनकी मीड हॉल ( in heorot ) रै महरूम अंतर्गत  attack by a monster known as Grendel .
After Beowulf  जानबूझ उसे , grendel  's mother attacks the hall and is then also defeated .
Victorious , Beowulf goes home to Geatland in Sweden and later  becomes किंग of the  Geats .
After a period of fifty years has passed ,  बियोवुल्फ़ defeats  a dragon , but is fatally wounded in the battle .
बाद उसके मौत , उसके सेवकों  bury him in a tumulus , a burial mound , in Geatland .
Shem  हैम और japheth by  James Tissot 1904 .
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም , Sēm ; `` renown ; prosperity ; name '' ) was one of the sons  of नूह in the यहूदी बाइबल as खूब as in इस्लामी  literature .
He is most  popularly regarded as  the eldest son , though some traditions regard him as the second son .
Genesis 10:21 refers to relative ages of Shem and his  bhai  Japheth , but with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations .
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also , the father of all the children of Eber , the brother of Japheth the elder ,  भी to उसे यहूद children born .  `` .
However , the New American Standard Bible gives , `` Also to Shem , the father of all the  children of eber , और the पुरानी bhai of japheth , children यहूद  born . ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad , (  लकिन nearly 101 - देखिए कालक्रम  note , ) two years after the flood , making him barely 99 at the time the flood began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this , making his age at death 600 years .
The children of Shem were Elam , Asshur ,  arphaxad , lud , और aram , in जोड  to daughters .
Abraham , the  patriarch of the hebrews और  Arabs , was one of the descendants of Arphaxad .
Islamic  साहित्य  describes Shem as one of the believing sons of Noah .
Some sources even identify Shem  as a नबी in उसके अपना सही  and that he was the next prophet after his father .
In one Muslim legend , Shem was one of  the लोगों कि परमेश्वर बना यीशु  resurrect as a sign to the Children of Israel .
The 1st century historian  flavius josephus , among अनेक अन्य , recounted the परंपरा कि  these five sons were the progenitors of the nations of Elam , Assyria , Chaldea , Lydia , and Syria , respectively .
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages , as a subset of the Afro-Asiatic languages , denoting  the आम भाषाई विरासत of अरबी , aramaic , अक्कादी  , Ethiopic , Hebrew and Phoenician languages .
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g. , B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers Rabbah 4:8 . ) , Shem is believed to have been Melchizedek , King of Salem whom Abraham is recorded to have met  बाद the बैटल of  the four kings .
In a  few of the अनेक extra-biblical  sources that describe him , Shem is also credited with killing Nimrod , son of Cush .
Shem is mentioned in  उत्पत्ति 5:32 , 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27  ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4 .
Geographic  identifications of flavius  Josephus , c. 100 AD ; Japheth 's sons shown in red , Ham 's sons in blue , Shem 's sons in green .
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group Inc. is  a privately आयोजित कम्पनी कि is primarily  an internet domain registrar and web hosting company .
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed for an IPO in 2006 , but later canceled  it , due to `` मार्केट  uncertainties '' .
In addition to domain  पंजीकरण और होस्टिंग go  Daddy also sells e-business related software and services .
On June 24 , 2011 , The Wall  गली जर्नल reported कि private-equity  firms KKR and Silver Lake Partners , along with a third investor , were nearing a deal to buy the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion .
On July 1 , 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that KKR ,  चांदी झील साझेदार  and Technology Crossover Ventures had closed the deal .
Although the purchase price was not  officially घोषित it  was reported to be $ 2.25 billion , for 65 % of the company .
, Bob Parsons had ceded the CEO role of Go Daddy to Warren  adelman , जो था महरूम साथ the कम्पनी लिये परिचय 10  years .
The  andorran कोट of  arms at the Andorran parliament .
Andorra ( ; , ) ,  officially the principality of अंडोरा ( ) , भी पुकारा the principality  of the Valleys of Andorra , ( ) , is a landlocked microstate in Southwestern Europe , located in the eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France .
It is the sixth smallest nation in Europe , having an  क्षेत्रफल of और an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी  of 85,000 in 2012 .
Its capital , Andorra la Vella , is the  उच्चतम पूंजी नगर in यूरोपीय , at an उन्नयन  of above sea level .
The official language is Catalan , although Spanish ,  पुर्तगाली , और फ्रेंच हैं भी  commonly spoken .
Created under a charter in 988 , the present  principality थी formed in 1278  .
It is known as a principality as it is a monarchy headed by two co-princes – the Bishop of  urgell और the अध्यक्ष of  France .
Andorra is a prosperous  देश मुख्यतः क्युकी of इसके पर्यटन उद्योग , जिससे सेवाएं  an estimated 10.2 million visitors annually , and also because of its status as a tax haven .
It is not a member of the European Union , but the euro  is the de facto  currency .
The people of Andorra have the  4th उच्चतम इंसान  life expectancy in the world — 82 years at birth .
The George Washington University ( GW ,  gwu , or जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक निजी , coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों  located in Washington , D.C. .
It awards certificates ,  स्नातक डिग्री , मास्टर्स  degrees , and PhDs across several dozen disciplines .
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on February 9 ,  1821 as the columbian कॉलेज in the ज़िला  of Columbia .
Kimberly Noel `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born October 21 , 1980 )  is an अमरीकी socialite  , television personality and occasional actress .
In 2007 , she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex tape that  subsequently resulted in a अदालत awarding  her $ 5 million ; later in that same year , she and her family rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up with the Kardashians , and its  subsequent spin-offs , सहित कोर्टनी और  Kim Take New York and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
In 2010 ,  कार्दशियन  was the highest-earning reality star , with estimated earnings of $ 6 million .
With  बहनों कोर्टनी  and Khloé , Kardashian co-owns the fashion boutique chain D-A-S-H .
She has been involved  in the उत्पादन  of several lines of clothing and fragrances .
In August 2011 , Kardashian married basketball  खिलाड़ी क्रिस humphries in a  widely publicized ceremony .
That  अक्तूबर  , Kardashian filed for divorce following 72 days of marriage .
The move garnered significant backlash from  the मीडिया , जो labeled it a  `` publicity stunt '' .
After 536 days ,  कार्दशियन और humphries पहुँचे an अघोषित उपनिवेश  at the Los Angeles Superior Court , finalizing the divorce in April 2013 .

Oahu ( ) or  oahu , ज्ञात as `` the महफ़िल प्लेस '' , is the  third largest of the Hawaiian Islands and the most populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii .
The state capital  , होनोलूलू  , is on Oahu 's southeast coast .
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the  आइलैंड्स in kaneohe खाड़ी और बंद the पूर्वी ( windward ) coast , it रै a कुल जमीन  area of , making it the 20th largest island in the United States .
In the greatest dimension  , इस volcanic द्वीप  is long and across .
The length  of  the shoreline is .
The island is the result of two separate shield volcanoes : Waianae and Koolau , with a broad `` valley ''   or saddle ( the central Oahu Plain ) between them .
the उच्चतम पाइंट is mt  . Ka'ala in the Waianae Range , rising to above sea level .
The base currency  of the संयुक्त राज्य is the u.S.  dollar , and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1 , $ 2 , $ 5 , $ 10 , $ 20 , $ 50 , and $ 100 .
At one time , however  , u.S. करेंसी शामिल  five larger denominations .
Notes in the  denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000  , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were printed for general use , and a $ 100,000 note was printed for certain internal transactions .
British Honduras was a British  उपनिवेश in सेंट्रल  America .
In 1981 , the colony gained  पूरा स्वतंत्रता , और  is now the independent nation of Belize .
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th century , the territory  on the ईस्ट coast of सेंट्रल अमेरिका , दक्षिण of मैक्सिको , became  a British crown colony in 1862 .
In 1964 ,  it became a  self-governing colony .
बेलीज़ became  fully independent from the United Kingdom in 1981 .
Belize  थी the पिछला महाद्वीपीय  possession of the United Kingdom in the Americas .
Spelt , also known as dinkel wheat , or hulled wheat , is an  प्राचीन प्रजाति of गेहूं इससे the  fifth millennium BC .
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from the Bronze Age to medieval times ; it now  survives as a relict क्रॉप in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय और उत्तरी  Spain and has found a new market as a health food .
Spelt is sometimes considered  a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम गेहूं  ( T. aestivum ) , in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp . spelta .
It is a hexaploid wheat , which means it has  छह सेट of गुणसूत्रों  .
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective created by  लेखक और चिकित्सक  Sir Arthur Conan Doyle .
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities border on the fantastic , Holmes is famous for his astute logical  तर्क , उसके क्षमता to अपनाना लगभग कोई भेस , और उसके उपयोग of forensic विज्ञान कौशल to solve  difficult cases .
Holmes , who first appeared in publication  in 1887 , थी प्रदर्शित in चार novels  and 56 short stories .
The first novel , A Study in Scarlet , appeared in  beeton 's क्रिसमस सालाना in 1887 और  the second , The Sign of the Four , in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890 .
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of short stories in The Strand Magazine , beginning with A Scandal in Bohemia in  1891 ; further श्रेणी of छोटी कहानियां और दो novels प्रकाशित in सीरियल रूप appeared  between then and 1927 .
The stories cover a period from around  1880 up to 1914  .
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and  biographer , dr. जॉन H.  Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` and `` The Lion 's Mane `` ) and two others are written in the third person ( `` The Mazarin Stone `` and `` His Last Bow `` ) .
In two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott `` ) , Holmes tells Watson  the प्रमुख स्टोरी इससे उसके यादें , जबकि वाटसन  becomes the narrator of the frame story .
The first and fourth novels , A Study in Scarlet  और the घाटी of भय , प्रत्येक शामिल  a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson .
The United States House of Representatives is one of the two houses of  the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस ( a bicameral  legislature ) .
It is frequently referred  to as the  House .
The other  हाउस is the  Senate .
The composition and powers of the House are established in  आलेख एक of the  United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the  सीनेट और further सहमत to by the u.S.  President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills , to impeach officials , and to elect  the u.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत in the  Electoral College .
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in  proportion to इसके  population but is entitled to at least one representative .
The most populous state ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , फिलहाल रै 53 प्रतिनिधि  .
The  कुल क्रमांक  of voting representatives is fixed by law at 435 .
Each  प्रतिनिधि  serves for a two-year term .
The Speaker of the  संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि , जो  presides over the chamber , is elected by the members of the House , and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House  meets in the दक्षिण  wing of the United States Capitol .
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to U.S.-based Kraft Foods for a number of gelatin desserts , including fruit  gels , puddings और no-bake  cream pies .
The brand 's popularity has led to it  होने प्रयुक्त as a जेनेरिक  term for gelatin dessert across the U.S. and Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park located in  वेस्ट mifflin , पेन्सिलवेनिया , a उपनगरीय of पिट्सबर्ग  .
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` trolley park  '' आकर्षण at the समाप्त of the mellon परिवार  's Monongahela Street Railway .
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew McSwigan and thus began the Kennywood Entertainment  कम्पनी कि रै remained a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार लिये over  100 years .
This traditional amusement park still has  structures और यात्राएँ डेटिंग वापस to  its opening and the early 1900s .
Along with Rye Playland Park , it is one of only two amusement parks listed  in the नेशनल पंजीकरण of ऐतिहासिक  Places .
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment Company , which until December 2007 was a closely held  परिवार कारोबार स्वामित्व by the henninger  and McSwigan families .
Kennywood  entertainment is अभी संचालित by california-based  Palace Entertainment , a subsidiary of Parques Reunidos , an international amusement park company based in Madrid , Spain .
Parque Reunidos is in turn a  subsidiary of candover  Investments , an investment fund based in the UK .
A Social Security card issued by the Railroad  रिटायरमेंट फलक in 1943 to a  now deceased person .
In the United States , a Social Security number ( SSN )  is a nine-digit क्रमांक जारी to u.S. नागरिकों , स्थाई निवासियों , और अस्थाई  ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act , codified as .
The number is issued to an individual by  the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रशासन , an स्वतंत्र एजेंसी  of the United States government .
Its primary purpose is to  track individuals  for Social Security purposes .
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying on Form SS-5 , ``  अनुप्रयोग  for A Social Security Number Card '' .
Minimalism describes  आंदोलनों in विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of आर्ट और डिज़ाइन , विशेषकर विज़ुअल आर्ट और  music , where the work is set out to expose the essence or identity of a subject through eliminating all non-essential forms , features or concepts .
Minimalism is any design or style in  जिससे the सरलतम और fewest  elements are used to create the maximum effect .
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified with developments in post–World  युद्ध ii पश्चिमी आर्ट , सबसे strongly साथ अमरीकी  visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s .
prominent कलाकारों संबद्ध साथ इस गति शामिल डोनाल्ड judd , जॉन mccracken , agnes मार्टिन , डान flavin , रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , ऐनी truitt , और फ़्रैंक स्टेला  .
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism , and is often interpreted  as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध अमूर्त अभिव्यंजनावाद  and a bridge to Postminimal art practices .
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in  म्यूज़िक जिससे सुविधाएँ repetition  and iteration , as in the compositions of La Monte Young , Terry Riley , Steve Reich , Philip Glass , and John Adams .
Minimalist compositions are sometimes  ज्ञात as प्रणालियों  music .
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to  designate anything कि  is spare or stripped to its essentials .
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett , the films of  रॉबर्ट bresson , the कहानियां of रेमंड carver ,  and even the automobile designs of Colin Chapman .
The word was first used in English in the  जल्दी 20th सदी to describe the  Mensheviks .
In  रसायन और भौतिकी , डाल्टन 's विधि ( भी पुकारा डाल्टन 's विधि of  partial pressures ) states that the total pressure exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases .
This empirical law was observed by John Dalton in 1801 and is related  to the आदर्श गैस  laws .
Mathematically , the  दबाव of a मिश्रण of गैसों  can be defined as the summation
or
where represent the partial  दबाव of प्रत्येक  component .
It is  assumed कि  the gases do not react with each other
where is the  mole भिन्न of the  i-th component in the total mixture of n components .
The relationship below provides a way to determine  the आवाज़ आधारित  concentration of any individual gaseous component
where is the  विशेषज्ञता of  the i-th component expressed in ppm .
डाल्टन 's विधि  is not exactly followed by real gases .
Those  deviations हैं  considerably large at high pressures .
in ऐसे शर्तें , the आवाज़ occupied  by the molecules can become significant compared to the free space between them .
In particular , the short average distances between molecules raises the intensity of  intermolecular शक्तियां between गैस  molecules enough to substantially change the pressure exerted by them .
Neither of those effects are  माना  by the ideal gas model .
This is a list of the largest United  राज्य कॉलेजों  and universities by enrollment for colleges and universities in the United States .

Colleges and universities within  the संयुक्त  States
University  प्रणालियों if the प्रणाली  is run under a single administration
Enrollment is the sum of the  headcount of undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट  students
Enrollment is counted by the Integrated  post-secondary शिक्षा प्रणाली  within the U.S. Department of Education .
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount , indicating the number of unique  विद्यार्थी जो attended the विश्वविद्यालयों दौरान the  year .
What  इस सूची  does not include:
Any indication  of कैसा अनेक of the नामांकित विद्यार्थी हैं  full or part time ( e.g. , some universities may have a high enrollment , but have most students enrolled in only a single class )
