`` Right Round '' is a song performed by American rapper Flo  rida , released  as the lead single from his second studio album , R.O.O.T.S . ( 2009 ) .
The song  सुविधाएँ अतिथि vocals इससे  Kesha .
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was digitally  released on 10 फ़रवरी by पो लड़के entertainment और अटलांटिक रिकॉर्ड  .
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's net ball referee enthusiasm , while  adapting the कोरस of the 1984 मुर्दे or जिंदा सोंग ``  You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook .
According to one of the song 's writers , the chorus  refers to मौखिक  sex .
Kesha  contributed अतिथि vocals  to the song , but in the United States , during the run atop the chart , Kesha was uncredited .
The song received mostly  ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , जो  claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic .
However , it was a commercial success , reaching the  शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट  in nineteen countries worldwide .
In the United  राज्य , it became flo rida 's  second number-one single and broke the record for first-week sales when it was released to digital retailers .
The single 's accompanying music video was directed by Malcolm Jones and nominated for an MTV Video Music  पुरस्कार  .
the सोंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in अनेक फिल्मों  , such as The Hangover , The Ugly Truth and the Telugu movie Pilla Zamindar .
in the फिल्म पिच पूर्ण  , the song is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers .
The Chief Justice of the United States is the head of the United States federal court system ( the judicial branch of  the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य ) और the मुख्य  judge of the Supreme Court of the United States .
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court  justices  ; the other eight are the Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of the United States .
From 1789 until  1866 , the दफ्तर  was known as the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court .
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer in the country , and acts as a chief administrative officer for the federal courts and as head of the Judicial Conference of  the संयुक्त राज्य appoints the निदेशक of the  Administrative Office of the United States Courts .
The Chief Justice also serves as a spokesperson for  the न्यायिक शाखा  .
The Chief  इंसाफ लीड  the business of the Supreme Court .
He presides over oral  वितर्क पहले the  court .
When the court renders an  राय , the मुख्य justice—when  in the majority—decides who writes the court 's opinion .
The Chief Justice also has significant agenda-setting power over the  अदालत 's बैठक  .
In the case of an  महाभियोग of a अध्यक्ष of the  United States , which has occurred twice , the Chief Justice presides over the trial in the Senate .
In modern tradition , the Chief Justice has the ceremonial duty of  administering the शपथ of  office of the President of the United States .
the पहला  Chief Justice was John Jay .
the 17th  and current Chief Justice is John G. Roberts , Jr .
Caribou  निकट prudhoe  Bay , 1973
Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a large oil  फ़ील्ड on अलास्का 's  North Slope .
It is the largest oil field in both the  संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर  America , covering and originally containing approximately of oil .
The amount  of recoverable आयल in the फ़ील्ड is अधिक than  double that of the next largest field in the United States , the East Texas oil field .
The field is operated by BP ; partners are ExxonMobil and  conocophillips अलास्का  .
Labor unions are  legally पहचाना as  representatives of workers in many industries in the United States .
Their activity  आज centers on सामूहिक bargaining over मजदूरी , लाभ  , and working conditions for their membership , and on representing their members in disputes with management over violations of contract provisions .
Larger unions also typically engage in lobbying activities and  electioneering  at the state and federal level .
Most unions in America are aligned with one of two larger umbrella organizations : the AFL-CIO created  in 1955 , और  the Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
Both advocate  नीतियों और विधान on निमित्त of मजदूर in the संयुक्त राज्य  and Canada , and take an active role in politics .
The AFL-CIO is  विशेषकर  concerned with global trade issues .
In 2010 , the percentage of workers belonging  to a संघ in the संयुक्त राज्य ( or कुल  labor union `` density '' ) was 11.4 % , compared to 18.4 % in Germany , 27.5 % in Canada , and 70 % in Finland .
संघ सदस्यता  in the private sector has fallen under 7 % — levels not seen since 1932 .
Unions allege that  employer-incited विपक्ष रै  contributed to this decline in membership .
The most prominent unions are among public  सेक्टर कर्मचारी  such as teachers and police .
Members of  संघ हैं disproportionately पुरानी  , male and residents of the Northeast , the Midwest , and California .
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in America after  controlling लिये व्यक्तिगत  , job , and labor market characteristics .
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s  , अमरीकी संघ remain a prominent राजनैतिक फ़ैक्टर , दोनो through mobilization of उनके अपना सदस्यताएँ और through coalitions  with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant rights , trade policy , health care , and living wage campaigns .
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs , unions are currently advocating new `` card check `` federal legislation that would require employers to bargain with a union if more than 50 % of workers signed forms ,  or `` ताश , '' stating वे काश to be represented by कि  union .
The current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 days for a federally supervised secret-ballot employee  referendum on the  subject .
The economist Joseph  stiglitz रै asserted कि , `` दमदार संघ have helped to  reduce inequality , whereas weaker unions have made it easier for CEOs , sometimes working with market forces that they have helped shape , to increase it . ''
the मनाही in unionization  since WWII in the United States has been associated with a pronounced rise in income and wealth inequality .
A Christian Lacroix fashion  बुटीक
A boutique is a small shopping outlet , especially one that specializes in  elite और फैशनेबल  items such as clothing and jewelry .
The word  is फ्रेंच लिये `` दूकान '' , via  Latin from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ) , `` storehouse '' .
The term entered into everyday English use in the late 1960s when , for a brief period , London was the  केन्द्र of the फ़ैशन  trade .
Carnaby Street and the Kings Road were the focus of much media attention as home to the  सबसे फैशनेबल boutiques  of the era .
Now the East of London has  महरूम regenerated और अधिक boutiques  pop up in fashionable areas , such as Tower Bridge Road .
It can also refer to a specialised  कड़ ऐसे as a बुटीक  investment bank or boutique law firm .
The word is often used to describe a property in the  स्वतंत्र खण्ड of the होटल मार्केट ( ऐसे as the rockwell in लंदन  ) in order to distinguish themselves from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ) .
In such cases the establishments  उद्देश्य to convey the विचार कि the  operation is elite and highly specialised .
In the strictest sense of the word , boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but more generally speaking , some chains can be referred to as  boutiques if वे  specialize in particular styles .
Recently , the term ``  बुटीक '' रै  started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or produced in intentionally small numbers at very high prices .
इस may be referred  to as boutique manufacturing .
For example , before the release of the Wii , a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` boutique video-game company '' , producing games for niche audiences , rather than  trying to compete सीधे साथ microsoft  and Sony .
In the traditional luxury- watch  उद्योग scalfaro अंतरराष्ट्रीय is माना  as the precursor in manufacturing and sale of bespoke watches .
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible  बुटीक निर्माण  site , which allows producing small series or even unique timepieces .
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made  वस्तुएं और अन्य truly one-of-a-kind वस्तुएं  , others simply produce t-shirts , stickers , and other fashion accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at unusually high prices .
In the early 1990s  सेलिना प्रारंभ निर्माण  her own line of women 's clothing .
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc . Boutique & Salon '' One located in Corpus  christi और एक स्तिथ  in San Antonio , Texas .
One was due  to खोलें in monterrey  , Mexico , in 1995 but due to her death it was not opened .
Around 1999 the San Antonio location  बंद और the कॉर्पस  Christi location was closed in 2009 .
In late 1990s some European  खुदरा व्यापारियों विकसित the विचार of tailoring  a shop towards a lifestyle theme , in the form of `` concept stores '' , which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments .
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como  in मिलान  , Italy followed by Colette in Paris and Quartier 206 in Berlin .
Several well-known American chains such as Urban  outfitters , d-a-s-h , और the गैप , ऑस्ट्रेलियाई कड़ी  Billabong and , though less common , Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000 .
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a credit union headquartered in Vienna , Virginia , chartered and  regulated अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the नेशनल क्रेडिट संघ प्रशासन  ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government .
Navy Federal is the largest natural member ( or retail  ) क्रेडिट संघ in the संसार , दोनो  in asset size and in membership .
As of September 2012 , Navy Federal had  over  $ 50 billion USD in assets , and over 4 million members .
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13 , 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ) , known by his stage name Stevie Wonder , is an American singer , songwriter , and multi-instrumentalist , a child prodigy who developed into one of the most creative  musical आंकड़े of the लेट 20th सदी .
Blind since shortly after birth , Wonder signed with Motown  's tamla लेबल at the आयु of  eleven , and continues to perform and record for Motown to this day .
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` Superstition `` , `` Sir Duke `` , `` You Are the Sunshine of My Life `` and `` I  बस पुकारा to कह  I Love You `` .
Well known albums also include Talking  किताब , innervisions और गीतों in the  Key of Life .
He has recorded more than thirty U.S. top ten hits and received twenty-two Grammy Awards , the  सबसे  ever awarded to a male solo artist .
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for political causes , including his 1980 campaign to  मेक मार्टिन लूथर किंग , jr. 's जन्मदिवस  a holiday in the United States .
In 2009 , Wonder was named a  संयुक्त राष्ट्र मेसेंजर  of Peace .
In 2008 , Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 All-Time Top Artists to celebrate the US  singles चार्ट 's पचासवें वर्षगांठ , साथ अचरज  at number five .
By popular vote , Stevie was inducted into The  soulmusic हॉल of कीर्ति at soulmusic.com in  December 2012 .
Psychosis ( from the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '' , for mind/soul , and -ωσις `` -osis '' , for abnormal condition or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the  दिमाग , और is a जेनेरिक मनोरोग पद लिये a दिमागी राज्य प्रायः वर्णित as involving a `` घाटा of  contact with reality `` .
People suffering  इससे मनस्ताप हैं वर्णित  as psychotic .
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder , during which hallucinations and delusions , gross excitement or  बेहोशी और impaired इनसाइट  may occur .
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can mean anything from relatively normal aberrant experiences through to the  जटिल और catatonic expressions of schizophrenia  and bipolar type 1 disorder .
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases , from  दोनो बाह्य substances  and internal physiologic illness , can produce symptoms of psychosis .
This led many  पेशेवर to कह कि मनस्ताप is नहीं  specific enough as a diagnostic term .
Despite this , `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( negative  लक्षण ) और अधिक  commonly to diverse types of hallucinations or delusional beliefs ( e.g . grandiosity , delusions of persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '' , whereas one exhibiting very  हल्का लक्षण could be वर्गीकृत in the श्रेणी of an ``  attenuated psychotic risk syndrome '' .
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is  traditionally linked to the धनात्मक लक्षण of मनस्ताप  , especially those of schizophrenia .
This is  विचार to occur through a यांत्रिकी of aberrant  salience of environmental stimuli .
Many antipsychotic  दवाएँ तदनुसार निशाना the dopamine प्रणाली ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled  trials of these drugs , however , show either no significant difference between drug and placebo , or a very small effect size , suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system .
People experiencing  मनस्ताप may प्रदर्शनी कुछ व्यक्तित्व परिवर्तन  and thought disorder .
Depending on its  गंभीरता , इस may be accompanied  by unusual or bizarre behavior , as well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities .
General Grievous is a fictional character  in the स्टार  Wars universe .
a पुनरावर्ती विपक्षी , he is the परम् कमांडर  of the Confederacy of Independent Systems , a political faction of planetary systems waging war on the Galactic Republic .
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat by Count Dooku , he is a ruthless and powerful warrior devoted to Jedi 's  विनाश दौरान the क्लोन युद्धों  .
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi body count would  संकेत the आकाशगंगा to दे उसे the उपनाम  the Knightslayer .
Though the notorious  जेडी slayer थी the होने in the आकाशगंगा दौरान the क्लोन  Wars who had killed the most Jedi in single combat , he did not hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would lose .
Statistics play  an महत्वपूर्ण  role in summarizing baseball performance and evaluating players in the sport .
Since the flow of a baseball game has natural breaks to it , and normally players act individually rather than performing in clusters , the sport lends itself to easy  record-keeping और आंकडे  .
Statistics have  महरूम रखा लिये पेशेवर बेसबॉल चूंकि the सृष्टि  of the National League and American League , now part of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major League Baseball , from leagues such as the  नेशनल संघ of पेशेवर आधार बॉल खिलाड़ी  and the Negro Leagues .
Dorothea Lange 's  migrant  Mother depicts destitute pea pickers in California , centering on Florence Owens Thompson , age 32 , a mother of seven children , in Nipomo , California , March 1936 .
USA annual real  जीडीपी इससे 1910–60 , साथ  the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
the बेरोजगारी रेट in the us 1910–1960  , with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression was a severe worldwide economic  अवसाद in the दशक preceding  World War II .
The timing of the Great Depression varied across nations , but in most  देशों it प्रारंभ in 1930 और  lasted until the late 1930s or middle 1940s .
It was the longest  , सबसे फैली  , and deepest depression of the 20th century .
In the 21st century , the Great Depression is commonly used as an  उदाहरण of कैसा दूर the संसार  's economy can decline .
The depression originated in the U.S. , after the fall in stock prices that began around September 4 , 1929 , and became  विश्वव्यापी न्यूज साथ the भण्डार मार्केट क्रैश  of October 29 , 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ) .
The Great Depression had devastating  प्रभाव in देशों  rich and poor .
Personal income  , कर आय , profits  and prices dropped , while international trade plunged by more than 50 % .
बेरोजगारी in the u.S. रोज़ to 25 % ,  and in some countries rose as high as 33 % .
Cities all around the world were hit hard  , विशेषकर those निर्भर  on heavy industry .
Construction was virtually halted in  अनेक देशों .
Farming and rural areas suffered as crop prices fell by  लगभग  60 % .
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate sources of jobs , areas dependent on  प्राथमिक सेक्टर उद्योग ऐसे as नकदी cropping  , mining and logging suffered the most .
Some economies started to  रिकवर by  the mid-1930s .
In many countries , the  ऋणात्मक प्रभाव of the ग्रेट अवसाद  lasted until the end of World War II .
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ) , also known as a premature ventricular complex , ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ) , ventricular  असामयिक ताल ( vpb ) , or ventricular extrasystole ( ves )  , is a relatively common event where the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node , the normal heartbeat initiator .
The electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a PVC to be  easily विशिष्ट  from a normal heart beat .
A PVC may be  आभास as a `` छोड़ा  beat `` or felt as palpitations in the chest .
In a normal heartbeat , the ventricles contract  बाद the atria have helped to भरण उन्हें by contracting  ; in this way the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the lungs and to the rest of the body .
In a PVC , the ventricles contract first and before the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with blood ,  जिससे अर्थात् कि परिसंचरण  is inefficient .
However , single beat PVC arrhythmias do not usually  पोज़ a खतरे और can be asymptomatic in  healthy individuals .
William Gary Busey ( born June 29 , 1944 ) , better known  as गेरी busey , is an अमरीकी फिल्मी  and stage actor , and artist .
He has  appeared in a किस्में of films , सहित lethal हथियार , पाइंट  Break , and Under Siege , as well as guest appearances on Gunsmoke , Walker , Texas Ranger , Law & Order , and Entourage .
He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor in 1978 for his role in  the दोस्त  Holly Story .
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ) ,  is a बहुराष्ट्रीय सन्धि  for the purpose of establishing international standards for intellectual property rights enforcement .
The agreement aims to establish an international legal framework for targeting counterfeit goods , generic  दवाइयाँ और कापीराइट infringement on the अंतरजाल , और होता बनाएँ a नई शासी देह  outside existing forums , such as the World Trade Organization , the World Intellectual Property Organization , or the United Nations .
The agreement was signed in October 2011 by Australia ,  कनाडा , जापानी , मोरक्को , नई जीलैंड , सिंगापुर , दक्षिण  Korea , and the United States .
In 2012 ,  मैक्सिको , the  European Union and 22 countries which are member states of the European Union signed as well .
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement , which would come into force in countries that ratified  it बाद अनुसमर्थन by छह देशों  .
Supporters have described the agreement as a response to `` the increase in global trade of  नकली goods और pirated कापीराइट सुरक्षित  works '' .
Trades Unions representing workers in the music , film and TV industries and large intellectual property-based  संगठन ऐसे as the गति चित्र संघ  of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America were active in the treaty 's development .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों कह the सम्मेलन  adversely affects fundamental rights including freedom of expression and privacy .
ACTA has also been  criticised by डॉक्टर बगैर सीमायें  for endangering access to medicines in developing countries .
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups , developing countries and  the सामान्य पब्लिक इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation प्रक्रम और it रै महरूम वर्णित as नीति laundering  by critics including the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association .
The signature of the EU and many of its member states resulted in the resignation in protest of the  यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट 's नियुक्त मुख्य अन्वेषक , rapporteur कादर  Arif , as well as widespread protests across Europe .
In 2012 the newly-appointed  rapporteur , अंग्रेजों mep दाउद मार्टिन , अनुशंसित  against the treaty , stating : `` The intended benefits of this international agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties '' .
On 4 July 2012 ,  the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट  rejected the agreement in plenary session , with 478 voting against the treaty , 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining .
faw semi-trailer  truck in China
Tractor with side dump trailer  semi-trailer
A tractor with an  auto-transport  semi-trailer .
Semi-trailer truck with  स्लीपर पीछे  the cab .
A semi-trailer truck  is an articulated  vehicle that consists of a towing engine , known as a tractor in the United States and truck in many other places , attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight .
It is also known as a transport  in कनाडा , प्रधान प्रस्तावक in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , सेमी , tractor-trailer , ट्रक  and trailer , transfer truck , 18-wheeler , mack truck , big rig in the United States , or artic , short for articulated lorry , in Britain and Ireland .
A semi-trailer does not trail  completely पीछे the towing गाडी , लकिन  is attached at a point that is just forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit .
इस is किया so कि a भिन्न of the वज़न of  the trailer is carried by the prime mover .
This arrangement means that both tractor  और semi-trailer होगा have  a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer .
The  पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स  are a professional football team based in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania .
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the American  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc  ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
संस्थापित in , the स्टीलर्स हैं the  oldest franchise in the AFC .
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( six ) , won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in ( fifteen ) and hosted more ( eleven ) conference championship games  than कोई अन्य afc  or NFC team .
The Steelers share the record for most Super Bowl appearances  साथ the डलास cowboys ( आठ  ) .
The Steelers won their most  हाल चैंपियनशिप  , Super Bowl XLIII , on February 1 , 2009 .
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8 , 1933 , by Art Rooney , taking its original name from the  बेसबॉल टोली of the वही नाम , as थी आम अभ्यास लिये एनएफएल  teams to do at the time .
The ownership  of the स्टीलर्स रै remained  within the Rooney family since its founding .
The current owner is  Art  's son , Dan Rooney , who has given much control of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II .
Long one of the NFL 's  फ्लैगशिप टीमों , the स्टीलर्स  enjoy a large , widespread fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation .
the स्टीलर्स फिलहाल  play their home games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh 's North Side in the North Shore neighborhood , which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers .
Built in 2001 , the stadium replaced Three Rivers Stadium which  hosted  the Steelers for 31 seasons .
Prior to Three Rivers , the Steelers had played their games in Pitt Stadium and Forbes  फ़ील्ड  .
Three different kinds of  गेहूं और rye आटा
Flour is a powder which is  बना by पीस खाद्यान्न दाने  , or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ) .
It  is the प्रमुख संघटक of ब्रैड , जिससे  is a staple food for many cultures , making the availability of adequate supplies of flour a major economic and political issue at various times throughout history .
गेहूं आटा is एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण भोजन in यूरोपीय , उत्तर अमरीकी  , Middle Eastern , Indian and North African cultures , and is the defining ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries .
While wheat is the most common base for flour ,  मकई आटा रै महरूम महत्वपूर्ण in mesoamerican भोजन चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स , और  remains a staple throughout the Americas .
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of central Europe ,  और राइस can भी be प्रयुक्त in आटा , हालांकि  this is relatively uncommon .
Heart rate is the number of heartbeats per  ईकाई of समय , typically  expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ) .
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide changes , such as  दौरान शारीरिक कसरत , नींद , बीमारी  , or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system  stimulants ऐसे as amphetamines बढ़ाएँ  heart rate .
Central nervous system depressants or  sedatives decreases the दिल रेट ( अलावा इससे कुछ विशेषकर  strange ones with equally strange effects , such as ketamine which can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ) .
वहीँ हैं  many ways in which the heart rate speeds up or slows down .
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the brain , many of which are those that are 'forced'/'enticed '  आउट by the ingestion और प्रसंस्करण  of drugs .
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume , one of the physiological ways to  उद्धार अधिक ऑक्सीजन to an अंग is to  increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often .
Normal resting heart rates  दायरा इससे 60-100 bpm .
Bradycardia is  पारिभाषित as a resting दिल रेट  below 60 bpm .
However ,  दिल दरों इससे 50 to 60 bpm हैं  common among healthy people and do not necessarily require special attention .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm , though  persistent बाकी दरों between 80-100 bpm , मुख्यतः if वे हैं उपस्थित दौरान  sleep , may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ) .
Catherine II 's carved , painted and gilded Coronation  कोच ( hermitage  Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people , usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) and sedan chairs are  excluded , चूंकि वे हैं wheelless  vehicles .
The  carriage is विशेषकर designed  for private passenger use and for comfort or elegance , though some are also used to transport goods .
It may be light ,  smart और तेज़  or heavy , large and comfortable .
Carriages  सामान्यतः have  suspension using leaf springs , elliptical springs ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping .
A public passenger vehicle would not usually be called a carriage – terms  लिये ऐसे शामिल stagecoach  , charabanc and omnibus .
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and (  two-wheeled ) कार्ट share महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the इतिहास of  the carriage , as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) chariot .
The 2004  भारतीय समंदर भूकंप थी an undersea megathrust  earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 UTC on Sunday , 26 December 2004 , with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra , Indonesia .
the भूकंप itself  is known by the scientific community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake .
The resulting tsunami was given various names , including the 2004  भारतीय समंदर सुनामी , दक्षिण  Asian tsunami , Indonesian tsunami , and the Boxing Day tsunami .
The earthquake was caused by subduction and triggered a series of devastating tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean , killing over 230,000 people in fourteen countries ,  और inundating तटीय समुदायों साथ  waves up to high .
It was one of the deadliest  प्राकृतिक आपदाओं  in recorded history .
Indonesia was the hardest-hit country , followed by Sri Lanka ,  इण्डिया , और थाईलैंड  .
With a magnitude of Mw  9.1–9.3 , it is the तीसरा largest भूकंप  ever recorded on a seismograph .
The earthquake had the longest  अवधि of faulting कभी observed  , between 8.3 and 10 minutes .
It caused the  संपूर्ण ग्रह to हिलना as much as  and triggered other earthquakes as far away as Alaska .
Its epicentre was  between simeulue  and mainland Indonesia .
The plight of  the प्रभावित लोगों  and countries prompted a worldwide humanitarian response .
In  सब , the विश्वव्यापी जातियाँ दान  more than $ 14 billion ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid .
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power  स्टेशन  in Iceland .
Geothermal energy is  थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित in  the Earth .
Thermal energy is the energy that  determines the तापमान  of matter .
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the  ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे रेडियोसक्रिय  decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in  तापमान between the कोर of the ग्रह और इसके सतह , ड्राइव a निरन्तर  conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective  geothermal originates इससे  the Greek roots γη ( ge ) , meaning earth , and θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning hot .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy is created by radioactive decay and  temperatures may पहुँचें over  5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
Heat conducts from the core to  surrounding  cooler rock .
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt , creating magma  संवहन upward चूंकि it is  lighter than the solid rock .
The magma heats rock and water  in the क्रस्ट , sometimes  up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used for bathing since  paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस हीटिंग  since ancient Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide , about  10,715  megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct  geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग , स्पेस हीटिंग  , spas , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal power is cost effective , reliable , sustainable , and  environmentally दोस्ताना  , but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent  technological अग्रिम have dramatically विस्तारित  the range and size of viable resources , especially for applications such as home heating , opening a potential for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within  the धरती , लकिन ये emissions  are much lower per energy unit than those of fossil fuels .
As a result , geothermal power has the potential to help  mitigate वैश्विक वार्मिंग if widely  deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to  सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा needs , लकिन तभी a बहुत छोटी भिन्न  may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and exploration for deep  संसाधन is  very expensive .
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions about technology , energy prices ,  subsidies , और ब्याज  rates .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers  होता be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a बेदर्दी उर्जा सोर्स जैसे geothermal  .
लकिन as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted शोध और उद्योग  experience , the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 , geothermal  उर्जा लागत between दो और  ten cents per kwh .
The term cubic foot is an Imperial and  us प्रथागत ( non- मीट्रिक )  unit of volume , used in the United States and the United Kingdom .
It is defined as the volume  of a घन साथ पहलू of एक  foot ( 0.3048 m ) in length .
To calculate cubic  फीट गुणा  length X width X height .
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation : ,  दक्षिणी वियतनामी उच्चारण : ) ; 19 may 1890 –  2 September 1969 ) , born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn Ái Quốc , was a Vietnamese communist revolutionary leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ) .
He was a key  फिगर in the न्यास of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र  of Vietnam in 1945 , as well as the People’s Army of Vietnam ( PAVN ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War .
He led the Việt Minh independence movement from 1941 onward , establishing the communist -ruled Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945 and defeating  the फ्रेंच संघ in 1954 at  the battle of Điện Biên Phủ .
He officially stepped down from power in 1955 due to  स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं , लकिन remained a अत्यधिक दृश्य figurehead  and inspiration for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united , communist Vietnam—until his death .
After the war , Saigon , capital of the Republic of  वियतनाम , थी renamed  Hồ Chí Minh City .
All Roads Lead Home  is a विशेषता फिल्मी released  on September 26 , 2008 .
Directed by Dennis Fallon , it stars Peter Boyle , Patton Oswalt , Jason London , Vivien Cardone ,  वैनेसा शाखा , पीटर कायोटी , स्टीफन मिल्टन , और allan kayser  .
The movie  थी फिल्माया in  and around Kansas City , Missouri .
The movie made its World Premiere  जनवरी 27 at the सांता बारबरा अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival .
The film has also recently been in several  फिल्मी त्यौहार ,  and has received bad reviews .
Peter Boyle  died पहले  the movie 's release .
It  थी the पिछला  movie he appeared in .
Sales taxes in the United States are taxes placed on the sale or  पट्टे of goods और सेवाएं  in the United States .
While no national general sales tax exists , the federal  सरकारी levies अनेक नेशनल चयनात्मक बिक्री कर on the  sale or lease of particular goods and services .
Furthermore , forty-five states , the District of Columbia , and Guam impose general sales  कर कि लागू to the बिक्री or पट्टे of सबसे goods और कुछ सेवाएं , और  states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services .
States may also delegate to local governments the authority to impose  अतिरिक्त सामान्य or चयनात्मक बिक्री  taxes .
Sales tax is calculated by multiplying the  खरीदें  price by the applicable tax rate .
Tax rates vary  widely by क्षेत्राधिकार  and range from less than 1 % to over 10 % .
बिक्री कर  is collected by the seller at the time of sale .
Use  कर is स्वः assessed  by a buyer who has not paid sales tax on a taxable purchase .
Unlike the value  added कर , a बिक्री कर  is imposed only once , at the retail level .
However , in cases where items are sold at retail more than once , such as used cars , the sales  कर can be चार्ज on the वही  item indefinitely .
The definition of retail sales and what goods  और सेवाएं हैं  taxable vary among the states .
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous categories of goods  और सेवाएं  that are exempt from sales tax , or taxed at reduced rates .
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale  is uniformly exempt इससे बिक्री कर  .
Most jurisdictions exempt food sold in grocery stores ,  नुस्खा medications , और अनेक  agricultural supplies .
Sales taxes , including those  imposed by लोकल सरकारें , हैं generally  administered at the state level .
States imposing sales tax require retail sellers to  collect कर इससे ग्राहक ,  file returns , and remit the tax to the state .
Procedural  नियम vary  widely .
Sellers generally must collect tax from in-state purchasers unless the purchaser provides  an exemption प्रमाणपत्र  .
Most states allow or require  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक remittance  .
A central processing unit ( CPU ) , also referred to as a central processor unit , is the hardware within a computer that carries out the  निर्देश of a कंप्यूटर  program by performing the basic arithmetical , logical , and input/output operations of the system .
The term has been in use in the computer industry at least  चूंकि the जल्दी 1960s  .
The form , design , and implementation of CPUs have changed over the course of their  इतिहास , लकिन उनके आधारभूत आपरेशन remains much the  same .
A computer can have more than one CPU ; this is called  multiprocessing  .
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain multiple  cpu on a सिंगल चिप ; those ics हैं पुकारा  multi-core processors .
Two typical components of a CPU are the  गणित लॉजिक ईकाई ( alu ) , जिससे performs  arithmetic and logical operations , and the control unit ( CU ) , which extracts instructions from memory and decodes and executes them , calling on the ALU when necessary .
Not all computational  प्रणालियों rely on a सेंट्रल  processing unit .
An array processor or vector processor has multiple parallel  कम्प्यूटिंग  elements , with no one unit considered the `` center '' .
In the distributed computing model , problems are solved  by a वितरित interconnected नियत  of processors .
RFID  चिप अगला to  a grain of rice .
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an  बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र  a coded identification number when queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer products , and implanted in pets , for  पहचान उद्देश्य  .
Radio-frequency  पहचान ( rfid ) is the बेतार non-contact  use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data , for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
The tags  contain electronically  stored information .
Some  टैग हैं संचालित और  read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else have no battery but collect energy from  the interrogating em फ़ील्ड , और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder  to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
बैटरी संचालित  tags may operate at hundreds of meters .
Unlike a bar code , the tag  करता नहीं necessarily  need to be within line of sight of the reader , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are  प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग  .
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to track its  प्रगति through the सभा  line .
Pharmaceuticals  can be tracked  through warehouses .
Livestock  और पालतु may have टैग injected , allowing  positive identification of the animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing , possessions , or even implanted  भीतर लोगों , the सम्भावना  of reading personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Overtime is  the राशि of समय  someone works beyond normal working hours .
सामान्य घंटों may  be determined in several ways:
by custom (  कया  is considered healthy or reasonable by society ) ,
by practices  of a दिए  trade or profession,
by  legislation,
by agreement between  नियोक्ता और मजदूर  or their representatives .
Most nations have overtime labor laws designed to  dissuade or prevent  employers from forcing their employees to work excessively long hours .
These laws may  लो into खाता अन्य  considerations than the humanitarian , such as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive , or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy .
एक आम दृष्टिकोण to regulating ओवरटाइम  is to require employers to pay workers at a higher hourly rate for overtime work .
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay even if not obliged to do so by law ,  विशेषकर  if they believe that they face a backward bending supply curve of labour .
ओवरटाइम अदा दरों can कारण  workers to work longer hours than they would at a flat hourly rate .
Overtime laws ,  attitudes toward ओवरटाइम  and hours of work vary greatly from country to country and between different economic sectors .
Visualization of  कड़ी between पृष्ठों on  a wiki using a force-directed layout .
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are  a क्लास of algorithms लिये आरेखण रेखाचित्र  in an aesthetically pleasing way .
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges as  संभावित , by assigning शक्तियां among the नियत of किनारे  and the set of nodes , based on their relative positions , and then using these forces either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy .
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem , force-directed algorithms ,  होने शारीरिक  simulations , usually require no special knowledge about graph theory such as planarity .
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for inflation ) is the amount of goods  or सेवाएं कि can  be purchased with a unit of currency .
For example , if you had taken one dollar to a store in the 1950s , you would have been able to buy a greater number of items than you would today , indicating that  तुम होता have था a वृहद खरीदना शक्ति in  the 1950s .
Currency can be either a  कमोडिटी धन , जैसे सुनहरा or चांदी , or  fiat currency , or free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars .
As Adam Smith noted , having money gives one the ability to `` command '' others ' labor , so purchasing power to  कुछ extent is शक्ति over अन्य लोगों ,  to the extent that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency .
If one 's monetary income stays the same ,  लकिन the दाम स्तर increases , the  purchasing power of that income falls .
Inflation  करता नहीं सदा imply गिरना खरीदना शक्ति of एक  's money income since it may rise faster than the price level .
A higher  रियल आय  means a higher purchasing power since real income refers to the income adjusted for inflation .
For a price index , its value in the base year is  प्रायः सामान्यीकृत to a मान of 100  .
The purchasing power of a unit of currency , say a  डालर , in a  given year , expressed in dollars of the base year , is 100/P , where P is the price index in that year .
So , by definition the purchasing power of a dollar  decreases as the  price level rises .
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount C of money , t years into the  भविष्य , can be computed साथ the  formula for the present value :
where in this case i is an assumed future annual  महंगाई  rate .
Education in South Korea is viewed as being crucial for success and competition is  नतीजतन बहुत heated  and fierce .
A central administration  oversees the प्रक्रम लिये the शिक्षा of  children from kindergarten to the third and final year of high school .
Mathematics , science , Korean , English , and social studies  हैं generally माना to be the सबसे  important subjects .
Normally  शारीरिक शिक्षा is नहीं माना  important as it is not recognised , by the generally academic elitist South Korean populace , as education and therefore many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics .
South Korea was the  पहला देश in the संसार to provide high-speed  internet access to all primary , junior , and high schools .
Although South Korean students often  रैंक अत्यधिक on अंतरराष्ट्रीय तुलनात्मक आकलन  when compared to students of most Western education systems , the South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation .
The South Korean  शिक्षा प्रणाली is बल्कि  notably strict and overly structured as compared to its counterparts in most Western societies .
Also , the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ) , which too emphasise on  passive memorisation , as opposed to conceptual समझना  , in students are criticised as a major social problem .
The My Lai Massacre ( , ; , , or ) was the  वियतनाम युद्ध द्रव्यमान हत्या of between  347 and 504 unarmed civilians in South Vietnam on March 16 , 1968 , by United States Army soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion , 20th Infantry Regiment , 11th Brigade of the Americal Division .
Victims included  महिलाओं , मेन  , children , and infants .
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies were later found to be mutilated and many women were  allegedly raped prior  to the killings .
While  26 u.S. सैनिको यहूद initially चार्ज साथ दण्ड  offenses for their actions at Mỹ Lai , only Second Lieutenant William Calley , a platoon leader in Charlie Company , was convicted .
Found guilty of killing 22 villagers , he was originally given a life sentence ,  लकिन तभी परोसा तीन और a हाफ  years under house arrest .
The massacre took  प्लेस  in the hamlets of My Lai and My Khe of Son My village .
The event is also known as the Son My Massacre , especially in the  वियतनामी राज्य मीडिया  .
The U.S. military codeword for the `` Viet Cong  stronghold '' थी  `` Pinkville '' .
The incident prompted  वैश्विक आक्रोश  when it became public knowledge in 1969 .
The massacre  भी increased घरेलू  opposition to the U.S. involvement in the Vietnam War .
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to  halt the नरसंहार और protect the wounded  were initially denounced by several U.S . Congressmen as traitors .
They received hate mail and death threats and found mutilated  पशु on उनके doorsteps  .
The  तीन यहूद बाद  widely praised and decorated by the Army for their heroic actions .
The hijackers  in the सितंबर  11 attacks were 19 men affiliated with al-Qaeda , and 15 of the 19 were citizens of Saudi Arabia .
Others were from Egypt , Lebanon  , और  the UAE .
The hijackers were organized into four  टीमों , प्रत्येक  led by a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' who were trained to help subdue the pilots , passengers , and crew .
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States were Khalid  al-mihdhar और nawaf al-hazmi  , who settled in the San Diego area in January 2000 .
They were followed  by तीन hijacker-pilots , मोहम्मद atta , marwan  al-Shehhi , and Ziad Jarrah early in the summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida .
the चौथी hijacker-pilot  , Hani Hanjour , arrived in San Diego in December 2000 .
The rest of  the `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' arrived in  the spring and early summer of 2001 , just months before the September 11 attacks .
Abū al-Qāsim  muḥammad इब्न ʿabd allāh इब्न ʿabd al-muṭṭalib  ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ) , also transliterated as Muhammad ( ) , was a religious , political , and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam .
he is believed by मुसलमान  and Bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God .
Muhammad is almost universally  माना by मुसलमान as the  last prophet sent by God for mankind .
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the founder of  islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer  of an अनछुए असली monotheistic  faith of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus , and other prophets .
Born in about 570 CE in the  arabian नगर of मक्का , he थी  orphaned at an early age and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly as a merchant  , as खूब  as a shepherd , and was first married by age 25 .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for  अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ , he बाद reported कि  it was there , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly , proclaiming that `` God is One ``  , कि पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण  '' to Him ( lit .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God , and that he himself was a prophet and messenger of God  , in the वही रग as अन्य  Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few followers early on , and was met with  दुश्मनी इससे कुछ  Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly .
To escape persecution ,  मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of  his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This event , the Hijra , marks the beginning of  the इस्लामी पंचांग  , which is also known as the Hijri Calendar .
In Medina , Muhammad united  the जनजातियों अंतर्गत  the Constitution of Medina .
After eight years of fighting  साथ the meccan जनजातियों , उसके अनुसरणकर्ता , जो by  then had grown to 10,000 , took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
He  नष्ट the pagan मूर्तियों in the नगर और तब  sent his followers out to destroy all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
in 632 , a few महीने बाद returning  to Medina from The Farewell Pilgrimage , Muhammad fell ill and died .
By  the समय  of his death , most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam , and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The revelations (  or ayah , lit  .
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his  मौत – रूप the आयतें of the कुरान  , regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based .
Besides the  कुरान , मुहम्मद 's जीवन (  sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law .
They  discuss मुहम्मद और अन्य नबियों of  Islam with reverence , adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times  यहूद largely ऋणात्मक , appraisals  in modern history have been far less so .
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest people  in the संसार in ordinal रैंक , ऐसे as oldest  person or oldest man .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body that specifically deals in  आयु शोध , ऐसे as the जराविद्या शोध  Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan  is कि of  Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ) , who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She met Vincent  वैन gogh जब  she was 12 or 13 .
This led to news  मीडिया ध्यान  in 1985 , after Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age , beyond any reasonable question , in the records of  उसके देशी नगर  , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been  उत्पादित than लिये कोई अन्य supercentenarian  ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
the longest undisputed जीवनकाल लिये पुरूष supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon किमुरा , जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी और is आयु as of  .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States ,  on 17 दिसम्बर  2012 , Kimura , born 19 April 1897 , is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented .
He has also been the oldest living man  चूंकि the मौत of 114-year  old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January  2013 , the oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa , भी  from Japan , born on 5 March 1898 .
This is a timeline of  the african-american  Civil Rights Movement .
The Civil Rights  गति थी a  freedom struggle by African Americans in the 1950s and 1960s to gain equality .
The goals of the movement were  स्वतंत्रता इससे पक्षपात , बराबर अवसर in नियुक्ति  , education and housing , the right to vote and equal access to public facilities .
Heavy  मेटल ( प्रायः referred to as मेटल  ) is a genre of rock music that developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s , largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States .
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock , the bands that created heavy metal developed a thick , massive sound  , characterized by अत्यधिक प्रवर्धित distortion  , extended guitar solos , emphatic beats , and overall loudness .
Heavy metal lyrics and performance styles are  generally संबद्ध  with masculinity and machismo .
The first heavy metal bands such as Led Zeppelin , Deep Purple and Black Sabbath attracted large audiences , though they were often derided by  आलोचकों , a औकात आम throughout the इतिहास of  the genre .
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by  discarding much of इसके ब्लूज़ influence ; motörhead introduced a  punk rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed .
Bands in the New Wave of British Heavy  मेटल ऐसे as आयरन  Maiden followed in a similar vein .
Before the end of the  दशक , भारी मेटल प्रशंसक became  known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers `` .
During  the 1980s , glam मेटल became  a commercial force with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison .
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme , aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the mainstream with bands such as Metallica , Megadeth , Slayer , and Anthrax , while other styles of the most extreme subgenres of metal like  मौत मेटल और ब्लैक मेटल  remain subcultural phenomena .
Since the  mid-1990s , लोकप्रिय शैलियाँ ऐसे as nu मेटल , जिससे प्रायः incorporates तत्व of  grunge and hip hop ; and metalcore , which blends extreme metal with hardcore punk , have further expanded the definition of the genre .
The  far-right ( भी ज्ञात as the चरम  right ) refers to the highest degree of rightism in right-wing politics .
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society , and supports supremacy of certain individuals or  समूह  deemed to be innately superior or preferable who are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable .
The far right 's  वकालत of  supremacism is based on what its adherents perceive as innate characteristics of people that can not be changed .
This stands as a point of difference with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours , such as laziness or  decadence , as the प्राथमिक स्त्रोत of  social inequalities .
The centre right—unlike the  दूर right—claims कि लोगों  can end their behavioural inferiority through changing their habits and choices .
The original far right  , जिससे उभरा in फ़्रांस  after the French Revolution , refused to accept the French Republic and supported a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy .
The far right is commonly associated with persons or groups  जो थाम चरम राष्ट्रवादी , xenophobic  , racist , religious fundamentalist or reactionary views .
The most extreme-right movements have pursued oppression and genocide against groups  of लोगों on the आधार of उनके कथित हीनता .
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ) , in some older texts Thomas Hobbs  of malmsbury , थी an अंग्रेज़ी पारस , बेहतरीन ज्ञात आज लिये उसके कार्य on राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र  .
His 1651 book  leviathan स्थापित the न्यास  for most of Western political philosophy from the perspective of social contract theory .
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign , but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which led to the later distinction between civil society and the state ) ; the view that all  legitimate राजनैतिक शक्ति जरूर be `` प्रतिनिधि '' और आधारित on the सहमति of the लोगों ; और a उदार  interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid .
He was one of the founders of modern  राजनैतिक  philosophy .
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion , obeying the same physical laws as other matter and motion , remains influential ; and his account of human nature as self-interested cooperation , and of political communities as being based upon a `` social  अनुबंध `` remains एक of the प्रमुख विषय of राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र  .
In addition  to राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र , hobbes  also contributed to a diverse array of other fields , including history , geometry , the physics of gases , theology , ethics , and general philosophy .
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to  पहचानो , assess , और कंट्रोल the भाव  of oneself , of others , and of groups .
It can be divided into ability EI and   trait EI .
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships with traditional intelligence , whereas trait EI is usually measured using  self-report questionnaires और रै stronger  relationships with personality .
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real intelligence and whether it has incremental  वैध over  IQ and the Big Five personality traits .
Heredity is  the गुजर of traits  to offspring from its parents or ancestor .
This is the process by which an offspring cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the characteristics of its  जनक कोशिका or सजीव  .
through आनुवंशिकता , विसंगतियाँ  exhibited by individuals can accumulate and cause some species to evolve .
The study of heredity in biology is called genetics , which  शामिल the फ़ील्ड of epigenetics  .
For United States individual income tax , adjusted gross  आय ( agi ) is कुल सकल आय  minus specific reductions .
Taxable income is adjusted gross  आय ऋण  allowances for personal exemptions and itemized deductions .
For  सबसे व्यक्तिगत कर  purposes , AGI is more relevant than gross income .
Gross income is  बिक्री दाम of goods  or property , minus cost of the property sold , plus other income .
It  शामिल मजदूरी , ब्याज , dividends , कारोबार  income , rental income , and all other types of income .
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a  कारोबार or rental कार्यकलाप और 21 अन्य  specific items .
Several deductions ( e.g .  चिकित्सा खर्च और विविध itemized  deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI .
Certain phase outs , including those  of निम्नतर  tax rates and itemized deductions , are based on levels of AGI .
Many  राज्य आधार राज्य आय कर on agi  with certain deductions .
`` Lazy  नजर '' is the तीसरा सिंगल  from Silversun Pickups ' debut album Carnavas .
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David Letterman , The Tonight Show with Jay  लीनो , बाद साथ jools हॉलैंड , और पिछला कॉल  with Carson Daly .
The song is a playable track on Rock Band 2 and  गिटार नायिका :  World Tour .
An alternate version of the  सोंग , साथ a लंबाई of 7:27 ,  was played on XMU before the shorter version was played on FM and other XM channels .
This  संस्करण थी प्रदर्शित  on their demo CD ( which featured early versions of four tracks ) .
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone number ; in the  उत्तर अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना  countries ( country code 1 ) , it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone number .
In other countries both the prefix and the number may have  अलग lengths  .
It  shows जिससे एक्सचेंज  the remaining numbers refer to .
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code ( required for international calls only ) ,  क्षेत्रफल कोड ( जरूरी  for calls between telephone areas ) , prefix , and subscriber number .
Some places restrict certain prefixes to fax numbers or cell phones only ;  in अन्य स्थान ऐसे समर्पित  prefixes are not used .
As telephone technology advanced , the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in London , UK , was once the GULliver exchange , but now 44207485xxxx is just considered one of many  क्रमांक ब्लॉक परोसा by the clken kentish कस्बा एक्सचेंज  ; 4420770703xx is another .
Metformin ( BP  , सुनाया , ; originally  sold as Glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class .
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2 diabetes , in particular , in overweight and  मोटे लोगों और those साथ सामान्य  kidney function .
Its use in  गर्भकालीन मधुमेह  has been limited by safety concerns .
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome ,  और रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य  diseases where insulin resistance may be an important factor .
metformin works by suppressing  glucose production by the liver .
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug that has been conclusively shown to prevent  the cardiovascular जटिलताओं  of diabetes .
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride  स्तर , और is नहीं संबद्ध  with weight gain .
, metformin is one of only two oral antidiabetics in the World Health Organization Model  सूची of अनिवार्य दवाइयाँ ( the अन्य होने glibenclamide  ) .
When prescribed appropriately , metformin causes few adverse effects ( the most common is  जठरांत्र परेशान ) और  is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious concern in overdose and when it is prescribed to people with contraindications  , लकिन वरना , वहीँ is no significant  risk .
First synthesized and found to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s , metformin was forgotten for the next two  दशकों as शोध shifted to  insulin and other antidiabetic drugs .
Interest in  metformin थी rekindled in the लेट 1940s बाद  several reports that it could reduce blood sugar levels in people , and in 1957 , French physician Jean Sterne published the first clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for diabetes .
It was introduced to the United Kingdom  in 1958 ,  Canada in 1972 , and the United States in 1995 .
metformin is अभी believed to be the सबसे widely  prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States alone , more than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its generic formulations .
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved  into the ग्रेनाइट फेस  of Mount Rushmore near Keystone , South Dakota , in the United States .
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son , Lincoln Borglum , Mount Rushmore features sculptures of  the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , थामस  Jefferson , Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln .
The  संपूर्ण मेमोरियल  covers and is above sea level .
the tallest पहाड़  in the region is Harney Peak ( ) .
South Dakota  इतिहासकार दोने रॉबिन्सन is credited साथ conceiving  the idea of carving the likenesses of famous people into the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region .
Robinson 's initial idea was to sculpt the Needles ; however , Gutzon Borglum rejected the Needles site  क्युकी of the ग़रीब विशेषता of the ग्रेनाइट और दमदार विपक्ष इससे पर्यावरणविद  and Native American groups .
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location , which also has the advantage of facing  southeast  for maximum sun exposure .
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark , Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but  borglum decided the मूर्तिकला चाहिए have a अधिक नेशनल फ़ोकस , और  chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain .
After securing federal funding ,  निर्माण on the मेमोरियल began in 1927  , and the presidents ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939 .
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941 , his  बेटे lincoln borglum  took over construction .
Although the initial concept called for each president to be depicted  इससे सिर to कमर , कमी  of funding forced construction to end in late October 1941 .
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the memorial in 1933 , while it was still under construction , and has managed the memorial  to the  present day .
It attracts nearly three million  लोगों annually  .

A shirt , dress shirt , button-front , button-front shirt , or button-up shirt is a garment with a collar , a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem , and sleeves with   cuffs .
Shirts are predominantly  प्रयुक्त by मेन , चूंकि महिलाओं प्रायः  wear blouses .
The front opening is  fastened using बटन  or studs , and the cuffs close with buttons or cuff links .
Shirts are  सामान्यतः बना इससे woven cloth  , and are often accompanied by a jacket and tie , for example with a suit or formalwear , but shirts are also worn more casually .
In British English , dress shirt means specifically the more formal evening garment worn  साथ black- or white- टाई , भी discussed  below .
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and  detachable छल्लों संलग्न  with collar studs .
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to apply to all shirts ( with or  बगैर buttoned bas छल्लों ) , होने प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये `` button-up '' or ``  button-front '' .
Administrative  पेशेवर दिन ( भी ज्ञात as secretaries दिन or  Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries , administrative assistants , receptionists , and other administrative support professionals .
In North  अमेरिका , it is मनाये  on the Wednesday of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ) .
In  फ़्रांस it is मनाये on the तीसरा  Thursday in April ( April 18 in 2013 ) .
in ऑस्ट्रेलिया  it is celebrated on the first Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin  ( ; 15 जून 1594 – 19 नवम्बर 1665 ) थी the अग्रणी चित्रकार of the शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच बरॉक  style , although he spent most of his working life in Rome .
His work is characterized by clarity , logic  , और अनुक्रम , और favors लकीर  over color .
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for such classically oriented artists as Jacques-Louis  दाउद , jean-auguste-dominique ingres  and Paul Cézanne .
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere , except for a  छोटी काल जब कार्डिनल रिचलू  ordered him back to France to serve as First Painter to the King .
Most of his  works हैं इतिहास paintings of धार्मिक  or mythological subjects that very often have a large landscape element .
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1 , 1954Stambler , Irwin , and Grelun Landon ( 2000 ) . - Country Music : The Encyclopedia . - New York : St. Martin 's Press . - p.533 . - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin , Richard ( 2003 ) . - Country Music : A Biographical Dictionary . - New York : Routledge - p.427 . - ISBN 978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin , Colin ( 1995 ) . - The Guinness Encyclopedia of Popular Music . - New York : Stockton Press - P.4462 . - ISBN 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton , Scott ( 2003 ) . - The Tombstone Tourist : Musicians . - New York : Pocket Books . - p.395 . - ISBN 978-0-7434-6330-0.—Hicks , Jack . - `` Singer Keith Whitley 's Memory Alive Through Songs , Love in Home Town '' . - The Kentucky Post . - September 25 , 1991.— '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley Dead at 33 '' . - Lexington Herald-Leader . - May 10 , 1989.——Hurst , Jack . - `` Whitley 's Last Days '' . - Chicago Tribune . - May 14 , 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley '' . - United Press International . - ( c/o The San Francisco  वृत्तान्त ) . - may 10 , 1989 . — may 9 , 1989 ) , ज्ञात professionally as कैथ whitley , थी an अमरीकी देश म्यूज़िक  singer .
Whitley 's brief career in mainstream country music lasted from 1984 until his  मौत in 1989 , लकिन he continues  to influence an entire generation of singers and songwriters .
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts , including five consecutive Number Ones : `` Do n't Close Your Eyes `` , `` When You Say Nothing at All `` , `` I 'm No Stranger to the Rain `` , `` I Wonder Do You Think of Me  `` and `` It Ai  n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ) .

A statute is a formal written enactment of a legislative authority that  governs a राज्य  , city , or county .
Typically , statutes command or  prohibit कुछ , or घोषित  policy .
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies  इससे मामला विधि , decided  by courts , and regulations issued by government agencies .
Statutes are sometimes  referred to as विधान  or `` black letter law . ''
As  a सोर्स  of law , statutes are considered primary authority ( as opposed to secondary authority ) .
Ideally all statutes must be in harmony with the fundamental law of the land (  संवैधानिक  ) .
इस शब्द is प्रयुक्त  in contradistinction to the common law .
Statutes acquire their force from the time of their  ड्योढ़ी , however  unless otherwise provided .
Statutes are of several kinds ;  namely , पब्लिक  or private .
Declaratory or  remedial .
Temporary or  perpetual  .
A temporary statute is one  जिससे is सीमित in इसके अवधि  at the time of its enactment .
It continues in force until the time of its  limitation रै  expired , unless sooner repealed .
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of which there is no  सीमित समय , हालांकि it may  not be expressly declared to be so .
If , however , a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another which is temporary only , the former  होगा भी be अस्थाई और निर्भर  upon the existence of the latter .
Before a statute becomes law in some countries , it must be agreed upon by the  उच्चतम कार्यपालिका in the सरकारी  , and finally published as part of a code .
In many countries , statutes are organized in topical arrangements ( or  `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर  publications called codes , such as the United States Code .
In  अनेक राष्ट्र statutory विधि is  distinguished from and subordinate to constitutional law .
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate off the common iliac arteries anterior to the  sacroiliac संयुक्त of the  pelvis .
They proceed anterior and inferior along the medial border of the  psoas प्रमुख मांसपेशियां  .
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and  अवर to the वंक्षण स्नायु  about one third laterally from the insertion point of the inguinal ligament on the pubic tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries .
The external iliac artery is usually the artery used to attach the renal artery to the  प्राप्तकर्ता of a गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण  .
Steam is a digital distribution , digital rights management , multiplayer and  संचार मंच  developed by Valve Corporation .
It is used to distribute games and related media online , from small independent developers  to larger तन्त्र घरों ; in अक्तूबर 2012 , वाल्व विस्तारित the सेवा to  include non-gaming software .
Steam provides the user with installation and automatic management of software across multiple computers , community features such as friends lists and  समूह , बादल छायांकन , और in-game  voice and chat functionality .
The software provides a freely available application programming interface , Steamworks , that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of  भाप 's कृत्यों भीतर उनके तन्त्र उत्पाद , सहित नक़ल सुरक्षा , नेटवर्किंग और matchmaking , in-game उपलब्धियाँ और  micro-transactions , and support for user-created content through Steam Workshop .
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft Windows , the client  रै विस्तारित  to include OS X and Linux versions , and clients with limited functionality on the PlayStation 3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices .
In addition to being a central hub for gaming software , Valve has created a version of Steam  साथ altered कार्यक्षमता to be प्रयुक्त in स्कूलों लिये शैक्षणिक  software , including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons .
, there  हैं nearly 2000 खेल  available through Steam , and 54 million active user accounts .
As of January 2013 , Steam has  देखी over 6.6 लाख  concurrent players .
Steam has an estimated 50–70 % share of the  डिजिटल वितरण मार्केट लिये वीडियो  games .
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank and rod from  the walschaerts वाल्व गियर of a भाप लोकोमोटिव  .
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16 , 1926 ) is an American comedian , actor  , सिंगर , फिल्मी निर्माता , screenwriter  and film director .
He is known  लिये उसके  slapstick humor in film , television , stage and radio .
He was originally paired up  साथ डीन मार्टिन in 1946 , forming the  famed comedy team of Martin and Lewis .
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work ,  वे स्ट्रक्चर  in a successful series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures .
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as national  अध्यक्ष लिये the muscular dystrophy संघ  ( MDA ) .
Lewis has won several awards for lifetime achievements from The American Comedy Awards , Los Angeles Film Critics  संघ , और वेनिस फिल्मी पर्व , और he रै  two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
In 2005 , he received the  राज्यपालों पुरस्कार of the अकादमी of टेलीविज़न कला &  Sciences Board of Governors , which is the highest Emmy Award presented .
On February 22 , 2009 , the Academy of Motion Picture  कला और sciences awarded  Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award .
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually  बहती into the उत्तर समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं longest नदी  in Europe , at about , with an average discharge of more than .
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of the  उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of  the Roman Empire and , since those days , the Rhine has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland .
It has also served as a defensive feature and has been the basis for  क्षेत्रीय और अंतरराष्ट्रीय  borders .
The many  castles और  prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine testify to its importance as a waterway .
नदी ट्रैफ़िक could be रोका at ये स्थितियाँ , प्रायः  for the purpose of collecting tolls , by the state that controlled that portion of the river .
Sri (  सिंहली )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री , IAST ; Śrī ) , also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree  is a शब्द of संस्कृत उत्पत्ति , प्रयुक्त in the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप  as polite form of address equivalent to the English `` Mr. '' in written and spoken language , or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ) .
Design of complex structures like the International Space Station  needs in-depth समझना  of Structural Analysis .
Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design , construction , and maintenance of the physical and naturally built environment , including works like roads , bridges ,  नहरों , dams , और इमारतें  .
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after military engineering , and it was defined to distinguish non-military  अभियान्त्रिकी इससे  military engineering .
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including  पर्यावरणीय अभियान्त्रिकी , भूतकनीकी अभियान्त्रिकी , भूभौतिकी , भूगणित , कंट्रोल  engineering , structural engineering , biomechanics , nanotechnology , transportation engineering , earth science , atmospheric sciences , forensic engineering , municipal or urban engineering , water resources engineering , materials engineering , coastal engineering , surveying , and construction engineering .
Civil  अभियान्त्रिकी takes प्लेस on सब स्तर : in the पब्लिक सेक्टर  from municipal through to national governments , and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to international companies .
