कैथरीन  Dunham in Cumbia
Katherine Dunham (  जून 22  , 1909 – May 21 , 2006 ) was an American dancer , choreographer , author , educator , and social activist .
Dunham had one of the most successful dance careers in American and European theater of the 20th century , and  निर्देशित उसके अपना नृत्य कम्पनी लिये  many years .
She has been  पुकारा the ``  matriarch and queen mother of black dance '' .
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s , Dunham was renowned throughout Europe and  लैटिन अमेरिका और थी widely लोकप्रिय  in the United States , where the Washington Post called her `` dancer Katherine the Great '' .
For almost  तीस सालो वो कायम  the Katherine Dunham Dance Company , the only self-supported American black dance troupe at that time , and over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances .
dunham थी an innovator in african-american  modern dance as well as a leader in the field of dance anthropology , or ethnochoreology .
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses , commonly called peat  मॉस due to इसके व्यापकता in गीला habitats  where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires .
Sphagnum accumulations can store water , since both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of  जल अंदर उनके कोशिकाएं ; पौधे may थाम इससे 16-26  times as much water as their dry weight depending on the species .
The empty cells  सहायता retain जल  in drier conditions .
Hence , as sphagnum moss grows ,  it can धीरे स्प्रेड into drier शर्तें  , forming larger peatlands , both raised bogs and blanket bogs .
These peat accumulations then provide habitat for a wide array of peatland plants , including sedges and ericaceous  shrubs , as खूब as orchids और  carnivorous plants .
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay readily  क्युकी of the phenolic यौगिकों  embedded in the moss 's cell walls .
In addition , bogs , like all  वेटलैंड्स , develop अवायवीय मृदा शर्तें  , which produces slower anaerobic decay rather than aerobic microbial action .
Peat moss can also acidify its surroundings  by लेने up cations , ऐसे as  calcium and magnesium , and releasing hydrogen ions .
Under the right conditions , peat can accumulate to a  गहराई of अनेक  meters .
Different species of Sphagnum have different tolerance limits for flooding and pH , so any one  peatland may have a क्रमांक of  different Sphagnum species .
Individual  peat मॉस पौधे consist of a प्रमुख स्टेम ,  with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles usually consisting of two or three spreading branches and two to four hanging branches .
The top of the plant , or capitulum , has compact clusters of  यंग शाखाओं  .
Along the stem are scattered leaves  of विभिन्न  shapes , named stem leaves ; the shape varies according to species .
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small , green , living cells (  chlorophyllose कोशिकाएं ) , और विशाल  , clear , structural , dead cells ( hyaline cells ) .
the latter have the  large water-holding capacity .
The earliest version of the Network Card ,  जारी हस्तचालित बल्कि  than through an APTIS machine .
The first APTIS  संस्करण  of the Network Card .
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until well into the 1990s , as stocks had to be  प्रयुक्त up despite the परिचय of the new-look  orange-banded version in 1991 .
The  परिचय of the weekday न्यूनतम किराया कंडीशन in 2002  resulted in a minor change : the red `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard .
This  संस्करण is  still in use as of 2007 .
The Network Railcard is a  छूट कार्ड introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल  , upon the creation of their Network SouthEast area around London , England .
The card is intended  to प्रोत्साहित अवकाश सफर by रेल by offering छूट  for adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares .
The range of discounts available , and the price of the card , have varied since that  समय , लकिन the कार्ड  has always been valid for a year 's unlimited use .
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent , by completing an  अनुप्रयोग रूप - no फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक पहचान or अन्य दस्तावेज़ीकरण  is needed to buy or use the card .
It is one of a number of concessionary fare schemes  उपलब्धियाँ on the अंग्रेजों रेल  system .
The United Nations ( UN ; French : Organisation des Nations Unies , ONU ) is the world 's largest ,  foremost , और सबसे prominent अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन  .
The stated aims of the United Nations include promoting and facilitating cooperation in international law , international security , economic development , social progress , human rights , civil rights  , सिविल लिबर्टीज  , political freedoms , democracy , and the achievement of lasting world peace .
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the  लीग of राष्ट्र , to रोकें  wars between countries , and to provide a platform for dialogue .
It contains  अनेक subsidiary  organizations to carry out its missions .
at इसके founding , the  UN had 51 member states ; as of 2011 , there are 193 .
From its offices around the world , the UN and its specialized agencies decide on substantive and  प्रशासनिक  issues in regular meetings held throughout the year .
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in promoting international economic and social cooperation and development ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies , information , and facilities needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice (  the प्राथमिक न्यायिक अंग ) ; और the संयुक्त राष्ट्र ट्रस्टीशिप परिषद ( जिससे  is currently inactive ) .
Other prominent UN System agencies include the World Health Organization ( WHO ) , the World Food Programme ( WFP ) and United Nations Children  's निधि  ( UNICEF ) .
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the  दफ्तर of secretary-general जिससे रै महरूम आयोजित by बैन ki-moon  of South Korea since 2007 .
The United Nations  मुख्यालय resides in अंतरराष्ट्रीय  territory in New York City , with further main offices at Geneva , Nairobi , and Vienna .
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary contributions from its member states ,  और रै छह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अरबी  , Chinese , English , French , Russian , and Spanish .
South Beach , also nicknamed SoBe , is a neighborhood in the city of Miami Beach , Florida , United  राज्य , स्तिथ due ईस्ट of मियामी नगर उचित  between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean .
The area encompasses all  of the अवरोध  islands of Miami Beach south of Indian Creek .
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed , starting in the 1910s ,  धन्यवाद to the विकास प्रयत्न of कार्ल G. फिशर , the lummus भाइयो  , and John S. Collins , the latter whose construction of the Collins Bridge provided the first vital land link between mainland Miami and the beaches .
The area has gone through numerous artificial and  प्राकृतिक परिवर्तन  over the years , including a booming regional economy , increased tourism , and the 1926 hurricane , which destroyed much of the area .
As of 2010 , about  39,186 निवासियों सजीव  in South Beach .
The United States  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय  election , held on Tuesday , November 8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party nominated incumbent Vice-President Richard Nixon , while the Democratic  पार्टी मनोनीत जॉन F. कैनेडी , सीनेटर  from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President ,  रिपब्लिकन  Dwight D. Eisenhower , was not eligible for re-election after serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes , or 0.17 % of the popular vote , giving him a  विजय of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी कॉलेज , the closest चूंकि  1916 .
This was the  पहला चुनाव  in which all fifty of the current United States participated .
A number of factors  बताइये क्यों the चुनाव  was so close .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which  ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन , और he था the लाभ  of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans .
Furthermore  , the नई मत कि  Kennedy gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively  outmatched निक्सन  's .
In the end , Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried little weight , and he wasted energy by campaigning  in सब 50 राज्य बजाय of concentrating on  the swing states .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination , secure endorsements , and , with  the सहायता of the पिछला of the  big-city bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the South and used television  effectively .
This election is notable as  होने the पहला समय in u.S. इतिहास  that two sitting U.S . Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president , a phenomenon that has been repeated once , by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases , the president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
A  पोस्टर लिये a c. 1884 अमरीकी उत्पादन  of Macbeth , starring Thomas W. Keene .
Depicted ,  काउंटर clockwise इससे top-left  , are : Macbeth and Banquo meet the witches ; just after the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth .
Macbeth is a  खेल लिखा  by William Shakespeare .
It is considered one of his darkest  और सबसे शक्तिशाली  tragedies .
Set in Scotland , the play dramatizes the corroding  मनोवैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक प्रभाव उत्पादित जब इसके समर्थक  , the Scottish lord Macbeth , chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power .
He commits regicide to become king and then furthers his moral  descent साथ a शासनकाल of murderous आतंक to रहो in शक्ति , आखिरकार plunging  the country into civil war .
In the end , he loses everything that gives  अर्थ और purpose to उसके  life before losing his life itself .
the  play is believed to have been written between 1603 and 1607 , and is most commonly dated 1606 .
The earliest account of a performance of what was probably Shakespeare 's play is  अप्रैल 1611 , जब साइमन forman अंकित देखकर ऐसे  a play at the Globe Theatre .
It was first published in the Folio of 1623 , possibly  इससे  a prompt book .
It was most likely  लिखा दौरान the शासनकाल  of James I , who had been James VI of Scotland before he succeeded to the English throne in 1603 .
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company , and of all the plays Shakespeare wrote during James’s reign  , मैकबेथ सबसे clearly reflects the playwright’s संबंध  with the sovereign .
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy , and tells the story of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth who receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that  एक दिन he होगा become किंग of स्कॉटलैंड  .
Consumed by ambition and spurred to action  by उसके बीवी , मैकबेथ हत्याएं किंग  Duncan and takes the throne for himself .
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia , and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more  और अधिक हत्याएं  to protect himself from enmity and suspicion .
The  bloodbath swiftly takes मैकबेथ  and Lady Macbeth into realms of arrogance , madness , and death .
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland , Macduff , and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ) , a history of England , Scotland and Ireland familiar to  शेक्सपियर और उसके contemporaries , हालांकि the कार्यक्रम in the खेल differ extensively  from the history of the real Macbeth .
In the backstage  संसार of थिएटर , कुछ मानना कि the खेल is शापित , और होगा नहीं  mention its title aloud , referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play `` .
Over  the कोर्स of अनेक सदियां , the  play has attracted some of the most renowned actors to the roles of Macbeth and Lady Macbeth .
It has been adapted to film , television , opera , novels , comic  किताबे , और अन्य मीडिया  .
The Milton Hershey School is a private philanthropic (  pre-k through 12 ) बोर्डिंग  school in Hershey , Pennsylvania .
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School , the institution was founded and funded by chocolate  उद्योगपति मिल्टन snavely hershey  and his wife , Catherine Sweeney Hershey .
The school was originally established for  impoverished , स्वस्थ , caucasian , पुरूष अनाथ , जबकि आज  it serves students of various backgrounds .
The Milton Hershey School Trust , which funds the school , owns controlling interest in The Hershey Company and owns the Hershey  entertainment और रिसॉर्ट कम्पनी ( herco ) जिससे oversees अनेक of the  area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark .
With over six billion dollars in  एसेट , the मिल्टन hershey स्कूल  is one of the wealthiest schools in the world .
the स्कूल is overseen  by a Board of Managers .
The school currently serves 1,818 students , and  योजनाएँ  to grow to 2,100 students by 2013 .
A member of  कोर : गठबन्धन लिये  Residential Education , it is the largest residential education program in the US .

EPUB , a free  और  open e-book standard
Electronic article , articles in scholarly journals or  मैगज़ीन कि can be पहुँचा via इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  transmission
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United States as Title II of the  व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम और कंट्रोल अधिनियम of 1970  .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the  manufacture , importation  , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the Single  सम्मेलन on narcotic  Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules (  classifications ) , साथ varying  qualifications for a substance to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000 , which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be  बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये गाली ( an अपरिभाषित पद ) , फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा उपयोग  in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
Second-language acquisition or  second-language सीखना is the प्रक्रम by जिससे लोगों  learn a second language .
Second-language acquisition ( often  abbreviated to sla ) भी refers to  the scientific discipline devoted to studying that process .
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a person 's first language ; although the concept is  नामित second-language अधिग्रहण , it can भी चरितार्थ the सीखना of तीसरा , चौथी , or subsequent भाषाएं  .
Second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it does not  refer to practices  in language teaching .
The academic discipline of second-language  अधिग्रहण is a subdiscipline  of applied linguistics .
It is broad-based and relatively  नई .
As  खूब as the विभिन्न शाखाओं of भाषाविज्ञान , second-language अधिग्रहण is भी  closely related to psychology , cognitive psychology , and education .
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself , the  शर्तें second-language अधिग्रहण शोध , second-language  studies , and second-language acquisition studies are also used .
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary  फ़ील्ड , और क्युकी of इस it  is difficult to identify a precise starting date .
However , it does  appear to  have developed a great deal since the mid-1960s .
The  पद अधिग्रहण थी originally  used to emphasize the subconscious nature of the learning process , but in recent years learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous .
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage  भाषा  learning , but it does not usually incorporate bilingualism .
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a language , not the process itself , and see  the term  as referring to native-like fluency .
लेखक in फ़ील्ड ऐसे as शिक्षा और  psychology , however , often use bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism .
Second-language acquisition is also not  to be contrasted साथ the  acquisition of a foreign language ; rather , the learning of second languages and the learning of foreign languages involve the same fundamental processes in different situations..
There has been much debate about exactly  कैसा भाषा is सीखे , और अनेक  issues are still unresolved .
There are many theories of second-language acquisition , but none are accepted as a complete  स्पष्टीकरण by सब sla शोधकर्ताओं  .
Due to the  interdisciplinary प्रकृति of  the field of second-language acquisition , this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future .
Forbes list of billionaires is an annual ranking of the world 's wealthiest  लोगों , compiled और प्रकाशित by फोर्ब्स , an अमरीकी  national business magazine .
The total net worth of each individual on the list is estimated , in United States dollars ,  आधारित on  their assets and accounting for debt .
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a single day , due to daily  fluctuations among एक्सचेंज दरों और भण्डार  valuations .
The United States Secret Service is a  u.S. संघीय विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसी कि is भाग  of the United States Department of Homeland Security .
The sworn members are  विभाजित among  the Special Agents and the Uniformed Division .
Until March 1 , 2003 , the Service was  भाग of the संयुक्त  States Department of the Treasury .
The U.S. Secret Service has  दो पृथक क्षेत्रों  of responsibility:
Financial Crimes , covering missions such as  रोकथाम और छानबीन of counterfeiting of u.S.  currency and U.S. treasury securities , and investigation of major fraud .
Protection , which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders and their families , such as the President , past  राष्ट्रपतियों , वाइस राष्ट्रपतियों , अध्यक्षीय  candidates , visiting heads of state , and foreign embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ) , etc . )
The Secret Service 's initial  जिम्मेदारी थी to investigate counterfeiting  of U.S. currency , which was rampant following the U.S. Civil War .
The agency then evolved into the United States ' first domestic  प्रज्ञा और counterintelligence एजेंसी  .
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal Bureau  of छानबीन (  FBI ) , Bureau of Alcohol , Tobacco , Firearms and Explosives ( ATF ) , Immigration and Customs Enforcement ( ICE ) , and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) .
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is a  सोंग लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson  and Fred Foster , originally performed by Roger Miller .
Others performed the song later ,  सहित kristofferson खुद , और janis  Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after her death , making the song the second posthumous number-one single in U.S. chart history after `` ( Sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding .
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his  आद्याक्षर  , FDR , was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century , leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms , he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932 , as his domestic policies  पारिभाषित अमरीकी उदारतावाद लिये the मध्य तीसरा of the  20th century .
With the bouncy popular song  `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान थीम , fdr पराजित लाज़िम  Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932 , at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over  पोलियो , fdr 's unfailing आशावाद  and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against  जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध ii , और restoring समृद्धि to  the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to  उपज राहत ( सरकारी कार्य लिये the बेरोजगार ) , रिकवरी ( आर्थिक  growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved  rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937 ,  but then relapsed into a deep recession .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937  prevented उसके पैकिंग the परम् अदालत or गुजर कोई  considerable legislation ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World War II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85 , except for the regulation of Wall Street  by the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग , जिससे स्टिल exists  .
Along with several  छोटी कार्यक्रम , प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम  include the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation , which was created in 1933 , and Social Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the  Japanese invasion  of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His  लक्ष्य थी to मेक  America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with Congressional  स्वीकृति , provided  Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after the  जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर  7 , 1941 , calling it a `` date which will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the  mobilization of the u.S.  economy to support the Allied war effort .
As an active military leader ,  रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts कि  ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942  रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment  of 100,000 Japanese American civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief programs largely ended , and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people  स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers , और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं यहूद drafted  or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated  the अमरीकी राजनैतिक झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह  years of his presidency , but also for decades afterward .
He  orchestrated the realignment  of voters that created the Fifth Party System .
FDR 's New Deal Coalition  संयुक्त मजदूर संघ , बिग  city machines , white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He also influenced the later  सृष्टि of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by  विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष  three U.S. Presidents , along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A liberal Democrat , Roosevelt defined his  वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a  little left of center . ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS , Mara , and MS-13 ) is a transnational criminal gang that originated in Los Angeles  और रै स्प्रेड to  other parts of the United States , Canada , Mexico , and Central America .
The majority of the gang is  ethnically रचित of सेंट्रल  Americans and active in urban and suburban areas .
In the U.S. , the MS-13 has an  विशेषकर भारी उपस्थिति in लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी और the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the वॉशिंगटन , d.C. महानगर  areas of Fairfax County , Virginia , Montgomery County , Maryland , and Prince George 's County , Maryland ; Long Island , New York ; the Boston , Massachusetts area ; Charlotte , North Carolina ; and Houston , Texas .
There is also a presence of MS-13 in  टोरंटो , ओंटारियो ,  Canada .
सदस्यों of ms फर्क themselves  by tattoos covering the body and also often the face , as well as the use of their own sign language .
They are notorious for their use of violence and a subcultural moral code that predominantly consists of merciless  बदला और बेदर्द retributions  .
This cruelty of the distinguished members of the  `` maras '' or `` mareros '' अर्जित उन्हें  a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border .
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration  और कस्टम  Enforcement , who have initiated wide-scale raids against known and suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the country .
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on the Fox  संजाल in the संयुक्त राज्य  on September 13 , 2005 .
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic archaeology , with each episode focusing on an FBI case file concerning the mystery behind human remains brought by FBI Special Agent Seeley Booth ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic  anthropologist dr. temperance `` हड्डियों '' ब्रेनन  ( Emily Deschanel ) .
The rest of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin , T. J. Thyne , Eric Millegan , Tamara  टेलर , जोनाथन एडम्स , और जॉन फ्रांसिस  Daley .
Created by  हार्ट hanson  , the series is very loosely based on the life and writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs , who also produces the show .
Its title character , Temperance Brennan , is named  बाद the  protagonist of Reichs ' crime novel series .
Conversely , Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels based around a fictional ( in the Bones universe )  forensic anthropologist नामित कैथी reichs  .
Bones is a joint production by Josephson Entertainment , Far Field  प्रोडक्शन्स और 20th सदी फॉक्स टेलीविज़न  .
the श्रेणी रै समाप्त airing इसके आठवीं  season and has been renewed for a ninth season .
सुपर कटोरी xxv थी an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन भैंस  Bills and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion New York Giants to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season .
The Giants  पराजित the बिल्स by the स्कोर of 20–19  , winning their second ever Super Bowl .
It is the only Super  कटोरी decided by  one point .
The game  थी आयोजित at tampa  Stadium in Tampa , Florida , on January 27 , 1991 , during the height of the Gulf War .
It was thus  निभाई अंतर्गत much  patriotic fervor .
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` The  star-spangled  Banner `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies .
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making their first Super Bowl appearance after finishing the regular season with  a 13-3 रिकार्ड , और अग्रणी the लीग in कुल अंक  scored with 428 .
In advancing to their second Super Bowl , the Giants also posted a 13-3 regular season record , but with a ball-control  ठोकर और a रक्षा कि अनुमत  a league low 211 points .
The game is best remembered for Bills placekicker Scott Norwood 's last-second  फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य attempt जिससे गई चौड़ी सही of the  uprights , leading to a Giants victory , and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills .
The Giants set a Super Bowl record  पकड़कर  possession of the ball for 40 minutes and 33 seconds .
New York  भी overcame a 12-3 second-quarter  deficit , and made a 75-yard touchdown drive that consumed a Super Bowl record 9:29 off the clock .
Giants running back Ottis Anderson , who carried the  बॉल 21 टाइम्स लिये 102 गज और एक touchdown  , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He was the first awardee to receive  the newly नामित `` पीट rozelle ट्रॉफी '' ( नामित  for the former commissioner ) .
एंडरसन भी  recorded one reception for seven yards .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz  ( ) , थी an african-american मुस्लिम मंत्री और इंसान  rights activist .
To his admirers , he was a courageous advocate for the rights of  अश्वेतों , a man जो indicted  white America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans .
detractors अभियुक्त उसे  of preaching racism , black supremacy , and violence .
he रै महरूम पुकारा एक of the महानतम  and most influential African Americans in history .
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white  supremacists , it थी rumored—when  he was young , and at least one of his uncles was lynched .
When  he थी 13 , उसके माँ थी  placed in a mental hospital , and he was placed in a series of foster homes .
in 1946 , at आयु  20 , he went to prison for breaking and entering .
In  थाना , मैल्कम x became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश  of Islam ; after his parole in 1952 , he quickly rose to become one of its leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm  x थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह , लकिन मोहभंग साथ  Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964 .
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East , he returned to the United  राज्य , जहाँ he संस्थापित मुस्लिम मस्जिदे , inc. और the संगठन of afro-american  Unity .
In February 1965 , less than a year after leaving the Nation of Islam , he was assassinated by  तीन सदस्यों of the  group .
Malcolm X 's expressed  मान्यताओं बदला  substantially over time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black  सर्वोच्चता और advocated विरह of ब्लैक और  white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with it , `` I did many  बाते as a  [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now .
I was a zombie then ... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim , he disavowed racism and  expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ  , he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
The third season of 90210 , an  अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  , premiered on Monday September 13 , 2010 .
The CW officially renewed the show for a third  ऋतु on फ़रवरी 16 ,  2010 .

It premiered on  सितंबर 13 , 2010 और  was met with generally positive reviews from critics .

It follows Adrianna 's rise to fame , a new relationship  between चांदी और navid और a उलझन  Teddy who decides to reveal to his family and friends he is gay .
It also deals with the aftermath of  नाओमी क्लार्क 's  assault .
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes , Tristan Wilds ,  annalynne mccord , रयान eggold , जेसिका stroup , माइकल steger , जेसिका  Lowndes , Matt Lanter , Gillian Zinser , Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin .

christmas-themed एपीसोड  `` Holiday Madness '' , hit season highs in all key demos with 2.1 in The CW 's target demo of women 18–34 , a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49 .
It was also the  सबसे देखी एपीसोड in over a साल साथ 2.2  million viewers tuning in .
The season finale aired on May 16  , 2011 .
The season averaged 1.75 million  सजीव दर्शक और  a 0.9 adults 18–49 rating .
It was  released on dvd in the  United States on August 30 , 2011 .
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16  sovereign राज्य , ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms , और उनके territories  and dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and , in some of her realms , carries the title  of defender of the आस्था as भाग of उसके पूरा शीर्षक  .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 ,  एलिज़ाबेथ became सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल और महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल  countries : the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992 , the number of her realms varied as territories gained  स्वतंत्रता और कुछ realms  became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the  बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स , तुवालू  , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign of years is  फिलहाल the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों  monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years .
एलिज़ाबेथ थी  born in London and educated privately at home .
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII , from  जिससे समय वो थी the वारिस  presumptive .
She began to undertake public  कर्तव्य दौरान  the Second World War , in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 ,  वो शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप , ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग  , with whom she has four children : Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
Her  राजतिलक सेवा  took place in 1953 and was the first to be televised .
The Queen 's many  ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to  the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms , such as devolution in the United Kingdom and the  patriation  of the Canadian constitution .
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children , the births of her grandchildren , the investiture of the  प्रिंस of वेल्स , और the जश्न of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as उसके  Silver , Golden , and Diamond Jubilees in 1977 , 2002 , and 2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the  परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड , the falklands  War , wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan .
There have  महरूम टाइम्स of निजी विषाद लिये उसके जिससे शामिल the मौत of उसके  father at 56 , the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle , Lord Mountbatten , the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ) , the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments ,  but  support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high .
The 2010 United States Senate election in Florida took place on November 2 , 2010 along with other elections to the United States Senate in other states as well as all elections to the United States  हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और विभिन्न राज्य और लोकल चुनावों  .
Republican Marco Rubio , former Speaker of the Florida House of Representatives  , पराजित स्वतंत्र चार्ली  Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race .
One term Senator Mel Martinez was elected in  a बहुत बंद  race against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote .
Martinez  घोषित on दिसम्बर 2 , 2008 कि he  would not seek re-election to the Senate , and would resign prior to the end of his term .
In August  2009 , राज्यपाल चार्ली crist घोषित कि he होता नियुक्त  his former Chief of Staff , George LeMieux , a Republican , to the Senate seat being vacated by Martinez .
Governor Crist publicly  घोषित he थी कार्यशील  for the seat in mid-2009 .
At the time he received many Republican endorsements , such as the National  रिपब्लिकन senatorial कमेटी ,  Martinez , and the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain .
His  support of the अमरीकी रिकवरी  and Reinvestment Act of 2009 hurt his popularity among conservatives , and candidate Marco Rubio surged .
In April  2010 crist घोषित he होता बूँद आउट  of the Republican primary and run as an independent .
The National Republican Senatorial Committee withdrew its endorsement of Crist and demanded a  refund of इसके अभियान  funds that it provided for the Crist campaign .
Congressman  kendrick नम्र थी the पहला  Democrat to declare his intention to run .
Alexander Snitker was the first member of the  libertarian पार्टी on the बैलट  for senator in Florida 's history .
Satellite view  of दोहा
Doha ( , ' or ' , literally : `` the  बिग पेड़ '' ) is the पूंजी नगर  of the state of Qatar .
Located  on the coast  of the Persian Gulf ,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008 , and is  भी एक of the  municipalities of Qatar .
Doha is Qatar 's largest city , with over 60 % of the nation 's population residing in Doha or its  surrounding उपनगरों , और is भी the आर्थिक  centre of the country .
Doha also serves  as the सीट of सरकारी of क़तर  , which is ruled by Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani .
Doha is home to the Education City ,  an क्षेत्रफल devoted to शोध  and education .
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level meeting of the  दोहा विकास गोलाकार of संसार  Trade Organization negotiations .
The city of Doha held the 2006 Asian Games , which was the largest Asian Games  कभी आयोजित  .
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games and  सबसे of the खेल at the 2011 afc  Asian Cup .
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate Negotiations ( COP  18 ) दिसम्बर 2012  and will host a large number of the venues for the 2022 FIFA World Cup .
The World Petroleum Council held the 20th World  पेट्रोलियम सम्मेलन in दोहा in दिसम्बर  2011 .
Paranasal sinuses are a group of four paired  air-filled स्पेसेस कि घेर the nasal गुहा (  maxillary sinuses ) , above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ) , between the eyes ( ethmoid sinuses ) , and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ) .
The sinuses are named for the facial bones in which  वे हैं स्तिथ  .
Lean manufacturing , lean enterprise , or lean production , often simply , ``  Lean , '' is a  production practice that considers the expenditure of resources for any goal other than the creation of value for the end customer to be wasteful , and thus a target for elimination .
Working from the perspective of the customer who  consumes a उत्पाद or सेवा , `` मान '' is पारिभाषित as कोई कार्रवाई or प्रक्रम कि a ग्राहक  would be willing to pay for .
Essentially , lean is  केन्द्रित on preserving  value with less work .
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy derived mostly from the Toyota Production System ( TPS ) ( hence the term Toyotism is also  प्रचलित ) और  identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s .
TPS is renowned for its focus on reduction of the original Toyota seven wastes to improve overall customer value , but  वहीँ हैं varying perspectives on कैसा इस is बेहतरीन  achieved .
The steady growth of Toyota , from a small company to  the संसार 's largest automaker , रै केन्द्रित ध्यान  on how it has achieved this success .
icarly  logo
iCarly  is an अमरीकी sitcom कि airs on निकलोडियन  , which premiered on September 8 , 2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far such as `` iDo '' , `` iHire an Idiot '' , `` iPity  the nevel '' , `` idate sam  & Freddie '' , etc . as specials , despite their being regular episodes .
Every episode title begins with a lower case i which represents the internet  , as in `` icarly  '' .
The  दिखाएँ थी मनोनीत लिये an एमी  award for Outstanding Children 's Program in 2009 .
The series starring Miranda Cosgrove as Carly Shay , a 13-year-old who  becomes an अंतरजाल  star .
The series ended on November 23  , 2012 साथ the one-hour  special episode `` iGoodbye '' .
A total of 7 seasons  और 109 एपीसोड  were broadcast .
The largest audience of the series was 11.2 million viewers , with the  खास एपीसोड `` isaved अपना जीवन  '' premiered in January 2010 .
When Carly (  मिरांडा cosgrove ) और उसके sassy बेहतरीन dost sam  ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition , tech-savvy Freddie ( Nathan Kress ) tapes it and posts it online without telling them .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter , the online audience clamors for more and  the icarly वेबकास्ट  is born .
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence , Carly , Sam , and Freddie find out that  वे have भी become ऑनलाइन हस्तियाँ as उनके दिखाएँ – जिससे सुविधाएँ हुनर प्रतियोगिताओं  , recipes , problem-solving , and random dancing – garners international accolades .
Carly lives in Seattle , Washington with her 26-year-old brother and  संरक्षक स्पेंसर ( जेरी trainor ) और produces  the show in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment .
Their mother has never been seen or mentioned , but their father , Steven Shay ( David  chisum ) , is a u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी temporarily  stationed on a submarine , and is often mentioned but is only seen in person during the series finale episode , `` iGoodbye '' .
Westlife  यहूद an आयरिश लड़के  band which formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012 .
originally हस्ताक्षरित by साइमन cowell और प्रबंधित by लुई वाल्श ,  the group 's final line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne , Kian Egan , Mark Feehily and Shane Filan .
Brian McFadden was a  सदस्य इससे 1998 जबतक  his departure in 2004 .
Westlife sold over 50 million  रिकॉर्ड  worldwide , a total that included studio albums , singles , video releases , and compilation albums .
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in UK  इतिहास ) , tying साथ चट्टान रिचर्ड  and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley .
They achieved a total of 26 top ten  singles over उनके 14-year  career .
By 2010 , Westlife was listed in the Guinness World Records , as the UK 's  top-selling एल्बम समूह of the 21st सदी  .
They also  जीती the रिकार्ड of the साल ( the तभी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार आधारित on पब्लिक मत in the  UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012 , the Official Charts Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history .
Despite their European and Asian success , Westlife never  प्रबंधित to ब्रेक into the u.S. मार्केट  , achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again `` .
In October 2011 , Westlife announced their intention to split in 2012 , following their Greatest  हिट्स दौरे और the रिलीज of उनके महानतम  Hits album .
The  boyband 's  final concerts were held on 22 and 23 June 2012 at Croke Park Stadium in Dublin .
The first farewell concert  , offering 85,000 टिकटें , बेची आउट  in a record-breaking 5 minutes and the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide .
Vitamin A is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons , which  शामिल रेटिनॉल , retinal , retinoic एसिड और अनेक provitamin  A carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the most important .
Vitamin A  रै अनेक कृत्यों , it is महत्वपूर्ण  for growth and development , for the maintenance of the immune system and good vision .
Vitamin A  is needed by the retina of the नजर in the रूप of retinal  , which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule , that is necessary for both low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color vision .
Vitamin A also functions in a very different role as an irreversibly oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic acid , which is  an महत्वपूर्ण hormone-like विकास  factor for epithelial and other cells .
In foods of animal origin , the major form of vitamin A is an ester , primarily retinyl palmitate , which is converted to retinol ( chemically an  दारू ) in the छोटी  intestine .
the रेटिनॉल रूप कृत्यों  as a storage form of the vitamin , and can be converted to and from its visually active aldehyde form , retinal .
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ) , a metabolite that can be irreversibly  synthesized इससे विटामिन a , रै तभी आंशिक विटामिन  A activity , and does not function in the retina for the visual cycle .
Retinoic  एसिड is प्रयुक्त  for growth and cellular differentiation .
All  फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन a have a beta-ionone रिंग  to which an isoprenoid chain is attached , called a retinyl group .
Both structural features  हैं अनिवार्य लिये  vitamin activity .
The orange pigment of  गाजर – beta-carotene –  can be represented as two connected retinyl groups , which are used in the body to contribute to vitamin A levels .
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a single retinyl group ,  जिससे दे उन्हें कुछ विटामिन कार्यकलाप .
None of the other  carotenes have विटामिन  activity .
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and  रै विटामिन कार्यकलाप in इंसानो .
Vitamin A can be found in two principal forms  in भोजन :
Retinol , the  रूप of विटामिन a अवशोषित जब  eating animal food sources , is a yellow , fat-soluble substance .
चूंकि the pure दारू रूप is  unstable , the vitamin is found in tissues in a form of retinyl ester .
It is also commercially produced and  administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl  acetate or palmitate .
The carotenes alpha-carotene , beta-carotene , gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ) , but no other carotenoids , function as provitamin A in herbivores and omnivore animals , which possess the  एंजाइम ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) जिससे cleaves beta-carotene  in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol .
In general , carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing   carotenoids , and pure carnivores such as cats and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and can not convert any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for these species ) .
Selena Marie Gomez ( born July 22 , 1992 ) is an American  सिंगर और अभिनेत्री  .
She made her debut  as a चाइल्ड  actress in Barney & Friends .
In 2007 , Gomez came to prominence as a  अभिनीत डाल सदस्य in  the television series Wizards of Waverly Place .
वो हस्ताक्षरित to हॉलीवुड रिकॉर्ड the following  year , and became the founder and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene .
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ) , A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ) , and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and  have शाखित platinum-certified singles `` naturally  `` , `` Who Says `` , and `` Love You like a Love Song `` .
After the release of television films and their accompanying soundtracks , Gomez made her theatrical film debut in  ramona और beezus in 2010  and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011 .
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly  प्लेस और the अंतराल of सेलिना गोमेज़ & the झाँकी in 2012 , वो केन्द्रित on  her film career , serving as a voice actress in Hotel Transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year .
Her debut solo album is tentatively scheduled to be released in   summer 2013 , and is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It `` .
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry , Gomez is involved in philanthropic activities through charity work  और विभिन्न सोशल और पर्यावरणीय  causes .
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12 , 1976 ) is an American R &  b और पॉप singer-songwriter  , actress , and model .
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट  of government of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the  उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's  expansive Central Valley .
साथ an अनुमानित 2011  population of 477,891 , it is the sixth-largest city in California and the 35th largest city in the United States .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center  of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात  counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth  largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया बाद the वृहद  Los Angeles Area , San Francisco Bay Area , and the San Diego metropolitan area , as well as the 25th largest in the United States .
Sacramento was cited  by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका  's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of  the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन  Sutter , Sr. , his son John Sutter , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew  जल्दी धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा  of Sutter 's Fort , which was established by Sutter in 1839 .
During  the कैलिफ़ोर्निया सुनहरा फटाफट , sacramento थी a प्रमुख  distribution point , a commercial and agricultural center , and a terminus for wagon trains , stagecoaches , riverboats , the telegraph , the Pony Express , and the First Transcontinental Railroad .
California State University , Sacramento , more commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State , is the  largest लोकल विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of  the कैलिफ़ोर्निया  State University system .
Drexel University Sacramento is  स्तिथ in शहर  , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific  's mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is  located in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition  , the विश्वविद्यालयों  of California , Davis is located in nearby Davis , west of the capital .
The UC Davis  चिकित्सा बीच ,  a world-renowned research hospital , is located in the city of Sacramento .
मेमोरियल दिन is a संयुक्त  States federal holiday which occurs every year on the final Monday of May .
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and  महिलाओं जो died  while serving in the United States Armed Forces .
Formerly known as Decoration Day , it originated after the American Civil War to  commemorate the संघ और confederate  soldiers who died in the Civil War .
By the 20th century Memorial  दिन था महरूम विस्तारित  to honor all Americans who have died in all wars .
It typically marks the start of the summer  अवकाश ऋतु , जबकि मजदूर दिन marks इसके  end .
Many people visit  कब्रिस्तान और memorials  , particularly to honor those who have died in military service .
Many volunteers place an  अमरीकी ध्वज on प्रत्येक संगीन  in national cemeteries .
By the early 20th century , Memorial Day was an  अवसर लिये अधिक सामान्य expressions of मेमोरी , as  people visited the graves of their deceased relatives in church cemeteries , whether they had served in the military or not .
It also became a long weekend increasingly  devoted to खरीदारी , परिवार महफिलों ,  fireworks , trips to the beach , and national media events .
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries  हैं आयोजित on a संडे in लेट वसन्त or जल्दी गर्मियाँ in कुछ ग्रामीण  areas of the American South , notably in the mountains .
In cases involving a family graveyard where remote ancestors as well as those  जो यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न ,  this may take on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles .
People gather on the designated day and  put पुष्प on  graves and renew contacts with kinfolk and others .
There often is a  धार्मिक सेवा और a `` डिनर on the मैदान , '' the परंपरागत पद  for a potluck meal in which people used to spread the dishes out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass .
It is believed that this practice began before the American Civil War and thus may reflect the  रियल उत्पत्ति of the `` मेमोरियल दिन ''  idea .
Memorial Day is not to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who died while serving , while Veterans Day celebrates the service of all U.S. military veterans  ,  living or dead .
Mt .  zion गिरिजाघर राज्य  history marker near Philadelphia , Mississippi .
Freedom Summer ( also known as the Mississippi Summer Project ) was a campaign in the United States launched in June 1964 to attempt to register as  अनेक अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी मतदाता as संभावित in मिसिसिपी , जिससे था  historically excluded most blacks from voting .
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools , Freedom Houses , and community centers in small towns throughout Mississippi  to सहायता the लोकल ब्लैक जनसांख्यिकी  .
The project was organized by the Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ) , a coalition of the Mississippi branches of the  चार प्रमुख सिविल अधिकारों संगठन ( sncc , कोर , naacp और sclc ) .
Most of the impetus ,  नेतृत्व , और  financing for the Summer Project came from the SNCC .
Robert Parris Moses , SNCC field secretary and co-director of COFO ,  निर्देशित the गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट  .
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music genre that originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep South `` of the  संयुक्त राज्य around the समाप्त of the 19th सदी इससे spirituals  , work songs , field hollers , shouts and chants , and rhymed simple narrative ballads .
The blues form , ubiquitous in jazz , rhythm and blues , and rock and roll is characterized by specific chord  progressions , of जिससे the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ कॉर्ड progression  is the most common .
The blue notes that , for expressive purposes are sung or played flattened or gradually bent (  नाबालिग 3rd to प्रमुख 3rd ) in संबंध to the पिच of the प्रमुख  scale , are also an important part of the sound .
The blues  विधा is आधारित on the ब्लूज़ रूप लकिन possesses  other characteristics such as specific lyrics , bass lines , and instruments .
Blues can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from country to  शहरी ब्लूज़ कि यहूद अधिक or कम  popular during different periods of the 20th century .
बेहतरीन ज्ञात हैं  the Delta , Piedmont , Jump , and Chicago blues styles .
World War II marked the transition from acoustic  to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़ और the  progressive opening of blues music to a wider audience , especially white listeners .
In  the 1960s और 1970s  , a hybrid form called blues-rock evolved .
The term `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '' , meaning melancholy and  उदासी ; an जल्दी उपयोग of the पद in  this sense is found in George Colman 's one-act farce Blue Devils ( 1798 ) .
Though the use of the phrase in  african-american म्यूज़िक may be पुरानी , it रै महरूम attested to चूंकि 1912 , जब हार्ट wand  's `` Dallas Blues `` became the first copyrighted blues composition .
In lyrics the phrase  is प्रायः  used to describe a depressed mood .
A quarter  डालर ,  commonly shortened to quarter , is a coin worth 1⁄4 of a United States dollar or 25 cents .
the क्वार्टर रै  been produced since 1796 .
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination , as  opposed to 20¢ जिससे is अधिक आम in  other parts of the world , originated with the practice of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ) .
At one time `` two bits `` , i.e . two wedges , each wedge an eighth , thus a quarter of the  स्पेनी रियल , थी a आम  nickname for a quarter .
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican holiday celebrated  throughout मैक्सिको और around the  world in other cultures .
The  अवकाश focuses on महफिलों of परिवार और मित्रों to दुवा  for and remember friends and family members who have died .
It is particularly celebrated in Mexico , where it is a national holiday , and  सब बैंको हैं बंद  .
The celebration takes place on November 1 and 2 , in connection  साथ the कैथोलिक छुट्टियाँ of  All Saints ' Day and All Souls ' Day .
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the deceased using sugar skulls , marigolds , and the favorite foods and  पेय of the रजि और visiting  graves with these as gifts .
They also leave  possessions  of the deceased .
Scholars trace the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to indigenous  observances डेटिंग वापस सैंकड़ों of सालो  and to an Aztec festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl .
The holiday has spread throughout the world : In Brazil , Dia de Finados  is  a public holiday that many Brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and churches .
in स्पेन , वहीँ हैं त्यौहार  and parades , and , at the end of the day , people gather at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones .
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe , and similarly themed celebrations appear in  अनेक एशियाई और अफ़्रीकी  cultures .
ANITA Mk  viii .
The  अनीता चिह्नित सात और अनीता चिह्नित viii calculators  were launched simultaneously in late 1961 as the world 's first all- electronic desktop calculators .
designed और  built by the Bell Punch Co .
in Britain , and  marketed through इसके sumlock  Comptometer division , they used vacuum tubes and cold-cathode switching tubes in their logic circuits and nixie tubes for their numerical displays .
They were the first of a series of desktop and hand-held electronic  calculators कि the कम्पनी थी to develop  and sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s .
George Washington ( – , 1799 ) was the first President of the United States ( 1789–1797 ) , the commander-in-chief of the Continental Army  दौरान the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी युद्ध , और  one of the Founding Fathers of the United States .
He presided over the convention that drafted the Constitution , which replaced the  आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और  established the position of President .
Washington was elected President  as the  unanimous choice of the 69 electors in 1788 , and he served two terms in office .
He oversaw the  सृष्टि of a दमदार , well-financed नेशनल सरकारी  that maintained neutrality in the wars raging in Europe , suppressed rebellion , and won acceptance among Americans of all types .
His leadership style established many  फ़ॉर्म और संस्कार of सरकारी कि have महरूम  used since , such as using a cabinet system and delivering an inaugural address .
Further , the peaceful transition  इससे उसके  presidency to the presidency of John Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st century .
Washington  थी hailed as `` पिता of  his country `` even during his lifetime .
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of  औपनिवेशिक  Virginia ; his wealthy planter family owned tobacco plantations and slaves .
After both his  पिता और पुरानी  brother died when he was young , Washington became personally and professionally attached to the powerful William Fairfax , who promoted his career as a surveyor and soldier .
Washington quickly became a senior officer in  the औपनिवेशिक शक्तियां दौरान the पहला  stages of the French and Indian War .
Chosen by the Second Continental Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the Continental Army in the American Revolution , Washington managed  to फ़ोर्स the अंग्रेजों आउट of बोस्टन in 1776 , लकिन थी  defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City .
After crossing the Delaware  नदी in the मुर्दे of शीत , he पराजित the अंग्रेजों  in two battles , retook New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause .
Because of his strategy ,  क्रांतिकारी शक्तियां captured दो प्रमुख अंग्रेजों सेना  at Saratoga in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781 .
Historians laud Washington for his selection and supervision of his generals , encouragement of morale and ability to hold together the army , coordination with the state  राज्यपालों और राज्य मिलिशिया इकाई , संबंध साथ कॉंग्रेस  and attention to supplies , logistics , and training .
In battle , however , Washington was repeatedly  outmaneuvered by अंग्रेजों सेनापतियों  with larger armies .
बाद विजय था महरूम finalized in 1783 , वॉशिंगटन  resigned as Commander-in-chief rather than seize power , proving his opposition to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism .
असंतुष्ट साथ the कमजोरियों of the आलेख of  Confederation , in 1787 Washington presided over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States Constitution .
Elected unanimously as the first President of the United States in 1789 , he attempted to bring rival factions  साथ  to unify the nation .
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to pay off all state and national debt  , to implement an प्रभावी कर प्रणाली और to बनाएँ a नेशनल बैंको (  despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ) .
Washington  proclaimed the संयुक्त  States neutral in the wars raging in Europe after 1793 .
He avoided war with Great Britain and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing the Jay Treaty in 1795 ,  despite तीव्र विपक्ष  from the Jeffersonians .
Although never officially joining the Federalist Party ,  he समर्थित इसके कार्यक्रम  .
वॉशिंगटन 's विदाई पता थी an influential प्राइमर on रिपब्लिकन  virtue and a warning against partisanship , sectionalism , and involvement in foreign wars .
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his home , Mount Vernon ,  और उसके घरेलू जीवन जहाँ he प्रबंधित  a variety of enterprises .
He freed all his  स्लेव by उसके  final will .
Washington had a vision of a great and powerful nation that would be built on  रिपब्लिकन लाइनों  using federal power .
he sought to उपयोग the नेशनल सरकारी to  preserve liberty , improve infrastructure , open the western lands , promote commerce , found a permanent capital , reduce regional tensions and promote a spirit of American nationalism .
At his death , Washington was  eulogized  as `` first in war , first in peace , and first in the hearts of his countrymen '' by Henry Lee .
The Federalists made him the symbol of their  पार्टी लकिन लिये अनेक सालो , the jeffersonians जारी  to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument .
As the leader of the first successful revolution against a colonial empire in world history , Washington became an international  प्रतीक लिये मुक्ति और राष्ट्रवाद  , especially in France and Latin America .
Fiscal Year 2012 U.S.  संघीय बिता – नकदी  or Budget Basis .
फिस्कल साल  2012 U.S. Federal Receipts .
The Budget of the United States Government often begins as the President 's proposal to the U.S. Congress  जिससे अनुशंसा funding स्तर लिये the अगला फिस्कल साल ,  beginning October 1 .
However , Congress is the body required by law to pass a  बजट annually और to submit the बजट  passed by both houses to the President for signature .
Congressional decisions are  governed by नियम  and legislation regarding the federal budget process .
Budget committees set spending limits for the House and Senate  समितियों और लिये appropriations subcommittees , जिससे तब स्वीकृति  individual appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal programs .
If Congress fails to pass an annual budget ( as has been the case since 2009 ) , a series of Appropriations bills  जरूर be passed as  `` stop gap '' measures .
After Congress approves an appropriations bill , it is sent to the  अध्यक्ष , जो may चिह्न it into विधि , or may  veto it ( as he would a budget when passed by the Congress ) .
A vetoed bill is sent back to Congress , which  can pass it into विधि साथ  a two-thirds majority in each chamber .
कॉंग्रेस may भी combine  all or some appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation bill .
In addition , the president  may निवेदन और the कॉंग्रेस may pass supplemental appropriations  bills or emergency supplemental appropriations bills .
Several  सरकारी एजेंसियों provide बजट  data and analysis .
These include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO ) , Congressional  बजट दफ्तर  , the Office of Management and Budget ( OMB ) and the U.S. Treasury Department .
These agencies have reported that the federal government is facing  a श्रेणी of महत्वपूर्ण financing चुनौतियां  .
In the short-run , tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession  और कर नीति चुनाव , जबकि expenditures have विस्तारित लिये युद्धों , बेरोजगारी  insurance and other safety net spending .
In the long-run , expenditures  सम्बन्धित to healthcare कार्यक्रम ऐसे  as Medicare and Medicaid are projected to grow faster than the economy overall as the population matures .
New Guinea ( also , Tok Pisin : Niugini , Dutch :  nieuw गिनी , और ; historically : पापुआ ) is the संसार 's  second largest island , after Greenland , covering a land area of 786,000 km2 .
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean , it lies geographically to the east of the Malay Archipelago , with  जिससे it is sometimes शामिल as भाग of a वृहद indo-australian द्वीपसमूह  .
geologically it is a भाग of  the same tectonic plate as Australia .
When world sea levels were low , the two shared shorelines ( which now lie 100 to 140 metres below sea level ) ,  combining साथ lands अभी inundated into the tectonic  continent of Sahul , also known as Greater Australia .
The two landmasses became separated when the area now known  as the टोरेस जलसन्धि flooded बाद the समाप्त of  the last glacial period .
anthropologically  , New Guinea is considered part of Melanesia .
Politically , the  पश्चिमी हाफ  of the island comprises two Indonesian provinces : Papua and West Papua .
The eastern  हाफ फ़ॉर्म the मेनलैंड  of the country of Papua New Guinea .
The island has a population of about 7.5 million ,  साथ a बहुत कम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of तभी  8 inh/km2 .
New Guinea is differentiated from its drier , flatter , and less fertile southern counterpart , Australia , by its much higher rainfall and  इसके क्रियाशील volcanic भूविज्ञान , साथ इसके उच्चतम पाइंट , puncak  Jaya , reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ) .
Yet the two land masses share a similar animal fauna , with marsupials , including wallabies and possums , and  the egg-laying monotreme  , the spiny anteater , or echidna .
Other than bats and some two dozen indigenous rodent  genera , वहीँ हैं no pre-human  indigenous placental mammals .
Pigs , several additional species of rats , and the ancestor of the New Guinea Singing Dog were introduced with human  colonization  .
The human presence on the island dates back at least 40,000 years  to the oldest इंसान migrations आउट  of Africa .
Research indicates that the highlands were  an जल्दी और स्वतंत्र बीच of  agriculture , with evidence of irrigation going back at least 10,000 years .
Because of the time depth of its inhabitation and its highly  fractured लैंडस्केप , an unusually ऊँची क्रमांक of भाषाएं हैं बोला on the  island , with some 1,000 languages ( a figure higher than that of most continents ) having been catalogued out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects .
Most are classified as Papuan languages , a generally  स्वीकृत भौगोलिक पद जिससे  a minority of authors hold to be a genetic one .
A number of Austronesian  भाषाएं हैं बोला  on the coast and on offshore islands .
In the 16th century Spanish  explorers खोजा the  island and called it Nueva Guinea .
in हाल इतिहास पश्चिमी  New Guinea was included in the Dutch East Indies colony .
The Germans annexed the northern coast  of the पूर्वी हाफ of the द्वीप as जर्मनी नई गिनी in  their pre–World War I effort to establish themselves as a colonial power , whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain .
Following the Treaty of Versailles , the German portion was awarded to Australia ( which was already governing the  अंग्रेजों अर्जी , नामित the territory of पापुआ ) as a लीग of राष्ट्र  mandate .
The eastern half of the island was granted  स्वतंत्रता इससे ऑस्ट्रेलिया  as Papua New Guinea in 1975 .
The western half gained independence from the Dutch  in 1961 , लकिन became भाग of इंडोनेशिया जल्द  afterwards in controversial circumstances .
`` The Van Buren Boys '' is the 148th episode of  the sitcom seinfeld , और नाम  of a fictional New York street gang .
Their sign is crossing the hands , with one hand with all the fingers  'up ' और स्प्रेड आउट  .
The other  हाथ रै सब लकिन the अंगूठा  and pointer finger up , for a total of eight ( 8 ) .
The gang is named for the 8th President of the United States , Martin Van Buren  ( जो थी the पहला अध्यक्ष इससे नई  York ) .
This was the 14th episode for the  8th ऋतु  .
It aired on February  6 , 1997  .
Bevo  चिह्न
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt  पेय , or निकट बियर , brewed in the संयुक्त  States by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century .
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success  दौरान the समय of निषेध  , when beer , wine and distilled liquors , were made illegal for thirteen years .
The Anheuser-Busch company started brewing Bevo when alcoholic beverages were prohibited in 1916 by  the संयुक्त राज्य  armed forces .
Production rose greatly  साथ नेशनल निषेध  in 1919 , and Bevo was by far the most popular of the many `` cereal beverages '' or `` near beers '' of the time .
At the peak of its popularity in the  जल्दी 1920s , अधिक than पाँच लाख मामले  of Bevo were sold annually .
Renard with a mug of  bevo  , depicted in terra cotta on the interior walls of the Bevo building , St. Louis
Labels on the bottles  billed it as  `` Bevo the Beverage '' .
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from the word `` beverage '' and the Slavic language word for beer `` pivo '' , and was pronounced `` Bee-vo  ''  .
कुछ bevo विज्ञापन प्रदर्शित the अक्षर `` renard the  Fox `` ( based on the protagonist of a medieval French folk-tale ) , and promotional mugs with this character were manufactured .
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied cars in its St. Louis shops called the ``  bevo नौकाएँ '' जिससे यहूद प्रयुक्त लिये प्रमोशन  .
Seven are believed to have been built on Pierce-Arrow 8-cylinder chassis while one surviving example was  आधारित  upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8 .
Billboard advertising Bevo in Trenton ,  नई जर्सी , 1917
A contemporary advertisement read `` Cooling and invigorating , Bevo  the पेय  .
अनुक्रम by the मामला इससे  your grocer , druggist , or dealer . ''
The paper label on the back of the bottle read `` The All-Year-Round Soft  पेय  .
Appetizing - Healthful  - पौष्टिक  - Refreshing .
Milk or water may  contain जीवाणु  .
BEVO  never करता  . ''
Bevo became part of the popular  संस्कृति of the समय , और is  mentioned in various popular songs and Vaudeville skits of the era .
This led to secondary slang uses of the word  ; लिये उदाहरण , in अमरीकी सैन्य कठबोली a यंग  and inexperienced officer was called a `` Bevo '' .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों of टेक्सास नामित इसके शुभंकर  `` Bevo '' , a name which has stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink , `` You Ca n't Stay Up on Bevo ''  , in उसके 1917 फौज revue ,  Yip Yip Yaphank .
In the late 1920s smuggled  बूटलेग बियर और liquor  as well as `` homebrew `` , cut into Bevo 's marketshare .
With sales flattening to  100,000 मामले  by 1929 , Anheuser-Busch stopped production .
The Bevo  मिल , st.  Louis , in 2008
The Bevo building  , साथ the renard अक्षर  prominently displayed at the corners , still operates as a bottling facility at their main brewery in St. Louis , Missouri .
The landmark Bevo Mill ,  constructed by अगस्त anheuser  Busch , Sr. in 1917 .
It was closed in 2009 , but it  reopened  in October 2009 under new owners .
Bevo is also mentioned in the short story `` The Killers ``  by अर्नेस्ट हेमिंगवे ;  as well as in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis .
Mylanta is an over the  काउंटर दवा प्रयुक्त लिये the उपचार of एसिड  reflux , heartburn , and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also known as GERD ) .
Foremilk and Hindmilk samples  of इंसान  breast milk
A glass of pasteurized  गाय  milk
Milk is a white liquid produced by the  mammary ग्रंथियों of स्तनधारियों .
It is the primary source of nutrition for young mammals before  वे हैं समर्थ to डाइजेस्ट अन्य  types of food .
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum  , जिससे carries the माँ 's antibodies  to the baby and can reduce the risk of many diseases in the baby .
It also contains many  अन्य nutrients  .
As an agricultural product , milk is  निकाली इससे स्तनधारियों  and used as food for humans .
Worldwide , dairy farms produced about 730 million tonnes of  मिल्क in 2011  .
India is the world 's largest producer  और उपभोक्ता  of milk , yet neither exports nor imports milk .
New Zealand , the European Union 's 27 member  राज्य , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और  the United States are the world 's largest exporters of milk and milk products .
China and Russia are the  संसार 's largest importers  of milk and milk products .
Throughout  the संसार , वहीँ हैं  more than 6 billion consumers of milk and milk products .
Over 750 million  लोगों सजीव भीतर  dairy farming households .
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition and food security  विशेषकर in विकासशील देशों  .
Improvements in livestock and dairy technology offer significant promise in reducing  गरीबी और कुपोषण in the  world .
Motorcycle  स्पीडवे , प्रायः referred to as स्पीडवे  , is a motorcycle sport involving four and sometimes up to six riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit .
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear and have no brakes and racing takes place on a flat oval track  प्रायः consisting of मैल or loosely packed shale  .
Competitors use this surface to slide their machines sideways , powersliding or  broadsiding into the  bends .
On the straight  भाग of the track  the motorcycles reach speeds of up .
The exact origins of the sport are unknown but there is evidence  of a प्रकार of स्पीडवे रेसिंग होने practised in the यूएसए पहले  the First World War and in Australia in the late 1910s and early 1920s .
There are now  दोनो घरेलू और अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिताओं in a क्रमांक  of countries including the Speedway World Cup whilst the highest overall scoring individual in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion .
Speedway is popular in central and northern Europe and to a lesser extent in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया और उत्तर अमेरिका  .
A variant of track  रेसिंग , स्पीडवे is administered  internationally by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme ( FIM ) .
Domestic speedway events are regulated by  fim संबद्ध नेशनल मोटर खेल  federations .
Vitamin D is a group of  fat-soluble secosteroids  responsible for intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate .
In humans , the most important related compounds of  विटामिन d हैं विटामिन  D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and  ergocalciferol ( विटामिन d2 ) हैं अद्वितीय  as they constitute what we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun exposure is  पर्याप्त ( hence  its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin , it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense , as it  can be synthesized in पर्याप्त  amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight .
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D  efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त  it in their diet . )
An organic  रासायनिक यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically  called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins , vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the dietary  पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी , namely  , rickets , the childhood form of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like  अन्य यौगिकों पुकारा विटामिन , in the  developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid disease due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect  endogenous संश्लेषण इससे एक्सपोज़र  to sunlight as well as intake from the diet , and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of  अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप , no सुझाव हैं  issued by the Institute of Medicine , USA , for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference  intakes लिये विटामिन d assume कि no संश्लेषण occurs  and that all of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in practice .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to  calcidiol , जिससे is भी ज्ञात as calcifediol ( इन  ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol , the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood , regulating the concentration of  कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream  and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also  परिवर्तित to calcitriol बाहर of the गुर्दे  for other purposes , such as the proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or  rickets , the प्रमाण लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य  effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent .
the बेहतरीन प्रमाण of लाभ is लिये अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in मृत्यु in बुजुर्ग महिलाओं .
The Duramax  is a सामान्य मोटर्स डीज़ल इंजन  family for light- and medium duty trucks , designed by Isuzu .
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by DMAX , a  संयुक्त venture  between GM and Isuzu in Moraine , Ohio .
This engine was initially installed in 2001 model year Chevy and  जीएमसी ट्रक और रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि  then in pickups , vans , and medium-duty trucks .
In 2006 , production at Moraine was  reportedly सीमित to  approximately 200,000 engines per year .
On May 9 , 2007 ,  dmax घोषित the उत्पादन of the  1,000,000th Duramax V-8 diesel at its Moraine facility .

is also a  परंपरागत लिखा  abbreviation for Baltimore , Maryland .

Balto ( 1919 – March 14 , 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled dog who led his team on the  फाइनल लेग of the 1925 सीरम चलाएं to nome , in जिससे डिप्थीरिया antitoxin थी  transported from Anchorage , Alaska , to Nenana , Alaska , by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease .
The run is  commemorated by the सालाना  Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race .
balto थी नामित  after the Sami explorer Samuel Balto .
balto died at  the age of 14 .
