The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size / entry-level luxury car manufactured by Nissan , marketed as  the `` four-door खेल car  '' .
The origins of the Maxima began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810 , an upscale six-cylinder version of the Bluebird , and was spun into its own line in 1981 , having been made  लगातार चूंकि  then .
The  `` उच्चिष्ट  '' name was applied gradually , beginning in 1981 .
Most pre-2004 Maximas were built in Oppama , Japan , until  the वर्तमान उत्तर अमरीकी  Maximas started being assembled in Smyrna , Tennessee .
The ``  उच्चिष्ट '' रै भी महरूम लागू  to Cefiros and Laurels in various markets .
Propolis as  छत्ता sealing
Propolis is a  resinous मिश्रण कि मधु मधुमक्खियों collect इससे  tree buds , sap flows , or other botanical sources .
It is used as a  sealant लिये  unwanted open spaces in the hive .
Propolis is used for small gaps ( approximately or less ) , while larger spaces  हैं प्रायः भर  with beeswax .
Its color varies depending on its  वनस्पति सोर्स , the सबसे आम होने  dark brown .
Propolis is sticky at and  ऊपर रूम तापमान  , .
At lower temperatures  , it becomes  hard and very brittle .
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26 , 1948 ) is an American singer , songwriter , and multi-instrumentalist , best known as the frontman and lead singer of the Boston  -आधारd चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ , in जिससे he भी plays the  harmonica , and occasional piano and percussion .
He is known as the ``  राक्षस of screamin  ' '' due to his high screams and his wide vocal range .
He is also known  लिये उसके on-stage acrobatics  .
During his high-energy performances , he  प्रायः पोशाक in उज्जवल , रंगीन outfits साथ  his trademark scarves hanging from his microphone stand .
In the 1970s , Tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith , which released  ऐसे पड़ाव मुश्किल चट्टान एल्बम  as Toys in the Attic and Rocks .
In the late 1970s and early 1980s , Tyler had a heavy drug and  दारू व्यसन , और the बैंड  's popularity waned .
He  समाप्त ड्रग पुनर्वास in 1986 और subsequently कायम गम्भीरता  for over 20 years , but had a relapse with prescription painkillers in the late 2000s , for which he successfully received treatment in 2009 .
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s and early 1990s with the albums Permanent  अवकाश , पंप , और मिलेंगी a  Grip , Tyler became a household name and has remained a relevant rock icon .
As a result , he has since embarked on several solo endeavors  सहित अतिथि दिखावे on अन्य कलाकारों ' म्यूज़िक , फिल्मी  and TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ) , authoring a bestselling book , and solo work ( including a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ) .
However , he has continued to record  म्यूज़िक और  perform with Aerosmith , after more than 43 years in the band .
The band 's  नवीनतम एल्बम  , Music from Another Dimension !
,  थी released  on November 6 , 2012 .
Tyler is included among Rolling Stones 100 Greatest Singers  .
He was also ranked  3rd on hit parader 's शीर्ष 100 मेटल  Vocalists of All Time .
In 2001 he was inducted into the  चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति  with Aerosmith , and he was the presenter when AC/DC was inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003 .
In 2013 , Tyler and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be recipients of the ASCAP Founders  पुरस्कार और होगा भी be inducted into  the Songwriters Hall of Fame .
The  जिगर produces यूरिया in the  urea cycle as a waste product of the digestion of protein .
Normal human adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of urea nitrogen per 100 ml (  7–21 mg/ dl ) of रक्त  .
Individual  laboratories may have अलग सन्दर्भ  ranges , and this is because the procedure may vary .
वेन fontes ( born फ़रवरी 2 , 1940 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी  football coach and college and professional football player who was the head coach of the NFL 's Detroit Lions from 1988 to 1996 .
His 67 wins and 71 losses are each the  सबसे लिये a सिर कोच in  team history .
The Jews ( ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ) , also known as the Jewish  लोगों , हैं a स्वदेश और an ethnoreligious समूह  , originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of the Ancient Near East .
The Jewish ethnicity , nationality , and religion are  strongly interrelated  , as Judaism is the traditional faith of the Jewish nation .
Converts to Judaism , whose status as Jews within the Jewish ethnos is equal to those  born into it , have  been absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia .
In Jewish tradition , Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical patriarchs Abraham , Isaac and Jacob in the second  मिलेनियम bce  .
The modern State of Israel was established as a Jewish nation-state , and  defines itself as ऐसे in इसके मौलिक  Laws .
Its Law of Return grants the right of  नागरिकता to कोई jew जो निवेदन  it .
Israel is the only country  जहाँ यहूदियों हैं a बहुमत  of the population .
Jews also  enjoyed  political autonomy twice before in ancient history .
The first of these periods lasted from 1350 to 586 BCE  , और encompassed the अवधि of the न्यायाधीशों , the संयुक्त साम्राज्य  , and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel and Judah , ending with the destruction of the First Temple .
The second was the period of the Hasmonean  किंगडम spanning इससे 140  to 37 BCE .
Since the destruction of the  पहला टेम्पल , सबसे यहूदियों have  lived in diaspora .
A minority in  प्रत्येक देश in जिससे वे सजीव ( मगर इसराईल ) , वे have अक्सर अनुभवी  persecution throughout history , resulting in a population that has fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries .
The world Jewish  जनसांख्यिकी पहुँचे a शिखर of 15 लाख prior to  the Second World War , but six million Jews were killed in the Holocaust .
Since then the population has risen again and , was estimated at 13.4 million by the North American Jewish Data Bank , or  कम than 0.2 % of the कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी  ( roughly one in every 514 people ) .
According to this report , about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ) , and 39.3 % in  the संयुक्त राज्य ( 5.3 लाख ) , साथ सबसे  of the remainder living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ) .
These  संख्याएँ शामिल सब those  who consider themselves Jews , whether or not they are affiliated with a Jewish organization .
the कुल संसार यहूदी  population , however , is difficult to measure .
In addition to issues with census methodology , there are halakhic disputes regarding who is a Jew and secular , political , and ancestral  पहचान कारकों कि may affect  the figure considerably .
Corpus  christi बारात  .
Oil  on कैनवास  by Carl Emil Doepler .
Corpus  domini redirects  here .
For other  उपयोग देखिए कॉर्पस  Domini ( disambiguation )
The Feast  of कॉर्पस christi ( लैटिन लिये देह of मसीह  ) , also known as Corpus Domini , is a Latin Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition and belief in the body and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist  , जिससे थी observed on पावन  Thursday in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of Good Friday .
In the present  रोमन missal , the feast  is designated the solemnity of The Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ .
It is also  मनाये in कुछ anglican , लूथरन , और बूढ़ा कैथोलिक  Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence .
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after Trinity Sunday or , `` where the Solemnity of the Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation , it is assigned to the Sunday after the  सबसे पावन  Trinity as its proper day '' .
At the end of Holy Mass , there is  प्रायः a बारात  of the Blessed Sacrament , generally displayed in a monstrance .
The procession is followed by Benediction of  the  Blessed Sacrament .
A notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over  by the पोप प्रत्येक साल in रोम ,  where it begins at the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran and makes its way to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major , where it concludes with Benediction .
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood , the levels of which rise in response to inflammation ( i.e .  c-reactive प्रोटीन is an acute-phase  protein ) .
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of dead or dying cells ( and some types of bacteria ) in  अनुक्रम to activate the पूरक प्रणाली via the c1q जटिल  .
सीआरपी is synthesized by the जिगर  in response to factors released by macrophages and fat cells ( adipocytes ) .
It is a member of the pentraxin  परिवार of प्रोटीन  .
It  is नहीं सम्बन्धित  to C-peptide or protein C .
C-reactive protein was the first pattern  मान्यता receptor ( prr ) to  be identified .
The start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is typically dated to 1492 , when a Spanish  expedition headed by क्रिस्टोफर कोलंबस sailed लिये इण्डिया  to open trade but inadvertently discovered the Americas .
European conquest ,  large-scale खोजी और colonization  soon followed .
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied with many internal wars and was slowly  recovering इससे the अनेक मौतों कि the bubonic प्लेग caused  , the rapid expansion at which it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s .
The first  रिझाने occurred साथ  the Caribbean coasts on the islands of Hispaniola , Puerto Rico and Cuba , and after 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America .
In 1497 , sailing from the  उत्तर on निमित्त of इंग्लैण्ड , जॉन cabot  landed on the North American coast , and a year later , Columbus 's third voyage reached the South American coast .
France founded colonies in much of eastern North America , on a number of  caribbean आइलैंड्स , और in दक्षिण  America .
पुर्तगाल colonized  Brazil .
Eventually , the entire Western Hemisphere came under the control of European  सरकारें , अग्रणी  to profound changes to its landscape , population , and plant and animal life .
In the 19th century alone  over 50 लाख लोगों  left Europe for the Americas .
The post-1492 era is known as the  काल of the columbian  Exchange .
Keith Richards ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an English  संगीतकार , singer-songwriter और संस्थापक सदस्य  of the English rock band the Rolling Stones .
Rolling Stone  पत्रिका  said Richards had created `` rock 's greatest single body of riffs '' , ranking him 4th on its list of 100 best guitarists .
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with the Rolling Stones ' lead vocalist Mick  जैगर हैं सूचीबद्ध among रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's  `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time `` .
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from several drug busts during the late  1960s और 1970s और  his candour regarding his addiction to and eventual abstinence from heroin .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is a स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन इससे the androgen समूह  and is found in mammals , reptiles , birds , and other vertebrates .
In mammals , testosterone is primarily secreted in the testicles of males and the ovaries of females , although   small amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands .
It is the principal male sex hormone and an  anabolic स्टेरॉयड  .
In men , testosterone plays a key role in the development of male reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate as well as  promoting द्वितीयक यौन विशेषताएँ ऐसे as increased मांसपेशी  , bone mass , and the growth of body hair .
In addition , testosterone   is essential for health and well-being as well as the prevention of osteoporosis .
On average , in adult human males , the plasma concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the concentration in adult human females ' plasma , but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males  is वृहद , the रोज़ उत्पादन  is about 20 times greater in men .
Females also are  अधिक संवेदनशील  to the hormone .
Testosterone is  observed in सबसे vertebrates  .
Fish make a slightly different form called  11-ketotestosterone  .
Its  बंटवारा in  insects is ecdysone .
ये सर्वव्यापी  steroids suggest that sex hormones have an ancient evolutionary history .
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` natural '' but relatively homogeneous  groupings हैं evident in a सांख्यिकीय  population .
It is often used in  विपणन शोध  .
In this technique , the total population is divided into these groups ( or clusters ) and a  सरल यादृच्छिक नमूना of  the groups is selected .
Then the required information is  एकत्रित इससे a सरल यादृच्छिक  sample of the elements within each selected group .
This may be done for every element in these groups or a subsample of elements  may  be selected within each of these groups .
A common motivation for  क्लस्टर sampling  is to reduce the total number of interviews and costs given the desired accuracy .
Assuming a fixed sample size , the technique gives more  सटीक परिणाम  when most of the variation in the population is within the groups , not between them .
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County ,  उत्तर कैरोलिना , संयुक्त  States , and is a suburb of the nearby cities of Greensboro and High Point .
The population  थी 3,382  at the 2010 census .
Natalie Portman ( born  नताली hershlag ; ; जून 9 , 1981 ) is an अभिनेत्री  and model with dual American and Israeli citizenship .
Her first role was as an orphan taken in  by a हिटमैन in the 1994 कार्रवाई फिल्मी , लकिन मुख्यधारा कामयाबी आए  when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel trilogy ( released in 1999 , 2002 and 2005 ) .
in 1999 , वो नामांकित  at Harvard University to study psychology while still working as an actress .
She  समाप्त उसके  bachelor 's degree in 2003 .
In 2001 , Portman  खोली in नई यॉर्क नगर  's Public Theater production of Anton Chekhov 's The Seagull .
In 2005 , Portman received a  नामांकन  for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress and won the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama Closer .
She won a Constellation Award for Best Female Performance and a Saturn  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके अभिनीत  role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ) .
She played leading roles in the historical dramas Goya 's Ghosts (  2006 ) और the  Other Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ) .
In May 2008 , she served as the youngest member of  the 61st सालाना  Cannes Film Festival jury .
Portman 's directorial debut , Eve , opened the 65th Venice International Film  पर्व 's शॉर्ट्स प्रतियोगिता  in 2008 .
Portman directed a segment of the collective film  नई यॉर्क , i प्रेम  You .
In 2011 , Portman won the Academy Award , the Golden Globe Award , the BAFTA Award , the Screen Actors Guild Award , and the Independent  स्पिरिट पुरस्कार लिये उसके सीसे प्रदर्शन as नीना sayers in ब्लैक  Swan .
Copper is a chemical element with the symbol Cu ( from )  और परमाणु  number 29 .
It is a ductile metal with very high  थर्मल और विद्युत चालकता  .
Pure  तांबे is नरम और malleable ;  a freshly exposed surface has a reddish-orange color .
It is used as a conductor  of ऊष्मा और विद्युत  , a building material , and a constituent of various metal alloys .
The metal  और इसके alloys have महरूम  used for thousands of years .
In the Roman era , copper was principally mined on Cyprus , hence the origin of the  नाम of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of साइप्रस )  , later shortened to сuprum .
Its compounds are commonly encountered as copper (  ii ) लवण , जिससे प्रायः impart ब्लू or ग्रीन  colors to minerals such as azurite and turquoise and have been widely used historically as pigments .
Architectural structures built with copper  corrode to दे ग्रीन  verdigris ( or patina ) .
सजावटी आर्ट prominently सुविधाएँ  copper , both by itself and as part of pigments .
Copper is essential to all  जीना जीवों as a ट्रेस dietary  mineral because it is a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase .
In molluscs  और crustacea तांबे is a constituent  of the blood pigment hemocyanin , which is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish and other vertebrates .
The main  क्षेत्रों जहाँ  copper is found in vertebrates are liver , muscle and bone .
In sufficient concentration , copper compounds are  जहरीला to उच्चतर जीवों  and are used as bacteriostatic substances , fungicides , and wood preservatives .
The major  पेशेवर खेल लीग , or बस  major leagues , in the United States and Canada are the highest professional competitions of team sports in the two countries .
Although individual sports such as  गोल्फ़ , टेनिस , और स्वचालित रेसिंग  are also very popular , the term is usually limited to team sports .
The term `` major league '' was first used in 1921 in reference to Major League Baseball ( MLB ) , the top level of  पेशेवर अमरीकी  baseball .
Today , the major northern North America professional team sports leagues are Major League Baseball ( MLB ) , the National  बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए  ) , the National Football League ( NFL ) , and the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Other notable leagues include Major League Soccer ( MLS ) , the Canadian Football League ( CFL ) , the Arena Football League , Major  लीग lacrosse , the नेशनल lacrosse लीग और the महिलाओं  's National Basketball Association .
The  एनएफएल , एमएलबी , एनबीए , और एनएचएल  are commonly referred to as the Big Four .
Each of these is the richest professional club  प्रतियोगिता in इसके खेल  worldwide .
The  बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी can become सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक in दोनो देशों  and elsewhere in the world , because the leagues enjoy a significant place in popular culture in the US and Canada .
the एनएफएल रै  32 teams , and the others have 30 each .
The vast majority of  प्रमुख लीग टीमों हैं concentrated  in the most populous metropolitan areas of the United States .
Baseball , football , hockey , and soccer have had professional leagues for over  100 सालो ; जल्दी लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ , ओहियो लीग , और नेशनल  Hockey Association formed the basis of the modern MLB , NFL and NHL respectively .
Soccer was first professionalized in 1894 , but leagues suffered greatly from lack of  स्थिरता और seldom lasted अधिक than  a decade .
Soccer 's greatest successes were in the form of  the अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ) , the असली  North American Soccer League ( 1968-1984 ) , the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and , currently , Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ) .
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the NBA evolved from the National Basketball League and its  splinter समूह the बास्केट  Association of America , taking on its current form in 1949 .
Every major league averages 15,000 fans in  उपस्थिति प्रति खेल or  higher as of 2011 .
मध्याह्न ऊँचाई is an खगोलीय  navigation method of calculating an observer 's latitude .
Earned value management ( EVM ) , or Earned value project/performance  प्रबन्धन ( evpm ) is a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन  technique for measuring project performance and progress in an objective manner .
Because  evm रै the क्षमता  to combine measurements of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
and  cost,
in a single integrated system , Earned Value Management is able to  provide सटीक forecasts of प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन समस्याएं  , which is an important contribution for project management .
Early EVM research showed that the areas of  नियोजन और कंट्रोल हैं significantly impacted by इसके उपयोग ; और  similarly , using the methodology improves both scope definition as well as the analysis of overall project performance .
More recent research studies have shown that the principles of EVM  हैं धनात्मक predictors of प्रोजेक्ट  success .
Popularity of EVM  रै grown significantly in हाल सालो परे  government contracting , in which sector its importance continues to rise ( e.g. , recent new DFAR rules ) , in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes .
रंगीन वसन्त  garden flowers
Spring is one  of the चार conventional  temperate seasons , following winter and preceding summer .
There are various technical  परिभाषाएं of वसन्त , लकिन लोकल उपयोग of the पद  varies according to local climate , cultures and customs .
When it is spring in the northern hemisphere  , it होगा  be autumn in the southern hemisphere .
At the  वसन्त विषुव , दिनों हैं बंद to 12 घंटों long साथ  day length increasing as the season progresses .
Spring and ``  springtime '' refer to the ऋतु , और भी to विचार of rebirth , कायाकल्प  , renewal , resurrection , and regrowth , with festivals such as Carnival , Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time .
Jamestown was a settlement in the Colony of  वर्जिनिया , the पहला स्थाई  English settlement in the Americas .
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on May 14 , 1607 (  o.s . , may 24 , 1607 n.s . ) ,  it followed several earlier failed attempts , including the Lost Colony of Roanoke .
Jamestown served as the capital of the colony for 83  सालो , इससे 1616 जबतक  1699 .
The settlement was located within the territory of a  राजनैतिक एंटिटी ज्ञात as  Tsenacommacah , the state of the Powhatan Confederacy , with around 14,000 native inhabitants , and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe .
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing , feasting and tobacco ceremonies , and they provided crucial provisions and support for the survival of the colonists , who were not agriculturally inclined , although relations with the newcomers also  soured fairly जल्दी on , अग्रणी to the कुल annihilation  of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years .
भीतर a साल of jamestown 's  founding , the Virginia Company brought Polish and Dutch colonists to help improve the settlement .
In 1619 , the first documented Africans were brought to  jamestown , हालांकि the आधुनिक  conception of slavery in the future United States did not begin in Virginia until 1660 .
When the  उपनिवेश थी subdivided into the असली  eight shires of Virginia in 1634 , the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire .
The London Company 's second settlement , Bermuda , claims to be the site of the oldest town in the English New World , as St. George 's , Bermuda was officially established ( as  नई लंदन ) in 1612 , whereas जेम्स फोर्ट , in वर्जिनिया , थी  not to be converted into James towne until 1619 , and further did not survive into the present day .
In 1699 , the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg , after which Jamestown ceased to exist as a  उपनिवेश  , existing today only as an archaeological site .
Today , Jamestown is one of  तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the ऐतिहासिक त्रिभुज of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया , साथ  with Williamsburg and Yorktown , with two primary heritage sites .
ऐतिहासिक jamestowne , the पुरातत्व साईट on jamestown द्वीप  , is a cooperative effort by Jamestown National Historic Site ( part of Colonial National Historical Park ) , and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown Settlement , a living history interpretive site ,  is संचालित by the jamestown yorktown न्यास  in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia .
James Christopher Frey ( born September 12 , 1969 ) is an  अमरीकी  writer .
His books A Million Little  टुकड़े ( 2003 ) और my dost लियोनार्ड  ( 2005 ) , as well as Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 ) , were bestsellers .
He was  the विषय of a कांड जब जांचकर्ताओं खोजा कि थाना समय और  the extent of certain injuries were exaggerated in A Million Little Pieces , a purportedly autobiographical account of the author 's struggle with addiction .
Deere & Company , most commonly known by its name John Deere , is an  अमरीकी निगम आधारित in moline , इलिनोइस ,  and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world .
in 2012 , it  was listed as 97th in the Fortune 500 America 's ranking and 190th in the Fortune 500 Global ranking .
Deere and Company agricultural products , sold under the John Deere name , include tractors , combine harvesters , cotton harvesters , balers  ,  planters / seeders , sprayers , and UTVs .
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment and forestry equipment , as well as a supplier of diesel engines and drivetrains ( axles , transmissions ,  gearboxes ) प्रयुक्त in भारी उपकरण  .
Additionally , John Deere manufactures equipment used  in लॉन , grounds , और turf  care , such as walk-behind lawn mowers , zero-turn lawn mowers , lawn tractors , and snowthrowers .
To support  the कोर व्यवसायों  , John Deere also provides financial services and other related activities .
The company 's slogan is `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' and has a picture of a leaping deer as  a लोगो , a शब्द खेल pun on `` nothing रनों  like a deer '' .
Carl Westby coined the phrase `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' for a marketing  अभियान to बेचें snowmobiles  .
The company 's  उत्पाद हैं भी identifiable by इसके  distinctive shade of green paint , usually augmented by yellow trim .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a  denomination of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी  .
The first U.S. Secretary  of the राजकोष ( 1789–95 ) , सिकंदर  Hamilton , is currently featured on the obverse of the bill , while the U.S. Treasury Building is featured on the reverse .
(  हैमिल्टन is एक of दो  non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other  is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन  , on the $ 100 bill .
Hamilton is one of only four people  प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to  the present ) who was not born in the continental United States , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63  विधिक टेंडर ) ; जार्ज meade , स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000  1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In  जोड , kamehameha  I , appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter . )
All $ 10 bills issued today are  संघीय  Reserve Notes .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 bill in  परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced  due to wear .
लगभग  6 % of all US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills  हैं वितरित by संघीय  Reserve Banks in yellow straps .
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s  1805 पोर्ट्रेट of  Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency  in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक  featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left , but was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
Andy Samuel Griffith ( June 1 , 1926 – July 3 , 2012 ) was an American actor ,  टेलीविज़न निर्माता , ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning  Southern-gospel singer , and writer .
He  थी a टोनी पुरस्कार nominee लिये दो भूमिकाएँ , और gained prominence  in the starring role in director Elia Kazan 's film A Face in the Crowd ( 1957 ) before he became better known for his television roles , playing the lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock .
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin , ( née Raines ; born July 20 ,  1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -आधारd  , American -born naturalist , author , the widow of Australian naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah , Queensland , Australia .
She co-starred with her husband on The Crocodile Hunter , their unconventional television nature documentary series along with its spin-off series , Croc Files  और the  Crocodile Hunter Diaries .
She has lived in Australia since 1992 ,  जब वो शादीशुदा स्टीव इरविन  .
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of the Copernican system , from the  harmonia macrocosmica  ( 1660 ) .
Heliocentrism , or heliocentricism  , is the खगोलीय मॉडल in जिससे  the Earth and planets revolve around a relatively stationary Sun at the center of the Solar System .
The word comes from the Greek ( helios `` sun ''  और kentron ``  center '' ) .
Historically , heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism ,  जिससे लगाई the धरती at  the center .
The notion that the Earth revolves around  the सूर्य था महरूम प्रस्तावित as जल्दी as the 3rd सदी bc by aristarchus  of Samos , but Aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted little attention until Copernicus revived and elaborated it .
Lucio Russo , however , argues that this is  a भ्रामक छाप resulting  from the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era .
Using indirect evidence he argues that a heliocentric view was  expounded in हिप्पारकस 's  work on gravity .
It was not until the 16th  सदी कि a fully predictive गणितीय  model of a heliocentric system was presented , by the Renaissance mathematician , astronomer , and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland , leading to the Copernican Revolution .
In the following  सदी , योहानेस कॅप्लर elaborated  upon and expanded this model to include elliptical orbits , and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei .
साथ the observations of विलियम हर्शेल , फ्रेडरिक bessel , और अन्य  , astronomers realized that the sun was not the center of the universe and by the 1920s Edwin Hubble had shown that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions .
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah Jones Shankar ; March 30 , 1979 ) is  an अमरीकी singer-songwriter , pianist  , and actress .
She is the  बेटी of भारतीय सितार  player Ravi Shankar and Sue Jones .
वो is भी anoushka  Shankar 's half-sister .
In 2002 , she launched her solo music career with the release of the  commercially कामयाब और critically  acclaimed album Come Away with Me , a fusion of country music and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album , selling over 26 million copies .
The record earned Jones  पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , सहित the एल्बम of the  Year , Record of the Year , and Best New Artist .
Her subsequent studio albums , Feels Like Home , released in 2004 , Not Too Late , released in 2007 , the same year she made her film debut in My Blueberry Nights , and her 2009 release The Fall  सब gained प्लेटिनम औकात , selling over a लाख  copies and were generally well received by critics .
जोन्स ' पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम  , Little Broken Hearts , was released on April 27 , 2012 .
Jones has won nine Grammy Awards and was 60th on Billboard magazine 's  कलाकारों of the 2000–2009 दशक  chart .
throughout उसके करियर , जोन्स  has won numerous awards and has sold more than 50 million albums worldwide .
Billboard named her the top jazz artist  of the 2000–2009 दशक  .
नहीं to be  confused with Dimension of a physical quantity .
For other uses , see Dimension (  बहुविकल्पी  ) .
From left to right , the square , the cube , and  the tesseract  .
The  वर्गाकार is bounded  by 1-dimensional lines , the cube by 2-dimensional areas , and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes .
A projection of the cube is given since it is  viewed  on a two-dimensional screen .
The  वही applies to the tesseract  , which additionally can only be shown as a projection even in three-dimensional space .
A  आरेख प्रर्दशित  the first four spatial dimensions .
In physics and mathematics , the dimension of a space or object is informally defined as the minimum  क्रमांक of निर्देशांक needed  to specify any point within it .
Thus a line has a dimension of one because only one  निर्देशांक is needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( लिये उदाहरण  , the point at 5 on a number line ) .
A surface such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of two because two coordinates are needed to specify a point on it ( for example , to locate a point on the surface  of a गोला तुम need दोनो इसके अक्षांश और इसके  longitude ) .
The  अंदर of a घन , a बेलन or a गोला is  three-dimensional because three coordinates are needed to locate a point within these spaces .
In physical terms , dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and its position  in समय ( आभास as a अदिश आयाम साथ the t-axis ) , as खूब as the  spatial constitution of objects within—structures that correlate with both particle and field conceptions , interact according to relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description .
These , or other  अक्ष , may be संदर्भित to uniquely पहचानो a पाइंट  or structure in its attitude and relationship to other objects and occurrences .
Physical theories that incorporate time , such as general relativity , are said to work  in 4-dimensional `` spacetime `` , (  defined as a Minkowski space ) .
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' including quantum field and  स्ट्रिंग theories  .
The state-space  of क्वांटम यांत्रिकी  is an infinite-dimensional function space .
The concept  of आयाम is नहीं प्रतिबंधित  to physical objects .
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences for many reasons , frequently as configuration spaces such as  in लाग्रांजीय or हेमिल्टोनीय यांत्रिकी ; ये हैं अमूर्त स्पेसेस  , independent of the physical space we live in .
Fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762 residents in  सैन bernardino काउंटी  , California .
संस्थापित in 1913 , it remained  essentially rural until World War II , when entrepreneur Henry J. Kaiser built a large steel mill in the area .
It is now a regional hub of the trucking industry , with Interstate 10 and State Route 210 transecting the city from east to west  , और अंतरराज्यीय 15 गुजर diagonally through इसके  northwestern quadrant .
It is home to the largest of the San Bernardino County system libraries , a renovated historic theater , a municipal park , and the Auto Club Speedway on the  साईट of the कैसर स्टील मिल  .
Fontana also hosts  the fontana दिनों हाफ  Marathon and 5K run .
This race is the  तीव्रतम  half-marathon course in the world .
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that Fontana 's  जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012 , बनाना it the  second most populous city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state .
Cowboys  स्टेडियम is a स्टेडियम  with a retractable roof in Arlington , Texas .
It serves as the home of the National Football  लीग  's Dallas Cowboys .
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium , which opened in 1971 , and served as  the cowboys ' घर through the 2008 ऋतु  .
It was completed on May  27 , 2009  .
The stadium  सीटे 85,000 , बनाना it  the third largest stadium in the NFL by seating capacity .
The maximum capacity of the stadium ,  सहित खड़ा रूम , is 105,000  .
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are behind seats in each end zone and on a series of six  elevated प्लेटफ़ॉर्म  connected by stairways .
It has the world 's largest column-free interior and the fourth largest high  परिभाषा वीडियो स्क्रीन , जिससे hangs इससे  20 yard line to 20 yard line .
The facility can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( professional football ) such as concerts , basketball  खेल , मुक्केबाज़ी मिलान , कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और  high school football contests , soccer matches , and motocross races .
Canadian historians until the 1980s  tended to फ़ोकस on आर्थिक  history , including labour history .
In part this is because Canada has had far fewer  राजनैतिक or  military conflicts than other societies .
This was especially true in  the पहला हाफ of the बीसवीं सदी जब  economic history was overwhelmingly dominant .
Many of the most prominent English Canadian historians from this period were economic historians , such as  हेरोल्ड innis , डोनाल्ड creighton और आर्थर  R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the traditions that developed  in यूरोपीय और the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन frameworks  that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
The heavily Marxist influenced economic history that dominates Europe has little  प्रासंगिकता to सबसे of कनाडाई  history .
A focus on class , urban areas , and industry fails to address Canada 's  ग्रामीण और संसाधन आधारित अर्थव्यवस्था  .
similarly  , the monetarist school that is dominant in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border .
The study of economic history in Canada became highly focused on economic geography , and for  अनेक सालो the प्रबल स्कूल of विचार रै महरूम  the staples thesis .
This school of thought bases the study of the Canadian  अर्थव्यवस्था on the पढ़ाई of प्राकृतिक संसाधन  .
This approach has since  भी become प्रयुक्त बाहर of कनाडा  in Australia and in many developing nations .
Before  the आगमन of europeans , the पहला राष्ट्र  of what would become Canada had a large and vibrant trade network .
Furs , tools , decorative items ,  और अन्य goods यहूद प्रायः transported  thousands of kilometres , mostly by canoe throughout the many rivers and lakes of the region .
The early European history of the Canadian economy is  प्रायः पढ़ाई through the स्टेपल्स  thesis which argues the Canadian economy developed through the exploitation of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe .
Carbon-14 , 14C , or  radiocarbon , is a रेडियोसक्रिय समस्थानिक  of carbon with a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons .
Its presence in organic materials is the basis of the radiocarbon dating method  pioneered by willard लिब्बी और सहयोगियों  ( 1949 ) to date archaeological , geological and hydrogeological samples .
carbon-14 थी खोजा on 27 फ़रवरी 1940 , by मार्टिन कामेन और sam रूबेन at the  University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley , although its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934 .
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth :  99 % of the कार्बन is carbon-12 , 1 % is carbon-13 , और carbon-14 occurs in ट्रेस amounts , i.e. , बनाना up परिचय  1 part per trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere .
The half-life of  carbon-14  is 5,730±40 years .
carbon-14 decays into  nitrogen-14 through beta decay .
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on Earth is cosmic ray action upon nitrogen in the atmosphere , and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide   .
However , open-air nuclear testing between 1955–1980  contributed to  this pool .
the अलग  isotopes of carbon do not differ appreciably in their chemical properties .
This is used in chemical and biological research , in a technique called carbon labeling :  carbon-14 अणु can be प्रयुक्त to बदलें nonradioactive कार्बन , in  order to trace chemical and biochemical reactions involving carbon atoms from any given organic compound .
Lightning is a highly visible form  of उर्जा  transfer
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a massive  स्केल between the माहौल और an earth-bound  object .
They mostly originate in thunderclouds and terminate on the ground ,  पुकारा  Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning .
However , they may also be initiated from  a बहुत लम्बा grounded  object and reach into the clouds .
Although `` a lightning strike '' is commonly used to describe all lightning , it is rather erroneous and a misnomer , as only about 25 % of all lightning events worldwide are CG , the large bulk  of बिजली कार्यक्रम हैं intracloud  ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ) , where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere .
The scientific name for the complete process of a single lightning event is a and it is a very complex , multiple stepped interaction ,  जिससे is नहीं completely समझा  .
Most CG flashes only `` strike ''  एक शारीरिक स्थान  , referred to as a termination .
The primary conducting  चैनल , the उज्जवल  coursing light you may see and call a `` strike '' , is only about 1 inch in diameter , although to our eyes it looks much larger .
They are miles  long ,  upwards of tens of miles .
And the entire flash , lasts only a few fractions of a  दूसरी , सबसे of जिससे is नहीं दृश्य  to human eyes .
Thunder is always  उत्पादित by  lightning .
Just like lightning , that deceives our eyes ,  प्रायः looking larger or करीब than it वाकई is , the धरती 's माहौल और हमारी  brain 's perception of the outside world , ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not .
Lightning can not  happen in a वैक्यूम विहीन of ions ,  nor can thunder occur without molecules to vibrate .
Thunder is a physical absolute for  प्रत्येक सिंगल  flash of lightning .
Contrary to popular belief , a lightning strike itself is usually not responsible for multiple deaths or injuries from a  सिंगल इवेंट  .
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of  a फ्लैश , जबतक लोगों or पशु यहूद stacked on शीर्ष of प्रत्येक अन्य , or वे यहूद  somehow arranged vertically and part of the flash channel .
When lightning ignites an available fuel source and an explosion occurs , it is the shock wave or fire  causing the चोटों , नहीं the स्ट्राइक itself  .
Ground Currents , also called step potential , of an earth  termination  is what truly causes most injuries or death to humans and animals .
The near instantaneous rush of surface charges , induced by the overhead thundercloud itself , race to the strike point  इससे सैंकड़ों to हज़ारों of फीट दूर दौरान  discharge .
This current , caused during each  स्ट्रोक , takes the पाथ  of least resistance , which may be ion rich human or animal legs , over poorly conducting earth .
This is why it is best  to crouch , साथ  feet close together , if ever caught in the open during a thunderstorm .
Unfortunately , most reports do not draw a  भेद between the रियल कारण of चोट or मौत , be  it the strike itself , a resulting explosion or fire , or usually responsible step potential .
Peter F.  kilmartin ( born 1962  ) is the current Attorney General of Rhode Island .
Kilmartin is also a retired police captain and a  पूर्व सदस्य of the rhode द्वीप हाउस  of Representatives .

Sealing is an  अध्यादेश ( अनुष्ठान ) performed in latter दिन संतो मंदिरों  by a person holding the sealing authority .
The purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar relationships , making possible the  अस्तित्व of परिवार संबंध throughout  eternity .
LDS teachings place  ग्रेट महत्व on the विशिष्ट  authority required to perform these sealings .
गिरिजाघर doctrine  teaches that this authority , called the Priesthood , corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in .
sealings हैं typically  performed as marriages or as sealing of children to parents .
They were performed prior to the death of Joseph Smith , Jr. ( the main founder of the Latter Day Saint movement  ) , और हैं फिलहाल  performed in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints .
हालांकि कुछ अन्य denominations , ऐसे as the जातियाँ of मसीह  , view sealing as an artifact of Smith 's practice of plural marriage , some do still perform them .
The 2000s , pronounced `` two thousands '' , was a  दशक कि began on जनवरी  1 , 2000 , and ended on December 31 , 2009 .
Globalization , which had accelerated after the  जल्दी 1990s पतन of साम्यवादी  , continued to be a force in the 2000s .
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to globalization during the  दशक , बनाना it संभावित लिये लोगों to interact साथ अन्य लोगों , एक्स्प्रेस  ideas , introduce others to different cultures and backgrounds , use goods and services , sell and buy online , research and learn about things , along with experiencing the world without having to leave home .
The institutions ,  linkages और technologies कि उभरा or यहूद redefined  earlier would subsequently in this decade benefit many countries , in particular China and India .
however , in अन्य भाग of the संसार ऐसे  progress failed to address ongoing struggles with modernity , most notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups .
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States , United Kingdom , Spain , Canada and other nations invading  अफगानिस्तान , as खूब as implementing विभिन्न anti-terrorist उपायों at घर और विदेश in कया थी ज्ञात  as the War on Terror .
the यूरोपीय संघ  saw further integration and expansion throughout much of Europe .
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable environmental consequences , raised demand for  घटाते उर्जा संसाधन , और थी  still shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s .
The Gunfight at the O.K . Corral was a  gunfight कि took प्लेस  at about 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday , October 26 , 1881 , in Tombstone , Arizona Territory , and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West .
The gunfight , believed to have lasted only about thirty  सेकेंड , थी लड़ा between the गैरकानूनी cowboys बिली claiborne , आइक और बिली clanton , और tom और फ़्रैंक mclaury , और the opposing  town Marshal Virgil Earp and his brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and temporary lawman Wyatt , aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil .
Ike Clanton and Billy Claiborne ran from the fight unharmed , but Ike 's brother Billy Clanton was   killed , along with both McLaurys .
Lawmen Virgil and  मॉर्गन earp  and Doc Holliday were wounded .
Only  व्याट earp आए through  the fight unharmed .
The fight has come to represent a time in American  इतिहास जब the frontier थी खोलें दायरा लिये outlaws opposed  by law enforcement that was spread thin over vast territories , leaving some areas unprotected .
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what  रै चूंकि महरूम संकल्पित to be a largely  fictionalized biography , Wyatt Earp : Frontier Marshal , two years after Earp 's death .
झील retold उसके स्टोरी  in a 1946 book that director John Ford developed into the movie My Darling Clementine .
After the movie Gunfight at  the o.k . corral थी released  in 1957 , the shootout came to be known by that name .
Since then , the conflict has been portrayed with  varying डिग्री of सटीकता  in numerous Western films and books .
Despite its name , the gunfight actually occurred in a narrow lot  छह द्वार वेस्ट of the पश्च प्रवेश to the o.k  . Corral on Fremont Street , and also in the street .
The two opposing  पार्टियों यहूद initially तभी  about apart .
About thirty shots  यहूद fired in तीस  seconds .
Ike Clanton filed murder charges against  the earps और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे लकिन  they were eventually exonerated by a local judge after a 30-day preliminary hearing and then again by a local grand jury .
On December  28 , 1881 , वर्जिल earp  was maimed in an assassination attempt by the outlaw Cowboys , and on March 18 , 1882 , they assassinated Morgan Earp .
The suspects furnished solid alibis , and newly appointed Deputy U.S . Marshal Wyatt Earp took matters into his own hands during the Earp  वेंडेट्टा सवारी , ironically धड़ा by काउंटी शेरिफ  Johnny Behan with warrants for the Earp 's arrest .
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia  इंटरफ़ेस ) is a कॉम्पैक्ट audio/video इंटरफ़ेस लिये transferring uncompressed  video data and compressed/uncompressed digital audio data from a HDMI-compliant device ( `` the source device '' ) to a compatible computer monitor , video projector , digital television , or digital audio device .
HDMI is a digital  बदलना लिये मौजूदा  analog video standards .
There are a number of  hdmi-standard केबल कनेक्टर्स उपलब्धियाँ , प्रत्येक of जिससे can be प्रयुक्त लिये कोई  uncompressed TV or PC video format , including standard , enhanced , high definition , and 3D video signals ; up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a CEC ( Consumer Electronics Control ) connection ; and an Ethernet data connection .
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861  मानकों , जिससे define  video formats and waveforms , transport of compressed , uncompressed , and LPCM audio , auxiliary data , and implementations of the VESA EDID .
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each other when necessary  और allows the  user to operate multiple devices with one remote control handset .
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with the CEA-861 signals used by digital visual interface ( DVI ) , no  सिग्नल परिवर्तन is जरुरी , nor is वहीँ a  loss of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used .
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection , HDMI is independent of the various digital  टेलीविज़न मानकों प्रयुक्त by व्यक्तिगत डिवाइस , ऐसे as atsc और dvb , as ये हैं encapsulations of संपीडित एमपीईजी  video streams ( which can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ) .
Production of consumer HDMI products  प्रारंभ in लेट  2003 .
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is included in  the hd तैयार in-store labeling specification लिये tv सेट  for HDTV , formulated by EICTA with SES Astra in 2005 .
HDMI began to appear on  उपभोक्ता hdtv  camcorders and digital still cameras in 2006 .
As of January 8 , 2013 , which is  टेन सालो बाद the रिलीज of the पहला  HDMI specification , over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard .
Bree Van de  kamp ( née मेसन ; भी ज्ञात in the श्रेणी as ब्री होज  and Bree Weston ) is a fictional character and one of the four protagonists on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives .
She is played by actress Marcia Cross , who has received multiple awards and  nominations लिये उसके portrayal , सहित an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन , तीन सुनहरी  Globe Award nominations , and two Screen Actors Guild Awards .
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely  praised by आलोचकों और  fans .
Cross originally auditioned for the role of  मरियम ऐलिस यंग , लकिन श्रेणी निर्माता मार्क  Cherry thought she was better suited for the role of Bree .
Dana Delany , who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair , was originally  चुनी लिये the भूमिका लकिन turned it bas , saying  it was too similar to her role in Pasadena .
Bree 's main struggle  throughout the श्रेणी रै महरूम उसके  attempts to maintain a perfect life despite various obstacles such as widowhood , divorce , and alcoholism hindering her .
She has been married three  टाइम्स ; to रेक्स वैन de kamp  ( Steven Culp ) , Orson Hodge ( Kyle MacLachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ) .

The Hangover Part II is a 2011 American  कॉमेडी फिल्मी उत्पादित by legendary  Pictures and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures .
It is the sequel to 2009 's The Hangover and the  दूसरी फिल्मी in the hangover मताधिकार  .
Todd Phillips directed the film in addition to  co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट साथ क्रेग mazin ,  and Scot Armstrong .
The film stars Bradley Cooper , Ed Helms ,  zach galifianakis , केन jeong , जेफरी  Tambor , Justin Bartha and Paul Giamatti .
The  hangover भाग ii  tells the story of Phil , Stu , Alan , and Doug as they travel to Thailand for Stu 's wedding .
After the bachelor party in Las  वेगास , stu takes no संभावना  and opts for a safe , subdued pre-wedding brunch .
However , things do not go as planned , resulting in  another ख़राब hangover साथ no यादें  of the previous night .
Development of The Hangover Part II began in April 2009 , two months before The  hangover थी released  .
The principal actors were cast in March  2010 to reprise उनके  roles from the first film .
Production began in October 2010 , in Ontario  , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , before moving on location in Thailand .
The  फिल्मी  was released on May 26 , 2011 and , despite receiving mostly negative reviews from critics , it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its theatrical run .

The English Renaissance was a cultural and artistic  गति in इंग्लैण्ड डेटिंग इससे the लेट  15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century .
It is associated with the pan-European  पुनर्जागरण कि is प्रायः regarded as शुरूआत in  Italy in the late 14th century .
Like most of northern Europe ,  इंग्लैण्ड देखी छोटी of ये developments  until more than a century later .
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken , as a convenience ,  to be 1485 , जब the बैटल of bosworth  Field ended the Wars of the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty .
Renaissance style and ideas ,  however , यहूद slow in penetrating इंग्लैण्ड  , and the Elizabethan era in the second half of the 16th century is usually regarded as the height of the English Renaissance .
एलिज़ाबेथ ऐन bloomer वारेन `` बेट्टी '' घाट ( अप्रैल 8  , 1918 – July 8 , 2011 ) , was First Lady of the United States from 1974 to 1977 during the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford .
As First Lady , she was active in social policy  और निर्मित precedents  as a politically active presidential wife .
Throughout her husband 's term in office , she maintained high approval ratings despite opposition from  कुछ रूढ़िवादी republicans  who objected to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues .
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness following her 1974  mastectomy  and was a passionate supporter of , and activist for , the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ) .
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's Movement  , वो gained कीर्ति as एक of the सबसे निष्कपट पहला महिलाओं in इतिहास  , commenting on every hot-button issue of the time , including feminism , equal pay , the ERA , sex , drugs , abortion , and gun control .
She also raised awareness of addiction when she announced her long-running  बैटल साथ alcoholism in the  1970s .
Following her White House years , she continued  to लॉबी लिये the era  and remained active in the feminist movement .
She was the founder , and served as the first chair of the board of directors , of the Betty Ford Center for  पदार्थ गाली और व्यसन और is a प्राप्तकर्ता of the congressional सुनहरा पदक  ( co-presentation with her husband , Gerald R. Ford , October 21 , 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone , presented 1991 , by George H. W. Bush ) .
Platelet endothelial cell  adhesion अणु (  PECAM-1 ) also known as cluster of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a protein that in human is encoded by the PECAM1 gene found on chromosome 17 .
PECAM-1 plays a key role in  निकालना aged neutrophils  from the body .

The Miss Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the  प्रतिनिधि लिये the  state Florida in the Miss USA pageant .
While Florida has been successful in  शर्तें of runners-up , finalists और semi-finalists ,  the state has never won the Miss USA pageant , although Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe .

Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain  कि became ज्ञात as इंग्लैण्ड  , lasting from the end of Roman occupation and establishment of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples who came to Britain during the 5th and 6th centuries , including Angles , Saxons ,  frisii , और  Jutes .
The term also  refers  to the language spoken at the time in England , which is now called Old English , and to the culture of the era , which has long attracted popular and scholarly attention .
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy , the kingdoms of Northumbria , Mercia  , ईस्ट anglia , एसेक्स , केंट , ससेक्स ,  and Wessex .
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon  paganism दौरान the जल्दी काल , लकिन  converted to Christianity during the 7th century .
paganism था a फाइनल stronghold in a काल  of Mercian hegemony during the 640s , ending with the death of Penda of Mercia in 655 .
Facing the  threat of viking invasions , the हाउस of wessex  became dominant during the 9th century , under the rule of Alfred the Great .
During the 10th century , the individual kingdoms unified under the rule of Wessex into the Kingdom of England , which stood opposed  to the danelaw , the viking kingdoms स्थापित  from the 9th century in the north and east of England .
The  किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड गिरी in the viking आक्रमण इससे डेनमार्क  in 1013 and was ruled by the House of Denmark until 1042 , when the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored .
The  पिछला anglo-saxon किंग , हेरोल्ड  Godwinson , was killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings .

Smoked salmon  is a तैयारी  of salmon , typically a fillet that has been cured and hot or cold smoked .
Due to its moderately high price , smoked salmon  is माना a कोमलता .
Although the term lox is sometimes applied to  स्मोक्ड सामन , वे  are different products .
View of defibrillator electrode position  and  placement .
Defibrillation is a  आम उपचार लिये life-threatening  cardiac dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic  dose of electrical energy to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle , terminates the dysrhythmia , and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural  pacemaker , in the  sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be  बाह्य , transvenous  , or implanted , depending on the type of device used or needed .
Some external units , known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ) , automate the  निदान of treatable लय , अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to उपयोग  them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel (  अगस्त 19 , 1883 – जनवरी 10 , 1971  ) was a French fashion designer and founder of the Chanel brand .
She was the only fashion designer to appear on Time magazine 's list of the 100  सबसे influential लोगों of the 20th सदी  .
Along with Paul Poiret , Chanel was credited with liberating women from the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive , casual chic as the feminine standard in the  post- संसार युद्ध i era  .
A prolific fashion creator , Chanel 's influence  विस्तारित परे couture  clothing .
Her design  aesthetic थी एहसास in आभूषण  , handbags , and fragrance .
उसके हस्ताक्षर सैंट  , Chanel No . 5 , has become an iconic product .
चैनल थी ज्ञात  for her lifelong determination , ambition and energy which she applied to her professional and social life .
She achieved both success as a businesswoman and social prominence  धन्यवाद to the कनेक्शन्स वो बना  through her work .
These included many artists and  craftspeople to जिसको वो  became a patron .
However , Chanel 's highly competitive , opportunistic personality led her to make questionable life choices which  have उत्पन्न विवाद around उसके प्रतिष्ठा , विशेषकर उसके आचरण  during the German occupation of France in World War II .
Allied Mills flour mill on the banks of the  मैनचेस्टर जलयान  Canal
A  gristmill ( भी : grist  mill , corn mill or flour mill ) grinds grain into flour .
the पद can refer to  both the grinding mechanism and the building that holds it .
Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country located at the intersection of  सेंट्रल और southeastern यूरोपीय , bordering  on the Black Sea .
Romania shares a border with Hungary and Serbia to the west , Ukraine and Moldova to the  पूर्वोत्तर और ईस्ट , और  Bulgaria to the south .
At , Romania is the  आठवीं largest देश of the यूरोपीय संघ by क्षेत्रफल , और रै the सातवाँ largest  population of the European Union with more than 19 million people .
Its capital and biggest city is Bucharest , the 11th  largest नगर in the  EU .
The United Principalities emerged when the territories of Moldavia and Wallachia were  संयुक्त अंतर्गत प्रिंस सिकंदर ioan cuza  in 1859 .
In 1866 Prince Karl of  hohenzollern-sigmaringen  was called to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian Principate and in 1881 he was finally crowned as King Carol I the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania .
Independence from the Ottoman Empire was declared on 9 May  1877 , और थी internationally पहचाना  the following year .
At the end of World War I , Transylvania ,  bukovina और bessarabia संयुक्त  with the Kingdom of Romania .
World War II gave cause to the rise of a military dictatorship in Romania under fascist General  आयन antonescu , जो chose to लड़ो on the पक्ष of  the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944 .
After his removal ,  रोमानिया switched  sides in 1944 and joined the Allies .
By the end of the war , some formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the  सोवियत संघ , साथ रेड  Army units stationed on Romanian soil .
In 1947 Romania  forcibly became a लोगों 's  Republic ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of the Warsaw Pact .
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became  सामान्य सचिव of the रोमानियाई कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी , और the हर्ष austerity उपायों , राजनैतिक  repression , and cult of personality he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc .
Eventually his authoritarian  सरकारी थी  toppled in December 1989 during the Romanian Revolution of 1989 .
With the fall of the Iron  पर्दा , रोमानिया began इसके परिवर्तन towards लोकतंत्र  and a capitalist market economy .
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards decline , extensive reforms fostered economic  रिकवरी  .
As of 2010 , Romania is an upper-middle-income country with  a ऊँची इंसान विकास  index .
Romania joined NATO on 29 March 2004 , and the European Union on 1  जनवरी 2007  .
It is also a member of the : Latin Union , Francophonie , OSCE , WTO ,  bsec , संयुक्त  Nations , etc .
Today ,  रोमानिया is a एकात्मक semi-presidential  republic , in which the executive branch consists of the President and the Government .
`` प्राचीन  '' redirects here .
For other uses , see Antiquity (  बहुविकल्पी  ) .
The  टाइम्स पहले लिखने  belong either to protohistory or to prehistory .
Khafre 's  पिरामिड ( 4th  dynasty ) and Great Sphinx of Giza ( c. 2500 BC or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the study  of the लिखा  past from the beginning of recorded human history to the Early Middle Ages .
The span of recorded history  is roughly 5,000 सालो , साथ cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट  , the oldest discovered form of coherent writing , from the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC .
This is the beginning of  इतिहास , as opposed to प्रागितिहास , according  to the definition used by most historians .
The term classical antiquity is often used to refer to  इतिहास in the बूढ़ा संसार इससे the शुरूआत  of recorded Greek history in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ) .
This roughly coincides with the traditional date of  the founding of रोम in 753 bc , the शुरूआत of the  history of ancient Rome , and the beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece .
Although the ending date of ancient history is disputed , some Western scholars use the fall  of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 ad , the closure  of the Platonic Academy in 529 AD , the death of the emperor Justinian I , the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history .
In India , the period includes the early period of the Middle Kingdoms , and , in  चीन , the समय  up to the Qin Dynasty is included .
methylcobalamin (  shown ) is a form of vitamin B12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as dark  रेड crystals कि freely रूप cherry-colored  transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 , also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble vitamin  साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य  functioning of the brain and nervous system , and for the formation of blood .
It  is एक  of the eight B vitamins .
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human  देह , विशेषकर affecting डीएनए  synthesis and regulation , but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither fungi , plants , nor animals are capable of producing  विटामिन  B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis ,  हालांकि  many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis .
The vitamin is the largest and most  structurally जटिल विटामिन और  can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12  consists of a क्लास of chemically  related compounds ( vitamers ) , all of which have vitamin activity .
It contains the biochemically rare  तत्व  cobalt .
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin ) , but  परिवर्तन between अलग फ़ॉर्म of the  vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common  semi-synthetic रूप of the विटामिन , cyanocobalamin , करता नहीं occur in प्रकृति , लकिन is  produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements , and as a food additive , because of its stability and lower production cost .
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin , leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in  minimal विशेषज्ञता  .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin , and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive  pharmacological उत्पाद और खाना पूरक  .
The extra utility of these is currently  debated  .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from  इसके संबंध to the बीमारी  pernicious anemia , which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12 ,   so a lack of intrinsic factor , as seen in pernicious anemia , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of  विटामिन b12 कमियां और उनके  biochemical effects have since been elucidated .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post-  रिपब्लिकन काल of the प्राचीन रोमन सभ्यता , characterised  by an autocratic form of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which preceded it , had been destabilized  through a  series of civil wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's  नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ;  the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period  of unprecedented स्थिरता और  prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached  इसके महानतम expanse  during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ) .
In the 3rd  सदी , the साम्राज्य underwent a संकट कि  threatened its existence , but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century ,  दौरान  which time a system of dual rule was developed in the Latin West and Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the  5th सदी , the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता  later be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language , religion , architecture , philosophy , law , and forms of government in the  territory it governed , विशेषकर यूरोपीय , और by अर्थात् of यूरोपीय expansionism  throughout the modern world .
Total body surface area ( TBSA ) is an  मूल्यांकन माप of burns  of the skin .
In adults , the  `` नियम of nines '' is प्रयुक्त  to determine the total percentage of area burned for each major section of the body .
In some cases , the burns may cover more than one body part , or may not fully  कवर ऐसे a भाग ; in ये  cases , burns are measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the body .
For children and infants , the Lund-Browder chart is used to assess the burned body  सतह क्षेत्रफल  .
Different percentages are used because the ratio of the combined surface area of the head  और गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs is typically larger in children  than that of an adult .
Typical  मान  for common groups of humans follow .
( Due to rounding ,  मान may नहीं add to  100 % . )
World  शिशु मृत्यु  rates by five years averages in 2008 .
इस is a सूची  of countries by infant mortality rate .
यूनुस किर्स्टन sorrentino  ( born June 26 , 1975 ) , better known by his stage name KJ-52 , is a Christian rapper from Tampa , Florida .
The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his old rap  alias , `` किंग J. मैक , '' a नाम जिससे he बाद वर्णित  in one of his podcasts as `` horribly cheesy . ''
`` 52 '' , which is pronounced `` five two '' , not `` fifty-two '' , is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude with five loaves and two fish , which is also  सुंग परिचय in उसके सोंग `` धक्का up '' इससे the yearbook और in the  `` KJ Five Two '' on It 's Pronounced 'Five Two .
He was awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the Year for `` Never Look Away '' and  rap/hip हॉप एल्बम of the साल at the  GMA Dove Awards of 2007 .
On July 28 , 2009 , KJ-52 released `` End of My Rope '' , which is the  पहला सिंगल लिये उसके एल्बम five-two  Television .
His song `` Dear Slim '' is based on Eminem 's song ``  स्टेन `` और is a sort of  personal message from KJ-52 to Eminem .
The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used ,  among अन्य बाते , to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g .  in geographic coordinate systems ) , hours ( in the medical field ) , or degrees of temperature .
The symbol  consists of a छोटी उठाया  circle , historically a zero glyph .
In  युनिकोड it is एनकोडेड  at .
This is a list of roots , suffixes , and prefixes  प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा  terminology , their meanings , and their etymology .
वहीँ हैं  a few rules when using medical roots .
Firstly , prefixes and suffixes , primarily in Greek , but  भी in लैटिन , have  a droppable -o- .
As a general rule , this -o- almost always acts as a joint-stem to connect two  consonantal जड़ें , e.g . arthr- + -o- + logy  = arthrology .
But generally , the -o- is dropped when  connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g . arthr- + itis  = arthritis , instead of arthr-o-itis .
Secondly , medical roots generally go together according to  भाषा : यूनानी prefixes go साथ यूनानी प्रत्यय और  Latin prefixes with Latin suffixes .
Although international scientific vocabulary is not stringent about segregating combining forms of different languages , it is advisable when coining new words not to mix different lingual  roots  .
Stomach cancer , or  gastric कर्कट ,  refers to cancer arising from any part of the stomach .
Stomach cancer causes about 800,000  मौतों विश्वव्यापी  per year .
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) because most patients  उपस्थित साथ उन्नत बीमारी  .
Sara Lynn Evans ( born February 5 , 1971 ) is an American  देश सिंगर और songwriter  .
For her entire career , she has been  हस्ताक्षरित to आरसीए रिकॉर्ड नैशविले  .
इवांस ' डेब्यू , तीन  Chords and the Truth , did not produce a Top 40 hit on the Hot Country Songs charts .
She followed this up with No Place That Far ( 1998 ) , Born to Fly ( 2000 ) , Restless (  2003 ) और रियल  Fine Place ( 2005 ) .
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the Recording Industry  संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa )  , while the other three albums all were certified platinum .
These discs include the number 1 singles `` No Place That Far `` , `` Born to Fly `` , `` Suds in the Bucket `` and `` A Real Fine Place to Start `` , plus the top 10 hits `` I Could Not Ask for More `` ( a cover of the  एडविन मैक्केन सोंग ) , `` i रखना looking `` , `` पूर्ण `` और `` cheatin ' ``  .
Her  2007 महानतम हिट्स शामिल  the top 15 hits `` You 'll Always Be My Baby `` and `` As If `` .
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her fifth number  1 hit , `` a छोटी बिट stronger  `` , which was co-written by Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum .
Evans has  भी जीती एक पुरस्कार प्रत्येक इससे बिलबोर्ड , the अकादमी of  Country Music , Country Music Association , Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award .
The world 's principal  धर्मों  and spiritual traditions may be classified into a small number of major groups , although this is by no means a uniform practice .
This  सिद्धान्त began  in the 18th century with the goal of recognizing the relative levels of civility in societies .
