The Berlin blockade ( 24 June 1948 – 12  may 1949 ) थी एक of the पहला प्रमुख  international crises of the Cold War .
During the multinational occupation of post–World War II Germany , the Soviet Union blocked the Western Allies ' railway , road ,  और कनाल अभिगम to the सेक्टर of बर्लिन अंतर्गत अलाइड कंट्रोल  .
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying Berlin  साथ खाना और ईंधन , thereby giving  the Soviets practical control over the entire city .
In response , the Western Allies organized the Berlin  एयरलिफ्ट to carry आपूर्तियाँ to the लोगों in वेस्ट बर्लिन  .
Aircrews  इससे the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स , the अंग्रेजों royal एयर फ़ोर्स  , the Royal Australian Air Force , the Royal Canadian Air Force , the Royal New Zealand Air Force , and the South African Air Force flew over 200,000 flights in one year , providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as fuel and food to the Berliners .
By the spring of 1949 , the effort was clearly succeeding  और , by अप्रैल , the एयरलिफ्ट थी delivering  more cargo than had previously been transported into the city by rail .
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought embarrassment to the Soviets who  था refused to मानना it  could make a difference .
The  नाकेबंदी थी lifted  in May 1949 and resulted in the creation of two separate German states .
The Federal Republic of  जर्मनी ( वेस्ट  Germany ) and the German Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) split up Berlin .
In remembrance of the airlift , three airports in the former western zones of the city served as the primary gateways to  जर्मनी लिये another पचास सालो  .
The  यूरोपियन चिह्न ;  logotype and handwritten .
The euro  चिह्न is the करेंसी चिह्न  used for the euro , the official currency of the Eurozone in the European Union ( EU ) .
The design was presented to  the पब्लिक by the यूरोपीय आयोग on  12 December 1996 .
The international three-letter code ( according to  आईएसओ मानक आईएसओ  4217 ) for the euro is EUR .
In Unicode it is  एनकोडेड  at .
In English ,  the चिह्न precedes  the value .
In some styleguides , but  नहीं अन्य , the  euro sign is unspaced .
Mate ( , ; sometimes also spelled maté ) , also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ) , is a traditional South American infused drink , particularly in Argentina , Uruguay , Paraguay and the southern states  of ब्राज़ील और to a lesser उपाधि in दक्षिण  of Chile , the Bolivian Chaco , Syria and Lebanon .
It is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex  paraguariensis , ज्ञात in पुर्तगाली  as erva-mate ) in hot water .
Mate is served with a metal straw from a  साझा खोखला calabash करेले  .
The straw is called a bombilla in  कुछ लैटिन अमरीकी देशों , a bomba in पुर्तगाली  , and a bombija or , more generally , a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic .
The  स्ट्रॉ is traditionally  made of silver .
Modern , commercially available straws are typically made of nickel silver , called  alpaca ; बेदाग स्टील , or  hollow-stemmed cane .
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil , it  रै the विशिष्ट नाम of cuia , or भी cabaça ( the नाम लिये indigenous-influenced calabash  gourds in other regions of Brazil , still used for general food and drink in remote regions ) .
Even if  the जल is supplied इससे a आधुनिक thermos  , the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias .
As with other brewed herbs , yerba  mate पत्ते हैं सूखी , कटा  , and ground into a powdery mixture called yerba .
The bombilla acts  as दोनो a स्ट्रॉ  and a sieve .
The submerged end is flared , with  छोटी छेद or स्लॉट कि allow the brewed  liquid in , but block the chunky matter that makes up much of the mixture .
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube  साथ छेद , or वसन्त स्लीव  to act as a sieve .
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have been on the market in Argentina , Paraguay and Uruguay for many years under such trade names as ``  taragüí vitality '' in अर्जेंटीना , `` pajarito '' और `` kurupí '' in पैराग्वे , और in ब्राज़ील  under the name `` Mate Leão '' .
This is considered a  completely अलग  drink .
It is never drunk from cuias or called chimarrão , nor is it associated with  the gaucho/gaúcho  culture .
The automotive industry is a term that covers a wide range of companies and organisations involved in the design , development ,  manufacture , विपणन , और selling of मोटर वाहनों , towed  vehicles , motorcycles and mopeds .
It is one of the world 's  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आर्थिक सेक्टर  by revenue .
The term automotive  उद्योग प्रायः करता नहीं शामिल उद्योग समर्पित to the मेंटेनेंस of ऑटोमोबाइल  following delivery to the end-user , such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations .
The term automotive was created from Greek autos ( self ) ,  और लैटिन motivus ( of गति  ) to represent any form of self-powered vehicle .
This term  थी प्रस्तावित  by SAE member Elmer Sperry .
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista , Jr. ( born  जनवरी 18 , 1969 ) , is an अमरीकी मिश्रित martial कलाकार , bodybuilder ,  actor , and former professional wrestler best known for his time in World Wrestling Entertainment competing under the ring name Batista .
In WWE , he became a six-time  संसार चैंपियन , जीतना the संसार हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप चार टाइम्स  , and the WWE Championship two times .
He  is the longest-reigning  World Heavyweight Champion in WWE history .
In addition to these championships , Batista has won the World Tag Team Championship three times ( twice  साथ ric  Flair and once with John Cena ) and the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ) .
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went on to headline WrestleMania 21 , one  of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing pay-per-view  events in pro wrestling history .
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant , Batista signed a contract with the WWF in 2000 and was sent  to इसके developmental  territory , Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW ) , where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship .
In August 2012 , Bautista signed a contract with Classic Entertainment & Sports to  लड़ो in मिश्रित martial  arts .
He won his MMA debut  on अक्तूबर 6 , 2012 , defeating  Vince Lucero via TKO in the first round .
Henry T.  थामस sampson , jr. ( born in  Jackson , Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American inventor .
He graduated from high school  in 1951 इससे lanier ऊँची स्कूल  in Jackson , Mississippi .
He  तब attended मोरहाउस कॉलेज  for a couple of years before transferring to Purdue University where he became a member of the Omega Psi Phi fraternity .
He received a  स्नातक 's उपाधि in  science from Purdue University in 1956 .
He  ग्रैजुएट  with an MS degree in engineering from the University of California , Los Angeles in 1961 .
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear Engineering from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in 1965 ,  और उसके phd  in 1967 .
He is the first  अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to earn  a Ph.D.in Nuclear Engineering in the United States .
कुछ of उसके accomplishments शामिल होने a सदस्य of the संयुक्त राज्य  Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and earning an Atomic Energy Commission honor between 1964 and 1967 .
Later he was awarded the Black Image Award from Aerospace  निगम in 1982  .
He was  awarded the अश्वेतों in अभियान्त्रिकी , लागू विज्ञान  Award , and prize for education , by the Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983 .
In  जून 2007 , sampson थी शादीशुदा  to Laura Howzell Young in St. Thomas , U.S. Virgin Islands .
Young-Sampson is a  प्राध्यापक in the कॉलेज of शिक्षा  at California State University San Bernardino .
Robert Lane Gibbs (  born कूच 29 , 1971 ) is  a senior campaign adviser for US President Barack Obama .
Previously , he was the 28th White House Press  सचिव  .
Gibbs was  the संचार निदेशक लिये then-  U.S . Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign .
Gibbs , who has worked with Obama since 2004 , was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in Senate campaigns , having served as  संचार निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक senatorial अभियान कमेटी और लिये चार व्यक्तिगत  Senate campaigns , including those of Obama in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998 .
गिब्स  was also the press secretary of Representative Bob Etheridge .
On November 22 , 2008 , Gibbs  थी घोषित as the दबायें  secretary of the Obama administration .
He assumed the role of press secretary on January  20 , 2009 , और दिया उसके पहला  official briefing on January 22 .
On January 5 , 2011 , Gibbs announced that he would leave the White House to become  an बाहर adviser  to the administration .
He left on  फ़रवरी  11 , 2011 .
On February 12 , 2013 , it was announced that  गिब्स था महरूम नियुक्त  as a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC .
उसके पहला रूप  was on the same night prior to the 2013 State Of The Union Address .
Armando Pérez ( born January 15 , 1981 ) , better known by his stage name  pitbull , is an अमरीकी rapper , songwriter , और  record producer .
His first recorded performance was from the Lil Jon album Kings of  crunk  in 2002 .
In 2004 , he released his debut album  titled m.i.a.m.i  . ( short for Money Is A Major Issue ) under TVT Records .
Since then , he has released  तीन अन्य एल्बम अंतर्गत the लेबल :  El Mariel in 2006 , The Boatlift in 2007 , and Planet Pit in 2011 .
He released  rebelution in 2009 , जिससे शामिल singles  `` I Know You Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy `` .
The latter peaked at No . 30 on the Hot 100 and No . 11 on the Hot Rap  ट्रैक्स चार्ट जबकि `` i जान तुम want me  '' peaked at No . 2 on the Hot 100 and peaked within the top ten spots of charts in the UK , Canada , Italy , and the Netherlands .
The song reached No . 1 in France  और the यूरोपीय hot 100 on the  week ending August 29 , 2009 according to Billboard magazine .
He later  हस्ताक्षरित  with Polo Grounds Music through Sony Music and created his own label Mr. 305 Inc .
Another single from Rebelution was `` Hotel Room Service `` , which  peaked at no . 8 on the hot  100 .
Rebelution went on to  बेचें over 7.5 लाख  worldwide digital singles and albums combined .
nevertheless , he dropped a तोड़ पुकारा  `` Give Me Everything '' which reached # 1 worldwide , and featured artists Ne-yo , Nayer , and Afrojack .
He has also performed as a featured artist in the remixes of many other hit songs , like Tik Tok , Scream & Shout , Lo Hecho Esta Hecho , Bad , Papi  , ईंट , कैसा कम , tonight ( i 'm lovin ' तुम ) , वीडियो  Phone , Over To You Now and Bumpy Ride .
Pérez is also  the मेजबान of उसके अपना spanish-language  program on the cable channel Mun2 titled La Esquina ( Spanish for The Corner ) .
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' Combs co-founded Bad Boy Latino , a subsidiary of  combs ' ख़राब लड़के रिकॉर्ड  label .
It primarily focuses on Latin hip hop , Latin soul , Latin  पॉप और अन्य तीव्र म्यूज़िक  , and has offices in New York and Miami , Florida .
Along with co-founding it , Pérez currently  heads the a  & R division of the label .
Pérez has become a product endorser , representing alongside  ड्रेक , रिहाना , और trey songz the “so kodak” अभियान लिये the कोडक ब्रांड और embarking on a साझेदारी  with the soft drink giant Dr Pepper as part of the campaign “ Vida 23 ” for which he recorded the song specifically featured on his album Armando .
Pitbull also announced he has become the spokesperson for Voli Vodka , in which he holds a majority equity  हिस्सेदारी , और budweiser रै चुनी pitbull to प्रचार इसके कली लाइट  line of beer .
The commercials  फिलहाल हाइलाइट pitbull  dancing and gyrating on stage holding up a bottle of Bud Light .
Pitbull has also purchased an equity stake  in मियामी subs  Pizza and Grill .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ) , also known  as सब hallows ' संध्या , is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31 , the  eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised  feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय  harvest festivals , and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
अन्य विद्वानों  maintain that it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties , carving pumpkins  into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires  , apple bobbing , visiting haunted attractions , playing pranks , telling scary stories , and watching horror films .
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas  using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो  is willing to receive them .
The term freedom  of अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes  used synonymously , but includes any act of seeking , receiving and imparting information or ideas , regardless of the medium used .
In practice , the right to freedom of speech is not  निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं , as साथ मानहानि  , slander , obscenity , sedition ( including , for example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation , revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a  इंसान  right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international human rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek , receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds , regardless of  frontiers , either orally , in लिखने or in छपाई , in the रूप of आर्ट , or through  any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or  प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा  of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of  वाक may be legally curtailed  in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
Sydney Harbour from the air , showing the Opera House , the CBD , Circular Quay , the  सेतु , the parramatta नदी , उत्तर सिडनी और kirribilli  in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge across Sydney Harbour that carries rail , vehicular , bicycle and pedestrian traffic between the Sydney central  कारोबार ज़िला ( सीबीडी ) और the उत्तर  Shore .
The dramatic view of the bridge , the harbour , and the nearby Sydney  ओपेरा हाउस is  an iconic image of Sydney , New South Wales , and Australia .
The bridge is  nicknamed `` the coathanger  '' because of its arch-based design .
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C . Bradfield of the NSW Department of Public Works , the bridge was designed and built by British  कड़ dorman long और co ltd of middlesbrough और  opened in 1932 .
The bridge 's design was influenced by  the नरक फाटक सेतु  in New York .
It was the world 's widest long-span bridge , at  48.8 मीटर ( 160 फीट ) चौड़ी , जबतक  construction of the new Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver .
It is also  the पांचवां longest spanning-arch सेतु in the संसार  , and it is the tallest steel arch bridge , measuring from top to water level .
Until 1967 the Harbour Bridge  थी सिडनी 's tallest ढांचा  .
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands ,  in the उत्तरी प्रशांत  Ocean .
One of the most well-known and  heavily पढ़ाई हॉटस्पॉट in the संसार , the हवाई plume is जिम्मेदार लिये the सृष्टि  of the Hawaiian – Emperor seamount chain , an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of volcanoes , four of which are active , two of which are dormant , and more than 123 of which are extinct , many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls .
The chain extends from south of the island of Hawaii to the edge of the Aleutian Trench , near the  पूर्वी किनारे  of Russia .
While most volcanoes are created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries , the Hawaii hotspot is located far from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot theory , first proposed in 1963 by John Tuzo Wilson , proposes that a single , fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that then , cut off from their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate , become  increasingly निष्क्रिय और आखिरकार इरोड नीचे समुद्र स्तर over लाखो  of years .
According to this theory , the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor and Hawaiian segments of  the कड़ी थी caused by a अचानक शिफ़्ट  in the movement of the Pacific Plate .
In 2003 , fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot theory , suggesting that hotspots are mobile , not fixed ,  और कि the 47 लाख साल बूढ़ा बेंड थी caused by a शिफ़्ट  in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's .
Ancient  hawaiians यहूद the पहला  to recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the volcanoes to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands .
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their constant battle with the sea was a  प्रमुख तत्व in हवाई mythology ,  embodied in Pele , the deity of volcanoes .
After the arrival of  europeans on the द्वीप , in 1880-1881 जेम्स ड्वाइट दाना निर्देशित  the first formal geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics , confirming the relationship long observed by the natives .
1912 marked the founding of the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory by  volcanologist थामस jaggar , initiating  continuous scientific observation of the islands .
In the 1970s , a mapping project was initiated to gain more information about the  जटिल भूविज्ञान of हवाई 's  seafloor .
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged , showing it to be wide and up to deep , and olivine and garnet -based studies have shown its magma  कक्ष is लगभग  .
In its at least 85 million years of activity the  हॉटस्पॉट रै उत्पादित  an estimated of rock .
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time , causing the amount of time each individual volcano is active to decrease , from 18 million years for  the 76 लाख साल बूढ़ा डेट्रॉयट seamount , to बस अंतर्गत 900,000 लिये the एक लाख  year-old Kohala ; on the other hand , eruptive volume has increased from per year to about .
Overall , this has caused a  ट्रेंड towards अधिक क्रियाशील लकिन quickly-silenced , closely spaced volcanoes—whereas ज्वालामुखी on the निकट पक्ष of the हॉटस्पॉट ओवरलैप प्रत्येक अन्य ( forming  such superstructures as Hawaii island and the ancient Maui Nui ) , the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart .

Petitions are  होने हस्ताक्षरित to  bring the show for a fifth season .
The  दिखाएँ airs on treehouse  TV Canada and Nick Jr. ( formerly Noggin ) .
Eddie and the Cruisers is a 1983 American film directed by Martin  डेविडसन साथ the पटकथा लिखा  by the director and Arlene Davidson , based on the novel by P. F. Kluge .
It was  marketed साथ the  tagline `` Rebel .

vanished  . ''
Osteonecrosis of the  जबड़ों ( onj ) is a कठोर  bone disease that affects the maxilla and the mandible .
Various forms of ONJ have been described over the last 160 years  , और a क्रमांक of कल्याणकारी have महरूम सुझाया  in the literature .
Osteonecrosis  of the जबड़े संबद्ध साथ bisphosphonate चिकित्सा , जरूरी by कुछ  cancer treatment regimens , has been identified and defined as a pathological entity since 2003 .
The possible risk from lower oral doses of  bisphosphonates  , taken by patients to prevent or treat osteoporosis , remains uncertain .
Various treatment options have been explored , however severe cases of ONJ  स्टिल आवश्यकता सर्जिकल हटाना of  the affected bone .
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible sites of  दंत संक्रमण हैं जरूरी  to help prevent the condition , especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered .
The Boston Red Sox  हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in बोस्टन  , Massachusetts , and a member of Major League Baseball 's American League Eastern Division .
Founded in as one of the American League 's eight charter franchises , the Red Sox 's home ballpark  रै महरूम fenway पार्क  since .
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner  , जॉन I. टेलर , around , following पिछला बोस्टन  teams that had been known as the `` Red Stockings `` .
They have played  in 11  World Series , winning 7 .
Boston was a dominant team in the new  लीग , defeating  the Pittsburgh Pirates in the first World Series in and winning four more championships by .
However , they then went into one of the  longest चैंपियनशिप droughts in बेसबॉल इतिहास , पुकारा by  some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the rival Yankees two years after their world championship in 1918 , an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in .
However , the team 's  इतिहास दौरान कि काल थी hardly एक of futility , लकिन थी बल्कि punctuated साथ कुछ of the सबसे यादगार पल  in World Series history , including Enos Slaughter 's `` mad dash `` in , the `` Impossible Dream `` of , Carlton Fisk 's home run in , and Bill Buckner 's error in .
Red Sox history has also been marked by the team 's intense rivalry with the New York Yankees , arguably the fiercest and  सबसे ऐतिहासिक in उत्तर अमरीकी पेशेवर  sports .
The Boston Red Sox are  स्वामित्व by fenway खेल समूह , जो  also own Liverpool Football Club of the Premier League in England .
The Red Sox are consistently one  of the शीर्ष एमएलबी टीमों in औसत सड़क उपस्थिति , जबकि the छोटी क्षमता  of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance .
From May 15 , 2003 to April 10 , 2013 , the Red Sox sold out every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular season )  लिये a प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल रिकार्ड कि lasted लगभग  a decade .
Mince pie  भर साथ mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture of chopped dried fruit , distilled spirits and spices , and  sometimes बीफ suet , बीफ , or venison  .
originally , mincemeat  always contained meat .
Many modern  व्यंजनों contain बीफ suet , हालांकि  vegetable shortening is sometimes used in its place .
Variants of mincemeat are found in Australia , Brittany , Canada , northern Europe , Ireland , South Africa , the United Kingdom  और the संयुक्त राज्य  .
In some  देशों the पद  mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat .
Diana , Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 August 1997 ) was the first wife of  चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , the ज्येष्ठ बेटे और वारिस apparent of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ  II .
She was well known for  उसके fund-raising कार्य  for international charities and as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century .
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981  थी आयोजित at st पॉल 's गिरजाघर और देखी by a वैश्विक  television audience of over 750 million .
While married she bore the titles Princess of  वेल्स  , Duchess of Cornwall , Duchess of Rothesay , Countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew .
The  विवाह उत्पादित दो बेटे , the  princes William and Harry , who became second and third in line to the British throne .
डायना थी born  into an aristocratic English family with royal ancestry .
She was the fourth child of John Spencer , 8th Earl Spencer and his  बीवी frances , बेटी of मौरिस  Roche , 4th Baron Fermoy .
She became a public figure with the  घोषणा of उसके  engagement .
She also received  मान्यता लिये उसके दान कार्य  and for her support of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines .
इससे 1989 , वो थी the अध्यक्ष  of the Great Ormond Street Hospital for children , in addition to dozens of other charities .
Diana remained the object of worldwide media scrutiny during and after  उसके विवाह , जिससे  ended in divorce on 28 August 1996 .
Media attention  और पब्लिक शोक  were considerable following her death in a car crash in Paris on 31 August 1997 .
अर्जेंटीना , officially the अर्जेंटाइन गणतंत्र  ( ) , is the second largest country in both South America and the Latin America region .
The country is a federation of  23 प्रांतों और the autonomous  city of Buenos Aires , its capital and largest city .
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by land area and  the largest among spanish-speaking राष्ट्र by भौगोलिक क्षेत्रफल of 2,780,400 km2  and is the fourth by population , with over 41 million people .
अर्जेंटीना is a founding सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , mercosur , the संघ  of South American Nations , the Organization of Ibero-American States , the World Bank Group and the World Trade Organization , and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies .
अर्जेंटीना is स्तिथ in दक्षिण अमेरिका  , bordered by Chile to the west and south , Bolivia and Paraguay to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast .
अर्जेंटीना दावा प्रभुता  over part of Antarctica , the Falkland Islands ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands .
Argentina is the successor state of the Viceroyalty of  the río de la प्लाटा  , an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire .
Argentina declared independence during the Argentine War of  स्वतंत्रता , जिससे थी  followed by the Argentine Civil Wars during most of the 19th century .
The country faced several military coups and political instability during the 20th century , along with  आवधिक आर्थिक संकट कि  continue to this day .
A recognized Southern  कोन शक्ति , और मध्य शक्ति , अर्जेंटीना is लैटिन अमेरिका 's  third-largest economy , with a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index .
Within Latin America , Argentina has the fifth highest nominal GDP per  capita और the उच्चतम in खरीदना  power terms .
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a ``  न्यास लिये भविष्य विकास due to इसके मार्केट आकार  , levels of foreign direct investment , and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '' , and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy .
Argentina is the Latin American country with the most Nobel Prizes , for a  कुल of पाँच , सब प्राप्त  during the second half of the twentieth century .
The country has three Nobel prizes  in विज्ञान और दो of  peace .
The most important aspects of science and technology in Argentina are concerned with medicine , nuclear  भौतिकी , जैवप्रौद्योगिकी , nanotechnology , स्पेस और प्रक्षेपास्त्र प्रौद्योगिकी  and several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities .
The  देश भी रै the आचमन प्रदर्शनी  center of science , technology , industry and art that are Latin America 's largest .
Hickory is a city in Catawba  काउंटी , साथ भाग भी in बुर्के काउंटी  and Caldwell County .
The city 's 2010 estimated  जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010  .
Hickory is  the  principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA , in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497 .
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ) , commonly abbreviated PET , PETE , or the obsolete PETP or  pet-p , is a thermoplastic पॉलिमर राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; पेय  , food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber .
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a source of confusion because this  पदार्थ , पालतु  , does not contain polyethylene .
Thus , the alternate form , poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) , is often used  in scholarly जर्नल्स  for the sake of accuracy and clarity .
Depending on its processing and thermal history , polyethylene  terephthalate may मौजूद दोनो as an amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) और as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर  .
The semicrystalline material might appear transparent ( particle size < 500 nm ) or opaque and white ( particle size up to a  few माइक्रोन ) depending on इसके क्रिस्टल ढांचा  and particle size .
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be  synthesized by the esterification प्रतिक्रिया between terephthalic  acid and ethylene glycol with water as a byproduct , or by transesterification reaction between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct .
Polymerization is through a  polycondensation प्रतिक्रिया of the monomers ( किया तत्काल  after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct .
The majority of the world 's PET  उत्पादन is लिये सिंथेटिक मछली ( in  excess of 60 % ) , with bottle production accounting for around 30 % of global demand .
In the context of textile applications , PET is referred to by its common name , `` polyester , '' whereas the  एक्रोनिम  `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging .
पॉलिएस्टर makes up परिचय 18 % of संसार पॉलिमर उत्पादन  and is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second , respectively .
PET consists of polymerized units of the monomer ethylene terephthalate ,  साथ repeating c10h8o4 इकाई  .
PET is  commonly recycled  , and has the number `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol .
Louisiana was admitted to the Union on April 30 , 1812 , and  elects सीनेटरों to वर्ग 2  and Class 3 .
Its current senators are  डेमोक्रेट मरियम landrieu और रिपब्लिकन  David Vitter .
Black pudding  , रक्त खीर or रक्त सॉसेज  is a type of sausage made by cooking blood or dried blood with a filler until it is thick enough to congeal when cooled .
The  डिश exists  in various cultures from Asia to Europe and the Americas .
Pig , cattle , sheep , duck , and goat blood can be used  depending on अलग देशों .
In Europe and the Americas , typical fillers  शामिल मांस , मोटे , suet , ब्रैड  , cornmeal , sweet potato , onion , chestnuts , barley , and oatmeal .
In Spain , Portugal and  एशिया , आलू  is often replaced by rice .
Stakeholder may  refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ) , a person , group , organization , member or system who affects  or can be प्रभावित by an संगठन 's क्रियाएँ
Stakeholder , an  एंटिटी कि can be  affected by the results of that in which they are said to be stakeholders , i.e. , that in which they have a stake .
प्रोजेक्ट शेयरधारक  , a person , group or organization with an interest in a project
Stakeholder theory ,  a सिद्धान्त कि identifies और मॉडल the समूह  which are stakeholders of a corporation or project
शेयरधारक विश्लेषण  , the process of identifying those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ) , a third  पार्टी जो temporarily holds  money or property while its owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9 , 1925 - September 1 ,  2003 ) थी an अमरीकी थिएटर और  film director .
Smight was born in Minneapolis , Minnesota and went to  स्कूल साथ भविष्य कर्ता  Peter Graves .
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner , Rabbit , Run , Loving Couples , Midway , Harper , Airport 1975 , Damnation Alley and the  एमी पुरस्कार -winning एडी , as खूब as अनेक एपीसोड of टेलीविज़न  series such as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour .
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th Cousin and  रचित the म्यूज़िक  for the film adaption of Roll of Thunder Hear My Cry .
Smight died from  कर्कट in लॉस एंजिल्स  , California .
Dmitri Ivanovich  mendeleev ( ; 8 फ़रवरी 1834 – 2 फ़रवरी  1907 O.S . 27 January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and inventor .
He formulated the Periodic Law , created  उसके अपना संस्करण of the आवधिक तालिका of तत्व , और  used it to correct the properties of some already discovered elements and also to predict the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
modesto ( स्पेनी लिये `` modest '' ) , officially the  City of Modesto , is the county seat and largest city of Stanislaus County , California , United States .
With a population of approximately 201,165 at  the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , modesto बाँधने  as the 18th largest city in the state of California .
The Modesto Census County Division , which includes the cities of Ceres and  riverbank , रै a जनसांख्यिकी of 312,842  as of 2010 .
Modesto is located in the central valley area of Northern California , 90 miles north of Fresno , 92 miles east of San Francisco , 68 miles south of the  राज्य पूंजी of sacramento , 66 मील वेस्ट of yosemite नेशनल पार्क , और 24 मील दक्षिण of स्टॉकटन  .
Modesto , a 29-time Tree  नगर यूएसए honoree , is घिरी  by rich farmland , lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production .
Led by milk , almonds , chickens , walnuts , and corn silage , the county grossed nearly $ 3.1  अरब in agricultural उत्पादन  in 2011 .
Modesto was immortalized in the 1973 George Lucas film  अमरीकी  Graffiti .
the पुरस्कार जीतना फिल्मी captured the स्पिरिट of `` cruising '' और  friendship on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia that included the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs .
Ron Howard , Harrison Ford and  रिचर्ड dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in the फिल्मी  .
The soundtrack was a  विशाल कामयाबी  .
Director George Lucas is a  native  of Modesto , graduating from Downey High School in 1962 .
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011 , which interviews 1,000 participants daily and asks individuals to assess their jobs ,  finances , शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य  , emotional state of mind and communities , ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed .
In December 2009 , Forbes ranked Modesto 48th out of 100 among ``  बेहतरीन bang-for-the-buck शहरों  '' .
In this ranking , Modesto ranked 8th  in आवास affordability  and travel time but also ranked 86th in job forecast growth and 99th in foreclosures .
Independence Day , commonly known as the Fourth of July , is a federal holiday in the United States commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on July 4 , 1776 , declaring independence from the  किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  .
Independence Day is commonly associated with fireworks , parades , barbecues , carnivals , fairs , picnics , concerts , baseball games , family reunions , and political speeches  और ceremonies , in जोड  to various other public and private events celebrating the history , government , and traditions of the United States .
Independence Day is  the नेशनल दिन  of the United States .
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an  सजीव or characterizes an एजेंट by लिंग  .
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ and female ♀ are derived from astrological symbols , denoting the classical planets Mars  और शुक्र , क्रमशः  .
These symbols have been in use since the Renaissance also denoting elements in  alchemy , specifically the धातुओं  iron and copper .
They were first used to denote the effective gender of  पौधे ( i.e . sex of व्यक्तिगत in a दिए crossbreed , चूंकि सबसे पौधे हैं hermaphroditic  ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751 .
a leasehold एस्टेट is an स्वामित्व of a अस्थाई सही to  hold land or property in which a lessee or a tenant holds rights of real property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord .
Although a tenant does hold rights  to रियल प्रॉपर्टी , a leasehold  estate is typically considered personal property .
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property  कार्यकाल जहाँ एक पार्टी खरीदता the सही to occupy जमीन  or a building for a given length of time .
As lease is a legal  एस्टेट  , leasehold estate can be bought and sold on the open market .
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright  और thereafter आयोजित लिये an अनिर्धार्य  length of time , and also differs from a tenancy where a property is let ( rented ) on a periodic basis such as weekly or monthly .
Until the end of the lease period  ( प्रायः measured in दशकों or सदियां ; a 99 साल पट्टे is काफी  common ) the leaseholder has the right to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner .
Terms of  the अनुबंध हैं contained in a  lease , which has elements of contract and property law intertwined .
the पद एस्टेट  for years may occasionally be used .
This refers to a leasehold estate  लिये कोई  specific period of time ( the word `` years '' is misleading ) .
An estate for years is not  automatically नवीनीकृत  .
Colloquially , `` lease '' and `` leasing `` are often a formalization of a longer , specific  काल as compared साथ a  `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will , terminable or renewable at the end of a short period .
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the World of the Pig  ओलिविया ) is a british-american children 's एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न  series produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books .
It is  देखी on उपनाम jr.  in the US , Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland , and Disney Junior in Latin America and Brazil ,  treehouse tv in कनाडा  .
The  दिखाएँ रै जीती a चांदी अभिभावक  ' Choice Award for its positive story lines and characters .
Location of Panama between  प्रशांत (  bottom ) and Caribbean ( top ) , with canal at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a ship canal in Panama that connects the Atlantic  समंदर ( via the caribbean समुद्र  ) to the Pacific Ocean .
The canal cuts across the Isthmus of  पनामा और is a  key conduit for international maritime trade .
There  हैं  locks at each end to lift ships up to Gatun Lake ( above sea-level ) .
gatun झील थी  created to reduce the amount of work required for the canal .
The current locks  हैं  wide .
A third , wider  लेन  of locks is being built .
France began work on the canal in 1881 , but had to stop because of engineering  समस्याएं और ऊँची मृत्यु  due to disease .
The United States ( US ) later took over the project and took a decade to complete the canal in 1914 , enabling ships to avoid the lengthy Cape  सींग रूट around the southernmost  tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan .
One of the largest and most difficult engineering projects ever undertaken , the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible  लिये जहाजों to सफर between the अटलांटिक और प्रशांत महासागर  in half the time previously required .
The shorter , faster , safer route to the US West Coast and to nations in  और साथ the प्रशांत समंदर अनुमत those स्थान to become  more integrated with the world economy .
During this time , ownership of the territory that is now the Panama  कनाल थी पहला कोलम्बियाई , तब फ्रेंच , और तब  American ; the United States completed the construction .
The  कनाल थी  taken over in 1999 by the Panamanian government , as long planned .
Annual traffic has risen from about 1,000 ships  जब the कनाल  opened in 1914 , to 14,702 vessels in 2008 , the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons .
By 2008 , more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the canal , many of them much larger than the original  planners could have  envisioned ; the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax .
the अमरीकी समाज of सिविल इंजीनियर्स  has named the Panama Canal one of the seven wonders of the modern world .
बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन ( अप्रैल 17 , 1790 ) थी  one of the Founding Fathers of the United States .
A noted polymath , Franklin was a leading author , printer , political theorist , politician , postmaster , scientist , musician , inventor , satirist ,  नागरिक activist , statesman  , and diplomat .
As a scientist , he was a major figure in the American Enlightenment and the history of physics for his  discoveries और theories regarding विद्युत  .
He invented the lightning rod , bifocals , the Franklin stove , a  carriage ओडोमीटर , और the  glass 'armonica ' .
He facilitated  अनेक नागरिक संगठन ,  including a fire department and a university .
Franklin earned the title of `` The First American '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning for  औपनिवेशिक एकता ; as an लेखक और प्रवक्ता in लंदन लिये अनेक colonies  , then as the first United States Ambassador to France , he exemplified the emerging American nation .
फ्रैंकलिन थी foundational in धमक the अमरीकी ethos as a विवाह of the व्यावहारिक मान  of thrift , hard work , education , community spirit , self-governing institutions , and opposition to authoritarianism both political and religious , with the scientific and tolerant values of the Enlightenment .
in the शब्द of इतिहासकार हेनरी स्टील commager , ``  In a Franklin could be merged the virtues of Puritanism without its defects , the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat . ''
To Walter Isaacson , this makes Franklin `` the most accomplished  अमरीकी of उसके आयु और the सबसे influential  in inventing the type of society America would become . ''
Franklin , always proud of his working class roots , became a successful newspaper editor and printer in Philadelphia , the leading  नगर in the colonies  .
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of whom published the  पेन्सिलवेनिया वृत्तान्त , a समाचारपत्र  that was known for its revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies .
He became wealthy publishing Poor  रिचर्ड 's almanack और the  Pennsylvania Gazette .
फ्रैंकलिन gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय renown  as a scientist for his famous experiments in electricity and for his many inventions , especially the lightning rod .
He played a major role in establishing the  विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया  and was elected the first president of the American Philosophical Society .
Franklin became a national  नायिका in अमेरिका जब he पथप्रदर्शन the प्रयत्न  to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act .
An accomplished diplomat , he was widely admired among the French as American minister to Paris and was a major figure in the  विकास of धनात्मक franco-american संबंध  .
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies , which  सक्रिय उसे to नियत up the पहला नेशनल  communications network .
He was active in community affairs ,  औपनिवेशिक और राज्य राजनीती  , as well as national and international affairs .
From 1785 to 1788 , he  परोसा  as governor of Pennsylvania .
Toward the end of his  जीवन , he freed उसके  slaves and became one of the most prominent abolitionists .
His colorful life and legacy of  वैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक उपलब्धि , और औकात  as one of America 's most influential Founding Fathers , have seen Franklin honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names of many towns , counties , educational institutions , namesakes , and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death , countless cultural references .
Criminal Minds is an American police  प्रक्रियात्मक टेलीविज़न  program that premiered September 22 , 2005 , on CBS .
The series follows a team of profilers from  the एफबीआई 's  Behavioral Analysis Unit ( BAU ) based in Quantico , Virginia .
The BAU  is भाग of the  FBI National Center for the Analysis of Violent Crime .
The show differs from many  प्रक्रियात्मक dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग  the criminal , rather than the crime itself .
The show is produced by The Mark Gordon Company in association with CBS Television Studios ( originally Paramount Network Television then CBS Paramount Network  टेलीविज़न ) और एबीसी studios ( originally touchstone  Television ) .
CBS announced in October 2009 that Legacy Interactive  होता develop a वीडियो खेल आधारित on  the show .
The game  होता आवश्यकता खिलाड़ी to जाँचें  crime scenes for clues to help solve murder mysteries .
The interactive puzzle game was released in 2012 , but did not feature any of the voices of the show 's cast , nor was  the डाल  involved with the project .
On  कूच 14 , 2012 , सीबीएस नवीनीकृत  Criminal Minds for an eighth season , which premiered on September 26 , 2012 .
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana ,  लिखा by  vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain .
The song was released as the first  सिंगल इससे the  group 's third and final studio album , In Utero , in 1993 .
It was one of two songs from the album mixed by Scott  litt in अनुक्रम to augment  the original production by producer Steve Albini .
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single for sale in the United States , `` Heart-Shaped Box '' received much American radio airplay , reaching number one on  the  Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज  of the single reached number five on the UK Singles Chart .
The song 's music video , directed by Anton Corbijn ,  garnered नाजुक plaudits  .
The orbital speed of a body , generally a planet , a natural satellite , an artificial satellite , or a multiple  स्टार , is the गति at जिससे it orbits around the barycenter of a प्रणाली  , usually around a more massive body .
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed , the average speed as it completes an orbit , or  instantaneous कक्षीय गति , the गति at  a particular point in its orbit .
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be  computed इससे the अलहदा to the सेंट्रल देह at कि स्थिति , और the विशिष्ट  orbital energy , which is independent of position : the kinetic energy is the total energy minus the potential energy .
भूरा राजमहल  Interior and Atrium
Brown Palace Hotel is the  second-oldest  operating hotel in Denver , Colorado and is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever built .
It is now operated by  कोरम होटल  and Resorts .
It was built in 1892 , one year later than the  ऑक्सफोर्ड होटल  .
It was named for its original owner , Henry C. Brown , and was designed with  इसके विषम triangular आकार by वास्तु फ़्रैंक  Edbrooke .
The hotel is located at 321 17th St , Denver , CO between 17th Street , Broadway and Tremont Street/Pl  in  downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza .
The main entrance door  is  on Tremont Street .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and is  फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया , उत्तर अमेरिका , यूरोपीय , और ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive  साथ a तन्त्र  DVD player ) .
वाणिज्यिक dvd फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a संयोजन  of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ) .
typically , the आंकड़ा रेट लिये dvd  movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s , and the bit rate is usually adaptive .
It was  पहला  available for retail around 1997 .
The DVD-Video  specification थी निर्मित by dvd फ़ोरम और can be प्राप्त  from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not publicly available , because every subscriber must sign  a non-disclosure अनुबंध  .
Certain information in the DVD  किताब is मालिकाना  and confidential .
The nautical mile ( symbol M , NM or nmi ) is a unit of length that is about one minute of arc of latitude  measured साथ कोई मध्याह्न , or परिचय एक मिनट of चाप  of longitude at the equator .
By international agreement it  रै महरूम नियत  at 1,852 metres exactly ( about 6,076 feet ) .
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for use in the International System of Units by the BIPM  ) प्रयुक्त विशेषकर by  navigators in the shipping and aviation industries , and also in polar exploration .
It is commonly used in international law and treaties ,  विशेषकर regarding the  limits of territorial waters .
It developed from the sea mile and  the सम्बन्धित  geographical mile .
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and air navigators worldwide because of its convenience  जब working साथ चार्ट .
Most nautical charts use the Mercator projection whose scale varies by about a factor of six from the equator to 80° latitude , so charts covering  विशाल क्षेत्रों can नहीं उपयोग a सिंगल रैखिक स्केल  .
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a minute of latitude on a chart , so a distance measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to nautical miles  using the चार्ट  's latitude scale .
Shippensburg is a borough in  कम्बरलैंड और फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in  the U.S. state of Pennsylvania .
Settled in 1730 ,  shippensburg झूठ in the कम्बरलैंड  Valley , 41 miles ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg , and is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area .
In 1900 , 3,228 people lived there ; in 1910 , 3,457 ; and in 1940 , 5,244  लोगों जिया  there .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  5,492 at the 2010 census .
Shippensburg was  incorporated as a बरो on  January 21 , 1819 .
In the past , there were furniture  कारखानों ,  engine and pump works , and other industrial works located within the town .
Shippensburg is also the home of The  beistle कम्पनी , the oldest और largest  manufacturer of decorations and party goods , which sells its distinctive honeycomb paper decorations worldwide .
It is also the location of Pague and  fegan , the oldest  continuously operated hardware store in Pennsylvania .
In May 2012 , Volvo Construction Equipment began a $ 100  लाख विस्तार प्रोजेक्ट to लाओ  its American headquarters to Shippensburg .
Shippensburg  is भी घर to shippensburg  University of Pennsylvania , one of 14 universities of the Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education .
Yearly the last full week of July , the Shippensburg Community Fair  is  held .
Begun in 1958 , the fair bills itself as  पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest  bi-county fair .
The fair includes agricultural exhibits ,  a शिल्प दिखाएँ , खाना विक्रेता , और  carnival rides amongst other things .
Every  गर्मियाँ on the पिछला शनिवार of अगस्त , shippensburg  holds the Corn Festival , an event that brings regional artisans and vendors to operate stands downtown .
The  शहर  is closed to traffic for at least 5 blocks for most of the day .
Average attendance at the festival is  अनुमानित at 60,000  - 70,000 each year .
Black hairy tongue ( BHT , also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate with black  or भूरा discoloration , giving a ब्लैक  and hairy appearance .
The  रूप may  be alarming , but it is a harmless condition .
Predisposing factors include smoking , xerostomia ( dry mouth ) , soft  आहार , ग़रीब मौखिक hygiene और निश्चित medications  .
प्रबन्धन is by improving  oral hygiene , especially scraping or brushing the tongue .
The IEEE 1394 interface is a  सीरियल बस इंटरफ़ेस मानक लिये  high-speed communications and isochronous real-time data transfer .
It was developed in the late 1980s and early 1990s  by ठहराना , जो  called it FireWire .
The 1394 interface is  comparable to usb , और प्रायः those दो technologies  are considered together , though USB has more market share .
Apple  पहला शामिल  FireWire in some of its 1999 models , and most Apple computers since the year 2000 have included FireWire ports , though , as of 2013 , nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ) .
The  इंटरफ़ेस is भी ज्ञात by  the brand i.LINK ( Sony ) , and Lynx ( Texas Instruments ) .
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many applications , because of  निम्नतर क्रियान्वयन  costs and a simplified , more adaptable cabling system .
The 1394  मानक भी defines  a backplane interface , though this is not as widely used .
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network Alliance ( HANA ) standard connection  इंटरफ़ेस लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) घटक संचार और कंट्रोल  .
FireWire is also available in wireless , fiber optic , and  समाक्षीय संस्करण using the  isochronous protocols .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray  vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3 , 1954  – August 27 , 1990 ) was an American guitarist , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
Often referred to by his  आद्याक्षर srv , vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding  member and leader of Double Trouble .
Together with drummer Chris Layton and  bassist टॉमी शैनन  , they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s .
With a career  spanning सात सालो , vaughan और दोगुना  Trouble consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold .
He was born and raised in Dallas , Texas , and for a short period of time  जिया in ग्राहम , टेक्सास  .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan , Vaughan started playing the guitar at age seven and formed several bands  कि occasionally performed in  local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further  pursue उसके musical करियर , joining समूह  such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed Triple Threat Revue , a band that eventually  विकसित into दोगुना ट्रबल और regularly performed  around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at  the montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड , catching  the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie  पूछा vaughan to खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो एल्बम let  's Dance , while Browne offered the band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album .
In March 1983 , Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran record producer  जॉन हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम , टेक्सास बाढ़  in June of that year .
After successful touring , the group released the albums  , could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984  ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ) , the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had progressed successfully , Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta , Georgia to give up a cocaine  और दारू आदत और लौटे to touring  with the band .
In June 1989 , In Step was  released और अर्जित उन्हें  a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance .
On August 27 , 1990 , Vaughan was killed in a helicopter crash following a  प्रदर्शन in ईस्ट ट्रॉय , विस्कॉन्सिन  .
vaughan 's uniquely  eclectic yet intense style was derived from a variety of musical genres .
He was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King , Freddie King , Otis Rush , and Muddy  waters , और चट्टान guitarists  such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar playing  reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और  pentatonic scales .
He has received wide critical recognition  लिये उसके गिटार playing , रैंकिंग  at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame  in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in ऑस्टिन  's Auditorium Shores park .
स्टीवी रे vaughan is  widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to come from the state of Texas .
GigE  redirects  here .
For the  कैमरा प्रोटोकॉल  , see GigE vision .
In computer networking , gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or 1 GigE ) is a term describing  विभिन्न technologies लिये transmitting ईथरनेट फ्रेम्स  at a rate of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ) , as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard .
It came into use beginning in 1999 , gradually supplanting Fast Ethernet in wired local networks , where it  performed considerably  faster .
The cables and equipment are very similar to previous standards and were very common and  किफायती by 2010  .
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through  hubs हैं अनुमत by the specification , लकिन full-duplex  usage with switches is much more common .

The main components of a  stamp:
1 .  चित्र
2 .  perforations
3 .  denomination
4 .  देश  name
A  postage स्टैम्प is a छोटी टुकड़ा  of paper that is purchased and displayed on an item of mail as evidence of payment of postage .
Typically , stamps are made from special paper , with a national designation and  denomination ( दाम ) on the फेस , और a गम चिपकने  on the reverse side .
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other authorized vendor and are used to pay for the costs involved in moving mail as well as  अन्य कारोबार necessities ऐसे as बीमे और पंजीकरण  .
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a small rectangle of varying proportions , though  त्रिकोण or अन्य आकार हैं occasionally  used .
The stamp is affixed to an envelope  or अन्य डाक कवर ( i.e. , पैकेट , बक्सा ,  mailing cylinder ) that the customer wishes to send .
The item is then processed by the postal system , where a postmark , sometimes known as a  रद्दीकरण चिह्नित , is प्रायः लागू over the स्टैम्प  and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used , which prevents its reuse .
The postmark indicates the date and point  of  origin of the mailing .
The mailed item is then delivered to the address that the  ग्राहक  has applied to the envelope or cover .
postage stamps  have facilitated the delivery of mail since the 1840s .
Before this time , ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ) , usually made from wood or cork  , यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त to फ़्रैंक the मेल और confirm  the payment of postage .
The first adhesive postage stamp , commonly referred to as  the पैनी ब्लैक , थी जारी in the संयुक्त किंगडम  in 1840 .
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system in the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland , which in the early 19th  सदी थी in अस्तव्यस्तता  and rife with corruption .
There are varying accounts of the inventor or  आविष्कारक of the स्टैम्प  .
Before the introduction of postage stamps , mail in the UK was paid  लिये by the प्राप्तकर्ता , a प्रणाली कि थी संबद्ध साथ an irresolvable प्रॉब्लम  : the costs of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal service when recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items , and senders had no incentive to restrict the number , size , or weight of items sent , whether or not they would ultimately be paid for .
The  postage स्टैम्प resolved इस समस्या in a सरल और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner , साथ the अतिरिक्त  benefit of room for an element of beauty to be introduced .
Later related  आविष्कारों शामिल डाक स्टेशनरी ऐसे as prepaid-postage लिफाफे , पोस्ट ताश , lettercards  , aerogrammes and wrappers , postage meters , and , more recently , specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing .
The postage stamp afforded  convenience लिये दोनो the मेलर और डाक  officials , more efficiently recovered costs for the postal service , and ultimately resulted in a better , faster postal system .
साथ the conveniences stamps  offered , their use resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries .
Postage stamps during this era were the most popular way of paying for mail , but by the end of the  20th सदी यहूद rapidly होने आत by the उपयोग of metered postage  and bulk mailing by businesses . )
The same result with  आदर to संचार by निजी पार्टियों occurred over the पिछला दशक of the 20th  century and the first decade of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone communications and the development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had .
As postage stamps with  उनके engraved  imagery began to appear on a widespread basis , historians and collectors began to take notice .
The study of postage stamps and their  उपयोग is referred to as  philately .
Stamp collecting can be both a hobby and a form of historical study and reference , as government-issued postage stamps and their  mailing प्रणालियों have सदा महरूम  involved with the history of nations .
The University of  अलबामा at बर्मिंघम ( uab ) is a पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों  in Birmingham in the U.S. state of Alabama .
Developing from an extension center established in  1936 , the संस्था became an autonomous  institution in 1969 and is today one of three institutions in the University of Alabama System .
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions leading to bachelor 's , master 's , doctoral , and professional degrees in the social and behavioral sciences , the liberal arts , business , education , engineering , and  health-related फ़ील्ड ऐसे as आयुर्विज्ञान , dentistry , optometry , नर्सिंग , और पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य  .
The school is highly renowned for its  चिकित्सा शोध और प्राकृतिक  sciences programs .
The UAB Health System , one of the largest academic medical  centers in the संयुक्त राज्य  , is affiliated with the university .
UAB Hospital sponsors residency programs in various medical  specialties , सहित  internal medicine , neurology , surgery , radiology , and anesthesiology .
UAB Hospital is the only ACS verified Level I trauma  बीच in अलबामा , as रेटेड by the अमरीकी  College of Surgeons Trauma Program .
UAB is the state 's largest employer , with more than 18,000 faculty and  स्टाफ और over 53,000 कार्य at  the university and in the health system .
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area  और 1 in 33 कार्य in the राज्य  of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB .
The university 's  overall सालाना आर्थिक प्रभाव थी अनुमानित to  be $ 4.6 billion in 2010 .
In the fall of 2012 , the University of Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students from more than  110 देशों  , including 1,605 freshmen .
There are plans to commence with an ``  आक्रामक '' विकास in  enrollment at UAB .
The  वर्तमान uab अध्यक्ष  is Dr. Ray L. Watts .
Tofu , also called bean  दही , is a खाना बना by coagulating  soy juice and then pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks .
It is a component in many  ईस्ट एशियाई और southeast  Asian cuisines .
There are many different varieties of tofu , including fresh tofu and  टोफू कि रै महरूम processed  in some way .
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be used in  savory और मीठी  dishes .
It is often seasoned  or marinated  to suit the dish .
Tofu  originated in प्राचीन  China some 2,000 years ago .
चाइनीज लेजेंड ascribes  its invention to prince Liu An ( Chinese : 劉安 Liú Ān , 179–122 BC ) .
Tofu and its production technique  यहूद introduced into कोरियाई और  then Japan during the Nara period .
It  स्प्रेड into अन्य  parts of East Asia as well .
This spread likely coincided with the spread of Buddhism because it is an important source of  प्रोटीन in  the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism .
Li Shizhen in the  मिंग राजवंश वर्णित  a method of making tofu in Bencao Gangmu .
Tofu has a low calorie  गिनती , अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts  of protein , and little fat .
It is high in iron and depending on  the coagulant प्रयुक्त in निर्माण ,  may also be high in calcium and/or magnesium .
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee , known for being the one-time pet of American recording artist Michael  जैक्सन , जो खरीदा the primate इससे a टेक्सास  research facility in the early 1980s .
The animal was a  बारंबार सफर साथी to the सिंगर , जिनकी  attachment to the animal led to media mockery and , among other factors , to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric .
दौरान the  Bad World Tour , for example , Jackson brought Bubbles with him to Japan , where they both drank tea with the mayor of Osaka .
Bubbles was initially kept at the Jackson family 's home in  encino , लॉस एंजिल्स , लकिन थी स्थानांतरित to neverland  Ranch in 1988 .
There , he slept in a crib in Jackson 's  बेडरूम , प्रयुक्त the सिंगर 's प्रसाधन , और  ate candy in the Neverland movie theater .
In 2003 the public learned that , like all captive chimpanzees ,  बुलबुले था matured into a विशाल और आक्रामक वयस्क chimp  unsuitable as a companion animal .
He was sent to a California animal trainer , where  he थी reported to have  attempted suicide .
When the trainer shut down his operation in 2004 , Bubbles was moved to  the बीच लिये ग्रेट apes , a अभयारण्य in wauchula  , Florida , where he has lived since 2005 .
चिंतन हैं an अंग्रेज़ी  rock band from Teignmouth , Devon , which formed in 1994 .
The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals , lead guitar , piano , keyboards , keytar ) , Christopher Wolstenholme ( bass , vocals , keyboards , rhythm guitar , harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums ,  percussion , synthesisers  , sampling ) .
Since the release of their 2006 album Black Holes and  खुलासे , keyboardist और percussionist  Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band .
Muse are known for their energetic and extravagant live performances and their fusion of many music genres , including space rock ,  प्रगतिशील चट्टान , वैकल्पिक  rock , heavy metal , classical music and electronica .
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ) , Origin of Symmetry (  2001 ) , absolution ( 2003 ) , ब्लैक छेद और  Revelations ( 2006 ) , The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd Law ( 2012 ) .
They have also issued three live albums , Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ) , which is also a compilation of B-sides , Absolution Tour ( 2005 ) , and HAARP ( 2008 ) , which documents the band 's performances at  वेम्बली  Stadium in 2007 .
Black Holes and Revelations earned the band a Mercury Prize nomination and a third place finish in the NME Albums of  the साल सूची लिये 2006  .
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history , including five MTV Europe Music Awards , six Q Awards , eight NME Awards ,  दो ब्रिट पुरस्कार —winning `` बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों सजीव अधिनियम '' twice  , an MTV Video Music Award , four Kerrang !
Awards and an American Music  पुरस्कार  .
They were also nominated for five Grammy  पुरस्कार , of जिससे वे जीती  Best Rock Album , for their fifth studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ) .
Muse  have बेची over 15  million albums worldwide .
Bloemfontein  ( , ; डच लिये `` फव्वारा of पुष्प '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the फ़्री राज्य प्रांत of दक्षिण  Africa ; and , as the judicial capital of the nation , one of South Africa 's three national capitals – the other two being Cape Town , the legislative capital , and Pretoria , the administrative capital .
Bloemfontein is popularly and  poetically ज्ञात as ``  the city of roses `` , owing to the abundance of these flowers and the annual rose festival held there .
The city 's Sesotho name is Mangaung , meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it  रै महरूम शामिल in the mangaung लोकल नगरपालिका  since 2000 .
Bloemfontein is  situated on शुष्क घासभूमि  at , at an altitude of above sea level .
The city is home to 369,568 residents , while the Mangaung Local  नगरपालिका  has a population of 645,455 .

The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the  significance of जीवन or अस्तित्व  in general .
It can also be expressed in  अलग फ़ॉर्म , ऐसे as ``  Why are we here ? `` , `` What is life all about ? `` , and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
It has  महरूम the विषय of much philosophical  , scientific , and theological speculation throughout history .
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from many different  सांस्कृतिक और वैचारिक  backgrounds .
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence ,  सोशल ties , चेतना , और सुख , और सीमायें on अनेक अन्य मुद्दे , ऐसे as सांकेतिक  meaning , ontology , value , purpose , ethics , good and evil , free will , the existence of one or multiple Gods , conceptions of God , the soul , and the afterlife .
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related empirical facts about the universe ,  exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट और पैरामीटर्स concerning  the 'how ' of life .
Science also studies and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of  well-being और a सम्बन्धित धारणा  of morality .
An alternative , humanistic approach poses the question `` What is  the अर्थ  of my life ? ''
The value of the question pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the  उपलब्धि of परम वास्तविकता , or a अहसास of oneness , or भी  a feeling of sacredness .
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also  provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin , stewie  Griffin , Brian Griffin , and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features five main voice  अभिनेताओं , और numerous नियमित डाल और पुनरावर्ती  guest stars .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex Borstein  , सेठ ग्रीन , mila kunis ( जो replaced  Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now , the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West , John G. Brennan , Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly , and repeat guest stars include Phyllis  diller , चार्ल्स  Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast members provide voices for  अनेक वर्ण  .
The voice actors , in portraying the various character personalities on the show ,  चित्रण प्रेरणा इससे  celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy characters  have महरूम निभाई by अधिक than एक कर्ता  , after members of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and  an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड  Television Production , though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series .

`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : `` The Princess on the Pea '' ) is a literary fairy tale by  hans ईसाई andersen परिचय a यंग  woman whose royal identity is established by a test of her physical sensitivity .
The tale was first published  साथ तीन अन्य by andersen in an inexpensive  booklet on 8 May 1835 in Copenhagen by C.A . Reitzel .
andersen था सुना the स्टोरी as a चाइल्ड , और it संभावित  has its source in folk material , possibly originating from Sweden as it is unknown in the Danish oral tradition .
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen  's अन्य किस्से of 1835 यहूद खूब प्राप्त  by Danish critics , who disliked their casual , chatty style , and their lack of morals .
In 1959 `` The Princess and the Pea '' was adapted to the musical stage in a production  पुकारा एकबार upon a गद्दा  starring Carol Burnett .
German Americans ( ) are  नागरिकों of the संयुक्त राज्य जो यहूद either born in  Germany or are of German ancestry .
They  comprise परिचय 50 लाख लोगों , बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry  group ahead of Irish Americans , African Americans and English Americans .
They  comprise परिचय 1/3 of  the German diaspora all over the world .
None  of the जर्मनी राज्य  had New World colonies .
Not until the 1670s did  the पहला significant समूह of जर्मनी आप्रवासियों  arrive in the British colonies , settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania .
Immigration continued in very  विशाल संख्याएँ  during the 19th century , with some eight million arrivals from Germany .
वे यहूद खींचा by the आकर्षण of जमीन और  religious freedom , and pushed out of Europe by shortages of land and religious or political oppression .
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom ,  अन्य लिये आर्थिक अवसर वृहद than  those in Europe , and others simply for the chance to start fresh in the New World .
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought out the most productive land , where their  intensive खेती तकनीकों  would pay off .
बाद 1840 , अनेक आए to शहरों  , where `` Germania '' —German-speaking districts—soon emerged .
German Americans established the first  kindergartens in the संयुक्त राज्य , introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ परंपरा , और originated  popular American foods such as hot dogs and hamburgers .
German American celebrations are held  throughout the देश , एक of the सबसे well-known  being the German-American Steuben Parade in New York City , held every third Saturday in September .
There are also major annual events in Chicago , Cincinnati , Milwaukee , Pittsburgh ,  st. लुई  and other cities .
Like many other immigrants that came to the United States  , an overwhelming क्रमांक  of people of German or partial German descent have essentially become Americanized .
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a  ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान 's आधारभूत  purposes and guiding principles .
It states in general terms , and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of , the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's  अर्थ और कया वे hoped the संविधान होता achieve  as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that vast population concerning the individual  अधिकारों और समता among सब लोगों ; इस can be देखी सबसे broadly in  the divide between republicanism and social democracy .
The history of the Internet began  साथ the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर  in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California  , लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ) , बाद the दूसरी टुकड़ा of  network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I  at npl in the uk , cyclades , मेरिट संजाल  , Tymnet , and Telenet , were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking ,  in जिससे अनेक पृथक  networks could be joined together into a network of networks .
In 1982 , the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized , and consequently , the concept of a world-wide network of  interconnected tcp/ip संजाल , पुकारा the  Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in  1981 जब the नेशनल विज्ञान न्यास ( nsf ) विकसित the कंप्यूटर विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet )  and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations .
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began  to emerge in the लेट 1980s  and early 1990s .
The ARPANET was  decommissioned in  1990 .
The Internet was  commercialized in 1995 जब nsfnet  was decommissioned , removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce , including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail , instant  messaging , आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स ''  , two-way interactive video calls , and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and online shopping sites .
The research and education  जातियाँ continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत  networks such as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted  at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग  at 1-Gbit/s , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks  in the साल 1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated सूचना  by 2007 .
Today  the अंतरजाल continues to grow  , driven by ever greater amounts of online information , commerce , entertainment , and social networking .
Southwest Airlines Co. ( ) is a major U.S.  एयरलाइन और the संसार 's largest  low-cost carrier , headquartered in Dallas , Texas .
It  थी स्थापित in  1967 and adopted its current name in 1971 .
the एयरलाइन रै अधिक than 46,000 कर्मचारी  and operates more than 3,400 flights per day .
as  of June 5 , 2011 , it carries the most domestic passengers of any U.S. airline .
As of April 2013 , Southwest Airlines has  अनुसूचित सेवा to 84 गंतव्यों  in 41 states and Puerto Rico .
Southwest Airlines has solely operated Boeing 737s  , मगर लिये a few सालो  in the 1970s and 1980s , when it operated Boeing 727s .
as of अगस्त 2012 , दक्षिणपश्चिम is the largest ऑपरेटर of  the 737 worldwide with over 550 in service , each operating an average of six flights per day .
In May 2011 , the  एयरलाइन acquired airtran एयरवेज़ ,  with integration of the carriers expected to be complete by 2014 .
On March 1 , 2012 , the company was issued a  सिंगल ऑपरेटिंग प्रमाणपत्र  , technically becoming one airline .
Rolling  चट्टान is a 4.6  % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by the Latrobe Brewing Company .
Although founded as  a लोकल बियर in पश्चिमी पेन्सिलवेनिया ,  it was marketed aggressively and eventually became a national product .
The brand was sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis , Missouri , in mid 2006 , which  transferred brewing  operations to New Jersey .
Benedict XVI ( , , ; born Joseph Aloisius Ratzinger on 16  अप्रैल 1927 ) is पोप  emeritus of the Catholic Church .
He  परोसा as पोप  from 2005 to 2013 .
In that position , he was both the leader of the Catholic Church and  sovereign of the वेटिकन नगर  State .
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave ,  मनाये उसके papal उद्घाटन द्रव्यमान on 24 अप्रैल 2005 , और took कब्ज़ा  of his cathedral , the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran , on 7 May 2005 .
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native Bavaria , Ratzinger established himself as a highly regarded university theologian by the  लेट 1950s और थी नियुक्त a पूरा  professor in 1958 .
After a long career as an academic , serving as a professor of theology at several German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg , where he served as Vice President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of Munich and Freising and  कार्डिनल by पोप पॉल vi in 1977 , an असामान्य प्रमोशन लिये किसी साथ  little pastoral experience .
In 1981 , he settled in Rome when he became Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith , one of  the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण dicasteries of the रोमन  Curia .
From 2002 until his election as pope , he was also Dean of the College of Cardinals , and as such  , the प्राइमस इंटर pares  among the cardinals .
Prior to becoming pope , he was `` a major figure on the Vatican stage for a  क्वार्टर of a सदी '' as `` एक of the सबसे आदरणीय , influential और विवादास्पद सदस्यों of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स  '' ; he had an influence `` second to none when it came to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants .
He was originally a  उदार theologian  , but adopted conservative views after 1968 .
His prolific  कृतियाँ बचाव  traditional Catholic doctrine and values .
During his papacy , Benedict XVI advocated a return to fundamental Christian values to counter the increased  secularisation of अनेक पश्चिमी देशों  .
He views relativism 's denial of  उद्देश्य सच्चाई , और the denial of moral सच्चाई  in particular , as the central problem of the 21st century .
He taught the importance of both the Catholic Church and an understanding of  परमेश्वर 's redemptive  love .
Pope  बेनेडिक्ट भी revived a क्रमांक of परंपराओं  including elevating the Tridentine Mass to a more prominent position .
He renewed the  संबंध between the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और आर्ट , देखने the उपयोग of सौंदर्य as a पाथ  to the sacred , promoted the use of Latin , and reintroduced traditional papal garments , for which reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics '' .
He has been  वर्णित as `` the प्रमुख  intellectual force in the Church '' since the mid-1980s .
Several of Pope Benedict 's  विद्यार्थी इससे उसके अकादमिक  career are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him , notably Christoph Schönborn .
On 11 February 2013 , Pope Benedict announced his resignation in a speech in Latin before the cardinals , citing a ``  कमी of शक्ति of दिमाग  and body '' due to his advanced age .
His  इस्तीफा became प्रभावी  on 28 February 2013 .
He is the first pope to resign since Pope Gregory  बारहवीं in 1415 , और the  first to do so on his own initiative since Pope Celestine V in 1294 .
as पोप emeritus , बेनेडिक्ट retains the  style of His Holiness , and the title of Pope , and will continue to dress in the papal colour of white .
He was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13 March 2013 , and he  स्थानांतरित into the newly संवर मेटर ecclesiae मठ  for his retirement on 2 May 2013..
