Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for creating or enhancing the  भ्रम of गहराई in an चित्र by अर्थात् of stereopsis लिये binocular  vision .
The word stereoscopy derives from the Greek ``  στερεός '' ( stereos ) , `` कड़ , ठोस ''  + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ) , `` to look '' , `` to see '' .
Most stereoscopic methods present two offset images separately to  the बाएँ और  right eye of the viewer .
These two-dimensional images are then combined in the brain to  दे the बोध  of 3D depth .
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that display an image in three full dimensions , allowing the observer to increase  सूचना परिचय the 3-dimensional वस्तुएँ होने प्रदर्शित by सिर  and eye movements .
John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S . October 19 , 1735 ) – July 4 ,  1826 ) थी the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States ( 1797–1801 ) , having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States .
An American Founding  पिता , he थी a statesman , राजनयिक  , and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain .
Well educated , he was an Enlightenment  राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically  about his often seminal ideas , both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to prominence in the early stages of the  अमरीकी  Revolution .
A lawyer and public figure in Boston , as a delegate from Massachusetts to the  महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस , he निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका  in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas  जेफरसन in drafting the घोषणा  of Independence in 1776 , and was its primary advocate in the Congress .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe , he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with  ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और थी जिम्मेदार लिये obtaining vital सरकारी  loans from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and historian , Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780 , which together with his  पहले विचार on सरकारी , बहकावे अमरीकी राजनैतिक  thought .
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775 , he nominated George  वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief  , and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States .
Adams ' revolutionary  श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन  's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he  encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian republicans  , as well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams signed the controversial  एलियन और राजद्रोह अधिनियमों , और निर्मित up the फौज और  navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France , 1798–1800 .
The major  accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी  was his peaceful resolution of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition .
In 1800 ,  एडम्स थी पराजित  for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts .
he बाद  resumed his friendship with Jefferson .
He and his wife ,  अबीगैल एडम्स , संस्थापित an संपन्नता  family line of politicians , diplomats , and historians now referred to as the Adams political family .
Adams was the father of John Quincy Adams , the  छठे अध्यक्ष  of the United States .
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern times , though his contributions were not initially as  मनाये as those of अन्य  Founders .
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the building that eventually became known  as  the White House .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States  करेंसी .
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ) , Alexander Hamilton , is currently featured on the obverse of the bill , while the U.S.  राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the  reverse .
( Hamilton is one  of दो non-presidents  featured on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other is  बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन  , on the $ 100 bill .
Hamilton is one of only four  लोगों प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी  ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the continental United States , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender  ) ; जार्ज meade , स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष  Note ) ; and Robert Morris , England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In addition , Kamehameha I , appears on the 2008  हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर .  )
सब $ 10 बिल्स जारी  today are Federal Reserve Notes .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the  औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण  is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
Approximately 6 %  of सब us banknotes  printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are delivered  by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको  in yellow straps .
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John  trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट  of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left (  the $ 100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of वुडरो विल्सन facing  to the left , but was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
A rider on a  यामाहा waverunner xl  performing a high-speed turn .
A jetboat is a boat propelled by a  जेट of जल ejected इससे the  back of the craft .
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or behind the boat , a  jetboat draws the जल इससे अंतर्गत the नाव  into a pump inside the boat , then expels it through a nozzle at the stern .
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who  विकसित a waterjet in 1954 ) लिये आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और उथले नदियाँ of  New Zealand , specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters .
Previous attempts at  waterjet नोदन था बहुत छोटी lifetimes , generally  due to the inefficient design of the units and the fact that they offered few advantages over conventional propellers .
Unlike these previous waterjet  developments , ऐसे as campini 's और the hanley hydrojet , हैमिल्टन था a विशिष्ट need लिये a नोदन  system to operate in very-shallow water , and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution .
From  इस , the लोकप्रियता  of the jet unit and jetboat increased rapidly .
through further developments , it थी मिला the waterjet offered अनेक अन्य लाभ over propellers लिये a चौड़ी दायरा  of vessel types , and as such , waterjets are used widely today for many high-speed vessels , including passenger ferries , rescue craft , patrol boats and offshore supply vessels .
Jetboats are highly maneuverable ,  और अनेक can , इससे  full speed , be reversed and brought to a stop within little more than their own length , in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop '' .
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is cut , the steering is turned sharply and the throttle  खोली again , causing the नाव  to spin quickly around with a large spray of water .
There is no engineering limit to the size of jetboats , though the validity of  उनके उपयोग depends  a lot on the type of application .
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at low speeds , up to about , but as boat speed  increases परे इस , the अतिरिक्त हल प्रतिरोध  generated by struts , rudders , shafts ( etc . ) means waterjets are more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ) .
Also , in situations with very large propellers  turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as tug नौकाएँ ) , the समतुल्य  size waterjet would be too big to be practical .
For these reasons , the vast majority of waterjet units are installed in high-speed vessels and in particular situations where shallow draught ,  maneuverability , और  load flexibility are main concerns .
The biggest jet-driven vessels are found in military use or the  high-speed passenger/car  ferry industry .
South Africa 's s ( approximately long ) are the  biggest jet-propelled  vessels so far .
Even these German-built  बरतन हैं सक्षम of  performing `` crash stops '' .
Uveitis is broadly  पारिभाषित as  inflammation of the uvea .
The uvea consists of the middle , pigmented , vascular  structures of the नजर और शामिल the  iris , ciliary body , and choroid .
Uveitis  requires an तात्कालिक referral और thorough  examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist along with urgent treatment to control the inflammation .

The Shining is a 1980 psychological horror film produced and directed by Stanley Kubrick , co-written with novelist Diane Johnson , and starring Jack Nicholson ,  शेली duvall , scatman crothers ,  and Danny Lloyd .
the फिल्मी is आधारित  on the Stephen King novel The Shining .
A writer , Jack Torrance , takes a job as an off-season  कार्यवाहक at an पृथक  hotel .
His young son possesses  मानसिक abilities और is समर्थ to देखिए बाते  from the past and future , such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel .
Soon after settling in , the family is trapped in the hotel  by a snowstorm , और जोकर धीरे becomes बहकावे by a अलौकिक  presence ; he descends into madness and attempts to murder his wife and son .
Unlike previous Kubrick films , which developed an audience gradually by building on word-of-mouth , The Shining was released as a mass-market film , opening at first in just two cities on  मेमोरियल दिन , तब देशभर a माह  later .
Although initial response to  the फिल्मी थी मिश्रित , बाद नाजुक  assessment was more favorable and it is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre .
Film director Martin Scorsese , writing in The  रोज़ जानवर , क्रमित it as एक of the 11  scariest horror movies of all time .
Film critics , film students , and Kubrick 's producer , Jan  harlan , have remarked on the विशाल influence the फिल्मी रै  had on popular culture .
The initial European release of The Shining was 25 minutes shorter than the American version , achieved by removing most  of the दृश्यों लेने प्लेस बाहर the  environs of the hotel .
आँगन  Cola Bottle
Patio Diet Cola was a brand of  आहार सोडा introduced  by Pepsi in 1963 .
It  थी निर्मित in जवाब to  Diet Rite Cola , which was the first diet cola on the market .
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake was Patio Diet Cola  's प्रवक्ता  .
In 1964 , Patio released  नारंगी , अंगूर  , and root beer flavors .
This flavor line was not meant to compete with brands like  नारंगी crush , लकिन बल्कि  fill out the line .
Patio sodas  यहूद उपलब्धियाँ  in the cold-bottle market : grocery and mom-and-pop stores .
Advertising for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the time , bottlers were regionally franchised , and  सम्बन्धित विज्ञापन थी necessarily  local .
In 1964 , Patio diet cola  became  Diet Pepsi .
The newly branded diet soda was  advertised  alongside Pepsi with the tagline `` Pepsi either way '' , which replaced the slogan `` Dances with flavor '' .
The short life span of Patio Diet cola makes it  a ग्रेट जोड लिये बोतल collectors  .
Most of the remaining  आँगन लकीर of जायका यहूद phased आउट  by the early 1970s , while a few survived until the mid 70s
Infrastructure is basic physical and organizational structures needed for the operation of a  समाज or एंटरप्राइज़ , or the सेवाएं और सुविधाएं जरुरी लिये  an economy to function .
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural elements that  provide फ्रेमवर्क supporting an संपूर्ण ढांचा  of development .
it is an महत्वपूर्ण  term for judging a country or region 's development .
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a society , such as roads , bridges , water supply , sewers , electrical grids , telecommunications , and so forth  , और can be पारिभाषित as `` the शारीरिक components of interrelated प्रणालियों  providing commodities and services essential to enable , sustain , or enhance societal living conditions . ''
Viewed functionally , infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and services , and also the distribution of finished products to markets , as well as basic social  सेवाएं ऐसे as स्कूलों और अस्पताल ; लिये उदाहरण , सड़कें enable the हस्तांतरण  of raw materials to a factory .
In  सैन्य parlance , the पद refers to the  buildings and permanent installations necessary for the support , redeployment , and operation of military forces .
To make it  सरल , अवसंरचना  is anything that is needed everyday , an everyday item .
A graphical  प्रतिनिधित्व  of the ideal human karyotype
mitochondrial  DNA .
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences both within and  among populations .
वहीँ may be अनेक विसंगतियाँ  of any given gene in the human population ( genes ) , leading to polymorphism .
Many genes  हैं नहीं बहुरूपी , अर्थ कि तभी a सिंगल  allele is present in the population : the gene is then said to be fixed .
No two humans are genetically  एकसमान  .
Even monozygotic twins , who develop from one zygote , have infrequent genetic differences due to mutations  occurring दौरान विकास और जीन  copy number variation .
Differences between individuals , even closely related  individuals , हैं the कुंजी to तकनीकों  such as genetic fingerprinting .
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different human populations , with populations that are more geographically  और ancestrally रिमोट tending  to differ more .
Causes of differences between individuals  शामिल the एक्सचेंज of जीनों दौरान meiosis  and various mutational events .
There are at least two  कारण क्यों जेनेटिक  variation exists between populations .
प्राकृतिक चयन may confer an  adaptive advantage to individuals in a specific environment if an allele provides a competitive advantage .
Alleles under selection are likely to occur only in  those भौगोलिक regions  where they confer an advantage .
The second main cause of genetic  विभिन्नता is due to the ऊँची  degree of neutrality of most mutations .
Most  mutations do नहीं  appear to have any selective effect one way or the other on the organism .
The main cause is genetic drift , this is the effect of random  परिवर्तन in the जीन पूल  .
In humans , founder effect and past  छोटी जनसांख्यिकी आकार ( increasing the likelihood of जेनेटिक  drift ) may have had an important influence in neutral differences between populations .
the सिद्धान्त कि इंसानो recently  migrated out of Africa supports this .
the पढ़ाई of इंसान जेनेटिक विभिन्नता  has both evolutionary significance and medical applications .
It can help scientists  समझे प्राचीन  human population migrations as well as how different human groups are biologically related to one another .
For medicine , study of human genetic variation may be important  क्युकी कुछ disease-causing alleles occur अधिक प्रायः in  people from specific geographic regions .
New findings show that each human  रै on औसत 60 नई mutations compared  to their parents .
Apart from mutations , many genes that may have aided humans  in प्राचीन टाइम्स प्लेग इंसानो  today .
For example , it is suspected that genes that  allow इंसानो  to more efficiently process food are those that make people susceptible to obesity and diabetes today .
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the  नेशनल मॉल at the करदाताओं कूच  on Washington on September 12 , 2009 .
The Tea Party movement is an American political movement that advocates strict adherence to the United States Constitution , reducing U.S. government spending and taxes ,  और कटौती of the u.S. नेशनल कर्ज़ और संघीय  budget deficit .
The  गति रै महरूम पुकारा  partly conservative , partly libertarian , and partly populist .
The  गति रै प्रायोजित  protests and supported political candidates since 2009 .
The name of the movement is derived  इससे the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी of 1773  , an iconic event in American history .
Anti-tax protesters in the United States have often referred to the original  बोस्टन चाय पार्टी लिये प्रेरणा  .
References to the Boston Tea Party were part of Tax Day  विरोध आयोजित throughout the 1990s और पहले  .
By 2001 , a custom had developed among some conservative activists of mailing tea bags to legislators and other  officials as a  symbolic act .
The currencies of Puerto  रीको closely follow  the historic development of Puerto Rico .
As a colony of Spain and  the संयुक्त राज्य , प्यूर्टो  Rico was granted the use of both foreign and provincial currencies .
Following the Spanish colonization in 1502 ,  प्यूर्टो रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण बंदरगाहों , साथ  its own supply of gold .
However , as the mineral reserves ran  खाली भीतर the सदी  , the archipelago 's economy suffered .
The Spanish Crown issued the Situado  mexicano , जिससे meant कि a semi-regular शिपमेंट of सुनहरा इससे  the Viceroyalty of New Spain would be sent to the island , as a way to provide economic support .
Between 1636 and  1637 , फिलिप iv of स्पेन imposed  a tax which had to be paid using a revenue stamp .
Inspired by this , Puerto Rico began producing  banknotes in 1766 , बनने the पहला उपनिवेश to छपाई 8- रियल  banknotes in the Spanish Empire and which in the Spanish government 's approval of subsequent issues .
The situado was discontinued during the 19th century , creating an economic crisis , as a result of  मैक्सिको gaining  its independence from Spain .
Salvador Meléndez Bruna , the colonial  राज्यपाल in दफ्तर , ordered the समस्या of प्रांतीय  banknotes , creating the Puerto Rican peso .
However , printing of these banknotes ceased after  1815 .
During  the following दशकों ,  foreign coins became the widespread currency .
In the  1860s और 1870s ,  banknotes reemerged .
On February 1 , 1890 , the Banco Español de Puerto Rico was inaugurated and  began issuing banknotes  .
the बैंको designed  four series and placed three in circulation under Spanish rule .
In 1895 , a Royal Decree ordered the  उत्पादन of प्रांतीय  peso coins .
On August 13 , 1898 , the  spanish-american युद्ध ended साथ स्पेन ceding  Puerto Rico to the United States .
The Banco Español  de प्यूर्टो रीको थी renamed बैंको  of Porto Rico and issued bills equivalent to the United States dollar , creating the Puerto Rican dollar .
In 1902 , the First National Bank  of पोर्टो रीको जारी banknotes  in a parallel manner .
Two   more series were issued until 1913 .
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated into the United  राज्य ' आर्थिक और मौद्रिक प्रणाली , the  Puerto Rican dollars were redeemed for those issued by the United States Treasury .
The peso and dollar have been followed by other  समकालीन मुद्दे , सहित commemorative banknotes  , private currency , and a quarter coin designed with Fort San Felipe del Morro in the face .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi , formerly stylized in uppercase as  पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय कि is उत्पादित और  manufactured by PepsiCo .
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink ,  it थी renamed  as Pepsi-Cola on August 28 , 1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .
The Book of Ezekiel is the third of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible , following the  किताबे of यशायाह और यिर्मयाह और preceding  the Book of the Twelve .
( The order is somewhat  अलग in  the Christian Old Testament ) .
It derives its name from , and records the visions of , the 6th century  bc पुजारी और नबी ezekiel  .
According to  the किताब , the नबी , exiled in बाबुल , अनुभवी  a series of seven visions during the 22 years from 593 to 571 BC , a period which spans the final destruction of Jerusalem in 586 .
The visions , and the book , are structured around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 )  ; ( 2 ) निर्णय on the राष्ट्र ( अध्याय 25-32 ) ; और भविष्य आशीर्वाद लिये  Israel ( chapters 33-48 ) .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major United States port and the largest city and  महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the  state of Louisiana .
The  जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829  as of the 2010 U.S. Census .
The New  ऑरलियन्स  metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States .
The New  orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय  Area , a larger trading area , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans , a city located on the Loire River in Centre , France , and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture , as  खूब as इसके cross-cultural और बहुभाषी  heritage .
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine ,  म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ) , और इसके सालाना  celebrations and festivals , most notably Mardi Gras .
The city is often referred  to as the `` सबसे  unique '' in America .
New Orleans is located in  southeastern louisiana , straddling  the Mississippi River .
the नगर  and Orleans Parish ( ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to  the उत्तर , st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट , plaquemines  to the south and Jefferson to the south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain , part of which is included in the city limits , lies to  the उत्तर और झील borgne  lies to the east .
The National Birth  कंट्रोल लीग  was a birth control organization in the United States .
It was founded in March 1915 by Mary Dennett , Clara  gruening  Stillman and Jessie Ashley .
Its main purpose was to overturn the  कानून जिससे बैन contraceptives  from the U.S. mails .
Campaigns were mounted in New York , but in 1919 the League was disbanded and reformed into the  voluntary parenthood लीग  .
Cancer , known medically as a malignant neoplasm , is a broad group of  विभिन्न रोगों , सब involving unregulated  cell growth .
In cancer , cells divide and grow uncontrollably ,  forming malignant  tumors , and invade nearby parts of the body .
The cancer may  भी स्प्रेड to अधिक दूर भाग  of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream .
Not all  tumors  are cancerous .
Benign tumors do not  grow uncontrollably , do नहीं invade neighboring  tissues , and do not spread throughout the body .
There are over 200 different  ज्ञात cancers कि पहुँचकर  humans .
determining कया कल्याणकारी  cancer is complex .
Many things are known to increase the risk of cancer ,  सहित तम्बाकू उपयोग , निश्चित infections , विकिरण , कमी of  physical activity , obesity , and environmental pollutants .
These can directly damage genes or combine with   existing genetic faults within cells to cause the disease .
Approximately five to ten percent of cancers are  entirely खानदानी  .
Cancer can be detected in a number of ways , including the presence of  निश्चित लक्षण और लक्षण , स्क्रीनिंग परीक्षण , or  medical imaging .
Once a possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by  microscopic परिक्षा  of a tissue sample .
Cancer is usually  treated साथ कीमोथेरेपी , विकिरण  therapy and surgery .
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the  प्रकार और स्थान of the कर्कट और the extent  of disease at the start of treatment .
While cancer can affect people of all ages , and a few types of cancer are more common in children , the  रिस्क of विकासशील कर्कट generally increases साथ आयु  .
In 2007 ,  कर्कट caused परिचय 13  % of all human deaths worldwide ( 7.9 million ) .
Rates are rising as more people live to an old age and as  द्रव्यमान जीवनशैली परिवर्तन occur  in the developing world .

Skiing is a recreational activity and  प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in जिससे the भागीदार attaches  long runners or skis to boots or shoes on the feet and uses them to travel on top of snow .
Aside from recreation and competition , skiing has been used for military purposes and even travelling in areas  कि अनुभव भारी हिमपात  .
Many types of competitive skiing events are  पहचाना by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Olympic Committee , and the International Ski Federation .
John Maynard Keynes , 1st Baron  keynes , cb , fba ( ; 5 जून 1883 – 21 अप्रैल 1946  ) was a British economist whose ideas have fundamentally affected the theory and practice of modern macroeconomics , and informed the economic policies of governments .
He built on and greatly refined earlier work on the causes of business cycles , and is widely considered to be one of the founders of modern macroeconomics and the most influential  अर्थशास्त्री of the 20th सदी  .
His ideas are the basis for the school of  विचार ज्ञात as keynesian अर्थशास्त्र , as खूब  as its various offshoots .
In many ways , subsequent developments in 20th century economics can be viewed as either building  on keynes ' विचार or  reacting against them .
In the 1930s , Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic thinking , overturning the older ideas of neoclassical economics that held that free markets would , in the short to medium term , automatically  provide पूरा नियुक्ति , as long as मजदूर यहूद लचीली in उनके मजदूरी मांगे  .
Keynes instead argued that aggregate demand determined the overall level  of आर्थिक कार्यकलाप , और कि अपर्याप्त  aggregate demand could lead to prolonged periods of high unemployment .
He advocated the use of fiscal  और मौद्रिक उपायों to mitigate  the adverse effects of economic recessions and depressions .
Following the outbreak of the Second World War , Keynes 's ideas concerning economic  नीति यहूद अपनाया by अग्रणी पश्चिमी  economies .
In 1942 ,  keynes थी awarded a खानदानी peerage as सामन्त  Keynes of Tilton in the County of Sussex .
Keynes died in 1946 , but during the 1950s and 1960s the success of  keynesian अर्थशास्त्र resulted in लगभग सब पूंजीवादी  governments adopting its policy recommendations .
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s , partly as a result of problems that began to afflict the Anglo-American  economies इससे the प्रारंभ of the दशक  , and partly because of critiques from Milton Friedman and other economists who were pessimistic about the ability of governments to regulate the business cycle with fiscal policy .
However ,  the आगमन of the वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट  in 2007 caused a resurgence in Keynesian thought .
Keynesian economics provided the theoretical underpinning for  आर्थिक नीतियों undertaken in जवाब to the संकट by  Presidents George W. Bush and Barack Obama of the United States , Prime Minister Gordon Brown of the United Kingdom , and other heads of governments .
In 1999 , Time magazine included Keynes in their list of the 100 most important and influential people of the  20th सदी , commenting कि : ``  His radical idea that governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism . ''
In addition to being an economist , Keynes was also a civil servant , a director of the British Eugenics Society , a director of the Bank of England , a  संरक्षक of the कला और an आर्ट कलेक्टर , a भाग of the bloomsbury समूह of intellectuals  , an advisor to several charitable trusts , a writer , a philosopher , a private investor , and a farmer .
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel Sofer emulated the 1675 Ten Commandments at  the एम्सटर्डम  Esnoga synagogue .
The Ten Commandments , also known as the Decalogue , are a set  of biblical कानून relating to आचार और इबादत , जिससे खेल a आधारभूत भूमिका in judaism  , Islam and Christianity .
They include instructions to worship only  परमेश्वर , to रखना the  sabbath holy and prohibitions against idolatry , blasphemy , murder , theft , deception and adultery .
Different groups follow  थोड़ा अलग परंपराओं  for interpreting and numbering them .
The Ten  आयतें appear twice in the यहूदी  Bible , in the books of Exodus and Deuteronomy .
According to the story in Exodus , God inscribed them on two stone tablets , which he gave to Moses on  माउंट sinai .
Modern scholarship has found likely  प्रभाव in hittite और  Mesopotamian laws and treaties , but is divided over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them .
The discography of the English alternative  चट्टान बैंड the smiths consists of चार स्टुडियो एल्बम  , one extended play ( EP ) , one live album , ten compilation albums , twenty singles , one video album and fourteen music videos on the Rough Trade , Sire and WEA record labels .
The band was formed in 1982 in Manchester  by vocalist morrissey  , guitarist Johnny Marr , bass player Andy Rourke and drummer Mike Joyce .
Despite being championed by BBC Radio 1 disc  jockey जॉन छिलके , the बैंड 's डेब्यू सिंगल , ``  Hand in Glove `` ( May 1983 ) , failed to chart .
Its follow-up , `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 ) ,  मिले साथ नाजुक acclaim और  reached number twenty-five on the UK Singles Chart .
The Smiths ' cult status was  followed by मुख्यधारा कामयाबी in 1984 , as वे पहुँचे  number twelve in the UK with the `` What Difference Does It Make ? `` single and reached number two on the UK Albums Chart with their debut album , The Smiths ( 1984 ) .
Their next three singles all reached the top twenty of  the चार्ट in the uk  , helping to consolidate their previous chart success .
The next studio album , Meat Is Murder ( 1985 ) , reached the top of the British charts ; however , the only single to be released  इससे the एल्बम , `` कि चुटकुला is n't मजेदार anymore `` ( 1985 ) , विफल to ब्रेक  the UK Top 40 .
Returning to form , The Smiths ' next six singles all reached the higher than number thirty in the UK and their third  एल्बम , the महारानी is मुर्दे ( 1986 ) , पहुँचे क्रमांक दो  in the UK .
Despite the band 's chart success , Marr  बाएँ the समूह in अगस्त 1987  due to a strained relationship with Morrissey .
Failing to find a replacement , The Smiths disbanded by the time their final  स्टुडियो एल्बम , strangeways  , Here We Come , was released in September that year .
Strangeways , Here We Come reached number two in the UK and became the band 's  highest-charting रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य जब it पहुँचे क्रमांक fifty-five  on the Billboard 200 .
In early 1992 , WEA acquired the entire back catalogue of The Smiths and produced two compilations –  बेहतरीन ... i और ... बेहतरीन ii – the पहला of जिससे पहुँचे the  top of the UK Albums Chart .
WEA  released  two further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001 , with a further compilation , The Sound of The Smiths , released in November 2008 .
Gone with the Wind is a  अनोखा लिखा by मार्गरेट मिशेल  , first published in 1936 .
it is प्रायः लगाई  in the literary sub-genre of the historical romance novel .
However , it has been argued  the अनोखा is a `` निकट मिस '' और करता नहीं  contain all of the elements of the romance genre , making it simply a historical novel .
The story is set in Clayton County , Georgia , and Atlanta during the American  सिविल युद्ध और पुनर्निर्माण  .
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara , the spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner , who must use every means at her disposal to come out of the poverty she  पाता herself in बाद शरमन 's `` कूच  to the Sea '' .
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone with the  हवा in 1926 to pass the समय जबकि recovering इससे an auto-crash  injury that refused to heal .
In April 1935 , Harold Latham of Macmillan , an editor who was looking for new fiction , read what she  था लिखा और देखी  that it could be a best-seller .
After Latham agreed to publish the book , Mitchell worked for another six  महीने checking the ऐतिहासिक  references , and rewrote the opening chapter several times .
Mitchell and her husband John Marsh , a copy editor by trade ,  संपादित the फाइनल संस्करण  of the novel .
Mitchell wrote the book 's final  पल पहला , और तब लिखा  the events that led up to it .
As to what became  of उसके प्रेमियों , रहेट और स्कारलेट , बाद the  novel ended , Mitchell did not know , and said , `` For all I know , Rhett may have found someone else who was less difficult . ''
Mitchell received the  पुलित्जर पुरस्कार लिये fiction  for the book in 1937 .
The book was adapted  into a 1939  American film .
Gone with the Wind is the only novel by Mitchell published  दौरान उसके आजीवन  .
Endodontics ( from the Greek endo `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth '' ) is one of the dental specialties recognized by the  अमरीकी दंत संघ , royal कॉलेज of dentists of कनाडा , और royal  Australasian College of Dental Surgeons , and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth .
Endodontists perform a variety of procedures including  endodontic चिकित्सा ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट कनाल चिकित्सा '' )  , endodontic retreatment , surgery , treating cracked teeth , and treating dental trauma .
Root canal  चिकित्सा  is one of the most common procedures .
If the pulp ( containing nerves , arterioles , venules  , lymphatic ऊतक , और तंतुमय  tissue ) becomes diseased or injured , endodontic treatment is required to save the tooth .
Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) is a point-to-point serial protocol that  चालें आंकड़ा to और  from computer storage devices such as hard drives and tape drives .
SAS replaces the older Parallel SCSI ( pronounced `` scuzzy '' ) bus technology that first appeared  in  the mid-1980s .
SAS , like its  पूर्ववर्ती ,  uses the standard SCSI command set .
SAS offers backward  संगतता साथ second-generation  SATA drives .
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be connected to SAS backplanes , but SAS drives can  नहीं कनेक्ट to sata  backplanes .
The T10 technical committee of the International  कमेटी लिये सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी मानकों ( incits  ) develops and maintains the SAS protocol ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology .

Status as a natural-born  नागरिक of the संयुक्त  States is one of the eligibility requirements established in the United States Constitution for election to the office of President or Vice President .
This  आवश्यकता थी intended to protect  the nation from foreign influence .
The  संविधान  does not define the phrase natural-born citizen , and various opinions have been offered over time regarding its precise meaning .
A 2011 Congressional  शोध सेवा  report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several decisions of the United States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing with the question of eligibility for citizenship by birth , but the Supreme Court has never directly addressed the question of a  विशिष्ट अध्यक्षीय or vice-presidential प्रत्याशी 's पात्रता as a natural-born नागरिक  .
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt ''  warner ( born जून 22 , 1971  ) is a former American football player .
He played quarterback for three  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) टीमों : the st. लुई मेढ़ों , the  New York Giants , and the Arizona Cardinals .
He was  originally हस्ताक्षरित by the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स  as an undrafted free agent in 1994 after playing college football at Northern Iowa .
Warner would go on to be  माना the बेहतरीन undrafted खिलाड़ी of सब समय , following a 12-year  career regarded as one of the greatest stories in NFL history .
Warner first attained  स्टारडम जबकि playing लिये the st. लुई मेढ़ों इससे 1998 to 2003 , जहाँ  he won two NFL MVP awards in 1999 and 2001 as well as the Super Bowl MVP award in Super Bowl XXXIV .
He led the 2008 Arizona Cardinals to Super  कटोरी xliii  ( the franchise 's first Super Bowl berth ) , and owns the three highest single-game passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history .
Warner  फिलहाल holds the seventh-highest करियर passer  rating of all-time ( 93.7 ) , and the third-highest career completion percentage in NFL history with 65.5 % .
In 13 career  playoff खेल , warner बाँधने पहला all-time in पूर्णता  percentage ( 66.5 % ) , yards per attempt ( 8.55 ) , and second in passer rating ( 102.8 ) .
He also holds the highest completion percentage for a single game during the regular season , at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ) , on  सितंबर 20 , 2009 , विरूद्ध the  Jacksonville Jaguars .
He announced his retirement on January 29 , 2010. <  संदर्भ name='cnn 2010-01-29  ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ;  born may 26 , 1953 ) is the जूनियर संयुक्त  States Senator from North Carolina , in office since January 2009 .
Previously she served  in the उत्तर  Carolina Senate from 1999 to 2009 .
She is a member of the Democratic  पार्टी और is viewed as a मॉडरेट  member of her party .
जब hagan पराजित रिपब्लिकन लाज़िम एलिज़ाबेथ  Dole in the 2008 United States Senate election , she became the first woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election .
The Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( usually known colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or the Heisman ) , is  awarded annually to the खिलाड़ी deemed the सबसे  outstanding player in collegiate football .
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club trophy and renamed in 1936 following the death of the Club 's athletic director , John Heisman ( former Brown University and University of Pennsylvania player ; head football coach at Oberlin College , Auburn University , Clemson University ,  राइस विश्वविद्यालयों , और the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया ; और फ़ुटबॉल ,  basketball , and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech ) .
the पुरस्कार is प्रस्तुत by the heisman  Trophy Trust in early December before the postseason bowl games .
It is the  oldest of अनेक overall  awards in college football , including the Maxwell Award , Walter Camp Award , and the AP Player of the Year .
The Heisman and the AP Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most outstanding player , while the Maxwell Award and Walter Camp Award recognize the best  खिलाड़ी , और the आर्ची griffin पुरस्कार recognizes the सबसे मूल्यवान  player .
The United Nations Command ( UNC ) is the unified command structure for the multinational military  शक्तियां  supporting the Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean War .
After troops of the Democratic People 's Republic of Korea ( North Korea or DPRK ) invaded  दक्षिण कोरियाई on जून 25 , 1950 , the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Security Council adopted Resolution 82 calling on North Korea to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel .
On June 27 , 1950 , it adopted Resolution 83 , recommending that members of the United Nations provide  सहायता to the गणतंत्र of कोरियाई `` to repel the  armed attack and to restore international peace and security to the area '' .
Security Council Resolution 84 , adopted on July 7 , 1950 , recommended that members providing military forces and other assistance to South Korea `` make such forces and other  सहायता उपलब्धियाँ to a एकीकृत कमांड अंतर्गत the संयुक्त  States of America '' .
Although the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC were ``  संयुक्त राष्ट्र शक्तियां '' , और संयुक्त राष्ट्र  itself could be considered a belligerent , in practice the United Nations exercised no control over the combat forces , which were controlled by the United States .
Most observers concluded that the forces under the UNC were not in law United Nations troops , and the acts of  the unc यहूद नहीं the अधिनियमों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  .
The UNC can be regarded as an alliance of national armies  , ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत  the collective right of self-defense .
On August 29 , 1950  , the  British Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry Brigade arrived at Busan to join the UNC , which until then included only ROK and U.S. forces .
The 27th Brigade moved into the Naktong River  लकीर वेस्ट of daegu  .
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid  उत्तराधिकार ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया , belgian संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Command , Canada , Colombia , Ethiopia , France , Greece , Luxembourg , the Netherlands , New Zealand , the Philippines , Thailand and Turkey .
The Union of South Africa provided air units which fought  alongside the एयर शक्तियां of अन्य सदस्य  nations .
Denmark , India , Norway , and  स्वीडन provided चिकित्सा  units .
Italy provided a  हॉस्पिटल , भी हालांकि  it was not a UN member .
The United  राष्ट्र कमांड और the chinese-north कोरियाई कमांड हस्ताक्षरित  the Korean Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953 , ending the heavy fighting .
The armistice agreement established the Military Armistice Commission ( MAC ) , consisting of representatives  of the दो signatories , to supervise the क्रियान्वयन  of the armistice terms .
The North Korean-Chinese MAC has been replaced by Panmumjon  प्रतिनिधि  under exclusive North Korean management .
Regular meetings have been stopped , although duty officers of Joint Security Area , commonly  ज्ञात as the युद्धविराम गाँव of panmunjom ,  from each side meet regularly .
Lincoln Heights is an American family  नाटक टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय एडी सटन , a मिशन विस्टा पुलिस अधिकारी जो चालें उसके  family back to his old neighborhood , Lincoln Heights , to start a new life and to help out his old neighborhood .
It is a dangerous place to raise a family , and through the many trials the  परिवार goes through , वे जल्द सीख कि settling in is नहीं  as easy as it seems .
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with every day life as a street cop in  लॉस एंजिल्स , उसके बच्चे कोशिश to  fit in at their new schools and with their new neighbors .
The show premiered  जनवरी 8 , 2007 on the एबीसी परिवार संजाल साथ  13 episodes ordered for the first season .
It was approved for a  दूसरी ऋतु  , which premiered September 4 , 2007 .
Vanessa  हजेंस ' सोंग , कह ok  had been used in a commercial to promote the second season .
To promote the third season , they showed clips of Cassie and Charles 's  संबंध to the सोंग , crush by the अमरीकी आइडल  's seventh season runner-up , David Archuleta .
To promote season 4 , they 're using the  सोंग , हिमस्खलन by मारी  Digby .
The show 's theme song  थी लिखा और performed  by bassist Stanley Clarke and singer-songwriter Blaire Reinhard .
On January 29 , 2010 , ABC  परिवार घोषित the रद्दीकरण  of the series after four seasons .
A Christian denomination is an identifiable  धार्मिक देह अंतर्गत a आम नाम , ढांचा  , and doctrine within Christianity .
In the Orthodox  परंपरा , चर्च हैं विभाजित प्रायः साथ  ethnic and linguistic lines , into separate churches and traditions .
Technically , divisions between one group and  another हैं पारिभाषित by doctrine और  church authority .
मुद्दे ऐसे as the प्रकृति of यीशु , the प्राधिकार  of apostolic succession , eschatology , and papal primacy separate one denomination from another .
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1  अरब सदस्यों , over हाफ of सब ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी , बनाना it the largest  denomination for any religion worldwide ( although the church does not view itself as a denomination , but as the original pre-denominational church ) .
Protestant denominations  comprise roughly 38–39 % of ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी  , and together the Catholics , Protestants , Anglicans , and other closely related denominations comprise Western Christianity .
The Eastern Orthodox Church , Oriental Orthodox Churches and the Assyrian  गिरिजाघर of the ईस्ट हैं माना  Eastern Christian denominations .
Western Christian  denominations जीतना in पश्चिमी  Europe and its former colonies .
Eastern Christian  denominations हैं represented  mostly in Eastern Europe , the Middle East and North Africa .
Christians have various doctrines  परिचय the गिरिजाघर , the देह of वफादार कि वे मानना  was established by Jesus Christ , and how the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations .
Both the Catholics and the  पूर्वी परंपरागत consider  each of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One Holy Catholic and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of the other .
Protestants separated from the  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर  because of theologies and practices that they considered to be in violation of their interpretation .
Generally , members of the various denominations acknowledge each other as Christians , at least to the extent that they have mutually recognized baptisms and acknowledge historically orthodox views including the Divinity of Jesus and doctrines of  सिन और मोक्ष , भी हालांकि doctrinal और ecclesiological बाधाएं रोकते पूरा नियाज़  between churches .
Since the reforms surrounding Vatican II , the Catholic Church has referred to  प्रोटोस्टेंट समुदायों as  `` denominations '' , while reserving the term `` church '' for apostolic churches , including the Eastern Orthodox ( see subsistit in and branch theory ) .
There are however  कुछ non-denominational ईसाइयों  who do not follow any particular branch .
The panda (  ailuropoda melanoleuca  , lit .
`` black and white cat-foot '' ) , also  ज्ञात as the दानव पांडा to फर्क it  from the unrelated red panda , is a bear native to central-western and south western China .
It is easily recognized by the  विशाल , distinctive  black patches around its eyes , over the ears , and across its round body .
हालांकि it belongs  to the order Carnivora , the panda 's diet is 99 % bamboo .
Pandas in the wild will occasionally eat other grasses , wild tubers , or even meat in the  रूप of पक्षियों , rodents or carrion  .
In captivity , they may receive honey , eggs , fish , yams ,  झाड़ी पत्ते , संतरे , or केले साथ साथ  specially prepared food .
The giant panda lives in a few mountain ranges in central China ,  मुख्यतः in सिचुआन प्रांत  , but also in the Shaanxi and Gansu provinces .
As a result of farming , deforestation and other development , the panda has been  चलित आउट of the lowland क्षेत्रों  where it once lived .
The panda is a  संरक्षण reliant endangered  species .
A  2007 रपट shows 239 pandas जीना  in captivity inside China and another 27 outside the country .
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate shows that there are about 1,590 individuals living in the wild , while a 2006 study via DNA analysis estimated  कि इस फिगर could be as ऊँची as 2,000  to 3,000 .
कुछ रिपोर्ट्स भी  show that the number of pandas in the wild is on the rise .
However , the IUCN does not believe there is  पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify the प्रजाति  from Endangered to Vulnerable .
While  the ड्रैगन रै प्रायः  served as China 's national emblem , internationally the panda appears at least as commonly .
As such , it is becoming widely used within  चीन in अंतरराष्ट्रीय contexts , लिये उदाहरण the पाँच  Fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics .
The  पतंग धावक is a 2007 अमरीकी नाटक  film directed by Marc Forster based on the novel of the same name by Khaled Hosseini .
It tells the story of Amir , a well-to-do boy from the Wazir Akbar Khan district of Kabul , who is  tormented by the guilt of abandoning  his friend Hassan , the son of his father 's Hazara servant .
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous events , from the fall of the monarchy in Afghanistan through the Soviet military intervention , the mass exodus of Afghan  शरणार्थियों to पाकिस्तानी और the संयुक्त राज्य , और the तालिबान शासन  .
Though most of the film is set in Afghanistan , these parts were mostly shot in Kashgar  , चीन , due to the खतरों  of filming in Afghanistan at the time .
The majority of the film 's dialogue is in Dari ,  साथ the शेष  spoken in English .
The child actors are native speakers ,  लकिन अनेक  adult actors had to learn Dari .
Filming wrapped up on December 21 ,  2006 , और the फिल्मी  was expected to be released on November 2 , 2007 .
However , after concern for the safety of the young actors in the film due to fears of violent reprisals to the sexual nature of some scenes in which they appear , its  रिलीज तिथि थी धकेल वापस छह  weeks to December 14 , 2007 .
The Kite  धावक थी released  on DVD on March 25 , 2008 .
A HD DVD release was announced for the  वही तिथि , लकिन थी रद्द  following the format 's demise .
The film was nominated for the Golden Globe Award for  बेहतरीन विदेशी भाषा फिल्मी  in 2007 .
The film 's score by Alberto  इग्लेसियस थी मनोनीत लिये बेहतरीन  Original Score at the Golden Globes and the Academy Awards .
The  वैधता  of cannabis varies from country to country .
Possession  of कैनबिस is illegal in सबसे देशों  and has been since the beginning of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s .
However , many countries have decriminalized the possession of small  quantities of कैनबिस , विशेषकर in उत्तर अमेरिका , दक्षिण अमेरिका  and Europe .
Furthermore , possession  is विधिक or effectively विधिक in the नीदरलैंड्स , उत्तर कोरियाई और होता be in the  U.S. states of Colorado and Washington if it were not for federal law , which governs persons in all states .
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number of countries  , सहित कनाडा , the चेक  Republic and Israel .
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis , enforcement varies widely at the state level and some states have  स्थापित औषधीय मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in कि खण्डन संघीय विधि ; दो  states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime , also contrary to federal statute .
Some countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as others but , apart from the  देशों कि प्रस्ताव अभिगम  to medical marijuana , most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe .
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in regard to the cultivation , use , possession  or  transfer of cannabis for recreational use .
A few  jurisdictions have lessened दंड लिये कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities  of cannabis , making it punishable by confiscation and a fine , rather than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for young or frequent users , with freedom from  narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य और a few jurisdictions परमिट कैनबिस  use for medicinal purposes .
There are also changes in a more restrictive  दिशा as in कनाडा  .
Drug  परीक्षण to detect कैनबिस हैं increasingly  common in many countries and have resulted in jail sentences and people losing their jobs .
However , simple possession can carry long jail sentences in some countries , particularly in parts of East  एशिया और southeast एशिया जहाँ the बिक्री of कैनबिस may सीसे to a वाक्य  of life in prison or even execution .
Loxahatchee is a community located in Palm  बीच काउंटी , फ्लोरिडा  , United States .
It is located in the areas north of Wellington and west and northwest of Royal  ताड़ बीच , फ्लोरिडा  and approximately west of West Palm Beach .
Loxahatchee is also the name of the Post Office that serves this area , which is  अंतर्गत the zip कोड  of 33470 .
The name Loxahatchee means `` turtle  नदी  . ''
Loxahatchee is located within the  भारतीय trails सुधार ज़िला  and the Loxahatchee Groves Water Control District .
Lion  देश safari , a drive-through  safari park , is located in Loxahatchee .
In 2006 , the state of Florida approved incorporation of part of Loxahatchee as the Town of Loxahatchee Groves  to become the 38th नगरपालिका in ताड़ बीच  County .
the प्रमुख कारण लिये incorporating थी to बेहतर protect the क्षेत्रफल इससे बुवाई  growth and to preserve the rural character of the neighborhood .
Perhaps the most rural area within a close  निकटता to वेस्ट ताड़ बीच  , with lot sizes range from 1-20 acres .
Along with The Acreage , it is notable for loose land restrictions and the native and  exotic एनिमल उपस्थिति is  quite notable .
Seminole Ridge High School  serves the  area .
The Canadian Citizenship Test is a test , administered by Citizenship and  आव्रजन कनाडा ( सीआईसी ) , कि is जरूरी  for all applicants for Canadian citizenship who are aged between 18 and 54 and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship .
The test is available in both French and  अंग्रेज़ी , the आधिकारिक भाषाएं  of Canada .
Renaissance Cruises , originally founded in 1989 owned by Fearnley  & eger rederi in ओस्लो - नार्वे , बाद खरीदा  by Edward Rudner ( founder of Alamo Car Rental ) as the company faltered during the Gulf War .
They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the Mediterranean , the Greek Isles , Tahiti and the  दक्षिण प्रशांत , उत्तरी यूरोपीय और scandinavia  .

It was headquartered in Fort  lauderdale ,  Florida .
Epithelium is one of the four basic  प्रकार of एनिमल  tissue , along with connective tissue , muscle tissue and nervous tissue .
epithelial ऊतकों लकीर the कैविटी और सतहों  of structures throughout the body , and also form many glands .
कृत्यों of epithelial कोशिकाएं शामिल  secretion , selective absorption , protection , transcellular transport and detection of sensation .
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '' , and `` θηλή ''  ( `` thēlē '' ) अर्थात्  `` nipple '' .
Epithelial  परतों हैं avascular , so वे जरूर प्राप्त nourishment via  diffusion of substances from the underlying connective tissue , through the basement membrane .
epithelia  can also be organized into clusters of cells that function as exocrine and endocrine glands .
Kent E. Hovind ( born January 15 , 1953 ) is an American young Earth  creationist  .
Hovind has spoken on creation science and has aimed to convince listeners to reject theories of evolution , geophysics ,  और cosmology in एहसान of उसके  interpretation of the Genesis creation narrative from the Bible .
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and  कुछ of उसके विचार have भी महरूम criticized  by young Earth creationist organizations such as Answers in Genesis .
Hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991 , and frequently spoke on young Earth creationism at seminars at private schools  और चर्च , debates  , and on radio and television broadcasts .
Since January 2007 , Hovind has been serving a ten-year prison sentence after being convicted of 58 federal  रिश्तो , सहित 12 कर offenses , एक गिनती of obstructing  federal agents , and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions .
He is incarcerated at the Federal Correctional Institution  at बर्लिन , नई हैम्पशायर .
Bride with  बिंदी सजा  forehead
A bindi ( , from Sanskrit bindu , meaning `` a drop , small particle , dot '' ) , or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil , Telugu , and  मलयालम ) is a माथे सजावट worn in दक्षिण एशिया ( विशेषकर इण्डिया , बांग्लादेश , नेपाल  , Sri Lanka and Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia .
Traditionally it is a bright dot of red color applied in the center of the forehead close to the eyebrows , but it can also consist of a sign  or टुकड़ा of आभूषण worn  at this location .
The New York gubernatorial election of 2010 was held on Tuesday , November 2 ,  2010 , to elect the राज्यपाल of नई  York , to serve a four-year term that began in January 2011 .
Incumbent Democratic Governor David Paterson , elected as  लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल in 2006 as the कार्यशील mate of पूर्व राज्यपाल  Eliot Spitzer , chose not to run for a full-term .

The  प्रमुख डाल of  Dragon Ball at the end of the manga .
The Dragon Ball manga and anime series  सुविधाएँ an extensive डाल of वर्ण  created by Akira Toriyama .
The series takes place in a fictional universe , the same as Toriyama 's previous series Dr.  slump , और फ़ॉलो the adventures of martial कलाकार बेटे goku इससे बाल्यकाल to  adulthood as he searches for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls , used to summon a wish-granting dragon .
During the course of the story , he encounters allies such as Bulma , Yamcha , Kuririn and Trunks , rivals such as Tenshinhan , Piccolo and  vegeta , और दुश्मनों ऐसे  as Freeza and Cell .
While many of the characters are humans with superhuman strength and/or supernatural abilities , the cast also  शामिल anthropomorphic पशु और बाद , extraterrestrial  lifeforms .
The series also includes depictions of the afterlife ,  साथ अनेक वर्ण होने  gods that govern the universe .

The Comanche are a Plains Indian tribe whose historic territory , known as Comancheria , consisted of present day eastern New Mexico , southern Colorado , northeastern  एरिज़ोना , दक्षिणी कान्सास  , all of Oklahoma , and most of northwest Texas .
The Comanche people are enrolled  in the federally पहचाना  Comanche Nation , in Oklahoma .
historically  , the Comanches were hunter-gatherers with a horse culture .
There may have been as many as 45,000 Comanches in the  लेट 18th सदी  .
Today , the Comanche Nation Comanche tribal enrollment numbers 15,191 with approximately 7,763 members  residing in the lawton – फोर्ट sill और surrounding क्षेत्रों of दक्षिणपश्चिम  Oklahoma .
The Comanche  स्वदेश homecoming powwow  is held annually in Walters , Oklahoma in mid-July .
The Comanche spoke the Comanche language , a Numic language of the Uto-Aztecan family , sometimes classified as a Shoshone dialect ;  however , तभी परिचय 1 % of comanches बोलो it  today .
