the अनोखा थी adapted  into a film , Ethan Frome , in 1993 .
Times Square Studios ( TSS ) is an American television studio located in the  टाइम्स वर्गाकार पड़ोस of the मैनहटन बरो of नई यॉर्क  City , New York .
The studio is best known as the production home of ABC News ' Good Morning America ( GMA ) , a  morning न्यूज और बात कार्यक्रम और खण्ड लिये जीएमए on  ABC News Now .
The Las Vegas Strip World of  coca-cola संग्रहालय in  2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants , and vending machines in every  देश मगर क्यूबा और उत्तर कोरियाई  .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta , Georgia , and is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March  27 , 1944  ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs  candler , जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to इसके दबदबा of the संसार soft-drink  market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then sold  to licensed coca-cola  bottlers throughout the world .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company , produce finished  उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the  concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell , distribute and merchandise  coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स और वेंडिंग  machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola  उद्यमों , जिससे is the largest सिंगल  Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western Europe .
The  coca-cola  Company also sells concentrate for soda fountains to major restaurants and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company  रै , on अवसर  , introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero ,  coca-cola  Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's  बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011 , coca-cola  was the world 's most valuable brand .
प्रकार of  bar-lines
In musical notation  , a बार ( or  measure ) is a segment of time defined by a given number of beats , each of which are assigned a particular note value .
Dividing music into bars provides  नियमित सन्दर्भ अंक  to pin point locations within a piece of music .
It also makes written music  easier to follow , चूंकि  each bar of staff symbols can be read and played as a batch .
Typically , a piece consists of several bars of the same length , and in modern  musical संकेतन the क्रमांक of बीट्स in प्रत्येक बार is निर्दिष्ट  at the beginning of the score by the top number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ) , while the bottom number indicates the note value of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ) .
The  शब्द बार is अधिक आम in  British English , and the word measure is more common in American English , although musicians generally understand both usages .
In American English , although the words bar and measure are often used interchangeably the correct use of  the शब्द 'bar ' refers तभी to the लंबवत लकीर itself , जबकि the शब्द 'measure  ' refers to the beats contained between bars .
In international usage , it is equally correct to speak of bar numbers and  माप संख्याएँ , e.g . ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm  . 9–16’ .
Along the same  लाइनों , it is हिकमत  to reserve the abbreviated form ‘bb .
3–4’  इत्यादि . लिये बीट्स तभी  ; bars should be referred to by name in full .
The first metrically complete measure within a piece of  म्यूज़िक is पुकारा ‘bar 1’ or ‘m  . 1’ .
When the piece begins with an anacrusis (  an incomplete  measure at the head of a piece of music ) , ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ is the following measure .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar  संयंत्र in स्पेन  features 15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant  लाइट और ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य , रै महरूम harnessed  by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal  विद्युत , सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis  , which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar  or क्रियाशील सौर depending  on the way they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar  तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग  of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a  भवन to the सूर्य , selecting सामग्री साथ  favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International  उर्जा एजेंसी कहा कि `` the विकास of  affordable , inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly  import-independent संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce प्रदूषण  , lower the costs of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These advantages  हैं वैश्विक  .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered learning  निवेश ; वे जरूर be बुद्धिमानी खर्च और need  to be widely shared '' .
Primary care may be provided in community  स्वास्थ्य केंद्रों  .
Primary care is  the स्वास्थ्य परवाह  given by a health care provider .
Typically this provider acts as the principal point of consultation for patients  भीतर a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणाली और  coordinates other specialists that the patient may need .
Such a professional can be a primary care physician , such as a general practitioner or family physician , or depending on the locality , health  प्रणाली संगठन , और रोगी 's discretion , वे may देखिए a फार्मासिस्ट , a चिकित्सक सहायक , a नर्स practitioner , a नर्स ( ऐसे as in the संयुक्त किंगडम ) , a नैदानिक अधिकारी ( ऐसे  as in parts of Africa ) , or an Ayurvedic or other traditional medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ) .
Depending on the nature  of the स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन  , patients may then be referred for secondary or tertiary care .
`` Ocean Avenue '' is a song  अंकित by अमरीकी  pop punk group Yellowcard .
It  थी released in  February 2004 as the second single from Ocean Avenue and the third track .
It  is  known for bringing them into the mainstream , as it received numerous spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay .
Ocean Avenue is a street in Jacksonville , Florida , the band 's stomping grounds near  उनके ऊँची स्कूल , डगलस एंडरसन स्कूल of the कला , और  another street mentioned in the song , Cherry Street .
The name of  समंदर एवेन्यू in  Jacksonville is actually Beach Boulevard .
They left their original base  पीछे जब वे स्थानांतरित to लॉस  Angeles .
The song  थी प्रदर्शित on the  Much Music compilation album Big Shiny Tunes 9 .
A psychiatrist  is a चिकित्सक जो  specializes in psychiatry .
A psychiatrist specializes in the treatment of  दिमागी विकार  .
Psychiatrists are  प्राधिकृत to prescribe आयुर्विज्ञान , conduct  physical examinations , order and interpret laboratory tests , use psychotherapy and may order brain imaging studies such as computed tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ) , magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) , and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning .
Within the framework of the World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of health as a state of complete physical , mental and social  well-being , और नहीं merely the अनुपस्थिति of बीमारी or  infirmity , reproductive health , or sexual health/hygiene , addresses the reproductive processes , functions and system at all stages of life .
Reproductive health , therefore , implies that people are able to have a responsible , satisfying and  safer sex जीवन और कि वे have the काबिलियत to  reproduce and the freedom to decide if , when and how often to do so .
One interpretation of this implies that men and women ought to be informed of and to have access to safe , effective , affordable and acceptable methods of birth control ; also access to appropriate health care services of sexual , reproductive medicine and implementation of health education programs to stress the  महत्व of महिलाओं to go सकुशल through गर्भावस्था और प्रसव could provide युगल  with the best chance of having a healthy infant .
On the other hand individuals do face inequalities  in reproductive स्वास्थ्य  services .
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic  औकात , शिक्षा स्तर , आयु , नस्ल ,  religion , and resources available in their environment .
It is possible for example , that low income individuals lack the resources for appropriate health services and the knowledge to  जान कया is उचित  for maintaining reproductive health .
According  to the जो , `` reproductive और यौन ill-health  accounts for 20 % of the global burden of ill-health for women , and 14 % for men . ''
Reproductive  स्वास्थ्य is a भाग  of Sexual and reproductive health and rights .
This is a list of  एपीसोड लिये the डिज़्नी चैनल असली  series The Suite Life on Deck , which aired for three seasons on Disney Channel from September 26 , 2008 to May 6 , 2011 .
Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single- , dual- , and quad-core  microprocessors आधारित on the कोर microarchitecture  .
The single- and dual-core  मॉडल हैं single- die , whereas the quad-core  models comprise two dies , each containing two cores , packaged in a multi-chip module .
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range market , and reunified laptop and desktop CPU lines , which previously had been  विभाजित into the pentium 4 , pentium d ,  and Pentium M brands .
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006 , comprising the Solo ( single-core ) , Duo (  dual-core ) , क्वाड ( quad-core ) , और in 2007 , the चरम  ( dual- or quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands .
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro technology ( designed  लिये व्यवसायों ) शामिल the dual-core  and quad-core branches .
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) , the उच्चतम स्तर of पेशेवर अमरीकी  football in the United States , culminating a season that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year .
The Super  कटोरी उपयोग रोमन  numerals to identify each game , rather than the year in which it is held .
For example  , सुपर कटोरी i थी निभाई on जनवरी 15 , 1967 , following  the 1966 regular season , while Super Bowl XLVII was played on February 3 , 2013 , following the 2012 season .
The game was created as part of a merger agreement between the NFL and its then-rival  लीग , the अमरीकी  Football League ( AFL ) .
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion  टीमों  would play in an AFL–NFL World Championship Game until the merger was to officially begin in 1970 .
After the merger  , प्रत्येक लीग थी redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन  `` , and the game was then played between the conference champions .
Currently , the National Football Conference ( NFC ) leads the series with 25 wins to 22 wins for the American  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) .
The day on which the Super Bowl is  निभाई , अभी माना  by some a de facto American national holiday , is called `` Super Bowl Sunday `` .
It is the second-largest day for U.S. food consumption , after  थैंक्सगिविंग  Day .
In addition ,  the सुपर कटोरी रै अक्सर  been the most watched American television broadcast of the year .
Super Bowl XLV , played in  2011 , became the most-watched अमरीकी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम in इतिहास , आरेखण an औसत दर्शक of 111 लाख  viewers and taking over the spot held by the previous year 's Super Bowl , which itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H .
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in the world , almost all being North  अमरीकी ऑडियंस , और is दूसरी to संघ फ़ुटबॉल ’s यूईएफए champions लीग  final as the most watched annual sporting event worldwide .
Because of its high  viewership , वाणिज्यिक airtime दौरान the सुपर कटोरी  broadcast is the most expensive of the year .
Due to the high cost of  निवेश in विज्ञापन on the सुपर कटोरी , कंपनियाँ  regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this broadcast .
As a result , watching and discussing the broadcast 's  commercials रै become a significant पहलू of the इवेंट  .
In addition , many popular singers and musicians have performed during the event 's pre-game and halftime  ceremonies  because of the exposure .
Fiona  is a feminine  given name .
The name Fiona was invented , and first used , by the  स्कॉटिश कवि जेम्स macpherson  ( 1736–96 ) , author of the Ossian poems , which he claimed were translations from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources , when challenged , he never produced ) .
The name was subsequently used as a pseudonym by William Sharp ( 1855–1905 ) , who authored several romantic  works अंतर्गत the नाम  `` Fiona Macleod '' .
The name has since become popular in England ,   Scotland and Ireland .
The name is considered to be a Latinised form of the Gaelic  शब्द fionn , अर्थ  `` white '' , `` fair '' .
The name Fiona  is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त as an anglicisation of the irish-language  name Fíona , although these names are otherwise unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ) .
There is also a modern tendency  to equate the प्रामाणिक स्कॉटिश  Gaelic feminine name Fionnghal with Fiona .
The name Fiona  is उठती in लोकप्रियता  particularly in German -speaking countries .
Fiona was the 49th most popular name for baby girls born  in 2008 in जर्मनी  .
Fiona was tied for third place in the ranking of most popular names for baby  लड़कियों born in the  tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008 .
the नाम थी the 347th सबसे  popular name for girls born in the United States in 2008 , where it has ranked among the top 1,000 most popular names for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999 .
The name Fiona has been particularly popular for girls of Asian or Pacific  islander descent in नई यॉर्क नगर , जहाँ फिओना क्रमित as the नवीं सबसे  popular name for girls from those groups in 2007 .
Many  भाषाएं हैं प्रयुक्त  , or historically have been used in the United States .
The most commonly used  भाषा  is English .
There are also  अनेक भाषाएं स्वदेशी to उत्तर  America or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific region .
Languages brought  to the देश by colonists or आप्रवासियों इससे यूरोपीय , एशिया , or अन्य भाग of  the world make up a large portion of the languages currently used ; several languages , including creoles and sign languages , have also developed in the United States .
Approximately 337 languages are spoken or signed by the  जनसांख्यिकी , of जिससे 176 हैं स्वदेशी  to the area .
Fifty-two languages formerly spoken in the country 's territory are  अभी विलुप्त .
The variety of English  बोला in the संयुक्त राज्य  is known as American English .
English is the de facto national language of the United States , with 80 % of the population claiming it as a mother tongue , and some 95 % claiming to speak it `` well '' or ``  बहुत खूब ''  .
However ,  no आधिकारिक भाषा  exists at the federal level .
There have been several proposals to make English the national language in amendments to immigration reform bills , but none of these bills  रै become विधि साथ  the amendment intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels , with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in  a de jure क्षमता , अन्य adopting अंग्रेज़ी अलोन , अन्य officially adopting अंग्रेज़ी as खूब as लोकल भाषाएं , और स्टिल अन्य  adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism .
Spanish is the second most  आम भाषा  in the country , and is spoken by over 12 % of the population .
The United States  holds the संसार 's पांचवां largest  Spanish-speaking population , outnumbered only by Mexico , Spain , Colombia , and Argentina .
throughout the southwestern संयुक्त राज्य , long-established  Spanish-speaking communities coexist with large numbers of more recent Hispanophone immigrants .
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less than fluent in English , nearly all  second-generation हिस्पैनिक अमेरिकी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी धड़ल्ले  , while only about half still speak Spanish .
According to the 2000 US census , people of German ancestry make up the  largest सिंगल जातीय समूह in the  United States , and the German language ranks fifth .
Italian , Polish , and French are still widely spoken among populations descending from immigrants from those countries in the early 20th century , but the use of these languages is  dwindling as the पुरानी पीढियां  die .
Russian  is भी  spoken by immigrant populations .
Tagalog and Vietnamese have  over एक लाख अध्यक्षों प्रत्येक in the संयुक्त  States , almost entirely within recent immigrant populations .
Both languages , along with the varieties of the Chinese language , Japanese , and  कोरियाई , हैं अभी  used in elections in Alaska , California , Hawaii , Illinois , New York , Texas , and Washington .
Native American languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the country ,  लकिन ये populations हैं अवरोहण , और the  languages are almost never widely used outside of reservations .
Hawaiian , although having few native speakers , is an  आधिकारिक भाषा साथ साथ  English at the state level in Hawaii .
The state government of  louisiana offers सेवाएं और दस्तावेज़ in  French , as does New Mexico in Spanish .
Besides English , Spanish , French , German , Navajo and other Native American languages , all other  भाषाएं हैं प्रायः सीखे इससे अप्रवासी पूर्वजो कि  came after the time of independence or learned through some form of education .
1990 's Pontiac  ग्रैंड  Am Sedan fender and quarter panel
On an automobile , a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is known in British  अंग्रेज़ी ) is प्रायः माना the देह फलक जिससे goes between the पश्च द्वार और the ट्रंक और typically wraps around the व्हील खूब ; however , the  similar front section Fender ( vehicle ) , between the door and the hood , is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel .
The quarter panel is  typically बना of चादर मेटल , लकिन is sometimes  made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced plastic ; although , this varies with different makes and models .
A quarter panel is typically a welded on component of the  uni-body ढांचा or  Monocoque .
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter panel typically requires it to be cut off the vehicle and a replacement part to be  welded ( or sometimes बंधुआ ) to the  Vehicle .
Due to this high amount of specialized labor , a quarter panel may often be repaired  बल्कि than replaced by hammering आउट the क्षति  , and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface .
Shropshire ( or ;  alternatively salop ; abbreviated , in छपाई  only , Shrops ) is a county in the West Midlands region of England .
It borders Wales to the west , Cheshire to  the उत्तर ,  Staffordshire to the east , Worcestershire to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south .
A unitary authority ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April  2009 , लेने over इससे the पिछला  county council and 5 district councils , and covers most of the county .
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has  महरूम a पृथक एकात्मक प्राधिकार  since 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county .
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county town of Shrewsbury , which is culturally and historically important and is located in the centre of the county ; Telford , a new town in the east which was constructed around a number of older towns , most notably Wellington ,  dawley और madeley , जिससे is आज the सबसे populous ; और oswestry in the north-west , bridgnorth बस to the  south of Telford , and Ludlow in the south .
The county has many further market towns , including Whitchurch in the north , Newport  बस to the north-east of telford , और मार्केट  Drayton in the north-east of the county .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site , covering  ironbridge , coalbrookdale और a भाग of madeley  .
There  हैं , additionally , अन्य notable  historic industrial sites located around the county , such as at Shrewsbury , Broseley , Snailbeach and Highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal .
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty covers about a quarter of the  काउंटी , मुख्यतः in the दक्षिण  .
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties , with the population density of the Shropshire Council area  होने बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq  mi ) .
The Wrekin is one of the  सबसे प्रसिद्ध प्राकृतिक लैंडमार्क in the काउंटी  , though the highest hills are the Clee Hills , Stiperstones and the Long Mynd .
Wenlock Edge is another  significant भौगोलिक और geological  landmark .
In the low-lying northwest of the county ( and overlapping the border with Wales ) is the Fenn 's , Whixall and  bettisfield mosses नेशनल प्रकृति आरक्षित , एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और बेहतरीन preserved  bogs in Britain .
The River Severn , Great Britain 's  longest नदी , रनों through the काउंटी , exiting into  Worcestershire via the Severn Valley .
Shropshire is  landlocked , और साथ an क्षेत्रफल  of , is England 's largest inland county .
The county flower is the  round-leaved  sundew .
For Eurostat purposes , the county ( less the unitary district of Telford and Wrekin ) is  a nuts 3 प्रदेश  ( code UKG22 ) .
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county ) , together with the authorities covering the  ceremonial काउंटी of staffordshire  , comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region .
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con 2009 , from left : Kunal Nayyar , Simon Helberg , Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and  जॉनी galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory , created and executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady , premiered  on सीबीएस on सितंबर 24 , 2007  .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter , two Caltech physicists ; Penny , a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's  मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर हावर्ड wolowitz , और astrophysicist राजेश koothrappali  .
Over time , several supporting characters have been  प्रचारित to अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ : लेस्ली winkle ( ऋतु 1 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ) , a physicist सहयोगी , और , at अलग टाइम्स , a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु  4-present regular ) , a microbiologist , Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife , and former part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also features numerous supporting characters , each of whom  plays a prominent भूमिका in a छोटी समूह of एपीसोड  .
the a-team is an अमरीकी action-adventure  television series , running from 1983 to 1987 , about a fictional group of ex– United States Army Special Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune , while on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit `` .
A feature film based on the  श्रेणी थी released by 20th  Century Fox on June 11 , 2010 .
A comic book series , A-Team : Shotgun  विवाह , began  March 9 , 2010 .
Diana Prince is a fictional character appearing  regularly in कहानियां प्रकाशित  by DC Comics .
She debuted in Sensation Comics # 1 ( January 1942  ) और serves as the civilian और  secret identity of the superhero Wonder Woman .
The  अक्षर थी निर्मित  by Charles Moulton and Harry G. Peter .
Wat Phra  kaew ,  Bangkok , Thailand
There is no official state religion in the Thai constitution , which guarantees religious freedom for all  थाई नागरिकों , हालांकि the किंग is जरूरी by विधि to be बौद्ध  .
According  to the पिछला जनसांख्यिकी  ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais are Buddhists of the Theravada tradition .
Muslims are the second largest  धार्मिक समूह in  Thailand at 4.6 % .
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani , Yala , Narathiwat and  भाग of songkhla  Chumphon have dominant Muslim populations , consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay .
The southern  टिप of थाईलैंड is ज़्यादातर  ethnic Malays .
Christians , mainly Catholics , represent  0.7 % of  the population .
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some  हिन्दुओं भी सजीव in the देश 's शहरों ,  and are heavily engaged in retail commerce .
There is also a small Jewish community in Thailand , dating back to  the 17th सदी  .
Since  2001 , मुस्लिम कार्यकर्ताओं , generally वर्णित by the थाई सरकारी  as terrorists or separatists , have rallied against the central government because of alleged corruption and ethnic bias on the part of officials .
Thailand 's Department of Religion , currently under the Ministry of Culture , is formally responsible for the registration of religious groups in Thailand  url_http जिससे थाम गुण through legally  established foundations .
It has oversight , along with the Immigration Police , over the work permits of missionaries who are `` expatriate  धार्मिक मजदूर '' of सब धर्मों  .
A value added tax ( VAT ) is a form  of  consumption tax .
From the  परिप्रेक्ष्य of the खरीदार  , it is a tax on the purchase price .
From  कि of the विक्रेता , it is a कर तभी on the  value added to a product , material , or service , from an accounting point of view , by this stage of its manufacture or distribution .
The  निर्माता  remits to the government the difference between these two amounts , and retains the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the inputs .
The value added to a product by or with a business is the sale price charged to its  ग्राहक , ऋण the लागत of सामग्री और अन्य  taxable inputs .
A  vat is जैसे a बिक्री कर in  that ultimately only the end consumer is taxed .
It differs from the sales tax in that , with the latter , the tax is collected and remitted to the government only  एकबार , at the पाइंट of खरीदें  by the end consumer .
With the VAT , collections ,  remittances to the सरकारी  , and credits for taxes already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products .
A referee calling  a high-sticking  penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur when  a खिलाड़ी intentionally or inadvertently  plays with his or her stick above the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal .
This can  परिणाम in a stoppage  of play or in a penalty .
In the rules of the National Hockey League , high-sticking is defined as a penalty  in नियम 60 और as a  non-penalty foul in Rule 80 .
A stoppage in play results if a high stick comes in  सम्पर्क साथ the पक  and the team who touched it regains control of the puck .
However , play usually  continues if a खिलाड़ी छू the पक साथ  a high stick and the opposing team gains control of the puck .
If the puck goes into the opposing net after coming into contact with a high  स्टिक , the लक्ष्य is प्रतिबंधित  .
The  स्तर at जिससे a स्टिक is  considered too high for a goal is the crossbar of the net .
however , if a खिलाड़ी knocks  the puck into his own net with a high stick , the goal is allowed .
A penalty is assessed if a player strikes another player with a  ऊँची  stick .
The player is given  a नाबालिग दंड जबतक उसके ऊँची स्टिक caused an चोट ,  in which case the referee has the option to assess a double-minor , major or match penalty .
It is the  रेफरी 's discretion जिससे दंड to assess : the नियम काल्स लिये a दोगुना नाबालिग लिये an आकस्मिक चोट  , or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ) .
Injury is usually decided by the high stick causing bleeding , but the  उपस्थिति of रक्त  does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded .
कुछ referees have महरूम ज्ञात to पुरस्कार an अतिरिक्त दंड बगैर the उपस्थिति of  blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty .
Typical modern memory card reader , compatible with many  आम स्वरुप
A memory card  रीडर is a यंत्र , typically having  a USB interface , for accessing the data on a memory card such as a CompactFlash ( CF ) , Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ) .
Most card readers also  प्रस्ताव लिखें काबिलियत  , and together with the card , this can function as a pen drive .
Some printers and personal computers  have a built-in कार्ड  reader .
A multi card reader is used for communication with more than one type of flash  मेमोरी कार्ड .
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory capacity ,  लकिन हैं समर्थ to accept  multiple types and styles of memory cards .
The number of compatible memory cards varies from reader to reader and can  शामिल अधिक than 20 अलग प्रकार  .
The number of  अलग मेमोरी ताश कि a मल्टी कार्ड रीडर  can accept is expressed as x-in-1 , with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted , such as 35-in-1 .
There are three categories of card readers sorted by the  प्रकार और मात्रा of the कार्ड  slots : single card reader ( e.g . 1x SD-only ) , multi card reader ( e.g . 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g . 4x SD only ) .
Some kinds of memory cards with their own USB  कृत्यों do नहीं need the कार्ड रीडर ,  such as the Intelligent Stick memory card , which can plug directly into a USB slot .
The USB device class  प्रयुक्त is  0x08 .
धमकाना is हानिकारक to विद्यार्थी  ' well-being and development .
Bullying is the use of force  or coercion to गाली  or intimidate others .
The behavior can be habitual and  involve an असंतुलन of  social or physical power .
It can include verbal harassment or threat , physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims , perhaps on  grounds of रेस , धर्म , लिंग , कामुकता , or क्षमता  .
If bullying is done by a group ,  it is पुकारा mobbing  .
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred  to as a `` निशाना  '' .
Bullying  can be पारिभाषित in  many different ways .
The UK currently has no  विधिक परिभाषा of धमकाना  , while some U.S. states have laws against it .
धमकाना consists  of three basic types of abuse – emotional , verbal , and physical .
It  typically involves हल्का  methods of coercion such as intimidation .
धमकाना सीमाएँ इससे सरल one-on-one धमकाना to अधिक जटिल  bullying in which the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities .
Bullying in school and the  कार्यस्थल is भी referred to as  peer abuse .
रॉबर्ट W.  Fuller has analyzed bullying in the context of rankism .
A  धमकाना संस्कृति  can develop in any context in which human beings interact with each other .
This includes school , church , family ,  the कार्यस्थल  , home , and neighborhoods .

Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4 , 2007 , in Austin , Texas , after the 8-year-old introduced Mrs.  बुश दौरान घोषणा  of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children .
Rae Leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a result of an AMBER Alert when she  थी 8 सप्ताह बूढ़ा in नवम्बर 1998  .
An  एम्बर चेतावनी or a चाइल्ड abduction आपात ( वही कोड : cae  ) is a child abduction alert system originating in 1996 , now employed in 9 countries .
AMBER is  officially a backronym लिये अमेरिका 's लापता :  Broadcasting Emergency Response , named for Amber Hagerman , a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington , Texas in 1996 .
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia , `` Levi 's Call '' ( named after Levi Frady ) ; in Hawaii , `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ;  और अरकंसास , `` मॉर्गन उपनाम एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( in  memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations , Internet radio ,  उपग्रह रेडियो , टेलीविज़न स्टेशन , और केबल tv by the आपात चेतावनी  System and NOAA Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ) .
The alerts are also issued via e-mail , electronic traffic-condition signs , the LED billboards which  हैं स्तिथ बाहर of नए walgreens  locations , along with the LED/LCD signs of billboard companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor , CBS Outdoor and Lamar , or through wireless device SMS text messages .
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google  और फेसबुक to रिले  information regarding an AMBER Alert to an ever growing demographic .
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS  संदेश can विज़िट बेतार एम्बर चेतावनियाँ , जिससे हैं offered by  law as free messages .
In some states , the display scrollboards in  सामने of लॉटरी  terminals are also used .
The decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each police organization ( in many cases , the  राज्य  police or highway patrol ) which investigates each of the abductions .
Public information in an AMBER  चेतावनी प्रायः consists of the नाम और  description of the abductee , a description of the suspected abductor , and a description and license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle , if available .
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States  अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an  `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its repercussions ( which  शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग  ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
House of Night is a series of vampire  -थीमd काल्पनिक novels by अमरीकी लेखक P. C.  Cast and her daughter Kristin Cast .
It follows  the adventures of zoey  Redbird , a sixteen-year-old girl who has just become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is required to attend the House of Night boarding school in Tulsa , Oklahoma .
The series  रै महरूम on the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स बेहतरीन विक्रेता सूची लिये  63 weeks and there are over seven million copies in print in North America alone .
the छठे अनोखा , इम्तिहान  , which went on sale on October 27 , 2009 with a first printing of a million copies , entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
In January , 2010 , Gezeichnet , a  जर्मनी अनुवाद of चिह्नित  , reached the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list .
The series has so far sold more  than टेन लाख किताबे  in 39 countries .
Burned was released on  अप्रैल 27 , 2010 , और जैसे इम्तिहान  , it entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
Awakened  , released in जनवरी  , 2011 , also entered the list at # 1 .
The series , which is published by St Martin 's Press is  नियोजित to शामिल बारह  books .
In 2008 , plans for a film adaptation were  भी घोषित  .
The tenth book in the series , Hidden , was  released on अक्तूबर 16 , 2012  .
The second book in the novellas ( which give backgrounds on supporting  वर्ण ) , lenobia 's प्रण , थी released  January 31 , 2012 .
Book eleven is currently called Revealed , and the Casts have  घोषित कि दो अधिक novellas  , Neferet’s Curse , planned to be released February 19 , 2013 , and a prequel novel about Kalona , are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books .
In Greek mythology , the Trojan War was waged against the  नगर of ट्रॉय by the achaeans (  Greeks ) after Paris of Troy took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta .
The  युद्ध is एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम in यूनानी  mythology and has been narrated through many works of Greek literature , most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey .
The  इलियड relates a भाग of  the last year of the siege of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's journey home .
Other  भाग of the युद्ध हैं contained  in a cycle of epic poems , which have survived through fragments .
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek tragedy and other  works of यूनानी साहित्य  , and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid .
the युद्ध originated इससे a  quarrel between the goddesses Athena , Hera , and Aphrodite , after Eris , the goddess of strife and discord , gave them a golden apple , sometimes known as the Apple of Discord , marked `` for the fairest '' .
Zeus sent the goddesses to  पेरिस , जो judged कि aphrodite  , as the `` fairest '' , should receive the apple .
In exchange , Aphrodite made Helen , the most beautiful of all women and wife of Menelaus , fall in love with Paris , who  took उसके to ट्रॉय  .
Agamemnon , king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus , led an expedition of  achaean सैनिकों to ट्रॉय और besieged the नगर लिये टेन सालो क्युकी  of Paris ' insult .
After the deaths of many heroes , including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax , and the Trojans  हेक्टर और पेरिस , the नगर गिरी  to the ruse of the Trojan Horse .
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom they kept or sold as  स्लेव ) और desecrated the मंदिरों , यूँ कमाई  the gods ' wrath .
Few of the Achaeans returned safely to their homes and many founded  colonies in दूर shores  .
The Romans later traced their origin to Aeneas  , एक of the ट्रोजन्स , जो थी कहा to have led the surviving  Trojans to modern-day Italy .
The  प्राचीन यूनानियों विचार कि the trojan  War was a historical event that had taken place in the 13th or 12th century BC , and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles .
By modern times , both the war and the city  यहूद widely believed  to be non-historical .
In 1868 , however , the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert , who convinced Schliemann that  ट्रॉय थी at hissarlik और schliemann took over  Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars .
Whether there is any historical reality behind the  trojan  War is an open question .
Many scholars  मानना कि वहीँ is a ऐतिहासिक कोर to the टेल , हालांकि  this may simply mean that the Homeric stories are a fusion of various tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age .
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical conflict usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC , often  preferring the तिथियाँ दिए by इरैटोस्थनिज़ , 1194–1184 bc , जिससे roughly corresponds साथ पुरातत्व प्रमाण  of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa .
Anarchists have employed certain  प्रतीकों लिये उनके कारण , सहित सबसे prominently the circle-a  and the black flag , although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement .
Since the revival of anarchism around the start of the  21st-century संयुक्त साथ the वृद्धि of  the anti-globalization movement , anarchist cultural symbols are widely present .
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits  the वृहद palatine धमनी , रग , और तंत्रिका  between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity .
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and summer from the European Centre for  medium-range मौसम forecasts
The climate of  अंटार्कटिक is the  coldest on the whole of Earth .
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature ever recorded on the ground on  धरती : −89.2 °c ( −128.6  °F ) at Vostok Station .
It is also extremely dry ( technically a  मरुस्थल ) , averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in  ) of precipitation per year .
Even so ,  on सबसे भाग of the महाद्वीप the  snow rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet .
Weather fronts rarely penetrate far into  the महाद्वीप  .
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap  जलवायु ( köppen ef ) साथ बहुत ठंडा , generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम  throughout the year and no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ) .
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET ) with a short   summer averaging above freezing , and much higher precipitation .

The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise has had 16 head  कोच throughout इसके इतिहास  .
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in , the name was changed to the Steelers prior  to the ऋतु to  celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel .
Joe Bach served two separate terms as head coach and Walt Kiesling served three  पृथक शर्तें  .
During the and seasons ,  due to the राशि of खिलाड़ी  who fought in World War II , the Steelers combined their team with Philadelphia and Chicago , respectively .
During these seasons , Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching duties with Greasy  neale और फिल  Handler , who have not been included within this list .
Struggling for much of the franchise 's early  सालो , the टोली 's पहला  season with more wins than losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in .
in , अंतर्गत sutherland , the स्टीलर्स  played their first playoff game against the Philadelphia Eagles .
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their entire professional coaching careers with the franchise , including John McNally , Walt Kiesling and  चक noll , जो have भी महरूम  voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame .
One of  तभी चार मेन to कोच  the same team for 23 years , Chuck Noll retired in .
Noll is also the only coach in National Football  लीग इतिहास to  win four Super Bowls .
Bill Cowher , Noll 's replacement ,  coached the स्टीलर्स to उनके पांचवां  Super Bowl victory , in 2005 .
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII , while head coached by Mike Tomlin , the team  's वर्तमान सिर कोच  .
In criminal  विधि , धोखाधड़ी is जानबूझकर  deception made for personal gain or to damage another individual ; the related adjective is fraudulent , and verb is defraud .
Fraud is a crime and a civil law violation , though the specific  दण्ड विधि परिभाषा varies  by legal jurisdiction .
Defrauding people or entities of money or  valuables is a आम purpose  of fraud .
A  hoax भी involves deception , लकिन बगैर the इरादे  of gain or of damaging or depriving the victim .
धोखाधड़ी is a रक्षा  in a civil action for breach of contract or specific performance of a contract .
Fraud is a basis for  निष्पक्ष क्षेत्राधिकार  .
Passover , or Pesach ( from :  in यहूदी , यहूदी ) , tiberian : , आधुनिक यहूदी : /ˈpesaχ/ pesah  , Pesakh , Yiddish : Peysekh , Paysakh , Paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish festival .
historically , साथ साथ shavuot ( `` पेंटेकोस्ट '' ) और sukkot ( `` झोपड़ियों '' ) , passover  is one of the three pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem .
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to Mount  gerizim , लकिन तभी मेन participate  in public worship .
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts for either seven days ( in  इसराईल ) or आठ दिनों ( in the  diaspora ) .
In Judaism , a day commences at dusk  और lasts जबतक the following संध्या , यूँ the पहला दिन of passover  only begins after dusk of the 14th of Nisan and ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan .
The rituals unique to the Passover  जश्न commence साथ the  Passover Seder when the 15th of Nisan has begun .
In the Northern Hemisphere Passover takes place in spring as the Torah prescribes it  : `` in the माह of [ the ] वसन्त '' ( בחדש האביב  ) .
It is  एक of the सबसे widely  observed Jewish holidays .
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years ago by  परमेश्वर इससे गुलामी in प्राचीन मिश्र कि थी  ruled by the Pharaohs , and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses .
It commemorates the  स्टोरी of the exodus as वर्णित in the यहूदी  Bible especially in the Book of Exodus , in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus , the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel  एस्केप इससे उनके गुलामी in मिश्र  by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born .
The Israelites were instructed to  चिह्नित the doorposts of उनके घरों साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered वसन्त मेमने  and , upon seeing this , the spirit of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes , hence the name of the holiday .
वहीँ is कुछ  debate over where the term is actually derived from .
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites , it is said that they left in such a hurry that they  could नहीं इंतजार लिये ब्रैड आटा to वृद्धि ( leaven )  .
In commemoration  , लिये the अवधि of passover no leavened  bread is eaten , for which reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread '' .
यूँ matzo ( चपटा unleavened  bread ) is eaten during Passover and it is a symbol of the holiday .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ) , officially designated  1p/halley , is the best-known of  the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is  the तभी short-period धूमकेतु  that is clearly visible to the naked eye from Earth , and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and  अधिक spectacular , लकिन होगा  appear only once in thousands of years .
Halley 's returns to the  भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have महरूम observed  and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese , Babylonian , and medieval European  chroniclers , लकिन यहूद  not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time .
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond  हैली , बाद जिसको it is अभी नामित  .
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar  प्रणाली in 1986 और होगा अगला  appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition , Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft ,  providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु केंद्रक  and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model , which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile  ices – ऐसे as जल , कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अमोनिया – और धूल  .
The missions also provided data which substantially  reformed  and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
anti-communism  is opposition to communism .
Organized anti-communism developed in  प्रतिक्रिया to the वृद्धि of साम्यवादी , विशेषकर बाद the 1917  October Revolution in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War .
Most anti-communists reject the  अवधारणा of ऐतिहासिक भौतिकवाद , जिससे  is a central idea in Marxism .
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that capitalism will be followed by  समाजवादी और साम्यवादी , बस as सामंतवाद  was followed by capitalism .
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim that the socialist state  होगा `` wither दूर '' जब  it becomes unnecessary in a true communist society .
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of  bolshevik नियम , जबकि नहीं as चरम as कि दौरान जोसेफ स्टालिन 's नियम , थी स्टिल कठोर by उचित मानकों , citing उदाहरण ऐसे as  Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret police , which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions , and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion .
Some  anti-communists  refer to both Communism and fascism as totalitarianism , seeing similarity between the actions of communist and fascist governments .
Historian Robert Conquest  रै argued कि साम्यवादी थी जिम्मेदार  for tens of millions of deaths during the 20th century .
Opponents argue that Communist  पार्टियों कि have आइये to शक्ति have  tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition .
These opponents claim that most Communist countries have shown no signs of advancing  इससे मार्क्स 's समाजवादी  stage of economy to an ideal communist stage .
Rather ,  कम्युनिस्ट सरकारें have महरूम  accused of creating a new ruling class ( a Nomenklatura ) , with powers and privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes .
Gil Heron ( 9 April 1922 –  27 नवम्बर  2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer .
He was the first  ब्लैक खिलाड़ी to खेल लिये स्कॉटिश  club Celtic , and was the father of poet and musician Gil Scott-Heron .
He died in  डेट्रॉयट of a दिल  attack on 27 November 2008 .
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a species of legume native to East  एशिया , widely grown लिये इसके खाद्य  bean which has numerous uses .
The plant is classed as an oilseed rather than a pulse by the UN Food and  agricultural संगठन ( fao  ) .
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and cheap source of protein for animal feeds and many  prepackaged meals ; सोया सब्ज़ी  oil is another product of processing the soybean crop .
For example , soybean products such as textured vegetable protein ( TVP ) are  संघटक in अनेक मांस  and dairy analogues .
Soybeans produce significantly  अधिक प्रोटीन प्रति एकड़ than  most other uses of land .
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans include soy milk  , और इससे the latter टोफू और टोफू स्किन  .
Fermented foods include soy sauce , fermented bean paste , natto ,  और tempeh , among अन्य  .
The oil is used in many  औद्योगिक  applications .
The main producers of soy are the   United States ( 35 % ) , Brazil ( 27 % ) , Argentina ( 19 % ) , China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ) .
The beans contain significant amounts of phytic acid ,  alpha-linolenic एसिड , और isoflavones  .
Harrison Ford ( born July 13 , 1942 ) is an American  फिल्मी कर्ता और निर्माता .
He is famous for his  प्रदर्शन as हान सोलो in the असली स्टार युद्धों त्रयी  and the title character of the Indiana Jones film series .
Ford is also known for his roles as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner , John Book in Witness and Jack Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear  और उपस्थित  Danger .
His career has spanned six decades and includes roles in several Hollywood blockbusters , including Presumed Innocent , The  भगोड़े  , Air Force One , and What Lies Beneath .
At one point , four of the top six box-office hits  of सब समय  included one of his roles .
पाँच of उसके films  have been inducted into the National Film Registry .
In 1997 , Ford was ranked No . 1  in साम्राज्य `` the शीर्ष 100 फिल्म  Stars of All Time '' list .
, the United States domestic box office grosses of Ford 's films total  over us $ 3.5 अरब , साथ विश्वव्यापी  grosses surpassing $ 6 billion , making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star .
Ford  is the  husband of actress Calista Flockhart .
A tube of  chapstick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured  by फाइजर उपभोक्ता healthcare और प्रयुक्त in अनेक देशों  worldwide .
It is intended to help treat and prevent chapped lips  ; hence the नाम .
Many  किस्में भी  include sunscreen in order to prevent sunburn .
Due to its popularity , the term has become a  genericized ट्रेडमार्क  .
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained  in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और लागू  in the same manner as lipstick .
However , the term is still a registered trademark , with  अधिकारों exclusively  owned by Pfizer .
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom , the  उत्पाद 's प्रमुख प्रतिस्पर्धी is lypsyl , बना by novartis  Consumer Health , which is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick .
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ) , also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ) , was an Anglo-Irish  पारस जिनकी प्राथमिक उपलब्धि थी the उन्नति of a सिद्धान्त he  called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ) .
This  सिद्धान्त झुठलाए the अस्तित्व of सामग्री पदार्थ और बजाय contends  that familiar objects like tables and chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers , and as a result can not exist without being perceived .
Thus , as Berkeley famously put it , for  शारीरिक वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi ''  ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ) .
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction , an important premise in his  तर्क लिये  immaterialism .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his first major work , , in which he discussed the limitations of human vision  और उन्नत the  theory that the proper objects of sight are not material objects , but light and colour .
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 which , after its poor reception , he rewrote in dialogue form and published under the  शीर्षक तीन संवाद  between Hylas and Philonous in 1713 .
In this book , Berkeley 's views were  represented by philonous ( यूनानी  : 'lover of mind ' ) , while Hylas ( Greek : 'matter ' ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents , in particular John Locke .
बर्कली argued विरूद्ध सर इसहाक़  Newton 's doctrine of absolute space , time and motion in De Motu ( on Motion ) , published 1721 .
His  वितर्क यहूद a precursor  to the views of Mach and Einstein .
In 1732 , he published  alciphron , a ईसाई क्षमाप्रार्थी विरूद्ध the free-thinkers  , and in 1734 , he published The Analyst , an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal calculus , which was influential in the development of mathematics .
His last major philosophical work , Siris ( 1744 ) , begins by  वकालत the औषधीय उपयोग of तारकोल जल  , and then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including science , philosophy , and theology .
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II , because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century such as the problems of  बोध  , the difference between primary and secondary qualities , and the importance of language .
Qingdao ( ) , historically known as Tsingtao , is a major city in eastern Shandong province , Eastern  चीन  , with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ) .
Its built up area , made  of 6 शहरी जिले और 4 county-level  cities , is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010 .
It borders Yantai to the northeast , Weifang to the west and  rizhao to the दक्षिणपश्चिम  .
Qīng ( ) in Chinese  अर्थात् `` ग्रीन '' or  `` lush '' , while dǎo ( ) means `` island '' .
Qingdao is administered  at the sub-provincial  level .
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea , Qingdao  is a प्रमुख seaport  , naval base , and industrial centre .
It is also the site of the  tsingtao ब्रेवरी  .
The world 's longest sea bridge , the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge , links the main  शहरी क्षेत्रफल of चिंगदाओ  with Huangdao district , straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas .
Qingdao is named  चीन 's सबसे livable  city .
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified  प्रजाति नामित acanthamoeba polyphaga  mimivirus ( APMV ) , or is a group of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated usually MimiN ) .
In colloquial speech , APMV is more  commonly referred to as बस ``  mimivirus '' .
Until October 2011 , when a larger virus Megavirus chilensis was  वर्णित , it था the largest capsid व्यास of  all known viruses .
Mimivirus has a large and complex genome  compared साथ सबसे अन्य  viruses .
Mimivirus , short for `` mimicking  microbe '' , is so पुकारा to प्रतिबिंबित  its large size and apparent Gram-staining properties .
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed  विरोध between the लोगों of मैक्सिको और the स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक  authorities which started on September 16 , 1810 .
The movement , which became known as the Mexican War of Independence , was led by Mexican-born Spaniards  , mestizos और amerindians जो sought  independence from Spain .
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their colonial masters , but  ended as an असंभावित गठबंधन between मैक्सिकन ex-royalists और  Mexican guerrilla insurgents .
Crohn 's disease , also  ज्ञात as crohn सिंड्रोम और क्षेत्रीय enteritis , is a प्रकार of जलन bowel बीमारी  that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus , causing a wide variety of symptoms .
It primarily causes abdominal pain , diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ) , vomiting ( can be continuous ) , or weight loss , but may also cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes ,  गठिया , सूजन of the नजर , थकान  , and lack of concentration .
Crohn 's disease is caused by  interactions between पर्यावरणीय  , immunological and bacterial factors in genetically susceptible individuals .
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder , in which the body 's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract  संभवतः निर्देशित at सूक्ष्मजैविक antigens  .
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an autoimmune  बीमारी in the पास्ट ; हाल  investigators have described it as an immune deficiency state .
There is a genetic association with Crohn 's disease , primarily with  विसंगतियाँ of the nod2 जीन और इसके प्रोटीन , जिससे होश  bacterial cell walls .
Siblings of affected individuals  हैं at उच्चतर  risk .
Males and females  हैं बराबर  affected .
Smokers are two times more likely  to develop  Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers .
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000  और 600,000 लोगों in  North America .
Prevalence  estimates लिये उत्तरी यूरोपीय  have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000 .
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties , with another  शिखर incidence in the fifties to seventies , हालांकि the बीमारी can  occur at any age .
There is no known pharmaceutical or surgical cure for  crohn 's बीमारी  .
Treatment options  हैं प्रतिबंधित to controlling  symptoms , maintaining remission , and preventing relapse .
The disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn , who , in 1932 , together with two other colleagues at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York ,  वर्णित a श्रेणी of मरीजों साथ सूजन of the टर्मिनल ileum , the क्षेत्रफल सबसे commonly प्रभावित  by the illness .

The list directly includes the tallest buildings and structures for each country , and where  उचित , it भी अंक  to more detailed country-specific lists .
Rough and Ready is  a census-designated  place in Nevada County , California , United States .
It is located west of  ग्रास घाटी  , California , approximately 62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  963 at the 2010 census .
YouTube is a video-sharing website , created by three former PayPal  कर्मचारी in फ़रवरी 2005 , on जिससे उपयोक्ता can अपलोड  , view and share videos .
The company is based in San Bruno , California , and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to  प्रदर्शक a चौड़ी किस्में of user-generated वीडियो सामग्री , सहित फिल्म क्लिप्स , tv  clips , and music videos , as well as amateur content such as video blogging , short original videos , and educational videos .
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals , although media corporations including CBS , the BBC , Vevo , Hulu , and other organizations offer some of their material  via the साईट , as  part of the YouTube partnership program .
Unregistered users can watch videos , while registered  उपयोक्ता can अपलोड an असीमित  number of videos .
Videos  माना to contain potentially  offensive content are available only to registered users at least 18 years old .
In November 2006 , YouTube , LLC was bought by  google लिये us $ 1.65 अरब , और operates  as a subsidiary of Google .
Sister Act is a musical written by Cheri Steinkellner and Bill Steinkellner with additional book material by  डगलस कार्टर beane , साथ गीत by ग्लेन स्लेटर और म्यूज़िक by एलन menken  .
It is  आधारित on the hit 1992  film comedy of the same name .
The 2009 West End production was produced by Stage Entertainment , Whoopi Goldberg ,  और माइकल रेनो लिये  Sis Acts LLC .
Goldberg is also a  निर्माता of the  2011 Broadway adaptation .
Microsoft DirectX is a collection  of  application programming interfaces ( APIs ) for handling tasks related to multimedia , especially game programming and video , on Microsoft platforms .
Originally , the names of these APIs all began with Direct  , ऐसे as direct3d , directdraw  , DirectMusic , DirectPlay , DirectSound , and so forth .
The name DirectX was coined as shorthand term for all of these APIs ( the X standing in for the  particular api names ) और जल्द became the नाम of the संग्रहण  .
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console , the X was used as the basis of the name  एक्सबॉक्स to indicate कि the कंसोल  was based on DirectX technology .
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed for the Xbox such as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ) ,  जबकि the डाइरेक्टएक्स पैटर्न रै महरूम जारी लिये खिड़कियाँ api  such as Direct2D and DirectWrite .
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development of video games for Microsoft Windows , Microsoft Xbox , Microsoft Xbox 360 and  कुछ  Sega Dreamcast games .
Direct3D is also used by other software  अनुप्रयोग लिये  visualization and graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM engineering .
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of DirectX , it is common to see the names `` DirectX  '' और `` direct3d '' प्रयुक्त interchangeably  .
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable binary  रूप , साथ साथ accompanying दस्तावेज़ीकरण और headers  for use in coding .
Originally ,  the runtimes  were only installed by games or explicitly by the user .
Windows 95 did not launch with DirectX , but DirectX was  शामिल साथ खिड़कियाँ 95 oem सेवा  Release 2 .
Windows 98  और खिड़कियाँ nt 4.0 दोनो  shipped with DirectX , as has every version of Windows released since .
The SDK is available as a  फ़्री डाउनलोड  .
While the runtimes are proprietary , closed-source software , source code is provided for most of the SDK  नमूने  .
Starting with the release   of Windows 8 Developer Preview , DirectX SDK has been integrated into Windows SDK .
direct3d 9ex , direct3d 10 , और direct3d 11 हैं तभी उपलब्धियाँ लिये खिड़कियाँ विस्टा और  newer because each of these new versions was built to depend upon the new Windows Display Driver Model that was introduced for Windows Vista .
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics hardware for various applications and services like the Desktop  खिड़की मैनेजर  .
Quetzaltenango  , भी commonly ज्ञात  by its indigenous name , Xelajú , or more commonly , Xela , is the second largest city of Guatemala .
It  is दोनो the पूंजी of  Quetzaltenango Department and the municipal seat of Quetzaltenango municipality .
It has an estimated  जनसांख्यिकी of 224,703  .
The population is about  61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian  , 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European .
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an elevation of 2,330 meters ( 7,655 ft )  ऊपर समुद्र स्तर at इसके न्यूनतम  part .
It may  पहुँचें ऊपर  2,400 meters within the city .
The  नगरपालिका of  Quetzaltenango consists of an area of .
Municipalities abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá , Cantel , Almolonga , Zunil , El Palmar , Concepción  chiquirichapa , सैन mateo , la esperanza , olintepeque  , and San Andrés Xecul .
All these municipalities are part of the Department of Quetzaltenango , except San Andrés Xecul which is a part  of the विभाग of totonicapán  .
The Epic of Gilgamesh  , an एपिक कविता इससे मेसोपोटामिया ,  is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature .
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about  'Bilgamesh ' (  Sumerian for Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk .
Four of these were used as source material for a combined  एपिक in अक्कादी .
This first combined epic , known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version ,  तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is titled बाद  its incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a few fragments of it have  बच  .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and  bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru  ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of  लगभग दो  thirds of this longer , twelve-tablet version have been recovered .
Some of the  बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा  in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a friendship between  gilgamesh और enkidu  .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract  उसे इससे oppressing the लोगों of uruk  .
Together , they journey to the Cedar  पहाड़ to शिकस्त  Humbaba , its monstrous guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven , which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish  gilgamesh लिये spurning  her advances .
As a punishment for  ये क्रियाएँ , the  gods sentence Enkidu to death .
The second half of the epic focuses  on gilgamesh 's  distress at Enkidu 's death , and his quest for immortality .
In order to learn the secret of eternal  जीवन , gilgamesh  undertakes a long and perilous journey .
He learns that `` The life that you are  seeking तुम होगा never ढूँढें  .
When the gods created man they  आवंटित to उसे मौत , लकिन जीवन वे retained  in their own keeping . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic , and then attributed to  the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim  in the Akkadian version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death , because of his great building projects , and his account  of कया utnapishtim बताई उसे happened दौरान the बाढ़  .
The story has been  अनूदित into अनेक अलग भाषाएं  , and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction .
There are numerous debates over who created the first video game , with the  जवाब depending largely on कैसा वीडियो खेल हैं पारिभाषित  .
The evolution of  वीडियो खेल represents  a tangled web of several different industries , including scientific , computer , arcade , and consumer electronics .
The `` video '' in `` video game `` traditionally refers to  a रास्टर प्रदर्शक  device .
With the popular catch phrase use of the term `` video game '' , the  पद अभी implies सब प्रदर्शक प्रकार , स्वरुप , और प्लेटफ़ॉर्म  .
Historians have also sought to bypass the issue by instead using the  अधिक विशिष्ट `` डिजिटल खेल '' वर्णनात्मक  .
This term leaves out the earlier  analog-based कंप्यूटर  games .

Unless  वरना stated , संख्याएँ indicate विश्वव्यापी  units sold , ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount .
The exception  हैं the ones specifying शिपमेंट , जिससे  have lower precedence than others listing sales .
Franchise sales include expansion  पैक भी हालांकि  they are not considered full video games .
For best-selling individual video games , see List  of best-selling  video games .
The sales figures given below do not include arcade game sales  , जिससे can be मिला  at List of highest-grossing arcade video games .
