Kennewick is a  नगर in benton काउंटी in the southeastern भाग of the  U.S. state of Washington , near the Hanford nuclear site .
It is the most populous of the three cities collectively  referred to as the tri-cities ( the अन्य होने pasco और richland  ) .
Kennewick is located along the southwest bank of the Columbia River , opposite Pasco and just south of the confluence of the  कोलंबिया और  Yakima rivers .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 73,917 at the 2010 census .
April 1 , 2012 estimates from the Washington State  दफ्तर of वित्तीय प्रबन्धन put the  city 's population at 75,160 .
The  निकटतम वाणिज्यिक विमानक्षेत्र  is the Tri-Cities Airport in Pasco , a regional commercial and private airport .
Forbes magazine named Kennewick the # 2 area in the United States  लिये जॉब विकास , जबकि आसपास  Yakima was named # 1 .
The article cites the number of scientists employed by the Pacific Northwest  नेशनल प्रयोगशाला और क्षेत्रफल  farmland for this outlook .
The  prothrombin समय ( pt )  and its derived measures of prothrombin ratio ( PR ) and international normalized ratio ( INR ) are measures of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation .
This test is  भी पुकारा  `` ProTime INR '' and `` PT/INR '' .
They are used to determine the clotting  tendency of रक्त , in the माप of warfarin  dosage , liver damage , and vitamin K status .
PT measures factors I (  फाइब्रिनोजेन  ) , II ( prothrombin ) , V , VII , and X .
It is used in conjunction with the activated partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) which  उपायों the मूलभूत  pathway .
`` I 'm in the Mood for Love  '' is  a popular song .
The music was written by Jimmy McHugh ,  the गीत by डोरोथी  Fields .
The song was  प्रकाशित in 1935  .
it थी introduced  by Frances Langford in the movie Every Night at Eight released that year .
The song was featured in the 1936 Our Gang ( Little Rascals ) short , The Pinch Singer , sung by Carl ``  अल्फाल्फा '' switzer  , and in the 1936 film Palm Springs .
It  is प्रायः ज्ञात  to be Switzer 's signature song .
James Moody 's saxophone solo on a 1952 recording of this song  प्रेरित the सोंग `` मूडी 's मनोदशा  for Love `` .
Hip hop  कलाकार प्रिंस पॉल sampled  the song as the basis for the track `` Mood for Love '' on his album A Prince Among Thieves ( 1999 ) , with Don Newkirk singing its original lyrics .
The song 's title inspired the  अंग्रेज़ी शीर्षक  of Wong Kar Wai 's movie In the Mood for Love .
Cross-cultural psychology is  the वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई  of human behavior and mental processes , including both their variability and invariance , under diverse cultural conditions .
Through expanding research  methodologies to recognize सांस्कृतिक  variance in behavior , language , and meaning it seeks to extend and develop psychology .
Since psychology as an academic discipline was developed  largely in उत्तर अमेरिका , कुछ psychologists became चिंतित कि constructs स्वीकृत as सार्वभौमिक यहूद नहीं as निश्चर as previously assumed ,  especially since many attempts to replicate notable experiments in other cultures had varying success .
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes , such as affect , cognition , conceptions of the self , and  मुद्दे ऐसे as psychopathology , चिंता , और अवसाद , may कमी बाह्य  validity when `` exported '' to other cultural contexts , cross-cultural psychology re-examines them using methodologies designed to factor in cultural differences so as to account for cultural variance .
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural psychological research and claim that serious  त्रुटियां in the सैद्धांतिक और methodological bases प्रयुक्त impede बल्कि than सहायता the  scientific search for universal principles in psychology , cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the study of how differences ( variance ) occur , rather than searching for universals in the style of physics or chemistry .
In 1972 the International Association of  cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान  ( IACCP ) was established .
This branch of psychology has continued to expand as there has been an increasing popularity of  incorporating संस्कृति और विविधता  into studies .
Cross-cultural  मनोविज्ञान is differentiated इससे सांस्कृतिक  psychology .
The latter is the branch of psychology that  holds कि इंसान बर्ताव is significantly  influenced by cultural differences , meaning that psychological phenomena can only be compared with each other across cultures to a very limited extent .
In contrast , cross-cultural psychology includes a  ढूंढें लिये संभावित  universals in behavior and mental processes .
Walter J. Lonner , writing for Eye on Psi Chi , has stated that `` cross-cultural psychology can be thought of as a  प्रकार शोध methodology , बल्कि  than an entirely separate field within psychology ( 2000 ) . ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga ,  इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम born इस रास्ता  ( 2011 ) .
It was  released by interscope  Records on April 15 , 2011 , four days ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne , `` Judas '' is a dance  और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस  song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her .
It embodies the  incidents कि have haunted गागा in the पास्ट , और इसके  core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further explained that the song was also about honoring one  's भीतरी अंधेरा in अनुक्रम to लाओ oneself  into the light .
The artwork for the single was  designed by गागा in  Microsoft Word .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the song was generally well received by critics , who likened the song to `` Bad  रोमांस `` साथ कुछ  noting it should have been the album 's lead single .
The song has  a समान ध्वनि to गागा 's पिछला  RedOne-produced tracks , including `` Poker Face `` , `` LoveGame `` , `` Bad Romance '' , and `` Alejandro `` .
It contains three distinct hooks and a  हाउस -influenced ब्रेक  down .
Gaga explained that the lines  बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण  talk about her as beyond redemption , regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be .
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening , but was less successful  commercially in तुलना to  Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached  the शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट  in most major music markets , and also reached the top of the charts in South Korea .
A music video for the  सोंग थी फिल्माया in अप्रैल 2011 , co-directed  by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus .
It has a Biblical storyline where Reedus  निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई  Mary Magdalene .
The video  portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक  day missionaries going to Jerusalem .
It  शामिल the biblical  story of Judas betraying Jesus , and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the alleged use of religious  imagery और उसके भूमिका in the वीडियो  .
however  , critics generally praised the video , not finding any offensive content .
The video was nominated for  दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 एमटीवी  Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows , including The Graham Norton Show , Saturday Night Live , Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '' , the French X Factor as  खूब as on the एलेन degeneres  Show .
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a standard for video  संपीडन , और is फिलहाल एक of the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त स्वरुप लिये the रिकॉर्डिंग ,  compression , and distribution of high definition video .
The final  drafting कार्य  on the first version of the standard was completed in May 2003 .
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -based  कोडेक मानक विकसित  by the ITU-T Video Coding Experts Group ( VCEG ) together with the ISO/IEC JTC1 Moving Picture Experts Group ( MPEG ) .
The  प्रोजेक्ट साझेदारी  effort is known as the Joint Video Team ( JVT ) .
The ITU-T H.264 standard and the ISO/IEC MPEG-4 AVC standard ( formally , ISO/IEC 14496-10 – MPEG-4 Part 10 , Advanced Video Coding ) are jointly  कायम so कि वे have एकसमान  technical content .
H.264 is perhaps best known as being one of the  कोडेक मानकों  for Blu-ray Discs ; all Blu-ray Disc players must be able to decode H.264 .
It is also widely used by streaming internet sources , such as videos from Vimeo , YouTube , and the iTunes Store , web software such  as the adobe फ्लैश खिलाड़ी और microsoft silverlight , और भी विभिन्न  HDTV broadcasts over terrestrial ( ATSC , ISDB-T , DVB-T or DVB-T2 ) , cable ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ) .
Non-binding arbitration is a type of  मध्यस्थता in जिससे the arbitrator makes a determination of the  rights of the parties to the dispute , but this determination is not binding upon them , and no enforceable arbitration award is issued .
The `` award ''  is in प्रभाव an  advisory opinion of the arbitrator 's view of the respective merits of the parties cases .
Non-binding arbitration is used in  कनेक्शन साथ कोशिशें  to reach a negotiated settlement .
The role of an arbitrator in  non-binding मध्यस्थता is , on  the surface , similar to that of a mediator in a mediation .
However , the principal distinction is that whereas a mediator will try to help the parties find a middle ground to compromise at , the arbitrator remains totally removed from the settlement process and will only give a determination of  देयता और , if उचित , an indication of the क्वांटम of क्षतिपूर्ति  payable .
Subsequent to a non-binding arbitration , the parties remain free to pursue their claims either through the courts , or by way of a binding arbitration ,  हालांकि in अभ्यास a उपनिवेश  is the most common outcome .
The award and reasoning in a non-binding arbitration is almost invariably inadmissible in any subsequent action in the courts or in  another  arbitration tribunal .
Non-binding arbitration is utilised mostly in  the संयुक्त  States and Canada .
It is largely unknown in Europe , although in the United Kingdom there is a practice of parties who are seeking a settlement to jointly instruct a Queen 's Counsel for an opinion on the  merits और संभावित क्वांटम of a अर्जी , और  then to negotiate on the basis of the views expressed in that opinion .
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome Complex on Augustine Island in  southwestern कुक इनलेट in the kenai  Peninsula Borough of southcentral coastal Alaska , southwest of Anchorage .
The Alaska Volcano Observatory currently rates Mount Augustine as Level of Concern Color Code Green for  विमानन और the ज्वालामुखी चेतावनी स्तर is  at Normal .
Augustine Island has a land area of ,  जबकि वेस्ट द्वीप  , just off Augustine 's western shores , has .
The island  is बना up मुख्यतः  of past eruption deposits .
Scientists have been able to discern that past dome collapse has  resulted in विशाल avalanches  .
A  मैप  of Belize .
The country of Belize has roughly 386  km of तटरेखा , और रै  many coral reefs , cays , and islands in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of these form the Belize Barrier Reef , the longest in the western  गोलार्ध stemming लगभग  .
The reef and its islands have  महरूम a युनेस्को  World Heritage Site since 1996 .
The following is a list of oceanic islands of  बेलीज़ , arranged according to प्रदेश लकिन  all of which are in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of the islands variate in spelling between `` cay '' and `` caye '' , and also  उपयोग the स्पेनी `` cayo ''  .
River islands have  नहीं महरूम  listed .
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet writing application for the Microsoft Windows operating system that allows optical disc data storage  डिवाइस to be प्रयुक्त in a manner समान  to floppy disks .
DLA is a packet writing  प्रौद्योगिकी लिये cd और dvd मीडिया  that uses the UDF file system .
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista and newer , although a patch  exists to फिक्स इस समस्या  under Windows Vista .
roxio बर्न थी introduced  on April 30 , 2009 .
As a replacement for DLA , it remedies compatibility issues  अंतरजाल  Explorer 8 .
Alpha Rex Emmanuel Humbard ( August 13 , 1919 –  सितंबर 21 , 2007 ) थी a well-known अमरीकी टेलीविज़न इंजीलवादी  whose Cathedral of Tomorrow show was shown on over 600 stations at the peak of its popularity .
Limitless is a 2011  अमरीकी थ्रिलर फिल्मी  directed by Neil Burger and starring Bradley Cooper , Abbie Cornish , and Robert De Niro .
It is based on the  2001 अनोखा the अंधेरा फ़ील्ड  by Alan Glynn with the screenplay by Leslie Dixon .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity  of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप , साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  boundary with Canada to the east , the Arctic Ocean to the north , and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is  the largest राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल , the  4th least populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States .
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live  भीतर  the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil , natural gas , and fishing industries ; it has  ये संसाधन in प्रचुरता  .
Alaska was purchased from Russia on  कूच 30 , 1867 , लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $  adjusted for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11 , 1912 ,  और the 49th राज्य of the u.S. on जनवरी  3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in  the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल , जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप  and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq , meaning `` the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska  , the `` ग्रेट  land '' , an Aleut word derived from the same root .
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ( NMMU ) is a South African tertiary education institution with its  प्रमुख प्रशासन in the तटीय नगर  of Port Elizabeth .
A merging of three institutions founded NMMU in January 2005  but  its history dates back to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों draws अंतरराष्ट्रीय  students from all over the world .
There are over 3000 international students and include students from the United States , France , China , Germany ,  बेल्जियम , डेनमार्क , फिनलैंड , नीदरलैंड्स  , Norway , Sweden , United Kingdom and many other countries .
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering  पेशेवर और वोकेशनल प्रशिक्षण  .
The University has six campuses - five in  बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ और  one in George .
The  प्रमुख कैम्पस  is the South Campus .
Students at NMMU can study towards diplomas and  डिग्री up to और सहित डॉक्टरेट  level qualifications .
A number of courses include workplace  अनुभव as भाग of the  curriculum .
CoverGirl is an American cosmetics brand founded  in मेरीलैंड , by the noxzema रासायनिक कम्पनी ( बाद पुकारा  Noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989 .
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line by allowing ``  कवर लड़कियों  '' , fashion models who appear on the front cover of women 's magazines , to wear its products .
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct  व्यक्तिगत ग्राहक सेवा by providing  a wide variety of cosmetics available at reasonable prices .
On the Origin of Species , published on 24  नवम्बर 1859 , is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य  by Charles Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology .
Its full  शीर्षक थी on the उत्पत्ति of प्रजाति  by Means of Natural Selection , or the Preservation of Favoured Races in the Struggle for Life .
For the sixth edition of 1872 , the short  शीर्षक थी बदला to  The Origin of Species .
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory that populations evolve over  the कोर्स  of generations through a process of natural selection .
It presented a body of evidence that the diversity of  जीवन arose by आम descent through  a branching pattern of evolution .
Darwin included evidence that he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s and his subsequent findings from research ,  पत्राचार , और  experimentation .
विभिन्न विकासवादी विचार  had already been proposed to explain new findings in biology .
There was growing support for such ideas among dissident  anatomists और the सामान्य  public , but during the first half of the 19th century the English scientific establishment was closely tied to the Church of England , while science was part of natural theology .
Ideas  परिचय the transmutation of प्रजाति यहूद विवादास्पद as वे विरोधी  with the beliefs that species were unchanging parts of a designed hierarchy and that humans were unique , unrelated to other animals .
The political and theological  implications यहूद पडती  debated , but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream .
The book was written for non-specialist readers and  आकर्षित फैली  interest upon its publication .
As Darwin was an eminent scientist , his findings were taken seriously and the  प्रमाण he प्रस्तुत  generated scientific , philosophical , and religious discussion .
The debate over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H . Huxley and his fellow  सदस्यों of the x क्लबों to secularise विज्ञान  by promoting scientific naturalism .
Within two decades there  थी फैली वैज्ञानिक अनुबंध कि  evolution , with a branching pattern of common descent , had occurred , but scientists were slow to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate .
During the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the 1880s to the 1930s , various other  mechanisms of एवोल्यूशन यहूद  given more credit .
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s , Darwin 's concept of  विकासवादी अनुकूलन through प्राकृतिक चयन  became central to modern evolutionary theory , now the unifying concept of the life sciences .
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' Stengel ( ; July 30  , 1890 – सितंबर 29 , 1975 ) , nicknamed ``  The Old Perfessor '' , was an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager .
He was  निर्वाचित to the  Baseball Hall of Fame in .
Stengel was born in Kansas City , Missouri , and originally  nicknamed `` डच '' , a आम उपनाम  at that time for Americans of German ancestry .
After  उसके प्रमुख लीग करियर began , he acquired the उपनाम  `` Casey '' , which originally came from the initials of his hometown ( `` K. C. '' ) , which evolved into `` Casey '' , influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat .
In the 1950s , sportswriters dubbed him with yet another nickname , `` The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ) , for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on  anything बेसबॉल -सुनानाd  .
Although his baseball career spanned a number of teams and cities  , he is primarily संबद्ध साथ क्लब  in New York City .
Between playing and managing , he  is the तभी  man to have worn four of New York 's major league clubs ' uniforms .
He was the first of four men ( through the season ) to  मैनेज दोनो the नई यॉर्क  Yankees and New York Mets ; Yogi Berra , Dallas Green , and Joe Torre are the others .
जैसे टोरेस , he भी  managed the Braves and the Dodgers .
He ended his baseball career as the beloved manager for the then expansion New York Mets , which won over the hearts of New  यॉर्क partly due to the अद्वितीय अक्षर  of their veteran leader .
June ( ) is the  छठे माह of the साल in the जूलियन  and Gregorian calendars and one of the four months with a length of 30 days .
Ovid provides two etymologies for June 's name  in उसके कविता  concerning the months entitled the Fasti .
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno , wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek goddess Hera ; the second is that the name comes from the Latin word  iuniores , अर्थ `` younger ones , '' as opposed to maiores ( `` बड़ो '' ) लिये  which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ) .
See : Months in various calendars also called the season of the June is the month with  the longest daylight घंटों of the साल in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध  and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere .
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal equivalent to  दिसम्बर in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध और वाइस versa  .
In the Northern hemisphere , the beginning of the meteorological  गर्मियाँ is 1 जून  .
In the Southern hemisphere , the beginning of the meteorological  शीत is  1 June .
At the start of June , the sun rises in the constellation of Taurus ; at the end of June  , the सूर्य उदय in  the constellation of Gemini .
However , due to the precession of  the equinoxes , जून begins साथ the सूर्य in the astrological चिह्न of मिथुन  , and ends with the sun in the astrological sign of Cancer .
June is known for the large number of marriages  कि occur over the कोर्स  of the month .
According to one etymology , June is named  बाद juno ( hera  ) .
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a married couple 's household , so some  consider it शुभ लक to be शादीशुदा in  this month .
According to another etymology provided by the Roman poet Ovid , June is named for the  iuniores , लैटिन लिये `` यंग लोगों '' ( fasti  VI.88 ) and that the month of May is named for the maiores , Latin for `` elders '' .
In Iceland , folklore says that if you bathe naked in the morning dew on the morning of June 24 , you are supposed to keep  वृद्धावस्था at खाड़ी  for longer .
A constitution is  a नियत of आधारभूत सिद्धान्त  or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed .
These rules together make up , i.e  . constitute , कया  the entity is .
When these principles are written down into a single document or set of legal documents , those documents may be said to embody a written constitution ; if they are written down in a  सिंगल व्यापक दस्तावेज़ , it is कहा to  embody a codified constitution .
Constitutions concern different  स्तर of संगठन  , from sovereign states to companies and unincorporated associations .
A treaty which establishes an international organization is also its constitution , in  कि it होता define कैसा कि संगठन is  constituted .
Within states , whether sovereign or federated , a  संविधान defines  the principles upon which the state is based , the procedure in which laws are made and by whom .
Some constitutions , especially  संहिताबद्ध constitutions , भी अधिनियम as limiters of राज्य शक्ति , by establishing  lines which a state 's rulers can not cross , such as fundamental rights .
George Washington at Constitutional Convention of  1787 , हस्ताक्षर of u.S. संविधान  .
The Constitution  of इण्डिया is the longest लिखा संविधान of कोई sovereign देश in the संसार ,  containing 448 articles , 12 schedules and 100 amendments , with 117,369 words in its English language version , while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution , at 7 articles and 27 amendments .
Ron Diftler ( left ) , NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training session in the Space Environment  सिमुलेशन प्रयोगशाला at नासा 's जॉनसन स्पेस  Center .
Engineering management is a specialized form of management  कि is चिंतित साथ the अनुप्रयोग  of engineering principles to business practice .
अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबन्धन is a करियर कि brings साथ the technological problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी  and the organizational , administrative , and planning abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion .
Example areas of engineering are product  विकास , निर्माण  , construction , design engineering , industrial engineering , technology , production , or any other field that employs personnel who perform an engineering function .
Successful engineering managers  typically आवश्यकता  training and experience in business and engineering .
Technically inept  प्रबंधक tend to be वंचित of support  by their technical team , and non-commercial managers tend to lack commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy .
Largely , engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by  non-entrepreneurial  thinking , thus require the necessary people skills to coach , mentor and motivate technical professionals .
Engineering  पेशेवर  joining manufacturing companies sometimes become engineering managers by default after a period of time .
They are required  to सीख कैसा to मैनेज एकबार वे हैं  on the job , though this is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities .
In an insurance policy , the deductible is the amount  of खर्च कि जरूर be  paid out of pocket before an insurer will pay any expenses .
In general usage , the term deductible may be used to  describe एक of अनेक प्रकार of clauses ( देखिए नीचे ) कि  are used by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments .
Deductibles are  typically प्रयुक्त to deter  the large number of trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of .
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs , the  बीमे कड़ expects to अदा आउट थोड़ा छोटी amounts much कम  frequently , incurring much higher savings .
As a result , insurance premiums are  typically सस्ता जब वे involve  higher deductibles .
Deductibles are normally provided as clauses in an insurance policy that  dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered व्यय is borne by  the policyholder .
They are normally quoted as a fixed  मात्रा और is a भाग  of most policies covering losses to the policy holder .
The insurer then becomes liable for  claimable खर्च कि  exceed this amount ( subject to the maximum sum claimable indicated in the contract ) .
Depending on the  नीति , the deductible  may apply per covered incident , or per year .
For policies where incidences are not easy to delimit ( for example health insurance ) , the  deductible is typically  applied per year .
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer based on  the कारण of the  claim .
For example , a single housing insurance policy may contain multiple deductible amounts for loss or damage arising from  चोरी , आग , प्राकृतिक calamities , निकासी  etc .
There are also deductible reimbursement programs that reimburse a deductible in the event of an auto  , घर , boat/yacht or स्वास्थ्य  insurance claim .
An invoice or bill is a commercial document issued by a seller to a buyer , indicating the products ,  quantities , और सहमत कीमतें  for products or services the seller has provided the buyer .
An  चालान indicates  the sale transaction only .
Payment terms are independent of the invoice and are  negotiated by the खरीदार और the  seller .
Payment  शर्तें हैं प्रायः  included on the invoice .
The buyer  could have already सशुल्क  for the products or services listed on the invoice .
Buyer can also have a maximum number of days in which to pay for these goods and is sometimes offered a discount if paid  पहले the due तिथि  .
In the rental industry , an invoice must include a specific  सन्दर्भ to the अवधि of the समय होने  billed , so in addition to quantity , price and discount the invoicing amount is also based on duration .
Generally each line of a  rental चालान होगा refer to the वास्तविक  hours , days , weeks , months , etc. , being billed .
From the point of view  of a विक्रेता , an चालान  is a sales invoice .
From the point of view of a  खरीदार , an चालान  is a purchase invoice .
The document indicates the buyer and seller , but the term  चालान indicates धन is owed  or owing .
In English , the context of the term  चालान is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to clarify इसके  meaning , such as `` We sent them an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ) .
The right main  bronchus ( or  right primary bronchus , or right principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system .
It is wider , shorter , and more vertical in  दिशा than the बाएँ  .
It is  परिचय 2.5 cm long , और enters  the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra .
The azygos  रग arches over  it from behind ; and the right pulmonary artery lies at first below and then in front of it .
About 2 cm from its  शुरुआत it देता बंद a शाखा to  the upper lobe of the right lung .
This is termed the eparterial branch of the bronchus , because it arises  ऊपर the सही pulmonary धमनी  .
The bronchus  अभी गुजरता नीचे the धमनी  , and is known as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into two branches for the middle and lower lobes .
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the trachea , it will most likely enter the right main bronchus instead of the left ,  due to the straighter संरेखण of the सही bronchus to the श्वासनली  .
Squash is a racquet sport played by two (  singles ) or चार खिलाड़ी ( युगल  ) in a four-walled court with a small , hollow rubber ball .
The players must alternate in striking the ball with their racquet and hit the ball onto the  playable सतहों of the चार दीवारें of  the court .
The game was formerly called squash racquets , a reference to the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the game ( compared with the  fatter बॉल प्रयुक्त in इसके जनक  game racquets or rackets ) .
Squash is recognized by the IOC and supporters are lobbying for its  incorporation in a भविष्य ओलम्पिक  program .
In 2003 ,  फोर्ब्स रेटेड स्क्वैश as  the number one healthiest sport to play .
Residual oil is oil found  in कम एकाग्रता naturally  or in exhausted oil fields .
Often mixed  साथ जल , it can नहीं be बरामद  by conventional techniques .
However , it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( CO2 EOR ) which involves injecting  कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड into the खूब reducing श्यानता और  enhancing flow of the oil .
The technique is not new but has not been used extensively on  अवशेष आयल zones  , low-grade deposits of petroleum such as the 38 square miles in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr .
The  तकनीक  is limited by availability of carbon dioxide .
It does  नहीं परिणाम in sequestration  of the carbon dioxide but the gas is recycled as much as possible .
United States reserves of residual  आयल हैं अनुमानित to  be 100 billion barrels .
Artist 's rendering of the fire , by John R. Chapin , originally  मुद्रित in हार्पर 's साप्ताहिक ; the दृश्य चेहरों  northeast across the Randolph Street Bridge .
The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration that burned from Sunday , October 8 , to early Tuesday , October 10 , 1871 , killing hundreds  और destroying परिचय in शिकागो  , Illinois .
Though the fire was one of the  largest u.S. आपदाओं of the 19th सदी , the पुनर्निर्माण  that began helped develop Chicago as one of the most populous and economically important American cities .
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) was king of England from 21  अप्रैल 1509 जबतक उसके मौत  .
He was lord , and later king , of Ireland , as well as continuing the nominal claim by the  अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the किंगडम of  France .
हेनरी थी the दूसरी monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश  , succeeding his father , Henry VII .
Besides his six marriages , Henry VIII is known for his role in the separation of  the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the रोमन  Catholic Church .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to  the विरह of the  Church of England from papal authority , the Dissolution of the Monasteries , and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England .
Yet  he remained a आस्तिक  in core Catholic theological teachings , even after his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and Wales  साथ the कानून in वेल्स अधिनियमों 1535  and 1542 .
In 1513 , the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor ,  maximillian i , और invaded फ़्रांस in  1513 with a large , well-equipped army , but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
Maximillian , for his part , used the  अंग्रेज़ी  invasion to his own ends , and this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French .
This foray would  prove the प्रारंभ of an obsession लिये हेनरी  , who invaded again in 1544 .
This time , Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne , but again the Holy Roman Emperor , Charles V , supported Henry only as long as he needed to and  इंग्लैण्ड , strained by the विशाल लागत of the युद्ध , ransomed the नगर  back for peace .
उसके contemporaries माना हेनरी in उसके प्रधान to be an आकर्षक , शिक्षित और  accomplished king , and he has been described as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling with absolute power , he also engaged himself as an author and  composer  .
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars of the Roses – led  to the दो बाते लिये जिससे हेनरी is सबसे remembered : उसके छह विवाह और  the English Reformation .
Henry became morbidly obese and  उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered , contributing  to his death in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised in his later life as a lustful , egotistical , harsh ,  और असुरक्षित किंग .
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language  telenovela उत्पादित  by the United States television network Telemundo , in conjunction with the Antena 3 network and RTI Producciones .
Based on a novel of the  वही नाम by स्पेनी लेखक arturo pérez-reverte , the नाटक  depicts the rise of Teresa Mendoza ( Kate del Castillo ) , a young woman from Mexico who becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain .
Patricio Wills , the president of Telemundo Television Studios ,  थी the  executive producer .
Though La  reina डेल सूर थी मनोनीत  for Novela of the Year , Favorite Lead Actress , and Best Bad Luck Video , it won no awards .
With a $ 10 million budget , La  reina डेल  Sur was the most expensive telenovela ever produced by Telemundo .
The program 's premiere on February 28 , 2011 , was the network 's highest  रेटेड प्रीमियर लिये a telenovela  to date .
The program frequently dominated  इसके समय स्लॉट , भी over अंग्रेज़ी  language programming on other major U.S. networks .
La Reina del Sur completed its 63 episode run on  telemundo और इसके 13 एपीसोड चलाएं  on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30 , 2011 .
The final episode was the highest rated broadcast  in telemundo 's 19-year इतिहास ( 4.2 लाख दर्शक  ) , and beat all of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic .
The program 's success spurred Telemundo to launch its first campaign to gain  the श्रेणी an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन  .
A one-night  खास featuring अनेक डाल सदस्यों  aired on May 31 , 2011 , and marked the Telemundo debut of noted Latina television personality Cristina Saralegui .
La Reina del Sur is broadcast in several other markets , including  सर्बिया , कोलंबिया , चिली , साइप्रस  , Nicaragua , Costa Rica , Mexico , Albania , Hungary , Slovenia , Croatia , Romania , ( among others ) .
An  उदाहरण  of rack mounted servers
A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service  कि allows individuals  and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts  हैं कंपनियाँ कि provide स्पेस on a सर्वर  owned or leased for use by clients , as well as providing Internet connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet for other servers located in their  आंकड़ा बीच , पुकारा colocation , भी ज्ञात as आवास in लैटिन  America or France .
the पैमाना of वेब  hosting services varies greatly .
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting ,  जहाँ फाइलें can be अपलोड  via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The  फाइलें हैं प्रायः वितरित  to the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing .
अनेक अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं  ( ISPs ) offer this service free to subscribers .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting  इससे वैकल्पिक सेवा  providers .
Personal web site hosting is  typically फ़्री  , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size and type  of the जालस्थल  .
Single page hosting is  generally sufficient  for personal web pages .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides database support and application development  प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g . पीएचपी , जावा , माणिक्य on rails  , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow customers to write or install  स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग जैसे  forums and content management .
Also , Secure  sockets परत (  SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce .
The host may also provide an interface or control  फलक लिये  managing the Web server and installing scripts , as well as other modules and service applications like e-mail .
Some hosts specialize in certain software  or सेवाएं ( e.g . e-commerce ) , जिससे हैं  commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure .
Madden NFL ( known as  जॉन मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल पहले 1993 ) is an अमरीकी  football video game series developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports .
The game series is named after Pro Football Hall of Famer John Madden , a well-known former Super Bowl –winning coach of the  ओकलैंड हमलावरों और रंग कमेंटेटर  .
The series is  the बेहतरीन selling ea  Sports series .
The games have consistently been a best seller , and has even spawned TV shows  जहाँ खिलाड़ी  compete .
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player statistics , and voice commentary  कि allows खिलाड़ी  to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast .
The Madden NFL series has been nicknamed  the एनएफएल 's 33rd मताधिकार  .
The series was originally conceived  by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला संस्थापक ट्रिप हॉकिन्स  , who then approached Madden in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise .
Due to Madden 's insistence  कि the खेल be  as realistic as possible , the first version of John Madden Football was not released until 1988 .
the दूसरी संस्करण of the  game was released in 1990 , with annual versions since then .
The series ' name was changed to Madden  एनएफएल in 1993 बाद ea acquired the  rights to use NFL teams and players .
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in  2009 , he continues  to lend his name and provide expertise for the game .
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born July 10 , 1957 ) is an American  antiwar  activist whose son , U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan , was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War .
She attracted  नेशनल और अंतरराष्ट्रीय मीडिया ध्यान in अगस्त  2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift camp outside President George W. Bush 's Texas ranch —a stand that drew both passionate support and angry criticism .
Sheehan ran  unsuccessfully लिये कॉंग्रेस in  2008 .
She is a  गायन आलोचक of  President Barack Obama 's foreign policy .
Her memoir , Peace Mom : A Mother 's  यात्रा  Through Heartache to Activism , was published in 2006 .
Sheehan was the 2012  vice-presidential nominee of the सलाम और  Freedom Party .
Wyclef  jeanelle जां ( ; ; born  October 17 , 1969 ) Wyclef Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME , Aug 21 , 2010 .
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he was running for President of Haiti , Wyclef  जां थी  still listing his age as only 37 years old .
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate , the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come clean and confirm that he was  वाकई 40 . '' is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning haitian-american rapper , singer-songwriter , संगीतकार , रिकार्ड  producer , and politician .
At age nine , Jean moved to  the संयुक्त राज्य साथ उसके  family and has spent much of his life in the country .
he पहला प्राप्त  fame as a member of the acclaimed New Jersey hip hop group the Fugees .
On August 5 , 2010 , Jean filed for candidacy in the 2010 Haitian presidential election , although the Electoral Commission subsequently  शासित उसे अयोग्य to स्टैंड as he था नहीं मिले the आवश्यकता  to have been resident in Haiti for five years .
Wyclef Jean to appeal against  हैती चुनाव सत्ताधारी  – BBC News , Aug 22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr  जां  was ineligible to stand as the Haitian constitution requires candidates to have lived in the country for five years prior to an election .
The  40-year-old सिंगर  lives in the US .
Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief ,  अत्यधिक publicized  in 2010 throughout Haiti and the United States , were channeled through his charitable organization , Yéle Haiti .
The charity , which  performed a किस्में of charitable  works in Haiti between 2005 and 2010 , effectively closed in 2012 .
In law , a set-off is a statutory defense to the whole or to a portion of a  अभियोक्ता 's अर्जी  .
It had no existence  अंतर्गत the अंग्रेज़ी आम विधि  , being created by 2 Geo . II c. 22 for the relief of insolvent debtors , although set-off was recognized in equity .
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual  debts of a definite अक्षर , और  did not apply to cases in which damages were claimed , nor to equitable claims or demands .
By the rules of the Supreme Court (  O. xix . r. 3 ) a प्रतिवादी in an कार्रवाई may नियत बंद  or set up any right or claim by way of counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff , and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action .
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person ( `` Party A '' ) who owed money to another ( `` Party B '' ) could  be भेजा to कर्जदार थाना , despite the फैक्ट कि पार्टी b भी  owed money to Party A .
The law  यूँ allows दोनो पार्टियों to टालना  payment until their respective claims have been heard in court .
Upon judgment , both claims are extinguished and replaced by a single net sum owing ( e.g . If Party A owes Party B 100 and  पार्टी b owes पार्टी a 105 , the दो  sums are set off and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ) .
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual agreement so that  , जहाँ a पार्टी मूलभूत  , the mutual amounts owing are automatically set off and extinguished .
In certain  jurisdictions ( सहित  the UK ) , set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company .
This means that , for each party which is both a creditor and debtor of the insolvent company , mutual debts are set-off against each other , and then either the bankrupt 's  creditor can अर्जी the संतुलन in the दिवालियापन or the ट्रस्टी  in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid , depending on which side owed the most .
इस रै महरूम criticized as an undeclared सुरक्षा  interest that violates the principle of pari passu .
The alternative , where a creditor has to pay all its debts , but receive only a  सीमित portion of the leftover moneys कि अन्य unsecured लेनदारों  get , poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies .
The right to set  बंद is विशेषकर  important when reporting a bank 's exposures to regulatory authorities .
The  हालात जहाँ a बैंको रै to रपट कि it रै lent a विशाल योग to a  borrower ( and is therefore exposed , because there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its depositors ' money ) is thus replaced ( where the bank has taken security over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value of the security taken .
जेनिफर  Joanna Aniston ( born February 11 , 1969 ) is an American actress , film director , and producer .
Aniston gained worldwide recognition  in the 1990s लिये portraying रेचल ग्रीन on the टेलीविज़न sitcom मित्रों , a भूमिका जिससे अर्जित  her an Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award .
Aniston has  भी enjoyed  a successful Hollywood film career .
She gained critical acclaim for  उसके प्रदर्शन  in the independent films She 's the One ( 1996 ) , Office Space ( 1999 ) , The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ) .
She has had her greatest commercial successes with the  films ब्रूस सर्वशक्तिमान ( 2003  ) , The Break-Up ( 2006 ) , Marley & Me ( 2008 ) , Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ) .
Aniston received a star on the Hollywood Walk of  कीर्ति on फ़रवरी 22  , 2012 .
A white Bengal tiger at the  ह्यूस्टन एक्वेरियम
(  video )
A White  बाघ at tobu  Zoo , in Saitama , Japan .
The white tiger is a recessive mutant of the Bengal tiger , which was reported  in the जंगली इससे समय to समय in असम , बंगाल , बिहार और विशेषकर इससे  the former State of Rewa .
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect , part of the PCI Local Bus  मानक और प्रायः shortened to बस  PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions found  on a प्रोसेसर बस , लकिन in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि  is independent of any particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus appear to  the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट  directly to the processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space .
संलग्न डिवाइस  can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself , called a planar device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles , where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus  as  the bus configuration .
It has  subsequently महरूम अपनाया  for other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express , but , most  motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई  slots , which are sufficient for many uses .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and  अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ) , विद्युत विशेषताएँ  , bus timing , and protocols .
The specification can be purchased from the PCI Special Interest  समूह ( pci-sig  ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs  शामिल : संजाल ताश , ध्वनि ताश , modems  , extra ports such as USB or serial , TV tuner cards and disk controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the  पसन्दीदा इंटरफ़ेस लिये वीडियो ताश became अगप , और तब पीसीआई  Express .
PCI video cards remain available for  उपयोग साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर  AGP or PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now  commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in  universal serial bus and PCI Express versions .
Caffeine is a bitter , white crystalline xanthine  एल्कलॉएड कि अधिनियमों as a उत्तेजक  drug .
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds , leaves , and  फल of  some plants , where it acts as a natural pesticide that paralyzes and kills certain insects feeding on the plants , as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators .
It is  सबसे commonly खपत by इंसानो in infusions निकाली  from the seed of the coffee plant and the leaves of the tea bush , as well as from various foods and drinks containing products derived from the kola nut .
Other sources include yerba maté , guarana berries ,  guayusa , और the yaupon  holly .
In humans , caffeine acts as a central nervous system stimulant , temporarily warding off  drowsiness और restoring  alertness .
It is the world 's most widely  खपत psychoactive ड्रग , लकिन  unlike many other psychoactive substances , it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the world .
पेय containing कैफीन  , such as coffee , tea , soft drinks , and energy drinks , enjoy great popularity .
In North America , 90 % of adults consume caffeine   daily .
Part of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food and Drug  प्रशासन as ग्रा ( generally  recognized as safe ) is that toxic doses ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ) .
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks , even when carried on for years – there may be a  modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव विरूद्ध कुछ रोगों , सहित parkinsons बीमारी , और निश्चित प्रकार of  cancer .
Caffeine can have both  धनात्मक और ऋणात्मक प्रभाव  on anxiety disorders .
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine , especially during the evening hours , but others show little  disturbance और the प्रभाव of कैफीन on नींद  is highly variable .
Evidence of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal  , लकिन कुछ अधिकारियों have  concluded that prudent advice is for pregnant women to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less .
The American Congress of  obstetricians और स्त्रीरोग ( acog ) concluded  in 2010 that caffeine consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women .
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic effects when administered to people who  हैं नहीं प्रयुक्त to it , लकिन नियमित  users develop a tolerance to this effect , and studies have generally failed to support the common notion that ordinary consumption contributes significantly to dehydration .
With heavy use , tolerance develops  rapidly to autonomic प्रभाव ऐसे as elevated दिल रेट और मांसपेशी  twitching , but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine .
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically significant physical and mental dependence remains a  विषय of विवाद in the चिकित्सा साहित्य  .

A  longboard is a longer  variant of a skateboard .
It is commonly used for  cruising , downhill रेसिंग  , slalom racing , sliding , and/or transport .
Sources outside  of विकिपीडिया  give differing estimates:
The CIA 's World Factbook gives the world population as 7,021,836,029 ( July 2012 est . ) and the  वितरण of धर्मों as ईसाई 100 % ( of जिससे रोमन कैथोलिक 18.85 % , प्रोटोस्टेंट 8.15 % , परंपरागत 4.96 % , anglican 1.26 % ) , मुस्लिम 22.74  % , Hindu 13.8 % , Buddhist 6.77 % , Sikh 0.35 % , Jewish 0.22 % , Baha'i 0.11 % , other religions 10.95 % , non-religious 9.66 % , atheists 2.01 % .
( 2010  est . ) .
The Coast Ranges of California span from  हम्बोल्ट काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया दक्षिण to  Santa Barbara County .
The  अन्य तीन तटीय कैलिफ़ोर्निया  mountain ranges are the Transverse Ranges , Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains .
physiographically , वे हैं a खण्ड of the larger प्रशांत किनारा  province , which in turn are part of the larger Pacific Mountain System physiographic division .
UNESCO has included the  `` कैलिफ़ोर्निया coast सीमाएँ जीवमंडल  Reserve `` in its Man and the Biosphere Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983 .

An automobile , autocar , motor car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle used for transporting passengers , which  भी carries इसके अपना इंजन  or motor .
Most definitions of the term specify that automobiles are designed to run primarily on roads , to have seating for one to eight people , to typically have four wheels ,  और to be constructed प्रधानतया लिये the हस्तांतरण of लोगों बल्कि  than goods .
The term motorcar has also been used  in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of electrified रेल प्रणालियों to  denote a car which functions as a small locomotive but also provides space for passengers and baggage .
These locomotive cars were often used on  suburban रूट  by both interurban and intercity railroad systems .
It was estimated in 2010 that the number of automobiles had risen to over 1 billion vehicles , up from the  500 लाख of 1986  .
The numbers are  increasing rapidly , विशेषकर  in China and India .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29 , 1917 – November 22 , 1963 ) , often referred to by his initials JFK , was the 35th President of the United  राज्य , सेवारत इससे 1961 जबतक उसके मौत in 1963  .
After  सैन्य सेवा as कमांडर of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ  PT-109 and PT-59 during World War II in the South Pacific , Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter , he served in  the u.S. सीनेट  from 1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice  अध्यक्ष और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी  Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to have been elected to the office , the second-youngest President ( after  थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ) , और the  first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only non- Protestant president , and is the only president to  have जीती a पुलित्जर पुरस्कार  .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs  आक्रमण , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट , the भवन  of the Berlin Wall , the Space Race , the African-American Civil Rights Movement , and early stages of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number of  सैन्य advisers , खास आपरेशन शक्तियां  , and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic  हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented  by the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment , and segregation of rural South Vietnamese  इससे the उत्तरी और दक्षिणी  communist insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22 , 1963 in  डलास , टेक्सास  .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime , but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby  दो दिनों बाद , पहले a विचारण could  take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission  officially concluded  that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However , the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that  those investigations यहूद flawed और कि  Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
however , एबीसी न्यूज in उनके छानबीन  , The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional  छानबीन कि lasted इससे 1963  to 1970 .
Since the 1960s  सूचना concerning कैनेडी  's private life has come to light .
Details of  कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं  in which he struggled have become better known , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially kept secret from the  सामान्य पब्लिक , रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering  have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks highly in public opinion ratings of U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  .
A Siemens MXL fire alarm control panel (  शीर्ष ) और ग्राफिक annunciator (  bottom ) for Potomac Hall , at James Madison University .
A Vigilant VM-1 fire alarm control unit ( FACU ) / autonomous  कंट्रोल ईकाई ( acu ) साथ एकीकृत  voice evacuation and fire fighter telephone system .
manufactured  by Edwards , A UTC F & S Company
A Fire Alarm Control Panel ( FACP ) , or Fire Alarm Control Unit (  facu ) , is the controlling  component of a Fire Alarm System .
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire , monitors their operational integrity and provides for automatic control of equipment , and transmission of information necessary  to तैयारी the सुविधा लिये आग  based on a predetermined sequence .
The panel may also supply electrical energy to operate any associated sensor , control  , ट्रांसमीटर  , or relay .
There are four basic types of  panels : coded  panels , conventional panels , addressable panels , and multiplex systems .
