MTV 's first day on the  एयर थी rebroadcast on vh1 क्लासिक in 2006 और अपलोड  onto YouTube in 2010 ( although only the first four hours were authentic ; the rest were edited VH1 rebroadcasts ) .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake International Airport and  कोलोन अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट  serving the city of Colombo , the other is Ratmalana International Airport .
mattala राजपक्षे  International Airport located in southern city of Hambantota is the other international airport in Sri Lanka .
भण्डारनायके अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport is located in Katunayake , 22 miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo .
It is administered by Airport and Aviation  सेवाएं ( श्री लंका )  Ltd .
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines , the national  वाहक of श्री लंका , और  Mihin Lanka , the budget airline of Sri Lanka .
ब्लैक swan is a 2010 अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक थ्रिलर  and horror film directed by Darren Aronofsky and starring Natalie Portman , Vincent Cassel , and Mila Kunis .
The  प्लाट घूमती  around a production of Tchaikovsky 's Swan Lake ballet by a prestigious New York City company .
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile White Swan , for which the committed dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a perfect fit , as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan  ,  which are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ) .
Nina is overwhelmed by a feeling of immense pressure when she finds herself competing for the part , causing her  to खोना उसके tenuous पकड़ on वास्तविकता और descend  into a living nightmare .
Aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings  of a उत्पादन of swan झील साथ an unrealized पटकथा परिचय understudies  and the notion of being haunted by a double , similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers .
Aronofsky cites Fyodor  दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` the दोगुना  `` as another inspiration for the film .
The director also considered Black Swan a companion piece to his 2008  फिल्मी the पहलवान ,  with both films involving demanding performances for different kinds of art .
He and Portman  पहला discussed the प्रोजेक्ट in 2000 , और  after a brief attachment to Universal Studios , Black Swan was produced in New York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures .
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet for several months prior to  फिल्मांकन , और notable आंकड़े  from the ballet world helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation .
The film premiered as  the खोलने फिल्मी लिये the 67th वेनिस अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival on September 1 , 2010 .
it था a सीमित  release in the United States starting December 3 , 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17 .
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release  , विशेषकर लिये पोर्टमैन 's प्रदर्शन और aronofsky 's दिशा  , and was a significant box office success , grossing $ 329 million worldwide .
The film received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best Actress  पुरस्कार लिये the  film , as well as many other Best Actress awards in several guilds and festivals , while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director .
In addition , the film itself received a  नामांकन  for Best Picture .
The world’s first ice-calorimeter ,  प्रयुक्त in the शीत of 1782-83 , by एंटोनी  Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon Laplace , to determine the heat involved in various chemical changes ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat .
These experiments mark the foundation of  thermochemistry  .
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor , meaning heat )  is an ऑब्जेक्ट प्रयुक्त लिये कैलोरीमिति  , or the process of measuring the heat of chemical reactions or physical changes as well as heat capacity .
Differential scanning calorimeters , isothermal microcalorimeters , titration calorimeters and accelerated rate  calorimeters हैं among  the most common types .
A simple calorimeter just consists of a thermometer attached to  a मेटल  container full of water suspended above a combustion chamber .
To find the enthalpy change per mole  of a पदार्थ a in a प्रतिक्रिया between दो substances a और b , the substances  are added to a calorimeter and the initial and final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after it has finished ) are noted .
Multiplying the temperature change by the mass and specific heat capacities of the substances gives a  मान लिये the उर्जा दिए बंद or अवशोषित  during the reaction .
Dividing the energy change by how many moles of A  यहूद उपस्थित देता इसके enthalpy बदलें  of reaction .
This method is used primarily in academic teaching as it describes the  सिद्धान्त of कैलोरीमिति  .
It does not account for the heat loss through the container or the  ऊष्मा क्षमता of the थर्मामीटर और संग्राहक itself .
In addition , the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the calorimeter and into the liquid , and the heat absorbed by  the ऊष्मामापी और the द्रव is बराबर to  the heat given off by the metals .
A pair of  ग्रीन flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri , thongs , jandals , or a variety of other names throughout the world ) are a type of open-toed sandal typically  worn in कैज़ुअल परिस्थितियों  , such as outside or at the beach .
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the  पैर by a y-shaped डोरी कि गुजरता between the  first and second toes and around either side of the foot .
वे may भी be आयोजित to the पैर साथ a  single strap over the front of the foot rather than a thong .
The name `` flip-flop ''  originated  because of the sound that is made by slapping between the sole of the foot and the floor when walking .
इस स्टाइल of जूते रै महरूम worn  by the people of many cultures throughout the world , originating as early as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 B.C .
The modern flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri , which became popular after World War II when  सैनिको returning to the संयुक्त राज्य brought  them back .
They became popular in casual settings during the 1960s ,  1990s , और 2000s  , and some varieties have even found their way into more formal attire , despite criticism .
The  उपयोग of flip-flops can परिणाम in अनेक pains और  injuries , including ankle sprains and broken bones .
Some individuals who walk for  long अवधि रपट पीड़ा in  the feet , ankles , and lower legs .
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results  in over-pronation चोटों  , caused by the foot slipping inwards further than normal .
इस can सीसे  to flat feet and tendonitis .
Other injuries that may result are due to the footwear 's open-toed nature , such  as stubbed toes ,  cuts , and bruises .
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles , as well as those that have a strap that is  नहीं कैनवास और कि आता वापस लगभग to the  ankle .
The owners of Hanjin Osaka ,  देखी यहाँ transiting  the Panama Canal in 2008 , declared general average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room on .
The law of general average is a legal  principle of मेरीटाइम विधि according to जिससे सब पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally  share any losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency .
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea  , क्रू सदस्यों प्रायः have अनमोल छोटी समय  in which to determine precisely whose cargo they are jettisoning .
Thus , to avoid quarrelling  कि could बर्बाद मूल्यवान समय , वहीँ  arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants whose cargo landed safely would be called on to contribute a portion , based upon a share or percentage , to the merchant or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril .
While general average traces  इसके origins in प्राचीन मेरीटाइम विधि , स्टिल it remains भाग of the admiralty  law of most countries .
The first codification of general average was the York Antwerp Rules  of 1890 .
American companies  स्वीकृत it in 1949  .
General average requires  तीन तत्व जिससे हैं  clearly stated by Mr. Justice Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
``  1st  .
A common danger : a danger in which vessel , cargo and crew all participate ; a danger imminent and apparently 'inevitable , ' except by voluntarily incurring the  घाटा of a portion of the पूरे to सहेजें the शेष . ''
`` 2nd . There must be a voluntary jettison , jactus , or casting away , of some portion of the joint concern for  the purpose of बचने इस निकट peril ,  periculi imminentis evitandi causa , or , in other words , a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole . ''
``  3rd .
This  attempt to avoid the निकट  common peril must be successful '' .
Example Polish call for vaccination against  डिप्थीरिया  and Tetanus .
a टीकाकरण अनुसूची is a  series of vaccinations , including the timing of all doses , which may be either recommended or compulsory , depending on the country of residence .
A vaccine is an antigenic preparation used to produce active immunity to a disease , in order  to prevent or reduce  the effects of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen .
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness , either to produce sufficient initial immune response  or to बूस्ट  response that fades over time .
For example , tetanus vaccine boosters  हैं प्रायः  recommended every 10 years .
Vaccine  schedules हैं विकसित by सरकारी एजेंसियों or physicians समूह  to achieve maximum effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for a locality while minimizing the number of health care system interactions .
Over the past two decades , the recommended vaccination schedule has grown rapidly  और become अधिक जटिल  as many new vaccines have been developed .
Some  टीके हैं अनुशंसित तभी in निश्चित क्षेत्रों ( देशों  , subnational areas , or at-risk populations ) where a disease is common .
For instance , yellow fever  टीकाकरण is on the दिनचर्या टीका अनुसूची of फ्रेंच guiana , is अनुशंसित  in certain regions of Brazil but in the United States is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease .
In developing countries , vaccine recommendations also take into account  the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य परवाह अभिगम , the लागत  of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the World Health Organization show a developed country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's life and uses vaccines which cost over $ 700 including administration costs while a developing country  उपयोग a अनुसूची providing टीके in the पहला 9 महीने of  life and costing only $ 25 .
This difference is due to the lower cost of health care , the lower cost of many vaccines provided to developing nations , and that more  महंगी टीके , प्रायः लिये  less common diseases , are not utilized .
In 1900 , the smallpox vaccine was the only one  administered to children  .
By the early 1950s , children routinely received four vaccines , for protection against ( diphtheria , pertussis , tetanus , polio , and  smallpox ) , और as अनेक as पाँच गोलियाँ by दो सालो  of age .
चूंकि the mid-1980s , अनेक टीके  have been added to the schedule .
, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (  सीडीसी ) अभी अनुशंसा टीकाकरण  against at least fourteen diseases .
By two years of age , U.S. children receive as many as 24  टीका injections , और might प्राप्त up to पाँच  shots during one visit to the doctor .
The use of combination vaccine products means that , , the United Kingdom 's immunization program consists of 10 injections by  the आयु of दो , बल्कि than 25 if टीकाकरण लिये प्रत्येक बीमारी  was given as a separate injection .
Two  revellers  dance in the streets .
The form of dancing is called `` wining '' (  घुमावदार )  pronounced wine-ing
A Music Truck  entertains the  crowd on the streets .
Trucks are an  अभिन्न भाग of  the street parade , featuring live performances or deejays
The Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an annual event held on the Monday and Tuesday before Ash Wednesday , and is well known for participant 's colorful costumes and  समृद्ध जश्न  .
Carnival in Trinidad and Tobago is the most significant event on the islands ' cultural and tourism calendar , with numerous cultural events running in the lead  up to the गली परेड on कार्निवल सोमवार  and Tuesday .
It is said that if the islanders are not celebrating it , then they are preparing for it ,  जबकि reminiscing परिचय  the past year 's festival .
The heart  of the musical जश्न रै महरूम  calypso ; recently soca has replaced calypso as the most celebrated type of music .
वेशभूषा  , stickfighting and limbo competitions are also important components of the festival .
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and Tobago  is भी मनाये in शहरों विश्वव्यापी  .
These including Toronto 's Caribana , Miami 's Miami  कार्निवल , ह्यूस्टन carifest , लंदन  's Notting Hill Carnival as well as New York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few .
Carnival was created when West African slaves mimicked  उनके फ्रेंच स्वामी जो जहाँ ज्ञात  for their lavish costumes balls .
हराम to partake in ये festivities  and confined to their quarters , slaves combined elements from their own cultures to their master 's fete .
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab Jab or Jab Molassie ( Devils ) , Midnight Robbers ,  imps , lagahroo , soucouyant  , La Diablesse and Demons .
With the abolition of slavery in 1838 , freed Africans  took उनके  version of Carnival to the streets through expression of drums , riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population entered Trinidad , Carnival evolved into what we know today .
The city of Chicago , Illinois  आयोजित a nonpartisan mayoral चुनाव  on Tuesday , February 22 , 2011 .
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley , a member of the Democratic Party who  था महरूम in दफ्तर  since 1989 , did not seek a seventh term as mayor .
Candidates needed to collect  12,500 याचिका हस्ताक्षर by नवम्बर  22 , 2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot .
April 5 , 2011 was scheduled to be a runoff election date if no  प्रत्याशी प्राप्त an  absolute majority .
Rahm Emanuel won the race for mayor with more  than 55 % of the vote  .
He was  उदघाटन on may  16 , 2011 .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a song by American  इंडी पॉप बैंड फोस्टर  the People .
It was released as the group 's debut single in  सितंबर 2010 , और the following साल थी शामिल  on their EP Foster the People and their debut album Torches .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' became the group 's breakthrough hit  और थी एक of  the most popular songs of 2011 .
The song was written and  अंकित by frontman चिह्नित  Foster while he was working as a commercial jingle writer .
Contrasting with the upbeat musical composition , the  गीत describe the  homicidal thoughts of a troubled youth .
The track received considerable attention after it was posted online  in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड , और it helped the समूह गार्नर a multi-album रिकार्ड सौदे  with Columbia Records imprint Startime International .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a sleeper hit ; in 2011 , after  receiving significant airplay on आधुनिक  rock stations , the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations .
The song spent  आठ लगातार सप्ताह at क्रमांक तीन on the बिलबोर्ड hot  100 chart in the United States , making it the first Billboard Alternative Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009 .
The song was widely praised by critics , and it has been licensed for use  in a चौड़ी  range of popular media since its release .
`` Pumped Up Kicks  '' प्राप्त a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार नामांकन  for Best Pop Duo/Group Performance .
The State  मेला of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया  is an annual state fair for West Virginia .
It is held annually in mid-August on the State Fairgrounds in  fairlea , निकट lewisburg ,  West Virginia in the southeastern part of the state .
The State  fairgrounds consists of a विशाल खोलें फ़ील्ड लिये  carnivals and exhibitions , a horse track , grandstands , and several exhibition buildings .
Free parking is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds and , until  2006 , फ़्री कैंप थी भी उपलब्धियाँ in a विशाल फ़ील्ड साथ  running-water toilets and showers , but no hookups .
Campers are now  चार्ज a छोटी  fee .
The White House , the president  's आधिकारिक निवास और  center of the administration
Under the  संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , the अध्यक्ष  of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the  संघीय सरकारी as a पूरे , the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the  United States by influence and recognition .
The president is also  the commander-in-chief of  the United States Armed Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives should the Electoral College fail to award an  निरपेक्ष बहुमत  of votes to any person ) .
Since the ratification of the  twenty-second amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान in 1951 , no व्यक्ति  may be elected President more than twice , and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death , resignation , or removal from  दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष  , the Vice President assumes the office .
The President must be at least 35 years of  आयु और a ``  natural born '' citizen of the United States .
This list  शामिल तभी those व्यक्तियों जो यहूद sworn  into office as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution , which took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For  अमरीकी नेताओ  before this ratification , see President of the Continental Congress .
the सूची करता नहीं शामिल कोई एक्टिंग  Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and  is गिने क्रमबद्धता as दोनो the 22nd और 24th अध्यक्ष  .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four were assassinated  ( अब्राहम lincoln , जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड , विलियम mckinley  , and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first president , was inaugurated in  1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote  of the Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841 , and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years  , but  died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two terms , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry Truman , was passed to limit the number of times an  व्यक्तिगत can be निर्वाचित  president .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president , was  the पहला to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828 बाद सबसे  laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the first elected after  महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920  .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams , Rutherford  B. हेज़ , बेंजामिन हैरिसन  and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office .
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith  , और the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष  , Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent .
`` Lombardi Trophy  '' redirects  here .
For the award awarded annually to the best  कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल lineman or linebacker , देखिए लोम्बार्डी पुरस्कार  .
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded each year to the winning team of the National Football League 's  चैंपियनशिप खेल , the सुपर  Bowl .
The  ट्रॉफी is नामित in  honor of legendary NFL coach Vince Lombardi .
This is a  सूची of टेबल of the सत्यापित  oldest people in the world in ordinal rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified '  if उसके or उसके अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically  deals in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of Jeanne  calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ) , जो  died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She  मिले विंसेंट वैन  Gogh when she was 12 or 13 .
This led  to न्यूज मीडिया  attention in 1985 , after Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age ,  परे कोई उचित सवाल , in the  records of her native city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her case  serves as an archetype in the methodology  for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura , who currently lives in  जापानी  and is age as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States , on 17  दिसम्बर 2012 , किमुरा , born 19 अप्रैल 1897 ,  is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented .
He has also been the oldest living man since the  मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning  on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 , the oldest living woman  रै महरूम -year-old misao  Okawa , also from Japan , born on 5 March 1898 .
The People 's Court is an  अमरीकी arbitration-based वास्तविकता अदालत दिखाएँ , फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड फ्लोरिडा राज्य सर्किट  Court Judge Marilyn Milian , in which small claims disputes are handled .
the लोगों 's अदालत  is the first court show to use binding arbitration , introducing the format into the genre in 1981 .
The system has been duplicated by most of the show 's successors in the  न्यायिक विधा .
Moreover , The People 's  अदालत is the  first popular , long-running reality in the judicial genre .
It was  preceded तभी by a few short-lived हकीकत in the विधा ; ये  short-lived predecessors were only loosely related to judicial proceedings , except for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings .
Prior to The People 's Court   , the vast majority of TV courtroom shows used actors , and recreated or fictional cases ( as did radio before that ) .
Among examples  of ये प्रकार of अदालत shows शामिल प्रसिद्ध  Jury Trials and Your Witness .
The People 's Court has had two  चिहृ  lives .
The show 's first  जीवन थी presided over solely  by former Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner .
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on September 14 , 1981 , until May 21 , 1993 , when  the दिखाएँ थी रद्द  due to low ratings .
इस बाएँ the दिखाएँ  with a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons .
The show was taped in Los Angeles  दौरान  its first life .
After  होने रद्द  , reruns aired until September 9 , 1994 .
On  सितंबर 8 , 1997 ,  after being out of production for four years , The People 's Court was revived for a second life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program .
Former lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter ,  जिससे he कायम लिये 2 सीज़न इससे the 1997–98  season through the 1998–99 season ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ) .
By the 1999–00 season , husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over Judge Judy ) and former New York State   Supreme Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch .
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he was replaced  towards the समाप्त of the  2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ) .
Beginning in spring 2001 , Florida judge Marilyn Milian took over  the लोगों 's अदालत और रै presided  over the show ever since .
Once Milian completes the 2012–13  ऋतु , वो होगा have परोसा as longest  arbiter over the series with 12 and a half seasons .
As of the  उपस्थित , however  , her years on the program tie Wapner at 12 seasons .
In the 2009-10 television season , The People 's Courts 2nd/present life outlasted its first when it reached  13 सीज़न  .
While the show taped in New York City for the first 15 seasons of its second life , it now  टेपों in stamford , कनेक्टिकट as of the 2012-13 ऋतु  .
On September 3 , 2012 , The  लोगों 's अदालत 's 2nd/present  life entered its 16th season ( 28th overall season ) .
With 28 total seasons , The People 's Court ranks as the 2nd  longest-running courtroom कार्यक्रम पीछे the जारी तलाक  Court at 33 seasons ( from its 3 combined lives ) .
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : Wo'tééneihí '  ) is  a state in the Western United States .
It became the 45th  राज्य admitted  to the Union on January 4 , 1896 .
Utah is  the 13th-largest , the 34th-most populous  , and the 10th-least-densely populated of the 50 United States .
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front , centering on Salt Lake City , leaving vast expanses of the state nearly uninhabited and  बनाना the जनसांख्यिकी the छठे सबसे urbanized in the u.S. यूटा  is bordered by Colorado on the east , Wyoming on the northeast , Idaho on the north , Arizona on the south , and Nevada on the west .
it भी छू  a corner of New Mexico on the southeast .
Utah is the most  religiously समरूप राज्य  in the Union .
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of  latter-day संतो or lds ( mormons ) , जिससे  greatly influences Utah culture and daily life .
The world headquarters of The Church  of यीशु मसीह of latter-day संतो (  LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital .
The state is a center of transportation , education , information  प्रौद्योगिकी और शोध , सरकारी  services , mining , and a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation .
According to the U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's जनसांख्यिकी estimates  , Utah is the fifth fastest-growing state in the United States as of 2012 .
St. George , was the fastest–growing  महानगर क्षेत्रफल in  the United States from 2000 to 2005 .
A 2012 Gallup national survey  मिला यूटा overall to be the `` बेहतरीन राज्य to सजीव in ''  based on 13 forward-looking measurements including various economic , lifestyle , and health-related outlook metrics .
Coldwater is a small town in Tate  काउंटी , मिसिसिपी  .
It is in the  मेम्फिस महानगर  Area .
The population was 1,674 at the  2000 जनसांख्यिकी .
The hard palate is a thin horizontal bony plate of the skull  , स्तिथ in the छत of  the mouth .
It spans the arch formed by  the अपर  teeth .
It is formed  by the palatine  process of the maxilla and horizontal plate of palatine bone .
It forms a partition between the nasal  passages और the  mouth .
Also on the anterior portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which are  the irregular ridges in the श्लेष्मक झिल्ली कि  help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx .
This partition is continued deeper  into the मुँह by a मांसल  extension called the soft palate .
Complete  नियत of scrolls  , constituting the entire Tanakh .
The  tanakh ( , or ; भी tenakh ,  Tenak , Tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh is also known as the Masoretic  टेक्स्ट or the miqra  .
the नाम is an एक्रोनिम formed इससे the आरंभिक यहूदी अक्षर of  the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '' , also known as the Five Books of Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra ''  ( מקרא ) , अर्थ `` कि जिससे  is read '' , is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh .
The books of the Tanakh were  relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed on by प्रत्येक  generation , called the Oral Torah .
Sobriety checkpoint  in जर्मनी
Driving under the influence ( DUI ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) , drunken driving , drunk driving , drink driving , operating under the influence , drinking and driving , or impaired driving is  the अपराधों of ड्राइविंग a मोटर गाडी साथ रक्त स्तर of दारू in excess of a विधिक सीमा ( ``  Blood Alcohol Content '' , or `` BAC '' ) .
Similar regulations cover driving or operating certain types of machinery while affected by drinking alcohol or  लेने अन्य दवाएँ  , including , but not limited to prescription drugs .
This is a criminal offense  in सबसे राष्ट्र  .
Convictions do not necessarily involve actual driving of the  गाडी  .
In most jurisdictions a measurement such as a  रक्त दारू सामग्री ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर , ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines  the offense , with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol .
In some  jurisdictions , वहीँ is an क्रोधित श्रेणी  of the offense at a higher level e.g . 0.12 % .
In most countries , anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing  किसी जबकि अंतर्गत the influence of दारू or दवाएँ  can be heavily fined , as in France , in addition to being given a lengthy prison sentence .
Some jobs have their own rules and BAC limits , for example commercial pilot , and the Federal Railroad  प्रशासन in the संयुक्त राज्य रै a 0.04  % limit for train crew .
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; for  उदाहरण , the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै a 0.08 % bac  limit , which is lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a commercial driver 's license .
The California BAC  सीमा is 0.01 % लिये those younger than 21  years of age and those on probation for a previous DUI conviction .
Some large corporations have their own rules ; Union Pacific Railroad has their own BAC limit of 0.02 % that , if  violated दौरान a यादृच्छिक परीक्षण or a for-cause परीक्षण — लिये उदाहरण , बाद a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना  — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire .
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada  have अपनाया सच्चाई in sentencing कानून कि enforce  strict guidelines on sentencing , differing from previous practice where prison time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued .
Some  jurisdictions have न्यायिक  guidelines requiring a mandatory minimum sentence .
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive fees  to forfetiruree of अपना  license plates and in some serious circumstances , your vehicle .
A drunk driving  सिम्युलेटर in  Montréal , Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called , depending on the jurisdiction , driving under the influence [ of  दारू or अन्य दवाएँ ] ( dui ) , ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत तीव्र influence (  DUII ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) , operating under the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ) , operating a motor vehicle while intoxicated ( OMVI ) , driving under the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs , driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ] .
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling , boating , piloting aircraft , use of motile farm equipment such as tractors  और combines , सवारी घोड़े or ड्राइविंग a horse-drawn  vehicle , or bicycling , possibly with different BAC level than driving .
In some jurisdictions there are  पृथक  charges depending on the vehicle used , such as BWI ( bicycling while intoxicated ) , which may carry a lighter sentence .
In the United States ,  लोकल विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसियों बना 1,467,300 रखवाले देशभर लिये ड्राइविंग  under the influence of alcohol in 1996 , compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983 .
In 1997 an estimated  513,200 dwi  offenders were in prison or jail , down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986 .

Law  प्रवर्तन in the संयुक्त राज्य  is one of three major components of the criminal justice system of the United States , along with courts and corrections .
हालांकि वहीँ exists an अंतर्निहित interrelatedness between  the different groups that make up the criminal justice system based on their crime deterrence purpose , each component operates independently from one another .
However , the judiciary is vested with the power to make  विधिक determinations regarding the conduct  of the other two components .
Apart from maintaining order and service functions , the purpose of policing is the investigation of  suspected दण्ड कार्यकलाप और the referral  of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts .
Law enforcement  , to varying डिग्री at अलग स्तर of सरकारी और in अलग एजेंसियों , is भी commonly  charged with the responsibilities of deterring criminal activity and of preventing the successful commission of crimes in progress ; the service and enforcement of warrants , writs and other orders of the courts .
Law  प्रवर्तन एजेंसियों हैं भी शामिल in providing पहला जवाब to emergencies और अन्य खतरे to पब्लिक सुरक्षा ; the सुरक्षा of  certain public facilities and infrastructure ; the maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ) .
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28 , 1968 ) , best known under the stage name Chayanne , is a Puerto  rican  Latin pop singer and actor .
As a  सोलो कलाकार , chayanne रै  released 21 solo albums and sold over 15 million albums worldwide .
`` World War Hulk '' is a  कॉमिक किताब क्रॉसओवर कथानक कि भागा through  a self titled limited series and various other titles published by Marvel Comics in 2007 , featuring the Hulk .
The series consists of five main issues titled World War Hulk , with Greg Pak as writer and John Romita , Jr. as penciller , and three other limited series  : संसार युद्ध हल्क : सामने लकीर , संसार युद्ध हल्क :  Gamma Corps , and World War Hulk : X-Men .
It also ran  through अनेक अन्य  Marvel comics series .
The plot is the culmination of a   series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into space by the Illuminati and a life model decoy of Nick Fury , the Hulk 's subsequent exile seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati .
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; May 26 , 1907 –  जून 11 , 1979 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम जॉन  Wayne , was an American film actor , director and producer .
An Academy Award -winner , Wayne was among the top box office draws for  तीन दशकों , और थी नामित the all-time  top money-making star .
An enduring American icon , he epitomized rugged masculinity and is famous  लिये उसके demeanor , सहित उसके distinctive शांत  voice , walk , and height .
वेन थी born in winterset , आयोवा लकिन उसके  family relocated to the greater Los Angeles area when he was four years old .
He found work at local film studios when he lost his football scholarship to USC as a  परिणाम of a bodysurfing  accident .
initially  working for the Fox Film Corporation , he mostly appeared in small bit parts .
His first leading role came in the widescreen epic The Big Trail ( 1930 ) , which led to leading roles   in numerous films throughout the 1930s , many of them in the western genre .
His career rose to further heights in 1939 , with John Ford 's Stagecoach making him  an तत्काल superstar  .
Wayne would go on to  स्टार in 142 तस्वीरें , primarily  typecast in Western films .
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ) , which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ) , in which he plays a Civil War veteran who  seeks आउट उसके abducted भांजी ; रिओ ब्रावो ( 1959 ) , playing a शेरिफ साथ डीन मार्टिन ; सच्चा grit ( 1969 ) , playing a  humorous U.S . Marshal who sets out to avenge a man 's death in the role that won Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ) , his final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer .
वेन स्थानांतरित to नारंगी काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in the 1960s , and was a prominent Republican in Hollywood , supporting anti-communist positions .
He died of  पेट कर्कट  in 1979 .
In June 1999 , the American Film Institute named Wayne 13th  among the महानतम पुरूष  Screen Legends of All Time .
Galileo  गैलिली ( ; 15 फ़रवरी 1564  – 8 January 1642 ) , was an Italian physicist , mathematician , astronomer , and philosopher who played a major role in the Scientific Revolution .
His achievements include  सुधार to the दूरदर्शी  and consequent astronomical observations and support for Copernicanism .
Galileo has been called the  `` पिता of आधुनिक observational खगोलशास्त्र `` , the ``  father of modern physics `` , the `` father of science '' , and `` the Father of Modern Science '' .
His contributions to observational astronomy include the telescopic confirmation of the phases of Venus , the discovery of the four largest satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour ) , and the  अवलोकन और विश्लेषण of sunspots  .
Galileo also worked in applied science and  प्रौद्योगिकी , inventing an improved सैन्य कम्पास  and other instruments .
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his lifetime , when most  subscribed to either geocentrism or the  Tychonic system .
He met with opposition from astronomers , who doubted  heliocentrism due to the अनुपस्थिति of  an observed stellar parallax .
The matter was  investigated by the रोमन  Inquisition in 1615 , and they concluded that it could be supported as only a possibility , not an established fact .
Galileo later defended  उसके दृश्य in संवाद concerning the दो मुख्य संसार प्रणालियों , जिससे appeared  to attack Pope Urban VIII and thus alienated him and the Jesuits , who had both supported Galileo up until this point .
He was tried by the Inquisition , found `` vehemently suspect of heresy '' , forced to recant , and spent the  बाकी of उसके जीवन अंतर्गत हाउस  arrest .
It was while Galileo was under house  गिरफ़्तार कि he लिखा एक of उसके finest  works , Two New Sciences , in which he summarised the work he had done some forty years earlier , on the two sciences now called kinematics and strength of materials .

Prototype OLED lighting panel  विकसित by  Lumiotec
demonstration  of a flexible OLED device
An OLED ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode (  led ) in जिससे the emissive electroluminescent  layer is a film of organic compound which emits light in response to an electric current .
This layer of organic  सेमीकंडक्टर is situated  between two electrodes .
Generally , at least  एक of ये  electrodes is transparent .
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as television screens , computer monitors , portable systems  ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन ,  handheld games consoles and PDAs .
A  प्रमुख क्षेत्रफल of शोध is the विकास  of white OLED devices for use in solid-state lighting applications .
There are two main families of OLEDs : those based on  छोटी अणुओं और those employing  polymers .
Adding mobile ions to an OLED creates  a light-emitting electrochemical  cell or LEC , which has a slightly different mode of operation .
OLED displays can use either  passive-matrix ( pmoled  ) or active-matrix addressing schemes .
Active-matrix OLEDs ( AMOLED ) require a thin-film  ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to स्विच प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत पिक्सेल on or बंद , लकिन  allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes .
An OLED display  works बगैर  a backlight .
Thus , it can display deep black levels and can be  thinner और हल्का  than a liquid crystal display ( LCD ) .
In low ambient light conditions such as a dark room an OLED screen can achieve a higher contrast ratio  than an एलसीडी , whether the  LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight .
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal , Canada , showing its French facade ( English reverse ) and the French  पद लेत de poule ( वस्तुतः ,  `` hen 's milk '' )
Eggnog , or egg nog , is  a sweetened  dairy -based beverage traditionally made with milk and/or cream , sugar , and whipped eggs ( which gives it a frothy texture ) .
Brandy , rum ,  व्हिस्की , bourbon , वोदका , or a संयोजन of liquors  are often added .
The finished serving is often garnished  साथ a sprinkling of मैदान  cinnamon or nutmeg .
It was also known  as the अंडा मिल्क  punch .
Eggnog is a popular drink throughout the United States and Canada , and is usually  संबद्ध  with Christmas .
Eggnog  may be added as a flavoring  to food or drinks such as coffee and tea .
Eggnog as a custard can  भी be प्रयुक्त as  an ice cream base .
A pasty ( , ) , ( sometimes known in Britain as a  cornish pasty , और in the संयुक्त राज्य as a pastie or अंग्रेजों  pasty ) is a baked pastry , a traditional variety of which is particularly associated with Cornwall , the westernmost county in England .
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of meat and vegetables , without meat in  शाकाहारी  versions , on a flat pastry circle and folding it to wrap the filling , crimping the edge to form a seal .
After baking , the result is a raised  semicircular comestible  .
The traditional Cornish pasty , which has Protected Geographical Indication ( PGI ) status in Europe , is  भर साथ बीफ , sliced or diced  potato , swede ( also known as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as turnip ) and onion , seasoned with salt and pepper , and is baked .
Today , the pasty is  the खाना सबसे संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल , it is regarded as the  national dish , and it accounts for 6 % of the Cornish food economy .
Pasties with many different fillings are made ; some shops specialise in selling all  sorts of pasties  .
The origins of the pasty are  unclear , हालांकि वहीँ हैं अनेक  references to them throughout historical documents and fiction .
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the spread of  cornish खनिक , और विसंगतियाँ can  be found in Australia , the United States , Mexico and elsewhere .
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is one of three major parts of the autonomic  बेचैन प्रणाली : the अन्य होने the enteric और parasympathetic  systems .
Its general action is to  mobilize the  body 's nervous system fight-or-flight response .
It is , however , constantly active at a  मौलिक स्तर to  maintain homeostasis .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices , such as mobile  फोन , डिजिटल कैमरे , gps नेविगेशन  devices , and tablet computers .
The Secure Digital standard is  कायम by the sd  Card Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across  दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी और अधिक  than 8,000 models .
The Secure  डिजिटल स्वरूप शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ  in three different form factors .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity (  sdsc ) , the high-capacity ( sdhc ) , the extended-capacity ( sdxc  ) , and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The three form factors are the original  आकार , the `` मिनी '' आकार , और  the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ) .
There are many  combinations  of form factors and device families .
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a  छोटी कार्ड in a मेजबान यंत्र निर्मित  to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards , but this article  explains अनेक कारकों कि can  prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may  प्रस्ताव वृहद क्षमता than the मेजबान यंत्र  can handle .
A newer card may  उपयोग a संचिका प्रणाली the  host device can not navigate .
Use of an SDIO card requires the  मेजबान यंत्र  be designed for the input/output functions the card provides .
The  संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला  starting with the SDHC family .
Some vendors produced SDSC  ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda  had standardized a method of doing so .
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with  इसके विशेषताएँ और assure  users of compatibility .
