It was  released to रेडियो स्टेशन on सितंबर 29 , 2009 और  debuted at # 44 on the U.S . Billboard US Billboard Hot Country Songs chart for the week of October 10 , 2009 .
It was  लिखा by रोब mathes और  Allen Shamblin .
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness , medical need and efficiency of health  परवाह सेवाएं प्रक्रियाओं और सुविधाएं according to स्थापित मापदण्ड or दिशानिर्देश और  under the provisions of an applicable health benefits plan .
typically it शामिल नई क्रियाएँ  or decisions based upon the analysis of a case .
Utilization management describes proactive procedures , including  निर्वहन नियोजन , संयुक्त नियोजन  , pre-certification and clinical case appeals .
It also covers proactive  प्रक्रियाओं , ऐसे as संयुक्त  clinical reviews and peer reviews , as well as appeals introduced by the provider , payer or patient .
As pre-certification and  संयुक्त पुनर्विलोकन  of cases grew , utilization management spun out of utilization review .
While not synonymous , health care professionals tend to use the terms as  interchangeable  .
The difference is  utilization प्रबन्धन is  and intends to manage health care cases efficiently and cost effectively before and during health care administration .
Utilization review is more considering whether  स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी appropriately लागू बाद it थी administered  .
There are  चार मौलिक तकनीकों  in utilization management:
Demand  प्रबन्धन
utilization  Review
Case  प्रबन्धन
बीमारी  Management
The Outsiders  is a coming-of-age अनोखा  by S. E. Hinton , first published in 1967 by Viking Press .
Hinton was 15 when she started writing the novel , but did  सबसे of the कार्य जब वो थी सोलह और a जूनियर in ऊँची  school .
hinton थी  18 when the book was published .
The  किताब फ़ॉलो दो प्रतिद्वंद्वी समूह ,  the Greasers and the Socs ( pronounced by the author as , short for Socials ) , who are divided by their socioeconomic status .
The book takes place in  तुलसा , ओक्लाहोमा , in 1965  , but it is never stated in the book .
A film adaptation was produced in 1983 , and a little-known  short-lived टेलीविज़न श्रेणी appeared  in 1990 , picking up where the movie left off .
The  संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  is one of the two houses of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ) .
It is  अक्सर referred  to as the House .
The  अन्य हाउस  is the Senate .
The  संयोजन और शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं  established in Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the  विधान साथ a two-thirds बहुमत in प्रत्येक कक्ष  ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills , to impeach officials , and to elect the U.S. President in  मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत  in the Electoral College .
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population  लकिन is हकदार to at तनिक एक  representative .
The most populous state ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , फिलहाल रै  53 representatives .
The total number of voting  प्रतिनिधि  is fixed by law at 435 .
प्रत्येक प्रतिनिधि  serves for a two-year term .
The Speaker of the United States House of  प्रतिनिधि , जो presides over the कक्ष ,  is elected by the members of the House , and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House meets in the  दक्षिण  wing of the United States Capitol .
A supply chain is actually a  जटिल और डायनेमिक  supply and demand network .
( cf .  wieland/wallenburg  , 2011 )
A supply  कड़ी is a प्रणाली of संगठन , लोगों  , activities , information , and resources involved in moving a product or service from supplier to customer .
Supply chain activities transform natural resources , raw materials , and components into a  समाप्त उत्पाद कि is वितरित to the समाप्त  customer .
In sophisticated supply chain systems  , प्रयुक्त उत्पाद may  re-enter the supply chain at any point where residual value is recyclable .
सप्लाई जंजीरों  link value chains .
`` Purple Haze '' is a song written and recorded by  जिमि हेंड्रिक्स in 1967 , released as the  second single by The Jimi Hendrix Experience in both the United Kingdom and the United States .
It  बाद appeared on the अमरीकी  version of the band 's 1967 album Are You Experienced .
`` Purple Haze '' has become one of the `` archetypical  साइकेडेलिक ड्रग गीतों of the sixties  '' .
`` Purple Haze  's  '' guitar virtuosic techniques would be emulated by many metal guitarists .
A close up picture  of a गैंडा  skin .
Skin is the soft outer  covering of vertebrates  .
Other animal coverings such as the arthropod exoskeleton have different  developmental उत्पत्ति  , structure and chemical composition .
The  क्रियाशील cutaneous  means `` of the skin '' ( from Latin cutis , skin ) .
In mammals , the skin is the largest organ of the  integumentary प्रणाली बना up of  multiple layers of ectodermal tissue , and guards the underlying muscles , bones , ligaments and internal organs .
Skin of a different nature exists in amphibians , reptiles  , और  birds .
All mammals have some hair on their skin , even  समुद्री स्तनधारियों जिससे appear  to be hairless .
The skin  अंतरफलक साथ the पर्यावरण और  is the first line of defense from external factors .
For example , the skin plays a key role in protecting the body against pathogens  और excessive जल  loss .
Its other functions are  इन्सुलेशन ,  temperature regulation , sensation , and the production of vitamin D folates .
Severely damaged skin may heal by  forming scar ऊतक  .
This is sometimes  discoloured और depigmented  .
the मोटाई of स्किन भी varies  from location to location on an organism .
In humans for example , the skin located under the eyes and around the  eyelids is the thinnest स्किन in the देह at 0.5 mm मोटा ,  and is one of the first areas to show signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles .
The skin on the palms and  the सोल्स of the फीट  is 4 mm thick and the thickest skin in the body .
फर is  dense hair .
Primarily , fur augments the insulation the skin provides  लकिन can भी serve as a द्वितीयक  sexual characteristic or as camouflage .
On some animals , the skin is very  मुश्किल और मोटा  , and can be processed to create leather .
Reptiles and fish have hard protective scales on their skin for protection , and  पक्षियों have मुश्किल feathers , सब बना of मुश्किल  β- keratins .
Amphibian skin is not a strong barrier to passage of chemicals and is often  विषय to परासरण और diffusive शक्तियां  .
For example , a frog sitting in an anesthetic solution would be  sedated  quickly , as the chemical diffuses through its skin .
Thomas  स्कॉट
The Rev . Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is principally known for  उसके best-selling कार्य a commentary on  The Whole Bible and The Force of Truth , and as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society .
डेनियल  Radcliffe , who portrays Harry Potter , has been the icon of the film series since the release of the first film in 2001 .
Some of the most renowned actors of the United Kingdom and Ireland have  voiced or portrayed वर्ण appearing  in the Harry Potter film series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling .
Daniel Radcliffe , Rupert Grint and Emma  वाटसन have निभाई हैरी कुम्हार  , Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger in all the films .
When they were  डाल  only Radcliffe had previously acted in a film .
Complementing them on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham Carter , Jim Broadbent , John Cleese , Robbie Coltrane , Warwick Davis , Ralph Fiennes , Michael Gambon , Brendan Gleeson , Richard Griffiths , Richard Harris , John Hurt , Jason  isaacs , miriam margolyes , हेलेन mccrory , गेरी oldman  , Alan Rickman , Fiona Shaw , Maggie Smith , Timothy Spall , Imelda Staunton , David Thewlis , Emma Thompson , and Julie Walters , among others .
Thirteen actors have appeared  as the वही अक्षर in सब आठ  films of the franchise .
Some well-known British actors who have not appeared in the  श्रेणी , हैं  asked in jest why they have not been cast .
When David Yates was directing the fifth film , Bill Nighy , who had previously collaborated with Yates on three of his television projects , said that he  joked साथ येट्स कि संभवतः अभी he होता n't be the  only actor in England who had n't been in Harry Potter .
`` But nobody called  '' , nighy  added .
But in 2009 , Yates cast Nighy as Minister of Magic Rufus  scrimgeour in deathly hallows  .
Nighy said , `` I am no longer the only  अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता नहीं to be in  Harry Potter and I am very pleased . ''
Jude Law has  quipped , ``  Nobody 's asked me .
I was a  बिट  too old for Harry '' .
When a reporter compared potions  प्राध्यापक होरेस slughorn 's obsession साथ प्रसिद्ध names to the  series ' connection to `` every notable British actor , '' Jim Broadbent , who plays Slughorn said , `` Well , not every actor gets invited .
I know  कुछ जो हैं  still waiting . ''
With the exception of Chris Columbus , each director has had a cameo appearance in his  संबंधित फिल्मी : अलफोंसो cuarón appears as a जादूगर पकड़कर a मोमबत्ती दौरान a झाँकी at the तीन  Broomsticks in Prisoner of Azkaban ; Mike Newell is heard briefly as the radio presenter in Frank Bryce 's house in Goblet of Fire ; and David Yates features as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in Order of the Phoenix .
निर्माता दाउद heyman भी makes  a cameo appearance as a wizard featured within a magical moving portrait in the third film , Prisoner of Azkaban .
J. K. Rowling  दिया a वाक दौरान the संसार प्रीमियर of the  final film in the series— Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 —on 7 July 2011 in London , England .
She announced that she could never have dreamt of the talented actors and  अभिनेत्रियों जो have appeared in सब the  Harry Potter movies .
रोलिंग भी घोषित कि वहीँ हैं सात हैरी कुम्हार फिल्मी श्रेणी डाल सदस्यों , जो वो  refers to as `` The Big Seven '' , they are Daniel Radcliffe , Rupert Grint , Emma Watson , Tom Felton , Matthew Lewis , Evanna Lynch and Bonnie Wright .

A twelve-step program is a set of  guiding सिद्धान्त ( स्वीकृत by सदस्यों as 'spiritual  principles , ' based on the approved literature ) outlining a course of action for recovery from , compulsion , or other behavioral problems .
Originally proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism , the Twelve Steps were first published in the book Alcoholics Anonymous : The Story of How More Than One Hundred Men Have  बरामद इससे alcoholism in 1939  .
the विधि थी तब adapted  and became the foundation of other twelve-step programs .
As summarized by the American Psychological Association , the  प्रक्रम involves the following:
admitting that one can not control one 's  व्यसन or मजबूरी ;
recognizing a उच्चतर  power that can give strength ;
examining past errors with the help  of a प्रायोजक ( अनुभवी सदस्य  ) ;
making amends for  ये त्रुटियाँ  ;
सीखना to सजीव a नई  life with a new code of behavior ;
helping अन्य जो suffer  from the same addictions or compulsions .
Witness impeachment , in the law of evidence of the United States , is the process of calling into  सवाल the विश्वसनीयता  of an individual who is testifying in a trial .
The  संघीय नियम of प्रमाण contain  the rules governing impeachment in federal courts .
Party leaders and whips of the United  राज्य हाउस of  Representatives are elected by their respective parties in a closed-door caucus by secret ballot and are also known as floor leaders .
The U.S. House of Representatives does not officially use   the term `` Minority Leader '' although the media frequently do .
The House instead uses the terms `` Republican Leader '' or `` Democratic Leader ''  depending on जिससे पार्टी  holds a minority of seats .
The current House Majority Leader is Republican Eric  cantor , जबकि the वर्तमान  House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi .
The current House Majority Whip is Republican  केविन मैकार्थी  , while the current House Minority Whip is Democrat Steny Hoyer .
Following the outbreak of World War I in 1914  , the जर्मनी फौज खोली  the Western Front by first invading Luxembourg and Belgium , then gaining military control of important industrial regions in France .
The tide of the advance was dramatically turned with  the बैटल of the marne  .
Following the race to the sea , both sides dug in along a meandering line of fortified trenches , stretching from the North Sea to  the स्विस frontier साथ फ़्रांस  .
This line remained essentially  अपरिवर्तित  for most of the war .
Between 1915 and 1917 there  यहूद अनेक प्रमुख offensives  along this front .
The attacks employed massive artillery bombardments and massed infantry  अग्रिम  .
However , a  संयोजन of entrenchments  , machine gun nests , barbed wire , and artillery repeatedly inflicted severe casualties on the attackers and counterattacking defenders .
As a result , no significant  अग्रिम यहूद बना  .
Among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead , the Battle of the Somme with  more than [ an estimated  ] million casualties , and the Battle of Passchendaele with roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties .
In an effort to break the deadlock , this front saw the introduction of new military technology , including poison  गैस , वायुयान और  tanks .
लकिन it थी तभी बाद  the adoption of improved tactics that some degree of mobility was restored .
The German  वसन्त अप्रिय of 1918 थी बना संभावित  by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end of the conflict on the Eastern Front .
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics , the German armies advanced nearly to the west , which marked the deepest advance by either side since  1914 और बहुत nearly succeeded in  forcing a breakthrough .
In spite of the generally stagnant nature of  इस  front , this theater would prove decisive .
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies during the second half of 1918 persuaded the German commanders that defeat was inevitable , and the  सरकारी थी मजबूर to मुकदमा लिये  conditions of an armistice .
The terms of peace were agreed upon with the  हस्ताक्षर of the सन्धि  of Versailles in 1919 .

The First Lady of the United States (  flotus ) is the होस्टेस  of the White House .
Because this position is traditionally filled by the wife of the President of the United States ,  the शीर्षक is सबसे प्रायः लागू to the बीवी  of a sitting president .
The current First Lady is Michelle  ओबामा .
After  उसके husband बराक ओबामा थी  re-elected on November 6 , 2012 , she is scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Septic shock is a medical condition as a result of severe infection and sepsis , though the  microbe may be प्रणालीगत or स्थानीयकृत to a particular  site .
It can cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly  ज्ञात as अनेक अंग विफलता ) और मौत  .
Its most common victims are children ,  immunocompromised individuals , और  the elderly , as their immune systems can not deal with the infection as effectively as those of healthy adults .
Frequently , patients suffering from  सेप्टिक शॉक  are cared for in intensive care units .
The mortality rate from septic shock is  लगभग 25–50  % .
Kevin Brereton ( born February 20 , 1972 ) , better known by his stage name k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ) ,  is a कनाडाई rapper , सिंगर , songwriter और रिकार्ड निर्माता  .
His given name  may भी be cited  as Kheaven , a spelling he later adopted .
The alias `` k-os '' , spelled with a lower case `` k '' , was intended to be less  आक्रामक than the pseudonyms  of other rappers whose names were all upper case , such as KRS-One .
It is an acronym for `` Knowledge of Self , '' although in a later  इंटरव्यू he कहा कि it originally stood लिये ``  Kevin 's Original Sound . '' k-os ' music incorporates a wide variety of music genres , including rap , funk , rock , and reggae .
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at times expressing  आलोचना of मुख्यधारा हिप हॉप संस्कृति 's obsession साथ धन , कीर्ति  and glorification of violence .
A musician  as खूब as a निर्माता , k-os रै लिखा  and produced nearly every part of all four of his albums .
k-os usually performs  साथ a सजीव बैंड  , something that is uncommon in the hip hop genre .
He sometimes plays guitar and keyboard both  दौरान सजीव प्रदर्शन और  in the studio .
k-os received his first musical exposure with the  सिंगल `` musical essence  '' , released in 1993 .
बाद the रिलीज of उसके दूसरी सिंगल `` वृद्धि जैसे the सूर्य ''  in 1996 , he withdrew from the industry because he was dissatisfied with his musical style .
He reappeared briefly  in 1999 और released  his debut album Exit in 2002 .
The album received  धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ  but sold relatively few copies .
He released his  दूसरी एल्बम  Joyful Rebellion in 2004 , which received platinum status in Canada .
A third album , , was  released in 2006 और भी  went platinum .
His fourth album ,  यस  !
, थी released  in 2009 .
His fifth album BLack on BLonde  थी released in  2013 .
The official 2007  संस्करण of the  UCC .
Even  the गोपनीय अशिष्ट मसौदा  of the UCC were saved and published as a 10-volume set .
The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code )  , पहला प्रकाशित in 1952 , is एक of a क्रमांक of वर्दी अधिनियमों कि  have been promulgated in conjunction with efforts to harmonize the law of sales and other commercial transactions in all 50 states within the United States of America .
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing  रूट साथ एक or अधिक stops  at a belay station .
Each section of actual climbing  between stops at the belay  stations is called a pitch .
The leader ascends the pitch , placing gear and stopping to anchor  themselves to the belay  station .
The reason  लिये the stops can be  determined by choice , convention or necessity .
For  example:
The rope is too short to do the entire route in  एक  pitch ( necessity ) .
The  नेता रै चलाएं  out of protective gear ( necessity ) .
There is a  सुविधाजनक protectable कगार , or फिक्स्ड bolts  placed by previous climbers , at the location for a belay station ( convention ) .
the नेता chooses  to rest or exchange leads before the next section of the climb ( choice ) .
The general purpose of these stops is to allow the second to ascend to the point of the lead  climber जबकि collecting the सुरक्षात्मक गियर  from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent .
At the belay station , the  सुरक्षात्मक गियर is एकत्रित , संभवतः  exchanged to a new leader , and the leader of the next pitch ascends the route .
A diagram showing an I Formation on  ठोकर और a 4-3  Formation on defense
In American football , each team has  ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the फ़ील्ड  at one time .
The specific role that a player takes on the field  is पुकारा उनके  position .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are  अनुमत असीमित subsititutions  , that is teams may change any number of players after any play .
This has resulted in the development of  तीन `` platoons '' of खिलाड़ी , the ठोकर  ( the team with the ball , who is trying to score ) , the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring , and to take the ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons ,  विभिन्न विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ  exist depending on what the player 's main job is .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was  enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of  the United States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which  the manufacture , importation  , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the  नेशनल implementing विधान  for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation  निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications ) , साथ  varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000 ,  जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i . वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये  abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New Jersey Transit park-and-ride  स्टेशन in वेन , नई जर्सी साथ the montclair-boonton लकीर कि provides बस सेवा to नई  York City and various other points in the area as well as Montclair-Boonton Line train service to New York , Hoboken , and intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University .
It is located off of the southbound  गलियों of नई जर्सी रूट  23 on West Belt Road , near the interchange where Route 23 , Interstate 80 , and U.S. Route 46 meet , across from the Willowbrook Mall .
The station opened in January 2008  और रै 1,000 पार्किंग  spaces .
New Jersey Transit intends for this  संयुक्त रेल और बस स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन , ''  that will help relieve the habitual congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange , where the three major highways meet .
In addition , the construction of the station was meant to  भी आसानी the जमघट at कया थी तब रूट 23 पार्क & सवारी , a बस डिपो on रूट 23 उत्तर  that has since been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride , and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ; the now-Mother 's site had limited parking while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook .
The Wayne  township बस गैरेज  is located on the opposite side of Route 23 .
There has been a proposal to build a  पार्किंग डेक साथ another हजार  spots and develop the land at the station .
In addition to Montclair-Boonton  रेल , the पारगमन बीच  is served by the following New Jersey Transit bus lines:
75 to  न्यूर्क penn  Station and Butler
194 to Port Authority  बस टर्मिनल  and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to Port Authority Bus  टर्मिनल और विलियम paterson विश्वविद्यालयों
324 to Port Authority  और वेन  Route 23
748  to  Willowbrook Mall and Paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol , ampersat , apetail or commercial at in  english—and कम commonly a चौड़ी दायरा  of other terms .
The fact that there is no single word in English for the symbol has prompted some writers to use the French  arobase or स्पेनी और पुर्तगाली arroba—or to सिक्का नई शब्द ऐसे as asperand , ampersat—but  none of these has achieved wide currency .
Originally an accounting and  वाणिज्यिक चालान संक्षिप्त अर्थ `` at the रेट of '' ( e.g . 7 विजेट  @ $ 2 = $ 14 ) , it was not included on the keyboard of the earliest commercially successful typewriters , but was on at least one 1889 model and the very successful Underwood models from the `` Underwood No . 5 '' in 1900 onward .
It is  अभी universally शामिल  on computer keyboards .
In recent years ,  इसके अर्थ  has grown to include the sense of being `` located at , '' `` and , '' or `` directed at '' , especially in email addresses and social media , particularly Twitter .
The mark is  एनकोडेड  at .
The Catcher in  the rye is  a 1951 novel by J. D. Salinger .
Originally published  लिये वयस्कों , it रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय साथ  adolescent readers for its themes of teenage angst and alienation .
it रै महरूम अनूदित  into almost all of the world 's major languages .
Around  250,000 नक़ल हैं बेची प्रत्येक  year with total sales of more than 65 million books .
The novel 's protagonist and  antihero , होल्डन caulfield ,  has become an icon for teenage rebellion .
The novel was included on Times 2005 list of the 100 best English-language novels written  चूंकि 1923 , और it थी नामित by आधुनिक पुस्तकालयों और इसके पाठक as एक of the 100 बेहतरीन  English-language novels of the 20th century .
It has been frequently challenged in the United States and other countries  लिये इसके उदार उपयोग of profanity  and portrayal of sexuality .
It also deals with complex issues of  पहचान , belonging , कनेक्शन  , and alienation .
skeletal  muscles homo sapiens
This is  a तालिका of मांसपेशियां  of the human anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical  इंसान , और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां  , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
nevertheless , the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to  define because different sources group muscles differently , e.g . regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
उदाहरण दायरा इससे  640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body  can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating  to the head and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers to the action of each muscle  इससे the मानक anatomical  position .
In other positions , other actions  may  be performed .
Bad Girls Club  ( bgc ) is an  American reality television series created by Jonathan Murray for the Oxygen television station .
The show centers on seven feisty and mischievous women with  अलग पृष्ठभूमि और personalities  , who have a number of psychological and behavioral problems .
They are introduced to the show off  उनके घातक बर्ताव और accomplish विशिष्ट  goals .
The cast , deemed `` bad girls '' , enjoy a luxurious lifestyle in a fine mansion for three  महीने ,  during which they must obey specified rules .
Their lives inside – and outside – of  the हाउस हैं  chronicled and recorded by the production team .
The Bad Girls Club is broadcast in five  देशों ( संयुक्त राज्य ,  Netherlands , Australia , Hungary , and Sweden ) .
It has received negative reviews from critics , who believe the show promotes violence by adolescent  दर्शक  .
Furthermore ,  अनेक डाल सदस्यों बना विवादास्पद  remarks which outraged many viewers .
The format of the show has  बदला इससे जल्दी सीज़न  .
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a rule , she is evicted from the show and , if it is early in the season  ,  replaced by a new `` bad girl '' .
There have been nine complete seasons of The Bad  लड़कियों क्लबों , साथ the दसवाँ ऋतु  currently airing .
The fourth season had the highest ratings in the show 's history , becoming its ``  भेदन  season '' .
There have been three  spin-offs of  The Bad Girls Club .
One of them , Love Games : Bad Girls Need Love Too , where  पास्ट डाल सदस्यों तलाश  true love , has gained high ratings .
Oxygen has also released a mobile game  , कॉमिक स्ट्रिप और merchandise  to promote the show .
Of the 92 contestants , Kerry  harvick ( of ऋतु एक ) थी a कामयाब देश  singer before the show .
tanisha थामस  ( of season two ) later hosted Oxygen 's OxygenLive !
and   the subsequent seasons of Love Games : Bad Girls Need Love Too .
Thomas , who has  महरूम उतावले the `` गॉडमदर '' to  all contestants , has her own television documentary entitled Tanisha Gets Married .
As of Season 8 she  's महरूम the मेजबान  of the reunion specials .
The Iowa Senate is the upper house of the  आयोवा सामान्य  Assembly .
There are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate , representing 50  single-member जिले आरपार  the state with populations of approximately 60,927 per constituency , .
Each Senate  ज़िला is रचित  of two House districts .
The Senate  meets at the आयोवा  State Capitol in Des Moines .
Unlike the lower house , the Iowa House of Representatives , Senators serve four-year terms ,  साथ हाफ of the सीनेट लड़खड़ाते लिये re-election  every two years .
There are no term  हद लिये the  Senate .
mechanical  repair
मेंटेनेंस , मरम्मत , और परिचालन ( mro ) or मेंटेनेंस , मरम्मत  , and overhaul involves fixing any sort of mechanical , plumbing or electrical device should it become out of order or broken ( known as repair , unscheduled or casualty maintenance ) .
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in working  अनुक्रम ( ज्ञात as अनुसूचित मेंटेनेंस ) or prevent ट्रबल  from arising ( preventive maintenance ) .
MRO may be defined as , `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or  restoring an मद in or to a राज्य in जिससे it can  perform its required function .
The actions include the combination of all technical  और सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक  , managerial , and supervision actions . ''
MRO operations can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the customer , i.e . a service is being offered , or whether the  उत्पाद is खरीदा by the reprocessing  organisation and sold to any customer wishing to make the purchase ( Guadette , 2002 ) .
In the former case it may be a backshop operation within a larger  संगठन or छोटी  operation .
The former of these represents a closed loop supply chain and usually has the scope of maintenance , repair or  of the उत्पाद  .
The latter of the categorisations is an open loop supply chain and is typified by  refurbishment  and remanufacture .
The main characteristic of the closed loop system is that the demand for a  उत्पाद is matched साथ  the supply of a used product .
Neglecting asset write-offs and exceptional activities the total population of the product between  the ग्राहक और the सेवा प्रदाता  remains constant .
Prince William , Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) , is the elder son of Charles , Prince of  वेल्स , और डायना  , Princess of Wales , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in the line of succession , behind his father , to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New  जीलैंड , जमैका , बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स , तुवालू  , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was  शिक्षित at चार स्कूलों in the संयुक्त किंगडम  and obtained a degree from the University of St Andrews .
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile , Belize , Tanzania , and  कीनिया जहाँ he रै जिया और holidayed  several times .
Prince William has also  लिया kiswahili  studies at universities in Kenya and Tanzania .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with his brother Prince Harry —and , two years later , earned his wings by  completing पायलट प्रशिक्षण at royal एयर फ़ोर्स कॉलेज  Cranwell .
In 2009 , he transferred to the Royal Air Force , was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying training in order  to become a full-time पायलट  with the Search and Rescue Force .
In 2010 , he completed his general and  special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर प्रशिक्षण और गई on to raf घाटी on no . 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing  co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter .
Prince William married  उसके longtime गर्लफ्रेंड , कैथरीन मिडलटन  , on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey .
Hours prior to his wedding , Prince William was created Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज , अर्ल of strathearn , और सामन्त  Carrickfergus .
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July  28 , 1990 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम soulja लड़के बताना 'em , or बस  Soulja Boy , is an American rapper , record producer , actor , and entrepreneur .
in सितंबर 2007  , his single `` Crank That ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100 .
the सिंगल थी initially  self-published on the internet , and it later became a number-one hit in the United States for seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007 .
On  अगस्त 17 रास्ता  was listed at # 18 on the Forbes list of Hip-Hop Cash Kings of 2010 earning $ 7 million for that year .
Way has currently released three studio albums and one independent album : his debut studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was  certified प्लेटिनम  by the RIAA .
However , his next two albums , iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did not  मैच the वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू , the  latter only selling 100,000 copies , despite the success of several singles across both albums , such as `` Kiss Me Thru the Phone `` and `` Turn My Swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ) .
This was  मुख्यतः due to negotiation समस्याएं साथ interscope  Records which meant a limited amount of records were made available to the public .
As of 2011 , Way has confirmed he is working on his fourth studio album , entitled USA DRE ,  जिससे होगा be released  in 2013 .
The electron transport chain in the mitochondrion is the site of oxidative  phosphorylation in eukaryotes  .
The NADH and  succinate उत्पन्न in the साइट्रिक एसिड साईकिल  are oxidized , providing energy to power ATP synthase .
Photosynthetic electron transport chain of the  thylakoid झिल्ली  .
An electron transport chain (  इत्यादि ) युगल इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्रांसफ़र  between an electron donor ( such as NADH ) and an electron acceptor ( such as O2 ) with the transfer of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane .
The resulting  electrochemical प्रोटॉन अनुपात is प्रयुक्त to generate  chemical energy in the form of adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) .
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms  प्रयुक्त लिये extracting उर्जा  from sunlight in photosynthesis and also from redox reactions , such as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ) .
In chloroplasts , light drives the conversion of water to oxygen and NADP+ to NADPH with transfer of H+ ions  आरपार हरितलवक झिल्लियों  .
In mitochondria , it is the conversion of oxygen to  जल , nadh to naD+ और succinate to fumarate कि हैं  required to generate the proton gradient .
Electron transport chains are  प्रमुख साइट of असामयिक इलेक्ट्रॉन leakage to ऑक्सीजन  , generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress .
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip , Ryzolt , Ultracet , Ultram in the USA ,  ralivia , zytram xl durella  { CR-100/200 mg } in Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain .
The drug has a wide range of applications , including treatment of rheumatoid arthritis , restless legs syndrome , motor neurone  बीमारी और लुपस  .
It was launched and marketed as Tramal by the German  फार्मास्युटिकल  company Grünenthal GmbH in 1977 .
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist that also induces serotonin release  और inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine  .
tramadol is metabolized  to O-desmethyltramadol , a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist .
Tramadol  और इसके प्रमुख metabolite ( s )  are distinguished from other more potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors .
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff ( ;  born अप्रैल 29 , 1938 ) is an अमरीकी पूर्व  stockbroker , investment advisor , financier , and white collar criminal .
He is the former non-executive Chairman of  the नैस्डैक भण्डार मार्केट , और the  admitted operator of a Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in U.S. history .
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC  in 1960 , और थी इसके अध्यक्ष जबतक उसके गिरफ़्तार  on December 11 , 2008 .
The firm was one of the top market maker businesses on Wall Street , which bypassed `` specialist '' firms by directly executing orders over the  काउंटर इससे खुदरा  brokers .
He employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and  मुख्य अनुपालन अधिकारी ; पीटर रै चूंकि  been sentenced to 10 years in prison .
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's rules and compliance officer and attorney , and his sons Andrew  और चिह्नित ( चिह्नित वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by फांसी  exactly two years after his father 's arrest ) .
On December  10 , 2008 , madoff 's बेटे बताई अधिकारियों  that their father had confessed to them that the asset management unit of his firm was a massive Ponzi scheme , and quoted him as describing it as `` one big lie . ''
The following  दिन , एफबीआई एजेंटों गिरफ्तार  Madoff and charged him with one count of securities fraud .
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had previously  conducted investigations into madoff  's business practices , but did not uncover the massive fraud .
In March 2009 , Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies and admitted to turning his wealth management business into a massive Ponzi scheme that  झांसे हज़ारों of निवेशकों of अरबों  of dollars .
Madoff  कहा he began  the Ponzi scheme in the early 1990s .
However , federal investigators believe the fraud began as early as the 1970s , and those charged with recovering  the लापता धन मानना the निवेश आपरेशन  may never have been legitimate .
The amount missing from client accounts  , सहित fabricated  gains , was almost $ 65 billion .
The  court-appointed ट्रस्टी अनुमानित  actual losses to investors of $ 18 billion .
On June 29 , 2009 , he was sentenced to 150 years  in थाना , the  maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin  दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों  to recognize the work of secretaries , administrative assistants , receptionists , and other administrative support professionals .
In North America , it is  मनाये on the बुधवार  of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ) .
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in  अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 18  in 2013 ) .
In Australia it is  मनाये on the  first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board  , generally of a पब्लिक प्रशासनिक एजेंसी , जिससे रै शक्तियां और प्रक्रियाओं resembling those of a अदालत of विधि or न्यायधीश ,  and which is obligated to objectively determine facts and draw conclusions from them so as to provide the basis of an official action .
Such  क्रियाएँ हैं समर्थ to उपाय a हालात or थोपने विधिक दंड , और may affect the विधिक अधिकारों , कर्तव्य or privileges of विशिष्ट पार्टियों .
स्मारक of tycho  Brahe and Johannes Kepler in Prague
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624  अक्तूबर 1601 ) , born tyge ottesen ब्राहे  , was a Danish nobleman known for his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations .
He was born in Scania , then part of Denmark  , अभी भाग of modern-day  Sweden .
Tycho was well  ज्ञात in उसके आजीवन  as an astronomer and alchemist .
In his De nova stella ( On the new  स्टार ) of 1573 , he refuted  the Aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm .
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars , '' ( stellae novae , now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572 ,  lacked  the parallax expected in sub-lunar phenomena , and were therefore not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed , but were above the atmosphere and moon .
Using similar measurements he showed that comets were also not atmospheric phenomena , as previously  विचार , और जरूर pass through the माना `` अपरिवर्तनीय  '' celestial spheres .
As an astronomer , Tycho worked to combine what he saw as the geometrical benefits of the Copernican system with the philosophical benefits of the Ptolemaic system into his own model of the  ब्रह्मांड , the tychonic  system .
Furthermore , he was the last  of the प्रमुख नग्न नजर खगोलशास्त्रियों , working  without telescopes for his observations .
Tycho Brahe was  granted an एस्टेट on the द्वीप of hven और the funding to निर्माण the uraniborg  , an early research institute , where he built large astronomical instruments and took many careful measurements , and later Stjerneborg , underground , when he discovered that his instruments in the former were not sufficiently steady .
On the  द्वीप ( on जिससे he demonstrated निरंकुश अक्षर  and behavior toward the residents ) he founded manufactories such as paper-making to provide material for printing his results .
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597 , he was invited by the Bohemian king and Holy Roman emperor Rudolph II  to प्राग , जहाँ he became the आधिकारिक  imperial astronomer .
He  निर्मित the  new observatory at Benátky nad Jizerou .
Here , from 1600 until his death in 1601 , he was assisted by Johannes Kepler who later used Tycho 's  खगोलीय आंकड़ा to develop कॅप्लर  's laws of planetary motion .
Guro District (  guro-gu ) is a ज़िला of  Seoul , South Korea , which was separated from Yeongdeungpo District on April 1 , 1980 .
Located in the southwestern part of the city , where besides Yangcheon District and Geumcheon District Guro District has an important position as a transport link which contains railroads , land  रूट इससे the  rest of Seoul to the south of the country .
The Gyeongbu and Gyeongin railway   lines connect Seoul to Busan and Incheon .
In  जोड , सियोल  Metropolitan Subway lines 1 , 2 , and 7 , and major highways intersect in Guro District .
The name Guro originates  इससे the लेजेंड कि नौ (  ) old men ( Korean : ro ) enjoyed longevity in the district .
A  डिजिटल औद्योगिक  complex is located in Guro District .
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex , which played a leading industrial role mainly with textile manufacturing , dressmaking and other labour-intensive industries in 1967 , has been  rapidly बदला into an it औद्योगिक जटिल  .
This complex played a pivotal  भूमिका in the आर्थिक विकास of the दक्षिण कोरियाई 's विकास era ,  referred to as the `` Miracle on the Han River `` , and also contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s .
Twenty-one  प्रतिशत of the कुल क्षेत्रफल  of Guro District is a restricted zone to be used as a greenbelt with the only arboretum in Seoul .
The zone is changing into a lively district as large labour-intensive factories are moving from the area and the  परिषद is विकासशील कया it शर्तें इसके चार zones  .
An `` e-government `` system based  on इस hosted the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  e-participation forum on February 7–9 , 2007 , with the participation of more than thirty-seven countries .
The  फ़ोरम थी शुभारम्भ साथ the थीम `` promoting लोकतंत्र और क्षेत्रीय विकास '' और twenty-five mayors सहित आंद्रे santini  ( Issy-les-Moulineaux , France ) , Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill , US ) , Apirak Kosayothin ( Bangkok , Thailand ) , Uvais Mohamed Emthiyas ( Colombo , Sri Lanka ) , and world experts such as Dr William H. Dutton ( Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the University of Oxford , UK ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere , Finland ) participated in the forum .
The Guro  घोषणा , अपनाया दौरान the फ़ोरम , aims to नियत up a पोर्टल साईट लिये  e-government development and to establish a concrete project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities .
This  अभ्यास  has been recognised for providing a new important step in the development of e-democracy .
The e-participation forum was a key factor for Guro to play the leading role in bridging the digital divide among cities , to provide I.T . enterprises located in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to launch  into the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मार्केट  , to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy .

A wonton ( also spelled wantan , wanton , or wuntun in transcription from Cantonese ;  मंदारिन : húndùn  ) is a type of dumpling commonly found in a number of Chinese cuisines .
Many people were involved in the  आविष्कार of रेडियो  as we now know it .
Several possible methods of wireless communication were considered , including inductive and capacitive induction and transmission  through the मैदान , however the विधि प्रयुक्त लिये रेडियो  today exclusively involves the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves .
After early speculation on  the विषय , प्रायोगिक कार्य on the कनेक्शन between विद्युत और  magnetism began around 1820 with the work of Hans Christian Ørsted and continued with the work of André-Marie Ampère , Joseph Henry , and Michael Faraday .
These investigations  culminated in the पूरा सिद्धान्त  of electromagnetism developed by James Clerk Maxwell .
This theory  वर्णित the सैद्धांतिक आधार of the  propagation of electromagnetic waves .
After Maxwell 's theory was  प्रकाशित अनेक लोगों experimented  with wireless communication , some intentionally using Maxwell 's theory some not .
It is considered likely that the first intentional transmission of a  सिग्नल by अर्थात् of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves was performed by David Edward Hughes around 1880 , although this was considered to be induction at the time .
The first systematic and unequivocal transmission of EM waves was performed by Heinrich  रुडॉल्फ हर्ट्ज़ और वर्णित in papers  published in 1887 and 1890 .
Hertz famously considered these  परिणाम as होने of  little practical value .
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components and theory involved with  the हस्तांतरण और  reception of electromagnetic waves .
Others , notably Guglielmo Marconi , were concerned with practical improvements and the commercial  अनुप्रयोग  of radio to wireless telegraphy .
Later on Reginald A. Fessenden became  the पहला to  send an audio signal by means of electromagnetic waves .
Scurvy is a disease resulting from a  कमियां of विटामिन c ,  which is required for the synthesis of collagen in humans .
The chemical name for vitamin C , ascorbic acid  ,  is derived from the Latin name of scurvy , scorbutus , which also provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of , characterized by or having to do with scurvy '' ) .
Scurvy often presents itself initially as symptoms of malaise and lethargy , followed by formation  of  spots on the skin , spongy gums , and bleeding from the mucous membranes .
Spots are most  abundant on the जांघों  and legs , and a person with the ailment looks pale , feels depressed , and is partially immobilized .
As scurvy advances , there can be open , suppurating wounds , loss of teeth , jaundice ,  ज्वर , न्यूरोपैथी और मौत  .
Scurvy  थी at एक समय आम among sailors , pirates और अन्य सवार जहाजों at समुद्र longer than perishable  fruits and vegetables could be stored ( subsisting instead only on cured and salted meats and dried grains ) and by soldiers similarly deprived of these foods for extended periods .
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c .  380 bc ) , और हर्बल cures लिये स्कर्वी have  been known in many native cultures since prehistory .
स्कर्वी थी एक of the limiting कारकों  of marine travel , often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew on long-distance voyages .
This became  a significant  issue in Europe from the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in the 15th century , continuing to play a significant role through World War I in the 20th century .
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a  nutritional कमियां , जबतक the अलगाव of विटामिन  C and direct evidence of its link to scurvy in 1932 , numerous theories and treatments were proposed , often on little or no experimental data .
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of  विटामिन c as a पृथक अवधारणा  , an inability to reliably link different foods ( notably present in fresh citrus , watercress , and organ meat ) to scurvy .
An additional concept required to understand scurvy was the  degradation of विटामिन c by एक्सपोज़र to एयर और तांबे और  other transition metal salts such as those of iron , thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time .
Treatment by fresh food , particularly citrus  फल , थी periodically  implemented , as it had been since antiquity .
However until  the 1930s , उपचार  was inconsistent , with many ineffective treatments used into the 20th century .
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy , James Lind who first proved it could be treated with citrus fruit in  प्रयोग he वर्णित in उसके 1753 किताब , a treatise of the स्कर्वी , हालांकि उसके  advice was not implemented by the Royal Navy for several decades .
In infants , scurvy  is sometimes referred to as barlow 's बीमारी  , named after Sir Thomas Barlow , a British physician who described it .
however , barlow 's बीमारी  may also refer to mitral valve prolapse .
अन्य eponyms  for scurvy include Moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's disease .
Scurvy does not occur in most  पशु क्युकी वे can synthesize उनके  own vitamin C .
However , humans and other higher primates ( the simians - monkeys  और apes - और tarsiers ) , गिनी  pigs , most or all bats , and some species of birds and fish lack an enzyme ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet .
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues , with  विशेषकर ऊँची एकाग्रता occurring in citrus  fruits ( oranges , lemons , limes , grapefruits ) , tomatoes , potatoes , cabbages , and green peppers .
Iron is a  रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक  Fe ( from ) and atomic number 26 .
It is a metal in the  पहला परिवर्तन  series .
It is  the सबसे आम तत्व  ( by mass ) forming the planet Earth as a whole , forming much of Earth 's outer and inner core .
It is the  चौथी सबसे आम  element in the Earth 's crust .
Iron 's very common presence in rocky planets like Earth is due to its abundant production as a result of  संलयन in high-mass  stars , where the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic .
This causes radioactive nickel to become the last element to be produced before collapse  of a सुपरनोवा लीड to the विस्फोटक कार्यक्रम कि scatter इस precursor  radionuclide of iron abundantly into space .
Like other group 8 elements , iron exists in a wide range of oxidation states , −2 to +6 , although +2 and  +3 हैं the सबसे आम  .
Elemental  आयरन occurs in meteoroids और अन्य कम ऑक्सीजन  environments , but is reactive to oxygen and water .
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray , but oxidize in normal air to give  hydrated आयरन आक्साइड , commonly ज्ञात  as rust .
Unlike many other  धातुओं जिससे रूप passivating ऑक्साइड परतों , आयरन आक्साइड  occupy more volume than iron metal , and thus iron oxides flake off and expose fresh surfaces for corrosion .
Iron metal has been used since ancient times , though copper  alloys , जिससे have निम्नतर melting temperatures  , were used first in history .
Pure iron is soft (   softer than aluminium ) , but is unobtainable by smelting .
The material is significantly hardened and strengthened by impurities from the  smelting प्रक्रम , ऐसे as कार्बन  .
A certain  proportion of कार्बन (  between 0.002 % and 2.1 % ) produces steel , which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron .
Crude iron metal is produced in blast  furnaces , जहाँ अयस्क is घटाया  by coke to pig iron , which has a high carbon content .
Further refinement  साथ ऑक्सीजन reduces the कार्बन  content to the correct proportion to make steel .
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by far the most  आम धातुओं in औद्योगिक उपयोग , due to उनके  great range of desirable properties and the abundance of iron .
Iron chemical compounds , which include ferrous and ferric  यौगिकों , have  many uses .
आयरन ऑक्साइड मिश्रित साथ एल्युमिनियम चूर्ण  can be ignited to create a thermite reaction , used in welding and purifying ores .
It forms binary compounds with the  हैलोजन्स  and the chalcogens .
Among its organometallic compounds is  ferrocene , the पहला  sandwich compound discovered .
Iron plays an important role in biology , forming complexes with molecular oxygen in hemoglobin and myoglobin ; these  दो यौगिकों  are common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates .
Iron is  भी the मेटल प्रयुक्त at the क्रियाशील साईट  of many important redox enzymes dealing with cellular respiration and oxidation and reduction in plants and animals .
The Blue Cross Blue Shield  संघ ( bcbsa ) is a  federation of 38 separate health insurance organizations and companies in the United States .
Combined , they directly or  indirectly provide स्वास्थ्य बीमे  to over 99 million Americans .
The history of Blue  क्रॉस तिथियाँ वापस to 1929 , जबकि  the history of Blue Shield dates to 1939 .
The Blue Cross Association dates back to 1960 , while its Blue  शील्ड बंटवारा थी निर्मित  in 1948 .
The two organizations  मिलाया in 1982 , forming  the current association .
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American , Australian , New Zealand , Canadian , Singaporean , Hong Kong , South African and Jamaican English ; as a crisp in British English and Hiberno-English , and as either a chip or wafer in  भारतीय अंग्रेज़ी ) is a पतला टुकड़ा of आलू  that is deep fried or baked until crunchy .
Potato chips are commonly served as an appetizer , side dish  , or स्नैक .
The basic chips are  पकाया और salted ; अतिरिक्त  varieties are manufactured using various flavorings and ingredients including seasonings , herbs , spices , cheeses , and artificial additives .
`` Crisps '' , however , may also refer to many different types of savory snack products sold in the United Kingdom and Ireland , some made from potato , but may  भी be बना इससे मक्का , tapioca or  other cereals .
An example of these kinds of  savory स्नैक्स is  Monster Munch .
Potato chips  हैं a predominant भाग of the स्नैक खाना  market in English-speaking countries and numerous other Western nations .
The global potato  चिप मार्केट उत्पन्न कुल revenues  of US $ 16.4 billion in 2005 .
इस accounted लिये 35.5 % of  the total savory snacks market in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ) .
Henry Clay , Sr. ( April 12 , 1777 – June 29 , 1852 ) was a lawyer , politician and skilled orator who  represented केंटकी in दोनो the सीनेट  and in the House of Representatives .
He served three different terms as Speaker of the United States House of Representatives and was also Secretary of State from  1825 to 1829  .
He lost his  अभियान  for president in 1824 , 1832 and 1844 .
Clay was a  प्रबल फिगर in दोनो the  First and Second Party systems .
As a  अग्रणी युद्ध हॉक in 1812 , he favored  war with Britain and played a significant role in leading the nation to war in the War of 1812 .
In 1824 he ran for president and lost , but threw  उसके चुनावी मत to जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स , जो बना उसे सचिव  of state as the Jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt bargain . ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the candidate of the Whig  पार्टी , जिससे he संस्थापित और प्रायः  dominated .
Clay was the foremost proponent of the  अमरीकी प्रणाली , लड़ लिये an बढ़ाएँ in tariffs to फोस्टर  industry in the United States , the use of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure , and a strong national bank .
He opposed the  annexation of टेक्सास ,  fearing it would inject the slavery issue into politics .
Clay also opposed the Mexican-American War and the `` Manifest  नियति `` नीति of डेमोक्रेट , जिससे लागत उसे मत in  the close 1844 election .
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator  , '' मिट्टी brokered महत्वपूर्ण  compromises during the Nullification Crisis and on the slavery issue .
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio , '' along with his colleagues Daniel Webster and John C. Calhoun , he was instrumental in formulating the Missouri  सुलह of 1820 और the  Compromise of 1850 .
He was viewed  as the प्राथमिक प्रतिनिधि  of Western interests in this group , and was given the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star . ''
A plantation owner  , मिट्टी आयोजित स्लेव  during his lifetime but freed them in his Will .
Abraham Lincoln , the Whig leader in  इलिनोइस , थी a ग्रेट admirer of  Clay , saying he was `` my ideal of a great man . ''
Lincoln  wholeheartedly समर्थित  Clay 's economic programs .
In 1957 , a Senate Committee selected Clay as one of the five greatest U.S . Senators ,  साथ साथ डेनियल वेबस्टर , जॉन C. calhoun  , Robert La Follette , and Robert Taft .
BJ 's Wholesale Club , Inc. , commonly referred to simply as BJ 's , is a membership-only warehouse club chain operating on the United States East Coast ,  as खूब as in the राज्य  of Ohio .
The company is ranked # 232  on सौभाग्य पत्रिका 's 2010 लिस्टिंग  of America 's 500 largest public corporations .
The Wizard of Oz , known during his reign as The Great and Powerful Oz , is the epithet of Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman  henkel emmannuel ambroise diggs , a fictional अक्षर in the जमीन of oz ,  created by American author L. Frank Baum .
The character was further popularized by the  क्लासिक 1939 फिल्म  , wherein his full name is not mentioned .
Kristinia Jamie DeBarge ( ; born March 8 , 1990 ) is an American singer ,  songwriter ,  dancer and actress .
She  पहला appeared on नेशनल टेलीविज़न  in 2003 as a contestant on the American Idol spin-off , American Juniors .
In 2009 , DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records department Sodapop , releasing her debut album Exposed in  जुलाई of the  same year .
The first single , `` Goodbye `` , reached the top 20  in the us और  Canada .
The lead single ( `` Cry Wolf ''  ) इससे उसके बेनाम sophomore  album was released on September 27 , 2012 .

The team  is coached  by Norm Chow .
It was part of the Western Athletic Conference  जबतक जुलाई 2012 , जब the टोली  joined the Mountain West Conference .
the हवाई योद्धाओं यहूद the तीसरा non-aq टोली to खेल  in a BCS bowl game ; losing to Georgia 41–10 in the Sugar Bowl on January 1 , 2008 in New Orleans , Louisiana .
Marvin Gaye ( April 2 , 1939April 1 , 1984 ) , born Marvin Pentz Gay , Jr. , was an American  singer-songwriter और संगीतकार .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string  of हिट्स सहित `` कैसा मीठी it is ( to be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम  Wells and Tammi Terrell , later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and became among  the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the बागडोर of इसके  production company .
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R  & b subgenres  such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s ,  gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning  hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album .
Since his death in 1984 ,  gaye रै महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों ,  including the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .
