The Chernobyl disaster ( , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that  occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त  ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ) , which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An explosion and fire released large  quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into  the atmosphere , which spread over much of the western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history , and is one of only two classified as a level 7 event on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the  Fukushima  Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the contamination and  avert a वृहद प्रलय  ultimately involved over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles .
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has  महरूम विवादित , और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे  as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for .
Mrs. Claus says goodbye to her husband as he  सेट बंद on उसके यात्रा  in this 1919 postcard
Mrs. Claus is the wife of Santa  क्लॉस , the क्रिसमस  gift-bringer in North American and European Christmas tradition .
She is known for making  कुकीज़ साथ the elves और  preparing toys with her husband Santa Claus .
Her first name is a mystery , though she has  महरूम referred to as मरियम , जेसिका , layla  , Annette , Heidi , or Martha .
HijackThis ( also  hijackthis or hjt ) is an खोलें सोर्स enumerating  tool for Microsoft Windows originally created by Merijn Bellekom , and later sold to Trend Micro .
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking methods ,  बल्कि than relying on a डेटाबेस  of known spyware .
It scans a user 's computer quickly ,  और प्रदर्शक ब्राउजर  hijacking locations , showing what entries are there .
HijackThis is used primarily for diagnosis of browser hijacking , as uninformed use of its removal facilities can  कारण significant तन्त्र क्षति  to a computer .
HijackThis does not remove or detect spyware ; it lists most common  स्थितियाँ जहाँ ब्राउजर hijacking  activity can occur .
Browser hijacking can cause malware to be  संस्थापित on a कंप्यूटर  .
On February 16 , 2012 ,  ट्रेंड सूक्ष्म released the hijackthis  source code as open source and it is now available on the SourceForge site .
Saddle Creek Records is an  अमरीकी रिकार्ड लेबल आधारित  in Omaha , Nebraska .
Started as a college class project on entrepreneurship , the label was founded by Mike Mogis and Justin Oberst in 1993  ( as lumberjack रिकॉर्ड  ) .
Mogis soon turned over his role in the company to  robb  Nansel .
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road , a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha , and the  beginnings of a झाँकी जिनकी सदस्यों शामिल conor oberst ( तब a सोलो कलाकार , फिलहाल of  Bright Eyes , Conor Oberst and the Mystic Valley Band , Desaparecidos and Monsters of Folk ) , Tim Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia , currently of Cursive and The Good Life ) , and others .
collectively , वे यहूद  known unofficially as the `` Creekers '' .
Saddle Creek first appeared in print on a show flyer  ,  offering to `` Spend an evening with Saddle Creek '' ( later to be the title of the label 's DVD . )
Saddle Creek  became an incorporated एंटिटी as a परिणाम  of a class project on entrepreneurship .
Distribution is handled  by the वैकल्पिक वितरण  Alliance , which is under the Warner Music Group umbrella .
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the flagship label of a style of music called `` The  ओमाहा ध्वनि `` , characterized  by a slight country twang .
This is increasingly inaccurate  , हालांकि , साथ the वृद्धि of अधिक  electronic sounds such as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles .
The  eclectic ध्वनि of काठी क्रीक 's disparate  member bands is somewhat explained by their history ; a number of the original members of the label attended grade school together .
A `` sister label '' , of sorts , to  काठी क्रीक  is Team Love , started by Conor Oberst in 2004 .
The label opened arms to their first bands not based in Omaha in 2001 with releases by Now  it 's  Overhead and Sorry About Dresden .
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed , including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley , Eric  bachmann ( formerly नेता of archers of loaf और कुटिल उंगलियाँ  from North Carolina ) , Georgie James ( Washington D.C. ) , Two Gallants ( San Francisco ) , and most recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ) .
In 2005 , Spend an Evening with Saddle Creek , a  वृत्तचित्र detailing the पहला टेन सालो of the  record label 's history , was released .
The DVD features extensive interviews with the  काठी क्रीक bands ,  archival footage , and rare live performances .
On June 8 , 2007 , the label opened their own music  स्थान नामित slowdown ( बाद the  group Slowdown Virginia ) , located in downtown Omaha , Nebraska .
The following is a  सूची of एपीसोड लिये  the television show Full House .
In total , there were 192 episodes filmed for the show over the course of its eight  सीज़न , इससे 1987  to 1995 .
Full  हाउस is a हालात  comedy which chronicles a widowed father 's struggles of raising his three young daughters and the lives that they have touched .
The patriarch of the family , Danny ( Bob Saget ) , invites his brother-in-law Jesse ( John Stamos ) and his best friend Joey  ( डेव coulier ) , to सहायता उठाएँ उसके children ( candace cameron , jodie sweetin , और मरियम kate/ashley olsen  ) , after his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver .
After  एपीसोड 88 और  89 , Jesse marries Becky ( Lori Loughlin ) , and they move into the attic .
Then , after episodes 104 and 105 , Becky  और जेसी have जुड़वा लड़कों नामित nicky और एलेक्स (  Daniel and Kevin Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ) .
The series ends with episode 192 , `` Michelle Rides Again Part 2 '' , when Michelle loses her  मेमोरी और the परिवार कोशिशें to restore  it .
Notice of Stamp  अधिनियम  of 1765 in Newspaper
American newspapers reacted  to the स्टैम्प अधिनियम साथ गुस्सा और पूर्वानुमान  of the demise of journalism .
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in American Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 George III , c. 12 ) imposed a direct tax by the British Parliament specifically on the colonies  of अंग्रेजों अमेरिका , और it जरूरी कि अनेक मुद्रित सामग्री in the colonies be उत्पादित on stamped पेपर उत्पादित in लंदन  , carrying an embossed revenue stamp .
These printed materials were  विधिक दस्तावेज़ , मैगज़ीन , अखबारों  and many other types of paper used throughout the colonies .
Like previous taxes , the stamp tax had to be paid in valid British currency , not in  औपनिवेशिक पेपर धन  .
The purpose of the tax was to help pay for troops stationed in North America after the British  विजय in the सात सालो  ' War .
The British government felt that the colonies were the primary beneficiaries of this military presence , and should pay at  तनिक a portion of the  expense .
The Stamp Act met great  प्रतिरोध in the  colonies .
The  colonies भेजा no प्रतिनिधि  to Parliament , and therefore had no influence over what taxes were raised , how they were levied , or how they would be spent .
Many colonists considered it a violation of their rights as Englishmen to be taxed without their  सहमति —consent कि तभी the औपनिवेशिक  legislatures could grant .
Colonial assemblies sent petitions and  विरोध .
The Stamp Act Congress held in  नई यॉर्क  City , reflecting the first significant joint colonial response to any British measure , also petitioned Parliament and the King .
Local protest groups , led by colonial merchants and landowners , established connections through correspondence that created a  ढीला गठबन्धन कि विस्तारित  from New England to Georgia .
Protests and demonstrations initiated  by the बेटे  of Liberty often turned violent and destructive as the masses became involved .
Very soon all stamp tax distributors were intimidated into resigning their  आयोग  , and the tax was never effectively collected .
Opposition to the Stamp Act was  नहीं  limited to the colonies .
British merchants and manufacturers , whose exports  to the colonies यहूद threatened by औपनिवेशिक आर्थिक समस्याएं  exacerbated by the tax , also pressured Parliament .
The Act was repealed on March 18 , 1766 as a matter of expedience , but  पार्लियामेंट  affirmed its power to legislate for the colonies “in all cases whatsoever” by also passing the Declaratory Act .
There  followed a श्रेणी of नई कर और regulations  , likewise opposed by the colonists .
the एपीसोड निभाई  a major role in defining the grievances and enabling the organized colonial resistance that led to the American Revolution in 1775 .
pt-105 underway  .
PT boats were a variety of torpedo-armed fast attack craft used by the  संयुक्त राज्य नेवी in संसार युद्ध  II to attack larger surface ships .
`` PT '' is the US hull classification symbol  लिये `` पैट्रोल torpedo ''  .
The PT boat squadrons were  nicknamed `` the मच्छर बेड़े  '' .
The  जापानी पुकारा  them `` Devil Boats '' .
The original pre– World War I torpedo boats were  designed साथ `` विस्थापन  '' hulls .
They displaced up to  300 टन और the शीर्ष  speed was .
the pt नौकाएँ प्रयुक्त in संसार  War II were built using the planing -type hull form developed for racing boats .
They were much smaller ( 30–75  टन ) और तेज़ ( 35–40  knots ) .
Both types were designed to strike at larger warships with torpedoes , using  अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची गति to मिलेंगी बंद  , and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire .
They were much less expensive than  विशाल  warships .
PT boats were much faster ,  छोटी , और सस्ता than  conventional ( displacement hull ) vessels .
During World War II , American PT boats engaged  दुश्मन destroyers और numerous अन्य सतह  craft , ranging from small boats to large supply ships .
PT boats also operated as gunboats against  दुश्मन छोटी शिल्प  , such as armored barges used by the Japanese forces for inter-island transport .
Good Friday is a religious  अवकाश observed primarily by ईसाइयों  commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and his death at Calvary .
The holiday is observed  दौरान पावन सप्ताह as भाग of the paschal triduum  on the Friday preceding Easter Sunday , and may coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover .
It is also  ज्ञात  as Holy Friday , Great Friday , Black Friday , or Easter Friday , though the latter properly refers to the Friday in Easter week .
Based on the details of the Canonical gospels , the Crucifixion of Jesus was  सबसे संभावित to have महरूम on a शुक्रवार ( the  day before the Sabbath ) ( ) .
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33 , by two different  समूह , और originally  as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the Biblical and Julian calendars and the crescent of the moon .
A third method , using a completely different astronomical approach based on a lunar Crucifixion  अंधेरा और ग्रहण मॉडल ( सतत साथ apostle पीटर  's reference to a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ) , points to Friday , 3 April AD 33 .
The Great Basin  is the largest  area of endorheic watersheds in North America .
It is  विख्यात लिये दोनो इसके arid शर्तें और  its Basin and range topography that varies from the North American low point at Badwater Basin to the highest point of the contiguous United States , less than away at the summit of Mount Whitney .
The region spans several physiographic divisions ,  biomes / ecoregions , और  deserts .
Raster  may refer  to:
रास्टर ग्राफिक्स  , graphical techniques using arrays of pixel values
Raster graphics editor  , a  computer program
Raster scan , the pattern  of चित्र readout , हस्तांतरण , भंडार , और पुनर्निर्माण  in television and computer images
rasterisation , or rasterization ,  conversion of a vector image to a raster image
Raster image processor , or RIP , a component of a printing system  कि  performs rasterisation
Raster  इन्टरनेट ,  a computer interrupt signal
Raster  to वेक्टर , an  image conversion process
Raster  बार , an प्रभाव  used in computer demos
Raster-Noton , a record  लेबल
Rastrum , a device used in medieval music  पांडुलिपियों to  draw staff lines
Raster  दस्तावेज़ ऑब्जेक्ट ,  a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English :  ) is a legendary geatish  hero and later turned king in the epic poem named after him , one of the oldest surviving pieces of literature in the English language .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of  पर्ल हार्बर ) थी a आश्चर्य सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी विरूद्ध the संयुक्त राज्य नवल  base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From the standpoint  of the defenders , the आक्रमण commenced  at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions  the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the संयुक्त किंगडम  , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters  , बमवर्षक और torpedo  planes in two waves , launched from six aircraft carriers .
All eight U.S.  नेवी battleships  were damaged , with four being sunk .
Two of these  यहूद बाद उठाया , और साथ  the remaining four repaired , six battleships returned to service later in the war .
The  जापानी भी sank or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन  cruisers , three destroyers , an anti-aircraft training ship , and one minelayer .
188 U.S. aircraft were  नष्ट ; 2,402  Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as the power station , shipyard , maintenance , and fuel  और torpedo  storage facilities , as well as the submarine piers and headquarters building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost , and 65  servicemen मारे or wounded  .
One Japanese  नाविक थी captured  .
The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led  सीधे to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into संसार  War II in both the Pacific and European theaters .
The following day ( December 8 ) ,  the संयुक्त  States declared war on Japan .
घरेलू support लिये non-interventionism  , which had been strong , disappeared .
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality  पैट्रोल ) थी replaced  by active alliance .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to declare war on the U.S. on  दिसम्बर 11 , जिससे थी reciprocated by the u.S.  the same day .
There  यहूद numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents  for unannounced military action by Japan .
However , the lack of any formal warning ,  विशेषकर जबकि negotiations यहूद स्टिल जाहिर जारी , led अध्यक्ष  Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7 , 1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south United States highway that runs for in  the पहाड़ - उत्तरी  Plains states of the United States .
The southern terminus of the route is at the United States-Mexico border in El Paso , Texas ,  connecting साथ मैक्सिकन संघीय राजमार्ग  45 .
The northern terminus is at the United States-Canada border in Fortuna , North Dakota , where the route  continues उत्तर as saskatchewan  Highway 35 .
In both  the संयुक्त राज्य और  Saskatchewan , Canada the route is known as the CanAm Highway .
Sections of US 85 are  माना भाग  of the Theodore Roosevelt Expressway .
The  संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1968 थी the 46th  quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November 5 , 1968 .
the रिपब्लिकन  nominee , former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the election over the Democratic nominee , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on  a अभियान कि promised  to restore law and order to the nation 's cities , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it  permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन  that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
coming चार सालो बाद डेमोक्रेट lyndon B. जॉनसन जीती in a ऐतिहासिक  landslide , the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected for the first time in twelve years .
It was a wrenching national experience , conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader  मार्टिन लूथर किंग , jr. , और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश , the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी , फैली  opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses , and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The election featured the strongest  तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि  1912 by former Alabama Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end school segregation , he  carried the गहन दक्षिण और भागा खूब in जातीय  industrial districts in the North .
This was the last election in  जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत  in the electoral college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the सबसे चुनावी मत और रै remained the सबसे populous  state since then .
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without  carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय  candidate 's home state .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications , processes and CPU usage , commit charge and memory information , network activity and statistics , logged-in users , and system services  ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ , 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र  is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly , e.g , `` Process Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set process  प्राथमिकताएं , प्रोसेसर अपनापन , forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं ,  and shut down , restart , hibernate or log off from Windows .
खिड़कियाँ कार्य मैनेजर थी  introduced with Windows NT 4.0 .
पिछला संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ  NT included the Task List application , which had far fewer features .
The task list was capable of listing currently running  प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें , or बनाना  a new process .
In  खिड़कियाँ xp तभी , a shutdown मेनू  is also present that allows access to Standby , Hibernate , Turn off , Restart , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x , Windows 95 ,  खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक  the programs currently running .
This file was executed by  कार्यशील the taskman.exe संचिका इससे the  C : \Windows directory .
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the modern Japanese writing system along with hiragana ( ひらがな , ) , katakana ( カタカナ , ) , Hindu-Arabic numerals , and the  occasional  use of the Latin alphabet .
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the Chinese characters  वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` हान वर्ण  '' and is written using the same characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ) .
John R Williams ( May 4 , 1782 – October 20 , 1854 ) was an American  सिपाही , व्यापारी , और राजनेता जो is  most well known for serving as the first mayor of Detroit , Michigan .
In total , he served  as डेट्रॉयट 's महापौर लिये पाँच  other terms .
He also was a brigadier general  in the संयुक्त राज्य  Army during the Black Hawk War .
A simple dry  चुम्बकीय पोर्टेबल  compass .
A smartphone that  can be प्रयुक्त as a कम्पास क्युकी  of the magnetometer inside .
An iPhone that can be used as  a geological  compass because of the 3-axis teslameter and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A military compass  कि थी प्रयुक्त  during World War I .
A compass is a navigational  यंत्र कि shows दिशानिर्देश  in a frame of reference that is stationary relative to the surface of the earth .
The frame of reference defines  the चार कार्डिनल दिशानिर्देश  ( or points ) – north , south , east , and west .
इंटरमीडिएट दिशानिर्देश  are also defined .
Usually , a diagram called a compass rose , which shows the directions ( with their names  प्रायः  abbreviated to initials ) , is marked on the compass .
When the compass is in use , the rose is aligned with the real directions in the frame of reference , so , for example , the `` N '' mark on the  रोज़ वाकई अंक to the उत्तर .
Frequently , in addition to the rose or sometimes instead of it , angle  markings in डिग्री  are shown on the compass .
North corresponds to zero degrees , and the angles increase clockwise , so east is  90 डिग्री , दक्षिण is 180 ,  and west is 270 .
These numbers allow the compass to show azimuths  or बियरिंग , जिससे  are commonly stated in this notation .
The magnetic compass was first  invented as a यंत्र लिये भविष्यवाणी as  early as the Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since about 206 BC ) .
The compass  थी प्रयुक्त in सोंग राजवंश  China by the military for navigational orienteering by 1040-1044 , and was used for maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117 .
The use of a compass is recorded in Western Europe between 1187 and  1202 , और in फारस in  1232 .
The dry compass was  invented in यूरोपीय around  1300 .
This was supplanted in the  जल्दी 20th सदी by the  liquid-filled magnetic compass .
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire ( Quechua : Tawantinsuyu )  थी the largest साम्राज्य  in pre-Columbian America .
The administrative , political and military center of  the साम्राज्य थी स्तिथ  in Cusco in modern-day Peru .
The Inca  सभ्यता arose इससे the हाइलैंड्स  of Peru sometime in the early 13th century .
From 1438 to 1533 , the  incas प्रयुक्त a किस्में of विधि , इससे conquest to शांतिपूर्ण  assimilation , to incorporate a large portion of western South America , centered on the Andean mountain ranges , including , besides Peru , large parts of modern Ecuador , western and south central Bolivia , northwest Argentina , north and central Chile , and southern Colombia into a state comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia .
The official language of the empire was  quechua , हालांकि सैंकड़ों of लोकल भाषाएं  and dialects of Quechua were spoken .
The Inca referred to their empire as Tawantinsuyu which can be  अनूदित as the चार  Regions or The Four United Provinces .
There were many local forms of worship , most of  उन्हें concerning लोकल पवित्र `` huacas `` , लकिन the इन्का नेतृत्व प्रोत्साहित the इबादत  of Inti —the sun god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults such as that of Pachamama .
The Incas considered their King ,  the sapa इन्का , to be the  `` child of the sun . ''
The kidneys are organs that serve several  अनिवार्य नियामक भूमिकाएँ in सबसे पशु  , including vertebrates and some invertebrates .
They are essential in the urinary system and also serve homeostatic functions such as the regulation of electrolytes , maintenance of acid–base  संतुलन , और विनियमन of रक्त दबाव ( via maintaining नमक और जल  balance ) .
They serve the body as a natural filter of the blood , and remove wastes which are diverted to  the urinary ब्लैडर  .
In producing urine , the kidneys excrete wastes  ऐसे as यूरिया और अमोनियम , और वे हैं भी जिम्मेदार  for the reabsorption of water , glucose , and amino acids .
The  गुर्दे भी उपज  hormones including calcitriol , erythropoietin , and the enzyme renin .
Located at the rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum , the kidneys receive blood from the paired renal arteries ,  और नाली  into the paired renal veins .
Each kidney excretes urine   into a ureter , itself a paired structure that empties into the urinary bladder .
Renal physiology is the study of kidney function , while  nephrology is the चिकित्सा specialty  concerned with kidney diseases .
Diseases of the kidney are diverse , but individuals with  गुर्दा बीमारी अक्सर प्रदर्शक characteristic  clinical features .
Common clinical conditions involving the kidney include the nephritic and nephrotic syndromes , renal cysts , acute kidney injury , chronic kidney disease , urinary tract infection  , nephrolithiasis , और urinary  tract obstruction .
विभिन्न cancers of the गुर्दा  exist ; the most common adult renal cancer is renal cell carcinoma .
Cancers , cysts , and some other renal conditions  can be प्रबंधित साथ हटाना  of the kidney , or nephrectomy .
When renal function , measured by glomerular filtration rate , is persistently poor , dialysis and  गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण  may be treatment options .
Although they  हैं  not severely harmful , kidney stones can be painful and a nuisance .
The removal of kidney stones involves ultrasound treatment to break up the stones into smaller pieces , which are  तब passed through the urinary  tract .
One common symptom of kidney stones is a sharp pain in the  medial/lateral खण्ड  of the lower back .
Lockton Companies Inc.  is the संसार 's largest privately आयोजित बीमे  brokerage firm , providing insurance , risk management and employee benefits solutions .
In addition to its Kansas City , Missouri headquarters , Lockton  operates 60 स्थितियाँ  in 17 countries .
Lockton is currently  घर to अधिक than  4,450 Associates worldwide .
The company was founded by  जोकर lockton in 1966 और  has since become the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage firm .
Lockton serves a wide array of industries with services that include risk management ,  casualty , surety ,  professional indemnity and more .
For 46 years , Lockton posted extraordinary organic growth , with  वैश्विक revenues reaching $ 915 लाख  in fiscal 2012 .
Lockton Benefits Group : Lockton’s Employee  benefit’s टोली works closely साथ बीमे वाहक और प्रशासकों  to create comprehensive and integrated benefits strategies for clients .
The Lockton Benefits Group provides services including compliance ,  कार्यपालिका लाभ , स्वास्थ्य और welfare , स्वास्थ्य  risk solutions , retirement and more .
Lockton  अपनापन : lockton अपनापन , an संबद्ध of  Lockton Companies , meets the insurance needs of affinity groups , franchises , professional organizations , and associations of all sizes .
Lockton Affinity offers  a किस्में of बीमे उत्पाद  options and programs .
Products include : General Liability , Professional Liability , Property  , मजदूर मुआवजे , निर्देशकों & अधिकारियों  Liability , Commercial Auto , Specialty Coverage , Excess , Health Plans and more .
lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय  : Lockton International operates offices in the UK and Ireland , as well as offices throughout Asia and Latin America .
In Europe , Lockton International is a partner in EOS RISQ , Europe’s  अग्रणी बीमे ब्रोकिंग और  risk management consultancy .
EOS RISQ is an equity-based  यूरोपीय साझेदारी of प्रमुख स्वतंत्र बीमे  brokers with over 3,500 employees based in more than 30 countries in Europe .
Lockton International provides specialized solutions for  निजी लाइनों , sme’s और प्रमुख multi-national  clients .
White  चॉकलेट is a चॉकलेट  derivative .
It  commonly consists of cocoa मक्खन , शुगर  , milk solids and salt , and is characterized by a pale yellow or ivory appearance .
The melting point of cocoa butter , its primary  cocoa सेम घटक , is ऊँची पर्याप्त  to keep white chocolate solid at room temperature .
Donald Leon `` Don '' Blankenship ( born March 14 , 1950 ) was Chairman and CEO of Massey Energy Co. , the  छठे largest कोयले  company ( by 2008 production ) in the United States .
He served in those roles from November 30  , 2000 , जबतक दिसम्बर  31 , 2010 .
Blankenship is an active financial backer of the Republican party and  भागीदार in लोकल और राज्य राजनीती  , especially in his home state of West Virginia .
He has frequently spoken out publicly about politics , the  पर्यावरण , संघ , और  coal production .
U.S. Securities and Exchange  आयोग filings दिखाएँ blankenship थी सशुल्क $ 17.8  million in 2009 , the highest in the coal industry .
उसके 2009 अदा represents a $ 6.8  million raise over 2008 and almost double his compensation package in 2007 .
blankenship भी प्राप्त a deferred मुआवजे  package valued at $ 27.2 million in 2009 .
On December 3 , 2010 , Blankenship announced that he was retiring as CEO at the end of the year , and  होता be succeeded by massey अध्यक्ष बैक्सटर  F. Phillips Jr .

Negligence ( Lat . negligentia , from neglegere , to neglect , literally `` not to  चुनें up कुछ '' ) is a विफलता to कसरत the परवाह कि  a reasonably prudent person would exercise in like circumstances .
The area of tort law known as  लापरवाही involves नुक़सान caused  by carelessness , not intentional harm .
According to Jay M.  feinman of the rutgers  University School of Law ;
`` The  कोर विचार of लापरवाही is कि लोगों चाहिए कसरत उचित  care when they act by taking account of the potential harm that they might foreseeably cause harm to other people . ''
`` those who go personally or bring property where they know that they or it may come into collision with the  व्यक्तियों or प्रॉपर्टी  of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision . ''
Fletcher v Rylands  ( [ 1866 ] lr  1 Ex 265 )
Through civil litigation , if an injured person proves that another person  acted negligently to कारण उनके चोट  , they can recover damages to compensate for their harm .
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the injured plaintiff to  मुआवजे लिये नुक़सान to उनके देह , प्रॉपर्टी , दिमागी well-being , वित्तीय औकात  , or intimate relationships .
however , क्युकी लापरवाही मामले हैं बहुत fact-specific , इस सामान्य परिभाषा  does not fully explain the concept of when the law will require one person to compensate another for losses caused by accidental injury .
Further , the law of negligence at common law is only  एक पहलू of the विधि of देयता  .
Although resulting damages must be proven in order to recover  मुआवजे in a लापरवाही कार्रवाई , the  nature and extent of those damages are not the primary focus of negligence cases .
A melanocytic nevus ( also known as `` Nevocytic nevus '' ) is a  प्रकार of lesion कि contains nevus कोशिकाएं ( a प्रकार  of melanocyte ) .
कुछ स्त्रोत  equate the term mole with `` melanocytic nevus '' .
अन्य स्त्रोत आरक्षित  the term `` mole '' for other purposes .
The majority of  औज़ार appear दौरान the पहला दो दशकों of a person’s  life , while about one in every 100 babies is born with moles .
Acquired moles are a form of benign neoplasm , while congenital moles , or congenital nevi , are  माना a नाबालिग malformation or hamartoma और may be at a उच्चतर रिस्क लिये melanoma  .
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a  pigmented विकास on the स्किन , formed  mostly of a type of cell known as a melanocyte .
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting agent , melanin  , is जिम्मेदार लिये उनके  dark color .
Moles are a member  of the परिवार of स्किन lesions  known as nevi .
the व्यापक  metabolic panel , or chemical screen , ( CMP ; CPT code 80053 ) is a panel of 14 blood tests which serves as an initial broad medical screening tool .
The CMP provides a rough check of kidney function , liver function , and  electrolyte और द्रव संतुलन  , but it is far from perfect .
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a result of false positives and thus the CBC may need to be repeated for a  रोगी ( or replaced साथ a अधिक विशिष्ट  test ) .
The CMP  is an विस्तारित संस्करण  of the basic metabolic panel ( BMP ) , which does not include liver tests .
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as part of a routine physical examination , or  may be प्रयुक्त to मॉनिटर a रोगी साथ a दीर्घकालिक बीमारी  , such as diabetes mellitus or hypertension .
Previous names for the  फलक of परीक्षण have महरूम chem  12 , Chemistry panel , Chemistry screen , SMA 12 , SMA 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - Computer ) .
The  परीक्षण हैं performed on  machines based on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957 .
Natural gas  निष्कर्षण by देशों in घन  meters per year .
Natural gas is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture consisting primarily of methane , but  commonly सहित varying amounts of अन्य hydrocarbons  , carbon dioxide , nitrogen , and hydrogen sulfide .
प्राकृतिक गैस is an उर्जा सोर्स  often used for heating , cooking , and electricity generation .
It is also used as fuel for  वाहनों और as a रासायनिक फर्टिलाइजर in the manufacture  of plastics and other commercially important organic chemicals .
Natural gas is found in deep underground natural rock  formations or संबद्ध  with other hydrocarbon reservoirs in coal beds and as methane clathrates .
Petroleum is also another resource found in proximity to and  साथ प्राकृतिक  gas .
Most natural gas was  निर्मित over समय by दो mechanisms  : biogenic and thermogenic .
Biogenic gas is created by  methanogenic जीवों in marshes , bogs  , landfills , and shallow sediments .
Deeper in the earth , at greater temperature and  दबाव ,  thermogenic gas is created from buried organic material .
Before natural gas can be used as a fuel , it must undergo processing to remove impurities , including  जल , to मिलें the विशेषताएँ  of marketable natural gas .
The by-products of processing include ethane , propane ,  butanes , pentanes , और  higher molecular weight hydrocarbons , hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into pure sulfur ) , carbon dioxide , water vapor , and sometimes helium and nitrogen .
Natural gas is often informally referred to simply as  गैस , विशेषकर जब compared  to other energy sources such as oil or coal .
This page is  परिचय the कल्पना  Movers band .
For information about the TV show starring the band , see  कल्पना मूवर्स  ( TV series ) .
Imagination Movers is a band formed in New Orleans ,  louisiana ,  in 2003 .
The lineup includes Rich Collins , Scott Durbin , Dave Poche ,  और स्कॉट `` smitty  '' Smith .
सदस्यों of  the group were longtime friends and neighbors .
The group started as a television/music concept which was pitched to local PBS  affiliates in नई  Orleans .
WLAE-TV  थी the पहला  to take an interest in the group and later introduced them to Beth Courtney , the President & Chief Executive Officer at Louisiana Public Broadcasting .
Soon after , LPB  began airing one-minute  videos produced by the Imagination Movers themselves .
The Movers built a sizable regional following by setting educational songs  लिये बच्चे to melodies  and rhythms that adults appreciate as well .
They sold more than  100,000 नक़ल of उनके  self-produced CDs and DVDs .
Their three indie CDs : `` Good Ideas , '' `` Calling All Movers , '' and `` Eight Feet '' along with their grass roots DVD `` Stir It  up '' have , संयुक्त , जीती चौदह नेशनल पुरस्कार , इससे ऐसे समूह as the नेशनल संघ  of Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice .
In early 2005 , Disney  took सूचना , और initiated negotiations  to add the Movers to the company 's roster .
ये यहूद बाधित  in August when the flood protection designed and built by the Army Corps of Engineers to protect New Orleans failed .
The resulting floodwater claimed the band 's office , as well as the homes  of कॉलिन्स , durbin और poche – लकिन  the deal was signed in the spring of 2006 .
In 2008 ,  वॉल्ट डिज़्नी रिकॉर्ड introduced  the Imagination Movers ' music to the nation with the release of the Movers ' first nationally-released CD , `` Juice Box Heroes . ''
In September 2008 , a  30-minute दिखाएँ featuring the समूह  began airing on the Disney Channel 's preschool programming block known as Playhouse Disney , and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement , Disney Junior .
The Movers  लिखें और perform  all the songs on their show .
Moreover , the Imagination Movers have received  नाजुक  kudos for their live concert performances .
In October 2009 , the Imagination  मूवर्स प्रारंभ the `` सजीव इससे the विचार  Warehouse Concert Tour 2009 '' .
Traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their live performances include lots of  उनके पसंदीदा गीतों और नाचना , as खूब as वीडियो दिखावे  of Warehouse Mouse .
Beginning in early-February  2011 और wrapping up in लेट may 2011 , the कल्पना मूवर्स प्रस्तुत उनके `` in a बिग गोदाम कॉन्सर्ट दौरे  , '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ cities across North America .
From March to October 2012 , the Imagination Movers toured  उत्तर अमेरिका  on their post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour .
The show maintained several elements of the original TV concept , such as an on-stage `` idea emergency '' and several sets from their older catalogue ; however , with the departure of Wendy Calio back to her  देशी हवाई , the अक्षर `` नीना '' , साथ साथ उसके musical संख्याएँ , is नहीं  present .
The tour promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/DVD release , ``  rock-o-matic '' , जिससे सुविधाएँ  all new music from the band .
The album itself is produced independently of Disney and has a notably more mature , contemporary rock-and-roll sound , though  स्टिल बहुत उचित लिये  children .
Several performance dates were moved to later in 2012 to benefit from the increased exposure of  the कल्पना मूवर्स tv दिखाएँ अभी playing रोज़ on डिज़्नी  Junior .
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a  semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , including Tasmania .
Together with the four species of echidna , it  is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes  , the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth .
It is the sole living representative of its family (  ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus  ) , though a number of related species have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed , beaver -tailed , otter -footed mammal baffled European  naturalists जब वे पहला encountered  it , with some considering it an elaborate fraud .
It is one of the few venomous mammals , the male platypus having a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom  सक्षम of causing कठोर पीड़ा to इंसानो  .
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable and iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a  शुभंकर at नेशनल कार्यक्रम  and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin .
The platypus is the animal emblem of the state  of नई दक्षिण  Wales .
Until the early 20th century , it was  hunted लिये इसके फर , लकिन it is  now protected throughout its range .
हालांकि खिलाते प्रजनन programmes have  had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution , it is not under any immediate threat .
The Chupacabra or Chupacabras  ( , इससे chupar `` to चूस '' और cabra ``  goat '' , literally `` goat sucker '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of the Americas .
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in Puerto Rico (  जहाँ ये sightings यहूद पहला reported ) , मैक्सिको , और the संयुक्त राज्य , विशेषकर in the latter 's लैटिन अमरीकी  communities .
The name comes from the animal 's reported habit of attacking and drinking the blood of livestock ,  विशेषकर बकरियों  .
Physical  descriptions of the प्राणी  vary .
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico , and have since been reported as far north as Maine , and as far south as Chile , and even being  spotted बाहर the americas in देशों जैसे रूस और the फिलीपीन  .
It is supposedly a heavy creature , the size of a small bear , with a row of  कांटे reaching इससे the गर्दन  to the base of the tail .
Sighting reports of the  chupacabra have महरूम disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking  evidence , while most reports in northern Mexico and the southern United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange .
Biologists and  वन्यजीव प्रबन्धन officials दृश्य the chupacabra  as a contemporary legend .
The North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) is an agreement signed by Canada , Mexico , and the United States  , बनाना a trilateral  trade bloc in North America .
The agreement came into force on  जनवरी 1 ,  1994 .
it superseded the canada–united राज्य  Free Trade Agreement between the U.S. , Canada , and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the  उत्तर अमरीकी अनुबंध on पर्यावरणीय  Cooperation ( NAAEC ) and the North American Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ) .
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind  कि expresses संतोष साथ the थर्मल  environment and is assessed by subjective evaluation ( ANSI / ASHRAE Standard 55 ) .
Maintaining this standard of thermal comfort for occupants of buildings or other enclosures is one of the important goals of HVAC ( heating  , वेंटिलेशन , और एयर कंडीशनिंग ) डिज़ाइन इंजीनियर्स  .
The Predicted Mean Vote  ( pmv ) मॉडल स्टैंड among the सबसे पहचाना  thermal comfort models .
It was developed using principles of heat balance and experimental data  एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु कक्ष अंतर्गत  steady state conditions .
Because the PMV model was derived from data collected in a controlled climate , it is not  उपयुक्त लिये अनुप्रयोग in naturally हवादार  spaces which often have high levels of air movement .
This shortcoming motivated the  विकास of a परिवार  of empirical statistical models of thermal comfort in naturally ventilated spaces known as adaptive models .
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting with their  पर्यावरण , और controlling उनके थर्मल सुकून by अर्थात् of कपडे  or window-opening and closing .
This is in contrast  to थर्मल सुकून in sealed इमारतें , in जिससे  occupants experience the environment passively .
Thermal comfort is affected by heat  conduction , संवहन , विकिरण  , and evaporative heat loss .
Thermal comfort is  कायम जब the ऊष्मा उत्पन्न by इंसान  metabolism is allowed to dissipate , thus maintaining thermal equilibrium with the surroundings .
It has been long recognized that the sensation of feeling  hot or ठंडा is नहीं बस  dependent on air temperature alone .
Thermal comfort calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 55 can be freely performed with the CBE Thermal Comfort  औजार लिये ashrae-55 .
Durante degli Alighieri , simply referred to as Dante  ( , ; ; c. 1265–1321 ) ,  was a major Italian poet of the Middle Ages .
His Divine Comedy , originally called ' and later called ' by Boccaccio , is widely considered the greatest  साहित्यिक कार्य रचित  in the Italian language and a masterpiece of world literature .
In  इटली he is ज्ञात  as ' ( `` the Supreme Poet '' ) or just ' .
He , Petrarch and Boccaccio are  भी ज्ञात as `` the तीन  fountains '' or `` the three crowns '' .
Dante is also called the `` Father  of the इतालवी भाषा  '' .
Headquarters (   Kobe , Japan )
( )  is a टायर  and rubber company based in Japan .
It is part  of the sumitomo  Group .
The company traces its origins  to 1909 , जब the sumitomo  Group made an investment in Dunlop Japan , the newly formed Japanese subsidiary of the British company Dunlop Rubber .
Over the years Sumitomo and Dunlop developed a close  कारोबार संबंध , और in 1963 the sumitomo  Group acquired control of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd .
In 1985 , when Dunlop Rubber was taken over by BTR plc , the company acquired the automobile tire assets of Dunlop , including the right to use the Dunlop  ब्रांड  on automobile tires .
The acquisition did not include the US and Australian businesses , which were separately owned , but in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired  the dunlop टायर निगम of the  US from its management .
In 1997 , Sumitomo formed a joint venture  साथ goodyear  Tire and Rubber Company , by which Goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture tires for each other 's markets , including Dunlop branded tires .
As part of  the अनुबंध , goodyear acquired 75 % रूचि  in Dunlop Tyres , the UK company which Sumitomo had formed , and in Dunlop Tire Corporation .
goodyear और sumitomo  also made investments in each other .
Today , the company makes a wide range of rubber based products ,  सहित ऑटोमोबाइल टायर , गोल्फ़ गेंदें और टेनिस  balls .
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware  एकीकृत विकास environments ( आईडीई ) विकसित by microsoft  that are lightweight versions of the Microsoft Visual Studio product line .
Express Editions were  conceived शुरूआत साथ  Visual Studio 2005 .
The idea of Express editions is to provide  streamlined , easy-to-use और easy-to-learn ides लिये  users other than professional software developers , such as hobbyists and students .
The Alps are one of the great mountain range systems  of यूरोपीय stretching लगभग आरपार आठ अल्पाइन  countries from Austria and Slovenia in the east , Switzerland , Liechtenstein , Germany , France to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south .
The mountains  यहूद formed over सैंकड़ों of लाखो of सालो  as the African and Eurasian tectonic plates collided .
Extreme shortening  caused by the इवेंट resulted in समुद्री sedimentary  rocks rising by thrusting and folding into high mountain peaks such as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn .
Mont Blanc spans the  french–italian किनारा , और  at is the highest mountain in the Alps .
The Alpine region area  contains अनेक  peaks higher than , known as the `` four-thousanders `` .
The altitude and size  of the दायरा affects the जलवायु in यूरोपीय ; in the kyu वर्षण  levels vary greatly and climatic conditions consist of distinct zones .
Wildlife such as ibex live in the higher peaks to elevations of ,  और पौधे ऐसे as edelweiss grow in रॉकी क्षेत्रों  in lower elevations as well as in higher elevations .
Evidence of human habitation in the Alps goes back to the  paleolithic era  .
A mummified man , determined to be 5,000 years old , was discovered on a glacier at the  austrian–italian किनारा in 1991 .
by the 6th सदी  BC , the Celtic La Tène culture was well established .
Hannibal may have  crossed the ऐल्प्स साथ a झुंड of  elephants , and the Romans had settlements in the region .
In 1800 Napoleon  crossed एक of  the mountain passes with an army of 40,000 .
The 18th and 19th centuries saw  an influx of naturalists , लेखक , और कलाकारों , in particular  the Romantics , followed by the golden age of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks .
In World War II the Third Reich invaded the Alpine countries , with the  एक्सेप्शन of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein  ; Adolf Hitler kept a base of operation in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war .
The Alpine  प्रदेश  has a strong cultural identity .
The traditional culture of farming , cheesemaking , and woodworking still exists in Alpine  गांवों , हालांकि the पर्यटक उद्योग began to grow जल्दी in the  20th century and expanded greatly after World War II to become the dominant industry by the end of the century .
The Winter Olympic Games have been hosted in the  स्विस , फ्रेंच , इतालवी  , Austrian and German Alps .
At present the region is  घर to 14 लाख लोगों और रै  120 million annual visitors .
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née  pewterschmidt ) is a अक्षर इससे the एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  Family Guy .
She is voiced by writer  एलेक्स borstein और पहला appeared on टेलीविज़न  , along with the rest of the family in the 15-minute short on December 20 , 1998 .
Lois was  निर्मित और designed by श्रेणी  creator Seth MacFarlane .
MacFarlane  थी  asked to pitch a pilot to the Fox Broadcasting Company based on Larry and Steve , a short made by MacFarlane which featured a middle-aged character named Larry and an intellectual dog , Steve .
After the pilot was given the green light ,  the griffin परिवार appeared  on the episode `` Death Has a Shadow `` .
लोइस is the माँ  of the Griffin family .
With her husband Peter  , वो रै था तीन  children : Meg , Chris , and Stewie .
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother , despite  उसके admitting to होने a ड्रग उपयोक्ता ,  a recovering meth addict kleptomaniac .
Lois has  भी था अनेक अफेयर्स ,  one of which allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg .
She has appeared in other media relating to Family Guy—including a video game , commercials and  books—and प्रेरित an संपूर्ण लकीर  of merchandise .
Lois 's distinctive New York accent originated from a character in a stage show that Alex Borstein had performed in , which was  largely प्रेरित  by a relative who grew up on Long Island , New York .
Family transmission of Basque language (  बास्क as आरंभिक भाषा  )
Percentage of students registered in  बास्क भाषा स्कूलों ( 2000–2005  ) .
Location of the  basque-language प्रांतों भीतर स्पेन और  France
Basque ( endonym : , ) is  the ancestral भाषा of the बास्क  people , who inhabit the Basque Country , a region spanning an area in northeastern Spain and southwestern France .
It is spoken by  27 % of basques in सब territories  ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ) .
Of these , 663,035 live in the Spanish part of  the बास्क देश  and the remaining 51,100 live in the French part .
In academic discussions of  the वितरण of  Basque in Spain and France , it is customary to refer to three ancient provinces in France and four Spanish provinces .
Native speakers are concentrated in a contiguous area including parts of the  स्पेनी autonomous समुदायों  of the Basque Country and Navarre and in the western half of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques .
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic Basque Country incorporating the traditional Spanish provinces of Biscay , Gipuzkoa , and Álava , which retain their  अस्तित्व as politico-administrative  divisions .
These provinces and many areas of Navarre are heavily populated by ethnic Basques , but Basque was , at least until the 1990s , not spoken as a native language in most of Álava , western parts of Biscay and central and southern areas of Navarre , either because it had been replaced by  स्पेनी साथ the  centuries , in some areas , or because it had never been spoken there , in other areas .
In southwestern France , the ancient Basque-populated provinces were Labourd ,  निम्नतर नावारा , और soule  .
They and other regions were consolidated into a single département in 1790 under the name Basses-Pyrénées  , a नाम जिससे persisted  until 1970 .
A standardized form of the Basque language , called Euskara Batua , was developed  by the बास्क भाषा अकादमी in the  late 1960s .
Euskara Batua was created so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by all Basque speakers—in formal situations ( education  , द्रव्यमान मीडिया , साहित्य ) ,  and this is its main use today .
The role of this standard Basque language depends  on the भाषाई शैक्षणिक मॉडल of  each region and each school .
In most areas of the Spanish Basque Country , the educational Model D , where all subjects are  सिखाया in बास्क , मगर `` स्पेनी भाषा  and literature '' ( which is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model .
In France , the Basque language school Seaska and the  संघ लिये a दुभाषिया ( बास्क और फ्रेंच ) schooling ikasbi मिलें a चौड़ी दायरा  of Basque language educational needs up to the Sixth Form , while often struggling to surmount financial and administrative constraints .
Apart from this standardized version , there are five main Basque dialects : Bizkaian , Gipuzkoan , and Upper Navarrese in Spain ,  और navarrese–lapurdian और zuberoan  ( in France ) .
हालांकि वे लो उनके names इससे the उल्लेखित  historic provinces , the dialect boundaries are not congruent with province boundaries .
The President , Directors and Company , of the Bank of the United States , commonly known as the First Bank of the United States , was a  सेंट्रल बैंको , चार्टर्ड लिये a पद of बीस  years , by the United States Congress on February 25 , 1791 .
स्थापना of the बैंको थी शामिल in a three-part विस्तार of संघीय फिस्कल और मौद्रिक शक्ति  ( along with a federal mint and excise taxes ) championed by Alexander Hamilton , first Secretary of the Treasury .
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to stabilize and improve the nation 's credit ,  और to improve हैंडलिंग of the वित्तीय कारोबार of the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी अंतर्गत the newly  enacted Constitution .
Officially proposed to the first session of the First Congress  in 1790 , हैमिल्टन 's बैंको faced फैली  resistance from opponents of increased federal power .
सचिव of राज्य थामस जेफरसन और जेम्स मैडिसन led the विपक्ष , जिससे claimed कि the बैंको थी असंवैधानिक , और कि  it benefited merchants and investors at the expense of the majority of the population .
The First Bank building is now a National Historic Landmark located in Philadelphia ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया भीतर स्वतंत्रता नेशनल ऐतिहासिक  Park .
James Wesley Marsters ( born August  20 , 1962 ) is an अमरीकी  actor and musician .
Marsters first came to the attention of the general public playing the popular  अक्षर स्पाइक , a platinum-blond yobbish अंग्रेज़ी पिशाच in  the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off series , Angel , from 1997 to 2004 .
Since then , he has gone on to play other science fiction roles , such as the alien supervillain Brainiac on the Superman -inspired series Smallville , the omnisexual time traveller Captain John  हार्ट in अंग्रेजों science-fiction दिखाएँ torchwood  and terrorist Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica .
Marsters appeared in a supporting role  in the 2007 फिल्म  P.S .
I Love You and as the main  विपक्षी , piccolo , in the 2009  fantasy adventure film Dragonball Evolution .
He appeared as a recurring character in the first season of the  पुनरुद्धार of  Hawaii 5-0 .
In molecular biology , human  chorionic gonadotropin  ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized egg after conception .
Later  दौरान गर्भावस्था it is बना by the विकासशील placenta  , and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast .
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore , elevated levels measured when the patient is not  गर्भवती can सीसे to a कर्कट निदान  .
However , it is not known whether this production is a contributing cause or an  प्रभाव of tumorigenesis  .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , is produced in the  pituitary ग्रंथि of males और  females of all ages .
, the FDA has  निषिद्ध the बिक्री of ``  homeopathic '' and over the counter hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal .
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter , known by  उसके स्टेज नाम बेयोंस ( ; born सितंबर  4 , 1981 ) , is an American singer , songwriter , dancer , and actress .
Born and raised in Houston , Texas , she performed in singing and dancing competitions as a child before  forming in 1990 a समूह साथ केली rowland और latavia roberson  that was eventually named Destiny 's Child .
Once signed to Columbia Records ,  the लड़कियों subsequently  became one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time .
The  समूह थी plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और  legal turmoil and Knowles suffered from depression that lasted for a number of years .
During the group 's hiatus , Knowles released her debut  सोलो एल्बम  Dangerously in Love ( 2003 ) , which earned her five Grammy Awards and has sold a total of 4.9 million copies in the US alone .
It spawned Billboard number one singles `` Crazy in Love , '' considered by VH1 to be the ``  महानतम सोंग of the 00 's ,  '' and `` Baby Boy . ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny 's Child in 2005 , Knowles 's second solo album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the top five singles `` Déjà Vu `` , `` Irreplaceable `` , and ``  खूबसूरत  Liar `` .
Her performance in Dreamgirls ( 2006 ) earned her two  सुनहरी ग्लोब nominations  .
Knowles ' work  playing etta जेम्स  in that film inspired her subsequent album I Am ...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits `` If I Were a Boy `` , `` Single Ladies ( Put a  रिंग on it ) `` , `` हेलो `` , और `` मीठी सपनो ``  .
The album also helped Knowles earn six Grammys in 2010 , breaking the record for  सबसे ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  won by a female artist in one night .
उसके चौथी एल्बम 4 ( 2011  ) deviated towards traditional R & B and became her fourth consecutive number one album on the Billboard 200 .
In January 2012 , Knowles gave birth to daughter Blue Ivy  कार्टर , उसके  first child with husband Jay-Z .
Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in the US and 118 million records worldwide (  as खूब as a further 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड साथ नियति 's चाइल्ड ) , और is एक of the best-selling  music artists of all time .
The Recording  उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका  ( RIAA ) recognized Knowles as the Top Certified Artist of the 2000s .
In 2009 , Billboard named her the Top Radio Songs Artist of the decade and ranked  उसके the शीर्ष  Female Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade .
Beyoncé Knowles is the  सबसे मनोनीत स्त्री in ग्रैमी पुरस्कार इतिहास , receiving 17 पुरस्कार ; अन्य accolades शामिल 12 एमटीवी वीडियो  Music Awards , 7 Billboard Awards including a Millennium Award , and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child .
`` Angry All the Time '' is the title of a song written by Bruce Robison and first  अंकित on उसके 1998 एल्बम लपेटा  .
It was later covered by  टिम mcgraw साथ अतिथि vocalist  Faith Hill .
Released in July 2001 , McGraw 's version was the  दूसरी सिंगल इससे mcgraw 's नियत  This Circus Down album .
The song reached Number One on the  बिलबोर्ड hot देश singles & ट्रैक्स ( अभी hot देश  Songs ) charts .
Dear John is a 2010  अमरीकी रोमांटिक नाटक - युद्ध  film starring Amanda Seyfried and Channing Tatum .
It was released theatrically in North America on  फ़रवरी 5 , 2010  .

It follows the  जीवन of a सिपाही  ( Channing Tatum ) after he falls in love with a young woman ( Amanda Seyfried ) .
They decide to exchange letters to each  अन्य बाद he is तैनात  to the war .
the फिल्म थी फिल्माया  in 2009 in Charleston , South Carolina .
Despite receiving negative reviews , the film made a strong box office performance , knocking off Avatar after seven weekends in first place and grossing a total  of $ 114,977,104 विश्वव्यापी  .
The film  थी released on  May 25 , 2010 on DVD and Blu-ray .
These are  सूचियाँ of the व्यस्ततम  airports in the United States .
Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International  विमानक्षेत्र is the व्यस्ततम सिंगल  airport in the United States .
However , all of  the नई यॉर्क नगर महानगर क्षेत्रफल 's एयरपोर्ट combine to  create the largest airport system in the United States , second in the world in terms of passenger traffic , and first in the world in terms of total flight operations .
Dora the Explorer is an American animated  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  created by Chris Gifford , Valerie Walsh , and Eric Weiner .
Dora the Explorer  became a नियमित श्रेणी in 2000  .

Santa Fe ( ; ( Tewa : Ogha Po'oge , ) ) is  the पूंजी of the  U.S. state of New Mexico .
It is the  fourth-largest नगर in  the state and is the seat of .
Santa Fe ( meaning “holy  faith”  in Spanish ) had a population of 67,947 in the 2010 census .
It is the principal city of a Metropolitan Statistical Area which encompasses all of Santa Fe County and is part of the larger  albuquerque-santa fe-las वेगास संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल  .
The city’s full name when founded was La  विला रियल de la सांता  Fé de San Francisco de Asís ( “The Royal Town of the Holy Faith of St. Francis of Assisi” ) .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi , formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft  पेय कि is उत्पादित और manufactured  by PepsiCo .
Created  और विकसित in 1893 और introduced as ब्रैड  's Drink , it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28 , 1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .

The Sons of Liberty was a group consisting of American patriots that originated  in the pre-independence उत्तर अमरीकी अंग्रेजों  colonies .
The group was formed to protect the rights of the   colonists and to take to the streets against the taxes by the British government .
They are best known for undertaking the Boston Tea Party in 1773 , which led to the Intolerable Acts ( an intense crackdown  by the अंग्रेजों  government ) , and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots .
Osaka  किला
is a city in the Kansai region of Japan  's प्रमुख द्वीप of होन्शू , a designated नगर अंतर्गत the लोकल स्वायत्तता विधि , the  capital city of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest part of the Keihanshin metropolis , which comprises three major cities of Japan , Kyoto , Osaka and Kobe .
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka Bay , Osaka is  जापानी 's तीसरा largest नगर by जनसांख्यिकी बाद  Tokyo ( special wards ) and Yokohama .
Keihanshin is the second largest  महानगर क्षेत्रफल in जापानी by जनसांख्यिकी और एक of the largest  metropolitan areas highly ranked in the world , with nearly 19 million people , and by GDP the second largest area in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world .
Historically the commercial center of Japan , Osaka functions as one of the  कमांड centers लिये the जापानी  economy .
The ratio between daytime and night time population is 141 % , the highest  in जापानी , highlighting इसके औकात  as an economic center .
Its nighttime  जनसांख्यिकी is 2.6 लाख , the तीसरा in the देश , लकिन in दिन the जनसांख्यिकी surges to 3.7 लाख , दूसरी तभी  after Tokyo ( combining the special wards of Tokyo , which is not a single incorporated city , for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ) .
Osaka used to be  referred to as the in सामंती  Edo period because it was the centre of trading for rice , creating the first modern futures exchange market in the world .
The  छोटी मरमेड is a 1989 अमरीकी  animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
Based on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen  , the छोटी मरमेड tells the स्टोरी of a खूबसूरत मरमेड  who dreams of becoming human .
Written , directed , and produced by Ron Clements and John Musker , with music by Alan Menken and Howard Ashman , the film features the voices  jodi बेंसन , क्रिस्टोफर  Daniel Barnes , Pat Carroll , Samuel E. Wright , Jason Marin , Kenneth Mars , Buddy Hacket , and Rene Auberjonois .
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series , The Little Mermaid was released to theaters on November 14 , 1989 to largely positive reviews , garnering $ 84 million at the box  दफ्तर दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज , और $ 211 लाख in कुल आजीवन सकल  .
After the success of the 1988  डिज़्नी / amblin फिल्मी जो framed रोजर  Rabbit , The Little Mermaid is given credit for breathing life back into the art of Disney animated feature films after a string of critical or commercial failures produced by Disney that dated back to the early 1970s .
It also marked the start of the  era ज्ञात as the  Disney Renaissance .
A stage adaptation of the film with a book by Doug Wright and  अतिरिक्त गीतों by एलन menken और नई  lyricist Glenn Slater opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10 , 2008 .

Purple drank is a slang term for a recreational drug  लोकप्रिय  in the hip hop community in the southern United States , originating in Houston , Texas .
Its main ingredient is  नुस्खा -strength खांसी  syrup containing codeine and promethazine .
Cough syrup is typically mixed with ingredients such as Sprite soft drink or  पहाड़ ओस और टुकड़े  of Jolly Rancher candy .
The purplish hue of  जामुनी पिया आता इससे dyes in  the cough syrup .
There are numerous slang terms for purple drank , including sizzurp , lean , syrup ,  पिया ,  barre , purple jelly , Texas tea , and Tsikuni .
First/given , middle , and last/family/surname diagram with  J. S. बच as उदाहरण .
J. S. Bach shared his given name  साथ छह तात्कालिक परिवार  members and many extended family members .
He  साझा उसके परिवार  name with most family members .
A given name , in  पश्चिमी contexts प्रायः referred to as a पहला नाम , is a निजी नाम  that specifies and differentiates between members of a group of individuals , especially in a family , all of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ) .
A given name is purposefully  दिए , प्रायः by a चाइल्ड  's parents at or near birth , in contrast to an inherited one such as a family name .
A given name is  sometimes legally बदला  through a name change .
Given names are  प्रायः प्रयुक्त in a परिचित  and friendly manner in informal situations .
In more formal situations  the उपनाम is प्रयुक्त बजाय , जबतक  it is necessary to distinguish between people with the same surname .
The idiom `` on a  first-name आधार '' ( or `` on first-name शर्तें  '' ) alludes to the familiarity of addressing another by a given name .
The western style  of having  both a family name ( surname ) and a given name is far from universal .
In many countries it is common for ordinary people  to have तभी एक  name ( a mononym ) .
Hydrochloric acid is a  साफ , colourless समाधान  of hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water .
It is a highly  क्षयकारी , दमदार  mineral acid with many industrial uses .
Hydrochloric acid is  मिला naturally  in gastric acid .
Historically called muriatic acid , and spirits of salt , hydrochloric acid was  उत्पादित इससे vitriol  ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt .
It first  appeared दौरान the पुनर्जागरण ,  and then it was used by chemists such as Glauber , Priestley and Davy in their scientific research .
With major  उत्पादन starting in the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति , हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड is प्रयुक्त  in the chemical industry as a chemical reagent in the large-scale production of vinyl chloride for PVC plastic , and MDI / TDI for polyurethane .
It has numerous  smaller-scale अनुप्रयोग , सहित household  cleaning , production of gelatin and other food additives , descaling , and leather processing .
About 20 million tonnes of  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड  are produced annually .
Wheat (  triticum spp . ) is  a cereal grain , originally from the Levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands , but now cultivated worldwide .
In 2010 , world production of  गेहूं थी 651 लाख टन , बनाना it the तीसरा  most-produced cereal after maize ( 844 million tons ) and rice ( 672 million tons ) .
Wheat was the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; world production in  कि साल थी 682 लाख टन  , after maize ( 817 million tons ) , and with rice as a close third ( 679 million tons ) .
This grain is grown on more  जमीन क्षेत्रफल than कोई  other commercial food .
World trade in wheat is greater than for all  अन्य फसलों संयुक्त  .
Globally , wheat is the leading source of vegetable protein in  इंसान खाना , having a उच्चतर प्रोटीन  content than soybeans or the other major cereals , maize ( corn ) or rice .
In terms of total production tonnages used for  खाना , it is फिलहाल दूसरी to राइस as the  main human food crop and ahead of maize , after allowing for maize 's more extensive use in animal feeds .
Wheat was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based societies at the start of civilization because it was one of the first crops that could be easily cultivated  on a विशाल स्केल , और था the अतिरिक्त लाभ of yielding a कटाई  that provides long-term storage of food .
Wheat contributed to the emergence of city-states in the Fertile  crescent , सहित  the Babylonian and Assyrian empires .
Wheat grain is a staple food used to  मेक आटा लिये leavened , चपटा और steamed  breads , biscuits , cookies , cakes , breakfast cereal , pasta , noodles , couscous and for fermentation to make beer , other alcoholic beverages , or biofuel .
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop for livestock , and its  स्ट्रॉ can be प्रयुक्त as a निर्माण  material for roofing thatch .
The whole grain can  be milled to छोड़ बस  the endosperm for white flour .
The by-products  of इस हैं चोकर  and germ .
The whole grain  is a concentrated  source of vitamins , minerals , and protein , while the refined grain is mostly starch .
मुद्रण
To publish  is to मेक सामग्री  available to the general public .
While specific use of the term may vary among countries , it is usually  लागू to टेक्स्ट  , images , or other audio-visual content on any traditional medium , including paper ( newspapers , magazines , catalogs , etc . ) .
The word publication means the act of publishing  , और भी refers to  any printed copies .
मेलिसा & जॉय is  an ABC Family original television series starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence .
It first aired on ABC Family on  अगस्त 17 , 2010  .
The series follows local politician Mel Burke ( Melissa Joan Hart ) and Joe Longo ( Joey Lawrence  ) , जिसको mel hires to dekh बाद उसके भांजी और  nephew after a Ponzi scheme leaves him broke .

On August 17 , 2012 , ABC Family renewed Melissa & Joey for a third season , set to  प्रीमियर in वसन्त 2013  .
The Dharma wheel , often used to represent  the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ
The Noble Eightfold Path ( , ) is one of the principal  शिक्षाओं of the बुद्ध  , who described it as the way leading to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening .
It is used to develop insight into the true nature of phenomena ( or reality ) and to  eradicate लोभ , द्वेष  , and delusion .
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the  बुद्ध 's चार प्रतिष्ठित सच्चाई ; the पहला  element of the Noble Eightfold Path is , in turn , an understanding of the Four Noble Truths .
It is also known as  the मध्य पाथ or  Middle Way .
All eight elements of  the  Path begin with the word `` right '' , which translates the word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ) .
These denote completion , togetherness , and coherence , and can also suggest  the होश of `` पूर्ण '' or `` आदर्श  '' .
'Samma ' is also translated as `` wholesome '' , ``  हिकमत  '' and `` skillful '' .
In Buddhist symbolism , the Noble Eightfold Path is often represented by means of the dharma  व्हील ( dharmachakra ) , जिनकी आठ तीलियां represent the आठ  elements of the path .
The Grammy Award for Song of the Year is an honor presented at the Grammy Awards , a ceremony that was established in 1958 and  originally पुकारा the gramophone पुरस्कार  .
पुरस्कार in अनेक श्रेणी हैं वितरित annually by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग  Arts and Sciences of the United States to `` honor artistic achievement , technical proficiency and overall excellence in the recording industry , without regard to album sales or chart position . ''
Economics is the social science that analyzes the production ,  वितरण , और खपत of goods  and services .
The term economics comes from the Ancient Greek ( ' , `` management of a household , administration '' ) from ( ' , `` house '' ) + ( ' , `` custom  '' or `` विधि '' ) , hence `` नियम of the  house ( hold ) '' .
Political economy was the earlier name for the subject , but economists in the late 19th  सदी सुझाया `` अर्थशास्त्र '' as a shorter पद लिये `` आर्थिक विज्ञान ''  that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation and as similar in form to `` mathematics `` , `` ethics '' , and so forth .
A focus of the  विषय is कैसा आर्थिक एजेंटों  behave or interact and how economies work .
Consistent with this , a  प्राथमिक textbook भेद is between  microeconomics and macroeconomics .
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic elements in the economy , including individual agents (  ऐसे as households और firms or as खरीदार और विक्रेता ) और  markets , and their interactions .
Macroeconomics analyzes the entire economy and issues affecting it , including unemployment ,  महंगाई  , economic growth , and monetary and fiscal policy .
Other broad distinctions include those  between धनात्मक अर्थशास्त्र ( describing `` कया is '' ) और normative अर्थशास्त्र  ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics ( more `` orthodox '' and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus '' ) and heterodox economics ( more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' ) .
Economic analysis may be applied throughout society , as in business , finance , health care , and government , but also to such diverse  विषय as अपराधों , शिक्षा , the परिवार , विधि  , politics , religion , social institutions , war , and science .
At the turn  of the 21st सदी , the expanding डोमेन  of economics in the social sciences has been described as economic imperialism .
An increasing number of economists have called  लिये increased जोर on पर्यावरणीय स्थिरता  ; this area of research is known as Ecological economics .
This is a list of Schedule IV drugs under the Controlled Substances Act for  the संयुक्त राज्य  .
जरूरी निष्कर्षों लिये दवाएँ  to be placed in this schedule:
The drug or other substance has a low potential for abuse  सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances  in schedule III .
The drug or other substance has a currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United  राज्य  .
Abuse of the drug or other substance may lead to limited physical dependence or psychological dependence relative to the drugs or other  substances  in schedule III .
The complete list  of अनुसूची  IV drugs are as follows .
The Administrative Controlled Substances  कोड क्रमांक लिये प्रत्येक ड्रग is शामिल  .

Median US household  आय , 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly  प्रयुक्त by the  United States government and private institutions .
Each household is  measured by the  income of every resident over the age of 15 .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment insurance , disability payments , child support payments received , regular rental  रसीदें , as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार , निवेश , or अन्य kinds of आय प्राप्त  routinely .
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been increasing  लगभग प्रत्येक साल इससे 1945 to 1999 ,  it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
U.S. median household income fell from $  51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502  in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United States , meaning households living  on कम than $ 2 प्रति दिन पहले सरकारी लाभ , doubled इससे 1996  to 1.5 million households in 2011 , including 2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head of  the household लिये उनके आय to  be considered part of the household 's income .
As households tend to share  a समान आर्थिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट ,  the use of household income remains among the most widely accepted measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort  कोई विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household  income categories , and may render direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible .
The lapse rate is defined as the rate of decrease with height for an  वायुमंडलीय परिवर्तनीय  .
The variable involved is  तापमान जबतक  specified otherwise .
The  शब्दावली arises इससे the शब्द  lapse in the sense of a decrease or decline .
While most often applied to Earth 's atmosphere the  अवधारणा can be विस्तारित  to any gravitationally supported ball of gas .
Blue  पहाड़ राज्य is an अमरीकी  comedy series that premiered on Spike on January 11 , 2010 .
The series  निर्माता शामिल क्रिस romano और eric  Falconer , and it is produced by Lionsgate Television .
The series is about a fictional university , Blue Mountain State , and  इसके फ़ुटबॉल टोली  , `` The Mountain Goats . ''
It  portrays निश्चित पहलुओं  of American university life , including football , sex , binge drinking , drugs , wild partying , and hazing .
In February 2012 , it was reported that Blue  पहाड़ राज्य होता नहीं be नवीनीकृत लिये a चौथी ऋतु  .
In March 2013 , Ed Marinaro stated that he is working on a  ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य फिल्मी .
Apple Inc. , formerly Apple Computer , Inc. , is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino , California that designs , develops ,  और बिकता उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स , कंप्यूटर तन्त्र  and personal computers .
Its best-known hardware products are the Mac line of computers ,  the ipod म्यूज़िक  player , the iPhone smartphone , and the iPad tablet computer .
Its software includes the OS X and iOS  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों , the itunes  media browser , the Safari web browser , and the iLife and iWork creativity and production suites .
The company was founded on April 1 , 1976 , and incorporated as Apple  कंप्यूटर , inc. on जनवरी 3 , 1977  .
The word `` Computer '' was removed from its name on January 9 , 2007 , reflecting its shifted focus towards  उपभोक्ता  electronics after the introduction of the iPhone .
Apple is the world 's  second-largest सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी कम्पनी by आय बाद  Samsung Electronics , and the world 's third-largest mobile phone maker after Samsung and Nokia .
Fortune magazine named Apple the most admired  कम्पनी in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 , और  in the world from 2008 to 2012 .
However , the company  रै प्राप्त आलोचना लिये इसके ठेकेदारों  ' labor practices , and for Apple 's own environmental and business practices .
, Apple maintains 394 retail  स्टोर्स  in fourteen countries as well as the online Apple Store and iTunes Store .
It is the second-largest publicly traded corporation in the world by market capitalization , with an  अनुमानित मान of us $ 414 अरब as of जनवरी  2013 .
,  the कम्पनी था 72,800 स्थाई  full-time employees and 3,300 temporary full-time employees worldwide .
Its worldwide annual  आय in 2012 totalled  $ 156 billion .
Section 8 housing in  the दक्षिण  Bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ) , often simply known as Section 8 , as repeatedly  amended , authorizes the भुगतान of rental आवास  assistance to private landlords on behalf of approximately 3.1 million low-income households .
It operates through several programs , the largest of which , the  आवास चुनाव वाउचर  program , pays a large portion of the rents and utilities of about 2.1 million households .
the  US Department of Housing and Urban Development manages the Section 8 programs .
The Housing Choice Voucher Program provides `` tenant-based '' rental  सहायता , so a किरायेदार can  move from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another .
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the purchase  of a घर , साथ over $ 17  billion going towards such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ) .
The maximum allowed  वाउचर is $ 2200  a month .
Section 8 also authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs , under which the owner reserves some or all of the units in a building for  low-income किरायेदारों , in वापसी लिये a संघीय सरकारी गारंटी to मेक up the अंतर between the  tenant 's contribution and the rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the government .
A tenant who leaves a  subsidized प्रोजेक्ट  will lose access to the project-based subsidy .
The United States Department of Housing and Urban Development and United States Department of Veterans  अफेयर्स have a खास खण्ड 8 कार्यक्रम पुकारा vash ( दिग्गजों अफेयर्स  Supportive Housing ) , or HUD-VASH , which gives out a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans .
